40001001	Jedi tue wayat keturun manu ke' Yesus Kristus, buboh Rajo Daud, buboh Abraham.
40001002	-
40001006	-
40001011	Jedi deri lapis Kei' Daud turun temurun sampai ke' lapis pada' reng Israel diserang ditangkap reng lalu dibeyie caro pakso ke' kota Babel nyeh, demo akei' puyang Yesus nyeh ya'am: 1) Rajo Daud 2) Salomo; ino' Salomo bokas bini Uria 3) Rehabeam 4) Abia 5) Asa 6) Yosafat 7) Yoram 8) Usia 9) Yotam 10) Ahas 11) Hiskia 12) Manase 13) Amon 14) Yosia, apa' Yekonya ken pada' dulor menyadie yeng merentah des pada' reng Israel dibeyie caro pakso ke' Babel mie.
40001012	-
40001016	Jedi deri lapis pada' reng Israel dibeyie caro pakso ke' Babel nyeh turun temurun sampai ke' kedetang Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah nyeh demo akei' puyang Yesus tei' ya'am: 1) Yekonya 2) Sealtiel 3) Serubabel 4) Abihud 5) Elyakim 6) Asor 7) Sadok 8) Akim 9) Eliud 10) Eleasar 11) Matan 12) Yakub 13) Yusup, laki Maria, yeng ngado Yesus lalu sampai ke' 14) Yesus, yeng didemo Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah.
40001017	Jedi deri Kei' Abraham sampai ke' Kei' Daud nyeh do empat belas lapis; deri Kei' Daud sampai ke' pada' reng Israel ditangkap dibeyie ke' Babel nyeh do empat belas lapis; a, deri pada' reng Israel ditangkap dibeyie ke' Babel nyeh sampai ke' kedetang Kristus nyeh pun do empat belas lapis.
40001018	Jedi cerito Yesus Kristus diado nyeh potue ne gesahe. Ino'e Maria kin betunáng ken reng bedemo Yusup. Jedi bolum sidoe diyam bekumpol seketidor seguring, poe Maria dah nganong, pie nganong tam kuwaso Roh Allah.
40001019	Ja'e Yusup si noe tawue ken Maria nganong go kuwaso Roh Allah. Sedang Yusup reng bujor, nan patoh nunoe ukum agama reng Israel. Jedi ngaso tunánge dah nganong tei' iyo pun na' sara', pie ngei'e ngembeba' bekau demo Maria di adap reng rami. Mangko kajie na' ngisei' pemulang amáng caro diyam-diyam nyem.
40001020	Jedi ketengah ngaji-ngajie tei' Yusup pun bemimpi. Lem mimpie do temeronyong melekat Tuwowe. Dah nyoe "O Yusup, buboh Daud," jie melekat. "Nang na' ngei' ngamie Maria kei bini kau, go ana' suwange do pun tam kuwaso Roh Allah," jie.
40001021	"Iyo cagar ngado ana' lelaki. Kau ca' ngendemoe Yesus*, go iyoam yeng langko' kei nyelamát umáte deri dosoe," jie melekat bepadah lem mimpi Yusup.
40001022	Semuya' nyoe pun kei nuntong pemadah Allah Tuwowe le' penijum Sen nyomie.
40001023	Go jie penijum nyomie, Reng dero bungas mat cagar nganong ken berana' siko' lelaki. Iyo cagar didemo Imanuel. Imanuel tei' retie Allah diyam ken diret. (Yesaya 7:14)
40001024	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe mat bengki'am Yusup. Dah bengki' tidor iyo pun nunoe po disuroh le' melekat Tuwowe. Maria tei' diamie kei binie. Lalu sidoe pun diyam bekumpol,
40001025	pie bolum seketidor seguring, kerado' ke' Maria berana'. Dah iyo berana' pun ana'e mat didemo le' Yusup Yesus.
40002001	Jedi tengkalo nyoe reng Israel berajo ke' Herodes, ketiko Yesus diado di kampong Betlehem mie, di peloya' Yudea. Jedi dah Yesus diado tei', dah nyoe do reng jagor bintang deri nenggeri jewoh, di ateh ke' timor nun. Sidoe detang deri nenggeri direte manu ke' kota Yerusalem.
40002002	Jedi dah detang ke' kota Yerusalem tei' lalu sidoe betentanyoe, "Dinaiam," jie, "ana' yeng dah diado, yeng langko' kei rajo reng Yahudi? Kami tawu ken rajo diado go kami dah merati bintang lamáte di timor. Mangko kami pun manu kitue na' nyomah iyo," jie sidoe.
40002003	Jedi Rajo Herodes ken pada' reng layin di kota Yerusalem pun ngerebeyang pengajie ningo gesah dah do rajo beru nyeh.
40002004	Mangko dikumpole le' Rajo Herodes pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' ugar agama Yahudi, lalu ditanyoe, "Mun jie penijum kam," jie Herodes, "Kristus yeng dijenyi kei rajo kam reng Yahudi nyeh langko' ca' diado dinai?"
40002005	"Di Betlehem, di peloya' Yudea," jie sidoe nyamut Rajo Herodes. "Go posan payit Allah yeng dicatat le' penijum siko' mie bungie potue," jie sidoe:
40002006	"Kampong Betlehem di Yudea noe iyo kampong sememerang peh, Betlehem tei' kampong tepileh deri kampong layin. Go deri Betlehem langko' do Pengiring kei ngiring umát Ku, reng Israel, jie Sen." (Mika 5:2) Nyoam tijum yeng dipadah pada' ugar agama Yahudi ke' Rajo Herodes.
40002007	Ningo paner bungi nyoe Rajo Herodes pun mangel pada' jagor bintang tadie, disurohe bekumpol caro besesulit nyem. Iyo na' ngenjeriji' ke' sidoe ari ken bulane bintang nyoe kememerue terobi' mie.
40002008	Dah nyoe jie Herodes nyingka' jagor bintang, "Turunam kam ke' Betlehem," jie, "kei ngogoe ana' biya' nyoe. Dah kam betomu kam padah ke' aku, go aku pun na' nyomah ke' iyo jum," jie.
40002009	-
40002010	Dah ningo bungi Rajo Herodes ponyoe, sidoe jagor bintang pun mat turunam. Diperatie do agei'am bintang lamát yeng dah sidoe merati di nenggeri direte nyomie. Ayah bikaham sidoe meratie! Geramam atie. Bintang nyeh pun ngulu sidoe sampai ke' Betlehem, bula' senopang rumah kediyam ana' biya' nyeh.
40002011	Dah nyoe tamoam sidoe ke' lem rumah. Dah merati biya' nyoe ken ino'e, sidoe pun nyomah ke' ana'e. Lalu dikoba'e pengunyo'e yeng paling mewah, demo ke' mas, menyán wangi, ken binya' ancit, diunyo'e ke' ana' biya' nyeh.
40002012	Dah nyoe sidoe jagor bintang . pulang ke' nenggeri direte. Pie pulang montas die, kehe sidoe ngelalu kota Yerusalem nyo' ngelapor ke' Rajo Herodes. Go sidoe dah dipadah le' Allah lem mimpi sidoe, nang na' pulang ke' Rajo Herodes.
40002013	Jedi dah reng jagor bintang pulang nyeh, melekat Tuwowe pun manu agei' ke' Yusup lem mimpie. Jie melekat, "Bengki'am Yusup," jie. "Kau ken ana' biya' nyoe ken ino'e ca' rari ke' Mesir. Go Rajo Herodes," jie, "cagar na' ngogoe ana' nyoe kei dibunohe. Jedi kamena' ca' diyam di Mesir nun lo'e. Pulang pun lamat lokase ca' nungu disuroh aku gi," jie melekat Tuwowe.
40002014	Jedi mátam, malam nyoe pun Yusup bengki' lalu pamus naban ana' biya' nyeh ken ino'e, nuju ke' Mesir.
40002015	Lalu diyam dinyoam manu ke' Herodes mati, berue pulang ke' nenggeri Israel. Nyoe pun tejedi kei nuntong tijum Tuwowe ngelalu penijum Sen mie, yeng bungie potue: Ku nyapo Ana' Ku di Mesir nyurohe pulang. (Hosea 11:1) Jedi mátam. Reng jagor bintang noam bepadah ke' Rajo Herodes ke' hal biya' nyoe, ngei'e nunoe po disuroh le' Herodes. Sidoe lintus pulangam ke' nenggeri direte.
40002016	Jedi ngaso dikelakar le' sidoe Rajo Herodes pun paling godie. Go maksut iyo mun dah tawu ken ana' biya' nai yeng langko' kei rajo nyeh na' dibunohe; pie tam sidoe jagor bintang noe bepadah, iyo pun noe tawu ken ana' biya' nai yeng langko' kei rajo, di Betlehem nun. Mangko Rajo Herodes nyuroh serededue munoh tiyap ko' ana' biya' lelaki yeng duwo tawun ke' beroh umore, di daerah kampong Betlehem. Nyurohe ca' yeng duwo tawun ke' beroh nyeh go iyo dah tawu deri reng jagor bintang mie ken bintang lamát yeng nano rajo diado nyeh kememerue terobi' dah duwo tawun nyomie ponyoe.
40002017	Jedi mátam. Pada' ana' biya' lelaki yeng duwo tawun ke' beroh nyeh mat dibunoh le' pada' serededu. Mangko dinyoam tuntongam pemadah penijum Yeremia mie. Tijume bungie potue:
40002018	Kedingo di Rama do bungi reng ngeloh perengkawung betentangis; Rahel* berato nangis pada' ana'e, ngei'e dilimu, go cum dah ana'e, jie tijum Yeremia. (Yeremia 31:15)
40002019	Jedi mátam, lamat belamat Rajo Herodes mat matiam, di nenggeri Israel. Dah nyoe melekat Tuwowe manu agei'am ke' Yusup lem mimpie di Mesir nun.
40002020	Jedi jie melekat Yaweh, "Bengki'am, tabanam ana' biya' nyoe ken ino'e pulang ke' nenggeri Israel. Go reng yeng na' munoh ana' biya' nyeh dah mati dah."
40002021	Lalu Yusup pun bengki', dah nyoe ditabane ana' biya' nyeh ken ino'e pulang ke' nenggeri Israel.
40002022	Pie dah nyoe kedingo Yusup ken Arkelaus, ana' Rajo Herodes, yeng kei penggenti apa'e. Ngaso ponyoe Yusup pun gola'e diyam di Yudea. Pie dah nyoe doam Allah madahe lem mimpie pai yeng ca' digewaie. Mangko Yusup sedena' mat ngaleh ke' peloya' Galilea,
40002023	lalu sedena' diyam di kampong Nasaret di peloya' nyoe. Nyoe pun tejedi kei nuntong yeng dipadah le' pada' penijum nyomie yeng bungie potue, "Iyo langko' didemo reng reng Nasaret," jie penijum nyeh.
40003001	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yohanes yeng didemo reng jum Penyolam tei' betongai madah posan Allah. Iyo madahe di ateh padang puwang nun, di peloya' Yudea, jewoh deri kota.
40003002	Iyo nyuroh pada' reng rami ca' bebeta' piker ke' hal dosoe, ca' tuno' taalo' ke' Allah, jie Yohanes, go jemán yeng dah lamat ditantie dicinto reng dah soma' dam, des Allah disomah kei rajo.
40003003	Yohanes tuam yeng kei nuntong tijum Yesaya nyomie. Jie tijum Yesaya nyomie bungie potue, Do reng kuwang kawung elo engko bepadah di padang puwang, bungie potue: Pemparangam jelan kei Tuwowe; pebujoram jelan kei Sen. (Yesaya 40:3) Jedi Yesaya mie nijum ke' hal Yohanes Penyolam.
40003004	Pekakas Yohanes ditonún deri bulu binatang unta; tali pingange deri kuli'.* Pemakane bunta' ken madu nyem.
40003005	Jedi benya' reng manu ke' Yohanes, na' ningo iyo ngajar; reng deri kota Yerusalem pun do, deri segonáp peloya' Yudea pun do, deri ateh sungai Yordan pun do.
40003006	Jedi dah ningo iyo ngajar, pada' reng rami nyeh mat na'e sidoe ngangkue dosoe; nyeretoam sidoe ken pemadah Yohanes. Lalu mat disolame le' Yohanes di Sungai Yordan.
40003007	Pie dah nyoe perati Yohanes tei' benya' jum reng deri kelompok Parisi ken reng deri kelompok Saduki yeng detang na' disolam jum. Jedi jie Yohanes, "Ha, pada' buboh ular, poe, yeng panai rari deri behayo. Nyeh kaji kam," jie, "mun kam disolam kam noe dikegodie diukum Allah peh gi? Pi noe kene! Sopai yeng madah kam tokoh nyoe?
40003008	Mun kam mat dah bebeta' piker si," jie Yohanes, "ca' do gewai ulah tingkah laku kam to' boktie. Ibarat ke' kayu din mun idup mat ca' bebuwah," jie.
40003009	"Nang na' ngarape kam dipelopas deri ukum Sen tam kam buboh ampeh Kei' Abraham," jie Yohanes. "Allah si tentu langko' nuntong jenyi Sen ke' Kei' Abraham nyo' ngendolat ngemberekat pada' buboh ampeh sen, pie Allah kin uleh Sen mulah keturun Kei' Abraham deri layin die. Noe sa' dituntong ke' kam tue pun. Mun Sen na' si mampu Sen mulah keturun Kei' Abraham deri pada' betu tue pun, kei didolat diberekat Sen. Nyoe mat-mátam.
40003010	Jedi kam," jie Yohanes, "mat ca' bebeta' pikeram mun kam na' didolat berekat Sen, ken kam dipelopas deri ukum Sen. Go Sen dah na' ngelaju ukum Sen dah. Ibarat ke' nobang kayu din beliyong dah diayun dah ke' betang kayu. Jedi senika' kayu yeng noe bebuwah panci si langko' ditobang lalu dilojang ke' lem api," jie Yohanes.
40003011	"Kam," jie Yohanes, "mat ca' siyap, go mat do reng siko' yeng dudi deri aku yeng langko' ngajar kam jum, pie iyo bekuwaso deri aku," jie. "Aku nyo' nyenting senale pun mat noe patut, sa'am go na' ngelayane nyo' ngenggewai gewai yeng penting," jie. "Mat die aku do nyolam kam ke' lem ayie kei nano kam bebeta' piker," jie Yohanes. "Pie iyo si langko' nyolam kam secaro roh, to' ngunyo' Roh Allah ke' kam. A, pie separo kam langko' disolame ke' lem api die.
40003012	Ibarat ke' padi din capane dah dijentinge dah, nyo' iyo nampie semuya' padie sampai bereseh bisam. Padie yeng dah bereseh nyeh langko' diongkahe ke' lem bedahe, pie pada' rumán ampoe si langko' dicucole ke' lem api yeng noe tepadam seora'-ora'eam," jie Yohanes. Bungi nyoam pemadah Yohanes kei negur pada' reng rami gei' sidoe bebeta' piker ke' hal dosoe.
40003013	Dah nyoe Yesus pun detang deri peloya' Galilea manu ke' Yohanes di sungai Yordan. Lalu iyo minta' na' disolam le' Yohanes.
40003014	Pie Yohanes na' nonga'e, go "Sepatute si," jie Yohanes, "aku yeng ca' disolam kau; noe patut kau disolam aku," jie.
40003015	Samut Yesus, "Pie ma'pusam aku disolam kau pun," jie. "Go tue pun," jie, "kei diret nuntong semuya' kemawo' Allah," jie Yesus. Ningo panere bungi nyoe si Yohanes pun mat nyolam Yesus.
40003016	Dah disolame tei' dah iyo nayi' ke' derat tei' temosie langi' pun tekoba', lalu diperatie Roh Allah pun turun na' po burong dero ngingap ke' Yesus.
40003017	Lalu kedingo suwaro deri serugo. "Tuam Ana' Kekaseh Ku," jie. "Mat paling ayah Ku ken iyo."
40004001	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus diiring le' Roh Allah ke' ateh padang puwang nun, arong sunyei', gei' digudo le' Pengelakar.
40004002	Jedi detang ke' padang tei' Yesus pun betara' noe makan, empat puloh ari empat puloh malam cum iyo makan, sampai pengasoe mat lapar nar.
40004003	Jedi dah empat puloh ari empat puloh malam tei' iyo mat dipanu le' Pengelakar yeng ngenggudoe, na' nyurohe bedoso. Lalu jie Pengelakar nyingka' Yesus, "Kau kin Ana' Allah," jie. "Boh kau nyuroh pada' betu tue menjedi roti, kei sego kau."
40004004	Pie jie samut Yesus, "Noe," jie, "go ditulis lem Kitap Allah nyeh, Mensiyo idup pun noe iyo engkas go jolu disego peh, pie pada' posan payit Allah die yeng nyuroh mensiyo idup," jie Yesus. (Ulang 8:3)
40004005	Dah nyoe iyo ditaban dibeyie le' Pengelakar ke' kota Yerusalem yeng suci. Detang kinun disurohe bediri di puco' bubong rumah kediyam Allah.
40004006	Dah nyoe jie Pengelakar, "A, kau kin Ana' Allah," jie. "Boh kau ngelumpat ke' beroh nun. Mun kau mat Ana' Allah kin kau noe beronso," jie, "tentu Allah ngiyas kau. Go kin ditulis lem Kitap Allah yeng bungie potue, Belo melekat disuroh Sen nulong kau; sidoe nyamut kau gei' kau noe beronso bemalo; kaki kau pun noe ningang betu," (Masmur 91:11) jie Pengelakar. "Ngelumpatam," jie. "Kau kin noe beronso," jie.
40004007	Pie samut Yesus, "Noe," jie, "go do jum ditulis lem Kitap Allah, Nang na' nguji Tuwowe, Allah kau," jie Yesus. (Ulang 6:16)
40004008	Dah nyoe ditabane agei' le' Pengelakar ke' tampo' buki' yeng paling tingie, lalu pada' kekayo kesugeh pada' nenggeri nenggero di deniyo tue ditunyo'e le' Pengelakar ke' Yesus kei iyo meratie.
40004009	"Tue," jie Pengelakar, "pada' semuya' kekayo kesugeh nenggeri nenggero ke' deng nyoe langko' ku unyo' ke' kau," jie, "sal ge' kau na' belutut nyomah ke' aku," jie Pengelakar.
40004010	Pie jie Yesus, "Rariam kau Pengelakar," jie. "Go dah ditulis lem Kitap Allah mie bungie potue, Kau ca' nyomah ke' Tuwowe, Allah kau; ca' patoh engkas ke' diret Sénam," jie Yesus. (Ulang 6:13)
40004011	Dah ningo Yesus bungi nyoe tei' Pengelakar pun temencaput rariam, ningal Yesus dinyoe. Dah Pengelakar rari sejurus pada' melekat die detang, lalu noyu merintu ngeleladen Yesus.
40004012	Dah nyoe Yesus pun ningo agah Yohanes Penyolam nyeh dipenjero le' rajo. Dah ningo agah nyoe Yesus pun ngaleh ke' ateh Galilea.
40004013	Iyo pinah deri kampong Nasaret ngaleh ke' kampong Kapernaum yeng soma' Lompoe Galilea. Peloya' nyoe didemo jum Peloya' Sebulon ken Peloya' Naptali. Jedi Yesus mat ngaleh kinyoe.
40004014	Go Yesus ngaleh kinyoe pun gei' dituntong tijum penijum Yesaya mie. Jie Yesaya mie,
40004015	Dingo beh kam di Sebulon ken Naptali, di pinger jelan yeng nuju ke' lawut nun, di seborang Sungai Yordan; Dingo beh kam di Galilea, nenggeri kediyam reng noe Yahudi pun;
40004016	Go mensiyo yeng diyam di sagam dah merati penampa' yeng paling tampa'; Penampa' Allah dah manyah ke' semuya' mensiyo, go mat cum mensiyo yeng timu rajang di belekang," jie Yesaya betijum nyomie. (Yesaya 9:1-2) Jedi dah Yesus ngaleh kinyoe mat tuntongam tijum nyoe.
40004017	Jedi dah Yesus ngaleh kinun iyo pun betongai madah ke' reng dinyoe. "Kam," jie, "ca' bebeta' piker ke' hal doso kam," jie, "go jemán yeng dah lamat ditantie dicinto kam dah soma' dam, des Allah disomah kei rajo."
40004018	Dah nyoe Yesus pun bejelan di pinger Lompoe Galilea. Lalu diperatie dinyoe tei' do reng duwo ko', ya'am Simon yeng didemo Petrus, ken menyadie Andreas. Gewai sidoe ngenjelo. Go sidoe nyoe pencarei'e udah-udah ngenjelo nyem.
40004019	Jedi dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Yo' kam tamah aku; kam kei murit ku. Ku na' ngajar kam kei kam menjedi penjelo mensiyo."
40004020	Jedi dah ningo Yesus ngaja'e bungi nyoe sidoe pun na'e. Jeloe lintus ditingale dinyoam, sidoe pun ngenjurut Yesus.
40004021	Jedi gei' bejelan tei' Yesus pun merati Yakobus ken Yohanes die. Sidoe duwo bemenyadie, apa'e demoe Sebedeus. Jedi Yesus merati sedena' tigo lem perawue, nyulam jeloe. Lalu Yesus nyapo Yakobus ken Yohanes jum, ngaja' sidoe kei murite.
40004022	Lintus sidoe duwo ditingale ming ponyoam apa'e ken perawue pun, lalu sidoe bemenyadie nyeh ngenjurut Yesus jum.
40004023	Lalu Yesus betatap begoyap di seruroh peloya' Galilea, ngajar di pada' rumah semeyang reng Yahudi. Iyo madah agah panci ke' hal des Allah disomah kei rajo; ge'em iyo membeyi' pada' reng saki' poníng rodang rungue.
40004024	Demo iyo pun tekemuko di seruroh nenggeri nyoe, sampai di nenggeri Siria jum. Mangko dibeyie ke' iyo pada' reng saki' poníng rodang rungue, demo ke' reng yeng kesarong setan, reng saki' saban, reng timpang opai. Semuya' segenoe mat dibeyie ke' Yesus, lalu iyo pun ngembeyi'e.
40004025	Paling rami reng ngenjurut iyo ketiko nyoe, dinai iyo dinyoam urang benya' nyeh yeng ngelulue iyo; reng deri peloya' Galilea pun do, deri kota Yerusalem pun do, deri peloya' Yudea pun do, deri kelompok kota yeng demoe Sepuloh Kota pun do, deri piya' nun Sungai Yordan pun do reng yeng ngenjurut iyo.
40005001	Jedi mátam, paling rami reng yeng ngenjurut Yesus. Ngaso benya' nar reng yeng ngenjurute lalu iyo mendeki natai, dudo', na' ngajar sidoe dinyoe. Pada' murite pun dudo' ngelilinge.
40005002	Lalu Yesus ngajar sidoe potue.
40005003	"Untong tuwaham kam yeng tawu ken kam mat cum bedeyo, yeng ngangkue ken kam perelu ken Allah, go kamame' yeng konoe kawum des Allah disomah kei rajo.
40005004	"Untong tuwaham kam yeng susah sontok tam doso, go kamam yeng dilimu le' Allah.
40005005	"Untong tuwaham kam yeng suyo', yeng arap ken Allah bangam, go kamam yeng nerimoe semuya' yeng dijenyi Allah.
40005006	"Untong tuwaham kam yeng paling ngemoran na' menjedi bujor benar po Allah, go cinto kam pasti dituntong Sen.
40005007	"Untong tuwaham kam yeng ngaseh reng susah, go kaseh kam langko' dibelas.
40005008	"Untong tuwaham kam yeng patoh ken Allah sebulat ati, go kamam yeng begelumo ken Sen.
40005009	"Untong tuwaham kam yeng ngendamai urang, yeng nunyo' jelan yeng panci ke' betor, go kamam yeng langko' didemo ana' Allah.
40005010	"Untong tuwaham kam mun kam diiro dikenyayo reng go kelaku kam bujor benar; ca' ayah bikah, go kamame' yeng konoe kawum des Allah disomah kei rajo.
40005011	Jedi sege' kam diolo'-olo' reng, disensare reng, dipempulah reng go kam arap ken aku, pie kam mat untong tuwaham!
40005012	Ca' besukor, beayah bikah, beriyah beramilah! Semalang ke' pada' penijum yeng pecayo mie ge'e, dikenyayo reng, sa'am go kam. Jedi kam ca' paling ayah bikah, go paling bosai upah yeng diajen nyo' kam di serugo nun," jie Yesus.
40005013	"Po geram dilaboh ke' rompah ponyoe jum kam di antaro pada' mensiyo di deniyo tue. Pie geram yeng dah telampoh tabar noe tawu dipulah masing agei'. Mat cum gunoe, dibuwang ngóng nyem, lalu ditija'-tija' reng," jie Yesus.
40005014	"Kam nyo' tanyoh seruroh deniyo tue. Kam nan diperati reng, keedah kampong di tampo' buki' yeng maloe nar.
40005015	"Mun reng mantong pelito kin dileta'e di tongah rumah gei' tampa' semuya' rumah. Noe ken pelito dah dipantong lalu diserangkong reng ken gentang.
40005016	"A, ponyoe jum kam. Tanyoh kam nang na' diselinong; ca' manyah di tongah semuya' reng benya', gei' pada' reng merati tingkah laku kam yeng panci yeng benar. Sege' reng merati gewai panci kam sidoe pun tetap mugi Allah, Apa' kam di serugo," jie Yesus.

40008001	Jedi mátam, dah nyoe Yesus pun turun deri natai. Pada' reng rami pun ngenjurute jum.
40008002	Dah nyoe iyo dipanu le' siko' reng saki' kusta, penyaki' yeng behayo nar.* Jedi dah detang ke' adap Yesus nyeh reng saki' kusta pun nungkup belutut di adap Yesus, lalu minta' tulong. "Tuwowe," jie, "mun den na' nyuroh penyaki' ku tue beyi' si pasti uleh den," jie.
40008003	Yesus pun mat nyampang jerie ke' reng saki' nyeh. "Ku na' ku nulong kau," jie. "Beyi'am penyaki' kau," jie. Tumas paner Yesus bungi nyoe tei' reng yeng saki' kusta sengkunyong beyi'am.
40008004	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Tue," jie, "kau ca' manu ke' pelayan Allah di rumah kediyam Allah lo'e, nyo' iyo mereso kuli' kau, gei' iyo merati ken penyaki' kau dah beyi'. A, beyie jum kinun pesaling nyo' adat pembereseh kau na' po yeng disuroh le' Kei' Musa mie, kei ngembokti ke' reng rami ken penyaki' kau dah beyi' dah," jie Yesus. "Pie nang na' dipadah ke' sopai pun ken aku yeng ngembeyi' kau," jie.
40008005	Jedi Yesus sidoe mat bejelan ke' kampong Kapernaum. Dah detang ke' kampong Kapernaum tei' iyo dipanu le' siko' kapten tentara yeng muhún mampal na' minta' tulonge.
40008006	Jedi jie kapten nyingka' Yesus, "Tuwowe," jie, "ana' buwah ku saki' uyoham di rumah ku nun, noe bengki'-bengki' nyem, nolehe begerak," jie.
40008007	"Yo'am demoe kinun," jie Yesus, "nyo' ku ngembeyi'e," jie.
40008008	Pie samut kapten tentara nyeh, "Tuwowe," jie, "den mat noe patut ke' rumah aku," jie. "Pie mun den mat na' nulong aku, den bekosoh deri tue ja'; ana' buwah ku pun beyi'am," jie.
40008009	"Aku kin tawu ke' hal nyuroh reng pakai caro bekato nyem, go aku pun tuno' ke' pemimpin aku, ken do jum ulun pesuroh aku yeng tuno' ke' aku. Aku nyuroh pada' pesuroh ku pun pakai caro bekato nyem; misale kinun jie ku; mangko pesuroh ku pun tetap kinunam. Atau kitue jie ku, mangko iyo pun mat manuam. Pai-pai pun yeng disuroh aku mat digewai le' pada' pesuroh ku. Mangko ku yakin, mun den na' ngembeyi' ana' buwah ku pakai caro bekato nyem pun pasti beyi'am penyaki'e," jie kapten nyeh.
40008010	Dah ningo paner kapten bungi nyoe tei' mat kangápam Yesus, go kapten nyeh mat yakin nar ken kuwaso Yesus, poe. Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' pada' reng rami yeng ngenjurute, "Dingo beh kam, paner kapten nyeh. So ku di seruroh nenggeri Israel tue pun cum yeng nyamo kepecayo reng tue," jie Yesus.
40008011	"(Enah dih? Yeng diangap kam rangang, yeng noe dikawum ken umát Allah nyeh pie manseh yakinam kepecayoe deri kepecayo kam reng Yahudi pun. Pie tarah ke' ponyoam des Allah disomah kei rajo)," jie Yesus. "Go des Allah disomah kei rajo gi," jie, "langko' rami nar pada' reng noe Yahudi pun, deri semuya' nenggeri nenggero di seruroh deniyo tue," jie, "yeng langko' ngadap pesta Sen gi, beroto ken Kei' Abraham, Kei' Isak ken Kei' Yakub pun.
40008012	Pie tekonoe ke' umát Sen reng Yahudi yeng menurute ca' ngadape si pie separoe mat noe diterimoe, malah ken paie ditunong Sen ke' luwar ke' arong sagamam. Dinyoe sidoe langko' kesal ngiyal, nangis nentumau lolauam," jie Yesus. "Mangko kam Yahudi mat ca' ati-ati nar ngaji kepecayo kam," jie.
40008013	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' kapten nyeh, "A, bom," jie, "kau na' pulangam pun," jie. "Go yeng dipinta' kau langko' dituntongam, cuco' ken kepecayo kau," jie. Lalu mátam. Pas bungi nyoe paner Yesus tei' ana' buwah kapten pun mat beyi'am.
40008014	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus sidoe nayi' ke' lem rumah Simon. Detang ke' lem rumah tei' diperati Yesus tei' mentuwo Simon yeng betinoe nyeh domám, noe bengki'-bengki' nyem.
40008015	Dah nyoe Yesus nigue jerie. Tumas ditigue tei' domáme pun beyi'am. Dah beyi' tei' iyo pun bengki' lalu ngeleladen Yesus sidoe.
40008016	Jedi dah ujong ari ponyoe mat benya' jum pada' reng yeng naban betore yeng kesarong setan nyeh ke' Yesus. Yesus pun nunong pada' setan deri reng yeng dikesaronge pakai caro bekato nyem, ken pada' reng yeng saki' pun dipebeyi'e jum.
40008017	Nyoe pun kei nuntong yeng ditulis le' penijum Yesaya mie yeng bungie potue, Kesaki' kejoreh kesusah kesontok diret ditangong le' iyo, jie Yesaya. (Yesaya 53:4)
40008018	Jedi mátam. Mat rami nar reng yeng bekumpol ngopong ngeliling Yesus dinyoe. Ngaso ponyoe iyo nyuroh murite besesiyap nyo' nyemorang lompoe beroto ken iyo kaloe ponyoe.
40008019	Dah nyoe iyo dipanu le' siko' ugar agama yeng na' ngenjurute jum. Jedi jie ugar agama nyeh, "Guru," jie, "ku dah mutuse na' ngenjurut den konai-nai pun, to' murit den," jie.
40008020	Pie samut Yesus, "Gola' arap-arap," jie, "go aku mat cum rumah tangoe ku di deniyo tue. Tekonoe ke' binatang utan* si mat do rumange; tekonoe ke' burong pun ponyoe jum, sarange do. Pie aku Ana' Mensiyo si mat cumam rumah tangoe kediyam kedonoe ku di deniyo tue. Nyeh mat relo peh kau idup tokoh nyoe?" jie Yesus.
40008021	Dah nyoe do siko' reng layin, murite jum, yeng na' namah Yesus ketiko nyoe. Pie iyo bepadah ke' Yesus, "Mun borie den," jie, "ku gei' na' noyu merintu apa' ku lo'e. Dah sen mati, dah santo' kerinah kemati sen si ku mat na' namah den, Tuwowei," jie.
40008022	Pie Yesus nyamute, "Ngerinah kemati apa' kau si," jie, "diserah ke' waris wala' kau yeng bolum idup secaro roh; ma'am reng yeng mati dikerinah le' reng yeng mati. Pie yeng penting begi kau si kau ca' namah aku to' murit ku," jie Yesus.
40008023	Jedi mátam, dah nyoe Yesus pun nayi' ke' lem perawu nyeh. Pada' murite namahe jum.
40008024	Jedi dah detang ke' penenongah lompoe tei' semorie siyut! buwowe yeng paling ontap. Ayie pun mensiyok-mensiyokam tamoe lem perawu nyeh tam pada' gelumang bosai. Sedang Yesus si gei' tidor di lem perawu.
40008025	Jedi ngaso behayo tei' murit Yesus pun teger ngenggora'e. "Tulong ge', Tuwowe," jie. "Diret dah na' lomas dah!" jie.
40008026	Pie Yesus nyamute, "Gopai go kam gola'? Cum peh kepecayo kam?" jie. Dah nyoe Yesus pun mat bengki', lalu nonga' nedoh buwowe ken pada' gelumang nyeh. Semorie rap! tenángam lompoe nyeh; gelumang pun tedoham.
40008027	Jedi merati tokoh nyoe tei' pada' murite pun kangápam, lalu bepaner ken pada' betore, "Sopai nin beh máte reng tue," jie, "go buwowe ken pada' gelumang pun na'e tuno' ke' iyo," jie sidoe.
40008028	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yesus sidoe mat detangam ke' seborang lompoe nyeh te', ke' nenggeri reng Gerasa. Dah detang ke' seborang tei' sidoe pun mat nayi' ke' derat. Lalu dah nyoe Yesus dipanu le' reng duwo ko' yeng kesarong setan, detang deri pada' tama'. Sidoe duwo nyeh tei' mat gilo bereni, sampai cum reng yeng bereni bejelan ngerudu arong nyoe.
40008029	Jedi dah merati Yesus tei' reng duwo ko' yeng kesarong setan nyeh tei' mangkas ontap pera' perango. "Ana' Allah!" jie. "Nang ngaru kami! Ngopai go kau na' mempungah kami? Tue kin bolum jengkahe yeng ditentu Sen nyo' kau mempungah kami," jie sidoe duwo nyeh.
40008030	Jedi di natai yeng jewoh kit tei' poe mat benya' pada' kaban bebi yeng diingún, nyungkal dinyoe.
40008031	Lalu pada' setan yeng nyarong ke' reng duwo ko' nyeh muhún ke' Yesus mun iyo langko' nunonge iyo minta' dialeh ja' ke' pada' kaban bebi die.
40008032	Lalu dah nyoe Yesus mat nunong pada' setan nyeh te'. "Rariam," jie Yesus nyingka' pada' setan nyeh. Mangko pada' setan pun bejejiyoh keluwar deri reng yeng disaronge te', lalu nyarong ke' pada' kaban bebi die. Tumas nyarong ke' pada' kaban bebi tei' lalu pada' kaban bebi tei' pegerudus! ngerurus deri kenaming tingie nyeh bung! ngencabur ke' ayie, lalu pada' kaban bebi pun mat mati lomasam.
40008033	Pada' penungu bebi pun pederobas rari ke' kamponge, lalu diagah awohe gesah ke' hal bebi ken ke' hal reng yeng kesarong setan nyeh te'.
40008034	Dah ningo gesah nyoe tei' pada' reng kampong nyoe bejejiyoh manu ke' Yesus soma' lompoe nun. Dah betomu ken Yesus tei' dah merati pada' bebie mat dah mati nyeh gola'am sidoe, lalu sidoe pun muhún mampal ke' Yesus gei' iyo rariam deri peloya' kampong sidoe; nang na' diyam dinyoe, jie sidoe.
40009001	Jedi ngaso ningo paner sidoe yeng bungi nyoe tei' lalu Yesus pun mat nayi' perawu nyeh agei'am, lalu nyemorang lompoe nyeh pulang ke' kampong direte*.
40009002	Jedi detang ke' kampong direte tei' poe do reng nangong reng siko' ken tikare; urange timpang. Diperati le' Yesus tei' sidoe mat pecayoam ken kuwaso iyo. Lalu jie Yesus nyingka' reng timpang nyeh, "Nang na' susah, jangei. Dah dielon dah doso kau," jie Yesus.
40009003	Jedi di antaro pada' reng rami nyeh do jum pada' ugar agama dinyoe. Jedi ningo paner Yesus bungi nyoe tei' pada' ugar agama nyeh do bekengkaji lem atie nun, "Eis, somong nar reng nyoe!" jie lem atie nun. "Iyo menghina ngeremeh Allah, go iyo ngangap direte samo ken Allah, poe," jie.
40009004	Pie Yesus si mat tawue ken pengaji sidoe tokoh nyoe, lalu jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Gopai go pengaji kam jat ponyoe?

40009006	Kaji kam aku noe bekuwaso ento' ngelon doso reng, dih? Nyoe pun maring dibokti, go noe awas ken mato diret. Pie potue ne ku ngemboktie ke' kam omóng ku tadie. Jedi diret kin tawu ken ngat Allaham yeng tawu ngelon doso reng. Ken ngat Allaham jum yeng tawu ngembeyi' reng caro bekato nyem. A, jedi mun aku yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo mampu ngembeyi' reng tue, maksute aku bekuwaso ento' ngelon dosoe jum, mat noe?" Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' reng timpang nyeh, "Bengki'am kau," jie, "tangongam tikar kau nyeh, bom na' pulang bediret kau pun," jie.
40009007	Seroto ningo omóng Yesus bungi nyoe tei' reng timpang pun mat bengki'am, lalu pulangam. Mat sengkunyong jogaram reng timpang nyeh te'.
40009008	Dah pada' reng rami merati gewai Yesus nyeh mat kangápam, lalu sidoe mugi Allah tam Sen nyuroh mensiyo bekuwaso tokoh nyoe.
40009009	Jedi dah ningal arong nyoe tei' Yesus pun merati reng bedemo Matius. Matius tei' nongah dudo' di pos penageh pajak nyeh, go tugase mat ngumpol nageh pajak pemerentah. Jedi jie Yesus nyingka' Matius, "Yo' tamah aku to' murit ku," jie. Lintus Matius pun ditingaleam gewaie dinyoe lalu mat namah Yesus.
40009010	Jedi dah kaloe ponyoe Yesus pun makan di rumah Matius. A, pada' reng penageh pajak pemerentah, ken pada' reng layin yeng dihina reng Parisi, yeng diangape reng jat nyeh pun do jum makan beroto ken Yesus ken murite.
40009011	Jedi ngaso ponyoe tei' pada' reng Parisi nyeh betanyoe ke' murit Yesus. "Ngopai beh," jie, "go guru kam na'e makan ken pada' penageh pajak ken pada' reng layin yeng jat-jat ponyoe?" jie.
40009012	Pie Yesus pun ningo paner reng Parisi bungi nyoe te', lalu Yesusam yeng nyamute. "Noe iyo reng jogar peh yeng perelu ditentamo," jie, "pie reng yeng saki' die.
40009013	Mangko aku pun," jie Yesus, "detang nyo' ngunang ngamie pada' reng bedoso die, noe iyo nyo' ngunang ngamie pada' reng bujor benar peh," jie. "Nyoe pun cuco' ken yeng dipadah Allah di lem kitap Sen mie yeng bungie potue, Yeng ku ingín deri kam, jie Sen, noe iyo pada' pesaling peh, pie yeng ku ingín deri kam gei' kam ngaseh nulong betor, jie Allah. (Hosea 6:6) A, kam," jie Yesus, ca' neliti ngenjerumát pemadah Sen dinyoe. Mun diitong-itong kam si kam langko' jelas jum ken gewai aku yeng nulong ngaseh pada' reng yeng diangap kam reng bedoso nyeh," jie Yesus.
40009014	Jedi dah nyoe do deri murit Yohanes Penyolam yeng manu na' betanyoe ke' Yesus. Jedi jie sidoe, "Ngopai beh," jie, "tekonoe ke' kami murit Yohanes ken pada' murit kelompok reng Parisi si mat koloe betara' noe makan. Pie tekonoe ke' murit kau gopai go noe koloe?" jie.
40009015	Lalu Yesus nyamut sidoe caro betanyoe. "Umpamoe des kelelotong reng pesta sabat nyeh patut noe mun pada' pengabange berato berayi? Kin noe patutam; malah ken paie beriyah beramiam pada' pengabange, sementaro penganting lelaki nyeh gei' do ken sidoe. Mat noe buleh pengabange betara' noe makan! Pie langko' do jum jengkahe des penganting lelaki nyeh diamie dirobut deri sidoe. Dah nyoe si mat doam pada' kabane yeng betara'," jie Yesus. "Jedi ponyoe jum murit ku ken aku," jie.
40009016	Dah nyoe Yesus nyamong panere pakai perempamo. "Noe ken do reng nampal beju lamat pakai bonáng yeng gei' beru, dih? Go bonáng yeng beru kin dah ditopas kaloe tekota', lalu pengabise cabi'e tadie kin bosai-bosai.
40009017	"A, ponyoe jum ke' hal ayie angur yeng beru, yeng gei' bolum popah nyeh. Noe ken disaling reng ke' lem kantong kuli' yeng lamat yeng dah korue nyeh. Go mun disaling kinyoe kin dah angur beru popah kin kantong lamat nyeh pasti melotus, lalu kededuwoe nyeh rugi modasam. Ayie angur pun bis tumpah modas, ken kantong nyeh pun pocah bolah. Pi yeng konoe si," jie Yesus, "ayie angur yeng beru nyeh mat ca' disaling ke' lem kantong kuli' yeng beru jum, gei' sempayo kededuwo nyeh samo bodan," jie.
40009018	Jedi Yesus tei' ngajar. Jedi ketengah iyo ngajar do siko' pemimpin umát reng Yahudi yeng manu ke' iyo, lalu belutut di adap Yesus. "Tulong ge' aku tue," jie. "Ana' ku gei' beruam mati," jie. "Pi kau mampu nyurohe idup agei', mun kau relo detang ke' rumah ku kei kau migange," jie.
40009019	Jedi mátam, Yesus mat ningal omónge dinyoe, lintus iyo ken murite namah reng nyoe, nuju ke' rumahe.
40009020	Di tongah jelan iyo dijurut siko' reng betinoe yeng saki'; penyaki'e nan detang bulan noe berenti-renti; dah duwo belas tawun dah pelamate iyo ngidape. Jedi iyo ngenjurut deri belekang, lalu nigue samang beju Yesus.
40009021	Go kajie lem atie nun, "Mun ku ngat nigue bejue pun pasti beyi'am penyaki' ku," jie. Lalu mat ditigue.
40009022	Dah iyo nigue beju Yesus tei' Yesus pun ngelinga' ke' belekang, lalu jie nyingka' reng betinoe, "Den ca' beayah bikaham, buei," jie, "go penyaki' den dah beyi' tam den arap ken kuwaso aku," jie Yesus. Lintus urang nyeh mat beyi' laluam.
40009023	Dah nyoe Yesus ken murite gei' melaju pejelane ke' rumah pemimpin yeng minta' tulong tadie. Jedi dah detang ke' rumahe diperati Yesus tei' mat benya' nar reng dinyoe, iroh, kamoh miyoh susah sontok cukup ken pada' reng besuling opai, nangis ana' biya' yeng mati nyeh.
40009024	Lalu jie Yesus nyingka' reng rami dinyoe, "Pamusam kam," jie. "Ana' biya' nyeh bede ke' mati; iyo tidor nyem." Pie reng rami nyeh diketawoe nyem paner Yesus, diolo'-olo'e.
40009025	Jedi dah nyoe, dah reng rami disuroh reng ke' luwar tei', lalu Yesus tamoe ke' kamar ana' biya' betinoe. Dah tamoe kinyoe dijepaie jerie. Temosie biya' nyoe idup agei'am, dah nyoe iyo bengki' deri tikare.
40009026	Agah ke' hal iyo ngidup ana' biya' nyoe tei' tesebar tegempar ke' seruroh peloya' nyoe.
40009027	Dah nyoe tumas dah pamus deri rumah bokas reng mati nyeh tei' Yesus bejelan. Lalu dijurute le' duwo ko' reng lelaki yeng butoe. Sidoe ngenjurute samel bepangkas, "Ta' tulong den, Buboh Rajo Daudei," jie.
40009028	Jedi dah Yesus tamoe ke' rumah tei' sidoe duwo pun tamoe jum, ngenjurut iyo. Jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Nyeh, kam duwo pecayo noei ken aku bekuwaso nulong kam?" "Pecayo, Tuwowei," jie.
40009029	Lalu dijemele le' Yesus ke' mato sidoe, samel bepadah, "Mun ponyoe mencinángam kam," jie, "kei nuntong kepecayo kam."
40009030	Semorie mat mencinángam sidoe. Dah nyoe Yesus tegas nonga' sidoe nang na' bepadah ke' sopai pun ken iyoam yeng ngembeyi' sidoe.
40009031	Pie sidoe nyeh kebelike, tarah ke' mat diagah awohe jemar luwas ke' seruroh peloya' nyoe.
40009032	Jedi sejurus pamus keluwar reng yeng bokas butoe nyeh tei' lalu reng bisue die ditaban reng ke' Yesus. Iyo bisue tam kesarong setan.
40009033	Dah nyoe setan nyeh ditunong le' Yesus. Seroto dah ditunonge setan tei' temosie uleheam reng nyoe bepaner. Pada' reng rami yeng meratie si kangápam. Jie sidoe, "Diret reng Israel pun beruam merati gewai tokoh tue," jie. "Selomo kin noe koloe," jie.
40009034	Pie jie pada' reng kelompok Parisi, "Jolu ge' iyo dikuwaso le' kepala' pada' antu setan nyeh keh," jie, "nyoam go iyo tawu nunong setan."
40009035	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus pun bejelan betatap ke' seruroh kampong halamán, ngajar di pada' rumah semeyang reng Yahudi. Iyo madah agah panci, ke' hal jemán yeng nan dicinto ditantie reng, des Allah disomah kei rajo. Ge'em iyo ngembeyi' pada' reng yeng ngidap bemacam bejenis penyaki'.
40009036	Pada' reng rami nan ngenjurute, konai iyo kinyoe jum pada' reng rami nyeh. Paling kaseh Yesus merati pada' reng rami, go sidoe mat susah sontok, mat noe bedeyo, na' po pada' domo yeng cum bepenungu.
40009037	Lalu jie Yesus nyingka' murite, "Deniyo tue," jie, "keedah umo yeng luwah yeng sedang na' digotam, pie celoe mat sikitam reng yeng ngenggewaie.
40009038	Mangko kam," jie, "ca' bedoa ke' Tuwowe umo nyeh, gei' Sen ngutus reng kei ngotam umo Sen," jie Yesus.
40010001	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus ngumpol murite yeng duwo belas ko' nyeh, lalu iyo nguwaso sidoe gei' sidoe mampu jum nunong setan ken ngembeyi' pada' penyaki' reng yeng bemacam bejenis pun.
40010002	Demo pada' pelantar posan Yesus tei' ya'am yeng pertamoe nyeh Simon, yeng digelare jum Petrus, ken Andreas; sidoe duwo tei' bemenyadie. Dah nyoe Yakobus ken Yohanes; sidoe duwo pun bemenyadie jum. Apa'e tei' Sebedeus.

40010005	Jedi dah sidoe duwo belas ko' dikuwaso le' Yesus, iyo pun ngutuse kei manu ke' pada' kampong halamán reng Israel. 40010006	Pie yeng ca' dipanu kam," jie, "pada' reng Israel die, yeng na' po domo yeng sosat, yeng cum penungue.
40010007	Jedi tuju pejelan kam," jie, "to' kam madah ke' reng Israel ken tue dah jengkahe yeng lamat dah dicinto ditantie le' sidoe, des Allah disomah mensiyo kei rajoe.
40010008	Ge'em," jie Yesus: "Reng saki' ca' dipebeyi', reng mati ca' disuroh bengki' idup reng saki' kusta ca' dipebeyi', pada' setan ca' ditunong. Kam ca' nulong reng caro modas- modasam," jie Yesus, "go kam pun ditulong caro modas-modasam.

40010010	Kam pegi bejelan pun," jie, "noe sa' meyie bokal sangue demo ke' pakai ingap, demo ke' beban bereno, demo ke' tungkat semamu, demo ke'... bokal duwit sikit pun, beyi' pun duwit mas, demo ke' duwit perak, demo ke' duwit temego; noe sa'am," jie. 40010011	"Jedi," jie Yesus, "dah kam detang ke' kota atau pun kampong, gogoam," jie, "reng yeng na' nerimoe kam, dah nyoe kam ca' antang tetap dinyoam, nang na' bepinah bealeh sampai ke' kam ningal kampong nyoe.
40010012	Jedi sal ge' nayi' ke' rumah sopai pun," jie, "urange ca' diberekat kam.
40010013	Mun reng seberumah nyoe mat nerimoe kam si dolat nyoe mat dituntong; pi mun kam noe diterimoe le' sidoe, dolat kam noe dituntong ke' sidoe.
40010014	Gola' do rumah atau pun kampong yeng ngei' nerimoe kam, yeng kehe ningo kam, arong nyoe ca' ditingal kaliam. Pada' debu di senal kam pun ca' ditoguram dinyoe des kam ningale, gei' sempayo sidoe jelas ken dosoe," jie Yesus.
40010015	"Mat-mátam yeng ku padah ke' kam tue," jie Yesus, "dah Ari Kiyamát gi," jie Yesus, "pada' reng Sodom ken reng Gomora yeng paling jat nyomie pie manseh nyamán ge' ukum sidoe deri ukum pada' kampong yeng noe nerimoe kam," jie Yesus.
40010016	"Mat behayoam gewai kam, go kam keedah domo di penenongah pada' serigala yeng buwas yeng gerang. Mangko kam ca' ati-ati, ca' panai keedah pelano', ca' gina' keedah burong dero. Pie kam nang gola', go akuam yeng ngutus kam.
40010017	Ja'e maksut aku ca' awasam beh kam! Go cagar do reng yeng nangkap kam, yeng mencaro kam, yeng melesah kam di rumah semeyang pun.
40010018	Malah ken paie kam sampai dipakso ca' ngadap pada' gubernor ken pada' rajo pun, dipecaro le' pada' pemuko, go kam murit aku. Pie nyoe pun," jie Yesus, "kelorong kam besaksi ke' hal agah panci ke' pada' rajo ken pada' reng layin yeng noe tekenale ken Allah.
40010019	Jedi sal ge' kam dipecaro reng," jie, "kam nang na' gedoh ngaji pai nyo' kam nyamut panere ken pai yeng langko' dikosoh kam. Dah jengkah kam nyamute si langko' diborie ke' kam isei'e.
40010020	Nyoe pun go noe iyo kam peh yeng ngomóng, pie Roh Allah, Apa' kam di serugo, yeng ngomóng ngelalu mulut kam.
40010021	"A, ngaji kam cagar dipecaro diukum gi," jie Yesus, "yeng nyerah kam kei kam diukum mati pun noe iyo urang peh, pie pada' waris wala' dulor menyadie kam die, pai noe apa' kam, pai noe ana' kam pun, yeng ngelangar kam ino' apa'e, lalu nyerah kam gei' diukum mati.
40010022	Mat pada' semuya' mensiyo langko' risie ken kam go kam murit aku. Pie kam ca' tan nyem, go murit ku yeng tan sampai ke' pengabise si langko' ditulong diselamát.
40010023	"Ja'e kam," jie Yesus, "sal ge' kam disensare reng di kampong sebuwah ca' rari ke' kampong layin die. Pi yeng máte si bolum bis tugas kam di pada' kampong di Israel tue pun aku yeng demo Ana' Mensiyo nyeh langko' detang (nyo' ngelaju tugas aku)," jie.
40010024	"Jedi ngaji kam langko' disensare si," jie Yesus, "patutam, tam cum murit yeng lobeh deri gurue. Ulun pun," jie, "cum yeng lobeh deri tuwowe.
40010025	Cukupam begi murit mun samo po gurue; ponyoe jum ulun ken tuwowe. Jedi semalang ke' tuwowe rumah ge'e, dipererujong, didemo reng Beelsebul, kepala' pada' antu setan nyeh, sa'am go seberumahe!
40010026	"Pi kam," jie, "nang na' gola' ken sidoe. Semuya' gewai reng yeng gei' tue diselinong pie dah nyoe gi langko' dikoba'; a, ken jolu pai pun yeng gei' tue ditapo' diporam reng pie dah nyoe gi cagar dibeba' dibekau.
40010027	Yeng ku besesulit madah ke' kam ca' diunang uwar kam ke' reng rami; yeng ku ngajar ke' kam pado kam, ca' disebar kam ke' semuya' segeno.
40010028	Kam manseh ca' ngeresudu', nang na' gola'. Nang gola' ken reng yeng tawu munoh tuboh mensiyo, go roh kin noe tawu dibunohe. Pie," jie, "kebelike ca' gola' ken Allah die, tam mat Allaham yeng bekuwaso mempungah beyi' tuboh beyi' roh di lawut api.
40010029	"Pie kam si noe sa' gola' ke' hal pai-pai pun di deniyo tue, go Allah kin mat kaseh ken kam," jie Yesus. "Contohe benso burong pipi'," jie. "Burong pipi' kin paling kocit, noe berogoam. Biyar duwo ko' pun dijuwal pie sesinam nilaie. Pie numo' noe benilai pun pada' burong pipi' nyeh manseh nan diawas le' Apa' kam di serugo; siko' pun cum yeng jetue ke' tanah cuwali diijin Sen.
40010030	A, kam pun nan diawas dipongki' Sen jum. Sampai ke' buwo' di kepalo kam pun dah dibilang Sen dah tiyap lamare.
40010031	Mangko nang na' gola', kamei. Semalang ke' pipi' pun ge'e, nan diawas Sen, sa'am go kam. Kam jewoh berogo deri pipi' nyeh," jie Yesus.
40010032	"Jedi mátam. Kam mat ca' ngeresudu' madah posan payit aku. Go berang reng yeng ngangkue aku di adap reng rami," jie Yesus, "aku pun ngangkue iyo di adap Apa' ku di serugo.
40010033	Pie yeng nyangkal aku di adap reng rami si," jie, "aku pun langko' nyangkal iyo di adap Apa' ku di serugo," jie.
40010034	Jedi jie Yesus, "Nyeh kaji kam aku detang ke' deniyo tue nyo' ngendamai mensiyo siko' ken betore peh? Pie noe," jie, "kedetang aku noe meyie damai peh, pie kibate malah ken paie reng langko' lawan melawan siko' ken betore, tam do yeng pecayo ken aku, do yeng noe.
40010035	Tam kedetang aku nyeh," jie, "reng pado seberumah pun langko' lawan melawan, sampai reng lelaki belawan ken apa'e; reng betinoe belawan ken ino'e; menantu betinoe belawan ken mentuwoe betinoe.
40010036	Yeng langko' kei munsoh reng pun seberumah direte!
40010037	Pie mun reng dilawan le' seberumahe pun, iyo ca' tetap pecayo ken aku. Go berang reng yeng kaseh ken ino' apa'e lobeh deri iyo ngaseh aku, iyo noe patut ento' menjedi murit ku. Ponyoe jum reng yeng ngaseh ana'e beyi' lelaki beyi' betinoe lobeh deri iyo ngaseh aku; iyo noe patut jum ento' menjedi murit aku.
40010038	"Berang reng yeng kehe nangong salipe, yeng noe relo disensare na' po aku, mat noe patut kei menjedi murit ku.
40010039	Berang reng yeng mementing na' meliharo keidupe di deniyo tue si pengabise mat losi nayáp kaliam. Pie berang reng yeng noe mementing meliharo keidup direte entam iyo pecayo ken aku si reng nyoe nomu ke' idup yeng mat," jie Yesus.
40010040	Lalu Yesus nyanto' posane ke' murite potue. "Jedi," jie Yesus, "sopai ja' yeng nerimoe kam maksute iyo nerimoe aku. A, yeng nerimoe aku pun maksute iyo nerimoe Apa' ku jum, yeng ngutus ku kitue.
40010041	"Jedi yeng nerimoe kam pun do upahe. Go sopai ja' yeng nerimoe reng yeng ngelantar posan Allah, ken nerimoe posane, mat do upahe, po upah reng yeng ngelantar posan pun. Ponyoe jum reng yeng nerimoe reng bujor benar, iyo pun do upahe. Go sopai ja' yeng nerimoe reng bujor benar entam iyo bujor benar nyeh iyo do upahe jum, po upah reng bujor benar pun.
40010042	Malah ken paie sopai yeng ngunyo' ayie insup secawan ja' ke' murit ku yeng paling beroh pun, pie mun diunyo'e tam iyo tawu ken kam murit aku si iyo pasti langko' diupah gi. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei," jie Yesus.
40011001	Jedi mátam, dah Yesus beposan ponyoe ke' murite yeng duwo belas ko' tei' lalu iyo pun turun deri nyoe, bejelan betatap ke' pada' kampong halamán samel ngajar ken madah posan payit Allah.
40011002	Jedi Yohanes Penyolam ketiko nyoe kin dah dipenjero dah. Iyo pun do ningo ke' hal pada' gewai Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah. Mangko iyo nyuroh murit direte manu ke' Yesus,
40011003	disurohe betanyoe ke' Yesus, ken iyo mat Kristus yeng dijenyi le' Allah na' detangei, ke' manseh ca' nungu reng layinei, yeng langko' kei nuntong jenyi Allah? jie Yohanes nyingka' murite. Lalu murite pun mat manu betanyoe ke' Yesus na' po yeng dipadah le' Yohanes.
40011004	Jedi dah murit Yohanes Penyolam betanyoe ponyoe ke' Yesus tei' Yesus pun nyamute. "Bom," jie, "kam bebeli' ke' Yohanes ken padaham ke' iyo ken jolu yeng didingo ken jolu yeng diperati kam ken mato kepalo diret kamam. Mat cuco'am ken yeng ditijum ke' hal Kristus nyomiam.
40011005	Gola' reng butoe mat dah mencinángam! Reng timpang pun dah bejelanam! Reng yeng bengal pun dah moncasam pendingoe! Pada' reng yeng saki' kusta pun dah beyi'am! Reng yeng mati pun disuroh bengki' idup agei'am! A, ken agah panci pun mat diagah dicerito ke' pada' reng bensat, (pas na' po yeng ditijum ke' hal Kristus yeng dijenyi le' Allah nyomiam.).
40011006	Mangko padaham ke' Yohanes, Mat untong tuwaham reng yeng yakin pecayo ken aku, yeng noe tumang aming kepecayoe, numo' pun iyo noe jelas ken yeng langko' tejedi ke' aku, " jie Yesus.
40011007	Jedi ningo paner Yesus bungi nyoe tei' pada' murit Yohanes pun mat bebeli' pulang ke' Yohanes. Pie Yesus si manseh ngomóng ken pada' reng rami ke' hal des Yohanes madah posan payit Allah di padang nun mie. Lalu jie Yesus, "Nyeh des kam bejejiyoh ke' padang puwang nun mie," jie, "noe ken go kam jengkoe na' merati muntie buloh yeng diciyup angín nyem, dih?
40011008	Ge'em noe ken go kam na' merati reng yeng bepekakas panci mewah, engo ku, go kam bejejiyoh kinun mie. Go mun na' merati reng yeng bepekakas mirah merang itam puteh si gogoe ja' di rumah rajo.
40011009	Pie yeng nyuroh kam bejejiyo ke' padang nun mie go kam na' merati penijum Allah, mat noe? Lalu mátam te', reng yeng kam perati di padang nun mie mat penijum Allahame'. Malah ken paie iyo mat lobeh deri penijum yeng selomo pun, kamei, benso Yohanes.
40011010	Go mat ke' hal Yohanesame' tijum di lem Kitap Allah des Sen ngomóng ken pelayan Sen yeng bungie potue: Ti beh; Aku ngutus pelantar posan Ku kei ngulu kau, nyo' iyo memparang jelan to' kau, jie Allah. (Maleaki 3:1)
40011011	"Jedi pada' semuya' penijum deri asal mulo nyomie pun," jie Yesus, "pie mat cum yeng ngelebeh Yohanes Penyolam, kamei. Pie mun na' ngaji sopai mensiyo yeng untong tuwah si," jie Yesus, "yeng paling untong tuwah nyeh ya'am mensiyo yeng tekawum des Allah disomah kei rajo. Go des jemán Allah disomah kei rajo si numo' pun reng yeng paling renah pie manseh untong tuwah deri Yohanes Penyolam pun, (go iyo mat ngicap jemán yeng nan ditantie dicinto reng, des Allah disomah kei rajo nyeh,)" jie Yesus.
40011012	-
40011013	Dah nyoe Yesus manseh nyamong panere ke' hal jemán des Allah disomah kei rajo. Jedi jie Yesus, "Kenaken si pada' penijum nyomie," jie, "demo ke' Kei' Musa demo ke' pada' penijum layin pun," jie, "mat nan betijum ke' hal des Allah disomah kei rajo. A, lalu penijum yeng pengudah nyeh yeng betijum ke' hal jemán nyoe mat Yohanes Penyolam. Lalu betongai deri Yohanes Penyolam ngajar nyeh," jie Yesus, "sampai ke' ari tue pun mátame', jemán Allah langko' disomah kei rajo nyeh kin soma'-soma' dam. Mat noe tawu reng na' nonga' melempange. Pasti laju nyem. Pada' reng rami pun mat ingín nar ngemoran na' dikawum des Allah disomah kei rajo, go mat jemán nyoame' yeng nan ditantie dicinto reng," jie Yesus.
40011014	"Tue pun," jie Yesus, "mat soma'am dah jengkahe," jie. "Tanoe go dah detang dah penijum Elia nyeh. Kin jie Allah nyomie Elia ca' detang sebolum jemán Allah disomah kei rajo. Pie tue kin detangam dah, kamei, go Yohanesame' mat Elia yeng dipadah Allah nyomie na' detang," jie Yesus. "Nyeh pecayo noe kam ken pemadah ku nyoe?
40011015	Semuya' segeno, kelinang mat ca' ningoam," jie Yesus.
40011016	Dah nyoe iyo manseh nyamong panere. Jedi jie Yesus. "Koti ku na' ngenggemar gewai pada' kam lapis tue? Ku na' makai perempamo nyo' ku jelas ngenggemar ati kam. Jedi ku merempamo kam lapis tue," jie, "ken pada' ana' biya' yeng usi' bererami, pi noe sesaro' ken betore.
40011017	Kami na' keca' beriyah berami pie keh kam; pie kami na' keca' berato berayi pun keh kam jum, jie ana' biya' nyeh nyingka' betore.
40011018	-
40011019	"Jedi ponyoe jum kam lapis tue," jie Yesus, "kam mat cerewet nar, semerega' mato alang. Yeng digewai Yohanes Penyolam pun noe cuco' begi kam; pie yeng digewai le' aku pun ponyoe jum, noe cuco' begi kam. Benso Yohanes Penyolam mie. Yohanes Penyolam mie kin keidupe mat panto' sepengayisam; cumam iyo insup ayie angur, cumam iyo beriyah berami, lalu jie kam iyo kesarong setan. A, tekonoe ke' aku yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo si, aku gela' beriyah berami ken betor, lalu padah kam aku rangkoe, dipadah kam jum aku pemabo', gela' begelumo ken pada' penageh pajak ken pada' reng bedoso yeng layin ge'em, jie kam. Mat cum pengonoeam begi kam, (go kam mat noe tawu, noe jelas des merati gewai Allah pun). Pie reng yeng belubang pemikere si," jie Yesus, "iyo mat ngangkue nyereto ken yeng digewai Allah mat-mátam, (beyi' yeng digewai le' Yohanes mie beyi' yeng digewai le' aku pun)," jie Yesus.
40011020	Dah nyoe Yesus madah ke' hal ukum borat yeng langko' dipenjeri ke' pada' kampong arong iyo mulah pada' keenah keaneh nyomie, go sidoe mat ngei'e bebeta' piker ke' hal dosoe.
40011021	Lalu jie Yesus, "Parah nar," jie, "pada' kam di kampong Korasim. Parah nar jum pada' kam di kampong Betsaida. Tekonoe ke' kota Tirus ken Sidon yeng paling jat pun pie kiro dudo' dipulah keenah keaneh di arong sidoe na' po yeng ku pulah di adap kam si sidoe dinyoe pasti na'e lintus bebeta' pikeram; na'e sidoe nyaro' karong goni ken dudo' di abu kei nano kesusah atie tam dosoe.
40011022	Pie tekonoe ke' kam si ngei' kam. Mangko tue ku padah ke' kam: des Ari Kiyamát gi ukum kam langko' ugas borat deri ukum reng kota Tirus ken Sidon yeng diangap kam paling jat pun.
40011023	"A, ponyoe jum kam di kampong Kapernaum," jie Yesus. "Pengaji kam si kamam yeng langko' dihormát langko' ditingie setingie tingiam, pie noe! Malah ken paie kam langko' ditunong direnah lalu pengabise na' po ampah urasam," jie "Tekonoe ke' kota Sodom yeng paling jat mie si pie kiro dudo' dipulah keenah keaneh di Sodom na' po yeng ku pulah di adap kam si pasti na'e reng Sodom bebeta' piker, noam dipunah ranah Sen; pasti gei' bodan sampai ke' ari tue.
40011024	Pie kam Kapernaum si noe; mat ngei' kam bebeta' piker dah merati kuwaso aku pun. Mangko tue ku padah ke' kam: des Ari Kiyamát gi ukum kam ugas boratam deri ukum reng di kota Sodom pun," jie Yesus.
40011025	Dah nyoe Yesus pun bedoa. "O Pa'," jie, "Den mat Tuwowe langi' ken tanah! Ku besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Den, Pa'ei, go semuya' segelo tue diselinong Den deri reng yeng ngangap direte panai ceredei' belubang pemiker. Pie kebelike dipadah Den ke' reng yeng ngangap direte keedah na' biya' kocitam yeng perelu ditulong, yeng cum kepanai direte.
40011026	Nyoe pun go mat cuco'am ken kona' kemawo' Dénam, Pa'ei," jie Yesus.
40011027	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' reng rami yeng ningoe tei', "Aku," jie, "go semuya' segelo dah diserah le' Apa' ku ke' aku. Siko' pun cum yeng tekenal ken aku ana' Sen cuwali Apa' ku. A, yeng tekenal ken Apa' ku pun ngat akuam, ana' Sen. Reng layin si cum yeng tekenal ken Sen, cuwali akuam yeng ngenale ke' Sen, tam keingín diret ku nyem," jie Yesus.
40011028	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Manuam ke' aku, kamei, pada' kam yeng lomah lempungai nangong beban borat kam, kei aku nyamute, kei ati kam lapang luwah.
40011029	Dingoam ajar aku, tuno' taalo'am ke' perentah aku; noe iyo maring, noe iyo borat peh. Go aku pun lomah lemut suyo' sabar. Mangko ati kam langko' lapang luwah, lopas deri beban borat kam.
40011030	"Go perentah aku murah ditunoe, ken tugas yeng ku serah ke' kam pun ringán, keedah beban lompongam," jie Yesus.
40012001	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yesus sidoe bejelan ngerudu kebun genum reng. Pada' murite si nongah lapar porute, jedi dah nyoe sidoe ngeropai genum nyeh lalu disegoe. Sedang ari nyoe tei' Ari Berenti Kerejo.
40012002	Jedi gewai sidoe tokoh nyoe tei' diperati le' pada' reng deri kelompok reng Parisi. Dah nyoe jie pada' reng Parisi nyingka' Yesus, "Ti beh! Pada' murit kau ngelangar ukum agama diret. Ari tue kin Ari Berenti Kerejo; gewai tokoh nyoe kin noe buleh," jie.
40012003	Pie Yesus nyamut sidoe pakai contoh gesah Kei' Daud nyomie. Lalu jie Yesus, "Kei' Daud mie pun ge'e, ken pada' tamah sen," jie Yesus, "des desiyan nongah lapar mie, do jum ngelangar ukum agama diret. Kam ugar agama si tentu do jum beco gesah nyoe, engo ku," jie Yesus. "Ketiko nyoe kin Kei' Daud desiyan lapar,
40012004	lalu sen tamoe ke' arong kediyam Allah, lalu disego le' desiyan roti yeng diunyo' reng kei pesaling ke' Allah. Teruhal na' nunoe ukum agama diret kin roti nyoe noe buleh disego semadi urang; ngat ento' disego pada' pelayan Allah bangam," jie Yesus.
40012005	"A, ke' hal ngenggewai jolu des Ari Berenti Kerejo nyeh ponyoe jum," jie Yesus. "Kam si tentu dah beco lem kitap Ukum Musa nyeh ke' hal tugas pada' pelayan Allah di rumah kediyam Sen. Jedi mun pelayan Allah melayan Sen di rumah kediyam Sen des Ari Berenti Kerejo nyeh noe peh ngelangar ukum ke' hal ca' berenti kerejo des ari Saptu nyeh? Pie noe ken do reng madah desiyan bedoso tam gewai desiyan tokoh nyoe. Go melayan di rumah kediyam Allah kin mat penting nar.
40012006	Jedi semalang ke' pelayan di rumah kediyam Allah pun ge'e, noe diangap bedoso des ngelaju tugase des Ari Berenti Kerejo, sa'am go yeng penting deri nyoe pun. Go dah tue si do dah yeng lobeh penting deri rumah kediyam Allah pun," jie Yesus. "Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei," jie.
40012007	"A, ge'em jie lem Kitap Allah mie kin yeng Sen ingín deri diret si noe iyo ngat pada' pesaling peh, pie yeng dikeingín Sen si gei' diret ngaseh nulong betor. Kira' kam mat tawu ken yeng penting begi aku mat ngaseh nulong si noe ken do kam nyalah reng yeng cum besalah," jie Yesus.
40012008	"Pai tel agei'," jie, "go aku Ana' Mensiyo mat Tuwowe semuya' segeloe; akuam yeng nentu pai yeng patut digewai des Ari Berenti Kerejo pun," jie Yesus.
40012009	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yesus pun nayi' ke' rumah semeyang reng Yahudi di peloya' nyoe.
40012010	Dinyoe tei' poe do reng yeng mayus jerie sepiya'. Pada' reng kelompok Parisi pun do jum, pie sidoe tei' teger ngengkorek ngogoe kesalah Yesus nyem. Go kaji sidoe mun iyo ngelangar ukum sidoe si sidoe langko' nuntut mencaroe. Mangko doam sidoe betanyoe ke' Yesus. "Nyeh na' nunoe ukum adat diret," jie, "buleh noe diret ngembeyi' reng saki' des Ari Berenti Kerejo nyeh?" jie sidoe.
40012011	Yesus pun nyamut sidoe pakai caro betanyoe. "Nyeh umpamoe mun do domo kam yeng kememujore tecabur ke' lem tengkelubang des Ari Berenti Kerejo nyeh kam aduei kam amiei? Noe peh pasti diamie ditulong kam," jie Yesus, "numo' pun Ari Berenti Kerejo nyeh? Do noe deri kam yeng ngei' ngamele yeng ngei' nulonge?" jie.
40012012	"A, semalang ke' domo ge'e, ditulong kam, sa'am go mensiyo. Mensiyo jewoh berogo deri domo," jie. "Mangko jie ku mat cuco'am ken ukum agama diret mun na' ngenggewai gewai yeng panci des Ari Berenti Kerejo pun," jie.
40012013	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' reng mayus nyeh, "Lontaram jeri kau," jie. Reng mayus pun mat ngelontar jerie; tumas dilontare tei' jerie mat beyi'am, jogar na' po jeri sepiya'e.
40012014	Pie pada' reng deri kelompok Parisi si jewoh beh na' mugi Allah merati reng mayus dah jogar nyeh tei', malah ken paie sidoe pamus keluwar deri rumah semeyang lalu bearau beamue na' munoh Yesus.
40012015	Jedi Yesus pun tawue ken arau amue pada' reng Parisi nyeh, mangko iyo mat ningal arong nyoe. Pada' reng rami pun do jum yeng ngenjurute, lalu sopai ja' yeng saki' di antaro reng rami nyeh mat dipebeyi' le' Yesus.
40012016	Pie iyo nonga' reng saki' yeng dipebeyi' nyeh gei' sidoe noe sa' beagah beawoh ke' reng layin ke' hal iyo.
40012017	Nyoe pun kei nuntong pemadah Allah ngelalu penijum Yesaya nyomie ke' hal Yesus. Bungie potue,
40012018	Tue reng yeng Ku pileh ento' pelayan Aku; mat kaseh Ku ken iyo; Iyo mat penyampai bulu mato Ku, jie Allah. Ku nyuroh Roh diret Kuam yeng nguwasoe; iyo langko' madah ke' pada' reng yeng noe tekenal ken Allah ken caro Ku nyo' Aku mutus reng bujor benar, jie Sen.
40012019	Iyo noe koloe betengkar betingkis; iyo noe koloe ngomóng caro pera' perango. Iyo noe koloe ngampa'-ampa' direte di muko umúm.
40012020	Sipate noe koloe betokan bepecet; gola' lomah noe diunyút, lanai noe dititi. Tingkah lakue mat nan tokoh nyoam, sampai yeng jat mat kalah; bujor benar die yeng monángam.
40012021	Semuya' segelo suku benso pun mat langko' arap ken demo iyo, (Yesaya 42:1-3) Bungi nyoam tijum Yesaya ke' hal pelayan Allah nyeh. Lalu mat Yesusam pelayan Allah yeng nuntong semuya' tijum nyoe.
40012022	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe do reng siko' yeng dikesarong le' setan yeng nyurohe butoe ken bisue, dibeyie jum ke' Yesus. Yesus pun ngembeyi'e gei' matoe mencináng ken iyo mampu ngomóng.
40012023	Jedi dah merati yeng dah tejedi ponyoe tei' pada' reng rami nyeh eran, kangápam ngajie. "Engo ku," jie, "reng tue Buboh Rajo Daud yeng dijenyi Allah mie na' detang nulong diret, pai nawue?" jie sidoe.
40012024	Pie dah ningo paner reng rami bungi nyoe tei' pada' reng Parisi tei' memuwal. "Ah," jie, "nyuroh iyo mampu nunong setan pun entam iyo dikuwaso Beelsebul, kepala' pada' antu setan nyeh keh," jie. "Noe iyo tam kuwaso Allah peh," jie.
40012025	Yesus pun tawue ken ati pemiker sidoe tokoh nyoe. Lalu jie Yesus, "Bom kam ngajie," jie. "Sempamoe pada' urang sebuwah nenggeri beregu bekelompok lalu beperang betempor pado nenggeri nyoe. Pengabise kin noe bodan nenggeri nyoe. A, ponyoe jum reng yeng sebuwah kampong atau pun yeng beseberumah. Mun iyo nan bekelayi pado lem rumah nyoe kin noe ken bodan pada' reng di lem rumah nyoe.
40012026	Jedi ponyoe jum Beelsebul. Mun aku mat nunong setan makai kuwaso Beelsebul si maksute Beelsebul beperang pado direte; iyo mempungah direte nyem. Pie mun ponyoe si kuwasoe langko' losi nayáp, mat noe? Noe ken iyo na' tokoh nyoe! Mangko mat jelasam ken aku noe nunong setan makai kuwaso iyo.
40012027	A, ge'em," jie Yesus nyingka' pada' reng Parisi nyeh, "deri murit kam pun," jie, "do jum yeng nunong setan, mat noe? Pi ti ku kam noe nyalah sidoe, madah ken kuwaso sidoe deri Pengelakar. Nyoe kin boktie," jie Yesus, "ken kam mat pileh bulu, mat beurang beaku. Mun begi murit kam diangap kam panci, pie mun aku diangap kam jat," jie Yesus.
40012028	"Pie boh kam ngajie: mun aku mat nunong setan makai kuwaso Roh Allah si," jie Yesus, "maksute kam dah ca' nyomah Allah kei rajo kam; tue dah jengkahe dah," jie Yesus.
40012029	"(Go mun setan mampu ditunong," jie, "maksute go do yeng lobeh bekuwaso deri kepala'e pun yeng behak bekuwaso nyo' merentah nyeh," jie.) "Jedi potue ne, kamei, contohe. Misale mun do tuwowe rumah yeng gegah bereni yeng ngenjego rumahe," jie, "noe ken mampu reng semadie ngeruma' rumahe ken ngerampas pada' reto beno berang kiyada'e, dih? Cuwali ja' tuwowe yeng gegah bereni nyeh mampu ditamat dipasong reng yeng lobeh gegah bereni deri iyo pun. Mun iyo mat ditamat dipasong reng yeng gegah bereni deri iyo nyeh si mampu die reng nyoe ngeruma' ken ngerampas pada' jolue," jie Yesus.
40012030	Lalu Yesus pun mat nyuroh reng yeng ningoe tei' ca' mileh ke' hal pengajar iyo. Jedi jie Yesus, "Berang reng yeng noe nyeroto aku si samoam ken iyo ngelawan aku. Ken berang reng yeng ngei'e ngerubut nulong aku si samoam ken iyo mempungah ngenderako ku kali," jie.

40012032	"Mangko jie ku, kamei, pada' doso mensiyo yeng layin, biyar iyo menghina ngeremeh aku yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo gei' tue si manseh tawu dielon Allah," jie Yesus. "Pie berang reng yeng menghina ngeremeh Roh Allah si mat noe tawu dielon, beyi' di jemán tue beyi' di jemán nun gi," jie Yesus.
40012033	"(Mangko kam," jie, "mat ca' mileh, koti kam ngenilai bungkong gewai aku; mat panciei, jatei?) Ibarat ke' kayu din mun jie kam panci buwahe si maksute kayue pun panci; a, mun jie kam buwahe jat si maksute kayu nyeh pun jat, mat noe? Go kayu kin dikenal reng panci jat pun mat poko' deri buwahe.
40012034	Pie celoe go kam si keedah pada' buboh ular yeng jat nyem! Cum yeng dinilai kam panci. Yeng panci pun dipadah kam jatam, go kam asale mat jat nyem. Nyoam go pada' gewai aku dipadah kam jat nyem, go ati pemiker kam pun jat, lalu yeng dikosoh kam kin mat tumoh deri ati pemiker kam nun," jie Yesus.
40012035	"Reng yeng panci si tingkah lakue pun panciam, go bungkonge mat deri ati pemikere yeng nan serarat mementing ngaji yeng panci nyem. Pie reng jat si tingkah lakue pun jat, go bungkonge deri ati pemikere nun yeng nan serarat mementing ngaji yeng jat nyem.
40012036	"Mangko jie ku ca' ati-atiam kam ngaji pai yeng disebut kam ke' hal aku tue. Go dah ari Allah ngakim pada' mensiyo gi," jie Yesus, "pada' mensiyo mat ca' nyamut Sen ke' hal omóng tutore yeng semadi, yeng kencang kencus.
40012037	Kam mat langko' diukum Sen setimpal ken omóng tutor kam; mun omóng tutor kam konoe si kam noe diukum, pie mun salah si pasti diukum Sen," jie Yesus.
40012038	Dah nyoe do pada' ugar agama ken reng deri kelompok Parisi yeng manu ke' Yesus. Jedi jie sidoe nyingka' Yesus, "Guru," jie, "kami na' merati petanah deri kau kei ngembokti kuwaso kau."
40012039	Pie samut Yesus, "Paling jat," jie, "pada' kam reng Yahudi lapis tue," jie. "Kam dah ningal Allah, na' po reng yeng noe mutu dah ken jodoe. Nyoam go kam minta' bokti agei'," jie. "Pie ku cum mulah petanah nyo' kam," jie, "cuwali petanah po petanah yeng tejedi ke' penijum Yunus mie.
40012040	Go Yunus kin tigo ari tigo malam lem porut ikan bosai. Ponyoe jum aku yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo. Aku cagar dipasar reng ke' lem guwo tigo ari tigo malam. Nyoam kei petanah, nyo' kam meratie gi.
40012041	"Pi kam," jie Yesus, "manseh ngei' kam bebeta' piker. Mangko dah jengkah reng bengki' idup agei' dah Ari Kiyamát nun gi," jie Yesus, "pada' reng kota Niniwe die langko' nuntut kesalah ke' kam lapis tue. Tam reng Niniwe mie, sekali dipadah le' Yunus mie, na'e sidoe bebeta' piker. Pi kam si noe. Teruhal reng yeng lobeh bekuwaso deri Yunus dah do dah ditue," jie Yesus.
40012042	"A, ponyoe jum ratu deri nenggeri Selatan gi," jie Yesus. "Dah jengkah pada' reng bengki' idup agei' dah Ari Kiyamát nyeh si ratu nenggeri Selatan pun mat langko' nuntut kesalah kam lapis tue, go kam keh ningo pemadah aku. Sedang ratu nenggeri Selatan mie kin mat detang deri pemuntol deniyo go iyo ingín nar na' ningo pemadah Rajo Salomo yeng belubang pemikere. Pi tekonoe ke' kam lapis tue si dah ningo reng yeng lobeh tawu deri Rajo Salomo nyeh pun, pie manseh ngei' kam ningoe. Mangko kam mat langko' dituntut didewo le' ratu Selatan gi, go iyo kin ingín tawu, pie kam si noe," jie Yesus.
40012043	Dah nyoe Yesus manseh nyamong panere. "Jedi perbening keada' kam lapis tue nyeh," jie Yesus, "na' po reng yeng dikesarong setan, lalu setan nyeh ditunong. Dah nyoe setan nyeh betatap begoyap di ujong puwang nun, ngogoe arong kei peronga' perentie, pie cum tetomue.
40012044	Mangko jie setan nyeh nyingka' direte, Ku na' pulang ke' arong bokas kediyam ku nyomie, jie. Jedi mátam, dah iyo pulang ke' arong bokas kediyame nyomie tei' diperatie ibarat ke' rumah din tokohe dah dibelukas dibereseh dah, alap ca' siyap nyo' dikediyam pie bolum do yeng ngendiyame.
40012045	Mangko dah nyoe iyo ngunang ngamie setan tujoh ko' agei' yeng paling jat deri iyo pun, nyo' diyam ken iyo dinyoe. Lalu pengabise reng nyoe mat uyoham deri keada' kememerue mie. A, ponyoe jum kam yeng jat lapis tue," jie Yesus. "Go dah nyoe gi kam mat kepala' uyoham deri kam ketiko tue pun," jie Yesus.
40012046	Jedi kebonóng Yesus gei' ngomóng ken pada' reng rami di lem rumah tei' poe do ino'e ken pada' menyadie yeng lelaki nyeh betungu di luwar, na' ngomóng ken Yesus.
40012047	Jedi dah nyoe do reng layin yeng madah ke' iyo, "Ino' kau ken pada' menyadie kau do di luwar, na' ngomóng ken kau," jie.
40012048	Pie Yesus nyamute, "Nyeh kaji kam sopailah ino' ku ken menyadie ku yeng mat?" jie.
40012049	Lalu Yesus nunyo' ke' pada' murite yeng dudo' dinyoe. "Reng tuam to' yeng ku angap ino' ku ken pada' menyadie ku yeng mat.
40012050	Go sopai ja' yeng ngenggewai kona' kemawo' Apa' ku di serugo si mat iyoam yeng ku angap menyadie ku ken ino' ku yeng mat," jie Yesus.
40013001	Jedi ari nyoe pun Yesus turun deri rumah, lalu bejelan ke' Lompoe Galilea. Detang kinun iyo pun dudo' dinyoe di pinger lompoe.
40013002	Rami nar reng bekumpol ngeliling Yesus, na' ningo Yesus ngajar. Mangko iyo ngaleh ke' perawu, dudo' di perawu die. Pada' reng rami yeng ningoe tei' bediri di derat, di pinger pantai lompoe.
40013003	Lalu Yesus ngajar benya' renoe ke' sidoe pie kontan pakai perempamo. Perempamo pertamo nyeh potue. Jedi jie Yesus, "Do reng siko'," jie, "yeng na' ngamur bonehe, pie noe iyo semuya'e yeng tejedi.
40013004	Boneh yeng diamure tei' separoe do yeng gegar di tongah jelan, lalu pada' burong pun pederodok manto'e, sampai bis.
40013005	A, yeng separoe boneh nyeh gegar ke' tanah yeng bisei' kerangán betu; tanahe lipisam. Belantang si mat copatam, go tanah nyeh lipis,
40013006	pie dah ari beyi', dah mato ari tingie si lantange layuam lalu rangkai kosai, go cum urate.
40013007	"A, separoe boneh nyeh gegar ke' tanah yeng bisei' pada' rampue durie. Belantang si na'e, pie dah rampue durie nyeh mansang, boneh yeng belantang panci tadie nayóng tam rampue durie.
40013008	"Pie do jum boneh yeng jetue ke' arong tanah lolohe. Dah belantang mat paling joboh, dah iyo bebuwah nyeh berinasam. Mat belipat genoam; do yeng 30 kali lipat, do yeng 60 kali lipat, malah ken paie do yeng sampai 100 kali lipat genoe" jie Yesus.
40013009	"Semuya' segeno, kelinang mat ca' ningoam," jie.
40013010	Dah nyoe Yesus dipanu le' murite. "Gopai go kau ngajar pakai perempamo?" jie murite.
40013011	Samut Yesus, "Kam si diborie kemampu nyo' kam ngentawu risi'-risi' Allah, koti keada'e des Sen disomah kei rajo. Pie sidoe layin yeng noe nunoe aku si," jie Yesus, "noe diborie kemampu kei iyo ngentawue.
40013012	Jedi," jie Yesus, "berang reng yeng dah buleh nyeh langko' disuroh Allah belobeh-lobeh pekulehe. Pie berang reng yeng noe buleh nyeh," jie, "yeng sikit yeng do di iyo pun langko' diperoru kaliam.
40013013	"A, aku ngomóng pakai pada' perempamo pun," jie Yesus, "entam sidoe kepa' pun merati pie mat sebujor meratiam, tarah ke' noe awase; kepa' pun nan ningo pie sebujor ningoam, tarah ke' noe noe tawue ken retie.
40013014	"Mat dituntong le' sidoe yeng ditijum le' penijum Yesaya mie. Go jie Allah di lem tijum Yesaya, Pada' reng tue langko' serarat ningo, pie tarah ke' noe tawue ken retie; sidoe serarat merati, pie tarah ke' noe tekalimáte.
40013015	Go ati benso sidoe tue mat paling tupal, kelinange semendingau modas-modasam, matoe dipempojame. Kira' noe tokoh nyoe si mato sidoe mat awas, kelinange mat ningo, atie mat tawu ken retie. Kira' sidoe awas ken ningo si gola' na'e sidoe bebeta' piker bebeli' ke' aku, nyo' aku membeyi'e, jie Allah lem Kitap Yesaya. (Yesaya 6:9-10)
40013016	Pie kam," jie Yesus, "mat beayah bikah beuntong tuwah, go mato muko kam awas, kelinang kam moncas.
40013017	Ketiko nyoe mie si," jie Yesus, "mat benya' penijum Allah demo ke' benya' reng yeng bujor benar pun yeng mat ingín nar merati yeng diperati kam tue, pie tarah ke' cum desiyan meratie. Mat ingín nar desiyan ningo yeng didingo le' kam tue, pie desiyan tarah ke' noe ningoe. Berue kam tuam yeng ningoe ken ngawase, mangko kam mat beayah bikah beuntong tuwah," jie Yesus.
40013018	Dah nyoe iyo ngenjelas ke' sidoe perempamo tadie. "Dingoam," jie Yesus, "ken reti perempamo reng ngamur bonehe.
40013019	Jedi," jie Yesus, "do reng yeng mat ningo agah panci ke' hal koti keada'e des Allah disomah kei rajo," jie. "Pie sidoe noe tawu ken retie. Jedi nyoe kin keedah boneh yeng gegar di tongah jelan, yeng lintus disego le' pada' burong, lalu bis. Go reng tokoh nyoe kin tumas iyo ningo posan payit Allah lintus detangam Pengelakar, ngerampas ngerobut jolu yeng diamur di ati sidoe, lalu cumam. Nyoam perempamo boneh yeng gegar di tongah jelan.
40013020	"A, arong kerangán betu yeng konoe gegar boneh tadie si nyoe keedah mensiyo yeng ningo posan payit Allah jum. Dah sidoe ningoe si lintus diterimoam, mat ayah bikaham sidoe ningoe.
40013021	Pie posan payit yeng didingoe noe nyorap ke' lem atie, keedah lantang yeng noe beurat delam, mat noe lano. Jedi sal ge' ngerudu kesusah, sal ge' disensare reng tam sidoe ningo posan payit Allah nyeh lalu sap! sidoe nyeraham.
40013022	"A, lalu arong yeng bisei' rampue durie yeng konoe gegar boneh tadie tei' nyoe keedah reng yeng ningo posan payit Allah pie cum asele, noe bebuwah. Ningo si ningo, pie dah nyoe sidoe nan kamoh ngaji keidup di deniyo tue, ken sidoe dikelakar tam keingíne na' menjedi kayo. Sampai posan payit Allah telinsam telimasam tam pada' kekamoh deniyo tue. Lalu mat cumam bebuwah.
40013023	"Pie tanah yeng di arong lolohe tei'," jie Yesus, "nyoe keedah reng yeng ningo posan payit Allah lalu tawue ken retie, na'e makaie. Sidoe mat berinasam buwahe, asele pun mat benya' lipate, do yeng 100 kali lipat, do yeng 60 kali lipat, do yeng 30 kali lipat." Nyoam penjelas Yesus ke' hal perempamo reng ngamur boneh. PADA' PEREMPAMO KE' HAL KERAJA' ALLAH DES ALLAH DISOMAH KEI RAJO
40013024	Dah nyoe Yesus ngajar agei' pakai perempamo. "Jedi sal ge' Allah disomah kei rajo," jie Yesus, "keada'e na' po keedah reng yeng beumo, yeng nanám tampang genum yeng panci di umoe.
40013025	Dah ditanáme dah nyoe dah malam kebonóng pada' reng tidor nyeh detang munsohe. Munsohe ngamur tampang igei' lalang die. Dah diamure iyo rariam.
40013026	"Jedi lamat belamat dah pada' genum ngurai beruam ketawu ken lalang becampor dinyoe.
40013027	Ngaso bisei' pada' lalang lalu pada' ulune bepadah ke' tuwowe. Tuwowe, jie, noe peh mungkal genumam ditanám den di umo den? I, jie tuwowe. Nyeh, jie sidoe, gopai go becampor ken pada' lalang tue? jie.
40013028	Nyoe gewai munsoh tona', jie tuwowe. Nyeh, jie ulune, ca' digurun peh?
40013029	Noe, jie tuwowe, mun lalang digurun gola' tecabut jum ke' pada' genum, jie.
40013030	Ma'am, jie, diaduam gei' iyo bosai. Dah jengkah ngotam gi, jie, do ku beposan ke' reng yeng ngotame gei' lalang dikumpol dolu, dikobat, kei dicucol. Dah nyoe berue genum ku digotam, dipaja' ke' lem jurong ku, jie tuwowe umo nyeh." Nyoam perempamo lalang ken genum.
40013031	Lalu sebuwah agei' perempamo Yesus. "Jedi sal ge' Allah disomah kei rajo," jie Yesus, "keada'e na' po igei' komang* yeng ditanám reng di umoe.
40013032	Igei' komang kin paling sonie. Pie dah iyo belantang kin mansang, kin joboh-joboh, bosai tingie, bepampang beedan, sampai pada' burong pun ulehe besarang dinyoe," jie Yesus.
40013033	Lalu sebuwah agei' perempamo Yesus. "Jedi sal ge' Allah disomah kei rajo," jie Yesus, "keada'e na' po pengemang sikit yeng digewol reng betinoe ke' topong genum segeredoh. Pie sungoh pun pengemang sikitam nyeh mampu ento' mopah semuya' topong genum menya' nyoe," jie Yesus.
40013034	Semuya' nyoe Yesus ngajar ke' reng rami pakai perempamo. Pada' pengajare ketiko nyoe kontan pakai perempamo nyem.
40013035	Nyoe pun mat disengejoe, gei' dituntong yeng ditijum le' siko' penijum nyomie. Bungi tijume potue: Ku ngomóng ken sidoe pakai perempamo. Ku ngerisi' ke' sidoe hal yeng noe diketawu reng semeja' asal mulo deniyo tue mie, jie bungi tijum nyeh. (Masmur 78:2)
40013036	Dah nyoe Yesus ningal reng rami nyeh, lalu iyo tamoe ke' lem rumah. Dinyoe dipanu le' pada' murite yeng na' betanyoe. Jie sidoe, "Padaham ke' kami," jie, "pai ge' retie perempamo genum ken lalang tadie," jie.
40013037	Samut Yesus, "Jedi potue. Yeng nanám boneh panci si aku yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo.
40013038	Umoe keedah deniyo tue, ken boneh yeng panci nyeh keedah reng yeng tuno' taalo' ke' Allah, yeng nyomah Sen kei rajoe. Lalang tei' keedah umát Pengelakar.
40013039	Do munsoh yeng ngamur igei' lalang si," jie, "keedah Pengelakaram. A, ken jengkah ngotam nyeh keedah Ari Kiyamát nun gi, dah pengudah deniyo tue; a, reng yeng ngotam nyeh keedah pada' melekat.
40013040	Jedi dah pengudah deniyo tue gi kin pada' mensiyo yeng jat langko' dikumpol, lalu dilojang ke' api, na' po lalang tadie.
40013041	Go Aku, Ana' Mensiyo," jie Yesus, "langko' ngutus pada' melekat ku ento' ngumpol pada' reng jat ken semuya' segelo yeng nyuroh reng bedoso, lalu dipencare ken pada' umát Allah yeng nyomah Sen kei rajoe,
40013042	dah nyoe dilojange ke' lawut api yeng nan benyalo. Dinyoe sidoe simah nangis nguyáng ngayíng adoh anáng pengabise susah.
40013043	Dah nyoe pada' reng yeng bujor benar diagong ditingie, mat nyacas po mato ari des Allah Apa'e disomah kei rajoe. Semuya' segeno, kelinang mat ca' ningoam," jie Yesus.
40013044	"Jedi sal ge' Allah disomah kei rajo," jie Yesus, "keada'e na' po reto pesako yeng diporam ke' lem tanah. Jedi do reng siko'," jie, "yeng kememujore senoka' senoko tetomu ke' reto pesako yeng diporam reng ke' lem tanah. Ayah bikaham perasoe nomu jolu nyoe, go paling berogo. Mangko ditapo'e agei'am dinyoe, gola' ketawu urang. Lalu iyo pulang ke' rumah; dah nyoe dijuwale bis semuya' pada' reto benoe. Lalu duwite asel iyo ngenjuwal pada' jolue tei' dipakaie ento' moli tanah yeng tomue beisei' reto pesako nyeh, go jolu nyoe paling berogo," jie Yesus.
40013045	"Ge'em," jie Yesus, "sal ge' Allah disomah kei rajo," jie, "keada'e na' po reng bedegang yeng nan ngogoe betu mutiara yeng paling panci.
40013046	Jedi simah ngogoe tei' kepepanyange mat tomu ken reng yeng punyi sebuwah mutiara yeng paling berogo. Paling ingín iyo na' molie, mangko dijuwale bis pada' jolu direte, ento' iyo ngumpol duwit cukup kei moli mutiara sebuwah yeng paling mahal nyeh," jie Yesus.
40013047	"Ge'em," jie Yesus, "sal ge' Allah disomah kei rajo," jie, "na' po keedah reng yeng ngenjelo. Ngenjelo tei' sur! dikibare jeloe ke' lem ayie, lalu buleh ikan bemacam bejenis.
40013048	Ngaso jeloe dah buleh, lalu dijujute ke' derat, dah nyoe dudo' dinyoam, miter ikane. Yeng panci dipaja'e ke' lem bedahe, yeng jat dibuwange.
40013049	"Jedi ponyoe jum," jie Yesus, "mensiyo dah Ari Pengudah deniyo tue gi. Jedi dah pengudah deniyo tue gi pada' melekat Allah langko' detang lalu dipencare pada' reng jat ken pada' reng bujor benar.
40013050	Dah dipencare pada' reng jat nyeh mat dilojang ke' lawut api yeng nan benyalo. Dinyoe sidoe simah nangis nguyáng ngayíng adoh anáng pengabise susah," jie Yesus.
40013051	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' murite, "Nyeh jelas peh kam ken semuya' yeng ku padah ke' kam tadie?" jie. Samut murite, "Jelas."
40013052	"Mun ponyoe si," jie Yesus, "ca' diagah dicerito ke' reng layin. Go tiyap ko' reng yeng ngajar posan payit Allah si, mun iyo dah belajar ke' hal des Allah disomah kei rajo nyeh mat ca' diagah diceritoe ke' reng layin," jie Yesus. "Contohe benso tuwowe rumah yeng buwar. Tuwowe rumah yeng buwar kin ngembegi pada' reto beno berang rega'e beyi' yeng beru beyi' yeng lamat pun, yeng selomo dikumpole lem pesimpane." Yesus noe diterimoe di kampong direte
40013053	Jedi mátam, dah santo' iyo madah pada' perempamo tadie tei' lalu Yesus pun ningal arong nyoe,
40013054	lalu mat pulang ke' kampong direte. Jedi dah nyoe iyo pun ngajar di rumah semeyang di kampong direte. Jedi ningo iyo ngajar tei' pada' reng yeng rami tei' mat kangápam ningoe, teruhal iyo reng dinyoam. "Di nai nin beh," jie sidoe, "biya' tue nomu pengentawue potue? Sampai mampu iyo ngajar kitap Allah potue, ken mampu mulah pada' keenah keaneh (yeng dipulahe di pada' kampong layin nyeh)?
40013055	Teruhal noe peh iyo tue ana' tukang kayu; ino'e kin Maria, diret dituam. A, adei'e pun kin Yakobus ke' deng nyoam, demo ke' Yoses, demo ke' Simon ken Yudas; kin reng dituam," jie sidoe.
40013056	"A, pada' menyadie betinoe pun gei' do jum ditue. Dinai nin beh iyo buleh pengentawu tokoh nyoe?" jie sidoe.
40013057	Lalu sidoe mat risie nar ken Yesus, ngei'e sidoe nerimoe. Lalu jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Reng penijum selomo nan dihormát diterimoe dinai-nai pun, cuwali di nenggeri direte. Pada' seberumahe pun mat ngei'e nerimoe ngehormát penijum di kampong direte," jie Yesus.
40013058	Mangko mat sikitam keenah keaneh yeng dipulah Yesus dinyoe, benoe, go sidoe mat noe pecayo ken iyo.
40014001	Jedi mátam. Ketiko nyoe Rajo Herodes pun kedingoe jum ke' hal agah berito pada' keenah keaneh yeng digewai Yesus nyeh.
40014002	Lalu jie Rajo Herodes nyingka' pada' ana' buwahe, "Nyoe pasti Yohanes Penyolam! Dah bengki' idup agei'am!" jie. "Patutam iyo bekuwaso mulah pada' keenah keaneh tokoh nyoe pun," jie Rajo Herodes.
40014003	Nyuroh kengkajie tokoh nyoe tei' go nyomie ponyoe mat Rajo Herodesam yeng nyuroh Yohanes Penyolam ditangkap lalu dipenjero, go binie Herodias si mat risie ken Yohanes Penyolam. Jedi potue ne gesahe. Herodias kin asale bini adei' Rajo Herodes yeng bedemo Pilipus, pie dah nyoe dirobut le' rajo.
40014004	Mangko rajo nan diperingát le' Yohanes go iyo ngelangar ukum Allah tam iyo ngerobut bini adei'e. Jedi ngaso ponyoe tei' pengabise Yohanes Penyolam nyeh mat dipenjero le' Herodes.
40014005	Kengkaji Herodes si do itonge na' munohe kaliam, pie iyo gola'e ken pada' reng rami, go jie reng rami kin Yohanes Penyolam nyeh mat penijum deri Allah.
40014006	Pie lamat belamat si doam kelorong, des Rajo Herodes bepesta nyamut ari ulang tawun direte. Jedi nongah bepesta tei' doam ana' Herodias yeng dero yeng ngadap Rajo Herodes ken pada' pengabange, lalu bejoget. Paling ayahe Rajo Herodes meratie bejoget nyeh te',
40014007	sampai iyo bejenyi besesumpah ken pai-pai pun yeng dipinta' le' ana' Herodias nyeh tei' pasti diunyo'e, cum yeng dididahe, jie rajo.
40014008	Jedi ana' biya' yeng bejoget nyeh tei' diasut le' ino'e to' minta' kepalo Yohanes Penyolam, jedi jie ana' Herodias nyingka' rajo nyeh, "Unyo' ja' ke' aku kepalo Yohanes Penyolam, dibeyie kitue lem talam," jie.
40014009	-
40014010	Ningo peminta'e bungi nyoe tei' lalu Rajo Herodes nyeh mat susaham atie, (kesalam ken jenyie tadie), pie entam dah telampoh besumpah di adap pada' reng yeng diunang nyeh kajie mat noe tawu na' ngela'e. Mangko iyo mat nyuroh reng ke' penjero nyo' nukong kepalo Yohanes Penyolam na' po yeng dipinta' le' ana' Herodias nyeh te'.
40014011	Lalu mátam, dah ditukong kepalo Yohanes Penyolam tei' mat dipaja' ke' lem talam dibeyie ke' adap rajo, lalu diunyo' ke' ana' Herodias. Dah nyoe ana' Herodias nyeh mat meyie kepalo Yohanes Penyolam nyeh ke' ino'e.
40014012	Jedi dah ningo agah nyoe tei' pada' murit Yohanes nyeh manu ke' penjero ngamie bengkai Yohanes, dah nyoe dipasare. Dah dipasare sidoe pun manu ke' Yesus, bepadah ke' iyo.
40014013	Jedi mátam. Dah Yesus ningo agah berito ke' hal Yohanes Penyolam dibunoh nyeh dah nyoe iyo mat ningal arong nyoe, nayi' perawu ken pada' murite na' nuju ke' arong sunyei'. Pie pada' reng rami si kedingoe konai penuju sidoe, mangko pada' reng rami deri pada' kampong peloya' nyoe pun mat ngenjurute jum deri derat.
40014014	Jedi dah Yesus sidoe nayi' ke' derat tei' diperati Yesus tei' pada' mensiyo pun mat ramiam yeng ngenjurute. Kaseham Yesus meratie. Lalu pada' reng saki' pun dipebeyi' le' Yesus ketiko nyoe.
40014015	Jedi dah ujong ari ponyoe tei' murit Yesus mat manu ngomóng ken iyo. "Arong tue," jie, "mat jewoh nar ken pada' kampong," jie sidoe. "Ari pun dah na' malam dah. Boh kau nyuroh pada' reng rami tue bepulang-pulangam, to' iyo ke' pada' kampong loboh nun semadie gola' sidoe mampu moli jolu kei sego direte," jie murite.
40014016	Pie Yesus nyamute, "Noe sa'am sidoe disuroh pulang," jie. "Boh kamam ngunyo'e jolu kei sego," jie.
40014017	Pie samut murite, "Yeng do di kami ngat ge' roti limo gie ken ikan duwo ko'," jie.
40014018	Lalu jie Yesus, "Ta'am kitue," jie.
40014019	Dah nyoe iyo nyuroh pada' reng rami nyeh dudo' di arong yeng berumput panci. Dah reng rami dudo' tei' dah nyoe diamie Yesus roti limo gie ken ikan duwo ko' nyeh. Lalu iyo pun nengkadah ke' serugo, besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Apa'e. Dah besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Apa'e tei' lalu roti nyeh dipocahe, dah dipocahe diunyo'e ke' pada' murite, lalu murite ngembilinge ke' pada' reng rami.
40014020	Pada' reng rami pun mat makan sekonyáng-konyáng poruteam. Jedi dah lopas reng makan tei' dah nyoe pada' murit Yesus pun ngumpol kesiso kepocah roti ken ikan nyeh; dah dikumpole tei' poe gei' do duwo belas taya' ponoh agei', kesisoe.
40014021	Sedang reng rami yeng makan tei' ento' reng lelaki tuwo ja' limo ribu ko'; bolum ngawum pada' ana' binie yeng makan jum.
