40014022	Jedi dah ngumpan pada' reng rami tei' dah nyoe Yesus nyuroh pada' murite gei' nayi' perawu nyeh betula' ke' seborang nun lo'e, nyo' iyo ngenjuwong sidoe di nun kaloe ponyoe, jie. Iyo si gei' dudi, go iyo gei' na' nyuroh pada' reng rami pulang ke' arong direte lo'e.
40014023	Lalu mátam, dah nyuroh pada' reng rami pulang nyeh tei' dah nyoe Yesus mendeki natai ento' iyo bedoa. Jedi dah malam tei' Yesus manseh bedoa bedireteam di natai nun.
40014024	Sedang perawu yeng bisei' pada' murite tei' dah jewoh dah deri derat, dah detang ke' tongah lompoe dah. Jedi dah di tongah lompoe tei' lalu perawu nyeh belungang belengi' tam gelumang diciyup le' angín deri adap. Mat belelah bejoreham pada' murit Yesus nyeh te'.
40014025	Jedi dah dini ari tei' Yesus pun bejelan di atas ayie manu ke' sidoe.
40014026	Dah ketawu murite ken jolu bejelan di atas ayie tei' sidoe mat tekeraya', lalu sidoe mangkas ontap, "Antu!" jie, lalu sidoe simah menciya' tam kegegola'e.
40014027	Pie Yesus lintus ngomóng ken sidoe, "Tenángam kam!" jie. "Akuam to'! Nang na' gola', kamei," jie Yesus.
40014028	Dah nyoe jie Petrus, "Mun mat den, Tuwowe," jie, "suroham aku bejelan di atas ayie jum nyo' ku manu ke' den," jie Petrus.
40014029	Samut Yesus, "Yo'am kitue." Dah nyoe Petrus mat turun deri lem perawu nyeh lalu bejelan di atas ayie manu ke' Yesus.
40014030	Pie dah merati pada' gelumang bosai tam buwowe tei' temosie gola'e, lalu becocat-cocat tengolam. Ngaso ponyoe tei' lalu Petrus pun mangkas ontapam, "Tulong ge' aku tue, Tuwowe," jie.
40014031	Yesus pun lintus ngenjepaie lalu jie Yesus, "Mat bolum togap kepecayo kau, Petrusei," jie. "Ngopai go kau tumang aming?" jie Yesus.
40014032	Dah nyoe sidoe duwo nyeh tei' nayi' ke' lem perawu. Dah nayi' ke' lem perawu nyeh semorie sap! tedoham buwowe nyeh te'.
40014033	A, ken pada' murite lem perawu nyeh pun mat nyomah Yesus. "Kau mat Ana' Allaham," jie sidoe.
40014034	Jedi mátam. Dah detang ke' seborang lompoe tei' sidoe betamat di pantai Genesaret.
40014035	Jedi dah tekenal pada' reng Genesaret ken nyoe mat Yesus tei' mangko sidoe ngagah ngawohe ke' ulu ke' ilie di seruroh ateh nyoe ken Yesus dah do dah dinyoe. Ngaso ningo ken Yesus do dinyoe tei' pada' reng saki' pun ditaban dibeyie reng ke' Yesus.
40014036	Sidoe muhún mampalam mun borie Yesus nyeh sidoe na' nigue samang beju jubahe nyem. Lalu sopai pun yeng nigue samang bejue tei' mat beyi'am penyaki'e.
40015001	Jedi do beberopai ko' reng deri kelompok Parisi ken pada' ugar agama deri Yerusalem yeng manu ke' Yesus. Lalu jie sidoe nyingka' Yesus,
40015002	"Ngopai," jie "go pada' murit kau ngelangar setilah geyamo akei' puyang diret? Sidoe noe ngerinah adat pemeso' nunoe ator adat diret, poe," jie pada' ugar agama.
40015003	Pie Yesus nyamute, "Nyeh kam ge'e," jie, "ngopai go kam ngelangar jum, pie yeng dilangar kam ukum Allah die," jie. "Nyoe pun kelakar kei kam ngukoh setilah geyamo mensiyo nyem," jie.
40015004	"Contohe potue ne, caro kei kam nangkis pemadah Allah nyeh. Kin jie ukum Sen ino' apa' diret ca' dihormát. A, ge'em jie Sen sopai pun yeng menghina ngeremeh ino' apa'e ca' diukum mati.
40015005	Pie kam si mat layin nar ajar kam. Go jie kam mun reng dah bepadah ke' ino' apa'e ken jolu yeng ku ajen nyo' deduwan nyeh dah ku serah bisam dah ke' Allah, lalu noe sa'am iyo nulong ino' apa'e, jie kam.
40015006	Pie nyoe caro kam nangkis ngela' deri ukum Allah, sampai yeng deri Allah noe pakai, kelakar kam ngeyakin setilah geyamo mensiyo nyem.
40015007	"Kam mat alap-alape nyem nyomah ke' Allah," jie Yesus. "Mat konoe nar tijum Yesaya mie ke' hal kam. Go pemadah Allah ke' penijum Yesaya mie bungie potue:
40015008	Reng tue mugi Aku di bibere nyem, pie atie rangang ken Aku, jie Sen.
40015009	Sidoe nyomah ke' Aku pun caro memuloe nyem, jie Sen, go sidoe ngajar pada' pelator direte nyem, seolah-olah pelator pemadah Aku, jie Allah. (Yesaya 29:13) Mat konoe nar tijum Yesaya mie," jie Yesus.
40015010	Dah nyoe Yesus ngumpol reng rami, lalu iyo bepadah ke' sidoe, "Dingo beh kam," jie. "Itongam pemadah ku tue.
40015011	Noe iyo jolu disego peh yeng kei ngencelo mensiyo di adap Allah. Pie yeng ngencelo mensiyo di adap Allah nyeh ya'am omóng tutor direte yeng jat," jie Yesus.
40015012	Jedi dah kaloe ponyoe iyo dipanu le' pada' murite bangam. Lalu dah nyoe jie murite, "Nyeh tawu noe kau Guru, ken pada' reng Parisi nyeh ngamie ati tam omóng kau tadie?" jie.
40015013	"Ma'am," jie Yesus nyamute, "kam noe sa' menduli sidoam," jie. "Go sidoe mat keedah rumput nyem," jie Yesus. "Ibarat ke' umo din senika' jolu yeng noe seli ditanám le' Apa' ku di serugo nyeh langko' dicabut Sen kaliam.
40015014	Noe sa'am kam mendulie," jie Yesus. "Sidoe mat pengulu yeng butoe. Mun reng butoe ngiring pado betor butoe kin kededuwoe tecabur ke' lem tengkelubang," jie.
40015015	Dah nyoe jie Petrus, "Padaham ke' kami pai jie perbeso kau tadie," jie.
40015016	Lalu jie Yesus nyamute, "Wai, pengaji kam gei' tupal jum, poe," jie. "Noe tawu kam peh ken perbeso ku tadie?" jie Yesus.
40015017	"Jedi maksut perbeso ku tadie tei'," jie, "noe iyo jolu disego peh yeng kei ngencelo mensiyo di adap Allah. Go jolu disego kin tamoe ke' lem porut lalu keluwar nyem," jie.
40015018	"Pie yeng ngencelo mensiyo di adap Allah si ya'am jolu yeng dikosoh deri nyawoe, go nyoe kin mat tumoh deri atie.
40015019	Nyoam bungkong pada' kebeyat mensiyo yeng jat, ken kengkaji mensiyo yeng jat, demo ke' munoh betor, demo ke' butang beonga', demo ke' ngeroyal, demo ke' maling, demo ke' mempulah, demo ke'...maner ngendongéng betor opai.
40015020	Gewai tokoh nyoam yeng ngencelo mensiyo di adap Allah. Noe iyo makan ken jeri yeng noe bebeso' peh yeng ngenceloe di adap Allah," jie Yesus.
40015021	Dah nyoe Yesus sidoe ningal arong nyoe, ngerari direte ke' jewoh nun, ke' ateh kota Tirus ken Sidon.
40015022	Jedi detang kinun tei' iyo dipanu le' siko' reng betinoe deri suku benso Kanaan yeng diyam dinun; iyo noe iyo reng Yahudi. Jedi dah reng betinoe manu ke' Yesus tei' lalu iyo muhún mampal ontapam minta' tulong ke' Yesus. "Tuwowe! Buboh Daud! Tulong ge' aku tue, gola' do kekaseh kau, go ana' ku* saki' uyoham tam kesarong setan," jie.
40015023	Pie Yesus si ngojap nyem, cum iyo nyamute. Dah nyoe jie pada' murite, "Ditulong ja' beh iyo tue kei iyo pulangam; gei' noe teger ngaru diret nyem gewaie," jie.
40015024	Pie Yesus nyamut sidoe, "Aku diutus ke' deniyo tue pun to' ku nulong pada' engku diret ku reng Israel nyem, yeng keedah domo yeng sosat," jie.
40015025	Pie ningo paner Yesus bungi nyoe tei' lalu reng betinoe tei' manu ke' soma' kit lalu belutut di adap Yesus, muhún mampal agei'am ke' Yesus. "Tulong ge' aku, Tuwowei," jie.
40015026	Pie Yesus nyamute pakai perbeso. "Noe ken patut jolu yeng to' sego ana' biya' pie dirobut diunyo' ke' ana' kudo'," jie.
40015027	"Nyoe mátam, Tuwowei," jie reng betinoe nyeh. "Ja'e ana' kudo' ge'e, gei' nyego pelamur tuwowe," jie.
40015028	Lalu jie Yesus, "Kepecayo kau mat tungang soh," jie. "Mangko yeng dipinta' kau tadie mat dituntongam," jie. Tumas iyo bepaner bungi nyoe tei' lalu penyaki' ana' reng betinoe nyeh pun mat beyi'am.
40015029	Dah nyoe Yesus ningal arong nyoe bejelan nyusor kenaming Lompoe Galilea, lalu mendeki natai, dudo' dinyoam.
40015030	Jedi dah dudo' di natai tei' dah nyoe Yesus dipanu le' pada' reng rami yeng bejejiyoh naban reng timpang, reng cacat, reng butoe, reng bisue, pada' reng yeng beneko reno penyaki'e ditabane ke' iyo, lalu mat dipebeyi' le' Yesus.
40015031	Paling kangáp pada' reng rami merati gewai Yesus, tam pada' reng bisue ulehe bepaner, pada' reng timpang ulehe bejelan, pada' reng cacat pulang beras, pada' reng butoe pun mencináng. Nyoam reng rami nyeh mat kangápam meratie, lalu simah mugi Allah yeng disomah reng Israel.
40015032	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus madah murite nyurohe bekumpol ke' soma'e. Lalu jie Yesus, "Kaseh ku," jie, "ngaji pada' reng rami tue; dah tigo ari sidoe ngenjurut ningo pemadah ku. Pada' bokale pun bis dah. Ku noe nyamán ati ku na' nyuroh sidoe pulang gei' lapar porute. Ngorie ku," jie, "gola' do yeng pisan di tongah jelan," jie.
40015033	Samut murite tei', "Pi diret tue jewoh ken kampong," jie "di padang sunyei' tue; konai na' moli roti cukup nyo' reng menya' tue di arong sunyei' potue?" jie.
40015034	"Nyeh pai menya' roti kam?" jie Yesus. "Gei' tujoh gie agei'," samut sidoe, "ken ikan kekocit siko' duwo nyem," jie.
40015035	Dah nyoe Yesus nyuroh pada' reng rami nyeh dudo'.
40015036	Dah dudo' tei' lalu diamie le' Yesus roti tujoh gie ken ikan nyeh te'. Dah diamie iyo bedoa beterimoe kaseh ke' Allah. Dah bedoa roti ken ikan tei' dipocahe, lalu dibecare ke' murite. Tang ke' murite berue dibegi ke' reng rami.
40015037	Lalu reng rami nyeh makan sekonyáng-konyángeam. Jedi dah makan tei' dikumpolam le' murite kelobeh kepocah roti ken ikan nyeh. Kekumpol kelobeh gei' do tujoh taya' gei' yeng ponoh.
40015038	Sedang pemenya' reng yeng makan tei' ento' reng lelaki ja' empat ribu ko'.
40015039	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yesus pun nyuroh pada' reng rami nyeh pulang. Dah reng rami nyeh pulang iyo si nayi' perawu, lalu bejelan ke' peloya' Magadan.
40016001	Jedi dah nyoe do deri kelompok reng Parisi ken deri kelompok reng Saduki, yeng manu ke' Yesus na' ngendugoe. Mangko sidoe nyuroh iyo mulah keenah keaneh kei ngembokti ke' sidoe ken kuwasoe mat deri Allahei noei.
40016002	Pie Yesus nyamute, "Pada' petanah petano ke' hal deniyo tue si ti ku tawu kam," jie Yesus. "Umpamoe kam mantau lamor di langi' des mato ari tengolam nyeh; a, jie kam, tanoe pagi na' beyi'.
40016003	A, mun kam mantau langi' silam des mato ari terobi' nyeh a, jie kam, tanoe ari na' ujan, tokohe. Jedi tekonoe ke' pada' petanah petano di deniyo tue si kam mat tawu kam ken retie. Pie tekonoe ke' petanah petano ke' hal gewai Allah des jemán tue si sungoh pun mat nyato nar nyeh pie tarah ke' noe tawu kam."
40016004	"Jedi tue kam," jie Yesus, "na' nyuroh aku mulah keenah keaneh nyo' petano ken kuwaso ku deri Allah," jie. "Menurute si kam dah jelas dah. Pie go kam lapis tue mat jat nar," jie. "Kam dah ningal Allah, na' po reng yeng noe mutu dah ken jodoe. Nyoam go kam minta' bokti agei'. Pie nyamán kam ngajie," jie, "cumam ku mulah petanah petano agei' nyo' kam, cuwali petanah na' po yeng tejedi ke' Yunus mie," jie Yesus. Dah nyoe Yesus ningal sidoe, lalu bejelan ke' arong layin die.
40016005	Jedi Yesus sidoe nayi' perawu lalu nyemorang lompoe agei'am. Murit Yesus tei' kelupoe meyie bokale.
40016006	Jedi dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Awas beh kam!" jie. "Kam ca' ati-ati gola' kam tepalet pengemang roti deri reng Parisi ken reng Saduki nyeh," jie Yesus.
40016007	Pie ningo omóng Yesus bungi nyoe tei' lalu pada' murite betentanyoe pado sidoe; pai nin beh omóng Yesus ke' hal roti nyeh, jie. "Jangán iyo nyiner ke' hal roti nyeh tam bokal diret bis dah," jie sidoe.
40016008	Yesus pun tawue ken omóng sidoe nyeh te', dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Kam si gei' malang nar kepecayo kam," jie. "Ngopai go kam manseh kamoh ke' hal roti, do cum nyeh?
40016009	Kam gei' bolum jelas peh ken kuwaso aku?" jie. "Dah kelupo dah peh, kam, ken gewai ku des ngumpan reng lelaki limo ribu ko' ken roti limo gie nyem? Kelobehe pun gei' pai taya' agei' yeng kam kumpol ketiko nyoe?
40016010	A, ken ku ngumpan reng lelaki empat ribu ko' kin ponyoe jum, ngat ken roti tujoh gie nyem, dah nyoe beropai taya' agei' kesisoe yeng kam kumpol nyeh?" jie Yesus.
40016011	"Pie gopai go kam bolum jelas?" jie. "Ku ngomóng ke' hal roti tadie," jie Yesus, "bedeke' ku kamoh tam cum beroti!" jie. "Pie jie ku tadie kam ca' ati-ati gola' tepalet pengemang roti reng Parisi ken reng Saduki nyeh," jie Yesus.
40016012	Dah nyoe berue murite pun mat jelase ken maksut Yesus tei' sidoe ca' ati-ati ke' hal pengajar reng Parisi ken reng Saduki nyeh; jedi noe iyo ke' hal pengemang roti peh.
40016013	Jedi Yesus tei' bejelan ken pada' murite, detang ke' peloya' soma' kampong Kaisarea Pilipi. Detang kinun lalu iyo betanyoe ke' murite. "Nyeh jie reng rami nyeh sopailah aku tue yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo?" jie Yesus.
40016014	Samut sidoe, "Do reng yeng madah kau Yohanes Penyolam gola' ke' pai nawue tue bengki' idup. Do jum yeng madah kau penijum Elia mie yeng pulang ke' deniyo tue. Separoe jie gola' ke' penijum Yeremia yeng mati bengki' idup, atau pun penijum yeng layin," jie murite.
40016015	"Nyeh mun jie kam," jie Yesus, "aku tue sopailah?"
40016016	Samut Simon Petrus, "Kau mat Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah. Kau Ana' Allah yeng idup," jie.
40016017	Lalu jie Yesus nyingka' Simon, "Mat untong tuwaham kau, Simon, ana' Yona! Kau tawu nyoe pun noe iyo go dipadah le' mensiyo peh, pie diret Apa' kuam di serugo yeng madahe ke' kau," jie Yesus.
40016018	"A, jedi tue do jum yeng na' ku padah ke' kau, Simonei," jie Yesus. "Go aku kin ngenggelar kau Petrus, ya'am betu. A, pada' reng yeng pecayo ken aku, yeng didemo ku gereja ku, suroh ku togap kukoh di betu kalas tuam. Mat akuam yeng nyurohe togap kukoham; mangko pada' penguwaso deri Deniyo Reng Mati pun mat noe mampu ngalahe.
40016019	"Ibarat ke' lawang din ku langko' nyerah ke' kau kunci lawang Deniyo Allah yeng Beru, nyo' kau ngunang ngamie reng kei tamoe, kei na' reng berajo ke' Allah. Ke' hal gewai umát ku di deniyo tue pun, kau yeng behak mutuse. Go yeng diputus kam ditue pun maksute go dah diputus disah le' Allah di serugo nun," jie Yesus.
40016020	Dah nyoe Yesus bepadah ke' murite, nonga' sidoe nang na' bepadah lo'e ke' sopai pun ke' hal iyo mat Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah.
40016021	Jedi betongai ari nyoe pun Yesus mulai ngenjelas ke' murite ken pai yeng langko' tejedi ke' iyo. Go iyo, jie, mat ca' ke' kota Yerusalem; lalu dinyoe iyo langko' ca' ngerudu kesusah kesensare yeng bemacam bejenis pun deri tangán pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi, demo ke' pada' ketuwo pelayan, demo ke' pada' ugar agama pun. Sampai iyo, jie, mat ca' dibunoh, pie dah ari pengentigoe si iyo langko' bengki' idup agei'am, jie Yesus.
40016022	Jedi ningo paner Yesus bungi nyoe tei' Petrus pun ngaja' Yesus ke' pinger jelan, lalu nyacue Yesus ngomóng bungi nyoe te'. "Noe ken kau ca' mati, jera' kau, Tuwowei," jie. "Tentu Allah ngiyas kau gei' sempayo nyoe noe tejedi ke' kau," jie Petrus.
40016023	Pie dah nyoe Yesus meruso' ke' Petrus. "Rariam, Penggudo, deri tue," jie Yesus nyingka' Petrus. "Kau nonga' melempang gewai aku, mun omóng kau tokoh nyoe. Omóng bungi nyoe kengkaji mensiyo nyem, noe iyo deri Allah peh," jie.
40016024	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' pada' murite, "Sopai ja' yeng na' menjedi murit aku," jie, "mat ca' ningal kepenting direte, ken ca' relo nangong salipe, disensare na' po aku disensare.
40016025	Go berang reng yeng mementing keidup direte di deniyo tue si pengabise losi nayápam. Pie berang reng yeng noe mementing keidup direte tam iyo mementing aku si, reng nyoe tarah ke' tetomuam ke' idup yeng mat.
40016026	Jedi nang na' salah pileh. Pai ge' keuntonge mun reng buleh semuya' kekayo kesugeh di deniyo tue pie pengabise rohe losi nayápam? Nyoe kin ngerugi ngerusa' direteam! Lalu mun na' nobus mensiyo yeng dah telampoh ngemboros keidupe nyo' kepenting direte kotilah? Pada' kekayo kesugehe pun noe ken cukup. Mat telampau dah," jie Yesus.
40016027	"Jedi mat ca' jelasam ke' hal tue, kamei," jie Yesus. "Go aku yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo," jie, "mat langko' bebeli' agei' ke' deniyo tue nyo' ku ngendecing pada' mensiyo. Kedetang ku gi mat agongam, bekuwaso, na' po Apa' ku yeng agong bekuwaso. Ken belo melekat pun langko' namah aku jum. Dah nyoe ku langko' ngendecing ken ngupah tiyap ko' mensiyo cuco' ken gewaie.
40016028	A, separo kam ditue pun mat langko' idup sampai merati keagong ken kuwaso aku des aku Ana' Mensiyo betongai disomah kei rajo," jie. "Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei," jie Yesus.
40017001	Jedi dah nyoe, dah nam ari ponyoe tei' dah nyoe Yesus ngaja' Petrus, Yakobus ken menyadie Yohanes nyeh nyo' sidoe tigo namah Yesus mendeki natai tingie.
40017002	Jedi dah detang kinun tei' temosie upo Yesus berubah cayoe di adap sidoe. Mukoe tampa' na' po mato ariam. Pekakase pun nyaca' bemalo puteh pepuwo, kontan tampa'am.
40017003	Tumas berubah cayo Yesus tei' temosie temeronyong penijum Elia ken penijum Musa, ngomóng ken Yesus dinyoe.
40017004	Jedi dah nyoe jie Petrus, "Tuwowe," jie, "untong naram soe go kami do ditue! Mun disuroh kau," jie, "ku na' ku mulah ponok tigo buwah nyo' nyomah ke' deduwan; sebuwah nyo' kau, sebuwah nyo' Kei' Musa, ken sebuwah nyo' Kei' Elia," jie Petrus.
40017005	Pie kebonóng Petrus ngomóng tei' temosie sok! sidoe diserudong le' románg yeng tampa'am, dah nyoe do kedingo suwaro yeng bebungi deri lem románg nyeh te'. "Tuam ana' Ku yeng paling Ku kaseh," jie. "Ku paling ayah ken iyo. Dingoam kam pemadah iyo," jie suwaro nyeh te'.
40017006	Jedi dah ningo bungi suwaro deri románg tei' murit Yesus yeng tigo ko' nyeh bap! tepesungkur tam abis kegegola'e.
40017007	Pie Yesus manu ke' sidoe lalu nigue sidoe. "Bengki'am, kamei," jie. "Nang gola'."
40017008	Dah nyoe murit Yesus nenguwa'; diperatie tei' cum dah reng layin dinyoe te'. Tingal siko' Yesus dam.
40017009	Jedi mátam. Des sidoe empat turun deri natai nyeh tei' Yesus mat bepadah ke' sidoe. "Nang na' madah ke' sopai pun," jie, "ken jolu yeng diperati kam tadie. Mun bolum aku Ana' Mensiyo mati bengki' idup agei' nyeh nang na' bepadah lo'e," jie Yesus.
40017010	Dah nyoe murite tigo ko' tei' betanyoe ke' Yesus. "Kaji kami si na' nunoe jie pada' ugar agama nyeh sepatute penijum Elia ca' ngulu Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah. Pie perati kami," jie, "bolum do Kei' Elia detang ngelaju tugase na' po yeng ditijum mie," jie.
40017011	Samut Yesus, "Nyoe si mátam, kamei. Elia mat ca' dolu deri Kristus, nyo' iyo memanci semuya' segeloe.
40017012	Pie yeng mat si Elia mat dah detang dah, kamei, pie reng noe tekenale ken iyo mat Elia. Jewoh na' tekenal, malah ken paie iyo mat dipempungah le' sidoe sekemawo' atieam," jie Yesus. "Jedi ponyoe jum ken aku yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo nyeh, kamei. Aku mat langko' dipempungah le' sidoe jum," jie Yesus.
40017013	Dah nyoe murite pun jelase ken yeng dimaksut Yesus tadie ke' hal Elia nyeh poe Yohanes Penyolam.
40017014	Jedi mátam. Dah turun deri natai tei' Yesus sidoe betomu agei'am ken pada' reng rami yeng nan do ngenjurute. Dah nyoe do reng lelaki siko' yeng manu ke' Yesus lalu belutut di adap Yesus.
40017015	"Tuwowe," jie, "tulong ge' ana' ku tue," jie. "Iyo saki' saban; mat lelaham iyo ngidape, sampai erat iyo teperobah ke' lem api, pai noe ke' lem ayie. Mat lelah nar iyo ngidape," jie.
40017016	Jedi jie reng lelaki nyeh, "Daham ku meyie iyo tue ke' murit kau, nyo' sidoe ngembeyi'e, pie ngei'e beyi', noe mampu sidoe," jie.
40017017	Lalu jie Yesus nyingka' pada' reng rami ken pada' murite, "Parah nar kam lapis tue," jie. "Dah lamat dah aku do ken kam pie manseh potuam ati kam; cumam kepecayo kam. Mat koringam ati kam, poe. Gei' paiam lamat agei' aku ca' nantie gei' ati kam berubah?" jie Yesus. Lalu dah iyo bungi nyoe dah nyoe jie nyingka' reng lelaki nyeh te', "Tabanam kitue ana' kau," jie.
40017018	Lalu mátam, dah ana'e nyeh ditaban ke' Yesus tei' lalu Yesus pun nunong setan deri ana' biya' nyeh te'; dah ditunonge tei' setan nyeh pun mat keluwaram. Dah keluwar tei' ana' biya' nyeh pun sengkunyong beyi'am.
40017019	Jedi dah kaloe ponyoe, tingal Yesus ken murite bangam nyeh, lalu murite betanyoe ke' Yesus. "Gopai nin," jie, "go kami tadie nunong setan nyeh, bolei'e?" jie sidoe.
40017020	Lalu Yesus nyamute, "Tam kepecayo kam gei' malang," jie. "Pie mun mat dipakai si numo' pun kepecayo kam gei' malang nyeh pie manseh bekuwasoam. Ibarat ke' jolu din numo' pun kepecayo kam mosai igei' sensabi, pie manseh bekuwasoam. Mampu na' nyuroh gunóng begenset deri tue kinyoe pun. Mat na'e tuno' ke' kam. Kam semuya' uleh semuya' mampu sal ge' kam mat pecayo," jie Yesus. [
40017021	"Ja'e ke' hal setan nyeh tadie," jie, "kepecayo diret togap pun go setan tokoh nyoe mat noe mampu ditunong modasam, cuwali ken caro bedoa ken betara' noe makan," jie Yesus.]
40017022	Jedi mátam. Dah pagi lusoe ponyoe Yesus ken pada' murite bekumpol agei', di peloya' Galilea. Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Aku yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo nyeh," jie, "mat langko' diserah ke' pada' penguwaso,
40017023	ken sidoe langko' munoh aku. Pie dah ari pengentigo nyeh aku langko' disuroh Allah bengki' idup agei'am," jie. Jedi ningo omóng Yesus bungi nyoe tei' pada' murite mat susaham atie.
40017024	Dah nyoe Yesus ken murite detang ke' kampong Kapernaum. Detang kinun lalu Petrus dipanu le' reng yeng nageh duwit pajak ento' rumah kediyam Allah*. Pemenya' pajak nyeh duwo bingkap duwit perak. Jedi jie sidoe yeng nageh pajak nyeh tei', "Nyeh guru kau," jie, "ngembeyar noei pajak rumah kediyam Allah?" jie betanyoe ke' Petrus.
40017025	"Guru kami ngembeyar jum," samut Petrus. Jedi dah ningal omónge ken sidoe Petrus pun nayi' ke' lem rumah, betomu ken Yesus. Lalu Yesus die yeng betanyoe ke' Petrus. Jedi jie Yesus, "Nyeh engo kau koti, Simon, ke' hal ngembeyar pajak di deniyo tue. Sepatute sopailah yeng ca' meyar pajak ke' pada' rajo di deniyo tue? Ca' ana' rajoei, ca' urangei?" jie Yesus.
40017026	Jie Petrus, "Ca' urang." Samut Yesus, "I, ca' urangam. Ana' rajo kin lopas, dih?
40017027	Ja'e mun diret noe ngembeyar pajak tue, gola' sidoe salah tangap ngaji diret; jedi ma'am dibeyar pun. A, boh kau ngayel ja' ke' lompoe," jie Yesus. "Sal dah kau buleh siko' kaloe kau ngoba' nyawoe; dinyoam kau nomu duwit cukup nyo' kau ngembeyar pajak diret duwo. Nyoe ca' diamie kau, diunyo' kau ke' sidoe, beh?" jie Yesus nyingka' Petrus. Lalu mátam.
40018001	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe pada' murit Yesus manu na' betanyoe ke' Yesus. Lalu jie sidoe, "Sopaiam yeng langko' bepangkat tingie des Allah disomah kei rajo di deniyo tue?" jie sidoe.
40018002	Dah nyoe Yesus pun ngamie nyapo siko' ana' biya' yeng do dinyoe, disurohe bediri kei iyo nyontohe di adap murite.
40018003	"Yeng mat si," jie Yesus, "mun kam noe berubah pemiker kam," jie, "kam langko' noe konoe kawum kaliam lem pada' berekat dolat Allah des Sen disomah kei rajo. Kam mat ca' renah ati na' po ana' biya'am.
40018004	Go sopai ja' yeng merenah direte na' po ana' biya' nyeh si iyoam yeng bepangkat tingie des Allah disomah kei rajo nyeh," jie Yesus.
40018005	"A, ken sopai ja' yeng nampan nerimoe begewol begelumo ken reng yeng paling beroh benso ana' biya' potue tam demo aku si mat samoam ken iyo nampan nerimoe akuam," jie Yesus.
40018006	"Pie kebelike," jie, "mun do reng yeng ngacau ngaru reng pecayo si ukume paling borat. Biyar pun reng pecayo yeng paling beroh pun, pie mun do reng yeng ngacau ngarue si mat paling boratam ukume. Manseh nyamán ge' mun betu bosai ditamat ke' liyere lalu iyo dilojang ke' lem lawut, deri pado iyo dibelas le' Allah tam iyo ngacau ngaru reng pecayo.
40018007	"Paraham deniyo tue, go nan do nyem jolu yeng kei nyangkut reng kei nyurohe bedoso. Jolu ge' deniyo tue mat jatam, mangko nan do nyem jolu yeng kei nyangkut reng; mat noe koloe noe. Pi mat paraham reng yeng nyuroh betore tesangkut, go ukume mat paling borat," jie Yesus.
40018008	"Mangko mun jeri kau atau pun kaki kau yeng to' meyie kau bedoso si coh ge' ditukong dibuwang kaliam," jie Yesus. "Go manseh nyamán kau idup begelumo ken Allah ken tuboh kau yeng timpang jerano deri pado dilojang ke' api yeng benyalo seora'-ora'eam ken tuboh kau yeng gei' pepak gonáp pun.
40018009	"A, ponyoe jum mun mato kau yeng to' meyie kau bedoso nyeh; coh ge' dicungkit dibuwang kaliam," jie Yesus. "Manseh nyamán kau idup begelumo ken Allah ken mato kau yeng butoe deri pado dilojang ke' lem lawut api ken mato kau yeng gei' moncas pun," jie Yesus.
40018010	"Ingátam kam, nang na' kam ngeremeh siko' pun deri engku aku yeng paling beroh pun," jie Yesus. "Go semalang ke' Apa' ku di serugo nun pun ge'e, noe koloe Sen ngeremehe, sa'am go kam. Sampai tiyap ko' engku aku mat do melekat yeng kei ngenjegoe; ken melekat nyeh pun rato-ratoe behak nan manu ngadap Allah kei nyampai penyadu engku ku ke' Sen," jie Yesus. [
40018011	"Mangko kam ati-ati nang na' ngeremeh engku aku yeng paling beroh pun. Go aku Ana' Mensiyo detang pun to' nulong nyelamát reng yeng sosat," jie Yesus.]
40018012	"A, contohe benso reng yeng benya' domoe. Jedi mun do reng ngingún domo seratus ko' nyeh, pie do siko' yeng meracau, yeng losi; lalu pai gewai tuwowe nyeh, engoe?" jie Yesus. "Tentu domo yeng benya' nyeh ditingale, diadue nyem iyo ngulam di natai nun nyo' tuwowe ngogoe domoe yeng siko' yeng losi nyeh, mat noe?
40018013	A, dah tomue kin iyo ayah bikaham ngajie. Malah ken paie paling ayah bikaham iyo ngaji yeng dah losi pie tue dah tomu agei'am, deri pado yeng benya' yeng renán yeng noe losi pun.
40018014	A, ponyoe jum ken Apa' diret di serugo nun. Kona' ati Sen si gei' sempayo siko' pun cum deri engku Sen yeng paling beroh pun yeng losi nayáp," jie Yesus.
40018015	Jedi jie Yesus, "Sal do betor kau yeng dah pecayo yeng bedoso," jie Yesus, "kau ca' negure caro besemuko. Pie kam bedenduwo nyem, caro besesulit. Mun iyo na' ningo kau, maksute kau dah ngerampas betor kau deri dosoe.
40018016	Pie umpamoe mun iyo ngei'e ningo kau, kau ca' meyie betor kau siko' duwo, dipanu agei'. Go mun na' ngesah kesalah urang ca' do saksi duwo tigo ko'.*
40018017	Pie mun iyo manseh ngei'e ningo kam duwo tigo nyeh, ca' dipadah ke' pada' umát gereja die. Kepepuwase, mun iyo ngei'e ningo pada' umát pun, kam ca' ngangape po kam ngangap reng yeng noe tekenal ken Allah, ken pada' reng penageh pajak nyeh*," jie Yesus. Nyoam pengajar Yesus ke' hal reng pecayo sege' bedoso.
40018018	"Jedi ke' hal gewai umát ku di deniyo tue," jie Yesus, "kam yeng behak mutuse. Go yeng diputus kam ditue pun maksute go dah diputus disah le' Allah di serugo nun," jie Yesus.
40018019	"A, tue mat penting jum ke' hal hak kam yeng pecayo nyeh," jie Yesus. "Jedi mun kam seati sepiker bedoa minta' tulong Sen di deniyo tue si, numo' pun ngat duwo ko' kam nyem yeng bedoa pie pasti dituntongam le' Apa' ku di serugo nun.
40018020	Go dinai do duwo tigo ko' kam nyem pie mun kam bekumpol bedoa tam pecayo ken demo aku si aku tetap nyeroto kam. Mangko Apa' ku pun mat nuntong ningo doa kam," jie Yesus.
40018021	Dah nyoe Petrus manu ke' Yesus, lalu betanyoe. "Tuwowe," jie, "ca' beropai kali aku ngampun betor ku mun iyo do salahe ken aku? Ca' sampai tujoh kali peh aku ngampune?" jie Petrus.
40018022	"Noe, noe iyo ngat bula' tujoh kaliam peh," jie Yesus. "Malah ken paie ca' tujoh puloh kali lipat kau ngampun betor kau!
40018023	Go ponyoe jum," jie, "sal ge' Allah disomah kei rajo," jie. Dah nyoe iyo madah sebuwah perempamo ke' hal koti keada'e sege' Allah disomah kei rajo. "Jedi," jie Yesus, "do siko' rajo. Dah nyoe kaji rajo tei' na' merati catat utang belo ana' buwahe, lalu na' diitonge.
40018024	Jedi des iyo merati catat utang nyeh, dibeyie ngadap ke' rajo siko' ana' buwahe yeng utange sampai bejejuta.
40018025	Pi iyo cum jolue nyo' ngembeyar utange. Mangko suroh rajo tei' deri iyo sampai ana' binie pun ca' dijuwal kei ulun reng, cukup ken rumah tangoe pai ca' dijuwal jum. Duwite asel sedena' seberumah dijuwal tei' nyo' ngembeyar utange, jie rajo.
40018026	"Susaham ati ana' buwahe ningo paner rajo bungi nyoe ken iyo. Lalu iyo nungkup di adap rajo, minta' muhún, simah minta' kekaseh rajo. Muhúnam, tuwowei, sabar lo'e, jie, nyo' ku besetiyar ngembeyar semuya'e, jie.
40018027	"Kaseham rajo meratie, lalu diapuse kaliam utange yeng paling bosai, noe sa' dibeyaram, jie.
40018028	"Pie, pailah. Dah pamus deri rajo tei' ana' buwah nyoe betomu ken kabane samo-samo ana' buwah rajo jum. Kabane tei' berutang ken iyo. Sikitam utange, ngat bereribu nyem. Pie tumas merati betore yeng berutang ken iyo tei', ditangkape, dijengengke, lalu, Beyaram utang kau ken aku, jie yeng siko' yeng gei' beruam diapus utange yeng paling bosai.
40018029	"Betore tei' nungkup lalu, Muhúnam, sabar lo'e, jie, nyo' ku besetiyar ngembeyare, jie.
40018030	"Pie ana' buwah yeng siko' nyeh ngei'e. Betore mat ditangkape, dipenjeroe, lopas noe lopas ca' dah pupus utange, jie.
40018031	"Pada' ana' buwah rajo yeng layin tei' merati jum gewai betore yeng siko'. Mat susaham sidoe meratie, lalu sidoe mat bepadah ke' rajo.
40018032	"Dah nyoe rajo beposan ke' ana' buwahe yeng diampune tadie ponyoe. Mat detangam ngadap rajo agei'. Lalu jie rajo nyingka'e, Kau ana' buwah yeng jat! jie. Utang kau yeng paling bosai ku apus ku, tam kau muhún dikaseh.
40018033	Menurute kau ca' ngaseh betor kau, po aku ngaseh kau. Pi kau cum kekaseh kau ken betor!
40018034	"Mat godiam rajo, mangko ana' buwahe disurohe dipenjero, disensare kerado' ke' dah dipupus utange.
40018035	"Ponyoe jum Apa' ku di serugo ken kam, mun kam noe ngelon betor, kamei," jie Yesus. "Kam ca' seputeh ati nan ngelon betor yeng besalah ken kam," jie.
40019001	Jedi mátam. Dah santo' Yesus ngajar reng bungi nyoe tei' lalu iyo ningal peloya' Galilea bejelan manu ke' peloya' Yudea di seborang Sungai Yordan.
40019002	Pada' mensiyo yeng ngenjurute pun mat paling rami nar, lalu yeng perelu ditulong dipebeyi' nyeh mat dipebeyi' le' Yesus.
40019003	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus dipanu le' reng deri kelompok Parisi yeng na' ngendugoe. Lalu jie sidoe, "Nyeh kengkaji kau ngelangar ukum noei mun reng semadi muwáng binie?" jie.
40019004	Dah nyoe Yesus nyamute, "Nyeh kam noe jelas peh ken tuju maksut Allah ke' hal reng bejodo nyeh? Pie tentu kam koloe beco di Kitap Allah, ken Sen yeng asal muloe ngado mensiyo mie mat ngado sepasang, selaki sebini.
40019005	Lalu dah diado Sen tei' jie Sen, Nyoam sebape sege' senika' reng lelaki bejodo nyeh iyo mat bepencar ken ino' apa'e, lalu ngumpol ke' jodoe, gei' sidoe sederah sedeginam, jie Sen. (Kejedi 2:24)
40019006	Maksute," jie Yesus, "yeng asale duwo ko' nyeh pie diangap menjedi siko'am. Mangko yeng dah dipadu le' Allah nyeh nang na' dipencar le' mensiyo," jie Yesus.
40019007	Lalu jie reng Parisi nyeh, "Nyeh mun ponyoe ngopai go jie ukum Kei' Musa mie reng mampu muwáng binie sal ge' diunyo'e ken surat* yeng sah?" jie sidoe.
40019008	Lalu jie Yesus nyamute, "Nyoe tam deri ati kam yeng bolei' dibongkeh urang nyeh ke; nyoam go Kei' Musa ngijin kam muwáng bini kam. Pie des Allah asal mulo ngado mensiyo mie si noe iyo tokoh nyoe peh.
40019009	Mangko jie ku sopai ja' yeng muwáng binie lalu bejodo ken bini yeng beru nyeh si iyo mat butang beonga', cuwali iyo sara' mie tam asale binie yeng butang beonga'," jie Yesus.
40019010	Jedi ningo paner Yesus bungi nyoe tei' jie murite, "Mun ponyoe si coh ge' noe sa' bejodo kaliam," jie sidoe.
40019011	Pie Yesus nyamute, "Noe iyo semuya' reng yeng mampu makai pemadah nyoe, cuwali iyo diunyo' kemampu deri Allaham," jie Yesus.
40019012	"Mat do reng yeng noe mampu bejodo tam iyo jerano cum napsue deri asal iyo diado mie pun. Do jum yeng noe mampu bejodo tam iyo mat dipulah reng jerano cum benapsu. A, do jum reng yeng noe bejodo tam iyo sengejo mileh noe bejodo tam na' bebas kit melayan Allah," jie Yesus. "Mangko sopai ja' yeng mat diborie Allah kemampu gei' iyo noe bejodo nyeh si kemampu nyoe mat ca' dipakai," jie Yesus.
40019013	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe do reng yeng meyie ana'e ke' Yesus kei minta' didoa diberekate. Pie sidoe dicacue, ditonga' le' pada' murit Yesus.
40019014	Pie jie Yesus, "Aduam beh pada' ana' biya' nyeh manu ke' aku," jie. "Nang na' kam nonga'e. Go mat reng yeng tokoh ana' biya'ame' yeng langko' tekawum lem pada' berekat dolat Allah des Sen disomah kei rajo," jie Yesus.
40019015	Lalu mat doam Yesus nyampang jerie ke' pada' ana' biya' nyeh nyo' iyo ngendolate. Dah nyoe iyo pun mat ngelaju pejelane.
40019016	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yesus dipanu le' siko' reng lelaki yeng gei' mudoe yeng na' betanyoe ke' iyo. Lalu jie reng lelaki yeng gei' mudoe nyeh, "Guru," jie, "gewai pailah yeng panci yeng ca' ku gewai gei' ku buleh idup yeng cum berudu mati?" jie.
40019017	Lalu samut Yesus, "Nyeh mun kau ngat ngangap ku guru nyem gopai go kau nanyoe aku ke' hal gewai yeng panci? Go kin ngat Allaham yeng panci. Tawu noe kau ken maksut omóng kau tue?" jie. "A, jedi ke' hal petanyoe kau tei'," jie, "mun kau na' buleh idup yeng cum berudu mati nyeh kau ca' tuno' taalo' ke' perentah Allah," jie.
40019018	"Perentah Sen yeng koti si?" jie reng mudoe nyeh. Lalu samut Yesus, "Kin jie ukum Musa, Nang munoh, nang butang beonga', nang maling, nang mempulah betor.
40019019	Ge'em ca' ngehormát ino' apa' kau, ken kau ca' ngaseh betor po ngaseh diret kau," jie Yesus.
40019020	Lalu jie reng yeng gei' mudoe nyeh, "Mun ja' ator ke' deng nyoe si," jie, "go ku nan tuno' nyem. Jolu pailah yeng gei' malang yeng ca' ku gewai?" jie.
40019021	Mangko jie Yesus, "Mun kau na' cum kekurang kemalang kau," jie, "kau ca' ngenjuwal pada' reto beno jento keraja' kau, lalu asele kau begi ke' pada' reng yeng bensat, kei kau diupah di serugo nun. Lalu dah nyoe kau bebeli' manu ke' aku, kei menjedi murit aku," jie Yesus.
40019022	Pie reng mudoe tei' ngaso ningo paner Yesus bungi nyoe tei' mat susaham atie, go iyo reng yeng paling kayo rayo. Sorote ngaji na' ngenjuwal pada' jolue. Ngaso ponyoe tei' iyo pun mat pulangam.
40019023	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' pada' murite, "Yeng mat si," jie Yesus, "reng kayo si mat maring nar na' nyomah Allah kei rajoe," jie.
40019024	"Manseh murah ge' binatang unta ngerudu lubang jerum deripado reng kayo na' tekawum des Allah disomah kei rajo, kamei," jie Yesus.
40019025	Jedi ningo paner Yesus bungi nyoe tei' mat kangápam pada' murite, lalu jie sidoe, "Mun ponyoe si mat mawáham kami tue, moe. Semalang ke' reng yeng diangap kami bujor benar pun ge'e, noe mampu ditulong diselamát, poe, sa'am go kami. Mat cum reng yeng mampu," jie pada' murite.
40019026	Pie Yesus mantau ke' sidoe lalu jie Yesus, "Mensiyo si mat cum kemampue na' nulong nyelamát direte pun. Ca' Allaham yeng nulong nyelamáte, go Allah si semuya' uleh semuya' mampu," jie Yesus.
40019027	Dah nyoe jie Petrus nyingka' Yesus, "Tauam," jie, "kami yeng dah menjedi murit kau. Kami si mat dah ningal semuya' segeno yeng do di kami tam kami na' ngenjurut kau. Nyeh pailah cagar yeng na' kami terimoe deri kau?" jie Petrus.
40019028	"Do mah gi ye'," samut Yesus, "untong tuwah diterimoe kam. Sege' dah deniyo tue dipulah beru nun gi akuam yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo yeng kei rajo yeng agong yeng bekuwaso. Kam duwo belas murit ku pun langko' dudo' di pada' belai agong dinun nyo' kam merentah jum beroto ken aku. Kam kei akim pada' reng Israel yeng duwo belas benso gi.
40019029	"Pai tel agei'," jie Yesus, "sopai ja' yeng ningal pada' jolu di deniyo tue go pecayo ken aku pasti beuntong tuwah gi," jie Yesus. "Demo ke' rumah tangoe, demo ke' dulor menyadie, demo ke' ino' apa'e, demo ke' ana' uco'e, demo ke'...boneh genelo cuco' tanám kebun jenah. Pie mun ditingal reng go iyo pecayo ken aku si iyo dibelas kaseh seratus kali lipat. Pai tel agei' buleh jum idup yeng cum berudu mati," jie Yesus.
40019030	"Mat tebeli' deri pengaji mensiyo," jie Yesus. "Go reng yeng dikaji betore langko' noe ditingie gi, pie dah kesudahe iyoam yeng ditingie. Pie kebelike yeng ngangap direte pasti langko' ditingie pie iyo tarah ke' noe ditingie gi," jie Yesus.
40020001	Dah nyoe Yesus manseh nyamong panere. "Mat ponyoame' des Allah disomah kei rajo," jie Yesus, "Ku merempamoe ke' siko' tuwowe kebun angur," jie. "Jedi sempamoe do tuwowe kebun angur nyeh, dah nyoe iyo bengki' kolam nyama' ngogoe reng kei ngerejo kebune.
40020002	Jedi dah iyo nomu reng yeng relo kerejo tei' iyo pun nyereto ngupah sidoe ken duwit denari sebingkap, na' po kebiyaso upah reng kerejo seari ponyoe. Dah nyereto ponyoe tuwowe kebun nyeh pun mat nyuroh sidoe bekoyo bekerejo di lem kebune.
40020003	"Jedi dah mato ari nayi' tei' tuwowe kebun nyeh turun agei'am deri rumahe, lalu diperatie tei' di tongah temelayan kampong tei' gei' do reng yeng ngencogok, yeng cum gewaie.
40020004	Jedi jie tuwowe kebun nyeh, Na' noe kam kerejo di kebun angur aku, jie. Kaloe ku ngupah kam setimpal ken kerejo kam, jie. Lalu sidoe pun mat na'e.
40020005	"Jedi dah tongah ari kaloe, ponyoe agei'am tuwowe kebun nyeh te'; iyo nyuroh reng yeng ngencogok di temelayan kampong nyeh nyo' ngamie upah di kebune. A, ken dah mato ari cunong penuto' nyeh pun ponyoe jum.
40020006	Jedi dah pengudah kali iyo bejelan di temelayan kampong tei' dah na' ujong ari dah, pie manseh gei' doam iyo merati reng yeng ngencogok, yeng cum gewaie. Lalu jie tuwowe kebun nyeh, Ngopai, jie, go kam beari-ari ngencogok nyem, cum gewai kam? jie.
40020007	Lalu jie samut sidoe, Jolu ge' cum reng yeng nyuroh kami kerejo, jie. "Lalu jie tuwowe kebun nyeh, Bom, jie, mun kam na' kerejo di kebun aku pun, jie. Lalu sidoe pun mat na'e.
40020008	"Jedi mátam. Dah ujong ari ponyoe tei' tuwowe kebun nyeh nyuroh ana' buwahe ngembegi upah ke' pada' reng yeng kerejo kebune te'. Jedi jie tuwowe nyeh nyingka' ana' buwahe, Dikumpolam pada' reng yeng ngamie upah tadie, begiam pada' upahe ke' sidoe, betongai deri yeng dudi mansok tadie manu ke' reng yeng paling dolu, jie tuwowe kebun nyeh.
40020009	"Lalu mátam. Pada' reng yeng mulai kerejo des dah na' ujong ari tadie pun pie manseh diupah sebingkap siko'.
40020010	Jedi dah detang ke' giler sidoe yeng dolu kerejo tadie si kaji sidoe, a, kami si pasti benya' upah deri sidoe layin. Pie sidoe pun manseh sebingkapam jum upahe, na' po yeng dijenyi ken tuwowe kebun tadie.
40020011	Jedi ngaso ponyoe tei' pada' sidoe yeng dolu kerejo tei' begunau ken tuwowe kebun nyeh.
40020012	Ngopai, jie, go upah kami samo ken upah sidoe yeng paling dudi; sidoe kin kerejo sejamam. Tekonoe ke' kami beompas pulas beari-ari bejomor, jie sidoe yeng mansok dolu nyeh te'.
40020013	"Pie jie tuwowe nyeh nyingka' siko' reng yeng begunau nyeh, Ku si so ku cum kesalah aku ken kau, kaban kuei. Kau kin nyereto ken upah sedenari ento' seari pul.
40020014	Noe peh dah diunyo' ke' kau na' po yeng dijenyi diret tadie? Mun ponyoe amiam upah kau, lalu pulangam, jie tuwowe. Ku si, jie, mat tam kerelo ati diret kuam na' ngupah sidoe yeng dudi tadie samo ken kam.
40020015	Go duwit kin yeng akuam. Nyeh kaji kam aku noe behak peh ngurus duwit diret ku? Atau pai nawue go ati kam isin dengki nyem go ku buwar ati ken sidoe, jie tuwowe nyeh." Bungi nyoam perempamo Yesus.
40020016	"Mangko jie ku tadie," jie Yesus, "mat tebeli' deri pengaji mensiyo. Go reng yeng dikaji betore langko' noe ditingie gi pie dah kesudahe iyoam yeng ditingie. Pie kebelike yeng ngangap direte pasti langko' ditingie pie iyo tarah ke' noe ditingie gi," jie Yesus.
40020017	Jedi mátam. Yesus sidoe mat bejelan nuju ke' kota Yerusalem. Dah nyoe Yesus ngumpol murite duwo belas ko' bangam, lalu jie nyingka' sidoe,
40020018	"Dingo beh kam," jie. "Tue diret bejelan nuju ke' Yerusalem. Jedi dah detang kinun," jie, "aku Ana' Mensiyo langko' diserah ke' pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' ugar agama diret, yeng langko' mutuse ken aku ca' diukum mati.
40020019	Lalu aku langko' diserah sidoe ke' pada' reng noe Yahudi die, yeng cagar ngeolo'-olo' ngererujong ku ken melesah mempungah aku. Sampai pengabise aku disalip le' sidoe. Pie dah ari pengentigo nyeh Allah pun langko' nyuroh aku bengki' idup agei'am," jie Yesus.
40020020	Dah nyoe Yesus dipanu le' bini Sebedeus ken ana'e Yohanes ken Yakobus, murit Yesus. Dah nyoe ino'e nungkup di adap Yesus, na' minta' jolu ke' Yesus.
40020021	Jedi jie Yesus, "Na' pai den tei'?" Samut ino' Yohanes nyeh, "Ku," jie, "na' minta' ke' kau kei ana' ku duwo ko' tue dudo' siko' di kiboe siko' di kanán kau kei wakel kau, dah kau disah kei rajo gi," jie ino' Yohanes.
40020022	Pie jie Yesus nyingka' Yohanes sidoe, "Kam," jie Yesus, "noe tawu reti jolu yeng dipinta' kam," jie. "Kam na' merentah kei wakel ku, pie mampu peh kam ngerudu pada' kesensare yeng ca' dirudu le' aku sebolum ku merentah kei rajo?" jie. "Mampu," jie sidoe duwo.
40020023	Samut Yesus, "Yeng mat si kam pun ca' ngerudu kesensare na' po aku," jie. "Pi ke' hal sopai yeng dudo' di kiboe sopai yeng dudo' di kanán kei wakel aku gi," jie Yesus, "nyoe noe iyo aku peh yeng nitahe. Apa' ku die yeng nitah nyoe, dah dipampoh Sen dah nyo' reng yeng dipileh Sen," jie Yesus.
40020024	Jedi dah murite layin yeng sepuloh ko' tei' ningo pai yeng dipinta' le' sidoe duwo bemenyadie nyeh lalu mat isinam sidoe sepuloh.
40020025	Pie Yesus pun ngumpol pada' murite lalu madahe potue. "Kam nang kalut ke' hal pangkat," jie. "Yeng nan penting ngaji pangkat si pada' benso layin, yeng noe menduli Allah," jie Yesus. "Sidoe si ayahe merentah nyuroh betor; pada' rajoe kejam merentah rayate, ken pada' wakele pun sebetah iyo nyuroh pada' rayate kitue kinyoe. Nyoe begi reng yeng noe menduli Allah.
40020026	"Pie kam," jie Yesus, "nang na' ponyoe. Kebelike sopai yeng na' mimpin ca' melayanam.
40020027	Ken berang reng yeng na' diangap tingie ca' dolu merenah direte, mat ca' kei ulun betor.
40020028	"Contohe aku tuam, yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo," jie Yesus. "Go aku pun detang noe iyo ento' dilayan peh. Kebelike," jie Yesus, "aku detang kei melayan, sampai nyerah diret ku kei mati, kei nobus reng benya' deri kuwaso Pengelakar," jie Yesus nyingka' murite.
40020029	Jedi mátam. Yesus sidoe ngelaju pejelane ke' Yerusalem ngelalu kota Yeriko. Dah ngelalu Yeriko tei' pada' reng yeng ngenjurut Yesus nyeh mat betetukue ramiam mensiyoe.
40020030	Jedi soma' Yeriko tei' poe do duwo ko' reng butoe yeng nan dudo' di pinger jelan, dah nyoe sidoe pun kedingoe ken Yesus do ngelalu sidoe dinyoe. Jedi ngaso kedingoe tei' sidoe yeng butoe tei' simah pera' perango nyapo Yesus. "Tuwowe, buboh Kei' Daud," jie, "tulong ge' kami tue," jie sidoe.
40020031	Pada' reng rami tei' nonga' reng butoe nyuroh sidoe ngojap nyem. Pie sidoe malah ken paie malar minta' tulong kin ontap-ontap nyapo. "Tuwowe, buboh Kei' Daud, tulong ge' kami tue," jie.
40020032	Dah nyoe Yesus tei' beronga' di tongah jelan lalu nengkuwau sidoe, nyurohe manu ke' soma'. Dah nyoe, "Na' pai perelu kam ken aku?" jie Yesus.
40020033	Lalu samut sidoe, "Kami na' mencináng, Tuwowei," jie.
40020034	Ningo panere bungi nyoe tei' Yesus mat kaseham atie, lalu diculete ke' mato sidoe duwo ko' nyeh te'. Tumas diculete tei' sidoe duwo pun lintus mencinángam. Lalu sidoe pun namah pada' reng rami ngenjurut Yesus jum.
40021001	Jedi mátam. Yesus sidoe gei' bejelan nuju ke' Yerusalem. Jedi dah soma' ke' Yerusalem tei' sidoe detang ke' senopang kampong Betpage, yeng aronge di tongah natai Buki' Saitun. Jedi dah nyoe Yesus ngutus murite duwo ko' nyo' kinun.
40021002	Jedi jie Yesus, "Boh kam ke' kampong di adap nun," jie. "Pas kam tomus kinun kaloe kam langko' merati keledai yeng ditamat ken ana'e. Jedi kam ca' mucel penamate lalu dibeyie kam kitue.
40021003	Jedi misale mun do reng nyacue kam, kam ca' nyamute potue: go Tuwowe perelu na' makaie, pie dah dipakaie kaloe si langko' dipulang kitue." Bungi nyoam posan Yesus ke' murite yeng duwo ko' te'.
40021004	Nyoe pun kei nuntong yeng ditulis le' penijum Allah nyomie yeng bungie potue,
40021005	Padaham ke' pada' reng di kota Sion, Ti beh kam! Rajo kam dah detang dah na' nulong kam. Iyo reng yeng lemah lemut suyo' sabar; bejelan pun pakai ana' keledai, binatang yeng selomo dipakai to' meyie beban reng nyem, (Masmur 118:22) jie penijum Sen mie.
40021006	Jedi mátam. Murit Yesus tei' mat turunam kinun ngamie keledai na' po yeng disuroh Yesus tadie ponyoe.
40021007	Keledai ken ana'e mat dibeyie ke' Yesus, lalu disolap sidoe ken beju jubahe. Yesus pun dudo' dinyoe melaju pejelane ke' Yerusalem.
40021008	Dah nyoe pada' reng rami yeng betetukue ngenjurut Yesus pun mat ngalu nyamut kedetang Yesus. Do yeng ngampar ngoma' beju jubahe di tongah jelan; do jum yeng mancong pada' dewun kayu yeng bekelopah, lalu dioma'e jum di tongah jelan.
40021009	Lalu pada' reng rami beyi' yeng ngulue beyi' yeng ngenjurute pun mat besesura' mugi Allah. "Tepugiam den, buboh Rajo Daudei," jie. "Tuam to' reng yeng detang atas demo Tuwowe! Detang dah! Mat Sénam yeng ngendolat ngemberekate," jie sidoe. "Tepugiam Allah yeng rajo tingie," jie pada' reng rami nyeh te'.
40021010	Jedi dah detang ke' kota Yerusalem tei' seruroh reng di Yerusalem nyeh kamoh iroh merati pada' reng rami yeng nyamut ngalu Yesus nyeh te'. Lalu jie sidoe, "Sopai beh yeng kam alu yeng kam samut nyeh?" jie.
40021011	Lalu pada' reng rami nyeh nyamute, "Yeng kami samut tue Yesus, penijum yeng tekemuko deri kampong Nasaret di peloya' Galilea," jie reng rami nyeh.
40021012	Jedi dah detang ke' Yerusalem tei' Yesus mat tamoe ke' kolong rumah kediyam Allah. Peratie tei' beisei' pada' reng yeng bedegang bebelo' dinyoe. Dah nyoe Yesus nunong pada' reng yeng bedegang nyeh te', deri reng yeng bejuwal sampai ke' pemolie pun. Pada' meja reng penukar duwit ken pada' bengku reng bejuwal pada' burong dero to' pesaling reng pun simah dibelungang belengi'e, dipebuwange deri nyoe.
40021013	Lalu jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Kin ditulis di lem Kitap Allah mie bungie potue, Rumah Ku tue kusus nyo' reng bedoa, jie Sen.* Pie kam," jie Yesus, "gopai go rumah kediyam Allah tue kam guno nyo' kam ngerampok die," jie.
40021014	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe pada' reng butoe ken pada' reng timpang nyeh manu ke' Yesus di rumah kediyam Allah, lalu Yesus pun ngembeyi' sidoe.
40021015	A, ken pada' ana' biya' yeng do di kolong rumah kediyam Allah pun teger besesura' mugi Yesus. "Tepugiam den, buboh Kei' Daudei!" jie sidoe. A, pada' ketuwo pelayan agama reng Yahudi, ken pada' ugar agama pun do jum dinyoe, merati pada' keenah keaneh yeng dipulah Yesus dinyoe, ken ningo pada' ana' biya' yeng mugie bungi nyoe, pie sidoe tei' godiam.
40021016	"Nyeh noe kedingo peh kau ken omóng ana' biya' nyeh, go kau pelebu nyem?" jie. "Kedingo ku," jie Yesus. "Ja'e go nyoe pun patutam. Mat konoe jum na' po yeng ditulis lem Kitap Allah mie yeng bungie potue: Ku langko' nyuroh pada' ana' biya' yeng kekocit die nyo' mugi Aku, (Masmur 8:2) jie Sen. Nyeh kam noe koloe peh beco Kitap Sen ke' hal nyoe?" jie Yesus.
40021017	Lalu Yesus mat ningal sidoe, pamus deri kota Yerusalem lalu bejelan ke' kampong Betania, dah nyoe iyo pun bemalam dinyoam.
40021018	Jedi dah pagie ponyoe Yesus ken murite bekolam nyama' turun na' bebeli' ke' kota Yerusalem. Jedi detang ke' tongah jelan tei' Yesus pun teraso lapar porute.
40021019	Jedi soma' jelan diperatie do sekayo' kayu buwah yeng bedemo ara. Jedi dipanue ke' soma', na' merati do noe buwahe. Pie dah merati ke' soma' tei' diperatie kontan dewune bangam, cumam buwahe. Dah nyoe Yesus nyumpah kayu nyeh te'. "Kayu ara tue, cumam kau bebuwah agei'," jie Yesus. Seroto bungi nyoe tei' kayu ara nyeh pun sap! ngojut ngerangkai kotai.
40021020	Jedi dah murit Yesus merati gewai Yesus tokoh nyoe kangápam sidoe. "Koti nin beh," jie, "go kayu ara tue semorie mampu sengkunyong ngerangkai kotai potue?" jie.
40021021	Lalu Yesus nyamute, "Kam," jie, "mat ca' pecayoam ken Allah. Nang na' kam tumang aming. Go mun kepecayo kam togap si," jie, "sa' beh na' nyuroh kayu tokoh tue ngerangkai kotai. Umpamoe mun na' nyuroh gunóng tue tepansang ke' lawut pun," jie, "mampu kam ye'. Na' Sen nulong kam," jie Yesus.
40021022	"Pai-pai pun yeng dipinta' kam mat langko' dituntongam sal ge' kam mat pecayo," jie Yesus.
40021023	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yesus pun tamoe agei' ke' kolong rumah kediyam Allah lalu ngajar pada' reng rami dinyoe. Jedi ketengah iyo ngajar tei' lalu iyo dipanu le' pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi yeng layin, yeng na' nanyoe hak Yesus. Jedi jie sidoe nyingka' Yesus, "Deri nailah hak kau nyo' kau ngenggewai jolu tokoh tue? Sopailah yeng ngutus kau kitue?" jie sidoe.
40021024	Lalu samut Yesus, "Aku pun," jie, "do jum sutie yeng na' ku tanyoe ke' deduwan. Dah deduwan nyamut petanyoe aku si aku pun langko' nyamut deduwan, ngenjelas ken deri nai hak aku," jie Yesus.
40021025	"Jedi yeng na' ku tanyoe ke' deduwan tei' ya'am ke' hal hak Yohanes Penyolam mie. Menurut deduwan tue Yohanes Penyolam mie sopai yeng ngutuse nyo' iyo ngelaju tugase mie? Deri nailah hake mie nyo' iyo nyolam reng? Nyoe deri Allahei, deri mensiyoei?" jie Yesus. Lalu pada' ketuwo nyeh mat bepempaham pado sidoe. "Ne," jie, "diret tue semuya' uka' akang nyamute. Na' dipadah ken hak Yohanes deri Allah gola' iyo tue betanyoe ke' diret gopai go diret noe pecayo ken pemadah Yohanes mie, mun iyo mat diutus le' Allah.
40021026	Pi na' dipadah ken Yohanes cum hake ponyoe jum," jie, "diret gola' ken reng rami die. Go pengaji pada' reng rami kin Yohanes Penyolam mat penijum deri Allah," jie pada' ketuwo nyeh bepempaham pado sidoe.
40021027	Lalu jie sidoe nyingka' Yesus, "Kami," jie, "noe tawu kami ke' hal Yohanes Penyolam, hake asale deri sopai pun," jie. Lalu Yesus nyamut sidoe, "Mun bungi nyoe penyamut deduwan si," jie, "aku pun cumam ku madah ke' deduwan ken deri nailah hak aku nyo' ku ngenggewai semuya' tue," jie.
40021028	Dah nyoe Yesus nyuroh reng ngaji ke' hal pai tuju perempamo tue. Jedi jie perempamo Yesus, "Do siko' reng yeng berana' lelaki duwo ko'. Jedi dah nyoe jie apa'e nyingka' ana'e yeng jula', Kau ari tue kerejo kebun angur tona', jangei, jie.
40021029	Lalu jie ana' jula' nyeh te', Ma'am, na' ku, pa'ei, jie. Pie cumam iyo ngerejoe.
40021030	"Dah nyoe apa'e manu ke' ana'e yeng bunsu, nyurohe ponyoe jum. Pie jie samut ana'e yeng bunsu nyeh, Ah, ku keh ku, jie. Pie dah nyoe ana'e yeng bunsu nyeh tei' bebeta' pikeram, lalu iyo mat ngerejo kebun apa'e.
40021031	"Jedi yeng na' ku tanyoe ke' kam," jie Yesus, "ana'e yeng nailah, máte, yeng ngenggewai kona' kemawo' apa'e?" jie. Lalu sidoe nyamute, "Ana'e yeng bunsu," jie sidoe. Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Nyoe si mátam, kamei," jie. "A, ponyoe jum pada' kam jemán tue," jie Yesus. "Go mat pada' reng penageh pajak ken pada' reng yeng ngeroyal yeng kaji kam pasti noe tekawum, pie sidoe die yeng konoe kawum yeng ngicap pada' berekat dolat Allah des Sen disomah kei rajo; kam cum," jie. "Nyoe si mat-mátam, kamei.
40021032	Go Yohanes Penyolam mie kin mat detang ke' kam nyo' madah jelan yeng mat yeng bujor yeng benar, pie kam ngei' kam ningoe. Pie tekonoe ke' pada' penageh pajak ken pada' reng royal si," jie Yesus, "mat na'e ningo; na'e pecayo. Pie kam numo' pun kam dah merati keidup sidoe yeng bebeta' piker ponyoe pie kam ngei' kam bebeta' piker, ngei' kam pecayo ken pai yeng dipadah Yohanes Penyolam mie," jie Yesus. "Mangko jie ku kam mat noe tekawum des Allah disomah kei rajo," jie Yesus.
40021033	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Dingo beh kam sutie tue agei' perempamo ku," jie. "Jedi do siko' tuwowe kebun angur yeng nanám angure. Jedi dah ditanáme tei' dah nyoe dipagare, dah dipagare tei' ditobo'e jum lubang betu (keedah losong) nyo' arong langko' kei ngiri' morah buwahe nyo' nguleh ayie angur nyeh gi. A, ken dipulahe jum rumah kocit jejengei' tingie keedah menara nyo' reng nungu kebune te'. Dah nyoe iyo pun mat ngupah beberopai ko' urang nyo' ngerejo ken nungu kebun angure. Lalu iyo pun bejelan ke' jewoh.
40021034	"Jedi lamat belamat, dah rekene jengkah angure bebuwah tei' dah nyoe tuwowe kebun pun nyuroh pada' ulune nyo' manu ke' reng yeng ngerejo kebune nun kei ngamie pembegi deri kebun angure nyeh nyo' tuwowe.
40021035	"Pie pada' reng yeng nungu kebun angur tei' jewoh beh na' ngunyo' pembegie ke' tuwowe, malah ken paie pada' ulun tuwowe yeng siko' tei' ditangkape, lalu yeng siko' dipangkonge, yeng siko' ditikame ken betu, ken yeng siko' tei' dibunohe kaliam.
40021036	"Jedi ngaso ponyoe tei' tuwowe kebun angur nyeh nyuroh ulune yeng layin die, yeng benya' kit deri yeng nyomie, ento' manu ke' kebun angure. Pie sidoe pun dipulahe ponyoe jum le' pada' reng yeng disuroh nungu kebune te'.
40021037	"Jedi pengabise ngaso tokoh nyoe ken ulune tei' lalu tuwowe kebun nyuroh ana' direteam nyo' manu ke' reng yeng ngerejo kebune, go so kengkaji tuwowe nyeh mun dah ana' direte si pasti na'e sidoe ngehormáte, na'e sidoe ningoe, kajie nun.
40021038	"Lalu mat kinunam ana' tuwowe nyeh te'. Pie dah detang kinun tei' lalu diperati le' pada' penungu kebun nyeh, lalu jie sidoe nyingka' betore, Ha, jie, iyoame' yeng cagar kei lileh nyawo tuwowe diret, jie. Yo' diret munohe kaliam, jie, gei' diret die yeng ngehak kebun tue, jie sidoe.
40021039	Lalu mátam, ana' tuwowe nyeh mat ditangkap le' sidoe, ditunonge deri kebun nyeh, sampai dibunohe," jie Yesus.
40021040	Dah nyoe Yesus pun betanyoe ke' pada' reng yeng ningoe. "Nyeh engo kam koti?" jie Yesus. "Dah tuwowe kebun pulang ke' nenggeri direte," jie, "pada' reng yeng ngerejo kebune langko' dipekotilah le' tuwowe nyeh, engoe?" jie Yesus.
40021041	Samut reng rami nyeh, "Pada' reng jat yeng ngerejo kebun nyeh pasti dibunoh le' tuwowe," jie, "lalu tuwowe kebun ngogoe reng layin nyo' ngerejo kebune, diserahe kebune ke' reng yeng na'e ngunyo' pembegi buwahe ke' iyo," jie sidoe.
40021042	-
40021043	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Mátam," jie. "Mangko jie ku kam ditue langko' diplah Sen tokoh nyoe jum; kam mat noe tekawum," jie Yesus, "des Allah disomah kei rajo (go kam nula' aku). Malah ken paie berekat dolat yeng asale diajen Sen nyo' kam mie pie langko' diunyo' Sen ke' suku benso layin die, yeng tingkah lakue cuco' ken reng yeng berajo ke' Allah. (Ibarat ke' reng yeng ngerejo kebun angur din iyo reloe nyerah buwahe ke' tuwowe nyeh)," jie Yesus. "Nyoe pun konoe jum," jie, "ken yeng ditulis lem Kitap Allah mie. Kam mat ca' ngajie, yeng kelar nan dibeco kam lem Kitap Sen yeng bungie potue, Do Betu yeng dibuwang le' pada' tukang rumah pie diamie Allah to' Betu yeng paling penting nyo' melaju rumah Sen. Nyoe mat gewai Tuwowe diret; mat kagumam diret meratie, (Masmur 118:22) jie Kitap Sen mie. [
40021044	Dah nyoe "Awas beh kam!" jie Yesus. "Go sopai ja' yeng jetue ningang Betu nyoe langko' remók rencam," jie. "Pai tel agei' sopai ja' yeng ditingange mat kepala'eam, luloh amoh, cum kedemáte," jie Yesus.]
40021045	Jedi pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' reng deri kelompok Parisi nyeh sie ningo perempamo Yesus tadie, go sidoe mat jelas ken perempamo nyoe pas konoe sidoam.
40021046	Jedi ngaso ponyoe tei' sidoe ngemoran na' nangkap Yesus, pie sidoe gola'e ken pada' reng rami die. Go pada' reng rami kin mat ngangap Yesus penijum deri Allaham.
40022001	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus ngomóng agei' ken pada' reng rami nyeh pakai perempamo. Jedi jie Yesus,
40022002	"Keada'e des Allah disomah kei rajo nyeh keedah siko' reng rajo yeng nyiyáp pesta nyo' ana'e sabat.
40022003	Lalu diunang diuware ke' pada' reng rami lo'e. Jedi dah siyap pada' jolu to' pesta nyeh tei' rajo pun nyuroh pada' ulune nyo' bepadah ke' pada' reng yeng dah diunang uware nyeh, gei' sidoe detang, go jolu pun dah siyap dah. Pie dah dipadah le' ulune tei' keh reng detang.
40022004	"Jedi ngaso ponyoe tei' rajo pun ngutus pada' ulune yeng layin die, nyurohe madah urang yeng diunange. Jedi jie posan rajo nyeh, Dingo beh kam, jie, pesta ku dah siyap dah. Sapi ku yeng nan ku timo' bekolam malam ari nyeh daham paroe. Ken nasei' ayie lawo' rompah pun dah siyap dah. Detangam kam ke' pesta ku tue, jie posan rajo nyeh.
40022005	"Pie pada' reng yeng diunang amie rajo tei' noe mendulie kaliam. Gola' yeng beumo, kumoam. Gola' yeng bedegang nyeh, gei' ngurus degange nyem.
40022006	A, ken pada' reng layin pun jewoh beh na' ngadap pesta nyeh; malah ken paie sidoe nangkap pada' ulun rajo yeng madah-madah sidoe nyeh, dipelesahe, sampai dibunohe kaliam.
40022007	"Jedi ngaso ponyoe tei' rajo nyeh mat paling godiam. Lalu iyo ngutus pada' serededue nyo' munah ranah pada' reng yeng munoh ulune. Sampai pada' kotae pun dipecucole kaliam.
40022008	"Jedi dah nyoe jie rajo nyingka' pada' ulune yeng gei' manseh. Pesta nyo' ana' ku sabat nyeh, jie, dah siyap dah, pie pada' reng yeng diunang diamie ku dolu mie mat noe patutam iyo ngadape, jie.
40022009	Mangko kam, jie rajo, ca' bejelan betatap ke' ulu ke' ilie ke' kiboe ke' kanán ngunang ngamie sopai ja' yeng ditomu kam nyo' ngadap pesta ana' ku, jie rajo.
40022010	"Jedi mátam, pada' ulune tei' mat bejelan betatapam ke' ulu ke' ilie ngunang ngamie sopai ja' yeng ditomue beyi' reng panci beyi' reng jat pun gei' ngadap pesta rajo. Sampai mat kental dingam rumahe tam pada' reng yeng ngabang ngadap pesta sabat ana' rajo nyeh te'.
40022011	"Jedi dah nyoe rajo pun nayi' ke' arong reng yeng ngadap pesta ana'e, na' merati pada' reng ngabange. Jedi dah nayi' tei' diperatie do siko' pengabang yeng noe nyaro' beju pesta (yeng dah disiyap le' rajo nyo' pada' pengabange.)
40022012	Dah nyoe iyo betanyoe ke' reng nyoe te'. Jedi jie rajo, Nyeh gopai go kau nayi' kitue noe nyaro' beju (yeng dah ku siyap nyo' pada' pengabang ku), kaban kuei? jie. Pie reng nyoe tei' mat noe tesamute; mat cum dedale.
40022013	"Mangko jie rajo nyingka' pada' ana' buwahe, Tangkapam reng nyoe, jie, pasongam kaki jerie, lojangam ke' luwar ke' arong sagam nun. Pada' reng di arong sagam nyoe serarat kesal ngiyal nentumau lolau nangisam, jie rajo." Bungi nyoam perempamo Yesus.
40022014	Dah nyoe Yesus manseh nyamong panere. "Mat benya'am reng yeng diunang diamie Allah, pie reng yeng mat dipileh Sen si mat sikitam," jie Yesus.
40022015	Jedi dah nyoe pada' reng deri kelompok Parisi nyeh bearau beamue na' ngenjorat Yesus ken omóng tutore.
40022016	Mangko sidoe ngutus beberopai ko' murit sidoe beroto ken pada' ana' buwah Rajo Herodes ge'em nyo' manu betanyoe ke' Yesus. Jedi dah nyoe jie sidoe nyingka' Yesus, "Guru," jie, "kami si tawu kami ken kau reng yeng bujor benar; ken kau nan teliti madah posan payit Allah yeng mat. Kau kin noe ngorie ke' hal kengkaji mensiyo, go kau mat noe ngembedo pangkat reng, beyi' tingie, beyi' beroh pun; kau ngeresudu' nyem madah yeng mat," jie sidoe nyingka' Yesus, pie go sidoe na' ngememanise nyem.
40022017	Lalu sidoe melaju panere ken Yesus. "Jedi boh kau madah ke' kami yeng máte. Jedi mun jie kau nyeh na' nunoe ukum adat diret si patut noe diret reng Yahudi ngembeyar pajak ke' rajo pemerentah Roma?" jie.
40022018	Pie Yesus kin tawue ken tuju jat sidoe yeng na' nganyore nyem. Lalu jie Yesus, "Ngopai go kam na' ngenjorat aku?" jie. "Alap-alape nyem kam betanyoe ke' aku," jie.
40022019	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Ta' kitue duwit sebingkap," jie, "yeng to' reng ngembeyar pajak nyeh," jie. Lalu sidoe pun mat ngunyo' duwite sebingkap ke' iyo.
40022020	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Nyeh tue gemar sopai ken demo sopai di duwit tue?" jie.
40022021	Lalu sidoe nyamute, "Gemar Kaisar, rajo Roma," jie. Lalu jie Yesus, "Mun ponyoe si yeng engku Kaisar ca' dipulang ke' Kaisar; yeng engku Allah ca' dipulang ke' Allah," jie.
40022022	Jedi ningo penyamut Yesus bungi nyoe tei' mat kangápam pada' sidoe nyeh te', go mat konoe nar penyamut Yesus. Mangko Yesus ditingaleam dinyoe, noam sidoe nangkape; sidoe pun pulangam.
40022023	Pado ari nyoe jum Yesus dipanu le' beberopai ko' reng deri kelompok Saduki die, yeng na' betanyoe jum ke' iyo. Reng Saduki kin noe pecayo ken reng yeng dah mati langko' bengki' idup agei'; jie sidoe dah mati daham, cum bengki' idup agei', jie.
40022024	Jedi mátam, do deri sidoe yeng manu ke' Yesus. Lalu jie sidoe nyingka' Yesus, "Guru," jie. "Jie ukum Musa kin mun do reng lelaki yeng bejodo pie mati bolum berana' nyeh, menyadie iyo ca' bejodo ken kebelu omue nyeh kei reng lelaki nyeh buleh tampang deri buboh ampeh keremiji direte*," jie sidoe.
40022025	"Jedi potue ne gesahe. Poe do reng lelaki tujoh ko' yeng bemenyadie. Jedi omue yeng tuwo tei' bejodo, pie bolum iyo berana' nyeh temosie mati. Mangko adei' jurute mat bejodo ken kebelu omue nyeh.
40022026	Pie ponyoe jum, bolum iyo berana' nyeh temosie mati jum. Lalu adei' jurute yeng pengentigo pun bejodo jum ken kebelue nyeh, pie ponyoe jum, bolum iyo berana' nyeh mati jum. Sampai pengabise semuya' sidoe tujoh ko' bemenyadie tei' mat bejodo bisam ken kebelu omue nyeh te', pie bolum berana' tei' mat bemati-mati bisam.
40022027	Jedi kepepanyange kebelu omue nyeh tei' mat mati jum.
40022028	Jedi yeng na' kami tanyoe ke' kau tei'," jie reng Saduki nyeh, "potue ne. Jedi dah mensiyo bengki' idup agei' gi sopaiam deri sidoe tujoh ko' nyeh yeng mat kei laki reng belu nyeh, go sidoe tujoh ko' kin mat bejodo bisam ken iyo," jie sidoe nyingka' Yesus, (pie sidoe pun nyungkit-nyungkite nyem, go sidoe kin noe pecayoe ken reng yeng dah mati nyeh langko' idup agei').
40022029	Jedi samut Yesus tei', "Kengkaji kam si mat salah nar ke' hal tue, go kam noe jelas ken yeng ditulis lem Kitap Allah ge'em, ken kam noe jelas ken kuwaso Allah ge'em.
40022030	Jedi ke' hal bejodo atau noe gi," jie Yesus, "dah mensiyo bengki' idup agei' si keidup mensiyo langko' na' po keidup melekat di serugo nun; noe betumo' bejodo, noe belaki bebini.
40022031	A, ponyoe jum ke' hal mensiyo langko' bengki' idup agei' nyeh, mat salah jum pemiker kam," jie Yesus. "Boh kam ngaji yeng nan dibeco kam di lem Kitap Allah, yeng dipadah Sen mie ke' kam.
40022032	Kin jie lem Kitap Sen mie, Aku mat Allah yeng gei' disomah Abraham, Isak ken Yakub. Sedang diret kin tawu, Allah mat disomah le' reng idupam; noe ken Sen disomah le' reng mati. Jedi mun jie Sen Sen gei' disomah le' Kei' Abraham desiyan kin maksute Kei' Abraham mat idup agei'am, numo' pun desiyan daham ngerudu mati mie. Mun noe koti desiyan manseh nyomah ke' Allah? Mangko," jie Yesus, "kengkaji kam mat salah nar ke' hal tue," jie.
40022033	Jedi ningo pengajar Yesus bungi nyoe tei' pada' reng rami yeng ningoe pun mat kangápam, go semuya' pengajar Yesus tei' mat konoe bangam.
40022034	Jedi dah nyoe kedingo le' pada' reng deri kelompok Parisi nyeh pun ken reng deri kelompok Saduki nyeh tadie noe tesamute ke' Yesus. Mangko pada' reng deri kelompok Parisi nyeh bereroto manu ke' Yesus,
40022035	go kaji sidoe sidoe si mampu ngalahe, mangko sidoe na' ngendugoe jum. Jedi do siko' ugar agama deri kelompok Parisi nyeh lalu betanyoe ke' Yesus,
40022036	"Guru," jie, "semuya' ukum Allah," jie, "perentah Sen yeng nailah yeng paling penting?" jie.
40022037	-
40022038	Lalu jie Yesus nyamute, "Perentah Allah yeng paling utamo ken yeng paling penting si ya'am Kau ca' kaseh patoh ke' Tuwowe Allah kau seputeh ati sebeníng derah; pusat pemiker kau ca' ke' Allah bangam. (Ulang 6:5)
40022039	A, ken yeng keduwo nyeh paling penting jum," jie Yesus, "ya'am Kau ca' ngaseh betor po ngaseh diret kauam," Imamat 19:18) jie.
40022040	"Go semuya' ukum Musa ken semuya' pengajar penijum Allah yeng layin yeng bukan pun perentah Sen nyoame' yeng kei pungka' pangkale," jie Yesus.
40022041	Jedi nongah gei' do pada' reng Parisi yeng bekumpol dinyoe tei' lalu Yesus pun betanyoe ke' sidoe.
40022042	"Jedi lem kengkaji kam pada' ugar agama," jie Yesus, "Kristus penulong yeng dijenyi Allah mie na' detang nyeh ca' deri buboh ampeh sopailah?" jie. Lalu sidoe nyamute, "Ca' deri buboh Kei' Daud," jie.
40022043	Lalu jie Yesus, "Nyoe si mátame'," jie. "Pie mun Kristus segontang buboh Kei' Daud secaro mensiyo nyem si pie gopai go Kei' Daud pun be-Tuwowe ke' Kristus? Dingo beh kam tijum Kei' Daud des sen dikuwaso le' Roh Allah mie. Ketiko nyoe kin jie Kei' Daud bungie potue,
40022044	Allah Tuwowe mat do bepadah ke' Tuwowe ku. Lalu jie Allah nyingka' Tuwowe ku, Boh kau dudo' merentah di piya' kanán Ku lo'e, sampai Ku nyuroh pada' munsoh kau ca' tekempojal di beroh jempoe kaki kau, jie Sen.(Masmur 110:1)
40022045	Bungi nyoam tijum Kei' Daud mie te'. Jedi maksute Kei' Daud numo' pun sen akei' puyang Kristus nyeh," jie Yesus, "pie Kei' Daud manseh be-Tuwowe ke' Kristus, poe. Kiro Kristus ngat segontang buboh keturun Kei' Daud secaro mensiyo nyem si noe ken sen na' be-Tuwowe ke' buboh diret sen! (Pi poe pangkat Kristus mat lobeh tingie deri buboh Kei' Daud secaro mensiyo pun, dih?)" jie Yesus.
40022046	Jedi pada' reng yeng ningoe tei' mat cumam kei iyo nimpa' agei'. Mangko dah lopas nyoe mat cumam reng yeng bereni ngaju petanyoe agei' ke' iyo.
40023001	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yesus ngomóng ken pada' reng rami ken pada' murit direte ge'em. Jedi jie Yesus,
40023002	"Na' nunoe ukum adat diret kin mat pada' ugar agama ken pada' reng kelompok Parisi nyeh yeng behak nyo' ngajar ukum Musa.
40023003	Mangko pai-pai pun yeng dipadah le' sidoe mun mat deri ukum Musa si mat ca' didingo ca' dipakai kam. Pie nang na' kam nunoe gewai ulah tingkah laku sidoe. Go sidoe noe nunoe pengajar direte pun.
40023004	Jolu ge' pengajare pun mat ditamah-tamahe nyem ken pada' pelatore yeng layin, sampai ibarat ke' pengoma' din mat borat nar, pie sidoe nyuroh betore die yeng ngoma'e. Tekonoe ke' direte si jewoh beh na' ngoma'e; ento' nulong ngangki' sikit pun kehe.
40023005	"Pada' gewai sidoe si," jie Yesus, "tujue pun gei' ngampa'-ampa' direte nyem di adap betore. Sidoe si alap-alape patoh nar! Ti beh, jemulaue ken pengobat jerie yeng ditulis ken pada' ukum Allah nyeh laba'-laba'am. A, jumai jubahe pun pekerumai panyang, nyo' iyo ngelelaga' des semeyang. Alap-alape nyem sidoe patoh!
40023006	Des bepesta nyeh sidoe nan ca' dolu dilayan; a, ken des semeyang nyeh sidoe nan ca' dudo' di arong yeng tekemuko.
40023007	Sidoe paling ayahe dialu disamut di adap reng rami, ayahe disapo reng Pa' Guru.
40023008	"Pie kam," jie Yesus, "noe tawu na' tokoh nyoe. Kam nang na' disapo Pa' Guru le' menyadie kam yeng seimán, go kam seimán kin semenyadiam; siko' akuam guru kam.
40023009	A, ken kam nang na' meningie gila' pemimpin kam pado mensiyo. Go ngat siko'am Apa' kam yeng paling tingie, ya'am Apa' kam di serugo nun.
40023010	Ge'em kam nang na' ngijin reng be-tuwowe ke' kam, go ngat siko'am Tuwowe kam, ya'am aku Kristus.
40023011	Pie kebelike reng yeng diangap paling penting deri kam pun mat ca' melayan betore.
40023012	Go sopai ja' yeng meningie direte langko' direnah. Pie berang reng yeng ngerenah direte si langko' ditingie dihormát," jie Yesus.
40023013	Dah nyoe iyo manseh nyamong panere ke' pada' ugar agama opai. "Paraham kam ugar agama ken kam Parisi!" jie Yesus. "Kam alap-alape nyem mimpin betor. Go reng yeng ingín na' dikawum des Allah disomah kei rajo nyeh pie kam tonga' kam pelempange. Ibarat ke' lawang din kam nan nokat lawang di adap reng gei' reng noe tamoe. Sedang kam pun noe tamoe; pada' reng yeng ingín na' tamoe pun pie ditonga' dipelempang kam jum, keedah kosoe merarang buwah. [
40023014	"Parah nar pada' kam ugar agama ken kam Parisi nyeh!" jie Yesus. "Alap-alape nyem kam ngajar betor kam. Kam ngelakar pada' reng betinoe belu ken bujo' rayue, sampai ngabis pada' jolue. Dah nyoe kam bedoa yeng panyang-panyang kei kam napo' ngelibue kesalah diret kam, gei' kam diangap reng panci. Mangko ukum kam mat rajo boratam," jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe.]
40023015	"Parah nar kam ugar agama ken kam reng Parisi nyeh!" jie Yesus. "Alap-alape nyem kam beagama. Kam bejelan betatap ke' ulu ke' ilie ke' deng nenggeri jewoh-jewoh pun, go kam ngemoran na' nyuroh reng noe Yahudi biyar siko' pun (kei mansok agama Yahudi,) kei menjedi murit kam. Pie dah do murit kam nyeh ketegal tam pengajar kam yeng salah nyeh murit kam kepala' jateam deri kam gurue pun! Sampai kepepanyange ukum murit kam di lawut api nyeh mat kepala' boratam," jie Yesus.
40023016	"Parah nar kam yeng ngajar ngulu betor kam pie diret kam pun butoe," jie Yesus. "Go jie pengajar kam mun reng bejenyi ke' hal pai pun, pie mun iyo nogap jenyie pakai demo rumah kediyam Allah si kepa' pun noe dituntonge jie kam noe pai-paiam. Pie mun iyo nogap jenyie pakai demo mas perak yeng do di rumah kediyam Allah si, jie kam jenyi nyoe sah, mat ca' dituntongam.
40023017	Pie pengajar kam ponyoe pun go kam mat guru yeng butoe, yeng ngentungal! Noe tawu peh kam ken rumah kediyam Allah nyeh lebeh penting deri mas ken perak yeng do di delame ? Go pada' mas perak opai kin go diangap suci bereseh pun tam iyo dipakai di lem rumah kediyam Sen; mun noe di rumah kediyam Allah kin noe ken suci bereseh.
40023018	"A, ponyoe jum mun reng bejenyi ke' hal pai pun, lalu jenyie na' ditogape pakai demo pesaling, atau pun pakai demo bedah pesaling. Jie lem pengajar kam kin mun reng yeng nogap jenyie pakai demo bedah pesaling nyeh pie kepa' pun noe dituntonge noe pai-paiam, jie kam. Pie mun iyo nogap jenyie pakai demo pesaling si jie kam sah, noe buleh dipungker.
40023019	Pie kam mat guru yeng butoam! Noe tawu peh kam ken bedah pesaling nyeh mat lebeh penting deri pesaling yeng do dinyoe? Go pesaling nyeh, go diangap suci bereseh pun entam iyo diunyo' ke' Allah di atas bedah pesaling nyeh; mun seli jolue kin noe ken suci bereseh.
40023020	"Mangko jie ku mun reng nogap jenyie pakai demo bedah pesaling nyeh maksute pada' pesaling yeng dicucol di atas bedah pesaling nyeh dah tekawum dah jum.
40023021	A, ponyoe jum rumah kediyam Allah. Reng yeng nogap jenyie pakai demo rumah kediyam Allah si maksute iyo nogap jenyie pakai demo diret Sénam, go Sen kin mat ngendiyam rumah nyoe.
40023022	A, ken reng yeng nogap jenyie pakai demo serugo pun maksute iyo nogape ken demo belai agong Allah tei'am, ken demo diret Sénam yeng dudo' di belai agong Sen," jie Yesus. "Kam si mat salah nar pengajar kam ke' hal penogap jenyi nyeh," jie.
40023023	"Parah nar kam ugar agama ken kam reng Parisi nyeh!" jie Yesus. "Go kam alap-alape nyem patoh ke' Allah. Go ukum Allah separoe teliti nar kam ngenggewaie, pie separoe ditingal, diperayan kam kaliam. A, benso ukum Sen ke' hal pekuleh peramu diret ca' bebegi jum ken Sen sepuloh satu, sebegi nyo' Sen, semilan begi nyo' diret. Ke' hal nyoe si kam teliti nar ngenggewaie," jie Yesus. "Sampai pada' rerempah sesoniam ken pada' dewun samal pun nan dibegi kam ke' Sen. Nyoe pun cuco'am ken ukum Sen. Pie tekonoe ke' ukum Sen yeng lebeh penting, benso diret ca' bujor benar, diret ca' ngaseh betor, ken ca' patoh ke' Allah nyeh si pie nyoe tarah ke' noe dipeduli kam kaliam. Menurute yeng nyoe ca' teliti digewai kam jum; a, ken yeng tadie pun nang na' diperayan dipelebu. Mat ca' samo digewai bisam," jie Yesus.
40023024	"Pie kam si," jie, "go mat pengulu yeng butoam! Tekonoe ke' yeng noe penting nyeh mat teliti nar kam ngenggewaie; pie yeng penting si mat diperayan kaliam. Ibarat ke' ayie din ayie nyo' kam insup mat teliti kam nyaringe gei' noe tetolan ke' ampas urase, pie temosie tetolan ke' binatang unta die!" jie Yesus.
40023025	"Parah nar kam ugar agama ken kam reng Parisi nyeh!" jie Yesus. "Kam alap-alape nyem patoh ke' Sen. Benso pingan mangkok kam si mat teliti nar kam ngemberesehe kam meso'e cuco' ken adat pemeso' kam, pie dah nyoe diisei' kam ken jolu yeng jat nyem. Go pada' jolu kam sego ken kam insup nyeh mat pekuleh kam ngerebotoh, go kam mat tamá' goma' nyem.
40023026	Kam reng Parisi nyeh mat pengulu yeng butoe! Menurute keidup kam," jie Yesus, "ibarat ke' pingan mangkok din boh delame dibereseh kam dolu, dah nyoe luware pun langko' bereseh jum," jie Yesus.
40023027	"Parah nar kam ugar agama ken kam reng Parisi nyeh!" jie Yesus. "Kam alap-alape nyem patoh ke' Sen. Pie kam mat keedah guwo tama' yeng dicat puteh. Luware si mat panciam, pie delame bisei' pada' kerakah ken pada' jolu buntau nyem.
40023028	Ponyoe jum kam. Kam alap ca' reng bujor benaram, pie ati pemiker kam serarat jat bangam; kam si mat layin di ati layin di biber," jie Yesus.
40023029	"Parah nar kam ugar agama ken kam reng Parisi nyeh!" jie Yesus. "Kam mat alap-alape nyem patoh ke' Sen. Kam mulah lungún tama' pada' penijum Allah mie, ken kam nanám bengko pada' reng yeng layin yeng idup bujor benar mie; alap-alape si kam ngehormát pada' penijum Allah mie.
40023030	Jie kam kira' kam yeng do di jemán pada' akei' puyang kam mie si noe ken do kam ngerubut desiyan munoh pada' penijum nyeh.
40023031	Pie nyoe pun ngembokti kesalah kam jum, go kam kin ngangkue ken kam mat keturun pada' akei' puyang kam mie yeng nan munoh pada' penijum nyeh.
40023032	Bom agei' kam na' melaju gewai jat akei' puyang kam nyomie!" jie Yesus.
40023033	"Kam mat keedah buboh ular! Mangko kam langko' diukum Allah ke' lawut api; noe ken lopas kam deri ukum Sen nyoe," jie Yesus.
40023034	"Mangko cagare," jie, "ku langko' ngutus pada' penijum, ken pada' guru, ken pada' reng yeng panai madah posan payit Allah, kei sidoe manu ke' kam. Pi kam langko' nula'e; sidoe separoe langko' digogoe disarie kam dinai-nai pun nyo' kam nangkape; ken separoe langko' dipelesah kam di rumah semeyang kam, ken separoe pun mat langko' dibunoh kam kali, malah ken paie dibunoh kam disalip pun," jie Yesus.
40023035	"Dinyoam kenyatoe ken kam mat nimun doso pada' akei' puyang kam mie. 40023036	Lalu kam pun mat nimun doso pada' akei' puyang kam mie, mangko kam lapis tuame' yeng langko' nangong kicas doso pada' keragam kejeya' nyoe ye'," jie Yesus.
40023037	Dah nyoe Yesus ngeromus isei' atie ngaji pada' reng di Yerusalem. "Kaseh ku nar ngaji yeng langko' tejedi ke' semuya' segeno kam di Yerusalem tue," jie Yesus. "Aku si mat ngemoran na' nulong kam yeng seli engku Allah, na' nyelinong kam keedah mano' ngukup ana'e, pie kam si mat ngei' kam ditulong.
40023038	Mangko so beh gi! Tam kam ngei' ditulong nyeh kam ku tingal ming kali, cumam nyo' pelinong kam agei'.
40023039	Padah ku cum pelinong kam," jie Yesus, "go dah tue si kam mat cumam merati aku agei'. 40024001	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yesus mat turun na' ningal rumah kediyam Allah. Lalu pada' murite manu ke' Yesus nyurohe merati agei' pada' gedong rumah kediyam Allah yeng paling panci nyeh.
40024002	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Nyoe si mátam," jie, "pada' gedong yeng diperati diret tue mat panciam. Pie dingo beh kam. Pada' dininge yeng dipulah deri betu bosai-bosai pun pie mat noe tawu ken pesene agei'; mat ruma' rora' pamar bokar bisam," jie Yesus.
40024003	Jedi dah kaloe ponyoe Yesus mendeki ke' penenongah natai Buki' Saitun lalu dudo' dinyoe. Dah nyoe iyo dipanu le' pada' murite bangam. 40024004	Lalu jie Yesus nyamute, "Potue ne, kamei, dah nyoe gi. Kam mat ca' ati-ati, mat ca' jego dah nun gi, gei' kam noe tepengaroh.
40024005	Go mat benya' reng yeng cagar detang yeng ngangkue atas demo aku. Akuam Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah, jie sidoe, pie sidoe memuloe nyem. Pie pengabise mat benya' reng yeng langko' dikelakare.
40024006	A, ken cagare kam langko' ningo agah awoh pada' nenggeri nenggero beperang betempor beyi' jewoh beyi' soma' pun, pie sungoh pun ponyoe kam nang na' tekeraya'. Go semuya' jolu ke' deng nyoe mat dah ditentu le' Allah. Nyoe mat ca' tejedi sebolum jemán pengudah nyeh. Pie nyoe pun gei' bolum pengudahe nar, kamei.
40024007	Yeng langko' tejedi sebolume ya'am pada' nenggeri nenggero demo ke' pada' rajo demo ke' pada' pemerentah nyeh mat langko' lawan melawan. Pada' reng di deniyo tue langko' buyun menyasat, ken seruroh deniyo tue pun langko' simah begontar ditue dinyoe tam gempa bumi.
40024008	Pie semuya' nyoe pun sebujor gei' ketongaie nyem; ibarat ke' reng berana' din berue berodaiam," jie Yesus.
40024009	"Dah nyoe," jie Yesus, "pada' suku benso mat langko' risie ken kam go kam pecayo ken demo aku. Sampai kam langko' diserah ke' penguwaso nyo' kam dipangkong dipelesahe disakal dibunohe.
40024010	Ketiko nyoe si mat benya' reng yeng langko' ningal kepecayoe (tam iyo disensare), lalu yeng ningal kepecayoe tei' langko' risie siko' ken betore, sampai betore pun diserahe ke' pada' penguwaso jum.
40024011	A, ge'em langko' do benya' jum pada' penijum yeng memuloe madah direte penijum Allah, sampai benya' jum reng yeng dikelakare.

40024015	"Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe kam langko' merati jolu po yeng ditijum le' penijum Daniel nyomiam, ya'am jolu yeng paling dikerisie le' Allah, yeng temosie temeregam di arong suci yeng Sen didah. Rumah kediyam Allah pun mat dikotor dicemar le' jolu nyoe," jie Yesus. Jedi mátam. Pada' reng yeng ngembeco tue pun mat ca' panai ngalimáte gei' tawu ken tuju maksute.
40024016	Jedi jie Yesus, "Mun kam mat dah merati nyoe tejedi si mangko pada' reng di Yudea ca' rariam, betapo' ke' peloya' pada' gunóng nun. Nang ngaji jolu yeng layin.
40024017	Misale mun reng nongah do di co' loteng nyeh* mat ca' bebodap turun rari ja', nang na' ngaji bokal sangu opai," jie.
40024018	"A ponyoe jum misale mun do reng yeng nongah di umo tanáme, nang na' ngaji na' bebeli' ke' rumah to' ngamie pakai ingap opai. Pie mat ca' bekedibas rariam, puteh jempoe bebodap ke' peloya' pada' gunóng nun," jie Yesus.
40024019	"Kaseh ku ngaji pada' reng yeng nganong ken pada' reng yeng gei' nyusu ana'e yeng ca' ngerudu kesensare nyoe jum, jera'e," jie Yesus. "Go mat ugas ngeloham semuya' segenoe ketiko nyoe, sa'am go pada' reng yeng nganong ken pada' reng yeng gei' nyusu ana'e kekocit.
40024020	Mangko kam mat ca' bedoa minta' ke' Sen gei' nyoe noe tejedi des munsim colap atau pun des Ari Berenti Kerejo gei' cum peribate kam rari," jie Yesus.
40024021	"Go dah jemán pengudah nyoe gi si mat ngatam kesusah kesensare yeng langko' dirudu le' mensiyo di deniyo tue. Mat cum ngelobehe, semejak deri asal mulo deniyo tue mie sampai ke' ari tue, sampai ke' pemuntol jemán nun gi pun, pie mat cum melobehe kesusah kesensare yeng langko' dirudu le' semuya' segeno mensiyo des jemán pengudah tue gi.
40024022	Mun jemán nyoe noe dibatas Sen si mat cum mensiyo yeng bodan. Pi tam Sen gei' manseh ngaji pada' reng yeng dipileh kei engku Sen si, mangko Sen mutuse gei' jemán nyoe noe lamat.

40024024	"Mangko kam," jie Yesus, "mat ca' ati-ati bejegoam dah jemán pengudah nyeh. Go ketiko nyoe mat langko' do benya' penipu pengelakar yeng ngangkue direte Kristus, atau pun penijum Allah. Jedi mun kam do ningo reng yeng bepadah, Tau beh kam, tue ne, dah do dah Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah; atau pun jie yeng layin bepadah, Dingo beh kam, dinun ne, dah do dah Kristus; pie kam nang na' ningoe," jie Yesus. "A, ken sidoe langko' mulah pada' keenah keaneh petanah petano. Maksut sidoe kira' mampu si na' ngelakar na' nipu ngendeyo pada' reng yeng dipileh Allah to' engku diret Sen pun.
40024025	Pi ngopai ge' go semuya' tue ku padah ke' kam sebolum nyoe tejedi pun, gei' sempayo kam noe konoe kelakare.
40024026	Maksut aku kin mun do reng bepadah ken Kristus dah detang dah, go iyo dah meratie di padang puwang nun, atau pun Kristus do betapo' di arong iyo, misale, pie nang na' kam angar totar manue. Nang na' kam ningoe kaliam.
40024027	"Go yeng mat si," jie Yesus, "des aku Ana' Mensiyo mat detang nar si mat langko' maloe, diperati reng bisam, na' po keedah kengkitar yeng lang ler ke' kiboe ke' kanán; mat nyacas tampa' di langi' nun," jie.
40024028	Dah nyoe Yesus madah perbeso tue, "Dinai do bengkai jolu pasti kaloe do olang detang nyegoe," jie.
40024029	"Jedi dah lopas jemán kesusah kesensare nyeh si," jie Yesus, "dah nyoe temosie belo pada' penampa' di langi' yeng ugas agong tampa'e nyeh mat langko' tekuca' teguyu. Sampai pengabise mato ari mat padam, losi penampa'e. Ken bulan pun cumam cayoe; a, pada' bintang pun peterotah losi deri langi'.
40024030	Tumas pada' penampa' beguyu tei' dah nyoe mat do petanah yeng layin die di langi' nun, yeng ngenyato ken aku Ana' Mensiyo mat na' detang nar dah. Ken pada' suku benso di seruroh deniyo pun langko' nangis nentumau lolauam. Dah nyoe aku Ana' Mensiyo nyeh temosie mat detangam, turun di pada' románg di langi' nun. Dinyoe semuya' segeno mensiyo pun langko' merati kuwaso ku ken keagong ku yeng ugas ngatam.
40024031	Dah nyoe do bebungi sangkakala yeng paling ontap, nyo' ku ngutus pada' melekat ku kei ngamie ngumpol pada' reng yeng ku pileh nyo' engku diret ku; lalu mat dikumpoleam deri pemuntol deniyo sampai ke' pemuntol serugo pun. Siko' pun cum kelawong angín. Ponyoam kedetang aku gi," jie Yesus.
40024032	"Jedi ke' hal petanah petano jemán pengudah nyeh," jie Yesus, "perbeninge na' po kayu buwah. Benso kayu ara nyeh," jie Yesus, "diret kin tawu, mun kayu ara nyeh dah mulai nyopi' anto'e kin nyoe tanoe ari dah na' kemarau dah.
40024033	Jedi ponyoe jum ke' hal petanah petano yeng ku padah ke' kam tadie. Mun kam merati semuya' jolu yeng ku padah tadie dah tejedi si," jie Yesus, "maksute jemán pengudah nyeh mat noe dam lamat. Mat dah soma' nar dam
40024034	"Semuya' tue langko' tejedi pun," jie Yesus, "sebolum lapis tue bis mati*. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei; pecayoam kam ken pemadah aku.
40024035	Go posan payit aku mat togap kukoham. Do langi' ken tanah tue mat langko' losi nayápam, pie posan payit aku si tan seora'-ora'eam," jie Yesus. .
40024036	"A, ke' hal arie ken pai pemayo ku langko' detang gi si," jie Yesus, "go ngat Apa' kuam yeng tawu. Siko' pun cum reng layin yeng tawu," jie Yesus. "Pada' melekat Sen pun noe tawue; a, ken aku ana' Sen pun mat noe tawu ku jum. Ngat siko' Sénam yeng tawu.
40024037	Pie keada'e des aku Ana' Mensiyo detang gi," jie Yesus, "mat na' po keedah des jemán Nuh nyomie; pada' mensiyo mat penggempang nyem.
40024038	Go ketiko nyoe kin sebolum deniyo dilamus nyeh cum mensiyo ngaji ken tue dah jengkahe dah iyo langko' diukum.
