40024040	"Mat do mensiyo yeng bodan do yeng losi nayápam. Umpamoe mun do reng duwo ko' yeng kumo pas des aku detang; pie mun noe samo-samo engku aku si yeng siko' diamie yeng siko' ditingal.
40024041	A, ponyoe jum umpamoe mun do reng betinoe duwo ko' yeng nongah nuto' padi pas des ku detang, pie mun noe samo-samo engku aku si yeng siko' diamie yeng siko' ditingal," jie Yesus.
40024042	"Mangko kam mat ca' bejegoam," jie Yesus, "go kam noe tawu ken sebilo Tuwowe kam langko' detang," jie.
40024043	"Cubo diret ngaji contoh des tuwowe rumah dipaling reng ke' jolue," jie. "Kira' iyo tawu ken pai mayo malam pemaling langko' detang maling jolue kin tentu iyo mat siyap bejego, gei' sempayo rumahe noe diruma' dirongko reng.

40024045	Dah nyoe Yesus nyamong panere. Jedi jie Yesus, "Umpamoe do tuwowe rumah yeng na' mileh siko' pelayane kei ngurus ngator noyu merintu pada' ulun amo di rumahe, benso ngembegi jolu kei makan udape opai des tuwowe cum di rumah. Nyeh engoe ca' pelayan yeng kotilah yeng dipilehe? Noe peh ca' pelayan yeng mutu, yeng belubang pemikere, dih?
40024046	Jedi mun pelayan nyoe mat mutu ngenggewai tugase sampai ke' tuwowe pulang si," jie Yesus, "pasti pelayan nyoe didolat diberekat le' tuwowe nyeh.
40024047	Go mun iyo mat mutu des tuwowe nongah cum nyeh tuwowe pun langko' pecayoam ken pelayan nyoe, mangko iyo langko' nyurohe ngurus ngator pada' reto beno jento keraja'e yeng layin jum, nyo' iyo noyu merintue. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei," jie Yesus.
40024048	"Pie koti umpamoe mun pelayan nyoe noe mutu, ati pemikere serarat jat nyem. Lalu kajie lem atie nun, A, entonge gei' suba' lamatam tuwowe ku dinun, jie.
40024049	Lalu iyo noe ngeleng-ngeleng ke' tugase tadie; pada' ulun amo nyeh jewoh na' ditoyu diperintue, malah ken paie dipempungahe nyem, dipelesahe. Lalu iyo teger beriyah berami makan minúm ken pada' kabane yeng gela' bemabo'-mabo' nyem gewaie.
40024050	Maksute kin pelayan nyoe mat noe mutu, noe tetungue ke' kedetang tuwowe nyeh. Dah nyoe temosie cus! detangam noe mererema'.
40024051	Mangko pelayane tei' pasti dibunohe kaliam le' tuwowe; maksute diukume beroto ken pada' reng layin yeng alap-alape nyem mutu. A, di arong nyoe kin reng serarat kesal ngiyal nentumau lolau nangisam," jie Yesus. "Mangko ku madah ke' kam, kam mat ca' bejegoam nungu kedetang aku," jie Yesus.
40025001	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus nyamong panere manseh makai perempamo ke' hal jemán pengudah nyeh. "Pie keada'e langko' keedah reng dero sepuloh ko' yeng to' pengapi' kabane siko' yeng na' sabat. Jedi dah ujong ari tei' reng dero nyeh tei' mat rato-rato meyie pelitoe, sebuwah siko', lalu turun nyo' iyo nungu kedetang penganting lelaki nyeh.

40025004	Jedi di antaro reng dero sepuloh ko' tei' do limo ko' yeng belubang pemikere. Sidoe mat meyie persiyap binya' nyo' iyo ngisei' pelitoe mun dah cudor kaloe ponyoe. Pie dero yeng limo ko' tei' redo budu; pelitoe si dibeyie, pie cumam iyo ngaji na' meyie binya' nyo' persiyape.
40025005	"Jedi mátam. Pada' reng dero sepuloh ko' nyeh tei' tungu ketungu pie penganting lelaki nyeh bolum detang; sedang ari tei' dah manu ke' tolap malam dah. Jedi tam dah tolap malam nyeh tei' pada' reng dero sepuloh ko' nyeh mat kanto' matoe, lalu tekonyápam.
40025006	"Jedi dah tongah malam temosie do suwaro reng mangkas ontapam. Detang dah penganting lelaki, jie. Yo' tona' nyamute, jie.
40025007	"Jedi ningo suwaro bungi nyoe tei' pada' reng dero mat tekojut, lalu ngaci pada' pelitoe.
40025008	Pie dah nyoe jie reng dero limo ko' yeng budu nyeh tei', Ta' ge' binya' kam, jie, go pelito kami dah cudor dah.
40025009	Pie jie pada' reng dero yeng belubang pemiker nyeh, Noe, jie, noe tebegi kami, gola' binya' kami kurang mun dibegi ke' kam, jie. Boh kam moli ke' pedegang ja', jie reng dero yeng belubang pemikere te'.
40025010	"Jedi pada' reng dero yeng budu nyeh mat begogoe nyo' moli binya' ke' pada' pedegang, pie peningal sidoe ngogoe binya' ke' pedegang tei' penganting lelaki pun mat detangam. Lalu reng dero yeng limo ko' yeng meyie persiyape tadie mat lintus namah penganting lelaki nyeh tamoe nyo' ngadap pesta sabate. Dah sidoe tamoe tei' lawang pun ditokat reng.
40025011	"Jedi dah kaloe ponyoe mat detang jum pada' reng dero yeng limo ko' yeng noe siyap ken binya'e tadie ponyoe. Jedi dah detang tei' lalu sidoe nengkuwau deri muko lawang. O Tuwowe, jie, koba' ge' lawang nyo' kami tamoe, jie.
40025012	"Pie samut tuwowe, Ne, kam si noe kaban aku ye', jie. Lalu lawang pun mat noe dikoba'." Bungi nyoam perempamo Yesus.
40025013	"Mangko," jie Yesus, "kam mat ca' siyapam, go kam noe tawu pai mayo ken sebilo aku langko' detang gi," jie.
40025014	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Do jum perempamo layin ke' hal des Allah disomah kei rajo nyeh. Jedi do siko' tuwowe rumah yeng begerak deri rumahe nyo' iyo bejelan ke' jewoh. Sebolum iyo bejelan tei' iyo ngumpol ulun amoe, lalu pada' reto beno jento keraja'e diserahe ke' ulune to' sidoe ngenjegoe nongah iyo cum.
40025015	Lalu mátam, duwite tei' diserahe ke' ulune tigo ko', seukor kemampu nyo' sidoe ngenjegoe. Yeng siko' tei' diserahe ken duwit mas limo kantong*; yeng siko' tei' diserahe ken duwit mas duwo kantong, a, ken yeng siko' tei' diserahe jum ken duwit mas sekantong. 40025016	"Jedi dah tuwowe rumah bejelan tei' mátam, reng yeng diunyo' ken duwit limo kantong tadie lintus dibungoe duwite, sampai mopah duwo kali lipat pemenya'e.
40025017	A, ken reng yeng diunyo' duwit duwo kantong tadie ponyoe jum, lintus dibungoe jum sampai mopah duwo kali lipat jum pemenya'e.

40025019	"Jedi mátam. Lamat belamat nyeh tuwowe rumah nyeh mat pulangam. Dah detang tei' iyo manu na' mereso hal duwit yeng diserahe ke' pada' ulune.
40025020	Jedi ulune yeng siko' yeng diunyo'e ken duwit limo kantong nyomie ponyoe mat detang ngadap tuwowe, ken meyie duwite yeng dah menjedi sepuloh kantong nyeh. Dah nyoe jie ulun nyeh, Tuwowe, jie, duwit limo kantong yeng den serah ke' aku mie pie dah ku bungo dah; tue dah menjedi sepuloh kantong dah, jie.
40025021	Lalu jie tuwowe nyeh Sukoram, jie, kau poe mat ulun yeng panci ken mutu. Kau mat mutu makai jolu menyikit nyoe pun, jie, mangko tue ku nyerah jolu yeng paling penting agei'am ke' kau, jie. Yo' ngadap pesta aku, jie, nyo' beriyah berami ken aku, jie tuwowe nyeh.
40025022	"Jedi ponyoe jum ken ulune yeng diserahe ken duwit duwo kantong nyomie ponyoe, mat detang jum ngadap tuwowe. Lalu jie nyingka'e, Tuwowe, jie, duwit duwo kantong yeng den serah ke' aku mie pie dah ku bungo dah; tue dah menjedi empat kantong dah, jie.
40025023	Lalu jie tuwowe nyeh, Sukoram, jie, kau poe mat ulun yeng panci ken mutu. Kau mat mutu makai jolu menyikit nyoe pun, jie, mangko tue ku nyerah jolu yeng paling penting agei'am ke' kau, jie. Yo' ngadap pesta aku, jie, nyo' beriyah berami ken aku, jie tuwowe nyeh.
40025024	"Dah nyoe ulun yeng siko' die, ngadap tuwowe jum, yeng diunyo'e sekantong duwit mas nyomie ponyoe. Lalu, Tuwowe, jie. Ku tawu ku ken den reng yeng noe tawu na' salah melo. Den gela' na' makai tulang poloh urang. Den na' beuntong deri pengasel reng layin. Ibarat ke' umo din den nyuroh reng layin ngenggewaie kei den yeng ngicap asele.
40025025	Mangko duwit den serah ke' aku sekantong nyomie ku poram, gola' ku makaie, gola' noe berasel. A, jedi tue ne duwit den, jie ulune nyeh.
40025026	Lalu jie tuwowe nyamute, Ati kau mat jatam, jie. Kau reng pelesu, poe. Mun kaji kau aku mat na' beuntong deri pengasel reng layin, ken na' ngicap asel umo yeng noe digewai diret ku , jie,

40025028	"Dah nyoe jie tuwowe nyingka' pada' ana' buwahe, Diamiam duwit reng tue, diunyo' ke' reng yeng sepuloh kantong duwit tadie.

40025030	Lalu tuwowe nyeh manseh nyamong panere. Ulun tue pun, jie, cum gunoe. Lojang ja' ke' luwar ke' arong sagam nun. Dinyoam reng kesal ngiyal nentumau lolau nangisam, jie tuwowe." Bungi nyoam perempamo Yesus ke' hal ulun amo ken duwit tuwowe nyeh.
40025031	Dah nyoe Yesus manseh nyamong panere. "Kedetang aku Ana' Mensiyo gi," jie, "mat paling agongam, ditamah diseroto le' pada' melekat yeng ugas benya'am. Dah nyoe aku mat langko' dudo' di belai agong ku nyo' ku ngakim ngendecing semuya' mensiyo.
40025032	Semuya' pada' suku benso pun langko' dikumpol nyo' ngadap aku. Jedi dah dikumpol tei' dah nyoe aku langko' nyaringe mencar sidoe menjedi duwo begi, keedah penungu domo mencar kaming ken domoe.
40025033	Jedi yeng segerumpok yeng bujor benar tei' disuroh ku betungu di piya' kanán ku, ken segerumpok yeng layin tei' disuroh ku betungu di piya' kiboe ku," jie Yesus.
40025034	"Dah nyoe akuam yeng Rajo semuya' segeno nyeh langko' bepadah ke' pada' reng di piya' kanán ku, Yo' kituam kam yeng diberekat dolat Apa' ku. Tue dah jengkahe dah nyo' kam yeng berajo ke' Allah nyeh nerimoe semuya' segeloe yeng disiyap Sen deri asal mulo Sen ngado deniyo tue mie nyo' kam pada' lileh nyawo Sen.
40025035	Mat kamame' yeng diberekat dolat Sen, go kamam yeng ngaseh aku. Des ku lapar nyeh mat kamam yeng ngunyo' jolu kei sego ke' aku; des ku coko' insup nyeh kamam yeng ngunyo' ku ayie insup; des ku bejelan ke' jewoh nyeh kamam yeng nampan nerimoe ku;
40025036	ken des ku cum pekakas ku kamam yeng ngunyo' pekakas ke' aku; a, des ku saki' poníng nyeh kamam yeng noyu merintu aku; a, ken des ku dipenjero nyeh kamam yeng nan ngulang aku. Bungi nyoam ku nyingka' pada' reng bujor benar di piya' kanán ku gi," jie Yesus.

40025039	"Dah nyoe pada' reng bujor benar yeng di piya' kanán ku tei' langko' nyamut ku potue. Tuwowe, jie, dinai beh kami do merati den lapar? Dinai kami do merati den coko' na' insup? Ken sebilo beh kami do merati den jewoh deri arong diret den, demo ke' den noe bepekakas, demo ke' den saki' poníng, demo ke' ...den di penjero? So-so ku cum kami ngunyo' jolu ke' deng nyoe ke' den, demo ke' makan udap, demo ke' ayie insup, demo ke' pakai ingap. Kami si soe noe koloe nampan nerimoe den di rumah kami, demo ke' ngulang den di penjero opai. Mat cumam soe gewai kami tokoh nyoe ken den, jie sidoe.
40025040	"Pie aku yeng Rajo semuya' segeloe langko' nyamute, Do die kam nulong ngembentue aku ye'. Go dinai kam nulong ngembentue pada' menyadie ku yeng seimán, numo' yeng paling beroh nyeh pun, dinyoam kam mat nulong ngembentue aku, jie ku.
40025041	"Dah nyoe aku yeng Rajo semuya' segenoe langko' bepadah ke' pada' reng layin yeng di piya' kiboe ku. Kam ku tunong kaliam ke' api yeng benyalo seora'-ora'eam, yeng asale dipulah Sen nyo' Pengelakar ken pada' melekate. Pie kam tue pun ca' kinunam jum, go kam mat disumpah le' Apa' ku.
40025042	Go des ku lapar nyeh cum kam ngunyo' jolu kei sego ke' aku; des ku coko' na' insup nyeh cum kam ngunyo' ayie insup ke' aku.
40025043	Ken des ku jewoh deri arong diret ku nyeh keh kam nampan nerimoe aku; des ku noe bepekakas nyeh cumam kam ngunyo' pekakas ke' aku; a, ken des ku saki' poníng di penjero nyeh keh kam nyongo' ken noyu merintu aku, jie ku nyingka' sidoe.
40025044	"Dah nyoe jie sidoe di kiboe ku, Pie Tuwowe, jie, dinai kami do merati den lapar? Dinai kami do merati den coko' na' insup? Go mun kami do merati den tokoh nyoe noe ken kami keh nulong den, jie sidoe.
40025045	"Pie aku langko' nyamute, Do ye' des kam keh nulong aku ye'. Go dinai kam ngei' nulong pada' engku diret ku yeng paling beroh pun dinyoam ngei' kam jum nulong aku, jie ku.
40025046	"Dah nyoe sidoe pun langko' diukum seora'-ora'eam, pie pada' reng yeng bujor benar si langko' idup seora'-ora'eam," jie Yesus.
40026001	Jedi mátam. Dah santo' Yesus madah semuya' nyoe ke' pada' murite tei' dah nyoe jie Yesus,

40026011	A, ke' hal nulong reng bensat si nyoe panci jum. Ja'e go nan do kelorong kam nyo' nulonge, go pada' reng bensat kin nan do di antaro kam," jie Yesus. "Pi aku si noe; aku noe dam lamat na' ningal kam.
40026012	A, gewai iyo nungang binya' ke' kepalo ku pun," jie Yesus, "na' po yeng digewai reng nungang binya' ke' bengkai sebolum dipasar. Pie iyo tue nungange ke' aku sebolum ku mati pun. Mat panciam gewaie.
40026013	Mangko," jie Yesus, "dah agah panci dipadah dinai-nai pun di seruroh deniyo si gewai reng tue mat langko' dipadah jum, diingát dikenáng reng. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei," jie Yesus.

40026016	Jedi mátam, betongai ari nyoe pun Yudas nan ngipoe kelengah nyo' iyo nyerah Yesus ke' sidoe.
40026017	Jedi mátam, dah manu ke' Pesta Roti yeng Noe Bepengemang* dah. Jedi ari kememerue pesta nyeh tei' murit Yesus tei' manu ke' Yesus lalu betanyoe, "Dinailah kami ca' berajen berano' jolu nyo' kau nyamut pesta Ari Raya Ngelalu kaloe?" jie.

40026020	Jedi dah ujong ari ponyoe tei' Yesus pun dudo' makan nyamut pesta nyeh ken pada' murite yeng duwo belas ko'.

40026054	"Pi mun ponyoe," jie, "pada' tijum ke' hal aku yeng ditulis di lem Kitap Allah nyeh noe tetuntong. Teruhal dah ditijum dah lem Kitap Allah ken semuya' tue ca' tejedi ke' aku," jie Yesus.
40026055	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' pada' reng rami nyeh, "Aku poe reng jat nar," jie, "go kam nangkap aku ca' bekelewang ca' bepementong. Teruhale aku milang ari dudo' ngajar di rumah kediyam Allah; kam pun nan do ningo aku dinun. Gopai go selomo keh kam nangkap aku dinun?
40026056	"Ja'e semuya' tue tejedi pun," jie Yesus, "go mat ca' dituntong yeng ditulis pada' penijum di lem Kitap Allah mie." Dah nyoe ngaso Yesus ditangkap nyeh pada' murite pun rariam, ditingaleam Yesus dinyoe.
40026057	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus dibeyie le' reng yeng nangkape tei' kei ngadap Kayapas, pelayan agong lem agama reng Yahudi nyeh. Pada' ugar agama ken pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi pun dah bekumpol bekaluam dinyoe.
40026058	Petrus si ngenjurut buntut deri jewoh, sampai ke' kolong rumah pelayan agong. Detang kinun tei' mat tamoe jum; dah tamoe tei' iyo mat dudo' ken pada' serededu nyeh, go na' merati pai yeng langko' tejedi ken Yesus.
40026059	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus mat dipecaro le' pada' ketuwo pelayan ken semuya' kelompok akim reng Yahudi. Sidoe teger ngengkorek ngogoe bokti kesalah Yesus, go kona' sidoe iyo ca' diukum mati. Pada' saksi pememuloe pun disurohe jum besaksi nyo' mempulah Yesus,
40026060	pie mat cum tetomu ke' bokti kesalah Yesus, numo' pun benya' reng yeng mempulahe. Jedi mátam, pengabise do reng duwo ko' reng layin yeng ngendudoh Yesus.
40026061	Jedi jie sidoe, "Reng tue do bepadah," jie, "ken iyo na' ngeruma' rumah kediyam Allah, pie iyo mampu mulahe agei' lem tigo ari nyem," jie sidoe duwo ko' nyeh.
40026062	Dah nyoe pelayan agong die bediri di adap betore yeng mencaro Yesus, lalu jie nyingka' Yesus, "Nyeh kau noe kau nyangkale peh, yeng disaksi sidoe ke' hal kau nyeh?" jie.
40026063	Pie Yesus si ngojap nyem. Pie pelayan agong manseh betanyoe ke' Yesus, "Nyeh kau mat Kristus, Ana' Allah peh?" jie. "Mun kau mat Ana' Allah nyeh kau ca' besumpaham demi demo Allah yeng idup," jie.
40026064	Lalu Yesus nyamute, "Mátam yeng jie den ye', mat akuame'," jie. "Malah ken paie deduwan langko' merati boktie yeng nyato nar gi, go dah nyoe gi deduwan langko' merati aku yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo nyeh mat dudo' di serugo nun, di piya' kanán Allah Apa' ku yeng rajo kuwaso. Dinyoam ku mat disomah kei rajo beroto ken Sen. Dah nyoe aku langko' turun di lem románg (nyo' ku mencaro ngakim pada' mensiyo di deniyo tue)," jie Yesus.
40026065	Jedi dah ningo paner Yesus bungi nyoe tei' pelayan agong tei' lalu simah ngencabi' pekakas direte kengengiyal godie. Jie pelayan agong, "Dah noe begogoe agei' kesalahe, go iyo ngangap direte samo ken Allah!" jie. "Kam pun dah ningoe dah, ken iyo mat menghina ngeremeh Allah," jie pelayan agong nyingka' betore yeng mencaro Yesus.
40026066	Lalu jie pelayan agong nyeh, "Koti kam bebar benya' ngendecing kesalah reng tue?" jie. Samut sidoe, "Iyo ca' diukum matiam," jie.
40026067	Dah nyoe sidoe simah ngelujah muko Yesus, samel mempungahe, ken do jum yeng nampare
40026068	samel ngeolo'-olo'e. Matoe pun dikobat reng, lalu jie sidoe, "Ne," jie, "mun mat kau panai betijum," jie, "sopaiam di antaro kami yeng nampar kau nyeh, Kristusei?" jie pada' ketuwo ken pada' akim nyeh.
40026069	Petrus si gei' dudo' di luwar, di kolong rumah pelayan agong. Dah nyoe dipanu le' siko' pembentu betinoe. Lalu jie pembentue nyeh nyingka' Petrus, "Ne, kau pun nan namah Yesus deri Galilea," jie.
40026070	Pie Petrus tei' nyangkale di adap pada' sidoe. "Aku si," jie, "noe tawu ku ken reti omóng kau," jie.
40026071	Lalu iyo pun ngaleh ke' soma' lawang pagar kolong. Dah nyoe diperati le' reng betinoe yeng siko' nyeh, lalu jie reng betinoe nyingka' reng layin dinyoe, "Ne, iyo pun," jie, "do nyeroto Yesus deri Nasaret," jie.
40026072	Pie Petrus mat nyangkal agei'am, sampai besumpah bepadah ken iyo mat noe tekenale ken Yesus.
40026073	Jedi dah kaloe ponyoe dipanu jum le' reng yeng bediri nonton gewai dinyoe, lalu jie sidoe nyingka' Petrus, "Mátam ye', kau tue sekaban ken sidoe ye'," jie, "go boktie go tayoh paner kam mat samo," jie.
40026074	Pie Petrus tei' simah nyumpah direte; nyangkal mati-mati. "Aku tarah ke' noe tekenal ku ken reng nyoe," jie. Jedi tumas iyo bepaner bungi nyoe tei' mano' pun mat tengkuko'am.
40026075	Lalu iyo pun mat teringáteam ken yeng dipadah le' Yesus tadie ponyoe, go bolum mano' tengkuko' pun jie Yesus, Petrus langko' tigo kali nyangkale. Dah nyoe Petrus pamus keluwar lalu mengkawung nangis.
40027001	Jedi mátam. Dah kolam nyama' nyeh pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi yeng layin nyeh bekumpol bekalue to' mutus pecaro Yesus. Jedi keputus sidoe tei' Yesus ca' diukum mati, pie sidoe cum hake na' ngukume mati.
40027002	Mangko Yesus dipasong ke' jerie lalu ditaban le' sidoe deri nyoe, dibeyie sidoe nyo' ngadap gubernor Pilatus, dah nyoe Yesus mat diserah sidoe ke' gubernor.
40027003	Ngaso Yesus mat na' diukum mati nyeh Yudas yeng nyerah Yesus ke' munsohe tei' mat kesal iyo ngajie. Lalu duwit tigo puloh bingkap yeng rogo iyo nyerah Yesus nyeh dipulange ke' pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi yeng layin.
40027004	"Ku mat bedoso," jie Yudas nyingka' sidoe, "go ku nyerah reng yeng cum kesalahe, sampai iyo diukum mati," jie. Pie jie sidoe ketuwo, "Eis," jie, "kami noe ken menduli nyoe," jie. "Nyoe urus kauame'," jie.
40027005	Lalu Yudas nyeh diamure duwite ke' lantai rumah kediyam Allah, lalu pamusam iyo, turun, dah nyoe iyo ngenjeyel direte.
40027006	Jedi mátam, dah nyoe pada' duwit perak yeng diamur Yudas tadie dipiter dikumpol le' pada' ketuwo pelayan. Lalu jie sidoe nyingka' betore, "Nyeh kotilah ngaji duwit tue, jolu ge' duwit tue duwit tulo' nyawo. Mun diret paja' ke' lem bedah sumang kin maksute ngelangar ukum Allah," jie sidoe.
40027007	Mangko dah nyoe sidoe mutuse ken duwit nyoe dipakai sidoe nyo' moli sebidang tanah yeng kusus nyo' pada' tama' reng noe Yahudi. Tanah arong nyoe tei' asale tanah bokas reng mulah tepayan tanah.
40027008	Pie tam diboli ken duwit tulo' nyawo nyeh mangko arong nyoe didemo Tulo' Nyawo. Lalu demo nyoe sampai ari tue pun gei' manseh.
40027009	A, gewai pada' ketuwo pelayan ponyoe pun mat nuntong yeng ditijum le' Yeremia nyomie, yeng bungie potue. Jie Yeremia, Iyo dinilai pada' reng Israel nyeh ngat tigo puloh bingkap duwit perak nyem. Dah nyoe dah kesudahe duwit nyoe diamie sidoe,
40027010	dipakai sidoe nyo' moli sebidang tanah yeng bokas reng mulah tepayan tanah, cuco' ken perentah Tuwowe ke' aku mie, jie Yeremia nyomiam. (Sakaria 11:12-13, Yeremia 32:6-9)
40027011	Jedi mátam. Yesus mat ngadap gubernor Pilatus. Dah nyoe Pilatus nyerudi ke' Yesus ke' hal penomah pendudoh reng ke' hal iyo. Jedi jie gubernor Pilatus, "Jie sidoe kau madah diret kau rajo reng Yahudi. Nyeh kau mat rajo reng Yahudi peh?" jie. Samut Yesus, "Mátam yeng jie den nye'," jie.
40027012	Lalu pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi yeng layin nyeh rami ngendudoh Yesus di adap Pilatus. Pie Yesus cum iyo nyamute.
40027013	Dah nyoe jie Pilatus, "Dingo beh pada' penomah pendudoh sidoe ke' hal kau nyeh. Ngopai go ngei' kau nyamute?" jie.
40027014	Pie pada' pendudoh sidoe mat cum sepatah kato pun Yesus nyamute. Ngaso ponyoe tei' Gubernor Pilatus pun mat kangápam iyo meratie.
40027015	Jedi tiyap Ari Raya Ngelalu nyeh kebiyaso selomo Gubernor Pilatus tei' nan do ngelopas siko' reng yeng ditahane di penjero, nyo' nyenáng ati reng Yahudi. A, yeng nentu sopai yeng dipelopase mat reng Yahudiam.
40027016	Jedi ketiko nyoe tei' do reng di penjero nyeh yeng temensohor tam kejate; demoe Yesus Barabas.
40027017	Jedi mátam, ketengah Yesus gei' dipecaro di adap Pilatus tei' dah nyoe pada' reng Yahudi yeng rami pun mat bekumpol bekalue dinyoe jum (na' nyuroh Pilatus ngelopas siko' reng yeng ditahane, na' po ketongkah selomoam des Ari Raya Ngelalu). Jedi jie Pilatus nyingka' pada' reng rami nyeh, "Nyeh yeng nailah yeng ca' ku pelopas nyo' kam tawun tue: Yesus Barabasei, ke' Yesus yeng didemo reng Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allahei?" jie Pilatus.
40027018	Bungi Pilatus ponyoe pun tam iyo na' ngelopas Yesus. Nyurohe na' ngelopas Yesus tei' go iyo tawu ken Yesus diserah ke' iyo pun noe tam kesalahe peh, pie tam pada' ketuwo pelayan nyeh isin dengki nyem.
40027019	A, ge'em ketiko Pilatus gei' dudo' di belai pengadele mencaro Yesus tadie ponyoe do jum posan binie ke' iyo. Jie posan binie, "Reng nyoe mat cum kesalahe; kau nang na' turut campor ngukume. Go aku beari-ari tue mat susaham tam mimpi ku ke' hal iyo," jie posan binie. Mangko kona' ati Pilatus pun mat na' ngelopas Yesus.
40027020	Pie pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi yeng layin tei' simah ngaca' ngarang pada' reng rami gei' sempayo sidoe minta' ke' Pilatus kei Barabas die yeng dipelopase; Yesus diukum mati ja'.
40027021	Jedi mátam, Pilatus mat betanyoe ke' pada' reng rami. "Nyeh sopailah máte yeng ca' ku pelopas nyo' kam, Yesusei, ke' Barabasei?" jie. Lalu jie sidoe nyamute, "Barabas," jie.
40027022	Lalu jie Pilatus, "Nyeh mun ponyoe ca' ku pekotilah ken Yesus yeng bedemo Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah tue?" jie. Pada' reng rami pun serentak nyamute, "Disalip ja' iyo!" jie.
40027023	"Pie ngopai iyo ca' disalip?" jie Pilatus. "Pailah kesalahe?" jie. Pie pada' reng rami nyeh kin ontap-ontap pangkas kayis pera' perango, "Disalip ja' iyo!" jie.
40027024	Jedi pengabise pengaso Pilatus tei' cum dah gunoe iyo minta' gei' Yesus yeng dipileh sidoe kei dipelopase; malah ken paie pada' reng rami nyeh kin iroh-iroh. Mangko Pilatus pun nyerah. Lalu iyo nyuroh reng ngamie ayie, dah nyoe iyo meso' jerie di adap pada' reng rami, tanoe iyo ngei' telibat tam gewai sidoe. "Tue tanoe," jie, "ken reng tue mati noe iyo go ketegal aku peh. Tue ketegal diret kamam," jie Pilatus.
40027025	Lalu samut pada' reng rami nyeh, "Ma'pusam!" jie. "Mun do ukum Allah ketegal tam kemati reng tue," jie, "kami ken pada' buboh ampeh kamiam yeng nangonge," jie sidoe.
40027026	Lalu mátam, Pilatus pun mat ngelopas nyerah Barabasam ke' pada' reng rami. Yesus si disurohe gei' dipelesah lo'e, dah nyoe mat diserahe gei' iyo disalip.
40027027	Dah nyoe Yesus dibeyie le' serededu gubernor kei tamoe ke' delam rumah gubernor. Detang ke' delam lalu ramiam pada' semuya' serededu bekumpol ngeliling Yesus dinyoe.
40027028	Dipucele le' sidoe pekakas Yesus, digentie ken beju jubah mirah, keca'e beju jubah ungu yeng dipakai kebiyaso le' rajo.
40027029	Dah nyoe sidoe ngenggolong labong akar durie, dikonoe ke' kepaloe, lalu jeri kanáne diunyo'e ken tungkat, ca'e iyo merentah rayate. Dah nyoe sidoe belutut di adape, seolah-olah nyomah ke' Yesus, pie ngeolo'-olo'e nyem. "Panyang umoram den, rajo reng Yahudi," jie sidoe, ca'ca'e besesungko ke' rajoe.
40027030	Simah dilujah le' sidoe, lalu dirobute tungkat di jerie, lalu dipererotu'e melentong ke' kepalo Yesus.
40027031	Dah kepepuwas sidoe meremayín ngererujonge dah nyoe dikerama'e beju jubah nyeh, lalu digenti semulo ken pekakas direte tadie. Dah nyoe diiring le' sidoe pamus, gei' disalip.
40027032	Jedi dah bejelan nuju ke' luwar kota tei' di tongah jelan namput betomu ken reng lelaki bedemo Simon,* yeng asale deri kota Kirene, di nenggeri Aprika. Lalu Simon deri Kirene tei' dipakso le' serededu ca' nangong salip Yesus.
40027033	Dah nyoe sidoe bejelan ke' arong demo Golgota. Golgota retie Kerakah Kepalo.
40027034	Jedi detang kinun Yesus bolum dipaku ke' salip tei' diunyo' le' serededu ken angur asam becampor ken jolu piyet*. Pie dah dikicap le' Yesus iyo bolei'e nginsupe.
40027035	Jedi mátam, dah nyoe sidoe mat nyalip Yesus. Lalu pekakas Yesus dibegi sidoe caro cabut uni.
40027036	Dah nyoe sidoe mat dudo'am dinyoe, di soma' salip Yesus nyeh, nyo' sidoe ngenjegoe.*
40027037	Jedi di tiyang salip Yesus nyeh piya' ke' atas kepaloe ditebeng papan, tulise: Tue Yesus, rajo reng Yahudi. Go ditulis ponyoe go nyoam yeng didudoh reng ke' hal iyo.
40027038	Jedi do jum duwo ko' reng perampok, disalip jum, beroto ken Yesus, siko' di kanán siko' di kiboe.
40027039	Arong nyoe kelelalu reng jum. Jedi dah nyoe sege' reng lalu ngerudu sidoe dinyoe reng yeng lalu tei' simah ngenjije' ngererujonge.
40027040	"Ne," jie sidoe, "jie kau nyomie kin kau na' ngeruma' rumah kediyam Allah, dah nyoe di lem tigo ari nyeh kau mampu mulahe agei', jie kau. Pie tue nulong diret kau pun noleh kau. Mun kau mat Ana' Allah," jie sidoe, "boh nulong diret kau. Turunam deri salip kau, mun kau Ana' Allah!" jie sidoe simah ngererujonge.
40027041	Ponyoe jum pada' ketuwo pelayan, ken pada' ugar agama, demo ke' pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi yeng layin yeng do dinyoe, simah ngeolo'-olo' Yesus jum.
40027042	"Ne," jie sidoe, "tekonoe ke' reng layin ditulonge, pi dah muwáh ke' direte noe mampue ngiyas langkang idonge," jie sidoe. "Kiroe," jie, "mun iyo mat rajo reng Israel dipelopasam direte deri salipe," jie. "Mun iyo mat turun si kami na' kami pecayo ken iyo," jie sidoe.
40027043	"Iyo kin pecayo ken Allah," jie sidoe, "malah ken paie kin madah direte Ana' Allah. Mun ponyoe si cubo dibokti le' Allah kaseh Sen ke' iyo, na' Sen noe Allah nulonge*," jie pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi nyeh.
40027044	Ponyoe jum bungi paner reng perampok duwo ko' yeng disalip beroto ken Yesus, teger ngejat menghinae jum.
40027045	Jedi dah tongah ari dah mato ari tingie tei' temosie lap! sagam gelemát, tigo jam pelamate, deri jam duwo belas sampai ke' jam tigo. Kontan sagam di seruroh nenggeri nyoe.
40027046	Dah nyoe dah jam tigo ke' deng nyoe Yesus bepangkas kayis, "Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani," jie lem paner direte. Retie, "Allah ku, O Allah ku, ngopai go Den merayan aku?" jie.
40027047	Jedi peningo separoe reng yeng do dinyoe tei' iyo nyapo penijum Elia. "Dingo beh," jie, "Iyo nyapo Kei' Elia, minta' tulong sen," jie.
40027048	Lalu siko' di antaro sidoe copat ngamie jolu keedah urat kumpai, dicelupe ke' lem ayie angur masam. Dah dicelupe dijola'e ken penjulo', na' ngunyo'e ke' Yesus gei' iyo nginsupe.*
40027049	Pie pada' betore tei' nonga'e. "Nang lo'!" jie. "Diret merati lo'e, na' noei Kei' Elia nulonge," jie.
40027050	Dah nyoe Yesus pun mangkas ontap agei'am, lalu nyerah nyawo direte, dah nyoe iyo mat matiam.
40027051	Jedi tumas iyo mati tei' semorie di Yerusalem nun rak! tebolah duwo deri atas ke' beroh bonáng tobal yeng kei dining di rumah kediyam Allah nun. Seruroh deniyo pun simah begontar, pada' betu kalas pun pocah bolah,
40027052	ken pada' tama' pun bis tebungkas tekabas. Benya' umát engku Allah yeng mati nyomie ponyoe bengki' idup agei'.
40027053	Sidoe mat pamus keluwar deri tama'e, pie bolum sidoe tamoe ke' kota Yerusalem yeng suci. Tamoe noe tamoe ke' kota Yerusalem nyeh dah tigo ari ponyoe, dah Yesus pun bengki' idup agei'. Reng rami pun mat benya' yeng merati pada' reng yeng bengki' idup agei' nyeh.
40027054	Jedi mátam te'. Pada' serededu ken kapten nyeh yeng gei' ngenjego Yesus disalipe tei' mat gupoham, merati tanah begontar ken pada' keenah keaneh layin yeng tejedi. "Adoh!" jie sidoe, "Iyo tue mat Ana' Allah!" jie.

40027056	Do jum dinyoe benya' reng betinoe yeng bediri ke' jewoh kit, merati ken nyaksi semuya' nyoe, benso Maria Magdalena, Maria ino' Yakobus ken Yusup; a, ken Ino' Yohanes ken Yakobus ge'em; apa' sidoe tei' Sebedeus. Deri nyomie ponyoe sidoe betinoe nan ngenjurut Yesus, ngeleladene di rumahe opai, betongai deri iyo kememerue mulai ngajar di Galilea nyomie. Lalu sidoe pun mat do dinyoe, meratie des Yesus mati.
40027057	Jedi do siko' reng kayo yeng bedemo Yusup, yeng asale deri kampong Arimatea di peloya' Yudea. Iyo dah menjedi murit Yesus jum. Jedi dah ujong ari ponyoe
40027058	Yusup tei' manu ke' Gubernor Pilatus, lalu minta' gei' bengkai Yesus nyeh diserah ke' iyo nyo' iyo masare. Lalu mátam, Pilatus pun mat madah ke' ana' buwahe kei bengkai Yesus diserah ke' Yusup.
40027059	Dah nyoe Yusup mat bebeli' ke' salip. Dah detang ke' salip tei' bengkai Yesus mat diturune le' Yusup deri salip nyeh. Lalu bengkai Yesus nyeh dibungkuse ken bonáng kayin linén yeng puteh bereseh,
40027060	dah nyoe diongkah le' Yusup ke' lem guwo yeng kusus nyo' tama'. Guwo nyeh tei' ditobo' reng deri lubang betu. Mat gei' bungas, bolum do dipakai. Kenaken si tama' nyeh dah disiyape kajie nyo' tama' direte, dah iyo mati, kaji Yusup; pie lalu dipakaie nyo' tama' Yesus. Jedi dah bengkai Yesus diongkah ke' lem guwo tei' Yusup pun ngembering betu bosai to' nudong lubang guwo nyeh. Dah nyoe iyo pun ningal arong nyoe.
40027061	A, Maria Magdalena ken Maria yeng siko' si betungu dudo' di senopang guwo tama' Yesus.
40027062	Jedi pagi ponyoe dah Ari Berenti Kerejo tei' pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' reng deri kelompok Parisi nyeh manu ke' Pilatus.
40027063	Lalu jie sidoe nyingka' Pilatus, "Pa' Gubernor," jie. "Kami tue teringát ke' paner reng pememuloe yeng dah mati nyeh des iyo gei' idup mie. Go menurut panere mie dah iyo mati tigo ari langko' na' pulang idup agei'.
40027064	Jedi kona' kami den ca' nyuroh reng ngenjego tama'e melamat tigo ari tue, gola' pai nawue murite na' maling bengkaie. Go sidoe si sege' dah dipalinge bengkaie tentu bepadah ken iyo dah bengki' agei'am dah. Ha, mun tejedi tokoh nyoe kin kepala' behayoam pemuloe iyo bengki' idup nyeh, deripado pada' omónge memuloe nyomie pun," jie sidoe nyingka' gubernor.
40027065	Lalu jie Pilatus, "Eis, semadie nyem beh," jie, "na' nyuroh serededu ngenjegoe setogap-togape pun," jie.
40027066	Lalu pada' ketuwo pelayan nyeh mat pegi ke' guwo tama' Yesus. Betu tudonge direntenge ken tali, lalu digegeloe sepiya' menyempiya', gei' nyato nar mun do reng ngarue. Lalu serededu nyeh disurohe bejego dinyoe.
40028001	Jedi mátam, dah lopas Ari Berenti Kerejo nyeh, dah na' bukoe tampa' ari Mingu* nyeh tei' Maria Magdalena ken Maria yeng siko' tei' bebeli' agei' ke' tama' Yesus, na' meratie.
40028002	Temosie terasoe tanah tei' begontar paling kuwat, go do melekat deri Tuwowe turun deri serugo manu ke' tama' Yesus. Iyo ngemberiing betu penudong deri ulo' lubang tama' Yesus nyeh lalu iyo dudo' ke' puco' betu nyeh.
40028003	Cayo melekat nyeh tei' lang ler po kengkitaram; ken pekakase puteh pepuwo.
40028004	A, pada' serededu yeng ngenjego tama' Yesus pun mat merati melekat nyeh jum; mat begegar begitikam, lalu bap! tepesungkur bepisan-pisan abis kegegola'e.
40028005	Pie jie melekat Tuwowe nyingka' Maria sidoe, "Nang gola', kamei. Go aku kitue pun tam ku tawu ken kam ngogoe Yesus yeng disalip reng.
40028006	Pie iyo cum dah ditue, kamei! Iyo dah bengki' agei'am dah, na' po yeng dipadahe nyomiam. Ti beh, tue ne arong reng ngongkah bengkaie, pie dah cum dah.
40028007	"Jedi kam," jie melekat, "ca' copatam bepadah ke' murite ken Yesus dah bengki' idup agei'am dah. Malah ken paie iyo na' dolu deri sidoe ke' Galilea nun, nyo' bejenjuwong ken sidoe dinun. Dinyoe doam sidoe betomu ken iyo," jie. "Aku melekat Tuwowame' yeng bepadah ke' kam," jie melekat nyeh.

41003005	Yesus pun godie mantau pada' sidoe; susaham atie go sidoe mat koran atie, ngei'e sidoe berubah. Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' reng mayus nyeh tei', "Lontaram jeri kau," jie. Tumas dilontare lintus mat beyi'am jerie te'.

41003007	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus ken pada' murite ningal arong nyoe, bejelan ke' daerah soma' lompoe. Reng yeng ngenjurute deri peloya' Galilea pun mat paling rami. Sa'am go reng deri Galilea, pie pada' reng deri peloya' Yudea pun do,
41003008	deri Yerusalem pun do, deri Idumea pun do, deri peloya' seborang nun Sungai Yordan pun do, ken deri daerah Tirus ken Sidon pun do. Mat paling ramiam pada' reng yeng manu ke' Yesus tam dah ningo gesah ke' hal pada' gewaie.
41003009	Jedi ngaso mensiyo rami ponyoe tei' Yesus pun nyuroh murite ngajen perawu kei kediyam iyo ngajar, gola' konoe dudu pada' reng rami kaloe ponyoe.
41003010	Go pada' reng rami nyeh besesenét begegepet; ken pada' reng saki' pun bedudu mendudu manu ke' soma' Yesus. Sidoe rami nyeh na' nigue iyo gei' penyaki'e beyi', go dah benya' dah reng yeng dipebeyi'e.
41003011	(Pada' reng yeng kesarong setan pun dibeyie jum ke' Yesus.) Sege' pada' setan merati Yesus tei' pada' reng yeng konoe saronge tei' mat tepesungkur di adape lalu mangkas kayis, "Kau mat Ana' Allah!" jie.
41003012	Pie Yesus nan tegasam nonga' pada' setan nyeh bepadah ke' reng rami bungi nyoe.
41003013	Dah nyoe lamat belamat Yesus mendeki natai, lalu diaja'e kinun pada' reng yeng dipilehe. Jedi sidoe yeng diaja'e mat namahe ke' natai.
41003014	Dah nyoe ditunyo'e reng duwo belas ko', didemoe pelantar posane. Maksut iyo sidoe kei namahe, lalu na' diutuse jum kei madah agah panci,
41003015	ken dikuwaso jum le' Yesus gei' sidoe mampu nunong pada' setan.
41003016	Jedi yeng dipilehe tei' Simon, yeng digelare jum Petrus;
41003017	Yakobus ken Yohanes, yeng bemenyadie. Apa'e tei' Sebedeus. Gelar sidoe duwo Gontu, go semongát sidoe kuwat.

41003019	ken Yudas Iskariot, yeng pengabise nyerah Yesus ke' munsohe. Sidoe duwo belas ko' nyeh yeng dipileh le' Yesus kei pelantar posane.
41003020	Dah nyoe Yesus nayi' ke' rumah reng, lalu ponyoe agei'am, bederum agei'am pada' reng rami bekumpol manu ke' iyo. Sampai Yesus ken pada' murite noe sompat makan pun entam kebenya' urang yeng nan do dinyoe.
41003021	Jedi dah pada' seberumahe ningo ke' hal Yesus nyeh sidoe pun turun deri arong direte, manu kinyoe na' ngamie Yesus. Tam jie reng iyo dah gilo dah.
41003022	A, ken pada' guru agama Yahudi yeng detang deri Yerusalem pun bepadah ken Yesus dikesarong le' Beelsebul, jie. Nyuroh iyo mampu nunong setan kin, jie, tam iyo dikuwaso le' kepala' pada' antu setan nyeh, jie sidoe.
41003023	Dah nyoe Yesus nyuroh sidoe ningo penjelase. "Noe ken koti Pengelakar na' nunong direte," jie. Dah nyoe iyo makai perempamo.
41003024	"Sempamoe," jie, "pada' urang sebuwah nenggeri beregu bekelompok lalu beperang betempor pado sidoe nyem. Pengabise kin noe bodan nenggeri nyoe.
41003025	"A, ponyoe jum reng yeng beseberumah. Mun iyo nan bekelayi pado lem rumah nyoe kin mempungah direte; pengabise noe bodan jum seberumah nyoe," jie Yesus.
41003026	"Jedi ponyoe jum Beelsebul. Mun aku mat nunong setan makai kuwaso Beelsebul si maksute Beelsebul beperang pado direte; demoe iyo mempungah direte nyem. Pie mun ponyoe maksute kuwasoe langko' losi lenyápam, mat noe? Noe ken iyo na' tokoh nyoe.
41003027	"Pie yeng mat si potue. (Mun setan mampu ditunong," jie, "maksute go do yeng lobeh bekuwaso deri kepala'e pun yeng behak bekuwaso.) Contohe potue, kamei. Misale mun do tuwowe rumah yeng gegah bereni yeng ngenjego rumahe," jie, "kin noe ken mampu reng semadie ngeruma' rumah ken ngerampas pada' reto beno berang kiyada'e, dih? Cuwali ja' tuwowe yeng gegah bereni nyeh mampu ditamat dipasong reng yeng lebeh gegah bereni deri iyo pun. Mun iyo mat ditamat dipasong reng yeng gegah bereni deri iyo nyeh si mampu die reng nyoe ngeruma' ken ngerampas pada' jolue," jie Yesus.
41003028	"Jedi kam mat ca' ati-ati ngaji gewai aku," jie Yesus. "Go pada' doso mensiyo yeng layin, gola' iyo menghina ngeremeh pado mensiyo pun pie manseh tawu dielon le' Allah,
41003029	cuwali ja'," jie, "reng menghina ngeremeh Roh Allah. Doso nyoe noe tawu na' dielon le' Allah, cum diapus Sen seora'-ora'eam," jie Yesus.
41003030	Go iyo kin dikuwaso le' Roh Allah, pie jie reng Parisi tadie iyo kesarong setan.
41003031	Jedi dah nyoe mat detangam ino' Yesus ken pada' menyadie lelakie nyeh (na' ngamie Yesus). Sidoe gei' diyam di luwar, nyuroh reng manu ke' delam nyo' madah iyo.
41003032	Yesus kin dikeliling pada' reng rami yeng dudo' dinyoe ningo iyo. Jedi jie reng yeng madahe, "Ino' kau ken pada' menyadie lelaki kau do di luwar, na' ngogoe kau," jie.
41003033	Samut Yesus tei', "Nyeh kaji kam sopailah ino' ku ken menyadie ku yeng mat?" jie.
41003034	Dah nyoe iyo ngelinga' ke' segonáp sidoe yeng dudo' ngeliling iyo. "Reng tuam to' yeng ku angap ino' ku ken pada' menyadie ku yeng mat," jie.
41003035	"Go sopai ja' yeng ngenggewai kona' kemawo' Allah nyeh iyoam yeng ku angap menyadie ku ken ino' ku yeng mat," jie Yesus.
41004001	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yesus ngajar reng rami agei'am, di pinger lompoe. Mat rami nar pada' reng yeng bekumpol ngeliling Yesus na' ningo iyo ngajar; mangko Yesus ngaleh ke' perawu, dudo' di perawu die, geluna' gelenóng di soma' pantai. Pada' reng rami yeng ningoe tei' bediri di derat di pinger pantai lompoe.
41004002	Lalu Yesus pun ngajar benya' renoe ke' sidoe pie kontan pakai perempamo. Jedi perempamo yeng sutie yeng dipadahe tei' bungie potue.
41004003	"Dingo beh kam," jie Yesus. "Do reng siko'," jie, "yeng na' ngamur bonehe, pie noe iyo semuya'e yeng tejedi.
41004004	Boneh yeng diamure tei' separoe do yeng gegar di tongah jelan, lalu pada' burong pun pederodok manto'e, sampai bis.
41004005	A, yeng separoe boneh nyeh gegar ke' tanah yeng bisei' kerangán betu; tanahe lipisam. Belantang si mat copatam, go tanah nyeh lipis,
41004006	pie dah ari beyi', dah mato ari tingie si lantange layuam, lalu rangkai kotai go cum urate.
41004007	A, separoe boneh nyeh gegar ke' tanah yeng bisei' pada' rampue durie. Lalu dah rampue durie nyeh mansang, boneh yeng belantang panci tadie ponyoe nayóng tam rampue durie, lalu cum bebuwah.
41004008	Pie do jum boneh yeng jetue ke' arong tanah lolohe. Dah belantang mat paling joboh; dah iyo bebuwah nyeh berinasam. Mat belipat genoam; do yeng 30 kali lipat, do yeng 60 kali lipat, do jum," jie Yesus, "yeng sampai 100 kali lipat genoe," jie.
41004009	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Semuya' segeno, kelinang mat ca' ningo," jie.
41004010	Jedi dah kaloe ponyoe, dah tingal iyo ken pada' murite bangam, dah nyoe murite yeng duwobelas ko' ken murite yeng layin yeng ngenjurute tei' betanyoe ke' Yesus ke' hal pada' perempamo nyeh tadie.
41004011	Jedi jie Yesus, "Kam si," jie, "diborie kemampu nyo' kam tawu ken risi'-risi' Allah, koti keada'e des Sen disomah kei rajo. Pie sidoe layin yeng noe nunoe aku si dipadah ke' hal nyoe kontan pakai perempamo nyem. Sidoe mat noe tawue ken risi'-risi' Allah.
41004012	Nyoe pun cuco' ken yeng ditulis lem Kitap Allah nyomie, yeng bungie potue, Go sidoe kepa' pun serarat merati pie mat sebujor meratiam, tarah ke' noe tekalimáte; kepa' pun serarat ningo pie sebujor ningoam, tarah ke' noe tawue ken retie. Kira' sidoe awas ken ningo si gola' na'e sidoe bebeta' piker bebeli' ke' Allah, gei' sempayo dosoe dielon, jie. (Yes 6:9-10)
41004013	Lalu jie Yesus, "Nyeh kam noe tawu kam peh ken reti perempamo nyeh tadie? Mun noe tawu ken reti perempamo tue," jie, "koti na' ngaji ngalimát yeng layin, kamei?"
41004014	"Jedi reng yeng ngamur boneh nyeh," jie Yesus, "keedah reng yeng madah posan payit Allah.
41004015	A, ken arong tongah jelan yeng diamur ken boneh tadie, nyoe keedah mensiyo yeng separoe, yeng ningo posan payit Allah, pie tumas iyo ningoe lintus detangam Pengelakar, ngerampas ngerobut posan payit Sen deri atie.
41004016	A, arong kerangán betu yeng konoe gegar boneh tadie si nyoe keedah ati separo mensiyo yeng ningo posan payit Allah jum. Dah sidoe ningoe si lintus diterimoeam, mat ayah bikaham sidoe ningoe.
41004017	Pie posan payit yeng didingoe noe nyorap ke' lem atie, keedah lantang yeng noe beurat delam, mat noe lano. Jedi sal ge' ngerudu kesusah, sal ge' disensare reng tam sidoe ningo posan payit Allah si lalu sap! sidoe nyeraham.
41004018	"A, lalu arong tanah yeng bisei' rampue durie yeng konoe gegar boneh tadie tei' nyoe keedah reng yeng ningo posan payit Allah pie cum asele, noe bebuwah. Ningo si ningo,
41004019	pie dah nyoe sidoe nan kamoh ngaji keidupe di deniyo tue, ken sidoe dikelakar tam keingíne na' menjedi kayo, ken keingíne to' semuya' segelo yeng layin ge'em. Mangko posan payit Allah mat telinsam telimasam tam pada' kekamoh deniyo tue. Lalu mat cumam bebuwah.
41004020	"Pie tanah yeng arong lolohe tei'," jie Yesus, "nyoe keedah reng yeng ningo posan payit Allah, lalu mat na'e nerimoe, na'e makaie. Sidoe mat berinasam buwahe. Asele pun benya' lipate: do yeng 30 kali lipat, do yeng 60 kali lipat, ken do yeng sampai 100 kali lipat genoe," jie Yesus.
41004021	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Mun reng meyie pelito ke' arong yeng sagam kin dileta'e di tongah ruwang. Noe ken pelito nyeh diserangkong ken gentang atau pun diongkah ke' beroh pempangong, dih?
41004022	Ponyoe jum ke' hal yeng nyomie gei' risi'-risi' Allah; mat ca' dipadaham, kamei. Go semuya' segelo yeng asale seolah-olah ditapo' nyeh pie pengabise maksut Sen ca' dikoba'. Sipat pai pun yeng asale risi'-risi' Sen nyeh pie pengabise maksut Sen cagar dibeba' bekau ke' reng rami.
41004023	Semuya' segeno, kelinang mat ca' ningoam," jie Yesus.
41004024	"Ge'em yeng didingo kam mat ca' dipakai. Go semingkin kam makaie semingkin langko' dijelas ke' kam ken reti pemadah ku ke' kam*.
41004025	Go berang reng yeng dah buleh nyeh langko' disuroh Allah belobeh-lobeh pekulehe, mun iyo makai yeng do di iyo. Pie berang reng yeng noe buleh si yeng sikit yeng do di iyo pun langko' diperoru kaliam, tam iyo noe makaie," jie Yesus.
41004026	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Des Allah disomah kei rajo si," jie, "mat diret Sénam yeng ngenggewaie. Benso boneh yeng diamur reng di udase.
41004027	Boneh yeng dah diamur reng kin diadue nyem, cum gewaie to' nyurohe belantang. Iyo begegiyo ngenggewai jolu layin po selomoam: dah malam mokap tidor, dah siyang bengki', ngenggewai jolu po selomoam. Pie boneh yeng diamure tei' mat belantang ken mansangam, numo' pun reng yeng ngamure mat noe tawu koti caro iyo belantang nyeh.
41004028	Mat belantang bedireteam deri lem tanah nyeh: betongai ngenyenjerum, lamat belamat nganong, lalu pengabise mat bebuwaham.
41004029	Dah mansa' padie mat lintus digotame, go dah jengkahe dah," jie Yesus. "Pie nyurohe sampai menjedi si mat Allaham."
41004030	Jedi jie Yesus, "Nyeh engo kam koti keada'e des Allah disomah kei rajo? Ku na' merempamoe gei' kam jelas ngajie. Jedi des Allah disomah kei rajo kin
41004031	keada'e keedah kam ngamur igei' komang di umo kam. Igei' komang* kin paling soniam,
41004032	pie dah iyo belantang kin mansang, kin joboh-joboh, bosai tingie, bepampang beedan, sampai pada' burong pun ulehe besarang belinong dinyoe," jie Yesus.

41004034	Iyo nan ngajar reng rami pakai perempamo nyem. Pie nongah des iyo do ken pada' murite bangam si nan dijelase nyem semuya'e ke' sidoe.

41004036	Jedi pada' reng rami nyeh ditingale dinyoe, lalu murite namah Yesus, nayi' perawu arong iyo dudo' tadie ponyoe des iyo ngajar, na' nyemorang ke' seborang lompoe. Pada' perawu layin pun do jum dinyoe.
41004037	Jedi mátam, dah nayi' perawu tei' dah detang ke' penenongah lompoe nyeh semorie siyut! jie buwowe yeng paling ontap. Gelebar gelebur jie gelumang yeng paling bosai, nyerangkong perawu nyeh, sampai na' karamam.
41004038	Pie Yesus si diyam di buntut perawu, tidoram, kepaloe bebental. Lalu simah digora'e le' pada' murite. "Guru," jie sidoe, "noe menduli peh kau ken diret na' mati lomas tue?"
41004039	Jedi Yesus pun bengki', lalu nonga' nedoh buwowe nyeh. Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' gelumang, "Jediam! Ngomas die!" Lalu sap! tedoham buwowe, gelumang pun ngomasam, tenángam lompoe nyeh.
41004040	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' murite, "Gopai go kam gola'? Cum peh kepecayo kam?" jie Yesus.
41004041	Pie sidoe mat gupoham, lalu jie nyingka' betore, "Sopai nin beh máte reng tue," jie, "go buwowe ken pada' gelumang pun na'e tuno' taalo' ke' iyo?" jie sidoe.
41005001	Dah nyoe Yesus ken murite mat detang ke' seborang Lompoe Galilea nun, ke' nenggeri reng Gerasa.
41005002	Lalu Yesus pun nayi' ke' derat. Tumas nayi' ke' derat tei' temosie dipanu le' siko' reng lelaki yeng kesarong setan, detang deri pada' tama'.
41005003	Go reng kesarong setan nyeh nan serarat mokap di tama' nyem. Cum siko' pun reng tawu ngukohe, na' masonge ken rantai bosi pun.
41005004	Puwas dah reng masong kaki jerie ken rantai bosi pun, pie iyo nan ngeroso nyem, rantai bosi pun petelunting. Urang nyeh paling kuwat, noe tawu reng dah ngukohe.
41005005	Jedi milang ari siyang malam betatap begoyap nyem gewaie, pai noe deng tama', pai noe deng buki'. Sampai betentureh direte ken betu pun, ken bepangkas kayis.
41005006	Jedi mátam. Dah Yesus nayi' ke' derat tei' reng nyoe gei' di jewoh nun, pie tumas iyo merati Yesus tei' lintus bebodap manu ke' Yesus, lalu belutut di adap Yesus.

41005008	Jedi jie Yesus, "Pamusam, setan, deri reng tue." Pie temosie setan nyeh mangkas kayis, "Yesus, Ana' Allah yeng rajo kuwaso! Nang ngaru aku! Besumpaham ke' Allah kei kau noe mempungah aku," jie setan nyeh.
41005009	Jedi Yesus betanyoe, "Sopai demo kau?" Samute, "Demo ku Bereribu, tam kami pun benya'."
41005010	Lalu setan nyeh pun simah minta' gei' iyo noe ditunong ke' jewoh, ke' nenggeri layin.
41005011	Jedi poe di natai soma' sidoe tei' do pada' kaban bebi yeng diingún, yeng nyungkal dinyoe.
41005012	Lalu jie pada' setan nyingka' Yesus, "Tunong ja'," jie, "kami ke' kaban bebi dinun, gei' kami nyarong ke' bebi," jie.
41005013	Jedi mat borie le' Yesus, ma'am, jie. Lalu mat peketocus pada' setan keluwar deri reng nyoe, nyarong ke' pada' bebi die. Temosie pada' bebi nyeh pegerudus! ngerurus kenaming tingie nyeh bung! ngencabur ke' ayie, lalu mati lomas. Pemenya' bebi nyeh tei' do duwo ribu ko'.
41005014	Dah nyoe pada' penungu bebi nyeh lintus rariam, lalu bepadah ke' ulu ke' ilie di kampong di pedukoh, ngenggesah bebi nyeh mati. Lalu pada' reng rami pun bejejiyoh manu merati kinun,
41005015	bekumpol ke' soma' Yesus. Diperati le' pada' sidoe tei' reng yeng tadie kesarong pada' setan, pie tue temosie dudo' tetugu ponyoam. Iyo bepekakas po reng selomoam, kengkajie pun dah mencono dah jum. Gola'am pada' reng rami meratie.
41005016	Lalu diceritoe le' reng yeng meratie tadie ponyoe pai yeng tejedi ke' reng kesarong setan, ken pada' bebi nyeh.
41005017	Dah ningo gesah nyoe pada' reng rami pun muhún mampal ke' Yesus gei' Yesus rariam deri nyoe, nang na' diyam di kampong sidoe.
41005018	Lalu mátam. Yesus mat nayi' ke' lem perawu agei'am, na' ningal arong nyoe. Lalu reng bokas kesarong setan muhúnam ke' Yesus, na' tamah jum.
41005019	Pie didahe le' Yesus. Jie Yesus, "Kau noe sa' tamah aku," jie. "Kau ca' pulang ke' waris wala' kawum kerabat kau," jie, "bepadah ke' sidoe gewai Allah Tuwowe kau nyo' kau, ken madah ke' sidoe caro Sen ngaseh nulong kau," jie Yesus.
41005020	Ningo paner Yesus bungi nyoe tei' reng bokas kesarong setan mat turunam, lalu bejelan betatap di seruroh peloya' kelompok kota yeng demoe Sepuloh Kota. Iyo beagah beawoh ken gesah direte dipebeyi' le' Yesus. Kangápam pada' reng yeng ningoe.
41005021	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yesus nayi' ke' perawu nyeh lalu nyemorang lompoe agei'am. Dah detang ke' seborang, dah nayi' ke' derat tei' dah nyoe mat bederum pada' reng rami bekumpol ngeliling iyo di pantai lompoe nyeh.
41005022	Dah nyoe iyo dipanu le' siko' pemimpin umát reng Yahudi yeng bedemo Yairus. Dah Yairus merati Yesus tei' iyo belutut di adap Yesus,
41005023	simah muhún mampal minta' tulong Yesus. "Tulong ge' aku tue," jie. "Go ana' kekaseh ku saki'; mat ngatam penguyohe. Minta' kau manu ke' rumah aku, nyo' kau nigue iyo, gei' penyaki'e beyi', gei' iyo idup," jie.
41005024	Lalu mátam, Yesus mat namah Yairus nuju ke' rumahe. Ken pada' reng rami pun ngenjurut jum, mat besesenét begegepet ngeliling Yesus.
41005025	Jedi di antaro pada' reng rami nyeh do siko' reng betinoe yeng saki'; penyaki'e tei' nan detang bulan noe berenti-renti; dah duwo belas tawun dah pelamate iyo ngidape.
41005026	Iyo dah puwas ngerudu betentamo ke' benya' dokter (yeng bemacam bejenis pada' tentamo nyeh), sampai beabis-abis pada' reto benoe pun. Pie jewoh na' beyi'; malah ken paie kin uyoh-uyoham penyaki'e.
41005027	Iyo tei' dah ningo dah agah berito ke' hal kuwaso Yesus, mangko iyo mat manu ke' Yesus deri belekange, belelinong di penenongah pada' reng rami nyeh, lalu ditigue beju jubah Yesus.
41005028	Go kajie lem atie nun, "Mun aku nigue bejue pun beyi'am penyaki' ku," kajie nun. Lalu mat ditigue.
41005029	Tumas iyo nigue beju Yesus tei' temosie beyi'am; noam iyo bederah agei'. Iyo pun terasoe ken penyaki' di tubohe dah noam dah.
41005030	Jedi tumas iyo ditigue tei' Yesus pun tawue ken do kuwasoe yeng keluwar deri direte nyo' ngembeyi' urang. Lintus iyo bepusing belekang lalu betanyoe ke' pada' reng rami, "Sopai beh," jie, "yeng nigue beju ku?" jie.
41005031	Pie samut pada' murite tei', "Konai kau na' betanyoe sopai yeng nigue beju kau, guruei? Perati beh pada' reng rami tue, mat besesenét begegepet ngeliling kau!"
41005032	Pie Yesus si teger ngelinga' ke' kiboe kanáne na' merati sopai yeng nigue iyo tadie ponyoe.
41005033	Dah nyoe reng betinoe tei' tawue ken yeng dimaksut Yesus tei' mat iyoam, go iyo tawu ken iyo dah beyi', mangko iyo mat begegar begitikam manu ke' Yesus, lalu tepesungkur di adape, ngangkue madah semuya'e ke' Yesus.
41005034	Ningo panere bungi nyoe tei' dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Sukoram, buei*; penyaki' den beyi' pun tam den pecayo ken kuwaso aku," jie. "Kiroe den serarat sehat segaram; penyaki' den pun cumam mulang agei'," jie Yesus.
41005035	Jedi ketengah Yesus gei' ngomóng ken reng betinoe nyeh tei' do reng yeng detang deri rumah pemimpin umát tadie, bepadah ken ana'e dah mati dah. "Cum dah gunoe na' ngamoh ngalut guru nyeh," jie sidoe.
41005036	Pie Yesus si noe menduli omóng sidoe. Malah ken paie iyo bepadah ke' pemimpin umát nyeh, "Noe sa' kau gedoham, beh? Mutuam kau pecayo ken aku," jie.
41005037	Iyo pun nyuroh reng layin noe sa' ngenjurut iyo, cuwali Petrus, Yakobus ken Yohanes, menyadie Yakobus nyeh. Lalu sidoe manseh nuju ke' rumah pemimpin umát.
41005038	Jedi dah detang ke' rumah pemimpin umát tei' diperatie tei' dah iroh dah reng dinun, pada' reng rami dah perengkawung betetangis.
41005039	Yesus si tamoe ke' rumah nyeh lalu jie nyingka' reng nangis nyeh, "Nyeh gopai go kam perengkawung iroh potue? Ana' biya' nyeh bede ke' mati; iyo tidor nyem," jie Yesus.
41005040	Pie pada' reng rami nyeh diketawoe nyem paner Yesus, diolo'-olo'e. Dah nyoe pada' reng rami nyeh disuroh Yesus keluwar. Dah disurohe keluwar tei' lalu ino' apa' ana' biya' nyeh ken murite tigo ko' yeng namahe tei' dibeyie Yesus ke' delam, ke' ketidor ana' biya' nyeh te'.
41005041	Dah tamoe ke' delam tei' dah nyoe Yesus ngenjepai ngangki' jeri ana' biya' nyeh, lalu jie Yesus nyingka'e lem paner direte*, "Talita kum!" jie. Retie tei', "Bengki'am, tung."
41005042	Tumas bungi nyoe tei' ana' biya' nyeh pun keduwas bediri lintus bejejelan lem kamar nyeh. Mat tebelonga'am sidoe yeng meratie tei'. Ana' biya' nyeh tei' betinoe; umore duwobelas tawun.
41005043	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus tegasam nonga' sidoe; nang dipadah ke' hal iyo ngembeyi' ana'e nyeh ke' sopai pun, jie. Dah nyoe iyo nyuroh sidoe ngeleladen jolu kei sego nyo' ana' biya' nyeh te'.
41006001	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus pun turun deri nyoe lalu pulang ke' kampong direte.* Murite yeng tigo ko' nyeh ken pada' murite layin pun namahe kinun.
41006002	Jedi dah detang ke' kampong direte tei' dah ari Saptu* nyeh iyo ngajar di rumah semeyang reng Yahudi. Mat ramiam reng yeng ningo iyo ngajar nyeh te'; semuya' sidoe kangápam ningoe teruhale iyo reng dinyoam. "Dinai nin beh," jie sidoe, "iyo nomu pengentawu tokoh tue? Sampai mampu iyo ngajar Kitap Allah potue, ken mampu mulah pada' keenah keaneh yeng dipulahe di pada' kampong layin nyeh?
41006003	Teruhal iyo kin tukang kayu nyem; ino'e Maria, diret dituam. A, adei'e Yakobus ke' deng nyoam, demo ke' Yoses, Yudas ken Simon; kin reng dituam; a, ken menyadie betinoe pun gei' do jum ditue. Dinai iyo buleh pengentawu tokoh nyoe?" jie pada' reng rami nyeh. Sidoe mat risie nar ken iyo, ngei'e sidoe nerimoe iyo.
41006004	Lalu jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Reng penijum selomo nan dihormát diterimoe dinai-nai pun, cuwali di nenggeri direte. Pada' waris wala'e demo ke' pada' seberumahe pun mat ngei'e nerimoe ngehormát penijum deri kampong direte," jie Yesus.
41006005	Mangko tam iyo noe diterimoe dihormát le' sidoe mat nolehe iyo makai kuwasoe nyo' mulah keenah keaneh na' po yeng dipulahe di pada' kampong layin nyeh; ngat duwo tigo ko' reng nyem yeng disampange ken jerie, dipebeyi'e ke' penyaki'e.
41006006	Iyo pun paling eran ngaji pada' reng di kampong direte ngei'e pecayo. Jedi dah nyoe Yesus mat bekeliling bejelan betatap ngajar di pada' kampong halamán di peloya' nyoe.
41006007	Lalu iyo ngumpol murite yeng duwobelas ko' nyeh tei', dah nyoe diutuse kei nempoh nuju ke' pada' kampong layin. Sidoe disurohe turun duwo-duwo ko' seregu, ken dikuwasoe jum nyo' mampu nunong pada' setan.
41006008	-
41006009	Jedi sebolum sidoe turun tei' doam posan Yesus; bungie potue. "Kam pegi bejelan," jie, "noe sa' meyie bokal sangu makan udap, demo ke' pakai ingap, demo ke' uwang duwit, demo ke'... beban bereno; noe sa'am meyie bokal pai-pai pun, cuwali tungkat di jeri senal di kaki kam.
41006010	Mun kam diterimoe di rumah reng ca' antang tetap dinyoam, nang na' bepinah bealeh, sampai kam ningal kampong nyoe.
41006011	Mun do kampong yeng ngei'e nerimoe kam yeng kehe ningo kam si arong nyoe ca' ditingal kaliam. Pada' debu di senal kam pun ca' ditoguram dinyoe, gei' sempayo sidoe jelas ken dosoe," jie Yesus.
41006012	Jedi mátam. Keduwo belas ko' murit Yesus nyeh mat turunam, bekeliling bejelan betatap di pada' kampong halamán. Sidoe mat madah ke' pada' reng yeng ningoe nyurohe bebeta' piker ke' hal dosoe,
41006013	lalu nunong pada' setan, ken malet binya' ke' pada' reng saki' nyeh lalu ngembeyi'e.
41006014	Jedi mátam te'. Pengabise agah ke' hal pada' gewai Yesus ken murite didingo jum le' Rajo Herodes, go demo Yesus dah temensohor dah. (Pie mat beseliseham pada' kengkaji reng ke' hal Yesus nyeh te'). Do yeng ngajie iyo Yohanes Penyolam yeng jie sidoe gola' disuroh Allah bengki' idup agei'. Nyoam go iyo bekuwaso mulah keenah keaneh tokoh nyoe, jie reng.
41006015	A, do jum yeng ngajie ken iyo penijum Elia mie yeng dah detang agei', na' po yeng dijenyi Allah nyomie; ken do reng layin ngajie ken iyo mat penijum yeng beru, na' po pada' penijum nyomiam.
41006016	Pie lem kengkaji Rajo Herodes si Yesus tei' mat Yohanes Penyolam yeng disurohe dibunoh dipancong ke' kepaloe nyomie ponyoe. Mangko kaji Herodes nyeh pasti Yohanes Penyolam dah bengki' idup agei'am.
41006017	Go kin mat Rajo Herodesam nyomie yeng nyuroh Yohanes Penyolam ditangkap ken dipenjero, tam binie Herodias mat risie ken Yohanes. Jedi potue ne gesahe. Herodias kin asale bini adei' rajo Herodes yeng bedemo Pilipus, pie dah nyoe dirobute le' rajo.
41006018	Mangko rajo nan diperingát le' Yohanes tam iyo ngelangar ukum Allah go iyo ngerobut bini adei'e.
41006019	Ngaso ponyoe binie sie nar ken Yohanes. Kenaken si kona'e na' dibunohe kaliam, pie didah le' rajo.
41006020	Go rajo kin gola'e ken Yohanes, tam iyo tawu ken Yohanes reng bujor benar yeng diutus le' Allah*. Mangko Yohanes ditoyu diperintu le' rajo (di lem penjero, gei' noe dibunoh le' binie). Rajo tei' ayaham ningo Yohanes ngajar, numo' pun pemikere kalut tobang tober des iyo ningoe.
41006021	Jedi mátam. Poe lamat belamat nyeh mat do kelorong panci nyo' binie Herodias nuntong arau amue, ketiko ari ulang tawun rajo nyeh. Jedi dah ari ulang tawune tei' pada' wakel rajo ken pada' komanan tentara ken pada' reng lelaki yeng tekemuko di Galilea nyeh mat diunang diamie rajo nyo' ngadap pesta ulang tawune.
41006022	Jedi ketengah sidoe bepesta tei' ana' Herodias yeng dero nyeh ngadap sidoe jum, lalu bejoget. Mat paling ayaham Rajo Herodes ken pada' reng yeng diunange meratie. Jedi ngaso ponyoe tei' lalu jie rajo nyingka'e, "Jolu pai pun yeng kau pinta' ke' aku, noe ku ngidahe," jie.
41006023	Sampai besesumpaham Rajo Herodes nyeh, "Jolu pai pun yeng kau pinta' ke' aku pasti ku unyo'e, kepa' begi duwo reto beno jento keraja' ku," jie rajo.
41006024	Mangko ana' Herodias yeng bejoget tadie pamus manu ke' ino'e, lalu betanyoe. "Jolu pailah yeng ca' ku pinta'?" jie. Samut ino'e, "Ca' minta' kepalo Yohanes Penyolam," jie.
41006025	Ningo panere bungi nyoe tei' ana'e pun copat bebeli' manu ke' rajo. Lalu jie nyingka' rajo, "(Jolu layin cum ku minta'," jie.) "Unyo' ja' ke' aku kepalo Yohanes Penyolam, dibeyie kitue ke' lem talam. Na' tuam to'," jie.
41006026	Ningo omónge bungi nyoe tei' Rajo Herodes nyeh sap! susaham atie, (mat kesalam ken jenyie tadie), pie entam dah telampoh besesumpah di adap pada' reng diunang nyeh kajie mat noe tawu na' ngela'e.
41006027	Mangko iyo mat nyuroh serededue yeng siko' nyo' ngamie kepalo Yohanes. Serededue pun mat lintus ke' penjero, nu-kong kepalo Yohanes,
41006028	dah nyoe iyo bebeli' ke' rajo nyenting talam yeng bisei' kepalo Yohanes nyeh. Dah dibeyie ke' pesta nyeh mat diunyo'e ke' ana' Herodias. Iyo pun ngunyo'e ke' ino'e.
41006029	Dah ningo agah nyoe tei' lalu pada' murit Yohanes manu ke' penjero ngamie bengkaie, dah nyoe dipasare di guwo. (Jedi mátam, ningo agah ke' hal Yesus tadie ponyoe mangko kaji Rajo Herodes nyeh Yesus mat Yohanes Penyolam yeng dah mati bengki' idup agei'am.)
41006030	Jedi mátam te'. Dah nyoe pada' pelantar posan Yesus yeng diutuse bejelan betatap ke' pada' kampong layin nyomie ponyoe tei' mat pulang agei' ke' Yesus. Sidoe bekumpol ngeliling Yesus lalu bepadah ken semuya' yeng digewaie ken diajare lem pejelane.
41006031	Pie di arong nyoe nan bisei' urang yeng pulang mansang tamoe pamus; mat cum berudu sunyei'. Sampai Yesus sidoe noe sompate makan pun. Jedi ngaso ponyoe tei' jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Yo' diret bangam ngaleh ja' ngogoe arong sunyei', nyo' kam berenti lo'e," jie.
41006032	Lalu sidoe mat nayi' perawu na' ngogoe arong sunyei' kit; yeng nayi' tei' Yesus ken pada' murite bangam.
41006033	Pie reng yeng merati sidoe turun tei' mat tekenale ken sidoe, lalu pada' reng rami deri pada' kampong di peloya' nyoe bederumam bebodap manu ke' arong yeng dituju le' Yesus sidoe, sampai reng rami nyeh dolu detang deri Yesus sidoe pun.
41006034	Jedi dah detang ke' derat tei' diperati Yesus tei' mat ramiam pada' mensiyo yeng dah bekumpol dinyoe. Kaseham Yesus meratie, go sidoe mat keedah pada' domo yeng cum penungue. Lalu Yesus pun mulai ngajar reng rami dinyoe. Lamatam iyo ngajar sidoe.*
41006035	Jedi dah ujong ari ponyoe pada' murite pun manu ngomóng ken Yesus. "Arong tue mat jewoh nar ken pada' kampong, ari pun dah na' malam dah," jie.
41006036	"Boh kau nyuroh reng rami tue bepulang-pulang moli jolu kei sego ke' pada' pedukoh ken pada' kampong loboh nun, semadie gola' sidoe mampu molie. Go ditue kin mat cumam jolue," jie murite.
41006037	Pie samut Yesus, "Boh kamam ngunyo'e jolu kei sego," jie. Samut murite tei', "Nyeh ca' kami peh bejelan betatap ke' kampong ngogoe jolu kei sego reng menya' tue?" jie. "Koti nin beh. Jolu ge' nyo' reng menya' tue ento' moli roti ja' ca' duwo ratus bingkap duwit perak*," jie murite.
41006038	Lalu jie Yesus, "Nyeh roti yeng do di kam si pai pemenya'e? Pantauam lo'e." Dah dipantau sidoe tei', dah nyoe dipadahe ke' Yesus. "Do roti limo gie ken ikan duwo ko'," jie sidoe.
41006039	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus nyuroh pada' reng rami dudo' begerumpok-gerumpok, di arong yeng berumput panci.
41006040	Reng rami pun mat dudo' panci, do yeng 50 ko' segerumpok, do yeng 100 ko' segerumpok.
41006041	Jedi dah reng dudo' panci tei' dah nyoe Yesus ngamie roti limo gie ken ikan duwo ko' nyeh tadie, lalu iyo nenguwa' nengkadah ke' serugo, besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Apa'e, dah nyoe roti nyeh dipocahe, diunyo'e ke' murite gei' dibilinge ke' reng rami. Ponyoe jum ken ikan duwo ko' nyeh te', mat dibecar-becare jum ke' segonáp urang.
41006042	Pada' reng rami mat makan sekonyáng poruteam.
41006043	Dah nyoe pada' murit Yesus ngumpol kesiso kepocah roti ken ikan nyeh. Dah dikumpole tei' poe gei' do duwobelas taya' ponoh agei', kesisoe.
41006044	Sedang reng rami yeng makan tei' ento' reng lelaki tuwo ja' reng limo ribu ko'.
41006045	Jedi mátam. Dah ngumpan reng rami tei' Yesus pun nyuroh murite lintus nayi' perawu yeng tadie nyo' nyemorang ke' kampong Betsaida nun lo'e, nyo' bejenjuwong ken iyo dinun kaloe ponyoe, jie. Iyo si gei' dudi, jie, go iyo gei' na' nyuroh pada' reng rami pulang ke' arong direte lo'e.
41006046	Jedi mátam. Dah bepencar ken reng rami tei' Yesus pun mendeki natai nyeh ento' bedoa.
41006047	Jedi dah malam tei' perawu yeng bisei' pada' murite tadie ponyoe detang di penenongah lompoe. Yesus si gei' tingal bedireteam di derat.
41006048	Diperati Yesus sidoe tei' belelah bejoreham ngendeyong perawue go ditempoh buwowe ontapam. Jedi dah dini ari ponyoe tei' Yesus pun bejelan di atas ayie manu ke' sidoe. Dah detang ke' soma' perawu nyeh tei' iyo tei' na' lalu nyem,
41006049	-
41006050	pie diperati pada' murite iyo bejelan di atas ayie. Tekeraya'am sidoe, menciya', mangkas, tam kegola'e; kaji sidoe iyo tei' antu. Pie Yesus lintus ngomóng ken sidoe, "Tenángam kam! Akuam to'! Nang na' gola', kamei," jie.
41006051	Dah nyoe iyo pun nayi' ke' lem perawu to' namah sidoe. Dah iyo nayi' tei' semorie sap! angín pun tedoham. Pada' murite pun tebelonga' tebelokam merati kuwasoe nyuroh angín tedoh ponyoe.
41006052	Go sidoe mat noe jelase ken kuwaso Yesus, numo' pun gei' berue sidoe merati yeng digewai Yesus ke' hal roti tadie ponyoe. Ati sidoe gei' tupalam.
41006053	Jedi mátam te'. Dah detang ke' seborang tei' sidoe betamat di pantai Genesaret. Perawu sidoe dikukoh dinyoe.
41006054	Tumas sidoe nayi' ke' derat tei' reng dinyoe mat tekenale ken Yesus.
41006055	Ngaso ponyoe sidoe bederum bebodap bejelan betatap bepadah ke' seruroh peloya' nyoe. Lalu dinai reng ningo agah awoh Yesus do nyeh dinyoe pada' reng yeng saki' poníng rodang rungue nyeh ditangong reng di co' tikare, dibeyie ke' Yesus.
41006056	Kinai Yesus bejelan kinyoam reng meyie pada' reng saki' nyeh, ke' deng pedukoh, ke' deng kampong loboh, ke' deng nai-nai pun, reng saki' nyeh mat dibeyie, diongkah reng di penenongah kampong gei' penyaki'e dipebeyi' le' Yesus. Sidoe muhún mampal mun borie Yesus sidoe na' nigue samang beju jubahe nyem. Go sopai ja' yeng nigue nyeh pun penyaki'e mat beyi'am.
41007001	Jedi dah nyoe do reng deri kelompok Parisi demo ke' pada' ugar agama Yahudi layin yeng detang deri kota Yerusalem, manu na' betomu ken Yesus.
41007002	Lalu diperati le' sidoe tei' murit Yesus paroe do yeng makan ken jerie yeng cemar. Sidoe noe ngerinah adat pemeso' nunoe caro setilah pada' sidoe kelompok Parisi, mangko diangape cemar.
41007003	Go reng Yahudi, semingkin reng Parisi nyeh cum makan cuwali bebeso' lo'e caro teliti nar nunoe adat setilah geyamo akei' puyange.
41007004	A, detang belenyo pun pada' jolu kei sego nyeh nan ca' dikerinah pakai adat pemeso' lo'e, berue disego. Paling benya' setilah geyamo bukan layin, keturun deri akei' puyange, yeng ditunoe sidoe. Demo ke' beso' pemeso' pada' cawan, demo ke' pada' tomóng, demo ke' pada' pekakas temego opai pun.
41007005	Jedi ngaso murit Yesus noe nunoe setilah bebeso' tei' lalu jie pada' ugar agama nyingka' Yesus, "Ngopai," jie, "pada' murit kau makan ken jeri cemar? Ngopai go sidoe ngei'e nunoe setilah geyamo akei' puyang diret?" jie.
41007006	Jie Yesus nyamut sidoe, "Kam," jie, "mat alap-alape nyem nyomah ke' Allah! Mat konoe nar tijum Yesaya mie ke' hal kam nyeh. Go pemadah Allah ke' penijum Yesaya mie bungie potue, Reng tue mugi Aku di bibere nyem, pie atie rangang ken Aku, jie Sen.
41007007	"Sidoe nyomah ke' Aku pun caro memuloe nyem, go sidoe ngajar pada' pelator direte, seolah-olah pelator pemadah Aku,* jie Allah. "Mat konoe nar tijum Yesaya mie.
41007008	"Go kam," jie Yesus, "pemadah Allah kam pelene nyem, pie paling patoh ken setilah geyamo mensiyo."
41007009	Dah nyoe iyo manseh nyamong panere. "Kam," jie, "mat panai nar nangkis pemadah Allah kelakar kei kam ngukoh ke' setilah mensiyo nyem.
41007010	"Contoh caro kam nangkis pemadah Allah nyeh potue," jie Yesus. "Kin jie ukum Allah yeng dipadah ke' Musa nyeh ino' apa' diret ca' dihormát. Ge'em jie Sen sopai ja' yeng menghina ngeremeh ino' apa'e ca' diukum mati," jie Yesus.
41007011	"Pi kam si layin nar ajar kam. Go jie kam mun reng keh nulong ino' apa'e iyo ca' madah pada' jolue korban ja', maksute dah diajen nyo' Allah. Lalu mat cum iyo nulong ino' apa'e.
41007012	Dah jolue dipadahe korban si kam pemimpin ngidahe nulong ino' apa'e pun.
41007013	Ponyoam kam nangkis ngela' deri ukum Allah, sampai yeng deri Allah noe pakai, kelakar kei kam ngeyakin setilah geyamo mensiyo nyem. Benya' ye' macam contohe gewai kam tokoh nyoe, noe iyo semacamam kejedie," jie Yesus.
41007014	Dah nyoe Yesus ngumpol reng rami, lalu bekato ke' sidoe, "Dingo beh kam rami," jie, "itongam pemadah ku tue.
41007015	Noe iyo jolu disego peh yeng kei ngencelo mensiyo di adap Allah. Pie yeng ngencelo mensiyo di adap Allah nyeh ya'am omóng tutore yeng jat, yeng terobi' deri atie," jie Yesus. [
41007016	"Semuya' segeno, kelinang mat ca' ningoam," jie.]
41007017	Dah nyoe iyo ningal pada' reng rami, tamoe ke' lem rumahe. Lalu ditanyoe le' murite pai retie perbesoe tadie.
41007018	"Wai, pengaji kam gei' tupal jum, poe. Noe tawu kam peh ken perbeso ku tadie?" jie Yesus. "Jedi maksut perbeso ku tadie," jie, "noe iyo jolu disego peh yeng ngencelo mensiyo di adap Allah.
41007019	Go jolu disego noe iyo tamoe ke' lem ati peh, pie tamoe ke' lem porut lalu keluwar nyem," jie Yesus. Maksut Yesus bungi nyoe tei' iyo madah ken semuya' jolu kei sego beyi' bangam, cum yeng mali, cum yeng ngencelo diret.
41007020	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Yeng ngencelo mensiyo di adap Allah," jie, "yeng tumoh deri atie nun.
41007021	Go deri ati mensiyo terobi' pada' pengaji yeng jat. Nyoam bungkong pada' kebeyat mensiyo yeng jat, demo ke' ngeroyal, demo ke' maling, demo ke' munoh betor, demo ke' butang beonga',
41007022	demo ke' ramang di mato, demo ke' ngelakar, demo ke' idup merajo lelo, demo ke' dengki, demo ke' maner ngendongéng, demo ke' somong, demo ke' noe tawu mileh jat ken panci, demo ke'...pada' kebeyat jat bemacam bejenis pun.
41007023	Pada' gewai tokoh nyoe kin bungkonge ati mensiyo, deri pemikere nun; nyoam yeng kei ngencelo mensiyo di adap Allah. Noe iyo jolu deri luwar peh," jie Yesus.
41007024	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus turun deri nyoe bejelan ke' ateh kota Tirus. Dah detang kinun iyo numpang di rumah reng. (Maksut iyo tei' na' mokap dinyoe bedireteam lo'e); kona' ati iyo gei' reng rami nyeh noe tawu ken iyo do dinyoe, pie mat noleh na' betapo'.
41007025	-
41007026	Malah ken paie iyo lintus dipanu le' siko' reng betinoe yeng ana'e* kesarong setan. Reng betinoe nyeh tei' reng Yunani, asale deri peloya' Penisia di nenggeri Siria. Noe iyo reng Yahudi peh. Jedi dah reng betinoe nyeh ningo ken Yesus do dinyoe tei' iyo pun lintus manu ke' Yesus, lalu tepesungkur di adape, muhún mampal ke' Yesus gei' iyo nunong setan nyeh deri ana'e.
41007027	Pie Yesus nyamute pakai pantun perbeso. Jedi jie Yesus, "Mat noe patutam mun jolu to' sego ana' biya' nyeh pie dirobut diunyo' ke' ana' kudo'. Kin ana' biya' yeng ca' diumpan dolu," jie perbeso Yesus.
41007028	"Nyoe mátam, Tuwowei," jie reng betinoe nyeh. "Pie ana' kudo' ge'e, gei' do nyego pelamur ana' biya' nyeh," jie.
41007029	Samut Yesus, "Tepatam penyamut kau tei'. Mangko doam ku nuntong yeng kau pinta' tadie; setan nyeh dah ditunongam deri ana' kau. Bom kau na' pulang pun," jie.
41007030	Lalu reng betinoe nyeh mat pulangam. Dah detang ke' rumahe tei' diperatie ana'e tei' mat ngalai panci di pempangong; mat noam iyo dikesarong setan agei'; dah rari dah.
41007031	Dah nyoe Yesus ningal ateh Tirus bejelan ngelalu ateh Sidon, niti jelan yeng ngerudu peloya' Sepuloh Kota, sampai detang ke' daerah Lompoe Galilea.
41007032	Dinyoe do reng manu ke' iyo meyie reng bisue. Sidoe muhún mampal gei' Yesus nyampang jerie ke' reng bisue nyeh te', gei' penyaki'e beyi'.
41007033	Jedi reng bisue nyeh tei' ditaban Yesus ke' pinger kit, jewoh kit ken reng rami, dah nyoe tunyo'e dicuco'e ke' kelinang reng bisue nyeh. Dah nyoe iyo ngelujah ke' tunyo' direte, lalu tunyo'e yeng dilujahe tei' ditigue ke' lidah reng bisue nyeh te'.
41007034	Dah nyoe iyo nengkadah ke' serugo lalu menderam, lalu jie nyingka' reng bisue lem paner direte*, "Epata!" Retie tei' "Tekoba'am!"
41007035	Tumas Yesus ngomóng bungi nyoe tei' kelinang reng bisue nyeh mat bepeningoam; lidahe pun mengkipatam; uleheam iyo bepaner panci.
41007036	Jedi dah ngembeyi' reng nyoe Yesus pun nonga' sidoe ngenggesah ke' hal iyo ngembeyi'e, nang na' diagah diawoh ke' sopai pun. Pie kebelike semingkin dikedidahe le' Yesus semingkin diagah diawoh dibeba' dibekau le' sidoe rami nyeh.
41007037	Go pada' reng rami mat ngatam pengerane. "Mat panci nar semuya' gewai reng tue," jie sidoe ke' hal Yesus. "Sampai nyuroh reng bisue tawue dah ngomóng; kelinang reng bengal pun mampu ningo," jie sidoe.
41008001	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe noe dam lamat nyeh sekali agei'am do pada' reng rami bekumpol ngenjurut Yesus. Lamat belamat nyeh bokal sidoe pun bis dah. Jedi Yesus ngumpol pada' murite, lalu jie Yesus,
41008002	"Kaseh ku," jie, "ngaji pada' reng rami tue; dah tigo ari sidoe ngenjurut ningo pemadah aku. Pada' bokale pun bis dah.
41008003	Pie ku noe nyamán ati ku na' nyuroh sidoe pulang gei' lapar porute. Ngorie ku gola' do yeng pisan di tongah jelan, go separoe kin mat detang deri jewoham," jie Yesus.
41008004	Samut murite tei', "Pi diret tue jewoh ken kampong," jie, "di padang sunyei' tue. Konai na' moli roti cukup nyo' reng menya' tue di arong sunyei' potue?" jie.
41008005	"Nyeh pai menya' roti kam?" jie Yesus. Samut sidoe tei', "Gei' tujoh gie agei'."
41008006	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus nyuroh pada' reng rami nyeh dudo'. Dah dudo' tei' diamie le' Yesus roti yeng tujoh gie nyeh. Dah diamie lalu iyo bedoa beterimoe kaseh ke' Allah. Dah bedoa tei' roti nyeh dipocahe, lalu dibecare ke' pada' murite gei' dibilinge, lalu mat dibilingam le' pada' murite ke' reng rami.
41008007	Jedi poe do jum ikan kekocit siko' duwo; lalu Yesus beterimoe kaseh tam ikan nyeh jum, dah nyoe disurohe dibiling jum ke' pada' reng rami te'.
41008008	Dah dibilinge tei' pada' reng rami pun mat makan sekonyáng-konyángeam. Jedi dah reng makan tei' dikumpoleam le' murit Yesus kelobeh kepocah roti ken ikan nyeh. Kekumpol kelobehe tei' do tujoh taya' agei' yeng ponoh.
41008009	Sedang pemenya' reng* yeng do dinyoe empat ribu ko' ke' deng nyoe. Jedi mátam. Dah pada' reng rami makan tei' dah nyoe mat disuroh Yesus pulang.
41008010	Dah nyoe iyo ken pada' murite nayi' perawu pegi ke' ateh Dalmanuta.
41008011	Jedi dah nyoe do deri kelompok reng Parisi yeng manu ke' Yesus, na' becencugeh ken iyo. Sidoe na' ngendugo Yesus, mangko sidoe nyurohe mulah keenah keaneh kei ngembokti ke' sidoe ken kuwasoe mat deri Allahei noei.
41008012	Susaham Yesus (ngaji ati sidoe yeng koring tokoh nyoe;) mat ngeloham, sampai menderam. Lalu jie Yesus, "Konai pada' kam jemán tue gei' minta' na' merati keenah keaneh?" jie Yesus. "Pie nyamán kam ngajie," jie, "cumam ku mulah petanah petano pai-pai pun nyo' kam. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei," jie.
41008013	Dah nyoe iyo ningal sidoe, nayi' perawu nyeh agei'am, lalu nyemorang ke' seborang nun.
41008014	Jedi mátam. Murit Yesus tadie ponyoe kelupoe meyie bokale nyo' di tongah jelan; tingal ge' sigie dam rotie; mat cum bokale layin di lem perawu nyeh te'.
41008015	Jedi dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Awas beh kam!" jie. "Kam ca' ati-ati gola' kam tepalet pengemang roti deri reng Parisi ken pengemang roti Herodes," jie.
41008016	Lalu sidoe betentanyoe beruning (pado sidoe, pai nin beh retie, jie, omóng Yesus ke' hal pengemang roti nyeh). "Engo ku gola' ke' nyiner hal roti nyeh tam bokal roti diret dah cum dah," jie sidoe.
41008017	Yesus pun tawue ken omóng sidoe, dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Nyeh gopai go kam manseh kamoh ke' hal roti, do cum nyeh? Gei' bolum jelas peh kam (ken kuwaso aku)? Bolum tetangkap peh kam? Gei' tupal peh ati kam?" jie Yesus.
41008018	"Mato kam si do, pie poe noe awas; a, ken kelinang kam pun do, pie poe noe ningo," jie. "Nyeh dah kelupo kam dah peh yeng digewai ku tadie?
41008019	Cubo ge' kam ngajie. Des ku mocah roti limo gie nyo' ku ngumpan reng limo ribu ko' mie, gei' pai taya' agei' kelobehe kam ngumpol kesisoe?" jie Yesus. Samut sidoe, "Gei' duwo belas taya' agei'," jie.
41008020	"A, des ku mocah roti yeng tujoh gie nyeh, nyo' ku ngumpan reng empat ribu ko' nyeh, gei' pai taya' agei' kelobehe, des kam ngumpol kesisoe?" jie Yesus. Samut sidoe, "Gei' tujoh taya' agei'."
41008021	Lalu jie Yesus, "Pie manseh gei' bolum jelas peh kam? Ku ngomóng ke' hal roti tadie bedeke' ku kamoh tam cum beroti," jie Yesus. "Nyoe perempamo ku nyem," jie.
41008022	Jedi dah Yesus sidoe detang ke' Betsaida tei' do reng yeng meyie reng butoe manu ke' Yesus, maksute na' minta' gei' ditigue le' Yesus gei' penyaki'e beyi'.
41008023	Lalu Yesus ngenjepai jeri reng butoe nyeh, lalu ngiringe ke' luwar kampong nyeh. Dah nyoe iyo ngelujah ke' mato reng butoe nyeh, lalu ngenculet matoe. Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Awas lum kau merati jolu?"
41008024	Reng butoe pun ngeleng ke' kiboe ke' kanán. "Awas," jie. "Pie ne," jie, "pada' kayu nyeh bejelan. Engo ku mensiyo," jie.
41008025	Dah nyoe Yesus ngenculet matoe agei'am. Dah diculete tei' lalu mato reng butoe nyeh mat mencinángam, mat awaseam ken jolu, mat moncas nar pemantaue te'.
41008026	Dah nyoe Yesus pun nyuroh reng bokas butoe nyeh pulangam, nang na' bebeli' ke' kampong Betsaida kei bepadah ke' reng dinyoe, jie Yesus.
41008027	Jedi mátam. Yesus ken pada' murite ngelaju pejelane ke' pada' kampong di ateh Kaisarea Pilipi. Jedi di tongah jelan tei' dah nyoe Yesus betanyoe ke' murite. Jie Yesus, "Nyeh jie reng rami nyeh aku tue sopailah?" jie.
41008028	Samut sidoe, "Do reng yeng madah kau Yohanes Penyolam, gola' pai nawue tue iyo bengki' idup agei'. Do jum yeng madah kau penijum Elia mie yeng pulang ke' deniyo tue. Do jum yeng madah kau penijum yeng layin, yeng bengki' idup agei'," jie pada' murite.
41008029	"Nyeh mun jie kam," jie Yesus, "aku tue sopailah?" Samut Petrus, "Kau mat Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah," jie.
41008030	Lalu Yesus nonga' sidoe gei' sidoe nang na' madah ke' sopai pun ke' hal iyo.
41008031	Jedi betongai ari nyoe pun Yesus ngajar ke' murite ke' hal yeng ca' tejedi ken iyo. Go iyo yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo, jie, ca' benya' ngerudu kesensare. Cagare iyo ca' ditula' ditentang le' pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi, demo ke' pada' ketuwo pelayan, demo ke' pada' ugar agama pun. Sampai iyo, jie, mat ca' dibunoh, pie dah ari pengentigoe si iyo langko' bengki' idup agei'am, jie Yesus.
41008032	Iyo madahe ke' sidoe caro berojang lantas. Ningo paner Yesus bungi nyoe tei' Petrus pun ngaja' Yesus ke' pinger jelan. Lalu iyo nyacue Yesus jediam ngomóng tokoh nyoe madah ken iyo ca' mati.
41008033	Pie Yesus meruso' ke' Petrus, ngadap ke' pada' murite layin die, dah nyoe iyo nunong Petrus. "Rariam, Penggudo, deri tue," jie Yesus nyingka' Petrus. "Omóng kau bungi nyoe kengkaji mensiyo nyem, noe iyo deri Allah peh," jie Yesus.
41008034	Dah nyoe Yesus nyapo pada' reng rami ken pada' murite kei manu ke' soma' iyo nyo' ningo pemadahe. "Sopai ja' yeng na' menjedi murit aku," jie Yesus, "ca' ningal kepenting direte, ken ca' relo nangong salipe, disensare na' po aku disensare.
41008035	"Go reng yeng mementing keidup direte di deniyo tue si pengabise losi nayápam. Pie berang reng yeng noe mementing keidup direte ento' kei iyo mementing aku ken mementing agah panci ku si, reng nyoe tarah ke' tetomuam ke' idup yeng mat.
41008036	"Jedi nang na' salah pileh. Pai ge' keuntonge mun reng buleh pada' semuya' kekayo kesugeh di deniyo tue pie pengabise rohe losi nayápam? Nyoe kin ngerugi ngerusa' direteam.
41008037	Lalu mun na' nobus mensiyo yeng dah telampoh ngemboros keidupe nyo' kepenting direte kotilah? Pada' kekayo kesugehe pun noe ken cukup. Mat telampau dah.
41008038	"Paling jat pada' kam reng Yahudi lapis tue," jie Yesus. "Kam dah ningal Allah, na' po reng yeng noe mutu ken jodoe. "Mangko sopai ja' yeng ngei'e ngangkue aku ken ngei'e nerimoe pengajar ku tengkalo tue si," jie Yesus, "aku pun ngei' ku ngangkue iyo dah Ari Pengudah deniyo tue gi. Go aku yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo," jie Yesus, "mat langko' bebeli' agei' ke' deniyo tue, nyo' ku ngendecing pada' mensiyo. Kedetang aku gi mat agongam, bekuwaso, po Apa' ku yeng agong bekuwaso. Belo melekat yeng suci bereseh pun namah ku jum kei pelayan aku dah nyoe gi," jie Yesus. "Lalu sopai ja' yeng dah telampoh noe ngangkue aku," jie Yesus, "aku pun noe ku ngangkue iyo dah ku detang gi," jie.
41009001	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Separo kam yeng do ditue pun," jie, "mat langko' idup sampai kam dah merati ketongaie Allah disomah kei rajo, des kuwaso Sen mat nyatoam. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei," jie Yesus.
41009002	Jedi dah nyoe, dah nam ari ponyoe Yesus tei' ngaja' Petrus, Yakobus ken Yohanes nyo' namahe mendeki natai tingie. Dinyoe mat sunyei'am, ngat sidoe empat bangam. Jedi dah detang kinun tei' temosie upo Yesus berubah cayoe di adap sidoe.
41009003	Pekakase nyaca' nampa' bemalo puteh pepuwo. Mat cumam reng di deniyo tue yeng mampu nopas pekakas memuteh nyoe!
41009004	Tumas berubah cayo Yesus tei' temosie temeronyong penijum Elia ken Musa mie, ngomóng ken iyo di adap murite tigo ko'.
41009005	Dah nyoe jie Petrus, "Guru," jie, "untong naram soe go kami do ditue! Mun potue," jie, "koti mun kami mulah ponok tigo buwah nyo' nyomah deduwan; sebuwah nyo' kau, sebuwah nyo' Kei' Musa ken sebuwah nyo' Kei' Elia," jie Petrus.
41009006	Pie omónge bungi nyoe tei' semerang kecok sal keromus nyem, jera'e, noe tawu ca' koti omónge pun pelintang tam ati sidoe tigo nyeh mat gupoh nar.
41009007	Jedi kebonóng Petrus ngomóng tei' temosie sok! sidoe diserudong le' románg, dah nyoe do kedingo suwaro yeng bebungi deri lem románg. "Tuam ana' Ku yeng paling Ku kaseh," jie. "Dingoam kam pemadah iyo."
41009008	Dah nyoe temosie diperati sidoe tei' cum dah reng layin dinyoe; tingal siko' Yesus dam.
41009009	Jedi des turun deri natai nyeh Yesus bepadah ke' sidoe kei nang na' dipadah ke' urang jolu yeng diperati le' sidoe tadie. Mun iyo yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo bolum bengki' deri mati nyeh nang na' dipadah lo'e, yeng sidoe merati di natai nyoe, jie Yesus.
41009010	Sidoe pun bediyam, cum dipadahe ke' urang pun, pi nan diruning pado sidoe. "Pai ge' retie," jie, "reng bengki' deri mati?" jie.
41009011	Dah nyoe sidoe betanyoe ke' Yesus, "Kaji kami si na' nunoe jie pada' ugar agama nyeh sepatute penijum Elia ca' ngulu Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah. Pie perati kami," jie, "bolum do Kei' Elia detang ngelaju tugase na' po yeng ditijum mie," jie.
41009012	-
41009013	Samut Yesus, "Nyoe si mátam, kamei. Elia mat ca' dolu deri Kristus, nyo' iyo memanci semuya' segeloe. Pie yeng mat si Elia mat dah detang dah, kamei. Dah dituntong dah yeng ditulis di lem Kitap Allah nyomie ke' hal iyo. Pie reng noe tekenale ken iyo mat Elia. Jewoh na' tekenal, malah ken paie sidoe yeng jat pun dah mempungahe seukor kona' kemawo' atie ken iyo," jie Yesus. "A, tue," jie, "aku pun na' betanyoe ke' kam," jie Yesus. "Jedi mun semuya' segeloe dah dipepanci Yohanes Penyolam tei' engo kam gopai go jie lem Kitap Allah nyeh ken Ana' Mensiyo nyeh manseh ca' ngerudu kesensare, ca' dihina dikerisie reng? Boh kam ngajie," jie Yesus.
41009014	Jedi mátam. Yesus sidoe mat turun deri natai bebeli' ke' pada' murit layin nyeh. Dah detang ke' pada' murit layin nyeh perati sidoe pada' murit nyeh dikopong keliling pada' reng rami. Di antaro reng rami nyeh do pada' ugar agama yeng becencugeh ken murit Yesus.
41009015	Jedi dah pada' reng rami merati Yesus tei' mat eranam sidoe, lalu bebodap manu nyamut Yesus.
41009016	Jedi jie Yesus, "Nyeh jolu pai jolu dicencugeh kam?"
41009017	Lalu siko' reng di antaro pada' reng rami nyeh nyamute. "Guru," jie. "Ku tadie meyie ana' ku nyo' dipebeyi' le' kau. Penyaki'e kesarong setan yeng nyurohe bisue.
41009018	Des iyo menendetang nyeh tubohe terompas ke' tanah tam setan nyeh, nyawoe bepupue, gigie mengkeret, tubohe kojar korue. Jedi ngaso kau cum tadie aku nyuroh murit kau nunong setan nyeh, pie sidoe noe mampue," jie.
