41009019	"Paraham kam lapis tue," jie Yesus nyingka' pada' reng rami ken murite. "Dah lamat dah aku do ken kam pie manseh potuam ati kam, cumam kepecayo kam. Gei' paiam lamat agei' aku ca' nantie gei' ati kam berubah?" jie Yesus. Lalu dah iyo bungi nyoe dah nyoe jie nyingka' reng lelaki nyeh tei', "Tabanam kitue ana' kau," jie Yesus.
41009020	Lalu mat dibeyiam. Tumas setan nyeh merati Yesus tei' temosie ana' biya' nyeh tei' disurohe temengkoji kojar korue, lalu bap! terompas ke' tanah, bebering puting; nyawoe pun bepupue.
41009021	Jedi jie Yesus betanyoe ke' apa'e, "Nyeh dah pai lamat ana' biya' tue ngidape?" "Lamat dah! Deri kebiya'e miam," jie apa'e.
41009022	"Mat dah puwas dah setan nyeh ngensaronge lalu ngompase, pai noe ke' lem api, pai noe ke' lem ayie, na' munohe. Kiro kau mampu na' nyuroh kau die nulong kena' tue, gola' do kekaseh kau," jie apa'e.
41009023	Samut Yesus, "Nyeh gopai go jie kau kiro kau mampu? Ku si semuya' uleh semuya' mampu sal ge' reng pecayo," jie Yesus.
41009024	Lintus apa' ana' biya' nyeh pun ontap nyamut Yesus, "Ku pecayo, Tuwowei! Tulong ge' kepecayo ku yeng gei' malang tue," jie.
41009025	Jedi perati Yesus tei' kin benya'-benya' reng rami nyeh yeng bederum bebodap manu kinyoe, mangko iyo copat nunong setan nyeh te' (sebolum reng rami detang kinyoe). Jedi jie Yesus nyingka' setan nyeh, "Dingo beh setan, kau yeng nyuroh reng bisue nyeh," jie Yesus, "ku nyuroh kau rari deri reng tue. Jediam kau nyarong ke' iyo agei'," jie Yesus.
41009026	Tumas ningo omóng Yesus bungi nyoe tei' setan nyeh pun menciya'; ana' biya' pun menggelasar ugas ngatam pelelahe, dah nyoe pengabise setan nyeh mat rariam. Ana' biya' nyeh ngalai ngelelomaham, na' po bengkai reng matiam; mat benya'am reng yeng madah ken iyo dah mati dah.
41009027	Pie Yesus si ngenjepai jerie, lalu ngangki'e. Lalu mat bediriam ana' bujang nyeh te'.
41009028	Jedi dah Yesus nayi' ke' lem rumah nyeh, dah tingal iyo ken murite tei' dah nyoe ditanyoe le' murite. "Gopai nin," jie, "go kami tadie nunong setan nyeh, bolei'e?" jie.
41009029	Samut Yesus, "Setan yeng tokoh nyoe mat noe mampu ditunong modasam cuwali ken caro bedoa," jie.
41009030	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus ken murite ningal ateh nyoe, lalu bejelan ngerudu peloya' Galilea. Kona' iyo gei' reng rami noe tawu ken iyo do dinyoe,
41009031	go iyo na' ngajar murite duwo belas ko' bangam ke' hal iyo cagar na' mati. Jedi jie nyingka' murite, "Aku," jie, "yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo tue cagar diserah ke' pada' penguwaso, lalu sidoe pun langko' munoh aku. Ja'e dah tigo ari ponyoe si," jie, "aku bengki' idup agei'am."
41009032	Pada' murite si kangápam ningoe, pai ge' reti tijum Yesus nyeh, kajie nun, pie na' betanyoe ke' Yesus pun noe berenie.
41009033	Jedi Yesus tei' bejelan ken murite. Dah nyoe sidoe detang ke' kampong Kapernaum, lalu nayi' ke' rumah. Dah nayi' tei' lalu jie Yesus nyingka' murite, "Jolu pai," jie, "kam cencugeh di tongah jelan tadie?" jie Yesus.
41009034	Pie sidoe ngojap nyem, kehe sidoe madahe, tam sidoe becencugeh sopai yeng tingie sopai yeng beroh pangkate antaro sidoe.
41009035	Lalu Yesus pun dudo' dinyoe kei ngajar. "Dingo beh kam," jie nyingka' sidoe duwo belas. "Sopai ja' yeng na' tingie pangkate," jie, "iyo ca' ngenilai direte yeng paling beroh, ca' melayan semuya' pada' betor," jie Yesus.
41009036	Dah nyoe Yesus nyapo siko' ana' biya', disurohe bediri di adap sidoe, lalu dirangkue le' Yesus. Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe,
41009037	"Sopai ja' yeng nampan nerimoe begewol begelumo ken reng yeng beroh benso ana' biya' potue tam demo aku pun samoam ken iyo nampan nerimoe begewol begelumo ken aku, nilaie," jie Yesus. "Sedang sopai yeng nampan nerimoe begewol begelumo aku," jie, "samoam ken iyo nampan nerimoe begewol begelumo ken Apa' ku, go Sénam yeng ngutus aku," jie Yesus.
41009038	Jedi dah nyoe jie Yohanes, "Guru," jie. "Kami do merati reng siko' yeng nunong setan pakai demo kau, pie kami nonga'e, go iyo kin noe semurit ken kami," jie.
41009039	-
41009040	Pie samut Yesus, "Nang na' kam nonga'e," jie, "go sopai pun yeng noe belawan ken diret mat nulong diret. Mun reng mulah keenah keaneh pakai demo aku kin noe ken dah kaloe ponyoe iyo ngejat menghina aku die. Iyo kin nulong diret," jie Yesus.
41009041	"Ponyoe jum ken sopai pun yeng nulong kam tam kam engku aku. Biyar sikit pun iyo nulong kam, benso ngunyo' ayie insup secawan ja', pie mun digewaie tam kam engku aku Penulong yeng dijenyi Allah nyeh* si pasti diupah Allah gi. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei.
41009042	(Pie kebelike mun reng ngacau ngaru reng pecayo si ukume paling borat.) Numo' pun reng pecayo yeng paling beroh pun, pie mun do reng yeng ngacau ngarue mat paling borat ukume. Manseh nyamán ge' betu bosai ditamat ke' liyere lalu iyo dilojang ke' lem lawut, deripado iyo dibelas le' Allah tam iyo ngacau ngaru reng pecayo nyeh. ("Manseh nyamán sensare di deniyo tue deripado bepencar ken Allah gi.)
41009043	Mangko mun jeri kau yeng to' meyie kau bedoso si coh ge' jeri kau ditukong dibuwang kaliam. Go manseh nyamán idup begelumo ken Allah ken tuboh yeng timpang jerano deripado dilojang ke' lawut api yeng benyalo seora'-ora'eam ken tuboh kau yeng gei' pepak genáp. [
41009044	Go api dinyoe mat cum berudu padam, ken ulat yeng nyego isei' reng pun mat noe tawu konyáng.]
41009045	A, mun kaki kau to' meyie kau bedoso nyeh ponyoe jum, coh ge' kaki kau ditukong dibuwang kaliam. Manseh nyamán idup begelumo ken Allah ken kaki yeng timpang jerano deripado dilojang ke' lawut api ken tuboh kau yeng gei' pepak genáp. [
41009046	Go dinyoe api nyeh mat cum berudu padam, ken ulat yeng nyego isei' reng pun mat noe tawu konyáng.]*
41009047	A, mato pun ponyoe jum. Mun mato kau yeng to' meyie kau bedoso nyeh coh ge' dicungkit kaliam. Manseh nyamán tekawum des Allah disomah kei rajo gi ken mato yeng butoe deripado dilojang ke' lawut api ken mato kau gei' moncas.
41009048	Go api dinyoe mat cum berudu padam, ken ulat yeng nyego isei' reng pun mat noe tawu konyáng," jie Yesus.
41009049	"Go semuya' reng dilaboh ken api keedah jolu kei sego dilaboh ken geram," jie.
41009050	"Geram kin mat do gunoe, pie mun dah telampoh tabar si noe tawu disuroh masing agei'. Mangko mat ca' idup damai siko' ken betor, kamei, samo serukui seati sepikeram," jie Yesus.
41010001	Dah nyoe Yesus ningal arong nyoe, bejelan ke' peloya' Yudea lalu nyemorang Sungai Yordan. Pada' reng rami pun bederum manu ke' iyo agei'am, lalu iyo pun ngajar reng rami nyeh na' po selomoam.
41010002	Jedi dah nyoe do reng deri kelompok Parisi yeng detang na' nguji ngendugo Yesus. Jedi jie sidoe, "Nyeh lem kengkaji kau ngelangar ukum noei mun reng muwáng binie?" jie.
41010003	Jedi samut Yesus, "Nyeh koti bungie perentah Kei' Musa mie ke' hal nyoe?" jie.
41010004	Samut sidoe, "Jie Kei' Musa si mun dah dipulah surat sara' yeng sah nyeh si buleh reng muwáng binie," jie.
41010005	Pie jie Yesus, "Nyuroh Kei' Musa nulis perentah nyoe nyomie si," jie, "go deri ati kam yeng bolei' dibongkeh urang.
41010006	Noe go kemawo' Allah tokoh nyoe peh. Go deri asal muloe nyomiam mensiyo dipulah Sen sepasang, selaki sebinie.
41010007	Nyoam sebape sege' reng lelaki bejodo nyeh iyo mat bepencar ken ino' apa'e, lalu ngumpol ke' jodoe,
41010008	gei' sidoe sederah sedeginam, jie lem kitap Sen mie. (Kejedi 2:24) Maksute yeng asale duwo ko' nyeh pie diangap menjedi siko'am.
41010009	Mangko yeng dah dipadu Allah nang na' dipencar le' mensiyo," jie Yesus.
41010010	Jedi dah pulang ke' rumah kaloe ponyoe pada' murit Yesus nyeh betanyoe ke' Yesus ke' hal sara'.
41010011	Jedi samut Yesus, "Mun reng lelaki muwáng binie lalu bejodo ken bini beru nyeh iyo mat butang beonga' teradap binie yeng lamat nyeh.
41010012	Ponyoe jum ken reng betinoe; berang reng yeng muwáng lakie lalu bejodo ken laki beru nyeh maksute iyo mat butang beonga'," jie Yesus.
41010013	Jedi mátam. Nan do reng yeng meyie ana' biya'e ke' Yesus gei' iyo nyampang jerie ke' ana'e kei ngemberekate. Pie sidoe dicacue ditonga' le' pada' murit Yesus.
41010014	Dah diperati Yesus ken murite nonga' reng meyie ana' biya' nyeh mat mereruwapam ati Yesus. "Aduam pada' ana' biya' nyeh manu ke' aku!" jie Yesus. "Nang na' kam nonga'e! Go mat reng yeng tokoh ana' biya' nyeme' yeng langko' tekawum lem pada' dolat berekat Allah des Sen disomah kei rajo," jie Yesus.
41010015	Pie reng yeng ngei'e renah ati nyomah ke' Allah na' po ana' biya' si iyo mat noe konoe kawum ken umát Allah. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei," jie Yesus.
41010016	Dah nyoe iyo mat ngerangkue ngolo' pada' ana' biya' nyeh, lalu nyampang jerie ke' tiyap ko' ana' biya' nyeh, lalu ngemberekat dolate.
41010017	Jedi Yesus tei' turun na' bejelan. Dah turun lalu do reng bebodap manu ke' iyo. Urang nyeh belutut di adap Yesus dah nyoe betanyoe, "Guru panci! Pailah yeng ca' digewai ku," jie, "kei ku buleh idup yeng cum berudu mati?"
41010018	"Nyeh mun kau ngat ngangap aku guru nyem, gopai go kau ngendemo aku panci?" jie Yesus. "Go kin ngat Allaham yeng panci. Tawu noe kau ken maksut omóng kau tue?.
41010019	"A, jedi ke' hal petanyoe kau nyeh," jie, "mun kau na' buleh idup yeng cum berudu mati si," jie, "kau ca' tuno' ke' perentah Allah, ya'am nang munoh, nang butang beonga', nang maling, nang mempulah betor, nang ngelakar betor, ca' ngehormát ino' apa' kau," jie Yesus.
41010020	Lalu jie reng nyoe, "Ku si," jie, "deri kebiya' ku mie pun nan tuno'am ke' pada' ukum nyoe, guruei," jie.
41010021	Paling kaseh Yesus mantau reng nyoe, lalu jie nyingka'e, "Pie sutie agei' yeng ca' kau gewai. Kau ca' pulangam lo'e," jie, "juwalam pada' reto beno jento keraja' kau; lalu asele kau becar ke' pada' reng bensat, kei kau diupah di serugo nun. Dah nyoe kau bebeli' manu ke' aku, kei menjedi murit ku."
41010022	Pie ningo paner Yesus bungi nyoe tei' reng kayo nyeh berubaham mukoe, mat susaham, go iyo reng yeng paling kayo rayo. Sorote ngaji ngenjuwal pada' jolue. Ngaso ponyoe tei' iyo pun mat pulangam.
41010023	Dah nyoe Yesus tei' ngelinga' ke' pada' murite, lalu jie nyingka'e, "Paling maring reng kayo na' nyomah Allah kei rajoe!" jie.
41010024	Kangápam pada' murite ningo panere bungi nyoe, lalu diulange agei' le' Yesus, "Mat maring nar, kamei, na' konoe kawum des Allah disomah kei rajo.
41010025	Manseh ge' murah binatang unta ngerudu lubang jerum deripado reng kayo na' tekawum des Allah disomah kei rajo," jie.
41010026	Mat kangápam pada' murite ken pengajar Yesus ponyoe. "Mun ponyoe si mat mawáham kami tue, moe. Semalang ke' reng yeng diangap kami bujor benar pun ge'e, noe mampu ditulong diselamát, poe, sa'am go kami. Mat cum reng yeng mampu," jie pada' murite.
41010027	Yesus mantau ke' sidoe lalu nyamute, "Mensiyo si mat cum kemampue na' nulong nyelamát direte, pie Allah si cum arong itong Sen noleh. Mat ca' Allaham yeng nulong nyelamát mensiyo, go Allah si semuya' uleh semuya' mampu," jie Yesus.
41010028	Dah nyoe jie Petrus, "Tauam, Tuwowei," jie. "Kami si mat dah ningal semuya' segeno yeng do di kami tam kami na' ngenjurut kau," jie.
41010029	-
41010030	Samut Yesus, "Mang pun," jie, "mangko kam pun langko' untong tuwaham dibelas kaseh jum. Go sopai ja' yeng ningal pada' jolue di deniyo tue tam iyo pecayo ken aku ken na' madah agah panci si pasti beuntong gi," jie Yesus. "Do die iyo ngerudu kesusah kesensare di deniyo tue; nyoe tentue. Pie pai-pai pun yeng ditingale," jie Yesus, "demo ke' rumah tangoe, demo ke' dulor menyadie, demo ke' ino' apa'e, demo ke' ana' uco'e, demo ke'...boneh genelo cuco' tanám kebun jenah opai, pie mun ditingal reng go iyo pecayo ken aku ken na' madah agah panci si mat dibelas kaseh seratus kali lipat di deniyo tue pun, demo ke' rumah tangoe, demo ke' dulor menyadie, demo ke' ino' apa'e, demo ke' ana' uco'e, demo ke'...boneh genelo cuco' tanám kebun jenah opai. Pai tel agei' buleh jum idup yeng cum berudu mati," jie Yesus. "Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei; pecayoam ken pemadah aku.
41010031	Mat tebeli' deri pengaji mensiyo, dih? Go reng yeng dikaji betore langko' noe ditingie gi, pie dah kesudahe iyoam yeng ditingie. Pie kebelike yeng ngangap direte pasti langko' ditingie pie iyo tarah ke' noe ditingie gi," jie Yesus.
41010032	Jedi mátam. Yesus sidoe mat ngelaju pejelane na' ke' Yerusalem. Yesus tei' bejelan dolu kit deri sidoe. Pada' murite si kagum ngaji Yesus manseh berenie na' ke' Yerusalem, ken pada' reng layin yeng ngenjurute pun sebenare gola'e ngajie, ngorie gola' iyo nomu behayo di Yerusalem, kajie nun. Jedi dah nyoe sekali agei'am Yesus ngumpol murite yeng duwo belas ko'; bekumpol sidoe bangam. Iyo na' ngenjelas ke' sidoe pai yeng langko' tejedi ke' iyo gi.
41010033	"Tue," jie Yesus, "diret bejelan nuju ke' Yerusalem. Jedi dah detang kinun aku Ana' Mensiyo langko' diserah ke' pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' ugar agama diret, yeng langko' mutuse ken aku ca' diukum mati. Lalu aku langko' diserah sidoe ke' pada' reng noe Yahudi die,
41010034	yeng cagar ngeolo'-olo' ngererujong aku, yeng langko' ngelujah ken melesah ku. Sampai pengabise aku dibunoh le' sidoe. Pie dah tigo ari nyeh aku pun langko' bengki' idup agei'," jie Yesus.
41010035	Dah nyoe Yesus dipanu le' murite Yohanes ken Yakobus, ana' Sebedeus. "Guru," jie sidoe. "Do yeng kami na' minta' ke' kau," jie.
41010036	"Na' pai kam?" jie Yesus.
41010037	Samut sidoe, "Dah kau diagong disah kei rajo gi kami na' dudo' siko' di kiboe siko' di kanán kau kei wakel kau," jie sidoe.
41010038	Samut Yesus, "Kam noe tawu ken reti jolu yeng dipinta' kam," jie. "Kam na' merentah kei wakel ku pie mampu peh kam ngerudu pada' kesensare yeng ngatam penyensaree yeng ca' dirudu aku, sampai mati na' po aku?" jie Yesus.
41010039	Lalu samut sidoe duwo nyeh, "Mampu," jie. Samut Yesus, "Yeng mat si kam mat cagar ca' ngerudu kesusah kesensare yeng ngatam penyensaree, na' po aku, kamei, sampai do deri kam yeng mati pun.
41010040	Pie ke' hal sopai yeng dudo' di kiboe ken di kanán aku kei wakel ku gi si nyoe mat noe iyo aku peh yeng nitahe," jie Yesus. "Apa' ku die yeng nitahe; dah dipampoh Sen dah le' Apa' ku nyo' reng yeng dipileh Sen," jie.
41010041	Jedi dah murite layin yeng sepuloh ko' tei' ningo jolu yeng dipinta' le' Yohanes ken Yakobus tei' sidoe mat isinam ken Yohanes sidoe.
41010042	Lalu dah nyoe Yesus ngumpol pada' murite ken madahe potue. "Kam nang kalut ke' hal pangkat," jie. "Yeng nan penting ngaji pangkat si pada' benso layin yeng noe menduli Allah. Sidoe si ayah merentah nyuroh betor; pada' rajoe kin kejam merentah rayate, ken pada' wakele pun sebetah iyo nyuroh pada' rayate kitue kinyoe. Nyoe begi reng yeng noe menduli Allah.
41010043	Pie kam," jie Yesus, "nang na' ponyoe. Kebelike sopai yeng na' mimpin ca' melayanam.
41010044	Ken berang reng yeng na' diangap tingie si ca' rajing ngelayan kemawo' semuya' segenoe.
41010045	"Contohe aku tuam, yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo," jie Yesus. "Go aku detang pun noe iyo ento' dilayan peh. Kebelike," jie, "aku detang kei melayan, sampai nyerah diret ku kei mati, kei nobus reng benya' deri kuwaso Pengelakar," jie Yesus.
41010046	Jedi mátam. Yesus ken murite ken pada' reng rami yeng ngenjurute tei' detang ke' kota Yeriko. Jedi poe di Yeriko do siko' reng lelaki yeng butoe dudo' di pinger jelan, gewaie nan minta' duwit ke' urang yeng lalu. Demoe Bartimeus. Bartimeus tei' retie ana' Timeus. Jedi iyo dudo' di pinger jelan yeng dititi Yesus sidoe ari nyoe des sidoe ngelalu.
41010047	Dah nyoe kedingo Bartimeus ken agah Yesus deri Nasaret lalu dinyoe. Lalu iyo simah pera' perango nyapo Yesus, "Yesus buboh Daud," jie, "tulong ge' aku tue."
41010048	Pada' reng rami tei' nonga' reng butoe, nyurohe ngojap nyem. Pie iyo malah ken paie malar nyem minta' tulong kin ontap-ontap, "O buboh Daud," jie, "tulong ge' aku tue."
41010049	Yesus tei' beronga' di tongah jelan, lalu jie Yesus nyingka' reng rami nyeh, "Suroham reng butoe nyeh manu kitue," jie. Lalu mat disapoe le' sidoe, reng butoe nyeh te'. "Ha, can kau! Bengki'am, manuam, dah disapoe nyeh," jie.
41010050	Lintus dibinsaie kekebu'e cur! ngelumpat lalu manu ke' Yesus.
41010051	Jie Yesus nyingka'e, "Na' pai perelu kau ken aku?" Jie reng butoe nyeh, "Ku na' mencináng, guruei."
41010052	"Mun ponyoe," jie Yesus, "daham, moe. Bom, na' pulang pun," jie. "Dah beyi' dah kau ketegal kau pecayo." Temosie iyo mat mencinángam, dah nyoe iyo ngenjurut pejelan Yesus jum.
41011001	Jedi mátam te'. Yesus sidoe gei' bejelan nuju ke' Yerusalem. Dah soma' Yerusalem tei' sidoe detang ke' senopang kampong Betpage ken kampong Betania, yeng aronge di tongah natai Buki' Saitun, dah nyoe Yesus ngutus murite duwo ko' nyo' kinun.
41011002	Jedi jie Yesus, "Boh kam ke' kampong di adap diret nun. Pas kam tomus kinun kaloe kam langko' merati ana' keledai siko', ditamat reng, yeng bolum koloe ditayi' reng. Penamate ca' dipucel kam, lalu kam beyie kitue.
41011003	Jedi misale mun do reng nyacue ken ngopai go diamie kam, kam ca' nyamute go Tuwowe perelu na' makaie; pie dah dipakaie kaloe langko' dipulang kitue agei', noe diamie lalu." Bungi nyoam posan Yesus ke' murite yeng duwo ko' nyeh te'.
41011004	Lalu mátam, murit Yesus yeng duwo ko' nyeh mat turunam kinun. Tang kinun diperati sidoe mat do siko' ana' keledai yeng ditamat di soma' lawang rumah reng, di pinger jelan. Dah merati ana' keledai nyeh sidoe mat mucel penamate.
41011005	Jedi pada' reng yeng do dinyoe do betanyoe, "Pai gewai kam? Ngopai go kam mucel penamat ana' keledai nyeh?" jie.
41011006	Pie murit Yesus pun nyamute na' po yeng dipadah le' Yesus tadie ponyoe, lalu mat noam reng ngidahe.
41011007	Jedi dah diamie sidoe ana' keledai nyeh tei', mat dibeyie le' murite ke' Yesus, lalu disolap sidoe ken beju jubahe. Yesus pun dudo' dinyoe melaju pejelane ke' Yerusalem.
41011008	Dah nyoe pada' reng rami pun mat ngalu nyamut kedetang Yesus. Do yeng ngampar ngoma' beju jubahe di tongah jelan; do yeng mancong pada' dewun kayu yeng bekelopah deri kebune, dioma'e jum di tongah jelan.
41011009	Pada' reng rami beyi' yeng ngulue beyi' yeng ngenjurute besesura' mugi Allah. "Tepugiam Allah!"* jie sidoe. "Tuam to' reng yeng detang atas demo Tuwowe diret! Detang dah! Mat Sénam yeng ngendolat ngemberekate," jie.
41011010	"Kiroe iyo merentah na' po Rajo Daud nyomie," jie sidoe. "Tepugiam Allah yeng rajo tingie," jie pada' reng rami nyeh.
41011011	Jedi sejurus tei' mat detangam Yesus ke' Yerusalem. Dah detang ke' Yerusalem tei' iyo lintus ke' kolong rumah kediyam Allah. Dinyoe iyo ngat merati semuya' segeloe, pie tam ari dah malam nyeh dah nyoe iyo pamus bebeli' pulang ke' kampong Betania lo'e, ken murite duwo belas ko' nyeh.
41011012	Jedi mátam. Dah pagi ponyoe dah turun deri kampong Betania na' bebeli' ke' Yerusalem si Yesus pun teraso lapar porute di tongah jelan.
41011013	Jedi noe jewoh deri nyoe tei' diperati Yesus do sekayo' kayu ara yeng panci dewune, alap ca' bebuwah; dah nyoe dipanue ke' soma', na' meratie do noei buwahe. Pie dah merati ke' soma' tei' kontan dewune bangam, cumam buwahe. Ja'e go ketiko nyoe si kenaken mat bolum munsim buwah.
41011014	Pie dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' kayu nyeh tei', "Kayu ara tue cumam kau bebuwah agei'," jie. Pada' murite pun mat ningo Yesus madahe bungi nyoe.
41011015	Jedi mátam. Dah detang ke' Yerusalem Yesus pun tamoe ke' kolong rumah kediyam Allah. Peratie tei' bisei' pada' reng yeng bedegang bebelo' dinyoe. Dah nyoe Yesus nunong pada' reng yeng bedegang nyeh te', deri yeng bejuwal sampai ke' pemolie pun. Pada' meja reng penukar duwit ken pada' bengku reng bejuwal pada' burong dero to' pesaling reng pun simah dibelungang dibelengi'e.
41011016	Reng yeng pulang mansang meyie pada' jolue ngelalu kolong rumah kediyam Allah pun ditonga'e jum; didahe le' Yesus pulang mansang ngelalu kolong nyoe.
41011017	Dah nyoe Yesus pun ngajar pada' reng rami yeng do dinyoe. Jie Yesus, "Kin ditulis lem Kitap Allah mie yeng bungie potue: Rumah ku tue rumah kusus nyo' reng bedoa deri segelo benso di seruroh deniyo, jie Sen. (Yesaya 56:7) Pi kam," jie Yesus, "gopai go rumah kediyam Allah tue kam guno nyo' kam ngerampok die," jie. (Yeremia 7:11)
41011018	Jedi pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' ugar agama nyeh pun dah ningo jum ke' hal gewai Yesus nunong reng deri rumah kediyam Allah. Dah nyoe sidoe bekengkomong ken betore, ngogoe caro na' munohe, go pada' reng rami nyeh mat ayahe nar ningo pengajar Yesus, mangko pada' ugar agama nyeh gola'e ken iyo. Nyoam go pada' ketuwo nyeh ngogoe caro na' munohe.
41011019	Jedi dah nyoe dah malam ari tei' Yesus sidoe pamus agei'am deri kota Yerusalem.
41011020	Jedi mátam. Dah kolam pagie ponyoe, dah Yesus ken pada' murite bejelan bebeli' ke' Yerusalem nyeh diperati sidoe kayu ara yeng kemayie ponyoe mat dah ngerangkai kotai dah deri dewune sampai ke' urate pun.
41011021	Jedi Petrus ingáte ken omóng Yesus kemayie ponyoe nyumpah kayu nyoe, dah nyoe jie Petrus, "Guru," jie, "ti beh, kayu ara yeng kau sumpah kemayie, dah ngerangkai kotai dah," jie.
41011022	Samut Yesus, "Mun kam na' tokoh nyoe gewai kam si kam mat ca' pecayo ken Allaham," jie.
41011023	"Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei. Go mun kam mat pecayo ken Sen si pai-pai pun yeng dipinta' disuroh kam langko' dituntongam. Umpamoe mun kam na' nyuroh gunóng tue tepansang ke' lawut pun. Mun noe tumang aming lem ati nun, ken mun kam togap yakin ken yeng disuroh kam langko' tejedi si Allah pun mat nuntonge.
41011024	Mangko jie ku kam mat ca' yakin, ca' pecayo ken pai-pai pun yeng dipinta' kam lem doa kam mat langko' dituntong, mangko mat dituntongam, kamei.
41011025	A, ge'em des kam bedoa mat ca' ngelon lo'e kesalah betor, mun do kesalahe ken kam, gei' sempayo Apa' kam di serugo nun ngelon doso kam jum. [
41011026	Go mun kam noe ngelon betor kam si Apa' kam di serugo pun langko' noe ngelon kesalah kam,]" jie Yesus nyingka' murite.
41011027	Jedi dah detang agei' ke' Yerusalem nyeh Yesus pun peleser di kolong rumah kediyam Allah. Dah nyoe iyo dipanu le' pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' ugar agama ken pada' ketuwo layin ge'em.
41011028	Jedi jie sidoe nyingka' Yesus, "Deri nailah hak kau nyo' kau ngenggewai jolu tokoh tue? Sopai yeng ngutus kau kitue?" jie sidoe.
41011029	Samut Yesus, "Aku pun," jie, "do jum sutie yeng na' ku tanyoe ke' deduwan. Dah deduwan nyamut petanyoe aku si aku pun langko' nyamut deduwan, ngenjelas ken deri nai hak aku," jie Yesus.
41011030	"Jedi yeng na' ku tanyoe ke' deduwan tei' ya'am ke' hal hak Yohanes Penyolam mie. Menurut deduwan tue Yohanes Penyolam mie sopailah yeng ngutuse nyo' iyo ngelaju tugase, engoe? Deri nailah hake mie nyo' iyo nyolam reng? Nyoe deri Allahei deri mensiyoei?" jie Yesus.
41011031	Lalu pada' ketuwo agama nyeh bepempaham pado sidoe. "Ne," jie sidoe, "diret semuya' uka' akang na' nyamute. Na' dipadah hak Yohanes deri Allah gola' iyo tue betanyoe ke' diret, ngopai go diret noe pecayo ken pemadah Yohanes mie, (mun iyo mat diutus le' Allah).
41011032	Pie na' padah Yohanes cum hake sa'am, gola' jum," jie. Go pada' pemimpin kin gola'e ken reng rami, go reng rami kin pecayo ken Yohanes mat penijum yeng diutus le' Allah.
41011033	Jedi ngaso ponyoe jie sidoe nyamut Yesus, "Kami," jie, "noe tawu kami ke' hal Yohanes," jie, "hake deri sopai pun," jie. Lalu samut Yesus, "Mun bungi nyoe penyamut deduwan," jie, "aku pun cumam ku madah ke' deduwan ken deri nailah hak aku nyo' ku ngenggewai semuya' tue," jie.
41012001	Dah nyoe Yesus ngomóng ken sidoe pakai perempamo. "Jedi," jie, "do siko' tuwowe kebun angur yeng nanám kebun angure. Jedi dah ditanáme tei' dipagare, dah dipagare tei' ditobo'e jum lubang betu (keedah losong) nyo' arong langko' kei ngiri' morah buwahe nyo' nguleh ayie angur nyeh gi. Dah ditobo' lubang betu tei' dipulahe jum rumah kocit jejengei' tingie keedah menara nyo' reng ngenjego kebune te'. Dah nyoe iyo pun mat ngupah beberopai ko' urang to' ngerejo ken nungu kebun angure te'. Lalu iyo pun bejelan jewoh.
41012002	Jedi lamat belamat dah rekene jengkah angure bebuwah nyeh tuwowe kebun nyeh nyuroh siko' ulune pulang nyo' manu ke' reng yeng ngerejo kebune nun, kei ngamie pembegi deri kebun angure nyo' tuwowe.
41012003	Pie reng yeng ngerejo kebun nyeh jewoh na' ngunyo' pembegie, malah ken paie ulun nyeh tei' ditangkap le' sidoe, lalu dipangkonge, dah nyoe disurohe pulang bedan sele nyem.
41012004	Jedi ngaso cum buleh ulun nyeh tei' lalu tuwowe nyeh pun nyuroh ulune yeng siko' die (nyo' manu ke' reng yeng ngerejo kebune te'. Pie dah diperati le' sidoe tei' lalu) ulun nyoe dipulahe ponyoe jum, dipempungah le' sidoe, dipelentonge ke' kepaloe, dihinae.
41012005	Jedi dah nyoe tei' ponyoe agei'am, tuwowe nyeh te'; mat ngutus ulune yeng layin die nyo' manu kinun, pie yeng nyoe si sengkunyong dibunohe kali. Mat benya' nar ulun tuwowe nyeh yeng disuroh le' tuwowe manu ke' reng yeng ngerejo kebun angur nyeh te', pie ponyoe bisam; pai noe dipangkonge, pai noe dibunohe pun.
41012006	"Pengabise tingal siko' dam yeng bolum disuroh le' tuwowe kinun, ya'am ana' tungal direteam. Mangko kepepanyange tuwowe kebun nyeh mat nyuroh ana' tungal direte nyo' manu ke' penjego kebun nyeh. Go so kengkaji tuwowe nyeh mun ana' direte si pasti na'e sidoe ngehormáte, na'e sidoe ningoe, kajie nun.
41012007	"Lalu mat kinunam ana' tungal nyeh te'. Pie dah detang kinun tei' dah diperati le' pada' reng yeng ngerejo kebune tei', lalu jie sidoe, Ha, jie, iyoame' yeng cagar kei lileh nyawo tuwowe diret. Yo' diret munohe kaliam, gei' diret die yeng ngehak kebun tue, jie sidoe.
41012008	Lalu mat ditangkap le' sidoe ana' tungal nyeh te', dibunohe, bengkaie dibuwang sidoe deri kebun nyeh te'," jie Yesus.
41012009	Dah nyoe Yesus pun betanyoe ke' pada' reng yeng ningoe. "Nyeh engo kam koti?," jie Yesus nyingka' reng rami nyeh. "Dah tuwowe kebun pulang ke' nenggeri direte, pada' reng yeng ngerejo kebune dipekoti le' tuwowe nyeh, engoe?" Dah nyoe iyo yeng nyamut petanyoe direte. "Noe peh dibunohe," jie Yesus, "lalu kebun angure diserahe ke' reng layin die," jie
41012010	"Nyoe kin dah dipadah di lem Kitap Allah nyomie. Kam pun mat ca' ngajie, yeng kelar nan dibeco kam lem Kitap Sen, yeng bungie potue, Do Betu yeng dibuwang le' pada' tukang rumah pie diamie Allah to' Betu yeng paling penting nyo' melaju rumah Sen.
41012011	Nyoe mat gewai Tuwowe diret; mat kagumam diret meratie, (Mas 118:22-23) jie lem kitap Sen mie," jie Yesus.
41012012	Dah nyoe pada' ugar agama nyeh ngemoran na' nangkape, go sidoe pun tawu ken perempamo Yesus tadie pas konoe sidoam. Pie entam sidoe gola'e ken pada' reng rami nyeh mangko Yesus ditingale lo'e, bolum ditangkape, lalu sidoe pun bepulang-pulangam.
41012013	Jedi dah nyoe pada' ketuwo agama ngutus beberopai ko' reng deri kelompok Parisi ken beberopai ko' ana' buwah Herodes nyo' manu ke' Yesus betanyoe ke' iyo, pie tujue go na' ngenjorate ken omóng tutore, kajie nun.
41012014	Jedi mátam, dah manu ke' Yesus nyeh jie sidoe tei', "Guru," jie, "kami si tawu ken kau reng bujor benar, ken kau nan teliti madah posan payit Allah yeng mat. Kau kin noe ngorie ke' hal kengkaji mensiyo, go kau mat noe ngembedo pangkat reng, beyi' tingie, beyi' beroh pun; kau ngeresudu' madah yeng mat nyem," jie sidoe nyingka' Yesus, pie go sidoe na' ngememanise nyem. Lalu sidoe manseh nyamong panere. "Jedi boh kau madah ke' kami yeng máte," jie. "Jedi na' nunoe ukum adat diret si patut noe diret reng Yahudi ngembeyar pajak ke' rajo di Roma nun?
41012015	Ca' dibeyarei noei?" jie. Pie Yesus kin tawu ken sidoe alap-alape nyem betanyoe, noe go na' tawu peh. "Gopai," jie, "go kam na' ngenjorat aku?" jie. Dah nyoe jie, "Ta' kitue duwit kam sebingkap, nyo' ku meratie," jie.
41012016	Lalu sidoe pun mat ngunyo'e duwite sebingkap ke' iyo. Dah nyoe jie Yesus. "Nyeh tue gemar sopai, ken demo sopai, di duwit tue?" jie. Samut sidoe, "Gemar Kaisar, rajo Roma," jie.
41012017	"Mun ponyoe," jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "yeng engku Kaisar ca' dipulang ke' Kaisar, yeng engku Allah ca' dipulang ke' Allah," jie. Lalu sidoe yeng ningoe pun mat kangáp nar ken penyamut Yesus, go mat konoe nar penyamute.
41012018	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe beberopai ko' reng deri kelompok Saduki die manu na' betanyoe ke' Yesus. Reng Sakudi kin noe pecayo ken reng yeng dah mati langko' bengki' idup agei'. Jie sidoe dah mati daham, cum idup agei'. Jedi mátam. Do deri antaro sidoe yeng manu ke' Yesus. Dah nyoe jie sidoe betanyoe ke' Yesus.
41012019	"Guru," jie, "ukum adat yeng ditulis le' Kei' Musa nyo' diret kin do bepadah, mun do reng lelaki bejodo pie lalu mati bolum do berana' nyeh," jie, "menyadie iyo nyeh ca' bejodo ken kebelu omue nyeh, kei reng lelaki nyeh buleh tampang deri buboh ampeh keremiji direte," jie sidoe.
41012020	"Jedi potue ne gesahe. Poe do reng lelaki tujoh ko' yeng bemenyadie. Jedi omue yeng tuwo tei' bejodo, pie bolum iyo berana' nyeh iyo pun mat matiam.
41012021	Mangko adei' jurute tei' bejodo ken kebelu omue nyeh, pie dah nyoe adei' jurut nyeh tei' tup! mati jum, bolum iyo berana'. Dah nyoe adei' jurut iyo pun bejodo jum ken kebelu omue nyeh te'; pie ponyoe jum.
41012022	Sampai pengabise sidoe tujoh ko' bemenyadie mat bejodo bisam ken kebelu omue nyeh te', pi bemati-mati bisam, cum berana' bisam. Lalu dah nyoe kebelu omue nyeh tei' mat mati jum.
41012023	Jedi yeng kami na' betanyoe ke' kau tei'," jie sidoe, "potue ne. Jedi dah mensiyo bengki' idup agei' gi sopai," jie, "yeng mat kei jodo kebelu nyeh, di antaro sidoe tujoh ko' nyeh, go sidoe tujoh ko' nyeh kin bejodo bisam ken iyo," jie sidoe betanyoe ke' Yesus, (pie sidoe pun nyungkit-nyungkite nyem, go sidoe kin noe pecayoe ken reng yeng dah mati nyeh langko' idup agei').
41012024	Jedi samut Yesus, "A, ditue kin jelas nar ken kam mat salah kengkaji kam, go kam mat noe jelas ken yeng ditulis lem Kitap Allah ge'em, ken kam noe jelas ken kuwaso Allah ge'em.
41012025	Jedi ke' hal bejodo atau noe gi," jie Yesus, "go dah mensiyo bengki' idup agei' gi keidup mensiyo langko' na' po keidup pada' melekat di serugo nun; noe betumo' bejodo, noe belaki bebini.
41012026	A, ponyoe jum ke' hal mensiyo dah bengki' idup agei' nyeh, mat salah jum pemiker kam," jie Yesus. "Boh kam ngaji yeng nan dibeco kam di lem Kitap Musa nyeh, ke' hal kayu bedurie yeng benyalo mie. Kin jie Allah nyingka' Kei' Musa deri kayu bedurie yeng benyalo nyeh, Aku mat Allah yeng gei' disomah le' Abraham, Isak ken Yakub, jie Sen.
41012027	Sedang diret kin tawu, Allah mat disomah le' reng idupam; noe ken Sen disomah le' reng mati. Jedi mun jie Sen Sen gei' disomah le' Kei' Abraham desiyan kin maksute go Kei' Abraham mat idup agei'am, numo' pun desiyan daham ngerudu mati mie; (mun noe koti desiyan manseh nyomah ke' Allah?) Mangko," jie Yesus, "kengkaji kam mat salah nar ke' hal tue," jie.
41012028	Jedi mátam. Do siko' ugar agama yeng ningo sidoe becencugeh ken Yesus ponyoe. Iyo ningo penyamut Yesus nyeh mat konoe nar. Mangko iyo pun manu ke' Yesus, na' betanyoe ke' iyo jum. Lalu, "Guru," jie, "perentah Allah pailah yeng paling penting yeng paling utamo?" jie.
41012029	Samut Yesus, "Perentah Allah yeng paling penting nyeh ya'am, Dingo beh reng Israel. Ngat Tuwowe, Allah diret, yeng mat Allah. Cum Allah yeng layin.
41012030	Kam ca' kaseh patoh ken Tuwowe Allah kam seputeh ati sebeníng derah. Pusat pemiker kam ca' ke' Allah bangam; semuya' keidup kam ca' mementing Allah. (Ulang 6:4-5)
41012031	Lalu yeng keduwo nyeh paling penting jum," jie Yesus, "ya'am Kau ca' ngaseh betor po ngaseh diret kauam. (Imamat 19:18) Mat cum perentah yeng penting deri nyoe," jie Yesus.
41012032	"Konoe nar, guruei, penyamut kau nyeh," jie ugar agama nyeh. "Mátam yeng jie kau nyeh: Allah mat siko'am; cum Allah yeng layin.
41012033	Diret mat ca' kaseh patoh ken Sen seputeh ati sebeníng derah; pusat pemiker diret ca' ke' Sénam; semuya' keidup diret ca' mementing Sénam. Ken diret ca' ngaseh betor po ngaseh diretam. Nyoe penting deri ngunyo' pesaling cucol yeng bemacam bejenis pun," jie.
41012034	Yesus pun ningo penyamut reng nyoe nyeh mat konoam. Lalu jie Yesus nyingka'e, "Nyoma'am kau tekawum jum ken reng yeng nyomah Allah kei rajo," jie. Dah lopas nyoe nyeh mat cumam reng yeng bereni betanyoe ke' hal pai pun ke' Yesus go nan kalah nyem reng yeng na' ngenjorate.
41012035	Jedi mátam. Yesus pun ngajar di kolong rumah kediyam Allah nyeh. Jedi jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe yeng do dinyoe, "Nyeh menurut jie pada' ugar agama diret si Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi Allah mie na' detang nyeh ca' deri buboh ampeh Kei' Daud, mat noe? (Nyoe pun konoam, go Kristus mat buboh sen secaro mensiyo.) Pie konai sidoe na' segontang ngenilai Kristus buboh ampeh sen secaro mensiyo?
41012036	Dingo beh kam tijum Kei' Daud mie, des sen dikuwaso Roh Allah mie. Ketiko nyoe kin jie Kei' Daud bungie potue, Allah Tuwowe mat do bepadah ke' Tuwowe ku. Lalu jie Allah nyingka' Tuwowe ku: Boh kau dudo' merentah di piya' kanán Ku tue lo'e, sampai Ku nyuroh pada' munsoh kau kei tija' iri' kau, jie Sen. (Masmur 110:1)
41012037	Bungi nyoam tijum Kei' Daud mie te'. Jedi maksute Kei' Daud, numo' pun sen akei' puyang Kristus nyeh," jie Yesus, "pie Kei' Daud manseh be-Tuwowe ke' Kristus, poe. Kiro Kristus ngat segontang buboh keturun Kei' Daud secaro mensiyo nyem si noe ken sen na' be-Tuwowe ke' buboh diret sen! (Pie poe pangkat Kristus mat lobeh tingie deri buboh Kei' Daud secaro mensiyo pun, dih?)" jie Yesus. Reng rami nyeh pun mat ayah nar ningo pengajar Yesus.
41012038	Jedi dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Awas beh kam; nang na' kam nunoe gewai pada' ugar agama yeng gela' ngelelaga', yeng bejelan ngelalu pada' reng rami pakai beju jubahe yeng mewah. Sidoe ayahe dialu disamut di adap reng rami, disapo reng Pa' Guru.
41012039	Des semeyang nyeh sidoe nan ca' dudo' di arong tekemuko; a, ken des bepesta pun sidoe nan ca' dolu dilayan.
41012040	Sidoe si ngelakar pada' reng betinoe belu ken bujo' rayue, sampai ngabis pada' jolue. Dah nyoe sidoe bedoa yeng panyang-panyang, kei iyo napo' ngelibue kesalah direte, gei' diangap reng panci. Rajo boratam ukum sidoe gi," jie Yesus.
41012041	Jedi Yesus tei' do di rumah kediyam Allah, dudo' besenopang ken arong reng nyumang duwite. Mat benya' reng yeng nyumang duwit; reng kayo reng berado pun nyumang duwite benya' dinyoe.
41012042	Pie dah nyoe detang jum reng betinoe belu yeng bensat. Iyo nyumang duwo bingkap duwit sin yeng nilaie paling kocit.
41012043	Jedi merati gewai reng belu nyeh tei' Yesus pun nyuroh pada' murite ngitong ngajie jum. "Dingo beh kam," jie, "tue mat-mátam yeng ku padah ke' kam. Semuya'-muya' reng yeng nyumang ditue pie mun diitong manseh reng belu yeng bensat tue yeng paling benya' sumange.
41012044	Go reng layin numo' pun benya' iyo ngunyo'," jie Yesus, "pie manseh deri kelobeh jolue. Pie reng belu tue sungoh pun bensat pie iyo nontu duwite yeng do di iyo. Sampai cumam kesisoe nyo' iyo belenyo agei' kaloe pun," jie Yesus.
41013001	Dah nyoe Yesus sidoe turun deri rumah kediyam Allah. Ketengah sidoe turun tei' do siko' murite nyingka' Yesus, "Tau beh, Guru. Pada' gedong rumah kediyam Allah tue paling panciam, dih? Paling bosaiam pada' betue," jie.
41013002	Samut Yesus, "Mátam, diret merati pada' gedong tue mat paling panciam," jie. "Pie dingo beh kam. Pada' gedong yeng panci yeng diperati diret tue langko'e gi dipunah ranah bisam. Pada' betue yeng bosai-bosai pun pie mat noe tawu ken pesene agei'; mat ruma' rora' pamar bokar bisam," jie Yesus.
41013003	Jedi dah kaloe ponyoe Yesus ken pada' murite dudo' di tongah-tongah natai Buki' Saitun di senopang rumah kediyam Allah. Lalu Petrus, Yakobus, Yohanes ken Andreas bangam betanyoe ke' Yesus.
41013004	Jedi jie sidoe, "Padaham ke' kami ken sebilo semuya' nyoe langko' tejedi, guruei. Pailah kei tanoe kei kami tawu ken semuya' nyoe dah na' dituntong gi?" jie sidoe.
41013005	Jedi samut Yesus, "Potue ne, kamei, dah nyoe gi. Kam mat ca' ati-ati, ca' bejego, gei' kam noe tepengaroh.
41013006	Mat benya' nar reng yeng cagar detang ngangkue atas demo aku. Akuam Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah, jie sidoe pie sidoe mat memuloe nyem. Pie pengabise mat benya' reng yeng dikelakare gi.
41013007	A, ken cagare kam langko' ningo agah awoh pada' nenggeri nenggero yeng beperang betempor beyi' jewoh beyi' soma' pun, pie sungoh pun ponyoe kam nang na' tekeraya'. Go semuya' jolu ke' deng nyoe mat dah ditentu le' Allah. Nyoe mat ca' tejedi sebolum pengudah nyeh, pi nyoe pun gei' bolum pengudahe nar.
41013008	Yeng langko' tejedi sebolume ya'am pada' nenggeri nenggero demo ke' pada' rajo ken pada' pemerentah nyeh mat langko' lawan melawan. Ken pada' deniyo tue langko' simah begontar ditue dinyoe tam gempa bumi; a, ken pada' mensiyo pun langko' buyun menyasat . Pi nyoe pun sebujor gei' ketongaie nyem; kiro reng berana' nyeh berue berodaiam," jie Yesus.
41013009	"Kam si mat ca' jegoam. Go kam cagar serarat didudoh dipecaro le' pada' ketuwo, ken kam langko' dipempungah dipelesah le' pemimpin agama diret di rumah semeyang pun. Malah ken paie kam sampai diserah kei dipecaro di adap pada' gubernor ken pada' rajo pun, tam kam pecayo ken aku, pi nyoe pun kelorong gei' kam besaksi ke' sidoe ke' hal aku.
41013010	Go sebolum pengudahe gi agah panci kin mat ca' dolu dipadah ke' semuya' benso mensiyo lo'e. Jedi maksute nyoe pun dipakai Allah lem rencana Sen jum.
41013011	"A, sal ge' kam ditangkap dipecaro reng si kam nang na' ngorie ngaji pai nyo' kam nyamut panere. Dah jengkah kam ngadape si dikosoh pai ja' kato yeng diborie Sen ke' kam, go noe iyo kam peh yeng madahe, pie Roh Allaham yeng ngomóng ngelalu kam.
41013012	"A, ke' hal kam ditangkap opai gi," jie Yesus, "yeng langko' nyerah kam gei' kam diukum mati gi pun noe iyo urang peh, pie pada' waris wala' diret kamam: demo ke' dulor menyadie kam, demo ke' apa' kam, demo ke' ana' kam pun, yeng ngelango' ngelangar kam ino' apa'e, sampai diserahe ke' pada' ketuwo gei' diukum mati.
41013013	Pada' semuya' mensiyo mat langko' risie ken kam go kam murit aku," jie Yesus. "Pi kam ca' beetat nyem, go sopai ja' yeng teetate sampai ke' pengudahe si mat langko' ditulong diselamát," jie.
41013014	"Jedi dah nyoe kam langko' merati jolu yeng paling dikerisie le' Allah, yeng temosie temeregam di arong yeng Sen didah, sampai rumah kediyam Sen mat dikotor dicemar le' jolu nyoe," jie Yesus. Jedi mátam. Pada' reng yeng ngembeco tue mat ca' panai ngalimáte, gei' tawu ken tuju maksute. Jedi jie Yesus, "Mun kam dah merati nyoe si mangko semuya' segeno reng di Yudea ca' rariam, betapo' di peloya' pada' gunóng nun. Nang ngaji jolu yeng layin.
41013015	Mat ca' copat rariam; misale mun reng nongah do di co' loteng* nyeh mat ca' bebodap turun rari ja', nang ngaji bokal sangu opai," jie.
41013016	"A, ponyoe jum misale mun do reng yeng nongah di umo tanáme, nang na' ngaji na' bebeli' ke' rumah to' ngamie pakai ingap opai. Pie mat ca' bekedibas rariam, puteh jempoe bebodap, ke' peloya' pada' gunóng nun.
41013017	"Kaseh ku ngaji pada' reng yeng nganong ken pada' reng yeng gei' nyusu ana'e yeng ca' ngerudu kesensare nyoe jum, jera'e," jie Yesus. "Go mat ugas ngeloham semuya' segenoe ketiko nyoe, sa'am go pada' reng yeng nganong ken pada' reng yeng gei' nyusu ana'e kekocit.
41013018	Mangko kam mat ca' bedoa minta' ke' Sen gei' noe tejedi des munsim colap, gei' cum peribate kam rari,
41013019	go dah jemán pengudah nyoe gi mat ngatam kesusah kesensare yeng langko' dirudu mensiyo. Mat cum melobehe, semejak deri asal muloe mie des Allah mulah deniyo tue, sampai ke' ari tue, sampai ke' pemuntol jemán gi pun pie mat cum melobeh kesusah kesensare yeng langko' dirudu le' pada' mensiyo dah jemán pengudah tue gi.
41013020	Mun jemán nyoe noe dibatas Tuwowe waktue si mat cum mensiyo yeng bodan, mat bemati-mati bisam. Pie tam Sen gei' manseh ngaji pada' reng yeng dipileh kei engku Sen si, mangko Sen mutuse gei' jemán nyoe noe lamat.
41013021	-
41013022	Jedi mátam, kamei, mat ca' ati-atiam kam dah jemán pengudah nyeh. Go ketiko nyoe mat do benya' penipu pengelakar yeng ngangkue direte Kristus, atau pun penijum Allah. Jedi mun kam ningo reng yeng bepadah, Tau beh kam, tue ne, dah do dah Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah atau pun jie yeng layin madah, Ti beh kam, dinun ne, kamei, dah do dah Kristus, pie kam nang na' ningoe," jie Yesus. "Sidoe langko' mulah pada' keenah keaneh petanah petano. Maksut sidoe si kira' mampu na' nipu ngendeyo na' nari' pada' reng yeng dipileh Allah to' engku diret Sen pun.
41013023	Pi awas beh kam! Ngopai go semuya' tue dah ku padah ke' kam sebolum iyo tejedi pun, gei' sempayo kam noe konoe kelakare," jie Yesus.
41013024	-
41013025	"Jedi dah lopas jeman kesusah kesensare nyeh si," jie Yesus, "dah nyoe temosie pada' penampa' di langi' yeng ugas agong tampa' nyeh langko' tekuca' teguyu. Sampai pengabise mato ari mat padam, losi penampa'e; bulan pun cumam cayoe, ken pada' bintang nyeh peterotah losi deri langi'.
41013026	Dah nyoe pada' mensiyo langko' merati aku yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo turun di pada' románg. Dinyoe pada' mensiyo langko' merati kuwaso ku ken keagong ku yeng ugas ngatam.
41013027	Dah nyoe ku langko' ngutus pada' melekat ku to' ngamie ngumpol pada' reng yeng ku pileh nyo' engku diret ku; lalu mat dikumpole deri pemuntol deniyo sampai ke' pemuntol serugo pun. Siko' pun cum yeng kelawong angín. Ponyoam kedetang aku gi," jie Yesus.
41013028	"Jedi, kamei, ke' hal tano jemán pengudah nyeh perbeninge kayu buwah, benso kayu ara nyeh," jie Yesus. "Diret kin tawu, mun kayu ara nyeh dah mulai nyopi' anto'e kin nyoe tanoe, ari dah na' kemarau dah.*
41013029	Jedi ponyoe jum ke' hal petanah petano yeng ku padah ke' kam tadie; mun kam merati semuya' jolu nyoe dah tejedi si maksute kin jemán pengudah nyeh mat noe dam lamat. Mat dah soma' nar dam.
41013030	Semuya' tue langko' tejedi pun," jie Yesus, "sebolum lapis tue* bis mati; nyoe mat-mátam, kamei.
41013031	Go posan payit aku mat togap kukoham; do langi' ken tanah tue si langko' losi nayápam, pie posan payit aku si tan seora'-ora'eam.
41013032	"A, ke' hal arie ken pai pemayoe ku langko' detang gi si," jie Yesus, "go ngat Apa' kuam yeng tawu. Siko' pun cum reng layin yeng tawu: pada' melekat Sen pun noe tawue; a, aku Ana' Sen pun mat noe tawu ku jum. Ngat siko' Sénam yeng tawu.
41013033	Mangko kam ca' nan siyapam. Ca' jego. Go kam mat noe tawu ken sebilo ku langko' detang.
41013034	Ibarat ke' tuwowe rumah din mun iyo na' bejelan ke' jewoh kin iyo nyuroh pada' ana' buwahe nyo' ngurus semuya' segeloe des iyo cum; tiyap ko' sidoe rato-ratoe diajen gewaie. A, reng yeng nungu lawang rumahe si iyo disurohe ca' nan siyap bejego.
41013035	Jedi ponyoe jum kam. Kam ca' nan bejegoam, go kam noe tawu bilo tuwowe rumah langko' detang, tah malam ariei, tah tongah malamei, tah dini ariei, tah bekolamei; kam si mat noe tawu kam.
41013036	Pie nang na' sampai aku temosie detang kam gei' kebonóng tidor.
41013037	Mangko ku madahe ke' semuya' segeno, na' po yeng ku padah ke' kam tue: kam ca' nan siyap, ca' bejegoam," jie Yesus..
41014001	Jedi tingal duwo ari dam manu ke' Ari Raya Ngelalu ken Pesta Roti yeng Noe Bepengemang. Jedi pada' ketuwo pelayan agama Yahudi ken pada' ugar agama nyeh gei' ngogoe kelorong caro besesulit nyo' nangkap Yesus kei dibunohe.
41014002	Pie jie sidoe pado sidoe nang na' ketengah reng rami ngalu pesta, gola' sidoe iroh, ngamo' belo.
41014003	Jedi mátam. Yesus tei' nongah do di kampong Betania, di rumah reng bedemo Simon yeng bokas saki' kusta. Jedi Yesus sidoe tei' dudo' makan di rumah Simon. Jedi kebonónge makan tei' do detang siko' reng betinoe yeng meyie tepayan kocit deri betu pualam, bisei' binya' wangi yeng paling mahal, yeng dipulah deri binya' ancit yeng murni. Jedi dah nyoe tepayan kocit nyeh dipukahe liyere, lalu binya'e ditungange ke' kepalo Yesus.
41014004	Pie do di antaro reng dinyoe yeng redo risie ken perboko reng betinoe nyeh, lalu sidoe begunau siko' ken betore. "Mawáham beh," jie sidoe, "rugi modasam binya' memahal nyoe dipakai noe menentu ponyoe.
41014005	Boh mun dijuwal; benya' ye' duwite ye'; sampai tigo ratus bingkap duwit perak. Kira' dijuwal kin duwite kei diunyo' ke' reng yeng bensat," jie. Mangko reng betinoe mat dicacue le' sidoe.
41014006	Pie jie Yesus, "Jediam beh, jera'e; noe sa' dicacue. Ngopai go kam na' nyuroh atie susah? Teruhal yeng digewaie to' aku tue mat panciam.
41014007	A, ke' hal nulong reng bensat si nyoe panci jum. Ja'e go nan do kelorong kam nyo' nulonge, go pada' reng bensat kin nan do nyem di antaro kam. Pie aku si noe; go aku noe dam lamat na' ningal kam.
41014008	A, reng tue pun," jie Yesus, "mat ngamie kelorong yeng do tue to' iyo melayan aku; iyo nungang kepalo ku ken binya' tue kin na' po yeng digewai reng nungang binya' ke' bengkai sebolum dipasar, pie iyo tue nungange ke' aku sebolum ku mati pun.
41014009	Mangko," jie Yesus, "dah agah panci dipadah dinai-nai pun di seruroh deniyo tue si gewai reng tue mat langko' dipadah jum, diingát dikenáng reng. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei," jie Yesus.
41014010	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yudas Iskariot, siko' deri murit Yesus yeng keduwo belas ko' nyeh, manu ke' pada' ketuwo pelayan agama Yahudi madah ke' sidoe ken iyo relo nyerah Yesus ke' sidoe.
41014011	Sidoe pun ayaham ningoe, lalu sidoe bejenyi ngupahe. Mangko Yudas pun ngipoe kelengah nyo' iyo nyerah Yesus ke' sidoe.
41014012	Jedi mátam, dah manu ke' Pesta Roti yeng Noe Bepengemang dah. Ari pertamoe nyeh kin ca' nyemeleh ana' domo kei nyamut Ari Raya Ngelalu. Jedi jie murit Yesus betanyoe ke' Yesus, "Dinailah kami ca' berajen berano' jolu nyo' kau nyamut pesta Ari Raya Ngelalu kaloe?" jie.
41014013	Lalu Yesus mat ngutus murite duwo ko'. "Kam," jie, "ca' ke' kota. Dah detang ke' kota kaloe kam langko' betomu ken siko' reng lelaki yeng nangong tepayan bisei' ayie; dah betomu kaloe kam ngenjurute
41014014	sampai ke' rumahe. Tang ke' rumahe kam pun tamoe, dah nyoe kam tanyoam ke' tuwowe rumah nyeh, posan guru tei' dinaiam ento' kamar temuwai yeng dah diajen kei iyo ken pada' murite ento' ngalu pesta Ari Raya Ngelalu.
41014015	Tuwowe rumah pun langko' ngantar kam ke' kamar bosai di loteng nun gei' kam merati aronge yeng lengkap ken pada' perabote. A, dinyoam kam ca' nyiyápe nyo' diret makan kaloe," jie Yesus.
41014016	Jedi ningo posan Yesus tei' mat turunam murite yeng duwo ko' nyeh. Dah detang ke' kota tei' mat pas cuco'am ken yeng dipadah le' Yesus tadie ponyoe. Sidoe pun ngajen jolu disego to' sidoe nyamut Ari Raya Ngelalu dinyoe.
41014017	Jedi dah ujong ari nyeh Yesus ken murite yeng layin* detang jum.
41014018	Jedi kebonóng sidoe dudo' makan tei' Yesus pun bepadah ke' sidoe, "Mat do siko' deri kam yeng dudo' makan ken aku ditue yeng langko' nyerah aku ke' munsoh ku," jie.
41014019	Pada' murite pun susaham ningo paner Yesus bungi nyoe, lalu sidoe begiler-giler betanyoe ke' Yesus, "Noe ken aku, dih, Tuwowe?," jie.
41014020	"Pie," jie Yesus, "mat siko' deri kam duwo belasame'," jie, "yeng ngencelup rotie ke' lem mangkok beroto ken aku tue," jie, "yeng langko' nyerah aku ke' munsoh ku.
41014021	"Yeng mat si, kamei," jie Yesus, "go aku Ana' Mensiyo nyeh mat ca' matiam cuco' ken yeng dah ditulis ke' hal aku lem Kitap Allah mie. Pie mat parah nar reng yeng nyerah aku ke' munsoh ku. Manseh panci ge' mun iyo noe diado kaliam mie, (deri pado ngerudu ukum yeng langko' dirudue tam iyo nyerah aku)," jie Yesus.
41014022	Jedi kebonóng makan tei' dah nyoe dijepaie Yesus roti nyeh, lalu iyo beterimoe kaseh ke' Apa'e. Dah nyoe roti nyeh dipocah-pocahe, dibecare ke' pada' murite. "Amiam kam," jie Yesus, "segoam; tue tuboh aku," jie.
41014023	Dah nyoe dijepaie jum cawan yeng bisei' ayie angur, lalu besukor beterimoe kaseh agei'am ke' Apa'e. Lalu dibilinge ke' pada' murite; semuya' sidoe pun mat nginsup deri isei' cawan nyoam.
41014024	"Tue," jie Yesus, "derah aku yeng cagar betumpah nyo' reng benya', kei ngesah jenyi semayo Allah ken umát Sen," jie.
41014025	"Aku pun," jie, "cumam nginsup agei' ayie angur tue lem jemán tue. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei. Nginsup noe nginsup," jie, "ca' dah diret beriyah berami nun gi, dah nginsup ayie angur yeng beru des Apa' ku disomah kei rajo gi," jie Yesus nyingka' murite.
41014026	Jedi mátam. Dah makan pesta tei' dah nyoe sidoe nyanyi lagu sekaran; lalu sidoe pun pamus turun ke' Buki' Saitun die.
41014027	Jedi jie Yesus nyingka' murite, "Semuya' kam kaloe langko' rari: aku ditingal kam ming ponyoam," jie. "Go kin ditulis lem Kitap Allah mie yeng bungie potue, Aku, jie Sen, langko' mempungah penungu domo, dah nyoe pada' domo pun langko' pencar temiyar, jie Sen. (Sakaria 13:7)
41014028	Pi," jie Yesus, "dah ku bengki' idup agei' si aku langko' ke' Galilea, bejenjuwong ken kam dinun," jie.
41014029	Pie jie Petrus, "Aku si cum ku ningal kau, numo' pun kau ditingal pada' sidoe layin," jie.
41014030	Pie samut Yesus, "Do die kau ningal aku, malam kaloe ye'," jie nyingka' Petrus. "Malah ken paie bolum mano' tengkuko' duwo kali kaloe kau dah nyangkal aku tigo kali," jie.
41014031	Pie Petrus ngiyal bepadah, "Kepa' pun aku ca' mati ken kau pun pie ku noe ku nyangkal kau peh," jie. Pada' murite yeng layin pun ponyoe jum bungie, cumam sidoe na' nyangkal Yesus, jie.
41014032	Dah nyoe sidoe detang ke' arong demo Getsemani. Jedi jie Yesus nyingka' pada' murite yeng benya' nyeh, "Kam dudo' ditue lo'e. Ku na' bedoa dinun."
41014033	Lalu iyo meyie Petrus, Yohanes ken Yakobus nyo' namahe. Dah nyoe paling na' so disogalam atie, dibelun tam kesusah kegedoh.
41014034	"Ati ku," jie, "na' so ancor luloh po kapor pali'am," jie, "na' so na' matiam, kamei," jie. Dah nyoe jie, "Kam ca' betungu ditue lo'e, bejego ken aku sementaro ku bedoa," jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe tigo nyeh.
41014035	Iyo tei' manu ke' jewoh kit, dah nyoe benyonsam ke' tanah tam kesusah atie. Iyo bedoa minta' ke' Apa'e mun do alore gei' iyo dikiyas deri kesensare nyoe.
41014036	"Abba*, Apa' ku," jie, "Den semuya' uleh semuya' mampu. Siseham kesensare tue deri aku, Pa'ei. Pie nang na' Den nunoe kemawo' aku; tunoam pai yeng Den kemawo'," jie Yesus.
41014037	Dah nyoe iyo bebeli' ke' murite tigo ko' nyeh; diperati le' Yesus tei' sidoe dah tidor dah. Jedi jie Yesus nyingka' Petrus, "Dah tidor dah peh kam, Simon?," jie. "Noe mampu kam nar, poe, bejego sejam pun," jie.
41014038	"Pie kam mat ca' bejegoam, ken ca' bedoa, gei' kam noe kalah sege' digudo. Roh kam si do keingín na' ngelaku yeng panci, pie kemampu kam cum, go tuboh kam mat lomah," jie Yesus.
41014039	Dah nyoe iyo manu agei' ke' ujong kit, bedoa na' po iyo tadie ponyoe.
41014040	Dah nyoe iyo bebeli' ke' murite yeng tigo ko' nyeh; diperatie sidoe tigo ko' nyeh tidor agei'am, go mat kanto'am matoe. Sidoe pun rasoe, pie cum dedal ingele na' nyamut Yesus gopai go nan tidor nyem.
41014041	(Dah bedoa agei' ponyoe) dah nyoe iyo bebeli' ketigo kalie ke' sidoe tigo nyeh. Lalu jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Ne, manseh ngalai tidor nyem gewai kam, poe," jie. "Jediam! Ti beh! Tue dah jengkahe dah kei aku Ana' Mensiyo nyeh ca' diserah ke' reng bedoso.
41014042	Bengki' die," jie, "yo' diret manu ke' sidoe dinun. Ti beh, dah do dah reng yeng langko' nyerah aku," jie Yesus.
41014043	Jedi ketengah iyo ngomóng tei' mat detangam Yudas, siko' deri murite yeng keduwo belas ko' nyeh. Yeng namah Yudas tei' pada' reng rami yeng meyie pada' kelewang ken pementonge. Nyuroh pada' reng rami namah Yudas nyeh tei' go disuroh pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' ugar agama ken pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi.
41014044	Jedi Yudas yeng na' nyerah Yesus tei' tadie ponyoe dah bepakat dah ken reng rami. Jie Yudas nyeh, "Tang kinun sopai ja' reng yeng ku ciyum kaloe, reng nyoame' urange yeng ca' ditangkap; dah ditangkap ati-atiam kam ngenjegoe," jie.
41014045	Jedi mátam, detang kinun tei' Yudas tei' mat lintus manu ke' Yesus. "Guru," jie. Lalu diciyume le' Yudas, na' po reng nyamut gelumo mansa'e.
41014046	Tumas diciyume tei' Yesus pun lintus dicogap reng, lalu dikerebo' ditangkap pada' reng rami.
41014047	Temosie siko' murit Yesus yeng bediri soma' nyoe noe mererema'e ngencabut kelewange lalu pak! mangkah ulun pelayan agong nyeh, sampai rimpong kelinange.
41014048	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' pada' reng rami nyeh, "Ngopai," jie, "go kam nangkap aku ca' bekelewang ca' bepementong? Poe aku tue reng jat nar," jie.
41014049	"Teruhale aku milang ari do ngajar di rumah kediyam Allah; kam pun nan do ningo aku dinun. Pi gopai go keh kam nangkap aku dinun? Ja'e tue tejedi pun go yeng ditijum lem Kitap Sen mie mat ca' dituntongam," jie Yesus.
41014050	Dah nyoe ngaso Yesus ditangkap nyeh pada' murite pun mat rariam, Yesus mat ditingale ming dinyoe.
41014051	Jedi do siko' reng bujang yeng namah ngenjurut Yesus yeng bekekebu' selamar kayin linén nyem. Dah nyoe do reng yeng ngencogap iyo jum, na' nangkape,
41014052	pi tecogap ke' kekebu'e nyem. Unán bujang nyeh mat rari telanyang; kayin linéne ditingale nyem.
41014053	Jedi dah ditangkap tei' Yesus dibeyie le' sidoe ke' rumah pelayan agong lem agama reng Yahudi. Pada' ugar agama demo ke' pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' ketuwo yeng layin pun dah bekumpol bekalue dinyoe.
41014054	Jedi Yesus dibeyie kinyoe. Petrus si ngenjurut deri jewoh, lalu iyo tamoe jum ke' kolong rumah pelayan agong. Iyo dudo' dinyoam ken pada' serededu penjego, bediyang soma' api.
41014055	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus mat dipecaro le' pada' ketuwo pelayan demo ke' semuya' kelompok akim reng Yahudi. Sidoe tei' ngengkorek ngogoe bokti kesalah Yesus, go kona' sidoe iyo ca' diukum mati, pi mat cum nomu boktie.
41014056	Pada' saksi pememuloe nyeh mat benya' nar yeng mempulah Yesus, pie tungkang tangking nyem, cum yeng senyucok belo saksie begesah.
41014057	Kepepuwase do yeng bediri besaksi, ngendudoh Yesus bungie potue.
41014058	"Kami si," jie sidoe, "do ningo iyo tue bepadah ken iyo langko' ngeruma' rumah kediyam Allah yeng dipulah le' mensiyo, jie. Dah diruma'e iyo jie mampu mulahe agei' lem tigo ari nyem, pie yeng noe dipulah le' mensiyo, jie." Ponyoam gesah saksie, pie sidoe memuloe, mempulah Yesus nyem.
41014059	Saksi sidoe pun tungkang tangking jum.
41014060	Pengabise pelayan agong die bediri di adap pada' betore yeng mencaro Yesus, lalu iyo betanyoe ke' Yesus. "Nyeh," jie, "kau noe kau nyangkal peh, yeng disaksi le' sidoe ke' hal kau nyeh?" jie pelayan agong.
41014061	Pie Yesus mat cum iyo nyamute sepatah kato pun, iyo ngojap nyem. Dah nyoe pelayan agong betanyoe agei' ke' Yesus, "Nyeh kau," jie, "mat Kristus Ana' Allah peh?" jie.
41014062	Lalu samut Yesus, "Mat akuame'. Malah ken paie pada' deduwan pun langko' merati boktie yeng nyato nar gi, go dah nyoe gi," jie Yesus, "deduwan cagar merati aku yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo dudo' di serugo nun di sepiya' kanán Allah Apa' ku yeng rajo kuwaso. Dinyoam ku mat disomah kei rajo beroto ken Sen. Dah nyoe aku langko' turun di lem románg nyo' ku mencaro ngakim pada' mensiyo di deniyo tue,*" jie Yesus.
41014063	Jedi dah ningo paner Yesus bungi nyoe tei' pelayan agong tei' simah ngencabi' pekakas direte, kengengiyale atie tam Yesus ngangkue direte samo ken Allah. Jie pelayan agong, "Mun dah bungi nyoe," jie, "dah noe begogoe agei' kesalahe," jie.
41014064	"Kam pun dah ningo dah ken iyo mat menghina ngeremeh Allah," jie nyingka' betore yeng mencaro Yesus tei'. "Nyeh koti kam bebar benya' ngendecing kesalah reng tue?" jie. Sidoe pun nyamut serentakam, mutuse ken Yesus ca' diukum mati.
41014065	Dah nyoe separoe sidoe tei' teger ngelujah Yesus, lalu matoe dikobate ken bonáng, dah nyoe sidoe teger ninyue, samel ngeolo'-olo'e. Jie sidoe nyingka' Yesus, "Ne," jie, "sopaiam di antaro kami yeng ninyu kau tue? Kau kin panai betijum," jie. Pada' serededu penjego pun ramiam nampare jum.
41014066	Jedi mátam te'. Petrus si gei' dudo' di luwar, di kolong rumah pelayan agong. Dah nyoe siko' betinoe pembentue pelayan agong nyeh ngelalue.
41014067	Dah teperati ke' Petrus bediyang nyeh lalu iyo ngenjena' muko Petrus, lalu jie, "Ne, kau pun nan bekaban ken reng deri Nasaret nyeh, tau ku," jie.
41014068	Pie Petrus tei' nyangkale. "Ah, pai ge' maksut omóng kau nyeh?" jie. "Ku noe tawu ku ken omóng kau tue," jie. Lalu Petrus pun ngaleh ke' muko lawang pagar kolong.
41014069	Dah nyoe diperati agei'am dinyoe le' pembentue yeng siko' tadie, lalu jie pembentue nyeh nyingka' reng layin dinyoe, "Ha, reng tue pun bekaban ken sidoe jum," jie.
41014070	Pie Petrus tei' nyangkale agei'am. Dah nyoe noe dam lamat reng yeng bediri di soma' nyeh bungi nyoe agei'am nyingka' Petrus. "Mátam ye'," jie, "kau tue sekaban ken sidoe, go kau kin reng Galilea," jie.
41014071	Pie Petrus tei' simah nyumpah direte; "Aku tarah ke' noe tekenal kaliam ken urang yeng jie kam nyeh," jie.
41014072	Tumas iyo bepaner bungi nyoe tei' temosie mano' pun mat tengkuko' keduwo kalie. Lalu Petrus pun teringáteam ken yeng dipadah le' Yesus tadie ponyoe, ken iyo langko' tigo kali nyangkal Yesus sebolum mano' tengkuko' (duwo kali). Dah teringáte ken omóng Yesus tei' Petrus pun sap! nangisam.
41015001	Jedi mátam te'. Pas bukoe tampa' nyeh pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi yeng layin demo ke' pada' ugar agama ken semuya' kelompok akim nyeh bekumpol bekalue mutus pecaro Yesus. Keputus sidoe Yesus mat ca' dibeyie ngadap gubernor Pilatus; mangko Yesus dipasong ke' jerie, dibeyie sidoe deri nyoe, diserahe ke' gubernor.
41015002	Lalu mátam, dah ngadap Pilatus tei' Pilatus pun nyerudi ke' Yesus ke' hal penomah pendudoh reng ke' hal iyo nyeh. Lalu jie Pilatus, "(Jie sidoe kau madah diret kau rajo reng Yahudi. ) Nyeh kau mat rajo reng Yahudi peh?" jie. Samut Yesus, "Mátam yeng jie den nye', jie.
41015003	Pada' ketuwo pelayan nyeh simah ngendudohe, mat benya' nar gewai jat yeng digewaie, jie sidoe.
41015004	Pie Yesus cum iyo nyamut sepatah kato pun. Lalu Pilatus betanyoe agei'am ke' Yesus. "Dingo beh pada' penomah pendudoh sidoe ke' hal kau nyeh," jie. "Ngopai go ngei' kau nyamute?" jie Pilatus.
41015005	Pie sungoh pun ponyoe Yesus manseh kehe nyamut; iyo ngojap nyem. Ngaso ponyoe tei' Gubernor Pilatus mat kangápam iyo meratie.
41015006	Jedi tiyap Ari Raya Ngelalu nyeh kebiyaso selomo Gubernor Pilatus nan do ngelopas siko' reng yeng ditahane di penjero, nyo' nyenáng ati reng Yahudi. Yeng nentu sopai yeng dipelopase mat reng Yahudiam.
41015007	Jedi ketiko nyoe do siko' reng bedemo Barabas yeng nyomie ponyoe dipenjero ken pada' betore. Go des sidoe ngaca' ngarang reng rami to' ngelawan pemerentah nyeh mat doam iyo munoh reng. Mangko mat dipenjeroam Barabas nyeh.
41015008	Jedi mátam. Ketengah Yesus gei' ngadap Pilatus nyeh dah nyoe do pada' reng Yahudi yeng rami manu ke' Pilatus. Sidoe minta' gei' iyo ngelopas siko' reng yeng ditahane na' po ketongkahe selomoam des Ari Raya Ngelalu nyeh.
41015009	Jedi jie Pilatus nyingka' reng rami nyeh, "A, koti mun ku ngelopas rajo kam reng Yahudi to' kam? Na' noe kam?" jie.
41015010	Bungi Pilatus ponyoe pun tam iyo na' ngelopas Yesus. Nyurohe na' ngelopas Yesus tei' go iyo dah tawu ken Yesus diserah ke' iyo le' pada' ketuwo pelayan pun noe iyo tam kesalahe peh, pie tam sidoe isin dengki nyem. Mangko kona' Pilatus nyeh na' ngelopas Yesus.
41015011	Pie ngaso Pilatus na' ngelopas Yesus tei' mangko pada' ketuwo pelayan teger ngaca' ngarang pada' reng rami gei' nyuroh Barabas ja' dipelopas Pilatus.
41015012	Ningo peminta' reng rami gei' Barabas dipelopase lalu jie Pilatus, "Nyeh mun ponyoe ca' ku pekoti ken reng yeng didemo kam rajo reng Yahudi tue?" jie.
41015013	Pada' reng rami pun bepangkas kayis nyamute, "Disalip ja' iyo!" jie.
41015014	"Pi ngopai iyo ca' disalip?" jie Pilatus. "Pailah kesalahe?" jie. Pie pada' reng rami nyeh kin ontap-ontap pangkas kayis pera' perango, "Disalip ja' iyo," jie.
41015015	Jedi mátam, pengabise mat Barabasam yeng dipelopas Pilatus nyeh, entam iyo na' nyenáng ati reng rami. Yesus si disurohe gei' dipelesah lo'e, dah nyoe mat diserahe le' Pilatus gei' iyo disalip.
41015016	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yesus dibeyie le' pada' serededu nyeh ke' delam rumah gubernor, ke' arong kediyam serededu yeng do di delam nyeh, lalu sidoe ngumpol pada' regue dinyoe.
41015017	Jedi Yesus disaro' sidoe ken beju jubah ungu*, keca'e jubah ungu yeng dipakai kebiyaso le' rajo. Dah nyoe sidoe ngenggolong labong akar durie, lalu dikonoe ke' kepaloe.
41015018	Dah dikonoe ke' kepaloe tei' dah nyoe sidoe bepangkas kayis ca'ca'e besesungko, "Panyang umoram den, rajo reng Yahudiei," jie.
41015019	Bepererotu'am sidoe simah melentonge ke' kepalo Yesus ken tungkate, ken simah dilujahe jum. Sidoe belutut di adape, seolah-olah na' nyomah iyo kei rajoe.
41015020	Dah kepepuwas sidoe meremayín ngererujonge ponyoe dah nyoe dikerama' le' sidoe beju jubah ungu nyeh lalu digentie semulo ken pekakas direte tadie. Dah nyoe iyo mat diiring le' sidoe pamus gei' disalipe.
41015021	Jedi ketengah bejelan nuju ke' luwar kota pada' serededu yeng ngiring Yesus tei' namput betomu ken reng lelaki yeng kememujore detang tomus ke' kota. Demoe tei' Simon; asale deri kota Kirene*. Iyo apa' Aleksander ken Rupus. Jedi ngaso betomu ken Simon di jelan nyeh pada' serededue ngempaksoe ca' nangong salip Yesus.
41015022	Dah nyoe Yesus mat dibeyie ke' arong demo Golgota. Golgota tei' retie Kerakah Kepalo.
41015023	Jedi detang kinun Yesus diunyo' sidoe ken ayie angur becampor ken binya' ancit*, pie iyo ngei'e.

42001079	Dah terobi' nyeh mat tampa'am pada' reng yeng diyam di arong sagam, yeng noe timu rajang di belekang. Tampa' pun kei kakie nyamán bejingkang di jelan lapang, kei idupe tenáng amánam."* Bungi nyoam Sakaria nijum samel mugi Allah.

42002021	Jedi mátam, dah umor icit lapan ari nyeh iyo disunát. Dah nyoe iyo mat didemo Yesus, nunoe pemadah melekat ke' ino'e mie, bolum iyo nganong pun.

42003002	Jedi lamat belamat Allah madah posan payit Sen ke' Yohanes, ana' Sakaria, di padang puwang nun, jewoh deri kota. 42003008	Mun kam mat dah bebeta' piker si ca' do gewai ulah tingkah laku kam to' boktie. Ibarat ke' kayu din mun idup mat ca' bebuwah. Nang na' ngarape kam dipelopas deri ukum Sen tam kam buboh ampeh Kei' Abraham," jie Yohanes. "Allah si," jie, "tentu langko' nuntong jenyi Sen ke' Kei' Abraham nyo' ngendolat ngemberekat buboh ampeh sen, pie Allah si uleh Sen mulah buboh ampeh Kei' Abraham yeng layin die. Noe sa' dituntong ke' kam tue pun. Mun Sen na' si mampu Sen mulah keturun Kei' Abraham deri pada' betu tue pun, to' didolat diberekat Sen. Nyoe mat-mátam. Jedi kam," jie Yohanes, "mat ca' bebeta' pikeram mun kam na' diberekat dolat Sen, ken kam dipelopas deri ukum Sen.
42003009	Go Sen dah na' ngelaju ukum Sen dah. Ibarat ke' nobang kayu din beliyong dah diayun dah ke' betang kayu. Jedi senika' kayu yeng noe bebuwah panci si langko' ditobang lalu dilojang ke' lem api," jie Yohanes.
42003010	Lalu jie pada' reng rami nyeh, "Mun ponyoe pailah yeng ca' digewai kami?" jie.
42003011	Samut Yohanes, "Umpamoe mun kam do beju duwo lamar, yeng selamar ca' diunyo' ke' betor yeng cum bejue. A, ken mun kam do jolu kei sego di kam, ca' dibegi jum ke' betor yeng cum jolu kei segoe," jie Yohanes.
