42004001	Jedi mátam. Yesus mat dikuwaso le' Roh Allah. Jedi dah nyoe iyo ningal ateh Sungai Yordan, lalu diiring le' Roh Allah
42004002	ke' ateh padang puwang nun. Dinyoe iyo digudo le' Pengelakar yeng na' nyurohe bedoso; empat puloh ari empat puloh malam pelamate iyo digudo nyeh. Cumam iyo makan melamat nyoe te'. Jedi dah empat puloh ari pelamate tei' iyo pun mat teraso laparam porute.
42004003	Dah nyoe jie Pengelakar nyingka' Yesus, "Kau kin Ana' Allah," jie. "Boh kau nyuroh pada' betu tue menjedi roti, kei sego kau," jie.
42004004	Pie, "Noe," samut Yesus, "go ditulis lem Kitap Allah bungie potue, Mensiyo idup pun noe iyo engkas tam jolu disego peh," jie Yesus. (Ulang 8:3)
42004005	Dah nyoe iyo ditaban le' Pengelakar ke' arong yeng tingie, lalu rap! awasam pada' nenggeri nenggero di seruroh deniyo tue.
42004006	Lalu jie Pengelakar, "Pada' kekayo kesugeh semuya' nenggeri nenggero tue, ken kuwaso nyo' merentah semuya' segenoe," jie, "mat dah diserah ke' akuam. Mangko aku pun mat behak nyerahe ke' sopai yeng cuco' ken kona' kemawo' aku. Tue pun aku langko' nyerahe ke' kau," jie.
42004007	"Mun kau na' belutut nyomah ke' aku si," jie, "semuya' segeloe mat to' engku diret kauam," jie Pengelakar.
42004008	Pie samut Yesus, "Noe," jie, "go dah ditulis lem Kitap Allah mie yeng bungie potue, Kau ca' nyomah ke' Tuwowe, Allah kau; ca' patoh engkas ke' diret Sénam, " jie Yesus. (Ulang 6:13)
42004009	Jedi iyo ditaban dibeyie le' Pengelakar ke' kota Yerusalem, lalu disurohe bediri di puco' bubong rumah kediyam Allah. Dah nyoe jie Pengelakar, "Kau kin Ana' Allah," jie. "Boh kau ngelumpat ke' beroh nun. Mun kau mat Ana' Allah kin kau noe beronso," jie; "tentu Allah ngiyas kau.
42004010	Go kin ditulis lem Kitap Allah mie yeng bungie potue, Belo melekat disuroh Sen nulong kau, gei' ngenjego kau.
42004011	Sidoe nyamut kau gei' kau noe beronso bemalo; kaki kau pun noe ningang betu," (Masmur 91:11-12) jie Pengelakar. "Ngelumpatam," jie. "Kau kin noe beronso," jie.
42004012	Pie samut Yesus, "Noe," jie, "go ditulis lem Kitap Sen mie bungie potue, Nang na' nguji Tuwowe, Allah kau," jie Yesus. (Ulang 6:16)
42004013	Jedi mátam, dah bemacam bejenis penggudo Pengelakar nyeh lalu Pengelakar pun ningal Yesus, rariam; iyo nantie kelorong layin die nyo' iyo ngenggudoe agei', kajie nun.
42004014	Jedi mátam. Yesus mat pulang ke' peloya' Galilea. Roh Allah pun nan nguwasoe. Agah berito gewai Yesus pun tegempar ke' segonáp nenggeri nyoe.
42004015	Jedi iyo betatap ngajar di pada' rumah semeyang reng Israel; pada' reng yeng ningo pengajare pun mat mugi iyo.
42004016	Lamat belamat dah nyoe pulang ke' kampong Nasaret die, kediyam iyo gei' biya' mie. Jedi dah ari Saptu tei' iyo pun ke' rumah semeyang, po selomoam. Nongah semeyang lalu iyo bediri na' beco posan payit Allah.
42004017	Diunyo' le' pelayan buko' yeng ditulis penijum Yesaya mie, kei iyo ngembecoe. Lalu dibintare buko' te', nomu beco tijum Yesaya yeng bungie potue:
42004018	Roh Allah Tuwowe renán di aku, tam mat akuam yeng dipileh le' Allah kei madah agah panci ke' reng bensat, kei ngelopas reng dipeulun le' Pengelakar, kei nulong reng butoe gei' mencináng, ge'em kei nulong reng yeng dipempungah le' munsohe.
42004019	Ku diutus kei madah ken tue mat jengkahe Allah Tuwowe na' nulong ngendolat umát Sen. (Yesaya 61:1-2) Nyoam tijum Yesaya yeng dibeco le' Yesus.
42004020	Jedi dah iyo ngembecoe tei' Yesus pun digilinge agei' buko' nyeh tei', diunyo'e ke' pelayan nyeh. Dah nyoe iyo pun dudo', go iyo na' ngajar. Pada' umát di rumah semeyang tei' nelomát ke' iyo bisam, na' ningo panere.
42004021	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Mat tuntongam, ari tue tei'am, tijum yeng ku beco tadie," jie Yesus. Lalu iyo ngajar nerange ke' sidoe.
42004022	Pada' umát nyeh pun mugi pengajar iyo. Kangápam sidoe ningo iyo ngomóng panci-panci ponyoe, go mun ditinyau ke' apa'e si Yusup nyem, reng sekampong ken sidoe.
42004023	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Ne, pasti kam na' madah perbeso diret ke' aku, go jie perbeso tei' Dokter ca' tawu ngembeyi' direte. Maksut kam na' nyuroh aku ngenggewai keenah keaneh di kampong diret ku tue, na' po kam ningo ku ngenggewai di peloya' Kapernaum. Nyoam kona' kam," jie Yesus.
42004024	"Pi yeng mat si," jie Yesus, "(kira' pun ku mulah keenah keaneh si manseh ngei' kam pecayo ken aku, go) nan kikeh reng nerimoe ngehormát penijum deri nenggeri direte," jie.
42004025	"Benso penijum Elia mie. Jedi ketiko nyoe kin tigo tawun setengah cum ari ujan, sampai buyun pada' mensiyo di segonáp nenggeri Israel tue. Pasti benya' reng belu yeng bensat di Israel tue ketiko reng buyun nyeh.
42004026	Pi Kei' Elia yeng seli deri Israel tue pun noe disuroh Allah nulong reng Israel peh. Sen disuroh Allah nulong siko' reng belu di nenggeri layin die, di kota Sarpat, di peloya' Sidon nun.
42004027	"A, ponyoe jum penijum Elisa mie, yeng seli deri nenggeri diret Israel tue jum. Ketiko nyoe mie mat benya' reng Israel yeng bepenyaki' kusta yeng uyoh. Pie reng Israel yeng saki' kusta nyeh siko' pun cum yeng ditulong le' Kei' Elisa. Yeng ditulong sen ngat siko' Naamanam, reng deri nenggeri Siria die, noe iyo reng Israel peh," jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe yeng sekampong ken iyo.
42004028	Ningo panere bungi nyoe ugas godiam pada' umát di rumah semeyang te'.
42004029	Temosie sidoe rami nyeh bediri lalu sekali rap! nunong Yesus deri kamponge. Dah ditunonge lalu dibeyie le' sidoe ke' cabing natai soma' kamponge, go kampong nyoe di bunus, jedi kaji sidoe na' ngelojang Yesus ke' beroh.
42004030	Pi iyo si lopasam deri sidoe, dirudue ponyoam pada' reng rami nyeh, lalu kamponge nyoe ditingaleam le' Yesus.
42004031	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yesus sidoe bejelan ke' kampong Kapernaum di peloya' Galilea. Jedi dah Ari Berenti Kerejo ponyoe iyo pun ngajar reng di rumah semeyang.
42004032	Mat kangápam pada' reng yeng ningo pengajare, go posan payit iyo mat bekuwasoam.
42004033	Jedi di rumah semeyang ari nyoe tei' poe do siko' reng lelaki yeng kesarong setan. Dah nyoe iyo bepangkas kayis ontapam,
42004034	"Adohai! Parah nar! Pai gewai kau kitue, ngaru kami, Yesus deri Nasaret? Ku tawu ku dah ken kau mat reng suci bereseh yeng diutus le' Allah," jie. "Kau detang tam dah na' mempungah kami peh?" jie.
42004035	Pi Yesus tegasam negur setan nyeh. "Diyam!" jie. "Keluwaram kau deri reng tue," jie. Tumas Yesus bungi nyoe semorie reng nyoe bap! jetue terompas di adap pada' reng rami tam kuwaso setan nyeh, pie noe die diderakoe; dah nyoe setan nyeh pun lintus keluwaram deri reng nyoe, lalu rari ningal iyo.
42004036	Pada' reng rami pun kangápam, lalu bepaner siko' ken betore, "Enah nar gewai guru yeng beru tue!" jie. "Iyo mat bekuwaso nunong merentah antu setan pun! Na'e rari tuno' taalo' ke' iyo," jie reng rami.
42004037	Mangko agah berito ke' hal gewai Yesus mat tegemparam di seruroh peloya' nyoe.
42004038	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yesus turun deri rumah semeyang lalu nayi' ke' rumah Simon die. Poe mentuwo Simon yeng betinoe tei' domám kuwat noe bengki'-bengki' nyem, lalu sidoe minta' tulong Yesus.
42004039	Yesus pun mat manu, lalu iyo nyuroh domáme tedoh. Tumas disuroh le' Yesus tei' lalu domáme pun mat beyi'am. Iyo pun lintus bengki'am lalu iyo ngeleladen Yesus sidoe.
42004040	Jedi ujong ari, dah mato ari ngelangar gunóng nyeh mat benya' reng yeng naban pada' betore yeng saki' poníng rodang rungue ke' Yesus. Yesus pun nyampang jerie ke' tiyap ko' reng saki' nyo' iyo ngembeyi'e, lalu mat beyi'am pada' penyaki' reng.
42004041	Pada' setan pun ponyoe jum, bererariam deri pada' reng yeng disaronge. Samel rari pada' setan nyeh simah kuwang kawung bungie, "Kau mat Ana' Allah," jie. Pie Yesus tegas nyacue, nyurohe ngojap, go pada' setan kin tawue ken iyo mat Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah. Mangko didahe le' Yesus pada' setan nyeh bepadah ke' hal iyo.
42004042	Jedi mátam. Pagi ponyoe dah bukoe tampa' nyeh Yesus pamus deri kampong nyoe manu ke' arong yeng sunyei'. Pada' reng rami pun begoyau ngogoe Yesus; pengabise Yesus mat ditomu le' sidoe di arong sunyei' nyeh. Maksut sidoe na' ngidah Yesus rari deri kampong nyoe.
42004043	Pie jie Yesus, "Aku noe tawu na' renán di kampong tue. Aku ca' bejelan betatap ke' pada' kampong layin jum, nyo' ku madah agah panci ke' hal Allah des Sen disomah kei rajo. Ngopai ge' go aku diutus Sen ke' deniyo tue pun nyo' ku madah agah panci nyoe," jie Yesus.
42004044	Mangko iyo mat ngeresudu' madah agah panci di pada' rumah semeyang reng Yahudi di seruroh peloya' Yudea.
42005001	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yesus tei' mat madah posan payit Allah di kenaming Lompoe Genesaret. Pada' reng rami pun bederum bededokut ngeliling iyo, na' ningo pengajare.
42005002	Jedi diperati Yesus tei' di pinger ayie do duwo buwah perawu yeng ditingal le' tuwowe dinyoe go tuwowe nyeh tei' kebonónge ngembereseh jeloe.
42005003	Jedi ngaso didudu le' reng rami nyeh Yesus pun ngaleh ke' perawu yeng engku Simon, lalu iyo minta' gei' perawu nyeh dijonyónge kit deri kenaming. Dah nyoe Simon pun mat ngenjonyóng perawu nyeh. Dah dijonyónge tei' Yesus pun mat dudo' dinyoe, dah nyoe iyo mat ngajar pada' reng rami yeng di derat nyeh.
42005004	Jedi dah santo' iyo ngajar reng rami nyeh dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' Simon, "Jonyóngam ke' tongah nun perawu kam, nyo' kam ngenjelo arong nun," jie.
42005005	Pie samut Simon, "Daham, Tuwowei, sampai nungkas malam kami belelah bejoreh ngenjelo, pi cum buleh. Ja'e mun disuroh kau Tuwowe kami si na' ku ngibar jelo ku agei'," jie.
42005006	Jedi mátam, Petrus sidoe mat ngibar jeloe na' po yeng disuroh le' Yesus. Tumas dikibare semorie perekijik, mat ponoh jelo nyeh te', sampai na' teroras.
42005007	Ngaso benya' buleh tei' lalu sidoe ngowai betore di lem perawu yeng sebuwah nyeh, minta' tulong sidoe. Dah detang pada' betore tei' semuya' sidoe ngencolo' ikan di lem jelo nyeh lalu diongkahe ke' lem perawu, sampai sarat perawu duwo buwah nyeh te' tam kebenya' ikan uleh jelo nyeh.
42005008	Jedi dah diperati Simon Petrus keenah keaneh nyeh tei' iyo pun tepesungkur di adap Yesus. "Nang na' begelumo ken aku, Tuwowei, go aku mat reng bedoso," jie.
42005009	Go iyo mat kagum merati pada' pekuleh ikan memenya' nyoe. Pada' ana' buwahe lem perawu pun kangáp jum meratie;
42005010	a, ponyoe jum peraso Yakobus ken Yohanes, ana' Sebedeus, yeng nan beregu ngenjelo ken Simon. Semuya' sidoe mat kagumam. Pie jie Yesus nyingka' Simon, "Nang gola', Simonei. Bedudo' ari tuam kam langko' ngenjelo mensiyo die," jie.
42005011	Lalu mátam, dah perawu nyeh ditari' sidoe ke' derat nyeh lalu semuya' segenoe ditingaleam le' sidoe nyo' sidoe ngenjurut Yesus.
42005012	Jedi mátam. Des Yesus nongah do di sebuwah kampong nyeh dah nyoe iyo dipanu le' siko' reng yeng tubohe tumpat keyayat tam penyaki' kusta; mat lelah nar iyo ngidape. Jedi dah teperati ke' Yesus tei' reng penyaki' kusta nyeh tei' bap! tepesungkur di adap Yesus, teger muhún mampal minta' tulong Yesus. "Tuwowe," jie, "mun den na' nyuroh penyaki' ku tue beyi' si pasti uleh den," jie.
42005013	Dah nyoe Yesus pun mat ngenjola' jerie lalu nigue reng saki' nyeh.* "Ku na' ku nulong kau," jie. "Beyi'am penyaki' kau," jie. Tumas iyo ngomóng bungi nyoe penyaki' kusta nyeh mat losiam deri reng nyoe te'.
42005014	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Tue," jie, "kau ca' manu ke' pelayan Allah di rumah kediyam Allah lo'e, nyo' iyo mereso kuli' kau, gei' iyo merati ken penyaki' kau dah beyi'. A, beyie jum pesaling nyo' ngerinah adat pembereseh kau na' po yeng disuroh le' Kei' Musa mie, nyo' ngembokti ke' reng rami ken penyaki' kau mat dah beyi' dah," jie Yesus. "Pie nang na' dipadah ke' sopai pun ken aku yeng ngembeyi' kau.”
42005015	Pie kebelike agah berito ke' hal Yesus nyeh semingkin tegemparam. Sampai pada' reng rami bederum bekumpol to' ningo iyo ngajar ge'em, ken to' iyo ngembeyi' penyaki'e ge'em.
42005016	(Yesus pun mat ngajar ken ngembeyi' pada' reng rami.) Pie erat jum iyo ningal reng rami nyo' iyo bedoa di arong yeng sunyei' kit.
42005017	Jedi mátam. Yesus mat bejelan betatap nyo' ngajar ken ngembeyi' pada' reng yeng saki'. Dah nyoe do pada' reng deri kelompok Parisi ken pada' ugar agama pun yeng detang ningoe jum, deri pada' kampong Galilea, deri peloya' Yudea, ken deri Yerusalem pun. Jedi dah manu ke' Yesus tei' sidoe dudo' ningo Yesus ngajar. Yesus pun nan do kuwaso Tuwowe nyo' iyo ngembeyi' reng saki' pun.
42005018	Jedi mátam. Kebonóng Yesus ngajar tei' do reng detang nangong reng siko' di tikare; urange timpang. Kaji sidoe na' tamoe ke' delam gei' sempayo reng timpang nyeh diongkahe di adap Yesus nyo' iyo ngembeyi'e.
42005019	Pie tam tumpat keyayat pada' reng rami nyeh mat noe mampu tamoe ke' delam, mangko sidoe nayi' ke' puco' atap die, lalu dipucele atap nyeh, dah nyoe reng timpang nyeh diulore ken tikare ke' beroh, di penenongah pada' reng rami, pas di senopang Yesus.
42005020	Jedi diperati Yesus tei' sidoe mat pecayoam ken kuwaso iyo. Lalu jie Yesus nyingka' reng timpang nyeh, "Dah dielon dah doso kau, jangei," jie.
42005021	Jedi ningo paner Yesus bungi nyoe tei' pada' reng Parisi ken pada' ugar agama nyeh do ngaji lem atie nun, "Somong nar reng tue!" kajie nun. "Iyo menghina ngeremeh Allah, go iyo ngangap direte samo ken Allah, poe. Noe ken mampue ngelon doso reng, ngat siko' Allaham yeng tawu ngelon doso," kaji sidoe nun.
42005022	Pie Yesus tei' tawue ken pemiker sidoe, lalu iyo nyamute, "Ngopai go pengaji kam tokoh nyoe?" jie.
42005023	-
42005024	"Kaji kam aku noe bekuwaso ento' ngelon doso reng, dih? Nyoe pun maring dibokti, go noe awas ken mato diret. Pie potue ne ku ngemboktie ke' kam omóng ku tadie. Jedi diret kin tawu ken ngat Allaham yeng tawu ngelon doso reng. Ken ngat Allaham jum yeng tawu ngembeyi' reng caro bekato nyem. A, jedi mun aku yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo mampu ngembeyi' reng tue, maksute aku bekuwaso ento' ngelon dosoe jum, mat noe?" Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' reng timpang nyeh, "Bengki'am kau," jie, "tangongam tikar kau nyeh, bom na' pulang bediret kau pun," jie.
42005025	Seroto ningo omóng Yesus bungi nyoe tei' reng timpang pun mat sengkunyong jogaram; iyo bengki'am, ditangonge tikar ketidore, lalu pulangam, samel mugi Allah.
42005026	Pada' reng rami yeng meratie pun mat kangáp; sidoe mugi Allah jum. Mat kagumam sidoe. "Enah nar jolu yeng diperati diret ari tue!" jie pada' reng rami.
42005027	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus turun bejelan agei'am. Lalu iyo merati siko' urang yeng bedemo Lewi, yeng tugase ngumpol nageh pajak pemerentah. Jedi Lewi tei' nongah dudo' di pos penageh pajak. Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka'e, "Yo' tamah aku to' menjedi murit aku," jie.
42005028	Dah ningo omóng Yesus bungi nyoe tei' Lewi pun lintus ditingaleam gewaie ngumpol pajak nyeh, lalu mat namah Yesus.
42005029	Dah nyoe Lewi ngunang ngamie pada' reng rami nyo' ngadap pesta di rumahe, nyo' iyo ngalu nyamut Yesus. Pada' kabane penageh pajak pemerentah, ken pada' reng layin pun ngabang jum.
42005030	Jedi pada' reng Parisi ken pada' ugar agama yeng sekelompok ken sidoe mat begunau ken pada' murit Yesus. "Gopai beh," jie, "go kam gela' segewol segelumo ken pada' reng jat nyeh? Makan samo pun na' kam, poe, ken pada' penageh pajak pun," jie.
42005031	Pie Yesus pun nyamut sidoe pakai perbeso. "Noe iyo reng jogar peh yeng perelu ditentamo, pie reng yeng saki' die.
42005032	Aku detang ke' deniyo tue pun," jie Yesus, "noe iyo nyo' ngunang ngamie reng bujor benar peh. Pi ku detang na' ngunang ngamie pada' reng bedoso die, gei' sidoe bebeta' piker," jie Yesus.
42005033	Jedi dah nyoe do reng betanyoe ke' Yesus. "Ngopai nin beh go murit kau noe koloe betara' noe makan? Sidoe nan bekumpol makan beriyah berami nyem, poe. Tekonoe ke' pada' murit Yohanes ken murit reng kelompok Parisi si na'e betara' noe makan, na'e sidoe ngerinah doae," jie sidoe.
42005034	Dah nyoe Yesus nyamut sidoe caro betanyoe. "Umpamoe des kelelotong reng pesta sabat nyeh patut noe mun pada' pengabange betara' noe makan? Kin noe patutam, dih? Malah ken paie beriyah beramiam pada' pengabange, sementaro penganting lelaki nyeh gei' do ken sidoe.
42005035	Pie langko' do jum jengkah des penganting lelaki nyeh langko' diamie dirobut deri sidoe. Dah nyoe si mat doam pada' kabane yeng betara'," jie Yesus. "Jedi ponyoe jum murit ku ken aku," jie.
42005036	Dah nyoe iyo nyamong panere pakai perempamo yeng layin die. "Cum reng yeng ngencarek bejue yeng beru nyo' nampal bejue yeng buro', dih? Go mun ponyoe kin samo rugi: yeng beru cabi' menyabi', a, yeng buro' pun noe tetampal, go bonáng beru kin noe cuco' ken yeng buro'.
42005037	A, ponyoe jum ken ayie angur yeng beru, yeng bolum popah nyeh. Noe ken disaling reng ke' lem kantong kuli' yeng lamat yeng dah korue nyeh. Go mun ayie angur yeng beru dah popah kin kantong lamat nyeh pasti melotus, lalu kededuwo nyeh rugi modasam. Ayie angur pun bis tumpah modas, ken kantong nyeh pun pocah bolah.
42005038	Pie yeng konoe si," jie Yesus, "ayie angur yeng beru mat ca' disaling ke' lem kantong kuli' yeng beru jum," jie Yesus.
42005039	"A, pie ke' hal ayie angur si reng yeng dah ngicap yeng lamat nyeh mat ngei'e nginsup yeng beru, go jie iyo ngat yeng lamat nyem yeng nyamán," jie. Nyoam perempamo Yesus.
42006001	Jedi mátam, dah nyoe Yesus sidoe bejelan ngerudu kebun genum reng. Samel bejelan tei' murite ngeropai genum nyeh, lalu disegoe. Sedang ari nyoe Ari Berenti Kerejo.
42006002	Jedi dah nyoe do pada' reng Parisi yeng betanyoe ke' Yesus, "Ngopai go pada' murit kau ngelangar ukum agama diret? Ari Berenti Kerejo kin gewai tokoh nyoe noe buleh," jie.
42006003	Pie Yesus nyamute, "Kei' Daud mie pun ge'e," jie, "do jum sen ngelangar ukum agama diret, ketiko desiyan lapar nyomie. Noe koloe peh kam ugar agama beco gesah nyoe?" jie Yesus.
42006004	"Kei' Daud kin entam sen lapar mie mat tamoe ke' arong kediyam Allah, lalu diamie sen roti yeng diunyo' reng kei pesaling ke' Allah, disego sen. Separoe dibecar sen ke' pada' kaban sen. Teruhal na' nunoe ukum agama diret kin roti nyoe noe buleh disego semadi urang; ngat ento' disego pada' pelayan Allah bangam," jie.
42006005	"(Pie cum kam nyalah gewai Kei' Daud, engo ku. Konai kam na' nyalah aku tam gewai murit ku des Ari Berenti Kerejo nyeh?) Hale aku Ana' Mensiyo mat Tuwowe semuya' segeloe; akuam yeng mutuse ke' hal pai yeng patut digewai des Ari Berenti Kerejo pun," jie.
42006006	Jedi mátam. Dah layin arie des Ari Berenti Kerejo agei' nyeh Yesus pun nayi' ke' rumah semeyang, lalu ngajar. Jedi kebonóng iyo ngajar tei' poe dinyoe do reng yeng mayus jeri kanáne.
42006007	Pada' reng kelompok Parisi ken pada' ugar agama do jum dinyoe, pie sidoe ngengkorek ngogoe kesalah Yesus. Mangko sidoe teliti meratie, gola' iyo ngembeyi' reng des Ari Berenti Kerejo. Kaji sidoe nun mun Yesus ngembeyi' reng des Ari Berenti Kerejo nyeh sidoe na' nuntut mencaroe.
42006008	Pie Yesus kin tawue ken arau amue sidoe, lalu jie Yesus nyingka' reng mayus nyeh, "Bediriam kau, di adap reng rami tue," jie. Lalu reng mayus pun bediriam.
42006009	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' pada' reng rami nyeh, "Tue ku betanyoe ke' kam. Jedi na' nunoe ukum agama diret si des Ari Berenti Kerejo," jie, "gewai pailah yeng buleh digewai? Gewai panciei, gewai jatei? Nulong betorei, mempungah betorei?" jie.
42006010	Dah nyoe Yesus pun merati ke' tiyap-tiyap sidoe rato-ratoe, gola' do yeng na' nyamute, pie sidoe ngojap nyem. Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' reng mayus nyeh, "Lontaram jeri kau," jie. Dah ningo Yesus bungi nyoe tei' reng mayus pun mat ngelontar jerie; tumas dilontare jerie pun mat beyi'am.
42006011	Pie pada' reng kelompok Parisi nyeh rajo godiam ken Yesus, lalu sidoe bepempaham bepempakat siko' ken betore ke' hal Yesus; ca' dikotilah reng tue? jie.*
42006012	Lamat belamat dah nyoe Yesus mendeki natai to' iyo bedoa. Nungkas malam iyo mat bedoa ke' Allah.
42006013	Jedi dah bekolame ponyoe iyo ngaja' pada' murite to' manu ke' iyo, dah nyoe dipilehe duwo belas ko' yeng didemoe pelantar posane.
42006014	Yeng dipilehe tei' ya'am Simon yeng digelare jum Petrus, Andreas menyadie Simon, Yakobus, Yohanes, Pilipus, Bartolomeus,
42006015	Matius, Tomas, Yakobus ana' Alpeus, Simon Patriot,
42006016	Yudas ana' Yakobus bukan urange, ken Yudas Iskariot, yeng pengabise nyerah Yesus ke' munsohe.
42006017	Dah nyoe Yesus sidoe turun deri natai nuju ke' arong yeng lonah kit soma' kaki natai. Pada' murite yeng rami pun bekumpol dinyoe, ken pada' reng rami yeng layin pun mat benya' jum, beyi' deri seruroh peloya' Yudea, beyi' deri Yerusalem, beyi' deri peloya' Tirus ken Sidon di pantai lawut;
42006018	mat ramiam reng yeng bejejiyoh manu ke' Yesus, na' ningo iyo ngajar ken na' dipebeyi'e ge'em. Pada' reng kesarong setan pun mat dipebeyi'e le' Yesus.
42006019	Pada' reng rami nyeh mat dudu mendudu ken betore manu ke' soma' Yesus nyo' ngenjemele, go mat doam kuwaso di Yesus to' ngembeyi' semuya' segeno reng saki'.
42006020	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus ngelinga' ke' pada' murite, lalu jie, "Untong tuwah kam yeng cum bedeyo, go kam die yeng konoe kawum des Allah disomah kei rajo.
42006021	"Untong tuwah kam yeng gei' tue teraso lapar, go kam die yeng langko' sabas. "Untong tuwah kam yeng gei' tue susah sontok berato berayi, go kam die yeng langko' beayah bikah.
42006022	"Untong tuwah kam mun kam dikerisie reng, ditunong reng, dipehina dikejat dipempulah reng pun tam kam arap ken aku Ana' Mensiyo.
42006023	Pie kam mat ca' beayah bikah beriyah beramiam sege' dipulah reng tokoh nyoe, go upah kam dah Ari Kiyamát gi mat bosaiam. Kam mat langko' diupah beroto ken pada' penijum Allah nyomiam; desiyan kin nan dipehina dikejat reng jum mie. Malah ken paie reng yeng menghina ngejat kam tengkalo tue mat buboh ampeh reng yeng menghina ngejat desiyan nyomiam. Pie kam mat ca' ayah bikaham, go upah kam mat bosaiam.
42006024	"Pie parah nar kam yeng kayo rayo yeng mementing jolu di deniyo tue, go kam dah buleh dah jolu yeng dikeingín dikeayah kam. Dah nyoe gi cumam jolu yeng langko' diunyo' ke' kam.
42006025	"Parah nar kam yeng gei' tue sabas go nan do jolu kei sego nyem pie kam noe sadar ken kam mat perelu ken Sen, go dah nyoe gi kamame' yeng langko' beleloe. "Parah nar kam yeng segontang mementing ayah bikah di deniyo tue nyem, pie kam noe susah tam doso kam, go dah nyoe gi kam die yeng langko' ngaso susah sontok berato berayi.
42006026	"Parah nar kam yeng segontang ngaji na' nan dipugi semuya' urang. Awas! Kam na' po pada' penijum tiru peh? Pada' penijum tiru mie kin nan dipugi reng. Malah ken paie sidoe yeng mugi kam tengkalo tue mat samoam ken akei' puyange mie, yeng gela' mugi pada' penijum tiru mie," jie Yesus.
42006027	Jedi jie Yesus, "Tue posan ku ke' kam yeng na' ningo aku, ya'am kam ca' ngaseh reng yeng bemunsoh ken kam. Ca' melas panci ken reng yeng risie ken kam.
42006028	Ca' minta' ke' Allah gei' Sen ngendolat ngemberekat reng yeng nyumpah misoh kam. A, ge'em ca' bedoa nyo' reng yeng jat ken kam.
42006029	"Nang na' melas kejat reng. Umpamoe mun do reng nampar kumping kanán kau, ca' ngelinga' ke' kiboe to' iyo nampar kumping kiboe kau jum. A, ponyoe jum, mun do reng yeng ngerampas beju jubah kau nang na' ngidahe. Sekurang beju jubah; beju kau layin pun diunyo' jum.
42006030	"Mun do reng minta' tulong kau, ca' ditulongam. Lalu mun jolu kau dirampas reng pun ma'am, nang na' kau maksoe ca' dipulang.
42006031	"Tingkah laku yeng diret keingín deri betor, nyoam kei pasa' budi beso diret teradap betor.
42006032	"Kam mat ca' ngaseh munsoh kam. Go mun kam ngat ngaseh betor yeng samo ngaseh kam, nyoe noe iyo gewai enah peh; nang na' ngarape kam do upah deri Sen mun segontang ngaseh betor yeng kaseh ken kam. Go semalang ke' reng yeng noe menduli Allah pun ge'e, tawue jum ngaseh betore yeng samo kaseh ken iyo, sa'am go kam.
42006033	A, ponyoe jum mun kam ngat panci ken reng yeng panci ken kam; nyoe noe iyo gewai enah peh; nang na' ngarape kam do upah deri Sen mun gewai kam segontang panci ken betor yeng panci ken kam nyem. Go semalang ke' reng yeng noe menduli Allah pun ge'e, tawue jum panci ken betore yeng panci ken iyo nyeh, sa'am go kam.
42006034	Ponyoe jum mun kam ngat ngunyo' jolu ke' reng yeng engoe mampu melas ngunyo' jolu jum ke' kam; nyoe noe iyo gewai enah peh. Nang na' ngarape kam do upah deri Sen mun kam ngat ngunyo' jolu ke' reng yeng mampu melas kam gi. Semalang ke' reng yeng noe menduli Allah pun ge'e, tawue jum ngunyo' jolu ke' betore tam iyo ngarape pasti geram pulang takar.
42006035	"Pie kepanci kam ca' lobeh deri nyoe. Sa'am benso ngaseh betor yeng kaseh ken kam; reng yeng bemunsoh ken kam pun ca' dikaseh jum. Kam mat ca' panci ken reng yeng bemunsoh ken kam. Ken kam ca' nulong reng caro modas-modasam, nang na' ngaji ca' dibelase sikit pun. Mun gewai kam tokoh nyoe si upah kam gi mat mewaham. Go semalang ke' Allah yeng rajo tingie pun ge'e, Sen manseh ngaseh pada' reng yeng jat pun, yeng noe koloe beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen; mangko kam pun ca' ponyoe jum. Mun kam mat nunoe gewai Sen nyeh maksute mat nyato ken kam mat ana' Sen.
42006036	Kam mat ca' do kekaseh kam ken sopai pun, na' po Apa' diret do kekaseh Sen ken sopai pun," jie Yesus.
42006037	"Nang pedo memedo nyalah betor," jie Yesus, "mangko kam pun noe dipedo reng. Nang lokas semadie nyalah betor kam, mangko kam pun langko' noe semadie disalah betor jum. Pie ke' hal ngelon si kam ca' ngelon kesalah betor, mangko kesalah kam pun dielon jum.
42006038	Ge'em ca' buwar ken betor, mangko kam pun langko' diunyo' belobeh-lobeham, keedah geredoh yeng ngisei'e bekuca', lalu teonya' kental, sampai berabong. Memenya' nyoe diret ngunyo' memenya' nyoe jum diret nerimoe," jie Yesus.
42006039	Dah nyoe iyo nyamong panere manseh pakai perempamo. "Reng butoe kin noe mampu ngiring pado butoe, go kededuwo ko' nyeh kin pasti tepacok ke' tebiyang.
42006040	Mangko kam ca' ati-ati mun na' nulong betor. Mat ca' po akuam. Murit kin noe lobeh deri gurue, pie mun dah diajar teliti si murit pun pengabise po gurueam.
42006041	"Pie mun kam na' nulong betor si ca' mereso keidup diret kam dolo'e. Gopai go kam na' po jie perbeso, Kejemis kayu di mato betor ketawu, konoe ke' kayu temerugu di kelomer mato direte noe ketawue.
42006042	Panai nar kam, poe; kam mat jelas ken doso betor kam, pie ken doso diret kam noe ketawu kam. Kam alap-alape nyem bujor benar. Pie kam mat ca' mereso tingkah laku diret kamam, ca' dipepanci lo'e; dah nyoe berue kam nyelidik kelaku betor, nyo' kam nulonge," jie Yesus.

42006044	"Setiyap kayu kin ca' dikenal deri buwahe. Kam kin tawu ngembedo kayu buwah ken rumput bedurie! Noe koloe reng nguleh buwah manis deri rampue gedong, dih? A, ponyoe jum kayu yeng joboh, buwahe kin panci, mat noe koloe bebuwah jat, ken kayu yeng kodel noe koloe bebuwah panci, dih? Go buwah kayu kin poko' deri bungkonge, panciei jatei.
42006045	Jedi ponyoe jum mensiyo. Reng yeng panci si tingkah lakue pun panciam, go bungkonge mat deri ati pemikere yeng nan serarat mementing ngaji yeng panci. Pie reng jat si tingkah lakue pun jat, go bungkonge deri ati pemikere nun yeng nan ngaji yeng jat nyem. Go jolu yeng dikosohe mat tumoh deri atie," jie Yesus.
42006046	"Kam kin betuwowe ke' aku. Pie pai ge' gunoe kam betuwowe ke' aku," jie Yesus, "mun kam ngei' tuno' taalo' ke' aku?" jie.
42006047	Dah nyoe iyo madah perempamo tue. "Jedi," jie Yesus, "do benya' reng yeng manu ke' aku, yeng ningo posan payit ku lalu mat makaie.
42006048	Ku merempamo sidoe ken reng yeng siko' yeng na' mulah rumah. Jedi lubang pondasie dikalie delam, sampai jejak ke' betu kalas, gei' rumahe togap kukoh. Mangko dah ditumpu ayie pasang delam pun rumahe noe beguyap beguyu sikit pun, go mat togap kukoham," jie Yesus.
42006049	"Pi do jum benya' reng yeng ningo posan payit aku pie engkas ningoe nyem, mat noe makaie. Ku merempamo sidoe ken siko' urang yeng mulah rumah jum, pie iyo kehe ngali lubang pondasie; iyo ngeletak kipe sempanal dal di tanah nyem. Dah nyoe des ditumpu ayie pasang delam nyeh lalu gum! robaham rumahe, tebelengi' sampai tekabasam," jie Yesus.
42007001	Jedi mátam. Dah ngajar pada' reng rami nyeh dah nyoe Yesus sidoe turun ke' Kapernaum.
42007002	Dinyoe tei' poe do siko' ana' buwah kapten tentara yeng saki' uyoh, tingal penyawo di dedoe dam. Kapten nyeh mat paling melas kaseh ken ana' buwahe.
42007003	A, kapten nyeh dah koloe ningo ke' hal Yesus, mangko dah ana' buwahe saki' nyeh kapten pun nyuroh beberopai ko' ketuwo reng Yahudi to' manu ke' Yesus, minta' ke' Yesus gei' manu ngembeyi' penyaki' ana' buwah nyeh te'.
42007004	Jedi pada' ketuwo tei' mat manu ke' Yesus, ngemoran na' nyuroh Yesus nulong kapten nyeh. "Mat patutam mun kau nulong kapten nyeh," jie,
42007005	"go iyo mat panci budi besoe ken suku benso diret. Malah ken paie rumah semeyang di kampong kami pun dipulah ken duwit sumang deri iyoam," jie sidoe.
42007006	Lalu Yesus pun turun namah sidoe manu ke' rumah kapten nyeh. Jedi dah soma' ken rumah kapten nyeh tei' dah nyoe kapten nyeh nyuroh bereropai ko' kabane to' manu ke' Yesus kei madah posane. Jedi jie posan kapten nyeh ke' Yesus, "Tuwowe," jie, "ma'am noe sa' kalutam den detang ke' rumah aku. Go den mat noe patut ke' rumah aku.
42007007	Ento' betomu ken den pun so ku mat noe patut; ngopai ge' go ku nyuroh reng nyo' manu ke' den pun. Pie mun den mat na' nulong aku, den bekosoh deri jewoh ja', kei den nyuroh ana' buwah ku beyi'.
42007008	Aku kin tawu ke' hal nyuroh reng pakai caro bekato nyem, go aku pun tuno' ke' pemimpin aku, ken do jum ulun pesuroh ku yeng tuno' ke' aku. Aku kin nyuroh pada' pesuroh ku pun pakai caro bekato nyem; misale kinun jie ku; pesuroh ku pun kinunam. Atau kitue jie ku, mangko iyo pun manuam. Pai-pai pun yeng disuroh aku mat digewaie le' pada' pesuroh ku. (Mangko ku yakin, mun den pakai caro bekato nyem nyuroh ana' ku beyi' pasti beyi'am penyaki'e)," jie posan kapten.
42007009	Yesus pun kangápam ningo posan kapten nyeh te', go kapten nyeh mat yakin nar ken kuwaso Yesus, poe. Dah nyoe iyo bepusing ngadap ke' pada' reng rami yeng ngenjurute. Lalu jie Yesus, "Dingo beh kam, posan kapten nyeh. So ku di seruroh nenggeri Israel tue pun cum yeng nyamo kepecayo reng tue," jie.
42007010	Dah nyoe pada' reng yeng disuroh kapten nyeh nyo' manu ke' Yesus tadie ponyoe mat pulangam ke' rumahe. Diperati sidoe ana' buwah kapten pun mat jogar dah, pulang tiko po selomoam.
42007011	Jedi dah nyoe noe dam lamat nyeh Yesus bejelan ke' kampong Nain. Pada' murite ken pada' reng rami pun ngenjurute.
42007012	Jedi dah detang ke' kampong Nain tei' dah soma' ken pintu gerbange tei' diperatie do reng nangong bengkai reng mati, na' ditangong ke' tama' di luwar kampong. Urang yeng mati nyeh lelaki, ana' tungal siko' betinoe yeng belu. Pada' reng rami yeng sekamponge pun namah reng belu jum, ngantar bengkai ana'e ke' tama'e.
42007013	Jedi mátam. Yesus Tuwowe dah iyo merati reng belu nyeh mat kaseham, lalu jie nyingka' reng belu, "Nang nangis, beh," jie.
42007014	Dah nyoe iyo pun manu ke' soma', lalu nigue senseno' reng mati nyeh. Reng yeng nangonge pun berenti dinyoam. Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' reng mati, "Jang, bengki' idupam kau."
42007015	Tumas Yesus bungi nyoe mat bengki' idup agei'am reng yeng mati tadie, lalu dudo'am, bepaner ken sidoe. Lalu jie Yesus nyingka' ino'e tei', "Tue ne, ana' den."
42007016	Merati kuwaso Yesus nyeh tang ke' gola'am pada' reng rami. Lalu sidoe ngagong demo Allah. Jie sidoe, "Penijum yeng rajo kuwaso dah manu dah ke' diret," jie sidoe. "Allah dah detang dah na' nulong diret, umát Sen," jie reng rami.
42007017	Lalu paner sidoe bungi nyoe ke' hal Yesus tesebaram ke' ulu ke' ilie di peloya' Yudea lalu ke' segonáp nenggeri nyoe.
42007018	Jedi mátam, do murit Yohanes bepadah ke' Yohanes ke' hal gewai Yesus.
42007019	Mangko Yohanes nyuroh murite duwo ko' manu ke' iyo. Dah manu ke' iyo disurohe le' Yohanes ca' manu ke' Yesus Tuwowe betanyoe, ken iyo mat reng yeng dijenyi le' Allah na' detangei, ke' manseh ca' nantie reng layinei yeng langko' kei nuntong jenyi Allah? jie Yohanes.
42007020	Lalu mátam, murit Yohanes nyeh mat manu betanyoe ke' Yesus. "Kami," jie sidoe, "disuroh Yohanes Penyolam ca' betanyoe ke' kau, go iyo mat na' tawu, kau mat reng yeng dijenyi Sen na' detangei, atau pun kami manseh ca' nungu kedetang reng layinei?" jie sidoe.
42007021	Jedi pas sidoe manu ke' Yesus tei' Yesus pun kebonónge ngembeyi' pada' reng yeng saki' poníng rodang rungue, demo ke' nunong setan, demo ke' ngembeyi' pada' reng butoe, opai.
42007022	Jedi dah nyoe jie Yesus nyamut murit Yohanes nyeh, "Bom," jie, "kam bebeli' ke' Yohanes ken padaham ke' iyo ken jolu yeng didingo ken jolu yeng diperati kam ken mato kepalo diret kamam. Mat cuco'am ken yeng ditijum ke' hal Kristus nyomiam. Gola' reng butoe mat dah mencinángam! Reng timpang pun dah bejelanam! Reng yeng bengal pun mat dah moncasam pendingoe! Reng yeng saki' kusta pun dah beyi'am! Reng yeng mati pun disuroh bengki' idup agei'am! A, ken agah panci pun mat diagah dicerito ke' pada' reng bensat, pas na' po yeng ditijum ke' hal Kristus yeng dijenyi le' Allah nyomie.
42007023	Mangko," jie Yesus, "padaham ke' Yohanes bungi tue: Mat untong tuwaham reng yeng yakin pecayo ken aku, yeng noe tumang aming kepecayoe, numo' pun iyo noe jelas ken yeng langko' tejedi ke' aku," jie Yesus.
42007024	Jedi ningo paner Yesus bungi nyoe tei' murit Yohanes pun mat bebeli'am pulang ke' Yohanes. Pie Yesus si manseh ngomóng ken pada' reng rami ke' hal des Yohanes madah posan payit Allah di padang nun mie. Lalu jie Yesus, "Nyeh des kam bejejiyoh ke' padang puwang nun mie," jie, "noe ken go kam jengkoe na' merati muntie buloh yeng diciyup angín nyem, dih?
42007025	Ge'em noe ken go kam na' merati reng yeng bepekakas panci mewah, engo ku, go kam bejejiyoh kinun mie. Go mun na' merati reng yeng kayo sugeh yeng bepekakas mirah merang itam puteh si gogoe ja' di rumah rajo.
42007026	Pi yeng nyuroh kam bejejiyoh ke' padang nun mie go kam na' merati penijum Allah, mat noe? Lalu mátam te', reng yeng kam perati di padang nun mat penijum Allahame'. Malah ken paie mat lobeh deri penijum yeng selomo pun, kamei, benso Yohanes.
42007027	Go mat ke' hal Yohanesam yeng ditulis mie di lem Kitap Allah des Sen ngomóng ken pelayan Sen yeng bungie potue, Ti beh, Aku ngutus pelantar posan Ku kei ngulu kau, nyo' iyo memparang jelan to' kau, jie Sen. (Maleaki 3:1)
42007028	"Jedi pada' penijum deri asal mulo nyomie pun*," jie Yesus, "pie mat cum yeng ngelebeh Yohanes Penyolam, kamei. Pie mun na' ngaji sopai mensiyo yeng untong tuwah si," jie Yesus, "yeng paling untong tuwah nyeh ya'am mensiyo yeng tekawum des Allah disomah kei rajo. Go des jemán Allah disomah kei rajo si numo' pun reng yeng paling renah pie manseh untong tuwah deri Yohanes Penyolam pun, tam iyo mat ngicap jemán yeng nan ditantie dicinto reng, des Allah disomah kei rajo," jie Yesus.
42007029	Pada' reng rami yeng ningo pengajar Yesus tei' mat ngangkue nyereto ken posan payit deri Allah mat-mátam, sampai ke' pada' penageh pajak yeng dihina reng pun, pie sidoe mat nyereto ken posan payit Allah, go sidoe mat dah disolam Yohanes mie.*
42007030	Pie tekonoe ke' kelompok pada' reng Parisi ken pada' ugar ukum agama si tarah ke' ngei'e nerimoe yeng direncana le' Allah ento' sidoe, go sidoe noe disolam le' Yohanes.
42007031	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus nyamong panere. Jedi jie Yesus, "Koti ku na' ngenggemar pada' kam lapis tue? Ku na' pakai perempamo nyo' ku jelas ngenggemar ati kam.
42007032	Jedi ku merempamo kam lapis tue ke' pada' ana' biya' yeng usi' bererami, pie nan noe sesaro' ken betore. Kami na' keca' beriyah berami nyeh keh kam; pie kami na' keca' berato berayi pun keh kam jum, jie ana' biya' nyeh nyingka' betore.
42007033	Jedi ponyoe jum kam tue, cerewet nar, semeraga' mato alang. Yeng digewai Yohanes Penyolam pun noe cuco' begi kam; pie yeng digewai le' aku pun ponyoe jum, noe cuco' jum begi kam. Benso Yohanes Penyolam mie, keidupe kin panto' sepengayisam, cumam iyo insup ayie angur, cumam iyo beriyah berami; lalu jie kam iyo bisei' setan.
42007034	A, tekonoe ke' aku Ana' Mensiyo si, aku gela' makan beroto bererami ken betor, lalu padah kam aku rangkoe, dipadah kam jum aku pemabo', gela' begelumo ken pada' penageh pajak ken pada' reng bedoso yeng layin ge'em, jie kam. Mat cum pengonoeam begi kam, go kam mat noe tawu, noe jelas des merati gewai Allah pun.
42007035	Pi pada' reng yeng belubang pemikere si," jie Yesus, "iyo mat ngangkue nyereto ken gewai Allah mat-mátam, beyi' yeng digewai le' Yohanes mie beyi' yeng digewai le' aku pun," jie Yesus.
42007036	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe do siko' reng deri kelompok Parisi yeng bedemo Simon. Simon tei' ngunang ngamie Yesus kei makan di rumahe. Jedi mátam, Yesus pun mat nayi' ke' rumah Simon, lalu dudo' makan dinyoe.
42007037	Jedi di kampong nyoe tei' poe do siko' reng betinoe yeng tejemaro tam keragam kejeya'e yeng jat. Jedi reng betinoe nyeh tei' kedingoe ken Yesus do makan di rumah Simon. Ngaso kedingoe tei' iyo pun nayi' ke' rumah Simon jum, meyie tepayan kocit deri betu pualam, bisei' binya' wangi,
42007038	lalu mat manu ke' Yesus. (Yesus tei' dudo' unyor, kakie ke' belekang.) Jedi reng betinoe nyeh tei' bediri di belekang Yesus di piya' ke' kakie. Dah nyoe simah nangisam reng betinoe nyeh tei', sampai beloncam ayie matoe ngujoh kaki Yesus. Kaki Yesus pun dikesate ken buwo'e, simah diciyume, lalu ditungange ken binya' wangi tadie.
42007039	Jedi Simon reng Parisi yeng ngunang ngamie Yesus ke' rumahe tadie mat merati gewai reng betinoe nyeh, lalu kajie lem atie nun, "Engo ku reng tue noe iyo penijum, go mun iyo mat penijum si pasti tawue ken betinoe tue reng bedoso, pasti didahe nigue pun,"* kajie lem atie nun.
42007040	Pie Yesus si sengkunyong tawue ken pemiker Simon tokoh nyoe, lalu jie Yesus madahe. "Do yeng ku na' padah ke' kau, Simonei," jie Yesus. "Bom padaham, guru," jie Simon.
42007041	Dah nyoe Yesus madah perempamo. "Jedi do duwo ko' reng yeng berutang ke' reng bedegang. Yeng siko' tei' utange limo ratus bingkap duwit perak; yeng siko' tei' limo puloham.
42007042	Jedi kededuwo ko' sidoe nyeh tei' mat noe tetomue ke' jolu to' iyo ngembeyar utange. Ngaso ponyoe tei' diapus kaliam le' pedegang nyeh, utang sidoe duwo nyeh." Jedi dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Engo kau, Simon, sopai di antaro sidoe duwo nyeh yeng bosai melas kasehe ken reng yeng ngapus utang sidoe; yeng bosai utangei yeng kocit utangei?" jie Yesus.
42007043	Samut Simon, "Engo ku," jie, "reng yeng bosai utange yeng bosai melas kaseh." "Nyoe mátam, Simonei," jie Yesus.
42007044	Dah nyoe Yesus ngelinga' ke' reng betinoe nyeh te', pie manseh nyamong panere ken Simon. "Peratiam gewai reng tue, Simon," jie Yesus. "Des ku nayi' ke' rumah kau tadie cumam kau ngajen ayie nyo' ku meso' kaki* ku; pie reng tue mat meso' kaki ku ken ayie matoe, lalu dikesate ken buwo'e.
42007045	Ken ku detang tadie cumam kau ngenciyum aku, pie reng tue teger ngenciyum kaki ku die noe berenti-renti, semejak ku detang tadie pun.
42007046	Ken kau cumam nungang kepalo ku ken binya' yeng paling murah pun, pie reng tue mat nungang binya' sampai ke' kaki ku, ken binya' wangi yeng paling berogo.
42007047	A, pailah yeng nyato di lem gewai reng tue, Simon? Ngopai engoe go iyo kaseh nar ken aku? Tentu tam iyo jelas ken dosoe mie mat benya' nar, pie tue dah dielon dah. Nyoam go kasehe mat bosai. Pie reng yeng ngaji ken dosoe sikit yeng ca' dielon nyeh kasehe pun mat sikitam," jie Yesus.
42007048	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' reng betinoe nyeh, "Doso kau dah dielon dah," jie.
42007049	Lalu pada' temuwai yeng layin yeng ningoe tei' mat ngaji lem atie nun, "Sopailah reng tue yeng bekuwaso ngelon doso reng pun?" jie lem atie nun.
42007050	Pie Yesus manseh ngomóng ken reng betinoe nyeh, "Kau dah ditulong diselamát dah, tam kau pecayo. Kiroe mat tenáng amánam kau," jie Yesus.
42008001	Jedi Yesus mat bejelan betatap di pada' kampong halamán samel madah agah panci ke' hal jemán yeng nan ditantie dicinto reng, des Allah disomah kei rajo. Murite yeng duwo belas ko' pun nan namahe jum,
42008002	ken beberopai ko' betinoe yeng dah dipebeyi' ke' penyaki'e, ken yeng dah dipelopas deri kesarong setan, benso Maria yeng didemo Magdalena. Maria nyomie kin disarong setan tujoh ko', pie ditunonge le' Yesus.
42008003	A, ken do jum reng betinoe yeng bedemo Yohana, bini Kusa yeng termansok kaki tangan Rajo Herodes; a, ken Susana, ken benya' betinoe yeng layin yeng namah Yesus. Sidoe makai duwit direte nyo' iyo nulong ken ngongkos Yesus ken pada' murite.
42008004	Jedi mátam. Mat bejejiyoham pada' reng rami yeng manu ke' Yesus deri semuya' segeno kampong halamán. Dah nyoe Yesus ngomóng ken sidoe pakai perempamo.
42008005	Jedi jie Yesus, "Do reng siko' yeng na' ngamur bonehe, pie noe iyo semuya'e yeng tejedi. Boneh yeng diamure tei' separoe do yeng gegar di tongah jelan, lalu konoe tija' reng niti jelan nyoe; ge'em pada' burong pun detang pederodok manto'e sampai bis.
42008006	"A, yeng separoe boneh nyeh gegar di tanah yeng bisei' kerangán betu, pie lantange layuam, lalu ngerangkai kotai, tam kurang ayie di tanah lipis ponyoe.
42008007	A, separoe boneh nyeh gegar ke' tanah yeng bisei' pada' rampue durie. Belantang si na'e, pie dah rampue durie nyeh mansang, boneh yeng belantang panci nyeh pie nayóng tam rampue durie.
42008008	Pie do jum boneh yeng jetue ke' tanah yeng lolohe. Dah belantang mat joboham; dah iyo bebuwah mat berinasam, mat belipat genoam sampai seratus kali lipat," jie Yesus. Dah nyoe iyo bepaner ontap, "Semuya' segeno, kelinang mat ca' ningoam," jie.
42008009	Jedi dah kaloe ponyoe murit Yesus betanyoe ke' iyo pai reti perempamo ke' hal boneh nyeh.
42008010	Lalu disamut Yesus. "Kam si," jie Yesus, "diborie kemampu nyo' kam tawu ken risi'-risi' Allah, ke' hal keada'e des Sen disomah kei rajo. Pie sidoe layin yeng noe nunoe aku si dipadah ke' hal nyoe pakai perempamo nyem. Sidoe mat noe tawue ken risi'-risi' Allah. Nyoe pun cuco' ken yeng ditulis lem Kitap Allah mie yeng bepadah ken sidoe nan serarat merati, pie tarah ke' noe tekalimáte; sidoe nan serarat ningo nyem pi tarah ke' noe tawue ken retie, jie Sen.
42008011	"Jedi," jie Yesus, "maksut perempamo ku tadie potue. Boneh nyeh keedah posan payit Allah.
42008012	Jedi arong tongah jelan tei' nyoe keedah mensiyo yeng ningo posan payit Allah, pie tumas iyo ningoe lintus detangam Pengelakar, ngerampas ngerobut posan payit Sen deri atie. Maksut Pengelakar tei' gei' sidoe noe pecayo, gei' noe tawu ditulong diselamát.
42008013	A, arong kerangán betu tadie nyoe keedah reng yeng ayah bikaham nerimoe posan payit Allah yeng didingoe. Pie ibarat ke' tentanám din cum urate. Iyo pecayo pun sebentaram; sal ge' digudo reng lalu sap! iyo nyeraham.
42008014	A, lalu arong tanah yeng bisei' rampue durie yeng konoe gegar boneh tadie tei' nyoe keedah reng yeng dah ningo posan payit Allah, pie cum asele, noe bebuwah. Ningo si ningo, pie lamat belamat posan payit Allah telinsam telimasam tam pada' kekamoh deniyo tue, tam sidoe nan ngejar kekayo kesugeh ken kenyamán kesenáng di deniyo tue nyem. Lalu mat belangam; cum bebuwah.
42008015	Pie tanah yeng di arong lolohe tei' nyoe keedah reng yeng ningo posan payit Allah yeng atie panci, bujor benaram. Sidoe nan ingáte ken posan payit Sen, mat mutu makaie, mangko pengabise mat bebuwaham," jie Yesus.
42008016	Dah nyoe iyo madah perempamo layin. Jedi jie Yesus, "Noe ken reng mantong pelito lalu diserangkonge ken gentang, atau pun diongkahe ke' beroh pempangong, dih? Tentu mun reng mantong pelito dileta'e di tongah ruwang, gei' sempayo tampa'e awas to' reng tamoe.
42008017	A, ponyoe jum ke' hal yeng nyomie gei' risi'-risi' Allah. Go semuya' segelo yeng nyomie seolah-olah ditapo' nyeh pie langko' dikoba'. Ken sipat pai pun yeng nyomie gei' risi'-risi' Sen nyeh pie langko' dibeba' bekau ke' semuya' segeno, gei' semuya' reng tawu.
42008018	Mangko kam mat ca' telitiam ningo ken makaie, gei' mampu madahe gi. Go berang reng yeng dah buleh nyeh mun mat makaie langko' disuroh Allah belobeh-lobeh pekulehe. Pie berang reng yeng noe buleh si, yeng kajie pekuleh direte pun mat pie mun noe dipakaie langko' diperoru kaliam," jie Yesus.
42008019	Jedi dah nyoe ino' Yesus ken pada' menyadie lelakie nyeh detang kinun na' betomu ken Yesus, pie noe mampu detang ke' soma'e pelintang pada' tukue reng rami nyeh.
42008020	Dah nyoe do reng bepadah ke' Yesus, "Ino' kau ken pada' menyadie kau do di luwar, na' betomu ken kau," jie.
42008021	Pie samut Yesus, "Yeng ku angap ino' ku ken menyadie ku yeng mat si," jie Yesus, "ya'am sopai ja' yeng ningo posan payit Allah lalu makaie," jie.
42008022	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus ngaja' murite ke' seborang lompoe. "Yo' diret ke' borang nun lompoe nyeh," jie. Lalu sidoe mat nayi' perawu nyeh nuju ke' seborang.
42008023	Jedi kebonóng belayar tei' Yesus pun tepetidoram. Gei' di penenongah lompoe tei' semorie siyut! jie buwowe yeng paling ontap. Gelumang bosai pun nyerangkong perawu nyeh, sampai mat behayo nar sidoe.
42008024	Jedi ngaso dah behayo tei' murit Yesus pun ngenggora'e. "Guru! Guru!" jie. "Diret dah na' lomas dah!" jie sidoe. Yesus pun bengki'am, lalu iyo nonga' nedoh buwowe ken pada' gelumang yeng gelebar gelebur nyeh. Lalu semorie rap! tedoham buwowe; gelumang pun ngomasam. Mat tenángam lompoe nyeh te'.
42008025	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' murite, "Gopai go kam gola'? Bolum pecayo peh kam ken aku?" jie. Pie pada' murite gupoham, mat kangápam merati kuwaso Yesus nyeh te'. Lalu jie sidoe nyingka' betore, "Sopai nin beh máte reng tue," jie, "go pada' buwowe ken pada' gelumang pun na'e tuno' taalo' ke' iyo," jie sidoe.
42008026	Jedi mátam, dah belayar nyemorang lompoe tei' lalu Yesus sidoe pun mat detang ke' nenggeri reng Gerasa, di seborang nun Galilea.
42008027	Dah detang tei' sidoe mat nayi' ke' derat. Tumas sidoe nayi' ke' derat tei' Yesus dipanu le' siko' reng lelaki yeng dikesarong setan. Reng lelaki tei' asale reng kampong nyoam pie dah lamat dah mokap di pada' tama' nyem, ngei'e pulang ke' kampong; pengidupe mat telanyang anyau-anyau nyem.
42008028	-
42008029	Iyo mat erat dikesarong le' setan yeng mempungahe. Mangko koti-ti pun reng ngukohe, sampai dipasong ke' kaki ke' jerie ken rantai bosi pun pie mat noe tan tam nan uleh nyem iyo ngeroso, lalu setan nyeh nyurohe rari ke' arong sunyei' yeng cum mensiyo. Jedi mátam. Dah teperati ke' Yesus tei' reng yeng kesarong setan nyeh mat menciya', lalu tepesungkur di adap Yesus. Yesus pun nyuroh setan nyeh rari deri urang nyoe. Pie reng kesarong setan nyeh simah pangkas kayis, "Yesus, Ana' deri Allah yeng rajo tingie!" jie. "Nang ngaru aku! Aku muhún mampalam gei' kau noe mempungah aku," jie reng kesarong setan nyeh.
42008030	Jedi jie Yesus betanyoe, "Sopai demo kau tue?" jie. Samut urang nyoe, "Bereribu," jie, go mat benya' nar setan nyeh yeng nyarong ke' iyo.
42008031	Pada' setan pun simah muhún mampalam ke' Yesus gei' Yesus noe ngelabohe ke' tengkelubang selamang nyeh.*
42008032	Jedi di natai soma' sidoe tei' poe do pada' kaban bebi yeng paling benya' yeng diingún, yeng nyungkal dinyoe. Lalu pada' setan nyeh muhún ke' Yesus minta' dialeh ke' pada' bebi ja'. Yesus pun mat ngemborie, ma'am, jie.
42008033	Ngaso ponyoe tei' mat peketocus pada' setan keluwar deri reng nyoe, nyarong ke' pada' bebi die. Dah nyarong ke' pada' bebi nyeh lalu pegerudus! pada' bebi nyeh ngerurus kenaming tingie nyeh bung! ngencabur ke' ayie, lalu mati lomasam pada' kaban bebi nyeh te'.
42008034	Jedi mátam, dah merati kejedi tokoh nyoe tei' pada' penungu bebi nyeh rariam, bepadah ke' ulu ke' ilie di kampong di pedukoh.
42008035	Pada' reng rami pun mat bederum manu na' meratie kinun. Jedi dah detang ke' soma' Yesus tei' diperati sidoe tei' reng yeng bokas kesarong pada' setan nyeh mat dudo' tetugu ponyoam di soma' Yesus. Iyo pun bepekakas tokoh urangam dah; kengkajie pun dah menconoam dah jum. Mat cum dah pada' setan nyeh yeng nyarong ke' iyo. Ngaso ponyoe mat gupoham pada' reng rami yeng meratie.
42008036	Lalu pada' reng yeng meratie tadie ponyoe mat becerito ke' reng rami nyeh ke' hal koti keada'e sampai reng yeng kesarong setan nyeh dipebeyi'.
42008037	Dah nyoe pada' reng rami deri peloya' Gerasa nyeh ngemoran nyuroh Yesus ningal arong nyoe, tam abis kegegola' sidoe. Mangko Yesus pun mat nayi' ke' lem perawu nyeh lalu mat ningal arong nyoe.
42008038	Reng bokas dikesarong setan tadie si muhún mampal na' namah Yesus jum, pie didah le' Yesus. Jie Yesus,
42008039	"Kau noe sa' tamaham," jie. Kau ca' pulangam ke' kampong diret kauam, nyo' kau madah semuya' gewai Allah yeng dah tejedi ke' kau," jie Yesus. Ngaso ponyoe tei' reng yeng kesarong setan tadie pun mat pulangam, lalu ngeliling bejelajap di seruroh kota nyeh, beagah beawoh begesah becerito ken gesah direte dipebeyi' Yesus.
42008040	Jedi mátam. Yesus mat nyemorang agei' ke' seborang lompoe nyeh te'. Pada' reng rami pun ayah ngalue, go sidoe dah lamat dah nantie di nun.
42008041	Dah detang kinun tei' iyo dipanu le' siko' pemimpin umát reng Yahudi yeng bedemo Yairus. Yairus mat manu ke' Yesus lalu belutut di adap Yesus, simah muhún mampal gei' Yesus detang ke' rumahe,
42008042	go ana'e yeng tungal nyeh saki', mat ngatam penguyohe. Ana'e tei' betinoe, duwo belas tawun ke' deng nyoe umore. Jedi Yesus pun mat turun nuju ke' rumah Yairus. Pada' reng rami pun bejejiyoh ngenjurute, betetanát begegepet ngeliling Yesus.
42008043	Jedi di antaro pada' reng rami nyeh do siko' reng betinoe yeng saki'. Penyaki'e tei' nan detang bulan noe berenti-renti. Dah duwo belas tawun pelamate iyo saki' nyeh, pie cumam reng yeng tawu ngembeyi' penyaki'e.
42008044	Jedi mátam, dah nyoe reng betinoe nyoe tei' manu ke' Yesus deri belekange, belelinong di penenongah pada' reng rami, lalu dijemele samang jubah Yesus. Tumas dijemele tei' mat berentiam iyo bederah nyeh te'.
42008045	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Sopai beh yeng nigue beju ku?" jie. Pie cumam reng rami yeng ngangkue ken iyo mat nigue bejue, tam cum sidoe yeng merasoe. Dah nyoe jie Petrus, "Pada' reng rami tue betetanát begegepet ngeliling kau, guruei, konai kau na' betanyoe ken sopai yeng nigue beju kau?" jie Petrus.
42008046	Pie samut Yesus, "Pi mat doam, so ku, reng yeng sengejo nigue aku. Ku tawu tam ku ngasoe pun, kuwaso yeng keluwar deri diret ku," jie Yesus.
42008047	Jedi reng betinoe yeng ngenjemel beju Yesus nyeh tei' ngaso Yesus dah tawu tei' lalu begegar begitikam manu ke' Yesus lalu tepesungkur di adap Yesus, ken bepadah terus terangam di adap pada' reng rami nyeh ken gopai go iyo ngenjemel beju Yesus, ken begesah jum ken penyaki'e dah beyi' dah.
42008048	Lalu jie Yesus, "Sukoram, buei; penyaki' den beyi' pun tam den pecayo ken kuwaso aku. Kiroe den serarat sehat segaram," jie Yesus.
42008049	Jedi ketengah Yesus gei' ngomóng ken reng betinoe nyeh tei' semorie do reng yeng detang deri rumah pemimpin umát nyeh, bepadah ke' pemimpin ken ana'e dah mati dah. Mangko jie reng nyoe, "Cum dah gunoe na' ngamoh ngalut guru," jie.
42008050	Pie ningo paner sidoe bungi nyoe lalu Yesus ngomóng ken Yairus. "Noe sa' kau gedoham beh? Mutuam kau pecayo ken aku," jie. "Ana' kau pun langko' beyi'am," jie Yesus.
42008051	Jedi dah detang ke' rumah Yairus tei' pada' reng rami yeng ngenjurut Yesus nyeh didahe tamoe ke' delam cuwali Petrus, Yohanes, Yakobus, ken Yairus sidoe.
42008052	Reng di luwar tei' simah perengkawung betentangis berato berayi tam ana' biya' yeng mati nyeh te'. Lalu ditonga' le' Yesus. Jedi Yesus, "Jediam kam perengkawung betentangis!" jie. "Ana' biya' tue bede ke' mati; iyo tidor nyem," jie.
42008053	Pie ningo paner Yesus bungi nyoe pada' reng rami nyeh tei' diketawoe nyem, diolo'-olo'e nyem omóng Yesus nyeh te', go sidoe kin tawue ken ana' biya' nyeh mat dah mati dah.
42008054	Pie dah Yesus tamoe ke' delam nyeh dijepaie jeri ana' biya' nyeh, lalu jie Yesus, "Bengki'am, tung."
42008055	Temosie ana' biya' nyeh bepenyawoam po selomo, lalu keduwas bengki' bediri. Dah nyoe Yesus nyuroh reng tuwoe nyeh ngunyo' jolu kei sego ke' ana' biya' nyeh te'.
42008056	Mat tebelonga'am reng tuwoe meratie, pie Yesus nonga' sidoe gei' noe bepadah ke' sopai pun ke' hal gewai iyo nyeh tadie.
42009001	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus ngumpol murite yeng duwobelas ko' nyeh, lalu iyo nguwaso sidoe gei' sidoe mampu nunong pada' setan ken ngembeyi' pada' reng yeng saki'.
42009002	Dah nyoe iyo ngutus sidoe kei nempoh nuju ke' pada' kampong halamán nyo' madah agah panci ke' hal des Allah disomah kei rajo ge'em, ken nyo' sidoe ngembeyi' pada' reng yeng saki' poníng rodang rungue ge'em.
42009003	Posan Yesus ke' sidoe tei' bungie potue: ""Kam turun bejelan," jie, "noe sa'am kam meyie bokal sangu makan udap, demo ke' pakai ingap, demo ke' uwang duwit, demo ke' beban bereno, demo ke' tungkat semamu opai," jie Yesus.
42009004	"Jedi dah kam detang ke' rumah reng, mun do rumah reng yeng nerimoe kam, kam ca' antang tetap dinyoam, nang na' bepinah bealeh sampai ke' kam na' ngaleh deri kampong nyoe.
42009005	Mun do kampong reng yeng ngei' nampan nerimoe kam ponyoe jum; kam ca' ningal arong nyoe. Ken debu di senal kam pun ca' ditoguram dinyoe gei' sempayo sidoe jelas ken dosoe," jie Yesus.
42009006	Mangko keduwo belas ko' murit Yesus mat turunam; sidoe mat bejelan betatap di segonáp kampong halamán, madah agah panci ken ngembeyi' pada' reng yeng saki' dinai-nai pun.
42009007	Jedi mátam. Rajo Herodes pun ningo agah berito ke' hal gewai Yesus ken pada' murite. Lalu mat ngerebeyangam kengkajie, go pemadah reng ke' hal Yesus mat beseliseham reng madahe. Do yeng madah ken iyo tue Yohanes Penyolam pie tue dah bengki' idup agei'.
42009008	A, do jum yeng madah ken iyo penijum Elia yeng dah detang na' po yeng dijenyi Allah nyomie; a, do jum yeng madah ken iyo tue gola' pai nawue siko' deri penijum Allah nyomiam pie tue dah bengki' idup agei'.
42009009	Pie jie Rajo Herodes, "Kato ken Yohanes Penyolam go akuam dah nyuroh kepaloe ditukong mie. Lalu mat sopai nin beh máte reng nyoe? Go mat paling benya' nar keenah keaneh yeng ku ningo ke' hal iyo," jie Rajo Herodes nyeh. Lalu iyo pun nan ngogoe kelorong ingín na' betomu ken Yesus.
42009010	Jedi mátam. Pada' pelantar posan Yesus mat bebeli' manu ke' Yesus lalu bepadah ken semuya' yeng digewai le' sidoe. Dah nyoe Yesus naban sidoe bangam ke' kampong yeng bedemo Betsaida.
42009011	Pie dah kedingo pada' reng rami nyeh ken Yesus sidoe do dinyoe si pada' reng rami pun ngenjurute jum. Yesus pun nampan nerimoe reng rami nyeh panciam, lalu iyo bepadah ke' sidoe ke' hal jemán yeng nyamán senáng des Allah disomah kei rajo. Ge'em iyo ngembeyi' pada' reng yeng perelu ditulong.
42009012	Jedi mátam. Dah ujong ari ponyoe keduwo belas ko' murite tei' manu ke' Yesus, lalu jie sidoe, "Boh kau nyuroh pada' reng rami tue," jie, "nyo' numpang bemalam ke' pada' pedukoh ken pada' kampong loboh nun, kei iyo mampu bepencar-pencar ngogoe jolu kei segoe," jie, "go arong tue mat sunyei' nar, cumam jolu na' diboli pun," jie murite.
42009013	Pie Yesus nyamute, "Boh kamam ngunyo'e jolu kei sego," jie. Samut murite tei', "Yeng do di kami si tingal ge' roti limo gie ken ikan duwo ko'," jie, "cuwali ja' kau na' nyuroh kami betatap ke' deng nun moli jolu kei segoe; pie noe ken teboli kami nyo' reng memenya' tue," jie.
42009014	Go reng rami nyeh ento' reng lelaki tuwo ja' 5,000 ko'. Pie jie Yesus nyingka' murite, "Kam ca' nyuroh reng rami tue dudo' begerumpok-gerumpok; 50 ko' ke' deng nyoe segerumpok," jie.
42009015	Lalu murite pun mat nyuroh reng rami nyeh dudo' na' po yeng disuroh le' Yesus; mangko reng rami pun mat dudo'am.
42009016	Dah nyoe diamie Yesus roti yeng limo gie ken ikan yeng duwo ko' nyeh te'. Dah dijepaie iyo nengkadah ke' serugo besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Apa'e. Dah besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Apa'e tei' dah nyoe dipocahe roti ken ikan nyeh. Dah dipocah-pocahe diunyo'e ke' murite gei' murite ngembilinge ke' pada' reng rami.
42009017	Dah dibilinge tei' reng rami pun makan sekonyáng poruteam. Dah makan tei' pada' murite ngumpol kesiso kepocah roti ken ikan nyeh. Dah dikumpole poe gei' do duwobelas taya' ponoh agei' kesisoe.
42009018	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus bedoa di arong sunyei'. Pada' murite pun namahe jum. Dah nyoe jie Yesus betanyoe ke' pada' murite, "Nyeh mun jie reng rami nyeh sopailah aku tue?" jie.
42009019	Lalu sidoe begesah. Jie, "Do yeng madah kau Yohanes Penyolam gola' pai nawue tue bengki' idup agei'am. A, do jum yeng madah kau penijum Elia mie yeng pulang ke' deniyo tue. Do jum yeng madahe kau penijum yeng nyomie yeng bengki' idup agei'," jie sidoe.
42009020	"Nyeh mun jie kam," jie Yesus, "aku tue sopailah?" Samut Petrus, "Kau mat Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah," jie.
42009021	Lalu Yesus pun nonga' sidoe madah nyoe ke' sopai pun.
42009022	Go jie Yesus, "Aku Ana' Mensiyo nyeh mat ca' ngerudu benya' kesensare, langko' ca' ditula' ditentang le' pada' ketuwo diret, ken pada' ketuwo pelayan, ken pada' ugar agama diret. Malah ken paie aku mat ca' dibunoh reng, pie dah nyoe ku langko' bengki' idup agei' dah ari pengentigo nyeh," jie.
42009023	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' pada' reng rami, "Sopai ja' yeng na' menjedi murit aku," jie, "ca' ningal kepenting direte, ken ca' serarat relo nangong salipe, relo disensare na' po aku disensare. Iyo mat ca' mutu nunoe akuam.
42009024	Go reng yeng mementing keidup direte di deniyo tue si pengabise losi nayápam. Pie berang reng yeng noe mementing keidup direte ento' iyo mementing aku si tarah ke' tetomuam ke' idup yeng mat.
42009025	Nang na' salah pileh. Pai ge' keuntonge mun reng buleh pada' semuya' kekayo kesugeh di deniyo tue pie pengabise roh direte losi nayáp? Nyoe kin ngerugi ngerusa' direteam!
42009026	"Sopai ja' yeng ngei'e ngangkue aku ken ngei'e nerimoe pengajar aku tengkalo tue si," jie Yesus, "aku pun ngei' ku jum ngangkue iyo dah Ari Pengudah deniyo tue gi. Go aku Ana' Mensiyo," jie Yesus, "mat langko' bebeli' agei' ke' deniyo tue nyo' ku ngendecing pada' mensiyo. Kedetang ku gi mat agongam, bekuwaso, na' po Apa' ku yeng agong, bekuwaso. Belo melekat yeng suci bereseh pun mat namah ku jum dah nyoe gi. Lalu sopai ja' yeng dah telampoh noe ngangkue aku nyeh," jie Yesus, "aku pun noe ngangkue iyo dah ku detang gi," jie.
42009027	"A, separoe kam ditue pun mat langko' idup sampai merati ketongaie Allah disomah kei rajo. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei," jie Yesus.
42009028	Jedi dah iyo ngajar ke' hal nyoe, dah sekitar semingu ke' deng nyoe Yesus ngaja' murite Petrus, Yohanes ken Yakobus bejelan mendeki ke' gunóng, kei bedoa dinun.
42009029	Detang kinun kebonónge bedoa tei' muko Yesus berubah cayoe. Pekakase nyaca' bemalo puteh pepuwo, mengkilat na' po kengkitar.
42009030	Tumas iyo berubah cayoe temosie temeronyong reng lelaki duwo ko' di soma' Yesus; poe mat penijum Musa ken penijum Elia.
42009031	Upo sidoe pun nyacas, temencorong, mat agongam. Sidoe ngomóng ken Yesus ke' hal kematie di Yerusalem gi, nyo' iyo nuntong kemawo' Allah.
42009032	Petrus sidoe tadie ponyoe mat ririe iyo tidor, pie temosie tekojut jogaram matoe, lalu sidoe merati jum keagong Yesus ken reng duwo ko' yeng bediri ken iyo.
42009033	Jedi dah sidoe duwo na' ningal Yesus tei' jie Petrus nyingka' Yesus, "Tuwowe, untong naram soe go kami do ditue! Mun potue," jie, "kami na' mulah ponok tigo buwah nyo' nyomah deduwan, sebuwah nyo' kau, sebuwah nyo' Kei' Musa ken sebuwah nyo' Kei' Elia," jie. Pie iyo ngomóng ngerebicok nyem, jera'e, noe tawue ken retie omóng direte pun.
42009034	Jedi kebonóng Petrus ngomóng bungi nyoe temosie sok! sidoe tei' diserudong le' kemoyang románg. Gupoham peraso sidoe.
42009035	Dah nyoe do kedingo suwaro yeng bebungi deri lem románg, "Tuam to'," jie, "Ana' Ku, Penulong Penyelamát yeng Ku pileh. Dingoam kam pemadah iyo."
42009036	Dah bungi nyoe suwaro deri lem románg nyeh tei' temosie tingal Yesus bedireteam yeng bediri dinyoe, Elia ken Musa dah cum dah. Jedi mátam. Murit Yesus yeng merati iyo diagong ponyoe pun cum bepadah ke' sopai pun ketiko nyoe, ke' hal yeng diperatie tei'; dipokape nyem lem atie nun.
42009037	Jedi pagi ponyoe dah Yesus sidoe turun deri natai nyeh pada' reng rami pun nyamute.
42009038	Lalu do reng siko' di antaro reng rami nyeh nengkuwau Yesus, minta' tulong. "Guru," jie. "Tulong ge' ana' ku tue, jera'e. Ngat siko' tuam ana' ku to'," jie.
42009039	"Penyaki'e tei' nan diaru setan. Des iyo menendetang nyeh iyo teciyak-ciyak menciya'; tubohe kojar korue, nyawoe bepupue. Nan serarat dikacau diaru le' setan nyeh, redo cum berudu tedoh.
42009040	Daham aku muhún ke' pada' murit kau tadie gei' iyo nunong setan nyeh pie mat ngei'e," jie reng nyoe.
42009041	Lalu jie Yesus, "Paraham kam lapis tue," jie. "Dah melamat tue aku do ken kam pie manseh potuam ati kam; cumam kepecayo kam. Gei' paiam lamat aku ca' nantie gei' ati kam berubah?" jie. Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' reng lelaki nyeh tadie, "Tabanam ana' kau kitue," jie.
42009042	Jedi ketengah ana' biya' nyeh diiring reng ke' Yesus tei' temosie menendetang diaru le' setan nyeh; ana' biya' nyeh tei' bap! terompas ke' tanah, lalu kojar koruam. Pie Yesus nunong setan nyeh, lalu ngembeyi' penyaki'e, dah nyoe diserahe ke' apa'e agei'am.
42009043	Mat eranam pada' reng rami pun mantau kuwaso Allah yeng rajo agong. Pie ketengah pada' reng rami gei' suba' eran ngaji gewai Yesus nyeh tei' Yesus manseh ngamie kelorong nyoe nyo' iyo madah agei'am ke' pada' murite ke' hal kemati direte.
42009044	Jedi jie Yesus, "Dingo beh kam; ca' ingátam ken pemadah ku tue," jie. "Go aku yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo mat langko' diserah ke' pada' penguwaso gei' diukume," jie Yesus nyingka' pada' murite.
42009045	Pie poe sidoe tarah ke' noe tawue ken pai retie paner Yesus nyeh te'; ibarat ke' jolu tei' din mat keedah jolu seolah-olah selinong bulu mano', mat noe tetangkape sidoe ke' retie. Sidoe pun gola'e betanyoe ke' Yesus ke' hal nyoe.
42009046	Jedi dah nyoe pada' murit Yesus becelaker ke' hal pangkate, sopai yeng langko' tingie pangkate des Yesus disomah kei rajo gi, jie sidoe.
42009047	Pie Yesus si tawue ken ati pemiker sidoe, lalu iyo ngamie nyapo siko' ana' biya' yeng do dinyoe, disurohe bediri di soma' iyo.
42009048	Jedi jie Yesus, "Dingo beh kam," jie. "Sopai ja' yeng nampan nerimoe begewol begelumo ken reng paling renah, benso ana' biya' potue pun, pie mun iyo nampan nerimoe nyeh tam demo aku si mat samoam ken iyo nampan nerimoe begewol begelumo ken aku jum," jie. "Sedang sopai ja' yeng nampan nerimoe begewol begelumo ken aku," jie Yesus, "samoam ken iyo nampan nerimoe begewol begelumo ken Apa' ku jum, go Sénam yeng ngutus aku kitue. Mangko jie ku yeng mat si reng yeng paling renah atiam yeng paling penting di antaro kam," jie Yesus.
42009049	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yohanes do bepadah ke' Yesus. "Guru," jie, "kami do merati reng siko' yeng nunong setan makai kuwaso demo kau, pie kami nonga'e, go iyo noe semurit ken kami," jie.
42009050	Pie samut Yesus, "Nang na' kam nonga'e," jie, "go sopai pun yeng noe belawan ken diret kin maksute iyo nulong diret," jie.
42009051	Jedi mátam. Jengkah yeng ditentu nyo' Yesus dibeyie pulang ke' serugo nyeh dah kin soma'-soma'am. Mangko Yesus pun mutuse koti-ti pun keada'e iyo mat arus ca' ke' Yerusalem.
42009052	Jedi iyo ngutus beberopai ko' deri pada' pelantar posane kei dolu ngogoe arong di desa yeng langko' dilalue. Lalu sidoe pun mat turunam. Dah turun tei' sidoe detang ke' sebuwah kampong di peloya' Samaria, na' ngurus kei arong pengináp nyo' Yesus sidoe.
42009053	Pie reng di kampong nyoe ngei'e nerimoe Yesus sidoe, go sidoe tawu ken Yesus dah mutuse na' ke' Yerusalem.*
42009054	Jedi ngaso noe diterimoe dinyoe tei' murit Yesus yeng bedemo Yakobus ken Yohanes betanyoe ke' Yesus, "Nyeh kami ca' nurun api deri serugo kei merabis sidoe peh, Tuwowe?" jie.
42009055	Pie ningo panere bungi nyoe tei' Yesus bepusing ngadap sidoe lalu nonga'e.
42009056	Lalu pada' sidoe melaju pejelane ke' kampong layin die.
42009057	Jedi Yesus sidoe mat bejelan nuju ke' Yerusalem. Dah nyoe do reng siko' yeng manu ke' Yesus, lalu jie, "Ku," jie, "dah mutuse na' namah den konai-nai pun to' murit den," jie.
42009058	Pie samut Yesus, "Gola' arap-arape," jie, "go aku mat cum rumah tangoe ku di deniyo tue. Tekonoe ke' binatang utan* si do rumange; tekonoe ke' pada' burong pun ponyoe jum, do sarange. Pi aku Ana' Mensiyo si mat cumam rumah tangoe kediyam kedonoe ku di deniyo tue. Nyeh mat relo peh kau idup tokoh nyoe?" jie Yesus.
42009059	Jedi dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' siko' reng layin die, "Kau tamah aku ja' to' murit aku," jie. Pie samut urang nyeh, "Pi mun borie den ku gei' na' noyu merintu apa' ku lo'e.* Dah sen mati, dah santo' kerinah kemati sen si ku na' ku namah den, Tuwowei," jie.
42009060	Pie jie Yesus, "Ngerinah kemati apa' kau," jie, "diserah ke' waris wala' kau yeng bolum idup secaro roh. Ma'am biyar reng mati dikerinah le' reng mati. Yeng penting begi kau si kau ca' bejelan betatap madah ke' hal des Allah disomah kei rajo," jie Yesus.
42009061	Dah nyoe jie siko' reng yeng layin bepadah ke' Yesus, "Ku dah mutuse na' namah den nyo' murit den, Tuwowei. Pi ku gei' na' pulang lo'e na' bepadah na' besako beserebeno ken waris wala' ku," jie.
42009062	Pie samut Yesus, "Reng yeng ngenggewai umo si ca' mutu mantau ke' adape kei perimaie bujor. Ponyoe jum reng yeng na' berajo ke' Allah; mat ca' mutu ngaji melayan Sen nyem, mun noe si mat noe tawu dipakai Sen," jie Yesus.
42010001	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus Tuwowe netap murite tujoh puloh ko' nyo' bejelan duwo-duwo ko' seregu, diutuse kei ngulu iyo ke' tiyap kampong halamán yeng langko' dipanue.
42010002	Jedi jie Yesus, "Deniyo tue keedah umo yeng luwah, yeng sedang na' digotam dah, pie celoe mat sikitam reng yeng ngenggewaie. Mangko kam," jie, "ca' bedoa ke' Tuwowe umo nyeh, gei' Sen ngutus reng kei ngotam umo Sen," jie Yesus.
42010003	"Tue kam ca' turunam," jie. "Kam mat behayoam di deniyo tue, go kam keedah ana' domo dipelopas ke' pada' serigala yeng buwas. Pie nang gola' beh kam, go mat akuam yeng ngutus kam.
42010004	A, des kam turun kam noe sa' bebokalam," jie Yesus, "demo ke' pakai ingap, demo ke' uwang duwit, demo ke'...beban bereno opai. Ca' mutu ngaji tugas kam nyem. Nang na' reren same' di jelan to' ngomóng ken urang.
42010005	"Jedi mun kam na' numpang nayi' di rumah reng, padaham ke' tuwowe rumah nyeh, Kiroe rumah tue diberekat didolat le' Allah.
42010006	Jedi mun reng na' nerimoe berekat dolat Sen si dolat kam nyeh mat dituntong ke' reng nyoe; pie mun iyo ngei'e si, dolat kam mat noe dituntongam ke' sidoe.
42010007	Pi dinai kam diterimoe reng kam mat ca' antang renánam dinyoe, nang na' bepinah bealeh. A, gei' pun nang na' kam noe nyamán ati tam kam ngembeban tuwowe rumah nyeh; nang na' kam namang nyego jolu pai pun yeng diunyo'e ke' kam, go kam mat pelayan aku; mun pelayan kin mat patutam ca' ditoyu ditemongi diumpan dipatik.
42010008	"Jedi sipat kampong halamán yeng nampan nerimoe kam mat ca' diulang dijongo'. A, ken des kam nayi' ke' rumah reng ca' nampan nerimoe pai-pai pun yeng dilentang di adap kam; nang na' nampi'e; biyar jolu pai pun ca' disego nyem," jie Yesus.
42010009	"Tugas kam di tiyap kampong nyeh ca' ngembeyi' pada' reng saki' poníng rodang rungue; a, ken ca' bepadah ke' semuya' segenoe ken jengkah yeng ditantie dicinto reng des Allah disomah kei rajo nyeh mat soma' dam.
42010010	Pie mun do kampong yeng noe nampan nerimoe kam si, kam ca' bepadah ke' semuya' segenoe bungi tue,
42010011	Dingo beh kam: Jengkah Allah langko' disomah kei rajo mat dah soma'am to'. Pie tue kami nogur debu senal di kaki kami di kampong kam, gei' kam jelas ken doso kam go kam mat noe nerimoe posan payit Sen. Bungi nyoam kam bepadah ke' sidoe," jie Yesus.
42010012	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' murite agei', "Dingo beh kam," jie. "Dah Ari Kiyamát gi si pada' reng Sodom yeng paling jat mie pun pie manseh ringán kit ukum sidoe deri ukum sipat kampong yeng ngei'e nerimoe kam," jie Yesus.
42010013	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Parah nar," jie, "kam di kampong Korasim. Parah nar jum kam di kampong Betsaida! (Go kam dah merati benya' keenah keaneh yeng dipulah di adap kam, pi manseh ngei' kam bebeta' piker.) Tekonoe ke' kota Tirus ken Sidon yeng paling jat pun pie kiro dudo' dipulah keenah keaneh di arong sidoe na' po yeng ku pulah di adap kam si sidoe dinyoe pasti na'e lintus bebeta' pikeram; na'e sidoe nyaro' karong goni ken dudo' di atas abu kei nano kesusah atie tam dosoe.
42010014	Pie tekonoe ke' kam si ngei' kam, mangko dah Ari Kiyamát gi ukum kam langko' ugas boratam deri ukum reng kota Tirus ken Sidon pun.
42010015	"A, ponyoe jum kam di kampong Kapernaum," jie Yesus. "Pengaji kam si kam langko' dihormát ditingie setingie-tingieam, pi noe! Malah ken paie kam langko' ditunong direnah lalu pengabise menjedi tokoh ampas urasam," jie.
42010016	Dah nyoe Yesus nyamong agei' panere ken murite yeng diutuse. Jedi jie Yesus, "Berang reng yeng ningo kam samoam jum ken iyo dah ningo aku; pie berang reng yeng ngei'e ningo kam samoam jum ken iyo ngei'e ningo aku; ken berang reng yeng ngei'e ningo aku samoam jum ken iyo ngei'e ningo Apa' ku yeng ngutus ku kitue," jie Yesus.
42010017	Jedi mátam. Dah bejelan betatap ke' pada' kampong halamán nyeh murit Yesus yeng tujoh puloh ko' tadie mat bebeli' pulang ke' Yesus. Mat ayah bikaham ati sidoe, lalu jie sidoe bepadah ke' Yesus, "Pada' setan pun mat na'e tuno' ke' kami tam demo kau, Tuwowei," jie.
42010018	Samut Yesus, "Ku mat merati des Pengelakar ditunong deri serugo nun bekilap bedecar na' po kengkitaram," jie.
42010019	"Aku mat nguwaso kam kei kam ngalah semuya' kuwaso munsoh; kiro ular biso ken kalo nyeh ditija' diiri' kam; maksute kam noe kalah tam kuwaso munsoh kam.
42010020	"Pie yeng paling penting, kamei," jie Yesus, "noe iyo ja' ayah bikah ngaji tam pada' setan tuno' ke' kam," jie. "Kebelike kam ca' ayah bikah go demo kam dah ditulis dah di serugo nun," jie Yesus.
42010021	Tumas iyo bepaner bungi nyoe ken murite tei' lalu Roh Allah pun nyuroh ati Yesus ayah bikaham, lalu iyo pun ngomóng ken Apa'e. "Apa' ku," jie, "Den mat Tuwowe langi' ken tanah. Ku besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Den, Pa'ei, go semuya' segelo tue mat diselinong Den deri reng yeng ngangap direte panai ceredei' belubang pemiker. Pie kebelike dipadah Den ke' reng yeng ngangap direte keedah ana' biya' kocitam (yeng perelu ditulong, yeng cum kepanai direte). Nyoe pun go mat cuco'am ken kona' kemawo' Dénam, Pa'ei," jie Yesus.
42010022	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' reng rami, "Aku," jie, "go semuya' segeloe dah diserah Sen dah ke' aku le' Apa' ku. Cum reng yeng tekenal ken aku ana' Sen cuwali Apa' ku. A, yeng tekenal ken Apa' ku pun ngat akuam, ana' Sen. Reng layin si cum yeng tekenal ken Sen, cuwali akuam yeng ngenale ke' Sen, tam keingín diret ku nyem," jie Yesus.
42010023	Dah nyoe iyo ngelinga' ke' murite lalu jie nyingka' murite bangam, "Mat ayah bikah untong tuwaham kam, go mato muko kam dah merati semuya' yeng tejedi tengkalo tue.
42010024	Sedang nyomie si," jie Yesus, "mat benya' penijum Allah demo ke' pada' rajo pun yeng ingín nar na' merati jolu yeng diperati kam tue, pi tarah ke' cum desiyan meratie. Mat ingín nar desiyan ningo yeng didingo le' kam tue, pie desiyan tarah ke' cum ningoe. Berue kam tuam to' yeng ningoe ken ngawase, mangko kam mat ayah bikah untong tuwaham," jie Yesus.
42010025	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yesus ngajar reng rami agei'am. Ketengah iyo ngajar tei' do siko' ugar agama Yahudi yeng bediri betanyoe ke' iyo, na' nguji Yesus. Jedi iyo betanyoe ke' Yesus. "Guru," jie, "pailah yeng ca' digewai aku gei' ku nerimoe deri Allah idup yeng cum berudu mati?" jie.
42010026	Jedi Yesus nyamut lalu betanyoe, "Nyeh pai jie Ukum Musa ke' hal nyoe? Pai retie Ukum Musa yeng nan dibeco kau?" jie Yesus nyingka'e.
42010027	Samut guru agama, "Jie Ukum Musa: Kau ca' kaseh patoh ken Tuwowe, Allah kau, seputeh ati sebeníng derah. Pusat pemiker kau ca' ke' Allah bangam; semuya' keidup kau, kau ca' mementing Allah. Ge'em ca' ngaseh betor po kau ngaseh diret kauam," * jie ugar agama nyamut Yesus.
42010028	Jedi jie Yesus, "Nyoe si mátam, samut kau nyeh," jie. "Mun kau nunoe pemadah nyoe kau pasti idup," jie.
42010029	Kenaken si ugar agama nyeh tei' mat do reng yeng noe dikasehe, pie iyo manseh na' ngembokti kepanci direte. Mangko iyo betanyoe agei'am ke' Yesus, "Nyeh sopailah máte urang yeng ca' dikaseh aku?" jie.
42010030	Lalu Yesus pun nyamute potue. "Jedi," jie Yesus, "do siko' reng lelaki turun deri kota Yerusalem bejelan nuju ke' kota Yeriko. Temosie di tongah jelan iyo dikerupu le' pada' perampok. Simah dipangkonge, bejue dikerama'e, lalu pada' jolu yeng do di iyo diamie le' pada' perampok. Lalu iyo ditingale ming temenggengang beronso di tongah jelan.
42010031	"Dah nyoe kememujore do siko' pelayan agama Yahudi niti jelan yeng bisei' urang yeng dipempungah reng. Tumas merati reng beronso nyeh iyo nelingkong, kehe nulonge, noe kasehe.
42010032	"Jedi dah nyoe do jum siko' reng Lewi, wakel pada' pelayan di rumah kediyam Allah, niti jelan nyoe jum. Pie iyo ponyoe jum. Tumas teperati ke' reng yeng beronso nyeh iyo nelingkong jum. Kehe jum nulonge.
42010033	"Dah nyoe do siko' reng Samaria* die niti jelan nyoe jum, lalu diperatie mensiyo yeng beronso nyeh te'. Kaseh nar iyo meratie.
42010034	Dah nyoe dipanue, ditulonge, diberesehe belo ronsoe ken ayie angur. Dah diberesehe digulaie ken binya', dah nyoe dikobate. Dah dikobate pada' lukoe nyeh urang nyoe dianyo'e ke' atas binatang keledaie. Dah diongkahe ke' keledaie tei' lalu dibeyie ke' rumah sewo. Lalu ditoyue dinyoe malam nyoe.
42010035	"Jedi dah ari sebuwahe tei' reng Samaria nyeh ca' melaju pejelane, pie ditingale duwit perak direte duwo bingkap, diunyo'e ke' tuwowe rumah sewo, ento' ngongkos reng yeng beronso. Duwit tue, jie, ento' ongkos reng tue, beh? Pai-pai ja' yeng diperelue diunyo'am. Lalu mun do kekurange akuam yeng nyamonge, dah ku bebeli' kitue agei', jie reng Samaria nyingka' tuwowe rumah sewo nyeh."
42010036	Jedi dah Yesus ngenggesah cerito nyoe lalu iyo betanyoe ke' guru agama yeng betanyoe ke' iyo tadie. "Jedi lem pengaji kau," jie Yesus, "sopailah di antaro reng tigo yeng ngelalu reng beronso nyeh yeng mat ngaseh betore na' po ngaseh direte?" jie.
42010037	Samut guru agama nyeh, "Tentu yeng relo nulonge yeng mat kaseh ken betore." Lalu jie Yesus, "Konoam, kau pun ca' ponyoe jum."
42010038	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus ken murite tei' melaju pejelane ke' kota Yerusalem. Lem pejelane tei' detang ke' kampong sebuwah. Kampong nyoe kediyam reng betinoe bedemo Marta. Jedi Marta tei' ngaja' Yesus sidoe ke' rumahe, lalu sidoe pun nayi'.
42010039	Menyadie betinoe Marta demoe Maria. Jedi dah Yesus sidoe nayi' ke' rumah ken dudo' tei' lalu Maria pun dudo' bejonyang ken Yesus Tuwowe na' ningo omónge.
42010040	Pie Marta si busak besik ngenggewai jolu kei iyo ngeleladen pada' temuwaie. Dah nyoe iyo berenti sebentar manu ke' Yesus, lalu "Tuwowe," jie Marta, "kau noe kaseh peh ken aku bejeri bediret kuam kerejo? Sedang gewai adei' ku tue," jie, "dudo' nyem, ningo omóng kam. Boh kau nyuroh iyo nulong aku," jie Marta.
42010041	Pie samut Tuwowe tei', "Kau kamoh nar, Martaei, ngorie kuwater itu ini.
42010042	Teruhal sutiam," jie, "yeng penting. Maria si dah mileh yeng paling panci, mangko yeng dah dipilehe tetap di iyo nyem, noe tawu dirobut," jie Yesus nyingka' Marta.
42011001	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus tei' bedoa. Jedi dah bedoa tei' lalu jie siko' murite, "Tuwowe," jie, "minta' kau ngajar kami bedoa, na' po Yohanes mie ngajar murit iyo caro sidoe bedoa," jie.
42011002	Mangko jie Yesus, "Kam ca' bedoa bungi tue, O Apa', Kiroe demo Den disomah diagong. Kiroe Den mat disomah kei rajo di deniyo tue.
42011003	Kami minta' ke' Den jolu kei sego yeng cukup ento' tiyap ari.
42011004	Elonam, Apa'ei, kesalah kami, go kami pun ngelon reng yeng do kesalahe ken kami. Kiyasam kami deri segelo penggudo." Bungi nyoam contoh doa Yesus te'.
42011005	Lalu jie Yesus, "Umpamoe do reng yeng detang tongah malam numpang ke' rumah diret pie nongah cum nar persiyap diret. Lalu diret manu ke' kaban diret. Lalu jie diret nyingka' kaban nyeh, Tulong ge' roti tigo gie, kaban kuei,
42011006	go do reng detang deri jewoh numpang di rumah kami, pie nongah lantas nar, mat cum jolu kami, jie diret.
42011007	A, pi umpamoe jie betor diret, Ah, nang ngaru aku, tue dah tolap malam dah! Lawang ku dah ditokat, kena' dah tidor dah, ngei' ku ngingar pada' ana' ku. Sorot ku dah bengki' to' ngunyo' jolu ke' kau, jie.
42011008	Numo' pun demoe kaban kerabat diret, pie manseh ngei'e nulong diret tam dah tolap malam, dih?" jie Yesus. "Pie dingo beh kam! Mun diret manseh ngeresudu' ngemoran minta' si pengabise na'e iyo bengki' lalu ngunyo' pai-pai pun yeng dipinta' diret.
42011009	A, ponyoe jum ke' hal Apa' diret di serugo," jie Yesus. "Mangko jie ku, ca' ngeresudu' minta', mangko diunyo'. Ca' ngeresudu' manu, mangko buleh. Ken ca' ngeresudu' ngetok, mangko lawang pun dikoba'.
42011010	Go berang reng minta' pasti nerimoe; a, ken berang reng yeng manu pasti buleh, ken berang reng yeng ngetok, lawang pasti dikoba' kei iyo tamoe," jie Yesus.
42011011	"Kam yeng berana' pun ge'e, ayah kam nyukup keperelu ana' kam. Mun ana' diret minta' lawo' ikan noe ken diunyo' diret ken jolu biso, dih?
42011012	A, mun misale ana' diret minta' tolue, noe ken diret ngunyo'e ken kalo.
42011013	A, semalang ke' kam reng yeng bedoso pun ge'e, tawu kam ngunyo' jolu yeng panci ke' ana' kam, sa'am go Apa' kam di serugo yeng rajo panci. Sen pasti ngunyo' Roh Sen ke' reng yeng minta' ke' Sen," jie Yesus.
42011014	Jedi mátam. Do siko' reng kesarong setan yeng nyurohe bisue, dah nyoe Yesus nunong setan nyeh. Dah setan nyeh rari tei' urang yeng bokas kesaronge mat uleheam bepaner. Lalu mat kangápam pada' reng rami meratie.
42011015	Pie jie separo sidoe, "Iyo mampu nunong setan pun entam iyo dikuwaso le' Beelsebul kepala' pada' antu setan nyeh keh," jie, "nyoam go tawue nunong setan ponyoe ye'. Noe tam kuwaso Allah peh," jie sidoe.
42011016	Do jum reng yeng na' ngendugoe, mangko sidoe nyurohe mulah keenah keaneh kei ngembokti ke' sidoe ken kuwasoe mat deri Allahei noei.
42011017	Pie Yesus kin tawue ken ati pemiker sidoe. Lalu jie Yesus, "Boh kam ngajie. Sempamoe pada' urang sebuwah nenggeri beregu bekelompok lalu nan perang memerang pado sidoe nyem. Pengabise kin noe bodan nenggeri nyoe. Ponyoe jum reng yeng beseberumah. Mun iyo nan bekelayi pado lem rumah nyoe kin mempungah direte; pengabise noe bodan jum seberumah nyoe.
42011018	Jedi tadie kin jie kam aku nunong setan pakai kuwaso Beelsebul. Pie mun ponyoe maksute Beelsebul beperang pado direte; iyo mempungah direte nyem. Maksute kuwasoe langko' losi nayápam, mat noe? Noe ken iyo na' tokoh nyoe! (Mangko mat jelasam ken aku noe nunong setan makai kuwaso iyo.)
42011019	A, ge'em," jie Yesus nyingka' pada' reng Parisi nyeh, "deri murit kam pun do jum yeng nunong setan, mat noe? Pi ti ku kam noe nyalah sidoe. Noam kam madah ken kuwaso sidoe deri Pengelakar. Nyoe kin boktie," jie Yesus, "ken kam mat pileh bulu, mat beurang beaku. Mun begi murit kam diangap kam panci, pie mun aku diangap kam jat," jie Yesus..
42011020	"Pi boh kam ngajie. Mun aku mat nunong setan makai kuwaso Allah si," jie Yesus, "maksute kam dah ca' nyomah Allah kei rajo kam; tue dah jengkahe dah," jie Yesus.
42011021	"(Go mun setan mampu ditunong," jie, "maksute go do yeng lobeh bekuwaso deri kepala'e pun yeng behak bekuwaso nyo' merentah nyeh," jie.) "Jedi potue ne, kamei, contohe. Misale do tuwowe rumah yeng gegah bereni," jie Yesus. "Jedi iyo ngenjego rumah direte cukup ken pada' senjetoe opai; kin maksute pada' reto beno berang rega'e amánam, noe mampu diram-pas reng.
42011022	Pie misale mun do reng yeng lobeh bekuwaso deri tuwowe rumah si, iyo mampu nyerang sampai ngalah tuwowe rumah tadie, mat noe? Pengabise kin pada' senjetoe yeng diarape kin dirampas jum, ken pada' reto beno berang kiyada'e kin dirobut reng yeng monáng nyeh, lalu dibegie jum ken pada' kabane, go iyo mat lobeh gegah bereni deri tuwowe rumah nyeh tadie," jie Yesus.
42011023	Lalu Yesus nyuroh reng yeng ningoe ca' mileh ke' hal pengajare. Jedi jie Yesus, "Berang reng yeng noe nyeroto aku si samoam ken iyo ngelawan aku," jie. "Ken berang reng yeng ngei'e ngerubut nulong aku si samoam ken iyo mempungah ngenderako aku," jie.
42011024	Dah nyoe iyo nyamong panere. "Jedi sempamoe," jie Yesus, "do reng yeng dikesarong setan, lalu setan nyeh ditunong. Dah nyoe setan nyeh betatap begoyap di ujong puwang nun, ngogoe arong kei peronga' perentie, pie cum tetomue. Mangko jie setan nyeh nyingka' direte, Ku na' pulang ke' arong bokas kediyam ku mie, jie.
42011025	Jedi mátam, dah iyo pulang ke' bokas kediyame diperatie ibarat ke' rumah din tokohe dah dibelukas dibereseh dah, alap ca' siyap dah nyo' dikediyam, pie bolum do yeng ngendiyame.
