42011026	Dah nyoe iyo ngunang ngamie tujoh ko' setan agei' yeng paling jat deri iyo pun, nyo' diyam dinyoe ken iyo. Lalu pengabise reng nyoe mat uyoham deri kememerue iyo dikesarong setan yeng siko' mie pun," jie Yesus.
42011027	Jedi kebonóng Yesus ngajar do siko' reng betinoe di antaro pada' reng rami nyeh yeng bepangkas ontap, "Untong tuwaham ino' kau yeng ngado kau ken nyusu kau mie," jie.
42011028	Pie samut Yesus, "Pie manseh kepala' untong tuwaham berang reng yeng ningo posan payit Allah lalu makaie," jie Yesus.
42011029	Jedi kin benya'-benya' pada' reng rami bejejiyoh manu ke' Yesus. Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Paling jat kam reng (Yahudi) lapis tue," jie. "Go kam minta' merati keenah keaneh kei ngembokti kuwaso aku. Pi nyamán kam ngajie," jie, "cumam ku mulah petanah petano agei' nyo' kam cuwali petanah petano po petanah yeng tejedi ke' penijum Yunus mie.
42011030	Go yeng tejedi ke' Yunus mie kin mat to' petanah petano ke' reng di Niniwe. A, ponyoe jum aku; yeng langko' tejedi ke' aku Ana' Mensiyo tue gi mat to' petanah petano nyo' kam lapis tue.
42011031	-
42011032	Pie kam si manseh ngei' kam bebeta' piker," jie Yesus. "Mangko dah jengkah reng bengki' idup agei' dah Ari Kiyamát gi si pada' reng Niniwe die yeng langko' nuntut kesalah kam lapis tue. Go reng Niniwe mie kin sekali dipadah le' Yunus mie mat na'e sidoe bebeta' piker. Pie kam si noe. Teruhale reng yeng lobeh bekuwaso deri Yunus pun dah do dah ditue," jie Yesus. "A, ponyoe jum ratu deri nenggeri Selatan gi. Dah jengkah reng bengki' idup agei' dah Ari Kiyamát nyeh iyo pun langko' nuntut kesalah kam lapis tue jum, go kam keh ningo pemadah aku. Sedang ratu nenggeri Selatan mie kin mat detang deri pemuntol deniyo go iyo ingín nar na' ningo pemadah deri Rajo Salomo yeng belubang pemikere. Pie tekonoe ke' kam lapis tue si dah ningo reng yeng lobeh tawu deri Rajo Salomo pun, pie manseh ngei' kam ningoe. Mangko kam mat langko' dituntut didewo le' ratu Selatan gi, go iyo kin ingín tawu, pie kam si noe," jie Yesus.
42011033	Jedi jie Yesus, "Reng yeng mantong pelito noe ken koloe ditapo'e, atau diserangkonge ken gentang, dih? Mun reng mantong pelito kin tentu dileta'e di tongah ruwang, gei' reng yeng tamoe pun awas tam tampa' nyeh.
42011034	A, ponyoe jum mato diret. Mato diret na' po pelito nyo' tuboh diret. Mun mato diret moncas kin pemantau diret pun jelas, awas ken tampa' nyeh, mangko diret tawu bejelan ken ngenggewai jolu. Pie mun mato diret rabun si pemantau diret pun kusam, mangko yeng digewai diret pun kontan di sagam nyem.
42011035	Mangko ca' ati-ati kam ngajie. Jangán sampai yeng diangap kam tampa' pie kejedie mat sagamam.
42011036	"Pie mun bedan beko sampai ke' ati pemiker diret mat tampa', mun cum arong yeng sagam si, mangko gewai ulah tingkah laku diret pun mat tampa'am, na' po cayo pelito yeng manyah ke' diret," jie Yesus.
42011037	Jedi dah Yesus ngajar ponyoe tei' dah nyoe iyo diunang le' siko' reng deri kelompok Parisi nyo' makan di rumahe; lalu Yesus mat nayi' ke' rumahe lalu dudo' makan dinyoe.
42011038	Pie reng Parisi tei' eran merati Yesus go iyo noe ngerinah adat pemeso' sebolum iyo makan.
42011039	Dah nyoe jie Tuwowe, "A, tue si mat nyato nar ken ati pemiker kam kelompok Parisi. Go kam keedah reng yeng meso' luwar cawan atau pun meso' buntut pingan, pie delame gei' suba' jatam. Go kam nan ngerinah adat pemeso', pie ati pemiker kam mat serarat jat bangam, nan tama' goma' nyem.
42011040	Teruhal yeng mulah bedan beko diret samoam ken yeng mulah ati pemiker diret. Noe ken Sen mementing bedan beko pie noe ngaji ati pemiker diret! Pemiker kam mat keribanam.
42011041	"Pie mun na' ngerinah adat pemeso' yeng mat si," jie Yesus, "kam ca' sebulat ati nyerah gewai ulah bedan beko ati pemiker kam ke' Sen, mangko kam mat suci bereseham, beyi' luwar beyi' delam pun.
42011042	Pie kam kelompok Parisi si mat parah nar! Go ukum Allah yeng separoe digewai kam telitiam, pie yeng separoe diperayan kam kaliam. A, benso ukum Sen ke' hal pekuleh peramu diret ca' dibegi jum ke' Sen sepuloh satu, sebegi nyo' Sen semilan begi nyo' diret. Ukum nyoe si mat teliti nar kam ngenggewaie, sampai pada' rerempah sesonie ken pada' dewun samal pun nan dibegi kam ke' Sen. Nyoe pun cuco'am ken ukum Sen. Pie tekonoe ke' ukum Sen ke' hal ca' kaseh ken ke' hal ca' bujor benar si tarah ke' noe dipeduli kam kaliam. Menurute yeng nyoe ca' teliti digewai kam jum; a, ken yeng tadie pun nang na' diperayan dipelebu. Mat ca' samo digewai bisam.
42011043	"Parah nar kam kelompok Parisi! Tam kam ayah dudo' di arong yeng paling tekemuko des semeyang. Ken kam ayah disamut dipugi di adap reng rami, disapo reng Pa' Guru.
42011044	Mat parah nar kam, go kam keedah tama' yeng noe bebengkong, lalu sampai konoe tija' reng yeng ngelalue noe disengejo, lalu ngotor ngencemar direte, kejedie, go iyo noe tawu ken arong nyoe bisei' tama'," jie Yesus.
42011045	Dah nyoe jie siko' ugar agama nyeh nyingka' Yesus, "Guru," jie, "mun pengajar kau bungi nyoe mat menghina ngeremeh kami jum," jie.
42011046	Samut Yesus, "Mang pun!" jie. "Parah nar jum pada' kam ugar agama nyeh! Go pengajar kam ngembeban umát ken pengoma' yeng paling borat, pie kam si nyuroh betor die yeng ngoma'e. Tekonoe ke' diret kam si jewoh beh na' ngoma'e; ento' nulong ngangki' sikit pun keh kam," jie Yesus.
42011047	"Mat paraham kam," jie, "go kam nanám bengko tama' pada' penijum Allah yeng dibunoh akei' puyang kam mie.
42011048	Jie kam si tam nyo' kam ngehormát pada' penijum, pie yeng mat si nyoe ngembokti ken kam mat nyereto ken gewai akei' puyang kam yeng munohe mie, mat seati sepiker sepakat sesaro'am kam ken desiyan: desiyan tukang munohe, lalu kam tue tukang nanám bengkoe.
42011049	-
42011050	Mangko kam jemán tue mat langko' diukumam, cuco' ken tijum Allah yeng dipadah Sen ngelalu kepanai diret Sen nyomie. Kin jie Sen betijum mie, Ku langko' ngutus pada' penijum ken pada' pelantar posan Ku ke' sidoe. Pie pada' sidoe do yeng dipempungahe, do yeng sampai dibunohe, jie Sen. Dinyoam kenyatoe ken kam mat nimun doso pada' akei' puyang kam mie. Mangko maksut Sen kam lapis tuame' yeng langko' nangong kicas doso tam derah pada' penijum yeng dibunoh reng deri asal mulo deniyo tue diado mie pun,
42011051	betongai deri penijum Abel sampai ke' penijum Sakaria* yeng dibunoh reng mie di arong suci pun, di antaro rumah kediyam Allah ken bedah pesaling mie. Lalu kam pun mat nimun doso pada' akei' puyang kam mie, mangko mat kam lapis tuame' yeng langko' nangong kicas doso pada' keragam kejeya' yeng jat nyoe ye'," jie Yesus.
42011052	"Paraham kam ugar agama nyeh!" jie. "Go kam nonga' melempang reng gei' reng noe tekenal ken Allah. Ibarat ke' rumah din kuncie diamie ditapo' kam. Diret kam si noe tamoe, pie reng layin yeng ingín na' tamoe pun ditonga' dipelempang kam jum, keedah kosoe merarang buwah," jie Yesus.
42011053	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yesus pun turun deri rumah nyoe. Pada' reng kelompok Parisi ken pada' ugar agama nyeh mat sie nar ken Yesus, lalu betongai ari nyoe sidoe nentange sekejam-kejamam; sidoe teger ngendugoe.
42011054	Kaji sidoe na' ngenjorate ken omóng tutore gola' iyo ngelangar ukum Allah, kaji sidoe nun.
42012001	Jedi mátam. Pada' reng rami pun mat bejejiyoh bekumpol ngeliling Yesus, mat kental jal, sampai betija' beiri' betore. Dah nyoe Yesus ngomóng dolu ken pada' murite. "Awas beh kam!" jie. "Kam ca' ati-ati teradap pada' reng Parisi nyeh, yeng alap-alape nyem pecayo ken Allah, gola' gewai ulah ati pemiker sidoe tepalet ke' kam jum, keedah pengemang roti yeng mopah semuya' roti nyeh.
42012002	Pie pengabise ati pemiker sidoe langko' nyatoam, go semuya' segelo yeng gei' tue diselinong pie dah nyoe gi langko' dikoba'; a, ken jolu pai pun yeng gei' tue ditapo' diporam reng pie dah nyoe gi cagar dibeba' dibekau. Mat cum yeng kelawong, mat dipadah bisam dah nyoe gi.
42012003	Go jolu pai pun yeng dikosoh reng di sagam pie langko' dipanyah le' tampa', ken jolu pai pun yeng diawum didendumít reng caro bedenduwo pie langko' diira'-ira' di adap pada' reng rami," jie Yesus.
42012004	"Dingo beh, kawum kerabat kuei," jie Yesus. "Nang na' gola' ken reng yeng tawu munoh tuboh mensiyo, go kuwaso sidoe mat bula' dinyoam.
42012005	Pie kebelike kam ca' gola' ken Allaham. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei, go mat Allaham yeng bekuwaso munoh tuboh reng ge'em, ken bekuwaso ngelojang reng ke' lawut api ge'em. Mangko jie ku kam mat ca' gola' ken Sénam.
42012006	-
42012007	"Pie kam noe sa' gola' ke' hal pai-pai pun di deniyo tue, go Allah kin mat kaseh ken kam. Contohe burong pipi'. Burong pipi' kin paling kocit; noe berogoam; biyar limo ko' pun dijuwal, pie duwo sinam, nilaie. Ja'e numo' noe benilai pun pie burong pipi' manseh nan diawas dipongki' diret Allaham. A, kam pun nan diawas dipongki' Sen jum; sampai ke' buwo' di kepalo kam pun dah dibilang Sen dah tiyap lamare. Mangko nang gola', kamei; semalang ke' burong pipi' ge'e, diawas dipongki' Sen le' Allah, sa'am go kam. Kam kin jewoh berogo deri burong pipi' nyeh," jie Yesus.
42012008	"Dingo beh kam," jie Yesus. "Berang reng yeng ngangkue aku yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo di adap pada' reng rami nyeh aku pun na' ku ngangkue iyo di adap pada' melekat Allah gi.
42012009	Pie berang reng yeng nyangkal aku di adap mensiyo si aku pun langko' nyangkal iyo di adap pada' melekat Sen gi.
42012010	Berang reng yeng menghina ngeremeh aku yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo gei' tue si pie manseh tawu dielon Allah. Pie berang reng yeng ngejat ngeremeh Roh Allah si mat noe tawu dielon Sen," jie Yesus.
42012011	"Jedi kam mat cagar dipecaro reng di rumah semeyang di adap pada' pemimpin ken pada' penguwaso gi. Pie des kam dipecaro ponyoe nang na' kam kamoh miyoh, nang na' gedoh ngaji pai nyo' kam nyamute ken pai yeng langko' dikosoh kam,
42012012	go dah pas jengkah kam ngosohe si Roh Allaham yeng langko' madah ke' kam isei'e, pai to' kam nyamute," jie Yesus.
42012013	Jedi ketengah Yesus ngajar reng rami ponyoe do siko' reng di antaro reng rami nyeh yeng minta' tulong Yesus. Jedi jie yeng minta' tulong tei', "Guru," jie, "ku minta' tulong kau, kei kau nyuroh omue ku ngembegi ke' aku pada' reto beno pedero apa' kami mie," jie.
42012014	Pie samut Yesus, "Aku tue noe iyo ketuwo adat kam peh, kei ngembegi jolu kam," jie Yesus.
42012015	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' reng rami, "Awas beh kam," jie, "nang na' tamá' goma' ken pada' jolu, nang na' ingín ken pada' reto beno. Go reng idup pun noe iyo bepoko' ke' kekayo kesugehe peh," jie.
42012016	Dah nyoe iyo nyerito perempamo tue ke' sidoe. "Jedi," jie Yesus, "do siko' reng kayo sugeh. Tanahe belobeh lobeh asele,
42012017	malah ken paie pada' juronge dah noe muwát dah na' naroh pada' pekulehe tam kebenya'e. Abis iyo ngajie lalu Koti, jie, akal ku tue. Jurong ku jie, dah ponoh, cum kei narohe agei', jie lem atie nun.
42012018	Potue ne, engo ku, jie, akal ku. Pada' jurong ku yeng noe muwát tue, jie, na' ku ruma' ku, na' mulah jurong yeng paling bosai agei' kei ku ngongkah pada' genum ken pada' jolu pekuleh ku, entam dah noe muwát, jie.
42012019	Mat ayah reng kayo nyeh ngajie. A, dah ku mulah pada' jurong beru nyeh gi, jie lem atie nun, ha, dah nyoe langko' ku bekaji bediret kuam: Poe mat untong nyurong tuwah detang ke' aku tue to'. Go pada' jolu ku, jie, bepuloh tawun pun bolum bis. Jedi aku tue, jie, na' nganai peraso ku, na' makan minúm beriyah berami nyenáng ati ku nyem, jie reng kayo nyeh.
42012020	"Pie jie Allah nyingka' reng kayo tei', Kau budu! Kau arap ken jolu kau, pie malam tue pun nyawo kau langko' dicabut. Lalu cum keuntonge begi kau, pada' jolu yeng kau kumpol menya' tue pun, jie Allah.
42012021	"Ponyoame'," jie Yesus, "pada' reng yeng ngumpol reto beno ngaji keuntong direte nyem, pie kehe ngumpol reto beno yeng tan ken Allah di serugo."
42012022	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' murite, "Mangko ku madah ke' kam, nang na' kam kamoh ke' hal keidup kam di deniyo tue, demo ke' makan udap, demo ke' pakai ingap.
42012023	Go Allah kin dah ngunyo' keidup ke' kam. Noe peh idup penting deri makan, tuboh penting deri pakai? Jedi semalang ke' yeng penting ge'e dah diunyo' Sen, sa'am go yeng noe penting, demo ke' makan udap demo ke' pakai ingap. Pasti diunyo' Sen jum ke' kam.
42012024	"A, peratiam burong donang. Cumam iyo nugal, cumam iyo ngotam, cumam iyo ngumpol padi ke' lem jurong; pie nan do nyem jolu kei segoe; diret Allaham yeng nyurohe do. Pai tel agei' kam. Kam lobeh penting deri pada' burong!
42012025	Jedi pai ge' gunoe kam kamoh miyoh ke' hal keidup kam? Dipengamoh pun mat noe tawu kam na' nyamong umor kam ento' sekali mengkirap pun.
42012026	A, mun jolu memurah nyoe noe tawu digewai kam, ento' pailah na' kamoh ke' hal jolu layin? Noe ken tawu digewai ditangong kam.
42012027	"A, ponyoe jum ke' hal pakai ingap. Perati beh, pada' komang kayu nyeh. Cum kekamoh kekalute; cum iyo bekoyo bekerejo, pie sungoh pun ponyoe jenga'-jenga'am periyase. Rajo Salomo nyomie pun, sama' iyo paling kayo rayo, pie manseh kalah kejenga' periyas sen tam kejenga' pada' komang kayu tue.
42012028	Go mat diret Allaham yeng nyurohe jenga'-jenga' potue. Sénam yeng noyu merintue. Teruhal pada' komang kayu ken pada' rumput nyeh mat jolu noe tan; jolu dipetobas, dipecucol reng nyem, pi kin noe pai-pai, go noe iyo jolu yeng tan peh. A, semalang ke' jolu noe tan ge'e, diperintu Sen le' Allah, sa'am go kam! Pasti jolu to' pakai kam diunyo' Sen ke' kam. Kam gei' malang kepecayo kam, mun kam gei' kalut ke' hal nyoe.
42012029	"Mangko jie ku nang na' ati kam bepusat ngaji jolu pai to' kam sego, jolu pai to' kam insup. Nang na' kamoh miyoh ke' hal jolu ke' deng nyoe.
42012030	Go jolu ke' deng nyoe kin nan dikejar reng yeng noe tekenal ken Allah. Pie kam si noe patut tokoh nyoe, go Apa' kam di serugo nun dah tawu Sen dah ken semuya' keperelu kam.
42012031	Pie kebelike kam ca' mementing Allah kei rajo kam seputeh ati sebeníng derah, mangko pada' keperelu kam di deniyo tue pun diunyo' Sen jum ke' kam.
42012032	Sen mat ayah bikaham ngemberekat dolat kam yeng berajo ke' Sen. Mangko nang na' gola', pada' domo kuei, go numo' pun kam sikitam pie mat akuam Penungu kam," jie Yesus.
42012033	"Pada' reto beno jento keraja' kam ca' dijuwalam, duwite kam begi ke' pada' reng yeng bensat. Kam ca' mementing ngumpol reto beno jento keraja' yeng noe tawu rusa', ya'am reto beno di serugo nun yeng noe tawu dikurang, noe tawu luwang. Go reto beno dinun mat noe tawu dipaling reng, noe tawu disego gogat.
42012034	Mangko kumpolam reto beno kam dinun, go dinai reto beno kam dinyoam jum ati pemiker kam," jie Yesus.
42012035	-
42012036	Jedi jie Yesus, "Kam ca' serarat siyapam nungu kedetang aku gi, keedah na' po pada' ulun amo siyap nungu kedetang tuwowe deri pesta sabat. Go ulun yeng siyap kin bejue disaro', pelitoe dipantong, gei' iyo siyap copat ngoba' lawang des tuwowe nyeh nyapo.
42012037	Mat ayah bikaham pada' ulun amo yeng siyap ponyoe, nungu kedetang tuwowe. Go dah tuwowe detang nyeh iyo langko' nyaro' beju na' po ulun nyeh, lalu kebelike tuwoweam yeng berungkai makan to' pada' ulune, ken diret iyoam yeng ngeleladen ngelelayan pada' ulun amoe nyeh. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei.
42012038	Mangko mat untong tuwaham pada' ulun amo yeng serarat nan siyap nyem sampai nungkas malam pun, gola' tuwowe nyeh detang tongah malam atau pun dini ari.
42012039	"A, cubo diret ngaji jum benso tuwowe rumah yeng dipaling reng ke' jolue," jie Yesus. "Kira' tuwowe rumah nyeh tawu pai mayo malam pemaling langko' detang maling jolue kin tentu iyo mat siyap bejego gei' sempayo rumahe noe diruma' dirongko reng.
42012040	A, ponyoe jum kam; kam mat ca' serarat siyapam, go aku Ana' Mensiyo detang gi mat noe mererema'; temosi detangam. Kam noe tawu sebilo aku langko' detang gi," jie Yesus.
42012041	Jedi dah nyoe Petrus betanyoe ke' Yesus. "Tuwowe," jie, "perempamo kau tadie nyingka' kami bangamei, ke' ngawúm pada' umát kau layinei?" jie.
42012042	Lalu Yesus Tuwowe nyamute pun pakai perempamo yeng layin. Jedi jie Yesus, "Umpamoe do tuwowe rumah yeng mileh siko' pelayane kei ngurus ngator noyu merintu pada' ulun amo di rumahe, benso ngembegi jolu kei makan udape opai des tuwowe cum di rumah. Nyeh engoe ca' pelayan yeng kotilah yeng dipilehe? Noe peh ca' pelayan yeng mutu, yeng belubang pemikere, dih?
42012043	Jedi mun pelayan nyoe mat mutu ngenggewai tugase sampai ke' tuwowe pulang si," jie Yesus, "pasti pelayan nyoe didolat diberekat le' tuwowe nyeh.
42012044	Go mun iyo mutu des tuwowe nongah cum nyeh mangko tuwowe pun langko' pecayoam ken pelayan nyoe, mangko iyo langko' nyurohe ngurus ngator pada' reto beno jento keraja'e yeng layin jum. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei.
42012045	Pie koti umpamoe mun pelayan nyoe noe mutu; ati pemikere jat. Lalu kajie lem atie nun, Ah, entonge gei' suba' lamatam tuwowe ku dinun, jie. Lalu iyo noe ngeleng-ngeleng ke' tugase tadie; pada' ulun amo jewoh na' ditoyu diperintue, malah ken paie dipempungahe nyem, dipelesahe; lalu iyo pun teger beriyah berami makan minúm sampai bemabo'-mabo' nyem gewaie.
42012046	Maksute kin pelayan nyoe mat noe mutu, noe tetungue ke' kedetang tuwowe. Dah nyoe temosie cus! tuwowe nyeh detang noe mererema'. Ngaso tokoh nyoe gewai pelayane mangko pelayane tei' pasti dibunohe kaliam le' tuwowe. Maksute diukume le' tuwowe nyeh beroto ken pada' reng layin yeng noe pecayo.
42012047	-
42012048	Mun do pelayan yeng noe tawu kali ken kona' kemawo' tuwowe nyeh si manseh ge'; mun gewaie noe cuco' ken kona' tuwowe nyeh mat do pertimange; ukume pun ringán. Pie mun pelayan yeng tawu ken kona' kemawo' tuwowe pie kehe ngenggewaie, noe dipedulie kaliam, mat cum pertimange. Ukume mat paling borat. Go reng yeng diunyo' benya' ditageh pun benya'; mun iyo diunyo' benya' kin mat ca' benya' asele," jie Yesus.
42012049	"Tugas ku detang ke' deniyo tue," jie Yesus, "ibarat ke' nyucol din to' ku notai seruroh deniyo tue. Kona' ati ku si kiroe dah ditotai dah.
42012050	Mat ugasam kesusah kesensare yeng manseh ca' dirudu le' aku; pie gei' bolum ngerudue tue si susah sontokam ku ngajie.
42012051	"Nyeh kaji kam aku detang ke' deniyo tue ento' ngendamai mensiyo siko' ken betor peh? Pie noe," jie Yesus. "Kedetang aku noe iyo meyie damai peh, pie kibate malah ken paie reng langko' lawan melawan siko' ken betore tam do yeng pecayo ken aku, do yeng noe.
42012052	Tam kedetang aku nyeh reng pado seberumah pun langko' lawan melawan. Umpamoe reng limo ko' di lem seberumah nyoe: sidoe langko' besepiya' besebelah. Yeng duwo ngelawan yeng tigo, yeng tigo ngelawan yeng duwo nyeh.
42012053	Go yeng noe pecayo mat belawan ken yeng pecayo: sampai reng lelaki belawan ken apa'e, apa'e belawan ken ana'e; a, reng betinoe belawan ken ino'e, ino'e pun belawan ken ana'e; a, ken menantu betinoe belawan ken mentuwoe betinoe, mentuwoe betinoe pun belawan ken menantue betinoe," jie Yesus.
42012054	Jedi dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' pada' reng rami nyeh, "Pada' petanah petano ke' hal deniyo tue si ti ku tawu kam. Umpamoe des kam merati muko ari silam nyeh* Ha, jie kam, tanoe ari tue na' ujan. Lalu mátam, ari pun mat ujanam.
42012055	A, mun do angín selatan nyeh A, jie kam, tanoe dah na' kemarau dah tokohe. Lalu mat kemarauam.
42012056	Jedi tekonoe ke' pada' petanah petano di deniyo tue si kam mat tawu kam ken retie. Pie tekonoe ke' petanah petano ke' hal gewai Allah des jemán tue sungoh pun mat nyato nar si pie tarah ke' noe tawu kam. Pie nyoe tam kam mat alap-alape nyem patoh ken Allah!
42012057	"Menurute," jie Yesus, "diret kamam dah tawu ngaji ngenilaie, gewai pai yeng panci, yeng patut ca' digewai kam. (Boh digewai tuam, sebolum telampoh ngadap Sen nyo' diakim Sen gi).
42012058	Contohe kin benso reng yeng na' diukum le' betore. Mun kau dah tawu ken betor na' ngukum kau boh kau manu ke' betor kau dolo'e, nampang suro' dolu sebolum dipecaro. Mun noe kin gola' kau diukum borat, yeng noe tebeyar kau, sampai diserah ke' penguwaso, lalu pengabise ditahan di penjero máte.
42012059	Mun dah tokoh nyoe kin lopas noe lopas ca' dah lunas ukum yeng diputus ke' kau nyeh. (Sepancie kin sebolum dudo' ca' belunyor, sebolum tidor ca' bemimpi), gei' noe konoe ukum Sen gi," jie Yesus.
42013001	Jedi dah Yesus ngajar bungi nyoe tei' dah nyoe do deri reng yeng ngadap yeng ningoe tadie yeng begesah ke' Yesus. Gesahe tei' ke' hal beberopai ko' reng deri Galilea yeng gei' berue tue dibunoh le' Pilatus pas ketengah sidoe nyemeleh pesalinge ke' Allah.
42013002	Jedi dah Yesus ningo gesah nyeh tei' lalu jie nyingka' pada' reng rami nyeh, "Pasti kaji kam rami tue go sidoe jat nar deri pada' reng Galilea layin pun, dih? Mun noe si noe ken sidoe ditingang behayo ponyoe, kaji kam lem ati kam nun.
42013003	Pi noe, kamei! Sidoe pai bedoe ken kam ditue pun! O, jie kam, noe ken do jolu tokoh nyoe tejedi ke' kami. Pie yeng mat si," jie Yesus, "semuya' segeno kam pun mat behayo jum; langko' losi nayáp punah ranaham jum cuwali kam bebeta' piker ke' hal doso kam," jie Yesus.
42013004	"A, ponyoe jum ke' hal yeng tejedi ke' reng lapan belas ko' di Siloam mie, yeng mati tingang le' rumah tingie yeng betingkat-tingkat yeng robah tue mie. O, jie kam, nyoe tam doso sidoe benya' deri doso betore layin di Yerusalem nyeh, go sidoe ditingang behayo ponyoe, kaji kam nun.
42013005	Pi noe, kamei! Sidoe pai bedoe ken kam ditue pun. Mangko jie ku semuya' segeno kam pun mat behayo jum; kam langko' losi nayáp punah ranaham jum cuwali kam bebeta' piker ke' hal doso kam," jie Yesus.
42013006	Dah nyoe iyo madahe pakai perempamo tue. "Jedi," jie Yesus, "do sekayo' kayu ara di kebun reng siko'. Jedi dah jengkahe bebuwah tei' tuwowe nyeh ngansaue, gola' do buwahe, pie cumam buwahe.
42013007	Lalu jie tuwowe nyingka' ana' buwahe, Ne, dah tigo tawun ken tue dah ku ngarap iyo tue, gola' do buwahe, pie nan cumam. Mun potue si, jie, coh ditobang ja'. Modas-modasam iyo timu di tanah tue, jie tuwowe.
42013008	Pie jie ana' buwahe nyingka' tuwowe, Nang lo' ditobang; diadu ja' lo'e setawun agei'am, tuwowei, nyo' ku ngelaboe ngalie ken mupoke.
42013009	Gola' pai nawue tawun di adap gi na'e bebuwah. Mun ngei'e tawun di adap bebuwah si ma'am na' nobange pun," jie perempamo Yesus.
42013010	Jedi mátam. Dah Ari Berenti Kerejo nyeh Yesus tei' ngajar di sebuwah rumah semeyang reng Yahudi.
42013011	Dinyoe tei' poe do reng betinoe yeng dah lapan belas tawun saki' tam setan. Sampai bungko' tam penyaki'e nyeh; nolehe bediri tega'.
42013012	Jedi dah Yesus merati reng betinoe nyeh tei' lalu iyo nyurohe manu ke' adap. Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Den dah lopas dah deri penyaki' den tue," jie.
42013013	Dah nyoe Yesus nyampang jerie ke' reng betinoe nyeh te'; tumas disampang jerie ke' reng betinoe nyeh reng betinoe pun lintus bediri tega'; mat ciga'am tokohe, lalu iyo mat besukor mugi Allah
42013014	Pie pemimpin rumah semeyang si godie go Yesus ngembeyi' reng des Ari Berenti Kerejo. Lalu jie pemimpin nyingka' reng rami nyeh, "(Kam tue kuwat nar ngelangar ukum Allah). Jie ukum Allah kin do nam ari yeng diajen nyo' tona' bekoyo bekerejo. Jedi mun kam na' dipebeyi' ke' penyaki' kam si ca' manu des ari layin die. Nang na' ninting des Ari Berenti Kerejo," jie pemimpin rumah semeyang.
42013015	Pie Yesus Tuwowe nyamute. "Kam si mat alap-alape nyem patoh ke' Allah!" jie. "(Kam ayah nyalah gewai aku des Ari Berenti Kerejo, ca'ca'e kam mat patoh nar)," jie. "Pi noe peh tiyap ko' kam pun nan ngelopas ingún pemurun kam deri kanange lalu ngiringe ke' ayie nyo' iyo insup, des Ari Berenti Kerejo pun.
42013016	A, semalang ke' ingún pemurun kam ge'e, dipelopas kam des Ari Berenti Kerejo nyeh, sa'am go reng betinoe tue. Iyo kin buboh Abrahamam. Pai tel agei' dah lapan belas tawun pelamate iyo seolah-olah dipasong dikotoh le' Pengelakar. Mat patutam iyo pun dipelopas, numo' pun des Ari Berenti Kerejo nyeh," jie Yesus.
42013017	Pada' munsoh Yesus nyeh kererawoe butoam tam penyamute yeng konoe nar. Pie pada' reng rami si ayaham merati pada' keenah keaneh yeng dipulah le' Yesus.
42013018	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Nyeh engo kam koti keada'e des Allah disomah kei rajo? Ku na' merempamoe gei' kam jelas ngajie.
42013019	Jedi keada'e des Allah disomah kei rajo nyeh," jie Yesus, "keedah igei' komang* yeng diamur reng di umoe. Igei'e kin paling soniam, pie dah belantang mat mansang kin joboh-joboh, bepampang beedan, sampai pada' burong pun ingap di edane, belinong dinyoe," jie Yesus.
42013020	Dah nyoe ngaleh perempamoe. "Do sutie agei' perempamo ku ke' hal des Allah disomah kei rajo nyeh, gei' nyamán kam ngajie," jie Yesus.
42013021	"Jedi keada'e des Allah disomah kei rajo nyeh keedah pengemang roti sikit yeng digewol reng betinoe ke' topong genum segeredoh. Pie sungoh pun pengemang sikit nyeh mampu mopah topong genum menya' nyoe," jie Yesus.
42013022	Jedi Yesus manseh bejelan betatap samel ngajar di pada' kampong ken pada' kota, samel nuju pejelane ke' Yerusalem.
42013023	Jedi dah nyoe do reng betanyoe ke' Yesus, "Tuwowe," jie, "mat ngat sikitam peh reng yeng cagar ditulong diselamát le' Allah?" jie. Samut Yesus,
42013024	"Pemenya'e si benya', pie ibarat ke' rumah din lawange mat sempitam. Mangko kam mat ca' mementing sebulat ati ngerudue tuam. Nang na' nungu pagi lusoe nun, gola' dah telampau. Go dah nun gi, kamei, yeng máte langko' benya' reng yeng ingín na' tamoe, pie mat nolehe,
42013025	go lawang dah telampoh dikatup le' tuwowe rumah nyeh. Mun kam dah konoe katup kin kam tingal simah nengkuwau deri luwar minta' na' tamoe. Koba' ge' lawang nyo' kami, tuwowei, jie kam. Pie tuwowe rumah langko' nyamut kam, Kam noe iyo kaban kerabat aku, jie.
42013026	Lalu kam langko' nyamute, Pie den kin do makan beroto ken kami mie, jie kam. Ken den nan ngajar di kampong halamán diret kamiam; noe ken noe tekenal den ken kami, jie kam.
42013027	Pie tuwowe langko' nyamut kam, Kam noe iyo kaban kerabat aku peh. Rariam pada' kam reng yeng jat deri tue, jie tuwowe nyeh.
42013028	Dah nyoe kam langko' kesal ngiyal, nentumau lolau nangis, merati pada' akei' puyang kam benso Abraham, Isak, ken Yakub, demo ke' pada' penijum pun, mat do bisam dinyoe, des Allah disomah kei rajo, pie tekonoe ke' kam mat ditula', noe diterimoe dah na' tamoe pun.
42013029	Urange si mat rami nar yeng ngadap pesta Sen gi, des Allah disomah kei rajo," jie Yesus, "ngawum pada' reng noe Yahudi pun, deri semuya' nenggeri nenggero di seruroh deniyo tue," jie, "(pie kam tarah ke' cum ngadape, mun kam noe ngerudu lawang yeng sempit nyeh," jie.)
42013030	"Mat enah nar, dih? Tekonoe ke' reng yeng paling dudi diunang diamie pie mat sidoam, separoe, yeng diterimoe. Tekonoe ke' yeng dolu diunang diamie pie separoe mat noe diterimoe kaliam," jie Yesus.
42013031	Jedi dah nyoe kebonóng iyo ngomóng tei' do beberopai ko' reng deri kelompok Parisi yeng manu bepadah ke' Yesus. "Kau ca' rariam deri peloya' tue," jie, "go Rajo Herodes na' munoh kau," jie sidoe.
42013032	Pie Yesus nyamute, "Ah, gola' ken pai beh? Padaham ke' momar* nyoe ken aku manseh ngeresudu' ngenggewai gewai ku po selomoam, ngembeyi' pada' reng saki' ken nunong pada' setan seari duwo tue. A, dah nyoe noe dam lamat nyeh mat santo'am gewai ku; aku pun mat langko' detangam ke' tuju ku. Padaham ponyoam ke' Rajo Herodes nyeh," jie Yesus.
42013033	"Go aku," jie Yesus, "biyar koti-ti pun ku mat ca' ngeresudu' ngelaju gewai ku gei' seari duwo tue, sampai ku detang ke' Yerusalem. Pejelan aku mat noe tawu reng na' ngalange, go sipat reng penijum kin mat noe patut dibunoh di semadie arong; mun iyo dibunoh mat ca' di Yerusalemame'," jie Yesus.
42013034	Dah nyoe Yesus ngeromus isei' atie ngenáng pada' reng di Yerusalem nun. "Kaseh ku nar ngaji semuya' segeno kam di Yerusalem," jie Yesus. "Kam mat langko' diukum, go kam yeng gela' mempungah ken munoh pada' penijum ken pada' reng yeng ngelantar posan Allah pun. Mat kaseh ku nar ngaji ukum kam gi," jie. "Aku si mat ngemoran na' nulong kam yeng seli engku Allah, na' nyelinong kam deri behayo na' po mano' ngukup ana'e, pi kam mat ngei' kam ditulong.
42013035	Mangko so beh gi! Tam kam ngei' ditulong nyeh kam ku tingal ming kali, cumam nyo' pelinong kam agei'. Padah ku cum pelinong kam," jie Yesus, "go dah tue si kam mat cumam merati aku agei'. Merati noe merati ku agei'," jie Yesus, "ca' kam dah ngalu nyamut aku na' po yeng ditulis lem kitap Allah mie yeng bungie potue, Patutam kau tue dipugi, yeng detang atas demo Tuwowe.* A, mun dah bungi nyoe paner kam si beruam kam reng Yerusalem merati aku agei'," jie Yesus.
42014001	Jedi mátam. Dah Ari Berenti Kerejo yeng layin nyeh Yesus tei' do makan di rumah siko' reng pemimpin deri kelompok reng Parisi. Pada' reng Parisi di nyoe pun merati nyelidik Yesus (mun iyo ngelangar ukum Musa, kajie nun, sidoe na' nanám salah).
42014002	Jedi mátam. Poe pas di adap Yesus tei' do siko' reng yeng saki' bongka'.
42014003	Dah nyoe Yesus betanyoe ke' pada' reng kelompok Parisi ken pada' ugar agama yeng do dinyoe. Jie Yesus, "Mun na' nunoe ukum adat tona' nyeh buleh noe mun ngembeyi' reng des Ari Berenti Kerejo nyeh?" jie.
42014004	Pie sidoe ngojap nyem, cumam sidoe nyamut. Lalu Yesus pun ngenjepai jeri reng saki' nyeh, lalu mat dipebeyi'e; iyo pun mat ngijine pulangam.
42014005	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' pada' reng layin yeng do dinyoe, "Nyeh mun sempamoe ana' kam atau pun sapi kam tecabur ke' lem sumor kememujore des Ari Berenti Kerejo nyeh kam lebu nyem peh? Noe peh kam amie," jie Yesus, "numo' pun Ari Berenti Kerejo. Do noe deri kam yeng ngei' nulonge?"
42014006	Pie sidoe mat noe tesamute sepatah kato pun ke' omóng Yesus nyeh te'.
42014007	Jedi mátam. Perati Yesus tei' pada' reng yeng diunang makan tei' na' begerumpok ken pada' reng pembosai pemuko des makan. Mangko Yesus madah perempamo tue ke' sidoe. Jedi jie Yesus,
42014008	"Mun diret diunang diamie ke' pesta sabat reng, nang na' diret seroto detang jurus dudo' ke' arong yeng diajen nyo' pada' pembosai. Gola' pai nawue do detang temuwai nyeh yeng diangap tuwowe rumah penting deri diret.
42014009	Pie mun diret dah telampoh dudo' di arong yeng diajen to' iyo kin tuwowe rumah nyeh manu ke' diret lalu nyuroh diret ngaleh, go arong nyoe dah diajen to' temuwai yeng layin. Kin kererawoe diret, ditegur tuwowe disurohe dudo' di arong bebar benya'.
42014010	Pie kebelike (diret ca' renah atiam) des diret diunang diamie ke' pesta sabat opai. Coh ge' diret dudo' di arong yeng paling beroh ja'," jie Yesus. "Maksute kin paji tuwowe rumaham, na' dihormátei noei diret. Mun jie tuwowe rumah nyingka' diret, A, kau kitue, dudo' di arong panci tue, kaban kuei, jie. Mun ponyoe kin dah tuwowe rumah nyem yeng ngangkat diret di adap pada' temuwai yeng layin, (tam kona' kemawo' iyoam, noe iyo tam kemawo' diret tam ati diret kememuwa',)" jie Yesus.
42014011	"Go berang reng yeng meningie direte si langko' direnah, pie berang reng yeng ngerenah direte langko' ditingie dihormát," jie Yesus.
42014012	Jedi dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' tuwowe rumah tei', "Kau," jie, "sege' kau ngado pesta potue, kau nang na' ngat ngunang pada' betor kau, pada' ana' berana' kau ken pada' menyadie kau, beyi' pun," jie, "yeng bedemo-bedemo di kampong kau. Kin dah nyoe, sal iyo do gewaie iyo tetap madah kau jum," jie. "Nyoe pun upah kau, keedah bepengari.
42014013	Pi kebelike," jie Yesus, "boh madah pada' reng bensat, reng timpang, reng cacat, reng butoe, poko'e reng yeng nan dihina kam.
42014014	Kin sidoe noe tawu iyo na' melas kaseh ke' kau. Pie kau tarah ke' ayah bikah, go Allah die yeng melas kaseh kau gi, dah ari kebengki' reng bujor benar," jie Yesus.
42014015	Dah nyoe siko' reng yeng dudo' makan ken iyo nyamut panere. "Mat ayah bikah beuntong tuwah," jie, "reng yeng diunang makan beroto ken Allah dah Sen disomah kei rajo diret gi," jie reng nyoe te'.
42014016	Pie Yesus nyamute makai perempamo tue. "Jedi do reng siko'," jie, "yeng cagar na' bepesta bosai, lalu diunang uware ke' pada' reng rami lo'e.
42014017	Dah diunang uwar tei' iyo pun besesiyap ngajen pada' jolue, lalu iyo nyuroh ulune beposan ke' pada' reng yeng diunange, kei madahe ken dah siyap dah, mat ca' detangam, jie.
42014018	"Jedi mat dipadahe le' ulune te', pie reng paling benya' dedal ingel reng. Jie siko', Ne, jie, ku berue ge' tadie moli kebun; aku gei' na' meresoe. Maáp beh, jie, ku cum ngabang.
42014019	"Dah nyoe jie yeng siko' agei', Ku berue ge' tadie moli sapi limo pasang; ku gei' na' ngelaboe lo'e, jie. Maáp beh, ku cum ngabang.
42014020	"Dah nyoe detang agei' ke' yeng siko'. Ku, jie, berue tadiam ku bejodo, ku cum ku detang beh? jie.
42014021	"Lalu ulune tei' mat pulang bepadah ke' tuwowe hal nyoe. Mat godiam tuwowe te', go pada' reng yeng diunange kehe detang, lalu iyo nyuroh ulune. Copatam, jie, kau ca' ke' ulu ke' ilie beposan ke' reng bensat ke' reng timpang ke' reng cacat ke' reng butoe, kei ngabang pesta ku, jie tuwowe nyingka' ulune.
42014022	"Mat copatam ulune beposan ke' pada' reng nyoe, dah nyoe pulang bepadah ke' tuwowe. Dah ku laku dah pai yeng disuroh den, pi suba' benya'am muwát rumah den.
42014023	Lalu jie tuwowe nyingka' ulune, Kau ca' ke' luwar kampong, ke' deng pedukoh, jie, madah ke' pada' reng noe sekampong seloboh ken tona' pun, ngaja'e ke' rumah ku, noe buleh noe, iyo ca' detang nyo' ngisei' rumah ku tue, jie.
42014024	Ha, pada' reng yeng dolu diunang yeng kehe detang si, jie, mat didah ku ngicap pesta ku kaliam, jie tuwowe." Nyoam perempamo dipadah le' Yesus ke' pengabang pesta mie te'.
42014025	Jedi Yesus gei' bejelan nuju ke' Yerusalem. Benya' nar pada' reng rami yeng ngenjurut tamah iyo. Jedi dah nyoe Yesus bepusing ngadap ke' pada' reng rami nyeh lalu jie nyingka' pada' reng rami,
42014026	"Mat benya' nar poe reng yeng manu ngenjurut na' tamah aku," jie Yesus. "Pie yeng mat si mun reng na' ngenjurut aku iyo ca' ngaseh ken mementing aku. Mun reng noe ngaseh ken mementing aku lobeh deri ino' apa'e demo ke' ana' binie demo ke' dulor menyadie, malah ken paie sampai ke' keidup direte pun, pie mun iyo noe ngaseh aku lobeh deri semuya' segeloe si," jie Yesus, "iyo mat noe mampu menjedi murit aku," jie.
42014027	"Ge'em mun reng na' namah aku iyo mat ca' relo disensare, ca' relo nangong salipe. Mun reng yeng noe relo nunoe aku, mun iyo ngei'e nangong salipe, disensare na' po aku, iyo mat noe mampu menjedi murit aku. Kam mat ca' ngaji lo'e kesusah kesensare yeng langko' dirudu kam, mun kam mat na' menjedi murit aku," jie Yesus.
42014028	"Misale umpamoe diret beanang na' mulah rumah yeng paling bosai. Kin ramue ca' dikaji diret dolo'e, cukupei noei nyo' diret nyanto'e.
42014029	Mun misale ramu noe cukup, pie diret dah nunyame tungkate kin lalu noe tesanto' diret; lalu kin diret ditentubi betor.
42014030	Ti beh, jie, reng tue, bosai pasa' deri pado tiyang.
42014031	"A, ponyoe jum," jie Yesus, "umpamoe do rajo yeng na' beperang ken rajo layin. Tentu iyo bekengkarang dolo'e ngaji munsohe: mun misale serededu munsohe duwo puloh ribu ko', pie yeng iyo ngat sepuloh ribu ko'am, mampu noe iyo ngelawane?
42014032	Mun engoe noe mampu kin iyo pasti ngewakel siko' to' minta' damai lo'e sementaro munsohe gei' di jewoh nun.
42014033	Jedi ponyoe jum ke' hal reng yeng na' menjedi murit aku. Mat ca' dikajie jum sebolume, mampu noe iyo ningal semuya' kepenting direte? Go berang reng yeng noe relo ningal semuya' kepenting direte si mat noe mampu menjedi murit aku," jie Yesus.
42014034	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Mat panciam mun reng na' menjedi murit aku, pie iyo mat ca' mutu mementing ngaji akuam. Ibarat ke' geram din geram kin mat benya' gunoe. Pie mun geram dah telampoh tabar kin mat noe tawu dipulah masing agei'.
42014035	Mat cum dah gunoe, na' dipampit nyo' mupo' jolu pun mat noe tepakai; a, nyo' pencegah rumput pun noe tepakai, tingal gunoe ento' dibuwang ngóng dam. "Semuya' segeno, kelinang mat ca' ningo," jie Yesus.
42015001	Jedi mátam te'. Pada' penageh pajak pemerentah demo ke' reng yeng diangap reng bedoso le' pada' ugar agama tei' rami bekumpol ningo Yesus ngajar.
42015002	Pie pada' reng kelompok Parisi demo ke' ugar agama Yahudi yeng layin si ngomel ke' hal Yesus. "Reng tue si," jie, "gela' begewol begelumo ken reng bedoso, malah ken paie koloe iyo makan ken reng bedoso pun," jie sidoe ugar agama.
42015003	Mangko Yesus ngajar sidoe pakai perempamo tue.
42015004	"Nyeh kam," jie, "sempamoe siko' di antaro kam yeng benya' domoe, sampai seratus ko'. Pi mun do siko' yeng meracau yeng losi nyeh pai gewai tuwowe, engoe? Tentu domo yeng benya' ditingale lo'e, diadue nyem iyo nyulam di padang rumput, kei iyo ngogoe yeng siko' yeng losi, mat noe? Simah digogoe sampai tomu,
42015005	dah tomu nyeh ayah bikaham. Disampange ke' bewue,
42015006	dibeyie pulang, lalu ngunang ngumpol pada' waris wala' kawum kerabate tam iyo mat ayah bikaham. Yo' diret beriyah berami, jie reng yeng nomu domo nyeh tadie, tam domo ku yeng losi tadie dah tomu ku dah.
42015007	"Jedi," jie Yesus, "ponyoe jum Apa' diret di serugo nun. Mun do siko' ja' reng bedoso yeng bebeta' piker, Sen tarah ke' ayah bikah, ngaji yeng siko' nyeh, deripado yeng semilan puloh semilan yeng bujor benar, yeng noe sa' bebeta' piker," jie Yesus.
42015008	"A, ponyoe jum," jie Yesus, "sempamoe do reng betinoe yeng nyimpan duwit perak sepuloh bingkap. Pie mun losi sebingkap pun iyo kin mantong pelito kei ngogoe, lalu nyapu lantai, gola' do di saroe lantai; simah digogoe sampai tomu.
42015009	Dah tomu tei' iyo pun beayah bikah, lalu madah waris wala' kawum kerabate. Yo', diret beayah bikah, go duwit ku yeng losi, dah tomu ku dah, jie.
42015010	"Mangko," jie Yesus, "ponyoe jum pada' melekat Allah di serugo nun. Sal ge' siko' reng bedoso pun yeng na'e bebeta' piker," jie, "pada' melekat Sen mat beayah bikaham, numo' iyo siko' pun," jie Yesus.
42015011	Dah nyoe Yesus begesah agei'am ke' sidoe. "Jedi," jie, "do reng yeng duwo ko' ana'e lelaki.
42015012	"Dah nyoe jie yeng bunsu nyeh tei' nyingka' apa'e, Begiam, Pa', ke' aku reto beno jento keraja' yeng cagar na' dibegi den ke' aku nyeh; ku, jie, ngei' ku nungu dah nyoe gi, ku na' nerimoe tuam, jie yeng bunsu. Lalu mátam, dibegie le' apa'e pada' reto beno jento keraja' kebun jenah ke' ana'e duwo ko'.
42015013	"Dah dibegie tei' yeng bunsu dah pagi lusoe ponyoe si lintus dijuwale bisam yeng dibegi ke' iyo; dah dijuwale lalu iyo pun ditingale rumah apa'e lalu turun bejelan ke' nenggeri jewoham. Dinyoam pada' duwite semadi bar bur diborose nyem segontang ayah ento' beriyah berami ponyoam, beabis-abisam duwite.
42015014	"Jedi poe dah bis pada' duwite tei' di nenggeri nyoe pun pada' reng buyun yeng paling menyasat. Paling susah, tang ke' bensat meretatam ana' bunsu nyeh te'.
42015015	Rumah kediyam pun cum dah, lalu iyo numpang rumah siko' reng nenggeri nyoe. Dah nyoe disuroh le' tuwowe rumah nyeh ca' nungu bebi di dukoh nun.*
42015016	Lalu mátam, gewaie tei' nungu bebi reng, mat bensat meretat tei'am, ana' bunsu nyeh te'. Kira' diunyo' reng ken sokam yeng kei ngumpan bebi pun na'e jum ento' ngonyáng porute, pi cum reng ngunyo'e jolu kei sego pun.
42015017	"Jedi kepepanyange si ana' bunsu nyeh mat kesale ken kelakue nyomie ponyoe, mat bebeta' piker. Lalu jie lem atie nun, Di rumah apa' ku si pada' ana' buwah sen pun bekelobeham jolu kei sego, sedang aku tue, jie, dah na' mati rangkah dah.
42015018	Tue, jie, aku na' pulang ke' apa' ku. Dah detang kinun aku na' ngangkue kesalah ku ke' sen, jie, go aku mat bedoso, ngelangar pemadah Allah ge'em, ngelangar pemadah apa' ku ge'em. Nyoam, jie, yeng na' ku padah ke' sen dah ku pulang.
42015019	Aku dah noe patut diangap ana' sen, tam doso diret ku; ma'am aku kei pelayan sen nyem, dah detang kinun, kaji ana' bunsu nyeh lem atie nun, bekengkaji pai yeng langko' dipadahe ke' apa'e dah iyo pulang.
42015020	"Jedi mátam. Mat turunam ana' bunsu nyeh deri nenggeri jewoh nyoe, na' pulang ke' apa'e. Dah nyoe lamat belamat mat soma' dah ke' kamponge. Jedi bolum iyo detang ke' rumahe tei', gei' jewoh deri rumahe nyeh apa'e pun dah ketawue dah ken ana'e detang. 42015021	"Dah nyoe jie ana'e nyingka' apa'e, Aku tue pa'ei, jie, dah bedoso dah, ngelangar pemadah Allah ge'em," jie, ngelangar pemadah den pun ge'em. Mat noe patut dah aku kei ana' den, tam aku mat bedoso, jie.
42015022	"Pie apa'e si mat ayah bikaham tam ana'e dah pulang. Lalu iyo beposan ke' pada' pelayan rumahe, Copatam! jie. Amiam beju yeng paling panci, disaro'am ke' ana' ku tue. Saro' jum sensaring ken senal, jie apa'e nyingka' pelayane.
42015023	Dah nyoe bunoham ana' sapi yeng gomo', jie, kei tona' bepesta beayah bikah.
42015024	Tam ana' ku tue, jie, yeng diangap ku dah mati pie tue bengki' idup agei'am! Seolah-olah, jie, jolu yeng losi, pi tue dah tomu agei'am, dah pulang dah ke' aku, jie apa'e. "Lalu mátam, mat bepesta beayah bikaham sedena'.
42015025	"Jedi ana' jula' reng nyoe tei' des adei'e pulang nyeh nongah kumo, bolum tawue ken adei'e dah pulang. Jedi dah detang deri umoe tei' dah soma' ken rumah lalu kedingo ken reng di rumahe nyeh beriyah berami.
42015026	Kangápam iyo ningo bungi reng rami nyeh, lalu ditanyoe ke' pelayan yeng siko', Nyeh pai gewai reng di rumah tue? jie.
42015027	"Ne, adei' kau dah tomus dah! jie pelayane. Nyoam go apa' kau nyuroh reng nyemeleh ana' sapi yeng gomo', nyuroh reng beriyah berami, go ana' sen dah selamát, dah pulang dah ke' apa'e, jie.
42015028	"Pie omue nyeh dah ningo agah nyoe mat godiam, ngei'e nayi' ke' lem rumah. Lalu apa'e pamus, ngemoran ngaja' ana'e nayi' makan.
42015029	"Pie ana' jula' nyeh berutap. Aku, jie, betetawun-tawun beompas pulas bekoyo bekerejo ngelayan den, keedah ulun den, jie. Sekali pun cum ku ngelangar pemadah den. Pie jangán ken ana' sapi, siko' kaming pun noe koloe den unyo' ke' aku nyo' ku beriyah berami ken kaban ku, jie.
42015030	Pie temosi dah detang ana' den tue yeng teger ngemboros reto beno den noe bebotang, diabise ke' pada' betinoe royal nyeh, pailah! semorie disamut den ken ana' sapi yeng gomo' lempong, pai noe dipesta, disensugoh, jie ana' jula'e.
42015031	"Samut apa'e tei', Jang, jie, kau kin serarat nan do ken aku ditue, jie apa'e. Pada' engku aku engku kau, jangei, dah yeng aku yeng kauam. Tingal kau makaie dam.
42015032	"Pi benso adei' kau tue, konai na' noe beayah bikah beriyah berami nyamute, go yeng diangap ku dah mati nyeh mat idup! Keedah jolu losi, pi tue dah tomu dah. Patutam tona' beayah bikah!, jie apa'e."
42016001	Dah nyoe Yesus madah perempamo tue ke' murite. "Do reng yeng kayo rayo yeng ngupah reng siko' nyo' kaki tangáne. Pie dah nyoe, poe, do jum reng layin yeng bepadah ke' reng kayo nyeh ken reng nyo' kaki tangáne teger ngemboros jolue.
42016002	Dah reng kayo ningoe lalu iyo nyuroh kaki tangáne ngadap iyo, lalu jie nyingka' kaki tangáne, Ngopai go gewai kau tokoh tue? Cum ku nyuroh kau tokoh tue, jie. Kau ca' nerang nyelesai koti caro kau ngembelenyo jolu aku tue; ca' dipadah kau abis-abisam. Dah nyoe kau langko' ku renti nyo' kaki tangán ku , jie reng kayo nyeh.
42016003	"Jedi ningo paner reng kayo nyeh bungi nyoe tei' lalu reng yeng to' kaki tangáne kajie lem atie nun, Poe aku tue langko' direnti le' tuwowe ku. Dah nyoe pailah nyo' pencarei' ku tue; na' beumo pun mat noleh ku; na' minta' modas ke' betor pun rasoe ku jum, jie lem atie nun.
42016004	Pie dah nyoe do iyo nomu pemiker, jolu pai yeng cagar digewaie, gei' iyo mat diterimoe ditulong reng dah iyo direnti le' reng kayo nyeh.
42016005	Jedi gewaie tei' potue. Iyo beposan ke' semuya' segeno reng yeng berutang ke' tuwowe nyeh nyo' ngadap iyo. Dah dipangele pada' reng yeng berutang nyeh tei' dah nyoe kaki tangán reng kayo nyeh betanyoe rato-rato ke' reng yeng berutang nyeh, ke' hal utange masing-masing sidoe. Jedi jie nyingka' yeng siko' tei', Beropaiam utang kau di tuwowe ku nyeh, jie.
42016006	Samute, Utang ku, jie, seratus buwah tepayan binya' saitun. Lalu jie kaki tangán reng kayo nyeh, Tue ne bon kau. Yeng seratus nyeh ca' kau apus, ditulis ja' limo puloh tepayan, jie. Copatam, jie. (Maksute yeng limo puloh tepayan nyeh noe sa' dibeyaram; nyoe penulong iyo ke' reng yeng berutang nyeh.)
42016007	Dah nyoe iyo betanyoe ke' yeng siko' agei', Nyeh utang kau tei' beropai? jie. Samut reng yeng berutang nyeh, Aku seratus bembiling genum, utang ku, jie. Lalu jie kaki tangán reng kayo nyeh, Tue ne bon kau; yeng seratus nyeh diapus, kau tulis lapan puloh buwah ja', jie. (Lalu ponyoe jum ken pada' utang reng layin; dikurange bis jum; maksut iyo gei' sidoe pun na'e melas kaseh noyu merintu iyo, dah iyo konoe renti reng kayo nyeh.)
42016008	Jedi dah reng kayo nyeh tawu ken gewai kaki tangáne yeng noe bujor benar nyeh pie manseh dipugie. (Noe iyo dipugi tam gewaie noe bujor benar peh,) pie dipugie tam iyo panai, belubang pemiker," jie perempamo Yesus nyeh te'. Lalu jie Yesus, "Poe, reng di deniyo tue yeng bolum tekenal ken Allah pun pie panai ngaji cadange nyo' keuntong direte; lobeh panai deri reng yeng seli umát Allah yeng dah diyam di tampa' pun," jie Yesus.
42016009	"Mangko ku madah ke' kam yeng murit aku," jie Yesus, "kam pun ca' panai jum makai reto beno kam di deniyo tue. Ca' dipakai kam nyo' kam ngongkos ngelayan gewai Allah. Go mun kam dah ke' serugo kin noe ken dipakai agei' reto beno kam di deniyo tue; pie mun kam panai makai reto beno kam di deniyo tue nyo' kam ngongkos ngelayan gewai Allah kin mangko dah kam kinun gi kam langko' dialu disamut panci. Yeng ngalu nyamut kam tei' ya'am pada' reng yeng do dinyoe asel tam kam ngongkos ngelayan gewai Allah di deniyo," jie Yesus.
42016010	"(Kam mat ca' panai ken bujor benar ken reto beno yeng diunyo' le' Allah ke' kam di deniyo tue,)" jie Yesus. "Go yeng mat si reng yeng tawu dipecayo ken yeng ringán yeng kocit si maksute iyo tawu jum dipecayo ken yeng bosai yeng penting. Pie reng yeng noe bujor benar ken jolu yeng kocit si pai tel agei' ken jolu yeng penting, pasti iyo noe bujor benar jum nguruse.
42016011	Mangko mun kam salah makai reto beno kam di deniyo tue," jie Yesus, "konai Allah na' nyerah ke' kam reto beno yeng mat yeng tan seora'-ora'eam dinun?
42016012	Mun noe tawu mongki' meringkin jolu di tanah pinyam tue konai Sen na' nyerah ke' kam reto beno yeng mat yeng lobeh berogo dinun?" jie Yesus.
42016013	Dah nyoe Yesus manseh nyamong panere agei'. "Reng mat noe tawu na' betuwowe duwo," jie, "go atie kin noe bulat ke' siko'am. Mun reng betuwowe duwo kin tentu yeng siko' dikeayahe yeng siko' dikerisie, yeng siko' dibuwang yeng siko' diamie. Ponyoe jum kam. Kam noe tawu na' patoh melayan Allah mun gei' mementing duwit. Ca' mileh, nai yeng kei tuwowe kam," jie Yesus.
42016014	Jedi pada' reng kelompok Parisi pun mat ningo jum semuya' omóng Yesus nyeh te'. Pie sidoe diolo'-olo'e nyem, go sidoe Parisi nyeh ayahe ken duwit.
42016015	Pie jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Kam si," jie, "di adap mensiyo ca' ca'e bujor benaram, pie Allah mat tawu Sen ken ati kam. Sen tawu ken kam noe mementing Sen di lem ati kam nun. Awas beh! Go jolu yeng dipugi dikepenting le' mensiyo si pie mat dikerisie dihina le' Allah," jie Yesus.
42016016	Dah nyoe iyo ngaleh panere. "Jedi," jie Yesus, "deri nyomie sampai ke' kedetang Yohanes Penyolam nyeh yeng kelar nan dipadah diajar si ya'am pada' ukum Allah ken semuya' yeng ditulis le' pada' penijum Sen yeng layin pun. Pie dah tue si, betongai ken Yohanes Penyolam nyeh yeng nan dipadah diajar si ya'am agah panci ke' hal jemán yeng nan ditantie dicinto le' umát Allah, des Allah disomah kei rajo. A, semuya' segeno mensiyo pun mat ngemoran nar na' dikawum des Allah disomah kei rajo nyeh.
42016017	Pie maksut ku noe go ukum Allah dah berubah peh. Noe! Setitik reno pun mat noe losi berayan. Malah ken paie manseh ge' murah seruroh langi' ken tanah tue losi nayápam deri ukum Allah berubah sikit pun," jie.
42016018	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Berang reng yeng nyara' binie dah nyoe bejodo ken bini beru si iyo mat butang beonga'. Ge'em mun reng lelaki bejodo ken betinoe yeng dah sara' ken lakie si nyoe demoe butang beonga' jum," jie Yesus.
42016019	Jedi Yesus ngenggesah cerito tue ke' sidoe. "Jedi do," jie Yesus, "siko' reng kayo sugeh, nan bepakai panci mewah, ken keidupe nan belobeh-lobeh. Milang ari beriyah berami makan minúm.
42016020	-
42016021	A, do jum siko' reng bensat meretat, demoe Lasarus. Tubohe ngeripas bisei' pada' koreng. Sampai asue pun nan manu ngenjilat korenge. Lasarus tei' nan ngalai di muko lawang pagar reng kayo sugeh. Nan lapar nyem, coko' ken jolu disego reng kayo nyeh. Kira' diunyo' reng ken kora'e pun na'e iyo nyegoe, kajie nun.
42016022	"Dah nyoe lamat belamat reng bensat nyeh matiam. Dah mati ditangong le' pada' melekat ke' serugo. Dinyoe iyo begelumo mansa' ken Kei' Abraham. "Kepepanyange reng kayo sugeh pun mati jum, dah mati tei' dipasar,
42016023	dah nyoe iyo ke' lawut api. Paling sensare iyo dinun. Dah nyoe iyo nengkadah ke' atas, diperatie do Kei' Abraham di arong jewoh nun, ken Lasarus di sepiya' Kei' Abraham.
42016024	"Dah nyoe jie reng kayo nyeh, O Kei' Abraham, jie, gola' do kekaseh den, tulong ge' aku tue. Nyuroh Lasarus kitue, ngencelup tunyo'e ke' lem ayie, nyo' ngembesah lidah ku. Go aku paling sensare lem api benyalo tue.
42016025	"Pie jie samut Kei' Abraham, O capit ku, jie, kau si dah nerimoe dah yeng paling dipenting kau des kau idup mie, ya'am pada' jolu panci mewah nyeh. Cum kau ngaji Allah, mangko tengkalo tue kau mat sensare. Tekonoe ke' Lasarus tue, jie, gei' idup mie nan beora'-ora' sensare. Ja'e tue si iyo diibor, dilimu, jie.
42016026	"A, pai tel agei', jie Kei' Abraham, na' nyuroh Lasarus kinun, tam tentaro kena' ken kam dah dipulah parong delam, to' reng noleh pulang mansang. Reng deri tue, jie, noe mampu na' kinun, yeng deri nun pun, jie, noe mampu na' kitue, jie Kei' Abraham.
42016027	"Mun ponyoe Kei'ei, jie reng kayo, ku muhúnam ke' den, nyuroh Lasarus manu ke' seberumah ku yeng gei' idup,

42016029	"Pie jie Kei' Abraham, Noe, jie, noe sa'am Lasarus manu ke' sidoe. Go pemadah Musa ken pemadah pada' penijum layin pun, jie Abraham, dah ditulis dah lem Kitap Allah nyo' menyadie kau ngembecoe. Kiroe menyadie kau ca' tuno' ken pemadah Musa sidoe, gei' noe manu ke' lawut api jum.
42016030	"Samut reng nyoe, Pi sidoe si ngei'e ningo pemadah yeng ditulis pada' penijum pun, jie. Ja'e gola' do reng mati pulang idup si entonge na'e sidoe bebeta' piker, jie reng kayo.
42016031	"Pie jie Kei' Abraham, Mun sidoe ngei'e ningo pemadah Musa ken pemadah pada' penijum layin, tetap ngei'e jum pecayo, numo' pun do reng mati pulang idup, jie Kei' Abraham."
42017001	Jedi jie Yesus nyingka' murite, "Kenaken si nan do nyem jolu yeng kei nyangkut reng kei nyurohe bedoso; mat noe koloe noe. Pie mat parah nar reng yeng nyangkut betore, go ukume mat paling borat.
42017002	Mun iyo nyangkut reng pecayo, biyar pun reng pecayo yeng paling beroh pun, pie mat borat nar ukume. Manseh nyamán ge' betu bosai ditamat ke' liyere lalu iyo dilojang ke' lem lawut deri pado iyo dibelas le' Allah tam iyo ngacau ngaru reng pecayo.
42017003	Jedi mat ca' ati-ati nar, kamei, gei' noe nyangkut betor. "Pie mun menyadie diret yeng seimán bedoso, diret mat ca' negure. Lalu ponyoe jum mun iyo dah bebeta' piker diret mat ca' ngelone.
42017004	Numo' pun benya' kesalahe ken diret diret manseh ca' ngelone. Umpamoe iyo mulah kesalah ken diret sampai tujoh kali lem seari nyoe pun, dah nyoe sampai tujoh kali jum iyo ngangkue kesalahe teradap diret. Pie mun iyo dah ngangkue ken dah bebeta' piker si, diret mat ca' ngelone," jie Yesus.
42017005	Jedi jie pada' pelantar posane nyingka' Tuwowe, "Kepecayo kami gei' memalang. Tulong ge' kami gei' kepecayo kami mansang," jie.
42017006	Samut Tuwowe, "Pie mun mat dipakai si, numo' pun kepecayo kam gei' malang pie manseh bekuwasoam, kamei. Ibarat ke' jolu din numo' pun kepecayo kam mosai igei' sensabi pun pie manseh bekuwasoam. Misale mun kam secaro bekato nyem na' nyuroh kayu tue gei' iyo tecabut tepelesat ke' lawut nun si mat na'e tuno' ke' kam," jie Yesus.
42017007	Jedi dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Umpamoe do ulun reng yeng beari-ari kumo atau pun nungu ingún pemurun tuwowe. Pie des iyo pulang ke' lem rumah malam ari nyeh noe ken do jie tuwowe, Dudo'am kau, bom na' makan lo'e, dih? Noe ken tuwowe bungi nyoe nyingka' ulune!
42017008	Kebelike kin ulun nyeh disuroh le' tuwowe berepi ngerompah dolo'e, manei' keberai opai, nyo' iyo ngeleladen tuwowe makan lo'e. Dah santo' melayan tuwowe nyeh berue ulune diborie istirahat, makan opai.
42017009	A, dah iyo santo' ngenggewai jolu ke' deng nyoe yeng disuroh le' tuwowe nyeh pun selomo mat cumam tuwowe nyeh beterimoe kaseh ke' iyo. Ngopai? Go nyoe kin tugas yeng patut ca' digewai le' iyo," jie Yesus.
42017010	"Jedi ponyoe jum kam ken Allah Tuwowe," jie Yesus. "Sama' pun kam dah ngenggewai semuya' segeno na' po yeng disuroh Sen ca' digewai pun pie nang na' ngaji lem ati kam nun ken Sen ca' besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' kam. Kebelike kam ca' bungi potue, Mat noe patut kami dibelas kaseh Den. Go kami si engkas ngelaju tugas kami yeng disuroh Den, na' po yeng patut digewai le' ulun." Ponyoam Yesus ngenjelas ke' hal ati ulun teradap tuwowe nyeh.
42017011	Jedi Yesus bejelan nuju ke' kota Yerusalem. Jelan nyeh tei' pas niti di tentaro peloya' Samaria ken peloya' Galilea.
42017012	Dah nyoe dah soma' sebuwah kampong tei' do reng lelaki sepuloh ko' yeng saki' kusta*, penyaki' kuli' yeng behayo, mat lelah nar. Sidoe na' betomu ken Yesus, pi tam bepenyaki' kusta nyeh sidoe mat bediri deri jewoh nun, noe manu ke' soma'.
42017013	Lalu pangkas kayis nyapo Yesus. "O Yesus! Tuwowe! Tulongam kami," jie, "gola' do kekaseh kau ngembeyi' penyaki' kami tue," jie reng sepuloh ko' nyeh.
42017014	Jedi Yesus mantau ke' sidoe lalu jie nyingka'e, "Manuam kam ke' pelayan Allah," jie Yesus, "gei' iyo merati kuli' kam dah beyi' nyeh." Lalu sidoe pun mat turunam, na'e tuno' ke' Yesus. Temosie di tongah jelan mat lintus beyi'am semuya' sidoe, sengkunyong licingam kuli' sidoe sepuloh ko' nyeh.
42017015	Dah nyoe siko' tei' ngaso mat dah beyi' tei' bebeli' pulang ke' Yesus, besesura' mugi Allah.
42017016	Iyo nungkup ke' tanah nyomah ke' Yesus, simah beterimoe kaseh, go iyo dipebeyi'e. Nyoe pun kenaken reng Samaria, yeng diangap reng Yahudi hina; noe iyo reng Yahudi peh.
42017017	Jedi jie Yesus, "Siko' tuam peh yeng pulang beterimoe kaseh?" jie. "Noe peh sepuloh ko' reng yeng dipebeyi' tadie? Konai yeng semilan ko' nyeh?" jie.
42017018	"Poe ngat siko' urang luwar," jie, "reng Samaria tue yeng bebeli' kitue beterimoe kaseh ke' Allah. Yeng seli reng Yahudi," jie, "tarah ke' cum yeng bebeli' kitue beterimoe kaseh," jie Yesus.
42017019	Dah nyoe jie nyingka' reng Samaria yeng nungkup di adap iyo, "Bengki'am," jie, "ma'am, kau na' pulang pun. Kau beyi' pun tam kau pecayo," jie Yesus.
42017020	Jedi dah nyoe do reng deri kelompok Parisi betanyoe ke' Yesus ke' hal bilo Allah langko' disomah kei rajo. Pi Yesus nyamute, "Ke' hal Allah disomah kei rajo nyeh noe iyo ke' hal pada' petanah petano yeng mampu diperati dolu le' mensiyo.
42017021	Noe iyo ke' hal kampong halamán beyi' pun nenggeri nenggero nyeh. Umpamoe jie reng siko', Ditue ne, kamei, Allah dah disomah kei rajo, ti ku, atau pun jie yeng siko', Dinun ne, Sen dah disomah dah kei rajo, jie reng yeng na' nentu aronge. Pie yeng mat si," jie Yesus, "dah noe sa' begogoe agei', kamei, go Allah dah disomah dah kei rajo di antaro kam tuam," jie.
42017022	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' murite, "Langko' do jengkahe gi, kamei, des kam ingín nar na' ngicap merati des aku disomah kei rajo, biyar seari nyem kam ngicap meratie pun, kaji kam nun, pi kam ca' sabar lo'e nyem manu ke' jengkahe, go mat bolum jengkahe.
42017023	Pie pasti do reng yeng langko' memuloe bepadah ke' kam, Ti beh kam, dinune, kamei, mat Kristusam to', atau pun jie yeng siko' nyeh, Ti beh, tue ne, mat do dah Kristus, jie. Pie kam nang na' angar totar kam manue. Nang na' kam murah ditipu dikelakare.
42017024	Go yeng mat si," jie Yesus, "des aku Ana' Mensiyo mat detang nar si mat diperati reng bisam, na' po kengkitar yeng lang ler! ke' kiboe ke' kanán; mat nyacas, tampa' di langi' nun.
42017025	Pie sebolum nyoe tejedi si, kamei, aku Ana' Mensiyo mat cagar ca' ngerudu benya' kesensare, ken cagar ca' ditula' le' reng lapis tue," jie Yesus.
42017026	"Pie ke' hal keada'e di deniyo tue des aku Ana' Mensiyo detang nyeh," jie Yesus, "mat langko' na' po keada'e des di jemán Nuh mie; pada' mensiyo mat reng penggempang nyem.
42017027	Go pada' reng di jemán Nuh mie kin cum iyo ngaji ken dah jengkahe dah iyo langko' diukum. Iyo ngat ngaji keidupe di deniyo tue nyem, benso betumo' bejodo berana' bebuwah, a, ngaji makan udape seari-ari nyem. Ngat nyoam lem kengkaji mensiyo des jeman Nuh nyeh, sampai ke' ari Nuh sedena' tamoe ke' lem topam. Dah nyoe semorie sap! deniyo tue dilamus ken ayie, lalu semuya' segeno sidoe di luwar topam nyeh mat punah ranah bisam. Jedi tokoh nyoe jum kedetang aku gi, kamei, mat digempang reng nyem.
42017028	"A, ponyoe jum des jemán Lot nyomie di kota Sodom. Pengaji reng ketiko nyoe kin ngat ngaji keidupe seari-ari nyem, demo ke' makan udap, demo ke' bedegang bebelo', demo ke' beumo betanám beramu betarang na' po selomoam.
42017029	Pie pas Lot sedena' rari ningal kota Sodom nyeh semorie lau! jie api ranyau ken merirang turun deri serugo, lalu semuya' reng di Sodom nyeh mat punah ranaham.
42017030	"Jedi cagare ponyoe jum, kamei, dah aku Ana' Mensiyo detang gi. Kebenya' reng mat noe siyap; iyo ngat ngaji keidupe seari-ari nyem.
42017031	Pie dah jengkah ari kedetang aku gi nang na' reng ngaji mementing meliharo jolue! Misale mun reng nongah do di co' loteng nyeh, nang na' iyo ngaji na' ngamie jolu di lem rumahe. Iyo ca' rari ja'; pada' jolue ca' ditingale ming ponyoam. A, ponyoe jum mun reng nongah di umo tanáme, nang na' ngaji na' bebeli' ke' rumah. Iyo ca' bekedibas rari ja'.
42017032	Ca' ingátam ngaji koti ken bini Lot nyomie!*
42017033	Jedi maksute berang reng yeng mementing na' meliharo keidupe di deniyo tue si pie pengabise mat losi nayáp kaliam. Pie berang reng yeng noe mementing meliharo keidup direte di deniyo tue si tarah ke' tetomu ke' idup yeng mat.
42017034	"Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei. Mat do mensiyo yeng bodan, do yeng losi nayáp des ku detang gi. Umpamoe mun tejedi des malam. Mun do reng duwo yeng seketidor pun pi mun noe samo-samo engku aku si yeng siko' langko' diamie yeng siko' langko' ditingal.
42017035	A, ponyoe jum mun umpamoe reng betinoe duwo ko' yeng nongah nuto' padi pas des aku detang; pie mun noe samo-samo engku aku si yeng siko' langko' diamie, yeng siko' ditingal," jie Yesus.

42018001	Dah nyoe Yesus madah perempamo tue ke' murite, kei sidoe jelas ken sidoe ca' serarat nan bedoa, nang na' patah ati numo' pun doa nyeh lamat berue dituntong.
42018002	Jedi jie Yesus, "Di sebuwah kampong do siko' reng akim yeng noe koloe gola' ken Allah, ken cum itong kaseh ken betore.
42018003	Do jum siko' reng belu di kampong nyoe. Iyo nan serarat nyadu ke' akim nyeh minta' kei akim ngurus pecaroe ken reng yeng ngelawane.
42018004	-
42018005	Pie akim nyeh nan ngei'e nyem nulong reng belu nyeh, noe dipedulie; dilebue nyem. Pie reng belu nyeh sebentar-bentar manu, sebentar-bentar manu ngemoran nar na' ditulong le' akim nyeh. Sampai kepanyange mat ditulonge le' akim nyeh te'. Jedi jie akim nyeh, Ah, coh ge' ku putus kali pecaro betinoe tue, ku monáng ke' reng betinoe, ku kalah ke' lawane, jie. Ja'e noe go ku gola' ken Allah peh, jie, noe iyo go ku kaseh ken urang sopai pun. Pie mun noe diputus ke' pecaroe entonge iyo nan serarat nyó' kenyenyó' manu kitue sampai lojue ku mantaue, jie. Mangko mat ditulonge le' akim nyeh," jie perempamo Yesus.
42018006	Dah nyoe jie Yesus Tuwowe, "A, pailah kesimpol deri perempamo akim yeng jat nyeh, kamei? Poe," jie Yesus, "semalang ke' akim yeng jat pun ge'e, na'e nulong reng yeng nan serarat manu ke' iyo,
42018007	sa'am go Allah. Na' Sen nulong reng yeng serarat minta' tulong ke' Sen. Sen pasti na' Sen ngenggewai yeng bujor benar nyo' pada' reng yeng dah dipileh Sen, yeng serarat negur nyapo minta' tulong Sen siyang malam pun. Noe Sen ne benene peh.
42018008	Dah jengkah yeng ditetap Sen si Sen langko' lokas nuntong doa sidoe ken ngukum pada' lawane caro bujor benar. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei. "Go Aku Ana' Mensiyo," jie Yesus, "pasti cagar bebeli' agei' ke' deniyo tue, kamei. Pie dah ku detang gi do noe engoe mensiyo yeng pecayo ken aku?" jie Yesus.
42018009	Jedi do jum pada' reng yeng gei' arap ken kepanci direte, ken menghina betore. Jedi Yesus ngajar sidoe pakai perempamo tue.
42018010	"Jedi," jie Yesus, "do reng duwo ko' yeng manu ke' rumah kediyam Allah, na' bedoa. Siko' tei' deri kelompok Parisi, yeng nan taát ken pada' pelator agamae. Yeng siko' tei' penageh pajak pemerentah; mat reng yeng hina.
42018011	"Jedi sidoe duwo nyeh mat do dinyoe. Dah nyoe reng Parisi tei' bediri di adap reng rami lalu bedoa mugi direte. O Allah, jie, aku mat beterimoe kaseh ke' Den, jie, tam aku noe koloe ramang di mato, ku noe koloe ngelakar betor ku, noe koloe butang beonga' na' po reng layin. Aku besukor ke' Den go aku noe reng jat, po penageh pajak pemerentah nyeh, jie.
42018012	Aku, jie, keragam panci ku pun melelobeh deri yeng Den suroh pun. Ku betara' noe makan duwo kali semingu. Pada' pekuleh peramu ku nan ku begi jum ke' Den sepuloh satu, jie reng Parisi bedoa.
42018013	"Pie reng penageh pajak si dah na' bedoa nyeh nemocer bedireteam. Noe iyo na' manu ke' adap; iyo nengkadah ke' langi' pun noe. Iyo manum dedo direte tam kesal ken dosoe, lalu jie, O Allah, aku tue mat reng bedosoam! Ampunam doso ku tam derah yeng betumpah.* Ngat nyoam doa reng penageh pajak nyeh.
42018014	Lalu sidoe duwo pun dah bedoa tei' mat pulangam. "Jedi," jie Yesus, "yeng diputus Allah reng bujor benar si reng penageh pajak nyem; reng Parisi si noe. Tam pada' reng yeng meningie direte langko' direnah le' Sen. Pie reng yeng merenah direte si ditingie le' Sen," jie Yesus.
42018015	Jedi mátam. Nan do reng yeng meyie ana' biya'e ke' Yesus gei' iyo ngemberekate. Pie dah diperati le' pada' murite ken pada' reng yeng meyie ana'e lalu dicacue ditonga'e die.
42018016	Pie Yesus si kebelike nyapo pada' ana' biya' nyeh, disurohe manu ke' iyo. Dah nyoe jie nyingka' pada' murite, "Aduam beh pada' ana' biya' nyeh manu ke' aku," jie, "nang na' kam nonga'e. Go mat reng yeng tokoh ana' biya' nyeme' yeng langko' tekawum lem pada' berekat dolat Allah des Sen disomah kei rajo.
42018017	Pie reng yeng ngei'e renah ati na' po ana' biya' nyeh mat noe konoe kawum des Allah disomah kei rajo. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei," jie Yesus.
42018018	Jedi do siko' pemimpin reng Yahudi yeng manu ke' Yesus lalu betanyoe. "Guru panci," jie. "Pailah yeng ca' digewai ku kei ku buleh idup yeng cum berudu mati?" jie.
42018019	Samut Yesus, "Nyeh mun kau ngat ngangap ku guru nyem gopai go kau madah ku panci? Go kin ngat Allaham yeng panci," jie Yesus. "(Kau jelas noe ken maksut omóng diret kau tue?)" jie.
42018020	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "A, ke' hal petanyoe kau si go kau pun tawu ken pada' perentah Allah, ya'am nang butang beonga', nang munoh, nang maling, nang mempulah betor, ken ca' ngehormát ino' apa' kau. (Mun kau na' buleh idup yeng cum berudu mati si mat ca' tuno' ke' pada' perentah Sen nyeh)," jie Yesus.
42018021	Lalu jie reng pemimpin nyeh, "Mun ja' ator ke' deng nyoe si go ku nan patoham deri kebiya' ku mie pun, guruei," jie.
42018022	Pie ningo panere bungi nyoe dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Pi sutie agei' yeng ca' kau gewai. Kau," jie Yesus, "ca' ngenjuwal pada' reto beno jento keraja' kau, lalu asele kau begi ke' pada' reng bensat, kei kau diupah di serugo nun. Lalu dah nyoe kau bebeli' manu ke' aku, kei menjedi murit aku," jie Yesus.
42018023	Pi ningo omóng Yesus bungi nyoe tei' reng pemimpin tei' susah atie, go iyo mat reng kayo rayoam, sorote ngaji na' ngenjuwal pada' jolue.
42018024	Yesus pun meratie ken atie mat susah, lalu jie Yesus, "Reng kayo si mat maring nar na' nyomah Allah kei rajoe.
42018025	Manseh murah ge' binatang unta ngerudu lubang jerum deri reng kayo konoe kawum des Allah disomah kei rajo," jie Yesus.
42018026	Lalu jie pada' reng yeng ningo Yesus ngomóng bungi nyoe tei', "Mun ponyoe si mawáham kami tue, moe. Semalang ke' reng diangap kami bujor benar pun ge'e, noe teselamát, sa'am go kami*. Mat cum reng yeng mampu," jie sidoe.
42018027	Pie Yesus nyamute, "Mátam, mensiyo si mat cum kemampue na' nulong nyelamát direte. Ca' Allaham yeng nulong nyelamát mensiyo, go Allah si semuya' uleh semuya' mampu," jie Yesus.
42018028	Dah nyoe jie Petrus, "Tauam, Tuwowei," jie, "kami si mat dah ningal semuya' segelo yeng do di kami tam kami na' ngenjurut kau," jie.

42018030	Samut Yesus, "Mang pun," jie, "mangko kam si langko' beuntong tuwah dibelas kaseh. Go sopai ja' yeng relo ningal jolue di deniyo tue tam iyo na' konoe kawum des Allah disomah kei rajo si iyo pasti dibelas kaseh le' Allah," jie. "Pai-pai pun yeng ditingale, demo ke' rumah tangoe, demo ke' tumo' jodoe, demo ke' dulor menyadie nyeh, demo ke' ino' apa'e, demo ke'....ana' uco'e, pie mun ditingal reng tam iyo na' konoe kawum des Allah disomah kei rajo si yeng diterimoe di deniyo tue pun langko' belobeh-lobeham deri pada' jolu yeng ditingale. Sekurang buleh jolu di deniyo tue, selampar agei' buleh jum idup yeng cum berudu mati dah nyoe gi," jie Yesus. "Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei; pecayoam ken pemadah aku," jie.
42018031	Dah nyoe Yesus ngumpol pada' murite duwo belas ko' bangam, lalu ngomóng ken sidoe. "Dingo beh kam," jie. "Tue diret," jie, "bejelan nuju ke' kota Yerusalem. Dah detang kinun pada' tijum yeng ditulis pada' penijum nyomie ke' hal aku Ana' Mensiyo nyeh mat cagar dituntongam.
42018032	Detang kinun," jie, "aku cagar diserah ke' pada' reng yeng noe iyo reng Yahudi, dah nyoe aku diolo'-olo'e, dipererujonge, dilujah le' sidoe,
42018033	lalu dipelesahe, sampai pengabise aku dibunoh le' sidoe," jie. "Pie dah ari pengentigo nyeh," jie Yesus, "aku pun langko' bengki' idup agei'."

42018035	Jedi mátam. Yesus sidoe melaju pejelane lalu detang ke' soma' kota Yeriko. Jedi dinyoe tei' poe do siko' reng lelaki yeng butoe, yeng nan dudo' di pinger jelan. Gewaie nan minta' duwit des reng lalu.
42018036	Jedi reng butoe tei' mat ningo geredak geredik bungi pada' reng rami yeng lalu dinyoe, lalu iyo betanyoe, "Na' konai nin," jie, "geredak geredik bungie reng rami nyeh?"
