42018039	Pie reng yeng ngulu pada' reng rami nyeh tei' nonga' reng butoe nyeh, nyurohe ngojap. Pie iyo malah ken paie malar teger minta' tulong kin ontap-ontapam, "Buboh Daud," jie, "tulong ge' aku tue!"
42018040	Dah nyoe Yesus mat beronga' di tongah jelan, lalu nyuroh reng ngiring reng butoe nyeh manu ke' iyo. Jedi dah reng butoe manu ke' soma' iyo lalu Yesus pun betanyoe ke' iyo,
42018041	"Na' pai perelu kau ken aku?" jie. Jie reng butoe nyeh, "Ku na' mencináng, Tuwowei."
42018042	Samut Yesus, "Mencinángam, moe. Dah beyi' dah kau ketegal kau pecayo," jie Yesus.
42018043	Reng butoe nyeh pun lintus mencinángam, dah nyoe iyo ngenjurut Yesus jum samel mugi Allah. Dah diperati pada' reng rami ken gewai Yesus ngembeyi' reng butoe nyeh lalu sidoe pun mugi Allah jum.
42019001	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus tei' bejelan ngerudu kota Yeriko, ken murite ken pada' reng rami yeng nan ngenjurute.
42019002	Di Yeriko tei' do reng lelaki yeng demoe Sakeus. Iyo reng kayo rayo, pangkate kei kepala' pada' penageh pajak pemerentah di kota nyoe.
42019003	Jedi Sakeus tei' ningo agah Yesus do di Yeriko nyeh coko'am na' merati sopailah Yesus. Pie iyo nan noe awaseam, entam paling rami reng ngeliling Yesus, sedang Sakeus beroham urange.
42019004	Jedi ngaso noe awas nyeh iyo pun bebodap dolu deri urang rami lalu nayi' ke' puco' kayu, go mun do Yesus ngerudue kaloe nyo' iyo awas ken Yesus, kajie nun.
42019005	Jedi mátam. Dah Yesus detang ke' soma' kayu nyeh lalu iyo nengkadah ke' atas. "Sakeus!" jie. "Copatam," jie, "kau turun! Go ku langko' ca' numpang di rumah kau ari tue," jie Yesus.
42019006	Mat ngerurusam Sakeus turun. Lalu ayah bikaham iyo nerimoe Yesus numpang di rumahe.
42019007	Pie pada' reng rami si ngomel go Yesus ke' rumah Sakeus. "Gopai dih," jie, "go iyo na'e ke' arong reng bedoso, ke' arong reng noe patoh ke' ukum Musa," jie sidoe.
42019008	Jedi Sakeus tei' dah ngeleladen Yesus di rumahe tei' dah nyoe iyo bediri, lalu ngomóng ken Yesus. "Potue ne, Tuwowei," jie Sakeus. "Belo jolu ku langko' ku begi duwo ken pada' reng bensat. A, ken reng yeng nan ku akal mie," jie, "langko' ku pulang empat kali lipat pemenya'e," jie.
42019009	Samut Yesus, "Ne, ari tue tei'am reng tue ken seberumahe ditulong diselamát le' Allah, diunyo' Sen idup beru. Go reng tue buboh Kei' Abraham jum, mangko jenyi Allah ke' Kei' Abraham mie nyo' iyo jum," jie Yesus.
42019010	"Aku yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo pun," jie Yesus, "detang ke' deniyo tue go na' ngogoe ken nulong pada' reng yeng sosat," jie Yesus.
42019011	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yesus mat nyamong panere ken pada' reng rami di rumah Sakeus nyeh yeng ningo panere tadie ponyoe. A, pejelane ke' Yerusalem kin dah soma' dam. Sedang pengaji pada' reng rami nun dah jengkahe dah to' Allah disomah kei rajo di deniyo tue na' po yeng ditantie sidoe deri nyomiam. Mangko Yesus mat nyamong panere ken sidoe makai perempamoe yeng bungie potue.
42019012	Jedi jie Yesus, "Do siko' reng keturun deri rajo yeng kajie dah jengkahe nyo' iyo merentah kei rajo di nenggeri direte. Mangko iyo nganang na' bejelan ke' jewoh, ke' pusat pemerentah nun, nyo' iyo disah le' atase dinun gei' iyo dikuwaso nyo' merentah kei rajo di nenggeri direte.
42019013	"Jedi bolum iyo turun tei' iyo ngumpol ulun amoe sepuloh ko' lo'e. Dah dikumpole dibegie duwit mina sebingkap siko'*, dah nyoe jie nyingka' pada' ulune, Tue nyo' modal kam bedegang penantie aku detang gi, jie. Dah nyoe iyo mat turun bejelan ke' nenggeri yeng jewoh nyeh te'.
42019014	"Pie pada' reng sekamponge si sie ken reng keturun rajo nyeh, mangko dah iyo turun nyeh pada' reng yeng sekampong nyeh mileh beberopai ko' reng nyo' manu ke' pusat nun, nyo' sidoe bepadah ke' reng di pusat nun ken sidoe ngei'e berajo ke' reng nyoe.
42019015	"Pie poe reng keturun rajo nyeh mat disah diijin le' reng di pusat nun nyo' iyo merentah di nenggeri direte, mangko iyo mat pulangam. Jedi dah pulang tei' iyo beposan ke' pada' ulun amoe yeng dibegie ken duwite nyomie nyo' modale. Iyo nyuroh sidoe ngadape, nyo' iyo betanyoe pai pemenya'e bungo asel duwit yeng iyo unyo' nyomie.
42019016	Jedi mátam, pada' ulune mat manu, dah nyoe yeng siko' nyeh mat ngadap reng keturun rajo nyeh. Dah nyoe jie ulune yeng siko' tei', Tuwowe, jie, duwit den yeng sebingkap yeng diunyo' den ke' aku nyomie tue dah popah menjedi sepuloh bingkap die, jie.
42019017	Sukoram, jie tuwowe, kau poe mat ulun yeng panci. Kau mat tawu dipecayo diunyo' ken jolu menyikit nyoe pun, jie, mangko tue ku nyerah kota sepuloh buwah ke' kau, nyo' kau ngatore ken merentahe, jie.
42019018	"Dah nyoe ulune yeng siko' agei', ngadap tuwowe jum, lalu jie ulun nyeh, Tuwowe, jie, duwit den yeng sebingkap yeng diunyo' den ke' aku nyomie tue dah popah jum menjedi limo bingkap, jie.
42019019	Sukoram, jie tuwowe nyeh, mangko tue ku nyerah limo buwah kota ke' kau nyo' kau ngatore ken merentahe, jie.
42019020	"Dah nyoe ulune yeng siko' agei' ngadap tuwowe jum, lalu jie nyingka' tuwowe, Tuwowe, jie, tue ne duwit den yeng sebingkap diunyo' ke' aku mie, jie. Ku tungkus ke' lem bonáng, ku poram ku, gola' losi.
42019021	Ku gola' ku makaie, go den reng yeng noe tawu na' salah melo. Den gela' na' makai tulang poloh urang; den gela' beuntong deri pengasel reng layin, gela' ngotam deri yeng noe den tugal. (Mangko ku gola' ku ngembelenyo duwit den, gola' noe berasel), jie ulun yeng siko' nyeh.
42019022	"Jedi samut tuwowe nyeh, Kau ulun yeng paling jat, jie. A, tue ku ngator kau pun cuco' ken pai jie paner kau tadie nyingka' aku, jie. Jie kau tadie nyingka' aku kin go aku reng yeng noe tawu na' salah melo, aku ayah na' makai tulang poloh urang, gela' buleh untong deri pengasel reng layin, ken aku gela' ngotam arong yeng noe ditugal ku, jie kau.
42019023	Mun ponyoe gopai go duwit aku di kau nyeh noe diserah kau ke' tukang duwit, nyo' sidoe ngembungoe? Kira' diserah ke' tukang duwit nyeh, jie, paling noe dah ku detang ku buleh untong bungoe, jie.
42019024	Dah nyoe jie tuwowe nyingka' pada' ana' buwahe yeng do dinyoe, Diamiam duwit reng tue, jie, diunyo' ke' reng yeng sepuloh bingkap duwite tadie, jie.
42019025	"Samut pada' ana' buwahe nyeh, Pie reng nyoe dah do dah duwite sepuloh bingkap, tuwowei, jie.
42019026	Pie samut tuwowe nyeh, Pungka' pangkale kin berang reng yeng dah do pekulehe nyeh mun mat dipakaie langko' ditamah pekulehe belobeh-lobeh. Pie kebelike berang reng yeng cum pekulehe, yeng do sikit di iyo pun pie mun noe dipakaie langko' diperoru kaliam, jie.
42019027	Lalu tuwowe nyeh manseh nyamong panere. A, ke' hal pada' munsoh ku yeng ngei'e berajo ke' aku pun, jie, dibeyiam kitue, dibunoh kali di adap aku, jie tuwowe nyeh." Bungi nyoam perempamo Yesus nyeh.
42019028	Jedi dah ngomóng bungi nyoe tei' Yesus pun bejelan dolu kit deri pada' murite ngeresudu' melaju pejelane ke' kota Yerusalem.
42019029	Jedi dah soma' ken Yerusalem tei' iyo detang ke' senopang kampong Betpage ken Betania, yeng aronge di tongah Buki' Saitun, dah nyoe Yesus ngutus murite duwo ko' nyo' kinun.
42019030	Jedi jie Yesus, "Boh kam ke' kampong di adap nun," jie. "Pas kam tomus kinun kaloe kam langko' merati ana' keledai siko' ditamat reng, yeng noe koloe ditayi' reng. Pie kam ca' mucel penamate, lalu kam beyie kitue.
42019031	Jedi misale mun do reng nyacue ken ngopai go kam mucele kam ca' nyamute go Tuwowe perelu na' makaie." Bungi nyoam Yesus beposan ke' murite yeng duwo ko' nyeh te'.
42019032	Jedi mátam, murit Yesus yeng diutus duwo ko' tei' mat turunam kinun. Jedi tang kinun tei' mat tejedi pas po yeng dipadah le' Yesus. (Ana' keledai pun do; sidoe pun mucel penamate.)
42019033	Jedi ketengah sidoe mucel penamat ana' keledai nyeh lalu tuwowe ana' keledai nyeh nyacue sidoe, "Pai gewai kam? Ngopai go kam pucel tali penamat ana' keledai kami?" jie.
42019034	Pie samut murit Yesus, "Go Tuwowe perelu na' makaie," jie. Lalu mat noam reng ngidahe.
42019035	Dah nyoe ana' keledai nyeh mat dibeyie murite ke' Yesus, disolap murite ken beju jubahe, dah nyoe sidoe nulong Yesus nengkujate.
42019036	Lalu Yesus pun mat melaju pejelane nayi' ana' keledai nuju ke' Yerusalem. Pada' reng rami pun ngampar ngoma' beju jubahe deng tongah jelan nyo' iyo ngalu nyamut kedetang Yesus.
42019037	Jedi mátam te'. Dah soma' Yerusalem tei' dah nurun Buki' Saitun nyeh dah nyoe pada' murit Yesus yeng paling rami nyeh betongai beserentak besesura' beayah bikah mugi Allah, tam pada' keenah keaneh yeng dah sidoe merati, des ketiko dipulah Yesus nyomie ponyoe.
42019038	"Tuam to' rajo yeng detang atas demo Tuwowe diret! Detang dah! Mat Sénam yeng ngendolat ngemberekate," jie. "Allah di serugo nun dah begelumo agei'am ken mensiyo," jie.* "Agongam Allah di serugo yeng rajo tingie," jie pada' reng rami nyeh.
42019039	Jedi do jum dinyoe pada' reng deri kelompok Parisi, pie sidoe noe setuju ken reng rami nyeh besesura' mugi Yesus. Lalu jie sidoe nyingka' Yesus, "Guru," jie, "kau ca' nonga' murit kau yeng besesura' mugi kau," jie.
42019040	Pie samut Yesus, "To' pai nonga' sidoe? Mun sidoe ngojap," jie, "tau beh, pada' betu die yeng pangkas kayis besesura' mugi aku," jie Yesus.
42019041	Jedi mátam. Yesus pun dah soma' dam ken kota Yerusalem. Dah iyo mantau kota Yerusalem lalu nangisam, go kaseh ngaji pada' mensiyo yeng diyam dinyoe.
42019042	"O kam reng Yerusalem," jie Yesus samel nangis, "kira'e kam pun tawu pailah ento' ngendamai kam ken Allah! Pie tue dah telampoh dah, noe tekalimát kam ken retie.
42019043	"Mangko dah nyoe gi," jie Yesus, "susah sontokam kam, kam cagar na' diserang dikeliling munsoh kam, yeng langko' magar seruroh kota Yerusalem gei' kam noe tawu tamoe pamus.
42019044	Dah nyoe kam ken pada' ana' kam ken semuya' kota Yerusalem dipunah ranaham le' pada' munsoh. Pada' betu rumah, betu pagar opai sutie pun cum yeng tesunsun panci gi, ruma' bisam. Kam dipunah ranah ponyoe gi pun," jie Yesus, "go kam noe menduli des Allah detang na' nulong kam."
42019045	Dah nyoe Yesus tamoe ke' kolong rumah kediyam Allah, lalu pada' reng yeng bedegang bebelo' dinyoe mat ditunong Yesus deri nyoe.
42019046	Jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Kin ditulis di lem Kitap Allah mie yeng bungie potue, Rumah ku tue kusus nyo' reng bedoa, jie Sen.* "Pi kam," jie Yesus, "gopai go rumah kediyam Allah tue kam guno nyo' kam ngerampok die," jie.
42019047	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus tei' tiyap ari nan ngajar di rumah kediyam Allah. Pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' ugar agama ken pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi yeng layin si nan ngogoe alor kei munoh Yesus,
42019048	pie nan cum tetomu ke' keloronge, go pada' reng rami nyeh teger nan ningo Yesus, ayah nar sidoe rami ken pengajar Yesus.
42020001	Jedi Yesus tei' ngajar di rumah kediyam Allah, madah agah panci dinun. Dah nyoe dipanu le' pada' ketuwo pelayan, ken pada' ugar agama, ken pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi yeng layin.
42020002	Jedi petanyoe sidoe tei' iyo nanyoe hak Yesus. Jie sidoe, "Padaham ke' kami," jie, "deri nailah hak kau nyo' kau ngenggewai jolu tokoh tue? Sopai ngutus kau kitue?" jie.
42020003	Samut Yesus tei', "Aku pun," jie, "do jum sutie yeng na' ku tanyoe ke' deduwan.
42020004	Jedi yeng na' ku tanyoe ke' deduwan tei'," jie, "ya'am ke' hal hal Yohanes Penyolam mie. Menurut deduwan tue Yohanes Penyolam mie sopai yeng ngutuse nyo' iyo ngelaju tugase mie? Deri nailah hake mie nyo' iyo nyolam reng? Nyoe deri Allahei deri mensiyoei?" jie Yesus betanyoe ke' sidoe.
42020005	Ngaso ditanyoe Yesus bungi nyoe tei' pada' ketuwo nyeh redo unga' angal kengkajie, lalu bepempaham pado direte. "Ne," jie sidoe, "diret tue mat semuya' uka' akang nyamute. Na' dipadah ken hak Yohanes deri Allah gola' iyo tue betanyoe ke' diret ngopai go diret noe pecayo ken pemadah Yohanes mie, mun iyo mat diutus le' Allah.
42020006	Pie na' dipadah ken Yohanes cum hake ponyoe jum," jie, "reng rami die yeng godie ken diret. Diret pasti dibunoh pada' reng rami tue, ditikame ken betu. Go pengaji pada' reng rami kin Yohanes mat penijum deri Allah," jie pada' ketuwo bepempaham. "Diret semuya' salah, mun diret nyamute," jie.
42020007	Mangko samut sidoe ke' Yesus tei', "Kami noe tawu kami ke' hal Yohanes," jie, "hake deri sopai pun," jie.
42020008	Lalu jie Yesus, "Mun bungi nyoe penyamut deduwan," jie, "aku pun cumam ku madah ke' deduwan ken deri nailah hak aku nyo' ku ngenggewai semuya' tue," jie Yesus.
42020009	Dah nyoe Yesus beperempamo ke' hal kebun angur ke' sidoe dinyoe. "Jedi," jie Yesus, "do reng siko' yeng nanám kebun angure. Ja'e dah ditanáme iyo lintus diserahe ke' urang kei ngerejoe, lalu iyo pun bejelan jewoh, ke' nenggeri layin. Lamatam iyo cum pulang ke' arong direte.
42020010	"Jedi lamat belamat, dah rekene jengkah angure bebuwah tei' dah nyoe tuwowe kebun pun nyuroh siko' ulune nyo' manu ke' reng yeng ngerejo kebune nun, kei ngamie pembegi deri kebun angure nyo' tuwowe. Pie pada' reng yeng ngerejo kebun nyeh jewoh beh na' ngunyo' pembegie ke' tuwowe, malah ken paie ulun tuwowe dipempungah le' sidoe, dipangkonge, disurohe pulang bedan sele nyem.
42020011	"Jedi ngaso cum buleh ulun nyeh tei' lalu tuwowe nyeh nyuroh ulune yeng siko' die, manu ke' reng yeng ngerejo kebune di nun. Pie ponyoe jum. Dah diperati le' sidoe yeng ngerejo kebun nyeh tei' lalu ulun nyoe dipempungahe ponyoe jum, simah dipangkonge, dihinae, sa'am kei ngembegi benya', sikit pun kehe ngembegie, lalu disurohe pulang jum ulune yeng siko' ken bedan sele nyem, cum pekuleh.
42020012	"Dah nyoe ponyoe agei'am, disuroh le' tuwowe ulune yeng pengentigo ko' nyeh, pie simah dipempungah diperako le' sidoe, lalu ditunonge.
42020013	"Pengabise jie tuwowe kebun angur tei', Pai ge', jie, ca' ku laku nyo' ku ngamie asel kebun ku, jie lem atie nun. Tue, jie, ku na' nyuroh ana' ku kinun, ana' tungal ku yeng ku kaseh tue, jie, nyurohe manu ke' kebun ku dinun. Entonge mun ana' diret ku si na'e sidoe ningoe, jie tuwowe kebun.
42020014	"Jedi ngaso ponyoe mat kinunam ana'e yeng tungal nyeh; pie dah detang kinun tei' dah diperati le' pada' reng yeng ngerejo kebune tei', Ha,jie sidoe, iyoame' yeng cagar kei lileh nyawo tuwowe diret, jie. Yo', diret munohe kali, jie, gei' diret die ngehak kebun tue, jie sidoe.
42020015	Lalu mátam, ana' tuwowe nyeh mat ditunong le' sidoe deri kebun nyeh, lalu dibunohe," jie Yesus. Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' reng rami yeng ningo perempamoe. "Nyeh engo kam koti? Dah tuwowe kebun pulang ke' nenggeri direte," jie, "pada' reng yeng ngerejo kebune langko' dipekotilah le' tuwowe nyeh, engoe?" jie Yesus.
42020016	Dah nyoe iyo yeng nyamut paner direte. "Tuwowe kebun," jie Yesus, "dah detang kinyoe gi," jie, "langko' munoh pada' reng yeng ngerejo kebune, lalu kebune diserah ke' reng layin die," jie Yesus. Pie jie sidoe rami nyeh, "Noe kene!" jie, "Kira'e nang sampai tokoh nyoe," jie.
42020017	Ja'e Yesus tei' paling tentu iyo mantau ke' sidoe yeng ningoe, dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Pi mat ponyoam ye', kamei," jie. "Kam mat ca' ngaji, pai maksute tijum yeng ditulis lem Kitap Allah mie yeng bungi potue: Do Betu yeng dibuwang le' pada' tukang rumah pie diamie Allah to' Betu yeng paling penting nyo' melaju rumah Sen. (Masmur 118:22) Nyeh engoe pai maksut tijum nyoe?" jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe.
42020018	Dah nyoe manseh ditamahe, ke' hal Betu nyoe. "Awas beh kam!" jie. "Go sopai ja' yeng jetue ningang Betu nyoe remók rencam," jie. "Pai tel agei' sopai ja' yeng ditingange mat kepala'eam, luloh amoh, cum kedemáte," jie Yesus.
42020019	Jedi pada' ugar agama ken pada' ketuwo pelayan nyeh sie ningo perempamo Yesus tadie, go sidoe pun tawu ken perempamo Yesus tei' pas konoe sidoe. Kona' sidoe na' lintus nangkap Yesus, pie sidoe gei' gola'e ken pada' reng rami nyeh, go reng rami si ayahe ken Yesus.
42020020	Jedi pada' ketuwo nyeh nan siyap, ngogoe kelorong kei nangkap Yesus. Dah nyoe sidoe ngirum reng kei mato-matoe, nyurohe kei betentanyoe ke' Yesus, seolah-olah mat ingín tawu. Pie maksut sidoe na' ngogoe kesalahe, mun iyo salah nyamut sidoe na' nangkape, na' nyerahe ke' kuwaso gubernor gei' diukum.
42020021	Jedi mátam. Reng yeng kei mato-mato pada' ugar agama nyeh tei' mat manu ke' Yesus lalu betanyoe, "Guru," jie, "kami si tawu kami ken kau reng yeng bujor benar; ken kau nan teliti madah yeng mat. Kau kin noe ngorie ke' hal kengkaji mensiyo, go kau mat noe ngembedo pangkat reng, beyi' tingie, beyi' beroh pun. Kau ngeresudu' nyem madah yeng mat," jie sidoe nyingka' Yesus, pie go sidoe na' ngememanise nyem.
42020022	Lalu sidoe melaju panere ken Yesus. "Jedi boh kau madah ke' kami yeng máte," jie sidoe. "Na' nunoe ukum adat diret si patut noe diret reng Yahudi ngembeyar pajak ke' rajo pemerentah Roma?" jie sidoe betanyoe.
42020023	Pie Yesus kin tawu ken sidoe ngat ngincu nyem. Jedi jie Yesus nyingka'e,
42020024	"Ta' kitue duwit sebingkap, nyo' ku meratie," jie. Dah nyoe, "Nyeh, tue gemar sopai, ken demo sopai, di duwit tue?" jie. Samut sidoe, "Gemar Kaisar, rajo Roma," jie.
42020025	"Mun ponyoe," jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "yeng engku Kaisar ca' dipulang ke' Kaisar; yeng engku Allah ca' dipulang ke' Allah," jie.
42020026	Lalu ningo penyamut nyoe sidoe pun ngojap nyem, mat paling kangápe, go penyamut Yesus mat konoe nar. Noleh sidoe na' ngogoe sutie kesalahe pun di adap reng rami nyeh pun.
42020027	Jedi mátam te'. Dah nyoe do beberopai ko' deri kelompok reng Saduki die yeng manu na' betanyoe ke' Yesus. Reng Saduki kin iyo noe pecayo ken reng yeng dah mati langko' bengki' idup agei'. (Jie sidoe dah mati daham, cum bengki' idup agei', jie.) Jedi mátam, do di antaro sidoe yeng manu ke' Yesus.
42020028	Jedi jie sidoe betanyoe ke' Yesus, "Guru," jie "ukum adat yeng ditulis le' Kei' Musa nyo' diret kin do bepadah, mun do reng lelaki yeng bejodo pie lalu mati bolum berana' nyeh," jie, "menyadie iyo nyeh ca' bejodo ken kebelu omue nyeh, kei reng lelaki nyeh buleh tampang deri buboh ampeh keremiji direte," jie sidoe.
42020029	"Jedi potue ne gesahe. Poe do reng lelaki yeng bemenyadie tujoh ko'. Jedi omue yeng tuwo tei' bejodo, pie bolum iyo berana' nyeh temosie matiam.
42020030	Dah nyoe adei' jurute tei' bejodo jum ken kebelue nyeh te', pie bolum iyo berana' mati jum.
42020031	Lalu adei' jurute yeng pengentigo pun bejodo jum ken kebelue nyeh, pie ponyoe jum, bolum iyo berana' nyeh mati jum. Sampai pengabise sidoe tujoh ko' bemenyadie tei' mat bejodo bisam ken kebelue nyeh, pi bemati-mati bisam bolum iyo berana'.
42020032	Kepepanyange tei' kebelu omue nyeh tei' mat mati jum.
42020033	Jedi yeng na' kami tanyoe ke' kau nyeh," jie reng Saduki nyeh, "potue ne. Jedi dah mensiyo bengki' idup agei' gi sopaiam deri sidoe tujoh nyeh yeng mat kei jodo reng belu nyeh, go sidoe tujoh ko' nyeh kin mat bejodo bisam ken iyo," jie sidoe nyingka' Yesus; pie sidoe pun nyungkit-nyungkite nyem, na' ngenjorate, go sidoe kin noe pecayoe ken reng yeng dah mati nyeh langko' bengki' idup agei'.
42020034	Jedi samut Yesus tei', "Ke' hal bejodo atau noe di jemán nun gi si potue ne," jie. "Gei' jemán tue si mensiyo mat betumo' bejodo belaki bebini.
42020035	Pie dah jemán nun gi si noe. Mensiyo yeng diangap Allah patut dikawum Sen des jemán beru gi, des sidoe disuroh Sen bengki' idup nyeh mat noe betumo' bejodo, noe belaki bebini peh," jie Yesus.
42020036	"Go di nun kin mensiyo cum berudu mati; mat idup seora'-ora'eam. Go keidupe gi langko' na' po keedah keidup melekatam dinun. Pada' mensiyo dinun kin mat ana' Allah tei'am, yeng disuroh Sen bengki' idup agei' nyo' idup seora'-ora'eam, " jie Yesus.
42020037	"A, ge'em ke' hal bengki' idup agei' nyeh," jie Yesus, "Kei' Musa nyomie kin do ngembokti jum ke' hal reng yeng dah mati pie mat bengki' idup agei' nyeh. Go di lem gesah Kei' Musa ke' hal kayu bedurie yeng benyalo bisei' api nyeh kin, jie sen Tuwowe diret mat Allah yeng gei' disomah Abraham, Isak ken Yakub.
42020038	Sedang diret kin tawu: Allah mat disomah le' reng idupam; noe ken Sen disomah le' reng mati. Jedi mun jie Sen Sen gei' disomah le' Kei' Abraham desiyan kin maksute Kei' Abraham mat idup agei'am, numo' pun desiyan daham ngerudu mati mie. Mun noe koti desiyan gei' na' nyomah ke' Allah? Go semuya' mensiyo mat idup bisam di adap Allah numo' pun tubohe dah mati nyeh," jie Yesus.
42020039	Lalu jie separo deri ugar agama nyeh, "Mat konoe nar penyamut kau, guruei," jie.
42020040	Lopas nyoe mat cumam reng yeng bereni ngaju petanyoe agei' ke' iyo.
42020041	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' pada' reng rami yeng ningoe, "Jie reng kin Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi Allah na' detang nyeh buboh ampeh Kei' Daud, dih? Nyoe si mat konoam, go Kristus mat buboh sen secaro mensiyo. Pi konai sidoe segontang na' ngenilai Kristus ngat buboh ampeh Kei' Daud secaro mensiyo nyem?
42020042	Sedang Kei' Daud kin be-Tuwowe jum ke' Kristus. Dingo beh, kam, yeng ditulis Kei' Daud mie di Kitap Masmur. Ketiko nyoe kin jie Kei' Daud bungie potue, Allah Tuwowe mat do bepadah ke' Tuwowe ku nyeh. Lalu jie Allah nyingka' Tuwowe ku tei', Boh kau dudo' merentah di piya' kanán Ku tue lo'e,
42020043	sampai Ku nyuroh pada' munsoh kau kei penyampang kaki kau, jie Sen. (Masmur 110:1)
42020044	Bungi nyoam tijum Kei' Daud mie. Jedi maksute Kei' Daud, numo' pun sen mat akei' puyang Kristus nyeh," jie Yesus, "pie Kei' Daud pun manseh be-Tuwowe ke' Kristus, poe. Kiro Kristus ngat segontang buboh keturun Kei' Daud secaro mensiyo nyem si noe ken sen na' be-Tuwowe ke' buboh diret sen! (Pie poe pangkat Kristus mat lobeh tingie deri buboh Kei' Daud secaro mensiyo pun, dih?)" jie Yesus.
42020045	Jedi kebonóng pada' reng rami gei' ningoe tei', Yesus pun bepadah ke' pada' murite,
42020046	"Awas beh kam," jie Yesus, "ken pada' ugar agama nyeh. Nang na' kam nunoe gewai sidoe. Go sidoe ayahe ngelelaga' bejelan ngelalu ngerudu pada' reng rami pakai beju jubahe yeng mewah. Sidoe paling ayahe dialu disamut di adap reng rami. Des semeyang sidoe nan ca' dudo' di arong tekemuko; a, ken des bepesta nyeh sidoe nan ca' dolu dilayan.
42020047	Ge'em sidoe ngelakar pada' reng betinoe belu ken bujo' rayue, sampai ngabis pada' jolue. Sidoe ayahe bedoa yeng panyang-panyang nyo' iyo napo' ngelibue kesalah direte, gei' sidoe diangap reng panci. Pie ukum sidoe gi mat paling boratam," jie Yesus.
42021001	Jedi mátam te'. Dah nyoe Yesus ngenjena' merati pada' reng kayo yeng maja' duwit sumang di arong reng nyumang duwit di rumah kediyam Allah nyeh.
42021002	Dah nyoe iyo merati jum do siko' reng betinoe belu yeng bensat. Jedi reng belu nyeh tei' nyumang duwit duwo sin yeng kocit nar nilaie.
42021003	Jedi merati gewai reng belu nyeh dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' murite, "Dingo beh kam," jie, "tue mat-mátam yeng ku padah ke' kam. Semuya'-muya' reng yeng nyumang ditue pie mun diitong manseh reng belu yeng bensat tue yeng paling benya' sumange," jie.
42021004	"Go reng layin numo' pun benya' iyo ngunyo'," jie Yesus, "pie manseh deri kelobeh jolue. Pie reng belu tue sungoh pun bensat pie iyo nontu duwite yeng do di iyo. Sampai cumam kesisoe nyo' iyo belenyo agei' kaloe pun," jie Yesus.
42021005	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe pada' murit Yesus nongah ngomóng ke' hal rumah kediyam Allah yeng paling panci nyeh. Pada' betu ramue ken pada' periyase yeng disumang reng paling mewaham, jie sidoe. Pie dah nyoe jie Yesus,
42021006	"Semuya' segelo tue yeng diret perati tue," jie, "langko' punah ranah bisam. Dah jengkah yeng ditentu le' Allah gi," jie, "pada' dininge yeng dipulah deri betu bosai-bosai pun pie mat noe tawu ken pesene agei', mat ruma' rora' pamar bokar bisam," jie Yesus.
42021007	Dah nyoe murite pun betanyoe ke' Yesus. "Guru," jie, "sebilo semuya' nyoe langko' tejedi? Pailah tanoe kei kami tawu ken semuya' nyoe dah na' dituntong gi?" jie sidoe.
42021008	Jedi samut Yesus, "Potue ne, kamei, dah nyoe gi. Kam mat ca' ati-ati, ca' bejego, gei' kam noe tepengaroh. Go mat benya' nar reng yeng cagar detang ngangkue atas demo aku. Akuam Kristus, jie sidoe. A, ken, Tue dah jemán pengudah yeng ditentu le' Allah, jie sidoe. Pie kam nang na' angar totar manue. Noe sa' kam tegema' ningoe.
42021009	A, ken cagare kam langko' ningo agah awoh pada' nenggeri nenggero beperang betempor pado sidoe yeng sekampongam; ken beperang betempor ken pada' nenggeri layin ge'em. Pie nang na' gola', kamei, dah jolu ke' deng nyoe tejedi pun. Go semuya' jolu ke' deng nyoe mat dah ditentu Allah. Nyoe mat ca' tejedi sebolum jemán pengudah nyeh. Pi nyoe pun gei' bolum pengudahe nar," jie Yesus.
42021010	Dah nyoe Yesus manseh nyamong panere ken murite. "Mun dah na' jemán pengudah nyeh tanoe pada' nenggeri nenggero demo ke' pada' rajo ken pada' pemerentah nyeh mat langko' lawan melawan,
42021011	ken deniyo tue pun langko' begontar kuwat ditue dinyoe tam gempa bumi. A, pada' mensiyo pun langko' buyun menyasat. Timal agei' penyaki' semparan yeng langko' nempoh ditue dinyoe jum. Pada' behayo bencano yeng bemacam bejenis yeng ngenggola' mensiyo mat langko' tejedi, ya'am keenah keaneh yeng ngatam di langi' nun. Nyoe pun kei petanah petano ken nyoma' dam na' jemán pengudah deniyo tue," jie Yesus.
42021012	"Pie sebolum semuya' nyoe tejedi pun," jie Yesus, "do jum kesusah kesensare yeng langko' dirudu le' kam murit aku," jie. "Kam langko' ditangkap reng, langko' dipempungah diperako diiro dikenyayo reng. Kam langko' dipecaro di pada' rumah semeyang reng Yahudi, ken kam langko' sampai dipenjero reng. Kam langko' ditomah didudoh dipecaro sampai di adap pada' gubernor ken pada' rajo pun, tam kam pecayo ken demo aku.
42021013	Pie nyoe pun kelorong nyo' kam besaksi ke' sidoe.
42021014	Mangko kam nang na' gupoh ngajie. Kam mat ca' dolu ngemputuse lem ati kam gei' kam noe ngorie ke' hal penyamut kam des kam ngadap sidoe. Nang na' kam ngorie,
42021015	go mat akuam yeng langko' ngunyo' ke' kam kei kam belubang pemiker kei kam nyamute. Kepepanyange pada' lawan kam pun kalah, cumam to' iyo nimpa' nyamong agei'," jie Yesus.
42021016	"Pie ke' hal kam langko' ditangkap opai si, yeng langko' nyerah kam pun noe iyo urang peh, pie mat waris wala' kaban kerabat diret kamam, demo ke' dulor menyadie kam, demo ke' ino' apa' kam ke' deng nyoame'. Sampai pengabise separo kam langko' diukum mati.
42021017	Pada' semuya' mensiyo mat langko' risie ken kam go kam pecayo ken demo aku.
42021018	-
42021019	Pi kam mat ca' beetat nyem, go berang reng yeng tan ngetate pengabise monángam, pasti ditulong diselamát. Selamar buwo' pun cum yeng cecer berayan deri kepalo kam; mat selamát bisam," jie Yesus.
42021020	"Jedi ke' hal kota Yerusalem tue si," jie Yesus, "dah kam merati kota tue dikopong pada' serededu nyeh si kam mat ca' awas. Maksute kin kota Yerusalem dah na' dipunah ranaham dah.
42021021	Mangko pada' reng di Yudea ca' rari betapo' ke' peloya' pada' gunóng nun. Ken semuya' segeno reng yeng diyam di Yerusalem pun ca' rari ningal kotae. Ken pada' reng yeng nongah do di pedukoh nun pun ponyoe jum, nang na' ngaji pulang kei belinong ke' kotae.
42021022	Go mun dah dikopong pada' serededu tokoh nyoe si maksute dah jengkahe dah Allah na' melas ngukum kota Yerusalem, kei nuntong pada' tijum Sen yeng ditulis di lem Kitap Sen mie.
42021023	Mat ngatam ukum Sen ketiko nyoe, tam kegodie Sen ken pada' umát Sen yeng ngei'e ningo. Sampai seruroh nenggeri tue langko' iroh ara susah sontokam. Mat kaseh kuam ngaji pada' reng yeng nganong ken pada' reng yeng gei' nyusu ana'e yeng ca' ngerudu kesensare nyoe jum, jera'e. Go semuya' segeno mensiyo mat ugas ngeloham ketiko nyoe, sa'am go pada' reng yeng nganong ken yeng gei' nyusu ana'e kekocit.
42021024	Sampai pada' umát Sen paroe do yeng langko' dibunoh le' pada' serededu nyeh, ken yeng noe dibunoh pun langko' ditangkap dipakso dibeyie rari ke' pada' nenggeri reng noe Yahudi. Dah nyoe kota Yerusalem nyeh langko' ditija' diiri' diperusa' diperenoh le' pada' reng noe Yahudi. Kepepanyange mat reng noe Yahudiam yeng langko' merentah nguwaso kota Yerusalem, ukor pelamat waktu yeng dah ditentu le' Allah begi sidoe.
42021025	"Jedi dah nyoe," jie Yesus, "langko' diketawu reng pada' keenah keaneh bemacam bejenis timu deri mato ari, bulan ken bintang di langi' nun. Di deniyo tue pun pada' ayie lawut langko' gelebar gelebur, menggerurung, sampai pada' suku benso di seruroh deniyo mat kamoh iroh begegar begitik tam gupoh.
42021026	Pada' mensiyo langko' gola' noe betayie ngaji koti kejedie deniyo tue, go pada' penampa' di langi' nun yeng ugas agongam tampa'e pun pie mat langko' tekuca' teguyu ketiko nyoe.
42021027	Dah nyoe berue pada' mensiyo langko' merati aku Ana' Mensiyo turun pakai románg; ken pada' mensiyo di deniyo tue langko' merati kuwaso ku ken keagong ku yeng ugas ngatam," jie Yesus.
42021028	"Jedi dah kam merati ketongai pada' petanah petano nyoe si kam ca' siyap! togap kukoham! go maksute nyoma' na' jengkahe dah kam langko' dipelopas deri semuya' kesusah kesensare ditue," jie Yesus.
42021029	Dah nyoe iyo nyamong panere pakai perempamo tue. Jedi jie Yesus, "Perati beh kamei, pada' kayu buwah, demo ke' kayu ara opai.
42021030	Mun dah mulai nyopi' anto'e kin diret pun tawu, tanoe ari dah na' kemarau dah.
42021031	A, ponyoe jum ke' hal pada' petanah petano yeng ku padah ke' kam tadie. Jedi mun kam merati semuya' jolu yeng ku padah tadie tejedi nyeh si tanoe jengkah yeng lamat ditantie dicinto le' kam dah na' betongai dah, ya'am des Allah disomah kei rajo di deniyo tue.
42021032	"Semuya' tue langko' tejedi pun," jie Yesus, "sebolum lapis tue bis mati.* Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei.
42021033	Go posan payit aku mat togap kukoham. Do langi' ken tanah tue si langko' losi nayápam, pie posan payit aku mat tan seora'-ora'eam," jie Yesus.
42021034	-
42021035	"Pie kam," jie Yesus, "mat ca' bejegoam ngaji diret kam. Go ari kedetang aku mat noe mererema'. A, semuya' segeno mensiyo di seruroh deniyo tue pun langko' meratie. Pie jangán sampai kam noe siyap, na' po keedah burong yeng konoe jorat. Gola' kam ngorie gila' ke' hal keidup kam di deniyo tue, pai nawue, atau pun gola' kam delu gila' nan beriyah berami bemakan beminúm ken betor kam, pai nawue, sampai pengaji kam pun tegema' tetari' ke' yeng layin, lalu pengabise kelupo kam ngaji kedetang aku," jie Yesus.
42021036	"Pie kebelike kam mat ca' nan bejegoam. Kam ca' bedoa minta' ke' Allah gei' kam togap kukoh, gei' kam mutu ngetate des kam ngerudu semuya' kesusah kesensare yeng langko' tejedi gi. Maksute kepepanyange gei' sempayo kam noe rasoe ngadap aku Ana' Mensiyo dah ku detang gi," jie Yesus.
42021037	Jedi mátam. Milang ari Yesus mat ngajar pada' reng rami di rumah kediyam Allah di Yerusalem. Dah malame ponyoe iyo ken murite keluwar deri kota nyeh ento' bemalam di Buki' Saitun.
42021038	(Pie dah bekolame ponyoe agei', sidoe bebeli' agei' ke' kota.) Mangko pada' reng rami pun tiyap ari bekumpol bekolam nyama' di rumah kediyam Allah, to' ningo Yesus ngajar.
42022001	Jedi dah soma' dam ken Pesta Roti yeng noe Bepengemang, yeng didemo jum Ari Raya Ngelalu. Paling rami belo reng Yahudi yeng dah bekumpol di kota Yerusalem nyo' ngalu pesta nyoe.
42022002	Jedi pada' ketuwo pelayan agama Yahudi ken pada' ugar agama nyeh teger ngogoe alor kei munoh Yesus. Ja'e sidoe na' munohe caro besesulit, go sidoe gola' ken pada' reng rami, gola' reng rami ngamo' belo.
42022003	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Pengelakar nyarong ke' Yudas, yeng demoe jum Iskariot. Yudas kin siko' deri keduwo belas ko' murit Yesus.
42022004	Jedi dah Pengelakar nyarong ke' Yudas tei' lalu iyo pun mat ningal Yesus ken belo murite. Iyo manu ke' belo ketuwo pelayan ken kepala' serededu yeng ngenjego rumah kediyam Allah nyeh. Lalu iyo beruning ken sidoe, ngogoe caro kei iyo nyerah Yesus ke' sidoe.
42022005	Pada' pemimpin pun ayaham ngajie, lalu sidoe bejenyi ngupahe, mun iyo na'e nyerah Yesus.
42022006	Yudas pun setuju, dah nyoe iyo pun ngogoe kelengah nyo' iyo nyerah Yesus ke' sidoe caro besesulit, diyam-diyam, gei' noe diketawu reng rami.
42022007	Jedi dah Pesta Roti yeng Noe Bepengemang dah. Jedi ari nyoe reng ca' nyemeleh ana' domo ento' kei nyamut Ari Raya Ngelalu.
42022008	Mangko Yesus beposan ke' murite Petrus ken Yohanes, "Boh kam," jie, "ngajen semuya'e nyo' diret nyamut pesta Ari Raya Ngelalu kaloe."
42022009	Jie sidoe, "Dinai si kami ca' ngajene, guru?"
42022010	Samut Yesus, "Dah kam tamoe ke' kota kaloe," jie, "kam langko' betomu ken reng lelaki yeng nangong tepayan bisei' ayie; dah betomu nyeh ca' ngenjurute . Dah iyo tamoe ke' rumahe kaloe," jie Yesus,
42022011	"kam tamoe jum. Dinyoe kam langko' betomu ken tuwowe rumah nyeh. Dah betomu ken tuwowe rumah nyeh kam ca' betanyoe ke' iyo, Posan guru tei' dinaiam ento' kamar temuwai yeng diajen kei iyo ken pada' murite ento' ngalu pesta Ari Raya Ngelalu?
42022012	Tuwowe rumah pun langko' ngantar kam ke' kamar bosai di lotenge, yeng lengkap ken pada' perabote. A, dinyoam," jie Yesus, "kam besesiyap nyo' diret makan kaloe," jie Yesus.
42022013	Lalu mat turunam Petrus ken Yohanes. Detang kinun pas cuco'am ken yeng dipadah le' Yesus tadie ponyoe. Sidoe pun ngajen jolu disego ento' nyamut Ari Raya Ngelalu dinyoe.
42022014	Dah nyoe pas jengkahe ngalu pesta nyeh tei' Yesus mat dudo' makan ken pelantar posane* dinyoe.
42022015	Jedi jie Yesus nyingka' murite, "Ku," jie, "mat dah lamat dah ku ingín na' makan pesta Ari Raya Ngelalu tue ken kam, sebolum ku ngerudu kesusah kesensare kaloe.
42022016	Go tue," jie Yesus, "mat pengudah kalie ku ngalu pesta tue lem jemán tue. Ngalu noe ngalue agei' pun," jie, "ca' dah jemán des Allah disomah kei rajo gi, kamei. Go dinyoe kin berue tetuntongam semuya' segeno yeng digemar lem pesta tue," jie Yesus.
42022017	Dah nyoe dijepaie Yesus cawan yeng bisei' ayie angur, lalu iyo bedoa beterimoe kaseh ke' Apa'e. Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Amiam, dibilingam tue ke' pada' kam," jie.
42022018	"Dah tue si," jie, "aku langko' cumam nginsup angur agei' sampai ke' des Allah disomah kei rajo di deniyo tue," jie.
42022019	A, dijepaie jum roti lalu iyo bedoa beterimoe kaseh ke' Apa'e. Dah nyoe roti nyeh dipocahe-pocahe, dibecare ke' pada' murite. Jie Yesus, "Tue," jie, "tuboh aku, yeng langko' ku serah nyo' kam. Jedi makan roti ken nginsup angur tue ca' nan digewai kam ento' kam ngingát ngenáng aku," jie.
42022020	Jedi dah makan tei' ponyoe jum, dijepaie agei' le' Yesus cawan yeng bisei' ayie angur. Lalu jie Yesus, "Tue derah aku yeng langko' betumpah nyo' kam, kei ngesah jenyi semayo Allah yeng beru ken umát Sen," jie.
42022021	"Pie ti beh kam," jie Yesus. "Mat enah nar, reng yeng langko' nyerah aku ke' munsoh ku kaloe mat nongah do dudo' makan begelumo ken aku tue," jie.
42022022	"Yeng mat si," jie, "go aku Ana' Mensiyo mat ca' matiam, cuco' ken yeng dah diputus Allah nyomiam. Pie mat parah nar reng yeng langko' nyerah aku ke' munsoh ku," jie Yesus.
42022023	Dah nyoe pada' murite pun betongai betentanyoe pado sidoe ken sopai nin beh di antaro diret tue yeng langko' nyerah Tuwowe diret, jie sidoe.
42022024	Jedi mátam, pada' murit Yesus ketiko nyoe becencugeh ke' hal pangkate, sopai deri sidoe yeng patut diangap betore yeng lebeh penting.
42022025	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Kam nang kalut ke' hal pangkat," jie. "Yeng nan penting ngaji pangkat si pada' benso layin yeng noe menduli Allah. Pada' rajo sidoe kin ayahe merentah rayate, ken iyo ingín diangap reng panci ken penting. Pie nyoe begi reng yeng noe menduli Allah.
42022026	Kam si nang na' ponyoe," jie Yesus. "Kebelike reng yeng dipenting le' betore mat ca' merenah direte, ken reng yeng bekuwaso merentah betore pie iyo mat ca' relo melayan semuya' segenoe," jie Yesus.
42022027	"A, jedi contohe benso diret yeng makan tue," jie Yesus. "Jedi selomo des reng makan, nailah yeng tingie," jie, "reng yeng melayan makanei ke' reng yeng dudo' makanei? Selomo kin reng yeng dudo' makan yeng diangap reng tingie pangkate, dih? Pie ti beh, kam; mat aku yeng tingie yeng melayan kam, dih? A, koti gewai aku ponyoe jum gewai kam," jie Yesus.
42022028	Dah nyoe do jum jenyi Yesus ke' pada' murite. "Mat kamam," jie Yesus, "yeng nan mutu nunoe aku melamat tue des aku ngerudu pada' kesusah kesensare," jie.
42022029	"Mangko aku pun nguwaso kam gei' kam merentah beroto ken aku des aku merentah kei rajo gi. Na' po Apa' ku nguwaso aku nyo' merentah beroto ken Sen," jie, "ponyoe jum aku nguwaso kam nyo' kam merentah beroto ken aku,
42022030	gei' kam pun beayah bikah beriyah berami ken aku dah jengkah des aku disomah kei rajo gi," jie Yesus. "Ge'em kam behak bekuwaso dudo' di pada' belai agong dinun nyo' kam ngakim pada' reng Israel yeng duwo belas benso gi. Go mat kamam yeng mutu nunoe aku melamat tue," jie Yesus.
42022031	Dah nyoe do Yesus bepadah ke' Simon Petrus. "Dingo beh Simon," jie Yesus. "Mat penting nar yeng ku padah ke' kau. Go Pengelakar," jie, "dah minta' gei' pada' kam tue diserah ke' iyo, gei' kam konoe tampie keedah padi.
42022032	Pie aku dah bedoa nyo' kau, Simonei, gei' kepecayo kau noe punah ranah. Maksut aku dah kau pulang beras togap agei'am si gei' kau pun nogap betor kau jum," jie Yesus.
42022033	Samut Petrus, "Aku si tetap mutu nunoe kau, Tuwowei," jie. "Biyar dipenjero biyar sampai mati pun ku relo ku," jie.
42022034	Pie samut Yesus, "Yeng mat si, Petrusei, bolum mano' tengkuko' kaloe kau dah tigo kali nyangkale ken kau tekenal ken aku," jie Yesus.
42022035	Dah nyoe iyo ngaleh panere agei'. Jedi jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Des ku ngutus kam to' madah agah panci mie kin suroh ku kam noe sa' meyie bokal sangu makan udap, demo ke' pakai ingap uwang duwit opai, dih? Nyeh do noe kam bekekurang ketiko nyoe?" jie Yesus. Pie sidoe nyamute, "Cumam kekurang kami," jie sidoe.
42022036	Lalu jie Yesus, "Pie tue si kam mat ca' besesiyap berue bejelan betatap nyo' madah posan payit ku," jie. "Gola' do yeng beuwang beduwit yeng bebeban bereno mat ca' dibeyiam. Kam mat ca' siyap, go dah tue si keada' kam mat behayo," jie Yesus.
42022037	"Dah tue," jie Yesus, "reng dah berubah dah ken aku," jie. "Kin ditulis lem Kitap Allah mie bungie potue, Iyo diangap reng reng jat nar, (Yesaya 53:12) jie Kitap Sen. Jedi yeng diangap reng jat nyeh mat akuame', kamei. Tue mat jengkahe dah nyo' pemadah Sen dinyoe ca' dituntongam. Malah ken paie semuya' segelo yeng ditulis lem Kitap Sen ke' hal aku mie pun mat dah na' dituntong dah," jie Yesus.
42022038	Dah nyoe jie murite, "Ti beh Tuwowe, do dah kelewang kami duwo bilah," jie. Samut Yesus, "Jediam,*" jie.
42022039	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yesus keluwar deri kota bejelan ke' Buki' Saitun, na' po ketongkah gewaie tiyap malam. Pada' murite pun ngenjurute.
42022040	Jedi dah detang ke' arong yeng ditujue tei' dah nyoe Yesus madah ke' murite, "Kam ca' bedoa gei' kam noe kalah sege' digudo," jie.
42022041	Iyo tei' mencar ke' jewoh kit, kurang lobeh sepemantau deri arong sidoe, lalu iyo belutut nungkup bedoa.
42022042	"Apa' ku," jie, "mun cuco' ken kona' kemawo' Den si ku muhúnam gei' Den nyiseh kesensare tue deri aku, Pa'ei. Pie nang na' Den nunoe kemawo' aku; tunoam kemawo' Den," jie. [
42022043	Dah nyoe temeronyong siko' melekat deri serugo to' nogap nguwát Yesus.
42022044	Yesus pun mat ngatam kesusah atie; kin sungoh-sungoh iyo bedoa muhún ke' apa'e. Sampai bepoloh ken derah betetet ke' tanah.]
42022045	Jedi mátam. Dah bedoa tei' dah nyoe Yesus bengki' lalu bebeli' ke' murite. Pie dah detang ke' murite peratie pada' murite tei' tidor, kopoe tam kesusah atie.
42022046	Pie jie Yesus, "Gopai go kam tidor? Bengki' die. Kam ca' bedoa, gei' kam noe kalah sege' kam digudo," jie.
42022047	Jedi ketengah iyo gei' ngomóng tei' dah nyoe mat detang pada' reng rami. Yeng ngulue tei' Yudas, siko' deri keduwo belas murit Yesus nyeh. Jedi Yudas tei' manu ke' Yesus lalu* ngenciyume na' po reng nyamut kaban gelumo mansa'.
42022048	Pie jie Yesus, "Caro beciyum potuam, dih, Yudas, nyo' kau nyerah aku Ana' Mensiyo ke' munsoh ku," jie Yesus.
42022049	Jedi mátam, ngaso pada' reng rami dah na' nangkap Yesus tei' lalu jie pada' murite nyeh, "Nyeh reng tue ca' diperang kami peh, Tuwowe?" jie.
42022050	Lalu siko' deri murit Yesus noe mererema'e rus! nari' kelewange pak! mangkah ulun pelayan agong, sampai rimpong kelinange.
42022051	Pie jie Yesus, "Jediam! Noe sa'am kam beperang tokoh nyoe," jie. Dah nyoe iyo migang kelinang reng yeng rimpong nyeh, lalu dipebeyi'e.
42022052	Jedi di antaro pada' reng rami nyeh tei' do jum pada' ketuwo pelayan agama Yahudi, ken pada' kapten serededu yeng nan ngenjego rumah kediyam Allah, ken pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi yeng layin, yeng detang jum na' nangkap Yesus. Jedi dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Ngopai," jie, "go kam nangkap aku ca' bekelewang bepementong? Poe aku mat reng jat nar," jie.
42022053	"Teruhale aku milang ari dudo' ngajar di rumah kediyam Allah. Kam kin nan do ningo aku dinun. Pi gopai go kam noe nangkap aku des dinun?" jie. "Pie patutam kam ngenggewai tue des nongah sagam potue pun, go tue mat jengkahe to' Penguwaso sagam ngelaju gewaie," jie Yesus.
42022054	Dah nyoe Yesus mat ditangkapam le' sidoe, lalu dibeyie deri nyoe. Jedi dah Yesus ditangkap tei' dah nyoe iyo dibeyie ke' rumah pelayan agong. Petrus pun ngenjurut deri jewoh.
42022055	Di penenongah kolong tei' do reng nugoh api, dah nyoe pada' reng dudo' bediyang dinyoe. Jedi Petrus pun dudo' ken sidoe dinyoe jum.
42022056	Jedi dah nyoe do siko' betinoe pembentue dinyoe yeng merati Petrus nongah dudo' soma' api; nyuroh iyo ketawu ken Petrus tei' tam rawa' api. Jedi pembentue nyeh nentili' muko Petrus, dah nyoe jie pembentue nyeh, "Ha, reng tue si nan do namah iyo," jie.
42022057	Pie jie Petrus nyangkale, "Ah, ku noe tekenal ku ken iyo," jie.
42022058	Dah sejurus do reng layin die yeng merati Petrus. Lalu ponyoe jum. Jedi jie reng layin tei', "Ha, kau pun bekaban ken sidoe nyoe," jie. Pie samut Petrus, "Ah, noe ken aku kaban iyo," jie.
42022059	Jedi dah nyoe dah sejurus anal agei' do siko' reng layin yeng bungi nyoe jum, ngemoran madah ken Petrus mat kaban Yesus. "Iyo tue mat kaban reng nyoe jum ye'," jie, "go iyo kin reng Galilea," jie.
42022060	Pie samut Petrus, "Eis!" jie. "Jolu pai beh jie kau nyeh? Noe tawu ku ningo paner kau nyeh," jie Petrus. Jedi ketengah iyo ngomóng bungi nyoe tei' temosie mano' pun tengkuko'.
42022061	Yesus Tuwowe pun ngelinga' mantau ke' Petrus. Dah nyoe Petrus pun teringáteam ken pemadah Tuwowe ke' iyo tadie ponyoe, ken iyo langko' tigo kali nyangkal Yesus sebolum mano' tengkuko'.
42022062	Jedi dah teringáte ken omóng Yesus tei' Petrus pun pamus keluwar lalu mengkawung nangis.
42022063	Dah nyoe pada' serededu yeng ngenjego Yesus nyeh simah mangkong melesah Yesus ken ngeolo'-olo'e.
42022064	Matoe dikobate ken bonáng, dah nyoe simah dipangkonge samel ngeolo'-olo'e, "Ne," jie, "mun mat kau panai betijum," jie, "sopaiam di antaro kami yeng mangkong kau tue?" jie.
42022065	Mat bemacam bejenisam sidoe ngejat menghina Yesus.
42022066	Jedi mátam. Pas bukoe tampa' tei' kelompok akim reng Yahudi, demo ke' pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' ugar agama nyeh pun mat bekumpol bekalue. Yesus pun dibeyie kei ngadap sidoe bekumpol nyeh. Jedi dah nyoe pada' akim nyeh betanyoe ke' Yesus,
42022067	"Mun kau mat Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah," jie, "ca' bepadah ke' kami," jie. Pie samut Yesus, "Kira' pun dipadah," jie, "noe ken na' deduwan pecayo," jie.
42022068	"Kira' pun ku meyie deduwan betentanyoe besensusor ke' hal nyoe pun pasti ngei' deduwan," jie Yesus.
42022069	"Pi dah tue si," jie Yesus, "deduwan langko' merati boktie yeng nyato nar gi, go aku yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo mat langko' dudo' di serugo nun di piya' kanán Apa' ku yeng rajo kuwaso. Dinyoam aku disomah kei rajo beroto ken Sen," jie.
42022070	Lalu semuya' sidoe betanyoe ke' Yesus, "Nyeh maksut kau kau Ana' Allah peh?" jie sidoe. Samut Yesus, "Mátam yeng jie deduwan nye'; mat akuame."
42022071	"Ne, dingoam," jie sidoe. "Mun dah bungi nyoe si bokti kesalahe dah noe begogoe agei'," jie. "Deri omóng direte pun diret dah tawu ngemboktie," jie.
42023001	Jedi mátam. Kelompok akim nyeh mat mencaro Yesus. Dah dipecaro tei' sidoe serempa' meyie iyo kei ngadap Gubernor Pilatus.
42023002	Dah sidoe manu ke' Pilatus lalu sidoe simah ngendudoh Yesus. "Reng tue," jie sidoe, "kejulong kami iyo ngasut rayat," jie. "Go iyo ngidah reng ngembeyar pajak ke' rajo," jie sidoe, "malah ken paie iyo ngangkue direte die kei rajo, go jie iyo iyo mat Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi Allah nyo' reng Yahudi," jie sidoe.
42023003	Jedi jie Pilatus nyingka' Yesus, "Kau peh rajo reng Yahudi?" jie Samut Yesus, "Nyoame' yeng jie den nyeh."
42023004	Dah nyoe jie Pilatus nyingka' pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' reng rami, "Ne, ku noe tetomu ku ke' kesalahe reng tue," jie.
42023005	Pie sidoe manseh ngiyal ngeresudu' nyem ngendudohe. "Go iyo ngajar di seruroh nenggeri Yudea, mulah iroh ara," jie. "Iyo betongai di peloya' Galilea, pi tue dah sampai ke' Yerusalem tue dah," jie sidoe.
42023006	Jedi ningo paner bungi nyoe tei' jie Pilatus, "Nyeh reng tue reng Galilea peh?" jie.
42023007	Jedi dah tawue ken Yesus mat asale deri Galilea tei' lalu Pilatus pun nyuroh Yesus ngadap Rajo Herodes die, go Herodes kei rajo peloya' Galilea. Lalu pas kememujore Rajo Herodes pun nongah do di Yerusalem jum ketiko Yesus dipecaro. Jedi disuroh le' Gubernor Pilatus ca' dibeyie ke' Rajo Herodes. Lalu mátam, dibeyie kinun.
42023008	Rajo Herodes si ayahe merati Yesus. Go iyo kenaken dah lamat ingín na' merati Yesus, tam iyo dah erat ningo gesah ke' hal Yesus. Lalu kaji Rajo Herodes iyo na' merati Yesus mulah keenah keaneh.
42023009	Jedi dah Yesus dibeyie ngadap rajo tei' rajo pun lamatam betentanyoe ke' Yesus, pie Yesus mat cum iyo nyamut sepatah kato pun.
42023010	Pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' ugar agama pun ngadap kinyoe jum. Sidoe ngendudoh Yesus paling kejam. Pie iyo cum nyamut*.
42023011	Lalu Rajo Herodes ken pada' serededu nyeh simah ngererujong Yesus. Disaro'e ken beju panci mewah, keca' beju rajo. Dah nyoe disuroh le' Herodes bebeli' manu ke' Pilatus.
42023012	Numo' pun Rajo Herodes ken Gubernor Pilatus lamat bemunsoh pie dah ari tue ponyoe rapat agei'am ken betore.
42023013	Jedi mátam, Yesus dibeyie ngadap Gubernor Pilatus agei'am. Jedi Pilatus tei' ngumpol pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi ken pada' reng rami ge'em.
42023014	Dah nyoe jie Pilatus nyingka' sidoe rami nyeh, "Ne," jie, "kam," jie, "meyie reng tue ke' aku go jie kam iyo ngaca' ngarang reng rami to' ngelawan pemerentah. Tue dah ku ngenjeriji'e dah di adap kam pun, pie tarah ke' cum kesalahe, numo' pun jie kam benya' kesalahe. Pie cum boktie, aku cum nomu kesalah iyo.
42023015	"Sa'am aku," jie Pilatus, "Herodes pun cum nomu kesalahe, gopai disurohe bebeli' ke' kami ditue, gei' kami mutuse. "Mangko jie ku reng tue cum kesalahe yeng setimpal ken iyo ca' diukum mati na' po yeng dikemawo' le' kam nyeh.
42023016	"Ja'e potue ne," jie Pilatus. "Noe sa' diukum mati, pie ku nyuroh reng melesahe, kei ngajare. Dah nyoe ku melopase," jie Pilatus. [
42023017	Go tiyap tawun dah Ari Raya Ngelalu tei' Pilatus nan ca' ngelopas reng siko' deri penjero, kei nyenáng ati pada' reng Yahudi. Mangko jie Pilatus, "Aku melopas Yesus tue," jie.]
42023018	Pie pada' sidoe rami si serentak besesura', "Bunoh ja' reng nyoe!" jie. "Barabas die dipelopas nyo' kami," jie sidoe.
42023019	Barabas tei' reng jat nar. Iyo dipenjero go iyo ngaca' ngarang reng rami to' ngelawan pemerentah di kota Yerusalem, ken koloe munoh reng jum. Pie sidoe cohe Barabas yeng dipelopas, sal ge' noe iyo Yesus. "Barabas ja' dipelopas," jie sidoe rami.
42023020	Dah nyoe Pilatus ngomóng agei' ken sidoe, go iyo mat na' melopas Yesus.
42023021	Pie sidoe tei' simah mangkas pera' perango, "Dibunoh ja'! Disalip ja' iyo!" jie.
42023022	Pilatus si pengentigo kalie ngomóng ken sidoe. "Pie ngopai iyo ca' disalip?" jie. "Pailah kesalahe? Aku si cum nomu kesalahe, cum bokti ke' hal iyo ca' diukum mati," jie. "Mangko aku nyuroh reng melesahe nyem, dah nyoe aku melopase," jie.
42023023	Pie sidoe si ngemoran nar na' ngukum Yesus, simah bepangkas kayis kin ontap-ontap, "Disalip ja' reng nyoe," jie. Kepepanyange kalah suwaro Pilatus, monáng suwaro reng rami.
42023024	Lalu Pilatus pun mutus ukum Yesus cuco' ken kemawo' sidoe.
42023025	Barabas yeng dipenjero tam iyo ngemberontak ken munoh reng nyeh mat dipelopase, po dipinta' le' sidoe. Pie Yesus si diserah gei' disalip, nunoe kemawo' reng rami nyeh.
42023026	Jedi mátam. Yesus mat dibeyie reng ke' luwar kota. Jedi ketengah bejelan tei' namput betomu ken reng lelaki siko' yeng kememujore detang na' tomus ke' kota nyeh. Reng lelaki tei' demoe Simon;* asale deri kota Kirene.* Jedi ngaso do betomu ken reng lelaki nyeh tei' serededu nyeh nangkape, dah nyoe serededu nyeh ngempakso ngongkah salip Yesus ke' Simon kei iyo nangonge ngenjurut Yesus.
42023027	Pada' reng rami pun do jum yeng ngenjurut Yesus, termansok pada' reng betinoe yeng perengkawung nangis na' po reng berato berayi.
42023028	Dah nyoe Yesus ngelinga' ke' belekang. "Kam nang na' nangis aku, betinoe deri Yerusalemei," jie. "Pie yeng patut si," jie, "kam ca' nangis diret kam ja', ken nangis pada' ana' kam, tam kesusah kesensare yeng langko' dirudu kamena' des kota Yerusalem tue punah ranah gi," jie.
42023029	"Ketiko nyoe si kam langko' ngerudu kesusah kesensare yeng ugas ngatam. Sampai yeng langko' diangap kam untong tuwah nyeh tarah ke' reng manáng die, yeng noe koloe ngicap berana' kaliam, go iyo noe sa' merati ana'e mati.
42023030	Go kesusah kesensare yeng langko' dirudu ketiko nyoe mat ugas ngatam, sampai pada' reng Yerusalem langko' minta' mati ditingang pada' betu kalas ja'. Tingangam kami tue, jie reng nyingka' pada' gunóng ken pada' betu kalas dah nyoe gi. Mat ugas ngatam kesusah kesensare ketiko nyoe.
42023031	Go ibarat ke' kayu din yeng gei' idup disego api sa'am yeng dah rangkai; kepala'eam," jie Yesus nyingka' pada' betinoe yeng nangis ngenjurut iyo. Dinyoe iyo madah ken keada' kota Yerusalem yeng langko' kin uyoh-uyoh.
42023032	Jedi mátam. Do jum reng jat duwo ko', yeng dibeyie jum keluwar kota beroto ken Yesus nyo' disalip ken iyo.
42023033	Jedi dah detang ke' arong yeng didemo Kerakah Kepalo nyeh Yesus mat disalip, beroto ken reng jat yeng duwo ko' nyeh, siko' di kiboe siko' di kanáne.
42023034	Jedi mátam. Dah Yesus disalip tei' dah nyoe iyo bedoa nyo' pada' reng yeng gewaie tokoh nyoe ken iyo. "Elonam sidoe tue, Apa' kuei," jie, "go sidoe pun noe tawue ken reti gewai direte," jie. Dah nyoe pekakas Yesus diamie pada' serededu nyeh, lalu dibegi sidoe caro cabut uni.
42023035	Jedi mátam te'. Pada' reng rami nyeh bediri neronyai dinyoe. Ken pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi pun do jum dinyoe, simah ngenjije' ngererujong Yesus. "Ti beh," jie sidoe. "Jie iyo kin iyo Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah. Pie mun iyo mat Kristus," jie sidoe, "cubo iyo ngelopas direte deri salipe nyeh," jie. "Semalang ke' reng layin mie ge'e, ditulonge," jie pada' ketuwo nyeh.
42023036	-
42023038	A, tadie ponyoe kin do setukong papan yeng ditebeng piya' ke' atas kepalo Yesus, yeng tulise Tue Rajo reng Yahudi. Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe pada' serededu nyeh ngerubut ngeolo'-olo' Yesus jum. Keca' angure sidoe meyie angur masam, ca'ca'e sidoe ngehormát iyo kei rajoe. Lalu jie pada' serededu nyeh, "Tulongam diret kau nyeh, mun kau mat rajo reng Yahudi," jie.
42023039	Dah nyoe siko' reng jat yeng di salip beroto ken Yesus nyeh ponyoe jum panere, menghina ngererujonge jum. "Noe peh kau Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah," jie. "Tulongam diret kau, ken tulongam kami tue ge'em," jie.
42023040	Pie do jum yeng siko' yeng disalip ken Yesus tei' nyacue betore. "Nyeh kau noe gola' peh ken Allah pun," jie. "Tue mat do tigo ko' tona' yeng diukum mati di salip," jie.
42023041	"Pi ukum diret duwo si mat setimpalam ken doso diret. Ja'e reng tue yeng kau olo'-olo' nyeh tarah ke' cum kesalahe," jie yeng siko'.
42023042	Dah nyoe jie nyingka' Yesus tei', "O Yesus," jie. "Ingátam beh ken aku sege' den dah disomah kei rajo gi," jie.
42023043	Jedi jie samut Yesus, "Aku bejenyi ken kau: ari tue tei'am kau cagar begelumo ken aku di serugo panci nun," jie Yesus.
42023044	Jedi mátam. Dah tongah ari tei' semorie noe mererema' lap! sagam gelemát di seruroh nenggeri nyoe; tigo jam pelamate, deri jam duwo belas sampai ke' jam tigo.
42023045	Cumam tampa' mato ari; kontan sagam gelemátam di arong nyoe. Semorie di Yerusalem nun bonáng tobal yeng kei dining di rumah kediyam Allah nyeh rak! tebolah duwo.
42023046	Lalu dah nyoe Yesus pun mangkas ontapam, "Ku nyerah nyawo ku ke' diret Dénam, Pa'ei," jie Yesus. Dah lopas iyo besuwaro bungi nyoe tei' iyo pun mat matiam.
42023047	Jedi kapten pada' serededu yeng nyalip Yesus tei' mat merati semuya' yeng tejedi tokoh nyoe. Dah nyoe iyo pun ngagong mugi Allah jum. "Reng tue mat bujor benaram," jie.
42023048	Pada' reng rami yeng neronyai tadie ponyoe pun dah merati semuya' yeng tejedi tei' mat susaham atie, manum-manum dedoe samel perengkawung betentangis. Lalu bepulang-pulangam pada' reng rami nyeh.
42023049	A, belo kaban kerabat Yesus do jum dinyoe, termansok pada' betinoe yeng nan ngenjurute deri kememerue iyo betongai ngajar di Galilea mie. Jedi sidoe tei' bediri ke' jewoh kit, merati jum semuya' yeng tejedi.
42023050	-
42023051	Jedi do siko' reng lelaki yeng bedemo Yusup, yeng asale deri kampong Arimatea, di peloya' Yudea. Iyo reng panci, diangap Allah reng bujor. Iyo pecayo ken jenyi Allah, mangko iyo nan nantie jengkah des Allah langko' disomah kei rajo di deniyo tue. Iyo tei' tekawum deri kelompok akim jum, pie iyo noe setuju ken keputus kelompok akim ngukum Yesus.
42023052	Jedi mátam. Dah Yesus mati tei' Yusup manu ke' Pilatus, minta' gei' bengkai Yesus diserah ke' iyo, nyo' iyo masare. Pilatus pun mat ngemborie.
42023053	Jedi Yusup mat manu ke' salip, lalu diturune bengkai Yesus deri salip, lalu diamie. Dibungkuse ken kayin kapan yeng lopue. Dah nyoe diongkahe ke' lem guwo. Guwo nyeh tei' yeng kusus nyo' tama', yeng ditobo' reng deri lubang betu. Tama' nyoe gei' bungas, bolum do dipakai. Jedi bengkai Yesus diongkah le' Yusup dinyoam.
42023054	Ari nyoe tei' gei' Ari Persiyap, kei reng besesiyap nyo' Ari Berenti Kerejo. Ari pun dah na' malam des Yusup ngongkah bengkai Yesus di guwo.
42023055	Jedi pada' betinoe tadie yeng namah Yesus deri Galilea nyomie ponyoe ngenjurut Yusup jum, lalu sidoe merati iyo ngongkah bengkai Yesus di guwo.
42023056	Dah merati Yesus diongkah lem guwo sidoe pun pulang, lalu ngumpol belo rerempah ken binya' wangi. Maksut sidoe na' ngulai ngarum bengkai Yesus ken pada' rerempah. Ja'e tam dah Ari Berenti Kerejo si sidoe pun mat berenti di rumahe lo'e, nunoe ukum Allah. Bolum bebeli' ke' tama' Yesus.
42024001	Ja'e dah ari Mingu bekolam nyama' nyeh sidoe mat bebeli' ke' guwo tama' Yesus, naban pada' rerempah.
42024002	Detang kinun poe betu tudong guwo tei' dah tebering dah deri lubang guwo.
42024003	Sidoe pun tamoe ke' delam, pie ke' bengkai Yesus si cum tomue.
42024004	Bemangam ati sidoe, lalu ketengah ngajie tei' temosie temeronyong dinyoe reng lelaki duwo ko' yeng bejue bedecar, mengkilat na' po kengkitar.
42024005	Gupoham sidoe betinoe, lalu nungkup ke' tanah. Pie lelaki duwo ko' nyeh tei' bepadah, "Nyeh gopai go kam ngogoe reng idup di tama' reng mati tue?" jie sidoe duwo ko'.
42024006	"Yesus tei' cum dah ditue! Iyo dah bengki' idup! Ingát noe kam ken pemadahe ke' kam nyomie, des iyo gei' di Galilea,
42024007	go iyo kin daham bepadah ke' kam ken iyo ca' diserah ke' reng bedoso, ca' mati di salip, dah nyoe dah ari pengentigoe iyo bengki' idup agei'," jie reng duwo nyingka' sidoe betinoe.
42024008	Dah nyoe sidoe betinoe mat teringáteam ken posan Yesus nyomie ponyoe.
42024009	Lintus sidoe pun ningal tama' nyeh, pulang ke' kota, madah semuya'e ke' murit Yesus sebelas ko' ken pada' murite layin jum.
42024010	Yeng madahe tei' Maria Magdalena, Yoana, ken Maria ino' Yakobus; pada' betinoe layin yeng namah sidoe tigo nyeh simah bepadah jum, ke' pada' pelantar posan Yesus,
42024011	pie pelantar posane tei' tarah ke' noe pecayoe ken gesah sidoe betinoe, go kaji murite lelaki nyeh paner dongéng modas-modasam.
42024012	Ja'e Petrus si ningo paner sidoe bungi nyoe iyo mat turun pamus, bebodap ke' guwo tama' Yesus. Detang kinun iyo nyunup merati ke' delam. 43002015	Dah nyoe Yesus mulah penyipat deri sogoe, lalu semuya' sidoe simah ditunonge deri rumah kediyam Allah nyeh, ken pada' sapie ken domoe ge'em. Pada' meja penukar duwit nyeh tei' simah dibelungang dibelengi'e, sampai belengkapur pada' jolue.

43002017	Dinyoe pada' murite pun teringát ken yeng ditulis di lem kitap Allah nyomie yeng bungie potue, Mat ugas ngatam kaseh ku ken rumah kediyam Den, sampai mereruwap ati ku entam dipulah reng tokoh nyoe," jie. (Masmur 69:9)
43002018	Jedi mátam. Dah merati gewai Yesus nunong pada' pedegang tei' dah nyoe pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi pun betanyoe ke' Yesus. "Sopai yeng nguwaso kau ngenggewai tue?" jie. "Boh kau mulah keenah keaneh nyo' ngembokti kuwaso kau di adap kami tue," jie.
43002019	Jedi jie Yesus nyamute, "Mun rumah kediyam Allah tue dirancang dirongko kam si aku langko' mulahe agei' lem tigo ari," jie.
43002020	Samut reng Yahudi tei', "Dah empat puloh nam tawun dah reng nukang rumah kediyam Allah tue," jie. "Noe ken konai kau na' mulahe lem tigo ari nyem," jie sidoe.
43002021	Pie sidoe noe tawue ken Yesus ngomóng pakai belelawut. Rumah kediyam Allah yeng dimaksut Yesus tei' ya'am tuboh direte.
43002022	Jedi lamat belamat, dah iyo mat mati ken bengki' idup agei' nyeh mat teringátam murite ken omónge bungi nyoe mie. Lalu sidoe pun mat pecayo ken Kitap Allah ke' hal iyo; sidoe mat jelas ken omónge ari nyoe ke' hal direte mat-mátam.
43002023	Jedi mátam. Des Yesus nyamut Ari Raya Ngelalu di Yerusalem nyeh mat benya' reng yeng pecayo ken iyo mat Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah, tam sidoe merati keenah keaneh yeng dipulahe.
43002024	-
43002025	Pie Yesus si noe yakin ken sidoe mat pecayo, go iyo kin tawue ken ati pemiker semuya' mensiyo. Noe ge' sa' dipadah reng layin ke' hal ati betor; iyo dah tawue dah.
43003001	Jedi do siko' ugar agama Yahudi deri kelompok Parisi. Demoe Nikodemus.
43003002	Jedi dah malam ari ponyoe iyo mat manu ke' Yesus. Lalu jie nyingka' Yesus, "Guru," jie. "Kami dah tawu kami bisam dah ken kau mat guru yeng diutus le' Allah. Boktie go pada' keenah keaneh yeng dipulah kau. Mat cum reng yeng mampu ngenggewai pada' keenah keaneh tokoh nyoe cuwali Allah nyerotoe," jie Nikodemus.
43003003	Yesus nyamute potue. "Aku madah kau yeng mat: Mun reng noe diado agei' si iyo mat noe tekawum des Allah disomah kei rajo," jie Yesus.
43003004	"Konai reng dah tuwo na' diado agei'?" jie Nikodemus. "Noe ken tawu na' tamoe ke' kanong ino'e agei', gei' diado agei'," jie.
43003005	Samut Yesus, "Pi mátam te', yeng ku padah ke' kau: Diado sekali caro mensiyo noe cukup. Ca' diado pengenduwo kali, diado le' Roh Allah, berue reng mampu dikawum des Allah disomah kei rajo.
43003006	Tuboh engkas ngado tuboh nyem; roh ngado roh. Tuboh mensiyo buleh idup nyeh tam diado le' ino'e. Pie roh si mun na' buleh idup ca' diado le' kuwaso Roh Allah.
43003007	Jedi nang na' kau kangáp mun ku madah ken kam ca' diado duwo kali.
43003008	"Mat die ke' hal roh si noe ketawu urang. Pie perbeninge keedah angín. Angín kin ngenciyup ke' ulu ke' ilie. Bungie si kedingo reng, pie unáne noe tekenal reng; reng noe tawu reng deri nai iyo tomus ken konai penujue. Jedi ponyoe jum senika' reng yeng diado caro roh. Mat nyato ken iyo dah buleh idup beru, numo' pun noe awas ken mato diret caro iyo bulehe pun," jie Yesus.
43003009	"Koti jolu yeng dipadah kau na' tejedi?" jie Nikodemus nyingka' Yesus.
43003010	"Wai," jie Yesus, "noe tawu kau peh? Kau kin ugar agama, pi manseh noe tawu kau, poe, ken maksut pemadah ku ke' hal idup beru," jie Yesus.
43003011	"Pi ku madah ke' kau jolu yeng mátam. Kami ngomóng ke' hal yeng kami tawu, kami madah hal yeng dah kami merati, pie kam Parisi manseh siko' pun cum yeng pecayo ken saksi kami," jie Yesus.
43003012	"Semalang ke' omóng ku ke' hal yeng tejedi di deniyo tue," jie, "kam noe pecayo, sa'am go ku na' begesah ke' hal yeng tejedi di serugo, ke' hal keidup beru. Konai kam na' pecayoe?
43003013	Teruhal ku mat behak madah ke' kam ke' hal serugo, go asal ku deri nunam. Mensiyo si siko' pun cum yeng dah ke' serugo lalu pulang ke' deniyo tue nyo' madah reng ke' hal dinun. Pi aku yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo si seli deri nunam, dah nyoe ku turun ke' deniyo tue. Mangko ku mat behak ngajar ke' hal serugo," jie Yesus.
43003014	"Jedi yeng langko' na' tejedi gi," jie Yesus, "na' po des Musa nganyo' ular temego di adap reng rami mie*. Ponyoe jum," jie, "aku tue gi, yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo. Aku ca' dianyo' di adap reng rami jum,
43003015	sempayo senika' reng yeng pecayo ken aku nomu ke' idup yeng cum berudu mati," jie Yesus nyingka' Nikodemus.
43003016	Go ugas bosaiam kaseh Allah ken mensiyo di deniyo tue, mangko diunyo' Sen ken Ana' Sen yeng tungal. Sopai-sopai ja' yeng pecayo ken Ana' Sen tei' cagar noe losi nayáp, malah ken paie nomu ke' idup yeng cum berudu mati.
43003017	Tuju maksut Allah ngirum Ana' Sen ke' deniyo tue pun noe iyo kei ngendecing kesalah mensiyo peh, pie kei nyelamát mensiyo deri dosoe.
43003018	Reng yeng pecayo ken Ana' Sen si noe didecing kesalahe. Pie reng yeng noe pecayo si dah didecing dah kesalahe. Kesalahe tei' tam iyo noe pecayo ken demo Ana' Allah yeng tungal.
43003019	Sidoe didecing diukum pun go ayahe ken sagam. Teruhal Tampa' si dah detang dah ke' deniyo tue. Pie mensiyo ayahe ken sagam, sie ken tampa', go keragam mensiyo mat jat.
43003020	Berang reng bekeragam jat kin sie ken tampa', ngei'e manu ke' tampa', gola' diketawu reng ken keragame yeng jat.
43003021	Pie reng yeng ngenggewai yeng mat si mat na'e manu ke' tampa'. Go iyo na'e manu ke' tampa' nyeh go dinyoe mat nyato ken gewaie yeng panci nyeh bungkonge mat deri Allaham.
43003022	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yesus ken pada' murite turun ke' peloya' Yudea, diyam dinyoe lo'e, ken nyolam pada' reng yeng manu ke' iyo.
43003023	-
43003024	Ketiko nyoe Yohanes kin gei' bolum dipenjero. Jedi Yohanes pun nyolam reng jum, di ateh Ainon di soma' Salim, go dinyoe ayie pun bosai. Nan do reng yeng manu ke' Yohanes minta' disolame.
43003025	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe do separo murit Yohanes yeng becencugeh ken siko' reng Yahudi ke' hal adat pemeso'.*
43003026	Mangko sidoe manu ke' Yohanes. "Guru," jie sidoe. "Ingát noe kau ken reng yeng do beroto ken kau di seborang sungai Yordan nun mie, yeng dipadah kau Ana' Domo Allah? Dingo beh!" jie. "Tue iyo dah nyolam reng jum, sampai bederum reng manu ke' iyo die," jie murit Yohanes nyeh.
43003027	Jedi samut Yohanes, "Nyoe kin tam kuwaso Allah, go diret mensiyo kin mat cum kuwaso diret, cuwali diunyo' le' Allah.
43003028	(A, Sen nguwaso aku mie pun nyo' ku memparang jelan, gei' reng manu ke' iyo.) Kam pun to' saksi pendukong ku, go semuya' kam mat ningo aku bepadah mie ken aku noe iyo Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah peh, pie aku mat diutus kei ngulu iyo, kei memparang jelan nyo' iyo.
43003029	"Mat patutam reng rami nyeh dah manu ke' iyo pun. Ibarat ke' reng sabat din penganting betinoe nyeh kin mat engku penganting lelaki. Jedi mat patutam mun iyo manu ke' lakie. Do aku si keedah pengapi' lelaki nyem, yeng gewaie kei nyiyáp semuya' segeloe to' penganting lelaki nyeh. A, mun penganting lelaki nyeh dah mat sabat ken cagar binie nyeh bedeke' pengapi' nyeh isin dengki! Malah ken paie ayah bikaham! Mat ponyoame' aku tue, kamei. Mat ngatam keayah bikah ku ningo pada' reng rami dah manu ke' Yesus!
43003030	Mat patutam kuwaso iyo ca' kin mansang, ken kuwaso aku ca' kin bekekurang
43003031	Go reng yeng berasal deri serugo nyeh mat nguwaso semuya' segenoe. Reng yeng berasal deri deniyo si iyo mat reng deniyo tei'am; panere pun paner reng di deniyo tue nyem, go iyo noe koloe merati serugo. Pie reng yeng berasal deri serugo nyeh mat nguwaso semuya' segenoe.
43003032	"Iyo si besaksi madah ke' hal yeng diperati ken yeng didingo direte di serugo nun. Pie celoe sikitam reng yeng pecayo ken hal yeng disaksie.
43003033	-
43003034	"Teruhal kin iyo mat diutus le' Allah; yeng dipadah le' iyo pun mat posan payit Allah tei'am. Kuwaso Roh Allah pun dijemín Sen ke' iyo belobeh-lobeham. Mangko sopai pun yeng pecayo ken saksi iyo si maksute sidoe setuju lem atie nun ken yeng dipadah le' Allah mat-mátam.
43003035	Go iyo mat Ana' Allah; Allah Apa' pun mat kaseh ken Ana' Sen, mangko semuya' segeloe dah diserah Sen dah ke' Ana' Sen.
43003036	Mangko sopai ja' yeng pecayo ken Ana' Sen tei' mat idup seora'-ora'eam, pie sopai ja' yeng ngei'e tuno' taalo' ke' Ana' Sen si mat cum ngicap kaliam idup yeng tan seora'-ora'eam, malah ken paie iyo serarat nangong ukum Allah yeng borat nyem," jie Yohanes.
43004001	Jedi mátam te'. Dah nyoe poe pada' reng Parisi pun kedingoe jum ke' hal reng rami yeng disolam to' murit Yesus. Sidoe yeng disolam to' murit Yesus tei' poe benya' deri yeng disolam Yohanes pun.
43004002	Ja'e yeng mat si noe iyo Yesus peh yeng nyolam reng. Pada' murite die yeng nyolam pada' reng rami yeng manu ke' Yesus.
43004003	Jedi mátam. Ngaso pada' reng Parisi dah dipadah ke' hal pada' reng rami yeng manu ke' iyo nyeh dah nyoe Yesus Tuwowe pun ningal peloya' Yudea, pulang agei' ke' Galilea.
43004004	Jedi na' pulang tei' pie iyo meraso tedorong lem atie ca' dolu ngerudu peloya' Samaria die.
43004005	Jedi mátam. Bejelan ngerudu peloya' Samaria tei' detang ke' kampong Sikar. Sikar soma' tentanah yeng dilileh Kei' Yakub ke' ana' sen Yusup nyomie.
43004006	Jedi di tentanah nyoe, soma' kampong Sikar tei' do ayie tengkelubang. Demoe Sumor Yakub. Jedi mátam. Yesus sidoe dah tongah ari ponyoe detang ke' soma' kampong Sikar. Yesus mat kopoe peraso bejelan, lalu berenti, namput dinyoe do sumor, dudo' ponyoam di pinger sumor Yakub.
43004007	-
43004008	Bedireteam iyo dudo' dinyoe; murite go manu ke' kampong na' moli jolu kei sego. Jedi kebonóng iyo dudo' dinyoe do detang siko' betinoe reng Samaria, na' ngencawo'. Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka'e, "Ta' ge' ayie kau cawo' nyeh nyo' ku insup beh?"
43004009	Samut reng betinoe, "Wai enah nar," jie, "kau minta' ayie insup deri aku, sedang kau reng Yahudi, aku reng Samaria, sa'am go aku betinoe!" jie. Nyuroh iyo kangáp nyeh go reng Yahudi ngei'e betegur begewol ken reng Samaria.
43004010	"(Mang pun enah aku minta' ayie insup deri kau, go menurute kau yeng ca' minta' deri aku!)" jie Yesus. "Ja'e go kau noe tawu kau ken pengunyo' Allah yeng Sen na' unyo' ke' kau, ge'em noe tawu kau sopailah aku tue yeng minta' ayie insup ke' kau. "Kira' kau tawu si," jie, "kau die yeng minta' deri aku, gei' aku ngunyo' ke' kau ayie yeng nyuroh kau idup," jie Yesus.
43004011	"Ne," jie betinoe nyeh, "pai kei kau ngamie," jie, "go sumor tue delam nar, kau pun cum jolu nyo' kau ngencedoke.
43004012	Konai kau na' ngamie ayie yeng nyuroh reng idup? A, gola' maksut kau na' deri sumor layin pun," jie, "go sumor tue yeng koloe nyo' Kei' Yakub desiyan insup, demo ke' ana' sen ken pada' ingún pemurun sen pun. Nyeh kau ngangap diret kau tingie deri Kei' Yakub peh, go kau na' ngamie ayie layin deri yeng tue?" jie reng betinoe nyeh.
43004013	Samut Yesus, "Pie pada' reng yeng insup ayie tue, dah kaloe kit coko' na' insup agei'," jie.
43004014	"Ja'e sopai ja' yeng insup ayie yeng ku unyo' si puwasam, cumam iyo coko' insup agei' seora'-ora'eam. Malah ken paie ayie yeng cagar ku unyo' nyeh langko' na' po lubang ayie yeng nan serarat ngamol meruwap, sempayo yeng nginsupe idup seora'-ora'eam," jie Yesus.
43004015	"Unyo'am ayie nyoe ke' aku," jie betinoe nyeh, "kei aku noe nan coko' insup, gei' noe sa' milang ari pulang mansang ngencawo' kitue," jie.
43004016	Samut Yesus, "Pulangam lo'e," jie, "kau ke' rumah kau, madah jodo kau, dah nyoe kam bebeli' kitue agei'," jie.
43004017	"Ku cum jodo ku," jie betinoe nyeh. "Mátam jie kau nyeh cum jodo kau," jie Yesus,
43004018	"go yeng mat si kau dah limo kali begenti jodo, ken yeng menjedi seberumah kau tue pun begolut nyem, noe dipejodo reng peh. Mat benaram to' kato kau ken cum jodo kau," jie Yesus.
43004019	Ningo panere bungi nyoe samut reng betinoe tei', "A, tue mat tawu ku dah ken kau mat siko' penijum," jie.
43004020	"Jedi mun kau penijum," jie reng betinoe nyeh, "ku na' betanyoe ke' kau. Jedi jie akei' puyang kami si mun na' nyomah ke' Allah ca' di Buki' Gerasim tue, pie jie benso kam reng Yahudi nyeh mun na' nyomah ke' Allah ca' di kota Yerusalem nyem, noe buleh di layin. Nai si yeng mat?" jie betinoe nyeh.
43004021	-
43004022	Samut Yesus nyingka' reng betinoe nyeh, "Kam reng Samaria nyeh noe tekenal kam ken Allah yeng kam somah: sebujor nyomaham, sebenare ken Allah noe tekenal kam. Kami reng Yahudi si," jie, "mat tekenal ken Allah yeng disomah kami. Sen mat nganyoe diret Sen ke' kami, go reng yeng kei Penulong pada' mensiyo pun buboh ampeh reng Yahudi die. "Pi kau," jie Yesus, "ca' pecayo ken pemadah aku tue. Go dah nyoe gi," jie, "noe ge' die penting arong reng nyomah ke' Allah Apa' diret, noe ge' ca' di buki' tue, noe ge' ca' di Yerusalemam.
43004023	-
43004024	Go dah nyoe gi--malah ken paie ketiko tue pun betongai dah jengkahe, ento' reng nyomah ke' Allah Apa' dinai-nai pun, entam dikuwaso le' Roh Sen yeng madah yeng bujor yeng benar ke' hal Allah. Go Allah tei' Roh. Mangko ngat reng yeng dikuwaso le' Roh Sénam yeng tawu nyomah ke' Sen secaro yeng mat. Go mat reng yeng tokoh nyoam yeng diingín dicinto le' Allah kei nyomah ke' Sen," jie Yesus.
43004025	Samut betinoe nyeh, "Ku pun tawu ku dah ken Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah langko' na' detang, yeng didemo reng Kristus. Dah iyo detang si iyo langko' ngajar nerang semuya'e ke' diret, deri epun sampai ke' ujonge," jie.
43004026	Samut Yesus, "Akuam to' urange yeng kau sebut te'. Mat akuam to' yeng ngomóng ken kau tue," jie Yesus.
43004027	Jedi mátam. Kebonóng iyo ngomóng detangam pada' murite yeng tadie ponyoe ke' kampong Sikar. Kangápam sidoe merati iyo ngomóng ken reng betinoe. Pie siko' pun cum murite betanyoe ke' betinoe nyeh pai gewai iyo kinyoe. Ke' Yesus pun cum yeng betanyoe gopai go iyo bepaner ken reng betinoe nyeh.
43004028	Jedi dah nyoe reng betinoe nyeh ditingale ming bedah ayie yeng dicedoke tadie, lalu iyo pulang ke' kamponge, lintus bepadah ke' pada' reng dinyoe.
43004029	"Tau beh kam," jie, "urang yeng betomu ken aku dinun tawue bisam iyo ngenggesah pada' kebeyat ku," jie. "Engo ku pai nawue iyoam Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi Allah," jie. "Na' meratie yo'am kam kinun."
43004030	Lintus mat turunam jum pada' reng yeng ningoe, namahe manu ke' arong bokase iyo ngomóng ken Yesus tadie.
43004031	Jedi sepeningal betinoe nyeh tei' pada' murit Yesus simah ngaja'e makan. "Yo' makanam, guru," jie sidoe.
43004032	"Yo'," jie Yesus. "Pie aku si do jolu kei sego yeng kam noe tawu," jie.
43004033	Dah nyoe jie pada' murite nyingka' betore, "Sopai nin beh," jie, "doei reng ngunyo' jolu kei segoe tingal diret tei'?"
43004034	Pie jie Yesus, "Aku si," jie, "pemakan ku tuno' taalo' ke' kemawo' Allah yeng ngutus ku ke' deniyo tue. Sal ge' ku nyanto' tugas ku yeng diserah Sen ke' aku si ibarat ke' makan din sabasam," jie.
43004035	"Tue pun," jie Yesus, "dah jengkahe dah nyo' diret bekoyo bekerejo. O, jie reng, suba'am; umo tue bolum tawu digotam; ca' empat bulan agei' berue tawu digotam. Pi ti beh, kam! Pantauam pada' mensiyo yeng keedah umo yeng sedang dah na' digotam!
43004036	Ha, tue pun kebonóng reng ngotame; upahe pun mulai do, yeng tan seora'-ora'eam. Mangko beyi' reng nugal beyi' reng ngotam samo beayah bikah.
43004037	"A, jedi," jie Yesus, "mat po jie perbeso reng, Do yeng nugale do yeng ngotame.
43004038	Go aku ngutus kam," jie, "gei' ngotam di umo yeng noe ditugal diret kam. Ibarat ke' umo din urang yeng ngerejoe, dah nyoe kam pun untong go kam ngotame," jie Yesus.
43004039	Jedi mátam. Dah reng betinoe tadie ngenggesah ke' hal Yesus do madah semuya' kebeyate tei' mat benya' reng Samaria yeng sekampong nyoe yeng pecayo.
43004040	Mangko sidoe mat manu ke' Yesus di Sumor Yakub, lalu muhún mampal gei' iyo diyam di kampong sidoe. Lalu iyo pun mat beronga' duwo ari duwo malam dinyoe, ngajar sidoe.
43004041	Jedi ningo omóng Yesus tei' mat kin popah-popah pemenya' reng yeng pecayo.
43004042	Lalu jie pada' reng pecayo nyingka' reng betinoe nyeh, "Tue kami pecayo pun," jie, "sekurang dah ningo deri kau, malah ken paie dah diret kamiam yeng ningoe. Mangko kami mat yakin nar ken iyo tue mat Penulong Penyelamát pada' mensiyo di deniyo," jie pada' reng Samaria di kampong nyoe.
43004043	Jedi mátam te'. Dah duwo ari beronga' di Samaria nyeh dah nyoe Yesus pun bebeli' ke' Galilea.
43004044	Go kin mat diret iyoam yeng dah bepadah, ken reng penijum nan noe diterimoe dihormát nyem le' pada' reng di nenggeri seli direte. Mangko iyo bebeli' ke' Galilea, noe iyo ke' Yudea peh.
43004045	Jedi dah detang ke' Galilea tei' iyo mat dialu diterimoe le' pada' reng Galilea. Go sidoe kin dah merati semuya' gewai iyo di Yerusalem mie, des iyo nyamut Ari Raya Ngelalu mie, go sidoe do jum di Yerusalem ketiko nyoe. Mangko iyo mat dialu diterimoe panci le' pada' reng di Galilea.
43004046	Jedi lamat belamat Yesus pulang agei' ke' kampong Kana di peloya' Galilea. Kampong Kana nyeh kampong yeng bokas iyo nyuroh ayie bujor menjedi ayie angur mie. Jedi do jum siko' wakel rajo di kampong Kapernaum, yeng jewoh deri Kana. Ana'e tei' saki' uyoh.
43004047	Jedi dah nyoe kedingo wakel rajo tei' ken Yesus dah detang deri Yudea, nongah do di kampong Kana. Lalu wakel nyeh turun deri Kapernaum manu ke' Yesus di kampong Kana. Detang kinun tei' lalu iyo minta' na' nyuroh Yesus detang ke' Kapernaum, membeyi' ana'e go mat dah uyoh nar, tingal penyawo di dedoe dam.
43004048	Jedi jie Yesus, "Kam," jie, "keh kam pecayo, cuwali merati aku ngenggewai keenah keaneh."
43004049	Pie wakel tei' ngemoran minta' tulong. "Pa' Guru," jie, "copatam kinun, ana' ku tingal penyawo di dedoe dam."
43004050	Samut Yesus, "Ana' kau dah beyi' dah," jie. "Bom na' pulang pun." Wakel rajo nyeh pun pecayo ken omóng Yesus, lalu turun pulang ke' kampong direte nun.
43004051	Di tongah jelan iyo betomu ken pada' ulune. Jedi jie ulune, "Ana' kau dah beyi' dah!"
43004052	Lalu dijeriji'e le' wakel rajo nyeh pai mayo ari ana'e beyi'. Samut sidoe, "Lopas tongah ari kemayie," jie, "jam satu ke' deng nyoe iyo beyi'am."
43004053	Lalu mat tesima'eam le' apa'e ken mat pas jam satu kemayie ponyoe Yesus madah ken ana'e dah beyi'. Lalu iyo ken pada' seberumahe pun pecayoam ken Yesus.
43004054	Jedi mátam. Nyoe petanah petano yeng keduwo yeng dipulah le' Yesus di Galilea. Mat dipulahe di Galilea dah iyo ningal Yudea mie.
43005001	Dah nyoe Yesus ke' kota Yerusalem, tam dinun pada' reng Yahudi nongah ngalu nyamut ari raya agama Yahudi.
43005002	Jedi di kota Yerusalem di soma' Pintu Gerbang Domo nyeh do kolam nyo' reng manei'. Kolam nyeh demoe Betesda lem paner Ibrani. Di pinger Kolam Betesda kiboe kanáne di sekelilinge dipulah reng belantai beatap nyo' reng betedoh, keedah kaki limo bepetak-petak, limo petak semuya'e.
43005003	Jedi di kaki limo nyeh nan bisei' pada' reng saki': reng butoe, reng mayus, reng timpang, opai, do bisam dinyoe, nan ngalai-ngalai nyem dinyoe. [Go sidoe ngalai dinyoe go nungu ayie meruwap.
43005004	Go bedes-dese do melekat Allah turun ke' kolam ngengguda' ayie. Sal ge' ayie meruwap sopai yeng dolu ngencabur nyeh sengkunyong beyi'am deri penyaki' pai pun yeng diidape. Nyoam go pada' reng saki' nyeh rami ngalai nungu dinyoe.]
43005005	A, di antaro pada' reng saki' nyeh do siko' reng lelaki yeng dah tigo puloh lapan tawun ngidap penyaki'e.
43005006	Jedi mátam. Dah Yesus detang ke' Yerusalem tei' iyo do merati reng yeng dah 38 tawun pelamate iyo saki'. Tawu jum Yesus ken iyo dah melamat nyoe saki'. Lalu jie Yesus nyingka' reng saki' nyeh, "Nyeh kau na' beyi' peh penyaki' kau?"
43005007	Samut reng saki' nyeh, "Na' ku beyi'," jie, "nyoam go ku betungu ditue to'. Pi aku go cum urang nulong ku ngencabur ke' lem ayie," jie, "des ayie ngamol meruwap. Sal ge' ku begenset na' manu ke' ayie," jie, "nan betor layin nyem umán dolu terojun ke' lem ayie nun, lalu iyoam yeng beyi', aku si noe."

43005010	Jedi ngaso ari Saptu lalu pada' pemimpin reng Yahudi simah nyacue reng yeng dipebeyi' tadie, go iyo nyenting tikare. "Tue ari Saptu," jie sidoe. "Kau nang na' meyie tikar kau," jie, "nyoe ngelangar deri ukum agama diret."
43005011	Pie samut reng yeng bokas saki' tadie, "Tam reng yeng membeyi' ku tadie nyeh keh; iyoame' nyuroh ku ca' nyenting tikar ku," jie.
43005012	Jie sidoe, "Nyeh sopai nyuroh kau ca' tokoh nyoe?"
43005013	"Tah beh, noe tawu ku jum," jie reng yeng dipebeyi' nyeh, go iyo mat tarah ke' noe tekenale ken sopai Yesus, entam Yesus mat losi nayáp di tentaro pada' reng rami dah iyo membeyi'e tadie.
43005014	Ja'e dah kaloe ponyoe Yesus betomu agei' ken reng nyoe, di rumah kediyam Allah. Dah nyoe, "Kau," jie Yesus, "kau dah beyi' tue jediam kau bedoso, kei kau noe kepala' sensare dah nyoe gi," jie.
43005015	Dah nyoe reng bokas saki' nyeh bebeli' ke' pada' pemimpin reng Yahudi, madah ken mat Yesus, poe, yeng membeyi'e tadie ponyoe.
43005016	Dah nyoe pada' pemimpin reng Yahudi tei' mat bemunsoh ken Yesus, nyensaree, go iyo membeyi' urang des ari Saptu.
43005017	Pie jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe pemimpin nyeh, "Aku," jie, "go Apa' ku ge' nan serarat bekoyo nulong reng; aku pun ponyoe jum."
43005018	Pie ningo omónge bungi nyoe si pada' pemimpin reng Yahudi semingkin na' munohe; sa'am go iyo na' melosi ukum agama ke' hal ari Saptu nyeh, tue pun iyo madah ken Allah Apa' direte. Nyoe kin Yesus ngangap direte samoam ken Allah. Nyoam go sidoe pemimpin na' munohe.
43005019	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe pemimpin, "Dingo beh kam; yeng ku padah ke' kam mat-mátam. Aku, Ana' Allah," jie, "noe tawu ngenggewai sutie pun ken kuwaso diret ku. Pie sipat gewai Apa' ku yeng ku merati nyeh nyoam ditunoe le' aku. Po gewai Apa' po gewai Ana'; samoam gewai kena'.
43005020	"Go Apa' ku kaseh ken aku, ana' Sen, mangko pada' gewai diret Sen nan serarat Sen padah ke' aku, gei' gewai kena' samo. A, gewai yeng kam merati ditue pun berue betongaiam. Pada' gewai yeng lebeh agong deri tue pun langko' Sen padah ke' aku nyo' ku ngelakue, gei' pengabise pada' kam pun langko' kangáp dah kam meratie gi.
43005021	Benso nyuroh reng dah mati bengki' idup agei'. Aku tawu nyuroh semuya' reng yeng ku mileh kei iyo bengki' idup agei', na' po Apa' ku nyuroh reng dah mati bengki' idup agei'.
43005022	Pai tel agei' akuam to' yeng behak ngendecing kesalah pada' mensiyo gi. Noe iyo Apa' ku peh yeng ngendecing kesalah reng gi. Hak nyoe dah diserah Sen dah ke' aku.
43005023	Maksut Sen nyerah hak nyoe ke' aku sempayo aku dipugi, po Sen pun dipugi. Sopai ja' yeng kehe mugi aku ana' Sen maksute iyo kehe mugi Apa' ku, go Sénam yeng ngutus aku kitue," jie Yesus.
43005024	"Dingo beh kam," jie Yesus, "ku madah ke' kam mat-mátam," jie. "Jedi sopai ja' yeng ningo posan payit aku, ken pecayo ken Allah yeng ngutus aku kitue, iyo dah buleh idup yeng cum berudu mati. Iyo noam diukum tam dosoe. Iyo dah ngaleh deri kemati manu ke' keidup.
43005025	Tue pun ku madah yeng mat ke' kam. Tue dah manu dah ke' jengkahe, malah ken paie tue dah jengkahe dah kei reng yeng mati ningo pemadah aku, ana' Allah. A, yeng ningo aku pun mat langko' idup.
43005026	Go Apa' ku bungkong idup, ponyoe jum aku ana' Sen. Aku pun bungkong idup, tam aku dikuwaso le' Sen.
43005027	"Ge'em," jie Yesus, "hak kei ngendecing kesalah mensiyo dah Sen serah ke' aku, ana' Sen, go aku pun Ana' Mensiyo," jie Yesus.
43005028	"Nyeh kangáp peh kam go aku madah diret ku bungkong idup? Pi kam ca' pecayo!" jie Yesus. "Go dah nyoe gi pada' reng yeng dah mati pun langko' ningo suwaro aku,
43005029	lalu bengki' pamus deri tama'e. Pada' reng yeng bekeragam panci si langko' disuroh bengki' gei' sempayo iyo idup seora'-ora'eam. Pi yeng bekeragam jat si langko' disuroh bengki' gei' sempayo iyo diukum disensare.
43005030	"Aku ngendecing ngukum mensiyo si makai yeng dipadah le' Apa' ku, mangko ukum ku mat bujor benar. Go aku noe mementing kemawo' diret ku. Ku na' nunoe kemawo' Sénam, yeng ngutus ku kitue.
43005031	"A, kira' diret ku bangam si yeng besaksi ke' hal diret ku," jie Yesus, "bolum ca' dipecayo. Ca' do jum saksi layin.

43005033	"Jedi benso Yohanes Penyolam. Kam kin ngutus reng kei betanyoe ke' Yohanes Penyolam mie; iyo pun besaksi yeng mat ke' hal aku.
