43005035	Yohanes si keedah pelito yeng benyalo, gei' tampa', gei' kam tawu jelan yeng mat. Sekali tebar mie si kam pun ayah ningoe, pie tue keh kam dah ngaji saksi Yohanes.
43005036	"Pie gei' do kesaksi yeng layin, yeng lebeh deri kesaksi Yohanes Penyolam pun, ya'am belo gewai ulah ku, demo ke' pada' keenah keaneh yeng ku pulah, tugas yeng diserah le' Apa' ku ke' aku. Pada' gewai ulah ku mat saksi yeng nyato ken aku mat diutus le' Apa' ku kitue.
43005037	"Malah ken paie diret Apa' ku yeng ngutus ku kitue pun dah besaksi jum ke' hal aku. Ja'e celoe suwaro Sen noe koloe kam ningoe, upo Sen noe koloe kam meratie.

43005045	"Ku si mat tawu ku dah ken kejat ati kam. Pi numo' pun aku tawu," jie Yesus, "nang na' kaji kam aku yeng langko' kei saksi yeng madah kesalah kam ke' Apa' ku. Noe iyo aku peh," jie, "pi Kei' Musaame' yeng nan diarap kam. Mat Kei' Musaam yeng langko' madah kesalah kam gi, noe ge' sa' aku, go kam noe pecayo ken posan payit Kei' Musa pun.

43006001	Dah nyoe Yesus nyemorang Lompoe Galilea, yeng demoe jum Lompoe Tiberias.

43006025	Jedi mátam. Dah pada' reng rami nyemorang lompoe tei' mat betomuam ken Yesus di seborang nun, lalu betanyoe. "Guru," jie, "sebilo kau detang kitue?"
43006026	"Yeng máte si," jie Yesus, "kam noe na' ngogoe aku tam pecayo ken tano kuwaso ku peh. Pi go kam ngaji konyáng porut kam bokas nyego roti nyem," jie. "Ngat roti nyem yeng penting begi kam," jie.

Siko' pun cum reng yeng manu ke' aku cuwali ditari' le' Apa' ku yeng ngutus ku kitue. Nyoe pun cuco' ken yeng ditulis penijum nyomie yeng madah ken semuya' reng langko' diajar le' diret Allaham. 43006048	"Akuam to' roti yeng borie idup.
43006049	Mat die akei' puyang kam nyomie nyego roti manna di padang puwang nun; pie lamat belamat manseh matiam desiyan, noe tawu roti nyoe nyuroh desiyan idup seora'-ora'eam.

43006054	"Sopai ja' yeng nyego isei' ku ken nginsup derah ku," jie Yesus, "mat buleh idup yeng cum berudu mati. Tubohe pun akuame' yeng nyurohe bengki' idup agei' dah ari pengudah deniyo tue gi.
43006055	Go isei' aku jolu kei sego yeng mat, derah aku jolu kei insup yeng mat; mat bungkong idup tei'am.
43006056	Sopai ja' yeng nyego isei' aku ken nginsup derah aku mat renán lem aku, aku pun renán lem iyo, mat seiyo sekato seati sepiker.

43006058	Go aku tue roti yeng seli, yeng turun deri serugo, noe iyo po roti manna yeng disego le' akei' puyang kam mie. Desiyan kin matiam, go roti nyoe noe tawu ngunyo' idup yeng cum berudu mati. Ja'e sopai ja' yeng nyego roti seli tue, yeng nerimoe idup deri aku nyeh, mat idup seora'-ora'eam."
43006059	Nyoam posan payit Yesus des iyo ngajar di rumah semeyang di kampong Kapernaum.
43006060	Jedi benya' murit Yesus yeng ningo omónge tadie tei' begunauam. "Eis, omónge tue mat nyeriyo' ningoe pun, sa'am na' ngelakue," jie.

43006063	"(Noe patut ge' menjedi pemiker kam go ku nyuroh kam nyego isei' aku gei' kam idup pun. Jediam ngaji ke' hal isei' ken derah,") jie Yesus. "Yeng borie idup kin mat Roh Allah; noe ken isei' mensiyo tawu ngemborie idup yeng cum berudu mati. Mun kam pecayo ken posan payit aku si kam mat diunyo' idup deri Roh Allah. Nyoam maksut ku te'.
43006064	"Pi gei' do di antaro kam yeng noe pecayo," jie Yesus. Go Yesus kin deri muloe pun dah tawue dah sopailah yeng noe pecayo, ken reng nailah yeng langko' nyerahe gei' dibunoh reng gi.
43006065	"Nyoam," jie Yesus, "go ku padah ke' kam ken reng noe tawu na' pecayo ken aku cuwali dikuwaso le' Apa' ku," jie Yesus.
43006066	Pie dah nyoe si benya' murite mat ngunor direte, kehe dah ngenjurute ken ningo ajare.

43006069	"Kami si," jie, "dah pecayo dah, dah yakin dah ken kau mat urang yeng suci bereseh deri Allah. Kau yeng diutus Sen ke' deniyo tue kei nulong kami," jie Petrus.

43007001	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Yesus mat bejelan betatap melaju ngajar di peloya' Galilea. Iyo ngei'e diyam ken ngajar di peloya' Yudea, go ketuwo reng Yahudi dinyoe mat bearau beamue na' munoh iyo.
43007002	Pie dah nyoe lamat belamat mat dah jengkahe pada' reng Yahudi na' ke' Yerusalem nyo' ngalu Pesta Rumah Tangong.*
43007003	Mangko pada' menyadie Yesus ngaja' iyo ke' Yerusalem. "Menurute si kau ca' ningal arong tue, ca' ke' Yudea die," jie sidoe, "nyo' pada' murit kau dinun merati keenah keaneh yeng dipulah kau.
43007004	Reng yeng na' tekemuko si pai ge' gunoe ngenggewai gewaie di arong sunyei' potue, seolah-olah betapo'. Mun kau na' mulah keenah keaneh si boh di adap semuya' segenoe di Yerusalem nun," jie sidoe.
43007005	Pie bungi sidoe tokoh nyoe go numo' pun menyadie direte sidoe tarah ke' noe pecayoe ken iyo mat penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah.

43007008	Mangko boh kamam kinun, na' ngalu pesta dinun pun. Ku si bolum na' kinun,* go tue bolum jengkahe yeng ditetap nyo' aku," jie.

43007011	Jedi pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi yeng ngalu pesta di Yerusalem nyeh mat nungu Yesus, tam sidoe manseh do arau amue ke' hal iyo. "Dinai beh reng nyoe?" jie sidoe betentanyoe ken betore.
43007012	Pada' reng rami pun beawum-awum ke' hal iyo. Pie pemiker reng rami nyeh mat beseliseh. Go jie reng yeng separoe si iyo mat reng panci, pie jie separoe, "Noe, noe iyo reng panci peh, go iyo ngiring reng nyelimpang deri jelan yeng mat," jie.
43007013	Pie reng rami ngomóng tokoh nyoe pun mat beawum-awum nyem. Ngei'e beba' bekau ke' hal iyo, go sidoe gola' ken pada' ketuwo nyeh.
43007014	Jedi mátam te'. Yesus tei' mat ditungu digogoe reng, pie iyo nantie dah ketengah pesta nyeh berue iyo nayi' ke' rumah kediyam Allah lalu ngajar reng rami.

43007016	Pie samut Yesus, "Pengajar aku si noe iyo kengkarang diret ku peh, pie pungka' pangkale ya'am Sen yeng ngutus aku kitue.
43007017	Berang reng yeng na' nunoe kemawo' Allah si iyo mat jelas ke' hal pengajar ku tue, mat kengkarang diret kuei, ke' mat deri Allahei.
43007018	Mun aku mat madah kengkarang diret ku si maksute aku ingín dipugi dihormát reng. Pie kebelike kebosai aku ngaji Sénam, yeng ngutus ku kitue, maksut aku gei' sempayo Sénam yeng dipugi dihormát reng. Mun ponyoe kin maksute aku mat bujor benar; noe ku pememuloe peh.
43007019	"(Kira' kam tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Allah si kam mat jelas ken pengajar aku). Noe peh Kei' Musa yeng madah ukum Allah ke' kam mie? Mat Kei' Musaame', yeng dihormát dipugi kam. Pi yeng mat si siko' pun cum deri kam yeng tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Sen. Lalu numo' pun semuya' kam ngelangare pie manseh kam bearau beamue na' munoh aku." jie Yesus, "tam jie kam aku yeng ngelangar ukum Sen."
43007020	Pie samut pada' reng rami nyeh, "Ah, kau bisei' setan," jie. "Noe ken do reng na' munoh kau," jie.

43007022	Sedang kam si erat bekerejo des Ari Berenti Kerejo nyeh. Padah ku bekerejo tei' go mun ana' biya' kam lelaki pas umore lapan ari des Ari Berenti Kerejo nyeh manseh disunát kam. Nyoe pun patutam, go mat cuco' ken pelator Kei' Musa nyomie yeng dipadah ke' tona'. Ja'e kato ken pelator Kei' Musa tei' go pelator sunát nyeh deri akei' puyang tona' nyomiam, dolu deri Kei' Musa pun. Pie poko'e mun ari ana' kam ca' disunát nyeh kememujore pas Ari Berenti Kerejo nyeh pasti dipelaju kam nyem.
43007023	Nyoe pun patutam, go ngei' kam ngelangar ukum Kei' Musa, yeng nyuroh ana' biya' ca' disunát pas lapan ari umore. Jedi mun ponyoe gopai go kam godie ken aku? Semalang ke' gewai sunát ge'e, digewai kam Ari Berenti Kerejo, sa'am go gewai aku yeng ngembeyi' reng segonáp tubohe. Mat noe patut kam godie ken aku.
43007024	Jediam kam ngenilai gewai reng caro topang-topang; ca' ngogoe rampang boktie yeng mat, yeng benar, berue ngujong ngelungaie," jie Yesus.
43007025	Jedi mátam te'. Dah nyoe pada' reng yeng diyam di Yerusalem pun betongai betentanyoe siko' ken betore. "Noe peh reng tue yeng na' dibunoh le' ketuwo tona' mie?
43007026	Pi enah nar tue, iyo bebas ngajar di adap reng rami pun; cumam pada' ketuwo tona' ngidahe. Jangán desiyan dah ngangap ken reng tue mat Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah.
43007027	Pie jie penijum nyeh mun dah detang Kristus si iyo detang noe mererema'; noe tawu reng asal usole. Pie ke' hal reng tue si diret kin jelas tawu deri nai asale," jie pada' reng rami.
43007028	Mangko Yesus pun nyamut omóng sidoe ketengah iyo ngajar di rumah kediyam Allah. Jedi Yesus mat bepadah ken suwaro ontap. "Mat die kam tekenal ken aku, ken tawu jum kam deri nai asal ku di deniyo tue. Pie nyoe sebujor ke' hal asal usol ku di deniyo tue. Pie yeng kam noe tawu si ya'am mat do yeng ngutus ku kitue; aku mat berasal deri Sénam. Aku manu kitue noe iyo tam kemawo' diret ku peh. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei, noe iyo kengkarang diret ku peh. Kam si go noe tekenal ken Sen.
43007029	Aku si tekenalam ken Sen, go aku mat berasal deri Sen; mat Sénam yeng ngutus ku kitue," jie Yesus.
43007030	Ningo omónge bungi nyoe tei' pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi nyeh na' nangkap Yesus, pie tarah ke' noe tetangkape, go bolum jengkah yeng ditetap le' Allah.
43007031	Pi tekonoe ke' pada' reng rami nyeh mat benya'am yeng pecayo ken iyo. "Noe peh keenah keaneh yeng tokoh tuam yeng jie penijum nyomie ca' dipulah le' Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi Allah dah iyo detang?" jie sidoe. "Na' mantau bokti pai agei'lah tona'?" jie.

43007035	Dah nyoe pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi betentanyoe pado direte. "Ah, na' konailah iyo," jie, "go iyo bepadah ken tona' noe tetomu ken iyo? Iyo na' ke' arong kawum kerabat tona' yeng pencar temiyar peh, engoe, nyo' iyo ngajar pada' reng noe Yahudi di nun, pai nawue?" jie sidoe.

43007037	Jedi mátam. Pesta Rumah Tangong nyeh na' pengudahe dah. Ari pengudah nyeh ari paling penting pesta nyoe. Jedi dah nyoe Yesus pun bediri di adap reng rami, lalu madah ke' reng rami. "Sopai ja' coko' na' insup," jie, "ca' manu ke' aku nyo' iyo insup.
43007038	"Go jie lem Kitap Allah nyeh bungie potue, Caro' ayie yeng borie idup langko' ngaler deri senika' urang yeng pecayo ken aku*," jie Yesus.

43007040	Jedi ningo panere bungi nyoe tei' separo pada' reng rami nyeh bepadah potue. "Pasti reng tue Penijum yeng dah lamat ditantie le' tona'," jie.

43007042	Kin jie Kitap Allah nyeh Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi Sen, ca' buboh ampeh Rajo Daud, ken ca' berasal deri Betlehem, kampong kediyam Kei' Daud mie," jie sidoe.

43007045	Lalu mátam. Pengabise pada' serededu tei' pulang puwang ke' pada' ketuwo pelayan ken ke' pada' reng Parisi. Bula'am sidoe nangkap Yesus te'. Dah nyoe pada' ketuwo ken pada' reng Parisi betanyoe ke' sidoe, "Nyeh gopai go bula' kam nangkap reng nyoe?"

43007049	Ngat pada' reng rami nyem, yeng na' pecayo ken reng nyoe. Nyoe pun tam kebudue, tam sidoe noe tawue ken ukum Allah Parah nar pada' reng rami nyeh!" jie pada' reng Parisi.
43007050	Jedi Nikodemus pun do jum dinyoe. Kin iyoam yeng manu betentanyoe ke' Yesus nyomie ponyoe. Iyo siko' ketuwo reng Yahudi jum. Jedi jie Nikodemus nyingka' pada' ketuwo nyeh,
43007051	"Nyeh cuco' noe ken adat peradat diret mun mutus ukum reng bolum ngelalu dipecaro?" jie.

43007053	Dah nyoe sidoe pun bepulang-pulangam ke' rumah direte.
43008001	Pie Yesus nayi' ke' Buki' Saitun die.
43008002	[Pagi ponyoe bekolam nyama' Yesus bebeli' ke' rumah kediyam Allah. Pada' reng rami bekumpol ngeliling iyo, lalu iyo pun dudo' ngajar sidoe.

43008005	Jedi jie ukum Musa kin reng yeng ngelaku ponyoe ca' diukum mati, ditikam ken betu. Nyeh, kotilah jie kau?" jie sidoe nyingka' Yesus.
43008006	Ja'e sidoe betanyoe tokoh nyoe pun nyo' ngogoe kesalah Yesus, gola' iyo salah nyamut kei ngendudohe, na' mencaro Yesus. Pie Yesus si nungkup nyem, nulis ken tunyo'e di lantai yeng bedebu. Iyo ngojap nyem.
43008007	Pie sidoe kelar betetanyoe ke' iyo. Kepepuwase tei' iyo pun nenguwa', lalu jie nyingka' sidoe, "Ma'am," jie. "Sopai ja' deri kam yeng cum bedoso," jie, "kei ngulu betore nikame ken betu. Bom," jie.

43008011	"Cum, Tuwowei," jie reng betinoe nyeh. "Ku pun noe ku na' ngukum kau," jie Yesus. "Ma'am kau na' pulang pun, pie," jie Yesus, "jediam kau bedoso," jie. ]
43008012	Dah nyoe Yesus ngajar reng rami agei'am. "Aku," jie, "Penampa' ento' semuya' mensiyo di deniyo tue. Sopai ja' yeng pecayo ken aku dah noam bejelan di sagam. Iyo buleh idup beru, jelane dah tampa' dah."
43008013	Jedi dah nyoe jie pada' reng Parisi nyeh, "Ne, tue si mat noe asi kau besaksi ke' hal diret kauam. Mun diret kau nyem kin ngangkue-ngangkue nyem," jie sidoe.
43008014	Pie samut Yesus, "Kepa' pun diret kuam yeng besaksi ke' hal diret ku pie nyoe manseh mátam, noe iyo memuloe, go aku kin tawu deri nai asal ku ken konai penuju ku. Deduwan si noe tawu deduwan, ken deri nai asal ku ken konai penuju ku.
43008015	Deduwan pun ngendecing gewai reng ken kemawo' ati deduwan nyem. Pi aku si noe.
43008016	Mun aku ngendecing gewai reng si keputus ku mat konoam, go aku mutuse noe iyo bediret ku peh, pie aku seati sepiker seiyo sekato ken Apa' ku yeng ngutus ku kitue.
43008017	(A, ponyoe jum ke' hal reng yeng besaksi nyo' aku, nyo' ngembokti ke' hal gewai ku.) Menurut ukum diret deduwan pun mun do saksi reng duwo ko' yeng cuco', yeng cum selingka'e kin maksute nyoe dah sah nyato; mat ca' diterimoe nyo' bokti gewai reng nyoe.
43008018	Jedi yeng besaksi ngembokti ke' hal gewai aku si yeng siko' nyeh ya'am diret kuam, ken yeng siko' nyeh Apa' ku, yeng ngutus ku kitue, yeng mampu besaksi ke' hal aku" jie Yesus.
43008019	Dah nyoe jie sidoe, "Konai apa' kau na' besaksi ke' hal kau? Dinailah apa' kau tei'?" jie sidoe. Samut Yesus, "Deduwan si go noe tekenal ken aku pun numo' pun aku do ditue ken deduwan, konai deduwan na' tekenal ken Apa' ku?" jie. "Kira' deduwan mat tekenal ken aku si deduwan tetap tekenal jum ken Apa' ku," jie Yesus.
43008020	Iyo mat terus terang berojang lantas bepadah ke' sidoe ketiko iyo ngajar di rumah kediyam Allah di soma' pada' kotak sumang nyeh. Pie begi sidoe yeng na' nangkape si mat cumam yeng nangkape dinyoe, go bolum jengkahe yeng ditetap le' Allah.
43008021	Dah nyoe diulang agei'am le' Yesus. "Aku mat langko' ningal deduwan," jie. "Dah nyoe deduwan mat langko' ngogoe aku, pie dah telampau dah. Lalu deduwan langko' mati gei' nangong doso deduwan, cum deduwan bebeta' piker. Go deduwan mat noe tawu manu ke' arong aku," jie Yesus.
43008022	Pie pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi nyeh manseh ngeolo'-olo'e nyem. "Nyeh iyo nyeh cagar na' munoh direte peh*," jie, "pai nawue, go iyo bepadah ken diret noe tawu na' manu ke' arong iyo?" jie sidoe.
43008023	Pie Yesus manseh nyamong panere. "Deduwan si berasal deri beroh tue; deduwan mat reng deniyo tue nyem. Aku si berasal deri atas nun; noe iyo deri deniyo tue peh.
43008024	Mangko jie ku tadie deduwan langko' mati gei' nangong doso deduwan. Nyoe mat-mátam, deduwanei. Deduwan mat langko' mati gei' nangong doso deduwan, cuwali deduwan pecayo ken aku mat berasal deri serugo, na' po yeng ku padah ke' deduwan tadie," jie Yesus.
43008025	"Ah, kau peh?" jie sidoe. "Noe ken sopai kau tue?" jie. Samut Yesus, "Deri nyomiam nan ku padah ke' deduwan ken sopai aku tue," jie. "Pie go deduwan noe pecayo.
43008026	Kenaken si dah benya' dah bokti yeng diperati ku yeng kei ngenyato hal kesalah deduwan, go deduwan noe pecayo ken aku. 43008027	Pie sidoe noe jelase ken iyo ngomóng ke' hal Apa'e.
43008028	Mangko jie Yesus, "Dah deduwan nganyo' aku Ana' Mensiyo (ke' kayu salip) gi beruam deduwan mat tawu ken sopai aku tue yeng sebenare. Dinyoam deduwan langko' tawu ken aku bekoyo mat noe bediret ku peh. Aku ngat madah po yeng dipadah le' Apa' ku.
43008029	Sen yeng ngutus aku mat nan nyeroto aku; noe Sen ningal ku ming ponyoe peh, go aku nan ngenggewai yeng nyenáng ati Sen," jie Yesus.
43008030	Jedi dah sidoe ningo paner Yesus tadie ponyoe benya' reng Yahudi yeng pecayo ken pengajare.
43008031	Lalu jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Mun kam nan nunoe posan payit aku si," jie, "kam mat murit aku.
43008032	Dah nyoe kam langko' tawu yeng mat yeng benar. Nyoam yeng kei ngelopas kam, gei' kam noe dipeulun."
43008033	Pie samut sidoe, "Kami si," jie, "buboh ampeh Abraham," jie, "noe koloe kami dipeulun sopai pun. Konailah kau na' madah kami ca' dipelopas gei' noe dipeulun?" jie sidoe.
43008034	Samut Yesus, "Ku bepadah ke' kam tue yeng mat-mátam to'," jie, "berang reng bedoso mat ulun doso.
43008035	A, yeng demo ulun pun," jie, "mat layin ken ana' seli degin derah ino' apa'e. Go ulun kin cum behak, noe tentu kelulue di rumah tuwowe. Pi yeng mat ana' seli si renánam, iyo serarat behak di rumahe.
43008036	Pi kam yeng ulun doso mat ulunam, noe iyo ana' seli peh. Mangko kam mat ca' dipelopas le' Ana' Allah, berue kam mat lopas, noam didemo ulun.
43008037	"Ku si," jie Yesus, "tawu ku jum ken kam mat buboh ampeh Abraham. Pie sungoh pun ponyoe kam manseh bearau beamue na' munoh aku. Nyoe pun tam kam ngei' kam nerimoe posan payit ku.
43008038	Diret layin gewai go layin apa'. Aku gewai aku si ngat madah ke' kam yeng mat, yeng ku merati des aku do ken Apa' ku mie," jie. "Pi gewai kam si na' munoh aku, go kam nan ngelaku yeng kam ningo deri apa' kam," jie Yesus.
43008039	"Kami beapa' ke' Kei' Abraham," jie sidoe te'. "Nyoame' akei' kami ye'." "Kira' kam buboh ampeh Kei' Abraham yeng mat si," jie Yesus, "tentu kelaku kam nunoe po tingkah laku Kei' Abraham.
43008040	Pi kam noe, noe kam nunoe kelaku Kei' Abraham peh. Gewai aku si engkas madah ke' kam kebenar yeng ku ningo deri Allah; pie kam manseh na' munoh aku! Noe ken gewai Kei' Abraham tokoh nyoe!
43008041	Pi go kam nunoe gewai apa' diret kamam, noe iyo gewai Kei' Abraham peh," jie Yesus. "Kami noe iyo ana' kampang peh," samut sidoe. "Kami siko' Allaham apa' kami," jie.
43008042	Pie samut Yesus, "Kira' Allah mat Apa' kam si," jie Yesus, "kam mat kaseh ken aku, go aku pun," jie, "detang kitue deri diret Sénam. Nyoam go aku do di deniyo tue. Ku noe detang na' ngewakel diret ku, pi diret Sénam yeng ngutus aku kitue.
43008043	Gopai go kam noe tawu ken reti paner aku?" jie Yesus. "Kam noe tawu," jie, "go kam bolei' ningo posan payit ku.
43008044	Entam kam," jie, "mat engku Pengelakar, apa' kam, mangko kam ayah nunoe kemawo' iyo. Nyoam go kam na' munoh aku ye', tam kam keturun deri apa' kam nyomie. Deri asal muloe pun iyo Pemunoh. Iyo noe koloe bepiya' ke' yeng mat, noe koloe do yeng mat di iyo. Nan cum nyem yeng mat di iyo. Patutam iyo nan memuloe, go demoe pun Pememuloe; iyo mat bungkong pada' pemuloe.
43008045	Kira' aku memuloe si na' kam pecayo, pi entam aku madah ke' kam yeng mat yeng benar nyeh mangko kam noe pecayo, go apa' kam mat Pememuloe.
43008046	Sopai," jie Yesus, "di antaro kam yeng mampu ngogoe kesalah aku?" jie. "Mat cumam. Jedi mun aku noe bedoso, mun aku nan madah yeng mat si gopai go ngei' kam pecayo ken aku?
43008047	Reng yeng beapa' ke' Allah si tentu na'e ningo posan payit Allah, pi go kam si mat noe beapa' ke' Allah peh, mangko keh kam ningo," jie Yesus.
43008048	"Bisei' setan kau!" jie sidoe Yahudi. "Reng Samaria kau!*" jie. "Mat cuco'am ken jie kami nyomie, kau padah kami kesarong setan," jie sidoe.
43008049	Samut Yesus, "Ku," jie, "noe iyo kesarong setan peh," jie. "Kebelike aku mugi Apa' ku die, pi kam menghina aku.
43008050	Aku si noe go aku nyinto na' dihormát peh," jie Yesus, "ja'e diret Allaham yeng ingín gei' aku dihormát. Ge'em Sénam yeng ngendecing kesalah reng gi.
43008051	Mat-mátam," jie Yesus, "yeng ku padah ke' kam tue: sopai ja' yeng tuno' taalo' ke' posan payit aku si reng nyoe mat cum berudu mati," jie Yesus.
43008052	Jie reng Yahudi nyeh, "Ha, dingoam kau ye'! Nyoam boktie," jie, "kami dah tawu dah to' ken kau bisei' setan," jie. "Semalang ke' Kei' Abraham," jie, "ken pada' penijum Allah ge' manseh mati; koti kau madah ken yeng pecayo ken kau cum berudu mati?" jie sidoe.
43008053	"Teruhal Kei' Abraham pun mati dah, pada' penijum pun mati dah, sa'am go kau! Kau lobeh deri desiyan peh? Kau ngangap diret kau sopai si go kau melelobeh deri desiyan?" jie.
43008054	Samut Yesus, "Mun aku mugi diret ku si mat cum nilaie. Ja'e Apa' ku die yeng mugi aku, yeng jie kam Allah kam. Sénam yeng mugi aku ye'!
43008055	Pi kam go noe koloe tekenal ken Allah. Aku si tekenal ku ken Sen. Mun aku madah aku noe tekenal ken Sen si aku memuloe na' po kamam. Pi aku mat tekenal ku ken Sen; posan payit Sen pun nan ku tunoe," jie Yesus.
43008056	"A, pulang ke' Kei' Abraham nyeh," jie, "akei' kam Abraham pun mat ayah bikaham ngaji na' merati kedetang aku; malah ken paie dah diperati sen ye' kedetang aku, mangko mat ayah bikah sen ngajie," jie Yesus.
43008057	Samut sidoe tei', "Eis, kau tue bolum do limo puloh tawun umor kau," jie, "noe ken kau dah betomu ken Kei' Abraham!" jie.
43008058	"Yeng mat si," jie Yesus, "Kei' Abraham bolum diado pun aku serarat nan do dah*," jie.
43008059	Jedi ningo iyo madah direte serarat nan do nyeh sidoe mat diamele betu, na' nikame, mat na' munoheam*. Pie Yesus si nyoli'-nyoli' napo' direte di pada' reng rami nyeh, lalu turun deri rumah kediyam Allah.
43009001	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus ken murite bejelan di kota Yerusalem. Dah nyoe sidoe merati reng lelaki yeng butoe asal.
43009002	Lalu murite betanyoe ke' Yesus. "Guru," jie sidoe, "gopai reng tue butoe? Tam doso direteei, tam doso ino' apa'eei?" jie murite.
43009003	Samut Yesus, "Noe, noe iyo tam doso direte peh, ken noe jum tam doso ino' apa'e," jie Yesus. "Pie tue," jie Yesus, "kelorong kei kuwaso Allah nyato nar di iyo.
43009004	Mangko diret ca' melaju gewai Allah yeng ngutus aku kitue empong gei' do kelorong tue. Siyang ari kin kelorong bekerejo; dah malam," jie, "noe tawu na' bekerejo. Ponyoe jum diret; diret ca' ngelaku gewai Sen empong gei' do kelorong. Dah nyoe gi cum dah kelorong diret.
43009005	Ja'e melamat ku gei' di deniyo tue si aku tue Penampa' deniyo."
43009006	Jedi dah ngomóng ponyoe tei' Yesus pun ngelujah ke' tanah, lalu liyore di tanah diuda'e ken tunyo'e, dah nyoe digulaie ke' mato reng butoe nyeh.
43009007	Dah nyoe "Kau," jie Yesus, "ca' betempungas ke' Kolam Siloam nun." Siloam tei' retie diutus. Jedi mátam. Reng butoe tei' mat manu ke' Kolam Siloam, lalu betempungas. Dah betempungas tei' lalu iyo pulang ken matoe yeng mencináng.
43009008	Jedi dah iyo pulang tei' iyo mat diperati le' pada' reng yeng bejonyang rumah ken iyo, ken pada' reng layin yeng selomo nan merati keidupe minta' duwit go iyo butoe. Lalu jie pada' sidoe nyeh, "Noe peh reng tue yeng selomo nan dudo' di pinger jelan minta' duwit ke' urang?"
43009009	Jie separoe nyeh "Mat iyoame'." Pie jie separoe si, "Noe, tue reng serupo ken iyo." Lalu jie reng yeng bokas butoe nyeh, "Mat akuam to'!"

43009012	"Nyeh konai reng nyoe tei'?" jie sidoe. "Tah beh, ku noe tawu ku jum konai ge' iyo," jie reng bokas butoe nyeh.
43009013	Jedi dah nyoe reng butoe asal tei' dibeyie reng ke' kelompok Parisi.
43009014	Ari Yesus mulah lumpor ken ngembeyi' mato reng butoe nyeh si pas Ari Berenti Kerejo.
43009015	Jedi mátam, reng bokas butoe nyeh mat dibeyie ke' adap reng Parisi, gei' ditanyoe le' sidoe Parisi koti sampai iyo dah mencináng. Jie reng butoe asal nyeh, "Aku mencináng tue," jie, "go do reng ngulai mato ku ken lumpor. Dah ku betempungas tei' mato ku pun mat mencinángam," jie.
43009016	Dah nyoe sidoe Parisi pun beseliseh pemikere ken pado sidoe nyem. Jie separoe tei', "Reng yeng ngembeyi'e noe ken diutus le' Allah, go iyo noe taát ke' pelator ari Saptu," jie. 43009018	Pie sidoe pemimpin reng Yahudi nyeh ngei'e pecayo ken iyo mat butoe lalu ulehe mencináng, cuwali ningo deri ino' apa'e, mangko nyusol ino' apa'e ca' manu kinyoe.
43009019	Jedi dah detang reng tuwoe tei' ditanyoe jum le' reng Parisi. "Nyeh tue ana' kam peh yeng jie kam butoe asal?" jie sidoe. "Lalu mun mat butoe asal," jie sidoe, "koti sampai iyo dah mencináng tue? Mat ana' kamei noei?"
43009020	Samut reng tuwoe nyeh, "Yeng kami tawu si," jie, "tue mat ana' kamiam. Iyo mat butoe asal," jie sidoe.
43009021	"Ja'e kami noe tawu koti caro sampai iyo mencináng tue," jie, "noe tawu jum sopai yeng nyurohe mencináng. Nyoe ca' betanyoe ke' diret iyoame'," jie. "Iyo kin dah bosai, noe iyo ana' biya' peh, tawue madah bedirete, noe sa' kamiam," jie.
43009022	Go ino' apa'e nyamut ponyoe go sidoe gola'e ken pada' pemimpin reng Yahudi. Tam jie pada' pemimpin reng Yahudi nyeh sopai ja' yeng ngangkue Yesus mat Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah si ca' dikeluwar deri agamae, didahe semeyang di rumah kediyam Allah.
43009023	Mangko mat gola'am reng tuwo nyeh, nyoam jie, "Iyo kin dah bosai, tanyoe ja' ke' iyo."
43009024	Jedi mátam, dah nyoe reng Parisi nyeh nyusol ke' reng butoe asal agei'am, nyuroh reng bokas butoe manu ke' sidoe agei'. Dah nyoe jie sidoe nyingka' reng bokas butoe tei', "Kau," jie, "ca' mugi Allaham," jie, "nang na' mugi reng nyoe. Go kami si tawu kami ken reng nyoe reng bedoso," jie. "Mangko kau ca' mugi Allaham," jie.

43009027	Samut reng bokas butoe nyeh, "Ngopai go deduwan betentanyoe agei'? Kin daham ku madahe ke' deduwan, pi deduwan ngei' ningoe," jie. "Nyeh deduwan na' menjedi murit iyo jum peh, go deduwan serarat nan betanyoe ke' aku?" jie reng bokas butoe.
43009028	Ningo panere bungi nyoe tei' godie nar sidoe Parisi, lalu ngereriyau menghina reng butoe nyeh. "Kauame' murit reng nyoe ye'," jie sidoe. "Kami si noe; kami murit Kei' Musa," jie.
43009029	"Kei' Musa si disah le' Allah," jie sidoe, "boktie go Allah ngomóng ken Kei' Musa, madah ukum Sen ke' Kei' Musa mie. Pi reng tue si kami noe tawu kami sopai yeng ngutuse, deri nai hake," jie sidoe ngeolo'-olo' reng bokas butoe nyeh.
43009030	"Wai, nyoe si mat enah nar," jie reng bokas butoe nyeh. "Iyo bekuwaso nyuroh mato ku mencináng, pi deduwan noe tawu ken deri nai hake.
43009031	Teruhal tona' dah tawu ken Allah noe nuntong doa reng bedoso. Pie sopai yeng tuno' taalo' ke' Sen," jie, "sopai yeng na' nunoe kemawo' Sen, nyoam yeng didingo Sen, mangko doae pasti dituntong Sen.
43009032	Engo ku," jie, "deri asal mulo deniyo tue pun tarah ke' noe koloe reng nyuroh reng butoe asal mencináng," jie, "berue reng tuam yeng tawu.
43009033	Mun iyo noe diutus le' Allah si noe ken tawue mulah pai-pai pun," jie reng bokas butoe nyeh.
43009034	Samut pada' reng Parisi, "Panting bedoso kau!" jie. "Sampai butoe asal kau entam kebenya' doso kau bolum kau diado mie pun," jie. "Konai kau na' ngajar kami?" jie. Lalu iyo ditunong le' sidoe deri rumah kediyam Allah, didahe semeyang agei' dinyoe.
43009035	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe kedingo le' Yesus ken reng bokas butoe dah ditunong reng Parisi deri rumah kediyam Allah. Lalu Yesus pun mat ngogoe reng bokas butoe nyeh. Dah betomu tei' jie Yesus nyingka' reng bokas butoe nyeh, "Kau," jie, "pecayo noe ken reng yeng bedemo Ana' Mensiyo?"*
43009036	"Sopailah Ana' Mensiyo nyeh?" jie reng bokas butoe nyeh. "Padaham ke' aku, ku na' ku pecayo ken iyo."
43009037	"Daham kau meratie!" jie Yesus. "Akuam to', yeng ngomóng ken kau tue."
43009038	"Ku pecayo ku, Tuwowei," jie reng nyoe, lalu iyo nungkup nyomah ke' Yesus.
43009039	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Aku detang ke' deniyo tue sempayo nyato ke' hal mensiyo, sopai yeng ca' diukum sopai yeng noe," jie Yesus. "Maksut aku kei pada' reng butoe mencináng," jie, "pi yeng ngangap direte dah mencináng si menjedi butoe die," jie Yesus.
43009040	Jedi do jum reng Parisi yeng soma' iyo dinyoe, yeng ningo panere bungi nyoe. Lalu jie reng Parisi, "Nyeh maksut kau kami tue butoe jum peh?" jie sidoe.
43009041	Samut Yesus, "Kira' kam mat butoe si, doso kam tetap losi," jie Yesus. "Pi tam jie kam kam mencináng, nyoam go doso kam renán, mat noe losi," jie Yesus.
43010001	Jedi jie Yesus, "Dingo beh kam, pemadah ku yeng mat tue," jie. Lalu iyo madah perempamo tue. "Jedi umpamoe do reng na' tamoe ke' pagar domo, pie iyo ngerabing pagare, ngei'e deri lawang. Yeng tokoh nyoe kin na' maling na' ngerampok nyem.
43010002	Pie yeng tamoe niti lawange si mat penungu domo.
43010003	"Jedi sege' detang penungu domo nyeh reng yeng nungu lawang pun na'e ngoba' lawange, kei iyo tamoe. Pada' domo pun tekenale ken bungi suwaro tuwowe. Iyo ngumai pada' domo yeng seli engku direte ken demoe siko'-siko', dah nyoe dibeyie bejelan pamus deri pagar nyeh.
43010004	Dah dibeyie pamus pun iyoam yeng ngulu ngiringe. Na'e domoe ngenjurute, go tekenale ken suwaroe.
43010005	Mun reng bungas si ngei'e pada' domo ngenjurute, kebelike domo nyeh rari, pencar temiyar, go noe tekenale ken suwaro reng bungas," jie Yesus.
43010006	Nyoam perempamo yeng dipadah le' Yesus ke' sidoe, pie sidoe noe tawu ken retie.
43010007	Mangko iyo bepaner agei'am ken sidoe. "Mátam te', yeng ku bepadah ke' kam to'. Aku tuam to' lawange, gei' pada' domo tamoe ke' lem pagare.
43010008	"Benya' die reng yeng detang dolu deri aku, kelakar na' ngingún pada' domo, pi sidoe pemaling perampok nyem, noe iyo penungu domo peh. Pada' domo pun kehe mendulie, ngei'e ningoe.
43010009	"Akuam lawang yeng mat," jie Yesus. "Pada' reng yeng pecayo ken aku mat ditulong, diselamát, keedah domo dilinong sege' tamoe ke' lem pagar. Domo kin bebas tamoe pamus, kei ngulam rumput. Cum kekurange, cum keperelue.
43010010	"Reng maling si detang go na' maling nyem gewaie, na' munoh, na' ngenderako nyem. Do aku si detang kei reng mat nomu keidup yeng mat, sempayo keidupe ayah bikah nyamán senáng.
43010011	"Akuam penungu domo yeng panci. Penungu domo yeng panci nyeh sampai mati pun relo nyo' pada' domoe.
43010012	"Reng yeng makan geji si noe iyo penungu domo peh, mangko iyo noe relo mati nyo' domoe. Iyo semato-mato ngarap gejie nyem. Sege' iyo merati binatang buwas besesubo' manu ke' domoe, iyo rariam; domoe ditingale ming ponyoe. Lalu pada' domo pun jera'e diserang le' binatang gerang, lalu pamar bokar, bis.
43010013	Go reng makan geji kin ngaji upahe nyem, noe tentu menduli ke' domoe, cum itonge kaseh, go domo mat noe engku direte.
43010014	"Pi aku si penungu domo yeng panci," jie Yesus. "Aku tekenal ken pada' domo ku, domo ku pun tekenale ken aku.
43010015	Na' po Apa' ku tekenal ken aku, aku tekenal ken Sen, ponyoe jum aku ken domo ku. Mangko aku pun relo mati kei ngelinong domo ku deri behayo.
43010016	"A, aku," jie Yesus, "domo ku yeng layin pun do jum, pi bolum tamoe ke' pagar domo tue. Ku ca' ngumai domo ku yeng layin jum, nabane kitue; na'e ningo suwaro ku. Dah ningo suwaro ku kin sekaban ken domo yeng do dah ditue, lalu pada' domo pun sepagaram, penungue pun siko'am.
43010017	"Apa' ku," jie Yesus, "mat kaseh ken aku go aku relo mati, nyerah idup diret ku nyo' domo ku. Tuju maksut ku mati pun kei bengki' idup agei'.
43010018	"Cum reng yeng bekuwaso nyabut nyawo ku, pie aku nyerah nyawo ku tam kemawo' diret kuam. Go aku mat bekuwaso nyerahe, ken bekuwaso ngamie agei'. Hak nyoe pun mat deri Apa' ku," jie Yesus.
43010019	Pie pada' reng yeng ningo Yesus tei' beseliseh, noe seati ngaji pemadah Yesus.
43010020	Jie reng benya' nyeh, "Iyo kesarong setan! Gilo! Gopai go kam na' ningoe?"
43010021	Pie jie separoe si, "Noe ken gilo," jie. "Reng kesarong setan," jie, "noe ken tawu ngomóng tokoh nyoe! Sa'am na' nyuroh reng butoe mencináng," jie. Lalu beseliseham pada' reng ngajie, mátei noei pemadah Yesus.
43010022	Jedi lamat belamat dah jengkahe dah to' reng ngalu Ari Raya Pengesah (rumah kediyam Allah) di Yerusalem. Mat munsim colap dah.
43010023	Jedi Yesus tei' peleleser di arong yeng didemo reng Serame' Solomo, yeng ngeliling rumah kediyam Allah.
43010024	Jedi dah nyoe pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi nyeh manu ngeliling Yesus, na' ngomóng. Lalu jie sidoe, "Gei' pai lamat agei' kami ca' acoh ta' acoh potue? Mun kau mat Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah nyeh padaham ke' kami caro terus terang berojang lantas," jie.
43010025	Samut Yesus, "Daham ku madahe ke' kam, pie kam tarah ke' noe pecayo. Pada' keenah keaneh yeng dipulah ku tam kuwaso demo Apa' ku dah madahe dah ke' kam ken sopai aku tue,
43010026	pie kam manseh noe pecayo, go kam noe tekawum ken kaban domo aku.
43010027	Domo aku si mat na'e ningo suwaro ku; aku pun tekenal ken domo diret ku, ken pada' domo ku mat ngenjurut nunoe aku.
43010028	Aku pun ngunyo' keidup yeng cum berudu mati ke' pada' engku diret ku; secum-cumam sidoe losi nayáp seora'-ora'eam. Mat noe tawu reng na' ngerobut ngerampas pada' engku ku deri jeri ku.
43010029	Mat Apa' kuam yeng ngunyo' sidoe ke' aku. Sen pun lobeh bekuwaso deri semuya' segeloe pun, mangko mat noe tawu reng na' ngerobut ngerampas engku ku deri jeri Apa' ku.
43010030	Go aku ken Apa' ku mat siko'am," jie Yesus.
43010031	Ningo panere bungi nyoe tei' pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi nyeh miter betu agei'am, na' nikam Yesus.
43010032	Pie jie Yesus, "Mat dah benya' dah keenah keaneh yeng agong yeng dipulah ku tam kuwaso Apa' ku di adap kam. Nyeh tam keenah keaneh nailah yeng ku pulah mie go kam na' munoh aku?" jie.
43010033	Samut pada' ketuwo nyeh, "Noe go keenah keaneh yeng dipulah kau peh go kami na' nikam kau ken betu nyeh, pie go kau na' ngerobut keagong Allah nyo' diret kauam. Go kau ngat mensiyo nyem, pie madah diret kau Allah," jie sidoe.

43010035	Samut Yesus, "Dingo beh pai jie Kitap Allah yeng noe tawu berubah seora'-ora'eam. Kin kitap ukum kam pun yeng do madah pemadah Allah ke' hal tue. Go nyomie kin pada' reng yeng nerimoe posan payit Sen mat didemo Sen "allah".* Jedi semalang ke' desiyan yeng nerimoe posan payit Sen mie ge'e, didemo Sen "allah",
43010036	sa'am go aku, yeng dipileh Sen, ken diutus Sen ke' deniyo tue. Konai kam na' madah aku ngerobut keagong Allah go jie aku aku Ana' Allah?" jie Yesus.
43010037	"(Pie yeng mat si aku mat diutus Sénam.) Mun aku noe ngenggewai gewai Apa' ku si kam mat noe sa' kam pecayoam.
43010038	Pi mun aku mat do ngenggewai gewai Apa' ku si kam mat ca' pecayo tam bokti keenah keaneh yeng diperati kam, numo' pun umpamoe kam noe pecayo ken omóng aku. Pie mun kam pecayo entam bokti keenah keaneh nyem pun mangko kam mat langko' tawu, langko' yakinam lem ati kam nun, ken aku ken Apa' ku mat siko'am," jie Yesus.
43010039	Ningo iyo bungi nyoe tei' sidoe nerai agei'am na' nangkape, pie tarah ke' noe tetangkape le' sidoe.
43010040	Dah nyoe Yesus pulang agei' ke' arong kememerue bokas Yohanes nyolam reng nyomie, di seborang Sungai Yordan. Iyo mokap dinyoam,
43010041	dah nyoe benya' reng manu na' ningo, na' merati iyo dinyoe. Lalu jie sidoe, "Mat die ke' hal Yohanes mie; mat noe koloe mulah keenah keaneh pai pun," jie. "Pie semuya'-muya'e yeng dipadahe mie ke' hal reng tue si mat-mátam," jie reng rami nyeh.
43010042	Mangko di arong nyoe mat benya' reng yeng pecayo ken Yesus.
43011001	Jedi do reng lelaki demo Lasarus yeng saki'. Iyo tei' diyam di kampong Betania di peloya' Yudea ken menyadie betinoe duwo ko', Maria ken Marta.
43011002	Maria tei' urang yeng nungang binya' mur yeng berogo ke' kaki Yesus Tuwowe, dah nyoe iyo ngesate ken buwo' direte. Jedi mátam. Lasarus menyadie Maria tei' lelah saki',
43011003	lalu menyadie yeng duwo ko' nyeh beposan ke' Tuwowe, madahe ken kabane Lasarus yeng gelumo mansa'e saki'.
43011004	Ja'e dah ningo agah nyoe jie Yesus, "Penyaki'e ujonge noe nyo' meyie nyawoe," jie, "pie kebelike cagar kei reng merati keagong Allah. Pengabise aku, Ana' Allah, diagong reng ketegal penyaki' Lasarus," jie Yesus.
43011005	Lalu iyo pun bolum manu ke' Lasarus. Yesus si mat kaseh ken sidoe tigo ko', Marta, Maria ken Lasarus.
43011006	Ja'e sungoh pun kaseh pi iyo bolum manu kinyoe, gei' duwo ari agei' diyam di arong jewoh tue.
43011007	Jedi dah duwo ari ponyoe dah nyoe Yesus ngaja' pada' murite, "Yo'," jie, "diret bebeli' agei' ke' Yudea."
43011008	Pie pada' murite tei' na' nonga'e, go sidoe ngaji ke' hal yeng berue tejedi di nun. "Guru," jie sidoe, "ngopai go kau na' bebeli' kinun? Noe peh gei' beru nar do tejedi dinun, pada' pemimpin reng Yahudi* dinun na' munoh kau, na' nikam kau ken betu," jie. "Nyo' pai kau na' bebeli' kinun?"
43011009	Ja'e Yesus nyamute ken perempamo. "Siyang ari," jie, "tampa'e duwo belas jam, mat noe?" jie nyingka' betore. "Jedi yeng bejelan siyang ari langko' noe tesongka', tam penampa' deniyo do kei iyo bejelan.
43011010	Pie yeng bejelan malam ari si tentu tesongka', go sagam, cum penampa'e."
43011011	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Kaban diret Lasarus nyeh dah tidor dah," jie. "Ku na' kinun, na' ngenggora'e," jie.
43011012	Samut murite, "Sukoram mun iyo tidor, Tuwowei," jie, "kin maksute dah na' beyi' penyaki'e."
43011013	Yesus tei' yeng dipadahe tidor nyeh mati, pie kaji sidoe tidor po selomoam.
43011014	Mangko dipadahe terus terang. "Lasarus tei'," jie, "dah mati dah."
43011015	"Ku," jie, "kebosai ku ngaji kam, mangko so ku untong go aku noe dinun des iyo mati. Go tue tejedi pun gei' kepecayo kam mansang. Yo'am diret kinun, manu ke' arong iyo," jie Yesus.
43011016	Jedi do siko' murite demo Tomas, yeng digelar reng Komar, yeng gei' ngaji omóng sidoe tadie ke' hal behayo di Yudea. Jedi ngaso Yesus manseh na' ke' Yudea nyeh dah nyoe jie Tomas nyingka' betore yeng semurit, "Yo' diret kinun jum, gola' iyo dibunoh reng," jie, "diret dibunoh jum, namahe mati jum," jie.
43011017	Jedi mátam, dah nyoe turunam sidoe bejelan, manu ke' kampong Betania. Detang kinun poe bengkai Lasarus tei' dah empat ari dah lem tama'e di guwo.
43011018	Kampong Betania soma'am ken kota Yerusalem, benso tigo pal ke' deng nyoe penjewohe.
43011019	Mangko pada' reng Yahudi deri Yerusalem pun rami jum manu ke' Marta ken Maria, nyo' ngelimu ngibor ati sidoe go menyadie nyeh mati.
43011020	Jedi mátam. Yesus pun dah detang ke' kampong Betania. Jedi dah Marta ningo agah Yesus dah detang tei' iyo pun pamus na' betomu ken Yesus, pie Maria gei' dudo' lem rumahe, berato berayi.
43011021	Jedi dah betomu ken Yesus tei' dah nyoe jie Marta, "Tuwowe," jie, "kira' kau do ditue si tentu menyadie ku noe mati," jie.
43011022	"Tue pun," jie, "bolum telampoh, go ku tawu ku ken kau sal ge' kau minta' pai-pai pun ke' Apa' kau pasti dituntong," jie.
43011023	Samut Yesus, "Menyadie kau langko' bengki' idup agei'am."
43011024	"Tentuam," jie Marta, "aku tawu ku ken iyo pasti bengki' idup agei' beroto ken reng layin sege' Ari Pengudah deniyo tue gi," jie.
43011025	-
43011026	Ja'e jie Yesus, "Akuame' yeng nyuroh mensiyo yeng mati bengki' idup. Numo' iyo mati pie iyo manseh bengki' idup agei' mun iyo pecayo ken aku. Akuame'," jie Yesus, "yeng ngunyo' reng idup beru. Reng yeng pecayo ken aku, yeng buleh idup beru, mat cum berudu mati, pie idup seora'-ora'eam. Pecayo noe kau ken pemadah ku tue?" jie Yesus.
43011027	"Mátam, ku pecayo ku, Tuwowei," jie Marta. "Ku pecayo ken kau mat Kristus, Ana' Allah, penulong yeng dijenyi Allah na' detang ke' deniyo," jie.
43011028	Dah nyoe Marta pun bebeli' ke' rumahe madah adei'e Maria. Iyo beawum-awum, "Guru dah detang dah," jie. "Do iyo nanyoe kau."
43011029	Ningo paner bungi nyoe tei' Maria pun lintus bengki' begegebar manu ke' Yesus.
43011030	Yesus tei' go gei' bolum tamoe ke' kampong Betania, gei' di luwar nun arong iyo ngomóng ken Marta tadie ponyoe.
43011031	Jedi Maria mat bengki', pamus deri rumahe. Lalu pada' reng rami yeng namahe ngelimue nyeh tei' pamus jum, ngenjurute, entam kaji sidoe Maria nyeh na' nangis di tama' menyadie nyeh.
43011032	Ja'e Maria manu ke' Yesus die, dah merati Yesus tei' lalu iyo belutut di adape. "O Tuwowe," jie, "kira' kau do ditue tentu noe mati menyadie ku," jie.
43011033	Lalu Yesus pun paling susah pengajie, sampai mukoe berubah cayoe; mat kaseham merati Maria ken pada' tamahe reng Yahudi yeng berato ken Lasarus mati.
43011034	Dah nyoe iyo betanyoe. "Dinai tama'e?" jie Yesus. Samut sidoe, "Yo'am, Tuwowe, na' meratie pun," jie.
43011035	Dah nyoe Yesus pun kisap nangis.
43011036	Lalu jie reng yeng meratie tei', "Mmm deh," jie, "mat kasehe nar ken Lasarus."
43011037	Pie jie sidoe separoe nyeh, "Mun iyo kaseh si," jie, "gopai go Lasarus noe dipebeyi'e? Semalang ke' reng butoe nyeh disurohe mencináng, pie konoe ke' Lasarus noe dipebeyi'e," jie sidoe.
43011038	Dah nyoe Yesus sidoe mat manu ke' tama' Lasarus. Tama'e tei' di guwo, ditudong ken betu bosai. Jedi dah detang kinun ponyoe agei'am ati Yesus, mat paling susah pengajie sampai mukoe berubah cayoe.
43011039	Jedi jie Yesus, "Gensetam betu tudong tama' nyeh," jie. Pie Marta menyadie reng mati nyeh na' nonga'e. "Dah buntau dah, Tuwowei, go dah empat ari dah iyo mati," jie Marta.
43011040	Pie samut Yesus, "Daham ku madah ke' kau, go mun kau pecayo kau cagar merati keagong Allah," jie.
43011041	Mangko mat digenset reng betu tudong nyeh te'. Dah nyoe Yesus nengkadah ke' atas, lalu ngomóng ken Apa'e. "Pa'," jie. "Aku," jie, "mat beterimoe kaseh ke' Den tam Den dah ningo aku; doa ku dah dituntong Den dah.
43011042	Ku si mat tawu ku ken Den nan serarat ningo aku. Pi aku bepaner bungi tue pun go ngaji reng rami tue, gola' sidoe na'e pecayo ken Den yeng ngutus aku kitue, des sidoe merati Den nuntong doa ku," jie Yesus.
43011043	Dah bedoa beterimoe kaseh ke' apa'e dah nyoe iyo mangkas ontap nyapo Lasarus. "Lasarus," jie, "pamusam kau!"
43011044	Temosie bengki'am reng mati nyeh, lalu pamus deri guwo. Kaki ken jerie gei' bekobat ken kayin kapan; mukoe gei' tetudong jemulaue. Lalu jie Yesus nyingka' reng rami nyeh, "Kerama'am pengobat kaki jerie, gei' iyo bejelan," jie Yesus.
43011045	Jedi benya' reng Yahudi yeng manu ngelimu Maria tei' mat pecayo ken Yesus, dah merati gewaie te'.
43011046	Pi do jum deri sidoe yeng manu ke' reng kelompok Parisi, lalu ngelapor gewai Yesus.
43011047	Dah nyoe sidoe deri kelompok Parisi ken pada' ketuwo pelayan di rumah kediyam Allah nyeh beposan bekumpol pado sidoe pemimpin kei bepempaham. Dah bekumpol tei' mat bepempaham pado sidoe, ngomóng ke' hal gewai Yesus. "Tau beh," jie sidoe. "Paling benya' keenah keaneh yeng dipulah reng nyoe te', sedang diret tue cum begegiyo nonga'e," jie.
43011048	"Mun pada' rayate ngenjurut iyo si, kotilah ken pemerentah Roma, pasti nyuroh serededue mempungah deri kampong halamán sampai ke' rumah kediyam Allah jum gi," jie.
43011049	Jedi siko' di antaro sidoe yeng bepempaham dinyoe demoe Kayapas. Kayapas pelayan agong reng Yahudi tawun nyoe. Jedi jie Kayapas nyingka' sidoe tei', "Kam budu nar!" jie.
43011050	"Coh ge' reng siko' ja' yeng mati kei ngenti reng rami, deripado pada' reng Yahudi tue mati bisam," jie. "Coham siko' iyo yeng mati," jie Kayapas.
43011051	Kenaken si iyo bepaner bungi nyoe pun noe iyo entam pengaji direte peh. Pie go iyo kei pelayan agong tawun nyoe, mangko Allah ngelalu iyo betijum ponyoe, nijum ke' hal Yesus langko' mati kei reng Yahudi.
43011052	Malah ken paie noe iyo ento' reng Yahudi bangam peh, pie iyo mati gei' pada' ana' Allah dinai-nai pun cagar sebeyo sebenan.
43011053	Jedi mátam, dah Kayapas bepaner bungi nyoe si pada' pemimpin agama Yahudi pun mat setuju, lalu betongai ari nyoe sidoe bearau na' munoh Yesus.
43011054	Mangko Yesus pun dah noe bebas bejelan di Yudea. Lalu iyo ningal arong nyoe, bejelan ke' kampong Epraim di peloya' soma' padang puwang, diyam dinyoe ken murite.
43011055	Nyoe pun nyoma' dam jengkah Ari Raya Ngelalu. Jedi deri pada' kampong jewoh pun mat rami reng detang ke' kota Yerusalem. Gei' jewoh ari sidoe rami manu ke' kota Yerusalem go na' ngerinah adat nyuci ngembereseh direte lo'e, bolum ngalu Ari Raya Ngelalu nyeh.
43011056	Jedi detang kinun belo reng rami nyeh nan bekumpol di rumah kediyam Allah. Sidoe betentanyoe ke' betore, "Nyeh koti kengkaji kam? Ngadap noe nin Yesus des Ari Raya Ngelalu nyeh, engoe?"
43011057	Go pada' guru agama Parisi ken pada' ketuwo pelayan Allah kin dah beposan ke' reng rami nyeh, mun do sidoe tawu ken dinai Yesus tei', jie, ca' dilapor ke' pada' pemimpin, kei sidoe nangkape. Nyoam go kaji reng rami nyeh do noei Yesus ngadap Ari Raya Ngelalu di Yerusalem.
43012001	Jedi gei' nam ari agei' manu ke' Ari Raya Ngelalu. Lalu Yesus ke' kampong Betania. Betania tei' kampong Lasarus yeng dibengki' idup agei' le' Yesus nyomie.
43012002	Jedi detang ke' Betania tei' reng rami makan bepesta ento' nyamut ngalu Yesus. Marta tei' ngeleladen; Lasarus tei' dudo' makan ken Yesus sidoe.
43012003	Jedi mátam. Kebonóng sidoe makan tei' diamie le' Maria binya' ancit* setengah liter. Binya'e tei' mat murni; mahalam rogoe. Jedi mat diamie le' Maria, lalu ditungange ke' kaki Yesus, dah nyoe dikesate ken buwo'e. Mat arum bedenangam bewue.
43012004	Pie Yudas Iskariot si begunau entam mantau Maria makai binya' ponyoe. Iyo mat murit Yesus jum, pie yeng pengabise nyerahe ke' munsohe.
43012005	Jedi jie Yudas, "Gopai nin beh," jie, "go binya' nyoe dipakai noe menentu ponyoe, rugi modasam?" jie. "Boh mun dijuwal; benya' ye' duwite ye'; do sampai tigo ratus bingkap duwit perak," jie Yudas. "Kira' dijuwal kin duwite kei diunyo' ke' reng yeng bensat," jie.
43012006	Ja'e Yudas ngomóng bungi nyoe pun noe go iyo kaseh ken reng bensat peh, pie mun binya' nyeh dijuwal, duwite ditaroh nyo' sego direteam, go iyo mat pemaling. Pada' uwang kas Yesus sidoe dipigang iyoam, lalu mat nan disego le' iyo nyem. Mangko iyo nyacue Maria go iyo makai binya' yeng mahal nyeh.
43012007	Pie samut Yesus, "Noe sa' dicacue, beh," jie. "Go iyo makai binya'e potue pun go ngaji ken aku na' dipasar gi.
43012008	A, ke' hal nulong reng bensat si nyoe panci jum. Ja'e go nan do kelorong kam nyo' nulonge, go pada' reng bensat kin nan do di antaro kam. Pi aku si noe, aku tue noe dam lamat na' ningal kam," jie Yesus.
43012009	Jedi dah nyoe pada' reng Yahudi ningo agah Yesus do di kampong Betania, lalu pada' reng rami manu jum kinun. Sidoe ingín na' merati Yesus ge'em, na' merati Lasarus ge'em, go iyo disuroh bengki' idup le' Yesus.
43012010	Jedi pengabise pada' ketuwo pelayan Allah si bearau beamue na' munoh Lasarus jum,
43012011	go tam Lasarus bengki' idup agei' nyeh benya' reng Yahudi pecayo ken Yesus, lalu sampai kelupoe ngaji pemimpin agama nyeh.
43012012	Jedi dah ari sebuwahe tei' mátam. Pada' reng Yahudi kin dah bererami bekumpol di kota Yerusalem ento' ngalu pesta Ari Raya Ngelalu. Jedi dah nyoe sidoe ningo agah ken Yesus mat na' detang ke' Yerusalem.
43012013	Lalu dipancong le' sidoe pada' dewun kayu yeng bekelopah, nyo' sidoe nyamut ngalu kedetang Yesus, dah nyoe sidoe rami turun ngalu Yesus samel besesura' mugi Allah. "Tepugiam Allah!" jie. "Tuam to' reng yeng detang atas demo Tuwowe diret! Detang dah! Mat Sénam yeng ngendolat ngemberekate," jie. "Mat iyoam to' rajo reng Israel tue!" jie pada' reng rami besesura' mugi Yesus.
43012014	Dah nyoe Yesus ngelaju pejelane numpang nayi' keledai yeng gei' mudoe, na' po ditulis di lem Kitap Allah mie yeng bungie potue,
43012015	Nang gola', reng di kota Sion! Tau beh, rajo kam dah detang dah, na' nulong kam. Iyo bejelan pakai ana' keledai, jie Kitap Sen. (Yes 40:9 / Sak 9:9)
43012016	Ketiko nyoe tejedi si pada' murite gei' bolum tawue ken retie. Pie dah Yesus bebeli' ke' serugo agong nun dah nyoe murite pun mat jelase ken tijum nyoe yeng ditulis lem Kitap Allah nyomie nyeh mat ke' hal Yesusam, a, ken gewai pada' murite ponyoe ari nyoe pun mat nuntong Kitap Sen jum.
43012017	-
43012018	A, nyuroh pada' reng rami ngalu nyamut iyo ari nyoe pun tam sidoe dah ningo agah awohe ke' hal petanah petano yeng dipulahe kemayie ponyoe. Go pada' reng yeng do des Yesus nyapo Lasarus deri tama'e ken nyurohe bengki' idup agei' kin teger ngagah ngawohe.
43012019	Sampai jie pada' reng Parisi nyingka' betore, "Ah, kin, kalaham diret mun reng nyoe dipelebu nyem. Perati beh, seruroh deniyo dah bederum bejejiyoh ngenjurut iyo!" jie.
43012020	Jedi mátam te'. Di antaro pada' reng yeng ngalu ari raya di Yerusalem nyeh do jum beberopai ko' reng Yunani.
43012021	Jedi dah nyoe sidoe Yunani manu ke' Pilipus. Pilipus tei' asale deri kampong Betsaida, di peloya' Galilea. Jedi jie sidoe nyingka' Pilipus, "Minta' tulong den ge'," jie. "Kami ingín na' betomu ken Yesus," jie.
43012022	Jedi ningo omóng sidoe tei' Pilipus pun manu madahe ke' Andreas, dah nyoe Andreas ken Pilipus madahe ke' Yesus.
43012023	Jedi samut Yesus tei', "Tue dah jengkahe dah nyo' aku Ana' Mensiyo diagong Allah. Pie noe iyo caro yeng dikaji kam peh.
43012024	Tue mat-mátam, kamei, yeng ca' dirudu aku nyeh. Ibarat ke' igei' genum din mun na' popah merejeyo kin ca' ditanám; mun dipongki' diperintu di lem bedah kin noe ken belantang; gola' sigie tetap sigie nyem. Mun mat ditanám si igei'e seolah-olahe mati; kerubonge buro', loloe. Pie mat ca' ponyoam, berue iyo mopah merejeyo, sampai bebuwah, benya' asele.
43012025	Jedi ponyoe jum ke' hal keidup diret. Berang reng yeng nan mongki' merintu keidupe di deniyo tue si pengabise losi nayápam. Pie berang reng yeng noe mongki' merintu keidupe di deniyo tue tarah ke' tetomu ke' idup yeng mat, yeng cum berudu mati.
43012026	Maksute sopai pun yeng na' melayan aku mat ca' nunoe tingkah laku aku. Lalu dinai kediyam aku dinyoam kediyam pada' pelayan ku. Apa' ku pun langko' ngagong reng yeng melayan aku," jie Yesus.
43012027	"(Tue dah jengkahe dah, kamei, nyo' aku ditanám na' po igei' genum tadie.) Mat susah sontokam ati ku ngajie. Ca' koti ge' aku tue? Ca' minta' ke' Apa' ku peh gei' aku dikiyas deri kesensare tue gi? Pie noe, go tuju ku detang ke' deniyo tue pun gei' aku mat ca' ngerudu kesensare tue," jie Yesus.
43012028	Lalu jie Yesus bedoa ke' Apa'e, "Pa'," jie, "kiroe Den nganyoe keagong demo Den," jie. Dah nyoe do suwaro yeng bebungi deri serugo, "Mat daham Aku nganyoe keagong demo Ku, ken Ku manseh langko' nganyoe keagong Ku agei'am," jie Sen.
43012029	Pada' reng rami yeng do dinyoe mat ningo jum bungi suwaro nyeh te'. Pie jie sidoe tei' bungi gontu nyem. A, ken do jum jie separo sidoe tei' do melekat yeng ngomóng ken Yesus.
43012030	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Suwaro nyoe tei' noe iyo ngat nyo' kedingo aku bangam peh. Aku si go nan ningo Sen nyem. Nyoe bebungi gei' kedingo le' kam jum.
43012031	"Go tue," jie Yesus, "dah jengkahe dah deniyo tue didecing kesalahe, ken yeng mangkue meloh deniyo tue pun mat langko' ditunongam.
43012032	Pi aku, dah ku dianyo' deri deniyo tue si aku langko' nari' ati semuya' mensiyo ke' aku," jie.
43012033	Bungi panere dianyo' tei' mat betijum ke' hal koti caro iyo langko' mati disalip nyeh.
43012034	Dah nyoe jie pada' reng rami nyeh, "Pie kami dah ningo deri Kitap Ukum Allah ken Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi Sen nyeh, mat ca' renán ditue seora'-ora'eam. Konai kau na' madah ken Ana' Mensiyo nyeh ca' dianyo'? Sopai máte yeng dipadah kau Ana' Mensiyo nyeh tei'?" jie sidoe.
43012035	Pie Yesus nyamute noe pakai caro berojang lantas. "Tingal sikit dam kelorong nyo' tampa' nyeh manyah ke' kam," jie Yesus. "Ibarat ke' bejelan din ca' disanto'am pejelan kam empong tampa' nyeh gei' do di arong kam, gola' kam begegap kaloe. Go yeng bejelan des sagam kin mat noe tawu konailah penujue.
43012036	Pecayoam ken tampa' nyeh telanyor tampa' nyeh gei' do di antaro kam, kamei, gei' kam pun kei tampa' po aku," jie Yesus. Jedi dah santo' omónge bungi nyoe tei' Yesus pun ningal sidoe, mokap di arong sunyei' die gei' noe tomu reng rami.
43012037	Jedi mátam te'. Numo' pun memenya' nyoe petanah petano yeng dipulah Yesus di adap muko rerayi pada' reng Yahudi nyeh pie sidoe manseh ngei'e pecayo ken iyo.
43012038	Nyoe tejedi pun nyo' nuntong pemadah penijum Yesaya nyomie yeng bungie potue, Tuwowe, kuwaso Den mat dah nyato dah. Numo' pun ponyoe pie siko' pun cum reng yeng pecayo ken agah Den yeng dah dipadah le' kami, jie Yesaya. (Yesaya 53:1)
43012039	Jedi entam sidoe ngei'e pecayo mangko pengabise mat noe mampu go atie disuroh Sen koring, na' po yeng dipadah le' Yesaya di lem tijume yeng layin. Jie tijume tei',
43012040	Mato sidoe suroh Ku butoe; ken ati sidoe suroh Ku koring. Maksute gei' mato sidoe noe awas, ken ati sidoe noe tetangkape ke' retie, ken sidoe noam bebeta' piker. Kira' sidoe bebeta' piker si Aku mat nulong membeyi'e, jie Allah ngelalu tijum Yesaya. (Yesaya 6:10)
43012041	Bungi tijum Yesaya tokoh nyoe pun go sen mat merati keagong Yesus nyomie jum, mangko sen mat madah ke' hal Yesus lem tijum sen.
43012042	Ja'e numo' pun kebenya' reng Yahudi noe pecayo nyeh pie manseh benya' jum deri ketuwo reng Yahudi pun, yeng pecayo ken iyo. Pie sidoe ngei'e ngangkue kepecayoe, entam sidoe gola' ken pada' reng kelompok Parisi; gola' sidoe dikeluware deri agamae, didahe semeyang di rumah kediyam Allah.
43012043	Tam sidoe mementing na' diterimoe dipugi le' betor, deri pado diterimoe dipugi le' Allah.
43012044	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' reng rami nyeh, "Reng yeng pecayo ken aku maksute noe iyo ngat pecayo ken aku bangam peh, pie pecayo jum ken Sen yeng ngutus ku kitue.
43012045	Ponyoe jum ke' hal reng yeng merati aku: sopai ja' yeng merati aku maksute iyo dah merati Sen jum yeng ngutus ku kitue.
43012046	Aku detang ke' deniyo tue pun kei Tampa' semuya' segeno mensiyo. Maksut ku gei' semuya' reng yeng pecayo ken aku noam renán di sagam.
43012047	"A, ke' hal reng yeng ningo posan payit aku pie ngei'e tuno' taalo' si kesalah sidoe pasti didecing. Pie noe iyo aku peh yeng ngendecing kesalahe. Go aku detang ke' deniyo tue pun noe iyo nyo' ngendecing kesalah reng peh, pie nyo' nulong nyelamáte.
43012048	Do die yeng dipakai nyo' ngendecing kesalah reng yeng ngei'e ken aku, yeng bolei'e ningo posan ku, ya'am posan payit yeng dah ku padah ke' sidoe. Nyoame' yeng ngembokti ken sidoe mat patut diukum Allah dah Ari Pengudah gi.
43012049	Go yeng ku padah ke' kam noe iyo kengkarang diret ku peh; malah ken paie semuya' segelo yeng ku padah ke' kam, mat ditetap le' Apa' kuam, yeng ngutus ku ke' kam. Deri isei' pemadah Sen sampai ke' caro ku madahe pun mat deri Sénam jum.
43012050	Aku pun tawu ken perentah Apa' ku yeng ku padah mat nyuroh reng idup seora'-ora'eam, mangko ku pun mat penting nan madahe nyem, pas po yeng disuroh le' Sen," jie Yesus.
43013001	Jedi mátam. Noe dam lamat jengkahe na' Ari Raya Ngelalu nyeh. Yesus pun dah tawu ken tue dah jengkahe dah nyo' iyo ningal deniyo tue nyo' pulang ke' Apa'e. Iyo si go nan kaseh nyem ken pada' engku direte di deniyo tue; tue pun iyo mat nganyoe keabis kebosai kasehe ken sidoe.
43013002	Jedi mátam, Yesus sidoe mat makan pesta nyamut Ari Raya Ngelalu nyeh. Pengelakar si dah nyuroh Yudas Iskariot, ana' Simon, gei' iyo na'e nyerah Yesus ke' belo pemimpin agama. Iyo tingal ngogoe keloronge dam.
43013003	Pie Yesus si tawue ken iyoam yeng dikuwaso le' Apa'e gei' mangkue meloh semuya' segeloe. Iyo tawu ken Allah yeng ngutuse ke' deniyo tue, ken iyo langko' pulang ke' Apa'e.
43013004	Jedi dah makan tei' Yesus bediri, lalu dipucele beju luware, dah nyoe dijepaie anok, dibesa'e ke' pungonge na' po besa' ulun.
43013005	Jedi dah nyoe diamele ayie, dipantinge ke' lem delong. Dah dipantinge ke' lem delong tei' iyo meso' kaki belo murite rato-rato, lalu dikesate ken anok di pungonge.
43013006	Pie dah jengkah ke' Simon Petrus si Simon Petrus ngidahe meso' kakie. "Tuwowe," jie Simon, "noe patut kau meso' kaki aku!"
43013007	Samut Yesus, "Gei' tue si kau mat bolum tawu ken reti ku na' meso' kaki kau, pi dah nyoe gi tawu kau," jie Yesus.
43013008	"Ku mat didah ku kali kau na' meso' kaki aku," jie Petrus. Pie samut Yesus, "Mun ku noe meso' kaki kau," jie, "maksute kau noe segelumo ken aku," jie.
43013009	Jedi ngaso bungi nyoe tei' samut Petrus, "Mun ponyoe," jie, "sa' beh kaki ku, jeri ken kepalo ku pun dibeso' jum, Tuwowei," jie Petrus.
43013010	Pie samut Yesus, "Noe sa'am," jie. "Go perbeninge," jie, "na' po keedah reng yeng dah manei' dah nyoe detang ke' lem rumah. Kin noe ca' bebeso' agei', cuwali kakie; go dah manei' tadie kin tubohe dah bereseh dah," jie. "Semuya' kam pun," jie Yesus, "dah panci bereseh ati kam," jie, "cuwali siko'."
43013011	Go Yesus kin tawu ken Yudas na' nyerahe kaloe ponyoe, nyoam go jie do siko' yeng atie noe panci bereseh.
43013012	Jedi dah Yesus meso' kaki pada' murite tei' lalu disaro'e agei' bejue, lalu pulang dudo' ke' bokase tadie. Dah nyoe iyo betanyoe ke' murite. "Kam tawu noe," jie, "ken reti gewai ku tadie?".
43013013	"Kam kin madah aku guru kam ken tuwowe kam," jie. "Nyoe pun patutam, go aku mat guru kam; aku mat tuwowe kam.
43013014	"Jedi semalang ke' guru ken tuwowe kam ge' meso' kaki kam, sa'am go kam," jie. "Ponyoe jum kam, ca' noe meningie diret kam, pie ca' merenah diret kam, sampai meso' kaki betor kam jum.
43013015	"Nyoam go aku," jie, "ngemborie contoh ke' kam, gei' kam nunoe gewai aku," jie.
43013016	"Mat-mátam aku madah ke' kam," jie Yesus. "Kam kin noe iyo lobeh deri aku. Go kam kin pelayan, aku tuwowe. Kam diutus, aku yeng ngutus. Jedi patutam kam nunoe gewai aku.
43013017	"A, tue si kam dah mat tawu ken maksut pemadah ku tue," jie. "Kam mat ayah bikaham mun kam makaie," jie.
43013018	"Ja'e noe iyo semuya' kam peh yeng jie ku cagar ayah bikah; siko' si tentu noam ayah bikah. Go ku tawu ku ken ati semuya' kam yeng ku pileh. Ja'e go ku mileh yeng siko' nyeh pun," jie, "gei' tijum lem Kitap Allah dituntong. Go jie lem Kitap Sen mie, Reng yeng nan makan ken aku menjedi munsoh aku. (Masmur 41:9)
43013019	"Tue si," jie Yesus, "mat bolum tejedi," jie. "Ja'e ku madahe lo'e ke' kam. Maksut ku mun pemadah ku tue dah dituntong gi kam pun pecayo ken aku mat urang yeng dijenyi Allah na' detang.*
43013020	"(Numo' pun do siko' yeng berayan pie kam si tetap to' pelantar posan aku.) Mangko sopai ja' yeng nerimoe reng yeng diutus le' aku, maksute iyo mat nerimoe akuam jum; ken sopai ja' yeng nerimoe aku iyo mat nerimoe Sen jum yeng ngutus ku kitue. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei.," jie.
43013021	Jedi dah nyoe mat susaham ati Yesus. Lalu bepadah terus terang ke' sidoe, "Mat siko' deri antaro kam," jie, "yeng langko' nyerah aku ke' munsoh ku," jie.
43013022	Bemangam belo murite, samo merati ke' betore. Yesus tei' nyingka' sopai, kaji sidoe nun.
43013023	Jedi do siko' murite yeng begelumo mansa' ken Yesus. Iyo bejonyang makan ken Yesus dinyoe.
43013024	Jedi dah nyoe Simon Petrus morie sarat ke' murit nyoe, yeng begelumo mansa' ken Yesus, nyurohe betanyoe ke' Yesus ken sopai yeng langko' nyerahe.
43013025	Lalu murite yeng siko' tei' ngelungkui ke' Yesus, lalu betanyoe, "Sopai nin beh, Tuwowe, yeng langko' na' nyerah kau?"
43013026	Jedi "Pantauam kaloe," jie Yesus. "Roti tue ku celup ke' lem mangkok; jedi sopai ja' yeng ku unyo' ken roti tue kaloe," jie, "nyoam yeng cagar nyerah aku," jie. Jedi dah nyoe mat dicelupe roti ke' lem mangkok nyeh, lalu diunyo'e ke' Yudas Iskariot.
43013027	Tumas dah diterimoe le' Yudas roti nyeh tei' iyo pun disarong le' Pengelakar. Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' Yudas, "Copatam! Pelajuam gewai kau."
43013028	Pie siko' pun cum murite yeng makan di nyoe yeng tawu ken reti posan Yesus ken Yudas.
43013029	Kaji sidoe gola' ke' Yesus nyuroh Yudas bebelenyo moli jolu nyo' sidoe ngalu pesta, atau pun gola' disurohe nyumang duwit ke' reng bensatei, paiei. Go Yudas kin pemigang duwit sidoe, uwang kase. Jedi tarah ke' noe tawu sidoe sebelas nyeh ken maksut omóng Yesus ke' Yudas.
43013030	Jedi mátam. Yudas mat nerimoe roti nyeh deri Yesus, lintus iyo pun pamus turun. Ari pun dah malam dah.
43013031	Jedi mátam. Ngaso Yudas dah turun ningal sidoe tei' mangko jie Yesus, "Tue dah jengkahe dah nyo' aku Ana' Mensiyo diagong. Allah pun diagong jum tam aku.
43013032	A, mun Sen diagong tam aku kin maksute aku langko' diagong Sen jum, tam kona' diret Sénam. Tuam to' jengkahe nyo' Sen ngagong aku, kamei," jie.
43013033	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Dingoam kam ana' ku," jie nyingka' murite. "Sebentar tue," jie, "aku ca' ningal kam lo'e. Dah nyoe numo' pun kam ngogoe aku, pie noe tawu kam na' ngenjurut aku kinyoe. Daham ku madahe ke' pada' pemimpin diret Yahudi mie; tue ku madahe ke' kam jum.
43013034	"Tue ku madah perentah beru ke' kam, ya'am kam ca' kaseh mengaseh ken betor kam. Na' po aku ngaseh kam, ponyoe jum kam ca' kaseh mengaseh ken betor.
43013035	"Go mun kam kaseh mengaseh ken betor, mangko nyato, kei semuya' reng tawu, ken kam mat murit aku," jie Yesus.
43013036	Jedi dah nyoe Simon Petrus betanyoe ke' Yesus. "Na' konai kau, Tuwowe," jie. Samut Yesus, "Ku nuju ke' arong yeng noe tawu dipanu le' kam tengkalo tue. Pie dah nyoe gi si kam langko' manu kinun jum," jie.
43013037	Pie jie Petrus, "Ngopai go kau ngidah ku ngenjurut kau tuam, Tuwowei? Ku relo ku sampai mati pun nyo' kau," jie Petrus.
43013038	"Mat relo peh kau Petrus, sampai mati pun nyo' aku?" jie Yesus. "Pie yeng mat si, Petrusei, bolum mano' tengkuko' kaloe kau dah nyangkal aku tigo kali."
43014001	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Kam nang na' susah, nang na' gola'. Pecayoam ken Allah, pecayoam jum ken aku.
43014002	Kediyam Apa' ku dinun keedah rumah bosai yeng benya' sekate; jedi aku ca' kinun lo'e, nyendiyo arong nyo' kam. Mun cum arong dinun nyo' kam noe ken ku bepadah do.
43014003	Jedi aku ca' kinun lo'e, nyendiyo arong to' kam; dah nyoe aku pun bebeli' agei' kitue ngamie kam, meyie kam ke' rumah kena' dinun. Maksut ku dinai aku dinyoam kam.
43014004	"Jedi ku ca' kinun lo'e; kam pun dah tawu kam dah ken jelane," jie Yesus.
43014005	Pie Tomas tei' betanyoe, jie, "Kami si noe tawu kami ken kau na' konai, Tuwowei," jie, "konai na' tawu ken jelane?"
43014006	Samut Yesus, "Aku tuam to' jelan ke' Apa' ku," jie. "Aku tuam yeng bujor benar, akuam yeng bungkong idup. Cum reng manu ke' Apa' ku cuwali ngerudu aku," jie.
43014007	"Kira' kam mat tekenal ken aku si kam tekenal jum ken Apa' ku," jie Yesus. "Pi tue pun kam dah tekenal dah ken Sen, dah merati Sen dah," jie.
43014008	Pie jie Pilipus nyeh, "Tuwowe, tunyo'am Apa' kau ke' kami, gei' kami merati Apa' kau ken mato muko diret kamiam; dah nyoe sabasam ati kami, ngat nyoam kona' kami," jie Pilipus.
43014009	Samut Yesus, "Nyeh kau bolum tekenal ken aku peh, Pilipus? Teruhal dah lamat dah aku nan begelumo ken kam. Kin berang reng dah merati aku dah merati Apa' ku jum. Konai kau minta' na' merati Apa' ku," jie, "sedang kau nan merati aku tue.
43014010	Noe pecayo peh kau ken aku samo ken Apa' ku? Kena' siko'am," jie Yesus. Dah nyoe jie nyingka' pada' murite tei', "Pada' pemadah ku ke' kam," jie, "noe iyo berasal deri aku peh. Diret Apa' kuam, yeng nan nyeroto aku, Sénam yeng ngenggewai gewai Sen ngelalu aku.
43014011	"Kam ca' pecayo ken kena' Apa' mat siko'am," jie Yesus. "Po aku po Apa', po Apa' po aku. Ja'e mun noe pecayo tam dipadah pun," jie, "do jum boktie, ya'am belo keenah keaneh yeng dah ku pulah. Nyoe kin boktie ken aku mat siko' ken Apa' ku. Senoe-noe ca' pecayo tam bokti nyoe," jie Yesus.
43014012	"Tue mat-mátam, kamei. Sopai ja' yeng pecayo ken aku si mat langko' mulah keenah keaneh na' po yeng dipulah le' akuam. Malah ken paie gewai pada' reng yeng pecayo ken aku nyeh langko' melobeh gewai diret ku pun, tam aku tue langko' pulang ke' Apa' ku dinun, mangko aku nulong kam deri nunam.
43014013	Lalu pai-pai pun yeng dipinta' kam lem demo aku mat cagar digewai ku, gei' sempayo aku Ana' Sen mat ngagong Apa' ku.
43014014	Mangko pai-pai pun yeng dipinta' le' kam lem demo aku si," jie Yesus, "mat langko' digewai ku.
43014015	Ge'em mun kam kaseh ken aku si kam pun pasti tuno' ke' pada' perentah ku," jie Yesus.
43014016	Jedi "Ku," jie Yesus, "cagar minta' ke' Apa', gei' Sen ngutus siko' Penulong yeng na' po aku, kei ngenti aku, yeng langko' diyam ken kam seora'-ora'eam.
43014017	Nyoam Roh Allah, yeng nan madah yeng mat yeng benar. "Reng yeng noe pecayo di deniyo tue si iyo noe nerimoe Roh Allah, go sidoe noe merati Sen, noe tekenal ken Sen. Kam si tekenal ken Sen, go tengkalo tue pun Sen dah do ken kam. Malah ken paie dah nyoe gi Sen langko' ngendiyam ati kam," jie Yesus.
43014018	"Kam noam ku tingal ming na' po ana' umáng peh," jie Yesus. "Ku pasti manu ke' kam agei'am.
43014019	Tue dah noe dam lamat reng di deniyo tue cum merati aku agei'; pi kam si langko' merati ku agei'am. Aku mat bungkong idup; mangko kam pun langko' buleh idup beru jum.
43014020	Dah nyoe kam langko' jelas ken aku mat segelumo ken Apa' ku; kam pun segelumo ken aku, ken aku pun segelumo ken kam.
43014021	Sopai ja' yeng ningo ken tuno' taalo' ke' pada' perentah aku si mat ngaseh aku. Sedang yeng ngaseh aku mat dikaseh le' Apa' ku; aku pun langko' ngaseh iyo ken langko' nganyoe ngenal diret ku ke' iyo," jie Yesus.
43014022	Dah nyoe jie Yudas, pie noe iyo Yudas Iskariot peh, "Pie Tuwowe," jie, "gopai go kau ngat na' nganyoe diret kau engkas ke' kami nyem? Gopai go kau noe nganyoe diret kau ke' semuya' segeno mensiyo?" jie.
43014023	Samut Yesus, "(Go noe iyo semuya' segeno mensiyo yeng ngaseh aku.) Berang reng yeng mat ngaseh aku si iyo na'e tuno' taalo' ke' perentah aku. Lalu Apa' ku pun ngaseh iyo, ken kena' Apa' langko' manu ke' reng nyoe ken nyerorap di atie. (Aku ken Apa' ku mat ayah begelumo ken reng yeng ngaseh kena'.)
43014024	Pie reng yeng noe ngaseh aku si mat noe tuno' taalo' ke' aku. Teruhal posan payit yeng dah didingo kam nyeh noe iyo posan payit aku peh; pie mat posan payit Apa' ku yeng ngutus aku kitue," jie Yesus. "Jedi begi reng yeng noe ngaseh aku, yeng noe tuno' taalo' ke' aku si cum ku nganyoe ngenal diret ku ke' sidoe," jie Yesus.
43014025	"A, telanyor ku gei' do ditue ken kam," jie Yesus, "akuam yeng madah semuya' tue ke' kam.
43014026	Ja'e dah nyoe gi Roh Allah die yeng langko' ngajar semuya' segelo ke' kam, yeng nan ngingát kam ken pada' pemadah ku ke' kam. Nyoam Penulong kam yeng diutus le' Apa' ku atas demo aku," jie Yesus.
43014027	"Maksut aku na' nyuroh ati kam tenáng amán, na' po ati akuam. Nyoam pengunyo' ku ke' kam. Mat layinam deri ketenáng amán ati yeng dirudu reng di deniyo tue, go tue mat pengunyo' pengaseh diret kuam ke' kam. Mangko kam nang na' susah, nang na' gola'.
43014028	"Padah ku nángam susah tei' go kam kin dah ningo ku madah ke' kam ken aku ca' ningal kam ditue lo'e, pie dah nyoe ku bebeli' agei' ke' kam. Kira' kam mat ngaseh aku si menurute kam ayah bikah tam aku pulang ke' Apa' ku, go keagong Sen kin mat lobeh deri keagong aku yeng kam merati nyeh.
43014029	A, semuya' tue ku padah ke' kam sebolum tejedi pun, gei' sempayo dah tejedi gi kam mat pecayoam," jie Yesus.
43014030	"Tue pun tingal sikit dam kelorong nyo' ku ngomóng ken kam," jie Yesus, "go pengelakar yeng mangkue meloh deniyo tue dah na' detang dah nyo' ngaru aku. Kenaken si aku mat cum kayi' ku ken iyo.
43014031	Pi ku mat nyerah diret ku gei' sempayo deniyo tue jelas ken aku mat ngaseh Apa' ku, ken aku mat tuno' ke' perentah Sen. "Yo' kam, diret turunam," jie Yesus.
43015001	Jedi jie Yesus, "Aku betang angur yeng seli. Apa' ku yeng ngebune.
43015002	Kam keedah edane. Jedi sal ge' do edan ku yeng noe bebuwah mat dipokis Sen le' Apa' ku. Pie tiyap edan yeng bebuwah si diriyas Sen gei' iyo bebuwah lobat agei'.
43015003	Pi kam si," jie Yesus, "dah diriyas dah, dah bereseh dah. Yeng ngembereseh kam posan payit yeng dah ku padah ke' kam.
43015004	"Kam," jie, "ca' idup segelumo ken aku, mangko aku pun idup segelumo ken kam. Mun edane noe likat ke' bungkonge tetap noe bebuwah. Mun mungkal edane mat cum buwahe. Ponyoe jum kam. Kam tetap noe bebuwah cuwali kam idup segelumo ken aku.
43015005	"Mangko jie ku aku betang angur, kam edane. Reng yeng idup begelumo ken aku, aku pun idup begelumo ken iyo, mangko buwahe lobat. Mat ca' begelumo ken aku, go kam noe tawu ngenggewai pai-pai pun mun kam rangang deri aku.
43015006	"Ja'e reng yeng noe idup begelumo ken aku si dibuwang, na' po edan yeng dibuwang lalu ngerangkai kosai. A, edan yeng mati kin dikumpol lalu dilojang ke' api yeng serarat benyalo.
43015007	"Jedi," jie Yesus, "potue ne, kam. Mun kam idup begelumo ken aku, nan ingát ken tuno' taalo' ke' posan payit aku, mangko pai-pai pun yeng kam pinta' langko' dituntong nyo' kam.
43015008	"Sal ge' kam nan bebuwah lobat si Apa' ku nan diagong, dipugi, dihormát reng. Mun bebuwah lobat, kam ngembokti ken kam mat murit aku.
43015009	"Jedi na' po aku dikaseh le' Apa' ku," jie Yesus, "ponyoe jum aku ngaseh kam. Kam ca' serarat ingát ken kaseh aku, sempayo kam idup na' po reng yeng ku kaseh.
43015010	Dinai kam tuno' taalo' ke' perentah aku dinyoam kam ingát ken kaseh aku, na' po aku nan ingát ken kaseh Apa' ku, go aku pun nan tuno' taalo' ke' perentah Sen.
43015011	"Semuya' tue pun," jie Yesus, "ku padah ku ke' kam gei' kam beayah bikah na' po aku nan beayah bikah. Kona' ati ku gei' kam mat-mat beayah bikah.
43015012	"Jedi tue perentah aku: kam ca' nan serarat kaseh mengaseh ken betor, na' po aku ngaseh kam.
43015013	Kaseh yeng mat si kenyatoe mun reng nyerah idupe, relo mati ngenti kabane. Cumam kaseh yeng lebeh deri nyoe.
43015014	Yeng ku maksut ken kaban tei' ya'am kam tue to'; kam mat kaban aku mun kam nunoe perentah ku.
43015015	Dah tue pun ku noam ngangap kam ulun ku, go ulun kin noe tawue ken urus tuwowe. Pi kam si tawu, mangko kam mat didemo ku kaban ku, go semuya' segelo yeng ku ningo deri Apa' ku dah ku padah bisam ke' kam.
43015016	"Noe iyo kam yeng mileh aku peh," jie Yesus, "pi akuam yeng mileh kam. Dah nyoe aku pun ngutus kam gei' kam nan serarat bebuwah, buwah yeng tan yeng noe tawu buro'. Mun kam bebuwah lobat si mangko sipat pai pun yeng kam minta' ke' Apa' ku atas kuwaso demo aku si Sen pun ngunyo'e," jie Yesus.
43015017	"Tuam to' perentah ku ke' kam: kam ca' kaseh mengaseh ken betor.
43015018	"Jedi," jie Yesus, "sal ge' reng di deniyo tue risie ken kam," jie, "nang na' eran, go akuam yeng dolu dikerisie reng.
43015019	Go kam dikerisie le' deniyo tue pun go kam noe dah sebeyo ken reng di deniyo tue. Kira' kam mat sebeyo sebenan sepiker seruning ken reng di deniyo si kam tetap dikasehe, noe dikerisie. Pi aku dah nari' kam deri deniyo tue, mangko kam noam sebeyo sebenan ken deniyo tue. Nyoame' go deniyo risie ken kam.
43015020	Pie kam ca' ingát ken posan payit ku ke' kam nyomie. Go pelayan noe koloe lobeh deri tuwowe. Jedi semalang ke' tuwowe kam ge'e, disensare reng, sa'am go kam. Semalang ke' deri kosoh mulut diret ku ge'e, keh reng ningoe, sa'am go pemadah kam.
43015021	Pi go kam dipulah reng ponyoe pun go kam ngangkue demo aku, go reng di deniyo tue kin noe tekenale ken Allah yeng ngutus aku kitue.
43015022	"Jedi sempamoe mun aku noe detang, noe bepadah ke' sidoe si pertimang hal dosoe manseh do. Ja'e tue ku dah detang dah, dah bepadah dah ke' sidoe, mangko cumam dedale nyo' napo' dosoe pun.
43015023	Berang reng yeng sie ken aku si sie jum ken Apa' ku.
43015024	Nyoe pun kenaken aku dah ngenggewai pada' keenah keaneh di adap sidoe, yeng noe koloe digewai mensiyo siko' pun, ento' ngembokti kuwaso diret ku. Kira' cum gewai ku tokoh nyoe si pertimang hal doso sidoe yeng sie ken aku nyeh manseh do. Pi tue numo' pun sidoe dah merati pada' keenah keaneh yeng dipulah aku pie manseh sidoe sie ken kena' Apa', mangko jie ku cumam pertimang hal dosoe.
43015025	Ja'e tue tejedi pun gei' tuntong yeng ditulis lem kitap ukum yeng nan dibeco sidoe pun. Jie lem kitap nyeh, Modas-modasam sidoe ngerisie aku. (Masmur 69:4)
43015026	"Jedi dah nyoe gi," jie Yesus, "aku pun langko' ngutus Penulong ke' kam, yeng ku minta' deri Apa' ku. Penulong tei'," jie, "Roh. Lalu gewaie pun nyo' ngenyato ngenjelas yeng mat ke' hal Allah. Jedi dah Roh Allah detang si," jie, "Sen langko' besaksi ke' hal aku.
43015027	Kam pun," jie, "ca' besaksi jum ke' hal aku, go mat kamam yeng nan merati gewai aku semeja' ku nongaie mie," jie Yesus nyingka' murite.
43016001	"Aku madah tue ke' kam," jie Yesus, "gei' kam siyap, noe tepengaroh dah kam ngerudu kesensare gi.
43016002	Sidoe pada' ketuwo nyeh langko' ngeluwar kam deri agamae; kam langko' didahe semeyang di rumah kediyam Allah. Kam langko' dibunoh reng; malah ken paie dah jengkah kam ngerudu kesensare nyeh berang reng yeng munoh kam kajie nun iyo munoh kam to' iyo ngelayan kona' kemawo' Allah.
43016003	Pie gewai sidoe tokoh nyoe tam sidoe mat noe tekenale ken kena' Apa'.
43016004	Tue ku dah madahe ke' kam yeng langko' tejedi nyeh; gei' sempayo dah tejedi gi kam pun ingát ken yeng dipadah aku tue mat-mátam; maksute kam noam tepengaroh. "Nyuroh ku noe madahe ke' kam deri kemuloe mie si go melamat tue kin aku nan doam ken kam; (a, melamat ku do ken kam kin bolum do kam ngerudu behayo).
43016005	Ja'e tue nyuroh ku madahe ke' kam go aku dah na' pulang ke' Sen yeng ngutus aku kitue. Menurute si kam ca' ayah bikaham ngajie pie poe keh kam nanyoe ke' aku, ke' hal aku pulang nyeh.
43016006	Kebelike kam susah sontokam ngaji jolu yeng ku padah ke' kam tadie.
43016007	Teruhal yeng mat si, kamei," jie Yesus, "mat panci begi kam pun mun ku ningal kam. Mun noe ku ningal kam si penulong yeng siko' tei' cum manu ke' kam. Ja'e mun aku ningal kam aku langko' ngutus Sen detang ke' kam.
43016008	"Jedi dah Sen detang gi Sen langko' madah reng di deniyo ke' hal dosoe, ge'em madah jum ke' hal kebenar, dah nyoe madah jum ke' hal Allah langko' ngukum reng.
43016009	"Maksut Sen na' madah ke' hal doso tei', doso sidoe go sidoe noe pecayo ken aku.
43016010	"Maksut Sen na' madah ke' hal kebenar tei', go akuam yeng benar. Boktie go aku manu ke' Apa' ku, lalu kam cum merati aku agei'.
43016011	"Lalu maksut Sen na' madah ke' hal Allah langko' ngukum tei', go yeng mangkue meloh deniyo tue pun dah diukum dah, ya'am Pengelakar; sa'am reng di deniyo tue, pasti diukum jum gi," jie Yesus.
43016012	"Kenaken si gei' suba'am jolu yeng na' ku padah ke' kam," jie Yesus, "pie gei' tue si kam bolum mampu nangkape.
43016013	Pie mun Roh Allah yeng bujor benar dah detang gi si Sénam yeng tetap ngiring kam gei' kam tawu semuya' segeloe yeng mat. Go Roh Sen pun noe madah kengkarang diret Sen peh; Sen ngat madah ke' kam po yeng didingo Sen deri Allah Apa'. Sénam yeng langko' madah ke' kam pai yeng langko' tejedi gi.
43016014	Sen langko' ngagong aku, caroe go Sen nerimoe pengajar deri aku lalu dianyoe dipadah Sen ke' kam gei' kam jelas ken tuju maksute.
43016015	Aku pun nerimoe pengajar ku deri Apa' ku, go dah yeng Apa' ku yeng akuam, po Apa' ku po aku. Nyoam go jie ku Roh Sen langko' nerimoe pengajar aku lalu dianyoe dipadah Sen ke' kam.
43016016	"Noe dam lamat tue cumam kam merati aku," jie Yesus. "Pie dah nyoe sebentar agei' kam merati aku agei'am," jie.
43016017	Ningo panere bungi nyoe tei' separoe deri murite betentanyoe siko' ken betore. "Pai maksute bungie tadie ken noe dam lamat tue diret cum meratie, dah nyoe sebentar agei' diret langko' meratie, tam iyo na' manu ke' Apa'e," jie sidoe.
43016018	"Pai ge' retie sebentar agei' ponyoe? Diret si mat noe tawu pai maksute," jie sidoe nyingka' betore.
43016019	Yesus pun tawue ken sidoe na' betanyoe ke' iyo. Mangko jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Nyeh tam jie ku noe dam lamat cumam kam merati aku, ken dah nyoe sebentar agei' kam merati aku peh? Maksut kam na' betanyoe ke' hal nyoe peh?" jie.
43016020	"Pie mat-mátam, kamei, yeng ku padah ke' kam," jie Yesus. "Noe dam lamat si kam langko' nangis, ken berato berayi, pie reng di deniyo langko' ayah bikaham. Kam si langko' susah sontok, pie nyoe mat sebentaram. Dah nyoe losi susah sontok timol ayah bikah die.
43016021	Contohe keedah reng yeng na' berana'. Des reng berodai na' berana' kin mat susaham ngaji yeng ca' dirudue nyeh, pie dah pas ana'e do kin mat kelupoeam iyo ngaji kesusah kesontok yeng dirudue tadie ponyoe; mat ayah bikaham go ana'e dah do.
43016022	Ponyoe jum kam. Tue si mat jengkahe kam susah sontok; pi diret mat langko' betomu agei'am, kamei, dah nyoe kam mat ayah bikaham. Lalu mat cum reng yeng mampu ngerobut keayah bikah kam.
43016023	"Dah nyoe gi si kam noe sa' betanyoe agei' ke' aku ke' hal pai pun; kam jurus ke' Apa' ku die. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei. Sen pun langko' ngunyo' ke' kam pai-pai pun yeng dipinta' kam lem demo aku.
43016024	Gei' tue si bolum do kam minta' pai-pai pun lem demo aku. Pie ca' minta' nyem, kamei, mangko kam mat nerimoam. Lalu keayah bikah kam mat cum kekurang kemalange.
43016025	"Ku madah tue ke' kam pakai belelawut," jie Yesus, "pie dah nyoe gi si mat rampang boktieam ku madah ke' kam ke' hal Apa' ku.
43016026	Dah nyoe kin noe sa' aku peh yeng minta' ke' Apa' nyo' pengantaro kam; pie jurus kamam yeng minta' ke' Sen lem demo aku.
43016027	Go Apa' ku mat kaseh ken kam; nyuroh Sen kaseh ken kam go kam kaseh ken aku, ken kam mat pecayo ken aku mat diutus le' Sen.
43016028	Aku detang ke' deniyo tue mie pun deri Apa' ku. Tue pun ku mat na' ningal deniyo tue to' ku pulang ke' Apa' ku," jie Yesus. ("Mangko dah ku pulang ke' Sen kin kam jurus manu minta' ke' Sénam lem demo aku," jie.)
43016029	Dah nyoe jie pada' murite, "A, tue si kau mat madah rampang boktie, noe kau pakai kato kiyas peh.
43016030	Tue kami dah jelas dah ken kau mat tawu semuya' segeloe, go bolum reng betanyoe pun pie kau dah tawu dah pai yeng na' ditanyoe reng ke' kau. Mangko kami pun dah pecayoam ken kau mat deri Allaham," jie sidoe.
43016031	"A, tue si kam dah pecayoam, dih?" jie Yesus.
43016032	"Pi tau beh, mat do langko' jengkahe, malah ken paie tue dah jengkahe dah, des semuya' kam langko' pencar temiyar, rato-ratoe rari ke' arong diret kam. Do aku si ditingal kam ming ponyoam; siko' pun cum deri kam yeng nyeroto aku kaloe. Ja'e aku si noe ku bediret ku peh, go Apa' ku nan nyeroto aku.
43016033	"Aku madah semuya' tue ke' kam," jie Yesus, "gei' sempayo ati kam mat tenáng amánam tam aku. Mat die di deniyo tue si pasti ngerudu kesusah kesensare, pie nang na' mudoe kuroe. Tam aku pun dah ngalah kuwaso deniyo tue," jie Yesus.
43017001	Jedi dah Yesus ngomóng ponyoe ken murite tei' dah nyoe iyo nengkadah ke' langi', lalu bedoa. "Apa'," jie, "tue dah jengkahe dah ento' Den ngagong aku ana' Den. Kiroe," jie, "Den ngagong aku, sempayo aku pun ngagong Den.
43017002	Patutam Den ngagong aku, go mat diret Dénam yeng nyerah hak ke' aku atas semuya' mensiyo. Hak nyoe sempayo aku ngunyo' idup yeng cum berudu mati ke' semuya' reng yeng Den unyo' ke' aku.
43017003	Idup yeng cum berudu mati nyeh maksute sidoe tekenal ken tona': ya'am tekenal ken diret Dénam, go ngat siko' Dénam yeng mat Allah. Ge'em tekenal ken aku, Yesus Kristus, yeng diutus Den kitue. Nyoam idup yeng cum berudu mati.
43017004	"Aku si daham ku ngagong Den di deniyo tue, go aku dah nyanto' gewai yeng Den tugas ke' aku.
43017005	Kiroe Den pun mat ngagong aku di adap diret Dénam, Pa'ei, na' po keagong yeng ku do ken Den sebolum deniyo tue dipulah mie.
43017006	"Jedi benso sidoe tue yeng engku aku," jie Yesus, "sidoe mat dipileh Den deri semuya' mensiyo di deniyo tue kei engku aku. Sidoe mat dolu engku Den, dah nyoe Den ngunyo' sidoe ke' aku. Aku pun dah nganyoe kuwaso demo Den ke' sidoe. Sidoe na'e tuno' taalo' ke' posan payit Den.
43017007	-
43017008	Go aku dah madah posan payit Den ke' sidoe; sidoe pun mat na'e nerimoe. Mangko tue pun sidoe tawu ken pada' gewai ulah omóng tutor aku mat seli deri diret Dénam. Sidoe dah yakin ken aku berasal deri Den, yakin jum ken Dénam yeng ngutus aku kitue.
43017009	Mangko ku mat bedoa ento' sidoe tue yeng engku aku. Noe ku bedoa nyo' reng di deniyo peh, pie kususe tue ku bedoa ento' sidoe yeng dah diunyo' Den ke' aku, go sidoe mat engku Den.
43017010	A, dah yeng aku yeng Den, dah yeng Den yeng aku, mat engku tona'. Aku pun diagong le' sidoe.
43017011	"Jedi tue," jie Yesus, "ku na' manu ke' Den; aku dah na' ningal deniyo tue. Pie sidoe si tingal dituam. Apa' ku yeng suci bereseh; benso sidoe tue yeng Den ngunyo' ke' aku, kiroe Den ngenjego sidoe ken kuwaso demo Den. Sidoe mat ca' dijego, sempayo iyo seati sepiker, na' po tona' seati sepiker.
43017012	Des aku gei' do ken sidoe di deniyo tue si mat akuam yeng ngenjego sidoe ken kuwaso demo Den, sampai siko' pun cum deri sidoe yeng losi nayáp, cuwali yeng siko' yeng mat patut losi nayáp seora'-ora'eam. Nyoe pun kei dituntong po ditulis di lem Kitap Den mie. "Ja'e tue ca' Dénam yeng ngenjego nyelinong sidoe,
43017013	go aku pun dah na' pulang ke' Den. Posan payit Den si daham ku madah ke' sidoe. A, aku ngomóng ken sidoe potue pun telanyor ku manseh di deniyo tue, maksut ku sempayo ayah bikah yeng seli deri aku mat meresap jum ke' lem ati sidoe, gei' sidoe serarat ayah bikah.
43017014	"Mat ca' Dénam yeng ngenjego sidoe, go deniyo tue mat risie ken sidoe. Ngaso aku madah posan payit Den ke' sidoe si lalu reng di deniyo tue si mat risie ken sidoe, go dinyoam deniyo mat jelas ken sidoe mat noe sebeyo ken deniyo tue, na' po aku pun noe sebeyo ken deniyo tue.
43017015	"Ja'e ngaji sidoe ca' dijego si ku noe ku minta' sempayo sidoe dicabut kali deri deniyo tue peh, pie ku minta' gei' Den nyelinong sidoe deri kuwaso Pengelakar.
43017016	"Sidoe mat noe sebeyo ken deniyo tue, na' po aku pun noe sebeyo ken deniyo tue, Pa'ei.
43017017	Kiroe Den nyiyáp ati sidoe ken posan payit Den yeng mat-mátam, sempayo sidoe nyerah direte nyo' melayan Den bangam.
43017018	-
43017019	Gopai go aku pun nyerah diret kuam begi sidoe, sempayo sidoe pun nyerah direte gi ento' melayan Den seputeh ati sebeníng derah. Ge'em aku dah ngutus sidoe ke' deniyo tue na' po Den ngutus aku mie ke' deniyo tue. Mangko ati sidoe mat ca' disiyap le' Den.
43017020	"Jedi tue," jie Yesus, "noe ku bedoa ento' sidoe tue bangam peh, pi ku bedoa jum," jie, "benso pada' reng layin yeng langko' na' pecayo ken aku tam posan payit yeng dilantar le' murit ku tue.
43017021	-
