43017023	Kiroe," jie Yesus, "semuya' segeno reng yeng langko' pecayo ken aku pun mat seati sepikeram, Pa'ei, na' po Den seati ken aku, aku pun seati ken Den. Ponyoe jum sidoe, kiroe seatiam jum ken tona'. Keagong yeng Den borie ke' aku nyeh aku pun borie ke' sidoe, kei sidoe mat seati po tona' pun seati: aku seati ken sidoe, Den pun seati ken aku. Go penting sidoe mat menjedi seati sepiker, gei' sempayo semuya' reng di deniyo pun tawu ken aku mat diutus le' Den. Ge'em sempayo deniyo tue tawu ken Den kaseh ken reng pecayo samo po Den kaseh ken aku.
43017024	"Apa' ku," jie Yesus. "Kona' ati ku, Pa'ei, kei sidoe yeng Den ngunyo' ke' aku nan serarat do jum ken aku, dinai aku dinyoam sidoe. Maksut ku sempayo sidoe merati keagong aku yeng diunyo' Den ke' aku entam Den mat kaseh ken aku sebolum deniyo tue dipulah pun.
43017025	"Apa' ku yeng bujor benar," jie Yesus; "reng di deniyo tue mat noe tekenal ken Den. Pi aku si mat tekenal ken Den. Sidoe tue yeng engku aku pun dah tawue dah ken mat Dénam yeng ngutus aku kitue.
43017026	Aku," jie Yesus, "dah nganyoe kuwaso demo Den ke' sidoe, gei' pun aku langko' na' serarat manseh nan nganyoe kuwaso demo Den ke' sidoe. Den serarat nan kaseh ken aku. Tuju maksut ku sempayo kaseh Den ken aku meresap jum di lem ati sidoe. Ge'em sempayo aku pun ngendiyam ati sidoe." Nyoam doa Yesus.
43018001	Jedi mátam. Dah bedoa tei' dah nyoe Yesus ken murite turun, bejelan ke' seborang Sungai Kidron. Dinun do kebun saitun; jedi Yesus ken murite mat bejelan dinyoe.
43018002	A, Yudas, yeng langko' nyerah Yesus pun, tawue jum ken arong nyoe, go nyomie Yesus ken murite mat erat bekumpol dinyoe.
43018003	Mangko Yudas malam nyoe mat bejelan jum ke' kebun nyoe. A, pada' reng Parisi ken pada' ketuwo pelayan reng Yahudi nyeh do ngutus pada' serededue nyo' namah Yudas; ken pada' serededu Roma pun do jum. Jedi semuya' sidoe mat diiring Yudas kinun, cukup ken tuware ken api demare ken... pada' senjeto opai.
43018004	Lalu mátam. Yesus kin tawue ken semuya' yeng langko' tejedi ke' iyo. Jedi ketiko Yudas ken pada' serededu nyeh manu ke' kebun nyoe tei' dah nyoe Yesus pun pamus deri kebun nyeh, manu ke' sidoe. Lalu dah betomu ken sidoe tei' jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Kam ngogoe sopai?"
43018005	Samut sidoe, "Kami ngogoe Yesus deri Nasaret," jie. Jie Yesus, "Tuam aku to'," jie. A, Yudas yeng langko' nyerahe kin do jum namah sidoe rami nyeh te'.
43018006	Jedi tumas ningo jie Yesus, "Tuam aku to'," temosie pada' sidoe tei' tekeraya' unor buntut, lalu pam! tepesungkur pejeripap pada' sidoe nyeh te'.
43018007	Dah nyoe ditanyoe agei'am le' Yesus. "Mat sopaiam," jie, "yeng kam gogoe?" "Kami ngogoe Yesus deri Nasaret," jie sidoe.
43018008	"Daham ku bepadah ke' kam, tuam aku to'," jie Yesus. "Mun mat akuam yeng kam gogoe si sidoe layin tue noe sa' kam tangkapam," jie.
43018009	Lalu mátam, murit Yesus mat noam ditangkap le' reng rami. Nyoe tejedi pun cuco'am ken tijum Yesus ken Apa'e lem doae tadie ponyoe. Kin jie Yesus lem doae tei', "Reng yeng diunyo' Den ke' aku nyeh siko' pun cum yeng cecer berayan," jie.
43018010	Jedi mátam te'. Simon Petrus tei' poe do meyie kelewang. Lalu dicabute kelewange deri saronge, lalu pak! dipangkahe ke' ulun pelayan agong nyeh, tepancong ke' kelinang kanáne, sampai rimpong kelinange. Demo ulun pelayan agong tei' Malkus.
43018011	Pie dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' Petrus, "Nang! Sarong die kelewang kau nyeh," jie. "Nyeh kaji kau go bolei' ku peh ngerudu kesensare yeng ditetap le' Apa' ku? Pie aku si relo ku," jie Yesus.
43018012	Jedi dah nyoe Yesus mat ditangkapam le' pada' serededu Roma ken komanane, ken pada' serededu deri ketuwo reng Yahudi ge'em. Dah ditangkape tei' dah nyoe dipasonge;
43018013	dah dipasonge tei' dibeyie le' sidoe kei ngadap Hanas lo'e. Go Hanas tei' mentuwo Kayapas, yeng ketiko nyoe kei pelayan agong lem agama reng Yahudi.
43018014	Kin nyomie ponyoe mat Kayapasam yeng bepadah ke' ketuwo reng Yahudi nyeh ken coh ge' reng siko' yeng mati kei ngenti reng rami. Jedi mátam. Yesus mat ditangkap, lalu dibeyie ngadap Hanas.
43018015	Jedi mátam te'. Des Yesus ditangkap tei' Simon Petrus ken siko' murit Yesus yeng layin pun ngenjurute jum. Dah detang ke' rumah pelayan agong nyeh murit Yesus yeng siko' tei' tamoe ke' kolong delam jum, beroto ken Yesus, go iyo dikenal le' pelayan agong.
43018016	Petrus si gei' betungu di luwar, soma' lawang. Pie dah nyoe murit yeng siko' yeng tamoe tadie yeng dikenal le' pelayan agong nyeh bebeli' keluwar agei', manu ngomóng ken pembentue betinoe yeng nungu lawang nyeh. Lalu Petrus dibeyie tamoe jum.
43018017	Dah tamoe tei' jie pembentu yeng nungu lawang nyeh, "Jangán kau tue murit reng nyoe jum," jie. "Noe," jie Petrus.
43018018	Malam nyoe kin colap, mangko pada' ulun ken pada' serededu deri ketuwo reng Yahudi nyeh dah nugoh api to' sidoe bediyang, lalu mat bediyang dinyoe. A, Petrus pun bediri ken sidoe, bediyang ken sidoe dinyoe jum.
43018019	Jedi mátam. Dah Yesus dibeyie ke' delam nyeh, dah nyoe pelayan agong pun ngenjeriji' ke' Yesus ke' hal murite ken ke' hal pengajare.
43018020	Pie samut Yesus, "Yeng dipadah aku si mat tawu reng bisam, go aku nan ngajare di adap reng rami. Aku nan ngajar di pada' rumah semeyang ken di rumah kediyam Allah, dinai-nai pun arong pada' reng Yahudi nan bekumpol. Aku noe ngajar pai-pai pun caro besesulit.
43018021	Gopai go den betanyoe ke' aku? Boh tanyoe ja' ke' sidoe yeng ningo aku. Go sidoe kin jelase ke' hal pengajar aku," jie Yesus.
43018022	Ngaso ningo Yesus nyamut bungi nyoe tei' temosie Yesus tei' dipangkong le' siko' serededu ketuwo reng Yahudi nyeh. "Bereni peh kau nyamut pelayan agong tokoh nyoe?" jie.
43018023	"Mun omóng ku salah," jie Yesus, "ca' dibokti caro yeng sah. Pie mun omóng ku konoe noe patut kau mangkong aku," jie Yesus.
43018024	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Hanas nyuroh Yesus dibeyie gei' dipasong ponyoe nyo' ngadap menantue Kayapas, pelayan agong nyeh.
43018025	Jedi nongah Yesus ngadap Hanas tei' Simon Petrus gei' bediyang di luwar. Jedi dah nyoe do siko' reng betanyoe ke' Petrus, "Jangán kau tue murit iyo jum," jie. Pie Petrus nyangkale. "Noe," jie.
43018026	Dah nyoe do siko' reng layin, pembentue pelayan agong nyeh, betanyoe jum ke' Petrus. Iyo waris reng yeng kelinange rimpong dipancong le' Petrus tadie ponyoe. Jedi iyo mat betanyoe ke' Petrus, "So ku do ku merati kau ken iyo di kebun saitun tadie," jie.
43018027	Pie disangkale agei'am le' Petrus. "Eh, noe beh," jie Petrus. Tumas bungi nyoe tei' mano' pun tengkuko'am.
43018028	Jedi mátam. Dah Yesus ngadap Kayapas tei' dah nyoe dibeyie ke' kediyam gubernor die. Malam pun dah dini ari dah. Pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi nyeh mat ngei'e tamoe ke' kediyam gubernor. Go mun sidoe tamoe ke' kediyam reng noe Yahudi si kaji sidoe nun ngotor ngencemar direte, sedang kaloe ponyoe sidoe na' ngingát ngenáng pesta Ari Raya Ngelalu. Mangko sidoe mat ngei'e tamoe ke' delam.
43018029	Jedi ngaso ponyoe Gubernor Pilatus mat pamus keluwar nyo' betomu ken sidoe di luwar. Dah nyoe Pilatus betanyoe ke' sidoe. "Pailah kesalah reng tue," jie, "go dibeyie kam ke' aku?" jie.
43018030	Samut sidoe, "Mun iyo noe reng jat," jie, "noe ken kami semadie nyerah reng ke' den," jie.
43018031	Pie jie Pilatus, "Boh dipecaro diret kamam ken adat peradat kam ja'," jie. Samut reng Yahudi, "Pie kami noe behak ngukum reng mati disalip," jie.
43018032	Nyoe pun kei nuntong tijum Yesus jum ke' hal koti caro iyo langko' mati nyeh.
43018033	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Pilatus tamoe ke' delam, lalu Yesus disurohe ngadap iyo, nyo' iyo nyerudi ke' Yesus ke' hal penomah pendudoh reng ke' hal iyo, benso ke' hal iyo madah ngangkue direte rajo. Dah nyoe Pilatus betanyoe ke' Yesus, "Mat peh kau rajo reng Yahudi?" jie.
43018034	Jie Yesus, "Nyoe kengkaji diret denei, mat dipadah reng layinei?"
43018035	Pie jie Pilatus nyamute, "Bede ke' ku reng Yahudi!" jie. "Noe ken do ku turut campor ken urus kam! Kau diserah ke' aku pun le' suku benso diret kauam, ken pada' ketuwo pelayan kam. Pailah kesalah kau tei' go kau diserah le' waris wala' diret kauam?" jie Pilatus. "Koti yeng máte ke' hal kau tue?"
43018036	Samut Yesus, "Di deniyo tue si aku mat noe diangkue disomah reng kei rajo. Kira' aku disomah reng kei rajoe di deniyo tue si tentu pada' ana' buwah ku do beperang belawan gei' aku noe diserah ke' reng Yahudi nyeh. Pie gei' tue aku mat noe diangkue disomah kei rajo di deniyo tue," jie Yesus.
43018037	"A, jedi maksute mat rajoam dih kau?" jie Pilatus. Samut Yesus, "Mátam jie den nyeh, aku mat rajo. Nyoam go aku diado di deniyo tue pun, ken aku detang ke' deniyo tue nyo' bepadah ke' hal yeng mat," jie. "Sopai ja' yeng ingín tawu yeng mat si mat na'e ningo jie aku," jie Yesus.
43018038	"Jolu pailah yeng dimaksut kau yeng mat tei'?" jie Pilatus.* "Engo ku maring mensiyo na' tawu yeng mat," jie. Dah nyoe Pilatus pun pamus ngadap reng Yahudi agei'am. "Ku noe tetomu ku ke' kesalah reng nyoe," jie Pilatus.
43018039	"Pi potue ne. Na' nunoe adat peradat kam kin tiyap Ari Raya Ngelalu nyeh aku ca' ngelopas siko' reng yeng ditahan aku, to' nyenáng ati kam. Jedi koti mun ku ngelopas rajo kam reng Yahudi to' kam? Na' noe kam?" jie Pilatus.
43018040	Pie pada' reng rami beserentak ontapam nyamute, "Noe! Nang na' ngelopas reng nyoe! Barabas ja' dipelopas!" jie sidoe. Teruhale Barabas tei' reng yeng gela' ngacau ngaru reng rami to' ngelawan pemerentah.
43019001	Jedi dah nyoe Pilatus nyuroh Yesus ca' dipelesah.
43019002	Pada' serededu nyeh ngenggolong labong akar durie, dikonoe ke' kepaloe. Disaro'e ken beju jubah ungu*, keca'e jubah ungu yeng dipakai kebiyaso le' rajo.
43019003	Lalu sidoe simah ngererujonge, ca'ca'e besesungko. "Panyang umoram den, rajo reng Yahudiei," jie sidoe, samel mangkonge.
43019004	Dah nyoe Pilatus pamus keluwar agei'am nyo' ngomóng ken pada' reng Yahudi. "Ti beh kam! Tue ku meyie iyo ngadap kam agei'am, gei' kam tawu ken aku cum nomu kesalahe."
43019005	Mangko Yesus mat pamus jum ngadap reng Yahudi; di tubohe gei' ketengah nyaro' beju jubah ungu tadie, ken kepaloe bisei' labong durie. Lalu jie Pilatus, "Ne, tue ne urange," jie.
43019006	Pi tumas pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' serededu merati Yesus tei' sidoe teger bepangkas kayis, "Salip ja'! Salip ja' reng nyoe!" jie. Pie samut Pilatus, "Kam ja' yeng ca' nyalipe, mun kam ngemoran gila'. Go aku mat noe tetomu ku ke' kesalahe," jie.
43019007	Samut pada' reng Yahudi, "Pi na' nunoe ukum adat kami," jie, "iyo mat ca' diukum mati, go iyo madah direte Ana' Allah. Nyoe ngelangar ukum kami," jie sidoe.
43019008	Dah ningo ken Yesus madah direte Ana' Allah tei' Pilatus tei' kepala' gola'eam.
43019009	Dah nyoe tamoe ke' delam agei'am. "Nyeh yeng máte kau tue berasal deri nai?" jie Pilatus betanyoe ke' Yesus. Pie Yesus cumam nyamute.
43019010	"Nyeh bereni peh kau noe nyamut aku?" jie Pilatus. "Noe tawu peh kau ken akuam yeng bekuwaso mutus kau tue, ca' dipelopasei ca' disalipei," jie.
43019011	Samut Yesus, "Den bekuwaso pun go deri Allaham. Mun noe si mat cumam kuwaso den na' pekoti pun ken aku," jie Yesus. "Mangko reng yeng nyerah ku ke' dénam yeng bosai dosoe," jie.
43019012	Ningo omóng Yesus bungi nyoe tei' lalu Pilatus ngemoran na' ngelopas Yesus, pie pada' reng Yahudi yeng rami nyeh mangkas ontap pera' perango, "Berang reng yeng bereni madah direte rajo si mat bemunsoh belawan ken Rajo Kaisar!" jie sidoe. "Mun reng tue dipelopas den maksute den pun bemunsoh jum ken Rajo Kaisar!"
43019013	Jedi mátam. Dah ningo omóng sidoe rami bungi nyoe tei' Pilatus pun nyeraham. Dah nyoe Yesus dibeyie keluwar, lalu Pilatus pun dudo' di belai pengadele*, di arong yeng bedemo Lantai Betu. Lem paner Ibrani nyeh demoe Gabata. Jedi Pilatus mat dudo' dinyoam.
43019014	Ari nyoe pun mat dah ari persiyap nyo' reng ngalu Ari Raya Ngelalu nyeh; mayo ari nyeh benso jam nam bekolam*. Jedi dah nyoe jie Pilatus, "Ti beh kam, tue ne rajo kam!" jie.
43019015	Pie sidoe simah bepangkas kayis pera' perango, "Bunoh ja'! Bunoh ja'! Salip ja' iyo!" jie. Samut Pilatus, "Nyeh rajo kam ca' disalip aku peh?" Pie jie ketuwo reng Yahudi, "Kami ngat siko' Kaisaram rajo kami! Cum rajo layin!" jie reng Yahudi.
43019016	Lalu pengabise Pilatus mat nyerah Yesus ke' sidoe gei' disalipe. Sidoe pun mat meyie Yesus deri nyoe.
43019017	Jedi Yesus nangong salip direte, pamus deri kota manu ke' arong demo Kerakah Kepalo. Lem paner Ibrani tei' demoe Golgota.
43019018	Dinyoe sidoe mat nyalipe. A, do duwo ko' reng layin yeng disalip ari nyoe jum; siko' di kiboe siko' di kanáne; Yesus tei' disalip di penenongah sidoe duwo nyeh.
43019019	Jedi mátam. Salipe tei' ditebeng ken ketukong papan yeng ditulis Gubernor Pilatus ken penomah pendudoh reng Yahudi ke' hal Yesus. Jie tulise tei', "Tue Yesus deri Nasaret, rajo reng Yahudi."
43019020	Lalu mat benya'am reng Yahudi yeng merati tulis di papan nyeh te', go arong Yesus disalip kin noe di arong sunyei' peh, mat di soma' kota Yerusalem, lalu tulise pun ditulis lem paner Ibrani, lem paner Latin ken lem paner Yunani ge'em.
43019021	Dah nyoe pada' ketuwo pelayan reng Yahudi nyeh muhún mampal ke' Pilatus gei' iyo ngubah tulise. "Gopai go den nulis Tue rajo reng Yahudi?" jie sidoe. "Menurute yeng ca' ditulis nyeh iyoam yeng madah direte rajo reng Yahudi," jie.
43019022	Pie samut Pilatus, "Pai yeng dah ditulis le' aku noe tawu diubah dialeh," jie.
43019023	Jedi mátam te'. Dah Yesus disalip nyeh dah nyoe pekakase diamie le' pada' serededu, dibegi sidoe empat, siko' sebegi. Do beju jubahe si gei' disisehe ke' layin, go beju jubahe tei' asale ditonún lintus jediam, cum bepenjeyi' deri atas sampai ke' beroh.
43019024	Mangko jie sidoe, "Rugiam dicabi' to' dibegi diret empat, dih? Diret cabut uni ja'. Sopai ja' yeng konoe nyoe yeng buleh," jie. Mangko mat digewaie ponyoe le' serededu nyeh. Nyoe pun tejedi kei nuntong yeng ditijum lem Kitap Allah nyomie, yeng bungie potue, Pekakas ku dibecar-becare ke' pado sidoe; ken sidoe cabut uni, sopai yeng konoe, buleh beju ku, jie. (Masmur 22:18)
43019025	Jedi soma' salip Yesus tei' do ino'e, ken menyadie betinoe ino'e, ken Maria bini Klopas, a, ken Maria Magdalena ge'em.
43019026	Jedi Yesus pun merati ke' ino'e te', ken murite yeng siko' yeng dikasehe ge'em, yeng bediri dinyoe jum. Lalu jie Yesus nyingka' ino'e, "Murit ku tue kei ana' den beh?" jie.
43019027	Dah nyoe jie nyingka' murite yeng siko' nyeh te', "Ino' ku tue kei ino' kau gei' kau noyu merintu sen," jie Yesus. Lalu dudo' ari nyoe murit nyoe mat noyu merintu ino' Yesus di rumah direte.
43019028	Jedi mátam. Yesus pun tawu dah ken tue dah santo' dah gewaie. Lalu jie Yesus, "Ku na' insup." Nyoe pun kei nuntong yeng ditulis di lem Kitap Allah nyeh.
43019029	Jedi di soma' salip nyeh do sebuwah tepayan kocit yeng bisei' ayie angur masam. Dah nyoe siko' serededu nyeh ngencelup jolu keedah urat kumpai ke' lem ayie angur masam nyeh; dah dicelupe dicuco'e ke' penjulo'*, lalu dijola'e ke' nyawo Yesus.
43019030	Jedi dah dicucupe dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Dah santo' dah gewai ku," jie. Dah nyoe iyo nuno' kepaloe ken nyerah nyawo direte.
43019031	Jedi ari nyoe pun Ari Persiyap, go pagi ponyoe Ari Berenti Kerejo yeng paling penting. Jedi ngaso ponyoe pada' pemimpin agama Yahudi manu ke' Pilatus, minta' ijin ke' Pilatus nyo' matah kaki reng tigo ko' yeng disalip, gei' sidoe copat mati. Go kona' pada' pemimpin tei' sempayo gei' bengkai reng tigo yeng disalip nyeh copat diturun deri salipe, gei' noe tegentong di salip dah pas ari bosai nyeh pagie ponyoe.
43019032	Jedi mátam. Pilatus tei' mat ngutus beberopai ko' serededue ento' matah kaki reng disalip nyeh. Lalu serededu pun manu kinun. Detang kinun mat dipatahe le' sidoe kaki reng duwo ko' yeng disalip beroto ken Yesus.
43019033	Pie dah manu ke' Yesus nyeh diperati le' sidoe tei' Yesus dah mati dah. Lalu bula'am sidoe matah kaki Yesus.
43019034	Pie do siko' serededu antaro sidoe yeng ngerojok kepepuwang Yesus ken tuma'e, lalu ngencerorok keluwar derah becampor ayie.
43019035	Aku siko' yeng merati tei' nyaksie ken mato kepalo diret ku, lalu akuam besaksi ke' hal nyoe; saksi ku pun mat bujor benar. Aku tawu ken saksi ku ke' hal nyoe mat benar, mangko ku padah ke' kam yeng becoe gei' kam pun pecayo.
43019036	Yeng tejedi pun mat tejedi gei' dituntong yeng ditulis di lem Kitap Allah mie. Go yeng ditulis di lem Kitap Allah nyomie bungie potue: Sutie pun cum tulange yeng dipatah.* (Masmur 34:20)
43019037	Ge'em ditulis jum di lem Kitap Sen mie bungie potue: Sidoe langko' mantau ke' reng yeng ditikame.* (Sakaria 12:10)
43019038	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe do siko' reng bedemo Yusup, deri kampong Arimatea di peloya' Yudea. Iyo tei' kenaken murit Yesus jum, pie iyo caro besesulit nyem, go iyo gola'e ken pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi. Jedi Yusup tei' manu ke' Pilatus, minta' gei' bengkai Yesus diserah ke' iyo nyo' iyo masare. Pilatus pun mat ngemborie. Dah diijin le' Pilatus tei' lalu Yusup pun mat manu ke' salip nyeh lalu ngamie bengkai Yesus.
43019039	Tamahe tei' Nikodemus, yeng nyomie ponyoe manu ngomóng ken Yesus malam ari nyeh. Nikodemus tei' meyie pada' rerempah binya' ancit ken geru, pemenya'e kurang lobeh tigo puloh kilo, nyo' ngarum bengkai Yesus nyeh.
43019040	Jedi dah diamie bengkai Yesus tei' dah nyoe dibungkus sidoe ken kain kapan yeng lopue, ken pada' rerempah ge'em, cuco' ken adat pemasar.
43019041	Jedi soma' arong Yesus disalip tei' do kebun. Di kebun nyoe do guwo yeng kusus nyo' tama', yeng ditobo' reng deri lubang betu. Tama' nyoe gei' bungas, bolum do dipakai.
43019042	Mangko sidoe ngengguno tama' guwo yeng soma' nyeh. Mat ngongkah bengkai Yesus dinyoe lo'e. Go ari nyoe kin dah Ari Persiyap dah. Pagie ponyoe mat Ari Berenti Kerejo (mangko sidoe ca' copat masar Yesus sebolum Ari Berenti Kerejo nyeh).
43020001	Jedi mátam. Dah kolam nyama' ari Mingu nyeh Maria Magdalena nyeh manu ke' tama' Yesus. Ari pun gei' sagam, berue na' bukoe tampa'. Jedi dah detang ke' guwo tama' Yesus tei' diperati Maria tei' betu tudong guwo nyeh dah tebering dah deri lubang guwo nyeh.
43020002	Ngaso ponyoe Maria pun bebodap manu ke' Simon Petrus ken murit Yesus yeng siko' yeng dikaseh le' Yesus. Tang kinun jie Maria nyingka' sidoe, "Tuwowe diret dah diamie reng dah deri tama'e. Kami noe tawu dialeh reng kinai nin," jie.
43020003	-
43020004	Ningo omónge bungi nyoe tei' Petrus ken murit Yesus yeng siko' nyeh turun bebodap manu ke' tama' Yesus, pie murite yeng siko' tei' ngelampat Petrus lalu dolu detang ke' tama' nyeh.
43020005	Dah detang ke' tama' tei' iyo nyunup merati ke' delam. Peratie tei' tingal kain kapane dam. Pie iyo noe tamoe ke' delam.
43020006	Simon Petrus si dudi kit. Pie dah detang tei' iyo si lintus tamoe ke' delam. Lalu diperatie tei' mat tingal kain kapan dam,
43020007	ken kain pembungkus kepaloe pun do jum dinyoe, belipat panci, jewoh kit deri kain kapan nyeh.
43020008	Dah nyoe murit yeng siko' yeng dolu tadie ponyoe mat tamoe jum ke' delam. Dah merati ke' delam lalu iyo mat pecayoam.
43020009	Go sidoe sampai saát nyoe kin gei' bolum jelase ken maksut pada' tijum lem Kitap Allah yeng madah ken Yesus mat ca' mati ken bengki' idup agei'. Dah merati ken mato kepalo direte berue becocat jelasam.
43020010	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe murit Yesus mat pulangam,
43020011	pie Maria diyam dinyoam, bediri soma' tama' nyeh simah nangisam. Kebonónge nangis tei' iyo nyunup merati ke' delam.
43020012	Diperatie di delam tei' do duwo ko' melekat yeng bepekakas puteh, yeng dudo' di arong bokas bengkai Yesus tadie ponyoe, yeng siko' piya' ke' kepalo, yeng siko' piya' ke' kakie.
43020013	Jedi jie melekat nyingka' Maria, "Nyeh gopai go kau nangis ponyoe?" jie. Samut Maria, "Go Tuwowe ku losi, diamie reng," jie. "Aku pun noe tawu dialeh reng konai," jie.
43020014	Dah nyoe iyo pusing belekang pamus deri guwo nyeh te'. Tumas pamus tei' diperatie do reng bediri dinyoe, pie iyo noe tekenale ken nyoe mat Yesus.
43020015	Jedi jie Yesus, "Nyeh ngopai go kau nangis? Ngogoe sopai kau tue?" jie. Kaji Maria tei' iyo tukang kebun nyeh. Jedi samut Maria, "Mun kau yeng ngaleh bengkaie padaham ke' aku dinai kau ngongkahe, nyo' ku ngamie," jie Maria.
43020016	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Maria!" Ningo Yesus nyebut demoe tei' Maria pun beputar ngadap Yesus, lalu "Raboni!" jie Maria. Raboni tei' retie guru lem paner Aramaik.
43020017	Dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Nang lo' migang aku," jie, "go aku bolum manu ke' Apa' ku dinun. Jedi kau ca' manu ke' menyadie ku yeng seimán lo'e, bepadah ke' sidoe ken aku tue dah na' manu ke' Apa' diret. Sen mat Allah ku ken Allah kam jum," jie Yesus.
43020018	Lalu Maria Magdalena pun mat manu bepadah ke' pada' murit Yesus. "Ku dah merati Tuwowe diret!" jie Maria. Lalu dipadahe jum yeng disuroh le' Yesus ca' dipadah ke' sidoe.
43020019	Jedi mátam. Ari pun dah malam dah, pie manseh ari Mingu nyoam. Pada' murit Yesus nyeh nongah bekumpol, pie lawang nyeh ditokate kukoh go sidoe gola' ken pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi. Jedi dah nyoe temosie Yesus temeronyong bediri di penenongah sidoe, lalu jie, "Tenáng amánam kam," jie.
43020020	Dah nyoe iyo nganyoe ke' sidoe bekale di jerie ken di pepuwange. Ngaso mat-mátam Tuwowe nyeh tei' mangko pada' murite mat ayah bikaham.
43020021	Dah nyoe iyo ngemberekat sidoe agei'am. "Tenáng amánam ati kam," jie. Lalu jie, "Na' po aku diutus le' Apa' ku mie ponyoe jum aku pun ngutus kam," jie.
43020022	Dah nyoe iyo ngenciyup napase ke' sidoe, lalu jie, "Terimoam kam Roh Allah," jie.
43020023	"Mangko kam bekuwaso madah reng ke' hal dosoe. Mun jie kam dosoe dah dielon nyeh mat dielonam. Pie mun jie kam noe dielon nyeh mat noam dielon," jie Yesus.
43020024	Jedi Tomas tei' nongah cum des Yesus manu ke' murite yeng layin. Tomas kin siko' deri murit Yesus yeng duwo belas ko' jum; gelare Komar.
43020025	Jedi pada' murite layin bepadah ke' Tomas, "Kami si dah merati Tuwowe dah, Tomasei," jie. "Iyo dah bengki' idup agei'am dah," jie sidoe. Pie Tomas gei' bolum pecayoe. "Aku si," jie Tomas, "noe pecayo ku," jie. "Aku ca' merati bekal paku di jerie," jie, "ca' nigue bekale ken tunyo' diret ku, ca' nyuco' jeri ku ke' bekal di pepuwange, berue ku pecayo," jie Tomas.
43020026	Jedi mátam. Dah ari Mingu sebuwahe pada' murite bekumpol agei' lem rumah nyoe. Tomas pun nongah do. Lawange si ditokat kukoh-kukoh. Jedi kebonóng sidoe do dinyoe tei' temosie detangam Yesus, bediri di penenongah sidoe, lalu ngemberekat sidoe: "Tenáng amánam kam," jie.
43020027	Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' Tomas, "Peratiam jeri ku tue, tiguam ke' bekale," jie. "Asoam bekal di pepuwang ku tue ken jeri diret kau," jie. "Pecayoam ken aku. Jediam kau noe pecayo," jie Yesus.
43020028	Samut Tomas, "Den mat Tuwowe ku, mat Allah ku," jie.
43020029	Lalu jie Yesus nyingka'e, "Kau si pecayo go mantau ken mato muko diret kau," jie. "Pi untong tuwaham reng yeng pecayo sungoh pun cum mantau aku ken mato muko direte," jie Yesus.
43020030	Mat gei' suba'am pada' petanah petano layin yeng dipulah le' Yesus yeng diperati le' kami murite. Pie noe ditulis di lem buko' tue.
43020031	Ja'e senika' yeng ditulis ditue si maksute gei' kam pecayo ken Yesus mat Ana' Allah, Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi Sen. Maksute sopai ja' yeng pecayo nyeh mat buleh idup, tam kuwaso demo Yesus.
43021001	Jedi ke' hal Yesus nganyoe direte ke' murite mat tejedi sekali agei'am di Lompoe Tiberias.* Potue ne gesahe.
43021002	Jedi kememujore murit Yesus do bekumpol. Yeng bekumpol tei' Simon Petrus, Tomas yeng digelar jum Komar, Natanael deri kampong Kana di Galilea, ana' Sebedeus yeng duwo ko' nyeh, a, ken murit Yesus yeng layin yeng duwo ko' ge'em.
43021003	Jedi jie Simon Petrus tei', "Ku na' ngenjelo," jie. Samut pada' betore, "Kami na' tamah kau jum." Lalu sidoe mat pamus deri rumah lalu nayi' perawue. Nungkas malam sidoe ngenjelo nyeh, pie siko' pun cum pekulehe.
43021004	Jedi dah bukoe tampa' tei' Yesus pun bediri di pinger pantai nyeh, pie kaji murite noe iyo Yesus.
43021005	Lalu jie Yesus, "Buleh noe kam?" "Eh, pai jolue beh," jie sidoe nyamute.
43021006	Lalu jie Yesus, "Boh dikibar ke' piya' kanán perawu kam nyeh. Dinyoe ne berue kam buleh kaloe ye'," jie. Lalu sidoe pun mat ngibar jeloe ke' piya' kanán perawu nyeh te', pie sidoe gei' bolum tawu ken iyo mat Yesus. Dah dikibare tei' semorie noleh sidoe nari' jeloe ke' lem perawu nyeh tam kebenya' ikane.
43021007	Ngaso ponyoe jie murit yeng dikaseh le' Yesus nyeh nyingka' Petrus, "Nyoe mat Tuwowe diret, kamei!" jie. Tumas kedingo ken nyoe mat Tuwowe tei' Petrus pun bekereropa' nyaro' bejue yeng dipucele tadie ponyoe, lalu bung! ngencabur ke' ayie kedonáng nuju ke' derat.
43021008	Pada' murit layin pun ngenjurut jum, pie sidoe deri perawu nyeh, samel ngunui jelo yeng beisei' pada' ikan nyeh tadie. Go sidoe noe dam jewoh deri derat, benso seratus meter ke' deng nyoe penjewohe.
43021009	Jedi dah detang ke' derat, dah turun deri perawu tei' perati sidoe poe dah do dah beroe api, a, ken ikan ken roti nyeh dah dipangang di atase.
43021010	Lalu jie Yesus nyingka' sidoe, "Beyiam kitue siko' duwo ikan dongah kam tadie," jie.
43021011	Mangko Simon Petrus nayi' agei' ke' perawu nyo' ngunui jelo meyie ke' derat. Mat benya' nar uleh jelo nyeh; ikane pun bosai-bosaiam, 153 ko' pemenya'e. Pie numo' pun menya' nyoe uleh nyeh tei' jelo nyeh noe ruma'.
43021012	Jedi dah ikan nyeh dibeyie ke' derat tei' dah nyoe jie Yesus, "Yo' makan," jie. Siko' pun cum deri murite yeng bereni betanyoe ke' iyo ken sopai iyo tei', mat Yesusei, noei. Go kenaken si sidoe yakin dah ken iyo mat Tuwowe.
43021013	Jedi Yesus tei' manu ke' soma' api, dijepaie roti nyeh, dibecare ke' sidoe. Ikan nyeh pun dijepaie, dibecare jum ke' sidoe.
43021014	Jedi mátam, nyoe pengentigo kalie Yesus nganyoe direte ke' murite lopas iyo bengki' idup agei' deri kematie.
43021015	Jedi mátam. Dah lopas makan tei' dah nyoe Yesus betanyoe ke' Simon Petrus, "Simon ana' Yona," jie. "Kaseh kau ken aku mat bosai peh deri kaseh betor kau tue?" jie Yesus. Jie samut Petrus, "Mátam, Tuwowe," jie, "Kau pun tawu ken aku mat kaseh ken kau." "Mun ponyoe," jie Yesus, "kau ca' ngumpan pada' ana' domo ku," jie.
43021016	Dah nyoe ditanyoe agei' le' Yesus. "Simon, ana' Yona," jie. "Mat kaseh noe kau ken aku?" jie. Samut Petrus, "Mátam, Tuwowei. Kau pun tawu ken aku mat kaseh ken kau," jie. "Mun ponyoe," jie Yesus, "kau ca' noyu merintu pada' domo ku," jie.
43021017	Dah nyoe Yesus betanyoe agei', ketigo kalie, ke' Simon Petrus. "Mat kaseh noe kau ken aku, Simon ana' Yonaei?" Petrus pun susaham atie tam dah tigo kali ken nyoe iyo ditanyoe le' Yesus ke' hal kaseh iyo te'. Lalu samut Petrus, "Kau semuya' tawu, Tuwowei. Kau si tawuam ken aku mat kaseh ken kau," jie. "Mun ponyoe," jie Yesus, "kau ca' ngumpan noyu pada' domo ku," jie. Dah nyoe Yesus nyamong panere.
43021018	"Dingo beh, Simonei. Semeja' kau gei' mudoe mie bediret kauam yeng ngurus semuya' keperelu kau; kau na' kitue kinyoe sebetah nunoe kona' kemawo' diret kau nyem; cum reng nonga' melempang kau. Ja'e dah kau tuwo gi si kau langko' ngenjola' jeri kau gei' ditamat reng layin, yeng langko' ngiring kau ke' arong yeng noe dikeingín kau. Nyoe mat-mátam, Simonei," jie Yesus.
43021019	Omóng Yesus bungi nyoe kin iyo betijum ke' hal caro Petrus langko' mati gi, nyo' iyo ngagong Allah. Dah nyoe jie Yesus nyingka' Petrus, "Pie kau ca' mutu ngenjurut akuam," jie.
43021020	Dah nyoe Petrus ngelinga' ke' belekang. Diperatie tei' do murit yeng dikaseh le' Yesus yeng ngenjurut sidoe jum di pantai nyeh te'. Murit nyoam yeng bejonyang makan ken Yesus des sidoe ngalu Ari Raya mie. Kin murit nyoam jum yeng betanyoe ke' Tuwowe mie ke' hal sopai yeng langko' nyerahe.
43021021	Jedi mátam, dah merati murit nyoe tei' lalu Petrus pun betanyoe ke' Yesus, "Tuwowe," jie, "pai yeng langko' tejedi ke' iyo tue gi?" jie.
43021022	Samut Yesus, "Mun ku na' nyuroh iyo tetap idup sampai aku bebeli' kitue si nyoe noe iyo kei namah kekalut kau," jie. "Yeng penting si kau ca' mutu ngenjurut akuam," jie Yesus.
43021023	Lalu entam omóng Yesus bungi nyoe tei' mangko tegemparam di antaro pada' menyadie yeng seimán nyeh ken murit nyoe noe langko' mati, pasti idup sampai Yesus bebeli' kitue, jie reng. Teruhale noe Yesus bepadah ken murit nyoe langko' noe mati peh. Yeng jie Yesus tei' mun ku na' nyuroh iyo idup sampai ku bebeli' kitue si noe noe iyo kei namah kekalut kau, jie. Ngat nyoam.
43021024	Jedi mátam. Mat aku, murit nyoam yeng merati ken ningo semuya' tue, lalu ku nulise. Aku mat yakin ken besaksi ken semuya' yeng ku tulis tue mat-mátam.
43021025	A, pada' gewai Yesus yeng layin pun gei' suba' benya'am yeng noe ditulis di lem buko' tue. Pie kira' umpamoe mampu ditulis bis pada' gewaie pun engo ku manseh noe muwát seruroh deniyo tue tam kebenya' pada' buko' nyeh.
44001001	Tue ditulis ke' Teopilus: Di lem buko' ku yeng pertamo mie ku tulis pada' semuya' gewai Yesus, ken pada' pengajare mie,
44001002	deri epune sampai ke' ari iyo diangki' pulang ke' serugo. Jedi mátam. Sebolum iyo pulang ke' serugo mie Yesus makai kuwaso Roh Allah nyo' madah posane ke' pada' pelantar posan yeng dah dipilehe.
44001003	Dah iyo mati di salip lalu bengki' idup agei' si iyo erat nan nganyoe direte ke' pada' pelantar posane, ngemboktie, gei' noe tawu reng nyangkal ken iyo mat bengki' idup. Empat puloh ari pelamate iyo nan serarat nganyoe direte ke' sidoe, ngembokti ken direte mat idup, ge'em ngajar ke' hal keada'e des Allah disomah kei rajo.
44001004	Sekali ketiko Yesus bekumpol ponyoe ken murite iyo bepadah potue. "Kam," jie, "nang lo' pamus deri kota Yerusalem tue, pie ca' nungu lo'e Pengunyo' yeng dah dijenyi le' Apa' ku ke' kam mie. Go kam pun dah tawu dah ken pemadah ku ke' kam ke' hal Pengunyo' nyeh.
44001005	Kin aku dah madah ke' kam ken Yohanes Penyolam mat nyolam urang ke' lem ayie, pi dah nyoe gi kam langko' na' disolam ke' lem Roh Allah, ya'am kam langko' nerimoe Roh Allah. Nyoe si noe dam lamat, kamei, mangko kam ca' betungu lo'e ditue," jie Yesus. Nyoe kin do di lem buko' ku yeng pertamo, Teopilusei.
44001006	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe sekali agei' murite bekumpol ken Yesus di Buki' Saitun, di luwar kota Yerusalem nun. Lalu sidoe betanyoe ke' iyo, "Tuwowe," jie, "tuam peh jengkahe kau langko' nyuroh kami reng Israel bekuwaso agei', gei' mangkue meloh nenggeri layin na' po nyomiam?" jie murite.
44001007	Ja'e samut Yesus, "Kam noe ge' ca' tawu ke' hal jengkah nyoe. Nyoe hak Apa' ku die. Apa' kuam yeng dah nentu jengkahe ken arie ento' semuya' nyoe tejedi.
44001008	"Kam si mat cagar buleh kuwaso deri Allah, sal ge' Roh Allah dah detang ke' kam. Dah nyoe kam menjedi belo saksi ku, nyo' ngelantar posan ku betongai di kota Yerusalem tue, lalu ke' segonáp peloya' Yudea ken peloya' Samaria, sampai ke' pemuntol deniyo," jie Yesus.
44001009	Jedi dah iyo beposan ponyoe tei' diperati le' sidoe iyo pun mat diangki', pas di adap mato muko sidoe, sampai teselinong románg di langi' nun, sampai noe awas le' sidoe.
44001010	Jedi murite simah nelomáte ke' langi' nun, nengkadah merati Yesus diangki'. Kebonóng sidoe nelomát nengkadah ke' langi' tei' temosi temeronyong reng duwo ko' bepekakas puteh, lalu bediri di soma' sidoe.
44001011	Jedi jie reng duwo ko' nyeh, "Gopai go simah nengkadah ke' langi' nun, kam Galilea?" jie. "Go Yesus yeng kam perati terangki' tadie," jie, "tue dah di serugo nun dah; ja'e iyo pun langko' turun agei' ke' deniyo tue. Na' po kam merati iyo terangki' tadie, ponyoe jum iyo turun ke' deniyo tue gi," jie sidoe duwo nyingka' pada' murit Yesus.
44001012	Jedi dah nyoe murit Yesus turun deri Buki' Saitun pulang ke' kota Yerusalem. Buki' Saitun si soma' ken Kota Yerusalem, penjewohe kurang lobeh sepal.
44001013	Jedi dah detang ke' rumah di Yerusalem lalu sidoe nayi' ke' loteng, ke' kamar yeng selomoe nan ditumpang sidoe. Yeng numpang dinyoe ya'am Petrus, Yohanes, Yakobus, Andreas, Pilipus, Tomas, Bartolomeus, Matius, Yakobus ana' Alpeus, Simon Patriot, ken Yudas ana' Yakobus.
44001014	Sidoe erat bekumpol dinyoe, serarat bedoa seati sepiker. Reng betinoe pun do jum yeng bekumpol ken sidoe, ken Maria ino' Yesus, ken pada' menyadie Yesus lelaki ge'em.
44001015	Jedi dah nyoe mátam. Sidoe seimán nyeh mat bekumpol dinyoe. Pemenya' sidoe yeng bekumpol kurang lobeh 120 ko'. Lalu Beberopai surat yeng ditulis le' Paulus ke' umát gereja, benso Epesus, Kolose Pilipi, Pilemon, Timotius ken Titus ditulis des iyo dipenjero di Roma. dah nyoe Petrus pun bediri na' ngomóng ken sidoe.
44001016	"Jedi kam waris wala' kawum kerabat ku," jie Petrus, "tue diret na' bepempaham ngogoe penggenti Yudas. Jedi yeng dah tejedi ken Yudas pun," jie Petrus, "mat dititah le' Allah ca' tejedi tokoh nyoe, kei nuntong yeng ditulis di lem Kitap Sen mie. Go Roh Allaham yeng bepadah nyomie ngelalu Kei' Daud, betijum ke' hal Yudas yeng ngiring reng yeng nangkap Yesus mie.
44001017	"Menurute si," jie Petrus, "ca' Yudasam yeng menjedi saksi ke' hal kebengki' Yesus, go iyo kin sekabanam ken kami sebelas nyomie, dipileh jum ento' melayan po kami.
44001018	Pie hal Yudas nyeh iyo yeng ngiring reng yeng nangkap Yesus. Dah nyoe duwit upah gewaie yeng jat nyeh digunoe kei moli tanah kebun sebidang. Dinyoam iyo mati, jetue tepetingkap lalu tebure bisam karam porute.
44001019	Mat gemparam agah nyoe sampai tawu bisam pada' reng Yerusalem, lalu tanah nyoe didemo reng Akeldama, retie lem paner sidoe Tanah Derah.
44001020	A, nyoe pun," jie Petrus, "cuco' jum ken yeng ditulis lem kitap Masmur mie, yeng bungie potue, Kiroe kediyame sunyei' senyápam, cumam reng diyam dinyoe.* A, do jum tijum layin yeng ditulis di kitap Masmur mie, yeng bungie potue, Kiroe tugase diserah ke' reng layin die, jie lem kitap Masmur nyeh.
