44001022	"Jedi tue," jie Petrus, "ca' do reng siko' nyo' penggenti Yudas, kei menjedi saksi samo po kami ke' hal kebengki' Yesus Tuwowe diret. Penggentie ca' reng yeng nan nyeroto diret yeng nan namah Yesus, deri Yesus disolam le' Yohanes mie sampai ke' iyo dibeyie pulang ke' serugo," jie Petrus nyingka' reng pecayo yeng bekumpol dinyoe.
44001023	Lalu mátam. Dah nyoe sidoe mileh reng duwo ko' kei calon penggenti Yudas. Yeng siko' tei' Yusup, yeng didemo reng jum Barsabas atau pun Yustus. Yeng siko' tei' Matias.
44001024	Lalu sebolum na' cabut uni sidoe pun bedoa. "O Tuwowe," jie sidoe bedoa. "Den yeng tawu isei' ati semuya' mensiyo. Padaham ke' kami, Tuwowei, sopai di antaro reng duwo tue yeng dah Den pileh
44001025	ento' melayan Den kei pelantar posan payit Den, kei melaju tugas yeng ditingal le' Yudas nyo' iyo manu ke' arong yeng patut begi iyo," jie doa sidoe.
44001026	Dah nyoe uni pun dicabut, poe pas konoe ke' Matias. Mangko iyo dipileh kei melayan ken sidoe sebelas pelantar posan.
44002001	Jedi mátam. Dah Ari Pentakosta*, ari pesta bosai nyeh, pada' reng pecayo do bekumpol di lem sebuwah rumah.
44002002	Dah nyoe temosie kedingo siyut! na' po bungi buwowe ontapam deri langi'; mat ontapam bungie di segonáp rumah arong sidoe bekumpol.
44002003	Tumas kedingo bungi nyoe temosi diperati le' sidoe do jolu turun tokohe na' po dewun api benyaloam. Sidoe yeng do dinyoe rato-rato diingap le' jolu yeng tokoh dewun api benyalo nyeh.
44002004	Lalu semuya' sidoe pun lintus dikuwaso le' Roh Allah. Dah dikuwaso le' Roh Allah sidoe pun betongai bepaner pakai pada' paner layin layin. Go Roh Allah pun nguwaso sidoe rato-rato gei' tawu bepaner paner yeng selomoe sidoe noe tawue.
44002005	Jedi ketiko nyoe di kota Yerusalem do pada' reng Yahudi yeng tuno' taalo' ke' Allah yeng asale deri seruroh nenggeri nenggero di deniyo, pie diyam di kota Yerusalem.
44002006	Jedi mátam. Kolam nyoe tei' pada' reng rami pun ningo bungi kejedi enah aneh di arong reng pecayo bekumpol nyeh, lalu kedebus pada' reng rami bekerumún bekumpol dinyoe jum. Tekanyatam pada' reng rami nyeh, mat tecengángam go rato-rato sidoe ningo reng yeng dikuwaso Roh Allah nyeh bepaner lem paner seari-ari sidoe reng rami yeng ningoe.
44002007	Paling kangápam reng rami nyeh. "Wai," jie, "tue enah nar," jie, "go sidoe yeng bepaner tue kin pada' reng Galilea nyem," jie.
44002008	"Pi kotilah diret ningo sidoe bepaner tue noe iyo paner Galilea peh, pie sidoe bepaner seli paner pada' diret tue die!
44002009	Teruhal diret tue seli deri pada' nenggeri layin di seruroh deniyo tue. Reng Patiya pun do, reng Media reng Elam pun do, reng Mesopotamia pun do, reng Yudea pun do, reng Kapadokia pun do, reng Pontus pun do, reng Asia pun do,
44002010	reng Prigia pun do, reng Pampilia pun do, demo ke' reng Mesir, demo ke'....reng deri pada' peloya' di nenggeri Libia yeng soma' kota Kirene. Reng deri kota Roma pun do.
44002011	Pada' reng seli Yahudi pun do, reng benso layin yeng bepinah agama ke' agama Yahudi pun do. Reng deri Kreta, deri Arab, deri....macam-macam nenggeri, diret tue. Pi semuya' diret rato-rato ningo sidoe ken paner diret masing-masing, madah keenah keaneh yeng dipulah le' Allah!" jie reng rami.
44002012	Mat tekanyat, kangápam pada' reng rami nyeh, "Pai reti keenah keaneh tokoh tue?" jie sidoe, betentanyoe ke' betore.
44002013	Ja'e paroe reng rami nyeh ngeolo'-olo'am. "Eis," jie, "mabo' nyem beh sidoe," jie.
44002014	Dah nyoe Petrus pun bediri, beroto ken kabane sebelas ko' pelantar posan. Iyo mat ngomóng ontap nyingka' pada' reng rami. "O kam reng Yahudi, ken semuya' segeno kam yeng diyam di Yerusalem tue," jie Petrus. "Dingo beh kam," jie, "ku ngenjelase, pai ge' tuju maksute keenah keaneh tue.
44002015	Kam benya' ngaji kami tue mabo'," jie, "pie kami noe mabo'. Sa'am tue gei' bekolam nyama', berue ge' jam semilan, noe ken dah mabo'," jie Petrus.
44002016	"Yeng mat si," jie Petrus, "yeng kam perati ken yeng kam dingo tue nyo' nyuco' ken tijum penijum Yoel nyomie.
44002017	Penijum Yoel nyomie kin nulis pemadah Allah yeng bebungi potue: Dah jengkah ari pengudah nun gi Aku langko' ngunyo' Roh Ku secaro buwar ke' segonáp mensiyo. Dah nyoe pada' ana' kam lelaki ken ana' kam betinoe pun mun dah nerimoe Roh Ku langko' madah pemadah Aku; A, pada' kam reng mudoe langko' keedah lem sensonam merati jolu yeng Ku anyoe ke' kam; pada' kam reng tuwo langko' bemimpi mimpi deri Aku, go kam dikediyam Roh Ku.
44002018	Malah ken paie, jie Allah lem kitap penijum Yoel nyeh, Aku langko' ngunyo' Roh Ku secaro buwar ke' pada' semuya' reng yeng tuno' taalo' ke' Aku, beyi' lelaki beyi' betinoe, mangko sidoe langko' betijum jum.
44002019	Aku langko' mulah keenah keaneh di langi' nun, ken petanah petano di deniyo tue, ya'am derah, ken api, ken asap yeng bebuwal.
44002020	Mato ari langko' menjedi sagam, bulan menjedi mirah keedah derah. Semuya' nyoe langko' tejedi sebolum Ari Tuwowe* yeng tekemuko, yeng agong.
44002021	Pado ari nyoe sopai ja' yeng nyapo minta' tulong atas kuwaso demo Aku Tuwowe mat langko' ditulong Aku, jie Allah ngelalu penijum Yoel nyomie. (Yoel 3:1-5) Mangko," jie Petrus, "yeng kam merati kolam tue pun cuco' ken tijum Yoel mie," jie.
44002022	Lalu Petrus madah reng rami ke' hal Yesus. "Dingo beh kam reng Israel," jie Petrus. "Jedi Yesus reng Nasaret nyeh mat disah le' Allah ke' kam; caro Allah ngesahe go Allah nguwaso iyo gei' iyo ngelaku pada' keenah keaneh pada' petanah petano di adap kam mie. Kam pun dah tawu kam dah, go pada' gewaie mie nyato nar di adap kam.
44002023	Numo' pun ponyoe manseh kam munohe! Ja'e nyoe pun go Allah dah mutuse dah ken Yesus ca' diserah ke' kam; nyoam anang Sen deri nyomiam, Sen dah tawu Sen dah. Jedi dah Yesus diserah nyeh, kam die yeng munohe, go kam nyuroh reng jat munohe di salip.
44002024	Pie dah nyoe Allah ngidupe agei', nyurohe bengki' idup agei'am. Sen ngelopase deri kesensare mati, go iyo noe tawu kalah tam kemati.
44002025	"A, koloe jum Rajo Daud mie betijum ke' hal Yesus tue. Yeng ditijum mie bungie potue: Aku tawu ku ken Tuwowe nan ngiring ngaping aku, Sen nan nulong aku. Kuwaso Sen yeng bosai nagang aku, gei' aku noe lomah.
44002026	Nyoam go ati ku nan ayah bikah, mulut ku nan besukor bepugi. Numo' pun aku mat noe timu rajang di belekang pi manseh gei' do arap ku, noam ku gedoh ngaji kemati tuboh ku.
44002027	Go Den noam melebu roh ku serarat mati. Noam Den melebu tuboh pelayan Den yeng suci sampai buro' lico'.
44002028	Den nyuroh ku idup agei', Den dah nunyo' ke' aku jelan yeng nuju ke' idup. Aku beayah bikah, mat geram so ati ku tam idup begelumo ken Den. (Masmur 16:8-11) Nyoe ditijum Rajo Daud mie," jie Petrus.
44002029	"Pada' waris wala' ku," jie Petrus, "dingo beh aku tue. Ku na' ngenjelase ke' kam hal tuju maksut tijum Kei' Daud tadie. Jedi potue ne. Kei' Daud kin dah mati dah, dah dipasar dah, malah ken paie tama' sen pun noe ge' die jewoh ken diret tue, mun na' meratie pun gei' manseh ye' tama' sen dinun. Mangko tijum tadie noe ken ke' hal diret sen bangam, go bengkai sen gei' manseh lem tama' sen.
44002030	"Pie Allah," jie Petrus, "dah bejenyi ke' Kei' Daud nyomie, dah besumpah, ken siko' buboh ampeh sen langko' dipileh le' Allah kei mangkue meloh kei rajo, na' po Kei' Daud. Kei' Daud kin ingát sen ken jenyi Allah; malah ken paie Kei' Daud pun reng penijum jum.
44002031	Mangko sen tawu sen pai yeng langko' digewai le' Allah nun gi, lalu betijum ke' hal Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah, mun iyo dah detang gi pasti langko' bengki' idup agei'. Nyoam reti tijum sen tadie, yeng bungie Iyo noe dipelebu serarat mati, tubohe noe dipelebu buro' lico' lem tama'e. (Masmur 16:10)
44002032	"Ha, tijum nyoe ke' hal Yesus die, kamei," jie Petrus, "go Allah nyurohe bengki' idup agei'; pada' kami pun dah nyaksie ken iyo mat idup agei'.
44002033	"Tue pun iyo dah dibeyie le' Allah Apa'e ke' serugo dah, dah diborie hormát, diborie kuwaso le' Sen, lalu iyo nerimoe Roh Allah yeng dah dijenyi le' Apa'e mie, dah nyoe diunyo'e jum ke' kami tue. "Jedi, yeng kam perati ken yeng kam dingo tue, pada' paner dongéng yeng beneko reno bemacam-macam tadie, nyoe mat kenyatoe pengunyo' Roh Allah yeng secaro buwar Sen unyo' ke' kami tue," jie Petrus.
44002034	"A, pulang ke' tijum Kei' Daud tadie si, ponyoe jum tijum sen ke' hal reng yeng dihormát di serugo," jie Petrus. "Go Kei' Daud noe sen nulis ke' hal diret sen peh yeng na' dihormát di serugo, pie manseh ditijum sen potue: Allah Tuwowe mat do bepadah ke' Tuwowe ku. Lalu jie Allah nyingka' Tuwowe ku, Boh kau dudo' merentah di piya' kanán Ku lo'e,
44002035	sampai Ku nyuroh pada' munsoh kei penyampang kaki kau, jie Sen. (Masmur 110:1) Nyoe tijum Kei' Daud, pi noe iyo ke' hal diret sen peh!
44002036	"Ha," jie Petrus, "mat dah nyatoam, kamei. Kam reng Israel mat ca' tawu, ken Yesus tue yeng disalip le' kam pie tue dah disah le' Allah kei menjedi Tuwowe diret, mat Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Sen. Koti kam na' nyangkale?" Nyoam pemadah Petrus ke' pada' reng rami nyeh.
44002037	Ningo paner Petrus nyeh dah nyoe mat tesobalam ati pada' reng rami nyeh, lalu betanyoe ke' Petrus ken pada' pelantar posan yeng layin, "O kam kawum kerabat kami," jie, "pailah yeng ca' digewai le' kami?" jie reng rami nyeh.
44002038	Jedi samut Petrus, "Kam," jie, "ca' bebeta' piker ke' hal doso kam. Tiyap-tiyap kam ca' disolam ngangkue kuwaso demo Yesus Kristus, penulong yeng dipileh le' Allah. Mangko doso kam dielon, ken kam pun langko' nerimoe Roh Allah, pengunyo' Allah yeng modas-modasam.
44002039	"Go yeng dijenyi le' Allah mie mat nyo' kamam, ken pada' ana' kam, ken pada' reng yeng noe iyo reng Yahudi pun, dikawum jum ken pada' semuya' reng yeng diunang amie Allah Tuwowe nyo' engku Sen."
44002040	Ponyoam Petrus nerange ke' pada' reng rami; gei' suba'am panere, simah ngemberansang pemiker sidoe, ngendorong sidoe kei bebeta' piker ken ngelopas direte deri kejat pada' benso sidoe yeng langko' diukum le' Allah.
44002041	Lalu mat benya' reng yeng pecayo ken pemadah Petrus, dah nyoe disolam. Kurang lobeh tigo ribu ko' reng yeng pecayo ari nyoe!
44002042	Sidoe pun begabong ken pada' reng layin yeng pecayo. Mutuam pada' sidoe serarat belajar ke' pada' pelantar posan, nan begelumoam pado reng pecayo, bekumpol makan bekumpol bedoa.
44002043	Jedi mátam. Mat benya' nar keenah keaneh petano petunyo' yeng nan dipulah le' pada' pelantar posan tam kuwaso Allah. Sampai kagumam pada' semuya' mensiyo meratie.
44002044	Pada' reng pecayo seati sepiker tei'am. Yeng engku diret sidoe rato-ratoe diangape ento' keperelu pado sidoe, gola' jolu siko' jolu semuya'eam, kaji sidoe.
44002045	Pada' jolue demo ke' reto beno jento keraja' kebun jenah opai pun ari aso dijuwal, lalu duwite dibegi-begi ke' sopai ja' yeng sesak sempit.
44002046	Milang ari sidoe teger bekumpol di rumah kediyam Allah, bekumpol jum makan beroto di pada' rumah sidoe masing-masing. Sidoe nan ayah bikah seputeh ati sebeníng derah,
44002047	idup mugi Allah. Pada' reng layin di kota Yerusalem yeng noe seimán pun ayaham ken reng pecayo. Malah ken paie milang ari Yesus Tuwowe nan namah pemenya' reng pecayo, go tiyap ari do reng beru yeng ditulong diselamát Sen.
44003001	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe dah jam tigo, dah mato ari cunong penuto' tei' Petrus ken Yohanes na' ke' rumah kediyam Allah. Go tiyap ari dah jam tigo reng Yahudi bedoa di rumah kediyam Allah, mangko sidoe duwo pun nayi' kinun, na' bedoa jum.
44003002	Jedi di soma' rumah kediyam Allah tei' do siko' reng lelaki yeng timpang, yeng jerano kakie asal deri lem kanong ino'e, nolehe bejelan. Iyo nan dudo' di muko lawang yeng didemo reng Lawang Panci, sutie lawang pagar rumah kediyam Allah. Milang ari iyo ditaban reng kinyoe, gewaie ento' minta' duwit ke' reng yeng tamoe ke' rumah kediyam Allah.
44003003	Jedi mátam. Petrus ken Yohanes tei' dah na' tamoe ke' rumah kediyam Allah nyeh lalu sidoe duwo diperati le' reng timpang yeng dudo' di muko lawang. Lalu iyo pun minta' jolu ke' sidoe.
44003004	Ja'e Petrus sidoe si ngenjena' ke' reng nyoe, lalu jie sidoe nyingka' reng timpang nyeh, "Pantauam ke' kami tue," jie.
44003005	Reng timpang pun mat ngelinga' nelomát ke' sidoe, go kajie tetap do buleh jolu deri sidoe.
44003006	Pie jie Petrus nyingka'e, "Ku," jie, "sesin pun mat cum duwit ku. Ja'e mat do die yeng na' ku ngunyo' ke' kau. Atas kuwaso demo Yesus Kristus deri Nasaret ku nyuroh kau bejelanam!" jie Petrus.
44003007	Lintus Petrus pun ngenjepai jeri kanán reng jerano nyeh kei nulong iyo bengki'. Temosie kakie ken bukue lalie lintus koring ken kuwatam.
44003008	Lalu keduwas bengki' bediri lalu bejelan pulang mansang ke' ulu ke' ilie. Dah nyoe iyo namah Petrus ken Yohanes tamoe ke' lem rumah kediyam Allah, teger bediga' bekanyar belelumpat-lumpat samel mugi Allah.
44003009	-
44003010	A, pada' reng rami di rumah kediyam Allah pun mat kagum, mat kangápam merati reng nyoe yeng ulehe dah bejelan, mugi Allah ponyoe. Go sidoe mat tekenale ken reng nyoe reng jerano yeng nan dudo' di muko Lawang Panci minta' duwit, pie temosie tue dah ulehe dah bejelan.
44003011	Jedi Petrus ken Yohanes tei' gei' do di kaki limo yeng didemo Serami Salomo, di rumah kediyam Allah. Reng bokas jerano kakie pun becengkukui bepagut ke' Petrus sidoe. Dah nyoe bederum pada' reng rami yeng kangáp nyeh bekerumún manu ke' Petrus sidoe.
44003012	Jedi ngaso pada' reng rami bekumpol kinyoe Petrus pun bepaner ken sidoe. Jie Petrus, "Kaban kerabat waris wala' ku," jie nyingka' pada' reng Israel nyeh, "gopai go kam kangáp ken reng tue yeng bokas jerano nyeh? Kam simah nelomát ke' kami, pengaji kam entam kuwaso kami iyo beyi' tue. Teruhal tue noe iyo gewai kami peh! Noe iyo tam kuwaso penawu kami peh, noe iyo tam kepanci kami peh, go reng tue mampu bejelan.
44003013	Tue si," jie Petrus, "gewai Allah die, Allah yeng disomah le' Kei' Abraham, le' Kei' Isak, le' Kei' Yakub, disomah le' pada' akei' puyang tona' mie. Mat Allaham to' yeng ngenyato keagong Pelayan Sen Yesus! Hale yeng diagong le' Allah pie kebelike diserah le' kam gei' iyo diukum. Kam nyangkal iyo kei rajo kam di adap Gubernor Pilatus, teruhal Pilatus si na'e ngelopase, kehe ngukume.
44003014	Pie kam bolei' kam ken Yesus yeng suci bereseh yeng bujor benar. Kam manseh coh minta' reng pemunoh die dipelopas.
44003015	Konoe ke' reng pemunoh dipelopas, konoe ke' Bungkong Idup dibunoh kam! Pie Allah ngidupe agei'! Kami pun meratie, dah iyo idup agei', mangko kami menjedi saksi ke' hal nyoe.
44003016	"Jedi gola' kam na' tawu," jie Petrus, "kuwaso pai yeng ngembeyi' ngenjogar reng jerano tue yeng diperati ken yeng dikenal le' kam. Iyo jogar tue entam kuwaso demo Yesusam to'! Entam iyo pecayo ken Yesusam, mangko reng tue mat jogar, na' po diperati le' pada' kam ditue.
44003017	"Jedi potue ne, kamei," jie Petrus. "Ku si tawu ku jum ken gewai kam munoh Yesus mie tam kam mat noe tawu kam ken sopai Yesus. Ponyoe jum pada' pemimpin kam.
44003018	Ja'e nyoe pun caro Allah kei nuntong tijum Sen yeng ngelalu pada' penijum mie. Go pada' penijum mie nan do bepadah ken Kristus, penulong deri diret Allaham mat ca' ngerudu kesensare des iyo detang. A, pada' tijum nyoe dah dituntong dah le' Allah," jie Petrus.
44003019	-
44003020	"Pie kam," jie Petrus, "mat ca' bebeta' piker ke' hal doso kam, ca' nyomah ke' Allah Tuwowe diret agei'am po nyomie, gei' doso kam diapus Sen. Go mun kam bebeta' piker mangko jemán yeng senáng nyamán dedoh dempu yeng nan ditantie diret mat ditongai le' Sen, des Sen ngutus Yesus Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi Sen, kei iyo bebeli' agei' ke' deniyo tue.
44003021	Gei' tue si Yesus ca' tetap renán di serugo nun lo'e, penantie jengkahe semuya' deniyo tue dikerinah dipepanci le' Allah, cuco' ken jenyi Sen ngelalu pada' penijum suci Sen deri nyomiam. Mangko diret mat ca' bebeta' piker, gei' semuya' nyoe mat tejedi.
44003022	Gopai go Kei' Musa mie pun betijum* ke' hal tue. Kin jie Kei' Musa Allah Tuwowe diret langko' ngutus ke' diret siko' penijum na' po sen, deri benso diretam to'. Diret pun ca' ningo semuya' pemadahe ke' diret, jie sen.
44003023	Berang reng yeng kehe ningo ca' di luwar gentang deri benso diret, ca' diukum matiam, jie Musa.
44003024	"A, pada' penijum layin pun do, yeng madah posan Allah, deri Samuel lalu turun temurun ke' pada' penijum yeng dudi deri Samuel pun. Semuya' desiyan betijum jum ke' hal jemán tue to', ya'am jengkah des penulong diret detang.
44003025	"Jedi mátam, kamei. Pada' jenyi Allah ngelalu pada' penijum Sen mie dah dituntong to' kamam to'. Kam mat dikawum des Sen bejenyi semayo ken akei' puyang diret mie. Go jie Sen nyingka' Kei' Abraham nyomie Sen langko' ngemberekat dolat semuya' segeno benso di deniyo tue ngelalu buboh Kei' Abraham.*
44003026	Ha, nyoe dah dituntong Sen dah, nyo' kamam to'. Go Allah dah ngutus Pelayan Sen ke' deniyo tue. Malah ken paie diutus Sen ke' kam yeng paling dolu. Kebosai Sen na' ngendolat kam, caro Sen ngendolat kam ya'am nyuroh tiyap ko' kam kei ningal pada' gewai kam yeng jat," jie Petrus nyingka' reng rami di Serami Salomo.
44004001	Jedi mátam. Ketengah Petrus ken Yohanes gei' ngomóng ken reng rami nyeh tei' temosie diseregap le' pada' pelayan agama Yahudi. Tamahe ken kepala' penjego rumah kediyam Allah, ken pada' reng deri kelompok Saduki jum.
44004002	Jedi sidoe mat nyeregape kinyoe. Sidoe godie ken Petrus sidoe, entam Petrus ngajar ke' hal pada' mensiyo langko' bengki' idup agei', boktie go Yesus mat bengki' idup agei', jie Petrus. (Sedang reng Saduki noe pecayo ken kebengki' tuboh*.) Mangko pada' pemimpin godie entam pengajar Petrus ponyoe,
44004003	lalu ditangkape, dipenjeroe, na' dipecaro di adap pada' pemimpin agama sidoe. Ja'e entam ari pun dah na' malam mangko sidoe ditahan lo'e di penjero sampai ke' kolam pagi ponyoe.
44004004	Ja'e pada' reng rami yeng ningo pengajar Petrus bolum iyo ditangkap tadie ponyoe tei' mat benya'am yeng pecayo. Sampai kekumpol pemenya' reng dah pecayo nyeh ento' reng lelaki yeng tuwo nyem dah kurang lobeh limo ribu ko' dah.
44004005	Jedi mátam te'. Dah pagi ponyoe mat bekumpolam ayong-ayong sidoe pada' pemimpin, pada' ketuwo, pada' ugar agama di kota Yerusalem, na' mencaro Petrus sidoe.
44004006	Ayong-ayong buboh pelayan agong pun do, demo ke' pelayan agong Hanas, demo ke' Kayapas, demo ke' Yohanes ken Aleksander.
44004007	Jedi dah bekumpol tei' sidoe nyuroh Petrus ken Yohanes ca' ngadap sidoe dinyoe. Dah nyoe ditanyoe. "Kam pakai kuwaso pai," jie pada' pemimpin, "atas demo sopai," jie, "gewai kam ponyoe?"
44004008	Lalu Petrus pun mat dikuwaso le' Roh Allah kei nyamut sidoe. "Jedi deduwan pemimpin deduwan ketuwo kami," jie Petrus.
44004009	"Poe kami dipecaro ari tue," jie, "entam kelaku panci, go nulong reng jerano. Deduwan seolah-olah ngengkorek na' ngendudoh kami, nanyoe koti sampai reng tue dipebeyi'.
44004010	Deduwan ingín tawu gopai go reng bokas jerano tue dah bediri di adap deduwan dah jogar ciga' potue. Ku pun na' ku nyamut," jie Petrus, "kei deduwan ditue ken semuya' umát Israel pun mat jelas. Go reng tue jogar ciga' potue," jie Petrus, "entam kuwaso demo Yesus Kristus deri Nasaret. Iyo jogar tam kuwaso Yesus yeng nyomie dibunoh le' deduwan, pie dah nyoe disuroh le' Allah bengki' idup agei'," jie.
44004011	"Go mat Yesusam to'," jie Petrus, "yeng keedah betu yeng ditijum lem Kitap Allah*. Maksut Allah Yesus keedah betu yeng paling penting nyo' mulah rumah kediyam Sen, pi deduwan yeng keedah tukang rumah nyeh bolei' deduwan ken betu nyoe, diangap deduwan betu yeng noe pakai yeng cum gunoe. Pie mat cuco' ken tijum nyoe mie, go betu yeng dikebolei' le' tukang rumah ja'e tue si dah menjedi betu yeng paling penting.
44004012	Go mat ngat Yesusam Penulong Penyelamát diret; cum yeng layin. Go sebenya'-benya' mensiyo di seruroh deniyo tue pie ngat Yesusam yeng bedemo, yeng dititah le' Allah kei nulong nyelamát diret; cum yeng layin," jie Petrus.
44004013	Ningo paner Petrus tei' pada' pemimpin nyeh paling kangáp. Go Petrus ken Yohanes paling bereni, cum arong itonge gola' di adap pada' pemimpin agama pun. Teruhal nyato jum ken Petrus sidoe reng biyaso nyem, noe iyo reng sekolah tingie peh. Pie paner sidoe mat bekuwaso, sidoe bereni, cum arong itonge gola'. Lalu kaji pada' pemimpin nyeh, "Tue entam sidoe bekaban ken Yesus mie," jie.
44004014	A, na' noe ngasi paner Petrus pun mat noe mampu sidoe, jolu ge' reng jerano kin do jum bediri bejonyang ken Petrus sidoe, dah jogar ciga', konai na' nyangkale.
44004015	Dah nyoe Petrus sidoe disurohe pamus lo'e deri adap kelompok akim nyeh, lalu pada' pemimpin beruning.
44004016	"Nyeh diret ca' koti ngaji ke' hal sidoe tue," jie pada' pemimpin. "Na' nyangkal keenah keaneh yeng dilaku le' sidoe pun go dah nyato dah, malah ken paie semuya' segeno reng Yerusalem pun dah tawue dah ken keenah keaneh tue, konai na' nyangkale," jie sidoe.
44004017	"Ja'e yeng penting tue," jie sidoe, "diret ca' nonga' melempange gei' pengajare noe tesebar luwas di nenggeri tue. Diret ca' tegas ngidah sidoe madah pai-pai pun atas kuwaso demo Reng Nyoe ke' sopai pun. Sempamoe dipadahe ke' reng siko' pun diret langko' ngukume," jie. Nyoam keputus pada' pemimpin.
44004018	Dah nyoe Petrus ken Yohanes dipangele ngadap kinyoe agei'am. Lalu pada' pemimpin nonga' Petrus sidoe ngajar atas kuwaso demo Yesus. Sa'am na' ngajar atas kuwaso demoe, nyo' nyebut demoe pun sedidah-didaheam le' pada' pemimpin.
44004019	Ja'e Petrus ken Yohanes si nyamut pada' pemimpin potue. "Nyeh mun jie Allah si nai yeng patut," jie Petrus, "ca' tuno' ke' deduwanei, ca' tuno' ke' Allahei? Boh deduwan pun ngajie, nai yeng patut.
44004020	Do kami si," jie Petrus, "koti dam na' noe dipadah ke' reng layin jolu yeng diperati ken yeng didingo kami," jie.
44004021	Ningo penyamut Petrus sidoe bungi nyoe tei' pada' pemimpin tei' kin tegas-tegas ngidah sidoe madah ke' reng layin ke' hal Yesus, pasti sidoe diukum mun madah ke' reng layin, jie. Pie pengabise sidoe dipelopas nyem le' pada' pemimpin, noe diukume. Na' ngukume pun cum alore, go gola' ken pada' reng rami, go pada' reng rami si nyereto ken gewai Petrus sidoe, mat mugi Allah entam reng jerano dipebeyi'.
44004022	Go reng jerano nyeh dah empat puloh tawun lobeh umore, sedang iyo jerano deri iyo gei' berue diado mie; kaji reng kin noe ken tepebeyi' penyaki' dah mengukoh-ngukoh nyoe cuwali secaro enah aneh.
44004023	Jedi Petrus sidoe dah dipelopas reng tei' lintus sidoe mat pulang ke' pada' betore seimán, dah nyoe ngelapor semuya' omóng pada' ketuwo pelayan ken pada' ketuwo yeng layin.
44004024	Ngaso dididah le' pada' pemimpin ngajar ke' hal Yesus tei' lalu pada' reng seimán nyeh seati sepiker bedoa ke' Allah. "Allah Tuwowe yeng Rajo Kuwaso," jie. "Mat Dénam yeng mulah langi' ken tanah ken lawut ken semuya' segelo isei'e.
44004025	Den dah koloe madah ke' hal yeng berue tejedi tue, go Roh Den ngomóng ngelalu pelayan Den Kei' Daud mie, yeng bungie potue, Gopai go pada' reng noe pecayo ken Allah gela' kesesomong? Pada' mensiyo gela' bekengkomong na' ngelawan Den, pi kacau bilau nyem, noe ken koti na' ngelawan Den!
44004026	Pada' rajo di deniyo besesiyap na' beperang, pada' pemimpin bekekumpol na' ngelawan Tuwowe Deniyo tue, na' ngelawan Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi Den! jie tijum Kei' Daud mie. (Masmur 2:1-2)
44004027	A, mat pas ponyoe jum di kota tue, des Rajo Herodes ken Gubernor Pontius Pilatus bekumpol bepaham ken pada' reng Yahudi ken pada' reng noe Yahudi mie. Sidoe bepempaham na' mempungah Pelayan Suci Den Yesus, yeng dah dipileh Den kei Rajo Penulong mensiyo.
44004028	Lalu yeng ngelaku ngenggewaie si mat sidoe, pi yeng nentu netap semuya' nyoe ca' tejedi si diret Dénam, cuco' ken kemawo' ken kuwaso Den," jie sidoe bedoa.
44004029	"Jedi tue pun, dingoam, Tuwowei, arau amue sidoe na' mempungah kami, na' nonga' nyuroh kami berenti ngajar ke' hal Yesus. Kiroe Den nulong kami pelayan Den, gei' kami mat-mat bereni madah posan payit Den.
44004030	Kiroe Den ngenyato kuwaso Den nyo' membeyi' reng saki', ken mulah pada' keenah keaneh petanah petano atas kuwaso demo Pelayan Suci Den Yesus," jie sidoe bedoa.
44004031	Dah sidoe bedoa tei' rumah arong sidoe bekumpol nyeh beguyap begontar. Sidoe pun dikuwaso le' Roh Allah, lalu sidoe mat bereni nar madah posan payit Allah.
44004032	Jedi pada' reng pecayo nyeh seati sepiker sekancau segelumo. Siko' pun cum yeng ngitong jolu direte kei engku diret bangam, pi jolue diangape ento' keperelu semuya' reng pecayo.
44004033	Pada' pelantar posan nyeh mat paling bekuwaso iyo besaksi ke' hal kebengki' Yesus Tuwowe. Allah pun secaro buwar ngemberekat dolat semuya' sidoe ken pengunyo' pengaseh Sen.
44004034	Sampai siko' pun cum di antaro sidoe yeng kekurang jolu. Go reng yeng do jolu, beyi' kebun jenah beyi' rumah tangoe pun ari aso dijuwale kei keperelu besamo. Duwite asel ngenjuwal jolue tei'
44004035	diserahe ke' pada' pelantar posan. Dah nyoe diunyo' le' sidoe ke' sopai ja' yeng perelu, seukor keperelue.
44004036	Jedi do siko' reng demoe Yusup yeng gewaie tokoh nyoe. Yusup tei' keturun Lewi, asale deri pulau Siprus. Pada' pelantar posan nyeh ngenggelare Barnabas, retie Pemberansang.
44004037	Jedi Barnabas tei' ngenjuwal kebune sebidang, lalu duwite diserahe ke' pada' pelantar posan.
44005001	Pie do jum siko' reng yeng bedemo Ananias. Binie demoe Sapira. Jedi sidoe pun ngenjuwal kebune sebidang.
44005002	Dah dijuwale tei' duwite paroe dikeduwowe ento' direte, paroe dibeyie le' Ananias, diunyo'e ke' pada' pelantar posan, pi noe dipadah ken dikeduwowe. Binie pun setuju ken gewai Ananias tokoh nyoe.
44005003	Jedi mátam. Duwit nyoe diunyo' Ananias ke' pelantar posan. Lalu jie Petrus, "Gopai beh Ananias," jie, "go kau borie kelorong nyo' Pengelakar nguwaso ati kau? Sampai kau memuloe Roh Allah, go paroe duwit asel kau ngenjuwal kebun kau disimpan di diret kau, pi noe kau padah.
44005004	Teruhal kebun nyoe bolum kau ngenjuwale mie mat engku diret kauam. Dah dijuwal pun duwite paji diret kauam, koti kau na' makaie pun, na' ngunyo' pai pemenya'e pun paji kauam. Gopai go ati kau bearau beamue nuju ke' doso tue?" jie Petrus. "Yeng kau pemuloe tue noe iyo mensiyo peh, pi Allaham," jie Petrus.
44005005	Ningo paner Petrus tei' Ananias pun pam! tepesungkam lalu matiam. Pada' reng layin yeng ningo paner Petrus pun mat gola'am.
44005006	Lalu reng lelaki yeng mudoe yeng do di nyoe manu ke' adap, dah nyoe bengkai Ananias dibungkuse, ditangonge ke' luwar, dah nyoe dipasare.
44005007	Jedi mátam. Dah kurang lobeh tigo jam ponyoe detang Sapira bini Ananias, tamoe ke' arong Petrus sidoe jum. Ja'e iyo detang bolum tawue ke' hal yeng tejedi ken lakie tadie ponyoe.
44005008	Lalu mantau Sapira detang nyeh ditanyoe le' Petrus. Jie, "Tuam peh semuya' duwit asel kam ngenjuwal kebun kam?" jie Petrus. "I," jie Sapira, "nyoame' semuya'e te'," jie.
44005009	"Adoh hai," jie Petrus. "Mat sepakat tei'am kam na' nguji Roh Tuwowe diret poe," jie. "Tau beh!" jie Petrus, "reng yeng gei' berue masar laki kau tadie dah detang dah na' masar kau die!" jie.
44005010	Lalu Sapira pun pam! tepesungkam di adap Petrus, lintus matiam. Lalu mat tamoam reng lelaki yeng mudoe yeng masar lakie tadie. Ngaso Sapira dah mati tei' lalu iyo pun ditabane ke' luwar, dah nyoe dipasare bejonyang ken lakie.
44005011	Pada' reng yeng ningo gesah ke' hal nyoe mat paling gola', beyi' pada' umát gereja lalu ke' pada' reng layin pun.
44005012	Mat benya' nar keenah keaneh petanah petano yeng dilaku pada' pelantar posan nyo' ngembokti kuwaso Allah di adap pada' reng rami. Sidoe erat bekumpol di kolong rumah kediyam Allah di arong yeng didemo reng Serami Salomo.
44005013	Reng layin si cum yeng bereni betentang ken sidoe, malah ken paie sidoe dihormát dipugi le' pada' reng rami nyeh.
44005014	Sampai kin benya'-benya' reng pecayo ken Allah Tuwowe, beyi' reng lelaki beyi' reng betinoe, mat benya' tei'am.
44005015	Pengabise pada' reng saki' pun ditaban dibeyie reng ke' tongah jelan, dipegelai reng ke' tikar ke' tilame di tongah jelan, go kaji sidoe gola' do Petrus ngelalu, ento' konoe kemoyange pun sidoe mampu beyi'.
44005016	Mat bederum pada' reng rami detang deri pada' kota di sekitar kota Yerusalem, meyie pada' reng saki' ken pada' reng yeng kesarong setan. Lalu semuya' sidoe mat dipebeyi' bisam.
44005017	Jedi mátam. Do jum di kota Yerusalem pelayan agong agama reng Yahudi ken pada' kaban kerabate deri pemimpin agama kelompok Saduki. Jedi ngaso ponyoe gewai pada' pelantar posan Yesus nyeh pada' pemimpin agama mat isin dengki.
44005018	Lalu pada' pelantar posan Yesus paroe ditangkape, dipenjeroe.
44005019	Jedi benso Petrus sidoe nyeh mat do di penjero. Dah nyoe dah malam ari ponyoe temosie detang melekat Tuwowe ke' penjero. Dikoba'e lawang penjero, lalu pelantar posan nyeh diiringe pamus keluwar. Dah nyoe jie melekat Tuwowe nyingka' sidoe,
44005020	"Kam ca' ke' rumah kediyam Allah," jie, "ca' ngerusudu' bereniam bepadah ke' pada' reng dinyoe ke' hal Idup Beru tue," jie melekat.
44005021	Lalu dah bukoe tampa' ponyoe sidoe pelantar posan mat tamoe ke' rumah kediyam Allah, lalu ngajar po yeng disuroh le' melekat tadie ponyoe. Jedi kolam nyoe pun pelayan agong ken pada' kaban kerabate bekumpol, lalu beposan ke' kelompok akim, ya'am pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi nyeh gei' bekumpol jum, go sidoe na' mencaro pada' pelantar posan yeng ditangkape kemayie ponyoe. Jedi dah bekumpol tei' pada' ketuwo nyusol ke' penjero kei pelantar posan dibeyie ngadap sidoe.
44005022	Lalu reng yeng disurohe nyusol ke' penjero tei' mat pegiam kinun, dipantaue pada' pelantar posan mat cumam. Mangko sidoe bebeli' bepadah ke' pada' pemimpin yeng na' mencaroe.
44005023	"Lawang penjero si dikunci kukoh," jie, "ken pada' penjego pun gei' do bejego di lawang nyeh," jie. "Pie dah dipantau kami ke' delam si cumam mensiyoe," jie sidoe ngelapor.
44005024	Ningo panere bungi nyoe mat iroh pada' ketuwo pelayan yeng na' mencaroe; kepala' polisi yeng bejego di rumah kediyam Allah pun iroh. Konai nin, jie, sidoe yeng dipenjero kemayie.
44005025	Jedi kebonóng ngaji ke' hal Petrus sidoe losi nyeh detang reng siko' yeng madah ke' sidoe. "Dingo beh," jie. "Reng yeng deduwan penjero kemayie," jie, "tue nongah do di rumah kediyam Allah, ketengah ngajar reng rami," jie.
44005026	Mangko kepala' polisi ken pada' serededue mat nangkap pelantar posan kinun, dibeyie ke' adap sidoe pemimpin nyeh. Pi sidoe nangkape caro panci-panci, noe secaro kejam, go sidoe serededu pun gola'e ken pada' reng rami yeng ayah ningo pengajar pada' pelantar posan, gola' dikerupue ditikame ken betu.
44005027	Jedi mátam. Dah pelantar posan ditangkape dah nyoe dibeyie ngadap pada' kelompok reng Israel. Lalu sidoe diusol le' pelayan agong.
44005028	Jie pelayan agong, "Kami dah negas ke' kam nang na' ngajar ke' hal reng nyoe," jie. "Pie tue tebeli' die kam," jie pelayan agong, "pengajar kam semakin disebar di seruroh kota Yerusalem tue. Malah ken paie kam nyalah kami die, maksut kam gei' kami nangong kicase entam reng nyoe mati betumpah derah," jie pelayan agong.
44005029	Dah nyoe Petrus ken pada' pelantar posan layin pun nyamut. "Mat die deduwan ngidah kami ngajar atas kuwaso demo Yesus," jie. "Pi reng ca' tuno' taalo' ke' Allaham, deri pado tuno' ke' mensiyo," jie. Lalu disamonge.
44005030	"Mat Allaham yeng disomah le' akei' puyang tona' nyeh yeng nyuroh Yesus bengki' idup agei'," jie Petrus. "Diret Sénam yeng nyuroh Yesus ngenggewaie, konai na' noe madahe. Deduwan si munohe mie, go deduwanam yeng nyuroh reng ngentonge di salip*.
44005031	Pie tue iyo dah idup agei', diagong le' Allaham, diborie Sen pangkat yeng tingie, kenyato iyo mat Pemimpin ken Penyelamát pada' mensiyo. Iyo diagong ponyoe sempayo reng Israel diborie kelorong bebeta' piker, gei' dosoe dielon.
44005032	"A, yeng menjedi saksi ke' hal semuya' tue yeng tejedi," jie Petrus, "kami ge'em, ken Roh Allah ge'em, yeng diunyo' le' Allah ke' semuya' reng yeng tuno' taalo' ke' Sen," jie Petrus sidoe. "Mangko kami mat noe mampu berenti madah kuwaso demo Yesus," jie.
44005033	Pie ningo panere bungi nyoe tei' pada' pemimpin agama Yahudi paling godiam, lalu bepempakat na' munoh pelantar posan nyeh.
44005034	Pie do jum dinyoe siko' reng ketuwo yeng bedemo Gamaliel, deri kelompok Parisi. Iyo ugar agama yeng dihormát pada' reng Yahudi. Jedi dah nyoe Gamaliel bediri di adap pada' kelompok akim. Pada' pelantar posan disurohe betungu di luwar lo'e.
44005035	Jedi dah sidoe keluwar Gamaliel pun bepaner ken betore pado pemimpin agama nyeh. "Dingo beh kam waris wala' kawum kerabat ku," jie. "Diret ca' ati-ati," jie, "bepempaham ke' hal reng tue," jie, "gola' diret salah paham.
44005036	Jedi diret," jie, "nang na' ngaru sidoe yeng dipecaro tue, diadu nyem iyo lo'e. Go contohe benso reng bedemo Teudas mie, yeng muncol di Israel. Iyo kin na' ngogoe demo. Benya' jum reng yeng ngenjurute, sampai reng 400 ko' yeng na' nunoe jie iyo. Pi pengabise kin cumam kejedie, malah ken paie iyo dibunoh reng; pada' umáte pun pamar bokar. Mat cumam kejedie.
44005037	"A, dah nyoe ponyoe jum ken reng bedemo Yudas, deri peloya' Galilea," jie Gamaliel, "des jengkah reng cacah jiwa mie. Benya' jum reng yeng tepengaroh entam Yudas mie, na'e nunoe jie iyo, pi pengabise iyo pun dibunoh reng jum, pada' umáte pamar bokar na' po umát Teudas mie.
44005038	"Jedi," jie Gamaliel, "ke' hal reng yeng dipecaro ari tue," jie, "ponyoe jum. Diret nang ngarue, diadu nyem. Go umpamoe mun pengajare atau pun gewai ulahe bungkonge deri mensiyo si sidoe pasti kalah, cum asele, losi nayápam po Teudas ken Yudas.
44005039	Pi mun bungkonge deri Allah si pasti noe tekalah le' diret. Semorie diret belawan ken Allah die. Jedi sepancie sidoe tue diadu nyem lo'e le' diret, merati ja' kesuntonge gi," jie Gamaliel nyingka' pada' pemimpin agama Yahudi.
44005040	Lalu sidoe pun na'e ningo jie Gamaliel, ma'am sidoe pelantar posan nyeh noe sa' dibunoh, jie pada' pemimpin bepempaham. Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe pelantar posan nyeh dibeyie agei' ke' delam ngadap pemimpin agama, dah nyoe dipelesahe. Dah dipelesahe lalu disurohe secaro tegas nang na' ngajar agei' atas kuwaso demo Yesus. Dah nyoe dipelopase.
44005041	Jedi sidoe pelantar posan pun turunam deri arong kelompok akim bekumpol nyeh. Sidoe mat ayah bikaham, mat so dihormát le' diret Allaham go sidoe pun diborie kelorong dihina disensare jum tam demo Yesus.
44005042	Lalu sidoe pun milang ari tetap serarat nan ngajar nyem ke' hal Yesus, beyi' di rumah kediyam Allah beyi' pun di tiyap rumah reng pun, nan serarat madah ken Yesus mat Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah.
44006001	Jedi mátam. Ketiko nyoe mat kin benya'-benya' reng yeng pecayo ken Yesus. Pie dah nyoe reng pecayo yeng seli paner Yunani nyeh begunau. "Sidoe yeng panere Ibrani nyeh salah," jie sidoe Yunani. "Go pada' belu Yahudi nan ditoyu diperintu tiyap ari, pi konoe ke' reng belu kami Yunani noe dipeduli nyem," jie.
44006002	Jedi ningo panere bungi nyoe pelantar posan Yesus yeng duwo belas ko' tei' nyuroh pada' umát bekumpol. Dah bekumpol pada' umát lalu bepempaham ke' hal reng belu nyeh. Jedi jie sidoe pelantar posan nyeh, "Mat noe alap, kamei," jie, "mun posan payit Allah konoe perayan tam ketegal kami ca' ngembegi jolu kei sego," jie.
44006003	"Jedi potue ne," jie. "Kam ca' mileh reng tujoh ko' deri pado kam umát, nyo' melayan jolu nyoe. Urang yeng dipileh nyeh ca' yeng diketawu reng yeng nan dikuwaso le' Roh Allah, ca' reng yeng panai yeng belubang pemikere. Dah nyoe reng tujoh nyeh ditujah kami nyo' melayan ngembegi jolu kei sego, opai.
44006004	Lalu kami," jie pelantar posan nyeh, "mampu mementing bedoa ken ngajar posan payit Allah na' po selomoam," jie.
44006005	Jedi pada' umát pun setuju ken paham pada' pelantar posan nyeh. Lalu sidoe mileh reng tujoh ko'. Yeng siko' tei' Stepanus, urang yeng pecayo sebulat ati, yeng nan dikuwaso le' Roh Allah. Dah nyoe Pilipus, Prokorus, Nikanor, Timon, Parmenas, Nikolaus deri Antiokia. Nikolaus tei' asale noe iyo reng Yahudi, pi pinah agama ke' agama Yahudi bolum iyo pecayo ken Yesus nyomie ponyoe.
44006006	Jedi dah sidoe tujoh ko' dipileh le' pada' umát nyeh mat dibeyie ngadap pada' pelantar posan. Lalu pada' pelantar posan bedoa, dah nyoe nyampang jerie ke' reng tujoh yeng dipileh, kei ngesah tugase.
44006007	Jedi mátam. Kin benya'-benya' reng yeng ningo posan payit Allah, sampai pemenya' reng yeng menjedi murit Yesus kin popah-popah. Benya' jum pelayan agama Yahudi pun yeng pecayo ken Yesus, yeng tuno' taalo' ke' posan payit Allah.
44006008	Jedi mátam. Poe pengunyo' pengaseh Allah mat nyato nar di Stepanus sampai iyo mat bekuwaso. Benya' nar keenah keaneh petanah petano yeng dipulahe. Benya' jum reng yeng meratie.
44006009	Pie dah nyoe do reng yeng ngelawan Stepanus, betentang ken iyo. Yeng ngelawan tei' umát Rumah Semeyang Libertini. Sidoe asale deri kota Kirene, kota Aleksandria, peloya' Kilikia, ken propinsi Asia. Lalu pada' sidoe bejebap ken Stepanus,
44006010	pi sidoe noe mampu ngelawane, go iyo paling panai ngomóng, tam iyo dikuwaso Roh Allah.
44006011	Ngaso Stepanus noe tekalahe lalu sidoe ngacok ngarang sampai ngupah reng nyo' mempulah Stepanus. Pempulahe nyeh go jie sidoe sidoe do ningo Stepanus menghina ngeremeh Musa ken menghina ngeremeh Allah pun, jie.
44006012	Ponyoam sidoe ngaca' ngarang reng rami kei meradang ken Stepanus. Yeng diaca' dikarange tei' pada' reng rami demo ke' pada' ketuwo reng Yahudi ken pada' ugar agama ge'em. Kepepanyange semuya' sidoe ngerupu Stepanus, nangkape, lalu dikeduduse dibeyie ngadap pada' kelompok akim reng Yahudi.
44006013	Dibeyie jum pada' saksie nyo' mempulah Stepanus te'. Dah nyoe jie saksie, "Reng tue," jie, "nan serarat menghina ngeremeh rumah kediyam Allah yeng suci tue. Pada' ukum adat istiadat tona' pun nan dihinae, diolo'-olo'e," jie sidoe mempulah Stepanus.
44006014	"Go kami," jie sidoe, "dah ningo iyo ngomóng ke' hal Yesus deri Nasaret nyeh, go Yesus jie na' merusa' merako rumah kediyam Allah tue, jie, ken pada' ukum adat tona' yeng dipadah le' Musa mie na' diubah dialehe," jie pempulah saksi yeng memuloe nyeh.
44006015	Lalu pada' kelompok akim yeng mencaro Stepanus tei' merati nelomát ke' iyo. Diperati sidoe muko Stepanus berubah cayoe, bemalo na' po muko melekat Allah.
44007001	Dah nyoe pelayan agong nyeh betanyoe ke' Stepanus. Jie pelayan agong, "Mat peh penomah pendudoh reng tue? Lalu kotiam isei' samut kau?" jie.
44007002	Dah nyoe Stepanus pun nyamut. "Jedi deduwan waris wala' ku," jie Stepanus, "dingoam penyamut ku. "Jedi Allah yeng rajo agong," jie Stepanus, "mat nganyoe diret Sen nyomie ke' akei' puyang tona' Abraham, des Kei' Abraham gei' diyam di nenggeri Mesopotamia, bolum ngaleh ke' nenggeri Haran mie.
44007003	Jedi Allah nganyoe diret Sen ke' Kei' Abraham, dah nyoe Sen nyuroh Kei' Abraham ningal nenggeri sen ken pada' waris wala' sen, ken disuroh le' Allah ca' manu ke' arong yeng cagar Sen tunyo' ke' Kei' Abraham.
44007004	Lalu mátam, Kei' Abraham pun turun deri nenggeri reng Kasadim di Mesopotamia, ngaleh diyam di nenggeri Haran. Dah nyoe lamat belamat apa' Kei' Abraham mati di Haran. Dah nyoe Kei' Abraham disuroh le' Allah ngaleh ken numpang di nenggeri tue yeng tona' kediyam tue.
44007005	Ketiko nyoe sen gei' numpang nyem, tanah nenggeri tue sikit pun cum yeng diunyo' le' Allah ke' Kei' Abraham nyo' engku Kei' Abraham. Ja'e go jenyi Allah ke' Kei' Abraham si do, go Allah bejenyi ken tanah nenggeri tue langko' kei engku Kei' Abraham gi, ken pada' buboh ampeh sen turun-temurun. Teruhal ketiko Allah bejenyi ponyoe Kei' Abraham si cum ana' sen.
44007006	Pie Allah bepadah ke' Kei' Abraham, betijum ke' hal yeng langko' tejedi ken pada' keturun sen. Buboh ampeh Kei' Abraham, jie Sen, cagar diyam di nenggeri urang lo'e, empat ratus tawun pelamate. Dinyoe cagar diangap reng reng mendetang, yeng diyam di nenggeri urang, lalu langko' dipeulun reng, disensare reng, jie Sen.
44007007	Ja'e Sen pun betijum ke' hal nenggeri nyoe, bejenyi ken Sen langko' ngukum pada' reng di nenggeri nyoe yeng ngulun buboh ampeh Kei' Abraham. Dah nyoe pada' keturun Kei' Abraham langko' pamus deri nenggeri nyoe, langko' bebeli' pulang agei' ke' nenggeri tue, nyo' bedoa nyomah ke' Sen di nenggeri tue to'. Nyoam jenyi Sen ken Kei' Abraham mie.
44007008	"Dah nyoe Allah pun ngesah jenyi Sen ken Kei' Abraham, disuroh Allah Kei' Abraham ken pada' buboh ampeh sen lelaki nyeh ca' disunát, nyo' tano jenyi Allah ken desiyan. Lalu mátam. Dah nyoe Kei' Abraham pun berana' lelaki, demo ana' sen Isak. Pas dah lapan ari umor ana' sen lalu mat disunát le' apa'e. Ha, dah nyoe lamat belamat Isak berana' ke' Yakub, Yakub pun berana' ke' ana' sen duwo belas ko' lelaki. Lalu ana' sen nyoam yeng menjedi akei' puyang tona' reng Israel," jie Stepanus.
44007009	"Pi dah nyoe," jie Stepanus, "akei' puyang tona' yeng sebelas ko' nyeh isin dengki ken adei' desiyan, Kei' Yusup. Mangko Kei' Yusup pun dijuwal le' desiyan kei ulun reng, dibeyie reng ke' nenggeri Mesir nun ento' menjedi ulun reng. Pie go Allah si nan nyeroto Kei' Yusup.
44007010	Kei' Yusup mat sensare di nenggeri Mesir, pi Allah nan nulong sen, sampai pengabise Piraun rajo Mesir pun ayahe ken Kei' Yusup. Nyoe pun go Kei' Yusup ditulong le' Allah, disuroh Sen panai mileh belubang pemiker. Mangko Kei' Yusup diangkat le' rajo Mesir kei gubernor seruroh nenggeri Mesir, demo ke' rumah tangoe jento keraja' rajo pun, semuya'e dikuwaso diperentah le' Kei' Yusup.
44007011	Dah nyoe lamat belamat buyun di seruroh nenggeri Mesir lalu ke' nenggeri Kanaan tue mie, paling sensare. Sampai akei' puyang tona' noe tetomu ke' jolu di sego.
44007012	Ja'e di nenggeri Mesir gei' do persiyap perarau. Jedi Kei' Yakub dah ningo agah ken di Mesir gei' do perarau genum mangko ana' sen, ya'am akei' puyang tona', disuroh sen ke' Mesir nun nyo' moli genum dinun. Dah moli lalu pulangam desiyan. Nyoe pertamo kali desiyan kinun.
44007013	Lalu lamat belamat desiyan moli kinun agei'am. Dah keduwo kalie kinun berue Kei' Yusup madah ke' desiyan sebelas ken sen menyadie desiyan. Dinyoam rajo Mesir pun tawu jum ken kawum kerabat Kei' Yusup.
44007014	"Dah nyoe Kei' Yusup pun beposan ke' apa' sen Kei' Yakub, nyuroh berabis ngaleh ke' Mesir die, semuya' sedena' 75 ko'.
44007015	Lalu mat ngaleh ngubalam Kei' Yakub desiyan ke' nenggeri Mesir. Lamat lawun Kei' Yakub desiyan pun mati di nenggeri Mesir.
44007016	Ja'e pada' tulang Kei' Yakub desiyan dialeh ke' ateh Sikem tue, dipasar di guwo yeng diboli Kei' Abraham mie. Diboli sen mie deri reng Emor yeng diyam di Sikem mie, pakai duwit perak. Jedi tulang akei' puyang tona' mie dipasar dinyoe," jie Stepanus.
44007017	"Dah nyoe mátam. Lamat belamat dah manu dah ke' jengkahe Allah na' nuntong jenyi Sen ke' Kei' Abraham mie. Benso diret Yahudi kin popah-popah di Mesir nun.
44007018	Rajo reng Mesir pun begenti beru. Sedang yeng beru nyeh noe menduli ken jeso pangkat pedero Kei' Yusup mie.
44007019	Malah ken paie iyo paling jat ken benso tona'. Desiyan disensaree, dipempungahe, sampai ke' ana' biya' berue pansut pun disurohe ca' dibuwang, dibunoh.
44007020	Jedi pas-pas ketiko nyoe Kei' Musa diado. Allah mat ayah ken kebiya' Kei' Musa. Lalu tigo bulan pelamate sen ditoyu perintu ino' apa' sen.
44007021	Pi dah tigo bulan, dah sen ca' dibuwang nunoe perentah rajo nyeh sen diamie le' ana' rajo betinoe die, ditoyu diperintu le' ana' rajo nyo' ana' direteam.
44007022	Disekolah jum le' reng Mesir, sampai semuya' kepanai reng Mesir nyeh diapal sen bisam le' Kei' Musa. Sen mat menjedi reng kuwaso, deri omóng tutor sampai ke' tingkah laku sen pun.
44007023	"Jedi mátam, dah empat puloh tawun umor Kei' Musa tei' kaji sen na' ngulang pada' waris wala' diret sen reng Israel.
44007024	Jedi mátam, dah sen belulang tei' dipantau sen do siko' kaban sen reng Israel dipempungah le' siko' reng Mesir. Ngaso kaban sen dipempungah lalu ditulong le' Kei' Musa, sampai reng Mesir nyeh dipangkong dibunoh sen.
44007025	Kaji Kei' Musa si pada' waris wala' sen tawue ken diret sénam yeng na' dipakai le' Allah kei nulong desiyan, kei desiyan dipelopas deri gongam reng Mesir, pie desiyan mat noe tawue.
44007026	"Jedi dah pagi ponyoe bejelan agei'am Kei' Musa. Dipantau sen do agei'am duwo ko' reng bekelayi, layin urange deri yeng kemayie. Sen manu kinyoe maksut sen na' nulong, na' ngeraroe na' ngendamaie, pi sidoe ngei'e. Jedi jie Kei' Musa, Kam, jie sen, sekaban sekerabat sekancau segelumo, jie sen, noe ken patut kam pado sebenso mempungah betor kam, jie sen.
44007027	Pie Kei' Musa ditula' le' yeng siko' yeng mempungah betore. Kau, jie yeng siko', noe ken rajo kami, go kau na' ngakim kami, jie.
44007028	Boh agei', jie, kau na' munoh aku po kau munoh reng Mesir kemayie peh, jie nyingka' Kei' Musa.
44007029	Lalu ngaso ningo paner bungi nyoe Kei' Musa mat rariam deri nenggeri Mesir, diyam di nenggeri urang, di Midian nun. Bejodo pun di Midian, berana' duwo ko' lelaki.
44007030	"Empat puloh tawun Kei' Musa diyam di Midian. Dah empat puloh tawun dah nyoe Kei' Musa do di padang puwang di Midian nun, soma' Gunóng Sinai. Jedi di padang nyeh temosie diperati sen do api benyalo di kayu yeng beduri, ken melekat Allah ngenjelomo lem api.
44007031	Kangápam Kei' Musa meratie, lalu na' manu ke' soma', ngenjena'e. Dah manu ke' soma' lalu kedingo bungi suwaro Allah Tuwowe. Jie Allah,
44007032	Aku mat Allah, jie Sen. Mat Akuam yeng disomah le' akei' puyang kau, deri Abraham sampai ke' Isak sampai ke' Yakub mie pun, jie Sen. Kei' Musa pun begegar begitik, gola' sen mantau kinyoe.
44007033	Dah nyoe jie Allah Tuwowe, Dipucelam senal kau, jie Sen, go arong kau bediri nyeh tanah suci bereseh.
44007034	"Aku, jie Allah, dah tawu Ku dah kesensare yeng dirudu umát Ku di Mesir nun. Kedingo Ku ken sidoe kuwang kawung. Mangko Aku detang go Ku na' nulong ngelopas sidoe deri nyoe. Yo'am, jie Allah nyingka' Kei' Musa. Aku na' ngutus kau pulang ke' Mesir nyo' nulong sidoe, jie Sen.
44007035	Mat Kei' Musaame' yeng diutus Allah, teruhal Kei' Musa mie kin dah ditula' dah le' reng Israel, go jie sidoe noe ken kau kei rajo ken akim kami, jie. Pi mat Kei' Musaame' yeng diutus le' diret Allaham kei menjedi pemimpin ken penulong reng Israel! Allah ngutus sen ngelalu melekat Allah yeng ngenjelomo lem api yeng benyalo di kayu yeng bedurie.
44007036	"Lalu mátam, mat Kei' Musaame' yeng ngiring pada' desiyan pamus deri nenggeri Mesir mie. Benya' gewai keenah keaneh yeng dilaku sen kei petanah petano, beyi' di nenggeri Mesir, beyi' di Lawut Teborau beyi' di ateh padang puwang nun melamat 40 tawun.
44007037	Mat Kei' Musaame' yeng bepadah ke' reng Israel ke' hal siko' penijum yeng cagar na' detang. Allah, jie Kei' Musa, langko' ngutus ke' kam siko' penijum na' po akuam, jie Kei' Musa, deri buboh ampeh kamam, jie sen*.
44007038	Ge' pun noe layin deri Kei' Musaame' yeng ngelantar ukum perentah Allah ke' tona' reng Israel di padang mie. Go melekat Allah di Gunóng Sinai nyeh ngomóng ken Kei' Musa nyem, lalu Kei' Musa ngelantare ke' akei' puyang tona'. Kei' Musa yeng nerimoe posan payit Allah yeng bekuwaso, yeng idup, lalu dipadah sen ke' tona', umát reng Israel.
44007039	"Pie dah pamus deri Mesir si akei' puyang tona' mat bolei'e tuno' ke' Kei' Musa, ditula' le' desiyan. Malah ken paie ati desiyan besale' ke' Mesir die, na' nyomah ke' jolu layin na' po di Mesir mie.
44007040	Lalu ketiko Kei' Musa gei' ngomóng ken Allah di gunóng nyeh desiyan rami mat manu ke' Kei' Harun, wakel Kei' Musa. Ngaso Kei' Musa lamat nar di gunóng lalu jie desiyan, Pulah ja' keramát kei disomah kami, nyo' allah kami, jie, nyo' ngiring merentah kami. Go kami, jie, noe tawu gopai ge' hale reng bedemo Musa nyeh, yeng ngiring kami pamus deri Mesir. Tue dah cum dah iyo kei ngiring diret, jie desiyan.
44007041	Lalu mátam, dipulah le' desiyan keramát gemar ana' sapi. Dah dipulahe desiyan munoh binatang kei pesaling desiyan ngenduwato ke' ana' sapi mas nyeh. Ayah bikah beriyah beramiam desiyan nyomah ke' jolu yeng dipulah le' jeri diret desiyanam," jie Stepanus.
44007042	"Ngopai go Allah pun," jie Stepanus, "ningal melebu desiyan, go pusam desiyan na' nyomah ke' pada' bintang di langi' pun, jie Sen. Nyoe pun cuco' ken yeng ditulis le' penijum di Kitap Allah nyeh. Bungi tijume potue. Noe iyo Aku peh yeng disomah kam, reng Israelei, des kam nyemeleh pada' binatang ken nyucol pada' pesaling waktu pelamat kam 40 tawun di padang puwang nun mie.
44007043	Malah ken paie kemah yeng to' kediyam Aku yeng nan kam tangong kam taban di padang nyo' kam nyomah ke' Aku, jie kam, pie kebelike kam pakai nyo' kam nyomah ke' duwato Molok die, nyo' kam nyomah ke' duwato bintang Repan, nyo' kam nyomah ke' pada' keramát yeng dipulah le' jeri diret kamam! Entam gewai kam tokoh nyoe, jie Sen, mangko kam ku tunong deri nenggeri tue. Kam dibeyie reng ke' jewoh nun, sampai lampau nenggeri Babel nun pun. (Amos 5:25-27) Nyoam pemadah Allah yeng ditulis le' penijum ke' tona' mie," jie Stepanus.
44007044	Lalu iyo gei' nyamong panere. "Jedi ke' hal rumah kediyam Allah," jie Stepanus, "ketiko akei' puyang tona' gei' di padang puwang nun," jie, "do rumah tangong nyo' kediyam Allah, nyo' ngembokti ken Allah nan nyeroto desiyan dinun. Kemah nyoe dipulah desiyan nunoe perentah yeng dipadah le' Allah ke' Kei' Musa; upoe nunoe contoh yeng dipadah le' Allah ke' Kei' Musa. Nyoam des desiyan gei' di padang nun.
44007045	Lalu dah akei' puyang tona' ngendiyam nenggeri tue pun kemah kediyam Allah nyeh dibeyie kitue jum. Lalu pada' benso layin mat ditunong le' Allah rari deri tue keedah dema' detang kubong rari. Lalu mátam. Kemah nyoe ditaban desiyan ke' nenggeri tue, lalu renánam ditue sampai ke' jemán Kei' Daud.
44007046	Kei' Daud pun mat diberekat dolat le' Allah. Ngaso ponyoe Kei' Daud muhún minta' ke' Allah, mun borie Sen, Kei' Daud na' mulah rumah kediyam Sen yeng togap kukoh, arong kei nyomah ke' Allah tona', po yeng disomah le' Kei' Yakub desiyan mie.
44007047	Pie kepanyange rumah yeng togap kukoh nyeh noe iyo Kei' Daud yeng mulahe, pie ana' sen Rajo Salomo die yeng mulahe.
44007048	Numo' pun dipulah reng rumah yeng togap kukoh pi Allah yeng rajo agong noe ken diyam di rumah yeng dipulah le' mensiyo. Nyoe pun dah jelas po ditulis le' penijum mie, yeng nulis pemadah Tuwowe diret. Jie Sen,
44007049	Konai kam na' mulah rumah kediyam Aku, jie Tuwowe. Dinai kam na' mulah pempalang pempangal peronga' perenti Aku? Sedang langi' pun keedah arong kedudo' ku nyem, deniyo tue pun keedah penyampang kaki ku nyem.
44007050	Pada' jolu ke' deng nyoe dipulah diret Akuam--konai kam na' mulah rumah kei Aku? jie Sen lem kitap penijum nyeh." (Yesaya 66:1-2) Nyoe penjelas Stepanus ke' hal rumah kediyam Allah nyeh. Dah nyoe,
44007051	"Pi deduwan," jie Stepanus, "paling koring ati somong bongko'. Deduwan si mat disunát bisam, tano deduwan umát Allah, pi paling ngei' deduwan ningo posan Sen! Ati deduwan na' po ati reng noe tekenal kali ken Allah! Po akei' puyang po deduwan, nan serarat ngelawan Roh Allah," jie Stepanus.
44007052	"Pada' penijum yeng ngelantar posan Allah mie pun disensare bisam le' akei' puyang deduwan. Benso pada' penijum yeng betijum ke' hal kedetang yeng Siko' yeng Rajo Benar, yeng cum dosoe. Desiyan yeng betijum ke' hal Reng nyoe pun sampai dibunoh le' akei' puyang tona'. A, tue pun," jie Stepanus, "dah detang dah yeng Siko' yeng Rajo Benar," jie, "pie iyo dipekoti le' deduwan? Sampai diserah lalu dibunoh le' deduwan!" jie Stepanus.
44007053	"Teruhal deduwanam to' yeng nerimoe pada' perentah Allah ngelalu pada' melekat mie, pi tarah ke' noe dituno' le' deduwan," jie Stepanus.
44007054	Ningo paner Stepanus bungi nyoe tei' pada' pemimpin agama tei' paling mengkuwal atie, ngeregintetam.
44007055	Pie Stepanus tenáng nyem, go iyo mat dikuwaso le' Roh Allah. Iyo nengkadah nelomát ke' serugo nun, merati Allah yeng rajo agong, ken merati Yesus bediri di piya' kanán Allah, go iyo rajo kuwaso.
44007056	"Ti beh!" jie Stepanus. "Tau ku serugo nyeh tekoba'! Urang yeng didemo Ana' Mensiyo yeng rajo kuwaso bediri di piya' kanán Allah!" jie Stepanus.

44007058	Stepanus tei' ditangkape, lalu dikeduduse ke' luwar kota, na' ditikame ken betu. Pada' saksi yeng ngendudohe tadie rato-rato mucel beju luware yeng ngeribate, lalu diongkahe di soma' reng lelaki bedemo Saulus. Dah nyoe pada' sidoe rami mat nikam Stepanus ken betu.
44007059	Pie ketengah reng nikame ken betu nyeh Stepanus bedoa. "O Yesus Tuwowe," jie, "terimoam roh ku tue," jie.
44007060	Dah nyoe iyo belutut, lalu mangkas ontapam, "O Tuwowe," jie, "kiroe Den noe ngukum sidoe tam dosoe tue," jie. Dah ngomóng bungi nyoe iyo pun matiam.
44008001	-
44008002	A, yeng bedemo Saulus tei' setuju jum ken Stepanus dibunoh. Pie pada' reng yeng patoh ke' Allah si nentumau lolau, lalu bengkai Stepanus nyeh diamie, dipasare. Jedi pas ari Stepanus dibunoh nyeh pada' semuya' umát gereja di Yerusalem pun betongai disensare dipempungah reng jum secaro kejam go sidoe pecayo ken Yesus. Sampai sidoe pencar temiyar ngerebecau ke' segonáp peloya' Yudea ken Samaria. Tingal pada' pelantar posan dam di Yerusalem.
44008003	Saulus pun simah mempungah pada' umát gereja. Iyo natap nyarie ke' tiyap rumah, gola' do reng pecayo beyi' betinoe beyi' lelaki pun ditangkape, dikeduduse deri rumahe, lalu ditabane ke' lem penjero nun le' Saulus.
44008004	Lalu mátam. Pada' reng pecayo di Yerusalem mat ngerebecau nyem ke' ulu ke' ilie tam disensare reng. Pie sidoe tei' gewaie madah agah panci dinai-nai pun.
44008005	Benso reng bedemo Pilipus. Jedi Pilipus tei' turun deri Yerusalem ke' kota Samaria, lalu madah ke' reng Samaria agah ke' hal Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah.
44008006	Reng Samaria pun seati sesaro' na'e ningo, go sidoe ningo ken mantau ken mato kepalo direte keenah keaneh yeng dilaku Pilipus, petanah yeng ngembokti ken posane mat deri Allah.
44008007	Go iyo membeyi' pada' reng timpang ken reng lumpoh, lalu nunong pada' setan yeng nyarong ke' mensiyo. Menciya' pamusam pada' setan nyeh rari.
44008008	Pada' reng Samaria nyeh mat ayaham merati pada' gewai Pilipus, ken ningo agah yeng dipadahe.
44008009	Jedi ketiko reng Samaria gei' bolum pecayo tei' do reng dukun beliyan, demoe Simon. Iyo dah lamat dah dipakai reng dinyoe. Iyo nan madah direte reng yeng paling temensohor. Pada' reng Samaria pun kagum ken lemu Simon nyeh.
44008010	Bosai kocit tuwo mudoe pun mat arapam ken Simon go Simon, jie sidoe, rajo kuwasoam, na' po Allaham, jie sidoe.
44008011	Go Simon kin dah lamat dah makai lemue kei nyuroh reng kagum gola' ken iyo.
44008012	Pie ketiko nyoe Pilipus gei' bolum detang kinyoe. 44008013	Sampai Simon yeng dukun beliyan nyeh pun pecayo jum ken Yesus, lalu disolam jum. Dah nyoe Simon serarat ngenjurut Pilipus, kinai Pilipus kinyoam dijurute. Paling kangáp Simon merati pada' gewai keenah keaneh yeng dilaku le' Pilipus, petanah petano yeng ngembokti kuwaso Allah.
44008014	Dah nyoe mátam, pada' pelantar posan di Yerusalem ningo agah reng Samaria dah pecayo dah ken posan payit Allah. Ngaso ponyoe sidoe di Yerusalem ngutus Petrus ken Yohanes kei manu ke' Samaria nun.
44008015	Tang kinun Petrus ken Yohanes mat betomu ken pada' reng pecayo dinun. Lalu Petrus ken Yohanes bedoa sempayo sidoe pun nerimoe jum Roh Allah.
44008016	Go sidoe Samaria disolam mie atas kuwaso demo Yesus Tuwowe, pie Roh Allah bolum do turun ke' sidoe secaro enah.
44008017	Mangko Yohanes ken Petrus nyampang jerie ke' reng yeng pecayo di Samaria, lalu sidoe pun nerimoe Roh Allah.
44008018	Jedi diperati Simon ken reng yeng pecayo dinyoe mat nerimoe Roh Allah ketiko Yohanes ken Petrus, pelantar posan Yesus, nyampang jerie ke' sidoe. Lalu Simon ingín jum atie kei iyo buleh kuwaso na' po Yohanes ken Petrus. Sampai meyie duwit ke' Petrus sidoe.
44008019	"Unyo' jum ke' aku kuwaso nyoe," jie, "gei' aku bekuwaso, sal ge' ku nyampang jeri ku ke' reng, reng nerimoe jum Roh Allah," jie Simon.
44008020	Pie samut Petrus, "Deri duwit sampai ke' penyawo kau pun punah ranaham di lawut api! Pengunyo' Allah yeng modas-modas noe ken tawu diboli ken duwit," jie Petrus.
44008021	"Kau," jie Petrus, "noe behak lem hal tue, go Allah pun tawu Sen ken ati kau noe bujor.
44008022	Kau," jie Petrus, "ca' bebeta' piker ke' hal doso kau tue, muhún minta'am ke' Allah Tuwowe, gola' na' Sen ngelon keingín ati kau yeng jat tue," jie.
44008023	"Go ti ku," jie Petrus, "kau gei' dikotoh le' doso. Ati kau seolah-olah bisei' tampang jolu biso yeng behayo."
44008024	Samut Simon, "Tulong ge' aku, kamei, muhúnam ke' Tuwowe, gei' noe tejedi ke' aku behayo na' po dipadah kam nyeh," jie Simon.
44008025	Dah nyoe Petrus sidoe besaksi ken madah posan payit Allah Tuwowe di Samaria. Dah nyoe sidoe pulang ke' Yerusalem. Samel pulang simpat pawut madah agah panci di pada' kampong layin jum di peloya' Samaria. Lamat belamat detangam ke' Yerusalem.

44008027	Lalu Pilipus mat turunam, niti jelan nyoe. Temosie diperatie do reng lelaki deri nenggeri Etiopia, niti jelan nyoe jum. Iyo ari nyomie detang ke' kota Yerusalem go na' semeyang nyomah ke' Allah di Yerusalem.
44008028	Jedi tue dah na' pulang ke' nenggeri direte, mangko niti jelan nyoe jum, nayi' kereto yeng ditari' binatang kuda. Samel bejelan lem kereto nyeh iyo dudo', ngembeco Kitap Allah, deri kitap yeng ditulis le' penijum Yesaya nyomie.

44008032	Jedi ayat yeng dibeco le' wakel tei' bungie potue, Iyo na' po domo yeng na' dibunoham. Na' po domo yeng na' dikukor ke' bulue, Iyo ngojap nyem, noe iyo ngelawan.
44008033	Iyo dipehina reng, iyo dipecaro reng ken caro noe adel. Paling jat pada' waris wala'e di jeman nyoe* go nyawoe dicabut deri deniyo tue, jie Kitap Yesaya nyeh. (Yesaya 53:7-8)

44008039	Dah nyoe sidoe nayi' ke' derat. Dah nayi' ke' derat tei' temosie Pilipus ditaban le' Roh Tuwowe ke' arong jewoham. Wakel ratu pun mat noe awase agei' ken Pilipus. Lalu wakel ratu melaju pejelane ke' nenggeri direte. Mat ayah bikaham peraso atie.
44008040	Do Pilipus si temosie ditaban le' Roh Allah deri nyoe. Dah ditaban le' Roh Allah lalu tup! semorie tomus di kota Asdod die. Dah nyoe iyo bejelan nuju ke' kota Kaisarea, samel simpat pawut madah agah panci di tiyap kota yeng konoe lalue sampai ke' Kaisarea.
44009001	Jedi reng yeng bedemo Saulus tei' manseh nan serarat risie ken pada' murit Yesus Tuwowe. Iyo nan bearau beamue na' munohe, malah ken paie dah do dah reng yeng dibunohe. Jedi dah nyoe Saulus manu ke' pelayan agong agama Yahudi,
44009002	minta' surat kuwaso ke' pelayan agong kei iyo ke' kota Damsik. 44009003	Lalu mátam. Dah do surat kuwaso tei' Saulus pun mat turunam ke' kota yeng didemo Damsik. Dah soma' ken kota Damsik tei' temosi las! jie jolu na' po kengkitar becayo ngeliling iyo.
44009004	Saulus pun pam! tepesungkuram, lalu iyo ningo suwaro urang nyingka' iyo. "O Saulus," jie, "gopai go kau nyensare mempungah aku?" jie bungi suwaro nyeh.

44009009	Dah detang ke' Damsik tei' tigo ari tigo malam iyo noe awase ken jolu. Makan minúm pun cum.
44009010	Jedi di kota Damsik do murit Yesus yeng bedemo Ananias. Lalu Ananias besensonam merati Tuwowe. Jie Tuwowe, "Ananias!" Samut Ananias, "Na' pai Den?"
44009011	"Kau," jie Tuwowe, "ca' manu ke' rumah reng yeng bedemo Yudas, di Jelan Bujor, nanyoe reng bedemo Saulus yeng asale deri kota Tarsus. Saulus nongah do di rumah Yudas; tue pun ketengah bedoa, gewaie.
44009012	Iyo dah tawu dah ken kau. Go Saulus dah besensonam dah jum deri aku," jie Tuwowe. "Lem sensonam Saulus iyo dah merati kau, Ananiasei. Lem sensoname kau manu ke' iyo, nyampang jeri kau ke' iyo gei' iyo mampu mantau agei'. Pegiam kau manu ke' Saulus," jie Tuwowe nyingka' Ananias.

44009014	Iyo detang kitue pun atas kuwaso pada' ketuwo pelayan, nyo' iyo nangkap pada' reng yeng pecayo ken Den," jie Ananias.

44009018	Sejurus iyo ngomóng tei' temosi jolu keedah sisi' ikan tekupa' topa' deri mato Saulus, lalu Saulus pun mat awaseam. Dah nyoe iyo lintus disolam.
44009019	Dah disolam tei' berue iyo makan, dah makan pulang tiko jogaram perasoe. Lalu iyo pun diyam beberopai ari ken pada' murit* Yesus di kota Damsik.
44009020	Jedi di kota Damsik Saulus lintus betongai ngajar ke' hal Yesus di semuya' rumah semeyang reng Yahudi. Iyo madah ken Yesus mat ana' Allah.
44009021	Paling kangáp pada' reng yeng ningoe. "Noe peh," jie, "Saulus tuam yeng nan mempungah pada' reng di Yerusalem yeng pecayo ken demo nyoe?" jie sidoe. 44009022	Pi Saulus tei' kin lamat kin dikuwaso Roh Allah. Pada' reng Yahudi di kota Damsik pun bemang pengajie, noe tawu nyamut omóng Saulus. Go iyo paling panai ngembokti deri Kitap Allah ken Yesus mat Kristus penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah.
44009023	Jedi lamat belamat pada' reng Yahudi bepempakat na' munoh Saulus.
44009024	Siyang malam sidoe betungu bejego di pada' pintu gerbang kota, gola' iyo pamus kin sidoe siyap, na' munohe. Pie pempaham sidoe kepepuwase kedingo le' Saulus.
44009025	Pada' reng yeng menjedi murit Yesus entam ningo pengajar Saulus pun na'e nulong Saulus. Jedi dah malam arie ponyoe Saulus diturun deri pagar kota, diulor sidoe makai keranyang.
44009026	Dah nyoe mátam. Saulus tei' pulang ke' Yerusalem, lintus iyo na' begelumo ken pada' murit Yesus dinyoe. Pie sidoe gola'e ken Saulus, noe pecayoe ken Saulus dah menjedi murit Yesus jum.
44009027	Pie pengabise do siko' reng pecayo yeng na'e nulonge. Demoe Barnabas. Jedi Saulus diantar Barnabas ke' pada' pelantar posan. Digesahe jum ke' sidoe ken Saulus paling bereni madah agah panci ke' hal Yesus di kota Damsik. Lalu ngaso ningo paner bungi nyoe pada' pelantar posan pun na'e nerimoe Saulus.
44009028	Dah nyoe Saulus pun bebas begelumo ken reng pecayo di Yerusalem. Iyo bereni nan madah agah panci ke' hal Tuwowe di kota nyoe.
44009029	Pie do jum reng noe pecayo yeng na' ngelawan Saulus, ya'am pada' reng Yahudi yeng panere paner Yunani. Saulus nan ngomóng ken sidoe jum, bejebap ken sidoe ke' hal Yesus. Sampai pengabise sidoe ngogoe kelorong na' munoh Saulus.
44009030	Pie do jum pada' kaban Saulus yeng seimán. Jedi dah tawu kaban Saulus ken do reng yeng na' munoh Saulus tei' lalu Saulus diantar le' sidoe yeng seimán ke' kota Kaisarea. Tang ke' Kaisarea sidoe nulong Saulus ngurus pejelane, lalu iyo pun ke' kota Tarsus.
44009031	Lalu ketiko nyoe pada' umát gereja mat tenáng amánam di seruroh peloya' Yudea, di peloya' Galilea, ken di peloya' Samaria. Cumam reng yeng nyensare mempungah sidoe yeng pecayo ketiko nyoe. Lalu gereja pun kin mansang kuwat, kin popah-popah pemenya'e. Pada' umáte gola' nungkang pemadah Tuwowe, nan tuno' taalo'am. Sidoe diajar ditulong le' Roh Allah.
44009032	Dah nyoe mátam. Petrus tei' nan bejelan betatap di nenggeri nyoe. Dah nyoe iyo ke' kota Lida, na' ngulang pada' umát engku Allah dinyoe.
44009033	Di Lida iyo betomu ken reng lelaki bedemo Eneas. Eneas tei' saki' lumpoh, noleh begeyo, dah lapan tawun dah pelamate, noe bengki'-bengki' deri tikare.
44009034	Dah nyoe jie Petrus nyingka' Eneas, "Bengki'am kau, Eneas, kemasam tikar kau," jie. "Go Yesus Kristus dah membeyi' kau," jie Petrus. Lintus mat bengki'am Eneas te'.
44009035	Semuya' reng di kota Lida ken reng yeng diyam di ateh Saron pun merati reng bokas saki' lumpoh nyeh dah beyi' dah. Lalu semuya' sidoe pun pecayo ken Yesus Tuwowe. Kepecayo lamate ditingale.
44009036	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe di kota Yope nun do jum siko' murit Yesus yeng betinoe, yeng bedemo Tabita, atau Dorkas lem paner Yunani.* Tabita tei' nan serarat bekeragam panci, nan nulong reng bensat.
44009037	Jedi mátam. Kebonóng Petrus gei' do di kota Lida nyeh murit Yesus di Yope yeng demoe Tabita tei' saki' ngojut, dah nyoe mati. Dah mati bengkaie dipanei' reng, dah nyoe dibeyie reng ke' loteng.
44009038	Jedi kedingo le' pada' murit di Yope ken Petrus nongah do di Lida, sedang Lida noe jewoh deri kota Yope. Lalu sidoe nyuroh reng lelaki duwo ko' nyusol Petrus di kota Lida, nyurohe copat manu ke' Yope.
44009039	Dah sidoe duwo ko' detang ke' Lida tei' Petrus pun na'e namah sidoe pulang ke' Yope. Tang ke' Yope Petrus dibeyie sidoe nayi' ke' loteng yeng bisei' bengkai Tabita. Dah nayi' ke' loteng dialu le' pada' betinoe belu yeng simah nangis samel nganyoe ke' Petrus pada' beju pempulah jeri Dorkas, go iyo rajing mulah beju nyo' pada' reng bensat meretat.
44009040	Dah nyoe Petrus nyuroh pada' reng rami nyeh pamus deri kamar nyeh. Dah sidoe pamus Petrus belutut, bedoa. Dah bedoa lalu ngelinga' ngadap ke' bengkai Dorkas. Lalu jie Petrus, "Bengki'am, Tabita." Tabita pun mencináng, dah mencináng iyo mantau Petrus do dinyoe, lalu iyo dudo'.
44009041	Petrus pun ngenjepai jerie nulong Tabita bediri. Dah nyoe iyo madah pada' umát engku Allah ngawum pada' belu nyeh, nyo' sidoe merati ken Tabita dah idup agei'am.
44009042	Jedi dah nyoe agah ke' hal nyoe dipadah di seruroh kota Yope, sampai benya' reng dinyoe yeng pecayo ken Yesus Tuwowe.
44009043	Lalu Petrus pun diyam beora'-ora' di kota Yope, numpang di rumah reng demo Simon. Simon tei' gewaie nan ngenggewai kuli' binatang.
44010001	Jedi do siko' reng bedemo Kornelius, yeng diyam di kota Kaisarea. Kornelius tei' kapten tentara Roma di nenggeri Israel. Iyo kapten deri Kelompok Italia.
44010002	Kornelius ken pada' seberumahe mat patoh, tuno' taalo' ke' Allah jum. Iyo nan nulong reng bensat, ge'em nan bedoa ke' Allah, numo' pun iyo noe seli reng Yahudi.
44010003	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe dah kurang lobeh jam tigo ari nyoe Kornelius tei' besensonam. Di lem sensoname iyo paling jelas merati siko' melekat Allah manu ke' iyo. "Kornelius," jie melekat.
44010004	Kornelius pun nelomátam ke' melekat, paling gola'e. "Na' pai, Tuwowe?" jie Kornelius. Samut melekat tei', "Allah di serugo," jie melekat, "tawu Sen ken pada' doa kau, ken gewai kau nan nulong reng bensat. Semuya' doa kau ken gewai kau mat diterimoe Sen keedah pesaling deri kau," jie melekat.
44010005	"Jedi kau," jie melekat, "ca' nyuroh urang ke' kota Yope," jie, "nyusol Simon yeng siko' yeng didemo reng jum Petrus, gei' iyo kitue.
44010006	Iyo numpang di rumah reng bedemo Simon jum, yeng gewaie ngenggewai kuli' binatang. Rumahe soma' lawut nun," jie melekat.
44010007	Dah nyoe melekat pun losiam. Lalu Kornelius lintus mangel pembentue duwo ko', ken pesurohe siko', serededu deri kelompok iyo, yeng patoh jum ken Allah.
44010008	Dah nyoe iyo begesah ke' sidoe tigo semuya' yeng tejedi di lem sensoname deri Allah tadie ponyoe, lalu iyo nyuroh sidoe ke' kota Yope kei nyusol Petrus.
44010009	Jedi pagi ponyoe dah tongah ari sidoe tigo pun dah soma' dah ken kota Yope, ja'e bolum detang. Jedi Petrus yeng diyam di rumah Simon tei' dah tongah ari ponyoe nayi' ke' bubong lalu diyam di atap yeng rato, na' bedoa.
44010010	Des iyo bedoa iyo teraso lapar porute, na' makan, pi bolum siyap jolu kei sego, jedi iyo gei' nungu reng berepi ngerompah. Jedi ketengah iyo nungu tei' temosie mantau jolu, na' po keedah mimpi, pie noe iyo tidor.
44010011	Diperatie langi' tekoba', dah nyoe jolu na' po kayin yeng luwah, yeng bisei' pada' binatang, diulor ke' deniyo tue. Diulor tei' seolah-olah digentong di empat penjurue.
44010012	Di lem kayin bisei' beneko reno jenis binatang, do binatang bekaki empat, demo ke' binatang ngenkerayap, demo ke' burong.
44010013	Dah nyoe do suwaro madah ke' Petrus, "Bengki'am Petrus," jie, "semeleham jolu tue nyo' sego kau," jie.
44010014	Samut Petrus, "Ku ngei' ku, Tuwowei," jie. "Go ku noe koloe ku nyego jolu yeng kotor cemar* po jie lem ukum Den," jie Petrus.
44010015	Samut suwaro nyoe, "Jolu yeng dah dipadah Allah beyi' bereseh nang kau padah kotor cemar," jie.
44010016	Tigo kali beulang tokoh nyoe, dah nyoe jolu nyoe dibeyie ke' serugo nun. Nyoe pemantau Petrus.
44010017	Paling kangáp iyo ngajie. Pai ge' retie jolu nyoe lem pemantaue tadie, kajie lem atie nun. Jedi dah nyoe sidoe tigo yeng disuroh le' Kornelius tei' dah detang dah ke' kota Yope, lalu sidoe betentanyoe dinai rumah Simon. Jedi mátam. Ketengah Petrus gei' ngaji pai gei' retie pemantaue tadie tei' poe sidoe tigo dah detang dah ke' pagar rumahe,
44010018	lalu sidoe nyapo nanyoe do noe reng bedemo Simon Petrus numpang dinyoe.
44010019	Petrus si gei' di atas, gei' kebonóng iyo ngaji ke' hal pemantaue tadie. Lalu Roh Allah madah ke' Petrus, "Do reng tigo yeng ngogoe kau," jie Roh Allah.
44010020	"Turunam kau," jie, "lalu namah sidoe pulang ke' kamponge. Kau nang na' sorot namah sidoe, nang na' ngembedo sidoe, go Akuam yeng ngutus sidoe tigo nyusol kau," jie Roh Allah nyingka' Petrus.
44010021	Lalu Petrus pun turun, mat betomu ken sidoe tigo ko'. "Akuam," jie Petrus, "yeng digogoe kam. Na' pai kam manu ke' aku?"
44010022	"Kami," jie sidoe tigo, "disuroh Kapten Kornelius kitue. Sen urang bujor benar, reng yeng tuno' taalo' jum ke' Allah, sen dihormát jum le' pada' reng Yahudi pun. Jedi Kapten Kornelius," jie sidoe "disuroh melekat Allah yeng suci ca' beposan ke' kami kei nyusol den, nyuroh den ke' rumah sen, nyo' sen ningo pai-pai yeng Allah nyuroh den madah ke' sen," jie sidoe.
44010023	Lalu Petrus pun ngaja' sidoe nayi' ke' rumah nyoe, disurohe bemalam dinyoe lo'e. Jedi pagi ponyoe Petrus ken sidoe tigo mat turun na' bejelan ke' Kaisarea. Do jum reng seimán deri kota Yope yeng kei namah Petrus ken reng tigo nyeh.
44010024	Jedi mátam. Dah ari sebuwahe sidoe mat detang ke' kota Kaisarea. Kornelius pun dah siyap dah nungu kedetang sidoe, ken pada' waris wala'e ken belo gelumoe yeng dikumpole ke' rumahe.
44010025	Jedi dah detang Petrus tei' Kornelius pun manu na' nyamute, nungkup ke' tanah di adap Petrus, na' nyomahe.
44010026	Ja'e Petrus mantau Kornelius na' nyomahe tei' iyo ngenjepaie, lalu diangki'e. "Bediriam beh," jie, "aku kin reng biyaso nyem."

44010028	Jedi jie Petrus nyingka' reng rami nyeh, "Tentu kam tawu," jie, "ken ukum agama kami, go kami reng Yahudi noe buleh begewol ken kam noe Yahudi, sa'am na' nayi' ke' rumah kam. Ja'e Allah si dah ngenjelas ke' aku," jie Petrus, "go mensiyo sopai-sopai pun noe depat diangap jat le' aku.
44010029	Mangko aku pun noe ngeloh na' kitue, dah diposan le' sidoe," jie Petrus. "Jedi kam," jie, "pai kemawo' kam go kam nyuroh aku kitue?" jie.
44010030	Lalu Kornelius pun nyamut. "Jedi aku," jie Kornelius, "kiloh mensanoe bedoa na' po selomoam," jie, "mayo tue jum ari, jengkah bedoa ujong ari," jie. "Jedi kebonóng ku bedoa tei' do temeronyong siko' reng lelaki, bepekakas mengkilat becayo.
44010031	Lalu iyo ngomóng ken aku. Kornelius, jie, Allah dah ningo doa kau, jie, tawu Sen dah ken gewai kau nan nulong reng bensat. Nyoe dah diterimoe Sen keedah pesaling kau ke' Sen, jie.
44010032	Mangko kau ca' nyuroh reng ke' kota Yope, nyusol Simon yeng didemo reng Petrus. Iyo numpang di rumah Simon yeng siko' yeng gewaie ngenggewai kuli' binatang; rumahe di soma' lawut, jie melekat.
44010033	Lalu aku pun," jie Kornelius nyingka' Petrus, "lintus nyuroh sidoe tigo nyusol kau. Kau pun," jie, "na' kau kitue, jera' kau." "Jedi kami bekumpol ditue pun mat tam kona' Allah," jie Kornelius, "mangko pai-pai pun yeng disuroh Tuwowe yeng na' dipadah ke' kami, kami pun na' kami ningoe," jie.
44010034	Dah nyoe Petrus pun ngembuka' omónge. "Jedi tue kam semuya' segeno," jie, "aku berue mat yakin nar, berue tuam aku jelas ken Allah mat noe pileh bulu, noe beurang bediret," jie.
44010035	"Sen poe nerimoe sopai pun yeng tuno' taalo' ke' Sen, yeng bekelaku panci, beyi' reng Yahudi beyi' reng benso layin pun," jie.
44010036	"Jedi tue ku madah ke' kam," jie Petrus, "posan payit yeng dah dikirum Sen ke' kami reng Israel. Posan payit Sen ya'am mat agah panci, ke' hal kedamai yeng dibeyie le' Yesus Kristus, Tuwowe semuya' segeno mensiyo, beyi' reng Yahudi beyi' reng noe Yahudi pun.
44010037	-
44010038	A, kam pun," jie Petrus, "tentu dah tawu ke' hal Yesus reng Nasaret nyeh, go gesahe dah tesebar di seruroh Yudea tue. Betongai mie di peloya' Galilea nun, des Yohanes madah ke' hal reng ca' disolam. Jedi po kam dah tawu nyeh Yesus mat dipileh le' Allah, disah le' Allah ken Roh Sen, diborie Sen kuwaso yeng mat. Dinai-nai pun Yesus nan serarat bekelaku panci, nulong reng, membeyi' pada' reng yeng disensare dipeulun le' Pengelakar, go Allah nan nyeroto iyo.
44010039	Kami pun," jie Petrus, "mat saksi Yesus, go kami merati semuya' gewaie di nenggeri kami reng Yahudi tue, sampai di kota Yerusalem pun. Pie dah nyoe iyo dibunoh reng, digentong reng di kayu salip di Yerusalem nun.
44010040	"Ja'e yeng dibunoh mensiyo nyeh pie disuroh le' Allah bengki' idup agei', dah ari pengentigoe nyeh. Dah iyo idup agei' nyeh Allah pun borie kelorong nyo' reng merati ken iyo mat idup.
44010041	Ja'e noe iyo semuya' urang peh yeng meratie dah iyo idup, pi ngat kamiam yeng dah dipileh le' Allah kei saksie, yeng meratie. Kami pun do makan ken iyo dah iyo bengki' idup agei' nyeh," jie Petrus.
44010042	"Dah nyoe kami disurohe ca' madah agah panci ke' semuya' urang, go kami mat nyo' saksie, kei madah yeng mat ke' hal iyo. Yesusam to' yeng dipileh le' Allah nyo' ngakim pada' mensiyo gi, beyi' mensiyo yeng gei' idup beyi' mensiyo yeng dah mati pun.
44010043	"Pada' penijum mie pun besaksi ke' hal Yesus jum! Go jie pada' penijum nyeh sopai ja' yeng pecayo ken iyo dosoe mat diampun tam kuwaso demo iyo," jie Petrus.
44010044	Jedi ketengah Petrus gei' ngomóng tei' temosie Roh Allah pun turun secaro enah ke' semuya' reng yeng ningo posan payit Petrus.
44010045	-
44010046	Lalu sidoe pun bepaner ngomóng pakai pada' paner layin yeng selomo noe tawue, samel besukor mugi Allah. Pada' reng Yahudi yeng namah Petrus deri kota Yope tadie ponyoe paling kangáp iyo ngajie. "Wai," jie sidoe, "poe diunyo' Sen jum le' Allah Roh Sen ke' pada' reng yeng noe Yahudi pun," jie. Lalu jie Petrus,
44010047	"Pai gei' alange sidoe tue disolam pun," jie, "go sidoe mat dah nerimoe Roh Allah jum, na' po diret nyomie," jie Petrus nyingka' betore reng Yahudi nyeh.
44010048	Lalu iyo pun nyuroh Kornelius sidoe ca' disolam atas kuwaso demo Yesus Kristus. Lalu mátam. Dah nyoe Kornelius sidoe pun nyuroh Petrus bemalam di arong sidoe benso duwo tigo ari pelamate.
44011001	Lalu mátam. Pada' pelantar posan ken pada' reng layin yeng seimán di peloya' Yudea nyeh dah ningo jum ken reng noe reng Yahudi pun dah nerimoe posan payit Allah.
44011002	Dah nyoe Petrus pun pulang ke' kota Yerusalem. Dah pulang ke' Yerusalem iyo dicacue le' reng Yahudi yeng gei' mementing pelator sunát.*
44011003	Jie sidoe, "Gopai go kau nayi' ke' rumah reng noe disunát," jie, "malah ken paie makan ken sidoe pun na' kau," jie sidoe nyacue Petrus.
44011004	Lalu Petrus pun ngenjelas ke' sidoe semuya' yeng tejedi deri asale. Jedi jie Petrus, "Potue ne, kamei.
44011005	Aku ketiko nyoe bedoa," jie, "di kota Yope nun. Jedi kebonóng ku bedoa," jie, "lem pemantau ku seolah-olah bemimpi merati jolu. Perati ku do jolu na' po kayin yeng luwah, bisei' pada' binatang. Kayin nyeh seolah-olah begentong di empat penjurue, lalu diulor deri serugo turun ke' soma' aku," jie.
44011006	"Dah nyoe aku pun nelomát ke' lem kayin nyeh; perati ku bisei' pada' binatang bekaki empat, ken pada' binatang gerang, demo ke' ular demo ke' coca' bengkarong, demo ke' pada' burong pun do.
44011007	Dah nyoe ku ningo suwaro yeng bepadah ke' aku, Bengki'am, Petrus, jie, semeleham, kei kau sego.
44011008	Pie aku nyamute, Ku ngei' ku, Tuwowei, go jolu yeng kotor cemar po jie lem ukum Den noe koloe ku ngenculete kaliam ke' nyawo ku, jie ku.
44011009	"Pie dah nyoe bebungi agei'am suwaro deri serugo nyeh. Jie, Yeng dah dipadah Allah beyi' bereseh nang na' dipadah kau kotor cemar, jie.
44011010	Nyoe beulang-ulang sampai tigo kali, dah nyoe jolu nyoe ken isei'e ditari' agei' ke' serugo nun," jie Petrus ngenggesahe.
44011011	"Jedi pas do pemantau ku ponyoe lalu temosie do reng lelaki tigo ko' detang ke' rumah tumpang aku, go sidoe diutus reng deri kota Kaisarea kei ngogoe aku.
44011012	A, Roh Allah pun," jie Petrus, "nyuroh aku namah sidoe. Jie Sen nang na' aku ngembedo sidoe numo' sidoe noe reng Yahudi pun. Lalu mátam. Aku pun namah sidoe tigo ko' ke' kota Kaisarea; a, sidoe nam tue yeng seimán nyeh namah kami empat kinun," jie Petrus. "Dah nyoe kami mat nayi' ke' rumah Kornelius yeng mosan aku kinyoe.
44011013	Lalu Kornelius pun ngenggesah nyerito ke' kami pai yeng tejedi ke' iyo. Jedi iyo do merati melekat temosie temeronyong di lem rumahe. Lalu melekat nyeh madah ke' Kornelius ken iyo ca' nyuroh reng ke' Yope kei nyusol aku, ke' Simon Petrus, jie.
44011014	Go aku langko' madah posan payit ke' sidoe, gei' sidoe seberumah diselamát, jie melekat nyingka' Kornelius. Kornelius pun ngenggesahe ke' kami dah kami detang ke' rumahe," jie Petrus. "Jedi ningo panere bungi nyoe
44011015	aku pun betongai madah agah panci ke' sidoe. Pie gei' berue betongai pun temosie Roh Allah mat turun ke' sidoe secaro enah, na' po yeng tejedi ke' diret nyomie.
44011016	Lalu dinyoam aku teringát ke' yeng jie Tuwowe diret nyomie.* Kin jie Yesus Tuwowe mie Yohanes Penyolam nyolam reng ke' lem ayie, pie dah nyoe, jie, diret langko' na' disolam ken Roh Allah, jie.
44011017	Mangko jie ku pengunyo' Allah ke' reng noe Yahudi pun mat samoam ken pengunyo' Sen ke' diret des diret pecayo ken Yesus Kristus Tuwowe. Mat Allaham yeng ngunyo'e," jie Petrus. "Konai aku na' nonga' Allah?" jie.
44011018	Lalu reng Yahudi yeng nyacue Petrus tadie pun mat noam iyo ngencelo agei', malah ken paie sidoe mugi Allah. "Eh," jie sidoe, "reng noe Yahudi pun poe diborie Allah kelorong nyo' sidoe bebeta' piker jum, gei' sidoe pun buleh idup beru," jie.
44011019	Jedi mátam. Ketiko Stepanus dibunoh mie pada' reng pecayo kin ngerebecau, rari deri Yerusalem tam disensare reng. Do yeng rari sampai ke' ateh Penisia, do yeng rari sampai ke' pulau Siprus, do jum yeng rari sampai ke' kota Antiokia.
