Hale aku dipecaro ari tue tam arap nyoam, Rajoei. Ngat nyoam penomah pendudoh sidoe ke' hal aku nyeh, ya'am go aku mat pecayo ken Allah mat nyuroh reng mati bengki' idup agei'. Sukor beh noe reng Yahudi yeng ngendudoh aku!
44026008	Pi gopai beh go kaji deduwan Allah noe ken do nyuroh reng mati bengki' idup agei'? Mat paling enah aku sampai dipecaro reng ke' hal arap nyoe!
44026009	"Ja'e gei' nyomie si aku mat ponyoe jum kengkaji ku, deduwanei. Kaji ku nyomie aku mat ca' besemangát beabis-abise nyo' ku nentang ngelawan pada' reng yeng pecayo ken demo Yesus deri Nasaret .
44026010	Jedi mátam, gewai ku di Yerusalem mie aku mat dikuwaso le' pada' ketuwo pelayan dinun mie nyo' ku nangkap pada' engku Allah nyeh. Sidoe sampai dipenjero ku, malah ken paie ku mat nyentuju des sidoe dibunoh reng pun.
44026011	Pai noe dipempungah ku di pada' rumah semeyang, pai noe dipemana' ku gei' menghina ngeremeh demo Yesus kira' sidoe na'e nye', pai noe digogoe disarie ku sampai ke' deng kota jewoh pun to' ku mempungah sidoe, tam mat ngatam mereruwap ati ku ketiko nyoe," jie Paulus.
44026012	"Jedi mátam te'," jie Paulus. "Mat nyoam gewai ku mie ketiko ku bejelan ke' kota Damsik mie. Jedi ketiko nyoe aku mat dikuwaso diutus le' pada' ketuwo pelayan kei ku nangkap pada' reng pecayo di Damsik nyeh.
44026013	"Jedi des ku bejelan ke' Damsik nyeh tongah ari ada'-ada' tei' noe mererema' semorie perati ku do tampa' yeng manyah deri serugo, Rajoei. Tampa' nyeh paling nyaca', caca' deri tampa' mato ari pun, manyah ke' aku ken ke' pada' tamah ku ge'em.
44026014	Semuya' kami pun pam! tepesungkur, lalu aku do ningo suwaro yeng ngomóng ken aku lem paner Ibrani. Saulus, jie, gopai go kau nyensare mempungah aku? jie. Kau keedah nepok ayie di dulang, jie. Kau nyensare diret kauam nan nentang ngelawan tuwowe kau, jie.
44026015	"Jedi samut aku, Sopai beh den, Tuwowe? Samut Tuwowe tei', Aku Yesus, yeng nan kau pempungah, jie.
44026016	Bengki', bediriam kau, jie Yesus. Dingoam posan ku tue. Go aku nganyoe diret ku ke' kau pun, jie, go ku deri nyomiam dah mileh ngogoe kau to' pelayan aku, jie. Maksut aku gei' kau besaksi madah pai yeng dah diperati kau ke' hal aku ari tue, ken to' kau madah jum pai-pai yeng langko' dianyoe dipadah ku ke' kau dah nyoe gi.
44026017	Aku dah mileh kau deri semuya' benso, beyi' reng Yahudi beyi' reng noe Yahudi pun. Ku ngutus kau kei kau besaksi madahe ke' semuya' sidoe,
44026018	gei' sempayo mato sidoe tekoba', gei' sidoe bebeta' piker bebeli' deri sagam, manu ke' tampa'; a, gei' sidoe ningal kuwaso Pengelakar ken bebeli' ke' Allah die. Tuju maksut ku gei' sidoe pun pecayo ken aku, gei' sempayo doso sidoe dielon, ken sidoe dikawum ken pada' engku diret ku jum, jie Tuwowe nyingka' aku.
44026019	"Jedi mátam, Rajo Agripaei. Aku mat tuno'am ke' semuya' yeng dipadah le' Sen di lem pemantau ku yeng cayo deri serugo mie. Konai aku na' nentange?
44026020	Jedi pai pun yeng dipadah Sen ke' aku nyeh aku mat besaksi; yeng pertamoe di kota Damsik, dah nyoe di Yerusalem, dah nyoe di seruroh peloya' Yudea, a, dah nyoe ku madahe ke' reng noe Yahudi ge'em. Aku bepadah kei semuya' segenoe mat ca' bebeta' piker bebeli' ke' Allah die; ge'em ken sidoe ca' idup po yeng patut begi reng yeng dah bebeta' piker.
44026021	Nyoam yeng ku padah dinai-nai pun. Ngat tam nyoam go reng Yahudi nangkap aku di rumah kediyam Allah mie, sampai na' munoh aku.
44026022	Pi aku mat nan serarat ditulong diberansang le' diret Allaham, sampai ke' ari tue pun, mangko ku bediri besaksi di adap deduwan bosai kocit tuwo biya' pun. A, Kei' Musa ken pada' penijum layin mie kin do bepadah yeng langko' na' tejedi. A, yeng ku padah pun ngatam yeng dipadah le' desiyan mie, noe ku ngurang, noe ku namah.
44026023	Go jie pada' penijum mie Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah mat ca' ngerudu kesensare, dah nyoe ca' bengki' idup agei'. Iyo mat Pengulu pada' reng layin yeng langko' bengki' idup agei' jum. Mat tam iyo bengki' idup agei' nyeh mangko iyo mampu madah agah panci yeng meyie tampa', beyi' ke' benso diret beyi' ke' reng noe Yahudi pun. Nyoam yeng nan dipadah aku jum, na' po yeng dipadah le' pada' penijum mie," jie Paulus.
44026024	Jedi ketengah Paulus gei' ngomóng nyamut pada' penomah pendudoh nyeh temosie Gubernor Pestus nyerokang samel mera'. "Kau tue ngerebecau dah, dingo ku, Paulusei," jie. "Dah gilo kau tue tam kebenya' pengentawu kepanai kau nyeh," jie Pestus.
44026025	Pie samut Paulus, "Noe, noe tam ku gilo peh, Pa' Gubernor yeng ku hormátei," jie. "Yeng ku padah tue mat-mátam. Mat tanai tenángam pemiker ku," jie Paulus.
44026026	"Semuya' yeng ku padah yeng tejedi nyomie mat maloam; noe iyo betetapo' peh, mat tampa' bedemar terang sesuloh. A, Rajo Agripa pun," jie Paulus, "mat tawu sen ke' hal tue, noe ken noe didingo sen, engo ku. Mangko ku bereni ngomóng terus terang potue ken sen."
44026027	Dah nyoe jie Paulus, "O Rajo Agripa," jie, "den pecayo noei ken yeng dipadah le' pada' penijum? Engo ku mat pecayo den," jie Paulus.
44026028	"Ah," jie Rajo Agripa, "lokas nar kau na' nyuroh aku menjedi reng Kristen," jie.
44026029	"Lamat lokas pun kiroe," jie Paulus, "noe iyo ngat den tuam, pie semuya' segeno yeng ningo aku ari tue pun kiroe mat na'e nunoe na' po aku jum," jie, "cuwali ja' nang na' sampai dipasong po aku tue," jie Paulus. "Nyoam doa ku ke' Sen," jie Paulus.
44026030	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Rajo Agripa bengki' bediri, lalu gubernor ken Bernike ken pada' reng layin yeng ngadap dinyoe pun bediri jum, lalu pamusam.
44026031	Jedi dah pamus keluwar tei' sidoe bekengkomong ngomóng ke' hal Paulus. Jie sidoe, "Mat cum kesalah reng tue; sa' beh na' diukum mati; kenaken dipenjero pun noe patutam," jie sidoe.
44026032	Lalu jie Rajo Agripa nyingka' Pestus, "Kira' iyo noe telampoh dah minta' dipecaro le' Rajo Kaisar si," jie, "reng nyoe tawu dipelopasam," jie Agripa.
44027001	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe diputus reng ken kami ca' nayi' kapal layar yeng nuju ke' Roma di nenggeri Italia. Lalu Paulus ken beberopai ko' reng layin yeng samo ditahan nyeh diserah ke' kapten yeng demoe Yulius. Yulius tei' bepangkat tingie di kelompok tentara Rajo Kaisar. Jedi Paulus sidoe mat diserah ke' iyo.
44027002	Dah nyoe kami Paulus nayi' kapal layar yeng berue detang deri kota Adramitium, yeng cagar na' singah menyingah di pada' kota di pinger lawut di propinsi Asia. Jedi mátam, dah nayi' kapal layar nyeh kami pun mat belayaram. Kami ditamah jum le' Aristarkus, reng deri kota Tesalonika di propinsi Makedonia.
44027003	Jedi dah nayi' kapal layar tei' dah pagi ponyoe detang ke' kota Sidon. Jedi Kapten Yulius pun paling panci atie ken Paulus, lalu di Sidon nyeh iyo ngijin Paulus turun ke' derat nyo' manu ke' pada' kabane dinyoe, nyo' sidoe nyukup keperelue.
44027004	Jedi dah nyoe belayar agei'am kami. Pie temosie ditempoh angín deri adap, mangko kami belayar ca' belelinong nyusor piya' kanán pulau Siprus.
44027005	Dah lopas pulau Siprus nyeh kami belayar di penenongah lawut yeng soma' daerah Kelikia ken Pampilia. Dah nyoe kami detang ke' kota Mira di daerah Likia.
44027006	Di Mira tei' Yulius nomu kapal layar deri kota Aleksandria yeng cagar na' belayar ke' nenggeri Italia. Mangko iyo ngaleh kami ke' kapal nyoe.
44027007	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe belayar agei'am kami beropai ari, pie kuyutam. Mat belelah bejoreh detang ke' soma' kota Nidus pun, tam nan tempoh le' angín yeng noe tentu. Dah nyoe ngaso noe mampu ngelawan angín nyeh lalu tepakso kami nyasar ke' kiboe pulau Kreta ngelalu soma' kota Salmone.
44027008	Kami belayar nyusur pantai nyem, mat belelah bejoreham pejelan kami. Lamat belamat detang ke' kota di pinger pantai yeng demoe Pelaboh Panci, soma' kota Lasea.
44027009	Dah detang ke' Pelaboh Panci nyeh mat dah lamat dah kami dah belayar, pie pejelan ke' Roma si gei' suba'am. Ari Raya Pendamai pun dah lampau dah; maksute kin dah behayo dah na' belayar, pelintang angín nan kuwat dah. Mangko Paulus pun nonga' sidoe noe sa' melaju pejelane.
44027010	Jedi jie Paulus nyingka' sidoe, "Mun lem pengaji aku si tona' mat behayo, deduwanei, mun ngeresudu' ngelaju pejelan tona'. Pasti benya' deri tona' yeng bemati belosi beronso bemalo, sa'am go berang rega' ken kapal tue pun," jie.
44027011	Pie Kapten Yulius tei' ngei'e ningo Paulus, cohe ningo jeragan ken kapten kapal nyeh.
44027012	Nyuroh sidoe ngei' ningo nyeh go kota nyoe mat noe panci nyo' kapal belinong des munsim colap, mangko sidoe benya' nyeh mat mutuse ken sidoe manseh na' belayaram deri nyoe. Kaji sidoe senoe-noe na' detang ke' kota Peniks, yeng di pantai pulau Kreta. Go kota Peniks kin do pelabohe yeng bepelinong kiboe kanán pun, mat amánam dinyoe. Mangko kaji sidoe mun dah detang ke' Peniks nyeh berue mat renán dinyoam seukor munsim colap nyeh.
44027013	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe siyut jie angín selatan asauam. Mangko jie sidoe, "Ha, can, tue mat cuco' ken rencana diret," jie. Lalu bosi penamat kapal nyeh mat diangki' sidoe, lalu kami pun belayaram soma' pantai Kreta, nuju ke' Peniks.
44027014	Pie noe dam lamat belayar tei' temosie ditempoh buwowe yeng paling ontap, yeng didemo reng angín timor lawut. Ngatam pengontape nempoh kapal kami deri derat,
44027015	sampai tekobusam kapal. Mat noe mampu ngelawan buwowe nyeh te', mangko kami mat nyeraham biyar kapal nyeh dibeyie le' buwowe pun.
44027016	-
44027017	Jedi ketiko kapal kami tesasar dibeyie le' buwowe ponyoe kami ngelalu pulau Kauda, piya' ke' arong selinong kit deri angín. Dinyoe kami mampu nari' perawu yeng ditamat di kemudi kapal nyeh; dah ditari' tei' perawu nyeh diangki', diongkah ke' lem kapal nyeh, pie mat belelah bejoreham ngenggewaie. Dah perawu ditari' diongkah lem kapal nyeh tei' lalu kapal nyeh dikukoh seukor kemampu sidoe, dikerekatue dikobate ken tali melintang melujor. Dah nyoe kaji sidoe gola' kapal nyeh dibeyie buwowe kaloe sampai terumpa' ke' betu di Tolo' Sirtis. Mangko pada' bonáng layar nyeh diturun le' sidoe gei' abar kit, dah nyoe kapal pun mat dibeyie le' buwowe nyem.
44027018	Gelebar gelebur gelumang lawut, sampai kapal pun belungang belengi' dibeyie le' buwowe, mangko pagi ponyoe sidoe betongai muwáng pada' berang rega' yeng do lem kapal nyeh ke' lem lawut, kei kapal nyeh angal kit.
44027019	Dah lusoe ponyoe sampai pada' alat-alat kapal pun dibuwange jum ke' lawut go kapal nyeh dah na' karam dah, kaji sidoe.
44027020	Pai-pai ari pelamate mat noe awas mato ari ken bintang pun; mat ngatam ujan buwowe nyeh yeng noe berenti-renti. Sampai pengabise kaji kami mat cumam arap kami na' selamát.
44027021	Jedi mátam. Kami mat dah lamat dah noe makan pun. Lalu Paulus pun bediri di adap pada' kami di kapal nyeh. Lalu jie Paulus, "Kaban kerabat ku," jie, "kira' deduwan na' ningo jie aku mie tentu tona' noe besusah payah beluwang berugi potue," jie Paulus, "go kin jie aku nyomie tona' noe sa' berangkat deri Kreta," jie Paulus.
44027022	Pi tue," jie Paulus, "deduwan ca' tenángam ati, go siko' pun cum deri tona' yeng cagar losi, cuwali kapal tue gi.
44027023	Go semalam," jie Paulus, "doam melekat manu ke' aku; iyo mat diutus le' Allah Tuwowe ku yeng ku somah.
44027024	Jedi melekat nyeh mat do bepadah ke' aku, ken aku noe sa' gola', go aku langko' selamát, jie, go aku kin manseh ca' manu ngadap Rajo Kaisar di Roma nun. A, sekurang aku, jie melekat, semuya' tamah ku di kapal tue pun jie langko' selamát jum, nuntong doa ku ke' Sen, jie melekat.
44027025	Mangko deri nyoe," jie Paulus, "mat ca' tenángam ati deduwanei, go aku mat pecayo ku ken Allah pasti nuntong pai yeng dipadah le' melekat semalam," jie Paulus.
44027026	"Engkasam yeng langko' tejedi," jie Paulus, "kapal tona' langko' kanas di sebuwah pulau," jie.
44027027	Lalu mátam. Dah empat belas ari dah kami dibeyie le' buwowe, bererapong di lawut Adria. Jedi dah tongah malam ponyoe kaji pada' kuli kapal nyeh kapal nyeh dah nuju soma' ke' derat dah.
44027028	Mangko sidoe ngukor pendelam ayie ken tali pendugo; peratie duwo puloh kayo' longán dam pendelame. Lalu dah soma' kit ke' derat nyeh diukor agei' peratie tingal limo belas kayo' longán dam pendelame.
44027029	Jedi ngaso kin tuwor ayie nyeh, sidoe ngorie gola' kapal nyeh terumpa' ke' pada' betu kalas kaloe, mangko dilabohe empat tie bosi penamat deri kemudi kapal nyeh, gei' susut kit. Mat kamoh iroham pada' sidoe, sedang ari pun gei' malam; kaji sidoe nun kiroe na'e ari copat siyang.
44027030	Jedi ngaso ponyoe pada' kuli kapal pun na' rari ningal kapal nyeh, lalu sidoe nurun perawu nyeh deri kapal nyeh ke' lawut, puro-puro seolah-olah sidoe na' memanci pada' bosi penamat di luwan kapal nyeh.
44027031	Pie dah nyoe Paulus bepadah ke' Yulius ken pada' serededue. Jie Paulus, "Sidoe kuli kapal nyeh ca' renán di kapal tue, nang na' sidoe rari," jie Paulus. "Mun sidoe rari si deduwan pun behayo," jie.
44027032	Mangko pada' serededu nyeh notas pada' tali penamat perawu nyeh, lalu perawu nyeh mat dilopas ming ke' tongah lawut gei' kuli kapal nyeh noe tawu na' rari.
44027033	Jedi mátam. Penantie ari siyang nyeh Paulus ngaja' pada' kami di kapal nyeh makan. "Semuya' segeno deduwan," jie Paulus,"tue dah empat belas ari dah deduwan nan serarat kamoh miyoham, makan opai pun cum.
44027034	Jedi tue ku muhún mampalam ke' deduwan, gei' sempayo deduwan makanam lo'e gei' peraso tona' jogar kaloe, go semuya' segeno tona' mat selamátam kaloe, siko' pun cum yeng cecer berayan," jie Paulus.
44027035	Jedi dah ngomóng ponyoe dah nyoe diamie le' Paulus roti, lalu iyo besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Allah di adap kami, lalu dipocahe rotie, disegoe; (na' ngaja' kami makan jum)*.
44027036	Dah nyoe pada' kami di kapal nyeh mat tenáng kit, lalu kami pun makan jum.
44027037	A, pemenya' semuya' kami di lem kapal nyeh duwo ratus tujoh puloh nam ko'.
44027038	Jedi dah bekonyáng-konyáng makan nyeh dah nyoe pada' karah genum yeng gei' do lem kapal nyeh dipebuwang reng jum ke' lem lawut, gei' sempayo kapal nyeh angal kit.
44027039	Tumas dah bukoe tampa' nyeh mat awasam ken derat, pie kuli kapal nyeh noe tekenale ken tentanah daerah nailah. Pie perati do tolo' kocit yeng dilinong pantai, lalu kaji sidoe mun mampu, kapal nyeh na' dituju ke' derat nyoe.
44027040	Mangko pada' bosi penamat kapal nyeh ditotase, diadue di lem lawut nyem. Samel pada' bosi penamat ditotas tei' pada' tali kemudie nyeh ditonor le' sidoe gei' sidoe mampu ngemudi kapal. Dah nyoe bonáng layar piya' ke' luwane dikonoe dipasang le' sidoe, gei' kapal nyeh dibeyie le' angín nuju ke' derat.
44027041	Pie dah kapal dituju ke' derat tei' temosie piya' ke' luwan kapal nyeh kanas tam paser, lalu nolehe begerak. Piya' ke' kemudie remók rencam dibantai le' gelumang bosai.
44027042	Jedi ngaso remók rencam tei' kaji pada' serededu nyeh pada' reng tahan ca' dibunoh ja', gei' sidoe noe rari ke' derat nun.
44027043	Pie ditonga' le' Yulius, go iyo mat na' nulong Paulus. Lalu jie Yulius berang yeng uleh kedonáng, jie, ca' ngelumpat ke' lawut dolu, nuju ke' derat.
44027044	Ken yeng noleh kedonáng, jie Yulius, ca' bepelampong ja' ken pada' papan ken pada' kepocah kapal, jie. Lalu mátam, semuya' segenoe pun mat selamát detang ke' derat, siko' pun cum yeng cecer berayan.
44028001	Jedi mátam. Dah selamát detang ke' derat nyeh lalu kami dipadah le' reng dinyoe ken derat nyeh tei' Pulau Malta, demoe.
44028002	Reng yeng diyam dinyoe mat paling panciam ken kami. Sidoe nyamut semuya' kami ken secaro panciam, ken sidoe nugoh api di pantai, go ari pun dah ujan, mat colapam tuboh kami.
44028003	Dah nyoe Paulus pun ngerubut ngogoe ranting kayu. Jedi dah kayue na' ditugohe ke' lem api nyeh tei' lalu ngaso tam angát nyeh temosi pamus ular, lalu dok! manto' jeri Paulus, sampai likat begentong ke' jerie.
44028004	Jedi dah pada' reng Malta merati ular tegegeníng di jeri Paulus nyeh lalu jie sidoe nyingka' betore, "Pasti reng tue pemunoh," jie. "Tam kepa' pun iyo lopas deri lawut tadie pie iyo manseh disumpah antu duwato," jie sidoe Malta.
44028005	Pie Paulus si dikibare nyem ular di jeri nyeh te' ke' lem api, noe diidape peh.
44028006	Reng Malta tei' tungu ketungu, nelomát, kaji sidoe pasti bongka'ei tubohe kaloe, atau pun tang ke' bap! ponyoamei, kajie. Pie tungu ketungu meratie ponyoe mat cum celo belengoe. Lalu berubah pengaji sidoe. "Eh," jie sidoe, "reng tue duwato engo ku", jie.
44028007	Jedi di soma' arong kami detang ke' derat nyeh di nyoe do tanah luwah engku gubernor pulau nyoe. Demo gubernor tei' Publius. Iyo nampan nerimoe kami paling panci; iyo ngelayan ngeladen kami sebuwar atie. Tigo ari pelamat kami numpang di rumahe.
44028008	Jedi ketiko kami di rumahe tei', poe apa'e domám, ken bicoe temiro, mat noe bengki'-bengki' nyem. Jedi ningo apa' gubernor saki' nyeh lalu Paulus pun nyongo'e, lalu ngendoae, nyampang jerie ke' tubohe, lalu penyaki'e pun mat na'e beyi'.
44028009	Jedi dah apa' Publius dipebeyi' ponyoe lalu pada' reng layin di pulau nyoe yeng saki' poníng rodang rungue nyeh detang jum, lalu dipebeyi'am jum.
44028010	Ngaso ponyoe sidoe mat kin ngehormát ngerogo kami. Lamat belamat dah kami na' ningal pulau nyoe semuya' keperelu bokal sangu kami di jelan nyeh mat diajen diunyo' le' sidoe.
44028011	Jedi dah tigo bulan kami di Malta nyeh dah nyoe kami pun nayi' kapal layar yeng layin, na' berangkat belayar nuju ke' Italia. Kapal tei' asale detang deri kota Aleksandria, ja'e go gei' munsim colap nyeh iyo betungu jum di Malta. To' lamang kapal tei' do gemar patong duwato yeng bekomar, demoe Kastor ken Poluks.
44028012	Jedi mátam te'. Dah belayar deri Malta tei' dah nyoe kami singah di kota Sirakus; lalu bemalam tigo malam dinyoe.
44028013	Dah nyoe berangkat agei' belayar nyusor pantai sampai ke' kota Regium. Dah seari di Regium tei' lalu do angín selatan, mangko kami belayar agei'am ngelaju pejelan kami. A, dah lusoe ponyoe si kami detang ke' kota Puteoli.
44028014	Di Puteoli kami betomu ken pada' menyadie yeng seimán, lalu kami diunang diamie le' sidoe kei diyam bekumpol ken sidoe tujoh malam pelamate. Dah nyoe turun agei'am deri Puteoli nuju ke' Roma.
44028015	Jedi bolum kami detang ke' Roma ponyoe poe menyadie yeng seimán di Roma kedingoe ken agah kami dah na' detang, lalu kami dialu le' sidoe. Do separoe nyeh yeng ngagau ke' Pasar Apius, a, ken do jum yeng ngagau ke' kampong Pengináp Tigo. Mat jewoham sidoe detang na' nyamut ngaban kami. Jedi dah betomu ken pada' sidoe nyeh Paulus pun besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Allah; mat teberansangam atie dah merati pada' kabane dinyoe.
44028016	Jedi dah detang ke' kota Roma nyeh Paulus diijin diyam di luwar, noe di rumah penjero peh, pie manseh dikawal dijego le' serededu siko' .
44028017	Jedi mátam. Dah tigo ari ponyoe di Roma tei' dah nyoe Paulus ngunang ngamel pada' pemimpin reng Yahudi dinyoe nyo' bekumpol ken iyo. Jedi dah bekumpol tei' dah nyoe Paulus ngomóng ken sidoe. "Pada' waris wala' kawum kerabat ku," jie Paulus. "Nyamán deduwan tawu ke' hal aku nyeh," jie, "go ku si mat cum kesalah ku teradap benso tona', cumam ku ngelangar adat peradat akei' puyang tona'. Pi numo' pun cum kesalah ku," jie, "aku manseh ditangkap di Yerusalem mie, lalu diserah ke' reng Roma.
44028018	Dah ku dipecaro le' reng Roma si sidoe na' ngelopas aku, go mat cum kesalah ku yeng ca' diukum mati so ku.
44028019	Pie go reng Yahudi dinun si manseh ngemoran na' ngukum aku, mangko tam cum jelan layin aku tepakso minta' dipecaro le' Rajo Kaisar die. Ja'e nyoe pun nyo' aku nyamut penomah pendudoh reng ke' hal aku, kamei, noe go ku na' nyalah kawum kerabat ku di adap rajo peh.
44028020	Mangko ku minta' na' betomu na' ngomóng ken kam," jie Paulus, "nyo' ku ngenjelas ke' hal tue. Go mat tam jenyi semayo Allah yeng diarap tona' Israelam mangko aku sampai ditangkap dipasong potue," jie Paulus.
44028021	Lalu samut pada' pemimpin tei', "Kami si cum nerimoe surat pai-pai pun deri Yudea ke' hal kau," jie. "A, ken pada' kaban kerabat tona' yeng detang tomus deri nun pun," jie, "cum yeng meyie abar ke' hal kau, mat cumam panere yeng jat ke' hal kau," jie sidoe.
44028022	"Ja'e tue," jie sidoe, "kami ingín na' ningo deri kau ke' hal kepecayo kau, go agah awoh ke' hal pengajar tue si mat nan diomel nan dicelo reng nyem dinai-nai pun," jie sidoe.
44028023	Dah nyoe sidoe mat nentu ari nyo' Paulus ngomóng ken sidoe ke' hal nyoe. Jedi dah pas ari yeng ditentu nyeh mat benya'am pada' sidoe Yahudi yeng manu ke' rumah yeng ditumpang Paulus. Lalu deri bekolam sampai ke' malam Paulus mat madah ngenjelas ke' sidoe ke' hal kepecayoe. Mat beari-ariam Paulus madah yeng mat, besaksi ke' hal des Allah disomah kei rajo. Tuju maksute tei' iyo na' nyuroh sidoe pecayo ken Yesus tam penjelas Paulus deri ukum Musa ken pada' kitap penijum layin.
44028024	Jedi separoe si dah ningo omóng Paulus nyeh pengabise kajie mátam yeng dipadah le' Paulus, pie separoe si manseh ngei'e pecayo.
44028025	Lalu beseliseham sidoe pun bepulang-pulang. Pie sebolum sidoe bepulang-pulang nyeh doam omóng pengudah Paulus ke' sidoe. Jedi jie Paulus, "Mat-mátam yeng dipadah le' Roh Allah ke' akei' puyang deduwan mie ngelalu penijum Yesaya," jie Paulus. "Go kin jie Sen nyingka' Yesaya mie bungi potue,
44028026	Kau ca' manu ke' reng Israel tue, madahe ken sidoe numo' pun langko' serarat ningo, pie tarah ke' noe tawu ken retie. Numo' pun sidoe serarat merati, pie tarah ke' noe tekalimáte.
44028027	Go ati benso sidoe tue mat paling tupal, kelinange semendingau modas-modasam, matoe dipempojame. Kira' sidoe awas ken ningo si gola' na'e sidoe bebeta' piker bebeli' ke' aku, nyo' aku membeyi'e, jie Allah lem kitap Yesaya." (Yesaya 6:9-10)
44028028	Lalu jie Paulus nyamong panere, "Dingo beh deduwan, nyamán deduwan tawu," jie. "Jedi entam caro Sen nulong nyelamát mensiyo ditula' deduwan, mangko Sen nyuroh ca' dipadah ke' reng noe Yahudi die. Reng noe Yahudi si na'e ye' ningoe," jie Paulus. [
44028029	A, dah ningo omóng Paulus bungi nyoe tei' pada' reng Yahudi pun mat bepulang-pulangam, teger beruning bepempaham pado sidoe.]
44028030	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Paulus mat diyam di Roma duwo tawun pelamate, di rumah yeng disewo direte. Iyo mat ayahe nerimoe sopai pun yeng detang manu ke' iyo dinyoe.
44028031	Ge'em mat cum reng ngidah iyo ngajar. Mat bebasam iyo teger madah ke' hal des Allah disomah kei rajo, ken ngajar ke' hal Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret.
45001001	surat tue deri aku Paulus, ulun amo Kristus Yesus. Allah dah ngunang ngamie aku kei menjedi pelantar posan Sen, dah nyoe aku diajen Sen kei mutu madah agah panci Sen nyem.
45001002	Agah panci tue dah dijenyi Sen dah deri nyomiam ngelalu pada' penijum Sen, yeng nulise di lem kitap suci Sen.
45001003	Jedi agah panci tue mat agah ke' hal ana' Sen. Mun diitong-itong secaro mensiyo si iyo mat diado le' buboh ampeh Rajo Daud.
45001004	A, ke' hal iyo mat Allah yeng panting suci pun nyoe dinyato secaro kuwaso ketiko iyo bengki' idup agei'. Nyoam boktie ken Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret nyeh mat Ana' Allah.
45001005	Ngelalu Yesus Kristusam kami nerimoe pengunyo' pengaseh Sen nyo' kami menjedi pelantar posan Sen, kei madah posan Sen ke' semuya' benso mensiyo, sempayo mensiyo pecayo ken tuno' taalo' ke' Sen. Maksute kei ngat demo Yesusam yeng dipugi dihormát reng!
45001006	A, "semuya' benso" nyeh ngawum jum kam di Roma tue, yeng diunang diamie nyo' menjedi engku Yesus Kristus.
45001007	Mangko ku nulis surat tue ke' semuya' kam di kota Roma tue yeng dikaseh le' Allah, yeng diunang diamie Sen kei menjedi engku diret Sénam. Salam deri aku berekat dolat ken damai deri Allah Apa' ken Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret.
45001008	A, bolum ku nulis ke' hal bukan si aku na' madah ke' kam ken aku mat besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Allah ngelalu Yesus Kristus nyo' semuya' kam, go gesah ke' hal kam dah pecayo si dah gempar dah dinai-nai pun!
45001009	-
45001010	Aku noe luput nan bedoa nyo' kam; nan nyimpat kam lem doa ku. Aku ngelayan Allah seputeh ati sebeníng derah madah agah panci ke' hal Ana' Sen; ha, diret Sénam kei saksi pendukong ku ken aku pun nan serarat bedoa to' kam. Aku dah lamat dah ingín na' ngenjongo' kam di Roma, mangko ku bedoa minta' tulong Sen, gola' pai nawue Sen ngijin pun mat diret Sénam yeng ngoba' alor jelan kei aku ngenjongo' kam terip tue.
45001011	Go aku ingín nar na' betomu muko ken kam ditue, sempayo aku mampu ngembegi pengunyo' pengaseh deri Roh Allah ke' kam, kei kam betamah kuwat.
45001012	A, aku pun na' ditulong le' kam jum. Maksute diret samo tulong menulong, kei samo-samo betamah kuwat entam kepecayo diret.
45001013	Kenaken si aku dah erat dah beanang-anang na' ngenjongo' pada' kam menyadie ku seimánei, pie go nan do alange. Kona' ati ku si na' bekerejo di Roma tue jum, sempayo do asel gewai ku di Roma tue na' po dah do asel gewai ku di antaro pada' reng noe Yahudi yeng layin pun.
45001014	Go aku mat keedah reng yeng berutang, pie utang ku ya'am aku ca' madah agah panci ke' semuya' mensiyo, beyi' ke' reng di kota*, beyi' pun ke' reng di ulu, beyi' ke' reng yeng sekolah tingie beyi' pun ke' reng noe sekolah.
45001015	Nyoam go aku ngemoran nar na' madah agah panci ke' pada' kam di Roma tue jum.
45001016	Aku mat yakin nar madah agah panci, go agah panci tue mat kuwaso Allah kei nulong nyelamát semuya' reng yeng pecayo, beyi' deri reng Yahudi yeng pertamo ningoe* sampai ke' pada' reng noe Yahudi pun.
45001017	Go mat agah panci tuam yeng nganyoe madah ke' diret caro diret mampu diputus Allah bujor benar. Caroe tei' caro pecayo nyem, deri epun sampai ke' ujong pun, cum caro layin. Nyoe pun dah ditulis dah di lem Kitap Allah mie, yeng bungie potue: Reng yeng diputus Allah bujor benar idup caro pecayo nyem. (Habakuk 2:4)
45001018	Jedi mátam. (Mat penting nar semuya' mensiyo ca' ningo agah panci.) Go Allah yeng merentah deri serugo dah nganyoe ngenyato kegodie Sen tam pada' kebeyat jat mensiyo yeng kehe nyomah ke' Allah. Mat diukum Sen. Pengajar yeng mat ke' hal Allah pun cum asel lem ati mensiyo tam diepang-epang dosoe.
45001019	Kira' mensiyo ingín na' tawu yeng mat ke' hal Allah si kenaken dah nyato dah, go dah dianyoe ke' sidoe le' diret Allaham.
45001020	Go numo' pun Allah noe diketawu mensiyo, pie tingkah laku Sen mat nyato nar deri asal mulo nyomie entam pada' semuya' jolu yeng dipulah Sen. Mensiyo si jelas tawu ken Allah mat do, ken Sen rajo kuwaso, go merati pada' jolu yeng dipulah le' Sen. Konai na' nyangkale?*
45001021	Mangko mensiyo mat diukum, go sungoh pun dah tawu ken Allah mat do, pie mensiyo bolei' nyomah ke' Sen, bolei'e ngangkue ken mat Sénam yeng Allah. Sidoe cum itonge na' besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen. Kebelike ati pemiker sidoe kapat ding tam sidoe nekat ke' jolu yeng noe mat. Kepepanyange ati sidoe budu nyeh menjedi bokue, noe tawu dah ken yeng mat.
45001022	Sidoe madah direte paling pintar, teruhale pengaji sidoe mat tukue budu.
45001023	Sampai Allah yeng rajo agong, yeng noe tawu mati, ditingale le' sidoe, malah ken paie disamie sidoe ken gemar beyang jolu yeng dipulahe, benso gemar beyang na' po mensiyo yeng tawu mali' buro', pai noe na' po burong, na' po binatang bekaki empat, na' po pada' binatang ngengkerayap, ento' disomahe.
45001024	-
45001025	Sidoe nyamie yeng mat ke' hal Allah ken jolu yeng noe mat. Sidoe ayah nyomah melayan jolu yeng dipulah Sen, deripado nyomah ke' diret Sen yeng mulah semuya' jolu. Teruhal diret Sénam yeng patut dihormát dipugi seora'-ora'eam. Amin. Mangko entam gewai sidoe budu ponyoe Allah pun mat nyerah sidoe kei sidoe mempungah direte. Diret sidoam yeng ngotor ngencemar tuboh direte siko' ken betore, bekeragam paling jat nunoe keingín ati sidoe. Nyoam caro Allah ngukume.
45001026	Sen mat nyerah sidoe kei sidoe nunoe keingín atie yeng ngemalu direte nyeh. Lalu secaro mensiyo yeng patut nyeh diubah digenti sidoe, sampai reng betinoe pun ngei'e dah tidor seguring ken lelaki, pie ngeroyal betinoe pado betinoe.
45001027	Ponyoe jum reng lelaki. Sidoe bolei'e tidor seguring ken betinoe po yeng patut begi lelaki, malah ken paie atie nan getal na' ngeroyal lelaki pado lelaki. Paling ngemalu gewai sidoe lelaki pado lelaki. Gewai sidoe tokoh nyoe ngerusa' ngerenoh direte. Pie nyoe pun ukum yeng setimpal go sidoe nyelimpang deri jelan yeng mat.
45001028	Kaji sidoe tei' sidoe noe perelu ken Allah,* mangko Allah pun nyerah sidoe ke' ukume yeng patut, sampai pengaji sidoe ampoe buwau nyem. Entam pengajie ponyoe mangko pada' kelakue pun nan noe alap nyem.
45001029	Kelaku sidoe nan serarat jat bangam, bemacam bejenis beneko reno keragame yeng jat, yeng noe mat, yeng noe senunoh. Atie berubah menjedi jat, sampai sidoe ngentageh ken gewai jat nyem. Sidoe nan serarat tamá' goma' nyem. Nan dengki mendengki, gela' munoh, noe koloe damai, gela' nipu ngendeyo, nan serarat isin ken betor. Sidoe gela' maner ngendongéng,
45001030	gela' mempulah betor, sie ken Allah, somong bongko', kememuwa', panai ngogoe caro bedoso, ngei'e tuno' taalo' ke' ino' apa'e.
45001031	Sidoe tupal budu, nan mungker jenyie, cum itonge kaseh ken sopai pun, nan serarat kejam.
45001032	Kenaken si sidoe dah jelas ken ukum Allah yeng madah ken reng yeng bekeragam ponyoe patut diukum mati. Sungoh pun jelas pie sidoe manseh ngeresudu' nyem bekeragam ponyoe, malah ken paie ayahe mun betore na' nunoe keragame ponyoe jum. Mat ponyoam gewai ulah tingkah laku reng yeng bolei'e nyomah ke' Allah.
45002001	(A, gola' gei' do reng yeng na' becencugeh ken aku ke' hal tue, yeng kajie iyo noe na' po reng layin. O, jie, patutam mun reng tokoh nyoe diukum, go gewai sidoe mat paling jat; pie noe ken gewai kami tokoh nyoe. Pie ku nyamut kam potue.) Biyar kam sopai-sopai pun pie kam mat noe mampu nyangkal doso kam jum. Mun kam ngangap ken betor ca' diukum tam gewaie yeng jat, mangko dinyoam kam mutuse ken kam ca' diukum jum. Go gewai kam pun samoam kejate.
45002002	Diret kin dah tawu dah ken sopai ja' yeng bekeragam tokoh nyoe pasti diukum Allah. Ukum Sen ukum yeng mat, noe beurang bediret.
45002003	Mangko jie ku noe ken kam telopas deri ukum Sen! Noe ken Allah ngukum reng layin pie ngelopas kam. Go gewai kam pun samo jat ken gewai betor yeng jie kam nyeh patut ca' diukum.
45002004	Kaji kam si Allah paling kaseh, paling sabar, noe ken Sen na' ngukum kam. Lalu kam ngelangar posan payit Sen. Pie pengaji ponyoe salah nar! Mat die Allah kaseh, pie kam noe menduli tuju kaseh Sen. Go maksut kaseh Sen pun noe iyo go na' ngadu kam bedoso peh, pie kei nyuroh kam bebeta' piker.
45002005	Pie kam si kebelike. Kam noe menduli kaseh Allah, keh kam bebeta' piker. Mangko ukum kam pasti do, setimpal ken ati kam yeng ngei' berubah. Ukum kam ditanor dikumpol nyo' kam, manu ke' Ari Kiyamát gi, des ari Allah langko' ngukum semuya' mensiyo yeng bedoso. Ari nyoe langko' nyato nar caro Allah ngukum reng ken caro yeng mat.
45002006	Go Sen cagar na' melas tiyap ko' mensiyo setimpal ken kelakue.
45002007	Do mensiyo yeng ingín diterimoe le' Allah; sidoe ingín buleh keagong yeng tan, ingín dihormát le' Allah, ingín idup seora'-ora'eam ken Sen. Mangko sidoe mutu ngelaku yeng panci. Reng tokoh nyoe si mat langko' diunyo' Allah keidup yeng cum berudu mati.
45002008	Pie do jum reng yeng nan mementing direte, bolei'e ningo yeng mat, nan nunoe yeng jat nyem. Reng tokoh nyoe si pasti diukum Allah caro kejam nar; paling borat ukume.
45002009	Paling saki' joreh susah sontokam senika' mensiyo yeng bekeragam jat, semingkin reng Yahudi, lalu ke' reng noe Yahudi pun.
45002010	Pie reng yeng gewaie panci si tenáng amánam, dihormát, diagong, semingkin reng Yahudi, lalu ke' reng noe Yahudi pun ponyoe jum.
45002011	Go Allah noe pileh bulu, noe beurang bediret. (Jedi mátam. Doso sopai pun mat diukum Allah, beyi' doso reng noe Yahudi, beyi' doso reng Yahudi pun. Pie yeng langko' dituntut didewo ke' tiyap mensiyo mat belayin-layin.)
45002012	Reng yeng di luwar gentang yeng noe tawu ken ukum Musa si manseh bedoso, diukum mati, pie ukume noe tekayi' ke' ukum Musa. A, reng Yahudi yeng tawu ken ukum Musa nyeh dituntut diukum tam iyo ngelangar ukum Musa.
45002013	Go mun reng na' arap ken ukum Musa si noe ken cukup ngat ningoe nyem. Noe iyo reng yeng ningo ukum Musa peh yeng diputus Allah bujor benar, pie ca' reng yeng tuno' ke' semuya' ukum nyoe, yeng noe ngelangare. Reng nyoam yeng diputus Allah bujor benar, noe diukum Sen. Pie mun dilangare mat diukum Sen.
45002014	Nyoe ke' hal reng Yahudi. Jedi ke' hal reng noe Yahudi diukum mati si potue ne. Mat die sidoe noe tawu ken ukum Allah yeng ditulis le' Musa mie. Pie dese gewai sidoe pun do jum yeng cuco' ken ukum Musa, go sidoe tawu lem atie nun ken reti gewai panci. Mangko pelator sidoe nyoe ke' hal jat ken panci tei' keedah ukum begi sidoe jum.
45002015	Gewai sidoe tokoh nyoe ngembokti ken ukum Allah mat do dah di lem ati sidoe. Des do ngelaku gewai jat nyeh ati kocite nun nonga'e; a, ponyoe jum des do ngelaku gewai yeng panci si ati kocite nun setuju, madah ken gewai nyoe mat panci.
45002016	Jedi semuya' tue langko' diitong Sen dah Ari Kiyamát nun gi, des ari Sen ngendecing ken ngukum pada' mensiyo, deri kelakue sampai ke' ati pemikere pun. A, Yesus Kristusam yeng kei wakel Sen nyo' ngendecing gewai semuya' mensiyo. Pengajar nyoam yeng do terudu di lem agah panci yeng nan ku padah.
45002017	A, mun kam reng yeng ayahe go kam reng Yahudi nyeh ponyoe jum. Kam kin arap diselamát entam kam tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Musa. Kam kememuwa' go kam begelumo ken Allah.
45002018	Kam tawu ken kemawo' Allah, tawu mileh yeng panci, go kam dah belajar ukum Musa.
45002019	Mangko kaji kam ca' kamam kei pengulu pengiring reng layin yeng gei' butoe, kam kei tanyoh nyo' reng yeng diyam di sagam.
45002020	Lem kengkaji kam si tentu kamam yeng tawu negur ngendidik reng yeng keriban, kamam kei guru reng yeng bolum tawu. Go semuya' pengentawu yeng mat si dah jelas dah lem ukum kam.
45002021	Pie tue mat enah nar: konoe ke' reng layin nan diajar kam, konoe ke' diret kam noe diajar. Kam nan madah perentah Allah "nang maling", pie kam pun maling, poe.
45002022	Kam nyuroh reng layin "nang butang beonga'", pie kam pun butang beonga' jum. Kam paling risie go reng nyomah ke' pengaroh keramát, pie kam pun ngeremeh Allah, noe ngehormát Sen.*
45002023	Kam kememuwa' go pada' ukum Musa do di kam, pie Allah yeng epun bungkong ukum nyoe dihina kam, go kam ngelangar ukum diret Sénam.
45002024	Malah ken paie, Sampai pada' reng noe Yahudi pun menghina ngeremeh demo Allah entam sidoe merati gewai kam Yahudi, jie lem kitap Sen nyomie. (Yesaya 52:5) Mat patutam mun reng Yahudi pun diukum le' Allah.
45002025	A, gola' jie kam lem ati diret kam nun, Pie kami si manseh diangap engku Allah go kami disunát.* Sunát si mat do gunoe mun diret nan patoh ken ukum Allah. Pie mun ngelangar ukum Sen si pai ge' gunoe disunát pun? Pai ge' bedoe ken reng noe disunát, yeng noe tawu ken ukum Allah.
45002026	A, kebelike, mun do reng noe Yahudi yeng noe disunát pun, pi mun iyo tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Allah si iyo manseh diterimoe le' Allah kei engku Sen, numo' pun iyo noe disunát.
45002027	Mangko kam langko' dituntut le' reng noe Yahudi die di adap Allah gi. Go kam manseh ngelangar ukum Allah, numo' pun ukum Sen dah ditulis dah nyo' kam. Pai tel agei' kam disunát, tano kam engku Allah. Sedang ke' reng noe Yahudi yeng noe disunát si pi iyo manseh tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Allah.
45002028	-
45002029	Mun ponyoe sopai máte reng Yahudi yeng seli? Reng Yahudi yeng seli si noe iyo secaro mensiyo peh, noe iyo yeng didemo engku Allah tam keturune secaro mensiyo. Pie reng Yahudi yeng mat nyeh ya'am reng yeng atie mat engku Allah. Ponyoe jum ke' hal tano sunát, go sunát yeng mat yeng nano reng mat engku Allah si noe iyo sunát di kuli' peh. Sunát yeng mat si ya'am sunát di ati, maksute ati yeng diubah entam kuwaso Roh Allah, go ukum Musa kin mat noe mampu ngubah ati mensiyo. Jedi mat reng ponyoam, yeng atie dah diubah, yeng mat engku Allah deri gewai ulah sampai ke' bedan beko, yeng patut didemo Yahudi. Go reng tokoh nyoe numo' pun noe dipugi le' mensiyo pie iyo dipugi diterimoe le' Allah. Nyoe reng Yahudi yeng mat yeng seli.
45003001	A, mun ponyoe do noe engoe keuntonge begi diret yeng seli keturun reng Yahudi secaro mensiyo? Do noe gunoe diret disunát pun?
45003002	Do die keuntonge yeng bosai. Keuntong yeng paling penting go posan payit diret Allaham diserah Sen ke' diret reng Yahudi.
45003003	Pie celoe go separo reng Yahudi numo' pun diberekat dolat ponyoe pie mat noe mutu pecayo; mat dah mungker jenyie ken Allah. Ja'e sungoh pun sidoe mungker jenyie pie Allah si manseh noe Sen mungker jenyi Sen!
45003004	Noe kene! Numo' pun semuya' mensiyo nan mungker jenyie pie Allah serarat nuntong jenyi Sen. Mat konoe nar yeng ditulis lem kitap Sen mie yeng bungie potue, Nyoe tejedi sempayo posan payit Den serarat dibokti bujor benar, Yeng diputus Den serarat mat mátam. (Masmur 51:4) (Mat untong nar diret reng Yahudi, go Sen pasti nuntong pada' jenyi Sen ke' diret.
45003005	Pie do jum Sen ngukum reng yeng bedoso.) Lalu dinyoe manseh do reng yeng na' nyalah Allah. Jie sidoe Allah noe adel des Sen ngukum sidoe. Jie sidoe semingkin benya' doso sidoe semingkin nyato kebujor kebenar Allah. Pakalam tam doso sidoe go reng mugi kebujor kebenar Allah, jie. Lalu jie sidoe Allah noe adel na' ngukum doso sidoe. Pie pemiker sidoe yeng bungi nyoe mat pemiker caro mensiyo nyem.
45003006	Paling salah nar! Noe ken Allah noe adel! Mun Sen noe adel konai Sen na' ngakim ngendecing semuya' mensiyo gi?
45003007	A, gola' do jum reng yeng nentang potue. Jie sidoe sidoe noe patut diukum mun sidoe mungker jenyie. Go mun sidoe mungker jenyie kin kepala' nyato ken ngat Allaham yeng mutu. Lalu pakalam tam doso sidoe go Sen dipugi, jie.
45003008	"Ayo' bedoso ja'," jie sidoe, "gei' nyato keagong Allah," jie. Sampai do reng mempulah aku, madah aku ngajar tokoh nyoe, ngaja' reng bedoso! Pie aku si noe. Pada' reng yeng ngajar tokoh nyoe si iyo mat patut diukum le' Allah. Go yeng mat si Allah pasti nuntong pada' jenyi Sen, ken pasti ngukum sopai ja' yeng bedoso.
45003009	A, jedi pulang ke' paner ku tadie tei' koti si engoe? Keada' diret reng Yahudi (yeng dipileh yeng diberekat le' Allah si) nyamán deri reng layin peh? Pie noe. Allah pasti ngukum diret jum. Go aku dah ngemboktie tadie* ken semuya' diret langko' diukum Allah tam doso diret, beyi' reng Yahudi lalu ke' reng noe Yahudi pun.
45003010	Mat konoe nar yeng ditulis di lem Kitap Allah nyomie, yeng bungie potue: A cum mensiyo yeng bujor benar, siko' pun cum.
45003011	Siko' pun cum yeng tawu yeng mat. A cum reng yeng ingín begelumo ken Allah.
45003012	Semuya' mensiyo dah nyelimpang deri jelan yeng mat, yeng nuju ke' Allah. Mat cum nilaie, cum gunoe begi Allah. A cum yeng bekeragam panci, siko' pun cum!*
45003013	Omóng sidoe paling jat, keedah lubang tama' yeng nan tekoba' bewu buntau. Lidahe becabang, serarat dipakai nyo' memuloe nyem. Omóng tutore paling biso nan nyaki' ati betor, keedah kebiso ular.
45003014	Mulut sidoe nan serarat nyumpah misoh nyelumang mengkayang.
45003015	Sidoe noe sorot semadie bunoh pun.
45003016	Gewai ulah sidoe serarat nyensare mempungah betore nyem.
45003017	Sidoe noe koloe idup damai ken sopai pun.
45003018	Sidoe noe koloe ngitong gola' ken Allah.* Bungi nyoam yeng ditulis lem kitap Sen mie.
45003019	-
45003020	A, mun ditulis di lem kitap ukum diret kin maksute nyingka' diret, dih? Teruhal diret reng Yahudi ngangkue madah direte tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Allah. Pie poe doso diret pun mat maloe nar begi Allah. Maksute mat cum mensiyo yeng mampu diputus Allah bujor benar tam iyo tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Sen. Malah ken paie guno ukum Sen pun sempayo diret jelas nar ken doso diret. Tuju maksut Sen sempayo mat cum mensiyo di seruroh deniyo yeng mampu nyangkal dosoe, mat tekedam, tepakso ngangkue ken direte mat patut diukum le' Allah.
45003021	A, pie tue si Allah dah nganyoe ke' diret caro Sen mutus diret bujor benar, numo' pun diret noe mampu tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Sen. Ja'e kenaken si caro tue pun dah dipadah dah di lem kitap Musa ken pada' kitap penijum mie pun.
45003022	Caroe tei' ya'am Sen mutus bujor benar sopai ja' yeng pecayo ken Yesus Kristus. Mat samoam caroe to' semuya' segeno mensiyo; mat cum bedoe.
45003023	Go pada' mensiyo dah bedoso bisam. Na' nyukup ketetap Allah yeng agong pun mat noe mampu.
45003024	Pie entam pengunyo' pengaseh Sen yeng modas-modasam mangko Sen mutus diret bujor benar, go diret ditobus le' Kristus Yesus yeng ngembeyar utang doso diret.
45003025	Deri nyomie diret Allaham yeng beanang-anang na' ngunyo' Yesus kei pesaling ento' diret Sen. Mangko tam derah Yesus uleh Sénam Allah nganyoe kekaseh Sen ke' sopai ja' yeng pecayo ken Yesus. Gewai Sen tokoh nyoe sempayo mat nyato ken Sen mat bujor benar, go pada' doso mensiyo mat diukum Sen. Gei' nyomie si doso mensiyo mat bolum diukum Sen, gei' diadu Sen nyem lo'e,
45003026	go Sen gei' sabar manu ke' jengkah waktu yeng tepat tue. Dah jengkah yeng tepat nyeh lalu Sen mat ngukum semuya' doso mensiyo des Yesus mati. Nyoam boktie ken Sen mat bujor benar, go doso mensiyo mat diukum. Gei' pun Sen mutus bujor benar sopai ja' yeng pecayo ken Yesus.
45003027	Mun ponyoe si konai diret na' kebebongko'? Mun diret diputus Sen bujor benar entam diret mampu tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Sen si manseh ge', patutam diret kebebongko' pun, go nyoe tam gewai diret. Pie pungka' pangkal yeng dipakai Sen tei' diret diputus bujor benar mat tam pecayo nyem. Konai na' kebebongko'?
45003028	Mangko kami yakin ken mensiyo diputus le' Allah bujor benar caro pecayo nyem, noe iyo go tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Allah peh.
45003029	A, pie gola' jie diret Allah Penulong reng Yahudi bangam. Pie noe. Sen Penulong pada' suku benso mensiyo layin jum.
45003030	Go Allah kin mat siko'am, mangko caro Sen mutus reng bujor benar pun sutiam. Gola' reng Yahudi diputus Sen bujor benar entam pecayo. A, reng noe Yahudi pun ponyoe jum, iyo diputus Sen bujor benar mat tam pecayo nyem.
45003031	Nyeh mun ponyoe maksute ukum Allah dipelosi peh, entam diret dah pecayo? Pie noe! Malah ken paie diret ngembokti ken ukum Allah mat panci bujor benaram.
45004001	A, jedi benso Abraham akei' puyang diret mie, pai yeng dirudu sen?
45004002	Mun sen diputus Allah bujor benar entam kelaku diret sen si, patutam mun sen kebebongko' pun. Pie sen mat noe tawu na' kebebongko' di adap Allah, go
45004003	ditulis di lem Kitap Allah pun Abraham pecayo ken Allah mangko diputus Allah bujor benar.*
45004004	(Jedi permeninge benso reng yeng ngamie upah ken reng yeng nerimoe jolu modas-modasam.) Reng yeng ngamie upah kin diupah entam iyo ngenggewai pai yeng disuroh. Mangko yeng diterimoe tei' noe iyo pengunyo' modas-modas peh, pi mat upah yeng sesuwai ken gewaie.
45004005	Pie ke' hal Allah mutus diret bujor benar si noe iyo tokoh nyoe peh. Kebelike mat tam pengunyo' pengaseh Sen nyem. Noe iyo pekuleh gewai diret peh. Pie entam diret pecayo mangko diret yeng jat pun mampu diputus Sen bujor benar.
45004006	A, Kei' Daud pun nulis ke' hal tue jum, madah ken reng yeng diputus Allah bujor benar, pie noe tam pekuleh gewai direte si, reng nyoe mat ayah bikaham.
45004007	Yeng ditulis Kei' Daud mie bungie potue: Untong tuwaham reng yeng kesalahe diampun, ken dosoe dielon.
45004008	Untong tuwaham reng yeng dosoe cum diitong le' Tuwowe kaliam. (Masmur 32:1-2)
45004009	Nyeh reng yeng dipadah Kei' Daud untong tuwah tadie ngat reng Yahudi yeng disunátei, atau pun ngawum reng noe Yahudi yeng noe disunátei? Cubo diret ngaji tue lo'e. Benso Kei' Abraham nyomie diputus Allah bujor benar tam sen pecayo, dih?
45004010	Pie sebilo nyoe tejedi? Atau pun sebolum sen disunátei, atau pun dah sen disunátei? Pie nyoe tejedi sebolum sen disunát, sebolum sen diangap reng Yahudi.
45004011	Malah ken paie sen disunát pun kei ngembokti ken sen daham diputus Allah bujor benar tam sen pecayo sebolum sen disunát pun. Mangko sen menjedi pengulu semuya' reng yeng pecayo sempayo diputus Allah bujor benar, numo' pun noe disunát.
45004012	Ge'em sen pengulu pada' reng yeng disunát jum, pie maksute yeng noe segontang disunát ke' tubohe nyem, pie yeng pecayo jum na' po Kei' Abraham mie sebolum sen disunát pun. Nyoe ke' hal reng diputus Allah bujor benar tam pecayo.
45004013	A, ponyoe jum ke' hal jenyi Allah ke' Kei' Abraham ken ke' pada' buboh ampeh sen. Allah kin bejenyi ken deniyo tue langko' dilileh Sen ke' Kei' Abraham. Pie Allah bejenyi ponyoe pun noe go Kei' Abraham tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Allah, pie entam sen pecayo, lalu diputus Allah bujor benar.
45004014	Mun jolu yeng dijenyi le' Allah ngat diunyo' Sen ke' reng yeng tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Sen si pai gei' gunoe pecayo? Jenyi Sen ke' hal pada' berekat dolat yeng langko' diterimoe diret pun siyo-siyo nyem mun tekayi' ke' ca' tuno' taalo' go diret mat noe mampu.
45004015	Ukum Allah noe iyo kei meyie berekat peh, pie kebelike kei ngukum reng. Ca' cum ukum kaliam berue diret mensiyo noe ngelangare; pie tam mat do ukum Allah nyeh mangko nan do reng ngelangare; lalu reng yeng ngelangare pun tetap diukum Sen. Noe diberekat Sen peh.
45004016	Mangko mat diputus Allah ken semuya' jolu yeng dijenyi Sen na' diunyo' Sen ke' reng yeng pecayo nyem. Maksut Sen sempayo jolu yeng diunyo' Sen mat pengunyo' pengaseh Sénam, noe iyo pekuleh gewai diret peh. Ge'em sempayo jolu yeng panci nyeh diterimoe le' semuya' buboh ampeh Kei' Abraham mie, beyi' buboh ampeh sen yeng idup nunoe ukum Musa mie beyi' buboh ampeh sen yeng diangap keturun sen tam pecayo, na' po sen pecayo mie. Go sen mat akei' puyang semuya' diret reng pecayo.
45004017	Nyoam maksut omóng Allah ken Kei' Abraham yeng ditulis lem kitap Sen mie yeng bungi potue, Aku, jie Allah, dah mileh kau kei benya' suku benso mensiyo beakei' puyang ke' kau. (Kejedi 17:5) Mat diret Allaham yeng bejenyi bungi nyoe ke' Kei' Abraham; Kei' Abraham pun pecayo ken Sen. A, Allah yeng dipecayo le' Kei' Abraham mie mat Allah yeng tawu diarap. Sénam yeng ngidup agei' reng yeng dah mati. Sénam Allah yeng bekuwaso mulah jolu deri jolu a cum pun.
45004018	Secaro mensiyo si Kei' Abraham mat cum arap sen na' berana' beruco' (sa'am go na' menjedi akei' puyang benya' benso), pie sen tetap pecayo, arap ken Allah. Mangko sen mat menjedi akei' puyang benya' suku benso, pas na' po yeng dijenyi le' Allah ke' sen nyomie ken keturun sen langko' paling benya', po bintang di langi' pemenya'e.
45004019	Teruhal Kei' Abraham ketiko nyoe dah seratus tawun dah umor sen, mat dah paling tuwo dah. Secaro mensiyo si mat cum dah arape sen na' berana'. Bini sen Nei' Sara pun ponyoe jum, mat dah labas dah. Pie Kei' Abraham si noe lomah kepecayo sen.
45004020	Cum itong sen noe pecayo, cum itong sen sangsi ken jolu yeng dijenyi le' Allah. Malah ken paie sen kin kuwat-kuwat kepecayo sen, samel sen besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Allah (ngaji jolu yeng bolum tejedi pun).
45004021	Sen yakin nar ken Allah pasti bekuwaso nuntong jenyi Sen.
45004022	A, tam sen pecayo ponyoe mangko Kei' Abraham diputus le' Allah bujor benar,
45004023	lalu mat ditulis di lem Kitap Allah, Abraham diputus bujor benar tam iyo pecayo. Ja'e yeng ditulis nyeh si noe iyo ngat ke' hal Kei' Abraham peh,
45004024	pie ditulis ke' hal diret jum, yeng diputus Allah bujor benar jum mun diret pecayo ken Allah, ya'am Allah yeng nyuroh Yesus Tuwowe diret bengki' idup agei'.
45004025	Go Yesus diserah kei mati tam doso diret, dah nyoe disuroh Allah bengki' idup agei' pun tam gewai Yesus mat cukupam, diterimoe le' Allah gei' diret diputus Sen bujor benar.
45005001	Jedi mátam. Tue diret mat diputus Allah bujor benar entam diret pecayo. Mangko diret dah begelumo ken Allah, diret dah damai dah ken Sen entam gewai Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret.
45005002	Ketiko diret pecayo nyeh diret diantar le' Yesus ke' Allah. Mat Yesusam yeng ngoba' jelan sempayo diret mampu begelumo potue ken Allah; diret buleh pengunyo' pengaseh Sen yeng nyuroh diret togap kukoh. Diret pun ayah bikah ngaji arap diret, ngaji keagong Sen di serugo nun gi.
45005003	Diret ayah bikah jum des diret ngerudu kesensare di deniyo tue, go diret yakin ken kesensare nyoe pun do jum keuntonge. Padah ku do keuntonge tei' go kesensare nyoe pun mat nyuroh diret sabar.
45005004	Mun diret sabar des ngerudu kesensare nyeh, nyoe ngembokti ken diret mat pecayo ken yeng mat. A, mun diret mat pecayo ken yeng mat si diret kin yakin ke' hal arap diret!
45005005	Go diret mat arap ken jolu yeng mat, yeng pasti dituntong Sen; noe diret kererawoe peh. Bokti ken diret arap ken yeng mat nyeh go Roh Allah dah diunyo' Sen kei diyam di lem ati diret, kei nan madah kaseh Allah ke' diret.
45005006	Boh diret ngaji kaseh Allah ken diret! Go ketiko diret gei' cum bedeyo nyeh pas-pas ke' jengkahe yeng ditetap le' Allah Yesus pun mati ento' diret yeng nungkang kemawo' Allah.
45005007	Do mensiyo si jerang nar iyo relo mati ngenti reng bujor benar pun. Mat iko'-iko'eam yeng na'e mati nyo' betore, nyoe pun ca' nyo' betor yeng panci ken iyo.
45005008	Pie Allah si nganyoe ngembokti kaseh Sen ke' diret, go ketiko diret gei' reng bedoso pun Kristus mati ngenti diret!
45005009	Lalu diret pun mat diputus Allah bujor benar entam derah Yesus. A, mun diret dah diputus Sen bujor benar kin sa'am, pai tel agei' dipelopas deri ukum Sen. Noe ken Sen ngukum reng yeng diputus Sen bujor benar!
45005010	Gei' nyomie si diret mat bemunsoh ken Allah, pie tue diret dah bedamai dah ken Sen tam Ana' Sen mati. A, semalang ke' des diret gei' bemunsoh ken Sen pun ge'e, manseh ditulong diselamát Sen, sa'am go dah tue, dah diret didamai ken Sen! Pasti diret ditulong le' Ana' Sénam yeng idup; noam diret diukum Sen.
45005011	Pie manseh betamah-tamah berekat dolat Sen! Berekat Sen tei' go dah tue diret mampu tekenal ken begelumo ken Allah tam gewai Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret. Mat besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen.
45005012	Jedi ke' hal mensiyo idup tam gewai Yesus si biso jum dibening ke' hal mensiyo mati tam gewai Adam. Go do doso di deniyo tue pun tam gewai reng siko'am, lalu kemati pun do tam doso nyoe. Dah nyoe nungkap ke' semuya' mensiyo, sampai semuya' mensiyo mat mati entam semuya' mensiyo nyeh bedoso.
45005013	Bolum do ukum Musa pun doso dah do dah di deniyo tue, pie entam bolum do ukum si mangko mensiyo pun noe dituntut entam ngelangar ukum.
45005014	Ja'e bokti mensiyo mat bedoso ketiko nyoe si jelas, go kemati manseh bekuwaso di deniyo tue, sampai semuya' urang deri Adam manu ke' Musa pun manseh gei' mati bisam, numo' pun iyo noe ngelangar perentah na' po Adam. A, Adam pun mat gemar beyang reng yeng siko' yeng ketiko nyoe bolum detang.
45005015	Padah ku gemar beyang tei' go benya' mensiyo yeng ngicap kibat doso Adam, ken benya' jum mensiyo yeng ngicap asel gewai Yesus. Semalang ke' gewai Adam nyeh do asele, sa'am go pengunyo' pengaseh Allah. Malah ken paie asel pengunyo' pengaseh Allah luwaham deri kibat doso Adam. Kibat doso siko' Adam si pada' mensiyo mati. Pie ngelalu urang yeng siko' ya'am Yesus Kristus nyeh Allah mat buwar ngenjemín pengunyo' pengaseh Sen ke' pada' mensiyo.
45005016	Mat layin nar pengunyo' Allah yeng modas-modasam dibening ken doso mensiyo yeng siko' nyeh. Entam doso yeng sutiam mie Allah mutuse semuya' mensiyo ca' diukum mati. Pie tue si, numo' pun doso mensiyo dah benya' nar pie entam pengunyo' Allah yeng modas-modas mangko mensiyo diputus Sen bujor benar.
45005017	A, ngelalu mensiyo yeng siko' yeng ngelangar perentah Allah mie kibat kemati mat nungkap nguwaso semuya' mensiyo. Pie kibat pengunyo' pengaseh Allah kepala' bekuwaso, nyo' ngalah semuya' kibat doso pun! Semalang ke' pelangar pun do kibat yeng bekuwaso, sa'am go pengunyo' pengaseh Sen, yeng diret nerimoe ngelalu mensiyo yeng siko', ya'am Yesus Kristus. Go ngelalu iyo, diret nerimoe pengunyo' pengaseh Allah yeng belobeh-lobeh, gei' pun diret diputus Sen bujor benar secaro modas-modasam. Mangko mat cum yeng nguwaso diret, go diret mat idup, mat bekuwaso, mat dipelopas deri kuwaso kemati. Mat layin nar pengunyo' Allah ken doso Adam.
45005018	Ja'e padah ku Adam gemar beyang Kristus tadie go do jum kesamoe. Potue ne kesamoe. Jedi kibat doso mensiyo yeng siko' tei' semuya' mensiyo diukum. Ponyoe jum kibat kelaku bujor benar mensiyo yeng siko', nungkap jum ke' semuya' mensiyo, pie kebelike pada' mensiyo lopas deri ukum dosoe, malah ken paie buleh idup.
45005019	Ketegal gewai yeng siko' yeng noe tuno' taalo' si semuya' mensiyo menjedi reng bedoso. Ponyoe jum gewai reng yeng siko' yeng tuno' taalo', nungkap ke' mensiyo yeng benya', pie ketegal gewai iyo si mangko pada' mensiyo cagar diputus Allah bujor benar die.
45005020	A, mun mat tam gewai Yesus nyem do noe guno ukum Musa? Gunoe si mat do. Dah mensiyo bedoso nyomie kin ukum Musa mat ditamah le' Allah sempayo pelangar mensiyo semingkin benya' semingkin nyato. Pie dinai doso mensiyo betamah-tamah dinyoam pengunyo' pengaseh Allah belimpah-limpah!
45005021	Allah mat ngenjemín pengunyo' pengaseh Sen yeng bekuwaso ngelalu gewai Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret yeng bujor benar. Nyoam yeng nyuroh diret idup seora'-ora'eam. Jedi na' po doso bekuwaso nyomie sampai nyuroh semuya' mensiyo mati, ponyoe jum pengunyo' pengaseh Sen bekuwaso, pie kei nyuroh diret idup seora'-ora'eam.
45006001	Jedi mun ponyoe kaseh Allah si kelaku diret ca' koti? Ca' serarat nan bedoso nyem peh, sempayo pengunyo' pengaseh Allah betamah-tamah?
45006002	Noe! Noe kene! Konai diret yeng dah mati ke' hal doso nyeh na' ngeresudu' teger bedoso?
45006003	Jedi yeng ku maksut "mati ke' hal doso" tei' potue. Na' po jolu disolam ke' lem ayie, ponyoe jum Roh Allah nyolam diret ke' lem Yesus. Mangko diret kin tawu, mun diret dah tekawum lem Yesus maksute diret dah mati beroto ken Yesus.
45006004	A, tuju diret mati ken dipasar beroto ken Yesus pun sempayo diret mampu idup agei'am secaro beru, layin deri keidup diret nyomie, samo po Kristus disuroh bengki' idup agei' le' kuwaso Apa'e yeng agong.
45006005	Go jelas mun diret tekawum ken Yesus des iyo mati tentu diret tekawum ken iyo des iyo bengki' idup agei'!
45006006	Diret dah tawu dah ken kebeyat diret yeng lamat dah dipaku ke' salip beroto ken Yesus, sempayo punah ranaham kuwasoe yeng nyuroh diret bedoso mie. Maksute kei diret noam dipeulun le' doso na' po ketiko nyomie.
45006007	Contohe na' po ulun ken tuwowe. Mun ulun dah mati kin maksute iyo lopasam deri tuwowe nyeh. Ponyoe jum diret yeng dah mati beroto ken Yesus. Diret pun lopas jum deri doso.
45006008	A, jedi mun diret dah mati ken Yesus diret yakin jum ken diret pasti idup jum ken iyo. (Konai na' idup po nyomie, nan serarat bedoso? Sedang diret dah lopas dah deri doso tam mati beroto ken Yesus, ken diret bekuwaso mileh panci tam idup beroto ken Yesus.)
45006009	Go diret dah tawu ken tue: mun Kristus dah bengki' idup agei' si maksute iyo lobeh bekuwaso deri kemati; noe tawu dah dikuwaso le' kemati. Cumam iyo mati agei'.
45006010	Gopai? Go ubonge ken doso dah putus; cumam agei' iyo ca' nangong doso mensiyo nyeh. Dah mati sekali pun cukupam, to' seora'-ora'eam. Iyo mati kei ubonge ken doso putus, iyo idup pun kei begelumo ken Allaham.
45006011	Jedi po Yesus po diret. Diret ca' ngangap ken diret dah mati, pie dah nyoe bengki' idup agei' beroto ken Yesus. Mangko ubong diret ken doso dah putus dah. Diret mat dah idup tekawum ken Yesus Kristus.
45006012	Jedi mun ponyoe nang na' diret ngijin doso nguwaso tuboh diret yeng cagar mati nyem, sampai diret nunoe keingíne yeng jat.
45006013	Nang na' nyerah bedan beko diret ke' doso, gei' dipakai kei alate nyo' bekeragam jat. Kebelike ca' nyerah bedan beko diret ke' Allaham, go nyoe yeng patut begi reng yeng dah mati pi tue bengki' idup agei'am! Gewai ulah bedan beko diret ca' diserah ke' Sen gei' dipakai le' Sen ento' diret bekeragam panci.
45006014	Go diret dah noam betuwowe ke' doso. Diret dah do dah tuwowe beru yeng noyu merintu idup diret, ya'am pengunyo' pengaseh Allah. Diret dah noe dah diukum na' po jie ukum Musa, pie diret idup tam pengunyo' pengaseh Allah nyem.
45006015	Jedi koti pengaji kam? "A," jie reng, "tue kin diret noe dah langko' diukum na' po jie lem ukum Musa. Tue diret diterimoe le' Allah tam pengunyo' pengaseh Sen nyem. Mun ponyoe ayo' diret bedoso ja'," jie reng. Nang! Nyoe noe buleh!
45006016	Mun diret nan bedoso kin maksute diret gei' ulun doso. Diret kin tawu, mun diret mileh tuno' taalo' ke' urang maksute diret menjedi ulun reng nyoe. Ponyoe jum ken doso. Mun diret nan mileh bedoso diret menjedi ulun doso, lalu pengabise kibate mati. Pie mun diret mileh tuno' taalo' ke' Allah si kibate tingkah laku diret pun menjedi panci, bujor benar.
45006017	Gei' nyomie si diret mat ulun doso, pie tue ku mat besukor ke' Allah go kam mat na' tuno' taalo' sebulat atiam ke' pengajar yeng mat yeng dah dipadah ke' kam.
45006018	Diret mat dah dipelopas deri kuwaso doso, sempayo diret menjedi ulun gewai yeng bujor yeng benar nyem.
45006019	Aku makai perempamo ke' hal ulun pun maksut aku kei kam nyamán nangkap tuju maksute, go kam pun jera' kam mensiyo jum, maring kam nangkape. Jedi potue ne. Nyomie kin diret nyerah tuboh diret kei ulun bemacam bejenis gewai jat, kin lamat kin ngelangar perentah Allah. Pie tue tuboh diret ca' diserah kei ulun gewai yeng bujor benar die, gei' diret idup suci bereseh to' Allaham.
45006020	Ketiko diret gei' ulun doso si cum itong diret na' ngenggewai gewai yeng bujor benar.
45006021	Tue si diret rasoe nar ngaji gewai diret ketiko nyoe mie! Cum nar keuntonge begi diret. Kibat gewai nyoe nuju ke' kemati nyem.
45006022	Pie dah diret dipelopas deri doso, dah menjedi ulun Allah si do die keuntong begi diret, go diret idup suci bereseh nyo' Sénam, gei' pun tujue idup yeng cum berudu mati. Jedi mátam.
45006023	Upah doso mensiyo mat ca' mati, pie tam pengunyo' Allah yeng modas-modasam diret nomu idup yeng cum berudu mati tam diret tekawum lem Kristus Yesus Tuwowe diret.
45007001	A, jedi pulang ke' omóng ku tadie ke' hal diret dipelopas deri ukum Musa nyeh, potue ne, menyadie ku yeng seimánei. Diret kin dah tawu: idup di kanong adat, mati di kanong tanah.
45007002	Benso reng betinoe yeng bejodo. Na' nunoe ukum adat ke' hal bejodo kin dah bejodo ca' mutu ke' lakie nyoe sampai lakie mati. Pie mun lakie dah mati si iyo dipelopas deri adat ke' hal bejodo; iyo bebas bejodo agei'.
45007003	Mun iyo na' jedi ken reng layin des lakie gei' idup si nyoe demoe butang beonga'. Pie mun lakie dah mati si maksute iyo dah dipelopas. Na' jedi ken reng layin pun buleh.
45007004	A, ponyoe jum ken diret, menyadie ku seimánei. Aku merempamo ke' reng bejodo nyeh nyo' ngenggemar ubong diret ken ukum Musa. Mat cum dah ubong diret ken ukum Musa. Entam diret konoe kawum des Yesus mati mangko maksute diret mat dah mati dah. Mun dah mati kin maksute dah dipelopas deri ukum Musa. A, jedi gunoe diret dipelopas deri ukum Musa kin kei diret bebas jedi ken reng layin, ya'am ken Reng yeng bengki' idup agei'. Ngopai go diret jedi ken Yesus pun gei' sempayo diret mat bebuwah, idup nunoe kemawo' Allah.
45007005	Gei' nyomie si buwah kelaku keidup diret ya'am kemati. Go diret ketiko nyoe mie gei' dikuwaso le' keingín diret yeng jat. Dah nyoe diret ningo ukum Musa yeng nonga' ngelarang diret ngelaku segelo itu ini; pie dah ningoe kebelike timol keingín na' ngelakue, sampai tuboh diret mat dikuwaso le' keingín nyoe. Lalu kibate kemati.
45007006	Pie yeng bekuwaso ngulun diret nyomie si pie dah tue cum dah kuwasoe. Go diret dah mati dah beroto ken Yesus, mangko diret dah dipelopas dah deri ukum Musa; dah noam dipeulun le' keingín yeng timol des diret ningo ukum nyoe. Caro diret melayan Allah tue mat dah caro beru dah, noe iyo caro tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Musa yeng dah noe laku peh, pie tue diret melayan Sen ken kuwaso Roh Sénam.
45007007	Jedi pulang ke' omóng ku tadie, mun aku ningo ukum Musa pie dah nyoe aku lebeh erat ingín ngelangare maksute jat peh ukum Musa nyeh? Pie noe kene! Kebelike mat panci, tam ukum Musaam yeng kei ngenyato sempayo diret jelas ken doso. Contohe, aku nyomie noe tawu ku ken gewai tamá' goma' mat doso, cuwali aku ningo jie ukum Musa, Nang tamá' goma'.
45007008	Pie celoe ati ku yeng jat. Go dah ku ningo pelator Nang tamá' goma' nyeh dinyoam kelorong ati ku yeng jat ngenggora' semuya' segelo keingín to' tamá' goma'! Gei' bolum tawu ken ukum Musa mie si doso seolah-olah bolum digora'.
45007009	Mulo-muloe mie si ku bolum tawu ku ken ukum Musa, mangko kaji ku aku mat idup, cum doso ku. Pie dah ku jelas ken ukum Musa si doso ku mat nyato nar.
45007010	Ukum Allah si tujue kei meyie idup, pie poe yeng tujue kei meyie idup nyeh kebelike nyuroh aku ca' diukum mati die go aku ngelangare.
45007011	Aku dikelakar le' ati diret ku yeng jat, go kaji ku aku mampu tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Allah, pie poe noe mampu ku. Malah ken paie pengabise aku ca' diukum mati die tam aku ngelangar ukum nyoe.
45007012	Mangko jie ku, kamei, ukum Allah si mat suci bereseh, noe becelo. Pada' perentah Sen mat bujor benar, panci bisam.
45007013	Mun ponyoe koti pengaji kam? Ukum Allah yeng panci nyeh peh yeng nyuroh reng mati? Pie noe. Aku mati tam doso diret kuam, go aku ngelangar ukum Allah yeng paling panci nyeh. Maksut ukum Allah tei' kei nyato nar ken jolu bedemo doso nyeh mat jat nar. Paling jat, paling behayo doso nyeh, sampai nyuroh aku ca' mati tam aku ngelangar ukum Allah yeng paling panci.
45007014	Diret kin jelas, ukum Allah nyeh bungkonge mat Roh Allaham. Pie aku mensiyo yeng lomah, dipeulun le' doso,
45007015	sampai aku semadi tuno' nyem ke' doso nyeh. Paling bising ku ken gewai diret ku. Tekonoe ke' yeng ingín ku laku noe dilaku ku, konoe ke' yeng dikebising ku nyoam yeng nan ku laku.
45007016	Maksute kin aku setuju ken ukum Allah mat panci, go aku ingín ngelakue. Pie celoe ku nan nungkange nyem.
45007017	Mun ponyoe si noe iyo aku yeng ngelaku yeng jat, pie doso yeng nguwaso aku.
45007018	Go aku mat tawu ku, ken sikit pun cum poe kepanci di lem diret ku, ya'am lem ati diret ku yeng nan jat yeng ayah bedoso. Boktie go aku noe mampu ngelaku yeng panci, sungoh pun keingín ku do.
45007019	Gewai yeng panci yeng ingín ku laku pie noe dilaku ku, konoe ke' yeng jat yeng ngei' ku ngelakue nyoam yeng nan digewai yeng nan dilaku ku.
45007020	Mangko jie ku mun aku ngenggewai yeng ngei' ku ngenggewaie, maksute nyoe noe iyo aku yeng ngelakue, pie doso yeng nguwaso aku, nyoam yeng ngenggewaie.
45007021	Poe potue aku, nan diperentah le' doso nyem aku tue. Sal ge' aku ingín ngelaku yeng panci, pie yeng timol nan gewai jat nyem.
45007022	Roh ku si ayah, setuju ken ukum Allah,
45007023	pie lem tuboh ku poe do yeng layin yeng bekuwaso, yeng belawan ken ukum Allah yeng dikeayah le' roh ku. Sampai aku dipeulun dikuwaso le' doso yeng nan monáng di lem tuboh ku.
45007024	-
45007025	Mat cumam arap ku, jera' ku! Aku dipeulun le' tuboh ku yeng bedoso yeng cagar mati nyem! Mun ngat ngaji kuwaso diret ku si aku lem ati pemiker ku mat melayan ukum Allah, pie tuboh ku nan melayan kuwaso doso nyem. Sopai nyo' ngelopas nyelamát aku tue? Pie aku mat besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Allah, go aku ditulong diselamát tam gewai Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret gei' ku mampu ngenggewai yeng mat.
45008001	Mangko tue dah jelas dah: sopai ja' yeng tekawum lem Kristus Yesus dah lopas dah deri ukum, pasti noam diukum le' Allah.
45008002	Yeng ngelopas diret deri kuwaso doso ken kemati nyeh mat kuwaso Roh Allaham, yeng ngemborie idup ngelalu Kristus Yesus.
45008003	-
45008004	Kona' Allah si sempayo diret mat idup bujor benar, pie ukum Allah noe mampu nyuroh diret ngelaku yeng bujor benar, celoe go diret mensiyo yeng lomah, noe mampu tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Sen. Mangko diret Allaham yeng nulong diret, ngirum Ana' Sen ke' deniyo tue berupo diret mensiyo yeng bedoso, kei ngurus doso diret. Ponyoam caro Sen ngalah kuwaso doso, sempayo cumam kuwaso doso lem tuboh diret. Maksut Sen sempayo diret mampu idup bujor benar cuco' ken yeng dipadah lem ukum Sen, go diret dah dikuwaso le' Roh Allah, cum dah nunoe kebeyat mensiyo.
45008005	Reng yeng idup nunoe kebeyat mensiyo si nan ngaji keingíne yeng jat nyem. Pie reng yeng idup dikuwaso Roh Allah si nan ngaji kemawo' Roh Sénam.
45008006	Yeng nunoe kemawo' Roh Allah si damai begelumo ken Allah, gei' pun idup seora'-ora'eam, pie reng yeng nan ngaji kebeyat mensiyo si mat mati.
45008007	Go reng yeng nan ngaji kebeyat mensiyo si bemunsoh ken Allah. Iyo ngei'e tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Allah, malah ken paie si mat nolehe.
45008008	Reng yeng tuno' taalo' ke' kebeyat mensiyo nyeh mat nolehe nyenáng ati Allah.
45008009	Pie diret si noe dah tokoh nyoe. Diret noe dah idup nunoe kebeyat mensiyo, pie diret nunoe kemawo' Roh Allah, go diret mat dikediyam le' Roh Allah. Mun reng noe dikediyam le' Roh Allah si maksute iyo noe engku Kristus, go pada' engku Kristus kin dah diunyo'e ken Roh Allah.
45008010	Kristus mat do lem ati diret. Mangko sungoh pun tuboh diret mati tam doso, pie roh diret idup go diret dah diputus Allah bujor benar.
45008011	Tuboh diret si mat cagar mati. Pie diret kin dah dikediyam Roh Allah, sedang Roh nyoame' yeng nyuroh Yesus Kristus bengki' idup. Mangko numo' pun diret mati gi, pie pengabise tuboh diret pun cagar bengki' idup agei' jum tam kuwaso Roh Allah yeng ngendiyam ati diret.
45008012	Jedi mun ponyoe gewai Allah ken diret, mat penting nar arus diret nunoe kemawo' Allah, menyadie ku seimánei. Nang na' diret nunoe kebeyat jat mensiyo. Ibarat ke' berutang din diret noam berutang ken kebeyat diret; noe ken diret ca' nuntong kemawo' nyoe. Diret berutang ke' Allah die, kei nunoe kemawo' Sen.
45008013	Mun diret idup nunoe keingín jat si diret pasti mati. Pie diret pasti idup mun diret makai kuwaso Roh Allah kei munah ranah gewai diret yeng jat.
45008014	Pada' reng yeng diiring le' Roh Allah si mat ana' Sen.
45008015	Go Roh Sen yeng diterimoe le' diret noe iyo kei ngulun ken ngenggola' diret peh, pie kebelike tam Roh Allah mangko diret diangkat kei menjedi ana' Sénam, mat beapa' ke' Allah, mat bereni manu ke' Sen nyapo Sen Apa'.*
45008016	Mat Roh diret Sénam yeng ngeyakine lem ati diret ken diret mat ana' Sen.
45008017	A, tam diret ana' Sen maksute diret lileh nyawo Sen jum, samo po Kristus lileh nyawo Sen. Go diret ngerudu kesensare beroto ken Yesus, mangko diret langko' diagong jum beroto ken Yesus.
45008018	Jedi mátam. Ngerudu kesensare si mat do, pie aku yakin ken kesensare yeng dirudu diret ditue manseh noe setimpal mun dibening ken keagong yeng langko' diborie Sen ke' diret gi.
45008019	Semuya' pempulah Allah pun seolah-olah nentili' ngemoran na' merati jum des semuya' ana' Allah diagong Sen gi.
45008020	-
45008021	Go dah jengkah nyoe gi semuya' pempulah Sen pun langko' dipelopas deri kuwaso mati yeng gei' nguwasoe tengkalo tue. Pempulah Sen tei' langko' dipulah beru, diagong jum, beroto ken pada' ana' Allah! Gei' tue si gei' mungkal arap nyem, gei' bolum tejedi. Go sementaro waktu tue tuju maksut Allah nyo' pada' pempulah Sen manseh dibatal diaru tam kibat doso mensiyo. Dibatal pun cuco' ken yeng dititah Sen nyomie.
45008022	Sampai ari tue pun diret jelas, go pada' pempulah Sen ngeloh, seolah-olah nguyáng ngayíng adoh anáng keedah reng berodai na' berana'.
45008023	Sa'am go semuya' pempulah Sen, diret yeng dah nerimoe Roh Allah kei pengunyo' penongai Sen pun ge'e, diret manseh nguyáng ngayíng jum lem ati diret nun. Diret tue gei' nantie kerado' ke' diret dipelopas deri tuboh tue yeng jat, sampai nerimoe tuboh beru yeng cagar na' diunyo' le' Sen. Nyoe pun kei ngenyato ken diret tue mat diangkat kei ana' diret Sénam.
45008024	Nyoam yeng nan diarap le' diret semeja' diret ditulong diselamát Sen deri nyomie pun. Go yeng didemo arap nyeh go jolu bolum do. Mun jolu yeng dah do kin noe iyo didemo ca' arap agei'.
45008025	Pie diret kin gei' arap nantie jolu yeng bolum awas le' diret, mangko diret tenáng, sabar nyem, go arap diret kin mat do.
45008026	A, kebonóng diret gei' susah sontok di deniyo tue si Roh Allah pun ngerubut nulong diret. Diret kin paling lomah; na' bedoa pun noe tawu koti caroe yeng patut, pie dinyoam Roh Allah di lem ati diret minta' tulong ke' Allah, sampai nguyáng ngayíng jum go noe tekosoh ken kato-kato mensiyo.
45008027	Allah pun tawu ken semuya' isei' ati mensiyo. Sen tawu jum ken tuju maksut Roh Sen yeng bedoa caro noe tekosoh pun, go yeng dipinta' le' Roh Allah nyo' diret yeng engku Sen si nan cuco' nyem ken kemawo' Sen.
45008028	Jedi ke' hal pai-pai pun yeng dirudu le' diret si go diret pun dah tawu ken asele begi diret. Go begi diret yeng ngaseh Allah, yeng diunang diamie Sen cuco' ken tuju maksut Sen si mat Sénam yeng ngurus ngator semuya' segeloe. Sen nguruse gei' asele pun panci begi diret.
45008029	-
45008030	Tuju maksut Allah kin sempayo diret menjedi serupo ken Ana' Sen Yesus. Allah deri asal nyomiam dah tawu Sen dah sopai ja' yeng langko' nyo' ana' Sen, mangko yeng langko' ento' ana' Sen mat diunang diamie Sen. Dah diunang diamie Sen lalu diputus Sen bujor benar. Dah diputus Sen bujor benar mat diagong Sen, dipejedi Sen serupo ken Ana' Sen Yesus. Maksute pada' ana' Sen ngat Yesusam Ana' Sen yeng jula', ento' ngulu ngiring pada' menyadie yeng layin kei menjedi serupo ken iyo. Mangko semuya' yeng dirudu diret mat dipakai le' Sen kei melaju tuju Sen nyo' diret.
45008031	A, ngaji semuya' gewai Allah nyo' diret si tue mat jelas: ya'am mun Allah di piya' diret, sopai yeng mampu ngelawan diret?
45008032	Go mun ke' hal pada' berekat dolat Sen si Allah mat cum arong Sen ngitong rugi. Semalang ke' Ana' Sen yeng Tungal pun ge'e, noe dididah Sen, malah ken paie diserah Sen kei mati ngenti semuya' diret. Sa'am go semuya' segelo berekat dolat Sen yeng layin pun. Sen langko' nyerahe ke' diret modas-modasam. Konai reng mampu ngelawan diret?
45008033	Ge'em sopai yeng bereni nuntut kesalah diret di adap Allah? Sedang diret kin ditinting ditujun le' diret Allaham. Sénam yeng dah mutus diret bujor benar. Konai reng na' ngenggugate?
45008034	Atau sopailah yeng bereni madah ken diret ca' diukum le' Allah? Teruhal diret dah diselamát deri ukum nyoe le' Kristus Yesus yeng mati ken bengki' idup agei'am. Iyo diagong diborie pangkat bekuwaso, disomah kei rajo di piya' kanán Allah. Iyo mat Pembela Penulong diret! (Konai reng na' madah ken diret manseh ca' diukum tam doso diret?)
45008035	Mun ponyoe jolu pailah yeng mampu mencar diret ken kaseh Kristus? Numo' pun diret ngerudu kesensare, numo' pun susah sontok, numo' pun disensare dikenyayo reng, numo' pun buyun, numo' pun bensat meretat, numo' pun ngerudu behayo bencano, ge'em numo' pun diret sampai dibunoh reng.
45008036	Pada' kesusah kesensare nyoe pun cuco'am ken yeng dah ditulis di lem kitap Allah mie ke' hal diret yeng bungie potue, Dah kami pecayo ken Den kami nan idup behayo nyem; serarat dikenyayo reng. Kami diangap reng paji urangam, keedah domo yeng na' disemeleh reng nyem, jie lem kitap Sen. (Masmur 44:22)
45008037	Pie numo' pun diret ngerudu kesensare bemacam bejenis pun pie diret mat noe tepencar deri kaseh Yesus. Diret si noe kalah, kebelike mat monáng, malah ken paie diret semingkin kin togap kukoham tam Yesus yeng ngaseh diret.
45008038	-
45008039	Aku mat yakin ke' hal tue: mat cum jolu yeng tawu mencar diret ken kaseh Sen. Beyi' behayo yeng dirudu di lem keidup tengkalo tue, beyi' behayo sampai mati pun, demo ke' melekat, demo ke' pada' pemerentah, demo ke' sopai-sopai pun yeng bekuwaso, demo ke' pai-pai yeng tejedi tengkalo tue, demo ke' pai-pai pun yeng langko' tejedi gi, demo ke' jolu di langi' nun, demo ke' pai-pai pun di deniyo tue, demo ke'....pada' semuya' pempulah Sen dinai-nai pun, pie mat cum jolu yeng tawu mencar diret ken kaseh Allah yeng diunyo' Sen ke' diret ngelalu Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret.
45009001	Do yeng na' ku padah ke' kam yeng mat-mátam to', noe ku memuloe peh; nyo' saksi pendukong ku Kristusam to'. Roh Allah pun ngeyakin lem ati ku nun ken tue mat-mátam.
45009002	Jedi tuam yeng na' ku padah ke' kam: Mat paling susah sontok so ati aku tue; na' so dibelun ken kesusah kegedoh
45009003	ngaji pada' waris wala' kawum kerabat diret ku secaro keturun buboh ampeh yeng ngei'e pecayo ken Yesus. Mat kaseh ku ngajie! Kira' mampu, kira' dipakai si coh ge' aku die diukum mati, dipencar ken Kristus, kei nulong sidoe, sempayo sidoe diselamát.
45009004	(Go sidoe mat kehe nerimoe agah panci deri Allah! Teruhal paling benya' berekat dolat sidoe.) Sidoe mat keturun deri Israel, suku benso yeng dipileh le' Allah nyo' engku diret Sénam. Keagong Sen dianyoe Sen ke' sidoe. Allah bejenyi noyu merintu mongki' sidoe. Pada' ukum Sen dipadah Sen jum ke' sidoe. A, caro yeng mat nyo' nyomah ke' Sen dipadah Sen jum ke' sidoe, ken pada' jenyi semayo Sen mie dijenyi Sen ke' sidoe.
45009005	Sidoe diberekat dolat tam akei' puyange yeng dipileh le' diret Allaham. Malah ken paie Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah mun diitong-itong mat buboh ampeh sidoe reng Israelam. Iyo mat Allah yeng rajo kuwaso, rajo tingie, yeng patut dipugi seora'-ora'eam. Amin.
45009006	Pie pai gunoe semuya' berekat dolat Allah ke' sidoe mun gei' do deri sidoe yeng bekuwa' ken Sen? Ja'e nyuroh do yeng bekuwa' ken Sen pun noe go Sen mungker jenyi Sen peh. Yeng nyuroh do yeng bekuwa' ken Sen si potue ne. Go noe iyo semuya' reng Israel peh yeng diangap Allah engku Sen yeng mat, pie ngat separoe nyem.
45009007	Diret merati bokti nyoe pun ken contoh keturun Abraham*. Pada' buboh ampeh Abraham yeng seli sedegin sederah ken sen pun pie noe iyo semuya'e yeng diangap Allah keturun Abraham yeng mat. Malah ken paie jie Allah mie buboh ampeh yeng diangap keturun Abraham yeng mat nyeh ca' buboh ampeh ana' sen Isak nyem.
45009008	Maksute potue: noe iyo keturun Abraham yeng diado secaro degin peh yeng diangap engku Allah, pie yeng diado tam jenyi Sen, nyoam yeng diangap engku Allah yeng mat yeng sah,
45009009	benso Isak. Go Isak kin diado entam jenyi Allah yeng bungie potue: Dah pas ke' jengkahe Aku langko' kitue agei', lalu Sara pun langko' ngado ana' lelaki, jie Allah. (Kejedi 21:12) Lalu ngat siko' ana' sen nyoam yeng diitong le' Allah keturun Abraham, yeng diberekat dolat Sen. Yeng layin si noe.
45009010	A, boktie kepala' nyatoeam di lem gesah Ribka yeng berana' komar. Ana' komar Ribka nyeh mat siko'am apa'e, ya'am Isak, akei' puyang diret. (Kin menurute ana' sen yeng tuwo yeng behak nyo' lileh nyawo sen. Pie ana' sen yeng bunsu die yeng dipileh le' Allah.)
45009011	-
45009013	Nyoe pun bolum kededuwo ko' ana' biya' nyoe diado; mat dah do jenyi Sen ke' hal sidoe. Kin jie Allah nyingka' Ribka, "Ana' jula' kau cagar melayan ana' kau yeng bunsu," jie Sen. A, ditulis jum bungie tue, "Yeng ku pileh Yakub; ngei' ku ken Esau." * Teruhal ana' biya' nyeh kin bolum diado, bolum do gewaie yeng panci jat pun. Pie Sen bejenyi dolu ponyoe sempayo jelas ken Sen noe mileh reng tam kelakue, pie dipileh Sen entam kemawo' Sen nyem.
45009014	Nyeh mun ponyoe maksute noe adel peh Allah? Pie adel. Pasti Sen adel, bujor benar.
45009015	Go jie Allah nyingka' Kei' Musa mie, "Diret Akuam yeng ninting nujun sopai yeng langko' dikaseh Ku ken sopai pun yeng langko' ditulong Ku." *
45009016	Mangko mat noe tekayi' ke' gewai ulah mensiyo atau pun ke' kemawo' mensiyo, pie semuya'e mat tam kekaseh Allaham.
45009017	A, ponyoe jum ke' hal mensiyo yeng dipelebu Allah lo'e, yeng noe lintus diukum Sen tam dosoe. Nyoe kin paji Sen jum. Benso Rajo Mesir mie. Kin jie Allah lem kitap Sen nyingka' Rajo Mesir nyeh, "Akuam yeng nentu kau kei rajo; kau gei' bodan pun * tam Akuam. Tujue kei Aku ngenyato kuwaso Ku, sempayo demo Aku gempar tekemuko di seruroh deniyo," jie Allah nyingka' Rajo Mesir.
45009018	Jedi tue mat jelas ken diret Allaham yeng ninting nujune, sopai ja' yeng na' ditulong dikaseh Sen. Pie Sen jum yeng ninting nujun sopai ja' yeng na' dipelebu Sen kei atie tetap somong po rajo Mesir nyeh.
45009019	A, pai nawue gola' do reng yeng becencugeh bungi potue. "Mun ponyoe ngopai go diret mensiyo disalah le' Allah? Mun yeng langko' digewai Sen dah diputus Sen deri nyomie si konai diret mensiyo na' ngelawane?" Pai nawue gola' do reng bungi tokoh nyoe.
45009020	Pie paling noe patut mensiyo becencugeh ngelango' nentang Allah. Noe ken patut jolu yeng dipulah na' nyalah reng yeng mulahe. Noe patut iyo betanyoe "gopai go den mulah ku potue?" *
45009021	Nyoe kin paji tukange, koti kona' tukange. Benso tukang yeng mulah pingan. Iyo kin paji iyoam mulahe, na' koti bentoke. Deri setukue tanah kayat pun biso dipulahe duwo reno pingan, yeng sutie dipulahe panci gei' dipongki' diperintu reng, yeng sutie dipulahe biyasoam ento' dipakai ari-ari. Go jolu ke' deng nyoe mat paji kemawo' tukangeam.
45009022	Jedi ponyoe jum Allah, koti pun ken mensiyo yeng dipulah Sen. Mun mensiyo yeng bedoso gei' bodan, gei' dipelebu Sen lo'e pun nyoe go Sen mat do tuju Sen. Kenaken si Sen paling ingín na' ngembokti ke' mensiyo ken Sen mat godie tam doso mensiyo, ken ingín jum na' ngenyato kuwaso Sen nyo' ngukum mensiyo. Pie Sen gei' Sen etat nyem, gei' bolum diukum Sen pada' reng yeng nyuroh Sen godie, yeng sepatute dah ca' dipunah ranah Sen dah.
45009023	Go Sen gei' ngetat, bolum Sen ngukum pada' mensiyo pun go Sen gei' ngaji pada' reng yeng ditinting ditujun sempayo dikaseh ditulong Sen. Tuju maksut Sen kei nyato nar keagong Sen, des Sen nulong pada' reng yeng dipileh kei dikaseh Sen. Pada' reng nyoe mat disiyap le' Sen kei ngenyato keagong Sen.
45009024	A, yeng disiyap kei ngenyato keagong Sen ya'am diret tuam to', kamei, diret yeng diunang diamie Sen. Noe iyo ngat reng Yahudiam peh, pie ngawum reng noe Yahudi jum. Jedi mun kona' Sen na' ponyoe, konai mensiyo na' nyalah Sen?
45009025	A, ke' hal Sen ngaseh reng noe Yahudi pun, nyoe cuco' jum ken posan payit Sen yeng ditulis le' penijum Hosea mie. Jie Allah, Pada' mensiyo yeng noe umát Aku pie langko' Ku demo Umát Ku. Yeng selomo noe dikaseh Ku pie langko' Ku sebut Kekaseh Ku, jie Sen. (Hosea 2:23)
45009026	Gei' pun jie Sen, Dinai arong Aku bepadah nyomie, Kam noe umát Aku pie dinyoam sidoe langko' disebut Ana' deri Allah yeng idup, jie Sen. (Hosea 1:10) Nyoe ke' hal reng noe Yahudi.
45009027	A, ke' hal reng Yahudi si do jum posan payit penijum Yesaya mie yeng dipadah sen sejelas-jelase. Jie sen, Numo' pun reng Israel paling benya' na' po paser di pantai, pie ngat sikitam reng yeng langko' diselamát,
45009028	go Allah Tuwowe pasti langko' lokas ngukum semuya' isei' deniyo tue cuco' ken jenyi Sen, jie Yesaya. (Yesaya 10:22-23)
45009029	Pie do die sikit reng Yahudi yeng diselamát, go jie lem tijum Yesaya yeng layin yeng bungie potue, Kira' Tuwowe diret yeng rajo kuwaso noe ngelaying kesiso sikit deri diret kei tampang sulie buboh ampeh diret si, diret mat punah ranaham des diukum Sen, na' po kota Sodom ken kota Gomora mie. Pie mat do kesiso diret yeng dilaying Sen, (Yesaya 1:9) jie tijum Yesaya.
45009030	Jedi mat potue poe kejedie. Gei' nyomie si reng noe Yahudi noe ngaji na' diputus Allah bujor benar, pie tue sidoe mat diputus Sen bujor benar, pie secaro pecayo. Maksute yeng noe dikejar dikeingín le' reng noe Yahudi mie pie tue mat tetomue.
45009031	Pie konoe ke' reng Israel yeng nan ngejar, nan ingín na' diputus le' Allah bujor benar cuco' ken ukum Sen pie tarah ke' noe tetomue.
45009032	A, gopai go sidoe noe detang ke' tujue? Gopai go sidoe noe tetomue? Go sidoe arap ken gewai panci direte, ngei'e manu ke' Allah ken caro pecayo nyem. Reng Yahudi na' po reng yeng tesongka' betu bosai,
45009033	cuco' ken tijum yeng ditulis di lem Kitap Allah yeng bungie potue, Ti beh, Aku na' ngongkah di kota Sion* Betu yeng nyuroh reng tesongka'. Betu yeng nyongka'e nyeh yeng ngalang sidoe, mangko sidoe noe detang ke' tujue. Pie berang reng yeng pecayo ken iyo si mat detangam ke' tujue, noam iyo kererawoe, jie Kitap Allah.(Yes 28:16)
45010001	Pada' menyadie ku yeng seimán: ati ku mat ingín nar sempayo pada' suku benso diret ku reng Israel ditulong diselamát. Ku nan bedoa minta' ke' Allah sempayo sidoe diselamát.
45010002	Go sidoe mat noe tawue ken jelan yeng mat, numo' pun paling patoh. Aku mat tawu ku tam aku pun koloe ngerudue. Jolah ke' kepatoh si sidoe mat besemangátam, maksut sidoe kei diterimoe le' Allah, hale sidoe noe tawu ken jelane.
45010003	Go caro Allah ento' mensiyo diputus Sen bujor benar pie sidoe noe mendulie nyem. Sidoe ingín na' diputus le' Allah bujor benar tam pekuleh gewai direte, mangko ngei'e nunoe caro Allah kei Sen mutus sidoe bujor benar.
45010004	Go caro Allah kin diret noe ca' bekaseh betoleh tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Musa gei' diputus Sen bujor benar. Diret diputus Sen bujor benar tam gewai Kristus nyem*. Maksute sempayo sopai ja' yeng pecayo, nyoam yeng diputus Allah bujor benar. Pie kebenya' reng Yahudi mat bolei'e makai caro nyoe.
