45010005	A, caro reng diputus bujor benar nunoe ukum Allah si dijelas le' Kei' Musa nyomie, go jie Kei' Musa mie, Reng yeng na' diputus Allah bujor benar tam tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Allah si ca' teliti jerumát nunoe semuya' segeloe, berue iyo mat idup. (Imamat 18:5)
45010006	Pie ke' hal reng diputus Allah bujor benar tam pecayo si noe iyo gewai yeng maring yeng noe mampu diret peh. Go jie lem kitap Allah ke' hal pecayo kin nang na' ngajie lem ati kocit nun ca' do reng nayi' ke' serugo, maksute kei ngemboktie ken Kristus mat turun deri nun,
45010007	atau pun ca' do reng yeng turun ke' arong reng mati, maksute kei ngemboktie mat bengki' idupei noei Kristus.
45010008	Pie jie lem kitap Sen, Posan payit Sen noe iyo jolu yeng maring to' kam peh; dah do dah ken kam, di lem paner diret kamam, dah diitong dikaji dah lem ati kam. (Ulang 30:12-14) A, yeng dimaksut posan payit tadie ya'am agah panci ke' hal pecayo yeng dipadah le' kami ke' kam.
45010009	(Mangko jie ku noe iyo gewai maring peh mun reng na' diputus Allah bujor benar entam pecayo.) Go mun diret ngangkue ken mulut diret Yesus mat Tuwowe, ken pecayo lem ati diret ken Allah dah nyuroh Yesus bengki' idup agei' si diret pasti ditulong diselamát le' Sen.
45010010	Go mat reng yeng pecayo lem atie ken ngangkue ken mulute yeng diputus Allah bujor benar, ditulong diselamát le' Sen.
45010011	Po yeng ditulis lem kitap Sen mie yeng bungie potue, Sopai ja' yeng pecayo ken Sen pasti ditulong diselamát, cumam iyo ngerudu kererawoe. (Yesaya 28:16)
45010012	A, yeng dimaksut sopai ja' tei' mat semuya' mensiyo yeng pecayo, beyi' reng Yahudi sampai ke' reng noe Yahudi pun. Mat cum bedoe, go Allah mat noe beurang beaku, Sen noe pileh bulu. Allah yeng Tuwowe semuya' segeno mensiyo si mat buwar ngemberekat sopai ja' yeng pecayo ken Sen.
45010013	Go jie jenyi Sen mie, Sopai ja' yeng minta' tulong ke' Tuwowe pasti ditulong diselamát Sen, jie. (Yoel 3:5)
45010014	Pie konai reng na' minta' tulong Sen mun iyo bolum pecayo? Ken koti reng na' pecayo mun iyo bolum ningo? Ken koti reng na' ningo mun cum reng yeng madahe?
45010015	A, ken koti reng na' madahe mun iyo noe diutus? Pie do die reng yeng diutus Sen, go jie lem kitap Sen mie bungie potue, Paling jenga' bungi langkah reng yeng meyie agah panci. (Nahum 1:15)
45010016	Pie celoe yeng dah ningo agah panci pun mat sikitam reng yeng na' nerimoe. Ponyoam yeng tejedi ken penijum Yesaya mie. Jie Yesaya nyingka' Allah mie, O Tuwowe, jie, sikit nar reng yeng pecayo ken posan payit yeng dipadah le' kami, jie. (Yesaya 53:1)
45010017	Pie yeng jelas si reng noe mampu pecayo cuwali iyo dah ningo posan payit ke' hal Kristus. Go kepecayo timol deri peningo.
45010018	A, mun ponyoe gopai go sikit nar reng Yahudi yeng pecayo? Go sidoe noe ningo peh, engoe? Pie noe! Sidoe mat ningo. Go jie lem kitap Allah nyeh, Pengajare dah gempar ke' seruroh deniyo, posan payite dah detang ke' pemuntol bumi. (Masmur 19:4)
45010019	Nyeh engoe go reng Israel noe tejempate peh, go sidoe noe pecayo? Pie sidoe tejempate ye'. Yeng pertamo nijum ke' hal tue ya'am Kei' Musa mie. Jie posan payit Allah ngelalu Kei' Musa mie, Ku langko' nyuroh kam dengki tam Aku ngerampeh suku benso yeng selomo noe umát Ku. Ku langko' nyukie kam tam Aku ngerampeh suku benso yeng selomo budu, jie Allah. (Ulang 32:21) (Maksute semalang ke' reng noe Yahudi yeng diangap diret budu pun pie sidoe tejempate, sa'am go reng Yahudi.)
45010020	A, dah nyoe Yesaya pun paling bereni madah ke' hal tue nyomie. Go jie Allah ngelalu penijum Yesaya mie bungie potue, Aku ditomu le' pada' reng yeng noe ngogoe Ku, Aku nganyoe diret Ku ke' reng yeng selomoe cum itonge na' tekenal ken Aku, jie Allah.
45010021	Pie ke' hal reng Yahudi si go jie Allah bungie potue, Aku nan serarat ngenjola' jeri Ku ento' nulong reng tue, pie sidoe nan nentang nyem, ngei'e tuno' taalo' ke' Aku, jie Sen. (Yesaya 65:1-2) (Jedi ke' hal reng Israel nyeh maksute go sidoe ngei' nyem, noe go noe tawu peh.)
45011001	Nyeh mun ponyoe, maksute Allah dah nula' umát Sen reng Israel peh? Pie noe! Go aku kin reng Israel, buboh Kei' Abraham, keturun deri Benyamin, pie aku noe ditula' Sen.
45011002	Allah si noam nula' umát Sen yeng dipileh le' Sen deri nyomie. Contohe benso Kei' Elia di lem kitap Allah mie, yeng kam dah tawu dah. Kei' Elia nyomie kin besadu ke' Allah ke' hal reng Israel.
45011003	Jie Kei' Elia, Cum dah, Tuwowei, reng Israel yeng pecayo ken Den, tingal aku siko' dam. Pada' penijum Den dah dibunoh reng dah, pada' bedah pesaling Den diruma' rora' reng dah. Tue pun sidoe na' munoh aku. Tingal aku bediret dam yeng pecayo ken Den, jie Kei' Elia.
45011004	Pie pai jie Allah nyamute? Kin jie Sen, Gei' do die yeng bodan yeng Ku selamát nyo' engku diret Ku, ya'am gei' tujoh ribu ko' agei' reng yeng noe nyomah ke' Baal, jie Allah nyamut Kei' Elia. (1Raja 19:10,14,18)
45011005	Jedi ponyoe jum tengkalo tue. Mat gei' do die siso reng Israel yeng pecayo ken Sen, yeng ditinting ditujun tam pengunyo' pengaseh Sen.
45011006	Maksut pengunyo' pengaseh tei' noe tekayi' kaliam ke' pekuleh gewai panci mensiyo. Go mun pekuleh gewai panci si nyoe noe iyo pengunyo' pengaseh; (nyoe maksute upah). (Pie reng Israel nyeh mat diselamát tam pengunyo' pengaseh Allah.)
45011007	Jedi mátam. Pada' umát Israel si ngejar ingín na' diputus Allah bujor benar, pie tarah ke' noe tetomue. Yeng diputus Sen bujor benar nyeh sikitam deri sidoe, ya'am yeng ditinting ditujun le' Sen. Yeng layin si atie menjedi koring, go ngei'e sidoe ningo.
45011008	Nyoe pun cuco' ken yeng ditulis di lem kitap Allah nyomie yeng bungie potue: Allah nyuroh ati pemiker sidoe keedah reng tidor ririe, sampai ari tue pun mato sidoe noe awas, kelinang sidoe pun noe ningo, jie lem kitap Sen mie.
45011009	Ja'e nyoe pun sepadan setimpal ken doso reng Israel. Go jie Rajo Daud mie bungie potue, Kiroe yeng nan dikeayah yeng diarap le' sidoe* menjedi jorat kei ngenjorat sidoe, ken belenti' yeng nikame, nyo' melas pada' dosoe.
45011010	Kiroe mato sidoe mempojam gei' noe awas, kiroe sidoe serarat bejelan ngembungko' nyem tam bebane yeng borat,* jie lem tijum mie, tam sidoe mat arap ken gewai panci direte.
45011011	A, jedi reng Israel tue mat keedah reng yeng tesongka'. Pie tuju maksut Allah noe kei sidoe sampai tepelesat peh. Pie entam reng Yahudi noe pecayo si mangko reng noe Yahudi die diborie kelorong gei' ditulong diselamát. Ja'e maksut Sen si sempayo dah nyoe gi reng Israel pun, dah merati reng layin ditulong diselamát nyeh, sidoe pun coko' jum.
45011012	Jedi mátam. Piyakalam tam doso reng Yahudi mangko reng noe Yahudi diberekat dolat Allah! Piyakalam tam reng Yahudi ditula' mangko reng noe Yahudi pun diberekat dolat Sen! Pie dah nyoe gi pada' reng Yahudi langko' pecayo agei'am ken Allah. A, semalang ke' des reng Yahudi noe pecayo pun reng noe Yahudi manseh diberekat dolat Allah, sa'am des reng Yahudi dah pecayo agei' ken Sen! Mat kepala' benya' berekat dolat ento' seruroh deniyo pun des reng Yahudi pecayo agei' ken Allah gi.
45011013	Jedi tue ku ngomóng ken kam reng noe Yahudi. Go aku kin dipileh le' Allah to' pelantar posan Sen ke' reng noe Yahudi. Mangko aku bereni kememuwa' ningie tugas ku di adap reng Yahudi,
45011014	gola' aku mampu ngaca' ngarang ati reng Yahudi, sempayo do jum deri sidoe waris wala' diret ku yeng ingín diselamát tam merati betor diselamát.
45011015	Nyoe pun keuntong begi kam reng noe Yahudi! Go semalang ke' des sidoe ditula' pun ge'e, kam beuntong, go seruroh deniyo diborie kelorong kei begelumo ken Allah. Sa'am des sidoe diterimoe agei' le' Allah! Seruroh deniyo pun kepala' untongeam, keedah reng bengki' idup agei'am!
45011016	Go reng Israel yeng benya' pun pasti dah nyoe gi diterimoe agei' le' Allah. Contohe benso setukue roti yeng diunyo' reng ento' pesalinge ke' Allah. Mun setukue kocit roti diunyo' ke' Sen mangko semuya'e dah konoe kawum dah. Ponyoe jum betang kayu. Mun urate engku Allah maksute edane pun engku Allah.
45011017	A, jedi reng Yahudi nyeh keedah kayu saitun yeng ditoyu dipeliharo le' Allah, pie dah nyoe do edane yeng dipancong Sen. Lalu kam noe Yahudi si keedah kayu saitun yeng layin yeng timu bedireteam lem utan, pie dah nyoe do edane yeng dicangkok ke' kayu yeng sekayo' nyeh, yeng ditoyu le' Allah. Maksute kei kam noe Yahudi pun diberekat dolat ditoyu diperintu na' po reng Yahudi nyeh.
45011018	Pie nang na' kam reng noe Yahudi kememuwa' kesesomong ngangap remeh pada' edan seli yeng dipancong nyeh. Konai kam na' somong? Kam kin edan nyem. Edan idup tam urat, noe iyo urat yeng idup tam edan.
45011019	Ku ngorie gola' jie kam edan seli nyeh dipancong pun kei kam die yeng dicangkok.
45011020	Mat die reng Yahudi dipancong, pie dipancong pun tam noe pecayo; kiro noe tam kam pecayo si kam pun dipancong jum. Mangko deri nyoe, kam nang na' kememuwa', kebelike kam ca' ati-ati, ca' teliti, gola' kam pun tesongka' po reng Yahudi (mun kam noe pecayo).
45011021	Semalang ke' edan selie ge'e, mampu dipancong Sen, sa'am go kam!
45011022	A, dinyoam mat nyato nar kepanci Allah ge'em, ken ketegas Sen ge'em. Sen tegas ngukum sidoe yeng selomo begelumo pie dah nyoe rangang, pie Sen panci ken kam mun kam mutu renán di lem kepanci Sen. Mun noe si kam reng noe Yahudi pun dipancong Sen jum.
45011023	A, reng Yahudi yeng keedah edan selie pun mun sidoe na'e pecayo, mun na'e bebeta' piker si, mampu sidoe pulang asal ke' bungkonge, go Allah tawu Sen mulang asale ke' bungkonge.
45011024	Kin kam noe Yahudi keedah pemancong kayu utan yeng menurute noe mampu dicangkok ke' kayu peliharo. Pie manseh ge' kam dicangkok, diamie Sen, dikawum Sen. Sa'am reng seli Yahudi yeng keedah edan kayu peliharo. Sen mat tawu Sen mulange ke' bungkonge gi.
45011025	Pada' menyadie ku yeng seimán: do rencana Allah yeng selomo risi'-risi', pie tue na' ku madahe ke' kam, sempayo kam jelas tawu, gei' kam noe kesesomong. Jedi isei' risi'-risi' nyeh tue ne: Mat die separoe reng Israel nan nungkang, ento' melawan agah panci, pie tue mat sementaroe nyem, sampai semuya' segeno kam reng noe Yahudi diborie kelorong ento' ningo agah panci.
45011026	Dah nyoe pada' reng Israel pun langko' ditulong diselamát jum. Ha, caro reng Israel diselamát pun dah dijelas lem kitap Allah nyomie yeng bungie potue, Reng yeng nulong nyelamát kam langko' detang deri kota Sion.* Iyo langko' na' ngelosi pada' kebeyat jat deri keturun buboh ampeh Yakub.
45011027	Nyoam caro Ku nuntong jenyi semayo Ku ke' sidoe, des Aku ngelosi ngapus pada' doso sidoe,* jie Allah mie.
45011028	Pie tam sidoe Israel bolei'e ken agah panci si sidoe mat bemunsoh ken Allah tengkalo tue, ja'e nyoe pun untong begi pada' suku benso yeng layin, go kam diborie jum kelorong kei kam pecayo. A, ge'em numo' pun ponyoe gewai sidoe pie sidoe manseh suku benso yeng dipileh le' Allah, nyo' engku diret Sénam, mangko Sen kaseh ken sidoe cuco' ken jenyi Sen ke' akei' puyang sidoe mie.
45011029	Go Allah noe koloe berubah ken reng yeng dah dipileh Sen; a, yeng dah diunyo' Sen modas-modas pun noe ken diamie ditari' Sen agei'.
45011030	Jedi potue ne asale, kamei. Kam reng noe Yahudi si nyomie noe tuno' taalo' ke' Allah, pie tue kam dah ditulong dikaseh Sen dah, go seli umát Sen noe taát ke' Allah, ngei'e dikaseh Sen. Maksute nyoe kin kelorong nyo' kam.
45011031	A, ponyoe jum reng Yahudi yeng tengkalo tue. Sidoe die yeng ngei'e taát, na' po kam nyomie, pie cuco' ken tuju Sen nyeh na' po kam dah ditulong dikaseh Sen, ponyoe jum sidoe gi, langko' ditulong dikaseh Sen jum.
45011032	Semuya'e pun to' kelorong Sen nulong ngaseh semuya' segeno mensiyo. Go Allah dah nimang nengah ngembokti ken semuya' mensiyo mat dah noe taát ke' Sen, patutam diukum bisam,* pie tuju Sen sempayo Sen mampu ngaseh semuya' mensiyo.
45011033	Ugas bosaiam kaseh Allah! Sen mat paling panai ngator seruroh deniyo tue! Kemereti Sen paling luwah! Semuya' pada' keputus Sen noe tejengkau le' pemiker diret mensiyo. Pada' gewai ulah Sen pun noe teselidik le' diret.
45011034	Cum reng yeng tawu ati pemiker Tuwowe. Sen pun noe perelu diajar dinasehat le' sopai pun.
45011035	Allah noe berutang ke' mensiyo, go mensiyo noe tawu ngunyo' pai-pai pun ke' Allah sempayo Sen tekor ca' meyare ke' diret.
45011036	Go Sen bungkong semuya' segeloe pun, dipulah le' kuwaso Sénam ento' diret Sénam. Mat patutam Sen dihormát diagong dipugi seora'-ora'eam! Amin.
45012001	Mat paling bosai kaseh sayang melas ati Allah ken diret! Mangko ku muhún mampalam ke' kam menyadie ku yeng seimánei, kiroe diret mat nyerah gewai ulah bedan beko diret ke' Sen nyo' engku diret Sénam, keedah pesaling yeng idup, yeng nyenáng ati Sen. Mat patutam diret nyomah melayan Sen ponyoe.
45012002	Nang na' gewai ulah tingkah laku diret serayu ken deniyo tue. Pie gewai ulah tingkah laku diret ca' diubah kaliam; diret ca' nunoe ati pemiker diret yeng beru. Mun gewai diret diubah mangko diret pasti tawu kemawo' Allah nyo' diret. Maksut kemawo' Allah tei' sipat gewai yeng panci, yeng sempurno, yeng nyenáng ati Sen.
45012003	A, aku mat do diunyo' pengunyo' pengaseh deri Sen, mangko aku madah tue ke' kam. Jedi tiyap ko' diret ca' teliti, ca' jerumát ngaji tugas diret lem tuboh Kristus. Go tiyap ko' diret mat nerimoe kemampu deri Sen. Mangko deri nyoe nang na' siko' pun kebebongko' ngangap direte lebeh penting lebeh panai deri yeng mat. Pie tiyap diret ca' sungoh-sungoh ngaji ngenilai direte, pailah yeng ca' digewai diret, cuco' ken kemampu yeng diunyo' le' Allah des diret pecayo.
45012004	Ibarat ke' tuboh din tuboh diret mat siko'am pie benya' begie. Semuya' begie pun layin-layin gunoe, noe iyo samo.
45012005	Ha, ponyoe jum diret reng pecayo. Diret mat benya', pie kejedie siko'am tam samo-samo tekawum lem Kristus. Tiyap ko' diret begelumo ken betor entam diret setuboham.
45012006	A, diret mat diunyo' jum kemampu belayin-layine, cuco' ken pengunyo' pengaseh Sen. Lalu kemampu yeng diunyo' Sen mat ca' dipakai. Misale mun reng diunyo' kemampu nyo' iyo betijum madah posan payit Allah, iyo ca' betijum cuco' ken kepecayo diret.
45012007	Ponyoe jum mun kemampu diret nyo' melayan, diret mat ca' melayan. Mun kemampu diret nyo' ngajar, diret ca' ngajar.
45012008	Mun kemampu diret ento' ngemberansang betor, diret mat ca' ngemberansang betor, ken mun kemampu diret ento' ngunyo' jolu ke' reng yeng nongah do keperelue, diret mat ca' ngunyo'e sebulat ati. A, yeng do kemampu nyo' mimpin betor iyo mat ca' mimpine ken caro rajing ken mutu, ken yeng do kemampu nyo' nulong ngaseh betor, iyo ca' nulong ngasehe ken secaro ayah bikah. Nyoam ke' hal gewai diret yeng diangap tuboh Kristus.
45012009	Jedi diret mat ca' kaseh mengaseh siko' ken betor seputeh ati sebeníng derah. Gewai jat ca' dikerisie, gewai panci ca' dikeayah.
45012010	Diret ca' kaseh mengaseh ken betor na' po ngaseh reng yeng sedegin sederah ken diret. Diret ca' seolah-olah besaying beselumoe ento' mugi ngehormát betor ken caro yeng mat, seputeh ati.
45012011	Diret ca' serarat nan bekaseh betoleh bekoyo bekerejo, nang na' lalai leler. Diret ca' besemangát melayan Tuwowe keedah api yeng gei' bemakan.
45012012	Diret ca' ayah bikah entam diret do arap, ca' sabar des ngerudu kesensare, ken ca' serarat mutu bedoa.
45012013	Sal ge' do engku Sen yeng bekekurang ca' ditulong dibentue. Ken diret ca' nan relo nerimoe temuwai tentamui.
45012014	A, mun do reng yeng nyensare diret, nang na' diret minta' gei' Allah nyumpahe. Kebelike diret ca' minta' kei iyo diberekat dolat Sen.
45012015	Mun do betor yeng beayah bikah diret pun ca' samo-samo ayah bikah jum. Mun do betor yeng nongah susah sontok, diret ca' samo-samo susah sontok.
45012016	Diret ca' samo serukui siko' ken betore. Nang na' diret kebebongko'. Kebelike diret ca' begewol begelumo ken reng yeng diangap reng hina. Nang na' diret kesesomong.
45012017	Jedi mun do reng yeng jat gewaie ken diret, nang na' melas jat. Pie tuju diret ca' kei semuya' gewai diret panci, kei diperati semuya' reng ken gewai diret mat nokoham.
45012018	Bilo beh noe beseliseh betingkis ken urang, pie nang na' deri diret. Ja'e seberopai bolehe diret ca' mementing idup damai ken semuya' urang.
45012019	Kaban ku yeng ku kaseh: nang na' diret melas kejat betor. Mun do reng yeng jat ken diret, diret ca' ngetate nyem, nyerah ke' Sen, borie kelorong nyo' Sénam yeng ngukume. Go kin jie lem kitap Sen, Diret Akuam yeng behak nyo' melas kejat, jie Tuwowe. Mat Akuam yeng melas kejat mensiyo.(Ulang 32:35)
45012020	Mangko diret nang na' melas gewai jat ken jat, kebelike diret ca' panci ken munsoh diret, go jie lem kitap Sen, Mun munsoh kau lapar kau ca' ngumpan matike. Mun iyo coko' na' insup ca' diunyo' ayie insup. Go mun kau melase ken panci ponyoe mat keedah ngenggugur beroe api ke' atas kepaloe.*
45012021	Mangko jie ku nang na' diret dikalah le' kejat betor, sampai diret pun melase ken jat. Kebelike diret ca' ngalah gewai jat ken gewai panci.
45013001	Jedi ke' hal pemerentah si semuya' diret mat ca' tuno' taalo' ke' pemerentah, go tiyap pemerentah pun diunyo' kuwasoe le' Allah. Mun noe diijin le' Sen kin cum kuwasoe.
45013002	Jedi maksute sopai ja' yeng nentang pemerentah iyo nentang yeng ditentu le' Allah. Mangko yeng nentang pasti diukum, nyoe tewas direteam.
45013003	Pie mun gewai diret panci si diret noe sa' gola' diukum. Go pemerentah kin nyo' ngenggola' reng yeng gewaie jat, noe iyo ento' ngenggola' reng yeng gewaie panci peh. Kau gola' peh ken pemerentah? Pie noe sa' gola' mun gewai diret panci. Pemerentah pun ayahe ken diret mun gewai diret panci.
45013004	Go pemerentah pun keedah pelayan Allah jum, sempayo diret idup tenáng amán. Pie mun gewai diret jat si patutam diret gola', go pemerentah besenjeto pun do gunoe. Go pemerentah mat pelayan Allah nyo' melaju ukum Allah ke' pada' reng jat.
45013005	Mangko diret ca' tuno' taalo' ke' pemerentah. Nang na' diret tuno' taalo' tam gola' diukum nyem, pie ge'em entam lem ati kocit nun diret dah tawu ken tuno' taalo' ke' gewai yeng mat.
45013006	Ponyoe jum ke' hal ngembeyar pajak. Diret ca' ngembeyar pajak pun go pemerentah mat pelayan Allah nyo' ngurus pada' hal ke' deng nyoe.
45013007	Mangko dibeyaram ke' pemerentah pai pun yeng ca' dibeyar diret. Pada' pajak bemacam bereno pun dibeyaram. Gei' pun ca' tuno' taalo', ca' ngehormát pemerentah, go nyoe mat patut.
45013008	Nang na' berutang ke' sopai pun. Pie mat do utang budi diret yeng nan ca' digewai, ya'am utang kaseh. Diret ca' serarat kaseh mengaseh ken betor. Go reng yeng kaseh ken betore mat nyukup semuya' ukum Allah.
45013009	Kin do ukum Sen, "Nang butang beonga'; Nang munoh; Nang maling; Nang tamá' goma' ken jolu betor." A, ken pada' perentah Sen layin pun do jum. Pie pangkal perimpus semuya'e ya'am perentah tue: "Kau ca' ngaseh betor po ngaseh diret kau."
45013010	Go reng yeng kaseh si cum gewaie yeng jat ken betor. Mangko jie ku kaseh tei' mat nyukup semuya' ukum Sen.
45013011	-
45013012	Nyoe kin gewai yeng patut, sa'am tengkalo tue, go diret dah tawu ken jemán tue. Jengkah ari kei Allah nyelamát diret dah kin soma'-soma' deri ketiko kememerue diret pecayo mie pun. Ibarat ke' siyang ken malam din malam tue dah tolap dah, nyoma' dam na' siyang. Mangko ati diret ca' jego, jediam tidor. Gewai yeng digewai reng des sagam ca' dipelosi. Diret ca' ngelaku pada' gewai panci, yeng digewai reng di tampa'. Nyoe pun pelinong diret, keedah nyaro' alat perang kei beperang betempor.
45013013	Gewai ulah diret ca' suyo' sabar, po yeng patut yeng digewai reng di tampa'. Nang na' diret beriyah berami betena' betari bemabo'-mabo'. Nang na' diret butang beonga' ken ngeroyal. Nang na' diret bekelayi begegah, nang na' diret isin dengki ken betor.
45013014	Semuya' keingín diret yeng jat nyeh nang na' dikaji dipeduli kaliam, nyo' diret nunoe kemawo'e. Kebelike diret ca' nyaro' Yesus Kristus Tuwowe kei pelinong diret, nyo' nunoe kemawo' iyo.
45014001	Jedi mátam. Tue ke' hal betor yeng dah pecayo pie manseh gei' bolum togap kepecayoe. Jedi betor yeng gei' bolum togap kepecayoe manseh ca' diterimoe dikaseh diret keedah menyadie diret. Pie ca' diterimoe seputeh ati tam kaseh nyem, nang na' diterimoe kei betentang betengkar ke' hal pengaji pemikere yeng layin deri yeng diret, seolah-olah diret akim betor.
45014002	Misale potue. Reng yeng dah togap kukoh kepecayoe iyo yakin ken semuya' jolu pun mampu disegoe, beyi' bisam. Pie reng yeng gei' bolum togap kepecayoe iyo makan noe belawo', nempogal nyem.
45014003	Jedi maksut aku reng yeng semadi sego ken semuya' jolu, iyo nang na' menghina betore yeng noe semadi sego. A, yeng noe semadi sego pun ponyoe jum; nang na' madah betore yeng semadi sego nyeh "O, kau rangkoe nar." Go betor pun dah diterimoe le' Allah; noe ken patut diret medoe.
45014004	Umpamoe ulun ken tuwowe. Ulun kin bekerejo ento' tuwowe, go ngat tuwoweam yeng ngenilai gewaie. Noe patut reng layin campor ngator ulun urang. A, ponyoe jum ken betor diret yeng pecayo, go iyo mat ulun Allah. Noe patut diret medoe, madah ken iyo noe diterimoe le' Allah tam nyego lawo', misale. Iyo pasti ditulong dibentue Allah, go mat Tuwowe yeng nyurohe togap kukoh. Mangko jie ku nang na' betentang betingkis ke' hal jolu disego.
45014005	A, ponyoe jum ke' hal reng patoh ke' ari. Misale do reng yeng gei' bolum togap kepecayoe yeng ngangap do ari yeng lebeh penting deri ari selomo. Sedang betore ngangap tiyap ari samoam. Pie yeng penting tiyap ko' diret ca' yakin ngajie lem ati diret nun.
45014006	Go reng yeng mementing do ari yeng lebeh penting nyeh tujue go iyo na' ngehormát Tuwowe. Ponyoe jum ken betore yeng ngangap semuya' ari samo suci bereseh. A, ke' hal makan pun ponyoe jum. Reng yeng makan pai-pai pun, beyi' lawo' beyi' rompah nyeh, tuju maksute go iyo na' ngehormát Tuwowe, go iyo mat besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen. A, reng yeng bolei'e makan isei' jolu pun ponyoe jum, tuju maksute pun go iyo na' ngehormát Tuwowe jum. Iyo pun besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen.
45014007	Go diret yeng pecayo kin deri idup sampai ke' mati pun noe iyo ento' kepenting diret.
45014008	Deri diret idup sampai ke' mati pun ento' mementing ngehormát Tuwowe diret. Maksute idup mati pun diret engku Sen.
45014009	Gopai ge' go Kristus mati ken bengki' idup agei' pun, maksute sempayo iyo menjedi Tuwowe semuya' segeno, beyi' yeng idup beyi' yeng mati pun.
45014010	Mangko mat paling noe patut begi reng pecayo mun iyo medo betore yeng semenyadie lem Kristus, atau pun ngangap betore yeng semenyadie renah deri iyo. Go yeng mencaro diret gi diret Allaham, go semuya' diret langko' ngadap belai pengadel Allah, kei dipecaro Sen.
45014011	Nyoe kin jelas, go ditulis lem kitap Allah mie bungie potue: Aku, Allah yeng idup, madah yeng mat-mátam, jie Tuwowe. Tiyap ko' mensiyo langko' nungkup nyomah ke' Aku, ken tiyap ko' mensiyo langko' ngangkue ken Aku mat Allah, jie Sen. (Yesaya 54:23)
45014012	A, nyoe kin jelas ken semuya' diret mat ca' ngadap Allah bisam gi, nyo' nyamut madah gewai diret di adap Sen.
45014013	Mangko jie ku jediam diret pedo memedo siko' ken betore. Deri pado medo betor si coh ge' diret nyelidik neliti gewai diret die, gola' pai nawue do gewai diret yeng mempengaroh betor.
45014014	Do aku si dah yakin dah, dah dijelas dah ke' aku le' Yesus Tuwowe ken semuya' jolu pun mat cum yeng noe buleh disego. Mun kaji reng mat do jolu disego yeng kei ngenceloe di adap Allah si tentu iyo ngangape ponyoe. Pie yeng mat si mat cum jolu yeng noe buleh disego.
45014015	Ja'e tue si noe ku ngomóng ke' hal jolu disego peh, pie ke' hal kaseh. Go mun menyadie diret lem Kristus tepengaroh entam iyo merati diret nyego jolu yeng diangap iyo noe patut si maksute bungkong gewai diret noe iyo kaseh. Teruhal Kristus sampai mati nyo' menyadie diret nyeh! Nang na' diret mempengarohe ketegal jolu disego nyem!
45014016	Mat panci nyamánam begi diret, mun diret bebas semadi sego ken jolu, pie nang na' yeng panci begi diret sampai dipadah reng jat entam betor diret tepengaroh.
45014017	Go des Allah disomah kei rajo si yeng penting noe iyo pada' pelator ke' hal jolu disego, jolu diinsup opai. Pie yeng penting ya'am gewai diret yeng bujor benar, idup damai siko' ken betor, ken idup yeng ayah bikah go diret dikediyam le' Roh Allah.
45014018	Mun diret melayan Kristus tokoh nyoe si Allah pun ayah, mensiyo pun ayahe jum ken diret.
45014019	Jedi mátam te'. Diret ca' serarat ngejar nuju ke' gewai ulah yeng meyie damai, ca' ngejar gewai yeng bebotang beguno nyo' nogap siko' ken betor, sempayo diret samo-samo mansang.
45014020	Nang na' gewai Allah dipempungah ketegal jolu yeng noe penting menso jolu disego! Go semuya' jolu disego mat beyi' bisam, cum yeng ngencelo diret di adap Allah. Pie diret mat salah mun betor tepengaroh tam gewai diret.
45014021	Mun betor diret tepengaroh tam gewai diret si coh ge' gewai nyoe ditingal kali, beyi' makan isei' jolu beyi' minúm tuwa' opai. Mun gewai nyoe kibate mempengaroh betor si coh ge' ditingal kaliam, gei' noe ngaru betor.
45014022	A, jedi reng yeng togap kukoh yeng yakin iyo bebas nyego pai-pai pun, nyoe mat urus iyo ken Tuwowe. Pie nang na' kebebase semadie diampa'- ampa' di adap betor yeng gei' bolum togap kepecayoe. Mat die diret bebas nyego jolu; nyoe mat berekat deri Sen, pie diret mat kepala' diberekat dolat Sen mun diret mampu ngembatas direte gei' betor noe tesongka' tam kebebas diret nyeh. Go mun betor tesongka' lalu pengabise diret die yeng salah!
45014023	Pie reng yeng gei' bolah dulang pemikere, yeng gei' bolum yakin lem atie nun ken iyo mat bebas nyego pai-pai pun, reng nyoe si mat salah mun iyo ngeresudu' nyegoe. Go iyo bolum yakin lem atie nun ken gewai nyoe mat disetuju le' Allahei noei. Teruhal mun diret noe yakin ken gewai pai-pai pun mat panci si diret mat bedosoam mun diret ngeresudu' ngenggewaie.
45015001	Jedi mátam. Diret yeng togap kukoh ca' sabar, ca' nulong kelomah betor yeng gei' bolum togap kepecayoe. Nang na' diret ngaji keingín kenyamán begi diret.
45015002	Pie diret ca' ngaji pailah yeng dikeingín betor, jolu pai yeng panci begi iyo, koti caro nogap iyo gei' iyo mansang kepecayoe.
45015003	Kristus pun noe iyo ngaji keingín direte, po ditulis lem Kitap Allah yeng bungi potue, Reng yeng ngato mujo Den lalu ampi' rari' ke' aku, jie. (Masmur 69:9) Pie semalang ke' Kristus pun ge'e, dipulah reng tokoh nyoe pie iyo noe mileh keingín direte. Sa'am go diret.
45015004	Go semuya' yeng ditulis di lem kitap Sen nyomie pun ditulis kei ngajar diret, gei' diret diibor diberansang le' Kitap Sen gei' sempayo diret sabar ngetat ken yakin bepigang ke' arap diret.
45015005	Mat Allaham yeng nan ngemberansang diret, nyuroh diret sabar ngetat des disensare. Kiroe Sen nulong diret idup seati sepiker siko' ken betor, cuco' ken kona' kemawo' Yesus Kristus.
45015006	Maksute sempayo diret seati sepiker serempa' serentak mugi Allah, Apa' Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret.
45015007	Mangko jie ku diret ca' samo-samo ayah begelumo siko' ken betor, noe pileh bulu, na' po Kristus pun noe pileh bulu. Iyo kin relo begelumo ken semuya' diret. A, tuju maksute pun sempayo Allah yeng diagong dipugi.
45015008	Jedi mátam. Kristus menjedi pelayan reng Yahudi*. Iyo detang kei nuntong jenyi Allah ke' akei' puyang reng Yahudi. Ponyoam iyo ngembokti ken Allah mat bujor, noe memuloe. Nyoe ke' hal reng Yahudi.
45015009	Ge'em tuju iyo detang nyeh sempayo pada' reng noe Yahudi pun dikawum jum, sampai mugi Allah tam kekaseh Sen. Nyoe cuco'am ken pada' ayat yeng ditulis lem Kitap Sen mie, benso yeng bungie potue, Mangko Aku langko' mugi Den beroto ken pada' reng noe Yahudi, nyanyi mugi demo Den, jie.
45015010	A, di kitap layin do yeng bungie potue, Beayah bikaham, reng noe Yahudi, beroto ken umát Sen reng Yahudi.*
45015011	Dah nyoe di kitap yeng layin nyeh do yeng bungie potue, Mugi Tuwowe, pada' reng noe Yahudi. Mugi Sen, semuya' segeno mensiyo.
45015012	Lalu jie penijum Yesaya lem kitap sen mie, Siko' deri buboh ampeh Isai langko' muncol keedah lantang jolu yeng timu. Iyo langko' merentah semuya' suku benso mensiyo. Pada' reng noe Yahudi pun langko' arap ken iyo,* jie Yesaya betijum mie. (Mangko mat cuco'am ken yeng ditulis lem kitap Allah mie mun pada' reng noe Yahudi pun mugi Sen.)
45015013	Jedi bula' dituam lo'e. Salam dolat deri aku. Ku minta' kei Allah bungkong arap diret nyuroh kam rajo ayah bikah, serarat tenáng amánam go kam pecayo ken Sen. Maksute sempayo kin ari kin yakinam arap kam entam kam dikuwaso Roh Allah yeng ngendiyam kam.
45015014	Pada' menyadie ku yeng seimán: ku si dah tawu ku, kenaken, ken kam dah panci nar tingkah laku kam, pengentawu kam pun dah jelas dah, mampu kam samo-samo ngajar nulong betor.
45015015	Ja'e nyuroh ku manseh bereni nulis hal tue pun seolah-olah kei ku ngingát kam, go tue mat tugas aku, tam pengunyo' pengaseh Sen ke' aku.
45015016	Sen mat nguwaso aku kei pelayan Yesus Kristus, nyo' aku madah agah panci Sen ke' pada' reng noe Yahudi. Tugas aku na' po tugas pada' pelayan di rumah kediyam Allah. A, pesaling ku ya'am pada' reng noe Yahudi yeng dah ningo agah panci. Jedi tuju deri tugas ku ya'am sempayo pada' reng noe Yahudi mat menjedi pesaling yeng diterimoe Sen, go dah suci bereseh tam gewai Roh Allah.
45015017	A, ngaji pada' reng noe Yahudi yeng dah pecayo nyeh aku mat besukor mugi Yesus Kristus yeng nulong aku melaju tugas ku melayan Allah. Mat patutam aku beiyap bebungah peraso ku,
45015018	-
45015019	go mat Kristusam yeng ngenggewai semuya'e ngelalu aku; mun noe si aku pun noe bereni na' madah pai-pai pun ke' kam ke' hal asel gewai ku. Ja'e go Kristus mat makai gewai ulah ku ken omóng tutor ku, ken Roh Allah pun nguwaso ku kei mulah petanah petano keenah keaneh nyo' ngiring ngaping reng noe Yahudi kei iyo tuno' taalo' ke' Allah. Ponyoam aku mat madah semuya' agah panci ke' hal Kristus cuco' ken tugas ku, deri Yerusalem sampai ke' Ilirikum.
45015020	Nyoe pun cuco' ken cinto ku, go aku deri nyomie pun nan serarat nyinto na' madah agah panci ke' arong yeng bolum do ningo demo Kristus, go ku ngei' ku po keedah tukang yeng melaju rumah yeng dah ditunyam reng layin.
45015021	Kebelike cinto aku cuco' ken yeng ditulis lem Kitap Sen mie yeng bungie potue, Reng yeng noe koloe dipadah ke' hal Sen langko' merati, ken reng yeng noe koloe ningo ke' hal Sen langko' tawu, (Yesaya 52:15) jie lem Kitap Sen. Cinto aku nyeh kei nuntong tijum nyoe.
45015022	Jedi mátam, entam aku madah agah panci di pada' nenggeri layin mangko melamat tue pun nan do alang rencana ku na' ngenjongo' kam di Roma tue.
45015023	-
45015024	Pie tue si mat do anang ku na' ngenjongo' kam. Go tue pun dah santo' dah gewai ku di pada' daerah peloya' nun, gei' pun aku dah betetawun dah mat ingín na' ngenjongo' kam. Ajat ati ku langko' na' ke' nenggeri Spanyol, mangko kaji ku na' ngenjongo' kam des aku ngerudu arong kam. A, dah puwas aku begelumo ken kam kin--kira' tawu puwas, pie--dah nyoe kam pun mampu nulong aku melaju pejelan ku ke' Spanyol, kaji ku nun.
45015025	Pie gei' tue si aku gei' na' ke' Yerusalem lo'e, na' ngantar sumang nyo' nulong pada' engku Sen dinun.
45015026	Ku meyie sumang deri umát di Makedonia ken Akaya. Diret sidoe yeng ingín besumang secaro kerelo atie nyo' umát engku Allah di Yerusalem yeng bensat.
45015027	Sidoe si ayah besumang ponyoe, gei' pun patut jum, go nyoe kedudo' ngembeyar utang jum. Go berekat dolat Allah ke' reng Yahudi nyeh dah dibegi jum ke' reng noe Yahudi, mangko patutam reng noe Yahudi pun melas kaseh ngembegi jolue ken reng Yahudi.
45015028	Jedi mátam. Dah ku nyanto' tugas ku ngantar sumang tue yeng dah dikumpol nyeh dah nyoe ku langko' melaju pejelan ku ke' Spanyol ngerudu arong kam.
45015029	Aku pun yakin ken Kristus langko' ngemberekat dolat diret belimpah-limpah mun aku dah detang ngenjongo' kam.
45015030	Pada' menyadie ku yeng seimán: Yesus Kristus mat Tuwowe semuya' diret. Ge'em diret mat kaseh mengaseh ken betor tam Roh Sen. Mangko ku muhún ke' kam gei' kam nulong aku bedoa, minta' tulong Sen nyo' aku,
45015031	sempayo aku diselinong deri reng yeng noe pecayo di Yudea, ge'em sempayo sumang yeng ku antar ke' gereja di Yerusalem diterimoe secaro panci le' engku Sen dinun.
45015032	Dah nyoe kin mun mat kemawo' Allah nyeh aku mat ayah bikah detang ke' kam, lalu diret samo-samo teibor, keedah rumput yeng layue jogar agei'.
45015033	Ku minta' gei' Allah bungkong damai nyeroto semuya' kam. Amin.
45016001	Jedi yeng manu ke' kam ditue nyeh ya'am Pebe,* menyadie diret lem Kristus. Iyo siko' pelayan umát gereja di Kengkrea.
45016002	Iyo ca' diterimoe disamut kam po yeng patut begi diret engku Allah, beh? Go iyo mat engku Tuwowe. A, gola' do keperelue kam nulonge, go iyo dah benya' nulong reng layin, termansok aku jum.
45016003	Salam aku ke' Priska ken lakie Akwila, kaban kerabat ku yeng melayan Kristus Yesus ken aku.
45016004	Aku paling besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' sidoe go sidoe relo nyerah penyawoe ento' nyelinong aku nyomie. Sekurang aku, pada' umát reng noe Yahudi pun beterimoe kaseh jum ke' sidoe duwo.
45016005	Salam jum ke' umát gereja yeng bekumpol semeyang di rumah sidoe. Salam ke' kaban gelumo ku Epenetus. Kin iyoam yeng pertamo pecayo di propinsi Asia.
45016006	Salam ke' Maria, yeng bekaseh betoleh melayan kam.
45016007	Salam ke' waris ku Andronikus ken Yunias, yeng dipenjero ken aku nyomie. Sidoe tekemuko di antaro pada' pelantar posan, gei' pun sidoe pecayo ken Kristus dolu deri aku.
45016008	Salam ke' Ampliatus, kaban gelumo ku yeng semenyadie lem Tuwowe.
45016009	Salam ke' Urbanus, kaban sekerejo melayan Kristus, ken Stakis, kaban ku yeng ku kaseh.
45016010	Salam ke' Apeles; dah dibokti dah ken iyo mutu melayan Kristus. Salam ke' seberumah Aristobulus.
45016011	Salam ke' waris ku Herodion. Salam ke' seberumah Narkisus yeng dah pecayo ken Tuwowe.
45016012	Salam ke' Tripena ken Triposa* yeng bekaseh betoleh melayan Tuwowe. Salam ke' Persis yeng dikaseh diret, yeng mat belelah bejoreh melayan Tuwowe jum.
45016013	Salam ke' Rupus, yeng dipileh le' Tuwowe. Kesaksi idupe mat dipugi reng. Salam jum ke' ino'e, yeng nan ngangap aku na' po ana' diret sen jum.
45016014	Salam ke' Asinkritus, Plegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas, ken pada' menyadie seimán yeng sekaban ken sidoe.
45016015	Salam ke' Pilologus, Yulia, Nereus ken menyadie Nereus yeng betinoe nyeh, ken Olimpas, ken pada' engku Allah yeng bekumpol semeyang ken sidoe.
45016016	Besalamam kam siko' ken betore ken caro kaseh.* Semuya' gereja Kristus ngirum salame ke' kam jum.
45016017	Pada' menyadie ku yeng seimán, ku muhún ngendorong kam: jegoam. Nang na' kam tepengaroh tam reng yeng nyabong ngadu betor, ken yeng ngaru ngenggudo betor nyurohe bedoso. Gewai nyoe kin betentang ken pengajar yeng dah kam terimoe. Nang na' kam begelumo ken reng tokoh nyoe.
45016018	Reng tokoh nyoe noe melayan Kristus Tuwowe diret peh, pie iyo melayan nunoe keingín direte nyem. Sidoe ngomóng keedah lemák manis gulo madu pie na' ngelakar ati reng yeng bolum bepengalam.
45016019	Kam si go dah mutu tuno' taalo' ke' Sen. Reng pun dah tawu reng bisam ken kam mat mutu. Mangko ku mat ayah bikah ngaji kam. Kebosai ati ku gei' kam panai, pie panai mileh semuya' yeng mat yeng panci, noe panai kaliam nyo' ngelaku yeng jat.
45016020	Allah bungkong damai noe dam lamat langko' ngalah Pengelakar, dipere diiri' diinal kepaloe ken tumi' kam. Ku minta' kei kam diberekat dolat le' pengunyo' pengaseh Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret.
45016021	Salam deri Timotius yeng melayan beroto ken aku. Salam deri waris ku Lukius, Yason ken Sosipater.
45016022	Aku, Tertius, yeng disuroh Paulus nulis surat tue, madah salam ku ke' kam jum, go diret mat semenyadie lem Tuwowe.
45016023	Salam deri Gayus. Iyo nan relo nerimoe reng numpang di rumahe beyi' aku beyi' pada' umát gereja dinun. Salam deri Kuwartos menyadie diret yeng seimán, ken deri Erastus, pemigang duwit kota. [
45016024	Ku minta' ke' Allah kei pengunyo' pengaseh Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret nyeroto kam. Amin.]
45016025	Patutam Allah diagong dipugi! Sen yeng nyuroh kam nan serarat mutu, cuco' ken agah panci yeng ku padah, ya'am agah ke' hal Yesus Kristus. Gei' nyomie si agah panci tue gei' risi'-risi' diret Sénam, deri asal muloe nyomiam.
45016026	Ja'e tengkalo tue si Allah yeng idup seora'-ora'eam nyuroh merentah kei agah panci tue nyato, dijelas cuco' ken yeng ditulis le' pada' penijum di lem pada' kitape mie. Maksut Sen ngenyato ngenjelas agah panci tue pun sempayo semuya' segeno suku benso mat pecayo ken tuno' taalo' ke' Sen.
45016027	Ku minta' ke' Allah kei semuya' mensiyo ngagong Allah seora'-ora'eam ngelalu Yesus Kristus, go ngat diret Sénam yeng Allah, yeng rajo tawu yeng ugas panai. Amin.
46001001	Surat tue deri Paulus, yeng diunang diamie Allah kei pelantar posan Yesus Kristus, cuco' ken kemawo' Sen. Ge'em deri Sostenes, menyadie diret yeng seimán. Kami nulis surat tue
46001002	ke' umát gereja Allah di Korintus, yeng diunang diamie kei engku Sen yeng suci, yeng diajen kei diret Sénam ngelalu Yesus Kristus. Kam mat tekawum ken semuya' segeno umát Allah dinai-nai pun yeng arap ken demo Yesus Kristus, Tuwowe sidoe ken Tuwowe diret ge'em.
46001003	Salam damai ken berekat dolat deri Allah Apa' diret ken Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret.
46001004	Ku serarat beterimoe kaseh ke' Allah tam kam, tam pengunyo' pengaseh yeng diunyo' Sen ke' kam ngelalu Yesus Kristus.
46001005	Secaro roh si kam mat reng kayo rayo, mat reng berado tam kam sekaban segelumo ken Kristus. Kam mat panai nar madah posan payit Sen, a, ken pengentawu ke' hal Sen dah nyerorap dah di lem ati kam.
46001006	Nyoe pun ngembokti agah panci ke' hal Kristus yeng dah kami padah ke' kam!
46001007	Maksute mat cukupam pengunyo' pengaseh Sen nyo' semuya' keperelu kam; mat cumam kekurang kemalang kam nongah kam yakin betungu, nungu kedetang Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret.
46001008	Iyoam yeng nogap kam sampai ke' pengudahe gi, gei' sempayo kam mat noe becelo belengo dah ari Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret bebeli' agei' gi.
46001009	Go Allah mat tawu diarap. Sénam yeng ngunang ngamie diret nyo' begelumo ken Ana' Sen, Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret. Sen pasti nuntong pada' jenyi Sen ke' diret.
46001010	Jedi mátam, menyadie ku yeng seimánei: hak aku mat atas kuwaso demo Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret. Mangko ku minta' ke' kam gei' kam samo setuju seiyo sekato siko' ken betor, gei' kam noe beseliseh. Maksut ku gei' kam mat ca' samo serukui, seati sepikeram.
46001011	Go mat do deri seberumah Kloe yeng besadu ke' aku, bepadah ken kam mat betengkar betingkis, pada' menyadie ku seimánei.
46001012	Go padah ku betengkar betingkis tei' go jie kam separoe, "Kami piya' Paulus". A, jie yeng separoe, "Kami piya' Apolos"; a, ge'em jie separoe jum, "Kami piya' Petrus": a, ken jie yeng separoe, "Kami ngat piya' Kristus nyem".
46001013	Gopai go kam tokoh nyoe? Noe ken Kristus tawu dipencar-pencar! Nyeh kaji kam aku Paulus peh yeng disalip nyo' kam? Des kam disolam kam ngangkue demo aku peh?
46001014	Ku besukoram ken semuya' kam mat noe disolam le' aku, cuwali Krispus ken Gayus.
46001015	-
46001016	A, máte din, mat do jum seberumah Stepanus sidoe yeng disolam le' aku. Luwar deri nyoe si mun noe salah ingát ku mat cumam yeng disolam aku. Entonge mun semuya' kam disolam aku doam jie kam ken kam disolam ngangkue demo aku.
46001017	Pie aku noe iyo diutus le' Kristus ento' nyolam reng, pie aku mat diutus nyo' madah agah panci. Iyo nyuroh aku madahe pun ken paner biyaso nyem, gola' mun ku bepaner secaro bepantun perbeso ken paner yeng jenga'-jenga' si telinsamam kuwaso kemati Yesus di salip.
46001018	A, begi sidoe yeng noe pecayo, yeng langko' diukum Allah gi si, iyo mat noe mementing posan payit Sen ke' hal Yesus disalip. Begi sidoe si posan payit Sen nyeh diangap sidoe omóng keriban nyem. Pie begi diret yeng diselamát Sen si posan payit nyoe mat posan payit Allah yeng bekuwaso.
46001019	(Sen noe pakai caro yeng diangap mensiyo panai.) Nyoe pun jelas deri yeng ditulis lem kitap Sen mie, yeng bungie potue, Aku, jie Allah, cagar munah ranah pada' kepanai reng yeng ngangap direte panai. Aku cagar ngelosi ngenayáp pada' pengentawu reng yeng ngangap direte mat bepengentawu nar, jie Sen. (Yesaya 29:14)
46001020	-
46001021	Maksute nun biyar reng yeng paling panai, biyar pada' ugar agama, biyar reng yeng panai bejebap ke' hal agama opai, pie iyo manseh noe mampu tekenal ken Allah ngelalu kepanai direte. Go Allah dah jelas ngenyatoe ken kepanai mensiyo nyeh didemo Sen kepanai keriban nyem. Nyoe pun cuco' ken rencana Allah yeng paling panai. Di lem rencana Sen mensiyo mat noe mampu tekenal ken Allah ngelalu kepanai direte nyem. Mangko Sen mutuse makai caro yeng diangap mensiyo keriban. Ya'am Sen mutuse nulong nyelamát reng yeng pecayo ken pemadah ke' hal Yesus mati disalip nyem!
46001022	Pie mat layin caro yeng na' dipakai le' mensiyo. Jedi benso reng Yahudi iyo ca' merati keenah keaneh nyo' ngembokti kuwaso Allah; a, ken reng Yunani iyo mementing kepanai mensiyo.
46001023	Pie begi awong diret ngatam cukup madah ke' hal Yesus mati di salip nyo' jelan keselamát. Reng Yahudi si sie nar ningo gesah ke' hal Yesus mati di salip.* A, reng Yunani pun ponyoe jum. Gesah ke' hal Yesus mati disalip nyeh omóng keriban nyem, jie sidoe.
46001024	Pie begi semuya' diret yeng diunang diamie Allah si beyi' reng Yahudi beyi' reng Yunani pun kemati Kristus di salip nyeh mat ngenyato ngembokti kuwaso Allah, ken ngenyato ngembokti ken Allah mat rajo panai.
46001025	Mat tawu panai jempat mereti Allah. Sempamoe gewai Sen yeng diangap mensiyo keriban pun pie manseh jewoh panai deri kepanai mensiyo! Sempamoe gewai Sen yeng diangap mensiyo noe begeyo pun pie manseh jewoh bekuwaso deri mensiyo yeng bekuwaso pun!
46001026	Menyadie ku yeng seimán: cubo kam ngaji diret kamam, koti keada' kam ketiko kam diunang diamie Sen mie. Mun diitong-itong secaro deniyo si sikitam kam yeng panai, sikitam kam yeng bekuwaso yeng bepangkat tingie, sikitam kam yeng bedemo yeng tekemuko, dih?
46001027	Pie Allah manseh mileh kam! Sen sengejo mileh reng yeng noe panai di deniyo tue kei ngererawoe reng yeng ngangap direte panai. Sen mat mileh reng yeng cum besikai di deniyo tue kei ngererawoe reng yeng (ngangap direte) bekuwaso.
46001028	Sen mat mileh reng yeng paling renah, reng yeng dihina le' betore, malah ken paie Sen mileh reng yeng diangap reng cum nar gunoe, gei' sempayo ngalah reng yeng ngangap direte mampu.
46001029	Tuju maksut Sen gei' semuya' mensiyo mat cum yeng mampu beiyap bebungah di adap Sen tam dongah kemampu direte.
46001030	Go diret Allaham bungkong keidup diret ngelalu Kristus Yesus. Kepanai Allah mat dilileh Sen ke' diret ngelalu Kristus Yesus! Malah ken paie diret diputus Sen bujor benar, gei' pun diret diajen nyo' engku diret Sénam, diret ditobus deri doso tam gewai Kristus Yesusam.
46001031	Mangko na' po ditulis lem Kitap Sen mie, Mun do reng yeng na' beiyap bebungah, iyo ca' beiyap bebungah tam gewai Tuwowe diret. (Yer 9:24)
46002001	Benso aku pun ponyoe jum, menyadie ku yeng seimánei, des aku manu ke' kam ditue mie nyo' madah posan payit Allah ke' kam. Aku noe makai kepanai mensiyo peh; ku madahe pun noe ku madah ken omóng yeng jenga'-jenga' ken benya' pantun perbeso.
46002002	Go aku mutuse lem ati ku nun ken nongah ku gei' do ken kam ditue pun beyi' omóng tutor beyi' tingkah laku ku, ku ngat mementing Yesus Kristusam, terutamoe ke' hal Yesus mati di salip. Cum ku ngaji yeng layin.
46002003	Aku mat jelas des aku manu ke' kam mie ken aku mat cum kemampu diret ku; paling gola' ku, mat begegar begitik peraso ku ketiko nyoe.
46002004	A, ken caro ku madah posan payit nyeh ke' kam pun noe go ku na' ngememanis kam ken kepanai omóng ku peh, pie mat kuwaso Roh Allah die yeng ngembokti ken posan payit yeng ku madah ke' kam mat-mátam.
46002005	Maksut Sen gei' sempayo kepecayo kam noe bebungkong ke' kepanai mensiyo, pie mat bebungkong ke' kuwaso Allaham.
46002006	Ja'e bungi ku ponyoe pun noe go kami ngeremeh kepanai peh. Kami pun do madah kepanai yeng mat, pie dipadah ke' reng yeng dah pecayo (ken agah panci, yeng noe arap ken kepanai direte). Ge'em kepanai yeng dipadah le' kami noe iyo kepanai deniyo tue, atau pun kepanai reng yeng bekuwaso yeng bedemo di jemán tue peh, go kuwaso ken demo sidoe pengabise mat cumam.
46002007	Yeng dipadah le' kami si mat kepanai Allaham, risi'-risi' yeng ditapo' di diret Sénam ketiko nyomie; Sen mutuse ketiko deniyo tue gei' bolum diado Sen pun. Pie tue dah dipadah dah. Risi'-risi' Sen tei' ya'am gei' sempayo diret konoe kawum lem keagong Sen!
46002008	A, reng yeng bekuwaso yeng bedemo di jemán tue si siko' pun cum yeng jelas ken rencana Allah yeng panai tue. Kira' sidoe jelas si noe ken sidoe nyalip Tuwowe diret yeng agong.
46002009	Pie sidoe mat noe jelase ken iyo mat Tuwowe yeng agong. Nyoe pun cuco' ken yeng ditulis lem kitap Sen mie yeng bungie potue, Gewai Sen yeng agong yeng digewai Sen nyo' reng yeng ngaseh Sen si mat gewai yeng noe awas ken mato, yeng noe kedingo ken kelinang, yeng noe tekaji lem ati mensiyo pun. (Yesaya 64:4)
46002010	Pie yeng diselinong deri sidoe mat dianyoe le' Allah ke' diret ngelalu Roh Sen! Go Roh Allah kin tawu ngenjelas semuya' segeloe. Sampai ke' ati pemiker Allah pun dijelas Sen ke' diret.
46002011	Contohe potue. Diret mensiyo kin ngat roh diretam yeng tawu ken ati pemiker diret. Jedi ponyoe jum ken Allah. Mat cum reng yeng tawu ken ati pemiker Sen cuwali Roh Sénam (lalu Roh Sen mat nganyoe ati pemiker Sen ke' diret).
46002012	Go diret kin dah nerimoe Roh Sen. Roh nyoe noe iyo deri deniyo tue peh, pie mat deri Allaham! Maksut Sen ngunyo' Roh Sen ke' diret pun sempayo diret mat tawu ken semuya' pengunyo' pengaseh Sen ke' diret.
46002013	Mangko des diret madah ke' betor ke' hal pengunyo' pengaseh Sen nyeh, diret noe madahe makai kato-kato yeng bebungkong ke' kepanai mensiyo peh, pie diret madah posan payit Sen ngelalu Roh Sénam. Go patutam mun ngomóng ke' hal roh si mat ca' makai kato-kato deri Roh Sen.*
46002014	Reng yeng noe dikediyam le' Roh Allah si iyo mat noe nerimoe penjelas deri Roh Sen, go diangape omóng keriban nyem. Iyo mat noe tejempate ke' maksute, go Roh Allah mat cumam di lem atie kei ngenjelase.
46002015	Reng yeng dikediyam Roh Allah si go iyo tawu neliti ngenilai semuya' pengajar deri Roh Allah. Pie reng layin yeng noe dikediyam le' Roh Allah si iyo mat noe tawu ngenilai yeng do di lem ati diret yeng dah dikediyam Roh Allah.
46002016	Konai iyo na' tawu, go ditulis di lem kitap Sen pun bungie potue, Mensiyo mat noe tawu ken ati pemiker Tuwowe, konai na' ngenasehat Sen. (Yesaya 40:13) Nyoe kin ke' hal mensiyo yeng noe dikediyam le' Roh Allah, pie diret ketiko tue si mat dah tawu dah ken ati pemiker Kristus lem ati diret.
46003001	Jedi mátam, menyadie ku seimánei: ketiko ku gei' do ken kam ditue mie aku mat bolum mampu ngomóng na' po ku ngomóng ken reng yeng diiring le' Roh Allah. Aku tepakso ngomóng ken kam na' po ngomóng ken reng yeng gei' nunoe keingín direteam, na' po ngomóng ken ana' biya' kocit nyem, go kam mat bolum mansang kepecayo kam ken Kristus.
46003002	Ketiko ku gei' do ken kam mie ku mat gei' bolum mampu ngajar ke' hal yeng delam; ibarat ke' ngumpan din mat gei' ngumpan kam ken ayie susu nyem, bolum ku ngumpan ken jolu yeng koring, go kam mie bolum mampu kam nerimoe. Malah ken paie sampai ketiko tue pun kam gei' bolum mampu kam nerimoe!
46003003	Go kam gei' nunoe keingín pengaji diret kamam. Boktie go kam nan isin dengki ken betengkar beseliseh ken betor nyem. Nyoe kin na' po gewai mensiyo biyaso nyem yeng noe tekenal ken Allah.
46003004	Go padah ku kam na' po mensiyo biyaso tei' go jie kam separoe "Kami piya' Paulus", a, ken jie separoe "Kami piya' Apolos".
46003005	Teruhale pai gewai kami Apolos? Kami Apolos kin pelayan Allah nyem, yeng ngiring nulong kam sampai pecayo ken Sen. Kami ngat melaju tugas yeng dah diserah le' Tuwowe ke' kami masing-masing.
46003006	Ibarat ke' tentánam lem kebun din aku nanáme, Apolos nyirame, pie Allaham yeng nyurohe serarat mansang.
46003007	Mangko ngat Allaham yeng ca' dipugi, go Sénam yeng nyurohe mansang. Noe ken reng yeng nanám ken reng yeng nyirame yeng ca' dipugi.
46003008	-
46003009	A, ge'em reng yeng nanám ken reng yeng nyiram mat samoam tujue, cum bedoe; konai kam na' besepiya' besebelah? Go kami Apolos mat sepelayan ken Allah. Kam pun keedah umo Sen; ge'em keedah rumah gedong yeng dipulah Sen jum. Ja'e upah reng yeng ngerejoe si mat paji Allaham, koti pun Sen na' ngupahe rato-ratoe cuco' ken gewaie.
46003010	Jedi pengunyo' pengaseh Sen ke' aku mat kemampu nyo' aku nukang rumah Sen. Mangko ku makai kemampu nyoe nyo' ku nunyam tungkat* rumah nyeh. Dah nyoe do reng layin yeng melajue. Pie sopai pun yeng melaju nukange mat ca' ati-ati.
46003011	Iyo mat ca' melaju mulah rumah numpoe tungkat yeng dah ditunyam, ya'am Yesus Kristus. Noe tawu na' nunyam tungkat yeng layin.
46003012	-
46003013	A, ke' hal reng yeng melaju mulah rumah nyeh mat ca' ati-ati mileh ramue. Ca' mileh ramu yeng tan api. Jedi do reng yeng makai ramu yeng panci, benso mas, perak ken betu kecubong. Do jum yeng makai ramu yeng noe tan, benso kayu, lalang ken jeramie. Jedi dah pengabise gi asel gewai tiyap ko' mensiyo langko' nyato, go dah Ari Pengudah gi Allah langko' nguji asel gewai diret ken api, gei' nyato, tanei noei.
46003014	Mun gewai diret tan, mun noe disego le' api si diret mat langko' nerimoe upah.
46003015	Pie mun gewai diret disego le' api si mat rugiam; mat cum upah diret. Diret si selamát, pie terojun bedan sele, na' po reng yeng dirampas deri api; pada' jolu si mat bis disego api.
46003016	Jedi yeng ku maksut rumah kediyam Allah tei' sopailah, kiroe? Paling eran ku ken kam, go kam seolah-olah noe tawu ken diret kamam rumah kediyam Sen! Roh Allah mat ngendiyam ati kam! Konai kam na' betengkar betingkis besepiya' sebelah?
46003017	Awas! Mun do reng mempungah rumah kediyam Allah, Sen pun mempungah reng nyoe, go rumah kediyam Sen mat engku diret Sénam, ya'am mat kamam to'!
46003018	Nang na' siko' pun deri kam nipu ngendeyo direte. Kaji kam si kam panai, pie gewai kam mat ngerusa' ngerenoh gewai Allah. Sopai ja' di antaro kam mun iyo ngangap direte panai tam kepanai deniyo tue, coh ge' kepanai nyoe ditingal ming nyem. Ma'am iyo diangap le' mensiyo keriban, sal ge' iyo buleh kepanai yeng mat.
46003019	Go kepanai deniyo tue mat diangap le' Allah keriban nyem, mat cum gunoe. Nyoe kin jelas, go dah ditulis lem kitap Sen mie, Reng yeng ngangap direte panai langko' dijorat le' Allah ketengah iyo ngenggewai gewaie yeng diangap direte mereti. (Ayub 5:13)
46003020	A, ge'em go do yeng layin yeng bungie potue, Tuwowe diret kin dah tawu Sen dah ken ati pemiker reng yeng panai secaro deniyo tue, go kepanai nyoe mat ampoe buwau nyem. (Masmur 94:11)
46003021	Mangko ku madah ke' kam, jediam kam kememuwa' tam kam besepiya' besebelah ke' reng tue ke' reng nyoe. Teruhale semuya' segeloe pengunyo' Allah ke' kam nyo' keuntong kamam!
46003022	Benso kami, Apolos, ken Petrus yeng ngajar kam--nyoe kin nyo' keuntong kamam. Ponyoe jum ke' hal deniyo tue, beyi' pai-pai pun yeng tejedi tengkalo tue, beyi' pun yeng bolum tejedi nun gi, a, biyar kam idup biyar kam mati pun, pie semuya' segeloe mat pengunyo' pengaseh Sen sempayo kamam yeng untong.
46003023	A, kam pun engku Kristus, ken Kristus engku Allah. Mangko diret ca' bepiya' ke' Sénam.
46004001	Jedi mátam. Kami yeng ngajar kam ca' diangap reng pelayan Kristus, go kami ditugas le' Allah kei kami madah posan payit yeng gei' nyomie risi'-risi' Sen nyem.
46004002	Mangko kami mat ca' mutu melaju tugas nyoe, go pelayan mat ca' reng yeng tawu diarap le' tuwowe.
46004003	-
46004004	Yeng ngenilai gewai kami mutu noe mutu pun Tuwowe kami nyem. Yeng pengaso aku si aku mat mutu melayan Sen, cum kesalah ku, pie tah doei tah cumei kesalah ku Sénam yeng ngenilaie. Aku kin mat noe tawu ngenilai diret ku, sa'am na' dinilai le' kam atau mensiyo layin pun. Ku si noe ngarap penilai kam, go mat Tuwowe kuam yeng ca' ngenilai gewai aku.
46004005	Mangko deri nyoe diret nang na' semadi medo ngenilai gewai betor mun bolum jengkah yeng ditetap le' Allah, go mat Séname' yeng ngenilai gewai diret dah jengkah kedetang Sen gi. Sen langko' manyah semuya' segelo yeng gei' ketiko tue tetapo' di sagam. Tiyap pada' neko reno pelowai penuju lem ati mensiyo langko' dianyoe Sen. Dinyoam berue tiyap ko' diret nerimoe pugi hormát deri Tuwowe.
46004006	Menyadie ku yeng seimán: tadie kin ku ngamie contoh gewai kami Apolos nyo' ngenjelas hal tue, ja'e semuya' tue pun yeng ku padah ke' kam mat nyo' kamam to', gei' kam nunoe tingkah laku gewai kami nyo' contoh kam, gei' kam mat idup nunoe po yeng dah ditulis lem kitap Sen mie. Maksute tei' sempayo kam nang na' kememuwa' ketegal tam kam besepiya' besebelah ngamie ke' siko' buwang ke' siko'.
46004007	Jedi tue ku madah ke' sopai ja' yeng ngangap direte panai deri betore--pie nyoe mat pengangap direteam! Do noe sipat pai pun yeng bungkonge di diret, yeng noe diterimoe deri Allah? Pie cumam. Mangko mun semuya' segelo yeng do di diret mat deri Allaham, konai diret na' kebebongko' ngangap bungkonge di diret?
46004008	Pie kam si mat layin deri kami, poe. Kam dah cum kekurang kemalang kam. Kam dah reng berado dah; kami si noe. Kam dah menjedi rajo dah, poe; kami si noe. Pie yeng máte si ku ingín gei' kam mat-mátam menjedi rajo gei' kami pun merentah po rajo beroto ken kam jum!
46004009	Go kami pada' pelantar posan si gei' paling sensare nar. Kami si poe diborie Allah pangkat yeng paling beroh di deniyo tue, na' po reng jat yeng langko' diukum mati di adap reng rami. Go semuya' segenoe beyi' melekat beyi' mensiyo pun merati keada' kami; kami mat menjedi tonton semuya' segenoe.
46004010	Kami si relo diangap reng keriban tam kami melayan Kristus, pie kam si poe mat ngangap diret kam umát Kristus yeng panai nar. Kami si lomah; pie kam kuwat, poe. Kami si dihina reng; pie kam diagong dihormát reng.
46004011	Kami si deri asal nyomie sampai ke' ari tue pun mat erat kami lapar, erat kami awus, pekakas kami cabi' cari', kami dipempungah disensare reng; kami keedah reng yeng noe antang nyem.
46004012	Kami bepatah tulang becabi' kuli' mencarei' to' keidup di deniyo tue. Des kami disumpah pisoh reng kami melase ken berekat dolat. Des kami diiro dikenyayo reng kami sabar nyem, ngetate.
46004013	Des kami dipejat dipehina reng kami nyamute ken lomah lemut. Kami keedah dekie yeng diperanyút reng; di seruroh deniyo tue kamiam yeng cum gunoe, yeng diangap reng kei ngotor deniyo tue nyem.
46004014	Aku nulis tue pun noe go ku na' ngererawoe kam peh, pie tue kebosai ku na' memperingát kam, pada' ana' kekaseh kuei.
46004015	Go aku mat apa' kam lem Kristus. Biyar pun bereribu-ribu guru kam yeng ngajar kam ke' hal Kristus, pie ngat akuam keedah apa' kam, go kam pecayo ken Yesus Kristus pun tam akuam yeng madah agah panci ke' kam.
46004016	Mangko tue ku ngemberansang kam gei' nunoe contoh gewai aku.
46004017	Ngopai ge' go aku ngutus Timotius ke' kam pun, gei' iyo nulong kam. Timotius mat ana' kekaseh ku jum yeng mutu melayan Tuwowe. Mangko ku ngutus iyo gei' iyo memperingát kam ken tingkah laku aku yeng cuco' begi diret yeng dah idup tekawum lem Kristus, na' po yeng ku ajar di tiyap gereja dinai-nai pun.
46004018	Separo kam si poe mat kememuwa', go kam ngiro ken aku cumam bebeli' ke' kam ditue.
46004019	Pie yeng mat si aku mat noe dam lamat na' bebeli' ke' kam ditue, mun Tuwowe diret nyereto, pie. Dah detang kitue si aku noe menduli omóng sidoe yeng kememuwa' nyeh. Aku na' nyelidik hake, do noe kuwasoe.
46004020	Go mun Allah mat disomah kei rajo nyeh tanoe noe iyo omóng yeng berakah peh, pie kuwaso Sen mat nyato lem gewai diret.
46004021	Aku si mat na' bebeli'am kitue. Jedi dah ku kitue gi, paji kamam, nai coh: mun kam gei' ngeresudu' si ku meyie penyipat, pie mun kam dah bebeta' piker si, aku mat lemah lemutam.
46005001	Gewai yeng jat di antaro kam nyeh mat dah tegempar dah, ya'am ke' hal reng yeng ngeroyal, go iyo mat setidor seguring ken jodo apa'e.* Teruhal pada' reng noe pecayo ken Allah pun cum yeng gewaie tokoh nyoe, pie poe di gereja kam mat do.
46005002	Sungoh pun ponyoe pie kam manseh kememuwa' ke' hal gereja kam! Paling eran nar ku ngajie. Noe ken patut mun kam kememuwa' ke' hal gereja kam pie doso tokoh nyoe dipelebu kam nyem. Menurute kam ca' susah sontok ngaji gewai reng yeng ngeroyal tokoh nyoe. Sepatute ca' ditunong deri antaro kam.
46005003	Aku si mat jewoh ken kam, ja'e jewoh di mato soma' di ati. Semalang ke' aku yeng jewoh pun ge'e pie aku daham mutuse pai yeng ca' digewai kam ke' hal reng nyoe, sa'am go kam.
46005004	-
46005005	Kam mat ca' bekumpol; a, aku pun secaro roh bekumpol ken kam. Lalu kam ca' nyerah reng nyoe ke' Pengelakar, makai hak diret ken kuwaso diret atas demo Yesus Tuwowe diret. Tuju maksut diret gei' tubohe punah ranah, sempayo rohe ditulong diselamát dah Ari Kiyamát des Yesus Tuwowe diret detang gi.
46005006	Paling noe patut kam kememuwa' tokoh nyoe. Go kam kin dah tawu jie perbeso, Pengemang sikit pun pie mat ngelaban nyo' mopah roti semuya'e.
46005007	Jedi pengemang nyeh mat ca' dibuwang kaliam, gei' kam menjedi roti yeng beru, go diret yeng pecayo kin keedah roti yeng noe bepengemang dah. Go diret kin dah siyap nyamut Ari Raya Ngelalu, tam ana' domo yeng disemeleh kei ngenti diret des Ari Raya Ngelalu* nyeh dah mati dah, ya'am Kristus!
46005008	Mangko diret mat ca' nyamut ari raya nyeh ken roti yeng noe bepengemang. Maksute pada' keingín diret yeng ingín na' mempungah ngerusa' betor ken pada' gewai jat diret mat ca' dibuwang kaliam. Diret mat ca' idup bujor benar seputeh ati sebeníng derah.
46005009	Jedi mátam. Di lem surat ku yeng dolu mie kin ku nyuroh kam noe sa' begewol ken reng yeng ngeroyal.
46005010	Pie yeng dimaksut ku dinyoe noe ku nyuroh kam gei' noe begewol kaliam ken reng yeng noe pecayo yeng gewaie tokoh nyoe peh. Mun na' noe begewol ken reng noe pecayo yeng ngeroyal, demo ke' yeng tamá' goma', demo ke' yeng maling ngerampok, demo ke' yeng nyomah ke' jolu yeng noe Allah si maksute diret kin ca' rari kaliam deri deniyo tue!
46005011	Pie maksut ku lem surat nyoe mie gei' kam nang na' begewol begelumo ken reng yeng madah direte menyadie diret yeng seimán, pie gewaie ngeroyal, tamá' goma', nyomah ke' jolu yeng noe Allah, nomah ngendudoh, gela' mabo', maling ngerampok opai. Mun reng madah direte menyadie seimán pie gewaie tokoh nyoe nang na' diret dudo' makan beroto ken iyo pun, sa'am go na' bekaban begelumo ken iyo.
46005012	-
46005013	Na' ngukum reng noe pecayo (yeng gewaie tokoh nyoe) si nyoe noe iyo urus aku peh. Diret Allaham yeng ngukum sidoe. Pie reng yeng umát diret si mat ca' diurus le' diret, go jie lem kitap Sen mie, Reng jat nyeh ca' ditunong deri kam. (Ulang 17:7)
46006001	Jedi tue ku ngaleh omóng sikit, ke' hal ngurus hal antaro diret seimán. Kam si paling enah. Des do petingkis peseliseh antaro kam yeng seimán pie ngei' kam manu ke' reng yeng engku Allah kei nguruse. Noe rasoe peh kam minta' dipecaro le' reng yeng noe pecayo?
46006002	Sedang dah nun gi diret engku Allah yeng menjedi akim kei mencaro semuya' segeno! Semalang ke' seruroh deniyo tue langko' dipecaro le' diret, sa'am go pekaro yeng kocit potue.
46006003	Semalang ke' pada' melekat ge'e langko' dipecaro le' diret, sa'am go pekaro kocit potue yeng jolah keidup diret seari-ari.
46006004	Mangko mun do timu petingkis peseliseh nang na' kam minta' dipecaro le' reng noe pecayo, kamei. Kebelike cubo diurus le' umát gereja diret, biyar reng yeng nan dipeinoe-inoe kam pun. Iyo manseh mampu deri pado reng yeng noe pecayo.
46006005	Ugas ayip maluam kamei! Nyeh go cum nar peh di antaro kam yeng panai kei ngurus pada' petingkis antaro menyadie yeng seimán? Pie do.
46006006	Celoe kam mat ngei' kam manu ke' menyadie yeng seimán. Kam si poe mun do betingkis ken betor yeng seimán kam nan ca' dipecaro ken adat mensiyo nyem. Pai tel agei' minta' dipecaro le' reng noe pecayo die!
46006007	Pie yeng mat si, kamei, mun dah sampai jejak ke' pecaro begi diret pecayo maksute dah rugi nar dah. Coh ge' diret ngetate nyem, deri pado melas kesalah betor. Coh ge' diret bererugi pun.
46006008	Pie kam kebelike jewoh beh na' ngetat kesalah betor, jewoh na' bererugi, malah ken paie kam die yeng do kesalah ken betor. Kam die yeng ngerugi betor kam, pado menyadie yeng seimán pun!
46006009	Nyeh noe tawu peh kam ken reng yeng gewaie jat ponyoe noe konoe kawum lem pada' berekat dolat Allah des Sen disomah kei rajo? Nang na' sosat, nang na' nyelimpang deri jelan yeng mat, kamei. Go yeng mat si reng yeng ngeroyal, demo ke' reng yeng nyomah ke' jolu yeng noe Allah, demo ke' reng yeng butang beonga', demo ke' reng yeng ngeroyal lelaki pado lelaki ken ngeroyal betinoe pado betinoe,
46006010	demo ke' reng yeng maling, demo ke' reng yeng tamá' goma', demo ke' reng yeng gela' mabo', demo ke' reng yeng nomah ngendudoh, demo ke' reng yeng ngerampok, demo ke'...semuya' reng tokoh nyoe, mat noe konoe kawum di jemán yeng ditantie dicinto reng des Allah disomah kei rajo.
46006011	A, separo kam nyomie mat reng yeng tokoh nyoe jum. Pie tue kam mat dah dibereseh deri doso kam. Kam dah menjedi engku diret Allaham. Kam dah diputus Allah bujor benar tam kuwaso Roh Sen, go kam pecayo ken demo Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret! Mangko nang na' bebeli' ke' keidup kam yeng nyomie.
46006012	Jedi mátam. Begi diret yeng dah lopas deri ukum Musa si mátam, mat cum yeng mali, mat beyi' bisam. Pie biyar beyi' pun noe iyo semuya'e nyo' nguntong, noe iyo semuya'e yeng beguno begi diret. Mat die semuya' jolu mat beyi' bisam, cum yeng mali, pie ku si ngei' ku dipeulun le' pai-pai pun.
46006013	Jie perbeso reng, "Jolu disego ento' tamoe ke' lem porut, porut dipulah pun ento' bedah jolu disego." Nyoe mátam, jolu nyoe pun jolu yeng noe tan; beyi' porut beyi' jolu disego pun langko' dipunah ranah Allah. Pie ke' hal tuboh diret si mat layin. Tuboh diret noe patut semadi dipakai to' gewai yeng jat. Tuboh diret dipulah noe iyo ento' ngeroyal peh! Tuboh diret dipulah ento' mugi ngagong Tuwowe diret; ken Tuwowe diret pun langko' ngagong tuboh diret gi.
46006014	Go Allah kin dah nyuroh Tuwowe diret bengki' idup agei'; a, diret pun langko' disuroh Sen bengki' idup agei' tam kuwaso Sen. Nyoam go jie ku mat paling noe patut mun tuboh diret dipakai ento' ngeroyal.
46006015	Noe tawu peh kam ken tuboh diret mat tekawum lem tuboh Kristus? Konai na' ngerobut tuboh Kristus kei dicampor ken tuboh betinoe yeng pelacor? Nang! Noe patut!
46006016	Pie nyoam yeng tejedi mun diret ngeroyal, go reng yeng becampor ken betinoe yeng pelacor iyo mat setuboham ken reng nyoe. Nyoe jelas di lem kitap Allah yeng ditulis nyomie yeng bungie potue, Sidoe duwo menjedi sederah sedeginam. (Jedi maksute yeng becampor ken betinoe yeng pelacor pun mat sederah sedeginam ken iyo.)
46006017	Pie kebelike reng yeng ngenggelumo direte ken Tuwowe diret si maksute iyo segewol segelumo ken Sen secaro roh.
46006018	Diret mat ca' copat ngenjewoh ngerari diret deri sipat gewai ngeroyal. Pada' doso layin yeng digewai reng nyeh mat ngerusa' reng layin. Ngat doso ngeroyalam yeng makai tuboh direte nyo' ngerusa' direte.*
46006019	A, pai tel agei' noe tawu peh kam ken tuboh diret mat kediyam Roh Allah? Roh Allah yeng diret nerimoe deri Sen mat do ngendiyam diret. Diret noe iyo engku diret peh.
46006020	Go diret dah diboli nyo' engku diret Sénam, rogoe pun dah lunas dah. Mangko tuboh diret ca' dipakai nyo' ngagong mugi Sen.
46007001	Jedi mátam. Tue ku nyamut hal yeng ditulis lem surat kam. (Jedi ke' hal reng lelaki ca' bejodo atau noe:) mat do keuntonge begi reng lelaki mun iyo noe bejodo.
46007002	Pie tam benya' penggudo nyo' ngeroyal si sepancie mat ca' bejodoam: tiyap ko' lelaki ca' do bini direte, tiyap ko' betinoe ca' do laki direte.
46007003	Ken reng yeng bejodo ca' samo-samo nyuko kemawo' betore.
46007004	Go tuboh bini si noe engku direte bangam peh, pie engku lakie jum. A, ponyoe jum lakie: tuboh lakie noe engku direte bangam peh, pie engku binie jum.
46007005	Mangko nang na' ngidah betore mun jolu engku direte. Cuwali ja' laki ken bini yeng dah sepakat sesaro' noe seketidor seguring nyo' sementaro waktu, go na' mementing bedoa; nyoe si ma'am. Pie dah nyoe ca' bekumpol ken betore agei'am na' po yeng selomo. Mun noe, mun lamat bepencar kin digudo le' Pengelakar, go kam mat lomah, noe mampu nahán keingín diret kam.
46007006	Ja'e omóng ku tadie noe ku nyuroh merentah tiyap diret sempayo arus ca' bejodo, pie ku ngijin ke' berang reng yeng na'.
46007007	Kona' aku si gei' semuya' urang na' po akuam.* Pie ku si jelas ken Allah noe ngatore ponyoe. Sénam yeng ngunyo' kemampu ke' tiyap diret, ken kemampu nyoe mat belayin-layin.
46007008	A, jedi tue ku madah ke' hal sidoe yeng cum jodoe, ken ke' pada' reng belu. Mat do keuntong begi sidoe mun sidoe tetap na' po aku.
46007009	Pie mun sidoe noe mampu nahán keingín direte si sidoe ca' bejodoam. Manseh panci bejodo deri pado nan panas tam keingíne.
46007010	A, jedi ke' reng yeng dah bejodo si tue perentah aku; ja'e noe iyo perentah aku peh, pie mat perentah Tuwowe diret. Jedi bini nang na' ningal lakie.
46007011	Mun do yeng dah sara' pun iyo ca' tetap ponyoam (nang bejodo ken reng layin), atau pun iyo ca' pulang ke' jodoe nyoe. A, ponyoe jum laki rumah, iyo nang na' muwáng binie.
46007012	A, jedi do jum pemadah ku ke' kam yeng layin, ja'e perentah tue noe iyo perentah yeng dipadah Tuwowe diret mie peh. Pie akuam yeng madahe ke' kam: jedi perentah ku tue ke' hal reng yeng pecayo mun binie noe pecayo. Mun binie relo renán ken iyo, iyo nang na' muwáng binie.
46007013	Ponyoe jum betinoe yeng pecayo. Mun lakie noe pecayo pie iyo relo renán ken iyo, binie yeng pecayo nang na' muwáng lakie.
46007014	Go lakie yeng noe pecayo mat diangap Allah laki yeng sah, tam binie reng pecayo; ponyoe jum bini yeng noe pecayo, iyo diangap Allah bini yeng sah, tam lakie yeng pecayo. Mun noe ponyoe kin ana' sidoe ana' kampang, pie noe. Ana' sidoe mat ana' yeng sah* (go reng tuwoe bejodo secaro sah di adap Allah).
46007015	Ja'e mun deri jodo yeng noe pecayo iyo na' ningal* jodoe yeng pecayo si ma'am. Nang na' bolei' ditingale, go diret diunang diamie le' Allah pun to' idup damai, noe to' bekelayi peh. Maksute mun reng noe pecayo ningal jodoe, lakie atau pun binie yeng pecayo nyeh dah lopas.
46007016	Pie mun reng noe pecayo na' mutu ken diret si diret mat ca' mutuam ken iyo, go pai nawue mun bini yeng pecayo mutu ken lakie gola' pai nawue lakie na'e jum pecayo. A, ponyoe jum ken laki yeng pecayo; mun iyo mat mutu ken binie si gola' pai nawue binie na'e jum pecayo. Mangko nang na' deri reng yeng pecayo yeng ningal jodoe.
46007017	Pie yeng penting ya'am kei tiyap ko' diret mat idup po yeng cuco' begi diret yeng diunang diamie le' Tuwowe, masing-masing di lem keada' yeng ditentu le' Sen. Nyoe pelator yeng nan ku padah di semuya' gereja Sen.
46007018	Misale mun do reng yeng disunát mie dah nyoe diunang diamie Allah, iyo noe sa' melosi tano sunáte*. Ponyoe jum ke' hal reng yeng noe disunát; dah iyo diunang diamie Allah, iyo noe ge' ca' disunát.
46007019	Sunát ken noe disunát nyeh mat noe ge' penting. Yeng penting diret mat ca' nunoe kona' kemawo' Allah.
46007020	Diret yeng diunang diamie Sen biyar lem keada' koti-ti pun mat ca' tetap dinyoam; yeng penting go diret dah diunang diamie Sen.
46007021	Misale mun Allah ngunang ngamie reng yeng ulun; iyo nang na' susah tam iyo ulun. Mun do kelorong nyo' iyo lopas deri ulun si nyoe mat sukoram; kelorong nyoe mat ca' digunoe. Pie mun iyo manseh mat ulun, iyo nang na' susah nang na' gedoh.
46007022	Go kenaken si reng yeng ulun pun pie mun iyo dah diunang diamie le' Tuwowe diret si maksute iyo dah dipelopas deri dosoe le' Tuwowe diret! Sedang ken reng yeng noe ulun pun pie mun iyo dah diunang diamie Sen si maksute iyo dah menjedi ulun Kristus! Jedi samo panci, ulun ken reng noe ulun pun.
46007023	Go semuya' diret dah diboli Sen to' engku diret Sénam; rogoe dah lunas dah. Mangko diret nang na' dipeulun le' mensiyo.
46007024	Yeng penting si, menyadie ku yeng seimánei, tiyap diret yeng dah diunang diamie Sen mat ca' tetap renán dinyoam: yeng penting diret begewol begelumo ken Sen.
46007025	A, jedi ke' hal reng yeng noe koloe bejodo benso dero bungas, tue noe iyo perentah Tuwowe diret, pie nasehat aku. Ja'e nasehat aku pun tawu dipecayo, tam Sen mat ngaseh ken nulong aku.
46007026	(Pie hal tue si noe iyo hal konoe ken salah, doso ken noe doso.) Ja'e tam ku ngaji behayo bencano yeng dirudu kam tengkalo tue,* lebeh panci mun tiyap diret tetap di lem keada' diret rato-ratoe.
46007027	Mun diret dah bejodo nang na' sara'. Mun diret bolum bejodo nang na' ngogoe bini.
46007028	Pie tue noe iyo ke' hal doso peh; mun reng lelaki na' bejodo si iyo noe bedoso; a, ponyoe jum reng dero, mun iyo na' bejodo iyo noe bedoso peh. Cume reng yeng bejodo mat benya' kesusah kesontok di deniyo tue; kebosai ati ku na' nyelinong kam deri kesusah kesontok nyoe.
46007029	Maksut ku potue, menyadie ku seimánei. Kelorong diret tue tingal sikit dam. Jedi yeng ku maksut kelorong yeng gei' do sisoe tue mat ca' kei mementing kemawo' Allaham. Benso reng yeng dah bejodo: pusat pemikere manseh ca' ke' Tuwowe, na' po seolah-olah noe bejodo.*
46007030	A, ponyoe jum reng yeng berato ken reng yeng beayah bikah. Reng yeng berato nang na' susah gila' tam kesusah kesensare di deniyo tue; ken reng yeng ayah bikah nang na' mementing gila' keayah bikah di deniyo tue. A, reng yeng beboli jolu ponyoe jum, nang na' atie bepusat kinyoe, pie iyo ca' ngangap jolu yeng dibolie seolah-olah noe engku direte.
46007031	Maksute diret yeng ngengguno jolu di deniyo tue nang na' mementinge gila' seolah-olah ngaji ngat tuam yeng do. Go deniyo yeng diret perati tengkalo tue mat cagar losi nayáp.
46007032	Jedi kona' ati ku gei' sempayo kam noe dibeban kaliam ken kekamoh miyoh deniyo tue. Benso reng yeng noe bejodo kin iyo noe kamoh ke' hal deniyo tue; iyo mat sebulat ati mementing hal Tuwowe nyem, ngaji koti caro iyo kei nyenáng ati Tuwowe.
46007033	Pie lelaki yeng bejodo si iyo mat kamoh miyoh ke' hal deniyo tue, koti caro iyo kei nyenáng ati binie,
46007034	mangko iyo bepampang pengajie bekengkaji duwo: ca' ngaji binie ge'em, ca' ngaji Tuwowe ge'em. A, ponyoe jum reng betinoe yeng noe bejodo atau pun betinoe yeng dero bungas; iyo sebulat ati mementing hal Tuwowe nyem, gei' iyo idup nyo' Tuwowe bangam deri bedan bekoe sampai ke' gewai ulah ati pemikere. Pie betinoe yeng bejodo si iyo mat kamoh ke' hal deniyo tue, ngaji koti caro kei nyenáng ati lakie.
46007035	Ja'e sungoh pun potue bungi ku noe go ku na' ngobat ngotoh kam peh. Pie kebosai ati ku mat ngaji nai yeng paling panci nyo' kam, gei' gewai ulah kam bujor benar, sempayo kam mat guntus patoh melayan Tuwowe.
46007036	Pie mun do reng yeng betunáng, mun iyo meraso direte salah tam dah lamat gila' betunáng, ken tunánge pun dah na' dero tuwo, a, lebeh panci iyo melaju tujue. Ma'am sidoe bejodo pun. Nyoe mat noe bedoso peh!
46007037	Pie mun iyo mutuse tetap betunáng, bolum na' jedi pun, nyoe panci jum. Ja'e iyo mat ca' yakin lem atie nun, ge'em iyo ca' reng yeng behak mutus hal direte, noe go dipakso reng layin. A, mun ponyoe keada'e mun iyo na' mutuse bolum bejodo pun ma'am. Nyoe panci jum.
46007038	Jedi maksute semuya' panci; bejodo pun panci, noe bejodo pun panci jum; pie mat jie ku tadie manseh lebeh untong reng yeng noe bejodo.
46007039	Betinoe yeng bejodo kin iyo mat tekayi' ke' lakie kerado' ke' lakie mati. Mun lakie dah mati si iyo mat lopasam, iyo mampu bejodo ken sopai ja' yeng kona' atie, sal ge' bejodo ken reng yeng tekawum lem Tuwowe.
46007040	Ja'e pendapat aku si iyo langko' lebeh ayah bikah mun iyo noe bejodo agei'. Nyoe awong akue, pie. Ja'e go aku pun diiring aping le' Roh Allah.
46008001	A, jedi tue ku nulis ke' hal pesaling yeng diunyo' kei beniyát bekawol ke' keramát ke' pengedoh; poko'e ke' jolu yeng noe Allah. Mat po jie kam nyeh, semuya' diret si dah tawu dah ke' hal tue. Pie celoe mun diret bepangkal ke' pengentawu diret si kibate mat kebebongko'. Pie kebelike mun diret bepangkal ke' kaseh si kibate diret mat togap kukoh, cum kemalang.
46008002	Pie mun reng ngangap direte semuya' dah tawu bisam si sebenare iyo sikit pun mat noe tawue. Jolu yeng sepatute iyo ca' dah tawu pun pie noe tawue.
46008003	Pie reng yeng mat ngaseh Allah si Allah pun tekenal Sen; Sen pun mat ngangkue reng nyoe kei engku diret Sénam. Mangko di lem hal tue diret ca' ngaji kaseh, noe ngaji kepanai pengentawu diret.
46008004	Jedi mátam te'. Ke' hal nyego jolu yeng dah dipakai kei reng beniyát ke' jolu yeng noe Allah benso keramát pengedoh si potue ne, kamei. Diret kin dah tawu ken semuya' jolu tokoh nyoe yeng disomah reng si mat jolu cum. Go Allah kin siko'am, mat cum Allah yeng layin.
46008005	Mat die benya' jolu yeng didemo reng allah ken didemo reng tuwowe, beyi' jolu di langi' beyi' jolu di tanah pun. Numo' pun didemo reng allah
46008006	pie begi diret yeng dah pecayo si Allah mat siko'am, Apa' diret, yeng ngado semuya' segeloe. Diret idup pun nyo' Sen. A, ken Tuwowe semuya' segeno pun mat siko'am, ya'am Yesus Kristus. Semuya' segeloe diado ngelalu iyo; diret idup pun tam iyo.
46008007	Pie noe iyo semuya' reng pecayo peh yeng jelas ken jolu yeng disomahe nyomie mat cum kuwasoe. Jedi tam ketumáne iyo nyomah ke' jolu nyoe nyomie lalu sampai ke' ari tue pun sege' iyo nyego jolu yeng dah diunyo' reng kei pesaling ke' jolu nyoe, lalu iyo manseh ngorie gola' tesego ke' jolu engku pada' antu duwato yeng disomahe mie. Lem ati kocite nun iyo bolum jelas, gei' sangsi, mangko mun mat disegoe iyo meraso lem atie nun mat becelo, go kajie mat bedoso.
46008008	Teruhal diret kin dah jelas; noe iyo tam jolu disego yeng kei nyuroh diret begelumo mansa' ken Allah! Disego pun cum keuntonge, noe disego pun cum kerugie begi diret.
46008009	Pie ati-ati beh! Nang na' sampai kebebas diret yeng nyego pai-pai pun sampai nyongka' betor yeng lomah yeng gei' bolum togap kepecayoe.
46008010	Maksut ku potue. Misale diret yeng dah yakin lem hal tue lalu diret makan di rumah arong reng nyomah ke' jolu yeng noe Allah. Lalu diret diperati le' reng yeng gei' sangsi, yeng gei' bolum jelas lem ati kocite nun. Pie tam iyo merati diret nyego jolu nyoe, lalu iyo bereni nyegoe jum numo' pun lem kengkajie nyoe doso.
46008011	Maksute jewoh beh diret na' nulong na' ngemberansang betor; malah ken paie keyakin diret lalu nyo' ngerusa' betor. Teruhal Kristus mati nyo' menyadie diret yeng seimán nyeh.
46008012	Jedi maksute mun menyadie diret yeng seimán nunoe gewai diret pie iyo nungkang lem ati kocite nun yeng gei' sangsi gei' malang ke' hal nyoe si, maksute diret mat bedoso jum, kamei. Bedoso teradap menyadie diret seimán ge'em, bedoso teradap Kristus ge'em.
46008013	Ku si ngei' ku tokoh nyoe! Mun ketegal tam ku nyego jolu tokoh nyoe sampai ngenjorat menyadie ku seimán nyeh coh ge' ngei' ku nyegoe kaliam, gei' noe nganyor betor.
46009001	A, jedi benso aku, kamei. Aku kin bebas, go aku noe iyo ulun reng peh. Aku mat pelantar posan Allah; aku mat do merati Yesus Tuwowe ken mato kepalo diret kuam. Kam pun mat asel gewai aku ento' Tuwowe diret.
46009002	Mat die do reng layin yeng noe ngangkue ken aku pelantar posan Allah, pie yeng dimaksut aku senoe-noe kam ditue peh yeng ngangkue ken aku mat pelantar posan. Go pada' kam ditue yeng pecayo ken Tuwowe mat kei bokti yeng sah ken aku mat pelantar posan Sen.
46009003	Nyoam penyamut aku ke' sidoe yeng medo aku (madah ken aku noe pelantar posan Sen).
46009004	Pie aku noe ngengguno hak ku sebagai pelantar posan Sen. Aku si mat behak makan minúm pai-pai pun.
46009005	Aku si behak bejodo ken reng yeng pecayo, ken naban jodo ku na' po yeng digewai le' pada' pelantar posan yeng layin nyeh, ken pada' menyadie Tuwowe diret, ken Petrus* ge'em.
46009006	A, ke' hal pencarei' pun ponyoe jum. Kaji kam kami Barnabas noe behak ditangong urang peh? Ngat kami Barnabasam peh yeng ca' mencarei' nyo' pengidup kami? Pie noe. Kami mat behak jum ditangong urang na' po betor yeng layin.
46009007	Contohe benso serededu kin ongkose noe ken ditangong le' direte. A, ponyoe jum reng yeng nanám kebun angur. Kin patutam iyo nyego asele. Ken reng yeng ngingún kaming domo iyo nyego ayie susue deri kaming domoe.
46009008	Nyoe kin pada' contoh deri keidup diret mensiyo seari-ari. Pie bokti deri ukum Musa pun do,
46009009	go jie lem ukum Musa, Sapi yeng ngiri' padi kam nang na' dikobat ke' nyawoe. (Ulang 25:4) Nyeh go Allah ngat ngaji ke' hal sapi nyem peh go Sen madah ponyoe?
46009010	Noe peh jelas ken Sen madah nyoe ento' diret? Mat ditulis ento' diret die, go perbeninge reng yeng ngerejo umo ken reng yeng ngiri' padi; iyo bekoyo bekerejo pun go do arape; mat patutam iyo ngarap ngicap asel gewaie.
46009011	Ibarat ke' umo udas din boneh yeng kami amur lem keidup kam mat boneh deri Roh Allah. Nyeh kiroe mun kami na' mungkot deri kam jolu deniyo nyo' ongkos kami maksute benya' gila' peh yeng kami tageh ke' kam nyeh?
46009012	Semalang ke' reng layin gei' behak ngarap jolu ke' deng nyoe deri kam, sa'am go kami, benso aku ken Barnabas. Pie kami si noe ngengguno hak nyoe. Nyoam go diret kamiam yeng nangong semuya'e, gei' sempayo cumam dedal ingel nyo' reng yeng na' nyalah medo kami, gola' posan payit Kristus tealang tepelempang.
46009013	Teruhal kam pun tawu ken reng yeng melayan di rumah kediyam Allah mie kin makan udape deri rumah Sen nyoe. Reng yeng nan melayan ngerinah pada' pesaling konoe begi jum pada' pesaling nyeh.
46009014	A, ponyoe jum mat dititah diperentah le' Tuwowe diret ken reng yeng madah agah panci nyeh, iyo mat behak diongkos le' reng yeng nerimoe agah panci nyoe. (Jedi mat jelasam ken kami mat behak ngarap ditangong le' reng yeng ningo agah panci deri kami.)
46009015	Pie awong aku si noe koloe ngengguno sereno pun deri pada' hak ku. Aku nulis tue pun noe go ku na' ngereringo ke' kam peh. Aku mat ayah ku tam aku mampu madah agah panci ke' kam caro modas-modasam. Mun ditangong kam kin losi modal ku nyo' ku beiyap bebungah tokoh nyoe. Ku coh mati rangkah kaliam deri pado losi modal ku nyeh.
46009016	Ke' hal beiyap bebungah si aku noe beiyap bebungah tam ku madah agah panci peh. Go gewai ku madah agah panci nyeh mat tugas ku deri Allah yeng arus ca' ku gewai. Konai ku na' beiyap bebungah tam aku tuno' taalo' ke' Sen? Yeng mat si mat behayo nar aku mun ku noe madah agah panci!
46009017	Sempamoe aku noe relo madahe pun pie aku manseh arus ca' madahe, go nyoe tugas yeng dah diserah Sen ke' aku. Pie mun aku madahe ken kerelo ati ku si, nyoe mat do upah ku.
46009018	Pailah upah ku? Upah ku tei' ya'am go aku diborie kelorong ento' madah agah panci caro modas-modasam! Nyoam go aku mat beiyap bebungah. Mangko aku noe ngengguno hak ku nyo' ku diongkos tam aku madah agah panci nyeh.
46009019	Aku si noe iyo ulun sopai pun; ku noe tegentong ke' sopai pun. Pie numo' pun ponyoe aku relo menjedi ulun semuya' segeno mensiyo, relo ku paji urangam gei' aku mampu naban meyie reng sebenya'-benya'e gei' iyo pecayo ken Kristus.
46009020	Mangko des ku do ken reng Yahudi si aku nyensuwai diret ku ken reng Yahudi, gei' sempayo mampu ku naban meyie reng Yahudi pecayo ken Kristus. Numo' pun aku dah noam ca' tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Musa pie des ku nongah do ken sidoe yeng gei' tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Musa si aku tuno' taalo' jum, gei' aku mampu naban meyie sidoe yeng tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Musa.
46009021	A, ponyoe jum des aku nongah do ken reng yeng noe dikawum ukum Musa. Aku nunoe kebiyaso sidoe yeng noe dikawum ukum Musa. Noe go aku noe tuno' taalo' ke' Allah peh; aku si mat nan tuno' ke' ukum Kristus. Ja'e maksut ku nunoe kebiyaso reng yeng noe dikawum ukum Musa nyeh gei' sempayo aku mampu naban meyie sidoe gei' sidoe pecayo ken Kristus jum.
46009022	A, ken sidoe yeng gei' bolum togap kepecayoe si aku noe ku ngampa'-ampa' keyakin ku ke' sidoe; aku nyensuwai diret ku ken sidoe, gei' aku mampu naban meyie sidoe. Ponyoe jum ken semuya' urang; ku relo nyensuwai diret ku ken sopai pun gei' sempayo biyar koti-ti pun caroe aku senoe-noe mampu naban meyie separoe deri sidoe gei' sidoe ditulong diselamát.
46009023	Semuya' tue ku gewai go ku ngangap ken agah tue mat agah yeng paling panci. Ku ingín konoe begi lem semuya' berekat dolat agah panci tue.
46009024	Kam kin tawu ke' hal reng yeng beselumoe. Dese mat benya' reng yeng beselumoe bebodap, pie yeng buleh piyala si ngat siko'am. Mangko semuya' diret ca' beselumoe besemangát seukor kemampu diret gei' sempayo diret mat buleh piyala diret.
