46009025	Tiyap ko' reng yeng beselumoe kin mat ngemoran ngelateh ken nahán ngenjego direte. Iyo ngaji ingín na' buleh hadiah, numo' pun hadiah nyeh hadiah labong* deri dewun nyem. Pie diret si mat langko' buleh mahkota yeng tan seora'-ora'eam.
46009026	Mangko aku noe ku beselumoe semadie nyem peh. Aku tetap nuju ke' tuju ku. Ibarat ke' reng betinyu din aku noe ku sememadi ninyu angín peh.
46009027	Aku mat ngemoran ngelateh tuboh ku gei' aku mampu nguwaso pada' keingíne sempayo aku noe dikuwaso le' tuboh ku. Mun noe si gola' aku yeng dah madah agah panci ke' betor pie pengabise aku die yeng konoe sekor.
46010001	Menyadie ku yeng seimán: mat penting diret ca' ingát pai yeng tejedi ke' akei' puyang diret mie. Go semuya' desiyan kin diselinong le' tiyang románg. Semuya' desiyan nyemorang Lawut Teborau.*
46010002	Semuya' desiyan seolah-olah disolam ken Musa di lem lawut ken tiyang románg. (Dinyoam ngenyato ken kerelo desiyan ngenjurut Musa.)
46010003	Semuya' desiyan nyego jolu pengunyo' Allaham,
46010004	ken semuya' desiyan nginsup ayie pengunyo' Sénam, go desiyan mat nginsup ayie deri betu kalas yeng ditunyo' le' Allah. Betu kalas yeng nan nyeroto ken noyu merintu desiyan pun mat Kristusam.
46010005	Pie numo' pun semuya' desiyan diberekat dolat Sen ponyoe pie mat sikitam desiyan yeng nyenáng ati Sen. Boktie go kebenya' desiyan mat mati di padang puwang nun, melintang pukang bengkai desiyan dinun.
46010006	Nyoe pun, kamei, kei contoh peringát begi diret, gei' diret noe tamá' coko' ken pada' jolu jat na' po yeng dikecoko' le' desiyan mie.
46010007	Maksute nang na' diret nyomah ke' duwato patong keramát na' po yeng digewai le' desiyan mie. Go ditulis lem kitap Sen pun yeng bungie potue, Lalu umát Sen makan minúm gewaie, betena' betari nyomah ke' baale. (Yeheskiel 32:6)
46010008	Pie nang na' diret tokoh nyoe.* Nang na' diret ngeroyal na' po yeng digewai le' desiyan mie, go desiyan mie kin sampai duwo puloh tigo ribu ko' yeng mati lem seari nyem, go desiyan mat diukum Sen.
46010009	Ken nang na' diret nguji Tuwowe diret, na' po yeng digewai le' desiyan mie, sampai desiyan bemati-mati dipanto' le' ular biso.
46010010	A, ge'em nang na' diret begunau, na' po yeng digewai le' desiyan mie, lalu desiyan dipenjeri le' melekat yeng munah ranah.
46010011	Semuya' yeng tejedi ke' desiyan mie pun, kamei, kei contoh begi diret; a, ditulis pun kei memperingát diret tengkalo tue di lem jengkah pengudah pada' jeman nyeh.
46010012	Mangko sopai ja' yeng ngangap direte togap kukoh awas! gola' tekelanar jetue.
46010013	Pada' semuya' penggudo yeng na' nyuroh diret bedoso si noe iyo penggudo yeng bungas yeng berue peh, pie penggudo yeng selomo nan dirudu le' mensiyo. Pie Allah si mat mutu, tawu diarap. Sen noe ngelebu diret digudo ngelampau deri kemampu diret. Des diret digudo nyeh Sen yeng nunyo' jelan keluwar gei' diret noe kalah tam digudo.
46010014	Mangko, kaban kekaseh ku, diret ca' nyiseh ngenjewoh deri sipat gewai yeng nyomah ke' duwato patong keramát.
46010015	Ku madah tue ke' kam pun go kam reng yeng belubang pemiker. Jedi dah kam ningo yeng aku tue diret kamam yeng ngaji ngeruninge, patut noe mun gewai kam tokoh nyoe.
46010016	Boh kam ngaji ke' hal tue: Des diret makan kei ngingát ngenáng Yesus kin diret nginsup deri cawan samel besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen, dih? Noe peh nyoe ngenyato ken diret segewol segelumo ken Kristus des iyo mati betumpah derah? Ponyoe jum des diret mocah ken makan roti beroto nyeh. Noe peh nyoe ngenyato ken diret mat segewol segelumo ken Kristus des iyo mati ken bengki' idup agei' secaro tuboh?
46010017	Mat segewol segelumoam ken Yesusam, kamei. Roti nyeh kin setukuam, ya'am Kristus, mangko numo' pun benya' diret yeng nyego roti nyeh pie diret mat segewol segelumoam ken iyo, go semuya' diret nyego roti yeng setukue nyoam.
46010018	A, cubo ngaji jum pelator adat jelan reng Yahudi. Des sidoe nyego pesaling yeng diunyo'e ke' Allah kin maksute sidoe segewol segelumo ken Allah yeng disomahe des ngadap bedah pesaling nyeh.
46010019	Jedi ke' hal nyego jolu yeng dah diunyo' kei pesaling ke' duwato patong keramát potue ne. Maksut aku noe go patong keramát yeng disomah reng mat jolu yeng do peh; a, ken pesalinge yeng diunyo'e ke' jolu ke' deng nyoe pun noe go do retie peh.
46010020	Pie yeng mat si des reng noe pecayo ken Allah ngunyo' pesaling ke' pada' jolu ke' deng nyoe iyo mat nyomah ke' pada' roh jat. Iyo noe nyomah ke' Allah peh. Aku si paling noe setuju ku mun kam segewol segelumo ken pada' roh jat!
46010021	Konai na' makan kei ngingát ngenáng Tuwowe dah nyoe nyego jolu yeng to' nyomah ke' roh jat? Noe ken diret ari tue segewol segelumo ken Tuwowe diret, dah nyoe pagi lusoe segewol segelumo ken pada' roh jat! Paling noe patut.
46010022	Cuwali diret na' ngaca' ngarang nyuroh Tuwowe diret cemburu, pie, tam diret nyomah ke' jolu layin. Nyeh, go diret bekuwaso deri Sen peh go diret bereni tokoh nyoe?
46010023	Mat die diret cum jolu yeng mali, mat beyi' bisam. Pie biyar beyi' pun noe iyo semuya'e nyo' nguntong. Mat beyi' bisam, pie mun jolu yeng noe nyuroh diret mansang ke' togap si ento' pai diret na' ngelakue?
46010024	Semuya' segeno diret ca' besemangát mementing ngaji betor. Nang na' siko' pun yeng mementing direteam. Nyoam to' pelator diret lem hal tue.
46010025	A, jolah ke' nyego degin yeng dijuwal reng si diret buleh makan pai-pai pun. Nang na' ngorie lem ati kocit nun. Noe sa' diselidik dolo'e,
46010026	go kin jie lem kitap Sen mie deniyo tue ken semuya' isei'e mat engku Tuwowe.
46010027	A, ponyoe jum des diret makan di rumah betor. Mun do betor yeng noe pecayo ngaja' diret makan di rumahe, lalu diret pun na', diret buleh makan pai-pai pun yeng dilentang ke' diret. Noe sa' nyelidike dolo'e tam ngorie lem ati kocit nun.
46010028	-
46010029	Ja'e mun do reng yeng gei' bolum togap kepecayoe madah ke' diret, "Jolu yeng kau sego tue bokas kei pesaling tadie", a, mun dah bungi nyoe si diret nang na' nyegoe. Noe iyo go diret sangsi lem ati kocit nun peh. Diret si noe sangsi, pie kebosai diret namang betor yeng madah diret tadie, gola' iyo to' atie, tam iyo gei' sangsi lem ati kocite nun. Mangko nang na' disego jolu nyoe. Menurute si kebebas diret mat noe patut dipedo le' betor yeng gei' sangsi lem ati kocite nun.
46010030	Mun diret dah besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen nyo' jolu yeng disego diret si mat noe patut reng medo diret tam diret nyegoe, go diret kin daham besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen nyo' jolu nyoe. Jedi tue ne pungka' pangkal yeng ca' dipakai diret:
46010031	ya'am pai-pai pun yeng digewai diret biyar makan minúm biyar gewai pai pun pie tuju semuya'e ca' ento' diret ngagong Allah.
46010032	Nyoe pungka' pangkal semuya' gewai diret. Pie lem gewai diret pai-pai pun nang na' diret nganyor betor, beyi' reng Yahudi beyi' reng Yunani beyi' umát gereja Allah.
46010033	Kam ca' nunoe gewai aku. Go aku koti-ti pun mat besemangát nulong melayan semuya' segeno mensiyo. Aku noe mementing keuntong diret ku; kebosai ati aku na' nulong mensiyo yeng benya' gei' sidoe ditulong diselamát.
46011001	Mangko kam ca' nunoe aku, go aku pun nunoe Kristus.
46011002	Jedi mátam te'. Aku mat mugi kam go kam nan ingát ken aku lem sipat pai-pai pun. A, ge'em kam mat patoh makai pada' pengajar yeng dah ku lantar ke' kam mie.
46011003	Pie do jum yeng ku gei' na' ngenjelas ke' kam; yeng tue penting jum kam ca' tawu, ya'am go kepala' tiyap ko' reng lelaki mat Kristus; a, kepala' reng betinoe mat lakie; a, ken kepala' Kristus mat Allah.
46011004	Mangko deri nyoe nang na' reng lelaki beserumong kepaloe des iyo bedoa atau madah posan payit Allah. Mun iyo beserumong kepaloe maksute iyo noe ngehormát kepala'e.
46011005	Pie betinoe si kebelike kepaloe mat ca' beserumong des iyo bedoa ken madah posan payit Allah. Mun iyo noe beserumong kepaloe maksute iyo noe ngehormát kepala'e. Mun reng betinoe noe beserumong kepaloe pai bedoe ken reng yeng ngenggunol buwo'e kaliam.
46011006	Mangko mun iyo ngei'e nyerumong kepaloe coh ge' buwo'e digunole kaliam. Noe peh rasoe?* Pie mun rasoe digunol nyeh menurute rasoe jum mun iyo noe beserumong kepaloe. Mangko tiyap ko' betinoe mat ca' beserumong kepaloe (des iyo bedoa ken des iyo madah posan payit Allah).
46011007	Do reng lelaki si noe patut beserumong kepaloe. Go reng lelaki serupo ken Allah, ken ngenyato keagong Allah. Do reng betinoe si ngenyato keagong reng lelaki.
46011008	Go asale mie kin noe iyo lelaki yeng dipulah deri betinoe, pie betinoe yeng dipulah deri lelaki.
46011009	A, ge'em noe iyo lelaki yeng dipulah kei nyukup kemalang betinoe, pie betinoe yeng kei nyukup kemalang reng lelaki.*
46011010	Mangko deri nyoe, ge'em tam ngaji pada' melekat (yeng mantau nyaksi diret semeyang), mat patutam reng betinoe beserumong kepaloe, kei ngenyato hake.*
46011011	Ja'e numo' pun ponyoe pie begi diret yeng pecayo ken Tuwowe si betinoe noe iyo bediri bedirete peh, pie gei' tekayi' ke' lelaki. Ken lelaki pun noe iyo bediri bedirete peh, pie mat tekayi' ke' betinoe jum.
46011012	Go na' po betinoe nyomie asale dipulah deri lelaki, ponyoe jum dah lopas nyoe lelaki diado deri betinoe. Pie semuya'e bungkonge mat Allaham.
46011013	Cubo diret kamam yeng ngaji ngeruninge. Patut noe mun reng betinoe bedoa ke' Allah mun noe beserumong kepaloe?
46011014	Pantauam kebiyaso reng selomo pun. Noe peh jelas mun reng lelaki bebuwo' panyang mat hina nar,
46011015	pie mun reng betinoe bebuwo' panyang nyeh nyoe mat keagonge; paling alap dipantau. Go betinoe diunyo' Allah buwo' panyang pun kei ngelibue ken nudong kepaloe.
46011016	Ja'e gola' do reng yeng na' bejebap beseliseh lem hal tue si go ngat tuam yeng nan diajar kami pada' pelantar posan. A, pada' gereja Allah yeng layin pun mat tokoh tuam kebiyasoe; mat cum kebiyaso layin.
46011017	Jedi tue do perentah pelator ke' hal makan kei ngingát ngenáng Tuwowe. Ja'e lem hal tue ku noe ku mugi kam peh, go des kam bekumpol nyeh jewoh na' ngemberansang nogap betor. Kam keluboe ngerusa' ngerenoh nyem.
46011018	Ngopai go padah ku ngerusa' ngerenoh nyeh, pertamoe go do reng nyadu ke' aku go des kam umát gereja bekumpol nyeh kam besepiya' besebelah. Pemenya' penyikite ku noe jelas pie aku yakin ken tue mátam, kamei.
46011019	Kam si poe mat nan ca' besepiya' besebelah, kaji kam, kei ngembokti sopai yeng mat.
46011020	Jie kam si kam bekumpol nyo' ngingát ngenáng Tuwowe, pie noe.
46011021	Go kam ajah-ajah makan, kau kauam, aku akuam. Cum nungu beroto ken betor, pie tiyap ko' kam seroto dudo' lintus lugap lagup besegoam. Sampai pada' kam do yeng belengkor lapar, do yeng bemabo'-mabo'!
46011022	Cum peh rumah tangoe diret kam to' arong kam makan minúm? Pie do. Nyeh, mun ponyoe, kedudo' kam na' menghina gereja Allah peh, atau pun kedudo' kam na' ngererawoe betor yeng cum jolue peh go gewai kam sampai tokoh nyoe? Nyeh ca' koti omóng ku ken kam? Ca' mugi kam peh? Noe ken ku na' mugi gewai kam tokoh nyoe! Noe iyo gewai yeng tokoh nyoe peh yeng ku lantar ke' kam nyomie.
46011023	Yeng ku lantar ke' kam si po yeng ku nerimoe deri Tuwowe mie, ya'am potue: Jedi Yesus Tuwowe diret malam iyo diserah nyeh iyo mat ngamie roti,
46011024	dah nyoe iyo beterimoe kaseh ke' Apa'e. Dah beterimoe kaseh ke' Apa'e lalu roti nyeh dipocahe, lalu Tue, jie, tuboh aku, yeng ku serah nyo' kam. Tue ca' nan digewai kam ento' kam ngenáng aku, jie.
46011025	Jedi ponyoe jum dah makan tei' dah nyoe iyo ngamie cawan, lalu, "Ayie tue," jie, "yeng nano jenyi semayo Sen yeng beru, yeng disah ken derah aku. Sege' kam nginsup tue ca' digewai ento' kam ngenáng aku," jie.
46011026	Mangko sege' diret makan roti ken nginsup ayie angur ponyoe diret mat keedah begesah becerito madah ke' hal kemati Tuwowe kerado' ke' iyo bebeli' agei' ke' deniyo tue.
46011027	Mangko, kamei, berang reng yeng sememadi nyego roti Tuwowe ken nginsup ayie angur Tuwowe ken caro yeng noe patut, maksute iyo salah ngengguno tuboh ken derah Tuwowe; mun iyo diajar dididik le' Allah mat patutam, kamei.
46011028	Mangko tiyap ko' diret ca' nguji mereso ati direte, dah nyoe berue diret mat makan ken nginsupe.
46011029	Go berang reng yeng makan roti Sen ken nginsup ayie Sen pie iyo noe jelas ken maksut tuboh Tuwowe yeng diserahe nyo' diret si iyo mat nangong kicas doso direte.
46011030	Ngopai go benya' di antaro kam yeng saki' poníng rodang rungue, malah ken paie sampai bemati-mati.
46011031	Kira' diret rato-rato nguji mereso ati diret si diret noam ca' diukum Allah.
46011032	Ja'e des diret diukum le' Tuwowe pun go Sen na' ngendidik ngajar diret, gei' sempayo diret noe konoe kawum des Sen ngukum deniyo tue gi.
46011033	Jedi mátam te', menyadie ku yeng seimán. Des diret bekumpol nyo' ngingát ngenáng Tuwowe diret ca' tungu menungu siko' ken betor.
46011034	Mun do reng yeng lapar si iyo ca' makan di rumah direte lo'e, gei' sempayo diret noe diukum Allah tam salah ngingát ngenáng Tuwowe des bekumpol. A, pada' hal layin pun langko' ku nerang ke' kam dah ku kitue gi.
46012001	Jedi mátam, menyadie ku yeng seimán. Tue ku nulis ke' hal kemampu yeng diunyo' le' Roh Allah ke' diret, go kona' ati ku gei' sempayo kam jelas tawu yeng mat ke' hal tue.
46012002	Jedi ketiko kam bolum tekenal ken Allah mie kin kam semadi nunoe sopai-sopai pun yeng meyie kam kei nyomah ke' pada' keramát peniyát yeng bisue.
46012003	Mangko ku madah tue ke' kam gei' kam mat tawu ngembedoe, yeng nai deri Roh Allah ken yeng nai yeng noe. Jedi potue ne caroe: mun do reng yeng nyumpah Yesus si reng nyoe pasti noe diiring Roh Allah. A, ge'em mun do reng yeng ngangkue ken Yesus mat Tuwowe si nyoe reng yeng mat diiring Roh Allah. Mat cum reng yeng ngangkue ken Yesus mat Tuwowe, cuwali iyo diiring le' Roh Allah.
46012004	Jedi mátam te'. Pada' pengunyo' pengaseh deri Roh Allah mat bemacam bejenis, pie yeng ngunyo'e mat Roh Sen yeng siko'am.
46012005	Caro diret melayan Sen pun mat bemacam bereno, pie Tuwowe yeng dilayan diret mat siko'am.
46012006	A, ken caro diret ngerejo gewai Allah pun mat bemacam bejenis beneko bereno, pie yeng ngunyo' kuwaso ke' semuya' mensiyo ento' ngenggewai semuya' segeloe mat siko' Allaham.
46012007	Roh Allah mat nganyoe kuwaso Sen di lem tiyap ko' diret, pie tuju Sen gei' semuya' umát Sen untong.
46012008	Go di antaro diret yeng benya' nyeh mat bemacam bejenis kemampu yeng diunyo' Sen. Do reng yeng diunyo' le' Roh Allah kemampu nyo' madah ke' hal kepanai kemereti yeng mat; a, ge'em do jum reng yeng diunyo' kemampu kei madah pengentawu yeng mat. Pie Roh yeng ngunyo' kemampu nyoe mat siko'am.
46012009	Do reng yeng diunyo' le' Roh Sen yeng siko' nyeh kemampu yeng luwar biyaso nyo' iyo pecayo ken Allah nyo' Sen ngenggewai hal-hal yeng enah. Roh yeng siko' nyoam jum yeng ngunyo' ke' reng layin kemampu nyo' iyo ngembeyi' ngenjemah reng saki'.
46012010	A, do jum reng yeng diunyo' kemampu deri Sen nyo' mulah keenah keaneh; do jum reng yeng diunyo' kemampu nyo' madah posan payit Allah.* Do jum reng yeng diunyo' kemampu kei neliti ngembedo kuwaso yeng dipakai reng, mat deri Roh Allahei deri roh layinei. A, do jum reng yeng diunyo' Sen kemampu kei ngomóng lem beneko reno paner* beru, ken reng layin diunyo' Sen kemampu nyo' iyo ngenjelas pai yeng dipadah le' betore lem paner beru nyeh tadie.
46012011	Mat beneko bereno kemampu pie semuya' segeloe mat digewai le' Roh Allah yeng siko'am. Sen ngenjemín pengunyo' Sen ke' tiyap ko' urange cuco' ken kemawo' Sénam.
46012012	A, contohe benso tuboh diret. Tuboh diret kin siko'am, ken benya' begie. Pie numo' pun benya' begie manseh siko'am tuboh nyeh. Jedi ponyoe jum tuboh Kristus.
46012013	Go semuya' diret, beyi' reng Yahudi, beyi' reng Yunani, beyi' reng yeng ulun, beyi' reng yeng noe ulun, pie semuya' diret mat menjedi setuboham. Yeng nyuroh diret setuboh nyeh tam diret diunyo' Roh Sen yeng siko'*. Sen mat buwar ngunyo' Roh Sen ke' diret. Pengunyo' Sen nyoe keedah pemakan yeng dilentang kei disego diinsup roh diret.
46012014	Jedi mátam te'. Benso tuboh diret kin noe iyo sebegi peh, pie benya' begie.
46012015	Pie koti misale mun jie kaki diret, "Ku noe konoe kawum di lem tuboh tue, poe, go aku noe iyo jeri," jie. Numo' pun kaki begunau bungi nyoe kin pie iyo tetap tekawum di lem tuboh nyoam; noe ken kaki dibuwang tam iyo noe jeri!
46012016	Atau pun misale jie kelinang, "Ku noe konoe kawum di lem tuboh tue go aku noe iyo mato," jie. Pie numo' pun kelinang begunau bungi nyoe kin iyo manseh tetap tekawum di lem tuboh nyoam; noe ken kelinang dibuwang tam iyo noe mato!
46012017	Kira' umpamoe semuya' tuboh diret mungkal mato, noe ken koti diret na' ningo! Kira' umpamoe semuya' tuboh diret mungkal kelinang, noe ken koti diret na' ngenciyum! Noe ken alap tuboh tokoh nyoe!
46012018	Pie yeng mat si tuboh diret mat disunsun Allah panciam, cuco' ken kona' kemawo' Sen. Sénam yeng ngator nyunsun tiyap-tiyap begi lem tuboh diret.
46012019	Mun tuboh nyeh ngat sebegiam maksute noe iyo tuboh peh!
46012020	Pie yeng mat si mat benya' begie lem tuboh diret, pie numo' pun benya' begie tuboh nyeh mat siko'am.
46012021	Masing-masing begi pun mat perelu ken pada' begi yeng layin. A, koti umpamoe mun jie mato nyingka' jeri, "Ku noe perelu ken kau," jie. Pie noe ken mato noe perelu ken jeri. Atau pun misale jie kepalo nyingka' kaki, "Ku noe perelu ken kau," jie. Pie noe ken begi tue noe perelu ken begi nyoe.
46012022	Yeng mat si tuboh diret mat perelu nar ken tiyap begie numo' pun yeng selomo noe diangap penting pun.
46012023	A, ken pada' begi yeng alap ca' noe ditoyu le' diret pie nyoam yeng ditoyu diperintu diret. Pada' begi yeng alap ca' dikerasoe mun diperati reng layin yeng nyoam yeng diputut diselinong rapi le' diret.
46012024	Pie begie yeng jenga' yeng alap diperati le' reng layin si mat noe ca' diputut diselinong. Yeng mat si mat Allaham yeng ngator nyunsun pada' begi lem tuboh diret. Sénam yeng nyurohe gei' pada' begi yeng alap ca' noe penting pie mat nyoam yeng lebeh dinilai, ditoyu diperintu le' diret.
46012025	Tuju maksut Sen gei' sempayo tuboh diret mat kerejo samoam, cum seliseh petingkise, gei' sempayo tiyap begi samo noyu merintu siko' ken betore.
46012026	Mun sebegi lem tuboh saki' nyeh semuya' tuboh teraso bisam. Mun sebegi di lem tuboh dipugi tentu semuya' tuboh teraso ayah bikah.
46012027	Jedi mátam te'. Diret kin mat tuboh Kristus. Tiyap ko' diret mat sebegi di lem tuboh Kristus,
46012028	ya'am gereja Sen. Lalu di lem gereja Sen nyeh mat Allaham yeng nentu netap gewai ulah reng. Yeng ditentu ditetap Sen nyeh ya'am yeng pertamoe pada' pelantar posan; yeng keduwo pada' reng yeng madah posan payit Allah; a, yeng ketigo nyeh pada' reng yeng ngajar. Dah nyoe Sen netap nentu reng yeng mampu mulah keenah keaneh, ken reng yeng diunyo' Sen kemampu nyo' ngembeyi' ngenjemah reng saki', ken reng yeng diunyo' Sen kemampu nyo' nulong melayan betor, ken reng yeng diunyo' Sen kemampu nyo' ngurus ngator, a, ken reng yeng diunyo' Sen kemampu nyo' bepaner lem paner yeng beru.
46012029	Noe ken semuya' diret pelantar posan! Noe ken semuya' diret yeng tawu madah posan payit Sen! Noe ken semuya' diret yeng ngajar atau mulah keenah keaneh.
46012030	Noe ken semuya' diret diunyo' Sen kemampu nyo' ngembeyi' ngenjemah reng saki', atau pun bepaner lem paner yeng beru, atau pun ngenjelas pai yeng dipadah le' betor lem paner yeng beru nyeh. Mat belayin- layin kemampu diret di lem gereja Sen.
46012031	Pie diret mat ca' sungoh besemangát nyinto kemampu yeng paling utamo. A, aku pun na' madah ke' kam jelan yeng paling panci.
46013001	Sempamoe aku mampu ngomóng ken pada' paner mensiyo, beyi' pada' paner melekat pun, pie mun aku noe kaseh si samo jum ken bungi tetawak yeng nyaring ken bungi canáng yeng cum retie.
46013002	Kepa' pun aku do kemampu nyo' madah posan payit Allah; a, kira' Sen madah pada' risi'-risi' Sen ke' aku, ken aku tawu semuya'-muya'e ke' hal Sen pun; a, ge'em sempamoe keabis ketogap keyakin kepecayo ku sampai aku mampu ngaleh buki' deri tue kinun pun, pie mun aku noe kaseh si mat cum guno ku.
46013003	Sempamoe aku ngembecar semuya' reto beno jento keraja' ku ke' reng bensat, a, ge'em sempamoe aku sampai relo nyerah diret ku diukum mati caro dicucol pun*, pie pada' gewai tokoh nyoe pun mun ku noe kaseh si mat cum keuntonge begi aku.
46013004	Kaseh tei' ya'am sabar, panci ati, noe isin dengki. Kaseh tei' noe berakah, noe somong bongko',
46013005	noe kasar beso. Kaseh tei' noe nunoe kepenting direte, noe murah ngamie ati, noe denam, (noe ngitong ken noe ngingát kesalah betor).
46013006	Kaseh tei' ayah bikah ken gewai yeng mat yeng benar, noe nyelopa' nyempulai kebeyat jat.
46013007	Kaseh tei' nan ngelon ngampun, noe ngembeba' bekau kesalah betor, nan pecayo ken pai-pai pun yeng panci, serarat arap, serarat ngetat semuya' segeloe.
46013008	Kaseh tei' mat noe berubah, tan seora'-ora'eam. Sedang kemampu nyo' madah posan payit Allah demo ke' kemampu nyo' bepaner ken paner yeng beru, demo ke' pengentawu yeng mat deri Sen si mat do pembula'e.
46013009	Go gei' tue si gei' malang pengentawu diret, ken kemampu diret nyo' madah posan payit Sen pun gei' kurang.
46013010	Ja'e dah jengkah waktu Sen nyukup ngenggonáp semuya' segeloe si yeng kurang yeng malang mat disiseh dipelosi Sen.
46013011	Contohe benso kebiya' ku mie. Gei' kebiya' ku mie omóng ku omóng ana' biya', pengaji ku pengaji ana' biya', ati pemiker ku ati pemiker ana' biya' nyem. Pie dah ku bosai si ku mat ningal kelaku kebiya' ku mie.
46013012	Ponyoe jum keidup diret caro roh. Gei' tue si yeng diperati diret gei' keedah merati ceromín yeng kusam, pie dah nyoe gi langko' torusam diret merati Sen besemuko. Gei' tue si gei' kilau-kilau pemantau diret, pie dah nyoe gi diret langko' jelas tawu semuya' segeloe, na' po Sen nan jelas tawu semuya' segelo ke' hal diret.
46013013	Jedi mátam te'. Yeng gei' ca' tetap nan digewai le' diret tengkalo tue si ya'am pecayo, arap, ken kaseh. Tigo reno nyoam. Pie yeng utamo paling penting tei' ya'am kaseh.
46014001	Jedi mátam te'. Yeng paling penting ca' dikejar diret ya'am kaseh. A, selayin deri nyoe diret ca' awus nyo' buleh kemampu yeng diunyo' le' Roh Allah, terutamo kemampu nyo' madah posan payit Allah.
46014002	Do reng yeng bepaner ken paner yeng beru nyeh iyo noe ngomóng ken mensiyo peh, pie ken Allaham. Yeng diomónge si mat deri Roh Sen, pie retie gei' risi'-risi', go diret noe tawu ken retie.
46014003	Pie reng yeng madah posan payit Allah si kebelike iyo mat ngomóng ken mensiyo, ento' ngemberansang ken ngibor ken nogap betor.
46014004	Yeng bepaner ken paner beru nyeh iyo ngat nogap direteam, pie reng yeng madah posan payit Allah si iyo nogap ngemberansang semuya' umát gereja.
46014005	Kona' ati aku si gei' semuya' kam mampu bepaner ken paner yeng beru nyeh. Pie yeng lebeh panci deri nyoe pun ya'am mun semuya' kam mampu madah posan payit Allah. Go gewai reng yeng madah posan payit Allah mat do keuntonge deripado reng yeng bepaner ken paner beru nyeh, cuwali do reng yeng ngenjelas retie, gei' semuya' umát tawu. Mun ponyoe si mat do jum bahan kei ngemberansang nogap umát.
46014006	A, benso aku, menyadie ku yeng seimán. Mun aku manu ke' kam ditue pie aku ngomóng ngajar kam pakai paner yeng beru nyeh pailah gunoe begi kam? Pie mun aku manu ke' kam nyo' ku madah posan payit Sen, atau pun to' ngajar pengentawu deri Sen si nyoe mat do keuntonge begi kam.
46014007	-
46014009	Contohe benso alat musik. Alat musik benso suling ken gitar mun semadi ditobah reng noe beketongkah si konai reng na' tawu lague? Ponyoe jum benso selumpit sangkakala yeng ditobah nyo' reng siyap beperang; mun semadi tobah nyem konai reng tawu ca' siyap beperang? A, alat musik kin berang mati yeng noe bepenyawo pie manseh ca' jelas bungie, sa'am go paner diret mensiyo. Mat arus ca' jelas tiyap reti omóng diret. Mun diret ngomóng ken paner yeng beru pie noe tawu reng ken retie si pai gei' gunoe paner diret? Nyoe mat keedah angín lalu nyem.
46014010	Di deniyo tue mat beribu-ribu macam jenis paner, pie cum yeng noe bereti; mat bereti bisam.
46014011	Pie mun aku noe tawu ken reti paner betor si begi aku omóng iyo ngerebicok nyem. Ponyoe jum omóng aku dikedingo iyo.
46014012	Jedi mátam, kamei. Kam yeng ingín nar na' buleh kemampu deri Roh Allah si ca' ingín buleh yeng paling penting, ya'am pada' kemampu deri Sen yeng mampu dipakai ento' nogap ngemberansang umát gereja.
46014013	Mangko reng yeng bepaner ken paner beru nyeh penting jum iyo ca' minta' tulong Allah gei' iyo madah maksut reti panere ke' betor gei' betor mat ditogap diberansang.
46014014	Mat penting nar diret ca' tawu ken reti maksut paner betor. Misale mun aku bedoa di lem paner yeng beru nyeh: roh ku si mat bedoa, pie pemiker ku noe ikut bekaji.
46014015	Jedi mun ponyoe ca' kotilah aku? Ku na' bedoa ken roh ku ge'em ken ati pemiker ku ge'em; ku na' benyanyi ken roh ku ge'em pie ken ati pemiker ku ge'em sempayo betor ku pun mampu tawu jum ken retie.
46014016	Mun diret besukor mugi Allah ken roh diret di lem paner beru nyeh konai betor yeng noe tawu ken tuju maksute na' nyentujue ken doa diret yeng beterimoe kaseh nyeh? Go iyo kin noe tawue ken tuju maksut paner diret.
46014017	Numo' pun sepanci-pancie diret beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen pie mun betor noe tawu ken tujue iyo noe ditulong ditogap.
46014018	Ku si mampu ku jum bepaner di lem paner beru nyeh, lebeh deri semuya' kam pun. Ku mat besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen tam kemampu nyoe.
46014019	Pie des bekumpol ken umát gereja si aku manseh coh ge' ngosoh empat limo patah pun sal ge' jelas, nyo' ngembegi ngajar betor, deri pado bereribu kato lem paner beru nyeh yeng noe jelas begi betor.
46014020	Jediam pengaji pemiker diret na' po pengaji pemiker ana' biya', menyadie ku yeng seimánei. Cuwali jolah ke' kebeyat jat si ma'am mun po ana' biya' pun, pie jolah ke' pemiker diret si mat ca' po reng yeng dah bosai.
46014021	Jedi mátam. Kin dah ditulis lem Kitap Sen mie yeng bungi potue, Ku langko' ngomóng ken umát benso tue ken paner yeng enah, ngelalu reng jewoh pun. Pie manseh ngei'e sidoe ningo Aku, jie Tuwowe. (Yesaya 28:11-12)
46014022	Dinyoe kin jelas ken kemampu nyo' ngomóng ken paner beru nyeh mat petanah petano deri Allah gei' reng noe pecayo jelas (ken iyo mat diluwar gentang, bolum tekawum ken umát Sen). Noe iyo kei nogap ngemberansang reng pecayo peh. Sedang kemampu nyo' madah posan payit Sen si mat petanah petano pengunyo' pengaseh Allah ke' reng pecayo, ento' nogap reng pecayo. Noe iyo kususe nyo' reng noe pecayo peh.
46014023	(Mangko mat kemampu nyo' madah posan payit Sen yeng ca' dipakai des kam bekumpol. Ja'e begi reng noe pecayo pun mat do keuntonge jum.) Jedi sempamoe mun umát gereja bekumpol lalu pada' umát nyeh bepaner ken paner yeng beru. Dah nyoe do reng yeng noe pecayo yeng bolum belajar detang kitue. Jewoh beh sidoe na' pecayo. Malah ken paie kaji sidoe pada' reng ditue reng gilo nyem!
46014024	Pie kebelike mun umát gereja nongah madah posan payit Allah lalu do detang reng yeng noe pecayo yeng bolum belajar si mangko iyo langko' jelas yakin ken doso direte, entam iyo ningo yeng dipadah le' semuya' kam.
46014025	Isei' ati pemikere yeng selomo tetapo' pie langko' ketaro. Pengabise iyo mat nungkup nyomah ke' Allah jum; ngangkue jum ken Allah mat nyeroto kam. Ponyoam kejedie reng noe pecayo mun iyo ningo diret yeng pecayo madah posan payit Allah.
46014026	Jedi mun ponyoe ca' koti máte des diret umát gereja bekumpol? Des diret bekumpol semeyang kin tiyap ko' diret do kemampu nyo' nulong ngemberansang betor: do yeng siyap na' nyanyi mugi, do yeng siyap ngajar, do yeng siyap madah yeng dipadah le' Allah ke' iyo, do yeng siyap bepaner lem paner yeng beru, a, do jum yeng siyap ngenjelas paner beru nyeh tadie. Pie semuya' pungka'e ento' kei nulong ngemberansang umát.
46014027	Mun do reng yeng na' bepaner di lem paner yeng beru nyeh ca' duwo ko' nyem, paling benya'e tigo ko'; nyoe pun ca' begiler. Ge'em ca' do yeng madah retie.
46014028	Mun cum reng nyo' madah retie iyo ca' ngojap nyem, nang na' ngomónge di pada' penenongah umát gereja nyeh. Iyo ca' di arong direteam ngomóng ken Allah.
46014029	A, reng yeng na' madah posan payit Allah pun ponyoe jum, ca' duwo tigo ko' nyem yeng madah posan payit Allah, lalu pada' umát yeng layin pun ca' nyima' lem ati pemikere.
46014030	Ge'em mun do Allah madah posan Sen ke' reng yeng dudo' ningo betore si betor yeng nongah madah posan Sen ca' berenti lo'e.
46014031	Maksute ca' begegiler; dah santo' yeng siko' berue yeng siko' die. Pie semuya' tujue gei' pada' umát diajar ken diberansang.
46014032	Caroe si caro telator, go reng yeng diunyo' kemampu nyo' madah posan payit Allah si iyo tentu tawu ngator nahán direte, noe iyo semadi ngomóng caro noe telator.
46014033	Go Allah kin bungkong tenáng amán, noe ken Sen nyuroh kacau bilau. A, kam pun ca' nunoe po yeng dipakai le' semuya' umát gereja Sen,
46014034	ya'am betinoe des belajar ca' ngojap nyem, go betinoe noe diijin ngomóng. Sidoe ca' tuno' taalo', cuco' ken ukum Allah mie.
46014035	Gola' umpamoe iyo na' nanyoe minta' penjelas pun ca' ditanyoe ke' lakie di rumah direte nyem. Go mat ngererawoe mun betinoe ngomóng des umát gereja bekumpol*. Nyoam caro yeng dipakai di semuya' gereja Sen.
46014036	Pie gopai go noe ditunoe dipakai kam? Go kaji kam posan payit Allah bebungkong di kam peh? Atau kaji kam ngat kam bangam peh yeng nerimoe posan payit Sen go kam na' layin deri pada' gereja yeng layin?
46014037	Mun do reng yeng jie iyo madah posan payit Allah atau pun reng yeng jie iyo do kemampu deri Roh Sen si iyo mat ca' jelas tawu ken yeng ku tulis tue, go tue mat perentah Tuwowe diret.
46014038	Pie mun reng ngei'e nerimoe ningo pemadah ku tue nang na' kam pun nerimoe ningo iyo.
46014039	Jedi mátam, menyadie ku yeng seimán. Yeng penting yeng ca' dikeingín kam ya'am kemampu nyo' madah posan payit Sen. Ge'em nang na' ngidah reng bepaner di lem paner yeng beru,
46014040	pie semuya'e ca' digewai secaro sopan santon ken telator.
46015001	Menyadie ku yeng seimán: Tue ku na' ngingát kam ke' hal agah panci yeng ku padah ke' kam mie. Kam kin nerimoe agah panci nyoe. Kam togap kukoh pun tam agah panci nyoam.
46015002	A, kam pun mat selamát, mun kam mat tetap pecayo ken agah panci nyoam yeng ku padah ke' kam mie. Cuwali ja' siyo-siyo kam pecayoe mie.
46015003	Go yeng ku lantar ke' kam mie noe iyo kengkarang diret ku peh; aku pun nerimoe dah nyoe aku pun mat ngelantare ke' kam. Poko' pangkal yeng ku padah ke' kam mie pun ya'am Kristus mati nyo' meyar utang doso diret, cuco' ken yeng ditulis di lem Kitap Allah mie.
46015004	Dah mati iyo mat dipasar, dah dipasar iyo disuroh Allah bengki' idup agei' ari pengentigo nyeh, cuco' ken yeng ditulis lem kitap Sen mie.
46015005	Dah bengki' idup agei' pun dah nyoe iyo mat nganyoe direte ke' Petrus, dah nyoe ke' pada' murite yeng duwobelas ko'.
46015006	Dah nyoe iyo nganyoe direte ke' menyadie diret yeng seimán yeng lobeh 500 ko' sekali gus. A, separo si dah mati dah yeng 500 ko' nyeh, pie kebenya'e si gei' idup. Jedi semuya' sidoe mat merati ken mato kepalo direte ken Yesus mat bengki' idup agei'.
46015007	Jedi mátam. Dah Kristus nganyoe direte ke' sidoe 500 nyeh dah nyoe iyo nganyoe direte ke' Yakobus, dah nyoe ke' pada' pelantar posan layin,
46015008	a, yeng pengudahe mie mat nganyoe direte ke' aku jum. Ibarat ke' reng berana' din aku keedah ana' suwang yeng ditoran dikaroh bolum jengkahe.
46015009	Go semuya' pelantar posan Sen si akuam yeng paling hina, go asale mie kin aku mempungah gereja Allah! Mat noe patut nar aku didemo pelantar posan Sen.
46015010	Pie tam pengunyo' pengaseh Allaham go aku tokoh tue; a, pengunyo' pengaseh Sen ke' aku pun noe siyo-siyo peh, mat do asele, malah ken paie akuam yeng belelah bejoreh betetes poloh bekerejo melayan Sen deri pada' betor pun. Pie nyoe pun noe iyo tam kemampu diret ku peh, pie mat tam pengunyo' pengaseh Allaham yeng nan nyeroto aku.
46015011	Jedi mátam te'. Biyar sopai pun yeng madahe, beyi' aku beyi' pada' pelantar posan yeng layin pun, pie yeng nan dipadah kami manseh agah panci tuam (ya'am ke' hal Yesus Kristus yeng bengki' idup agei'). Ken yeng dipecayo kam mie pun mat agah panci tuam to'.
46015012	Pungka' pangkal pengajar kami kin ya'am Kristus mati ken bengki' idup agei'. Nyoam yeng diterimoe dipecayo kam. Mun ponyoe gopai go do deri kam yeng madah dah mati daham; cumam reng mati bengki' idup agei'?
46015013	Mun cum reng mati bengki' idup agei' si maksute Kristus pun noe iyo bengki' idup mie, dih?
46015014	Jedi mun Kristus noe bengki' idup mie si maksute agah panci yeng kami padah ke' kam siyo-siyo nyem, mat ampoe buwau nyem. Ken siyo-siyo nyem kam pecayo pun, cum botange.
46015015	Malah ken paie mun Kristus noe bengki' idup agei' mie kenyatoe maksute kami kejulong memuloe kam. Ge'em kami mempulah Allaham, poe, go jie saksi kami si Allah nyuroh Kristus bengki' idup agei'. Pie mun mat jie kam reng mati noe disuroh Sen bengki' idup agei' si, maksute Kristus pun noe disuroh Sen bengki' idup jum.
46015016	Go Kristus kin mat mati mie; jedi mun jie kam reng yeng dah mati noe disuroh Sen bengki' idup agei' kin maksute Kristus pun noe disuroh Sen bengki' agei' jum.
46015017	Lalu koti ken kam: mun Kristus noe disuroh Sen bengki' idup agei' si pai guno kam pecayo pun? Mat ampoe buwauam kepecayo kam. Manseham kam cagar diukum tam doso kam mun Kristus mat noe bengki' idup agei'.
46015018	A, ge'em pada' reng yeng pecayo ken Kristus yeng dah mati dolu mie pun sidoe punah ranaham, cumam iyo bengki' idup agei' mun Kristus noe bengki' idup agei' nyeh.
46015019	A, mun reng pecayo yeng dah mati punah ranaham si maksute arap diret ken Kristus beguno ento' keidup diret di deniyo tue nyem. Teruhal diret dah noe dah ngaji deniyo tue; arap diret ken jolu ditue ditingal diperayan go diret ngaji keidup nyoe gi. Pie mun Kristus mat noe bengki' idup agei' si maksute diret pecayo ken yeng noe mat! Mun tokoh nyoe si mat paling cangongam diret yeng pecayo, mat pilue nar deri pada' betor yeng noe pecayo pun.
46015020	Pie noe! Yeng mat si Kristus mat disuroh Allah bengki' idup agei'am. A, gewai Sen nyuroh Kristus bengki' idup agei' pun keedah pengansor Sen kei ngembokti ken reng layin yeng dah mati pun mat cagar bengki' idup agei' jum.
46015021	-
46015022	(Maksute Kristus pengulu semuya' mensiyo yeng langko' bengki' idup agei', na' po Adam pengulu semuya' mensiyo yeng bemati-mati.) Go semuya' mensiyo bemati-mati pun tam kibat gewai reng yeng siko' mie, ya'am Adam. Mangko semuya' mensiyo mat mati tam tekawum ken Adam. Pie ponyoe jum ke' hal bengki' idup agei' nyeh. Mensiyo sampai mampu bengki' idup agei' nyeh tam kibat gewai reng yeng siko' ya'am Kristus. Mangko semuya' segeno langko' disuroh Sen bengki' idup agei', tekawum ken Kristus.
46015023	Pie yeng bengki' idup pun rato-ratoe ca' jengkah yeng ditetap le' Allah. Yeng paling pertamo kin Kristus yeng keedah buwah kememerue. Dah nyoe, dah iyo bebeli' kitue si yeng engku iyo die langko' bengki' idup agei' jum.
46015024	Dah nyoe, dah iyo munah ranah semuya' segeno beyi' yeng bedemo beyi' yeng bekuwaso beyi' yeng merentah dinai-nai pun, a, dah nyoe kuwaso iyo nyo' iyo merentah, ken semuya' segeloe yeng diperentahe, langko' diserahe bis ke' Allah Apa'e. Nyoam yeng didemo Ari Kiyamát nyeh.
46015025	Go Kristus mat ca' merentah sampai pada' munsohe tekempojal di beroh jempoe kakie.
46015026	Dah nyoe munsoh yeng pengudah yeng na' dikalahe tei' ya'am kuwaso kemati.
46015027	Nyoe mat ca' kalah jum tam kuwaso Kristus, go jie lem kitap Allah pun yeng bungie potue, Sen nyuroh semuya' segeloe ca' tekempojal di beroh jempoe kakie. (Masmur 8:6) Ja'e semuya' segeloe tei' cuwali Allaham, go mat diret Allaham yeng nyuroh semuya' segeloe tuno' taalo' ke' Kristus.
46015028	Jedi mátam te'. Dah Allah nyuroh semuya' segenoe tuno' taalo' ke' Ana' Sen si dah nyoe Ana' Sen die langko' nyomah nyujut ke' Allah yeng nyuroh semuya' segenoe tuno' taalo' ke' iyo tadie ponyoe! Tuju maksute sempayo mat nyato ken Allaham yeng merentah ken nguwaso semuya' segeloe dinai-nai pun. Mat kalaham kemati tam Kristus.
46015029	A, cubo kam ngaji tue jum. Mun reng yeng dah mati nyeh cagar noe bengki' idup agei' si gopai go do reng yeng na' disolam kajie nyo' nobus* betore yeng dah mati nyeh? Mun reng dah mati cum bengki' idup agei' si noe ken sidoe na' disolam nyo' betore yeng mati nyeh.
46015030	Ponyoe jum ke' hal kami. Ento' pai kami ngerudu behayo yeng noe leka'-leka' nyeh (mun cum arap kami na' bengki' idup agei' dah mati nyeh)?
46015031	Nyoe mat mátam, kamei: mat tiyap ari ku ngerudu behayo sampai na' dipebunoh reng, pie nyuroh ku relo pun tam aku mat yakin ke' hal gewai Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret. Tam gewai nyoame' mangko aku nan beiyap bebungah ke' hal kam jum. Jedi keyakin yeng nyuroh ku beiyap bebungah ke' hal kam pun samo jum ken keyakin yeng nyuroh ku relo nan ngerudu kebehayo pai-pai pun.*
46015032	A, contoh behayo yeng ku rudu nyeh benso di kota Epesus nun: pada' munsoh yeng ku lawan nyeh keedah binatang gerang yeng na' ngeridang aku. Pie aku si mat bereni ngelawane. Nyeh pailah keuntonge begi aku secaro mensiyo nyeh na' ngelawan munsoh ponyoe mun reng mati cum bengki' idup agei'? Mun reng yeng dah mati noe disuroh Sen bengki' idup agei' si coh ge' diret na' po jie perbeso nyeh Ayo' bemakan beminúm beriyah berami nyem, go pagi lusoe diret mati.
46015033	Pie kam nang na' ningo ajar nasehat tokoh nyoe; nang na' kam diiring nyimpang deri jelan yeng mat. Nang na' bebi utan ngalah bebi rumah.
46015034	Ca' jogar ca' sadaram pemiker diret, po yeng patut yeng konoam. Jediam bedoso. Go do di antaro kam yeng mat noe tekenal kaliam ken Allah. Sepatute ca' rasoe kam ngajie; ngopai go ku madah kam potue pun.
46015035	A, pai nawue gola' do reng yeng nanyoe, "Nyeh, koti reng yeng dah mati disuroh bengki' idup agei'? Tuboh nailah yeng dipakaie ento' bengki' idup nyeh?" jie. ("Go tuboh yeng dipasar kin mansang ke' buro' nyem.")
46015036	Pie reng yeng becencugeh tokoh nyoe redo budu, kamei, go maksute iyo noe ngaji jolu yeng diperatie seari-ari pun, benso belo tentanám opai. Kin jolu yeng ditanám ca' ditanám di lem tanah, ca' ngelalu rusa' lo'e* berue iyo belantang. (Jedi semalang ke' boneh pun ge'e, manseh tawu belantang dah ditanám ke' tanah nyeh, sa'am go tuboh mensiyo. Tawu jum disuroh bengki' idup agei'.)
46015037	A, ke' hal koti upo tuboh diret yeng bengki' gi pun ponyoe jum. Yeng ditanám diret kin boneh nyem, benso igei' genumei, atau ke' igei' jolu layinei: pie tentanáme dah iyo belantang ken mansang noe ken samo upoe ken igei'e yeng ditanám.
46015038	Dah iyo belantang pun upoe upo yeng ditetap le' Allaham, cuco' ken kemawo' Sen: layin igei' layin jum upo lantange.
46015039	A, benso jolu yeng benapas yeng dipulah Sen, ponyoe jum: kin belayin-layin upoe, noe ken samo. Isei' degin mensiyo kin layin jenise, isei' degin pada' binatang pun layin jenise, isei' degin pada' burong pun layin jenise, ken isei' degin ikan pun ponyoe jum, layin jenise.
46015040	A, ponyoe jum ken jolu di langi' ken jolu di tanah tue: semuya'e mat agongam, pie keagong jolu di langi' kin layin deri keagong jolu di tanah.
46015041	Malah ken paie jolu di langi' pun manseh bebedo layin-layin keagonge: keagong mato ari layin deri keagong bulan; keagong bintang kin layin deri keagong mato ari ken bulan; a, keagong pada' bintang yeng benya' pun layin-layinam keagonge.
46015042	Jedi ponyoe jum ke' hal tuboh diret yeng bengki' idup agei'. Tuboh diret yeng dipasar si tawu buro', pie tuboh yeng bengki' gi noe tawu buro'.
46015043	Tuboh yeng dipasar kin tuboh yeng jat, pie tuboh yeng bengki' idup agei' tuboh yeng agong. Tuboh yeng dipasar kin tuboh yeng lomah, pie tuboh yeng bengki' idup agei' tuboh yeng bekuwaso.
46015044	Tuboh yeng dipasar si tuboh yeng cuco' to' keidup diret di deniyo tue, pie tuboh yeng langko' bengki' idup agei' si mat tuboh yeng cuco' kei idup di serugo secaro roh. Go mun do tuboh yeng cuco' nyo' keidup diret di deniyo tue si maksute do jum tuboh yeng cuco' nyo' keidup diret di serugo nun secaro roh.
46015045	A, po yeng ditulis lem Kitap Sen mie Adam, mensiyo yeng pertamo nyeh, mat bepenyawo nyo' iyo idup di deniyo tue. Pie Kristus, yeng didemo Adam yeng pengudah nyeh, iyo mat Roh yeng nyuroh diret idup secaro roh.
46015046	Mat do tuboh yeng beru yeng cuco' nyo' diret idup secaro roh, ja'e go tuboh nyoe mat dudi. Yeng dolu kin tuboh yeng bepenyawo ento' keidup diret di deniyo tue. Dah nyoe berue tuboh yeng beru, yeng cuco' nyo' diret idup secaro roh.
46015047	Mensiyo yeng pertamo kin dipulah deri debu tanah, pie yeng didemo mensiyo yeng keduwo* nyeh ya'am Kristus iyo mat berasal deri serugo nun.
46015048	Jedi po mensiyo pertamo po keturune: mat asale deri debu. A, ponyoe jum mensiyo yeng berasal deri serugo nyeh. Po iyo po keturune, mat empue serugo.
46015049	Di deniyo tue si tuboh diret nunoe upo tuboh mensiyo yeng siko' yeng dipulah deri debu. Jedi ponyoe jum dah nyoe gi, tuboh diret cagar nunoe upo tuboh mensiyo yeng siko' yeng berasal deri serugo nun.
46015050	Go tuboh yeng bedegin bederah nyeh mat noe mampu dikawum des Allah disomah kei rajo gi. Yeng tawu buro' yeng tawu mali' kin noe mampu nerimoe pesako yeng noe tawu buro' yeng noe tawu mali'. Nyoe mat mátam, menyadie ku yeng seimánei.
46015051	Dingo beh kam: aku madah risi'-risi' Allah ke' kam. Risi' Sen tei' ya'am noe iyo semuya' diret yeng langko' mati! Pie yeng pasti si semuya' diret mat langko' diubah.
46015052	Dah pengudah deniyo tue gi dah bebungi sangkakala Sen si semuya' diret langko' diubah Sen rap! sekejap mato nyem. Reng yeng dah mati nyeh disuroh Sen bengki' idup ken tuboh yeng noe tawu buro', ken semuya' diret yeng layin pun yeng gei' idup nyeh diubah Sen jum.
46015053	Go tuboh diret yeng tawu buro' ken tawu mati nyeh mat ca' digenti* ken tuboh yeng noe tawu buro' yeng noe tawu mati.
46015054	Dah yeng tawu buro' yeng tawu mati digenti ken yeng noe tawu buro' yeng noe tawu mati nyeh, ha, berue mat tuntongam yeng ditulis di lem Kitap Sen mie yeng bungie potue, Kemati dah punah ranaham; keidup yeng monáng.
46015055	Kemati dah kalaham! Kemati mat cum dah kebisoe, jie bungi Kitap Sen mie. (Hosea 13:14)
46015056	Yeng nyuroh kemati mat biso mie si tam mensiyo bedoso, ken yeng nyuroh doso bekuwaso mie tam mensiyo mat ngelangar ukum Allah.
46015057	Pie paling besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Allah! Go Sen yeng nyuroh diret monáng ngalah doso ken kemati ngelalu Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret!
46015058	Menyadie ku seimán yeng ku kaseh: tam diret yakin ke' hal tue mangko diret mat ca' togap kukoham, noe begenset begenser. Diret ca' serarat melayan Tuwowe diret sebulat atiam, go diret mat yakin ken gewai diret nyo' Sen noe siyo-siyo.
46016001	A, jedi tue ke' hal duwit yeng na' dikumpol nyo' umát engku Sen yeng bensat nyeh. Jedi caro ngumpole ca' digewai po ku suroh yeng digewai le' pada' gereja di Galatia nyeh.
46016002	Jedi potue ne caroe. Dah Ari Kememerue di tiyap mingu nyeh tiyap-tiyap ko' kam ca' ngajen sesuwai ken pekulehe, lalu ditaroh, sempayo siyap, gei' noe sa' dikumpol dah ku detang kitue.
46016003	Jedi dah ku detang kitue dah kam mileh reng yeng disetuju kam nyeh aku pun langko' ngutuse kei ngantar sumang kam ke' Yerusalem, cukup ken pada' surat pengantare.
46016004	A, mun engoe penting aku ca' kinun jum si mangko sidoe yeng dipileh kam pun nyo' namah aku.
46016005	Jedi mátam. Aku langko' ngulang kam ditue dah ku ngerudu propinsi Makedonia, kamei. Go aku dah mutuse na' ngerudu Makedonia lo'e.
46016006	Pie dah nyoe engo ku cukup lamat aku cagar renán regan ken kam ditue, seukor munsim colap tue pun, gei' sempayo kam mampu nulong aku ngelaju pejelan ku gi, konai-nai pun.
46016007	Ku ngei' ku ngat sebentaram ngulang kam terip tue. Kona' ati ku na' lamat kit ken kam mun Tuwowe diret ngijine.
46016008	Gei' tue si ku gei' na' renán di kota Epesus nun lo'e, manu ke' Ari Raya Pentakosta.
46016009	Go dinun pun kelorong ketiko tue mat tebuka' nyo' ku madah agah panci, pasti benya' asele. Pie benya' jum reng yeng nentang gewai ku dinun. Mangko ku gei' renán dinun lo'e.
46016010	-
46016011	A, dah Timotius detang kitue nang na' iyo diremeh dipemuda' le' sopai pun, go iyo pun bekoyo bekerejo melayan Tuwowe jum na' po aku. Iyo ca' disamut panci beh, gei' iyo noe namang ken kam. Dah nyoe kam ca' nulong iyo ngelaju pejelane gei' iyo selamát bebeli' pulang ke' aku dinun. Aku pun dah nungu kedetang iyo ken pada' menyadie seimán yeng layin.
46016012	A, ke' hal Apolos menyadie diret yeng seimán nyeh aku si dah erat dah nan nyuroh iyo ca' ngulang kam ditue beroto ken pada' menyadie diret yeng seimán yeng layin. Pie iyo dah yakin mutuse ken terip tue iyo mat bolum kitue. Ja'e iyo jie pasti langko' ngulang kam ditue, dah do keloronge yeng cuco'.
46016013	Diret ca' bejego, ca' togap kukoh bepigang ke' kepecayo diret. Ca' bereni, ken ca' nan kuwat.
46016014	Sipat pai-pai pun yeng digewai diret ca' digewai ken ati yeng kaseh.
46016015	A, sutie agei' yeng ku pinta' ke' kam, menyadie ku yeng seimánei. Kam kin tawu ken keluwarga Stepanus sidoe yeng pertamo pecayo di Akaya mie. Sidoe mat tungang soh melayan pada' umát engku Sen nyeh.
46016016	Mangko yeng ku minta' tei' diret mat ca' tuno' ngehormát sidoe; mat ca' ningo ken nunoe sopai-sopai pun yeng ngerubut bekoyo bekerejo melayan Tuwowe na' po sidoe.
46016017	Stepanus, Portunatus ken Akaikus si dah pulang kinun. Aku pun mat ayah bikah dah sidoe pulang nyeh. Sidoe tigo nyeh penggenti kam kei ngelimu ati ku yeng rinue ken kam.
46016018	Go sidoe mat ngibor ati aku, ken ngibor ati semuya' kam jum. Reng yeng tokoh nyoe mat patutam dirogo diret.
46016019	Salam ke' kam deri pada' gereja di propinsi Asia. Benya' salam jum ke' pada' kam yeng tekawum lem Tuwowe deri Akwila, ken Priska, ken deri umát gereja yeng bekumpol semeyang di rumah sidoe.
46016020	Salam jum deri semuya' menyadie seimán dinun. A, kam ditue pun ca' besalamam siko' ken betore secaro kaseh.*

47001001	Surat tue deri aku Paulus, pelantar posan Kristus Yesus cuco' ken kona' kemawo' Allaham, ken deri Timotius, menyadie diret yeng seimán. Kami nulis tue ke' pada' umát gereja Allah di Korintus, ken ke' pada' engku Sen di seruroh peloya' Akaya.
47001002	Salam damai ken berekat dolat deri Allah Apa' diret ken Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret.
47001003	Patutam Allah, Apa' deri Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret dipugi! Sen nan nulong ngaseh diret. Sen mat Allah yeng bungkong semuya' pengibor pemberansang diret.
47001004	-
47001005	Sénam yeng serarat nan ngibor ngemberansang kami des kami ngerudu kesusah kesensare yeng bemacam bejenis pun. Kami mat nan serarat ngerudu kesensare po Kristus nyomie, pie kami nan serarat diibor diberansang jum tam gewai Kristusam; jedi po disensare po diibor. Tuju maksut Sen gei' sempayo pengibor yeng kami terimoe deri Sen nyeh dipakai kami jum ento' ngibor ngemberansang betor yeng ngerudu kesensare pai-pai pun.
47001006	Mangko beyi' des kami ngerudu kesusah beyi' pun des kami diibor pie tujue mat gei' sempayo kam die ditulong diselamát diibor diberansang. Go mun kam diibor kin maksute kam mampu sabar, mampu ngetate nyem des kam ngerudu kesensare po yeng dirudu le' kami.
47001007	Mangko kami nan yakinam ke' hal kam, go kami pun tawu: po kami po kam. Go po kam ngerudu kesensare pie ponyoe jum kam diibor diberansang, na' po kamiam.
47001008	Mat ugas ngatam kesensare yeng dirudu le' kami, menyadie ku yeng seimánei, benso yeng dirudu le' kami di propinsi Asia tue mie, nyamán kam tawue. Mat ugas ngatam kesensare kami mie; ibarat ke' ngoma' beban din mat noe tetahan kami dah. Mat cumam arap kami to' idup.
47001009	Peraso kami mat so na' matiam. Pie nyoe tejedi pun, kamei, go Sen na' nyuroh kami gei' noe ngarap kemampu diret kami, pie Sen na' nyuroh kami mat arap ken Allaham, go Sen mat uleh Sen nyuroh reng yeng dah mati pun pie bengki' idup agei'am.
47001010	Mat Sénam yeng dah nulong nyelamát kami. Sénam yeng dah ngerampas kami des kami ngaji ken kami pasti na' matiam. Tue pun manseh Sénam yeng nan nulong nyelamát kami. Ken kami mat yakin, mat arap ken Sénam gei' Sen serarat nan nulong nyelamát kami.
47001011	Ja'e go kam pun ca' nulong kami jum lem doa kam, beh? Go mun doa kam yeng benya' nyeh dah dituntong Sen si maksute kin benya' jum reng yeng besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen tam berekat dolat Sen nulong kami.
47001012	Jedi mátam. (Poe do di antaro kam yeng madah kami pememuloe. Pie noe, kamei.) Yeng mat si kesaksi kami di deniyo tue nan bujor benar seputeh atiam. Pai tel agei' di adap kam, tam kami mat ditulong le' Allah. Kami mat yakin lem ati kocit kami nun ke' hal tue; mampu kami beiyap bebungah ke' hal tue. Ja'e gewai ulah kami yeng tokoh nyoe pun noe tam kepanai kami mensiyo peh, pie tam pengunyo' pengaseh Allaham.
47001013	A, gopai ge' go padah ku bujor benar tadie pun go semuya' yeng ditulis kami kin noe iyo layin tola' layin tudong peh; go kam mampu jelas nangkap retie des kam becoe pun. Jedi kona' ati kami kira'e kam nan serarateam jelas ke' hal kesaksi idup kami,
47001014	na' po kam dah becocat jelasam. Maksut kami gei' kam mat yakin ken kam mat mampu beiyap bebungah ke' hal kami, na' po kami pun cagar beiyap bebungah ke' hal kam dah Ari Kiyamát des Yesus Tuwowe diret detang gi.
47001015	-
47001016	Jedi mátam. Entam ku yakin ken kam mat pecayo ken aku si, mangko ku mat mutuse mie na' duwo kali ngulang kam. Kaji ku des ku mansang ke' Makedonia na' singah ngulang kam; a, ken dah pulang pun manseh na' singah agei'am ngulang kam, kaji ku nun. Maksut ku mun duwo kali ngulang kam si kam pun diberekat lipat duwo. A, ken kam pun mampu nulong aku lem pejelan ku pulang ke' Yudea nyeh ge'em, kaji ku nun. Nyoam arau ku nyomie, pie lalu bula'am.
47001017	Ja'e sungoh pun bula' noe go ku berubah peh, kamei. Noe go ku memuloe, na' po reng yeng nunoe kengkaji mensiyo nyem peh.
47001018	Aku si noe iyo tokoh nyoe. Go Allah kin mat mutu, mat tawu diarap; mangko kami na' ponyoe jum, kami noe koloe memuloe kam.
47001019	Go Yesus Kristus Ana' Allah yeng dipadah ke' kam le' kami Silas ken Timotius nyeh, iyo noe koloe memuloe peh. Iyo madah yeng mat-mátam, iyo nan nuntong yeng dijenyie.
47001020	Ken pai-pai pun yeng dijenyi le' Allah deri nyomie pun mat dituntong le' Kristusam. Mat diamin* le' Kristus, diboktie ken yeng dipadah le' Allah mat-mátam. A, ken diret pun mat ngamine jum; maksute nyentuju ken pai pun yeng dipadah Sen mat-mátam, mangko Sen mat diagongam.
47001021	Pai tel agei' mat Allaham yeng nogap ngukoh kami, ken nogap ngukoh kam ge'em, gei' sempayo diret mat togap kukoh arap ken Kristus. Sen yeng mileh diret,
47001022	Sen yeng nano diret kei engku diret Sénam; mat Sénam yeng nyuroh Roh Sen diyam lem ati diret. Nyoe keedah pengansor nyo' nentu ken semuya' yeng dijenyi Sen mat cagar tejediam.
47001023	Jedi mátam. Allaham kei saksi pendukong aku: Sen si mat tawu Sen ken isei' ati kocit ku nun. Jedi yeng máte si nyuroh ku bula' bebeli' ke' Korintus mie mat go ku ngaji kamam; go ku tawu mun ku kinun ku ca' negur memperingát kam, sedang aku ngei' ku nyusah ati kam.
47001024	Ja'e sungoh pun kami negur memperingát kam noe go kami na' menjedi manor kam ke' hal kepecayo diret peh. Kami mat serentak bekerejo samo ken kam gei' sempayo kam mat ayah bikah. Ke' hal kepecayo si go kam mat togap kukoh dah.
47002001	Jedi mátam. Dah ku ngajie ku mat mutuse ngei' ku dah ngulang kam agei' mun aku ca' tegas ken kam sampai nyusah ati kam agei'am, na' po terip nyoe mie.
47002002	Nyoe kin na' po nepok ayie di dulang; go mun kam susah lalu sopai agei' nyo' ngibor ngemberansang aku? Ngat kamam yeng mampu nyenáng ngibor aku. Pie koti kam na' nyenáng ati aku mun aku dah nyusah kam?
47002003	Kona' ati ku si mat na' ayah bikah des aku betomu ken kam; nyoe pun go ku ngaji kam, go ku mat yakin ken diret mat seati sepikeram, po aku po kam, ayah bikah aku ayah bikaham jum semuya' kam. Ku ngei' ku susah des betomu ken kam, go yeng sepatute mat ca' kamam yeng nyenáng ati aku! A, gopai go ku nulis ponyoe jum lem surat ku nyomie, kamei, (gei' sempayo semuya' segelo yeng noe patut nyeh mat ca' diurus kam sebolum diret betomu muko, gei' sempayo diret noe samo susah.)
47002004	Pie ento' nulis surat nyoe mie pun mat susah sontokam ati ku, kamei, sampai berutusam ayie mato ku ketiko ku nulise nyeh. Pie nyuroh ku nulise pun noe go ku na' nyusah ati kam peh, kebelike gei' sempayo kam mat jelas ken kebosai kaseh ku ken kam.
47002005	Pie do die yeng nyusah ati diret. Sa'am go ati aku, malah ken paie nyoma' na' semuya' kam yeng susah jum go ketegal gewai reng nyoe. Na' dipadah ken semuya' kam yeng susah go ku ngei' ku mopah-mopahe.
47002006	Ja'e tue, kamei, ukum yeng dah dipelaju le' kam benya' nyeh mat cukupam to' reng nyoe.
47002007	Mun reng dah bebeta' piker kin diret ca' ngelon ngibune modas-modasam, ken ca' ngibor ngemberansange. Jangán sampai iyo patah atie tam ngatam kesusahe mun diret noe ngelone.
47002008	Mangko, kamei, ku na' ngendorong kam gei' kam nganyoe madah agei'am kaseh kam ken iyo, gei' iyo mat yakin hal kaseh kam.
47002009	Nyoam tuju ku deri nyomie pun; ngopai ge' go ku nulis surat ke' kam nyomie, go aku mat ingín tawu ken ati kam. Ku na' tawu, na' noe kam ningo aku sebolum ku detang kitue pun. Lalu poe mat na' kam tuno' taalo' sebulat ati; na' kam ngurus hal nyoe.*
47002010	Mangko tue pun nang na' kam namang ngelone pun; a, sopai ja' yeng dielon le' kam tetap dielon aku jum. Kristus pun tawu ken isei' ati ku, go semuya' gewai diret mat di adap iyoam. 47002011	Jangán sampai diret dikelakar, lalu yeng engku diret dirobut le' Pengelakar, go diret kin dah tawu dah ken tuju Pengelakar nan na' ngerusa' ngerenoh diret nyem.
47002012	Jedi mátam. Des ku detang ke' Troas mie nyo' madah agah panci ke' hal Kristus nyeh, poe mat tekoba'am arong nyoe nyo' ku ngenggewai gewai Tuwowe dinun.
47002013	Numo' pun ponyoe pie ati ku nan susah riputam, go ku gei' bolum betomu ken Titus, menyadie ku yeng seimán yeng ku ngutus kei ngulang kam. Kaji ku tei' na' ningo agah hal kam, pie lalu cumam.
