47002014	Pie ku mat nan besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Allah, go Sénam yeng nan mimpin ngiring kami sampai monáng, ngalah pada' munsoh, tam diret tekawum lem Kristus. Sen mat makai kami nyo' madah ke' hal Sen dinai-nai pun, gei' sempayo reng mat tekenal ken Sen; nyoe pun keedah bewu binya' wangi yeng arum yeng bedenang bewue.
47002015	Go kami yeng madah agah panci ke' hal Kristus nyeh mat keedah reng yeng nyucol menyán; Allah pun ayah Sen ngenciyume. Mangko agah panci pun mat dah bedenangam, beyi' ke' reng yeng ditulong diselamát Sen, beyi' pun ke' reng yeng nuju ke' behayo.
47002016	Begi reng yeng nuju ke' behayo nyeh si agah panci nyeh keedah bewu jolu buntau kokat. Sidoe ngei'e nyoma'e, mangko sidoe pun mat matiam. Pie begi reng yeng ditulong Sen si agah panci mat arumam; na'e sidoe nerimoe, mangko sidoe mat nomu idup. Mat hebat nar tugas nyo' madah agah panci tue! Sopailah yeng mampu?
47002017	Pie yeng noe patut nar si sidoe yeng makai agah panci keedah jolu yeng didegange, yeng madahe nyo' keuntong direte nyem. Ja'e go kami si noe tokoh nyoe peh, kamei. Kami bujor benaram madah agah panci, tam tekawum lem Kristusam. Kami mat diutus le' Allah; a, ken gewai kami pun mat digewai di adap diret Sénam.
47003001	A, gola' jie kam omóng ku bungi nyoe bungie to' mugi diret kami agei'am, gei' kami diterimoe panci le' kam. Pie noe. Nyeh kam dah ngangap kami na' po sidoe layin peh? Go sidoe layin kin ca' do surat pengantar gei' mampu diterimoe panci le' kam. Dah sidoe ke' arong layin pun ponyoe jum, ca' do surat pengantar deri kam, gei' iyo diterimoe panci le' reng yeng langko' dipanue. Pie noe ken kami ca' do surat pai pun gei' kami diterimoe kam, engo ku.
47003002	Hale kam ana' diret kamiam secaro roh! Kam asel gewai kami. Diret kamam surat pengantar kami, ditulis di lem ati kami. Sopai-sopai pun tawu ngembecoe, tawu jum ken retie.
47003003	Kami noe perelu surat layin. Reng dah tawu reng dah, des reng merati gewai ulah tingkah laku kam, ken surat tue mat deri Kristusam, ken kami tukang lantare. Surat tue noe ditulis ken tinta, noe diuker di betu peh, pie mat ditulis di lem ati mensiyo le' Roh Allah yeng idup.
47003004	Kami mat yakinam ken kami mat pelantar posan yeng diutus diret Allaham; mat Kristusam yeng ngeyakin kami gei' kami pecayo ken Allah lem hal tue.
47003005	Ja'e lem peritong kami si sikit pun cum gewai kami yeng bebungkong di diret kami; noe go do kemampu diret kami peh. Kemampu kami mat deri Allaham.
47003006	Mat diret Sénam yeng ngunyo' kemampu ke' kami nyo' kami melayan Sen ngajar madah ke' hal jenyi semayo yeng beru yeng dituntong Sen. Kami noe iyo madah ngajar ke' hal pada' ukum yeng ditulis peh, pie ke' hal roh. Go pada' ukum kin kibate nyuroh mensiyo mati nyem, pie Roh Sen nyuroh mensiyo idup. Nyoe agah panci yeng dipadah le' kami pelantar posan Sen.
47003007	A, jemán ukum Musa mie pun mat agong ketongaie. Teruhal pada' ukum nyoe pun ngat urup yeng diuker di betu nyem; ken kibat ukum Musa mie kin mat nyuroh reng ca' diukum mati nyem. Numo' pun ponyoe pie manseh dipadah Sen ke' mensiyo caro agong. Malah ken paie pada' reng Israel mie mat nolehe nelomát ke' muko Musa tam keagong Allah yeng nyacas di muko rerayi Musa nyeh. Nyoe pun keagong yeng mansang ke' pudar nyem. A, semalang ke' jemán ukum Musa ge'e, mat agongam,
47003008	sa'am go jemán tue, des Roh Allah ngendiyam ati mensiyo! Mat kepala' agongam.
47003009	Go jemán ukum Musa, yeng kibate nyuroh mensiyo sampai ca' diukum mati, pie manseh agongam; sa'am go jemán agah panci tue, yeng nyuroh sampai mensiyo mampu diputus Allah bujor benar. Mat kepala'eam keagonge!
47003010	-
47003011	Ukum Musa kin jolu sementaro nyem. Pie semalang ke' yeng sementaro yeng dah noe dipakai nyeh ge'e, manseh diborie Sen caro agongam, sa'am go yeng beru tue, yeng tan seora'-ora'eam. Mat kepala'eam keagonge. (10) Go yeng nyomie yeng mat agong pun pie dah tue si mat cumam keagonge mun dibening ken keagong yeng beru tue, yeng ngatam keagonge.
47003012	Jedi tam arap diret yeng tan yeng agong nyeh mangko kami mat bereni terus terang berojang lantas madahe.
47003013	Kami noe na' po Musa mie peh. Gei' jemán Musa mie kin benya' yeng bolum jelas. Contohe benso Musa yeng disuroh Allah ngenggerebong mukoe, ngidah reng Israel nelomáte. Keagong Allah mat diselinong gei' sidoe noe mantaue, sampai ke' cayoe yeng nyacas nyeh losi. Pie kami jemán tue noe na' po Musa mie yeng seolah-olah nyelinong keagong Allah; kami madah agah panci sejelas-jelase,
47003014	pie reng Israel manseh bolum tetangkape. Go ati pemiker sidoe mat disuroh tupal; sampai ke' ari tue pun mun des ukum Musa deri jemán nyomie dibeco nyeh pie sidoe manseh noe tetangkape ke' retie. Seolah-olah ati pemiker sidoe tetap digerebongam. Gei' bolum dipucel gerebonge. Pucel noe pucel pun ca' dah reng pecayo ken Kristus.
47003015	Pi sidoe kin bolum pecayo, mangko sampai ke' ari tue pun sal ge' ukum Musa dibeco nyeh ati pemiker sidoe manseh tegerebongam.
47003016	Pie sal ge' reng bebeli' manu ke' Tuwowe si gerebong mat dipucel.*
47003017	Yeng dimaksut Tuwowe tei' ya'am Roh Allah; ken sopai pun yeng dikediyam le' Roh Allah mat bebasam manu begelumo ken Sen.
47003018	Jedi muko diret mat noe digerebong peh; cum dah jolu yeng nyelinong diret nyo' merati keagong Tuwowe diret. Lalu semingkin merati keagong Sen semingkin diret diubah Sen, gei' menjedi serupo ken Sénam; mat kin kepala' agongeam. Nyoe pun mat patutam, go yeng ngenggewaie mat Roh Allah Tuwowe diret.
47004001	Jedi mátam, menyadie ku yeng seimán. Kami diborie kelorong nyo' melayan Sen potue tam kekaseh Sen nyem, mangko kami noe mudoe kuroe.
47004002	Kami si nula' pada' keragam kejeya' jat yeng ngererawoe diret. Kami noe ngelakar ngeliker reng peh. Kami noe nyunsang ngembelengi' posan payit Allah peh. Kebelike kami mat jelas madah yeng mátam; kona' kami gei' sempayo tiyap ko' reng yeng ningoe mat tawu lem ati kocite nun ken yeng dipadah le' kami mat-mátam. Allah pun mat maloe merati yeng digewai ken yeng dipadah le' kami mat-mátam.
47004003	Do die reng yeng noe jelase ken agah panci yeng dipadah le' kami, pie nyoe ngat reng yeng nuju ke' behayo nyem.
47004004	Nyoe pun go sidoe noe pecayo. Mangko Pengelakar, yeng merentah deniyo tue kei allahe, mat nyuroh ati pemiker sidoe sampai butoe. Tuju maksut Pengelakar tei' gei' sempayo agah panci yeng tampa' nyeh mat noe manyah lem ati sidoe, gola' sidoe mat merati keagong Kristus yeng serupoam ken Allah. Mangko mat disuroh le' Pengelakar nyeh butoe.
47004005	Kona' ati kami si gei' sidoe mat pecayo ken merati keagong Kristus. Go kami noe madah agah panci gei' kami tekemuko dipugi reng peh. Pie kami mat madah agah panci gei' sempayo Yesus Kristusam yeng tekemuko, dipugi, gei' semuya' reng tawu ken iyoam yeng mat Tuwowe. Do kami si, sengejo mat ulun amo kam nyem nyo' nulong kam tam kaseh Yesus.
47004006	Tuju kami si ngatam na' madah agah panci sejelas-jelase. Go mat Allaham yeng bekato mie, jie Sen, Do lah tampa' di arong sagam nyeh. Ponyoe jum gewai Sen tengkalo tue ken diret. Mat Sénam yeng manyah tampa' Sen di lem ati diret, gei' diret jelas merati keagong Sen yeng nyacas deri muko rerayi Kristus; mangko ati pemiker diret pun tampa'am.
47004007	Kami si mat cum kuwaso kami. Kami mat keedah tepayan tanah yeng noe berogo nyem, pie yeng bisei' reto beno yeng paling berogo. Maksut Sen gei' kuwaso yeng ugas bosai, yeng bekoyo bekerejo di lem kami nyeh mat kuwaso Allaham, noe iyo kuwaso kami peh.
47004008	Kami nan serarat dikosar dikopong beneko reno kesensare, pie noe tekopeh. Kami nan serarat noe besikai, pie noe mudoe kuroe.
47004009	Kami nan serarat dikejar le' munsoh, pie noe koloe ditingal le' Sen. Kami nan serarat diompas pun, pie noe sampai beronso.
47004010	Kami si nan serarat relo nyem, sampai tuboh tue mati pun, na' po Yesus mati mie. Maksute gei' reng mat jelas ken Yesus mat idup, tam merati gewai ulah tingkah laku kami.
47004011	Semeja' kami gei' idup nyeh kami nan serarat soma' ulo' lubang nyem entam kami melayan Yesus. Pie nyoe pun gei' sempayo nyato nar di lem tuboh kami yeng noe tan pun pie Yesus mat idup. Mat iyoam yeng nguwaso kami.
47004012	Jedi maksute kami nan serarat behayo nyem, pie ma'am, sal ge' kibate kam die yeng buleh idup.
47004013	Numo' pun kami nan serarat behayo nyeh pie kami manseh ngeresudu' nyem madah agah panci, tam arap kami samoam ken yeng ditulis lem Kitap Sen mie, yeng bungie potue: Tam ku pecayo, mangko ku mat madahe, jie. Ponyoe jum kami; kami pun pecayo, mangko kami nan madahe nyem.
47004014	Tam Allah kin dah nyuroh Yesus Tuwowe diret bengki' idup agei' mie, mangko tam kebengki' Yesus nyeh* kami pun mat yakin ken Sen langko' nyuroh kami bengki' idup agei' jum beroto ken kam nyeh, lalu diret pun bereroto dibeyie Sen kei ngadap Sen dinun, ento' bekaban begelumo ken Sen seora'-ora'eam. Nyoam arap kami yeng nan ngeresudu' nyem madah agah panci.
47004015	Semuya' tue pun, kamei, maksute nyo' keuntong kamam. Go semingkin benya' reng yeng pecayo nyeh semingkin benya' reng yeng jelas ken pengunyo' pengaseh Allah; ken semingkin benya' reng yeng jelas ken pengunyo' pengaseh Sen si semingkin benya' jum reng yeng besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen. Maksute sempayo pengabise Sen semingkin diagong dipugi reng!
47004016	Nyoam sebape go kami noe mudoe kuroe, kamei. Sama' pun kerubong tue kin ari kin mansang ke' rusa', pie roh kami si kin ari kin jogaram.
47004017	Kesusah kesensare yeng dirudu kami si mat noe seberopaiam, mat sebentaram. Go asele yeng diajen Sen nyo' kami si ya'am keagong yeng mat ugasam yeng tan seora'-ora'eam. Mat paling noe setimpal mun dibening ken kesensare yeng dirudu di deniyo tue.
47004018	Go kami noe menduli jolu yeng ketawu ken mato; pie kami sebulat ati ngaji ngenáng jolu yeng noe ketawu ken mato. Go jolu yeng ketawu ken mato tue mat noe tan, pie jolu yeng noe ketawu ken mato si mat tan seora'-ora'eam. Nyoam go kami noe mudoe kuroe, kamei.
47005001	Jedi mátam. Kami mat noe mudoe kuroe, go kami pun tawu: umpamoe mun kerubong diret di deniyo tue ancor luloh pun diret do dah kerubong di serugo nun, yeng dipulah le' Allah, noe iyo dipulah le' mensiyo peh. Yeng dipulah Sen dinun pun tan seora'-ora'eam.
47005002	Gei' bekerubong di deniyo tue si diret nan ngeloham, go diret ingín nar ibarat ke' beju din na' nyaro' kerubong yeng beru yeng cuco' nyo' keidup diret di serugo nun.
47005003	Maksute dah yeng lamat tue dipucel nyeh, yeng beru disaro'am, gei' sempayo diret noe telanyang.
47005004	Go diret yeng gei' ngendiyam kerubong di deniyo tue si mat ngeloham tam beban borat diret; ja'e noe go diret ingín noe bekerubong kali, pie go ingín nar na' nyaro' yeng beru die. Maksute gei' yeng tawu mati nyeh telinsam telimasam le' yeng idup seora'-ora'eam. .
47005005	Nyoam tuju Allah des Sen ngado diret mensiyo nyomie pun. Mat diret Sénam yeng ngenggewaie, ken ngunyo' Roh Sen ke' diret keedah pengansor Sen yeng nentu netap ken semuya'e mat cagar tejedi.
47005006	Mangko kami pun nan yakin tegoham. Kami si mat tawu, mun diret gei' ngendiyam tuboh tue maksute gei' bolum sekediyam ken Tuwowe diret.
47005007	Ja'e numo' pun gei' ngendiyam tuboh tue pie bungkong keidup diret noe iyo yeng awas ken mato peh. Bungkong keidup diret mat kepecayo diret.
47005008	Mangko jie ku kami mat yakin tegoh. Kona' ati kami si coh ge' ditingal ja' tuboh tue, nyo' diyam ken Tuwowe dinunam.
47005009	Mangko tuju kami idup mati pun kami nan na' nyenáng ati Sen nyem.
47005010	Go semuya' diret langko' ca' ngadap belai pengadel Kristus nyo' iyo mereso gewai ulah tingkah laku diret yeng telampoh digewai diret des diret idup di deniyo tue. Maksute gei' tiyap ko' diret nerimoe upah yeng setimpal ken gewai diret, beyi' yeng beguno beyi' yeng modas mawah pun.
47005011	Jedi mátam. Kami pun dah tawu ken mensiyo sepatute ca' gola' ken Tuwowe diret, ca' tuno' taalo' ke' Sen. Nyoam go kami nan madah nan meyie reng, gei' sempayo reng pecayo ken Sen. Do ke' hal kesaksi keidup kami si mat noe becelo di adap kam. Allah kin dah tawu Sen dah ke' hal nyoe. Kiroe kam pun jelas jum lem ati kocit kam nun ken gewai ulah kami mat noe becelo di adap kam.
47005012	Ja'e nyoe pun noe go kami na' mugi diret kami peh! Pie maksute gei' sempayo do pekuleh peramu kam die, gei' kam mampu beiyap bebungah ke' hal kami. Ge'em sempayo kam tawu nyamut sidoe yeng lubo ngaji na' tekemuko nyem, pie ngei'e mementing kepanci ati.
47005013	Poe do di antaro sidoe yeng madah kami gilo. Biyar kami diangap sidoe gilo pun ma'am, sal ge' kami mutu melayan Sen. Pie kami noe gilo peh, kamei. Mat tenángam pemiker kami, gei' kami nyukup kepenting kamam.
47005014	Go mat kaseh Kristusam yeng ngendorong ngemberansang gewai kami. Go kami mat yakin ke' hal tue: mat siko' Kristusam yeng dah mati nyo' ngenti semuya' segeno mensiyo. Mangko kemati iyo mat diangap kemati semuya' segeno diret yeng menurute ca' diukum mati.
47005015	A, maksut iyo mati pun kei diret buleh idup. Ja'e diret yeng buleh idup nyeh ca' idup kei nuntong kona' kemawo' Kristus yeng mati ken bengki' idup agei' ento' diret. Keidup diret yeng beru nyeh noe iyo ento' nuntong kona' kemawo' diret peh.
47005016	Mangko pemiker kami si dah berubah dah. Gei' nyomie si kami ngenilai reng ngat secaro mensiyo nyem; noe kami ngaji ke' hal roh peh. Sampai Kristus pun nyomie dinilai kami tokoh nyoam. Pie tue si dah noe dah kami ngenilai reng tokoh nyoe.
47005017	Go mun reng dah tekawum lem Kristus si maksute iyo dah dipulah Sen beru dah. Yeng lamat dah lopas dah; temosie tup! semuya'e dah menjedi beru dah.
47005018	Tue mat gewai Allah tei'am. Go Sénam yeng nyuroh diret yeng gei' nyomie bemunsoh ken Sen pie tue mampu bekaban begelumo ken Sen, tam gewai Kristus. Lalu Sen nugas diret ento' madah ke' betor caro Sen begelumo agei'am ken mensiyo.
47005019	Maksute ngelalu gewai Kristus, Allah nyuroh mensiyo di deniyo tue yeng selomo nan bemunsoh ken Sen pie tue mampu dah bekaban begelumo ken Sen agei'am. Doso mensiyo dah diapus Sen dah; cum dah Sen ngitonge agei'. Lalu Sen nugas diret nyo' madah ke' betor caro Sen begelumo agei' ken mensiyo.
47005020	Mangko diret mat pesuroh yeng diutus Kristus; mat diret Allaham yeng muhún mampal ngelalu diret. Diret ngenti suwaro Kristus yeng muhún ngunang ngamie mensiyo nyo' begelumo agei'am ken Allah! Diret nyurohe kei jediam bemunsoh ken Sen.
47005021	Go Kristus yeng cum dosoe pie dipulah le' Allah seolah-olah na' po reng bedosoam kei ngenti diret. Maksute gei' sempayo diret mampu dipulah Allah bujor benar na' po diret Sénam, tam diret tekawum lem Kristus. Nyoam agah panci yeng disuroh Allah ca' nan dipadah diret.
47006001	Jedi mátam. Diret mat seangki' seberangko ken Allah. Mangko kami ngendorong kam: nang na' siyo-siyo nyem kam nerimoe pengunyo' pengaseh Allah.
47006002	Go kin jie Sen lem kitap Sen mie yeng bungie potue, Dah jengkah nyo' Ku ngemberekat mensiyo si Ku mat nuntong doa kau. A, ken dah jengkah nyo' Ku nulong nyelamát mensiyo Ku mat nulong kau, jie Sen mie. (Yesaya 49:8) Dingo beh kam! Tuam to' jengkah Sen na' ngemberekat diret nyo' nuntong yeng jie Sen nyomie; tuam to' jengkah Sen na' nulong nyelamát mensiyo. Mangko nang na' siyo-siyo diret nerimoe pengunyo' pengaseh Sen.
47006003	Kami si mat nan bejego gei' cum betor yeng tepengaroh tam gewai kami. Kona' ati kami gei' cum dedal ingel nyo' reng nyalah gewai kami yeng melayan Sen.
47006004	Pie kebelike kona' kami nan na' serarat ngembokti ke' sopai pun ken kami mat pelayan Allah, biyar pai-pai pun yeng dirudu le' kami. Kami nan ngerudu kesusah kesensare yeng bemacam bejenis, na' so cum besikaiam, pie kami nan sabar nyem ngetate.
47006005	Kami koloe dipangkong dipelesah reng, koloe dipenjero reng, koloe dikerupu, ditunong dititeh reng. Kami belelah bejoreh bekoyo bekerejo, dese sampai noleh tidor, dese cum makan. Mat ngatam kesensare kami.
47006006	Bokti kami mat pelayan Allah nyeh tam kami melayan Sen seputeh ati; tam kami tawu yeng mat ke' hal Sen; tam kami sabar; tam kami murah ati; tam kami diiring le' Roh Allah; tam kami kaseh ken betor sebulat ati.
47006007	Ge'em kami nan madah yeng mat. Kami dikuwaso le' Allah. Kebujor kebenar Sénam yeng kei alat perang kami. Jeri sepiya' bisei' kelewang nyo' alat nyerang; jeri sepiya' bisei' kelawue nyo' ngela' serang deri munsoh.
47006008	Dese kami dihormát reng; dese dihina reng; dese dipugi reng, dese dipaner diomel reng. Kami nan madah yeng mátam, pie dipadah reng pememuloe.
47006009	Kami diperenah dipehine reng; pie di adap Sen kami tarah ke' tekemuko. Kami nan soma' ulo' lubang, pi tarah ke' idup! Kami nan disensare, pie noe sampai mati.
47006010	Kami nan susah, pie manseh nan serarat beayah bikah. Kami mat bensat meretatam, pie tam gewai kami si benya' reng buleh reto beno yeng mat. Mat cum jolu kami, pie yeng mat si semuya' segeloe mat engku kamiam! Semuya' nyoe mat ngembokti ken kami mat pelayan Allah yeng mat.
47006011	Kaban kerabat kami di Korintus: tue kami mat terus terang berojang lantas ngeromus semuya' isei' ati kami ke' kam. (Gopai go kam manseh ngerangang kami?)
47006012	Yeng ngerangang diret si mat deri kamam, noe iyo deri kami peh.
47006013	Tue ku ngomóng ken kam keedah apa' ngomóng ken ana'e: boh kam melas kaseh aku.
47006014	Pie noe ku nyuroh kam ca' ngenggelumo semuya' segenoe peh. Diret yeng pecayo nang na' seikat sekobat ken reng noe pecayo; nyoe mat noe patutam. Noe ken koti yeng bujor benar na' seikat ken yeng melelintang! Noe ken koti tampa' na' begabong begelumo ken sagam!
47006015	Noe ken Kristus na' seati sepiker ken Pengelakar!* Noe ken reng pecayo mampu samo serukui ken reng noe pecayo!
47006016	Noe ken koti nyomah jolu yeng noe Allah di rumah kediyam Allah. Go diret kin mat kediyam Allah yeng idup, kamei; konai diret na' seati sepiker ken reng yeng nyomah jolu yeng noe Allah. Kin jie Allah lem Kitap Sen mie yeng bungie potue, Aku langko' ngendiyam ati sidoe ken begelumo ken sidoe. Akuam to' Allah sidoe, ken sidoe pun to' engku diret Akuam, jie Sen.
47006017	Mangko, jie Tuwowe, kam ca' bepencaram ken reng yeng noe nyomah Aku; kam ca' ngerangang diret kam deri sidoe. Nang na' terikat ke' pai-pai pun yeng ngotor ngencemar kam. Aku pun na' Ku nampan nerimoe kam, jie Sen. (Yeremia 51:11)
47006018	Akuam to' Apa' kam, ken kam pun beyi' lelaki beyi' betinoe mat to' ana' Aku, jie Tuwowe yeng rajo kuwaso. (2 Samuel 7:14)
47007001	Mat paling panci pada' jenyi Sen ke' diret, dih! Mangko, pada' kaban kekaseh ku, diret mat ca' ngunsut ngembereseh diret deri semuya' segeloe yeng ngencelo diret, beyi' deri bedan beko beyi' sampai ke' ati pemiker diret nun. Tuju diret tei' ya'am gei' gewai ulah tingkah laku diret mat suci bereseham, tam diret mat idup tuno' taalo' ke' Allah.
47007002	Kami muhún mampalam gei' kam noe berubah ken kami; kiroe kam relo begelumo mansa' ken kami na' po selomoam. (Nang na' kam ningo sidoe yeng maner ngomel kami, kamei.) Go kami mat cum kesalah kami teradap sopai pun. Siko' pun cum reng yeng dipeluwang diperugi le' kami. Cumam kami ngelakar ngeliker reng. Mangko jie ku nang na' berubah ken kami, kamei.
47007003	Ja'e omóng ku bungi nyoe pun noe go ku na' medo kam peh. (Menurute kam pun tawu ken ati aku), go aku pun daham madah ke' kam ken ku mat kaseh nar ken kam. Diret mat seiyo sekato seati sepiker, mat seidup semati.
47007004	Ku noe ngaji ubong diret dah berubah peh; ku mat yakin nar ken kam. Malah ken paie ku nan beiyap bebungah ke' hal kam. Ati ku mat so diibor diberansangam tam kam. Numo' pun aku benya' ngerudu kesusah kesensare, pie ati ku ayah bikaham po cawan yeng belileh.
47007005	A, pulang ke' omóng ku tadie, padah ku ken aku benya' ngerudu kesusah kesensare nyeh si go ketiko kami sampai ke' Makedonia terip nyoe mie pun kami manseh susah riputam, mat noe sompat nenáng pemiker kami. Go kesusah kesensare mat bemacam bejenisam: deri reng luwar nyeh tam nan do reng yeng betengkar betingkis belawan bemunsoh ken kami; a, ken deri lem ati kami pun ponyoe jum, mat gupoham jum, nan ngorie ke' hal kam.
47007006	Pie Allah si mat tawu Sen ngibor reng yeng cum besikai pun, mangko mat do Sen ngibor kami ketiko nyoe mie. Caroe tam kedetang Titus.
47007007	Ento' mantau muko rerayie pun ati kami mat teibor, teberansang; sa'am dah ningo agah berito ke' hal kam deri iyo. Mat kepala'eam teibor teberansang ati kami. Nyuroh kami teberansang tei' go jie Titus kam panci nerimoe iyo, sampai ati iyo pun teibor teberansang. Iyo bepadah ke' kami ken kam mat rinue ken aku; kam mat dah susah riput tam doso di gereja kam mie, jie; a, ken kam mat kaseh nar ken aku, jie Titus. Mat paling ayah kami ningo agah kam deri Titus nyeh.
47007008	Pie des ku ningo ken kam susah tam surat ku mie si do die teraso ku kesal. Ja'e noe ku kesal ken ku nulise peh. Go numo' pun kam susah nyeh poe kesusah kam ngat sementaro waktu nyem.
47007009	A, aku pun dah tue si mat ayah bikaham; ja'e noe iyo ayah bikah tam kam susah peh; keayah bikah ku entam kesusah kam mat do asele. Asele tei' ya'am go kam mat bebeta' piker. Kesusah ati yeng berasel tokoh nyoe si mat cuco'am ken kona' kemawo' Allah. Mangko jie ku kam mat untongam tam surat kami; sikit pun cum kerugi kam.
47007010	Go kesusah ati reng yeng ngaji dosoe di adap Allah si mat nyuroh reng bebeta' piker. A, ken reng yeng bebeta' piker kin mat ditulong diselamát le' Sen. Konai na' nyesal kesusah yeng tokoh nyoe! Pie kebelike kesusah reng yeng ngat ngaji kibat dosoe di deniyo tue si asele mat kemati nyem.
47007011	Pie tau beh, asel kesusah ati reng yeng ngaji dosoe di adap Allah: mat nyato nar di diret kamam. Kesusah kam yeng ngaji Sen kin asele kam mat ingín nar na' copat ngurus semuya'e, noe dipelebu dietat kam peh. Malah ken paie kam ngemoran na' ngenggewai pai-pai pun gei' sempayo kesalah kam dielon.* Kam mat ngiyalam. Kam gola'am ngaji ukum Allah. Kam rinuam ken aku gei' diret segelumo po selomoam. Kam besemangát beabis-beabisam ngenggewai po yeng disuroh le' Sen. Jolah ke' ukum yeng patut nyo' reng bedoso pun mat cum kekurang kemalang kam. Mat secum-cumam kekurang kemalang kam ngurus hal nyoe. Nyoe mat ngembokti ken dah tue si kam mat noe becelo lem hal nyoe. Kam mat dah bebeta' pikeram dah.
47007012	Jedi mátam, kamei. Des ku nulis surat nyoe nyomie tei' noe iyo ngat reng yeng besalah peh yeng ku kaji; ken noe iyo ngat reng yeng tebemet tam kesalah nyoe peh yeng ku kaji. Pie aku ngaji kamam. Kona' ati ku gei' kam mat jelas tawu ken isei' ati diret kamam, ken kam mat ca' besemangátam ngenggewai po yeng disuroh kami. Go gewai kam mat diperati le' Allah.*
47007013	Mangko dah kami ningo gesah Titus nyeh ken kam mat dah ngurus semuya'e si mat teiboram ati kami. Titus pun dah lapang lemposaiam atie ngaji semuya' kam. Mat ayah bikaham atie. Mangko betamah-tamah jum keayah bikah kami.
47007014	Go aku pun deri nyomie nan begesah ke' Titus ke' hal kesaksi keidup kam yeng panci nyeh; ku mat ayah beiyap bebungah ke' hal gewai panci kam. Lalu aku mat noe kererawoe, go kenyatoe mat do lem keidup kam. Jedi yeng ku madah ke' Timotius ke' hal kam kin poe mat-mátam. A, ponyoe jum, kamei; semuya' segelo yeng kami koloe madah ke' kam mie ke' hal agah panci opai pun mat-mátam.
47007015	Jedi mátam. Benso Titus nyeh kaseh iyo ken kam mat kin bosai-bosai des iyo ingát ken caro kam nerimoe iyo mie; na' kam ningo iyo, na' kam tuno' taalo'.
47007016	Mangko ati aku pun ayah bikaham tam kam mat tawu diarap, tawu dipecayo, poe.
47008001	Menyadie kami yeng seimán: kami na' madah ke' kam ke' hal pengunyo' pengaseh Allah yeng dah nyato di pada' gereja Sen di propinsi Makedonia nun.
47008002	Go sidoe si mat ngerudu kesusah kesensare yeng ugas ngatam, pie keayah bikah sidoe nan belobeh-lobeh nyem. Sidoe mat bensat meretatam. Pie numo' pun ponyoe asele lem keidup sidoe si sidoe tungang soh na' nulong betore nyem sebulat ati.
47008003	Sidoe ngunyo' seukor kemampu yeng do; malah ken paie yeng diunyo'e mat lobeh deri kemampue; nyoe mat-mátam, kamei. Nyoe pun tam kemawo' direte nyem;
47008004	sidoe teger muhún mampalam na' ngerubut nulong pada' engku Allah di Yudea. Sidoe ngangape mat berekat dolat begi sidoe die mun sidoe nulong betor.
47008005	Pai tel agei' sumang sidoe jewoh lobeh deri yeng diarap kami. Kaji kami si sidoe na' ngunyo' jolu nyem, pie sidoe dolu nyerah bedan beko direteam ke' Tuwowe, dah nyoe sidoe nyerah direte nyo' nulong kami jum. Nyoe pun tam kona' kemawo' Allaham. Mat lobeh deri yeng diarap kami.
47008006	Jedi mátam. Dah kami merati ati reng Makedonia yeng buwar ponyoe mangko kami beposan ke' Titus gei' iyo ngulang kam di Korintus tue, nyo' iyo nyanto' sumang pengunyo' pengaseh deri kam jum. Go ketongaie mie pun iyoam jum yeng ngumpole.
47008007	Kam si go nan cum kekurang kemalang kam; demo ke' kepecayo kam, demo ke' pengentawu kam, demo ke' kepanai kam nyo' madah posan payit Sen, demo ke' keingín kam na' ngenggewai gewai yeng panci, a, demo ke' kaseh kam ken kami pun; di jolah nyoe mat cum kekurang kemalang kam, nan belobeh-lobeh nyem. Jedi kiroe sumang pengunyo' pengaseh nyo' nulong engku Allah di Yudea pun mat belobeh-lobeh jum deri kam, cum kekurang kemalange.
47008008	Nyoe pun noe go ku na' merentah kam peh, kamei. Pie go ku dah merati keingín sidoe layin nyo' nulong betore nyeh mangko kaji ku tue kelorong nyo' kam jum kei ngembokti ken kaseh kam mat kaseh yeng mat, noe iyo ngat kaseh di mulut nyem peh.
47008009	Go kam kin tawu ke' hal pengunyo' pengaseh Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret. Go numo' pun iyo paling kayo rayo pie tam iyo kaseh ken diret nyeh iyo mat menjedi bensat meretat. A, iyo menjedi bensat meretat pun maksute gei' diret die yeng menjedi kayo rayo.
47008010	Jedi tue pendapat aku, yeng engo ku paling panci begi kam ke' hal sumang nyo' reng di Yudea nyeh. Go tawun di belekang tue kin mat kamam yeng ngulu betor ngumpol sumang nyeh, beyi' jolah ke' keingín beyi' jolah ke' ngelajue pun. Mangko jie ku tue mat ca' dipelaju ca' disanto'am.
47008011	Jedi maksute na' po kam besemangát nongaie mie ponyoe jum kam ca' besemangát nyanto'e. Dipelajuam seukor kemampu kam.
47008012	Go mun ati diret relo ngunyo' seukor kemampu diret si ati Sen pun ayaham. Sen noe minta' ke' diret kei diret ngunyo' lobeh deri takar kemampu diret, (pie mat ca' ngunyo' seukor kemampu diret).
47008013	Maksut aku ngendorong kam potue pun noe go na' nyaki' diret kei ngenyamán betor peh, pie gei' sempayo samo seimangam.
47008014	Go ketiko tue kin kam mat bekemewah, kei kam nyukup kekurang sidoe. A, dah nyoe gola' sidoe yeng belelobeh gi nyoe maksute nyo' nyukup kekurang kam die gola' pai nawue pagi lusoe do kekurang kemalang kam. Maksute kin diret tulong menulong gei' seimangam.
47008015	Kin jie lem Kitap Sen mie yeng bungie potue, Reng yeng ngumpol benya' pun pie cum kelobehe; ken reng yeng ngumpol sikit pie cum kekurange, jie Sen. (Keluar 16:18)
47008016	Jedi ku pun besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Allah, go mat Sénam yeng nyuroh ati Titus samo serukui ken ati kami yeng ingín na' nulong kam.
47008017	Go iyo mat na'e disuroh kami manu ke' kam; sa' beh disuroh, bolum disuroh pun poe mat do dah kona' kemawo' direteam; iyo mat ingín nar na' manu ke' kam.
47008018	A, to' kaban iyo kami ngutus jum menyadie diret yeng seimán yeng dihormát di semuya' gereja Sen, go iyo nan melayan madah agah panci.
47008019	Malah ken paie iyo mat dah dipileh le' pada' gereja nyo' namah ngaban kami kei ngantar sumang pengunyo' pengaseh ke' Yudea gi. A, gewai kami melayan ponyoe pun gei' sempayo Tuwowe diret mat diagong; a, ge'em gei' sempayo nyato ken kami mat ingín nar na' nulong pada' betor.
47008020	Kami ngenggewaie pun teliti jerumát nar, gei' cum reng yeng nyalah kami ke' hal sumang bosai tue yeng langko' dibeyie kami kinun.
47008021	Maksut kami na' ngenggewaie caro bujor benar, beyi' di adap Tuwowe beyi' di adap mensiyo pun.
47008022	A, jedi ento' kaban Titus sidoe yeng langko' manu ke' kam tue nyeh kami ngutus jum menyadie diret yeng seimán agei'am. Iyo pun dah koloe diuji; kenyatoe iyo mat ingín nar nulong betor koti-ti pun. Sa'am lem hal tue; mat kepala' ayaham iyo ngaji na' nulong kam, go iyo mat yakinam ke' hal kam.
47008023	A, jedi ke' hal Titus si go kam pun dah tekenal ken iyo. Iyo mat kaban gelumo ku, yeng serentak seroto bekerejo ken aku nyo' nulong kam. A, ke' hal menyadie diret seimán yeng namahe si ponyoe jum, go sidoe mat pelantar posan pada' gereja; gewai ulah sidoe mat ngagong ngehormát Kristusam.
47008024	Mangko sidoe ca' diterimoe panciam beh, gei' sempayo kaseh kam mat nyato ke' pada' gereja layin pun. Nyoe kin nyo' ngembokti ken pemadah aku ke' hal kam nyeh mat-mátam, go aku kin nan beiyap bebungah ke' hal kam dinai-nai pun.
47009001	Kenaken si ku noe sa' nulis ke' kam ke' hal ca' nulong engku Allah.
47009002	Go aku pun tawu ken kam dah siyap dah, relo na' nulong. Ku dah beiyap bebungah ke' hal kam ke' sidoe di Makedonia nun, madah ken kam di peloya' Akaya tue dah siyap dah na' nulong deri tawun di belekang mie pun. Sampai keingín kam na' nulong nyeh mat ngenggora' keingín pada' sidoe jum.
47009003	Ja'e tue ku ngutus menyadie diret yeng seimán nyo' manu ke' kam ditue gei' kam siyap ken pada' sumang kam, go aku kin dah do madah ke' pada' sidoe ken kam mat dah siyap dah. Nang na' sampai omóng ku beiyap bebungah ponyoe kejedie omóng berakah nyem.
47009004	Go kaji ku nun mun do sidoe Makedonia yeng namah aku des ku manu ke' kam gi gola' kam kejulong; pengabise sekurang aku selampar kam pun kererawoe jum kejedie; maksute kin ku arap gila' ke' hal kam, mun kam gei' bolum siyap ponyoe.
47009005	Mangko kaji ku ku ca' minta' gei' menyadie diret yeng seimán nyeh do yeng dolu deri aku nyo' manu ke' kam, nyo' sidoe ngurus pada' sumang yeng dah dijenyi kam nyomie, gei' sempayo mat siyap dah, dah ku detang kitue gi. Go kona' ati ku gei' sempayo mat nyato ken kam ngunyo' pun ken kerelo ati kam, noe go ketegal tam ditoran dikosar reng peh.
47009006	A, diret ca' ingát ken jie perbeso nyeh, Reng yeng ngamur sikit, sikit jum yeng digotame, pie reng yeng ngamur benya', benya' jum yeng digotame .
47009007	Lalu tiyap diret ca' masing-masing mutuse lem ati direteam ken beropai yeng langko' diunyo'. Nang na' teraso borat. Nang na' teraso dipakso, go Allah mat kaseham ken reng yeng ngunyo' ken ati yeng ringán yeng ayah bikaham.
47009008	-
47009009	Go Allah kin tawu Sen ngemberekat diret ken semuya' pengunyo' pengaseh Sen yeng bemacam bejenis pun. Pengunyo' pengaseh Sen nan serarat cukup nyo' semuya' segelo keperelu diret. Go kin dah ditulis di lem Kitap Sen yeng bungie potue, Sen mat buwar ngunyo' jolu ke' reng miskin; Sen nan murah ati seora'-ora'eam, jie. (Masmur 112:9) Tuju maksut Sen buwar ken murah ati ken diret kin gei' diret nan belobeh-lobeh, gei' sempayo diret mampu jum ngenggewai gewai yeng panci yeng bemacam bejenis pun lem keidup diret.
47009010	Jedi mátam te'. Mat Sénam yeng ngunyo' boneh ke' reng nyo' ditanám, ken mat Sénam yeng nyurohe idup menjedi jolu yeng disego. Mangko Sen mat langko' ngunyo' ke' kam boneh jum, ya'am kemampu nyo' kam nulong betor. Malah ken paie mat disuroh Sen nan mansang ke' belelobeh, sampai asel kemurah ati kam nyeh mat belimpah-limpah, keedah umo yeng berinas.
47009011	Kam mat diunyo' Sen reto beno yeng bemacam bejenisam gei' sempayo kam mampu sebuwar ati serarat nulong betor lem sipat pai-pai pun. A, lalu dah kami ngembegi pada' sumang kam ke' betor nyeh asele ya'am sidoe mat besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Allaham.
47009012	Jedi gewai kam nulong betor potue nyeh mat bemacam bereno asele; yeng pertamoe nyo' nyukup keperelu engku Allah; a, yeng keduwoe mat benya' reng yeng besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Allah tam pengunyo' nyoe. Jedi maksute mat belimpah-limpaham asel kam nulong betor potue.
47009013	A, gewai kam nulong betor potue kin kelorong nyo' kam ngembokti ke' hal kepecayo kam ge'em. Allah pun mat diagong le' kam, go kam mat tuno' taalo' ke' Sen, po yeng patut begi reng yeng dah madah ken iyo pecayo ken agah panci Kristus. A, Sen mat diagong jum tam kam sebulat ati nan ngaji na' nulong betor nyem, beyi' sidoe di Yudea beyi' pada' reng layin pun.
47009014	A, ken sidoe yeng ditulong kam pun langko' nan bedoa minta' tulong Sen nyo' kam jum. Sidoe mat rinue ngaji kam, tam pengunyo' pengaseh Allah yeng nan belobeh-lobeh yeng nyato di ati kam. Mat paling benya' asel yeng panci mun diret nulong betor, poe.
47009015	Diret mat besukor ke' Allah tam pengunyo' pengaseh Sen yeng betumpah ruwah; mat noe tawu nyebute kaliam keabis pengudah kato.
47010001	Jedi tue aku, Paulus, do yeng na' ku muhún mampalam ke' kam. Jie reng si aku gola' ku negur reng caro besemuko. Ca' lem surat ku des bejenjewoh ken urang berue ku bereni negur reng, jie sidoe. Pie ti beh, di lem surat ku tue ku mat serenah atiam, lomah lemutam na' po Kristusam.
47010002	Jedi yeng ku muhún mampalam ke' kam si ya'am gei' kam nang na' ningo pada' guru tiru yeng mempulah aku. Go mun kam ningo sidoe kin aku mat ca' tegas memperingát kam des betomu muko ken kam gi. Ku kin ngei' ku ponyoe ken kam. Kona' ati ku na' renah ati, na' lomah lemut nyem ken kam. Ken sidoe yeng salah kengkajie hal kami si ku mat langko' tegasam negure, caro besemuko pun dah ku detang gi. Go sidoe poe ngitong kuwaso kami kuwaso deri deniyo tue nyem. Pie noe.
47010003	Go numo' pun kami diyam di deniyo tue, pie caro kami beperang betempor si noe iyo caro deniyo tue peh.
47010004	Alat perang kami noe iyo alat perang deri deniyo tue peh. Kami dikuwaso le' diret Allaham, nyo' kami ngerusa' ngeruma' pagar benong munsoh yeng togap kukoh pun.
47010005	Maksut pagar benong munsoh tei' ya'am pada' kengkaji mensiyo yeng bebungkong di ati direte nyem, a, ken ati pemiker mensiyo yeng kememuwa' yeng ngei'e tekenal ken Allah. Pie kengkaji pemiker mensiyo yeng somong bongko' nyeh mat dikalah kami ken kuwaso Allah. Kami makai kuwaso Allaham nyo' nyuroh sampai pelowai penuju ken kona' keingín ati mensiyo mat ca' tuno' taalo' ke' Kristusam.
47010006	Jedi kiroe semuya' kam mat sebulat ati tuno' taalo' ke' Sen. Go aku mat dah siyap dah kei ngenggewai ukum yeng setimpal ke' sopai pun yeng ngei'e tuno' taalo' dah ku detang gi. *
47010007	Pantauam, kamei, yeng dah maloe di adap kam. Go jie sidoe si ngat sidoam yeng pelayan Kristus*. Nyeh maksut sidoe kami koti? Noe iyo pelayan Kristus jum peh? Pie sidoe ca' ngaji yeng mat,
47010008	go kami mat dikuwaso le' Tuwowe diret. Mun ku na' beiyap bebungah ke' hal nyoe pun ku mat noe kererawoe peh. Kuwaso nyoe pun diunyo' Sen ke' kami nyo' kami nogap ngemberansang kam, noe iyo nyo' ngerusa' kam peh.
47010009	Pie maksut aku noe go na' ngenggola' kam peh ken pada' surat ku.
47010010	Go jie sidoe aku nulis surat si panai, tegasam, alap ca' bekuwaso, pie dah betomu muko si muko rerayi ku mat lomah, jie sidoe; ge'em pengajar ku noe bereti, jie; mat dihina le' sidoe.
47010011	Pie nyamán sidoe ngajie, koti po lem surat ku des bejenjewoh, ponyoe jum des ku betomu muko pun.
47010012	(Sidoe mat tingie nar pangkate deri kami, poe). Kami si noe bereni kami ngangap diret kami samo derajat ken sidoe yeng gela' meningie direte. Ento' ngendecing gewai sidoe si gewai direteam! Sidoe pado sidoam yeng ngendecing gewai pai yeng panci, ken gewai pai yeng jat. Sidoe mat keribanam.
47010013	Pie kami si ngei' kami beiyap bebungah tam gewai kami, cuwali didecing pakai decing yeng mat yeng bujor benar. Ento' ngendecing gewai kami si mat kona' kemawo' Allaham. A, benso des kami manu ke' arong kam mie, nyoe pun mat kona' kemawo' Allaham, kamei.
47010014	Kami noe ngelampau kona' kemawo' Sen peh, des kami nempoh sampai ke' daerah kam mie pun. Mat Sénam yeng nyuroh kami sampai kitue, mangko mat kamiam yeng pertamo detang kitue*, to' madah agah panci Kristus ke' kam mie.
47010015	Maksute mat patutam kami beiyap bebungah ke' hal kam, go kam pecayo pun mat asel gewai kami, yeng cuco' ken kona' kemawo' Allah; noe iyo asel gewai urang peh. A, arap kami pun ya'am semingkin togap kukoh kepecayo kam semingkin luwah kelorong nyo' kami melayan di daerah kam, cuco' jum ken kona' kemawo' Sen.
47010016	Maksut kami gei' na' madah agah panci di ujong kampong halamán kam jum, yeng bolum koloe ningo. Kami ngei' kami ngerobut gewai betor; na' po yeng di gewai le' sidoe. Go mun kami ngerobut gewai betor noe ken koti kami na' beiyap bebungah pun.
47010017	Ja'e go ke' hal beiyap bebungah nyeh kin jie lem kitap Sen, Mun na' beiyap bebungah coh ge' beiyap bebungah tam gewai Tuwowe, jie Sen. (Yeremia 9:24)
47010018	Jedi pai ge' gunoe mun reng mugi direte? Yeng penting si mun diret dipugi le' Tuwowe diret. Nyoam yeng ngembokti ken gewai diret mat konoam.
47011001	(Mun kami mugi diret kami kin maksute omóng keriban, dih?) Pie (nyuroh kami bungi tue pun go kami tepakso ngembokti ke' kam ken kami mat pelantar posan Allah yeng sah.) Kiroe kam etat nyem des kam ningo omóng ku tue lo'e, (biyar diangap omóng keriban pun).
47011002	Go yeng mat si ati aku tue nan ngaji kam nyem, kamei, nan rinue ken kam na' po ati diret Sénam. Mat diret kuam yeng nunáng kam, kei jodo Kristusam. Maksut ku gei' sempayo kam noe becelo dah ku nyerah kam ke' iyo des iyo detang gi.
47011003	Pie tue ku ngorie, ngeloh ku ngaji kam, gola' ati pemiker kam digudo, kamei, na' po Hawa dikelakar dikeliker le' kepanai ular mie, sampai kam noe seputeh ati sebeníng derah ngaseh Kristus, pai nawue.
47011004	Nyuroh ku ngorie si go bungie kam dah nampan nerimoe reng yeng pengajare layin deri yeng dah dipecayo kam mie. Yeng diajare ke' hal Yesus nyeh mat layin deri yeng dipadah le' kami mie, pie na' kam ningoe; a, agah yeng dipadah sidoe mat layin deri yeng dah dipecayo kam nyomie, pie na' kam pecayoe; a, ken roh pun mat layin deri Roh yeng dah diterimoe kam mie, pie sungoh pun ponyoe tarah ke' ayaham kam nampan nerimoam reng yeng pengajare tokoh nyoe.
47011005	(Tekonoe ke' aku si dah sorot kam dah nampan nerimoe aku.) Menurute si ca' akuam yeng didingo diterimoe kam, go aku mat noe ketingal ken pada' pelantar posan yeng ngangap direte ugas ugaram.
47011006	Numo' pun aku bepaner noe pakai pantun perbeso (licing po boman alus po dema') na' po sidoe si, pie jolah ke' pengentawu si aku mat jelas tawu pengajar ke' hal Allah. Kam kin dah jelas ke' hal kami, go kami nan serarat ngajar semuya' segelo ke' hal Sen caro teliti nar. Pie dah tue si kam dah na' nerimoe pengajar yeng layin. Nyoam yeng nyuroh ku ngorie nar.
47011007	A, ke' hal aku noe nerimoe penulong deri kam mie ponyoe jum. Des aku madah agah panci Allah ke' kam mie aku mat noe minta' diupah kam. Nyeh tam nyoe peh engoe go kam dah noe ngehormát aku?* Pie yeng mat si aku ngerenah diret ku ponyoe gei' sempayo kam die untong tuwah. Nyeh nyoe salah peh engo kam?
47011008	Des ku melayan di arong kam kin aku mat diongkos ditulong le' pada' gereja layin die, seolah-olah ku merereh jolu sidoe nyo' ku nulong kam.
47011009	Des ku nongah bekekurang mie pun mat cumam ku ngembeban siko' pun deri kam. Go mat menyadie yeng seimán yeng detang deri Makedonia die yeng nampong keperelu ku ketiko nyoe mie. Kona' ati ku deri asal nyomie sampai nun gi pun ku mat ngenjego diret ku gei' aku mat noe ngembeban kam sikit pun.
47011010	Pengaso ku si mat patutam aku tetap ngeresudu' madah agah panci di seruroh peloya' Akaya tue ken secaro kerelo ati nyem; cumam ku ngembeban sopai pun, noe ngarap diupah reng pun. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei, na' po yeng dipadah le' Kristus mie pun nan mat-mátam.
47011011	Nyeh tam ku noe kaseh ken kam peh, engoe, go aku noe ngembeban kam? Pie Allah si jelas tawu Sen ken ku mat kaseh nar ken kam.
47011012	Do sidoe pelantar posan yeng ugas ugar nyeh si gela' berakah go jie sidoe gewai sidoe samoam ken gewai kami. (Teruhal sidoe kin nan ca' diupah; sedang aku noe koloe diupah.) Aku pun langko' ngeresudu' nyem na' po selomoam. Ku melayan secaro kerelo ati nyem, noe diupah diongkos kam. Maksut aku gei' sempayo noe kei modal sidoe yeng berakah madah direte samo ken aku.
47011013	Aku si ngei' ku dipadah samo ken sidoe. Sidoe nyeh mat pelantar posan tiru, kamei, noe iyo deri Allah peh. Sidoe melayan pun nyo' ngelakar ngeliker nipu ngendeyo kam nyem. Sidoe panai nyangkor nyerupo tingkah laku pelantar posan Kristus, pie yeng mat si sidoe pelantar posan tiru nyem.
47011014	Ja'e nyoe pun diret noe kangáp agei' ngajie, go semalang ke' Pengelakar pun nan nyangkor melekat yeng nyacas cayoe,
47011015	sa'am go pada' pesurohe. Diret mat noe kangáp ngajie ken sidoe pun tawu jum nyerupo po pesuroh Allah yeng bujor benar jum. Pie pengabise sidoe langko' diukum setimpal ken gewaie.
47011016	Jedi ku ngulange agei'am, kamei; nang na' reng ngangap aku berakah tokoh reng keriban tam aku tepakso beiyap bebungah potue. Ja'e gola' pai nawue kam dah ngangap ku reng keriban si ma'am, kei kam ningo omóng aku na' po kam gela' ningo pada' guru tiru yeng mat keribanam. Jedi tue ku beiyap bebungah sikit ke' hal diret ku, na' po sidoe.
47011017	Pie omóng ku beiyap bebungah potue mat omóng reng keriban nyem, noe nunoe contoh omóng tutor Tuwowe diret mie peh, kamei.
47011018	Sidoe benya' nyeh mat gela' beiyap bebungah ke' hal direte na' po reng di deniyo tue. Mun ponyoe si ma'am, aku pun na' beiyap bebungah jum, gola' kam na' ningo aku jum, na' po kam nan ningo sidoe.
47011019	Lem penilai kam si kam mat panai nar, poe, go kam mat ayah ningo omóng reng keriban pun.
47011020	Kam ngetate nyem des kam dipeulun reng keriban pun, sampai kam diperusa' diperenohe pun, sampai jolu kam dirobut reng pun*, sampai reng meningie direte to' menjedi tuwowe kam pun, a, sampai kam dihina ditampar reng pun. Pie kam mat tamá' nar, na' dipulah le' pada' guru kam tokoh nyoe pun, poe.
47011021	Jie sidoe si kami lomaham, cum kemampu kami; nyoe si mátam, kamei, mun dibening ken gewai sidoe yeng bereni nar tokoh nyoe si kami mat lomaham. Nyoe ku angkue ku, kamei, gola' kam na' menghina kelomah ku pun. Pie mun sidoe bereni beiyap bebungah si aku pun bereniam jum. Pie ingát beh kam, tue manseh omóng reng keribanam.
47011022	O, jie sidoe, sidoe reng Ibrani, keturun reng Israel, buboh ampeh Abraham, jie. Pie aku pun ponyoe jum.
47011023	A, sidoe madah direte pelayan Kristus. Pie jolah ke' pelayan Kristus pun aku mat kepala'eam. Tue mat minta' maáp, beh, omóng ku mat ngerebicauam, bungi reng giloam, kamei, beiyap bebungah tokoh tue. Pie mátam. Jolah ke' melayan Sen si akuam yeng mat belelah bejoreh bekoyo bekerejo melayan Sen. Ku erat dipenjero. Ku erat dipelesah dikebelo yeng ngat ugasam. Ku mat eratam nyoma' na' mati.
47011024	Limo kali ku dipelesah le' reng Yahudi; tiyap kali dipelesah nyeh sampai tigo puloh semilan bekal.
47011025	Tigo kali ku dipangkong le' reng Roma ken tungkat. Sekali ku ditikam reng ken betu, go reng na' munoh aku. Tigo kali ku karam des ku numpang kapal layar di lawut. Yeng sekali nyeh sampai seari semalam ku bererapong di tongah lawut berue detang ke' derat.
47011026	Ku erat bejelan ke' jewoh; nan noe antang. Erat ku ngerudu behayo di jelan, pai noe behayo tam ayie pasang, pai noe behayo tam perampok, pai noe behayo beyi' deri piya' suku benso diret ku reng Yahudi beyi' deri piya' reng noe Yahudi pun. Ku koloe behayo di kota, koloe jum behayo di padang puwang; ku koloe behayo di lawut, a, ken koloe jum behayo tam konoe sangkor reng yeng memuloe nyerupo menyadie yeng seimán.
47011027	Ku mat bekaseh betoleh belelah bejoreh bekoyo bekerejo. Ku erat sampai noe tidor. Eratam ku ngerudu lapar, cum ayie insup, ken cum jolu kei sego. A, koloe ku ngerudu bececolap tuboh, ken koloe ku sampai cum bepekakas.*
47011028	Dah lah pada' kesusah kesensare secaro tuboh, kamei, timal agei' kesusah kegedoh ku ngaji pada' umát di pada' gereja nyeh; nyoe mat ngembeban ati ku jum milang ari.
47011029	Go des betor ngerudu lomah, aku pun teraso lomah jum. A, des betor digudo nyeh ati ku pun ngiyalam ngajie. Mat benya' nar kesusah kesensare ku yeng ngembokti ken aku mat tungang soh melayan Sen.
47011030	Mat ngeloh ku beiyap bebungah potue, kamei. Pie mun aku tepakso ca' beiyap bebungah nyeh to' ku nyamut pada' pempulah munsoh ku si coh ku beiyap bebungah ke' hal kesusah kesensare yeng koloe ku rudu, gei' kam jelas tawu ken aku mat mensiyo biyaso nyem yeng lomah yeng cum kemampu.
47011031	Allah, Apa' Yesus Tuwowe diret, yeng patut dipugi seora'-ora'eam nyeh mat tawu Sen ken aku mat noe memuloe kam. Mat-mátam, kamei; ku mat ngei' ku beiyap bebungah pun, cuwali ja' yeng ngembokti ke' hal kekurang kemampu ku. A, benso yeng ku rudu di Damsik mie.
47011032	Jedi di kota Damsik mie gubernor yeng ngewakel Rajo Aretas nyeh mat nyuroh serededue betungu bejego di pada' pintu gerbang kota, araue na' nangkap aku gola' aku pamus deri nyoe.
47011033	Pie aku ditulong le' betor, diturun deri jendela di pagar kota die, diulor sidoe makai keranyang.* Ponyoam ku mampu lopas deri gongam gubernor. Jedi ku coh ge' beiyap bebungah ke' hal kelomah ku tokoh nyoe, kamei.
47012001	Sebenare mat cum gunoe ku beiyap bebungah ke' hal diret ku, kamei. Ja'e tam kam nan na' ningo sidoe yeng beiyap bebungah ke' hal pemantaue ken sensoname si, mangko aku pun tepakso jum, beiyap bebungah ke' hal yeng tejedi ke' aku lem pemantau ken sensonam ku deri Tuwowe mie gei' kam mat jelas ken aku pelantar posan Sen yeng sah.
47012002	Yeng ku tawu si do reng pecayo yeng biyaso nyem, yeng temosie dibeyie diangki' ke' serugo yeng tingie nun. Nyoe tejedi empat belas tawun di belekang mie, kamei. Pie ku noe tawu ku, reng yeng kinun nyeh dibeyie secaro tubohei, atau ke' ngat secaro roh nyemei yeng kinun. Ngat Allaham yeng tawu ke' hal nyoe.
47012003	Pie sungoh pun ponyoe ku mat yakin ken urange temosie dibeyie diangki' ke' kediyam Allah yeng rajo panci; pie tah, ku noe tawu ku dibeyie secaro tubohei, atau ke' ngat roh nyemei. Pie yeng jelas si Allah mat tawu Sen.
47012004	Jedi nongah urange do dinun iyo do ningo jolu yeng noe tawu dijelas lem paner mensiyo; ge'em mat didah le' Sen na' madahe pun. Mat paling enah.
47012005	A, mun aku na' beiyap bebungah ke' hal tokoh nyoe si patutam dih? Engo ku borie kam. Pie aku mat ngei' ku beiyap bebungah ke' hal diret ku, kamei, cuwali ke' hal pada' kekurang kemampu ku.
47012006	Kira' umpamoe ku na' beiyap bebungah ke' hal keenah yeng Sen nganyoe ke' aku nyeh nyoe pun noe iyo omóng keriban, noe iyo omóng berakah peh. Nyoe mat omóng yeng mat-mátam, kamei. Pie ku mat ngei' ku beiyap bebungah ke' hal nyoe, gola' aku dianyo'-anyo' tam sensonam ku nyoe. Kona' ati ku mun ku dihormát dipugi reng coh tam keidup ku seari-ari yeng tuno' taalo' ke' Allah.
47012007	Jedi mátam. Pada' keenah keaneh yeng Sen nganyoe ke' aku mat benya' nar. Mangko gei' sempayo aku noe kememuwa' nyeh Sen pun ngijin pesuroh* deri Pengelakar gei' nan mempungah aku, keedah durie lem degin ku. Pie nyoe pun pengunyo' pengaseh Sen ke' aku, kamei, gei' aku noe kememuwa'.
47012008	Tigo kali ku muhún mampal ke' Tuwowe ke' hal tue, minta' gei' pesuroh deri Pengelakar nyeh ditunong deri aku.
47012009	Pie jie Sen, "Noe, Ku noe nunonge peh; pie go pengunyo' pengaseh Aku mat cukupam nyo' kau. Kebosai Aku gei' kau jelas ken cum kuwaso diret kau: ja'e go kuwaso Aku si mat cum kekurang kemalange," jie Sen. Mangko ku ngei' ku dah minta' gei' aku dipelopas Sen deri kekurang kemampu ku tue; pie aku malah ken paie ayah bikah beiyap bebungaham ke' hal kekurang kemampu ku tue, go dinai aku cum kemampu dinyoam mat nyato nar ken kuwaso Kristus.
47012010	Go aku ngaji ngenáng Kristus nyem, mangko aku tenáng amánam beyi' pun des ku cum kemampu ku, beyi' pun des aku disumpah dipisoh reng, beyi' pun des aku susah sontok, beyi' pun des ku diiro dikenyayo reng, beyi' pun des ku ngerudu kesusah kesensare, pie aku mat tenáng amánam, go dinai cum kemampu aku dinyoam aku mat bekuwaso.
47012011	Tau beh, mat na' po reng berakaham aku tue to' beiyap bebungah ke' hal diret ku. Pie tam diret kamam. Kira' kam noe berubah, kira' kam renán seiyo sekato ken aku si kam die yeng beiyap bebungah ke' hal aku! Noe sa' aku yeng beiyap bebungah potue gei' kam jelas ken aku mat pelantar posan Sen. Yeng mat si aku tawu ken aku mat noe beguno, kamei. Pie numo' pun ponyoe aku sikit pun noe kalah tam pada' pelantar posan yeng ngangap direte ugas ugaram, beyi' jolah pangkat beyi' jolah kuwaso pun.
47012012	Yeng mat si yeng nan digewai kami kei ngembokti ken kami mat pelantar posan Allah si, daham digewai le' kami di antaro kam mie. Allaham yeng nguwaso kami nyo' kami ngenggewai gewai yeng agong yeng kuwaso, ken keenah keaneh yeng nyuroh mensiyo kagumam, nyo' petanah petano kuwaso Sen. Mat mutuam kami ngembokti ken kami mat pelantar posan Sen, pie sungoh pun ponyoe poe kam mat noe ngangap kami pelantar posan.
47012013	Teruhal gewai aku di antaro kam des aku do ken kam nyeh mat samoam ken gewai aku di pada' gereja layin, mat cum kekurang kemalange. Cuwali to' ati kam go aku noe ngembeban kam ke' hal ongkos kami mie. (A, mun gewai aku yeng menurute to' keuntong kam pie diangap kam salah si) minta' maáp beh?
47012014	Jedi mátam. Tue pun aku mat siyap dah na' ngulang kam; dah tigo kali ken tue ku manu ke' kam, dih? Pie po nyomie po terip tue pun, aku langko' noe ngembeban kam. Go yeng ku keingín noe iyo jolu kam peh, pie mat diret kamam, ana' kekaseh kuei. Go kin mat reng tuwo yeng ngelileh reto beno ke' ana'e; noe iyo ana'e yeng ngelileh reto beno ke' reng tuwo nyeh.
47012015	Mangko ku mat ayah bikah tungang soh nyerah semuya' jolu ku nyo' kam, sekurang deri reto beno ku, bedan beko ku pun ku serah nyo' kam. Pie mat enah nar; poe semingkin bosai kaseh aku ken kam nyeh semingkin kurang kaseh kam ken aku.
47012016	Pie numo' pun tokoh nyoe yeng jelas si go aku noe ku ngembeban kam peh. O, jie reng, mat die iyo noe minta' upah kam, jie, pie iyo mat panai, seolah-olah ngenjorat kam, ngelakar ngeliker kam nyo' buleh jolu kam, jie sidoe.
47012017	Pie koti? Benso ke' hal reng yeng diutus aku kei ngulang kam nyomie; siko' pun cum, soe, sidoe yeng ngamie untong deri kam nyo' aku.
47012018	A, tue ku minta' agei' ke' Titus gei' iyo manu ke' kam, ken ku ngutus jum menyadie diret yeng seimán (nyo' ngumpol sumang deri kam). Kam kin begelumo mansa' ken Titus; noe ken kaji kam Titus na' ngelakar ngeliker kam, engo ku. Ponyoe jum aku. Kami Titus kin seati sepikeram; mat sebulat atiam mementing kamam; gewai ulah kami mat serayu serukuiam. Noe kami ngelakar ngeliker kam peh.
47012019	A, pai nawue kaji kam melamat tue pada' omóng ku bungi tue nyo' ku ngembenar diret ku di adap kam. Pie noe; go Allaham yeng mutus gewai konoe ken salah; noe iyo kam peh. Pie diret kin tekawum lem Kristus; a, tuju ku nulis ke' kam potue pun gei' sempayo kam mat togap kukoh, pada' kaban kekaseh kuei, noe go kami ngembenar diret kami peh.
47012020	Ku ngorie, kamei, gola' dah ku manu ke' kam gi do gewai kam yeng noe na' po yeng dikeingín le' aku; a, ken do jum gewai aku yeng noe dikeingín le' kam. Ku ngorie gola' gewai kam gei' do yeng betengkar betingkis, gei' do yeng isin dengki, gei' do yeng bongis, a, gei' do yeng ngaji kepenting direte nyem. Gola' gei' do omóng tutor reng yeng jat yeng mempulah betor, gola' do reng yeng maner yeng ngomel betor, gola' do reng yeng somong bongko'; a, gola' do kekacau kebilau lem gereja kam.
47012021	Ku ngorie dah ku manu ke' kam nyeh aku mat kererawoe di adap Allah ku tam gewai kam. Ku ngorie jum dah ku betomu ken kam ku cagar susah sontokam tam benya' reng yeng bedoso deri nyomie pie ngei'e bebeta' piker ke' hal gewaie yeng paling jat nyeh, yeng ngeroyal yeng delu gila', yeng serarat nan nunoe keingín direte yeng jat nyem. Jangán tokoh nyoam dah ku manu ke' kam terip tue gi, kamei!
47013001	Jedi mátam. Dah tigo kali ken tue gi ku na' ngulang kam, dih? Mun na' ngembokti kesalah reng si mat ca' do duwo tigo ko' nyo' saksi.* Sedang tue kin dah tigo kali ken tue ku negur kam.
47013002	Terip ku ngulang kam keduwo kali mie kin dah do dah ku bepadah ke' kam; sekurang sidoe yeng bedoso nyeh, sampai ke' pada' kam yeng layin pun ge'em, dah dipadah le' aku ke' hal tue. A, jedi nongah ku gei' bepencar ken kam tue pun ku ngulang agei'am pemadah ku ketiko ku do ken kam nyomie; ya'am aku langko' ngenggewai po yeng setimpalam ken gewai semuya' sidoe yeng bedoso nyeh. Cum yeng dikelawong ku dah ku detang gi.
47013003	Kam si nan ngogoe bokti ken aku mat pelantar posan Kristus. Ma'am, dah ku detang kitue, dah nyoe kam pun langko' jelasam ken Kristus mat ngomóng ngelalu aku. Go Kristus si noe iyo lomah peh na' bekoyo bekerejo di antaro kam pun; mat bekuwasoam.
47013004	Mat die iyo menjedi lomah mie sampai disalip reng pun; pie tue si iyo dah idup agei'am dah tam kuwaso Allah. A, kami pun ponyoe jum. Kami mat lomaham nan ngerudu kesusah kesensare, nan dihina reng na' po iyoam. Pie sungoh pun ponyoe gewai kami di antaro kam mat bekuwasoam, go kami pun mat idup tekawum lem Kristus tam kuwaso Allah.
47013005	Nyeh noe tawu peh kam ken Yesus Kristus ngendiyam ati kam? Cuwali ja' kam noe pecayo, pie. Kam ca' teliti ngajie, mereso ati diret kamam: mat pecayoei noei? Diret kamam yeng ca' ngemboktie. Pie kam si engo ku pasti do nomu bokti kepecayo kam.
47013006	A, mudah-mudahan kam jelas jum ke' hal kami, go bokti kami mat dikuwaso le' Kristus nyo' pelantar posane mat do jum.
47013007	Ja'e kira'e si kami noe sa' ngembokti kuwaso nyoe ke' kam dah kami detang terip tue gi. Go kami pun nan bedoa ke' Allah gei' sempayo gewai kam cum yeng salah, mangko kami pun noe sa' makai kuwaso kami nyo' negur kam. Go kebosai ati kami noe go na' ngembokti kuwaso kami peh, kamei. Ma'am, biyar kami noe diangap reng pelantar posan Sen pun. Malah ken paie sukoram, sal ge' kam tetap ngenggewai gewai yeng panci.
47013008	Go mun gewai kam bujor benar si noe ken kami pelantar posan nentang ngelawane; go kami kin nan di piya' yeng bujor benar nyem.
47013009	Ku mat ngei' ku ngembokti kuwaso ku ke' kam lem hal tue, kamei. Coh ge' kam die yeng bekuwaso ngenggewai gewai yeng panci, lalu kami lomah lempungaiam ken kam. Ku mat ayah bikaham mun tokoh nyoe! Doa kami pun ya'am gei' sempayo kam mat mansang ke' togap, gei' cum kekurang kemalang kam.
47013010	Nyoam go ku nulis tokoh tue des ku jewoh ken kam gei' sempayo semuya' segeno mat diurus digewai le' diret kamam. Tuju maksut aku dah ku manu ke' kam si ku noe sa' tegas gila' makai kuwaso ku yeng diserah Tuwowe ke' aku. Sedang kuwaso nyoe mat nyo' ku nogap ngemberansang kam, noe iyo to' ngerusa' kam peh.
47013011	A, bula' dituam lo'e, pada' menyadie ku yeng seimánei. Gewai kam mat ca' dipepanci disempurnoam. Dingoam penasehat aku. Diret ca' seati sepiker. Jediam betengkar betingkis; ca' idup damai siko' ken betor. A, Allah bungkong kaseh ken damai pun langko' nan nyeroto kam.
47013012	Besalamam siko' ken betor ken kaseh yeng sebulat ati, beh?*
47013013	Semuya' engku Allah dinun pun ngirum salame jum ke' kam.
47013014	Ku minta' ke' Allah gei' pengunyo' pengaseh Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret ken kaseh Allah nan nyeroto kam; kiroe semuya' kam mat idup begelumo ken Roh Allah. Ngatam deri aku.
48001001	-
48001003	Salam damai ken berekat dolat deri Allah Apa' ken Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret ke' pada' umát gereja di Galatia, deri Paulus ken pada' menyadie seimán yeng do ken aku dinun. Aku Paulus mat pelantar posan Allah. Aku noe diwakel atau pun diutus le' mensiyo peh, pie aku diwakel ken diutus le' Kristus Yesus ken Allah Apa' yeng nyurohe bengki' idup agei' mie. A, ke' hal Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret kin
48001004	iyoam yeng nyerah direte nyo' ngapus doso diret, sempayo diret mat dipelopas deri kuwaso deniyo yeng gei' jemán tue mat jatam. Diret dipelopas ponyoe pun mat cuco' ken kemawo' Allah Apa' diret.
48001005	Kiroe Sen mat diagong seora'-ora'eam! Amin.
48001006	Aku si mat paling eran ngaji kam, menyadie ku yeng seimánei. Poe mat copat nar kam na' bebeli' deri Allah yeng ngunang ngamie kam ngelalu pengunyo' pengaseh Kristus. Pie poe pengunyo' pengaseh nyoe na' ditingal kam nyo' kam pecayo ken agah panci yeng layin die.
48001007	Pie yeng mat si yeng layin nyeh noe iyo agah panci peh! Ja'e poe mat do reng yeng na' ngubah agah panci ke' hal Kristus, mat ngacau ngaru kam sampai pengaji kam ngerebeyang.
48001008	Dingo beh kam. Biyar kami, biyar melekat deri serugo pun, pie mun iyo madah agah panci yeng layin deri yeng dah dipadah le' kami ke' kam mie, kiroe iyo disumpah diukum Allah seora'-ora'eam.
48001009	Tue kin daham kami madahe ke' kam, des kami do ken kam nyomie, pie tue ku ngulange agei'am: biyar sopai-sopai pun yeng madah agah panci pie layin deri yeng mat yeng dah diterimoe kam mie, kiroe iyo disumpah diukum le' Allah seora'-ora'eam!
48001010	Bungi omóng ku tokoh tue kin jelas ken aku noe ingín na' dipugi le' mensiyo peh. (Mun ku ingín na' dipugi le' mensiyo kin noe ken ku nyumpah reng yeng madah agah panci yeng layin.) Pie ku ngat ngaji kemawo' Allah nyem. Engo kam aku manseh na' moli ati mensiyo peh? Kira' aku na' moli ati mensiyo si maksute aku noe pelayan Kristus. Pie aku si mat pelayan Kristusam. Mangko kam mat ca' nekat ke' agah panci yeng dipadah ku ke' kam mie.
48001011	Menyadie ku yeng seimán: kam mat ca' jelas ken asal usol agah panci yeng dah ku padah ke' kam, go agah panci yeng ku padah nyeh noe iyo bebungkong ke' mensiyo peh.
48001012	Ku noe nerimoe agah panci tue deri mensiyo peh, noe iyo mensiyo yeng ngajar aku ke' hal tue, pie mat Yesus Kristusam yeng ngenyatoe ke' aku.
48001013	Jedi potue ne latar belekange. Kam pun dah ningo gesah tingkah laku aku ketiko ku gei' ngenjelan ukum agama Yahudi mie. Ketiko nyoe pada' umát gereja Allah kin disensare diiro dikenyayo le' aku. Paling kejam aku, mat cum itong ku kaseh. Kona' ati ku mat na' mempungah ngerusa' ngerenoh gereja Sen.
48001014	Mun dibening manseh akuam yeng paling patoh ken tuno' taalo' ke' ukum agama kami mie, deri kebenya' reng Yahudi yeng sepantar sebengan ken aku pun. Mat paling besemangát aku nunoe pada' perentah pelator ukum adat deri akei' puyang kami mie.
48001015	-
48001016	Jedi mátam. Gewai aku nyomie mat paling kejam nyensare pada' umát gereja Allah. Pie dah nyoe Allah mat ngenyato ke' aku ken Yesus mat Ana' Sen. Nyoe noe iyo pengajar deri mensiyo peh, pie mat diret Sénam yeng ngenyatoe ke' aku. Jedi potue ne kejedie. Sen mat ninting nujune sebolum aku diado mie pun ken aku langko' kei pelantar posan Sen. Dah nyoe Sen yeng ngunang ngamie aku ngelalu pengunyo' pengaseh Sen. Mat kemawo' diret Sénam go Sen yeng ngenyatoe ke' aku ken Yesus mat Ana' Allah, sempayo aku madah agah panci nyoe ke' reng noe Yahudi. Jedi mátam. Dah Sen ngenyatoe ke' aku pun aku mat noe minta' nasehat penjelas deri sopai pun.
48001017	Ku noam ke' Yerusalem nyo' ku betomu ken sidoe yeng menjedi pelantar posan dolu deri aku. Kebelike aku lintus ke' nenggeri Arab die, ke' arong sunyei' dinun.* A, dah nyoe lamat belamat ku bebeli' pulang ke' kota Damsik.
48001018	Dah nyoe lopas tigo tawun pelamate berue ku ke' Yerusalem nyo' ku betomu ken Petrus. Limo belas malamam ku diyam ken Petrus dinyoe.
48001019	Ketiko nyoe pun cumam ku betomu ken pada' pelantar posan yeng layin, cuwali Yakobus adei' Tuwowe diret.
48001020	Tue mat-mátam yeng ku nulis ke' kam, noe ku memuloe peh. Diret Allaham to' saksi pendukong ku.
48001021	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe dah belenyat ke' Yerusalem terip nyoe nyeh lalu aku mat ke' peloya' Siria ken Kilikia die.
48001022	Pada' gereja Kristus di Yudea ketiko nyoe gei' bolum tekenale ken aku, noe koloe betomu muko ken aku.
48001023	Sidoe ngat ningo gesah nyem ke' hal aku, ken aku yeng nyomie nyensare sidoe pie tue dah madah agah panci; hale agah panci yeng nyomie na' ku pempungah!
48001024	Sidoe pun mat mugi Allaham tam gewai Sen ken aku.
48002001	Jedi mátam te'. Dah nyoe mat empat belas tawun pelamate berue ku bebeli' agei' ke' Yerusalem. Jedi yeng namah aku terip nyoe Barnabas; a, ge'em ku meyie Titus jum.
48002002	Ku kinun pun go mat Allaham yeng ngenyatoe ke' aku ken aku mat ca' kinun. Detang kinun tei' mat bekumpolam pado pemimpin umát bangam, lalu ku begesah becerito ke' sidoe agah panci yeng selomo nan ku padah ke' reng noe Yahudi nyeh, gola' pai nawue sidoe noe setujue ken gewai aku, gola' kaji sidoe siyo-siyo nyem gewai aku deri asal mulo mie pun.
48002003	Pie sidoe pemimpin si kebelike setujue. Kenyatoe go Titus sungoh pun reng noe Yahudi pie iyo noe dipakso sidoe ca' disunát nunoe po jie ukum Musa.
48002004	Kenaken si do jum yeng bekumpol ken pada' umát ketiko nyoe yeng na' nokan makso Titus ca' disunát nyeh. Sidoe bekumpol ken pada' umát nyeh ca'-ca'e menyadie yeng seimán. Pie sidoe nyaro' betore yeng pecayo. Tuju sidoe bekumpol ken kami pun go sidoe na' nyelidik kami, mat ditunoei noei ukum Musa nyeh. Kona' sidoe si na' ngulun diret, nyuroh diret ca' tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Musa. Teruhal diret yeng tekawum lem Yesus Kristus mat dah dipelopas dah tam gewai Kristus.
48002005	Mangko kami sikit pun cum kami na' nyerah na' tuno' ke' sidoe. Maksut kami sempayo agah panci mat dilinong dijego, gei' noe tecampor ken yeng noe mat, sempayo kam pun tetap pecayo ke' yeng mat. Jedi mátam te'. Pada' pemimpin gereja nyeh setujue jum, boktie go Titus mat noe dipakso ca' disunát.
48002006	A, pai tel agei' sidoe di Yerusalem yeng diangap reng pemimpin yeng bekuwaso nyeh pun* pie sidoe mat noe namah noe ngurang agah panci yeng dipadah le' aku. Biyar sidoe diangap pemimpin yeng bekuwaso pun pie Allah noe pileh bulu, noe beurang beaku. Mangko aku pun noe namang tam pangkat sidoe; yeng penting ku manseh ca' madah yeng mat. A, sidoe pun cumam yeng nyuroh agah panci ca' ditamah ken perentah pelator itu ini.

48002009	Kebelike sidoe yeng diangap pemimpin ken penogap umát nyeh benso Yakobus, Petrus ken Yohanes si mat ngangkue kami Barnabas mat sepelayan ken sidoe, mat bejenyi sekerejo segelumo ken kami: Kami Barnabas yeng to' madah agah panci ke' reng noe Yahudi, a, ken sidoe yeng madahe ke' reng Yahudi. Ngopai ge' go sidoe samo setuju ponyoe pun go sidoe dah jelas ken aku mat ditugas le' Allah nyo' madah agah panci ke' reng noe Yahudi, na' po Petrus ditugas Sen kei madahe ke' reng Yahudi mie. Sidoe mat jelase ken Allaham yeng bekoyo bekerejo ngelalu Petrus kei iyo ngelantar posan payit Sen ke' reng Yahudi nyeh. Lalu poe sidoe jelas jum ken mat Sénam jum yeng bekoyo bekerejo ngelalu aku nyo' ku ngelantar posan payit Sen ke' reng noe Yahudi. Dinyoam sidoe mat jelas ken pengunyo' pengaseh Allah ke' aku. Mangko kami Barnabas mat disetuju le' sidoe kei madah agah panci ke' reng noe Yahudi.
48002010	Ngat sereno tuam yeng dipinta' le' sidoe ya'am gei' kami noe kelupo nulong ngembentue nyumang jolu ke' pada' reng Yahudi yeng sepecayo yeng bensat nyeh. Nyoe pun mat nan angar totar ku ngenggewaie.
48002011	Jedi mátam te'. Ke' hal reng yeng arap ken ukum Musa nyeh aku pun koloe sampai nentange besemuko caro terus terang, go ku mat jelas ken gewai sidoe mat salah. Jedi potue ne kejedie. Ketiko nyomie kin Petrus detang ke' Antiokia.
48002012	Kemuloe iyo detang si gewaie mat panci, mat na'e iyo begewol makan ken reng noe Yahudi.* Pie dah nyoe do reng Yahudi kaban Yakobus, detang ke' Antiokia jum. Jedi dah detang sidoe si lalu Petrus ngunor direte deri reng noe Yahudi; ngei'e dah begewol makan ken sidoe. Iyo ngorie, gola' iyo dicacue dicelo le' sidoe kelompok Yahudi yeng na' nyuroh reng noe Yahudi yeng pecayo pun manseh ca' disunát gei' iyo diterimoe le' Allah. Mangko Petrus pun mat ngunor direte deri reng noe Yahudi nyeh.
48002013	Iyo mat sangsi beati duwo. Lalu pada' reng Yahudi yeng layin pun nunoe gewai Petrus jum, sangsi beati duwo. Pengabise Barnabas pun tepengaroh nunoe gewai sidoe jum.
48002014	Jedi perati ku sidoe mat nyimpang deri yeng mat, mat noe cuco' ken agah panci. Mangko aku mat negur Petrus di adap sidoe yeng rami. Jedi jie ku nyingka' Petrus, "Gewai kau tokoh tue seolah-olah na' memana' reng noe Yahudi gei' iyo ca' nunoe ukum adat reng Yahudi. Teruhal semalang ke' kau yeng seli reng Yahudi pun pie kau manseh noe tetunoe ke' ukum adat diret. Kau nunoe caro reng noe Yahudi die.* Konai kau na' memana' reng noe Yahudi gei' iyo nunoe ukum adat reng Yahudi?" jie ku.
48002015	"Diret kin seli reng Yahudi, noe iyo reng noe Yahudi. Reng noe Yahudi kin selomo nyomie nan diangap diret reng bedoso yeng noe nunoe ukum Allah; kaji diret ngat diretam yeng panci, yeng nunoe ukum Allah.
48002016	Pie tue diret dah jelas ken mensiyo biyar reng Yahudi pun mat noe tawu diputus Allah bujor benar tam tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Allah, pie ca' tam pecayo ken Yesus Kristus. Mangko diret mat arap pecayo ken Yesus Kristus gei' diret diputus Sen bujor benar tam pecayo ken Kristus nyem, noe tam tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Sen peh. A, semalang ke' diret reng Yahudi pun dah noe arap ken ukum Musa, sa'am go reng noe Yahudi! Konai diret na' nyuroh sidoe ca' tuno' ke' ukum nyoe? Go siko' pun cum mensiyo yeng tawu diputus Sen bujor benar tam tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Sen," jie ku nyingka' Petrus nyeh.
48002017	Jedi mátam. Diret reng Yahudi mat ningal arap diret ken ukum Musa, gei' diret diputus le' Allah bujor benar tam Kristus nyem. Poe diret "reng bedoso" jum, go dah noe tekayi' ke' ukum Allah nyo' diret diselamát. Mun ponyoe maksute Kristus na' nyuroh diret ngelangar ukum Allah peh? Pie noe kene! Noe ken Yesus na' nyuroh diret bedoso! Noe iyo doso peh mun diret ningal arap diret ken ukum Musa gei' diret arap ken Yesus nyem.
48002018	Pie yeng mat demo doso si mun ku nyuroh reng arap ken yeng dah noe pakai dah. Mun arap diret ken ukum Musa dah ditingal nyeh noe ken aku na' nyuroh reng layin makaie agei'. Ento' pai na' memanci yeng dah ruma' rora' nyeh? Mun aku nyuroh reng tokoh nyoe si akuam yeng bedoso.
48002019	Sedang aku si mat jelas ke' hal ukum Allah: mat ukum Allah tei'am yeng ngenyato ke' aku ken aku mat noe mampu ku ngenggewaie, ngopai ge' go ku ningal arap ku ken ukum Allah nyeh. Pie tuju maksute noe kei ku bebas bedoso peh, malah ken paie maksute sempayo aku idup nyo' Allaham.
48002020	Mun ke' hal ukum Allah si aku mat dah mati dah, disalip beroto ken Kristus. Ku idup tue pun noe tam kuwaso diret ku peh, pie tam kuwaso Kristus yeng idup lem ati ku. Caro ku idup di deniyo tue* pun mat idup pecayo arap ken Ana' Allah nyem, yeng ngaseh aku ken nyerah direte nyo' aku.
48002021	Konai aku na' nonga' pengunyo' pengaseh Allah nyeh! Kira' umpamoe diret mampu diputus Allah bujor benar tam tuno' taalo' ke' Allah si maksute kemati Kristus mat cum gunoe! (Pie aku si noe ponyoe; aku mat nerimoe pengunyo' pengaseh Allah ngelalu kemati Kristus nyem.)
48003001	Poe kam Galatia tue mat tupal dunal nar, mat noe tawu mileh. Kam na' po keedah reng yeng konoe kemátam. Teruhale mulo nyomie mat paling nyato nar gewai Yesus begi kam; seolah-olah dipantau kam ken mato kepalo diret kamam. Mat paling jelas kam ke' hal berekat asel gewai Yesus Kristus to' diret des iyo disalip.
48003002	(Ketiko nyoe kin kam mat paling jelas ken pada' berekat dolat yeng diterimoe kam mat tam kam pecayo ken kemati Yesus nyem.) Benso des kam nerimoe Roh Allah mie. Sutie tue ja' yeng na' ku tanyoe ke' kam. Jedi ketiko kam nerimoe Roh Allah mie si nyoe tam kam tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Musaei, tam kam ningo ken pecayo ken agah panciei? 48003003	Pie gopai go dah tue pemiker kam mat tupal dunal nar? Keidup kam yeng beru tue na' dipelaju kam ken kuwaso gewai diret kam peh? Teruhal kam mulai idup mie tam kuwaso Roh Sen; konai na' dipelaju ken kuwaso gewai diret kamam?
48003004	Jangán-jangán siyo-siyo nyem pada' berekat dolat Sen yeng kam dah ngicap mie.
48003005	A, ngopai go ku ngingát kam tadie ke' hal Roh Sen yeng dah diunyo' Sen ke' kam, ken pada' keenah keaneh yeng dipulah Sen di antaro kam. Nyeh pada' jolu ke' deng nyoe entam kam tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Musaei tam kam ningo ken pecayo ken agah panciei? Pie kam pun jelas, ken nyoe mat diterimoe kam tam kam pecayo.
48003006	A, nyoe pun cuco' jum ken yeng tejedi ke' Kei' Abraham mie. Kei' Abraham pun go sen pecayo ken Allah, mangko sen diputus Allah bujor benar.
48003007	Deri nyoe kin diret jelas, ken ngat reng pecayoam yeng diangap keturun Abraham yeng diputus Allah bujor benar, yeng diberekat dolat Sen.
48003008	A, pada' reng noe Yahudi pun mampu tekawum jum. Mangko agah panci nyoe mat dipadah dolu ke' Kei' Abraham lem posan payit Allah, go jie Allah nyingka' Kei' Abraham, Semuya' benso mensiyo langko' diberekat dolat tam kau, jie Sen. (Kejedi 12:3)
48003009	Lalu mátam. Sopai ja' yeng pecayo mat diberekat dolat Allah, konoe kawum ken Kei' Abraham yeng diberekat dolat mie tam sen pecayo.

48003012	(12) Mun gei' tekayi' ke' ukum Musa si bungkonge noe iyo pecayo peh, pie gewai ulah. Go jie ukum Musa, Reng yeng tuno' taalo' ke' perentah tue langko' diborie idup. (Imamat 18:5) (11) Pie siko' pun cum mensiyo yeng diputus le' Allah bujor benar tam tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Sen. Nyoe si mat jelas, go jie lem Kitap Sen, Yeng langko' idup ya'am reng yeng diputus Allah bujor benar tam pecayo. (Habakuk 2:4) (10) Jedi reng yeng arap tam iyo tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Sen si mat noam diputus Sen bujor benar. Malah ken paie iyo disumpah, langko' diukum Sen, go jie lem Kitap Sen pun madahe, Reng yeng noe serarat tuno' taalo' ke' semuya' segelo perentah yeng ditulis lem kitap ukum Sen si disumpah, langko' diukum Sen. (Ulang 27:26)
48003013	Pie Kristus mat nobus ngelopas diret deri sumpah nyoe, go iyo die yeng konoe sumpah, diukum kei ngenti diret. Caro iyo disumpah nyeh tam iyo disalip, go jie Kitap Sen madah, Sopai ja' yeng digentong di kayu salip si maksute go iyo mat disumpah le' Allah. (Ulang 21:23)
48003014	Jedi mátam. Tuju maksut Yesus Kristus nobus diret pun sempayo berekat dolat yeng dijenyi Allah ke' Kei' Abraham mie mat konoe jum ke' pada' reng noe Yahudi ngelalu gewai Yesus. Tuju maksut Sen gei' sempayo semuya' diret mat nerimoe Roh Sen yeng dijenyi Sen mie, pie ngat caro pecayo nyem.
48003015	Menyadie ku yeng seimán: tue ku amie contoh ke' keidup diret seari-ari. Misale jenyi mensiyo pado mensiyo. Numo' pun iyo mensiyo nyem, pie mun jenyi nyoe dah disah mat noe tawu ditamah noe tawu dibeta' dicabut le' sopai pun.
48003016	Jedi mátam. Jenyi Allah ken Kei' Abraham mat do, nyo' Kei' Abraham ken nyo' tampang sulie sen. A, diret ca' ingát jum ken yeng ditulis lem Kitap Allah pun noe iyo "ke' pada' tampang sulie kau", jie Allah nyingka' Kei' Abraham. Go mun ponyoe kin maksute benya', pie ditulis "ke' tampang sulie kau", jie Sen, go maksut Allah dinyoe tampang sulie Kei' Abraham yeng siko' nyeh, ya'am Kristus.
48003017	A, jedi pulang ke' paner ku ke' hal jenyi semayo yeng sah nyeh potue ne: semalang ke' jenyi semayo mensiyo pun ge'e, noe tawu dibeta' cabut, sa'am go jenyi Allah! Jedi dah Allah bejenyi ken Kei' Abraham si dah nyoe dah 430 tawun agei' berue Allah madah ukum Sen ke' Kei' Musa ken pada' reng Israel. Maksute ukum Sen dudi deri jenyi Sen ken Kei' Abraham. Pie noe ken pemadah Sen yeng dudi nyeh nyo' ngembula' pemadah Sen yeng dolu, ya'am jenyi Sen. Sen pasti nuntong jenyi Sen.
48003018	Mun berekat dolat Sen dilileh Sen ke' diret tam diret tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Musa si maksute noe dah tam jenyi Sen. Mun ponyoe kin ukum Musa ngembula' jenyi Allah ken Kei' Abraham. Pie noe! Allah ngemberekat dolat Abraham modas-modasam, tam jenyi Sen, noe tam Abraham tuno' taalo' peh.
48003019	Mun ponyoe ento' pai Sen madah ukum Sen ke' mensiyo? Pailah gunoe? Potue ne, kamei. Ukum Sen ditamah Sen tam doso mensiyo, sempayo jelas ken jolu bedemo doso mat pelangar ukum Allah. Pie maksut Sen ukum nyoe dipakai manu ke' jemán kedetang tampang sulie Abraham yeng siko' nyeh, yeng nuntong jenyi Sen deri nyomiam. A, ke' hal ngelantare pun jenyi Sen ken ukum Sen mat do bedoe. Go Allah madah ukum Sen ke' pelantar Sen Kei' Musa ngelalu melekat, dah nyoe Kei' Musa yeng ngelantare ke' reng Israel. Reng Israel pun bejenyi tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Sen.
48003020	Jedi pelantar kin dipakai di antaro reng duwo piya' tam kededuwo piya' nyeh mat do bejenyi siko' ken betore. Pie jenyi Allah ke' Kei' Abraham si Sen noe pakai pelantar, go beyi' yeng madahe beyi' yeng nuntonge pun mat siko' diret Sénam.
48003021	Nyeh mun bebedo jenyi Sen ken ukum Sen si maksute betungkang peh? Pie noe. Go jenyi Sen ken ukum Sen layin tujue. Tuju jenyi Sen si kei meyie idup. Kira' do ukum yeng mampu borie idup si manseh ge'; diret diputus Sen bujor benar tam tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Sen nyem.
48003022	Pie mat cum ukum Sen yeng mampu borie idup. Malah ken paie mat ukum Sen yeng tepansoe lem Kitap Sen nyeh yeng ngenjelas ngenyato ken semuya' segeno mensiyo dah ditangkap dikuwaso le' doso.* Tuju maksut ukum Sen si gei' sempayo diret mat jelas: lopas noe lopas deri kuwaso doso nyeh ca' dah diret nerimoe pengunyo' Sen yeng dijenyi Sen ke' reng pecayo ken Yesus Kristus. Mat dituntong Sen ke' reng pecayo nyem to'.
48003023	A, sebolum jelan kepecayo dinyato si diret seolah-olah dipagar dikotoh le' ukum Musa sampai jemán pecayo ken Yesus Kristus tue dah dinyato.
48003024	Ukum Sen seolah-olah kei penguwán pengawas* diret sampai kedetang Kristus. Maksute dah detang Kristus kin diret mat diputus Allah bujor benar secaro pecayo nyem.
48003025	Dah jemán pecayo ken Yesus tue si diret noam diawas dijego le' ukum Musa.
48003026	Go semuya' kam dah ana' Allah yeng sah dah, dah tekawum dah lem Yesus Kristus tam pecayo.
48003027	Ibarat ke' solam din des kam disolam ke' lem Kristus kam seolah-olah nyaro' Kristus.
48003028	Lalu semuya' diret yeng pecayo mat ana' Sen yeng sah. Po reng Yahudi po reng noe Yahudi, po reng ulun po reng noe ulun, po lelaki po betinoe: mat cum bedoe di adap Sen, go diret mat siko'am tam diret tekawum lem Yesus Kristus.
48003029	A, mun diret mat engku Kristus kin maksute diret mat keturun Kei' Abraham. Mangko diret mat lileh nyawo sen; diret langko' nerimoe yeng dijenyi Allah ke' Kei' Abraham.
48004001	Jedi penjelase potue, kamei. Aku merempamo ke' ana' biya' yeng dah ditentu nyo' lileh nyawo apa'e. Maksute kin semuya' reto beno jento keraja' apa'e langko' punyi iyo. Pie tam iyo gei' biya' si iyo gei' bolum behak, iyo gei' samo ken ulun nyem, cum bedoe.
48004002	Iyo manseh ca' tuno' taalo' ke' reng yeng ngenjego nguwán yeng ngiring ngaping iyo, sampai ke' ari yeng dolu dah ditentu le' apa'e.
48004003	Jedi ponyoe jum ken diret, kamei. Diret nyomie keedah ana' biya' yeng bolum behak, na' po ulunam. Yeng ngulun diret ya'am pada' ukum adat pempulah mensiyo.
48004004	Pie dah pas-pas jengkah yeng ditetap Sen nyomie si Allah nyuroh Ana' Sen ke' deniyo tue. Iyo diado le' reng betinoe, iyo reng Yahudi, mangko iyo pun tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Musa,
48004005	pie tujue go iyo na' ngelopas semuya' reng yeng ngemoran na' diputus Allah bujor benar tam iyo tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Musa, pie mat nolehe. Maksute sempayo diret mat diangkat diterimoe kei ana' Allah yeng behak.
48004006	A, bokti ken diret mat ana' Sen yeng behak nyeh go Sen mat ngirum ngutus Roh Ana' Sen nyo' diyam lem ati diret. Mangko diret mat beapa' ke' Allah; mat ayah bikaham diret manu ke' Sen nyapo Sen Apa'.*
48004007	Jedi mun ponyoe maksute diret mat noe dah ulun, pie tiyap ko' diret mat ana' Allah yeng behak tei'am. Ken tiyap ko' ana' Sen ditentu Sen nyo' lileh nyawo Sen.

48004009	Jedi mun ponyoe keada' kam, mun kam dah menjedi lileh nyawo diret Allaham si gopai go kam na' bebeli' dipeulun na' po nyomie? Gei' nyomie si manseh ge', go kam mat bolum tekenal ken Allah. Kam mat betuwowe ke' pada' jolu yeng didemo reng "allah", pie yeng sebenare noe iyo mat Allah. Pie tue si kam dah mulai tekenal ken Allah; ja'e yeng mat si go Allah die yeng dah dolu mileh kam gei' kam tekenal ken Sen. Jedi dah kam tekenal ken Allah yeng mat si gopai kam na' bebeli' na' arap ken pada' ukum adat pempulah mensiyo, yeng secum-cumam kuwasoe nyo' nulong nyelamát kam? Nyeh kam na' dipeulun agei'am peh?
48004010	Nyuroh ku bungi nyoe go ti ku kam mat teliti nar nyamut pada' ari raya agama, demo ke' Ari Berenti Kerejo, demo ke' bulan tumas, demo ke' tawun beru opai ke' deng nyoe. Maksut kam gei' kam diputus Allah bujor benar tam kam patoh ke' jolu ke' deng nyoe.
48004011	Ku ngorie nar ngaji kam. Gola' tulang poloh aku mat siyo-siyo nyem madah agah panci ke' kam nyomie.
48004012	Nang na' ponyoe, kamei. Ku muhúnam ke' kam gei' kam samoam ken aku, go aku mat noe arap dah ken ukum Musa. Numo' pun aku reng Yahudi, pie tue ku dah menjedi samo ken kam reng noe Yahudi, yeng nyomie mat noe arap ken ukum Musa. (Pie tue si aku mat ngorie, gola' gewai ulah ku ken kam nyomie mat siyo-siyo nyem.) Teruhale kam nyomie mat paling panci ken aku; cum salah kam ken aku.
48004013	Asale mie kin piyakalam go penyaki' go aku do kelorong detang ke' arong kam nyo' madah agah panci ke' kam.
48004014	Pie numo' pun ku saki' numo' pun aku mat ngalut ngenggedoh kam pie kam noe come' ken aku, noe nula' aku, malah ken paie kam nyamut nerimoe aku na' po reng nyamut melekat Allaham! Kam nyamut nerimoe aku mat keedah nyamut Yesus Kristusam.
48004015	Paling ayah bikah kam nerimoe aku mie! Ku pun mat yakin ken ati pemiker kam ken aku ketiko nyoe; kira' mampu nyungkit igei' mato diret kam pun nyo' aku si mat na' kam (tam kaseh ken aku, merati penyaki' ku nyeh). Gopai go kam dah berubah?
48004016	Gopai go temosie ku diangap kam munsoh kam? Tam aku madah yeng bujor yeng benar peh go kam ngangap aku munsoh kam?
48004017	Pada' guru yeng ngajar yeng salah nyeh mat besemangátam, ca'-ca'e ngehormát mementing kam, pie tujue mat noe panci. Sidoe na' ngerangang kam ken kami, sempayo pengabise kam die yeng besemangát ngehormát mementing sidoe!
48004018	A, besemangát nyo' ngehormát mementing betor si pai ge' salahe, kamei. Mat panci, mun tujue panci, pie. Kira'e kam pun nan serarat besemangát ponyoam, nang na' purue des aku do ken kam nyem. Pie sidoe yeng na' ngaru kam si noe iyo tokoh nyoe peh.

48004023	Ana'e yeng diado ken betinoe yeng ulun si diado caro biyaso nyem tam gewai mensiyo, pie ana'e yeng diado ken betinoe yeng noe ulun si diado tam jenyi Allah.

48005001	Diret mat dipelopas le' Kristus; maksut Kristus kei diret mat lopasam! Mangko diret ca' togap kukoh renán regan dinyoam. Nang na' diret relo dipeulun agei' le' ukum Musa.

48006012	Sidoe yeng na' nyuroh kam ca' disunát si tujue kei iyo dipugi le' betore go kam nunoe pada' perentah pelator sidoe. Pie kebosai atie gei' sidoe noe disensare le' betore. Sidoe tawu, mun sidoe madah ken mat cukupam gewai Kristus disalip si sidoe pasti disensare le' betore.
48006013	Sidoe disunát pun noe go patoh ken ukum Musa peh; malah ken paie sidoe pun noe tetunoe ke' ukum Musa! Pie kebosai ati sidoe go ingín mugi gewai direte nyem, na' ngenggesah ke' betore ken kam dah menjedi umát sidoe.

48006015	Disunát noe disunát nyeh dah noe penting dah; yeng penting si go diret dah diunyo' Sen idup beru.

49001006	Tuju maksut Sen sempayo pengunyo' pengaseh Sen yeng agong mat dipugi, ya'am pengunyo' pengaseh yeng diunyo' Sen modas-modasam ke' diret ngelalu Ana' Kekaseh Sen. Jedi mátam. Tuju maksut Sen tei' mat dipelaju Sen ngelalu Ana' Kekaseh Sen.

49001010	A, dah nyoe, cuco' jum ken keingín Sen yeng panci nyeh Sen pun madah ke' diret tuju Sen yeng nyomie gei' dilibue Sen pie tue dah dipadah Sen ke' diret. 49001011	Jedi mátam. Allah mat ngurus ngator semuya' segeloe cuco' ken tuju maksut kemawo' diret Sénam. Di lem tuju Sen tei' Sen dah dolu ninting nujun diret kei lileh nyawo Sen ngelalu Yesus Kristus.
49001012	Maksut Sen sempayo kami yeng dolu arap ken Kristus dipakai nyo' mugi keagong Sen.

49001014	A, Roh Sen pun mat keedah pengansor Sen yeng nentu ken semuya' jolu yeng dijenyi Sen pasti dilileh Sen ke' diret, des Sen nyanto' nobus diret engku Sen gi. A, semuya' tue pun sempayo keagong Sen dipugi!
49001015	-
49001016	Mangko aku pun nan serarat besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen ento' kam semeja' ku dah ningo agah berito ken kam dah pecayo ken Yesus Tuwowe diret, ken ningo jum ke' hal kaseh kam ken pada' engku Allah. Ku nan nyimpat kam lem doa ku.
49001017	Aku nan serarat minta' ke' Allah Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret *, ya'am Apa' diret yeng agong, gei' Sen nyuroh sempayo ati pemiker kam mat panai mileh, ken sempayo kam ingín tawu semuya' yeng dipadah le' Sen, gei' kam idup segewol segelumo ken Sen.

49001019	A, gei' pun ku minta' ke' Sen sempayo kam jelas tawu ken kuwaso Sen yeng enah ken belobeh-lobeh yeng noe teukor yeng Sen pakai kei nulong nyelamát diret yeng pecayo. Go kuwaso yeng Sen pakai nyo' nulong diret kin samo jum ken kuwaso Sen yeng rajo enah
