49002001	A, cubo ngaji kuwaso Allah yeng bekoyo bekerejo kei nulong nyelamát kam nyomie. Ketiko nyoe kin kam reng mati dah tam doso kam, go nyomie nan nungkang pada' pemadah Allah.
49002002	Ponyoam keidup kam nyomie. Kam nunoe caro deniyo tue yeng jat, kam taát ke' kepala' pada' roh jat nyem. Ketiko tue pun manseh kepala' roh jatam yeng nguwaso ati reng yeng serarat nan nungkang kemawo' Allah.
49002003	Kenaken si semuya' diret ponyoe bisam keidup diret nyomie. 49002009	Maksut Sen sempayo siko' pun cum mensiyo yeng mampu kememuwa' tam pekuleh gewai direte.
49002010	Go mat Allaham yeng ngado diret ngelalu Yesus Kristus. Pie tuju Sen ngado diret pun kei diret ca' bekeragam panci. Pai tel agei' pada' keragam panci nyeh dah direncana Sen dah deri asal nyomiam nyo' digewai le' diret, tingal diret melaju ngenggewaie dam dah diret pecayo.
49002011	Jedi mátam. Pada' kam yeng noe buboh ampeh reng Yahudi, cubo kam ngajie, koti keada' kam nyomie. Kam kin dihina le' reng Yahudi; sidoe ngendemo kam "reng noe disunát". Sidoe ngangap direte panci go disunát, numo' pun sunát nyeh engkas gewai jeri mensiyo ke' tubohe nyem, noe tawu ngubah atie peh.
49002012	Pie yeng mat, yeng kam mat ca' ingát si ya'am ketiko nyoe mie kam mat bepencaram ken Kristus. Kam noe tekawum ken umát Sen reng Israel. Kam mat urang nyem, di luwar gentang, noe konoe kawum lem jenyi semayo Sen na' ngemberekat umát Sen. Mat cum arap kam, noe tekenal kaliam ken Allah, mat ngatam kam.
49002013	Ja'e dah tue si ngelalu Kristus Yesus nyeh kam yeng nyomie rangang ken Sen pie tue dah begelumo dah ken Sen tam derah Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah.
49002014	-
49002016	Go mat Yesusam yeng ngendamai reng Yahudi ken reng noe Yahudi. Iyoam pendamai diret. Go iyo nyerah tuboh direte kei mati di salip. Ponyoam iyo ngapus ukum Musa ken pada' perentah pelatore, yeng nyomie keedah benong yeng nyapat reng Yahudi ken reng noe Yahudi, sampai diret nan bemunsoh. Lalu reng Yahudi ken reng noe Yahudi yeng nyomie duwo benso pie tue dah menjedi sebensoam tam tekawum ken Yesus. Nyoam tuju maksut Yesus mati di salip te': sempayo reng Yahudi ken reng noe Yahudi noam bemunsoh agei', pie damaiam, go dipulah le' Yesus menjedi sebensoam. Ge'em tujue sempayo mensiyo yeng dah menjedi sebenso nyeh mat didamai ken Allah die ngelalu iyo.
49002017	Pai tel agei' dah iyo ngenggewaie dah nyoe mat iyoam jum yeng madah agah panci nyoe ke' diret, beyi' ke' reng noe Yahudi yeng selomo bepencar ken Allah beyi' pun ke' reng Yahudi yeng selomo rapat ken Sen. Iyo madahe ken tue semuya' mensiyo mat dah didamaie dah ken Allah.

49006014	Jedi saro'am pada' beju perang diret, dah nyoe siyap! togap kukoh! Nyo' tali pingang diret ya'am omóng tutor ati pemiker yeng mat. Nyo' kelawue dedo diret ya'am tingkah laku yeng bujor benar.
49006015	Nyo' sepatu diret ya'am agah panci yeng meyie damai.
49006016	Kelawue diret ca' nan dibeyie jum, ya'am kepecayo diret, kei nonga' madam semuya' dema' beapi deri munsoh diret yeng jat.
49006017	Nyo' songko' bosi diret ca' nampan nerimoe keselamát deri Sen. Lalu nyo' kelewang diret ya'am posan payit Allah deri Roh Sen.
49006018	A, samel beperang diret ca' serarat betahan ken serarat nan jego. Lem ati diret nun diret ca' nan serarat bedoa nyem, serarat minta' tulong Sen nyo' semuya' keperelu diret, samel bedoa jum ento' semuya' umát engku Sen.
49006019	A, bedoa jum ento' aku, kamei. Minta' ke' Allah kei Sen ngemborie kato penyamut yeng konoe des aku dipecaro gi, sempayo aku bereni madah agah panci yeng nyomie risi'-risi' Sen ke' sidoe.
49006020	Hale aku diwakel le' Sen nyo' madah agah panci, numo' pun aku dipenjero potue ketegal tam ku madahe. Mangko kam ca' bedoa gei' sempayo aku mat bereni madahe ken penyamut yeng patut.
49006021	-
49006022	Jedi Tikikusam yeng langko' madah ke' kam semuya' segelo ke' hal aku ken koti keada' ku dinun. Gopai ge' go ku ngelantar iyo ke' kam ditue pun sempayo kam tawu agah cerito ku dinun, gei' pun kei iyo ngibor ngemberansang ati kam. Tikikus tei' mat menyadie kekaseh diret yeng mutu melayan Tuwowe diret.
49006023	Salam aku ya'am gei' semuya' menyadie seimán diberekat le' Allah Apa' ken Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret. Berekat dolat deri Sen ya'am gei' kam nan damai ken kaseh mengaseh, ken togap kukoh kepecayo kam.
49006024	Ku minta' ke' Allah kei pengunyo' pengaseh Sen nyeroto semuya' segeno reng yeng kaseh ken Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret ken kaseh yeng cum pemuntole.
50001001	Surat tue deri Paulus ken Timotius, ulun amo Yesus Kristus, ke' semuya' engku Allah yeng tekawum ken Yesus Kristus di kota Pilipi, ken ke' pada' pelayan umát ken ketuwo umát ditue.
50001002	Salam damai ken berekat dolat deri Allah Apa' diret ken Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret.
50001003	Tiyap kali des ku ngaji kam ku besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Allah ku.
50001004	Ku ayah bikah des ku bedoa nyo' semuya' kam ditue,
50001005	tam diret mat segelumo ken sekoyo sekerejo madah agah panci semeja' deri kememerue kam pecayo sampai ke' ari tue pun.
50001006	Aku pun yakin ken Allah yeng betongai ngenggewai gewai yeng panci lem ati kam pasti melajue sampai Sen nyanto'e dah ari Yesus Kristus detang agei'.
50001007	Mat patutam ati ku tokoh nyoe ngaji semuya' kam pun, go kam nan do lem ati ku, ku cum berudu ngelupo kam. Go numo' pun aku dipenjero potue beyi' pun des aku ngadap pada' munsoh agah panci pie kam tetap segelumoam ken aku; diret samo-samo ngicap pengunyo' pengaseh Sen. A, des aku ngadap munsoh nyeh nyoe kelorong begi aku ento' ku nyamut sidoe, ento' ngembokti ken agah panci tue mat-mátam. Pie biyar ku ngerudu pai-pai pun kam tetap segelumoam ken aku.
50001008	Allaham kei saksi pendukong aku ken ati ku mat rinue ken semuya' kam; kaseh aku nyo' kam mat na' po kaseh Yesus Kristusam.
50001009	Jedi doa ku nyo' kam ya'am sempayo kaseh kam belobeh-lobeh belimpah-limpah, ken sempayo pengentawu yeng mat pun betamah-tamah, ken kam serarat belubang pemiker,
50001010	-
50001011	sempayo kam nan tawu mileh yeng paling panci. Tuju maksute gei' keidup kam yeng bujor benar ibarat ke' buwah din lobat buwahe tam kuwaso Yesus Kristusam, sempayo Allah diagong dipugi! Lalu kam pun beníng, noe becelo, sempayo reng noe tawu ngendudoh ngencelo kam sampai ke' ari Kristus bebeli' agei' kitue.
50001012	Jedi menyadie ku yeng seimán, kiroe kam jelas ken kesensare yeng ku rudu tue noe iyo ngepang-ngepang agah panci peh, pie kebelike agah panci tue kin tesebar!
50001013	Padah ku tesebar tei' go reng kin tawu bisam ken aku di penjero nun tam aku madah agah panci. Lalu kin ari kin tesebar, deri semuya' reng di istana rajo pun sampai ke' pada' reng layin jum yeng ningoe.
50001014	A, ge'em kebenya'e menyadie diret lem Tuwowe pun mansang togap kukoh kepecayoe entam sidoe merati aku bereni (madah agah panci) sampai dipenjero potue pun. Lalu sidoe pun kin bereni-bereni madah posan payit Allah, cum itonge gola'.
50001015	-
50001016	Mat die ke' hal reng yeng madah agah panci tue mat noe samo tujue. Separo reng si mat madah agah panci go na' ngenggewai yeng mat, tam kaseh, go sidoe pun tawu ken aku dipenjero tue go Allaham yeng nentue, nyo' kelorong kei ku nyamut munsoh agah panci. Pie do jum reng yeng madah agah ke' hal Kristus tam isin dengki nyem; sidoe na' dipugi betore.
50001017	Sidoe noe sebulat ati peh, pie sebujor madah posan payit Kristus sempayo umát sidoe betamah benya'. Go kaji sidoe nun mun gewai sidoe berasel, aku di lem penjero nun betamah sensare pemiker ku! Pie aku si noe!
50001018	Ma'pusam. Yeng penting agah panci ke' hal Kristus mat ca' dipadah koti-ti pun, beyi' ngelalu reng yeng madahe secaro belot, beyi' ngelalu reng yeng madahe secaro bujor benar pun. Yeng penting go posan payit Kristus manseh ca' nan dipadah. Dinyoam ku ayah bikah. Malah ken paie ku langko' tetap ngeresudu' ayah bikah nyem.
50001019	Go aku pun tawu ken semuya' tue kepe- panyange Sen ngatore nyo' nulong aku, tam kam nan bedoa ge'em, ken Roh Yesus Kristus pun nan nulong aku ge'em.
50001020	Ku tarah ke' ayah ngaji ari-ari yeng di adap ku. Aku mat yakin ke' hal arap ku, sikit pun cum itong ku kererawoe, kebelike aku serarat bereni nyem. Maksute na' po selomoam, pai tel agei' tengkalo tue pun Kristusam yeng diagong dipugi lem gewai ulah bedan beko ku, beyi' idup, beyi' mati pun.
50001021	Tuju idup ku si mat Kristusam, mangko kemati pun mat untong sal ge' Kristus Yesus yeng diagong.
50001022	Kira' pun diret yeng nguruse aku manseh noe tawu na' mileh yeng nai, idupei, matiei. Mun gei' idup di deniyo tue si gewai ulah ku pun pasti berasel.
50001023	Konai aku na' mileh, idup ken mati, go aku mat uka' akang. Ati ku mat ingín ningal deniyo tue kei ku diyam ken Kristus dinun, go nyoe yeng paling panciam, cum melebehe.
50001024	Pie mun ku ngaji kam si ku yakin manseh penting aku ca' renán di deniyo tue lo'e nyo' ku nulong kam.
50001025	Mangko ku tawu ken aku tetap renán regan ken semuya' kam ditue, sempayo kam tetap maju ken ayah bikah tam kepecayo kam.
50001026	Jedi maksute dah aku bebeli' detang agei' ke' kam ditue gi kin betamah-tamah bahan kam nyo' madah keagong Yesus Kristus, tam gewai Yesus Kristus ngelalu aku.
50001027	Pie biyar koti-ti pun aku, begi kam yeng seli empue serugo si kam manseh ca' idup yeng patut begi diret yeng dah nerimoe agah panci deri Kristus. Go mun keidup kam tokoh nyoe, biyar aku betomu muko ken kam atau pun aku ngat ningo agah berito kam nyem pie aku tetap yakin ken kam mat togap kukoh, mat seati sepiker, mat seiyo sekato belelah bejoreh nyo' madah agah panci ke' hal kepecayo diret.
50001028	Kam ca' nan bereni, nang na' gola' sikit pun des kam diserang munsoh. Go mun kam bereni ponyoe si nyoe mat ngembokti ke' reng yeng nyensare kam ken sidoe mat langko' dipunah ranah, pie kam mat langko' ditulong diselamát le' diret Allaham.
50001029	-
50001030	Kam kin dah merati aku seolah-olah beperang, diserang le' munsoh. Tue pun manseh kam ningo agah aku gei' beperang betempor. Ponyoe jum tue kam pun dah ngerubut beperang betempor jum. Go diret mat diborie pengunyo' pengaseh Sen pun noe iyo engkas nyo' diret pecayo nyem peh, pie diborie jum kelorong nyo' diret ngerudu kesensare tam diret pecayo ken Kristus Yesus.
50002001	-
50002002	Kam menyadie ku yeng seimán: ku si serarat ayah bikah ngaji kam. Aku pun betamah ayah bikah mun kam samo serukui, samo-samo kaseh siko' ken betore, seati sepikeram nuju ke' tuju yeng samo. Aku ngemberansang kam tokoh nyoe go diret mat tekawum lem Kristus. Mat kaseh iyoam yeng ngendorong diret ca' idup ponyoe. 50002003	Nang na' diret mementing keingín diret nyem, nang na' diret ingín dihormát dipugi reng, pie kebelike diret ca' secaro renah ati mementing ngehormát betor.
50002004	Nang na' diret ngat ngaji kepenting keperelu diret nyem, pie tiyap diret ca' ngaji kepenting keperelu betor jum.
50002005	Pusat pemiker diret mat ca' nunoe contoh teladan Yesus Kristusam.

50002007	Malah ken paie pangkate ken keagonge ditingale nyem, go iyo mat menjedi ulun, serupo ken mensiyo.

50002010	Maksut Sen sempayo semuya' segeno beyi' di serugo beyi' di deniyo beyi' yeng di beroh deniyo tue pun, pie semuya'-muya'e ca' nungkup nyomah ke' Yesusam,
50002011	ken semuya' segenoe ca' ngangkue ken Yesus Kristusam mat Tuwowe, sempayo Allah Apa' diagong!
50002012	-
50002013	Mangko kaban kekaseh ku: na' po Yesus relo tuno' taalo', ponyoe jum kam. Allah si tetap bekoyo bekerejo lem ati semuya' kam sempayo kam mat ingín ken mampu ngenggewai semuya' kemawo' Sen yeng panci. Mangko kam pun ca' serarat belelah bejoreh ken ati yeng tuno' taalo' tam gola' ken Sen, sempayo penulong penyelamát deri Sen mat berasel lem pengidup kam.
50002014	Lem sipat gewai diret nang na' diret ngupat begunau, nang na' diret betengkar betingkis,
50002015	sempayo diret idup po ana' Allah yeng noe becelo, seputeh ati sebeníng derah, gei' cum reng yeng mampu nokan ngendudoh diret. 50002016	go diret mat nganyoe ken madah posan payit Sen yeng borie idup. Mangko aku pun do modal ku to' ku beiyap bebungah dah ari Kristus bebeli' ke' deniyo tue gi. Ku noe ku kererawoe peh. 50002017	Malah ken paie biyar aku tue sampai dibunoh reng pun pie aku manseh ayah bikaham. Go kam pun ayah bikah kam meyie pesaling kam ke' Allah, ya'am kepecayo kam yeng togap kukoh. 50002018	mangko kam pun ca' beayah bikah beroto ken aku biyar aku sampai mati pun.
50002019	Ja'e nyoe si noe iyo jolu yeng pasti langko' tejedi peh. Aku si mun cuco' ken kona' kemawo' Yesus Tuwowe diret anang aku noe dam lamat na' ngutus Timotius kei ngulang kam ditue. Maksute mun iyo dah pulang ke' aku agei' si aku pun teibor ningo gesah berito deri kam.
50002020	Sungoh pun kaban layin benya' pie ngat Timotiusam yeng seati sepiker ken aku, yeng mat sebulat ati nan ngaji mementing semuya' keperelu kam.

50002022	Pie Timotius si dah diuji dah, dah nyato dah ken iyo mat mutu, mat tawu diarap, go iyo pun mat daham jum melayan beroto ken aku nyo' madah agah panci, na' po ana' ken apa'. Kam pun dah tawu dah ke' hal nyoe.
50002023	Jedi mátam. Mun aku dah tawu ken koti kesuntonge ken aku dinun si aku langko' na' ngutus Timotius kei ngulang kam.
50002024	A, aku pun arap ken Tuwowe ku, kaji ku noe dam lamat aku na' kitue jum.
50002025	Ja'e dah ku itong-itong mat penting jum aku ca' nyuroh Epaproditus kei bebeli' pulang ke' kam. Kam si mat ngutus iyo kinun nyo' nulong aku di lem kecangong ku tue. Aku pun ngangap iyo menyadie ku yeng seimán, penulong ku yeng beroto beperang betempor ken aku dinun.
50002026	Pie engo ku tue iyo mat ca' pulang ke' kam; terutamoe go iyo mat dah rinue dah ken kam. Pengenduwoe go iyo susah kalut ngaji kam ditue tam kam dah ningo berito ke' hal iyo saki' mie.
50002027	Nyoe si mátam, iyo mat saki' uyoh mie, mat tingal penyawo di dedo dam. Mun iyo mat sampai mati si ati aku mat susah betamah susah. Pie sekurang iyo ditulong dikaseh Allah aku pun mat ditulong dikaseh le' Sen, mangko ati ku noam susah betamah susah.
50002028	Mangko kaji ku lebeh panci aku nyuroh Epaproditus nyeh copat bebeli' pulang ke' kam, gei' kam pun ayah bikah, tenáng ati mun betomu muko ken iyo, lalu aku pun noam susah ngaji kam ditue.
50002029	Kam mat ca' besukor ke' Tuwowe, ca' sebulat ati beayah bikah nerimoe nyamut iyo. Reng tokoh nyoe mat patut dihormát diret,

50003001	Jedi mátam te', menyadie ku yeng seimán. Diret mat ca' beayah bikah mugi Tuwowe! Ku si noe sorot ku beulang-ulang ngulang yeng dah ku tulis ke' kam mie; a, begi kam pun jolu yeng ku ulang mat kei penogap pelinong kam.
50003002	Awas beh, kam! Nang na' rapat ken sidoe yeng ca'-ca'e ngelayan Allah, pie gewai ulahe mat jat nar. Padah ku keedah "asue" yeng na' ngeridang nyem, go jie sidoe diret ca' nukong kuli' diret kei diret diterimoe le' Allah.
50003003	Jie sidoe si sunát, pie noe iyo sunát yeng mat peh, go ngat di tuboh nyem. Reng yeng disunát secaro yeng mat si ya'am diret yeng nyomah* ke' Allah ngelalu Roh Sen, diret yeng mugi keagong Yesus Kristus, diret yeng sikit pun cum arap ken gewai ulah diret. Nyoam maksut sunát yeng mat.
50003004	Kira' aku na' arap ken kepanci diret ku secaro mensiyo si aku manseh lobeh deri sopai pun; reng layin mat kalah mun dibening ken aku.
50003005	Go aku disunát pun pas umor lapan ari cuco' ken perentah Allah. Ku keturun deri benso Benyamin, buboh ampeh Israel; aku mat pasa' pagoh reng Ibraniam. Mun ke' hal ukum Musa si aku paling patoh, go aku deri kelompok Parisi,
50003006	malah ken paie ku sampai nyensare gereja Kristus mie entam paling patoh ke' ukum agama diret ku. A, mun na' ngukor kepanci ku ken ukum Musa si aku mat cum celo ku.
50003007	Ja'e semuya' jolu nyoe yeng nyomie ku angap untong pie dah ku ngitong-itonge perati ku mat jolu yeng ngerugi ku nyem, mangko arap ku yeng nyoe mat ku tingal sempayo aku arap ken Yesus Kristus bangam.
50003008	Malah ken paie sikit pun cum jolu yeng ku ngangape untong begi aku; semuya'- muya'e dah ku itong-itong mat ngerugi ku nyem, go aku ingín na' buleh jolu yeng paling berogo, ya'am ingín na' tekenal ken Yesus Kristus Tuwowe ku nyem. Entam ku ngaji iyo mangko pada' semuya' kepenting layin ku angap ampas uras nyem* kei aku mat buleh yeng paling untong, ya'am Kristus
50003009	sempayo aku diitong tekawum lem Kristus. Maksut tekawum lem iyo ya'am aku diputus Allah bujor benar entam pecayo ken Kristus nyem; nyoe pengunyo' Allah yeng aku buleh caro pecayo nyem. Ku ngei' ku dah belelah bejoreh gei' diputus Sen bujor benar tam taát ke' ukum Musa!
50003010	Pie pusat pemiker ku aku ingín na' tekenal ken Kristus nyem: ku na' idup ken kuwaso iyo, go iyo dah bengki' idup agei'am dah. Aku na' begelumo ken iyo sampai ngerudu kesensare pun na' po iyo, sempayo aku menjedi serupoam ken iyo, go iyo relo ningal semuya' kepenting direte sampai mati pun.
50003011	Go koti-ti pun begi aku yeng pentinge dah ku mati aku disuroh Sen bengki' idup agei' na' po Kristusam.
50003012	Ku si go bolum jejak ke' tuju ku; ku mat bolum dipulah Sen sempurno. Pie ibarat beselumoe din nyoam yeng nan dikejar le' aku, kei aku buleh piyala nyoe. Go nyoam tuju maksut Yesus Kristus des iyo nulong nyelamát aku!
50003013	Ku si noe ngangap ken aku dah buleh piyala nyoe peh, menyadie ku yeng seimánei. Pie tuju aku ngat sutie nyoam. Mangko hal-hal yeng dah ku lalu di belekang ku nyeh noe ku ngajie kaliam, keedah reng yeng beselumoe; aku bekaseh betoleh nuju ke' yeng di adap nyem,
50003014	ngejar ke' geris pengudah, sempayo aku mat buleh piyala deri Sen. Go Allah ngunang ngamie diret ke' serugo ngelalu Yesus Kristus pun kei buleh piyala nyoe!
50003015	A, semuya' diret yeng dah dewasa pemiker si kiroe ponyoe bisam ati pemiker diret, po ati aku po ati kam. Ja'e gola' do yeng layin pemikere lem hal tue* si nyoe pun langko' dijelas le' Allah ke' kam.
50003016	Pie yeng penting si yeng dah tawu mat ca' dilaku diret.
50003017	Pada' menyadie ku yeng seimán, ku minta' ke' Allah kei kam mat idup samo serukui na' po contoh keidup aku. Pantauam sopai di antaro kam yeng idup nunoe contoh gewai kami, lalu reng nyoam yeng ca' ditunoe kam.
50003018	Pie beyi'-beyi'am kam, go do jum reng yeng noe na' po kami. Kenaken si dah erat dah ku madah ke' kam ke' hal reng tokoh nyoe, pie tue sampai turun tangis ku ngulang madahe agei' ke' kam, go mat do benya' munsoh pengajar ke' hal Kristus mati disalip.
50003019	Pie pengabise si sidoe die yeng punah ranaham. Sidoe beallah ke' porute nyem*. Sidoe mugi keragam kejeya'e yeng sepatute sidoe ca' rasoe ngajie pun. Ati pemiker sidoe dipusate ke' jolu di deniyo tue nyem.
50003020	Pie diret si seli empue serugo! Lalu ati diret pun mat rinue nantie kedetang Penulong diret yeng langko' detang agei' deri nunam, ya'am Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret.
50003021	Mat iyoam yeng langko' ngubah tuboh diret tue yeng noe tan yeng tawu buro' sempayo menjedi na' po tuboh iyo yeng agong! Go iyoam yeng bekuwaso nyuroh semuya' segeloe pun ca' tuno' taalo' ke' iyo!
50004001	Mangko diret mat ca' togap kukoh ngaji arap ken Tuwowe diret, menyadie ku yeng seimánei. Aku paling rinue ken kam; ati ku paling kaseh ken kam, pada' menyadie kekaseh kuei. Kam keedah piyala ku; ku nan ayah bikah ngaji kam.
50004002	Jedi tue ku nulis sikit ke' Euodia ken Sintike.* Ku muhúnam ke' kam duwo sempayo kam samo serukui, go kam kin segelumoam lem Tuwowe diret.
50004003	A, ken kau Sunsugos, kaban kerabat ku yeng mutu, ku minta' kei kau nulong ngendamai sidoe duwo nyeh. Demo pada' semuya' sidoe pun dah ditulis dah di lem Buko' Catat Demo Reng Idup.
50004004	Ku minta' ke' Allah kei kam serarat ayah bikah tam segelumo ken Tuwowe! Tue ku ngulange agei'am: ca' ayah bikaham, kamei!
50004005	Kiroe semuya' reng layin pun merati ken ati kam mat suyo' sabar. Go noe dam lamat Tuwowe diret langko' detang!
50004006	Mangko nang na' ngorie ke' hal pai-pai pun, pie sal ge' ngerudu pai-pai pun diret ca' serarat bedoa ke' Allah, madah keingín diret, ken minta' tulong Sen samel besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen.

51003016	Diret ca' setulus ati besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Allah, samel nyanyi mugi Sen ken pada' nyanyi deri Roh Sen, benso nyanyi deri pada' Masmur opai. 51003020	A, ken pada' ana' biya' ca' serarat tuno' taalo' ke' reng tuwoe, go nyoe gewai yeng nyenáng ati Tuwowe diret.

51003022	Kam ulun amo ca' serarat tuno' taalo' ke' tuwowe kam di deniyo tue. Kam ca' tetap tuno' taalo' kepa' pun des tuwowe kam noe merati. Go mun tuno' taalo' des diperati nyem maksute go ingín dipugi mensiyo nyem. Pie kam mat ca' melayan seputeh ati entam kam tuno' taalo' ke' Yesus Tuwowe kam.
51003023	Jedi pai-pai pun yeng digewai diret ca' sebulat ati nyem, go diret mat melayan Yesus Tuwowe diret, noe melayan mensiyo peh.
51003024	Go diret kin dah tawu ken upah diret mat deri Yesus Tuwowe diretam to', ya'am reto beno yeng dilileh Sen ke' diret, go Tuwowe yeng dilayan diret si mat Kristusam.
51003025	Ja'e yeng ngei'e tuno' taalo', yeng serarat salah gewaie si mat do jum "upahe" setimpal ken kesalahe, go Allah noe pileh bulu.
51004001	Jedi kam yeng tuwowe ulun ponyoe jum, kam mat ca' noyu merintu ulun kam secaro bujor benar ken adel, go kam kin tawu ken kam pun betuwowe jum ke' Tuwowe kam di serugo nun.
51004002	Diret ca' ngerusudu' serarat bedoa, nan serarat siyap, nang na' lalai leler, malah ken paie ca' besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen.
51004003	-
51004004	A, bedoa jum nyo' kami, kamei, kei kami diborie Sen kelorong nyo' madah posan payit Sen, ya'am risi'-risi' Sen ke' hal Kristus. Minta' doa kam kei ku ngenjelase ke' reng rami ken penyamut yeng patut. Hale aku dipenjero pun entam aku madah risi'-risi' Sen ke' hal Kristusame'.
51004005	Sege' diret begelumo ken reng noe pecayo si diret mat ca' panai mileh, gei' ngengguno semuya' kelorong gola' iyo na'e jum pecayo.

51004007	A, jedi reng yeng langko' madah semuya' segelo ke' hal aku dinun si ya'am Tikikus, menyadie kekaseh ku yeng mutu nulong aku, ken melayan Tuwowe beroto ken aku.
51004008	Gopai ge' go ku ngelantar iyo ke' kam ditue pun sempayo kam tawu agah berito kami dinun; a, ge'em sempayo iyo ngibor ngemberansang ati kam.
51004009	Yeng namahe ya'am Onesimus, menyadie kekaseh diret yeng mutu jum; iyo pun urang kamame'. Jedi sidoe duwo tue yeng to' madah semuya' agah berito kami dinun.
51004010	Salam ke' kam deri Aristarkus, yeng dipenjero ken aku dinun; ge'em deri Markus, petungal Barnabas. Kam si dah ningo dah posan ku ke' hal Markus nyeh; mun iyo detang kitue ca' kam terimoe, disamut secaro panci, beh?
51004011	Salam jum deri Yesus, yeng demoe jum Yustus. Yeng seli reng Yahudi si ngat sidoe tigo ko'am yeng sepelayan ken aku nyo' madah agah ke' hal Allah yeng patut disomah kei rajo. Sidoe mat ngibor ngemberansang ati ku.
51004012	Salam deri Epapras, urang kamam jum, yeng melayan Yesus Kristus. Iyo nan bekaseh betoleh bedoa nyo' kam sempayo kam togap kukoh, cum kemalang kam, sempayo kam serarat yakin ke' hal semuya' kemawo' Allah nyo' kam.
51004013	Ati iyo nan serarat di kam nyem; iyo nan ngaji kam ken ngaji reng yeng pecayo di kota Laodikia ken di kota Hierapolis ge'em. Nyoe mat-mátam, kamei; aku kin dah tekenal ken ati iyo.
51004014	A, salam jum deri Demas ken dokter Lukas yeng kami kaseh.
51004015	Padah jum salam kami ke' pada' menyadie seimán di Laodikia. Salam jum ke' Nimpa, ken pada' umát yeng bekumpol semeyang di rumah iyo.
51004016	Dah surat tue dibeco ke' pada' umát ditue si ca' dibeco jum ke' pada' umát di Laodikia. Ponyoe jum ken surat ku yeng dikirum ke' sidoe Laodikia, ca' dibeco jum ke' kam ditue.
51004017	Posan ku ke' Arkipus nyeh iyo ca' nyanto' tugase, go iyo mat melayan Tuwowe diret.
51004018	Salam ku tue ku tulis ken jeri diret kuam: Salam deri aku, Paulus. Nang na' kelupo ken aku di penjero nun. Ku minta' ke' Allah kei pengunyo' pengaseh Sen nan nyeroto kam.
52001001	Surat tue deri Paulus, Silas* ken Timotius, ke' umát gereja Allah Apa' ken Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret di kota Tesalonika. Salam damai ken berekat dolat ke' semuya' kam ditue.
52001002	Kami nan besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Allah tam kam. Kami nan nyimpat kam lem doa kami
52001003	ke' Allah Apa' diret, go kami nan ingát yeng pertamoe ken gewai ulah kam tam kam pecayo; yeng keduwoe ken caro kam bekaseh betoleh nulong pada' betor kam tam kaseh, ken yeng ketigoe go kam togap kukoh tam arap kam. Nyoe pun tam kam tekawum lem Yesus Kristus Tuwowe.
52001004	Menyadie kami yeng seimán yeng dikaseh le' Allah: kami besukor beterimoe kaseh jum ke' Sen go kami yakin ken mat Sénam yeng mileh kam.
52001005	Ngopai go kami yakin pun yeng pertamoe go agah panci yeng kami madah ke' kam mie mat-mátam. Go kami madah agah panci ke' kam mie noe iyo ngat ken omóng tutor nyem peh, pie kami madahe ken kuwaso Roh Allah. Mat yakin nar kami madahe ke' kam. Kam pun jelas ken gewai ulah tingkah laku kami des kami do ken kam mie, go kami ngat mementing kamam to'.
52001006	A, ge'em yeng nyuroh kami yakin ken kam mat dipileh le' Allah tei' ya'am go kami merati caro kam nerimoe agah panci nyeh. Go kam mie mat niru tingkah laku kami ken niru tingkah laku Tuwowe diret ge'em, go kin numo' pun kam disensare nar des kam nerimoe agah panci mie pie kam manseh ayah bikaham entam Roh Allah yeng Suci.
52001007	Sampai tingkah laku kam kei contoh nyo' semuya' reng pecayo, deri propinsi Makedonia sampai ke' propinsi Akaya pun.
52001008	Malah ken paie posan payit Tuwowe noe iyo ngat bula' di Makedonia ken Akaya peh! Pie na' po bungi tetawak yeng maloe kedingo reng deri jewoh, ponyoe jum gesah kepecayo kam ken Allah, dah kedingo reng dah dinai-nai pun. Noe ge' ca' kami yeng begesah ke' reng layin ke' hal kam
52001009	go reng layin pun dah tawu. Malah ken paie mat reng layin die yeng begesah ken caro kam nyamut nerimoe kami nyomie, sampai kam mat bebeta' piker lalu nyomah ke' Allah die. Pada' antu duwato patong keramát mat ditingal kam mie nyo' kam tuno' taalo' ke' Allah yeng mat yeng idup.
52001010	Pada' jolu yeng noe mat nyeh sengejo mat ditingal kam nyo' kam nantie kedetang Ana' Allah yeng idup deri serugo. Ana' Sen tei' ya'am Yesus, yeng disuroh Sen bengki' idup agei'. Iyoam yeng nulong diret, yeng ngerampas diret gei' diret noe diukum le' Allah yeng godie tam doso mensiyo. Jedi mátam. Bokti kam mat reng pecayo yeng dipileh le' Allah nyeh mat nyato nar.
52002001	A, kam pun dah tawu dah ken kedetang kami ke' kam nyo' madah agah panci mie noe iyo siyo-siyo peh, pie mat beraselam, menyadie seimánei.
52002002	Bolum kami kitue mie si kami kin disensare dihina reng di kota Pilipi.* Pie numo' pun benya' reng yeng ngelawan kami pie kami mat ditulong le' Allah diret, mangko kami mat bereni madah agah panci ke' kam mie.
52002003	Kami ngaja' meyie kam nyo' pecayo ken agah panci mie go agah panci Sen mat-mátam. Kami pun seputeh ati sebeníng deraham madahe ke' kam; sikit pun cum itong kami na' ngelakar na' memuloe kam!
52002004	Ati kami mat tulusam. Bokti ati kami mat tulus nyeh go Sénam yeng nguji ken nerimoe kami, lalu Sen ngewakel kami nyo' madah agah panci. Mangko kami pun mat madahe ke' kam mie. Kami madahe pun noe go ngaji na' dipugi mensiyo peh, pie kami ngat ngaji Allaham. Allah pun mat tawu Sen ken ati kami.
52002005	Kam pun jelas tawu ken kami noe koloe ngememanis kam, noe koloe napo' ati go na' coko' ken jolu kam. Pie kami mat madah agah panci ke' kam sebulat atiam. Allahame' nyo' saksi pendukong kami, go Sénam yeng merati ati kami.
52002006	Ge'em kami noe iyo ingín nyo' dipugi mensiyo peh, beyi' deri kam beyi' deri sopai pun. Kenaken si kami pelantar posan Kristus nyeh mat behak kira' na' nyuroh kam pun,
52002007	pie kebelike kami bekaban begelumo ken kam mie lomah lemutam, na' po ino' noyu merintu ana'e.
52002008	Mat paling kaseh kami ken kam. Sekurang nyo' madah agah panci Sen ke' kam, malah ken paie ento' nyerah keidup diret kami nyo' kam pun kami mat relo, go kam mat dah menjedi engku kekaseh kami.
52002009	Kam pun pasti ingát jum caro kami bekerejo betetes poloh siyang malam kei kami noe ngalut ngembeban siko' pun des kami madah agah panci Allah ke' kam.
52002010	Beyi' Allah beyi' kam ditue pun nyo' saksi kami, ken gewai ulah tingkah laku kami ketiko kami gei' do di antaro kam yeng pecayo nyeh mat bujor benar, suci bereseh, noe becelo.

52002012	sempayo kam idup po yeng patut begi reng yeng engku Allah, go mat Allaham yeng ngunang ngamie diret kei diret berajo ke' Sénam, sempayo diret konoe kawum lem keagong Sen.
52002013	Mangko kami pun nan besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen! Go kam mat jelas ken posan payit yeng dipadah le' kami nyeh mat posan payit Allah tei'am. Noe diangap kam posan payit mensiyo nyem peh. 52002014	A, kenyatoe ken kam mat tungang soh nerimoe posan payit nyoe ya'am go kam mat ngetate des kam disensare, menyadie kami yeng seimánei. 52002015	Mat sidoe reng Yahudiame' yeng munoh Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret ken munoh pada' penijum nyomie; ge'em sidoe jum yeng nyensare ken nunong kami. Allah paling sie Sen ken gewai sidoe! Sidoe ngaca' ngarang ati Allah, ken bemunsoh ken semuya' segeno mensiyo ge'em.
52002016	Tuju kami si na' madah agah panci ke' reng noe Yahudi sempayo sidoe diselamát jum. Pie sidoe Yahudi nan begogoe kei iyo nonga' melempang kami. 52002017	Pie kami si bolum lamat kami tepencar deri kam mie--sungoh pun jewoh di mato pie soma' di ati--pie dah tepencar ken kam mie mat telelingauam kami, menyadie kami yeng seimánei. Kin ari kin rinue, mat ingín nar na' betomu muko ken kam.
52002018	Kenaken si mat erat nar kami mutuse na' manu ke' kam, benso aku Paulus, pie. Noe iyo sekali duwoam peh kami berencana na' manu ke' kam, pie rencana nyoe nan dialang le' Pengelakar.

52003001	Jedi mátam kamei, ketiko nyoe mie pengabise kin dah noe teetate dah ati kami yeng rinue ken pada' kam, mangko kaji kami ma'am biyar kami pun tingal kami bangam di kota Atena nyeh
52003002	sal ge' do siko' yeng manu kei ngulang kam ditue. Mangko kami mat ngutus Timotius, menyadie diret yeng seimán yeng melayan Allah beroto ken kami, nyo' ngulang kam, kei ngemberansang kam gei' kepecayo kam mat togap kukoh.
52003003	Kebosai ati kami si gei' sempayo kepecayo kam noe diaru tam pada' kesensare yeng dirudu kam. Kam pun dah tawu dah ken semuya' diret yeng pecayo mat arus ca' ngerudu kesensare nyeh.

52003005	(Ja'e ngaso kam dah disensare nyeh aku pun susah jum, ngorie gola' kepecayo kam noe tan.) 52003007	Jedi dah ningo agah berito ke' hal kam si ati kami pun mat teibor, menyadie kami yeng seimánei, numo' pun kami tue nongah ngerudu kesusah kesensare jum, pie ati kami mat teibor tam ningo ken kepecayo kam mat tan.
52003008	Peraso kami mat jogar agei'am sal ge' kepecayo kam mat togap kukoh ken Tuwowe diret.
52003009	Ugas ayah bikaham kami ngaji gewai Sen nyo' kam, sampai mat noe tekeromus soe semuya' peraso kami yeng besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen des kami ngadap Sen lem doa.
52003010	Beyi' siyang beyi' malam pun kami muhún mampal ke' Sen gei' kami mampu betomu muko ken kam agei'am, nyo' kami nyukup kemalang kepecayo kam.

52003013	Kiroe ati pemiker kam disuroh Sen togap kukoh, gei' sempayo kam suci bereseh, noe becelo dah ngadap Allah Apa' diret gi, des Yesus Tuwowe diret bebeli' kitue agei' ken pada' umát engku direte. Nyoe doa kami nyo' kam.
52004001	Jedi mátam, pada' menyadie kami yeng seimán. Kami pun dah madahe ke' kam nyomie ken tingkah laku yeng koti yeng ca' digewai kam kei nyenáng ati Allah. Kam pun dah nan idup ponyoam. Pie kami manseh na' minta' ken ngendorong ngemberansang kam--go diret kin segelumo ken Yesus Tuwowe diret--mangko kami ngemberansang kam gei' kam semingkin angar betetanya' serarat idup tokoh nyoe.
52004002	Kam kin dah jelas ken pada' posan yeng dah dipadah le' kami ke' kam mie, makai hak Yesus Tuwowe diret.
52004003	Go kemawo' Allah kin gei' kam suci bereseham, ya'am noe ngeroyal, noe butang beonga'.

52004005	Kona' kemawo' Sen gei' sempayo tiyap ko' diret mat ngehormát tuboh direte;* mat ca' diangap kediyam Allah yeng suci. 52004006	Pie semuya' doso tokoh nyoe mat ngerugi ngerusa' betor, ngurang nilai betor, seolah-olah diret maling makai jolu yeng suci nyo' ngemuwas keingín diret. 52004008	Mangko jie ku diret mat ca' idup suci bereseh. Pie reng yeng nula' pengajar tue maksute iyo nula' Allah yeng ngunyo' Roh Suci Sen ke' diret. Noe iyo ngat nula' mensiyo peh.

52004010	Malah ken paie kam mat ngaseh semuya' menyadie seimán di seruroh nenggeri kam Makedonia nyeh.* Ja'e kami manseh ngemberansang kam gei' sempayo kaseh kam kin ari kin betanya'-tanya'.
52004011	Yeng ca' dipenting le' diret ya'am idup tenáng amán; noe sa' kamoh miyoham. Ge'em diret ca' jerumát ngurus ngator gewai diretam. Diret ca' bekoyo bekerejo ken tulang urat direteam; nang na' numpang ke' betor nyem, na' po yeng dipadah kami ke' kam nyomie.
52004012	Maksute kei keidup diret noe tegentong ke' sopai pun; a, ge'em sempayo tingkah laku diret dihormát dipugi le' reng noe pecayo pun.
52004013	Menyadie kami yeng seimán: kona' ati kami si sempayo kam mat tawu ke' hal kaban diret yeng sepecayo yeng dah mati, sempayo kam noe susah sontok na' po reng yeng cum arape.
52004014	Go diret kin pecayo ken Yesus mat dah mati ken bengki' idup agei'. Mangko diret yakin ken reng yeng pecayo ken Yesus yeng dah mati nyeh langko' disuroh Allah bengki' agei' jum, gei' idup beroto ken Sen.
52004015	Yeng kami madah tue mat posan payit Tuwowe diretam ke' hal kedetang Sen gi. Jedi nunoe jie posan payit Sen tei' dah Sen detang gi diret yeng gei' idup noam ngulu betor yeng dah mati peh, pie diret manseh dudi nayi' deri sidoe.
52004016	Potue ne kejedie. Pas do perentah Allah yeng ontap, ken melekat agong yeng nyapo, ken bungi selumpit sangkakala Sen nyeh dah nyoe temosie Tuwowe diretame' turun deri serugo! Lalu pada' reng pecayo ken Yesus Kristus yeng dah mati nyeh langko' bengki' idup secaro tuboh deri tama'e lo'e.
52004017	Dah nyoe diret yeng gei' idup nyeh dibeyie Sen jum, beroto ken sidoe, ke' lem románg nun, nyo' nyamut Sen di langi' nun. Dah nyoe diret pun mat idup ken Tuwowe diret seora'-ora'eam!
52004018	Mangko diret mat ca' ngibor ngemberansang pado diret ken posan payit Sen tue.
52005001	A, ke' hal jengkah ken jemán kedetang Sen si noe ge' ca' ditulis le' kami, menyadie yeng seimánei.
52005002	Go kam pun dah tawu, dah jelas dah ke' hal Ari Kiyamát des Tuwowe detang gi. Go Sen langko' detang noe mererema', temosi detangam, na' po reng yeng maling yeng detang tolap malam.
52005003	Dinai jie reng, "Tue si tenáng amánam, cum behayo," pie temosie dinyoam sidoe dipenjeri, noe mererema' konoe behayo bencano. Siko' pun cum yeng tawu lopas deri behayo bencano nyeh. Mat keedah reng nganong yeng temosie teraso saki' na' berana', mat noe tawu na' rari.
52005004	Pie kam si menurute noe tekeraya' des ari kedetang Tuwowe, na' po reng tekeraya' dah pemaling detang. Go kam kin noe idup di lem sagam peh.
52005005	Semuya' kam tue reng idup lem tampa'. Kam tue dipencar ke' piya' tampa', di piya' siyang. Diret noe iyo reng idup lem sagam di piya' malam.
52005006	Mangko nang na' diret tidor na' po reng layin. Pie diret ca' nan ingát, ca' jego. Pemiker diret ca' tampa'.
52005007	Reng yeng gela' tidor kin tidor des malam, a, ken yeng mabo' kin mabo' des malam; nyoe mat gewai reng des malam.
52005008	Pie pemiker diret mat ca' jogar, go diret kin dah di piya' ke' siyang dah. Diret dah pecayo dah, mat kaseh mengaseham ken betor. Nyoam keedah kelawue dedo nyo' pengamán diret. Ge'em nyo' songko' bosi diret ya'am keyakin diret ken diret mat ditulong diselamát le' Sen. Mangko diret mat noe sa' ngoriam ke' hal kedetang Sen.
52005009	A, ngopai ge' go diret yakin pun go rencana Allah noe iyo kei diret dikegodie diukum Sen peh. Pie rencana Sen nyo' diret kin ya'am kei diret ditulong diselamát tam gewai Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret!
52005010	Maksute diret yeng dah pecayo beyi' yeng dah mati beyi' yeng gei' idup pun pie dah kedetang Sen gi si semuya' diret langko' idup beroto ken Sen. Nyoam sebape go Yesus mati nyo' diret!
52005011	Dah tawu ken nyoe kin mangko diret mat ca' ngibor ken ngemberansang pado diret, nogap menogap siko' ken betor, na' po yeng selomo digewai kam setelah udahe.
52005012	Jedi mátam, menyadie kami yeng seimán. Kami muhún ke' kam gei' kam ngehormát ngerogo sidoe yeng bekaseh betoleh bekoyo bekerejo nyo' kam, yeng dipileh le' Tuwowe nyo' ngajar ngemberansang ken noyu merintu kam.

54002011	A, jedi des belajar reng betinoe ca' bediyam, nang ngomóng ke' hal jolu bukan. Sidoe ca' suyo' ken sopan, ca' nerimoe pengajar ken ati yeng renah.
54002012	Aku noe ngijin reng betinoe ngajar atau pun merentah reng lelaki; mun des belajar ca' bediyam nyem.
54002013	Go betinoe noe patut merentah lelaki nyeh go asal mulo nyomie pun Adam yeng dolu dipulah le' Allah, dah nyoe berue Hawa.
54002014	Ge'em noe iyo Adam yeng ditipu le' Pengelakar, pie Hawaam konoe tipu sampai iyo ngelangar posan Allah.
54002015	Nyoam go betinoe sal ge' berana' saki' joreh. Sungoh pun ponyoe pie Allah manseh nulong nyelamát reng betinoe. Ja'e yeng ca' nan dipenting le' sidoe tei' ca' serarat patoh ke' kepecayo yeng mat, ca' nan kaseh mengaseh ken betor, kelakue ca' suci bereseh, ken ca' suyo' sabar. c
54003001	Posan payit tue mat-mátam, patut dipecayo. Jedi sopai ja' yeng ingín na' mimpin na' noyu gereja si sukoram, go melayan tokoh nyoe mat panci.
54003002	Tue ne sarate nyo' sidoe yeng na' melayan sebagai ketuwo umát: - Kelakue ca' bujor benar, gei' reng noe tawu nokan ngendudohe - Binie ca' siko'am, ken iyo ca' mutu ke' binie yeng siko' nyeh - Ca' tawu ngenjego direte - Ca' bulat togap pemikere - Ca' beso lakue, suyo' sabar - Ca' ayah nerimoe temuwai tentamui kei numpang di rumahe - Ca' mampu ngajar
54003003	- Ca' reng yeng noe gela' mabo' - Ca' reng yeng noe gerang - Ca' reng yeng lemah liyut pemikere, yeng adel - Ca' reng yeng noe gela' bekelayi begegah becokang beperobut, ca' ayah damai ken pada' betore - Ca' reng yeng noe ayah mementing duwit
54003004	- Ca' reng yeng tawu ngator noyu rumah tangoe direte. Ca' betangung jawab ngendidik ana'e caro telator, gei' ana'e nan tuno' taalo' ke' reng tuwoe.
54003005	Go mun reng noe tawu merentah ngator rumah tangoe direte koti iyo na' mimpin na' noyu gereja Allah?
54003006	- Noe buleh reng bungas yeng gei' berue pecayo, go mun copat dipileh gola' iyo kesesomong, lalu iyo konoe ukum na' po Pengelakar diukum mie.
54003007	- Deri umát diret sampai ke' reng di luwar pun ca' tekenal ken tingkah lakue mat panci bujor benaram. Nyoe pun sempayo iyo noe kererawoe gi, atau pun konoe sinta' jorat Pengelakar, go Pengelakar kin nan masang jorat nyo' diret. Nyoam sarat reng yeng na' melayan sebagai ketuwo umát.
54003008	A, pada' pelayan umát pun ponyoe jum. Sarate potue: - Tingkah lakue ca' yeng bujor benar, yeng patut dihormát le' betor - Ca' reng yeng omónge noe kencang kencus, tawu dipecayo - Ca' reng yeng noe peminúm - Noe biso reng yeng bekemewah mupok ngumpol duwit, sa'am na' ngumpole caro noe bujor
54003009	- Ca' reng yeng seputeh ati sebeníng derah togap kukoh nekat ke' kepecayo yeng Allah dah ngenyato ke' diret; pengajie noe becabang ke' layin.
54003010	Sidoe pun ca' dolu diperati, diuji, na' po ketuwo umát nyeh, nang na' reng bungas. Mun mat bujor benar kelakue si ma'am sidoe melayan pun.
54003011	A, sidoe betinoe yeng melayan* nyeh ponyoe jum. - Ca' bujor benar tingkah lakue, yeng patut dihormát le' betor - Ca' yeng noe gela' maner ngomel - Ca' tawu ngenjego direte, beyi' atie beyi' kelakue - Ca' reng yeng mutu, yeng serarat bujor, yeng mampu dipecayo ento' gewai pai-pai pun.
54003012	Ge'em pada' pelayan umát nyeh ca' siko'am tumo' jodoe, ken iyo ca' mutu ke' jodoe yeng siko' nyeh. Iyo ca' tawu ngator ana'e demo ke' rumah tangoe direte caro panci.
54003013	Jedi yeng dipileh kei pelayan nyeh mun iyo melayan secaro panci do jum keuntong begi direte, go kepecayo iyo pun tetap betamah kuwat, kin togap kukoh iyo pecayo ken Kristus Yesus.*

54003015	Kenaken si kona' ati ku noe dam lamat na' ngulang kau kitue, nyamán ngomóng besemuko ken kau ke' hal tue. Ja'e gola' do alang layin mangko posan ku tue ku tulis lo'e lem surat tue ke' kau, sempayo kau pun tawu gewai ulah tingkah laku yeng patut yeng konoe begi diret seberumah Allah. Seberumah Allah tei' maksute ya'am gereja Sen, kediyam Allah yeng idup. Go gereja Allah nyeh mat tiyang penega' pengajar yeng mat, mangko diret ca' tawu ken gewai ulah tingkah laku yeng patut begi seberumah Allah.
54003016	Semuya' urang pun dah tawu dah, mat noe tawu disangkal reng keagong agah panci. Nyomie si agah panci tue gei' risi'-risi' di diret Sénam, pie tue dah dianyoe Sen dah ke' diret, sempayo diret mampu idup nunoe kemawo' Sen. Tuam to' perimpus risi'-risi' kepecayo diret: Allah* nganyoe direte di deniyo berupo mensiyo. Roh Allah ngemboktie ken iyo mat bujor benar. Pada' melekat merati keagonge. Agah ke' hal iyo dipadah ke' pada' suku benso. Benya' reng di seruroh deniyo pecayo ken iyo. Iyo diangki' ke' serugo kei diagong dihormát! Nyoam perimpus kepecayo diret.
54004001	Jedi mátam. Numo' pun agong risi'-risi' kepecayo diret tue pie manseh gei' do yeng ningale. Roh Allah pun mat terus terang madah ken dah jemán pengudah nyeh pasti cagar do reng yeng tawu ken kepecayo yeng mat, pie dah nyoe manseh nyelimpang. Go sidoe ningo pada' roh jat yeng memuloe. Sidoe pecayo ken pada' pengajar deri roh jat.
54004002	Yeng ngajar pengajar deri roh jat nyeh alap-alape nyem ngajar yeng benar deri Allah, teruhale pada' pememuloe. Ati kocit sidoe teponát keedah degin temati; sidoe dah noam ngeloh ngaji dosoe.
54004003	Pengajar sidoe tei' ngidah reng bejodo, ngidah reng nyego itu ini. Teruhal bejodo demo ke' pada' jolu kei sego pun dititah ken dipulah le' Allah pun kei diterimoe dipakai reng caro besukor beterimoe kaseh begi reng pecayo yeng dah tawu yeng mat yeng benar.
54004004	Go pada' jolu dipulah Allah mat panciam, cum jolu yeng mali sal ge' diterimoe caro besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Allah.
54004005	Go mun diret dah bedoa beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen si semuya' jolu kei sego menjedi beyi' begi diret yeng pecayo, cuco' ken pemadah di lem Kitap Sen.
54004006	A, jedi nyoam yeng ca' dipadah kau ke' pada' menyadie diret yeng seimán. Mun kau nan madahe ponyoe kau pun mat pelayan Kristus Yesus yeng bujor yeng benar. Kau pasti togap kukoh sal ge' roh kau nan diumpan ken posan payit Sen ke' hal kepecayo ken pengajar diret yeng mat yeng benar yeng nan ditunoe kau.
54004007	Pie pada' gesah cerito kengkarang mensiyo yeng noe mat yeng noe beguno nyeh ca' dikebolei' kau kaliam. Kebelike kau ca' serarat belateh gei' idup cuco' ken kemawo' Allah.
54004008	Do ngelateh tuboh si gunoe ento' idup di deniyo tuam, pie ngelateh diret kau kei idup nunoe kemawo' Allah si lebeh beguno, beyi' di deniyo tue beyi' di serugo pun. Nyoe mat jenyi Allah ke' diret. Mangko mat ca' patoh ke' posan payit Sen yeng mat.
54004009	Posan payit Sen tue sengejo mat-mátam, patutam diterimoe dipecayo.
54004010	Gopai ge' go diret pun serarat bekoyo kerejo bepatah tulang becabi' kuli' nyo' madah agah panci, go diret mat arap ken Allah yeng idup. Sen mat Penulong pada' semuya' mensiyo, semingkin reng pecayo.
54004011	Jedi pada' posan ku tue ca' nan dipadah kau, ca' nan diajar kau ke' menyadie diret yeng seimán.
54004012	Numo' kau gei' mudoe pun pie ca' kauam yeng kei menjedi contoh ke' reng yeng pecayo. Noe patut kau diremeh dipemuda' tam kau gei' mudoe. Pie kebelike senika' tingkah laku kau ca' yeng patut ditunoe kei contoh betor yeng pecayo, beyi' omóng tutor paner dongéng kau, beyi' gewai ulah tingkah laku kau, beyi' secaro kaseh mengaseh ken betor kau, beyi' kepecayo kau yeng mutu, beyi' kelaku kau yeng noe becelo. Senika' tingkah laku kau mat ca' panci, kei contoh reng yeng dah pecayo.
54004013	Jedi mátam. Penantie aku gei' bolum detang nyeh tue ne yeng ca' kau pelaju: kau ca' teliti mementing ngembeco Kitap Allah des semeyang. Ca' ngemberansang betor, ken ca' serarat ngajar betor.
54004014	Kemampu yeng diunyo' Allah ke' kau ca' nan dipakai, nang na' kau lengah, nang na' dipelene kau. Kemampu nyoe diunyo' ke' kau cuco' ken pemadah Allah yeng dilantar le' penijum di gereja mie, des pada' ketuwo umát nyampang jerie di atas kepalo kau mie. Mangko kau ca' rajing betugas cuco' ken kemampu nyoe.
54004015	Kau ca' teliti nar mementing gewai kau lem gereja, ca' dikerejo seputeh ati sebeníng derah, pengaji kau nang becabang ke' layin. Mun kelaku kau tokoh nyoe mangko nyato nar ken kau kin ari kin mansang, kin tawu melayan Allah.
54004016	Kau ca' serarat mutu ngenjego diret kau demo ke' pengajar kau, sempayo kau nulong diret kau ken nulong pada' reng yeng ningo kau ge'em.
54005001	A, jedi umpamoe gola' do reng yeng ca' ditegur di lem gereja diret, caro negure nang na' ditegur dicacue secaro kejam. Jedi mun do reng lelaki yeng tuwo yeng ca' ditegur, iyo diperipo' na' po kau negur apa' diret kauam; a, lelaki yeng gei' mudoe ditegur na' po menyadie kau.
54005002	Do betinoe yeng tuwo si ditegur na' po kau negur ino' kau. Ken betinoe yeng gei' mudoe ditegur na' po negur menyadie betinoe kau, ken ati yeng bujor benar, cum keingín itu ini yeng na' jat yeng noe senunoh.
54005003	Ha, jedi ke' hal umát betinoe yeng belu yeng mat cum bedeyo nyeh, sidoe mat ca' ditoyu diperintu le' gereja.
54005004	Pie reng belu yeng do ana' uco'e si ca' ana' uco' direteam yeng noyu merintue. Sidoe ca' jelas tawu ken secaro melayan Allah yeng terutamoe ya'am ca' noyu merintu keremiji direte. Go nyoam caro sidoe nyo' iyo melas kaseh ke' reng tuwo direte, go Allah mat ayah Sen ken gewai tokoh nyoe.
54005005	Reng belu yeng mat bedireteam, yeng cum mensiyo na' diarape si, iyo mat arap ken Allah bangam. Iyo serarat bedoa minta' tulong Sen siyang malam pun. Mat patutam iyo ditoyu diperintu le' gereja.
54005006	Pie reng belu yeng nan mementing ngogoe kenyamán kesenánge nyem iyo seolah-olah dah mati dah numo' pun gei' idup.
54005007	-
54005008	Jedi mat do belu yeng ca' ditangong le' gereja, do jum yeng ca' ditangong le' keremiji direte. Go reng pecayo mat ca' noyu merintu ketangong kesan direte, pai tel agei' keremiji direte. Yeng keh noyu merintu keremiji direte iyo nungkang ngelangar pengajar deri Allah. Iyo lebeh jat deri reng noe pecayo pun. Mangko posan ku tue ca' kau padah ke' umát gereja, gei' tingkah laku umát diret bujor benar. Mun gewai diret bujor benar kin noe dipaner didongeng diupat dipeleter reng.
54005009	Jedi reng belu yeng diangap patut dicatat kei ditangong le' gereja nyeh sarate potue: - Umore ca' nam puloh tawun ke' atas - Ca' yeng mutu bulat ken tumo' jodoe des iyo gei' idup nyomie
54005010	- Ca' reng yeng dah dikenal ke' hal tingkah lakue yeng panci. Maksut tingkah laku yeng panci tei' iyo dah ngendidik ana' biya'e secaro panci, iyo nan relo nerimoe temuwai tentamui di rumahe, iyo relo ngerenah direte nyo' melayan pada' umát engku Allah. Iyo relo jum nulong reng saki' joreh yeng susah sontok. Maksute iyo serarat ngogoe kelorong kei nulong kei ngembentue urang. Iyo bemacam bejenis pada' tingkah lakue yeng panci. Jedi reng belu yeng tokoh nyoam yeng patut dicatat nyo' ditangong le' gereja.
54005011	Pie reng belu yeng gei' mudoe noe sa'am dicatat kei ditangong gereja. Go reng belu yeng gei' mudoe nyeh paroe lamat belamat lojue nyo' melayan Kristus bangam, lalu keingíne makin kuwat na' bejodo agei'.
54005012	Dah nyoe iyo dipedo disalah urang, go iyo mungker jenyie yeng pertamo mie.
54005013	A, do jum reng belu yeng gei' mudoe nyeh paroe sal ge' dah ditangong le' gereja nyeh sidoe pengabise lalu pereriyah, gela' betatap usi' nyem. Sa'am go betatap usi', nan maner ngendongéng ngejat urang, turut campor ken urus urang, nan ngomóng ke' hal yeng noe patut yeng noe senunoh.
54005014	Mangko nasehat aku nyeh reng belu yeng gei' mudoe si noe sa'am dicatat kei ditangong gereja. Lebeh beyi' iyo ca' bejodo agei'am, berana' bebuwah, ngator rumah tangoe direte, gei' iyo noe gela' betatap usi' nyem. Maksute sempayo cum dedale nyo' munsoh diret ngererujong ngeolo'-olo' diret entam kelaku reng belu yeng pecayo nyeh.
54005015	Diret sengejo ca' ati-ati ke' hal tue, go kenaken si dah do dah reng belu yeng mudoe nyeh yeng nyelimpang deri jelan yeng mat, go iyo na' nunoe kemawo' Pengelakar.
54005016	Jedi ku ngulang posan ku tadie. Reng pecayo mun iyo do keremiji direte yeng belu patutam iyo ca' ditoyu diperintue, nang na' dibebane ke' gereja. Maksute sempayo gereja mampu nangong jawab belu yeng mat cum deyoe.
54005017	Jedi pada' ketuwo umát yeng ngator ngurus umát gereja caro panci si mat patut ca' dihormát didingo ge'em, ken patut jum ca' ditulong dibentue lem keidupe seari-ari ge'em, semingkin sidoe yeng betangung jawab borat madah ngajar ngenjelas ke' hal posan payit Allah.
54005018	A, ke' hal iyo ca' ditulong bentue diret si go do yeng ditulis lem Kitap Allah yeng bungie potue, Sapi yeng ngiri' padi kam nang na' dikobat ke' nyawoe. (Bilang 25:4) Ge'em jie Kitap Allah, Reng yeng kerejo patut diupah.
54005019	A, jedi ke' hal ketuwo ca' dihormát le' diret nyeh, mun do reng na' ngendudoh ketuwo umát si diret nang na' ningoe, cuwali dibokti le' saksi duwo tigo ko'.
54005020	Ja'e mun sengejo do boktie ken iyo mat bedoso si iyo ca' ditegur di adap reng rami, gunoe sempayo yeng layin pun gola'e bekelaku tokoh nyoe.
54005021	Jedi ca' teliti lem hal tue. Nang na' semadie tangkap mun do reng ngendudoh ketuwo nyeh. Ja'e mun iyo mat bedoso si iyo patut ca' ditegur di adap reng rami. Nang na' pileh bulu, nang na' beurang beaku; kau ca' amie samo rato ken sidoe ketuwo. Posan ku tue mat penting nar. Ku madahe pun atas kuwaso Allah ken Kristus Yesus ken pada' melekat suci.
54005022	Nyoam go ca' ati-ati des mileh ketuwo gereja; nang na' copat semadi pileh, gola' mun reng dah dipileh dah nyoe mat nyato ken dosoe maksute seolah-olah kau setuju ken dosoe. Pie kau ca' ngenjewoh diret kau deri semuya' segelo doso. Kau ca' mileh yeng bujor yeng panci.
54005023	Ja'e noe ku ngidah kau nginsup ayie angur peh, Timotiusei. Kau nang na' nginsup mungkal ayie bujor nyem. Ayie angur ca' kau insup jum sikit-sikit, nyo' nentamo porut kau, go kau nan kuwat rungue.
54005024	Jedi pulang ke' hal ngesah ketuwo tei', nang na' lokas nar semadi pileh. Kin do reng yeng dosoe mat nyato nar, bolum dipecaro pun reng dah tawu reng dah ken dosoe. Pie do jum reng yeng dosoe noe sengkunyong nyato; pie ca' diperati lo'e, dah nyoe berue mat nyato ken dosoe.
54005025	Ponyoe jum ke' hal tingkah laku yeng panci. Do die yeng sengkunyong nyato, do jum yeng lamat berue nyato. Pie yeng noe lokas nyato pun noe tawu ditapo'. Lamat belamat ketawu diret ken tingkah lakue yeng panci pun. Mangko mat ca' ati-ati, nang na' lokas semadi pileh reng kei ketuwo gereja.
54006001	Jedi do jum reng pecayo yeng idup menjedi ulun reng. Idup tokoh nyoe mat sensare nar. Pie iyo manseh ca' ngangap tuwowe nyeh patut nan ca' dihormát. Manseh patut iyo serarat tuno' taalo' ke' tuwowe nyeh. Nyoe sempayo cum alor kei reng menghina ngeremeh demo Allah ken menghina ngeremeh agah panci Sen.
54006002	Jedi mun tuwowe ulun ken ulune samo reng pecayo, ulune nang na' ngelene perentah tuwowe. Malah ken paie ca' kepala' rajing iyo bekerejo, go tulang polohe ento' samo reng pecayo, yeng samo-samo dikaseh le' Allah. Pada' semuya' posan payit ku tue ca' nan dipadah nan diajar kau, nyo' ngemberansang betor.
54006003	Yeng diajar ca' cuco' ken posan payit yeng mat, yeng dipadah le' Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret. Ca' pengajar yeng ngemberansang diret sempayo diret idup nunoe kemawo' Allah. Pie berang reng yeng ngajar layin deri nyoe, yeng noe setuju ken pengajar diret si
54006004	mat somong berakah nyem, iyo noe tawu pai-pai pun. Iyo keedah reng yeng saki' uyoh, ja'e penyaki'e go iyo serarat ngemoran betengkar bemalau ke' hal agama. Kibat omóng tokoh nyoe si ngat jat nyem, go nyuroh reng isin dengki iro kenyayo, bemunsoh bepencar, maner ngejat betor, nan ngangap betore jat,
54006005	sampai serarat betengkar betingkis siko' ken betor nyem gewaie. Nyoam kibat gewai reng yeng ngemoran betengkar bemalau ke' hal agama. Nyoe pun go sidoe nan ayah ken yeng jat, sie ken yeng benar. Pemikere dilimún le' doso lalu ampoe buwauam. Sidoe tepencar tekuwa' deri yeng mat, pengabise pengajar yeng benar cum dah di ati sidoe, dah diamie dah deri ati sidoe. Go pengaji sidoe na' beagama pun kei iyo ngogoe keuntong kekayo kesugeh nyem.
54006006	Untong tuwah si mat do, pie untong tuwah nyoe nyo' reng yeng idup nunoe kemawo' Allah, yeng sabasam ken jolu yeng dah do nyeh. Iyo noam kei kekalute agei'.
54006007	Go diret diado di deniyo tue mie sikit pun cum meyie jolu. Ponyoe jum diret dah mati gi, mat noe tawu na' meyie jolu sikit pun. Keidup diret mat noe bepoko' ke' jolu.
54006008	Mangko ento' pailah na' ngejar duwit? Sal ge' dah do jolu kei sego ken pakai ingap na' pai agei'?
54006009	Pie reng yeng ngemoran na' ngogoe kekayo si muraham iyo digudo le' Pengelakar. Iyo tekotoh entam ngemoran na' buleh pada' jolu yeng cum nilaie, jolu yeng ngerusa' keidup yeng mat. Pengabise kibat keingín yeng tokoh nyoe si iyo mat karam, bis punah ranah losi nayáp seora'-ora'eam.
54006010	Go semuya' segelo bemacam bejenis kebeyat jat timu deri ati yeng nyinto na' benya' duwit. Mat do reng yeng nan ngejar duwit, sampai nyelimpang deri jelan kepecayo yeng mat. Pengabise mat susah sontok kesal sayang tam kibat gewai direteam.
54006011	Pie kau si, Timotiusei, nang na' tokoh nyoe, tam kau pelayan Allah. Mangko kau ca' nan serarat ngenjewoh diret kau deri pada' gewai ulah yeng tokoh nyoe. Kau ca' serarat mementing gewai ulah yeng bujor benar, ca' patoh ke' Allaham, ca' arap ken Sénam. Kau ca' serarat kaseh, ca' mutu ngetate des disensare, ca' lomah lemut.
54006012	Diret yeng dah pecayo mat ca' serarat besemangát beselumoe nyo' ngelawan ngalah yeng jat. Yeng ca' dipenting ngat idup beru yeng cum berudu mati. Diret diselamát pun sempayo diunyo' Allah idup beru. Kau pun daham ngangkue kepecayo kau ke' hal idup beru nyoe di adap saksi yeng benya'. Mangko nyoam yeng ca' dipenting kau.
54006013	Posan ku tue ku padah atas kuwaso Allah yeng bungkong idup semuya' segeno, beyi' mensiyo beyi' jolu bukan pun. Ge'em ku padah atas kuwaso Kristus Yesus yeng bereni besaksi ke' hal yeng mat di adap gubernor Pontius Pilatus mie.
54006014	Jedi posan ku potue ne: posan payit Sen ke' hal agah panci nyeh ca' dijego gei' noe tecampor ken pengajar yeng salah, sampai ke' jengkahe Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret ngenyato direte agei' di deniyo tue.
54006015	Tengkalo tue si iyo gei' noe diketawu di deniyo tue, pie pas-pasam ke' jengkahe yeng ditetap le' Allah gi diret Sénam yeng langko' ngenyato Ana' Sen di deniyo tue. Diret Sénam yeng rajo agong, yeng rajo kuwaso, yeng serarat ayah bikaham. Sen Rajo atas semuya' rajo, Tuwowe atas semuya' tuwowe.
54006016	Engkas diret Sénam bungkong idup, cum epun cum ujong Sen. Sen diyam lem cayo yeng panting nyacas, sampai noe tawu dipanu noe tawu disoma'. Mensiyo siko' pun noe koloe merati Sen, mat noe tan na' merati Sen. Patutam Sen dihormát, patutam Sen yeng disomah kei rajo seora'-ora'eam. Amin.
54006017	A, jedi padaham ke' sidoe reng kayo di deniyo tue gei' sidoe nang na' kememuwa'. Nang na' sidoe arap ken kekayo kesugehe. Go pada' kekayo kesugeh deniyo tue paling noe tawu diarap, noe kekal, jolu yeng noe tan; ari tue do, pagi cum. Pie sidoe ca' arap ken Allaham, go Allaham yeng buwar ngenjemín semuya' segelo ke' diret. Sipat jenis pai-pai pun yeng do di diret pun mat diunyo' le' Allaham. Maksut Sen pun kei diret nyamán ngicap semuya' segelo jolu yeng dipulah le' Sen.
54006018	Jedi padaham ke' sidoe yeng kayo nyeh gei' sidoe mementing ngelaku yeng panci, nulong reng layin. Ibarat ke' jolu din kelaku pancie die yeng ca' belimpah-limpah, keedah jolu yeng betimun-timun pemenya'e. Sidoe ca' serarat ayah ngunyo' ngemborie jolu ke' betore, ca' kaseh, ca' ayah begelumo ken semuya' urang.
54006019	Ponyoam sidoe numpok nimun reto beno di serugo nun, ya'am reto beno yeng tan yeng awi' yeng mat tawu diarap. Go ngat ponyoam sidoe mat ngicap keidup yeng mat yeng seli deri Allah.
54006020	Jedi pengajar yeng diserah ke' kau ke' hal kepecayo diret nyeh ca' serarat nan dijego kau, Timotiusei. Kau ca' ngenjewoh diret kau deri omóng yeng noe mat yeng noe bereti, ken deri pada' petingkis peseliseh. Omóng tokoh nyoe diangap reng paling mat, paling panai, teruhal paling salah.
54006021	Mat do reng yeng ngajar yeng salah ponyoe, pie sidoe dah nyelimpang deri kepecayo yeng mat. Mangko kau ca' ngenjego ken makai pengajar yeng mat nyem. Ku minta' ke' Allah kei pengunyo' pengaseh Sen nan nyeroto kau*.
55001001	Surat tue deri Paulus, pelantar posan Kristus Yesus, cuco' ken kemawo' Allah. Aku diutus kei madah ke' hal idup beru yeng dijenyi Sen ngelalu Kristus Yesus.
55001002	Ku nulis tue ke' Timotius, yeng ku kaseh na' po ana' diret kuam. Salam damai, kaseh ken berekat dolat deri Allah Apa' ken Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret. Jedi mátam.
55001003	Deri nyomiam akei' puyang aku nan nyomah ke' Allah; a, aku pun nyomah ke' Sen seputeh ati sebeníng derah. Jedi aku serarat nan besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen des ku ngaji kau, Timotiusei. Ku nan nyimpat kau lem doa ku ke' Sen siyang malam pun, ku noe luput nan bedoa nyo' kau.
55001004	Kaseh ku ngenggenáng ayie mato kau yeng berutus nyomie. Aku rinue ingín na' betomu ken kau, sempayo ati ku ayah bikah.
55001005	Ku ingát ku jum, Timotiusei, ken kau mat pecayo seputeh ati, na' po kepecayo yeng dolu timu lem ati inei' kau Lois ken ino' kau Eunike. Ku yakin ken kepecayo nyoe mat dah nyerorap lem ati kau jum.
55001006	Mangko aku na' ngingát kau sempayo nan dipakai le' kau pengunyo' pengaseh Allah yeng kau terimoe des aku nyampang jeri ku di atas kepalo kau mie. Pengunyo' nyoe ca' nan dipakai kau, nang na' kau lalai leler. Ibarat ke' api din ca' nan ditipau gei' iyo noe padam.
55001007	Nang na' kau gola' ngenggewai tugas kau, go Roh Allah yeng diunyo' Sen ke' diret noe iyo Roh yeng tawu dikegola' peh. Roh nyoe kebelike nyuroh diret bekuwaso, nyuroh diret kaseh mengaseh ken betor, ge'em nulong diret ngator ngenjego di lem keidup diret gei' noe kalah tam gola'.
55001008	Jedi kau nang na' rasoe besaksi ke' hal Tuwowe diret, Timotiusei. Nang na' rasoe entam aku dipenjero, go aku dipenjero pun entam aku melayan Sen. Pie kau pun ca' relo jum ngerudu kesensare na' po aku, entam diret madah agah panci. Allah pun pasti nguwaso kau gei' kau mampu ngerudu kesensare pai pun.
55001009	Sénam yeng nulong nyelamát diret, ken ngunang ngamie diret kei engku diret Sénam. Diret ditulong diselamát ken diunang diamie pun noe iyo tam pekuleh gewai diret peh, pie entam kemawo' diret Sénam, kontan pengunyo' pengaseh Sen. Deri asal muloe, bolum deniyo tue diado mie pun, Sen dah ngenjemín pengunyo' pengaseh Sen ke' diret ngelalu Kristus Yesus,
55001010	ja'e kenyatoe berue dianyoe Sen ke' diret tengkalo tue, des Kristus Yesus Penulong diret detang ke' deniyo tue. Go didemo Penulong tei' tam kuwaso kemati dah dikalahe, lalu keidup yeng cum berudu mati dianyoe Sen ke' diret. Nyoe pun diret tawu entam dah ningo agah panci.
55001011	A, dah nyoe Allah pun nentu nunyo' aku kei wakel Sen, kei pelantar posan Sen, kei guru nyo' ngajar agah panci tue.
55001012	Nyoam go aku ngerudu kesensare potue tam aku mat madah posan payit Sen. Pie aku noe ku kererawoe peh, aku tetap yakin nyem. Aku mat nyerah gewai ulah bedan beko ku ke' diret Sénam. Go aku tekenal ku ken Allah yeng dipecayo le' aku, mangko aku mat yakin ken Sen pun tetap mampu ngenjego noyu semuya' segeno yeng ku serah ke' Sen, sampai ke' Ari Kiyamát nun gi.
55001013	A, jedi kau ca' tetap nunoe pengajar yeng mat yeng kau ningo deri aku; nyoam kei contoh pengajar kau. Kau ngajar pun ca' cuco' ken kepecayo diret, cuco' jum ken kaseh yeng diret buleh deri Kristus Yesus.
55001014	Pengajar panci yeng diserah ke' kau mat ca' nan dijego, ca' ditoyu diperintu kau na' po reng ngenjego reto beno yeng berogo. Kuwaso Roh Allah yeng ngendiyam diret yeng kei nulong kau ngenjegoe.
55001015	Jedi mátam. Kau kin dah tawu dah ke' hal aku nyomie ditingal ming nyem le' pada' reng pecayo di nenggeri Asia nun, termansok Pigelus ken Hermogenes jum.
55001016	Ja'e keremiji Onesiporus si milang kali nan ngibor ngemberansang aku. Kiroe Tuwowe diret ngemberekat dolat sidoe. Go Onesiporus si tarah ke' noe rasoe tam aku dipenjero potue,
55001017	malah ken paie des iyo detang ke' Roma nun mie iyo lintus simah ngogoe aku sampai nomu aku.
55001018	Kau pun jelas jum ken caro iyo benya' nulong aku di Epesus mie pun. Kiroe Tuwowe ngemberekat dolat iyo dah Ari Kiyamát gi.
55002001	Jedi potue ne Timotius, ana' ku lem Kristusei. Kau mat ca' togap kukoh entam pengunyo' pengaseh yeng diunyo' ke' diret ngelalu Kristus Yesus.
55002002	Semuya' posan payit yeng kau ningo des aku ngajar di adap reng rami nyeh ca' diajar kau jum ke' reng yeng mutu, ke' reng yeng tawu dipecayo, yeng mampu jum ngajare ke' reng layin.
55002003	Kau ca' siyap ngerudu kesensare, go kau siko' tentara Kristus Yesus. Tentara yeng mutu nyeh iyo siyap ngerudu kesensare.
55002004	Reng yeng menjedi tentara nyeh kin noe pengamoh ngaji pengidupe seari-ari. Iyo nan serarat na' nyenáng ati kepala'e nyem, noe iyo ngaji kepenting direte.
55002005	Ponyoe jum benso reng beselumoe. Reng yeng beselumoe ca' bujor nunoe pelatore. Mun noe si iyo noe umán piyala nyoe.
55002006	A, ponyoe jum benso beumo betanám. Go reng yeng beumo betanám ca' beompas pulas berue tetomu tekicap ke' asel kerejoe*.
55002007	Beyi'-beyi'am kau ngeruning jolu yeng ku padah ke' kau, go Tuwowe diretam yeng madah ke' kau ken tuju maksut semuya' tue.
55002008	Kau ca' nan ingát ken Yesus Kristus, yeng bengki' idup agei', deri buboh ampeh Rajo Daud. Nyoam agah panci yeng nan dipadah aku.
55002009	Entam aku madah agah panci nyoe mangko aku disensare potue, sampai dipasong ken rantai di lem penjero, keedah reng yeng jat nar. Ja'e go posan payit Allah si mat noe tawu dipasong.
55002010	Mangko ku etat nyem semuya' kesensare tue, sal ge' agah panci nan dipadah. Go aku si noe ngaji diret kuam, pie ku ngaji pada' reng yeng dah ditinting ditujun le' Allah yeng na' pecayo ken Sen gi. Kebosai ati ku gei' sidoe pun ditulong diselamát jum le' Kristus Yesus, gei' sidoe buleh idup yeng agong yeng tan seora'-ora'eam.
55002011	Ha, tue posan payit yeng mat tawu dipecayo, ya'am: Mun diret mat mati ken Yesus kin diret langko' idup jum beroto ken Sen
55002012	Mun diret tan disensare diret langko' diaja' Sen nyo' merentah jum beroto ken Sen Mun diret nyangkal Sen Sen pun langko' nyangkal diret.
55002013	Ja'e biyar diret noe mutu pun pie Sen si tetap nan mutu, noe berubah, go Sen noe koloe mungker jenyi Sen*. Sen nan bujor benaram.
55002014	Jedi reng yeng pecayo ca' serarat nan diperingát kau ken pengajar ku tue. Padaham ke' sidoe atas kuwaso diret Allaham gei' sidoe noe betentang betingkis besamut besempado ken betor. Gewai tokoh nyoe cum gunoe, malah ken paie kei nonga' melempang nyem pada' reng yeng ningoe.
55002015	Jedi des kau ngajar posan payit yeng mat nyeh ca' caro yeng bujor benar, ca' tawu ken retie, keedah reng yeng memparang jelan yeng lurus yeng bujor. Nyoe ca' digewai kau sebulat ati, sempayo gewai kau sekali dipereso diuji le' Allah mat dinilai Sen panci, gei' kau noe kererawoe.
55002016	Kau nang na' turut campor ken pada' paner dongéng yeng cum gunoe, yeng meyie nari' reng kei rangang ken Allah. Jie sidoe yeng gewaie tokoh nyoe si go sidoe na' maju, na' memparang jelan beru. Pie kebelike gewai nyoe meyie sidoe kin jewoh-jewoh deri Allah.
55002017	Pada' pengajar sidoe tei' keedah penyaki' behayo yeng mengkeroyap di segonáp tuboh. Contohe benso Himeneus ken Piletus.
55002018	Sidoe dah nyelimpang dah deri jelan yeng mat. Sidoe salah ngajar ke' hal bengki' idup agei'; (jie sidoe cum diret bengki' idup agei' secaro tuboh).* Sampai separo reng pecayo nyeh tepengaroh entam pengajar sidoe ponyoe.
55002019	Ja'e numo' pun do yeng tepengaroh nyeh pie gereja Allah si mat togap kukoh, keedah tungkat rumah yeng togap, yeng noe beguyu beguncang. Yeng seli engku Sen kin mat do lamange. Lamange yeng sutie potue ne: "Tuwowe diret tawu Sen ken engku diret Sen." Lalu lamang yeng sutie agei': "Berang reng yeng ngangkue direte menjedi engku Allah Tuwowe si iyo mat ca' ningal dosoe." Jedi diret mat ca' ati-ati ke' hal pengajar yeng noe mat di lem gereja Allah.
55002020	Jedi hal tue biso diperempamo ke' rumah reng kayo. Rumah reng kayo mat bemacam bereno belo alat perabot pingan mangkok di depore. Do yeng dipulah deri mas ken perak ge'em, do yeng dipulah deri kayu atau pun tanah kayat ge'em. Pingan mas ken pingan perak kin dinilaie jolu yeng berogo, pie pingan kayu ken pingan korang nyeh dinilaie jolu yeng noe berogo.
55002021	Jedi berang reng yeng na' ngenjego direte, yeng ngenjewoh direte deri doso si iyo keedah pingan mas yeng berogo, yeng diajen gei' dipakai diret Sénam. Reng tokoh nyoe mat beguno begi Tuwowe, go iyo dah siyap kei melayan semuya' gewai yeng panci.
55002022	Mangko kau ca' nyiseh ngenjewoh diret kau deri pada' jolu yeng nan dikeingín dikejar le' pada' reng mudoe. Yeng ca' dikejar kau nyeh idup yeng bujor benar, kepecayo yeng mutu, kaseh mengaseh, idup damai ken pada' reng layin yeng arap ken Tuwowe seputeh ati sebeníng derah.
55002023	Reng yeng noe tawu pengajar yeng mat si iyo ayah betengkar betingkis ke' hal agama, pi kau nang na' ponyoe, go bedebat tokoh nyoe mat buduam. Pai ge' gunoe? Gewai tokoh nyoe ngat nyuroh reng betentang becelatu nyem.
55002024	Sedang pelayan Tuwowe mat noe patut betentang becelatu. Iyo ca' nan suyo', ca' sabar lemah lemut ken semuya' urang, ca' tawu ngajar, ca' etat nyem des disensare pun.
55002025	Iyo ca' caro renah ati madah reng yeng ngelawane, pai nawue gola' pada' lawane pun ditulong le' Allah gei' sidoe bebeta' piker, sempayo sidoe nerimoe pengajar yeng mat.
55002026	Lalu sidoe pun mampu telopas jum deri kuwaso Pengelakar, teringátam ken sidoe mat dikotoh le' Pengelakar sampai tuno' taalo' ke' kemawo' iyoam. Mangko diret ca' suyo' sabaram ngajar ken nulong betor.
55003001	So beh, dah jeman ari pengudah nyeh mat benya' nar kesusah kesensare.
55003002	Padah ku susah tei' entam pada' mensiyo dah ari jeman pengudah nyeh ngat mementing direteam; sidoe ayah ken duwit, somong berakah, kebebongko', sidoe gela' menghina ngeremeh beyi' Allah beyi' urang layin pun, ngei'e tuno' taalo' ke' reng tuwoe, noe tawu beterimoe kaseh, noe menduli Allah,
55003003	cum itonge kaseh ken sopai pun. Sidoe nan isin dengki, cum berudu damai, ayah mempulah betor, noe tawu ngator kona' kemawo' direte, gerang, risie ken semuya' yeng bujor yeng benar,
55003004	gela' nipu ngendeyo urang, pemikere noe belubang. Sidoe kememuwa', nan ngaji kepenting direte nyem, nan kereriyane ngejar keidup yeng mewah di deniyo tue, cum itonge na' begelumo ken Allah.
55003005	Sidoe paling rajinge beagama, pie ken kuwaso Allah yeng mampu ngubah atie mat bolei'e. Nyoam tingkah laku gewai ulah pada' mensiyo dah ari pengudah nyeh. Reng tokoh nyoe nang digelumo le' kau.
55003006	Go sidoe panai nayi' ke' rumah urang, ca'-ca'e na' ngajar, pie tujue na' nipu ngotoh betinoe yeng murah dipemuloe, yeng dah borat beban dosoe, yeng nan nunoe bemacam bejenis keingín yeng jat.
55003007	Sidoe betinoe tei' nan ayahe ningo pengajar beru deri sopai pun, ca'e simah belajar, pie noe koloe tetomu ke' pengajar yeng mat.
55003008	Jedi pada' lelaki yeng keca' ngajar betinoe tokoh nyoe paling jat pemikere. Kepecayoe pun noe iyo kepecayo yeng mat peh, pie kepecayo tiru nyem. Malah ken paie sidoe ngelangar pengajar yeng mat, na' po Yanes ken Yambres mie, yeng ngelawan Musa nyomie.
55003009	Pie sidoe yeng ngelawan pengajar yeng mat nyeh cum asele, tam gewaie yeng budu nyeh tentu nyato maloe diperati semuya' urang, na' po tejedi ken Yanes ken Yambres mie.*
55003010	Pie kau si, Timotiusei, tentu noe tokoh nyoe, go kau dah teliti nunoe contoh aku. Kau tawu ken pengajar aku, tawu jum ken tingkah laku ku, tawu ken tuju idup ku, tawu ken kepecayo ku. Kau tawu jum ke' hal kesabar aku, ke' hal kaseh ku, tawu kau jum ken aku togap kukoh des ku disensare.
55003011	Kau tawu jum ken pada' kesusah kesensare yeng dirudu le' aku entam pengajar diret, na' po di Antiokia, a, ken di Ikonium, ken di Kota Listra mie.* Mat bemacam- macamam kesensare yeng dirudu ku dinyoe, pie Tuwowe diretam yeng nulong nyelamát aku deri semuya'e.
55003012	Yeng mat si semuya' reng yeng pecayo ken Kristus Yesus yeng na' nunoe kemawo' Allah si pasti disensare reng.
55003013	A, do reng jat, ken reng yeng gela' nipu urang ken bemacam bejenis lemue si iyo kin lamat kin jat. Iyo nipu urang iyo pun konoe tipu jum.
55003014	Pie kau si ca' tetap patoh ke' pengajar yeng mat yeng kau pelajar mie, yeng dipecayo kau sebulat ati, go kau dah tekenal ken reng yeng ngajar kau mie, mat patut dipecayo.
55003015	Go deri kebiya' kau mie pun kau nan dididik deri Kitap Allaham yeng suci. Mat Kitap Allaham yeng mampu madah kau kei kau tawu mileh jelan yeng mat, tujue sempayo kau ditulong diselamát entam pecayo ken Kristus Yesus.
55003016	Go semuya' yeng ditulis di lem Kitap Allah mat pengasoh Allah tei'am, mangko beguno kei ngajar yeng mat, kei negur reng yeng salah, kei memanci yeng salah, ken kei ngelateh reng pecayo sempayo tetular idup bujor benar.
55003017	Guno makai Kitap Allah tokoh nyoe sempayo tiyap pelayan Allah cukup pada' perlengkap persiyape kei melayan koti-ti pun.
55004001	Posan perentah ku ke' kau tue atas kuwaso diret Allaham ken Kristus Yesus, yeng langko' ngendecing kesalah semuya' mensiyo gi, beyi' yeng gei' idup beyi' yeng dah mati pun. Sen langko' detang agei' secaro agong, nyo' disomah kei rajo di deniyo tue. Nyoam go kau ca' yakinam tuno' taalo' ke' posan perentah ku tue.
55004002	Posan ku tei' ya'am posan payit Allah ca' nan dipadah kau. Ca' serarat siyap, ca' ngemoran madahe, beyi' des reng na' ningoe beyi' des reng kehe ningoe pun. Kau ca' negur betor yeng salah, ca' tegas nonga' reng yeng bedoso, ca' ngemberansang semuya' betor. Ca' serarat nan sabar nyem, nan jerumát ngajar umát ke' hal kepecayo yeng mat.
55004003	-
55004004	Tuam to' kelorong nyo' ngajar kepecayo yeng mat. Tam dah nyoe gi langko' do jengkahe reng ngei'e ningo pengajar yeng mat. Sidoe langko' nompal kelinang des ningo pengajar yeng mat, pie mun ningo pada' gesah cerito yeng noe mat si kelinange dikoba'e. Sidoe na' ngogoe guru direte yeng ngajar cuco' ken keingín sidoe yeng jat, kei nyenáng pemiker direte nyem, kei nyamán iyo ningoe.
55004005	Pie kau si ca' serarat nan jego, ca' sadar, ca' togap kukoh pemiker kau. Ca' sabar ngetate des ngerudu kesusah kesensare. Yeng penting si ca' serarat madah agah panci, go nyoam tugas kau. Kau kin pelayan Allah, mangko ca' sebulat ati ngelaku tugas kau.
55004006	Bungi ku potue pun go aku si noe dam lamat di deniyo tue. Tue dah jengkahe dah nyo' ku ningal deniyo tue. Aku keedah pesaling ayie angur* yeng ketengah disaling.
55004007	Daham gewai ku betempor lem petempor diret yeng panci tue. Daham ku beselumoe, go dah detang dah ke' tuju ku. Aku tetap patoh nekat ke' kepecayo yeng mat; noe ku ningal merayane peh.
55004008	Tue tingal ku nerimoe piyala ku dam, yeng diajen le' Allah nyo' reng yeng diputus Sen bujor benar. Piyala nyoe langko' diunyo' le' Tuwowe diret dah Ari Kiyamát nun gi, des Sen ngakim pada' mensiyo caro bujor benar. Noe iyo ngat akuam peh yeng nerimoe piyala nyoe, pie diunyo' Sen jum ke' semuya' reng yeng rinue nyinto kedetang Allah Tuwowe diret des Sen bebeli' ke' deniyo tue agei'. Tingal nyoe dam yeng ku nantie.
55004009	Sedepat-depate copatam kau manu ke' aku, Timotiusei,
55004010	go Demas yeng selomo namah aku dah ningal aku di lem kesensare ku nun, tam iyo tamá' goma' ken jolu di deniyo tue nyem; iyo noe mementing na' madah agah panci. Iyo dah ke' Tesalonika dah. Sedang Kreskis dah ke' peloya' Galatia. Ken Titus nyeh ke' peloya' Dalmatia.
55004011	Tingal Lukas dam yeng namah ku dinun. Jedi kau copatam kinun. Boh ngaja' Markus jum kei namah kau kinun, go iyo paling beguno begi aku melayan dinun.
55004012	Tikikus si dah diutus ku nyo' melayan di Epesus die.
55004013	Dah kau na' detang kinun beyie jum beju jubah ku yeng ditingal ku mie di rumah Karpus di kota Troas. A, beyie jum pada' buko' ku, terutamoe pada' buko' yeng ditulis di kuli' binatang.*
55004014	-
55004015	Awas beh, gola' do kau betomu ken Aleksander, tukang temego nyeh, go iyo beneko reno kejate ken aku. Mat ca' ati-ati kau, go iyo kuwat nar nentang pengajar diret. Ja'e Tuwowe diretam langko' melas gewaie tokoh nyoe.
55004016	A, ke' hal aku dipecaro nyeh, pertamo kali aku dipecaro si siko' pun cum reng yeng mendukong aku, ku ditingal ming le' pada' kaban ku. Ja'e kiroe Allah ngelon gewai sidoe yeng ningal ku ponyoe.
55004017	Pie go Tuwowe diret si tetap nyeroto nulong aku, ngunyo' kuwaso ke' aku sempayo aku mampu madah agah panci ke' semuya' segenoe, sampai pada' suku benso yeng noe Yahudi pun mampu ningoe. Lalu aku pun dirampas Sen deri nyawo singa, noam ku diukum mati.*
55004018	Mat Tuwowe diretam yeng langko' ngerampas aku deri pai-pai pun yeng jat yeng tejedi ke' aku! Sen yeng nulong aku ken meyie aku ke' kediyam Sen di serugo nun! Patutam Sen diagong seora'-ora'eam. Amin.
55004019	Padaham salam aku ke' Priskila ken Akwila ken pada' seberumah Onesiporus.
55004020	Erastus manseh di Korintus. Do Tropimus si ditingal ku di Miletus, go iyo saki'.
55004021	Lokasam kau kinun beh, empong tue gei' bolum munsim colap tue gi. Ebulus, Pudes, Linus, Klaudia, ken pada' menyadie seimán yeng layin pun ngirum salam ke' kau.
55004022	Salam ku ke' kau kiroe Tuwowe diret nyeroto nulong kau. Ku minta' ke' Allah kei pengunyo' pengaseh Sen nan nyeroto kau.*
56001001	Surat tue deri aku Paulus, ulun amo Allah ken pelantar posan Yesus Kristus. Aku ditugas le' Sen sempayo pada' reng yeng ditinting ditujun le' Allah mampu pecayo ken Sen, sempayo sidoe tawu ken pengajar yeng mat, gei' mampu idup cuco' ken kemawo' Allah.
56001002	Arap diret ya'am diret langko' idup seora'-ora'eam. Nyoam bungkong kepecayo ken pengajar yeng mat. Diret Allaham, yeng noe koloe memuloe, bejenyi deri asal muloe nyomiam na' ngunyo' idup nyoe ke' diret,
56001003	ja'e go caro Sen ngunyo'e ke' diret berue dijelas dipadah di lem posan payit Sen pas ke' jengkah tue yeng ditetap le' Sen. A, caro Sen madah ngenjelase pun mat ngelalu pada' pelantar posan Sen, benso aku yeng ditugas dipecayo Sen kei madah posan payit nyoe. Mat Allah, Penulong diret, yeng nyuroh merentah aku ca' madahe. Nyoam tugas aku, pelantar posan Sen.
56001004	Surat tue ke' Titus yeng ku kaseh na' po ana' diret kuam, go diret mat seimán. Salam damai ken berekat dolat deri Allah Apa' ken Kristus Yesus Penulong diret.
56001005	Jedi aku ningal kau di Kreta tue, Titusei, sempayo kau ngurus pada' gewai diret yeng bolum santo'. Ge'em kei kau nentu netap ketuwo umát di tiyap kota, cuco' ken yeng ku posan ke' kau nyomie.
56001006	Jedi ketuwo umát nyeh ca' yeng idupe bujor benar, yeng noe becelo teradap betore pun. Binie ca' siko'am, ken iyo ca' mutu ken binie nyoe. Ca' yeng ana'e pecayo jum, yeng saksie panci. Nang na' mileh reng yeng ana'e dunal, yeng pelawan, yeng noe tuno' ke' ino' apa'e.
56001007	Go ketuwo umát kin pelayan Allah nyo' ngurus ngator gereja Sen, mangko idupe ca' bujor benar. - Noe biso reng yeng pereriyah, yeng somong bongko', - noe biso reng yeng murah godie, - noe biso reng yeng gela' mabo', - noe biso reng yeng gerang, - noe biso reng yeng na' melayan go tamá' ken duwit.
56001008	Pie yeng dipileh kei ketuwo tei' ca' reng yeng ayah nerimoe temuwai tentamui, - ca' ayah nulong betore. - ca' yeng panai ngator idup direte. - ca' reng yeng bujor benar, yeng patoh ke' Allah, ken yeng tawu ngenjego direte.
56001009	- Ca' yeng togap kukoh patoh ke' posan payit yeng mat yeng tawu dipecayo, na' po yeng diajar ke' iyo. Go mun iyo patoh ke' posan payit yeng mat nyeh iyo mampu ngajar ngem- beransang urang makai pengajar yeng mat yeng benar. Ge'em mampu iyo negur reng yeng ngelawan posan payit yeng mat, sempayo reng tawu ken kesalahe. Nyoe sarat ketuwo umát gereja.
56001010	Diret mat ca' tawu negur reng yeng ngelawan pengajar yeng mat, go mat benya' nar reng yeng somong, yeng ngei'e tuno' taalo' ke' pai-pai pun, semingkin sidoe deri agama Yahudi yeng gei' nekat ke' pada' ukum Musa. Pengajar sidoe omóng kosong nyem, mat cum gunoe, pie benya' reng yeng ditipu dipemuloe.
56001011	Mangko kau ca' nompal nyawo sidoe gei' noe ngomóng tokoh nyoe. Go do reng sampai sepemili bis tepengaroh tam pengajar sidoe yeng salah nyeh. Sidoe ngajar yeng paling noe patut diajar, go kebosai ati sidoe na' buleh duwit nyem, noe iyo na' nulong urang peh. Jedi mátam.
56001012	Kau ca' tegas negur semuya' umát di Kreta tue. Kin do tukang omóng diret sidoe yeng koloe bepadah ken "Semuya' reng Kreta paling pememuloe, paling jat, pelesu bekerejo pie paling gela' makan," jie.
56001013	Mat konoe nar pemadah tukang omóng sidoe mie. Mangko kau ca' tegas negur pada' umát di Kreta, sempayo sidoe na'e nekat ke' kepecayo yeng mat.
56001014	Go mun sidoe dah nekat ke' kepecayo yeng mat si tentu sidoe noam ningo menduli pada' gesah cerito Yahudi yeng noe mat, noam sidoe tuno' ke' pada' pelator perentah yeng dipulah le' mensiyo yeng nyelimpang deri agah panci yeng mat.
56001015	Pada' reng yeng dipulah Allah suci bereseh si mat suci bereseham. Pie pada' reng yeng jat mun iyo ngei'e pecayo si iyo mat tetap jatam, deri gewai ulah ati pemikere sampai ke' ati kocite nun, mat cumam yeng suci bereseh di iyo.
56001016	Jie sidoe si sidoe tekenale ken Allah, pie sidoe mat noe tekenal ken Sen. Kenyatoe deri gewai ulah sidoe. Sidoe patut dikerisie dikebising, go sidoe kehe tuno' taalo' ke' Allah. Pie Allah si tawu Sen ken sidoe mat noe pecayo, mangko semuya' gewai sidoe sikit pun cum yeng diterimoe le' Allah. Nyoe ke' hal reng yeng ngajar yeng noe mat.
56002001	Pie kau si ca' ngajar yeng cuco' ken pengajar yeng mat yeng benar, Titusei.
56002002	Misale begi reng lelaki yeng tuwo. Sidoe ca' tawu ngenjego direte. Gewaie ca' yeng patut dihormát reng. Pemikere ca' noe tumang aming. Ca' patoh ke' kepecayo yeng mat, ca' ngaseh betor seputeh ati, ken ca' togap kukoh des disensare pun.
56002003	Jedi reng betinoe yeng tuwo pun ponyoe jum. Gewai ulah tingkah laku reng betinoe yeng tuwo ca' yeng patut begi reng yeng engku Allah. Sidoe nang na' gela' maner ngomel, nang na' nyabong betore. Nang na' ketageh tam canu tuwa' ara'. Sidoe ca' ngajar yeng panci yeng benar,
56002004	ento' ngendidik umát betinoe yeng gei' mudoe. Go umát betinoe yeng gei' mudoe nyeh mat ca' diajar dididik gei' iyo kaseh ken lakie ken ana'e,
56002005	gei' pemikere bulat ken togap kukoh, gei' iyo topun, gei' iyo rajing bekoyo bekerejo di rumah tangoe direte, gei' iyo panci atie, gei' iyo tuno' taalo' ke' lakie. Mun reng betinoe bekeragam panci tokoh nyoe si tentu posan payit Allah yeng langko' dipugi reng, cum alor nyo' reng menghina ngeremeh pengajar diret.
56002006	Jedi reng lelaki yeng mudoe ponyoe jum, ca' dinasehat, ca' diajar, gei' sidoe bulat ken togap
56002007	beyi' deri pemikere lalu ke' tingkah lakue. Diret kauam, Titusei, kei contoh yeng panci, sempayo sidoe nunoe pada' gewai ulah tingkah laku panci kau. Kau ca' ngajar Kitap Allah seputeh ati, caro sungoh-sungoh.
56002008	Ca' ngajar yeng mat yeng benar, gei' noe dicelo reng. Maksute sempayo reng yeng ngelawan diret pengabise kererawoe, go cum tetomu ke' hal yeng jat nyo' iyo nokan ngendudoh diret.
56002009	Jedi pada' ulun amo reng ponyoe jum, sidoe ca' tuno' taalo' ke' tuwowe di lem gewai pai-pai pun. Sidoe ca' nan nyenáng ati tuwowe nyem. Nang na' sidoe nungkang ngembuler kemawo' tuwowe nyeh.
56002010	Nang na' sidoe ngomeh ngelit. Kebelike sidoe ca' nganyoe ngembokti ke' tuwowe ken tingkah laku sidoe mat bujor benar, tawu dipecayo. Mun keragam sidoe panci ponyoe mangko reng layin pun tetari' ke' pengajar diret ke' hal Allah Penulong diret. Mat patutam diret ca' idup bujor benar,
56002011	go pengunyo' pengaseh Allah yeng modas-modas nyeh dah dianyoe Sen dah ke' mensiyo, gei' sempayo semuya' mensiyo mampu ditulong diselamát Sen.
56002012	Mat pengunyo' pengaseh Sen nyoam yeng ngajar ngendidik diret, gei' diret nula' pada' gewai ulah yeng betungkang ken kemawo' Allah, gei' diret nyiseh keingín deniyo tue. Pengunyo' pengaseh Sénam yeng ngendidik diret gei' diret ngenjego ken nahán pemiker gewai diret, ge'em sempayo diret idup bujor benar, ken patoh ke' Allah, telanyor diret gei' idup di deniyo tue.
56002013	Gei' tue si diret gei' nantie nungu yeng diarap le' diret, yeng nyuroh ati diret ayah bikaham, ya'am kedetang Yesus Kristus Penulong diret, Allah yeng rajo kuwaso. Seruroh deniyo tue cagar merati keagonge des iyo detang gi. Nyoam arap diret!
