56002014	Mat Yesusam yeng nyerah direte mati ngenti diret. Iyo mati kei ngelopas diret deri semuya' kuwaso doso. Maksute na' ngembereseh diret, gei' diret dipelopas deri doso, gei' diret menjedi umát engku diret iyoam. Kona' iyo sempayo diret paling bekaseh betoleh nan bekelaku panci.
56002015	Nyoame', Titusei, yeng ca' nan diajar kau. Kau ca' ngemberansang ken negur pada' umát, go kau mat behak di lem gewai tue. Nang na' reng memuda' kau.
56003001	Jedi pada' umát ca' dipadah diingát ken tue, ya'am diret ca' tuno' taalo' ke' pemerentah yeng mimpin diret. Diret ca' taát, ca' serarat relo ngenggewai sipat pai-pai pun yeng panci yeng benar.
56003002	Nang na' diret menghina ngeremeh sopai pun. Nang na' diret betengkar betingkis. Diret ca' lemah lemut ken adel, ca' serarat renah ati, suyo' sabar ken semuya' urang.
56003003	Go diret nyomie pun tupal budu jum, ngei' tuno' taalo' ke' sopai pun, sosat tam dikelakar. Diret nyomie dipeulun le' beneko reno keingín napsu ken kemawo' degin nyem. Nan serarat jat nyem keidup diret, serarat isin dengki, patutam go diret dikebising betor. Diret pun nan serarat bising nyem siko' ken betor. Ponyoam keidup diret nyomie.
56003004	Pie dah nyoe Allah Penulong diret nganyoe kepanci Sen ken kaseh Sen ke' diret,
56003005	lalu Sen nulong nyelamát diret. Noe iyo pekuleh kepanci gewai diret peh, pie entam kekaseh diret Sénam. Caro Sen nulong nyelamát diret go Sen ngapus doso diret ketiko diret diado agei', diunyo' idup beru le' Roh Sen.
56003006	Paling buwar Allah ngunyo' Roh Sen ke' semuya' diret yeng pecayo, ento' semuya' keperelu diret. Nyoe pun tam gewai Yesus Kristus Penulong diret.
56003007	Kejedie entam pengunyo' pengaseh Allah yeng modas-modas nyeh diret pun diangap Sen bujor benar. Maksut Sen sempayo diret menjedi lileh nyawo Sen, yeng dilileh Sen idup yeng cum berudu mati. Nyoam arap diret.
56003008	Posan payit tue mat-mátam, mat tawu dipecayo. Kona' ati ku kau ca' mementing serarat nan ngajar tue caro teliti, go nyoe pasti berasel, do gunoe begi semuya' mensiyo. Dah sidoe yeng pecayo ken Allah jelas tawu ken posan payit yeng mat tue, mangko sidoe langko' mementing ngelaku gewai yeng panci yeng benar.
56003009	Pie pengajar yeng ngerusa' ngerenoh yeng cum gunoe si ca' dikiyas kau. Mat do reng yeng gela' betengkar becelatu ke' hal agama, pie nyoe mat gewai budu. Do yeng gela' ngajar pada' cerito ke' hal keturun buboh ampeh, yeng gela' betentang betengkar lem ukum agama. Pie gewai tokoh nyoe ngerusa' nyem, cum gunoe. Nyoe ca' dikiyas kau jum.
56003010	A, reng yeng ngaca' ngarang umát ken pengajar yeng salah nyeh ca' ditegur. Mun iyo ngei'e berubah ca' ditegur agei'. Pie mun iyo gei' manseh nyempokang ngajar yeng salah nyeh ca' disiseh le' diret.
56003011	Diret kin jelas ken reng tokoh nyoe dah mileh jelan yeng salah. Doso direte yeng ngembokti ken pengajare mat salah.*
56003012	Ku dah mutuse na' ngutus Artemas atau pun Tikikus ke' kau ditue. Dah sidoe detang kitue kau copatam manu ke' aku di kota Nicopolis, beh? Go aku munsim colap tue langko' diyam dinyoe.
56003013	Apolos ken Senas yeng ahli ukum nyeh ca' ditulong sekemampu kam, gei' cum kekurange des sidoe na' melaju pejelane gi.
56003014	Pada' umát diret ca' numán ngelateh direte gei' nan ngenggewai yeng panci, nulong reng yeng saki' joreh, go mun gewai ponyoe keidup diret berinas.
56003015	Salam deri pada' kaban ku dinun. Padaham salam kami ke' pada' kaban kami yeng seimán. Ku minta' ke' Allah kei pengunyo' pengaseh Sen nan nyeroto semuya' kam.
57001001	Surat tue deri aku Paulus, yeng dipenjero tam ku melayan Yesus Kristus, ken deri Timotius, menyadie diret seimán. Ditulis ke' Pilemon, kaban kerabat yeng sepelayan ken kami,
57001002	ken ke' Apia*, menyadie diret yeng seimán; ge'em ke' Arkipus yeng seati ken kami beperang secaro roh, ken ke' pada' umát yeng bekumpol semeyang di rumah kau.
57001003	Salam damai ken berekat dolat deri Allah Apa' diret ken Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret.
57001004	Des ku bedoa nyo' kau, Pilemonei, aku nan serarat besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Allah ku,
57001005	go aku mat dah ningo ken kepecayo kau gei' togap ken Yesus Tuwowe diret; a, ge'em ken kau mat kaseh ken pada' umát engku Sen.
57001006	Ku bedoa minta' gei' sempayo mat do asele kau begewol begelumo ken reng yeng sepecayo, sempayo kau mat jelas tawu ken semuya' berekat dolat diret tam diret tekawum lem Kristus.
57001007	Ati ku mat teibor, mat ayah bikaham soe, ngaji kaseh kau, menyadie ku yeng seimánei, tam ku dah ningo caro kau ngibor ngemberansang ati pada' umát engku Allah.
57001008	-
57001009	Mangko deri nyoe mat do yeng ku na' muhún mampal ke' kau, Pilemonei. Kenaken si mat do hak ku kiro ku na' nyuroh merentah kau gei' kau ngelaku yeng patut yeng ca' digewai kau, tam aku mat pelantar posan Kristus. Pie tam kaseh diret siko' ken betore jedi tue gei' muhún mampal gei' minta' nyemujor nyem ke' kau. Jedi mátam te'. Aku Paulus, yeng delu dah tuwo--tue ku dipenjero jum tam ku melayan Yesus Kristus--
57001010	mat akuam to' yeng muhún mampal ke' kau. Jedi yeng na' ku muhún mampal tei' ya'am ke' hal ana' ku yeng ku ado secaro roh di lem penjero nun. Yeng ku maksut tei' ya'am Guno.*
57001011	Jedi ke' hal reng tue si nyomie iyo mat noe beguno begi kau, pie tue mat dah beguno nar dah begi diret duwo pun.
57001012	Jedi mat reng tuam, ana' buwah kekaseh ati ku, yeng ku kirum bebeli' pulang ke' kau.
57001013	Kona' ati ku si, pie nyoe mun ngat ngaji kemawo' diret ku, aku ingín na' nahán iyo diyam ken aku dinun, kei iyo ngewakel kau kei nulong aku nongah ku gei' dipenjero tam ku madah agah panci nyeh.
57001014	Pie ku ngei' ku ditulong kau secaro pakso; aku ingín ditulong kau ken ati kau yeng mat ingín jum na' nulong aku. Mangko lem hal tue pun ku ngei' ku mutuse nahán iyo dinun mun gei' bolum disetuju le' kau.
57001015	A, ge'em nyuroh ku noe nahán iyo diyam ken aku dinun pun go kaji ku nun pai nawue iyo dipencar ken kau sementaro mie mat do tujue, sempayo iyo mampu pulang ke' kau to' selamat lamateam. Jedi kaji ku semuya' tue mat kei nuntong kemawo' Allah jum.
57001016	Go gei' nyomie si iyo engkas betuwowe nyem ke' kau, pie tue si iyo lobeh deri nyoe. Malah ken paie dah bemenyadie dah ken kau, go iyo mat menyadie kekaseh diret. Semalang ke' aku ge'e paling kaseh ku ken iyo, sa'am go kau, tentu kau kepala' kaseh ken iyo, beyi' secaro mensiyo beyi' secaro roh, tam kam mat dah segelumo dah ken Tuwowe.
57001017	Jedi pulang ke' paner ku tadie, yeng ku minta' deri kau tei' ya'am gei' kau nyamut nerimoe iyo na' po kau nyamut nerimoe aku, mun kau mat ngangap aku sekaban segelumo ken kau, pie.
57001018	A, umpamoe do kesalahe, atau pun gola' do ketekore ken kau, nyoe ca' ditageh ke' aku, beh?
57001019	A, tue ku nulise ken jeri diret kuam: Aku, Paulus, nangong ngembeyare. Ja'e mun na' nageh utang nyeh go yeng kau ken aku pun do, ya'am keidup kau nyeh!
57001020	Jedi mátam, menyadie ku yeng seimánei. Ku arap gei' sempayo kau mat "beguno" nyo' aku jum! Go diret mat segelumo ken Tuwowe diret. Tuntongam yeng ku pinta' tue, gei' sempayo ati ku mat teibor teberansang, tam diret mat tekawum lem Kristus.
57001021	A, ku nulis tue pun go ku yakin ken kau langko' pasti ngenggewai pai yeng ku pinta'. Malah ken paie ku tawu ken kau mat ngenggewaie lebeh deri pado yeng ku pinta' ke' kau.
57001022	A, ge'em aku minta' gei' kau nyiyáp arong nyo' aku ditue, go aku mat yakin arap ken Allah mat cagar ngabol doa kam nyo' aku mampu ngulang kam ditue.
57001023	Epapras yeng dipenjero ken aku dinun tam iyo melayan Yesus Kristus nyeh madah salame ke' kam ditue.
57001024	Salam jum deri Markus, Aristarkus, Demas, ken Lukas, yeng melayan beroto ken aku.
57001025	Ku minta' ke' Allah kei pengunyo' pengaseh deri Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret nan nyeroto roh kau.
58001001	Gei' jemán nyomie si Allah mat erat ngomóng ken akei' puyang diret; bemacam bejenis caro Sen madah posan payit Sen ngelalu penijum Sen yeng benya' nyeh.
58001002	Pie dah jemán pengudah tue si Sen dah lansong ngelalu ana' Sénam ngomóng ken diret. Sen mulah langi' ken tanah ken semuya' isei'e mie pun ngelalu Ana' Sen nyoam, mangko Sen nujah ngendeleh Ana' Sen nyoam kei lileh nyawo Sen yeng mangkue semuya' segeloe.
58001003	Iyo yeng manyah keagong Allah yeng temencilang. Iyo mat gemar yeng ngenyato diret Allaham: po Allah po iyo. Iyoam yeng noyu merintu ken nahán semuya' segeloe ken kebiso mulute nyem. Iyoam yeng nyuci ngembereseh doso mensiyo. Lalu dah gewaie nyoe santo' nyeh iyo mat dudo' di piya' kanán Allah yeng Rajo Kuwaso yeng Rajo Tingie kei merentah beroto ken Sen.
58001004	Jedi mátam. Ke' hal Ana' Sen tei' deri demoe sampai ke' pangkate pun iyo mat jewoh tingie deri pada' melekat pun. Demoe yeng diunyo' le' Allah kin mat jewoh tekemuko deri demo pada' melekat. Ponyoe jum pangkate. Allah nyuroh pangkate ca' paling tingie deri pada' melekat nyeh. Nyoe kin jelas,
58001005	go omóng Sen ken pada' melekat nyeh noe na' po omóng Sen ken Ana' Sen. Jie Sen nyingka' Ana' Sen mie: Kau to' ana' aku, Aku pun to' Apa' kau, jie Sen nyingka' Ana' Sen. Ge'em jie Sen separoe di layin Sen ngomóng bungi potue, Aku kei Apa' iyo, iyo kei ana' aku, jie Sen.* Pie Sen noe koloe ngomóng bungi nyoe ken pada' melekat Sen siko' pun.
58001006	A, dah nyoe, des Allah ngutus Ana' Sen yeng jula' nyeh ke' deniyo tue, jie Sen nyingka' pada' melekat Sen tei', Kam ca' nyomah ke' iyo, jie Sen.
58001007	Ge'em jie Sen ke' hal pada' melekat tei', Ku mulah melekat Ku mie to' melayan Aku; disuroh Ku kitue kinyoe keedah angín buwowe yeng deras, ken keedah kengkitar, jie Sen.
58001008	Pie jie Sen ke' hal ana' Sen tei', Kau mat Allah yeng langko' merentah seora'-ora'eam. Mat bujor benaram caro kau merentah pada' reng yeng berajo ke' kau.
58001009	Kau paling ayah ken tingkah laku yeng bujor benar, sie kau ken tingkah laku yeng nungkang pemadah Allah. Mangko Aku, Allah kau, mat ninting nujun kau kei rajo, yeng bepangkat tingie deri pada' betor kau pun. Pada' umát pun mat ayah bikaham tam kau dipileh kei rajo, jie Sen. (Masmur 45:6-7)
58001010	A, ge'em jie Sen, Kau mat Tuwowe semuya' segelo, asal muloe mie kauam yeng mulah deniyo tue. Langi' pun pempulah jeri diret kauam.
58001011	Semuya' jolu ke' deng nyoe langko' losi nayáp, pie kau serarat nan doam. Pada' langi' ken tanah nyeh cagar layue buro' po pekakas pekayan,
58001012	langko' digiling po reng ngenggiling kerampan, digenti po reng keberai ngenti bejue. Pie kau si serarat samoam, cum berubah. Kau nan do seora'-ora'eam, jie Sen nyingka' Ana' Sen. (Masmur 102:25-27)
58001013	Ge'em jie Sen, Kau dudo' merentah kei rajo di piya' kanán Ku tue, sampai Ku nyuroh pada' munsoh kau kei penyampang kaki kau, jie Sen. (Masmur 110:1 Pie Sen noe koloe ngomóng bungi nyoe ken pada' melekat Sen siko' pun.
58001014	Go melekat Sen kin roh yeng kontan kei melayan Sen. Pie sidoe diutus Sen kei nulong pada' reng yeng nerimoe pengunyo' Sen, ya'am reng yeng na' ditulong diselamát Sen. Mangko mat jelasam ken Ana' Sen tei' mat jewoh tingie tekemuko deri pada' melekat pun.
58002001	Mangko diret mat ca' teliti nar tuno' ke' posan payit yeng dipadah ke' diret, gola' diret anyút deri kepecayo diret,
58002002	-
58002003	lalu mat diukum Sen. Gei' jemán nyomie pun ponyoe jum. Posan payit Sen yeng dilantar le' melekat Sen ke' akei' puyang diret mie pun mat posan payit yeng mat. Mangko sopai pun yeng nungkang ngelangare sikit pun mat diukum setimpal ken pelangare. A, semalang ke' sidoe yeng ngelangar posan payit nyoe ge'e, diukum Sen, sa'am go diret tue, mun diret ngeremeh pemadah Sen yeng ugas panciam yeng kei nulong nyelamát diret jemán tue. Noe ken diret luput deri ukum Sen! Jedi asale mie caro Sen kei nulong nyelamát diret nyeh mat dipadah le' Tuwowe diret ke' urang. Lalu sidoe yeng ningo iyo mat ngemboktie ke' diret.
58002004	Allah pun ngemboktie jum ken pada' petanah petano ken keenah keaneh bemacam bejenis yeng Sen pulah ngelalu sidoe. Sen ngemboktie jum ken pada' kemampu deri Roh Sen yeng dijemín Sen cuco' ken kemawo' Sen. A, ngaso pemadah Sen dah dibokti sejelas-jelas ponyoe si noe ken diret luput deri ukum Sen, mun diret noe mendulie.
58002005	Jedi mátam te'. Pulang ke' pada' melekat tei' noe iyo melekat peh yeng mangkue meloh di deniyo yeng beru yeng langko' dipulah Sen gi, po jie ku tadie,
58002006	pie kebelike mensiyo die. Go do yeng ditulis mie bungie potue, O Allah, gopai go Den ngaji pada' mensiyo? Gopai go Den na' ngaseh ana' mensiyo nyeh?
58002007	Go gei' sementaro tue si gei' disuroh Den beroh pangkate deri melekat nyeh, pie dah nyoe si mat diagong dihormát Den.
58002008	Den nyuroh semuya' segeloe ca' tekempojal di beroh jempoe kakie, jie lem Kitap Sen. (Masmur 8:4-6) Maksute kin semuya' segeloe disuroh Sen ca' tuno' ke' mensiyo; mat cumam yeng noe dipangkue dipelohe. Pie gei' tue si diret gei' mat bolum merati mensiyo mangkue meloh semuya' segeloe.
58002009	Yeng diperati diret dah diagong dihormát tue si ya'am Yesus! Nyoam caro Allah nuntong jenyi Sen lem Kitap Sen tadie. Di lem waktu sejurus mie si Yesus mat disuroh Sen renah kit deri melekat, gei' sempayo iyo ngerudu kesensare sampai mati nyo' semuya' segeno mensiyo. Nyoe pun tam pengunyo' pengaseh Allaham. Lalu tam iyo mat relo mati ponyoe dah nyoe iyo mat diagong dihormát le' Allah!
58002010	Tuju maksut Allah kin kei semuya' segeno ana' Sen yeng layin pun tekawum jum di lem keagong diret Sénam. Go mat Allaham yeng mulah semuya' segeloe; dipulah Sen pun nyo' keagong diret Sénam. (Pie koti Sen mampu meyie diret mensiyo yeng dah rusa' tam doso sampai tekawum lem keagong Sen?) Caro Sen ngenggewaie mat paling konoam, go Sen nyuroh Ana' diret Sénam ca' ngerudu kesensare sampai mati. Maksut Sen gei' cum kekurang kemalang caro Sen nulong nyelamát diret, go utang doso diret kin dibeyar le' Ana' diret Sénam. Mangko mat Ana' Sen Yesus yeng kei Pengulu yeng ngoba' jelan gei' semuya' ana' Sen yeng layin mampu tekawum jum lem keagong Sen, cuco' ken rencana Sen deri nyomiam.
58002011	Jedi maksut ku ngendemo diret "pada' ana' Sen yeng layin" kin go mat siko'am Apa' diret. Beyi' Yesus yeng nyuci ngembereseh pada' ana' Sen yeng layin, beyi' pun yeng disurohe suci bereseh nyeh, pie mat siko'am Apa' diret. Nyoam sebape Yesus mat noe rasoe ngangkue diret kei menyadie iyo (go diret pun mat seApa'am).
58002012	Kin jie iyo nyingka' Apa'e mie, Aku langko' madah demo Den ke' pada' menyadie ku; des umát Den bekumpol semeyang aku langko' mugi Den, jie. (Masmur 22:22)
58002013	Do jum omónge yeng layin yeng bungie potue, Aku si arap ken Sénam, jie. A, dah nyoe do jum omónge yeng layin bungie potue, Peratiam aku tue, ken pada' ana' Sen yeng diunyo' Sen ke' aku, jie. (Yesaya 8:17-18)
58002014	Jedi yeng didemo pada' ana' Sen tei' mat mensiyo yeng bedegin bederah. Mangko Yesus pun relo nyerupo direte ken pada' mensiyo; mat menjedi mensiyo yeng bedegin bederah sempayo iyo tawu mati. Tuju maksute tei' sempayo ngelalu iyo mati nyeh kuwaso Pengelakar mat dipunah ranaham, yeng asal muloe bekuwaso nyuroh pada' mensiyo ca' mati.
58002015	Jedi tuju maksut Yesus munah ranah kuwaso Pengelakar nyeh ya'am sempayo pada' mensiyo yeng seumor idupe dipeulun tam gola' ken mati nyeh pie tue dah dipelopas dah. Caroe ken kemati direteam.
58002016	A, yeng dipelopase kin mat mensiyoam! Noe iyo melekat peh yeng mati, pie mensiyo die. Mangko noe iyo melekat peh yeng ditulonge lem gewai Yesus yeng mati nyeh, pie pada' keturun Abraham die.
58002017	Jedi Ana' Allah mat menjedi pelayan agong yeng ento' nulong mensiyo. Ento' persiyape menjedi pelayan agong nyeh iyo mat ca' menjedi mensiyo po pada' menyadie nyeh; mat ca' ngerudu semuya' segeloe yeng dirudu le' mensiyo. Maksute sempayo iyo mat menjedi pelayan agong yeng kaseh, yeng mutu, yeng tawu diarap, gei' iyo ngurus memanci ubong diret ken Allah. Maksute iyoam yeng meyie pesaling derah gei' doso mensiyo dielon.
58002018	Jedi mátam te'. Iyo mampu nulong diret yeng nan digudo nyeh go iyo pun koloe ngerudu kesensare, koloe digudo jum na' po diret. A, tuju iyo nulong nyelamát mensiyo pun gei' diret tekawum lem keagong Allah, cuco' ken rencana Sen deri nyomiam.
58003001	Jedi mátam. Yesus mat pelantar posan ken pelayan agong di lem kepecayo yeng diangkue diret. Mangko menyadie seimán yeng engku Sen, yeng diunang diamie nyo' empue serugo: diret si mat ca' nan serarat ngaji ngenggenáng iyoam.
58003002	Go iyo mat mutu melayan Allah yeng netape nyo' gewaie nyoe, na' po Musa pun mutu melayan pada' umát di rumah Allah mie.
58003003	-
58003004	Pie Yesus si patut dihormát diagong lebeh deri Musa pun. Ibarat ke' rumah din mun do rumah kin maksute do yeng mulahe; a, ken reng yeng mulahe kin tentu lebeh dihormát deri rumah yeng dipulahe. Kenaken si mat Allaham yeng mulah semuya' segeloe. Pie yeng ku maksut potue ne; na' po reng yeng mulah rumah lebeh dihormát deri rumah yeng dipulahe, ponyoe jum Yesus, mat patut dihormát diagong lebeh deri Musa.
58003005	Musa si mat mutu melayan semuya' seberumah Allah mie. Gewaie pun kei gemar beyang yeng ketiko nyoe bolum dipadah dijelas; gei' langko'e nyem.
58003006	Pie Kristus si mat Ana' Sen, yeng mangkue meloh pada' seberumah Sen. Yeng didemo seberumah Sen tei' ya'am diret, pie maksute diret yeng yakin bepigang ke' arap diret, yeng serarat beiyap bebungah tam arap nyoe.
58003007	Mangko diret mat ca' ningo yeng dipadah le' Roh Allah yeng suci mie yeng bungie potue, Tue, des kam ningo pemadah Aku,
58003008	nang na' koring ati kam, na' po akei' puyang kam mie yeng nungkang ken ngaca' ngarang Aku, yeng nguji Aku di padang puwang nun mie.
58003009	Sampai empat puloh tawun sidoe nan merati pada' gewai Ku mie, ken teger nguji Aku, jie Sen.
58003010	Mangko Ku mat godie ken pada' sidoe lapis nyoe. Ti Ku ati sidoe nan serarat nyimpang deri yeng mat. Sidoe tarah ke' noe setujue ken tingkah laku Aku, jie Sen.
58003011	Mangko Aku mat godie, jie Sen, lalu Aku besumpah ken sidoe pasti noe ngicap kenyamán beronga' berenti ken Aku, jie Sen. (Mas 94:7-11)
58003012	Jedi mátam, menyadie ku yeng seimánei. Diret mat ca' bejego gei' cum siko' pun yeng nungkang yeng ningal Allah yeng idup, tam atie yeng jat yeng noe pecayo ken jenyi Sen.
58003013	Diret mat ca' bejego, ken ca' serarat ngemberansang siko' ken betore tiyap ari, telanyor gei' jeman tue. Maksute gei' siko' pun cum deri diret yeng atie koring tam dikelakar le' doso.
58003014	Diret kin dah tekawum lem berekat dolat Kristus yeng tan. Maksute kin diret pasti diberekat dolat Sen sal ge' arap diret yeng deri asal muloe mie tetap nan dipigang diret caro togap kukoh sampai ke' pengudahe gi.
58003015	Kin jie Kitap Sen tadie, Tue des kam ningo pemadah Aku, nang na' koring ati kam, po des sidoe nungkang Aku nyomie, jie Sen. (Masmur 94:7-8)
58003016	Nyeh yeng ningo posan Sen lalu nungkange mie sopailah? Noe peh pada' desiyan yeng dah diiring Kei' Musa pamus deri Mesir mie?
58003017	Ken yeng dikegodie le' Allah empat puloh tawun pelamate mie sopailah? Noe peh pada' desiyan yeng bedoso, lalu bemati-mati melintang pukang di padang nun?
58003018	A, ken desiyan yeng disumpah Sen gei' noe ngicap kenyamán beronga' berenti ken Sen nyeh mat sopailah? Noe peh desiyan yeng noe tuno' taalo' ke' Sen?
58003019	Mangko dinyoam diret mat jelas, ken desiyan noe diijin Sen tamoe ke' nenggeri Kanaan mie tam desiyan noe pecayo ken jenyi Sen.
58004001	Jedi mátam. Ke' hal jenyi Allah si go jenyi Sen gei' laku; gei' do jenyi Sen yeng na' dituntong, gei' sempayo diret mat ngicap kenyamán idup seperonga' seperenti ken Sen. Mangko diret mat ca' jego, gola' do deri diret yeng angape noe detang ke' tujue.
58004002	Go agah panci kin dah dipadah ke' diret jum, na' po yeng dipadah ke' desiyan mie. Pie desiyan si, numo' pun desiyan ningoe, pie mat cum berekate begi desiyan, entam desiyan mat noe pecayoe.
58004003	Mangko diret yeng pecayo die yeng tekawum ngicap kenyamán seperonga' seperenti ken Sen. Pie yeng noe pecayo ken jenyi Sen si mat didah Sen, po jie Sen nyomie bungie potue, Aku, jie Sen, mat godie ken sidoe, mangko Ku besumpah ken sidoe pasti noe tekawum ngicap kenyamán beronga' berenti ken Aku, jie Sen. (Masmur 94:11) Teruhale tuju maksut Sen deri nyomie si gei' desiyan pun mat seperonga' seperentiam ken Sen, go gewai Sen kin mat dah santo'am semeja' Sen ngado deniyo tue mie pun.
58004004	Diret Sénam yeng madahe ken gewai Sen dah santo'am des Sen madah ke' hal ari pengentujohe mie. Jie lem Kitap Sen mie, Dah ari pengentujohe Allah pun berentiam, go gewai ulah Sen pun daham. (Kejedi 2:2)
58004005	Gopai ge' go do bungi Sen tadie, Sidoe noe ngicap kenyamán seperonga' seperenti ken Aku, jie Sen. (Masmur 94:11) Maksut Sen ken Aku tadie kin go Sen dah berenti dah; gewai Sen dah santo' dah. Lalu maksut Sen gei' mensiyo yeng pecayo mat seperonga' seperenti ken Sen.
58004006	Jedi mátam. Ke' hal berenti nyeh mat gei' do yeng na' dituntong Sen; mat ca' do yeng ngicape. Pie begi desiyan yeng nyomie ningo agah panci nyeh mat noe ngicape, mat noam desiyan berenti, go desiyan nungkang, bolei'e pecayo ken jenyi Sen.
58004007	-
58004008	Pengabise si mat do separo desiyan yeng diiring le' Kei' Yosua ke' arong yeng dijenyi Sen. Pie, poe, noe iyo arong nyoe yeng kei nuntong semuya' jenyi Sen ke' hal berenti nyeh. Go lamat belamat kin do Sen bejenyi agei'am ke' lapis beru die, po yeng dipadah ku tadie. Jie Sen bejenyi ke' Kei' Daud nyeh, Tue tei'am, jie Sen, des kam ningo pemadah Aku, nang na' koring ati kam, jie Sen. (Masmur 95:7-8)
58004009	Di nyoe kin diret jelas, mat gei' do kelorong begi umát Allah sempayo ngicap kenyamán berenti po Sen dah berenti dah ari pengentujoh nyeh.
58004010	Go sopai pun yeng dah berenti ken Sen maksute iyo dah berenti bekoyo bekerejo, na' po Allah pun berenti bekoyo bekerejo dah ari pengentujoh mie tam gewai Sen mie kin daham.
58004011	Mangko diret mat ca' angar nar kei diret samo-samo seperonga' seperenti ken Sen, nang na' arap ken gewai diret. Gola' do siko' pun yeng nungkang Sen, lalu noe detang ke' tujue na' po contoh desiyan nyomie. Diret mat ca' ningo ken tuno' taalo' ke' posan payit yeng dipadah Sen ke' diret ngelalu Ana' Sen Yesus.
58004012	Go posan payit Allah mat idup, mat bekuwaso, tajam deri kelewang yeng bemato duwo yeng paling tajam pun. Na' po kelewang yeng ngerok ke' delam, ke' roh ken semongát diret, ke' roko ken onsum, ponyoe jum posan payit Allah: tawu nyorap ke' ati diret nun gei' sempayo semuya' pengaji pemiker ken pelowai penuju diret yeng tetapo' di lem ati diret nun pie mat dinyato dipanyah diuji dipereso le' posan payit Sen.
58004013	Mat cum jolu tetapo' deri Sen; semuya' segelo pempulah Sen tekoba', maloe bisam, cum yeng selinong deri pemantau Sen. Semuya' gewai diret mat kei penyamut diret di adap Sen gi.
58004014	Mangko, kamei, diret mat ca' yakin bepigang ke' kepecayo yeng dah diangkue le' diret. Go yeng nulong diret mat pelayan Sen yeng rajo agong, ya'am Yesus, Ana' Allah, yeng ngadap Allah di serugo nun.
58004015	Pelayan agong yeng nulong diret nyeh mat ngaso jum ken kelomah diret. Iyo koloe jum konoe penggudo beneko reno bemacam bejenis na' po diret, ja'e go iyo noe bedoso. Lalu mat iyoam kei pelayan agong yeng nulong diret.
58004016	Mangko diret nang na' namang manu ke' Allah yeng merentah ken pengunyo' pengaseh Sen. Sen mat do kekaseh Sen; mangko dinyoam diret mat buleh pengunyo' pengaseh Sen nyo' nulong diret di lem keperelu diret. Dinyoam diret mat beronga' berenti ken Sen.
58005001	A, ke' hal pelayan agong nyeh si desiyan yeng dipileh mie nyo' menjedi pelayan agong kin dipileh pado mensiyo nyem. Desiyan dipileh nyeh kei ngewakel pada' mensiyo nyo' ngurus ubonge ken Allah, nyo' meyie sumang ken pesaling nyo' ngelon dosoe.
58005002	Reng yeng dipileh nyeh tawu jum suyo' sabar ken pada' kabane yeng samo mensiyo nyeh, beyi' yeng redo noe tawu, beyi' yeng gela' nyimpang deri jelan yeng mat, go direte pun benya' jum kelomahe.
58005003	Mangko iyo mat nan meyie pesaling beyi' nyo' doso direte beyi' nyo' doso pada' umát.
58005004	A, pelayan agong nyeh mat reng yeng tehormát. Pie iyo noe meningie direte; mat diret Allaham yeng milehe gei' iyo dihormát ponyoe, benso Harun mie.
58005005	Jedi ponyoe jum Kristus. Iyo noe jum meningie direte gei' dihormát kei pelayan agong. Kebelike Allah die yeng meningie ken ngagonge, go jie Sen, Kau ana' Aku, tue Aku mat Apa' Kau, jie Sen. (Masmur 2:7)
58005006	Ge'em jie Sen separoe di layin nyeh, Kau mat pelayan nyo' seora'-ora'eam, nunoe pangkat Melkisedek, jie Sen. (Masmur 110:4)
58005007	Jedi mátam. Ketiko Yesus gei' idup secaro mensiyo nyeh iyo mat do berudu nangis ontapam, berutus ayie matoe bedoa minta' tulong ke' Allah yeng tawu nyelamáte deri kemati. Lalu doae mat didingo Sen, tam iyo merenah direte, na'e tuno' taalo' ke' Allah.
58005008	Numo' pun iyo Ana' Allah pie iyo belajar tuno' taalo' ngelalu pada' kesensare yeng dirudue.
58005009	-
58005010	Dah iyo ngerudu kesensare ponyoe kin maksute dah cumam kekurang kemalange nyo' iyo menjedi pelayan agong nyeh, mangko iyo mat didemo le' Allah pelayan agong na' po pangkat Melkisedek nyeh. Iyoam yeng ngoba' jelane sempayo semuya' urang yeng tuno' taalo' ke' iyo mat ditulong diselamát seora'-ora'eam. Nyoe ke' hal Yesus, pelayan yeng rajo agong.
58005011	Kenaken si mat benya' ke' hal tue yeng na' dipadah le' kami, pie maring kami ngenjelase go kam mat dunal nar.
58005012	Sepatute dah melamat tue kam pecayo nyeh kam ca' dah mampu dah madah posan payit Sen ke' betor. Pie kebelike kam manseh ca' diajar reng agei'am pengajar yeng pungka' pangkal, yeng kememerue dipadah ke' kam nyomie. Ibarat ke' nyego jolu din kam gei' noleh nyego jolu koring; kam gei' ca' nan disusu.
58005013	Yeng gei' nyusu kin maksute gei' biya'; iyo gei' bolum tejempate ke' pengajar ke' hal keidup yeng bujor benar.
58005014	Pie reng yeng ulehe nyego jolu yeng koring kin maksute nyoe reng yeng dah bosai, yeng simah ngelateh direte sampai mat tawu mileh jat ken panci.
58006001	Mangko, kamei, dah sedang lamat dah diret belajar yeng kememerue nyeh. Tue diret ca' maju, ca' mansang. Pengajar yeng kememerue nyeh yeng pungka' pangkal kepecayo diret ken Kristus nyeh noe sa' nan diulang-ulang agei', benso pengajar ke' hal ningal gewai ulah yeng cum gunoe cum retie; a, benso pengajar ke' hal pecayo ken Allah;
58006002	benso pengajar ke' hal adat pemeso', pengajar ke' hal adat peradat penyampang jeri, pengajar ke' hal reng yeng dah mati langko' bengki' idup agei', a, ken pengajar ke' hal ukum Sen yeng seora'-ora'eam. Semuya' pengajar ke' deng nyoe menurute noe sa' nan diulang-ulang.
58006003	Pie kebelike diret mat ca' maju ke' pengajar yeng layin, mun Allah yeng ngijine.
58006004	-
58006006	Jedi mátam. Mat do reng yeng dah dipanyah le' tampa'; dah ngicap pengunyo' Sen deri serugo; dah nerimoe pembegi deri Roh Allah; dah tawu ken posan payit Allah mat paling panci, go dah dikicape dah. Go dah koloe sidoe merati pada' keenah keaneh yeng dipulah Sen ken kuwaso Sen yeng langko' kepala' nyato dah jemán nun gi pun. Pie dah ngicap semuya' nyoe pun dah nyoe sidoe nyimpang deri jelan yeng mat. Mangko mat maring, mat noe tawu na' nyurohe bebeta' piker agei'am. Go mun iyo dah ningal jelan yeng mat nyeh maksute seolah-olah gewaie na' nyalip Ana' Allah agei'am, seolah-olah iyo menghina Yesus Ana' Allah di muko umúm.
58006007	Jedi benso contoh tanah yeng dikujoh ujan. Mun tanah erat dikujoh ujan, lalu ayie mat nyorap ke' tanah nyoe, dah nyoe misale timu tentanám yeng beguno begi reng yeng nanáme, ha, tanah nyoe mat diberekat le' Allah.
58006008	Pie misale mun yeng timu dinyoe ngat pada' rampue rigap yeng benya' durie nyeh, maksute cum gunoe numo' pun tanah nyoe dah dikujoh ujan. Awas! Gola' tanah nyoe disumpah Sen die. Pengabise mat dicucol.
58006009	Pada' kaban kekaseh ku: numo' pun omóng kami bungi nyoe pie kami mat yakin ken kam mat noe tokoh nyoe. Kami yakin ken yeng diterimoe kam pasti panci deri nyoe; kam mat nerimoe pada' berekat dolat yeng diajen Allah nyo' reng yeng ditulong diselamát Sen.
58006010	Go Allah kin bujor benaram. Noe ken kelupo Sen ken gewai kam, ken kaseh kam ken Sen. Kaseh kam ken Sen mat nyatoam, go kam, deri nyomie sampai ke' ari tue pun, nan nulong pada' umát engku Sen.
58006011	Mangko kami pun ingín nar gei' kam ponyoe jum ke' hal arap kam; maksute gei' kam yakin nar seputeh ati sebeníng derah ke' hal arap diret, sampai ke' ari pengudah nun gi.
58006012	Kona' ati kami gei' kam noe lalai leler, pie kebelike gei' sempayo kam mat nunoe contoh pada' reng yeng nerimoe yeng dijenyi Allah ke' sidoe. Pada' reng yeng nerimoe yeng dijenyi Allah kin go tetap pecayo ken Sen; tetap sabar nantie yeng dijenyi Sen.
58006013	A, benso Kei' Abraham. Des Allah bejenyi ke' Kei' Abraham nyeh Allah mat besumpah ken pasti Sen nuntonge. Sen besumpah ken demo diret Sénam, go mat cum yeng melebeh Sen.
58006014	Jedi jie jenyi Sen, "Aku pasti ngemberekat kau, ken nyuroh kau berana' bebuwah jemar luwas jeyo jedi," jie Sen.
58006015	Lalu mátam te'. Dah Kei' Abraham sabar nantie nyeh mangko sen pun mat nerimoe yeng dijenyi le' Allah ke' sen.
58006016	Des mensiyo bejenyi kin iyo besumpah ken demo yeng lebeh deri demo direte kei ngesah jenyie, kei nyanto' nyudah peselisehe.
58006017	Mangko Allah pun besumpah, nyo' ngembokti ken jenyi Sen mat sah. Sen mat ingín ngembokti ke' pada' reng yeng langko' nerimoe yeng dijenyi Sen, ken tuju Sen nyo' nuntong jenyi Sen nyeh pasti noe berubah. Mangko jenyi Sen ditamah ken sumpah Sen, kei ngesahe.
58006018	Maksut Sen gei' sempayo ati diret yeng belinong ke' Sen mat teberansang setogap-togapeam, gei' diret yakin ngarap jenyi Sen ke' diret. Go beyi' jenyi Sen beyi' sumpah Sen pun mat noe berubah. Noe ken Allah memuloe!
58006019	Arap diret mat togap kukoham, keedah perbetu penamat nyo' keidup diret, gei' diret noe begenset begenser. Nyuroh diret noe begenset begenser pun go diret dah begelumo ken Allaham; seolah-olah dah tamoe ke' petak yeng paling suci, kediyam diret Allaham.
58006020	Yesus pun dah tamoe kinyoe, nyo' pengulu diret. Go iyo mat dah menjedi pelayan agong nyo' seora'-ora'eam, nunoe pangkat pelayan Melkisedek nyeh.
58007001	Jedi pulang ke' Melkisedek tei' iyo mat rajo nenggeri Salem* ken pelayan Allah yeng Rajo Tingie. Jedi ketiko nyoe mie Kei' Abraham kin beperang, ngalah pada' rajo yeng ngemunsohe. Lalu dah Kei' Abraham na' pulang nyeh Melkisedek pun betomu ken Kei' Abraham di jelan, lalu Melkisedek ngemberekat Kei' Abraham.
58007002	Lalu Kei' Abraham pun ngunyo' nyumang ke' Melkisedek separoe deri pekuleh sen ngalah pada' rajo tadie, dibegi sen sepuloh satu ken Melkisedek. A, reti Melkisedek tei' Rajo yeng Bujor Benar. Ge'em tam iyo rajo Salem nyeh maksute iyo mat Rajo yeng Meyie Damai.
58007003	Iyo mat noe beino' noe beapa' noe beakei' noe beinei'. Keidupe cum beepun cum beujong; iyo mat pelayan Allah nyo' seora'-ora'eam na' po Ana' Allah nyeh.
58007004	Jedi diret mat ca' ngaji ke' hal pangkat Melkisedek yeng rajo tingie nyeh. Benso Kei' Abraham kin sen mat akei' puyang umát yeng dipileh le' Allah, pie sen manseh nyumang jolu sen ke' Melkisedek, dibegi sen sepuloh satu.
58007005	Kira' Melkisedek keturun reng Lewi si manseh ge', mat patutam. Go pada' keturun Lewi kin ditetap nyo' pelayan Allah, lalu nunoe ukum Allah nyeh tugas sidoe termansok ngumpol penyumang sepersepuloh deri umát Sen, numo' pun pada' umát nyoe mat waris wala' direte yeng samo-samo keturun Abraham.
58007006	Pie Melkisedek si noe iyo diitong keturun reng Lewi peh. Numo' pun ponyoe pie iyo manseh nerimoe begi sepuloh deri pekuleh Kei' Abraham. A, jolah ke' berekat pun ponyoe jum. Kei' Abraham, yeng tehormát tam pada' jenyi Allah ke' sen nyeh pie manseh sen yeng didolat diberekat le' Melkisedek.
58007007	Sedang diret kin jelas, mat noe tawu disangkal. Mun jolah ke' hal ngemberekat nyeh nan reng tingie yeng ngendolat reng yeng renah.
58007008	A, do bedoe yeng layin jum, go tekonoe ke' reng Lewi yeng ngumpol begi sepuloh nyeh si sidoe mat mensiyo yeng tawu mati. Pie tekonoe ke' yeng siko' nyeh ya'am Melkisedek si menurut saksi yeng dibeco le' diret nyeh iyo mat tetap idupam.
58007009	Ge'em kenaken si Kei' Lewi, akei' puyang sidoe yeng ngumpol begi sepuloh nyeh pie sen pun ngunyo' begi sepuloh ke' Melkisedek mie ngelalu Kei' Abraham.
58007010	Go des Melkisedek betomu ken Kei' Abraham mie si Kei' Lewi kin bolum do, pie dah Kei' Abraham ngunyo' nyumang tadie termansok Kei' Lewi dah ngunyo' nyumang jum, tam sen mat do di lem tuboh Kei' Abraham, go sen mat tampang sulie Kei' Abraham. Mangko mat jelasam ken Melkisedek mie mat lebeh tingie pangkate deri Kei' Abraham ken Kei' Lewi pun.
58007011	-
58007012	Jedi mátam. Ke' hal caro yeng lamat dah digenti ken yeng beru nyeh potue ne, kamei. Gola' jie reng yeng lamat nyeh cum kekurang kemalange. Pie mun cum kekurang kemalange deri pada' pelayan Sen keturun Lewi nyeh ngopai ca' detang yeng layin? Ja'e poe mat doam kekurang kemalange, go mat do detang yeng siko' yeng layin, penggentie, yeng nunoe pangkat Melkisedek die. Sedang ukum Musa yeng diunyo' ke' umát Sen mie kin bebungkong ke' gewai pelayan keturun Lewi. Mangko mun pada' pelayan deri keturun Lewi dah begenti ken pelayan beru nyeh maksute ukum Musa pun mat ca' digenti jum. Go pelayan beru tue yeng kei ngenti pelayan deri keturun Lewi nyeh noe iyo nunoe pangkat Harun peh, na' po yeng dah dititah di lem ukum Musa.
58007013	-
58007014	Yeng beru kin keturun suku benso layin die, ya'am keturun suku benso Yehuda. Teruhal keturun deri benso Yehuda noe koloe melayan Allah di rumah kediyam Sen; mat cumam Kei' Musa bepadah ke' hal keturun Yehuda kei pelayan Sen. Pie tue Allah mat nitah Tuwowe diret, keturun reng Yehuda, kei pelayan nyo' seora'-ora'eam.
58007015	Jedi dinyoe mat kepala' nyatoam, ken beyi' ukum beyi' pelayan nyeh dah begenti beru dah, go dah detang dah pelayan yeng layin, yeng na' po Melkisedek mie.
58007016	Sarat kei iyo menjedi pelayan pun noe iyo tam pelator itu ini ke' hal akei' puyange secaro mensiyo peh, pie mat tam kuwaso keidupe yeng noe tekalah tam kemati. Nyoam sarate.
58007017	Nyoe pun cuco' ken saksi diret Allaham, go jie Sen nyingka' ana' Sen Yesus, Kau mat pelayan nyo' seora'-ora'eam nunoe pangkat Melkisedek, jie Sen.
58007018	Jedi maksute perentah pelator yeng lamat nyeh dah disiseh Sen dah, go mat cum gunoe, cum kuwasoe,
58007019	go ukum Musa mat noe tawu nyukup kekurang kemalang sopai pun. Dah tue si diret mat diunyo' arap yeng lebeh panci. Mangko ngelalu arap yeng beru tue diret mat mampu begelumo ken Allah.
58007020	A, pai tel agei' semuya' nyoe tejedi pun tam kebiso sumpah Sen. Des pada' pelayan Lewi menjedi pelayan Sen mie si cum Sen besumpah kei ngesah sidoe.
58007021	Pie Yesus menjedi pelayan Sen tam kebiso sumpah Allah, go jie Sen, Kau mat pelayan Aku nyo' seora'-ora'eam. Aku, Allah Tuwowe, dah besumpah; jenyi Ku mat noe berubah, jie Sen. (Masmur 110:4)
58007022	Mangko Yesus mat menjedi Penetap Penuntong jenyi semayo Sen yeng lebeh panci.
58007023	A, ge'em caro yeng lamat nyeh pada' pelayan benso Lewi turun temurun sampai benya' urange; mat nolehe melayan seora'-ora'eam pelintang go mati.
58007024	Pie pangkat Yesus kei pelayan nyeh mat noe berubah, noe dililehe ke' reng layin, go iyo mat idup seora'-ora'eam.
58007025	Mangko dinyoam iyo mampu nulong nyelamát nyo' seora'-ora'eam sopai pun yeng manu ke' Allah ngelalu iyo, go iyo serarat nan idup nyo' minta' tulong Sen nyo' diret.
58007026	Pelayan agong yeng tokoh nyoe si mat paling cuco'am kei nyukup keperelu diret. Iyo suci bereseham, cum kesalahe, cum celo belengoe. Iyo tepencar deri reng yeng bedoso, iyo diagong dihormát tingie deri serugo pun.
58007027	Do pelayan agong yeng layin si iyo ca' milang ari meyie pesaling, ento' doso direte lo'e, dah nyoe to' doso pada' umáte. Pie Yesus si noe. Iyo ngat sekaliam nyerah direte kei pesaling ke' Allah nyo' semuya' doso mensiyo.
58007028	Go di lem ukum Musa mie kin reng ditetap nyo' pelayan agong nyeh mat mensiyo nyem, yeng lomah. Pie sumpah Sen, yeng dudi deri ukum nyeh, mat netap Ana' Sen kei menjedi pelayan agong yeng sempurno nyo' seora'-ora'eam.
58008001	A, jedi tuam pungka' pangkale to': diret mat do pelayan agong na' po yeng dipadah tadie. Iyo mat dudo' merentah di piya' kanán Allah yeng Rajo Agong di serugo nun.
58008002	Iyo melayan di rumah semeyang yeng suci, ya'am rumah kediyam Sen yeng mat, yeng dipulah Tuwowe diret, noe dipulah le' mensiyo peh.
58008003	A, tiyap reng yeng menjedi pelayan agong mat ditetap kei meyie pada' sumang ken pesaling ke' Allah. Mangko pelayan agong yeng beru pun do jum pesaling yeng dibeyie di serugo nun.
58008004	Mun di deniyo tue si iyo noe disebut pelayan kaliam, go pelayan yeng meyie sumang di deniyo tue si dah do dah, deri keturun Lewi, cuco' ken yeng ditulis lem ukum Musa. Pie pelayan agong yeng beru nyeh mat meyie pesalinge di serugo nun.
58008005	A, yeng digewai pada' pelayan keturun Lewi nyeh pun nyo' gemar beyang rumah kediyam Allah di serugo nun. Ngopai ge' go Musa pun, dah iyo na' mulah rumah kediyam Allah di padang nun mie, iyo disuroh Sen ca' teliti nar mulahe nunoe contoh gemar yeng dah dipadah le' Sen di gunóng mie. Lalu pada' pelayan nyeh mat melayan dinyoe.
58008006	Pie yeng mat si tugas yeng diserah gei' digewai le' Yesus si jewoh lebeh agong deri yeng digewai le' sidoe. Go iyo mat pesulue* diret ken Allah yeng ngurus ngesah jenyi semayo Sen yeng beru nyeh, yeng lebeh panci deri yeng lamat nyeh. Go diurus disah Sen pun ken pada' jenyi Sen yeng lebeh panci.
58008007	Jedi potue ne kejedie. Kira' jenyi semayo yeng pertamo cum celoe si maksute kin noe ge' ca' digenti.
58008008	Pie, poe begi Allah si mat do celoe, ja'e go celoe pun mat ken umát Sen. Go jie Sen ke' hal umát Sen mie, Dingoam, jie Tuwowe. Dah nyoe gi Ku langko' ngelaju jenyi semayo yeng beru nyo' suku benso Israel ken nyo' suku benso Yehuda.
58008009	Jenyi semayo yeng beru nyeh mat layin deri yeng lamat yeng dah Ku tentu ke' akei' puyange mie, des Ku ngiring ngaping sidoe pamus deri Mesir mie. Gopai ge' go Aku mulah yeng beru nyeh pun, go sidoe mat noe mutu nunoe jenyi semayo yeng ditentu le' Aku nyomie. Mangko Aku pun noe menduli sidoe, jie Tuwowe.
58008010	Mangko, jie Tuwowe, tuam jenyi semayo beru yeng Ku tentu ken suku benso Israel dah jengkah pengudah tue gi, jie Sen. Pada' perentah pelator langko' Ku sorap ke' lem ati pemiker sidoe; mat seolah-olah ditulis Ku lem ati sidoe nun. Lalu pengabise Aku mat disomah le' sidoe kei Allahe, ken sidoe pun mat kei umát engku Aku, jie Sen.
58008011	Dah nyoe gi si cum siko' pun yeng ca' ngaja' ngajar betore atau pun waris wala'e gei' iyo tekenal ken Tuwowe, go semuya' segeno bosai kocit tuwo biya' mat dah tekenal bisam dah ken Aku gi.
58008012	Aku langko' ngampun pada' kejat sidoe, ken pada' doso sidoe mat noe ku ngitonge kaliam, jie Sen. (Yeremia 31:31-34)
58008013	Jedi tam jie Sen tadie dah do jenyi semayo yeng beru nyeh maksute Sen ngitong caro yeng lamat yeng bebungkong ke' ukum Musa nyeh dah noe pakai dah. Ibarat ke' umor din mun dah mansang ke' tuwo dah soma' ken ulo' lubang; maksute dah na' losi nayáp dah.
58009001	Jedi mátam. Jenyi semayo Allah yeng pertamo mie mat do pada' perentah pelator Sen caro nyomah ke' Sen; do jum arong yeng suci kei reng nyomah ke' Sen di deniyo tue mie.
58009002	Sidoe mie mulah rumah tangong. Petak luwar nyeh yeng didemo Petak Suci nyeh bisei' kaki pelito ken meja yeng bisei' pesaling roti.
58009003	Di sepiya' sekat bonáng tobal yeng piya' ke' delame do arong yeng didemo Petak Paling Suci.
58009004	Bedah kei reng nyucol menyán wangi nyeh do nyo' dipakai di petak nyoe; bedah nyoe dipulah deri mas. A, peti yeng dilapis ken mas sepiya' menyempiya' nyeh, yeng kei nano jenyi semayo Allah nyeh, do dinyoe. Peti nyoe bisei' betu duwo kepeng yeng ditulis ken sepuloh ukum Allah, ken tungkat Harun yeng bekotie, a, ken tepayan mas yeng bisei' roti manna.
58009005	Di atas peti nyoe do gemar puwako melekat* duwo ko' yeng rajo agong yeng nyelinong tudong peti nyeh. Go di tudong peti nyoam Allah ngelon doso mensiyo tam derah yeng ditumpah dinyoe.* Pie diret noe sompat ngaji ke' hal semuya' tue secaro jerumát.
58009006	Jedi mátam te'. Kediyam Allah yeng suci nyeh mat disunsun tokoh nyoam. Dah nyoe pada' pelayan Allah serarat nan tamoe ke' petak yeng piya' luwar ento' ngerinah tugase.
58009007	Pie yeng tamoe ke' petak yeng piya' ke' delam nyeh ngat siko' pelayan agong nyem; nyoe pun sekali setawun nyem, ken iyo pun didah tamoe kinyoe semerang arong cuwali iyo naban pesaling derah nyo' pada' kesalah sidoe yeng digewaie noe teraso*, beyi' yeng direte beyi' yeng pada' umát.
58009008	Jedi ngelalu semuya' gewai nyoe Roh Allah ngenyato tue ke' mensiyo: ya'am mun rumah kediyam Allah yeng pertamo nyeh gei' dipakai si maksute ngat pelayan agong nyem yeng tamoe ke' lem Petak Paling Suci. Jelan alor nyo' pada' semuya' mensiyo tamoe kinyoe bolum dikoba', mun caro yeng lamat nyeh gei' dipakai.
58009009	Jedi semuya' caro nyoe seolah-olah kato kiyas atau pun perempamo yeng dipakai Sen nyo' jemán sidoe ketiko nyoe, go yeng seli yeng mat nyeh mat bolum jengkahe. Mangko pesaling yeng betumpah derah ken pesaling yeng dibeyie le' sidoe yeng nyomah ke' Sen mat noe mampu nyo' nyempurno ati kocite nun.
58009010	Go pada' perentah pelator nyoe ngat ke' hal tuboh nyem, benso pelator makan minúm ken pelator caro bebeso' yeng bemacam bejenis. Caro nyoe disuroh Sen gei' dipakai sidoe pun manu ke' jengkah Sen ngentie ken caro yeng lebeh panci.
58009011	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe Kristus mat detang. Iyo pelayan agong yeng ngerinah tugase gei' sempayo umát Sen mat nerimoe semuya' segeloe yeng panci. A, arong iyo ngerinah tugase pun di rumah kediyam Allah yeng jewoh agong ken jewoh sempurno deri yeng kememuloe mie. Rumah nyoe noe dipulah mensiyo peh, maksute noe iyo di deniyo tue yeng dipulah Sen nyomie.
58009012	Jedi tugase tei' iyo mat nobus diret nyo' seora'-ora'eam; dah nyoe iyo tamoe ke' Petak Paling Suci. Nyoe pun ngat sekaliam nyo' seora'-ora'eam. Hak iyo tamoe kinyoe noe tam iyo meyie derah kaming ken derah ana' sapi peh; hak iyo tamoe kinyoe tam iyo mat meyie derah direteam.
58009013	Nunoe caro yeng lamat kin reng yeng bolum bebereseh ca' diamur dipoci' ken derah kaming ken sapi, ken abu ana' sapi yeng dicucol, sempayo iyo diangap suci bereseh secaro tuboh, gei' mampu manu ken nyomah ke' Allah. A, semalang ke' derah pada' kaming nyeh ge'e, mat do gunoe nyo' secaro tuboh,
58009014	sa'am go derah Kristus. Kristus kin ngelalu kuwaso Roh Allah yeng idup seora'-ora'eam kei iyo nyerah direte ke' Allah kei pesaling yeng noe becelo. Tentu derah Kristus tawu ngembereseh ati kocit diret nun, gei' sempayo diret noe arap ken pada' gewai ulah yeng cum gunoe cum retie. Maksute gei' diret nyomah ken melayan Allah yeng idup!
58009015	Mangko Kristus yeng didemo pesulue nyo' pengentaro mensiyo ken Allah mat ngurus jenyi semayo yeng beru. Iyo ngurus jenyi semayo yeng beru nyeh gei' sempayo semuya' reng yeng diunang diamie Sen mat nerimoe reto beno jento keraja' yeng tan seora'-ora'eam yeng dijenyi Sen mie. Caro iyo nguruse pun tam iyo dah mati kei nobus diret, go diret mat ngelangar ukum Sen yeng tekayi' ken jenyi semayo yeng pertamo nyeh.
58009016	-
58009017	A, gopai go iyo ca' mati nyo' netap jenyi semayo yeng beru nyeh? Potue ne. Umpamoe benso reng yeng mulah surat kuwaso kei netap sopai kei lileh nyawoe. Jedi, misale, surat nyoe dipulah. Pie bolum belaku cuwali reng yeng mulahe dah mati. Ha, mun dah do bokti ken reng yeng mulahe dah mati si berue pada' reto benoe mampu diserah ke' lileh nyawoe.
58009018	A, jedi jenyi semayo Allah yeng pertamo mie ponyoe jum: mat disah ken derah, maksute dah do yeng mati.
58009019	Jedi ketiko nyoe mie, des jemán jenyi semayo yeng pertamoe nyeh Kei' Musa mat madah semuya' ukum Allah ke' pada' umát. Dah nyoe beyi' buko' ukum Sen beyi' pada' umát nyeh dipoci' ken derah ana' sapi ken derah kaming ken ayie, pakai dewun hisop ken bonáng mirah deri bulu domo nyeh.
58009020	Jie Kei' Musa, "Derah tue kei ngesah jenyi semayo Sen yeng disuroh Allah ca' ditunoe diret," jie.
58009021	A, ponyoe jum kemah kediyam Sen ken pada' alate yeng dipakai pelayan pun, mat dipoci'e jum ken derah.
58009022	Kenaken si menurut ukum Sen mat nyoma' na' bis pada' semuya' segeloe ca' dibereseh ken derah. Mun jolah ke' doso si mat noe tawu na' diampun dielon cuwali do derah yeng betumpah. Jedi maksute beyi' jenyi semayo yeng lamat beyi' yeng beru pun mat disah ken derah.
58009023	Jedi mátam te'. Caro sidoe semeyang, ken pada' jolu yeng dipakaie mat ngenggemar jolu yeng mat, yeng di serugo nun. Lalu semuya'e mat diberesehe ken derah pada' pesalinge. Pie arong yeng seli di serugo nun mat jewoh panci. Mangko pesaling yeng betumpah derah nyo' ngesahe kei arong diret begelumo ken nyomah ke' Allah pun ca' jewoh panci.
58009024	Go Kristus noe tamoe ke' rumah kediyam Allah yeng dipulah le' jeri mensiyo, yeng ngat kei gemar yeng selie; pie iyo tamoe ke' kediyam Allah yeng mat yeng selie, ya'am serugo. Iyo mat betomu besemuko ken Allah dinyoe nyo' iyo nulong diret.
58009025	A, benso pelayan agong keturun Lewi mie iyo mat milang tawun tamoe ke' Petak Paling Suci, meyie derah, pie yeng dibeyie nyeh noe derah direte peh*. Pie Kristus si layin deri nyoe. Iyo nyerah derah direte; gei' pun noe iyo beulang-ulang kali peh.
58009026	Kira' ca' beulang-ulang kali nyeh si maksute ca' beulang-ulang kali jum Yesus ngerudu kesensare mulai deri jemán deniyo tue dipulah mie sampai ke' tengkalo tue pun. Pie iyo si noe. Yeng mat si dah jengkah jemán pengudah tue berue iyo mat detang ke' deniyo nyo' ngapus pada' doso. Sekali nyoam iyo nyerah direte nyo' ngapus doso mensiyo.
58009027	Mat dititah le' Allah ken tiyap ko' mensiyo mat ca' mati sekali, dah nyoe ca' ngadap Sen gei' dipecaro diukum.
58009028	Jedi ponyoe jum Kristus, mat mati sekaliam, pie iyo kei pesaling nyo' ngapus doso reng benya'. Dah nyoe gi iyo langko' detang keduwo kalie, pie iyo detang keduwo kali nyoe noe iyo nyo' ngurus doso mensiyo peh, na' po yeng dah digewaie mie. Pie kedetange keduwo kalie gi nyo' iyo ngamie nyelamát pada' reng yeng angar nantie kedetange.
58010001	Jedi mátam. Ukum Musa si mat gemar beyang pada' jolu panci yeng dijenyi Allah ke' diret; ibarat ke' jolu yeng dipulah din gei' belang, bolum jedi. Mangko pada' pesaling yeng nan dibeyie milang tawun le' sidoe yeng nyomah ke' Sen pie mat noe mampu nyo' nyukup kekurang kemalang sidoe.
58010002	Kira' pesaling nyoe mampu nyempurnoe kin noe ge' sa' dibeyie beulang-ulang kali. Kira' pesaling nyoe mat mampu ngemberesehe kin cukupam dibeyie sekaliam, nyo' seora'-ora'eam; lalu urange pun langko' yakin lem ati kocite nun ken dosoe mat dielon. Pie noe.
58010003	Kebelike sidoe milang tawun meyie pada' pesaling, go sidoe nan teringáte ken dosoe yeng bolum dibereseh.
58010004	Go derah sapi ken kaming kin mat noe mampu ngapus doso.
58010005	Mangko des Kristus detang ke' deniyo tue, iyo do omónge ken Apa'e yeng bungie potue, Yeng Den ingín noe iyo pada' sumang ken pada' pesaling binatang peh. Pie Den mat mulah tuboh nyo' aku kei pesaling ke' Den.
58010006	Den mat noe ayah ken pada' pesaling yeng dicucol ken pesaling semeleh kei ngelon doso, jie.
58010007	Mangko jie Kristus, Ti beh, aku detang ke' deniyo tue nyo' ngenggewai kemawo' Den, cuco' ken yeng ditulis ke' hal aku lem kitap Den, jie. (Masmur 39:7-9)
58010008	Maksut Yesus bungi nyoe tadie go jie Allah kin Sen noe ingín Sen, noe ayah Sen ken pada' sumang, pada' pesaling, pada' binatang yeng dicucol ken pada' pesaling semeleh nyo' ngelon doso. Teruhale na' nunoe ukum Musa si pada' sumang ken pesaling ke' deng nyoe mat ca' dibeyie.
58010009	Pie jie Yesus, "Aku tuam to' yeng detang nyo' ngenggewai kemawo' Den." Dinyoe kin jelas ken pada' pesaling yeng kememerue dipakai nyeh mat disiseh Sen, disamie Sen ken pesaling beru, ya'am gewai Yesus.
58010010	Lalu tam iyo mat ngenggewai kemawo' Allah nyeh mangko diret dah dipulah Sen suci bereseh ngelalu pesaling tuboh Yesus Kristus yeng diserahe sekaliam nyo' seora'-ora'eam.
58010011	Pada' pelayan deri keturun Lewi si milang ari serarat ngerinah tugase di rumah kediyam Allah; milang kali iyo meyie pada' pesaling pie mat noe mampu kaliam nyo' ngapus doso.
58010012	Pie Kristus si meyie pesaling yeng sutiam yeng meyar utang doso nyo' seora'-ora'eam. Dah nyoe santo'am gewaie. Iyo mat dudo' di piya' kanán Allah nyo' merentah beroto ken Allah.
58010013	Tue si iyo tingal nantie dam jengkah pada' munsohe disuroh Allah to' penyampang kakie nyem.
58010014	Gewai iyo nyempurno pada' umáte si dah santo' dah; pada' reng yeng dipulahe suci bereseh ken pesalinge yeng sutie nyeh mat sempurno nyo' seora'-ora'eam, mat cum kekurang kemalange.
58010015	A, do jum saksi deri Roh Allah ke' hal tue, go jie Sen lem Kitap Sen bungi potue,
58010016	Dah jengkah nyoe gi, jie Tuwowe, langko' Ku netap jenyi semayo tue ken sidoe: ya'am ukum Ku langko' Ku cetak ken Ku tulis lem ati pemiker sidoe, jie Sen.
58010017	Dah nyoe jie Sen, Pada' doso ken kejat sidoe langko' dikelupo Ku kaliam, cumam Ku ngitonge agei', jie Sen. (Yeremia 31:33-34)
58010018	Nyoam boktie ken pesaling Yesus yeng sutie nyeh mat cukupam, go mun doso dah diampun kin maksute dah noe perelu dah meyie pesaling nyo' ngapuse agei'.
58010019	Jedi mátam, menyadie yeng seimán. Tam pesaling derah Yesus nyeh mangko diret mat noe namang tamoe ke' lem Petak Paling Suci nyeh nyo' begelumo ken Allah.
58010020	Tam tuboh iyo yeng diserahe nyo' pesaling nyeh mangko iyo mulah caro yeng beru, caro yeng ngemborie idup, sempayo diret mampu ngelalu sekat bonáng tobal nyoe. Cum dah penyapate.
58010021	Mat doam pelayan agong yeng beru yeng noyu merintu semuya' seberumah Allah.
58010022	Tam gewai iyo kin ati kocit diret nun mat dah dibereseh dah, sempayo diret mat noe gola' ca' diukum tam doso diret. Diret keedah pelayan yeng manei' tubohe ken ayie yeng beníng. Mangko, kamei, diret mat ca' seputeh ati sebeníng derah manuam kei begelumo ken Sen, go diret mat yakin nar arap pecayo ken yeng digewai Sen.
58010023	Diret ca' yakin bepigang ke' arap yeng dah diangkue le' diret; nang na' diret tumang aming, go Sen yeng dah bejenyi ken diret si mat mutu, Sen mat tawu diarap.
58010024	Diret ca' ngaji keada' ken keperelu betor, gei' sempayo diret tawu koti caro nyo' diret ngendorong ngangki' siko' ken betore. Tuju maksute gei' diret kaseh mengaseh, ken sempayo diret ngenggewai yeng panci.
58010025	Diret ca' tetap bekumpol ken pado menyadie diret yeng seimán; gewai nyoe noe tawu na' ditingal, kamei. Nang na' po yeng digewai le' betor yeng separoe yeng ngei'e dah bekumpol ken diret. Kebelike diret mat ca' mutu bekumpol kei ngemberansang siko' ken betore, sa'am go tue diret kin jelas ken Ari Kiyamát nyeh kin soma'-soma' dam.
58010026	Jediam diret mileh bedoso. Diret kin dah tawu dah, dah nerimoe dah yeng mat. Pie mun diret manseh ngeresudu' mileh na' bedoso mat dah cum dah pesaling agei' nyo' ngapus doso.
58010027	Tingal diret nantie dam ukum Allah yeng ngenggola', ken api yeng ranyau yeng langko' dipakai Sen nyo' munah ranah pada' munsoh Sen.
58010028	Gei' jeman Musa mie si sege' do reng yeng ngei'e tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Musa, sal do saksi duwo tigo ko' kei ngembokti ke' hal dosoe, reng nyoe diukum matiam. Cum kekaseh nyo' iyo. Jedi semalang ke' reng noe tuno' ke' ukum Musa ge'e, di ukum mati,
58010029	sa'am go reng yeng ngei'e tuno' ke' Ana' Allah nyeh! Ukum iyo kepala' borat deri reng yeng nungkang ukum Musa pun. Go iyo mat ngeremeh ngelinya' Ana' Allah die. Derah Yesus yeng ngesah jenyi semayo Allah, yeng ngajene to' engku Allah bangam, pie diitong iyo jolu remeh nyem. Roh Allah yeng ngenjemín pengunyo' pengaseh Sen nyeh mat dihinae. Mangko iyo mat pasti diukum.
58010030	Go diret kin tekenal ken Allah yeng nitahe bungie potue: Akuam yeng ngukum reng! Aku pasti melas kejate, jie Sen. A, ge'em jie lem Kitap Sen, Tuwowe diret langko' mencaro ken ngukum umát Sen. (Ulang 32:36)
58010031	Mat ngeloh nar dipenjeri diukum le' Allah yeng idup!
58010032	Pie mátam, kamei. Kam ca' ingát koti keada' ken gewai kam ketiko nyoe mie, des kam ngaleh deri sagam ke' tampa' nyeh. Ketiko nyoe kin kam ngetat nyem, noe kam munor, numo' pun kam benya' ngerudu kesusah kesensare;
58010033	dese kam do berudu diolo'-olo', diiro dikenyayo di adap reng rami; dese go kaban kam yeng dipulah reng tokoh nyoe, pie kam neraso jum di lem kesensare betor.
58010034	Kam pun mat susah, seperaso seatiam ken kaban kam yeng dipenjero pun. Ge'em ketiko jolu kam dirampas reng mie pie kam tetap ayah bikaham; nyoe pun go kam dah tawu ken yeng seli engku kam si mat reto beno jento keraja' yeng jewoh lebeh panci, yeng tan.
58010035	Mangko keyakin diret ca' dipongki', nang na' dipelosi, kamei. Go mun diret yakin si upah diret pun paling bosai.
58010036	Diret mat ca' sabar ngeresudu' nyem gei' diret mat ngenggewai kemawo' Allah. Dah nyoe kin diret mat nerimoe pai-pai pun yeng dijenyi Sen.
58010037	Nyoe pun nyoma' dam, kamei, go jie lem Kitap Sen yeng langko' detang nyeh mat noe dam lamat na' detangam; Sen noe lalai leler peh.
58010038	Umát Sen yeng diputus Sen bujor benar tam pecayo nyeh mat idup, jie Sen. Pie mun do di antaro diret yeng munor si Sen paling noe ayah Sen ken reng yeng tokoh nyoe.
58010039	Pie diret noe iyo reng yeng munor lalu punah ranah* peh, kamei. Diret si mat reng yeng pecayo yeng suroh Sen bodan.
58011001	Pecayo tei' maksute yakin ken jolu yeng diarap diret, ya'am yakin ke' hal jolu yeng noe awas ken mato.
58011002	Tam pada' akei' puyang nyomie pecayo mangko desiyan pun dikeayah dipugi le' Allah.
58011003	Tam pecayo mangko diret jelas ken deniyo tue dipulah ken kosoh mulut Allaham: maksute jolu yeng awas mat dipulah deri jolu yeng noe awas.
58011004	Tam Habel pecayo mangko sen meyie ke' Allah pesaling yeng lebeh panci deri yeng dibeyie le' Kain. Mangko sen dipadah le' Allah reng bujor benaram. Mat diret Allaham yeng madahe ken Habel reng bujor benar; kenyatoe tam pesaling Habel diterimoe le' Allah. Lalu numo' pun dah mati pie ngelalu kesaksi kepecayo sen Habel manseh beagah becerito ke' diret sampai ke' ari tue pun.
58011005	Tam Henok pecayo mangko sen diangki' dibeyie le' Allah. Secaro tuboh sen mat cum berudu mati; temosie mat cum ponyoam, tam sen mat dibeyie le' Allah. Sebolum sen dibeyie ponyoe kin Allah dah bepadah, ken Sen mat ayah Sen ken Henok.
58011006	Sedang mensiyo mat noe tawu na' nyenáng ati Allah cuwali caro pecayo.* Go sopai pun yeng na' manu ke' Allah yeng pertamoe ca' pecayo ken Sen mat do; ge'em ca' pecayo ken Sen pasti ngupah sopai-sopai pun yeng pilue atie nyinto na' tekenal ken Sen. Jedi mátam.
58011007	Tam Nuh pecayo mangko na' sen ningo ken tuno' taalo' ke' Allah des Sen bepadah ke' hal yeng bolum tejedi pun. Mangko Nuh mat mulah topam gei' sempayo desiyan seberumah diselamát. Pengabise mat nyato nar ken mensiyo yeng layin mat patut ca' diukum le' Allah, tam sidoe mat noe pecayo. Pie Nuh si mat pecayoam, mangko sen pun tekawum ken pada' reng yeng diputus Allah bujor benar tam pecayo.
58011008	Tam Abraham pecayo mangko sen mat tuno' taalo' ke' Allah des Allah nyuroh sen ca' ngaleh ke' nenggeri yeng langko' diunyo' ke' sen ento' tanah ayie kampong loboh diret sen. Mangko sen pun mat turunam, numo' pun sen noe tawu nenggeri nai yeng na' dituju sen.
58011009	Tam sen pecayo mangko dah sen detang ke' nenggeri Kanaan nyeh sen tetap diyam dinyoe, di nenggeri yeng dijenyi Allah langko' diunyo' ke' sen. Ketiko nyoe si nenggeri nyoe gei' engku reng layin die. Abraham diyam dinyoe keedah reng numpang nyem. Kediyam sedena' pun dengau tangong nyem. Ponyoe jum Isak ken Yakub; tanah nenggeri nyoe dijenyi le' Allah nyo' desiyan jum,
58011010	pie desiyan mat diyam dinyoe na' po reng numpang nyem. Go yeng ditantie le' Abraham si mat kota kediyam sen gi yeng tan yeng togap kukoh, yeng dikaji dikarang ken dipulah le' diret Allaham.
58011011	Ge'em tam *Abraham pecayo mangko sen mat disuroh Allah mampu berana', numo' pun sen dah tuwo angkeh, ken bini sen Sara pun manáng. Pie sen mat pecayoam, go lem peritong sen si Allah yeng bejenyi mat mutu, tawu diarap.
58011012	Mangko pada' keturun sen pun mat noe tebilangam pemenya'e, na' po bintang di langi' paser di pantai: nyoe pun deri urang yeng siko' nyem, yeng diitong mensiyo mat dah labas dah; mat cum dah arape na' berana'.
58011013	Semuya' desiyan tadie idup secaro pecayo kerado' ke' mati. Desiyan sampai ke' mati pun mat bolum nerimoe semuya' jolu yeng dijenyi Allah ke' desiyan; sebujor mantaue keedah mantau jolu yeng gei' rapas, dialu disamut lem atie nun. Desiyan mat ngangkue ken desiyan mat urang nyem, yeng numpang diyam di deniyo tue.
58011014	Yeng ngangkue tokoh nyoe mat ngenyato ken iyo nantie tanah ayie kampong loboh yeng engku direte; maksute noe numpang agei'.
58011015	Ja'e noe go desiyan na' pulang ke' nenggeri asale di deniyo tue peh; kira' na' pulang ke' kampong asale kin nan do keloronge, benso Abraham.
58011016	Pie yeng mat si yeng dikeingín le' desiyan tei' tanah ayie kampong loboh yeng jewoh lebeh panci, ya'am di serugo nun. Mangko Allah pun mat ayah Sen tam desiyan mat ngangkue Sen nyo' Allah desiyan; boktie go Sen mat mulah kota nyo' desiyan di serugo nun.
58011017	-
58011018	Jedi mátam. Tam Abraham pecayo mangko sen mat ngunyo' Isak to' pesaling ke' Allah des Allah nguji sen mie. Siko' nyoame' ana' Abraham; Allah pun dah bejenyi ken pada' buboh ampeh Abraham langko' diado ngelalu siko' Isakam. Abraham pun ayah sen ke' hal semuya' yeng dijenyi Allah ke' sen. Pie dah Allah nyuroh sen ca' ngunyo' ana' sen Isak kei pesaling ke' Sen si Abraham pun mat relo. Sen mat ketengah ngenggewaie dah.
58011019	Go lem peritong Abraham si Allah mat tawu Sen nyuroh reng yeng mati bengki' idup agei' pun. Mangko deri nyoe Abraham nerimoe Isak nyeh seolah-olah dah pulang idup agei', go lem peritong Abraham Isak nyeh dah mati dah.
58011020	Jedi mátam. Tam Isak pecayo mangko sen pun ngemberekat ngendolat Yakub ken Esau, madah pai yeng langko' tejedi ke' desiyan.
58011021	Tam Yakub pecayo mangko ketiko nyoma' dam sen na' mati nyeh sen ngemberekat uco' sen, ya'am ana' Yusup yeng duwo ko', samel ngelungkui ke' tungkat sen nyomah ke' Allah.
58011022	Tam Yusup pecayo mangko sen pun dah soma' ulo' lubang nyeh sen mat ngomóng ke' hal pada' reng Israel yeng langko' pamus deri Mesir nyeh, lalu sen beposan ke' desiyan ken kerakah tulang sen ca' ditaban desiyan kinun.
58011023	Tam ino' apa' Musa pecayo mangko des Musa berue diado nyeh iyo mat ditapo' tigo bulan pelamate le' desiyan. Go pemantau desiyan kebiya' Musa nyeh mat jenga'am. Desiyan mat bereni nungkang perentah rajo.
58011024	Tam Musa pecayo mangko dah sen bosai nyeh relo sen ningal pangkat sen di rumah rajo; sen mat ngei' sen kei uco' rajo pun.
58011025	Sen coh disensare beroto ken pada' umát Allah, deripado ngicap kenyamán bedoso, go kenyamán bedoso pun noe tan.
58011026	Go lem peritong Musa pun mun sen diolo'-olo' dihina tam Kristus nyeh nyoe diitong sen manseh lebeh berogo deri pada' kekayo kesugeh nenggeri Mesir pun, go Musa kin nan ngaji upah sen gi.
58011027	Tam sen pecayo mangko sen bereni rari keluwar deri nenggeri Mesir; sen noe gola' sen ken rajo Mesir yeng godie ken sen. Sen ngeresudu' nuju ke' tuju sen nyem, seolah-olah sen dah merati Allah yeng kenaken noe awas ken mato.
58011028	Tam sen pecayo mangko sen ngerinah Ari Raya Ngelalu, ken nyuroh pada' reng Israel ngulai derah domo ke' bingkai lawange, gei' sempayo pada' ana' jula' reng Israel noe diculet kaliam le' melekat yeng munah ranah.
58011029	Tam pada' reng Israel pecayo mangko desiyan nyemorang Lawut Mirah na' po reng bejelan di tanah koringam. Pie dah pada' reng Mesir ngencubo ngenjurut si sidoe tengolam.
58011030	Tam reng Israel pecayo mangko pada' pagar betu kota Yeriko pun tumpar, dah desiyan bejelan ngelilinge tujoh ari nyeh.
58011031	Tam betinoe royal bedemo Rahab pecayo nyeh mangko sen mat noe dibunoh beroto ken pada' reng layin di Yeriko yeng nungkang Allah nyeh. Go ketiko reng Israel nyelidik kota Yeriko nyeh mat diterimoe panci le' Rahab. Mangko sen pun mat bodan.
58011032	A, jedi gesah pada' reng pecayo nyomie nyeh bula' dituam lo'e. Na' ngenggesah semuya'-muya'e kin noe sompat, benso ke' hal Gideon, Barak, Simson, Yepta, Daud, Samuel, demo ke' pada' penijum opai.
58011033	Tam desiyan pecayo mangko do deri desiyan yeng beperang ken ngalah pada' rajo; do yeng menjedi akim nenggeri Israel; do yeng ningo ken pecayo ken jenyi Allah; do yeng ngalah binatang singa;
58011034	do yeng noe disego le' api ranyau; do yeng noe dikalah le' munsohe yeng na' nikame ken kelewang; do yeng dikuwaso le' Allah des lomah; do yeng bereni beperang ken ngalah pada' tentara nenggeri bukan;
58011035	do betinoe yeng warise disuroh Sen bengki' idup agei'. A, do jum desiyan yeng pecayo pie ditangkap, disensare, dipempungah tubohe sampai mati. Kira' desiyan na' nyangkal kepecayo desiyan si dipelopas reng, pie desiyan noe nyangkal peh, go desiyan mat ngaji cadange yeng lebeh panci, ya'am bengki' idup agei' seora'-ora'eam.
58011036	Do deri desiyan yeng diolo'-olo', dipelesah, do yeng dipasong ken rantai bosi lalu dipenjero.
58011037	Do yeng dibunoh ditikam ken betu; do yeng dibunoh ditukong duwo ken kergeji; do yeng dibunoh ken kelewang; do yeng bensat meretatam, pekakase kuli' domo ken kaming nyem; do yeng dipempungah diderako reng.
58011038	Desiyan sampai merantau di padang puwang, di pada' gunóng, diyam di guwo ken di pada' tengkelubang nyem, keabis kesensaree. Paling patoh pada' desiyan nyomie. Mat noe patut reng sepanci nyoe ca' ngendiyam deniyo tue yeng paling jat nyeh.
58011039	Allah si mat ayah Sen ken semuya' desiyan tam desiyan pecayo. Pie numo' pun ponyoe siko' pun cum yeng nerimoe di deniyo tue yeng dijenyi Sen ke' desiyan.
58011040	Go Allah mat do rencana Sen yeng lebeh panci, yeng ngawum diret jum: ya'am pada' desiyan sempurno noe sempurno pun ca' beroto ken pada' diret gi. Dinyoam berue Sen nuntong pada' jenyi Sen ke' desiyan Nyoe gesah keturun pada' desiyan yeng pecayo mie.
58012001	Mangko diret pun ca' ponyoe jum, kamei: diret mat ca' ngeresudu' ngenggewai pai yeng dah ditetap nyo' diret, na' po reng yeng bebodap beselumoe tepat di jelan yeng dah ditentu nyo' iyo. Go diret mat ngaji saksi pada' desiyan yeng benya' yeng pecayo nyomie. Mangko pada' doso yeng ngereribat diret ca' dipucelam, ken pai-pai pun yeng ngembeban diret mat ca' diongkaham.
58012002	Semuya' pengaji diret ca' dipusat ke' Yesus bangam, go iyoam Pengulu ken Penyempurno kepecayo diret. Iyo mie noe menduli dihina reng pun; iyo sabar nyem ngetate disalip reng pun. Iyo ngaji cadange, go dah iyo lopas disensare reng mie iyo pasti tetap ayah bikah! Dah nyoe iyo mat diagong di piya' kanán Allah yeng merentah kei rajo.
58012003	Ngatam kesensare yeng dirudu Yesus mie, ditentang disensare le' pada' reng bedoso ponyoe, pie iyo dietate nyem. Mangko diret mat ca' nan ingát ngenáng iyo, gei' sempayo diret pun noe mudoe kuroe, noe lelah
58012004	beperang ngelawan doso. Go diret kin bolum do ngelawan doso sampai betumpah derah na' po iyo. Mangko diret ca' sabar nyem ngetate.
58012005	A, gola' pai nawue diret dah kelupo dah omóng Sen ken diret pada' ana' Sen, yeng ngemberansang ati diret. Omóng Sen di lem Kitap Sen mie kin bungie potue, Dingoam kam biya': nang na' ngeremehe des kam diajar dididik le' Tuwowe kam; nang na' mudoe kuroe des kam ditegur diperingát Sen.
58012006	Go diret yeng dikaseh le' Tuwowe pasti diajar dididik Sen; ken sopai pun yeng dah diterimoe kei ana' Sen pasti ditegur disipat Sen, jie Sen. (Amsal 3:11-12)
58012007	Mangko diret mat ca' sabar nyem ngetate des diret ngerudu kesensare, go dinyoam Allah ngajar ngendidik diret, na' po gewai apa' ken ana'e. Noe ken do ana' biya' yeng noe diajar dididik le' apa'e.
58012008	Mun diret noe diajar dididik Sen si maksute diret ana' kampang, noe iyo ana' sah, go semuya' ana' Sen mat diajar dididik Sen bisam, cum kecuwalie.
58012009	Semalang ke' apa' diret di deniyo tue pun ge'e, nan gei' ngajar ngendidik diret. Diret pun tuno' ngehormát apa' diret. Sa'am go Apa' diret secaro roh! Diret mat ca' tuno' taalo' ke' Sen gei' sempayo diret mat idup.
58012010	Apa' diret di deniyo tue si ngendidik diret sementaro waktu nyem, cuco' ken pai yeng diangap desiyan panci. Pie Allah si ngendidik diret kontan ngaji keuntong diret, gei' sempayo diret menjedi suci bereseh na' po diret Sénam.
58012011	Gei' ketengah ngerudu pengajar pendidik Sen si alape ca' nyo' nyusah diret, cum keayah bikahe. Pie berang reng yeng mat diajar dididik le' Sen si asele paling panci: ya'am idup tenáng amán tam gewai ulahe mat bujor benar. Nyoam go Sen ngajar ngendidik diret.
58012012	Mangko, kamei, ca' diperkuwatam jeri yeng jerurui, ken peletut yeng lomah!
58012013	Jelan diret ca' dipebujor dipensiyang, gei' sempayo reng timpang pun noe tejempilo' noe tepesalah, malah ken paie bebeli' jogar pulang tiko.
58012014	Diret ca' besemangát sebulat ati idup damai ken semuya' urang. Ge'em diret ca' besemangát sebulat ati idup suci bereseh, go yeng noe idup suci bereseh mat noe mampu begelumo ken Tuwowe diret.
58012015	Diret ca' bejego, gola' do siko' pun yeng ngerangang direte deri pengunyo' pengaseh Allah. Nang na' sampai timu di antaro diret na' po kayu yeng urate piyet, yeng biso, lalu iyo ngacau ngaru pada' umát, sampai benya' reng tebeyie jum lem gewaie yeng jat.
58012016	Diret ca' bejego, gola' do siko' pun yeng butang beonga'. Awas kam, gola' do yeng cum ngaji Allah, benso Esau. Esau kin muloe behak nerimoe dolat Allah tam sen ana' jula' nyeh, pie ditukar sen ken semangkok rompah nyem.
58012017	Kepepanyange kin Esau mat ingín nar na' diberekat, pie peminta' sen mat ditula'. Sampai berutus ayie mato sen ngemoran minta' diberekat, pie cumam diborie kelorong nyo' sen memanci kesalah sen yeng dah telampoh nyeh. Mangko nang na' diret nunoe contoh Esau.
58012018	Diret jemán tue kin layin ken reng Israel nyomie. Caro desiyan manu ke' Allah mie kin desiyan manu ke' jolu yeng awas ken mato yeng teraso ken jeri. Mat ngenggola'am jolu yeng diperati le' desiyan nyomie: api yeng ranyauam di Gunóng Sinai; ken sagam gelemát; ken ujan buwowe;
58012019	ken bungi selumpit yeng ontap; a, ken suwaro yeng gar gur madah posan payit Sen ke' desiyan. Sampai desiyan yeng ningoe muhún mampalam gei' sempayo jediam Sen madah posan payit Sen ke' desiyan,
58012020	go desiyan noe tan tam kegola'e. Go jie Sen kin umpamoe binatang pun yeng nyoma' gunóng nyoe mat ca' ditikam ken betu sampai mati, sa'am mun mensiyo.
58012021	Mat paling ngenggola'am yeng diperati le' desiyan dinyoe, mat tebelokamam desiyan meratie, sampai jie Kei' Musa sen pun begegar begitik tam kegola' sen.
58012022	Pie kebelike diret jemán tue si dah manu ke' Gunóng Sion die, kota kediyam Allah yeng idup, ya'am Yerusalem yeng mat, yeng di serugo nun. Dinunam pada' melekat Sen yeng beribu-ribu beriyah berami beayah bikah.
58012023	Diret tekawum lem gereja Sen, ya'am pada' ana' jula' Sen yeng demoe dah ditulis Sen dinun. Diret dah manu ke' Allah yeng ngakim semuya' mensiyo; a, ken manu jum ke' pada' roh mensiyo yeng bujor benar, yeng dipulah Sen sempurno.
58012024	Diret dah manu ke' Yesus, pesulue Allah ken mensiyo, yeng ngesah jenyi semayo yeng beru nyeh ken derah direteam yeng ngembereseh diret. Kesaksi yeng didingo diret deri derah Yesus si mat jewoh lebeh panci deri yeng dipadah le' derah Habel mie.*
58012025	Mangko diret mat ca' bejego, gei' diret noe nungkang Sen yeng madah posan payit Sen nyoe ke' diret. Desiyan nyomie pun ge'e. Yeng dipadah ke' desiyan nyomie kin dipadah di deniyo tue nyem. Pie dah desiyan nungkange mat noe luput deri ukum Sen. Sa'am go diret! Go yeng dipadah ke' diret kin deri serugo nun. Konai diret na' luput deri ukum Sen mun diret bolei' ken Sen.
58012026	Ketiko nyoe kin suwaro Sen mat ngenggontar deniyo tue. Tue pun Sen bejenyi sekali agei' Sen na' ngenggontare, pie noe iyo ngat tanah peh, pie langi' ge'em.
58012027	Bungi Sen "sekali agei'" nyeh maksute dah nyoe daham: go dah digontar Sen pengudah kalie nyeh dinyoam pada' pempulah Sen langko' dipelosi diperabis Sen kaliam. Maksute sempayo pengabise tingal jolu yeng tan dam, yeng noe tawu digontar.
58012028	Jedi mátam, kamei. Diret mat konoe kawum des Allah disomah kei rajo di arong yeng noe tegontar kaliam. Mangko diret mat ca' besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen. Nyoe caro diret nyomah ke' Sen yeng nyenáng ati Sen. Diret ca' ngehormát kuwaso ken keagong Sen, ken ca' tuno' taalo' ke' Sen,
58012029	go Allah diret keedah api ranyau nyo' munah ranah.
58013001	Diret yeng seimán ca' nan serarat kaseh mengaseh ken betor.
58013002	A, ge'em nang na' diret ngelupoe ken diret ca' ayah nerimoe temuwai tentamui. Go koloe reng yeng nerimoe temuwai tentamui temosie teterimoe ke' melekat die poe!
58013003	Diret ca' nan ingát ken kaban diret yeng dipenjero, na' po seolah-olah diret dipenjero jum ken sidoe*. Ponyoe jum ken pada' kaban diret yeng nan disensare, diret mat ca' seperaso ken sidoe seolah-olah tuboh diretam yeng disensare.
58013004	Idup bejodo mat idup yeng paling berogo; mat ca' dihormát le' semuya' segenoe. Nang ngeroyal ken nang butang beonga'. Nyoe ngotor ngencemar gewai yeng dititah le' Allah nyo' reng bejodo nyem. Go Allah pun pasti ngukum reng yeng butang beonga' ken yeng gewaie ngeroyal.
58013005	Diret ca' ngenjego keidup diret gei' dipelopas deri keingín na' buleh duwit. Diret ca' sabas ati ken pai-pai pun jolu yeng dah do di diret. (Konai na' noe sabas, go yeng nan do ken diret kin diret Sénam.) Kin jie Sen, Aku senoe-noam merayan kau, Aku senoe-noam ningal kau, jie Sen. (Ulang 31:6)
58013006	Mangko diret mat bereniam madah ke' sopai pun, ken yeng nulong diret tue mat Tuwowe diret, mangko diret noe gola' dipekoti pun le' mensiyo.
58013007	Ingátam ken pemimpin kam nyomie, yeng madah posan payit Allah ke' kam. Diret ca' nan ngaji ken ingát asel gewai ulah sidoe yeng panci deri idup sampai ke' mati pun. Diret ca' nunoe contoh kepecayo sidoe.
58013008	Yesus Kristus mat nan serarat samoam, po nyomie, po tengkalo tue, po seora'-ora'eam.
58013009	Mangko nang na' diret semadi dibeyie le' pada' pengajar yeng enah yeng bemacam bejenis, sampai diret nyimpang deri jelan yeng mat. Benso pengajar ke' hal nyego pesaling. Ati diret disuroh Allah togap kukoh pun tam pengunyo' pengaseh Sénam, noe iyo tam diret nyego pada' pesaling peh. Begi sidoe yeng patoh ke' hal ke' deng nyoe pun mat cum jum keuntonge begi sidoe.*
58013010	Diret si mat do pesaling nyo' doso diret, pie pesaling nyoe noe iyo pesaling yeng disego peh. Sidoe yeng melayan di rumah kediyam Allah di deniyo tue pun mat noe behak nyego pesaling nyoe.
58013011	Kenaken si ponyoe jum ken pesaling yeng dibeyie le' pelayan agong kei ngembereseh doso sidoe mie: derah binatang nyeh dibeyie ke' lem Petak yeng Paling Suci, pie bengkaie dicucole ke' jewoh, ke' luwar kolong kediyam sidoe. Isei'e noe disegoe peh.
58013012	Lalu pesaling Yesus ento' doso diret ponyoe jum: iyo mat ngerudu kesensare di luwar pintu gerbang kota Yerusalem, gei' iyo ngembereseh umáte deri dosoe ken derah direteam.
58013013	Mangko, kamei, diret mat ca' manu ke' iyo di luwar kolong jum*, samo-samo diolo'-olo' dihina reng na' po iyo nyomie.
58013014	Go kediyam diret yeng tan yeng togap kukoh nyeh noe iyo kediyam di deniyo tue peh; pie kebelike diret nantie ngendiyam kota yeng langko' do gi.
58013015	Jedi mátam te'. Ke' hal pesaling tei' diret mat ca' serarat meyie pesaling diret ke' Allah ngelalu Yesus. Pie pesaling diret nyeh ya'am omóng tutor yeng mugi demo Sen, nyo' besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Sen.
58013016	Ge'em nang na' diret kelupo ngenggewai gewai yeng panci nyo' betor, tulong menulong sopai pun yeng do keperelue. Go mat pesaling tokoh nyoam yeng nyenáng ati Allah.
58013017	Diret ca' tuno' taalo' ke' pemimpin diret, ca' relo nunoe jie sidoe. Go sidoe mat ngenjego ngawas diret tam sidoe pun tawu ken sidoam yeng ca' borie penyamut ke' Allah. Mun diret tuno' taalo' ke' sidoe si sidoe mat ayah bikah ngelaju gewaie, pie mun noe kin sidoe meraso borat ati ngelaju gewaie. Lalu keuntong begi diret pun cum.
58013018	Serarat bedoa nyo' kami beh? Kami si yakin lem ati kocit kami nun pun ken gewai kami mat panci, go kebosai ati kami si kami na' serarat ngenggewai yeng bujor benar.
58013019	Ku muhún mampal ke' kam gei' kam bedoa terutamoe gei' Sen nguruse gei' sempayo aku copat pulang ke' kam ditue. Jedi mátam.
58013020	Mat Allaham yeng ngendamai diret ken Sen. Jenyi semayo Sen ken diret mat disah Sen seora'-ora'eam ken derah Yesus. Mat ngelalu derah nyoe Yesus Tuwowe diret bengki' idup agei'am. Iyoam Penungu Domo yeng Agong yeng nungu noyu pada' domoe.
58013021	Ku minta' kiroe Sen ngemberekat kam ken semuya' segeloe yeng panci, nyo' nyukup kekurang kemalang kam, gei' sempayo kam mampu ngenggewai kemawo' Sen. Kiroe Sen ngerejo ngenggewai lem ati diret pai-pai pun yeng nyenáng ati Sen, ngelalu Yesus Kristus yeng patut diagong seora'-ora'eam. Amin.
58013022	Ku muhún mampal ke' kam menyadie ku yeng seimán: kiroe kam relo ningo nasehat ku lem surat tue, go kenaken si mat penekam surat yeng ku tulis tue, noe ge' die ngembeban gila', engo ku.
58013023	Timotius, menyadie diret yeng seimán nyeh, tue dah dipelopas deri penjero, nyamán kam tawue. Mun iyo lokas kinun si kena' berotoam ngulang kam ditue.
58013024	Padaham salam kami ke' pada' pemimpin kam ken ke' pada' umát engku Allah ditue, beh? Salam jum deri menyadie diret yeng seimán di Italia nyo' kam ditue.
58013025	Ku minta' ke' Allah gei' pengunyo' pengaseh Sen nan nyelinong nyeroto kam.
59001001	Salam deri Yakobus, ulun amo Allah ken Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret, ke' pada' umát Israel yeng duwo belas suku benso yeng pencar temiyar di seruroh deniyo tue.
59001002	Menyadie ku yeng seimán: des diret ngerudu kesensare yeng bemacam bejenis yeng ngencubo diret nyeh diret ca' ngitonge nyo' kelorong diret paling ayah bikah.
59001003	Go diret kin tawu, mun kepecayo diret tan diuji si asele diret mampu tan ngetat pai-pai pun.
59001004	A, diret tan ngetat pai-pai pun do tuju maksute, asele yeng paling panci, ya'am lamat belamat diret mat sempurnoam, cum kekurang kemalang diret.
59001005	Mun do di antaro diret yeng noe panai mileh si iyo ca' minta' ke' Allah kei Sen nulonge. Sen pun na' Sen nulonge, ngunyo' kemampu kei iyo panai mileh, go Sen paling buwar ngunyo' modas-modasam ke' sopai pun yeng manu ke' Sen. Noe Sen ngangki' ngugat, noe Sen ngitong ngonánge peh.
59001006	Pie reng yeng minta' pun mat ca' sebulat ati arap ken Sen, nang na' tumang aming, go reng yeng tumang aming na' po gelumang lawut yeng diciyup angín kitue kinyoe.
59001007	-
59001008	Reng tokoh nyoe mat beati duwo bolah dulang; keidupe nan noe tenáng. Nang na' arape reng yeng tokoh nyoe buleh pai-pai pun deri Tuwowe.
59001009	Menyadie diret yeng seimán yeng bensat nyeh iyo ca' beiyap bebungah tam iyo dah diagong ditingie le' Allah.
59001010	A, ken menyadie seimán yeng berado nyeh iyo ca' beiyap bebungah jum, pie ca' tam pangkate yeng renah samo ken betore. Iyo nang na' beiyap tam kekayo kesugehe, go keidupe di deniyo tue pun sebentaram, keedah komang yeng layue topa' deri tangkaie.
59001011	Go dah mato ari panas ontap nyeh rumput kin mat layuam, komange pun gegar, cum dah kejenga' kelaga'e. Ponyoe jum reng kayo berado: temosie losi nayápam ketengah iyo ngelaju pada' gewaie pun. Mangko nang na' iyo beiyap bebungah tam pada' jolue.
59001012	Reng yeng tan ngerudu kesensare si mat ayah bikaham, go mun iyo mat tan diuji kin maksute kepecayoe mat togap. Mangko iyo langko' nerimoe upahe, ya'am mahkota keidup yeng dijenyi Sen ke' semuya' reng yeng ngaseh Sen.
59001013	Jedi des diret digudo nyeh nang na' jie diret diret digudo le' Allah. Go Allah si noe koloe ngenggudo mensiyo kei iyo bedoso; Sen pun noe tawu digudo le' pai pun kei nyuroh Sen bedoso.
59001014	Pie yeng nyuroh diret mensiyo digudo si ya'am des diret ditari' dibeyie le' keingín diret yeng jat.
59001015	Lalu mun diret mat nunoe keingín yeng jat si kibate mat doso; a, kibat doso tei' pengabise ya'am kemati.
59001016	Mangko nang na' diret tetipu di lem hal tue, menyadie kekaseh ku yeng seimánei.
59001017	Go yeng mat si pengunyo' Allah ke' diret mat kontan panci bangam. Go semuya' segelo yeng panci yeng sempurno mat pengunyo' deri serugo; bungkonge mat Allah Apa' yeng asal muloe ngado pada' penampa' di langi' nun. Sen pun noe Sen berubah. Sen noe na' po mato ari yeng begenset sampai tampa'e menjedi sagam; pie Sen si nan serarat samoam.
59001018	Sen mat ngado diret ngelalu posan payit Sen yeng mat, tam kona' kemawo' diret Sénam. Tuju maksut Sen gei' sempayo diret ditingie dihormát deri pada' pempulah Sen yeng layin. Nyoam pengunyo' Sen yeng panci ke' diret.
59001019	Menyadie kekaseh ku yeng seimán: diret ca' ingátam ke' hal tue beh? Semuya' diret mat ca' copat ento' ningo, pie lamat ento' ngomóng, ken nang na' lokas godie.
59001020	Go kegodie mensiyo mat noe mampu ngelaju kemawo' Allah yeng bujor benar.
59001021	Mangko mat ca' dipucelam semuya' doso diret yeng paling benya' yeng paling jat. Diret ca' renah atiam nerimoe posan payit yeng ditanám di lem ati diret, yeng tawu nulong nyelamát diret.
59001022	Posan payit Allah mat ca' dipakai digewai le' diret. Reng yeng ngat ningoe nyem pie noe ngenggewaie si iyo memuloe direte.
59001023	Reng yeng ningo posan payit Sen pie noe ngenggewaie iyo keedah reng yeng berue mantau muko rerayi direte di lem ceromín,
59001024	pie dah iyo ningale iyo lintus kelupoam koti upo muko direte.
59001025	Teruhal lem posan payit Sen nyeh tepansoe pada' perentah pelator pengajar pemadah Sen yeng cum kekurang kemalange, yeng tawu ngelopas diret kei diret bebas melayan Sen. Mangko berang reng yeng serarat neliti ngenjerumát posan payit Sen, lalu noe ngelupo yeng didingoe pie mat digewaie si, pada' gewai reng nyoe mat diberekat didolat le' Allah.
59001026	Mun do reng yeng ngangap direte dah beagama, pie iyo noe tawu ngenjego omóng tutor direte si iyo mat siyo-siyo nyem beagama. Iyo memuloe direte nyem.
59001027	Pie reng yeng seputeh ati sebeníng derah beagama nyeh iyo noyu merintu ana' biya' umáng, ken noyu merintu pada' reng belu yeng susah sontok. Ge'em iyo nyiyáng nyiseh direte gei' noe dicelo le' kejat di deniyo tue. Allah Apa' diret pun mat ayah Sen ken reng yeng beagama tokoh nyoe.
59002001	Pada' menyadie ku yeng seimán: diret yeng pecayo ken Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret yeng agong si mat noe buleh pileh bulu beurang beaku.
59002002	Jedi umpamoe misale des diret semeyang, lalu detang temuwai duwo ko', siko' reng yeng kayo rayo, bepakai panci mewah, pakai mas perak opai. A, ge'em ken yeng siko' yeng bensat, pekakase buro', cabi' cari'.
59002003	Lalu umpamoe diret ngehormát reng yeng berado, nyurohe dudo' di arong yeng panci yeng mewah; pie yeng bensat mensekin disuroh diret bediri dinun ja' atau pun disuroh dudo' di arong yeng jat di pengesat kaki.
59002004	Mun ponyoe kin mat nyato nar ken diret ngembedo urang, mat pileh bulu ken pado diret yeng seTuwowe. Diret seolah-olah menjedi akim betor, pie akim yeng jat ati pemikere.
59002005	Dingoam beh, menyadie kekaseh ku yeng seimán. Yeng dipileh le' Allah kin kebenya'e mat reng bensat mensekin di deniyo tue; pie kekayoe tam iyo pecayo. Mat reng tokoh nyoe yeng dipileh Sen nyo' lileh nyawo Sen, kei nerimoe pada' reto beno jento keraja' yeng dijenyi Sen nyo' reng yeng ngaseh Sen.
59002006	Pie diret ngeremeh reng bensat, ngehormát reng kayo! Noe peh pada' reng kayo yeng erat nyensare kam, yeng gela' nomah ngendudoh kam di adap akim,
59002007	yeng...menghina demo Yesus Tuwowe diret yeng panci? Pie reng tokoh nyoe poe yeng nan dihormát kam, konoe ke' reng yeng bensat nyeh kam angap remeh.
59002008	A, jie perentah deri Rajo diret yeng ditulis lem Kitap Sen si diret ca' ngaseh betor po ngaseh diretam. Mun yeng nyoe mat ditunoe dipakai le' diret si mat konoam.
59002009	Pie mun diret pileh bulu beurang beaku si nyoe mat doso. Ukum Sénam yeng bepadah ken diret mat patut ca' diukum, go diret mat ngelangar ukum Sen.
59002010	Go biyar pun reng selomo nan tuno' taalo' ke' pada' ukum Allah pie mun iyo ngelangar sutie pun manseh patut ca' diukum, go ngelangar sutie ngelangar semuya'e pun manseh demo ngelangar.
59002011	Go beyi' yeng madah nang butang beonga', beyi' yeng madah nang munoh pie ngat siko' Allaham yeng madahe. Mangko mun reng noe butang beonga' pie mun iyo munoh si maksute iyo dah menjedi pelangar ukum dah.
59002012	Pie do jum pelator Sen yeng beru, yeng ngelopas diret deri kuwaso doso. Diret dipecaro gi pakai pelator yeng beru nyeh. Mangko omóng tutor gewai ulah diret mat ca' cuco' ken yeng beru.
