59002013	Go sopai pun yeng cum kekasehe ken betore si Allah pun cum kekaseh Sen des Sen ngukum reng nyoe gi. Ja'e mun do kekaseh diret si diret noe sa' gola' diukum. Go losi ukum timol kekaseh*.
59002014	Pada' menyadie ku yeng seimán: mun jie reng Ku si pecayo pie cum gewaie nyo' ngenyato kepecayoe si pai ge' gunoe? Noe ken iyo luput* deri kibat dosoe mun kepecayoe cum kenyatoe.
59002015	Umpamoe do menyadie diret yeng seimán yeng cum pakai ingape, cum jolu kei segoe.
59002016	Pai gei' gunoe mun jie diret Nyamán senángam, kayo sugeham! Pagi lusoe kiroe doam pakai ingap makan udap kau! Pie diret cum ngunyo' jolu yeng diperelue. Nyoe pai gunoe?
59002017	Ponyoe jum ke' hal pecayo. Mun mungkal pecayo nyem, pie cum gewai nyo' ngenyato kepecayo diret si mat cum gunoe. Kepecayo diret ibarat ke' jolu din dah mati dah.
59002018	Umpamoe jie reng iyo mementing pecayo nyem, noe iyo po betore yeng ngaji mementing gewaie. Pie koti iyo na' ngenyato kepecayoe mun cum gewaie? Gewai diret kin gunoe nyo' ngenyato kepecayo diret; pie reng yeng cum gewaie tokoh nyoe si pailah nyo' iyo ngenyato kepecayoe?
59002019	Jie iyo si iyo pecayo ken Allah mat siko'am. Nyoe si sukoram! Pie nyoe pai ge' bedoe ken pada' antu setan? Pada' antu setan pun pecayo jum ken Allah mat siko'am. Malah ken paie sidoe begegar begitik ngaji Sen!
59002020	Mat poso' ngeromusam pengaji reng tokoh nyoe, kamei. Kepecayo tokoh nyoe ampoe buwauam. Nyeh boktie manseh ca' ditamah agei' peh?
59002021	Boktie tei' ya'am benso Abraham, akei' puyang diret. Sen kin dinyato ken sen mat bujor benar* tam gewai sen nyerah ana' sen Isak di bedah pesaling mie.
59002022	Dinyoe kin jelas ken kepecayo sen mat diseroto ken gewai sen, lalu kepecayo sen pun mansang ke' kuwat tam gewai sen.*
59002023	Lalu dinyoe mat nyato nar yeng dah dipadah nyomie lem Kitap Sen yeng bungie potue, Abraham pun pecayo ken Allah, mangko diputus le' Sen reng bujor benar, jie Sen. (Yesaya 41:8) Lalu Kei' Abraham pun disebut kaban Allah.
59002024	Deri contoh Kei' Abraham tue diret jelas; mat gewai diret yeng kei ngenyato kebujor kebenar diret. Maksute diret diputus Allah bujor benar tam pecayo, pie noe iyo bula' dinyoam peh.
59002025	Ponyoe jum ke' hal Rahab, betinoe royal di Yeriko mie. Sen dinyato bujor benar tam gewai sen nulong desiyan yeng nyelidik kota Yeriko mie. Desiyan disuroh sen numpang di rumah sen, lalu dah na' pulang disuroh sen ca' pulang montas gei' noe ditangkap munsohe. Dinyoe sen ngenyato kepecayo sen ken gewai sen.
59002026	Jedi mátam te'. Po tuboh yeng rohe dah cum nyeh maksute dah mati; ponyoe jum kepecayo yeng noe begerak; seolah-olah dah mati jum.
59003001	-
59003002	Pada' menyadie ku yeng seimán: ke' hal omóng tutor diret si semuya' diret mat benya' kesalah diret. Mangko noe sa' benya' diret yeng menjedi guru. Go des diret ditiliti dijerumát gi, pada' guru dijerumát lebeh teliti deri reng layin. Mun do reng yeng noe koloe tegeroso' kato, reng nyoe mat sempurnoam; maksute iyo mat mampu ngator seruroh tubohe gei' noe bedoso.
59003003	A, benso kuda ken tali pengiringe. Diret namat tali pengiring ke' nyawo kuda gei' sempayo kuda nunoe kona' diret, mangko konai kemawo' diret kinyoe jum iyo ngenjurut.
59003004	A, benso kapal layar ge'em. Kapal layar kin bosai; ca' diciyup angín deras berue na'e bejelan. Pie iyo diator ke' kiboe ke' kanán ken kemudie yeng paling kocit ento' nunoe kemawo' jeragane.
59003005	Ponyoe jum lidah diret. Lidah diret kin sebegi yeng kocit lem tuboh diret, pie paling bosai kibat keberakah gewaie. Cubo ngaji benso api. Muloe kin paling kocit, pie mampu nyego tentanah utan imun yeng paling luwah!
59003006	Jedi lidah diret pun mat keedah api; pada' kebeyat jat bemacam bejenis di deniyo tue mat disebut dikosoh le' lidah diret; pengabise deri ati pemiker sampai ke' gewai ulah diret tecelo tam kejat lidah diret. Ibarat ke' api din dipantong deri lawut api dipontel ke' seruroh keidup diret.
59003007	Konoe ke' pada' binatang demo ke' burong demo ke' binatang ngengkerayap demo ke' pada' ikan opai si mat mampu mensiyo ngenggina'e, deri asal muloe mie pun.
59003008	Pie tekonoe ke' lidah direte si mat noe tawu diator digina' le' mensiyo. Mat keedah binatang gerang yeng noe mampu dikukoh. Mat paling jat lidah diret, keedah racun yeng biso.
59003009	Lidah diret dipakai nyo' mugi Apa' Tuwowe diret ge'em, dipakai nyo' nyumpah misoh mensiyo yeng dipulah serupo ken Allah ge'em.
59003010	Nyawo diret kin sutiam, pie omónge separoe kei mugi Sen separoe kei nyumpah misoh betor. Paling noe patut, menyadie ku yeng seimánei.
59003011	-
59003012	Cubo ngaji benso mato ayie: noe ken do mato ayie yeng ngeluwar duwo reno ayie, yeng sereno masing yeng sereno colap. Mun mato ayie nyeh masing noe ken keluwar ayie yeng colap, dih? Go bungkonge ngat sutiam. A, benso buwah kayu ge'em. Noe ken kayu ara bebuwah buwah saitun, menyadie ku yeng seimánei. Ken betang angur, noe ken bebuwah buwah ara! Jedi ponyoe jum ken lidah diret, mat noe patut dipakai kei nyumpah ge'em ken kei mugi ge'em. Menurute ca' diator, gei' noe dipakai tokoh nyoe. Jedi mátam.
59003013	Mun do di antaro diret yeng panai mileh, yeng dah tawu yeng mat si mat do caro kei iyo ngenyatoe. Iyo ca' ngenyatoe ken gewai ulah tingkah lakue yeng panci, yeng digewaie ken caro renah ati. Go pangkal renah ati tei' mat panai mileh.
59003014	Pie kebelike mun diret isin dengki, beati bedireteam, gela' ngempakso memana' betor si nang na' diret beiyap bebungah tam gewai diret tokoh nyoe. Nyoe nyunsang ngembelengi' posan payit Allah yeng mat.
59003015	Gewai yeng tokoh nyoe noe iyo kepanai mileh yeng berasal deri serugo peh. Gewai tokoh nyoe mat berasal deri deniyo tue, yeng nunoe keingín mensiyo nyem; mat asale deri roh jat.
59003016	Go dinai do reng yeng isin dengki ken beati bediret si dinyoam nan do timol kekacau kebilau ken semuya' kebeyat jat.
59003017	Pie epun bungkong kepanai mileh yeng deri Sen si diret mementing Sénam seputeh ati sebeníng derah. Mangko diret ngelimu ati pemiker betor gei' iyo idup sesaro' ken betor; diret suyo', relo tuno' ke' betor; diret nulong ngaseh betor yeng susah sontok; diret nan ngenggewai yeng panci; diret bulat ati; diret terus terang.
59003018	Tingkah laku yeng tokoh nyoe kin mat keedah boneh yeng diamur reng yeng na'e idup sesaro' ken betor, yeng ayahe nulong betore idup sesaro' jum. Mangko buwah yeng dipungkote ya'am gewai yeng bujor benar.
59004001	Nyeh gopailah di antaro diret nan do denam mendenam petengkar petingkis? Bungkonge go diret nan ngogoe kenyamán kesenáng direteam, lalu keingín diret betungkang ken keingín betor yeng layin.
59004002	Jolu yeng paling dikeingín diret mat noe tetomu, mangko diret denam mendenam ken betengkar betingkis. Keingín diret yeng nyelulu na' nyamán senáng nyeh nan do nyem, noe koloe berudu puwas, mangko diret sampai munoh. Pie yeng nyuroh keingín diret mat noe sabas pun go diret noe minta' ke' Sen.
59004003	Gola' diret minta' pun pie diret salah pinta', go tuju diret ngat nyo' nyabas keingín diret nyem. Mangko mat noe dituntong Sen.
59004004	Diret reng yeng paling noe mutu! Muraham diret ningal Allah nyo' diret bekaban ken deniyo tue. Teruhal diret kin tawu, mun bekaban ken deniyo tue diret mat bemunsoh ken Allah. Sopai ja' yeng mileh na' bekaban ken deniyo tue maksute mat bemunsoham ken Allah.
59004005	Diret kin tawu ke' hal nyoe; go dah jelas dipadah lem Kitap Sen mie ken Roh Sen yeng ngendiyam diret mat ingín nar kei diret nekat ke' Sénam. Mat cum Sen ngijine mun diret nekat ke' yeng layin.
59004006	Ja'e mun diret mat renah ati nekat ke' Sen si go pengunyo' pengaseh Sen si nan belobeh-lobeh. Ngopai go jie lem Kitap Sen, Allah nentang ngelawan reng yeng somong bongko', pie Sen ngunyo' pengunyo' pengaseh Sen ke' reng yeng renah ati. (Amsal 3:34)
59004007	Mangko diret mat ca' tuno' taalo' ke' Allah, ken diret ca' ngelawan nula' Pengelakar. Pengelakar pun mat rariam mun ditula' diret.
59004008	Diret mat ca' manu ke' Allah nyo' begelumo mansa' ken Sen. Mangko Sen pun manu jum na' begelumo mansa' ken diret. Reng yeng bedoso ca' bebeta' piker, ca' ningal dosoe. Reng yeng beati duwo ca' seputeh ati sebeníng derah ngaji diret Sénam.
59004009	Diret ca' susah tam doso diret; diret ca' nangis ngajie, sampai kesal ngiyal ken doso diret. Jediam diret ketawoe ken beayah bikah; kebelike diret ca' susah sontok, mat ca' kesal nar ngaji doso diret.
59004010	Diret mat ca' ngerenah diret di adap Tuwowe, mangko Sen pun ngangki' nganyo' diret.
59004011	Menyadie ku yeng seimán: diret nang na' gela' ngejat betor. Yeng ngejat ken nguto' medo betore si maksute iyo ngejat ken nguto' medo ukum Allah. Mun reng nguto' medo ukum Allah si maksute jewoh na' tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Sen, malah ken paie iyo menjedi akim die.
59004012	Teruhal siko' Allaham yeng asale madah ukum Sen; ngat Sénam yeng behak ngakim. Sénam jum yeng bekuwaso nulong nyelamát ken bekuwaso munah ranah pada' mensiyo. Konai diret mensiyo na' medo na' nyalah betor?
59004013	A, separoe deri diret do yeng berencana potue: "Pagi lusoe ku bejelan ke' kota nun, na' bedegang benso setawun ke' deng nyoe, gei' sempayo buleh untong benya' duwit," jie. Pie dingo beh kam!
59004014	Diret kin noe tawu nentu keidup diret, pai yeng langko' tejedi pagi lusoe! Go keidup diret di deniyo tue kin keedah kosu ayie yeng mengkura'; sebentar do dah nyoe semorie losiam.
59004015	Menurute si omóng diret ngaji pagi lusoe ca' bungi tue: "Mun gei' diijin Tuwowe mun ku gei' idup si ku langko' ngenggewai itu ini," misale. Nyoe si mat konoam.
59004016	Pie diret si gela' kebebongko'; paling gela' berakah ke' hal rencana diret. Berakah tokoh nyoe mat doso, kamei, go noe ingát ken Tuwowe des diret berencana.
59004017	Jedi mátam, kamei. Yeng dah didingo diret mat ca' dipakai. Go mun diret dah tawu ken gewai yeng panci yeng ca' digewai diret pie lalu noe digewai si maksute diret mat bedoso.
59005001	Dingo beh kam reng yeng kayo rayo! Kam ca' nentumau lolauam nangis ngaji pada' kesensare yeng langko' dirudu kam.
59005002	Pada' kekayo kesugeh kam nyeh langko' buro' rapoh; pada' pakai ingap kam langko' disego gogat;
59005003	a, ken pada' mas perak kam pun langko' bis betogar rapoh mali'. Dah Ari Kiyamát gi pada' mas ken perak yeng betogar mali' nyeh, nyoam kei ngembokti doso kam reng kayo yeng gela' ngumpol nemok pada' jolu nyeh. Mas ken perak yeng dikumpol kam nyeh nyoe yeng cagar nyego tuboh kam keedah api yeng nyego jolu. Go kam mat ngumpol nemok pada' kekayo kesugeh deniyo tue yeng noe dam lamat pengudahe.
59005004	Reng yeng kerejo ngamie upah ngotam di umo kam yeng berado nyeh pie mat noe diupah kam. Dingo beh! Pada' upah yeng diakal kam yeng noe dibeyar kam ponoh nyeh seolah-olah mangkas kayis nanám salah ke' kam di adap Allah. Pada' reng yeng ngotam umo kam yeng noe diupah kam nyeh mat bepangkas kayis minta' tulong Allah Tuwowe yeng Rajo Kuwaso. Sen pun dah ningoe dah, noe dipelebu Sen peh.
59005005	Kam yeng kayo nyeh nyamán senángam di deniyo tue, memuwas semuya' keingín kam, keedah binatang yeng ditimo' dipiyayu tam na' diguno.
59005006	Lalu pengabise kam pasti diukum gi. Go reng bujor benar yeng noe ngelawan kam pun pie manseh didudoh kam, diukum kam, sampai dibunoh le' kam reng kayo. Mangko kam die yeng langko' diukum.
59005007	Mangko, menyadie ku yeng seimán, diret mat ca' sabar nantie Tuwowe diret yeng cagar na' detang. Contohe na' po reng yeng beumo betanám. Reng yeng beumo betanám kin mat sabar nantie ujan des munsime, go iyo tawu ca' do ujan berue berasel. Mangko iyo noe lojue, iyo sabar nantie asele, go iyo pun ngaji yeng langko' digotame mat jolu yeng paling berogo.
59005008	Jedi diret pun ca' ponyoe jum. Diret ca' sabar, ca' togap kukoh go Tuwowe diret nyoma' dam na' detang.
59005009	Diret nang na' lojue, nang na' ati diret nomah ngendudoh betor, gola' diret diukum Sen. Go Allah Akim diret mat dah nungu dah di muko lawang.
59005010	Menyadie ku yeng seimán: diret ca' keedah pada' penijum Allah Tuwowe yeng ngelantar posan payit Sen mie. Desiyan kin disensare reng pie desiyan sabar, ngetate nyem.
59005011	Lalu diret pun jelas ken reng yeng sabar yeng tan disensare lamat belamat mat ayah bikah nyamán senángam. A, benso Kei' Ayub ge'em. Diret kin dah ningo ke' hal Kei' Ayub, caro sen ngetat disensare. Diret pun jelas ken pai yeng pengabise digewai Tuwowe diret nyo' Kei' Ayub. Go Tuwowe diret mat paling panci ati, Sen nan nulong ngaseh diret.
59005012	A, yeng tue pun paling penting jum ca' diingát le' diret, menyadie ku yeng seimánei, ya'am benso omóng tutor diret. Des diret ngomóng nang na' diret besumpah nogap omóng diret pakai demo jolu pai-pai pun beyi' jolu di deniyo tue beyi' jolu di serugo. Mun "í", padah "í"; mun "noe", padah "noe". Omóng diret nang na' betetiyang ken sumpah pisoh itu ini, gola' diret diukum Sen.
59005013	Jedi mátam. Mun do kaban diret yeng ngerudu kesensare si iyo ca' bedoa. Mun do yeng ayah bikah si iyo ca' benyanyi mugi Sen.
59005014	A, mun do yeng saki' poníng si iyo ca' mangel minta' tulong ketuwo umát gereja. Sidoe ca' malet binya' ke' reng yeng saki' nyeh, ken ca' bedoa atas kuwaso demo Tuwowe diret.
59005015	Lalu Tuwowe diret pun mat ngembeyi' ngenjemah reng yeng lomah, nuntong doa reng yeng arap ken Sen. Mun iyo bedoso si dosoe pun diampun.
59005016	Mangko diret mat ca' ngangkue doso diret siko' ken betor, ken ca' ngendoa betor, gei' diret jogar. Doa reng yeng bujor benar si mat paling bekuwaso.
59005017	Benso Kei' Elia mie. Kei' Elia kin urang po diretam jum, mensiyo biyasoam. Jedi Kei' Elia kin sebulat ati bedoa muhún mampal ke' Allah gei' ari noe ujan. Lalu mátam, ari pun noe ujan tigo setengah tawun pelamate.
59005018	Dah nyoe Kei' Elia bedoa agei' minta' ke' Sen gei' ari ujan. Lalu ari pun mat ujanam; tanah tue pun timu pada' kayu kayan. Mat bekuwasoam doa reng yeng bujor benar.
59005019	Menyadie ku yeng seimán: mun do kaban diret yeng nyimpang deri jelan yeng mat, lalu do reng yeng ngiringe bebeli' ke' yeng mat nyeh si nyoe paling panci.
59005020	Go sopai pun yeng nulong reng bedoso sampai iyo bebeta' piker ke' hal dosoe si reng nyoe mat ngerampase deri ukum mati. Pada' dosoe numo' pun betimun-timun pie mat dielon le' Allah. Ngatam deri Yakobus. Bula' dituam surat ku ke' kam menyadie ku yeng seimán.
60001001	Surat tue deri Petrus, pelantar posan Yesus Kristus, ke' umát yeng dipileh le' Allah, yeng numpang diyam di deniyo tue, yeng pencar temiyar di daerah Pontus, Galatia, Kapodokia, Asia ken Bitinia.
60001002	Kam dipileh le' Allah Apa' diret deri nyomiam kei engku diret Sen yeng suci, cuco' ken kona' kemawo' Sen, tam gewai Roh Sen. Maksut Sen gei' sempayo kam tuno' taalo' ke' agah panci, gei' doso kam diapus le' derah Yesus Kristus. Salam damai ken berekat dolat yeng belimpah-limpah deri Sen.
60001003	Patutam Allah, Apa' deri Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret dipugi! Go tam kebosai Sen na' nulong ngaseh diret mangko diret mat diado le' Sen pengenduwo kalie gei' diret idup tam arap diret yeng mat, yeng tan. Caro diret buleh idup beru nyeh tam Yesus Kristus mati ken bengki' idup agei'.
60001004	Arap yeng dilileh Sen ke' diret tei' ya'am reto beno jento keraja' yeng mensako, yeng noe luwang, yeng noe becelo, yeng tan seora'-ora'eam. Nyoe ditaroh dijego nyo' diret di serugo nun.
60001005	Semuya' nyoe mat nyo' diretam, kamei! Tam diret pecayo ken Sen mangko Sen pun nyelinong ngenjego diret ken kuwaso Sen sampai ke' jemán pengudah gi, sampai ke' jengkah Sen ngenyato ke' semuya' segeno pada' reto beno yeng dilileh Sen ke' diret tam diret ditulong diselamát Sen.
60001006	Paling ayah bikah diret ngaji arap nyoe, numo' pun gei' tue si diret mat ca' susah sontok ngerudu kesensare bemacam bejenis yeng nguji diret.
60001007	Kesensare nyoe keedah api nyo' nguji kepecayo diret. Contohe benso mas, jolu yeng berogo. Mas kin diuji reng ken api kei ngentawue mat masei noei. A, semalang ke' mas yeng tawu luwang pun ge'e, diuji reng ken api sa'am go kepecayo diret. Kepecayo diret kin jewoh berogo deri mas pun. Mangko diuji jum ngerudu pada' kesensare, nyo' ngembokti ken kepecayo diret mat tan. Maksute gei' sempayo kam mat dipugi diagong dihormát dah ari Yesus Kristus dinyato ke' semuya' segeno mensiyo gi.
60001008	Kam mat ngaseh iyo, numo' pun kam noe koloe meratie. Kam mat pecayo ken iyo, numo' pun sampai ari tue pun manseh cum kam meratie. Pie kam rajo ayah bikah, mat cumam melebehe, mat ngatam keayah bikah kam,
60001009	go kam mat buleh upah kepecayo kam, ya'am roh kam diselamát.
60001010	-
60001011	A, keselamát yeng diret buleh tue dah dipadah ditijum reng deri nyomiam. Deri nyomie kin pada' penijum mat madah ke' hal pengunyo' pengaseh Sen ke' diret. Paling ingín desiyan nyomie na' tawu koti caro Allah langko' nyelamát mensiyo. Roh Kristus di lem ati desiyan si mat dah bepadah dolu ken Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi Allah, langko' ngerudu kesensare, ken bepadah jum ken iyo langko' diagong dipugi dah iyo ngerudu kesensare nyeh. Pada' penijum nyeh paling teliti nyelidik ken sopailah urang yeng langko' nuntong jenyi nyoe, ken jemán pai iyo langko' detang*. Paling ingín na' tawu, jera' pada' penijum nyeh,
60001012	pie Allah nganyoe ngenyato ke' desiyan ken tijum Sen yeng dipadah le' desiyan nyeh langko' noe dituntong ke' desiyan yeng nijume, pie dituntong ke' diret tuam to'. Lalu mátam, yeng ditijum le' desiyan mie mat dah dituntong dah. Dah nyoe Roh Allah yeng dikirum Sen deri serugo nyeh mat nguwaso reng yeng detang madah agah panci nyoe ke' kam. Paling panci agah nyoe, sampai pada' melekat pun paling geram na' ngenjungaue.
60001013	Mangko, kamei, ati pemiker diret mat ca' nan siyap. Gewai ulah tingkah laku diret mat ca' dijego, gei' sempayo arap diret mat bepusat ke' pengunyo' pengaseh Sen bangam. Pengunyo' pengaseh Sen nyoe langko' dianyoe dinyato Sen secaro jelas dah ari Yesus Kristus dinyato ke' semuya' segeno gi. Nyoam kei pusat pemiker diret.
60001014	Diret menjedi ana' Sen pun kei diret tuno' taalo' ke' Sen. Mangko nang na' diret idup nunoe keingín diret yeng jat, na' po yeng ditunoe diret des diret noe tekenal ken Allah mie.
60001015	Kebelike gewai ulah tingkah laku diret mat ca' suci bereseham, na' po Allah yeng ngunang ngamie diret suci bereseh.
60001016	Nyoe pun go cuco' jum ken yeng dah ditulis lem Kitap Sen mie, yeng bungi potue, Kam ca' suci bereseham, go Aku suci bereseh, jie Sen. (Imamat 19:2)
60001017	Go kin Sénam yeng mencaro semuya' deniyo tue. Sen yeng langko' ngukum ngakim tiyap ko' mensiyo cuco' ken gewaie. Sen mat noe pileh bulu, noe beurang beaku. Diret mat beapa' ke' Allah nyoam, mat manu ke' Sen nyo' minta' tulong Sen. Mangko gewai ulah diret ca' tuno' taalo' ke' Sénam sementaro diret gei' numpang diyam di deniyo tue.
60001018	Go diret mat dah ditobus Sen, dah dipelopas Sen dah deri keidup diret yeng ngat segontangam, yeng cum bereti, yeng dilileh deri keturun akei' puyang diret. Diret pun jelas ken jolu yeng paling berogo yeng dibeyar Sen kei nobus diret. Go diret noe ditobus ken jolu yeng noe tan benso mas ken perak peh,
60001019	pie diret mat ditobus le' derah Kristusam yeng paling berogo, yeng keedah derah deri domo yeng noe becacat noe becelo.
60001020	Iyo dipileh le' Allah bolum deniyo tue diado mie pun, pie berue dianyoe di jemán pengudah tue nyo' iyo nulong nyelamát diret.
60001021	Mat ngelalu Yesusam diret pecayo ken Allah yeng nyuroh iyo bengki' idup agei'. Mat Allaham yeng meningie ken ngagonge. Mangko diret mat pecayo ken arap ken Allah bangam.
60001022	Jedi mátam. Entam diret tuno' taalo' ke' agah panci yeng mat nyeh mangko roh diret dibereseh, gei' diret mampu ngaseh betor sebulat atiam. Mangko diret mat ca' sungoh-sungoh kaseh mengaseh siko' ken betor seputeh ati sebeníng deraham.
60001023	Go diret dah diado beru dah. Bungkong idup beru tue noe iyo tampang sulie yeng noe tan peh, pie mat tampang sulie yeng tan seora'-ora'eam. Nyoe ditanám lem ati diret ngelalu posan payit Sen yeng idup yeng noe berubah,
60001024	cuco' jum ken Kitap Sen mie yeng bungie potue, Semuya' segeno mensiyo keedah rumput, ken semuya' kekayo kesugehe keedah komange. Rumput kin layue, ken komange pun ruroh.
60001025	Pie posan payit Tuwowe si tan seora'-ora'eam, jie Sen. (Yesaya 40:6-8) A, agah panci yeng dipadah ke' kam pun mat posan payit nyoam.
60002001	Mangko, kamei, jediam diret ngenggewai sipat pai pun yeng jat. Jediam diret ngenggewai pai pun yeng sipate nyo' nipu ngendeyo betor. Jediam diret berakah ken isin dengki ken semuya' omóng tutor yeng jat yeng mempulah betor.
60002002	-
60002003	Go diret tue kin dah ngicap kepanci Tuwowe dah! Mangko diret mat ca' serarat ingín diumpan secaro roh deri kitap Sen yeng suci nyem, na' po icit yeng nan ingín nyusu ke' ino'e, sempayo diret mansang ke' kuwat, sampai roh diret mat sehat jogar cuco' ken tuju Sen des Sen nulong nyelamát diret.
60002004	Tuwowe diret mat keedah betu bungkong idup diret, ya'am betu di lem tijum Sen mie yeng dibuwang le' mensiyo, pie begi Allah mat tepileh, diangap Sen paling mensako. A, jedi diret yeng manu ke' iyo nyeh
60002005	mat keedah pada' betu jum yeng to' ramu Sen, yeng diunyo'e idup beru, lalu diret mat disunsun Sen nyo' menjedi kediyam Roh Allah. Diret dipileh jum nyo' pelayan Allah yeng melayan Sen bangam. Na' po pada' pelayan yeng meyie pesaling ke' rumah kediyam Sen mie, diret mat nyomah ke' Sen secaro roh, begelumo ken besukor ke' Sen kedudo' nyo' pesaling diret ke' Sen. Nyoe pun diterimoe le' Allah tam gewai Yesus Kristusam.
60002006	Di lem Kitap Sen mie do Sen betijum ke' hal gewai Yesus yeng keedah betu penjuru. Jedi jie lem Kitap Sen, Ku, jie Allah, dah mileh betu yeng paling berogo nyo' betu penjuru di rumah kediyam Ku di kota Sion. Sopai ja' yeng pecayo ken iyo pasti noe kererawoe, jie Sen. (Yesaya 28:16)
60002007	Jedi mátam. Begi diret yeng pecayo si Betu nyoe mat paling berogo. Pie begi reng yeng ngei'e pecayo si nyoe mat nuntong yeng ditulis lem Kitap Allah yeng bungie potue. Do betu yeng dibuwang le' pada' tukang rumah pie diamie le' Allah to' Betu yeng paling penting* nyo' melaju rumah Sen, jie Kitap Sen. (Masmur 118:22)
60002008	A, jedi do jum yeng ditulis di yeng layin bungie potue, Sidoe mat tesongka' tam Betu nyoe. Malah ken paie tepetingkap lalu tepesungkur die tam Betu nyoe, (Yesaya 8:14) jie lem Kitap Sen mie. Go Allah pun ninting nujune ken sidoe yeng noe tuno' taalo' ke' pemadah Sen mat ca' tesongka', lalu punah ranaham.
60002009	Pie diret si dipileh le' Allah nyo' umát diret Sénam. Diret mat pelayan yeng tepileh nyo' melayan rajo. Diret suku benso yeng suci bereseh yeng diajen Sen nyo' diret tuno' taalo' ke' Sen sebulat ati. Diret mat umát jatah kei engku diret Sénam! Maksut Sen sempayo diret mat mugi pada' gewai Sen yeng agong, yeng ngunang ngamie diret deri sagam ke' tampa' Sen yeng ugas nyacasam.
60002010	Gei' nyomie si kam noe iyo umát Allah, pie tue kam dah umát Sen dah. Gei' nyomie si kam bolum nerimoe kekaseh Allah, pie tue kam dah nerimoe kekaseh Sen dah.
60002011	Kaban kekaseh ku: diret mat nemuwai nyem di deniyo tue. Diret numpang diyam di arong yeng noe engku diret. Mangko ku mat muhún mampal ke' kam gei' diret nyiseh ngenjewoh diret deri semuya' keingín diret yeng jat yeng nan beperang betentang ken roh diret.
60002012	Reng yeng noe tekenal ken Allah si gela' ngogoe cukie mempulah diret, madah ken gewai diret salah. Mangko deri nyoe diret mat ca' nan serarat ngenggewai gewai yeng panci nyem, gei' sempayo sidoe yeng mempulah diret pun mantaue, lalu kepepanyange gi sidoe ca' mugi Allaham dah ari Sen detang gi.
60002013	Diret ca' tuno' ngehormát reng yeng behak mimpin merentah diret di deniyo tue, go nyoe mat kona' kemawo' Tuwowe diret. Diret ca' tuno' ke' rajo, go iyo yeng migang kuwaso yeng paling tingie di deniyo tue.
60002014	A, diret ca' tuno' jum ke' pada' wakel rajo yeng diutus le' rajo nyo' ngukum reng yeng gewaie salah ge'em, ken nyo' ngehormát reng yeng gewaie konoe ge'em.
60002015	Mangko diret mat ca' di piya' reng yeng gewaie konoe, go maksut Allah gei' sempayo reng yeng keriban yeng noe tawu yeng mat yeng gela' maner diret pie pengabise dah iyo merati gewai diret yeng panci nyeh iyo mat tekempojalam.
60002016	Diret noam dah menjedi ulun. Mangko diret ca' idup po yeng patut begi reng yeng bebas deri ulun. Pie kebebas diret nang na' dipakai kei dedal ingel nyo' ngenggewai gewai yeng jat. Kebelike diret mat ca' idup po yeng patut begi diret yeng dah ulun Allah die.
60002017	Semuya' urang ca' dihormát le' diret. Diret ca' ngaseh semuya' menyadie yeng seimán, diret ca' gola' ken Allah, ken diret ca' ngehormát rajo.
60002018	Diret yeng ulun amo mat ca' nan tuno' ngehormát tuwowe diret. Ge'em nang na' engkas tuno' ke' tuwowe yeng panci yeng antus ken diret, pie diret mat ca' tuno' jum ke' tuwowe yeng kejam, yeng noe tawu salah melo.
60002019	Go diret yeng pecayo kin tekenal dah ken Allah, mangko tam ngaji Sen diret mampu ngetat des disensare reng pun, numo' pun cum kesalah diret. Nyoe pun gewai yeng nyenáng ati Allah.
60002020	A, mun diret dipelesah le' tuwowe diret tam gewai diret salah si nyoe mat patutam. Noe ken diret dipugi tam diret ngetat kesensare tam gewai salah tokoh nyoe! Nyoe tewas diretam. Pie yeng nyenáng ati Allah si mun diret sabar, tan disensare reng numo' pun gewai diret panci.
60002021	Nyoe pun cuco' ken tuju Allah yeng ngunang ngamie diret kei diret nunoe Kristus. Kristus kin disensare nyo' diret, to' contoh diret gei' diret ngenjurut pejelan iyoam.
60002022	Iyo kin noe koloe bedoso; omóng tutore diselidik reng caro teliti nar pie mat cumam iyo nipu ngendeyo memuloe betor.
60002023	Des iyo disumpah dipisoh reng iyo mat noe melas nyumpahe; des iyo disensare reng iyo noe bearau beamue na' melase. Pie kebelike iyo nyerah direte ke' Allah yeng tawu mencaro ken mutus ukum reng secaro bujor benar.
60002024	Yesus mat nangong doso diret di lem tuboh direteam di salip; maksute gei' sempayo diret dipelopas deri kuwaso doso, gei' diret mat ngenggewai gewai yeng bujor benar seumor idup diret. Iyo dipangkong sampai bebilor-bilor, maksute kei diret die yeng jogar.
60002025	Go diret mat na' po domo yeng bejelan besesosatam, pie tue diret dah bebeli' pulang ke' Penungu Domo yeng ngelinong ngenjego roh diret.
60003001	A, jedi pulang ke' hal tuno' tei' ponyoe jum. Pada' bini mat ca' tuno' ngehormát lakie. Tuju maksute sempayo gola' do laki rumah yeng noe tuno' taalo' ke' posan payit Allah pie mun iyo dah merati gewai ulah diret gola' na'e iyo tuno' taalo' ke' Sen. Biyar pun laki diret noe ningo posan payit Allah pie gewai ulah diret jodoe yeng meyie,
60003002	des iyo merati gewai diret yeng noe becelo tam diret gola' ken Allah.
60003003	Nang na' kejenga' kelaga' kam betinoe tekayi' ke' periyas pekakas, demo ke' pakai ingap demo ke' kungkong lancong, demo ke' ngulas jengol demo ke'...beriyas beraci delu gila'. Nang na' kejenga' kam bebungkong ke' nyoe.
60003004	Pie kebelike bungkong kejenga' kelaga' kam mat ca' deri ati pemiker kam nun, ya'am tingkah laku yeng antus yeng lemah lemut. Nyoe periyas yeng tan seora'-ora'eam! Allah pun ngangap periyas nyoe paling berogo.
60003005	A, benso pada' betinoe umát Allah yeng arap ken Sen di jemán nyomie pun ponyoe jum, periyas sidoe periyas yeng tan, go sidoe tuno' ngehormát ke' lakie,
60003006	benso Sara. Iyo mat tuno' taalo' ke' Kei' Abraham, mat "betuwowe" ke' lakie. A, kam betinoe jemán tue pun ponyoe jum. Mun gewai kam panci ken mun kam noe gola' water pai-pai pun mangko kam mat nunoe gewai ulah tingkah laku Sara jum, na' po ana' yeng nunoe gewai ino'e.
60003007	A, jedi diret laki rumah ponyoe jum. Diret ca' tawu koti caro yeng mat yeng panci nyo' diret diyam bekumpol ken bini diret, ca' sadar ke' hal bini diret, go betinoe umang semoli'. Bini diret ca' dihormát go diret samo-samo lileh nyawo Allah. Yeng dilileh Sen ke' diret pengunyo' pengaseh Sen, ya'am idup (yeng cum berudu mati). Jedi mun idup diret ken bini diret mat panci ken samo hormát menghormát mangko doa diret mat didingo le' Allah.
60003008	Jedi tuam perimpus pemadah ku ke' semuya' kam, ya'am diret ca' idup samo serukui seati sepiker siko' ken betor, diret ca' seperaso ati, diret mat ca' kaseh mengaseh ken menyadie yeng seimán, diret ca' panci buwar ken betor, ken ca' renah ati.
60003009	Nang na' melas jat ken jat; nang na' melas sumpah pisoh reng. Kebelike diret ca' minta' ke' Allah gei' Sen melas ngemberekat dolat reng nyoe. Go diret diunang diamie Sen pun sempayo diret ngemberekat ngendolat betor, maksute gei' sempayo diret jum buleh berekat.
60003010	A, do jum yeng ditulis lem Kitap Sen mie ke' hal nyoe, yeng bungie potue, Sopai ja' yeng na' panyang umor ken keidupe berinas, iyo mat ca' ngenjego omóng tutor direte gei' noe jat ken noe gela' memuloe.
60003011	Iyo ca' nyiseh direte deri gewai yeng jat; mat ca' ngenggewai gewai yeng panci. Iyo ca' ngemoran idup damai ken betor caro sungoh-sungoh.
60003012	Go Allah Tuwowe serarat ngenjego noyu merintu reng yeng bujor benar. Sen nan ningo doae. Pie Sen nentang ngelawan reng yeng gewaie jat, jie lem Kitap Sen. (Masmur 33:13-17)
60003013	Jedi mátam, kamei. Mun diret rajing ngenggewai yeng panci si cum reng yeng nyensare diret.
60003014	Pie misale mun gei' do reng yeng na' nyensare diret numo' pun gewai diret panci bujor benar, diret kin diberekat dolat Sen. Nang na' diret gola' ken arau amue sidoe. Nang na' diret kalut water.
60003015	Diret mat ca' betuwowe ke' Kristusam, ca' tuno' taalo' ke' Yesus Kristus bangam. Diret nan serarat ca' siyap sediyo kei nyamut sopai ja' yeng nanyoe ke' hal arap diret. Pie caro diret nyamute ca' lomah lemut ken ca' hormát.
60003016	Ge'em gewai diret ca' serayu ken saksi diret, gei' diret noe ditegur le' ati kocit diret nun. Maksute sempayo pada' sidoe yeng gela' mempulah diret ken gela' ngejat gewai panci diret yeng pecayo ken Kristus nyeh pie pengabise sidoe die yeng kererawoe mun cum gewai diret yeng jat.
60003017	Pie umpamoe mun mat kona' kemawo' Allah ken diret mat ca' ngerudu kesensare. Coh ge' diret disensare tam gewai diret panci; nang na' ketegal tam gewai diret jat!
60003018	Semalang ke' Kristus ge'e disensare, sa'am go diret. Kristus yeng bujor yeng benar mat mati gei' sempayo diret yeng jat mat mampu begelumo ken Allah. Jolah ke' doso diret si iyo mati ngat sekali nyoam. Tubohe mat dibunoh reng, pie Roh Allah yeng nguwasoe gei' iyo bengki' idup agei'.
60003019	A, secaro roh Yesus mat manu ke' pada' roh yeng ditahan nyo' diukum Sen, nyo' iyo madah pemadah Allah ke' sidoe,
60003020	ya'am ke' pada' roh* yeng noe tuno' taalo' ke' Allah des jemán Kei' Nuh mie. Teruhale ketiko nyoe mie Allah paling sabar melamat Kei' Nuh mulah topam nyeh. Pie mensiyo mat ngei'e tuno' taalo' ke' Sen, mangko mat sikitam reng yeng diselamát, ngat lapan ko'am reng yeng tamoe ke' lem topam gei' diselamát gei' noe dilamus ken ayie.
60003021	A, caro sidoe diselamát deri ayie di lem topam nyeh pun mat gemar beyang keselamát diret, go ponyoe jum diret diselamát deri ukum Allah ketegal Yesus Kristus bengki' idup agei'. Diret disolam lem ayie pun ngenggemar nyoe jum, go diret disolam noe iyo kei manei' tuboh diret yeng curoe peh, pie kei nyaksi ken diret mat yakin di lem ati kocit nun ken doso diret dah dielon tam Yesus Kristus bengki' idup agei'.
60003022	Dah iyo bengki' idup agei' nyeh iyo mat nayi' ke' serugo, ken ketiko tue iyo merentah kei rajo secaro agong di piya' kanán Allah. Pada' melekat yeng bepangkat tingie yeng rajo kuwaso pun mat tuno' taalo' ke' iyo!
60004001	Jedi mátam te'. Kristus des iyo idup lem tubohe mie mat ngerudu kesensare sampai mati, go iyo tawu ken nyoe mat mutus ubong ken doso. Mangko diret tue pun ponyoe jum ca' siyap, diret mat ca' nyaro' ati pemiker Yesusam.
60004002	Maksute sempayo seteruse empong diret gei' idup lem tuboh tue diret mat idup nunoe kemawo' Allah, noe iyo idup nunoe kemawo' jat diret.
60004003	Dah cukup dah waktu yeng diabis diboros le' diret mie nyo' ngenggewai yeng dikeayah le' pada' reng yeng noe tekenal ken Allah. Mat bemacam bejenisam gewai yeng digewai diret yeng jat yeng delu gila', nan serarat getal nyem na' ngenggewai gewai yeng noe senunoh, serarat beminúm mabo', sampai tekebabar mengembabar, nan nyelulu bererami kei minúm mabo', nan ngelangar ukum Allah, ken nan nyomah ke' jolu yeng noe Allah. Ponyoam keidup kam nyomie.
60004004	A, reng yeng gewaie gei' tokoh nyoe pun iyo paling eran kangáp ngaji kam, go kam ngei' kam dah ngencabur ke' lem doso, ngei' kam dah tunoe beboe royal ngeroyal na' po yeng nan digewai kam nyomie. Pengabise sidoe mat menghina ngeremeh kam.
60004005	Pie Allah die yeng langko' mencaro sidoe gi; diret sidoam yeng ca' nyamute di adap Allah gi ke' hal dosoe. Go noe dam lamat Allah langko' ngukum beyi' yeng gei' idup beyi' yeng dah mati pun.
60004006	Lem kengkaji mensiyo si reng pecayo yeng dah mati nyeh konoe ukum Allah jum, go tubohe mati; pai ge' bedoe ken reng noe pecayo, kaji sidoe nun. Pie yeng mat si rohe mat idup na' po roh Allah. Ngopai ge' go agah panci dipadah ke' pada' sidoe mie pun gei' sempayo rohe mat idup.
60004007	Pie mátam, kamei. Jengkah deniyo tue ken semuya' segeloe noe dam lamat na' pengudahe. Mangko diret mat ca' tenáng pemiker, ca' ngenjego ati pemiker ken gewai ulah diret, sempayo diret mampu nan bedoa.
60004008	Yeng paling penting si diret ca' serarat kaseh mengaseh sebulat atiam, go kaseh mat ngelaban biyar betimun-timun pada' kesalah betor.
60004009	Nang na' diret baye-baye nerimoe melayan menyadie diret yeng seimán di rumah diret.
60004010	Pengunyo' pengaseh Allah yeng diterimoe tiyap ko' diret nyeh mat ca' dipakai secaro panci to' nulong melayan betor. Go pengunyo' pengaseh Sen yeng bemacam bejenis beneko bereno nyeh mat diserah Sen ke' diret gei' dibegi dibecar ke' betor.
60004011	Maksut ngembegi ken ngembecar pengunyo' pengaseh Allah nyeh misale madah posan payit Allah, ken nulong melayan betor. Jedi sopai ja' yeng madah posan payit si iyo mat ca' ingát ken yeng dipadahe mat posan payit Allaham. A, berang reng yeng nulong melayan betore iyo mat ca' ingát ken iyo nulong pun atas kuwaso Allaham yeng Sen buwar ngunyo' ke' diret. Maksute bungkong semuya' gewai diret mat Yesus Kristus, sempayo pengabise Allaham yeng diagong dipugi. Sen mat rajo kuwaso, mat patut diagong seora'-ora'eam. Amin.
60004012	Kaban kekaseh ku: tue kam mat ngerudu kesensare yeng paling sensare nar, to' nguji kam. Pie sungoh pun ponyoe diret nang na' eran, go nyoe noe iyo enah peh begi diret yeng pecayo.
60004013	Kebelike deri pado eran diret ca' ayah bikah tam diret tebegi di lem kesensare Yesus. Maksute sempayo pengabise diret mat kepala' ayah bikaham, dah keagong Yesus dinyato gi.
60004014	Mun diret dipeinoe-inoe tam diret ngankue madah demo Kristus si nyoe mat untong begi diret, go diret mat dah dikediyam le' Roh Allah yeng agong.
60004015	Pie nang na' diret disensare ketegal tam kejat diretam, umpamoe diret munoh mangkal maling mencuri ken ngurus ngator gewai betor, a, ken besipat gewai pai pun yeng jat. Mun diret disensare tam gewai diret tokoh nyoe si nyoe mat patutam!
60004016	Pie mun diret disensare tam diret umát Kristen si diret nang na' rasoe; kebelike diret ca' mugi Allah tam diret disensare tam demo Kristus.
60004017	Ge'em diret ca' ayah bikah mugi Sen, go tue dah jengkahe dah nyo' Sen mencaro semuya' segeno mensiyo. Sen betongai pun deri diret pada' seberumah Sen. A, semalang ke' pada' umát Sen ge'e dipecaro Sen, sa'am go pada' reng yeng layin yeng noe tuno' ke' agah panci deri Sen. Mat ugas ngatam ukum sidoe gi.
60004018	Go jie lem Kitap Sen pun bungie potue, Ento' Sen nulong nyelamát reng bujor benar pun mat kangáp diret ngajie, sa'am go reng yeng jat yeng noe pecayo. Nang na' arape ditulong diselamát Sen. (Amsal 11:31)
60004019	Jedi mátam. Jengkah Sen ngukum sidoe dah soma' dah. Mangko diret yeng gei' tue ngerudu kesensare yeng cuco' ken kemawo' Allah si ca' nyerah diret ke' Allah yeng ngado diret, go Allah nan mutu nuntong jenyi Sen. Ge'em diret ca' ngerusudu' ngenggewai sipat gewai yeng panci.
60005001	Jedi mátam te'. Tue ku na' ngendorong ngemberansang kam ketuwo umát, go aku pun ketuwo umát jum. Aku mat merati ken mato kepalo diret kuam kesensare yeng dirudu le' Kristus mie, ken aku langko' konoe kawum lem keagong iyo yeng langko' dinyato nun gi. Mangko ku ngendorong ngemberansang kam ketuwo umát
60005002	gei' sempayo kam noyu merintu umát Allah na' po penungu domo yeng noyu merintu domoe, go nyoe mat tugas diret. Nang na' digewai caro bepemana' seolah-olah ditoran, pie ca' ken ati diret yeng relo cuco' ken kemawo' Allah. Nang na' mimpin umát go diret na' ngogoe keuntong, pie ca' tam diret ayah melayan betor.
60005003	Nang na' diret nyuroh merentah secaro tunyo' ke' kiboe tunyo' ke' kanán pada' umát yeng diserah Sen ke' diret, pie diret ca' mimpin mendomán ken teladan keidup diret.
60005004	Mangko dah Penungu Domo yeng Agong detang gi diret langko' nerimoe mahkota yeng pekencilang yeng noe mali' yeng tan seora'-ora'eam.
60005005	A, ponyoe jum ken pada' umát*. Diret ca' tuno' ngehormát ketuwo umát diret. Semuya' diret mat ca' renah ati ken semuya' betor, go jie lem Kitap Sen pun bungie potue, Allah nentang reng somong, pie Sen ngunyo' pengunyo' pengaseh Sen ke' reng yeng renah atie. (Amsal 3:34)
60005006	Mangko diret mat ca' tuno' merenah diret di adap Allah yeng rajo kuwaso, sempayo Sen pun meningie diret dah jengkah yeng ditetap le' Sen.
60005007	Pada' kekalut kekamoh diret ca' diserah bisam ke' Sen, go Sen si mat ayah Sen noyu merintu mongki' diret.
60005008	Diret ca' nan bejego, ca' serarat siyapam. Go Pengelakar munsoh diret mat keedah singa yeng nan ngintai ngadang, berenuwóng ngogoe reng yeng kei ratahe.
60005009	Pie diret ca' togap kukoh pecayo ken Allah kei ngelawan munsoh diret, go diret kin tawu ken pada' menyadie yeng seimán di seruroh deniyo pun mat ngerudu kesensare diiro dikenyayo reng jum na' po diret.
60005010	Pai tel agei' dah diret ngerudu kesensare yeng sebentar tue dah nyoe mat Allaham yeng langko' nyempurno diret gei' diret cum becelo. Sen langko' memperkuwat diret, ken nyuroh diret togap kukoh. Sen bungkong pengunyo' pengaseh. Sénam yeng ngunang ngamie diret ngelalu Kristus gei' diret diagong ken Sen seora'-ora'eam.
60005011	Sénam yeng rajo kuwaso seora'-ora'eam. Amin.
60005012	Yeng nulong ngembentue aku nulis surat yeng penek tue Silas, menyadie seimán yeng mat mutu. Maksut ku kei nulong ngemberansang kam gei' sempayo kam yakin ken pemadah ku tue mat pengunyo' pengaseh Allaham yeng mat. Kiroe kam togap kukoh dinyoam.
60005013	Salam deri pada' menyadie diret seimán di Babilon nun* yeng dipileh le' Allah na' po kam jum. Salam jum deri Markus yeng ku angap po ana' diret kuam.
60005014	Besalamam siko' ken betor ken kaseh yeng sebulat ati.* Kiroe kam engku Kristus tenáng amánam.
61001001	Surat tue deri aku Simon Petrus, ulun amo ken pelantar posan Yesus Kristus. Ditulis ke' pada' reng yeng pecayo yeng samo na' po kami. Paling untong diret yeng pecayo! Diret pecayo pun tam Allah yeng disomah diret mat bujor benar, ya'am Yesus Kristus Penulong Penyelamát diret.
61001002	Salam damai ken berekat dolat yeng belimpah-limpah ke' kam ditue go kam mat tekenal ken Allah ken Yesus Tuwowe diret.
61001003	Allah makai kuwaso diret Sen--go Sen mat Allah--kei Sen ngunyo' ke' diret semuya' yeng diret perelu gei' sempayo diret idup cuco' ken kemawo' Sen. Caro diret idup cuco' ken kemawo' Sen tei' go diret tekenal ken Sen, yeng ngunang ngamie diret; ken caro Sen ngunang ngamie diret pun go Sen nganyoe ke' diret keagong ken kepanci diret Sénam.
61001004	Ponyoam Sen ngunyo' ke' diret pada' berekat Sen yeng rajo panci yeng ugas berogoam, cuco' ken jenyi Sen. Tuju maksut Sen tei' sempayo diret nyaro' tingkah laku ati pemiker diret Sénam, go diret mat dah dipelopas deri pada' keingín jat di deniyo tue yeng na' munah ranah roh diret.
61001005	Tam gewai Sen ponyoe mangko dah diret pecayo nyeh diret ca' seputeh ati sebeníng derah bekaseh betoleh idup panci bujor benar. Ken gewai diret yeng panci bujor benar nyeh ca' ditamah ken keidup nyo' panai mileh.
61001006	Diret panai mileh nyeh ca' ditamah jum ken diret mampu ngator nahán diret. Diret mampu ngator nahán diret nyeh ca' ditamah jum ken diret ngetat des ngerudu kesensare. Diret ngetat ngerudu kesensare nyeh ca' ditamah jum ken idup cuco' ken kemawo' Allah.
61001007	Idup cuco' ken kemawo' Allah nyeh ca' ditamah jum ken kaseh mengaseh ken menyadie yeng seimán. A, kaseh mengaseh ken menyadie yeng seimán nyeh ca' ditamah jum ken kaseh yeng noe tegentong.
61001008	Go mun tingkah laku diret kin ari kin tokoh nyoe si maksute noe ampoe buwau asel diret tekenal ken Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret. Mat berasel berinasam keidup diret tam diret tekenal ken iyo.
61001009	Pie mun do reng pecayo yeng idupe noe tokoh nyoe si iyo na' po reng butoe rabunam. Iyo dah kelupoe dah ken dosoe yeng nyomie dah dibereseh.
61001010	Pie diret nang na' tokoh nyoe, menyadie ku yeng seimánei. Diret ca' semingkin bekaseh betoleh seputeh ati sebeníng derah nyo' ngembokti ken diret mat dah dipileh ken dah diunang diamie le' Sen. Go mun gewai diret ponyoe mangko diret mat togap kukoh, noe jetue,
61001011	ken diret mat disamut dialu secaro agong dinai arong Yesus Kristus Tuwowe ken Penulong diret merentah seora'-ora'eam.
61001012	Mangko, kamei, tuju maksut ku na' serarat ngingát kam ke' hal tue, numo' pun kam dah tawu, ken kam dah togap kukoham patoh ke' pengajar yeng mat yeng dah diterimoe kam.
61001013	Pie aku manseh ngangape ketangong aku ca' nan nguncau nguda' ati pemiker kam telanyor ku bolum mucel kerubong bedan beko ku tue.
61001014	Go aku pun tawu ken aku nyoma' dam na' mucel kerubong bedan beko ku tue, cuco' ken yeng dipadah mie ke' aku le' Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret.
61001015	Mangko aku mat nan bekaseh betoleh seputeh ati sebeníng derah gei' sempayo kam nan serarat ingát ken semuya' tue dah ku ningal deniyo tue pun.
61001016	Jedi mátam, kamei. Yeng kami padah ke' kam ke' hal kedetang Yesus Kristus Tuwowe diret ken ke' hal kuwaso iyo si mat-mátam. Poko' pangkal epun bungkonge yeng kami padah ke' kam noe iyo kengkarang kepanai mensiyo peh, go kami mat nyaksi merati keagong Yesus ken mato kepalo diret kamiam.
61001017	Go iyo mat diagong dihormát le' Allah Apa'; mat do suwaro deri Allah yeng rajo agong yeng bungie potue, Tuam Ana' ku yeng Ku kaseh. Ku paling ayah ken iyo, (Yesaya 42:1) jie.
61001018	Diret kamiam yeng ningo suwaro nyoe deri serugo nun, des kami do ken iyo di gunóng suci mie.*
61001019	Pai tel agei' mat do posan payit yeng dipadah le' pada' penijum mie yeng mat-mátam, yeng tawu diarap dipecayo. Sepatute diret mat ningo ken nunoe posan payit nyoe, go posan payit nyoe keedah pelito yeng manyah di arong yeng sagam, sampai ke' bukoe tampa', sampai ke' bintang timor terobi' ken becayo lem ati diret.
61001020	Yeng paling penting diret ca' tawu nyeh ya'am semuya' posan payit Sen di lem kitap Sen nyeh mat noe iyo kengkarang pada' penijum peh.
61001021	Go mat cum posan payit Sen yeng bebungkong ke' kona' kemawo' mensiyo. Kebelike mat Roh Allaham yeng ngendorong nguwaso mensiyo mangko sidoe pun mat madah posan payit deri Allah.
61002001	Jedi nyoe ke' hal penijum yeng madah posan payit Allah mie. Pie do jum ketiko nyoe mie pada' guru tiru di antaro reng Israel yeng jie mat madah posan payit Allah, pie iyo memuloe. Jedi po nyomie po tengkalo tue: pasti do jum guru tiru di antaro kam. Gewai sidoe beawum bedendumít caro besesulit ngajar yeng salah yeng ngerusa' ngerenoh. Pengajare yeng salah tei' sampai nyangkal ken Tuwowe yeng bekuwaso yeng nobuse. Mangko sidoe langko' lansong dipenjeri dipunah ranah Sen. Nyoam selopa'e.
61002002	A, benya' jum reng yeng langko' nunoe tingkah laku sidoe yeng lancang bebas yeng ngatam kejate, sampai jelan yeng mat nyeh langko' dipehina diremeh reng.
61002003	Pada' guru tiru nyeh mat tamá' goma' rangkue kukue. Mangko sidoe makai posan payit kengkarang direte nyo' iyo ngelakar ngeliker diret. Pie Allah si dah lamat dah Sen mutuse na' ngukum sidoe; Sen dah siyap dah na' munah ranah sidoe.
61002004	Benso melekat yeng bedoso mie ge'e, dipunah ranah Allah, dilojang Sen ke' Arong Reng Mati*, ditahan Sen di tengkelubang delam yeng sagam manu ke' Ari Kiyamát nun gi.
61002005	Ponyoe jum pada' mensiyo di deniyo tue nyomie, noe dipelopas Sen jum deri ukum Sen. Sen mat ngelamus deniyo nyo' ngelodoh pada' mensiyo yeng noe pecayo ken Sen. Yeng diselamát Sen ngat Kei' Nuh sedena' lapan ko'am. Kei' Nuh tuam yeng nyomie nan madah ke' betore ken caro idup bujor benar.
61002006	A, ponyoe jum kota Sodom ken Gomora mie: mat diukum dipunah ranah Sen; cum kesisoe, tingal abu dam. Gewai Sen nyoe ento' contoh peringát, pai yeng langko' digewai Sen ken reng yeng noe pecayo ken Sen.
61002007	Yeng diselamát Sen ngat Lot nyem, reng yeng bujor benar, yeng susaham atie merati tingkah laku reng dinyoe yeng noe tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Allah, yeng ngatam kejate.
61002008	Ja'e go Lot yeng bujor benar nyeh mat ngatam kesusah atie milang ari ningo ken merati gewai sidoe dinyoe yeng nungkang ukum Allah. Mangko iyo mat diselamát.
61002009	A, jedi Tuwowe diret yeng tawu nyelamát Kei' Nuh ken Lot nyomie, tawu Sen jum nyelamát reng yeng pecayo ken Sen dah tue pun, des diret ngerudu kesusah kesensare yeng ngenggudo diret. Sen tawu jum nahán pada' reng jat gei' iyo diukum dah ari Sen ngakim mencaro deniyo tue gi.
61002010	Yeng langko' diukum Sen terutamoe pada' reng yeng menghina kuwaso Allah, ken pada' reng yeng nan memuwas keingín degine go nan ditunoe diteliboe pada' keingíne yeng jat yeng ngotor ngerusa' direte. Ugas bereniam sidoe. Mat somong bongko', noe gola'e ngejat ngeremeh pada' penguwaso yeng agong pun.
61002011	Teruhal semalang ke' melekat yeng jewoh kuwat ken bekuwaso nyeh pie pada' melekat noe koloe ngejat ngeremeh pada' guru tiru des iyo nuntut kesalahe di adap Tuwowe.
61002012	Pie konoe ke' pada' guru yeng memuloe nyeh sidoe paling bereni ngejat ngeremeh hal yeng iyo noe tawue kaliam. Sidoe na' po binatang yeng cum bepemiker, yeng do ngat nyo' ditangkap dibunoh nyem. Ponyoe jum pada' sidoe, mat langko' punah ranah jum.
61002013	Sidoe langko' disensare, selopa'e go nan nyensare urang. Yeng dikeayah ento' nyenáng ati sidoe si ya'am beriyah berami ngemuwas keingíne yeng jat, noe ja' malam pie siyang ari pun. Sidoe ngotor ngencelo demo diret, go sidoe ayah ngemuwas keingíne yeng jat samel begelumo makan minúm ken diret pun.
61002014	Keingín matoe nan na' butang beonga' nyem. Sidoe nan ngogoe kelorong nyo' bedoso nyem. Sidoe ngenjorat nari' reng yeng noe yakin kepecayoe. Sidoe dah ngenggeyamo dah tamá' goma' rangkue kukue. Sidoam yeng nangong sumpahe.
61002015	Sidoe dah sosat dah go jelan yeng mat dah ditingale dah. Yeng ditunoe le' sidoe si gewai penijum Bileam ana' Beor mie.* Kesalah Bileam mie go iyo na'e ngenggewai yeng jat sal ge' iyo beuntong buleh duwit; nyoam yeng paling penting begi iyo.
61002016	Ja'e go doso Bileam mie ditegur le' binatang keledaie die! Keledai kin noe tawu bepaner, pie keledai Bileam mie temosi bepaner bungi mensiyoam (kei iyo negur Bileam nyeh), lalu Bileam pun mat bula'am ngenggewai gewaie yeng budu nyeh.
61002017	Jedi mátam te'. Pada' guru yeng memuloe nyeh iyo mat keedah mato ayie yeng kosat, ken keedah románg nganong ujan dibeyie angín. Allah dah ngajen arong yeng sagam gelemátam nyo' sidoe.
61002018	Mat do reng yeng nyoma' na' telopas deri segerumpok reng yeng keidupe gei' sosat, pie lalu dijorat ditari' le' pada' guru yeng memuloe nyeh, yeng ngenjorate ken pada' keingín tuboh yeng jat. Omóng tutor sidoe mat berakah nar. Jenyi sidoe benya' pie ampoe buwau nyem.
61002019	Jie sidoe si mat nyamán, bebas idup tokoh nyoe; teruhal sidoe pun mat dipeulun le' keidupe yeng jat yeng ngerusa'e. Go pai-pai pun yeng ngalah diret nyoam tuwowe diret*.
61002020	Mat do reng yeng asale dah telopas deri gewai deniyo tue yeng ngerusa' ngerenoh, tam iyo dah tawu ke' hal Yesus Kristus, Tuwowe ken Penulong diret. Pie dah nyoe iyo tejorat agei'am tam gewai tokoh nyoe, sampai kalah, nyeraham. Reng tokoh nyoe si pengabise ujonge kepala' jateam deri kemuloe mie pun.
61002021	Yeng panci to' sidoe coh ge' sidoe noe tawu kaliam jelan yeng mat, deri pado dah tawu pie dah nyoe bepusing belekang, ngei'e tuno' taalo' ke' ukum Allah yeng dipadah ke' sidoe.
61002022	Sidoe mat na' po perbeso, "Po asue nyego utahe", ken, "Po bebi yeng dah dipanei' pie pulang ke' pelangkane."
61003001	Kaban kekaseh ku: dah duwo kali ken tue ku nulis surat ke' kam. Di lem kededuwoe pun ku nguncau nguda' ati pemiker kam gei' kam ngaji yeng suci yeng bereseh. Gopai ge' go aku memperingát kam ke' hal yeng kam dah tawu pun,
61003002	gei' sempayo kam mat ingát ken posan payit yeng dipadah le' penijum Allah yeng suci mie, a, ge'em kei kam ingát ken perentah deri Tuwowe ken Penulong diret ngelalu pada' pelantar posan yeng ngelantare ke' kam.
61003003	Jedi mátam te'. Yeng paling penting diret ca' tawu nyeh ya'am dah jemán pengudah nyeh pasti do reng yeng idup mungkal nunoe keingíne yeng jat nyem. Sidoe ngererujong ngeolo'-olo' nyem,
61003004	memuwal jenyi Sen na' bebeli' ke' deniyo tue. Go jie sidoe, "Jenyi Sen na' bebeli' agei' ke' deniyo tue, pi naie? Cum, tau ku, tanoe ken jenyi Sen na' dituntong. Ti beh, deri akei' puyang diret dah mati mie sampai ke' ari tue pun sikit pun cum perubahe di deniyo diret tue; cum Allah ngukum mensiyo; deniyo tue nan serarat samoam deri semeja' asal mulo dipulah mie," jie sidoe.
61003005	-
61003006	Teruhale noe ken samo! Mat koloe Allah ngukum seruroh deniyo tue mie. Pie sidoe sengejo mat ngei'e ingát ken gewai Allah des Sen ngelodoh deniyo tue mie ken ayie. Go kin asal muloe mie langi' ken tanah tue dipulah Allah ken kebiso mulut Sen nyem: disuroh Sen timol deri ayie ken dibentok Sen pun ken ayie. Lalu Sen mat makai ayie nyoam kei ngelodoh seruroh deniyo tue mie.
61003007	A, ponyoe jum ke' hal jenyi Allah manseh na' ngukum deniyo tue gi. Mat kebiso mulut Sénam yeng gei' merintu mongki' ken ngadu langi' ken tanah tengkalo tue, pie pengabise tuju maksut Sen na' dipunah ranah Sen ken api die, dah ari Sen na' mencaro ken munah ranah pada' mensiyo yeng noe patoh ken Sen. Pie sidoe yeng ngeolo'-olo' nyeh ngei'e ngaji semuya' nyoe.
61003008	Pie diret si nang na' kelupo ken tue, pada' kaban kekaseh kuei; ketongkah Tuwowe diret noe samo ken ketongkah diret go begi Tuwowe diret si seari samo ken seribu tawun, ken seribu tawun samo ken seari nyem. Sen noe ngaji lamat ken lokas.
61003009	Mat do reng yeng ngangap Sen lalai leler nuntong jenyi Sen, pie Sen noe lalai leler peh. Pie go Sen bolum ngelodoh deniyo tue go kona' ati Sen gei' cum mensiyo yeng losi nayáp; kona' Sen gei' semuya' segenoe mat bebeta' piker. Mangko Sen gei' sabar ken diret.
61003010	Pie Ari Kiyamát des Tuwowe detang si mat do ye'. Ja'e Sen detang pun mat noe mererema', mat keedah pemaling. Ari nyoe pun langi' nyeh cagar mengkuwut losi nayápam, ken pada' bahane pun disego bis le' api Sen, a, ken tanah tue ken pada' isei'e mat bisam, cum kedemáte.
61003011	Jedi ngaji deniyo tue ken pada' isei'e langko' dipunah ranah Sen ponyoe si ca' kotilah keidup diret? Tentu diret ca' idup suci bereseham, ca' nunoe tingkah laku Sen
61003012	nongah diret mat angar nar nantie ari kedetang Allah. Go ari nyoe kin langi' mat cagar bis disego api, ken pada' bahane pun ancor loloe tam angáte.
61003013	Pie diret nantie yeng dijenyi Sen, ya'am langi' ken tanah yeng beru, kediyam pada' reng yeng bujor benar.
61003014	Mangko kaban kekaseh ku, nongah diret nantie ari nyoe si diret mat ca' bekaseh betoleh idup suci bereseh noe becelo, idup tenáng amánam begelumo ken Sen.
61003015	Diret ca' ingát gopai go Tuwowe diret gei' sabar, gei' bolum bebeli' kitue pun gei' sempayo mensiyo do kelorong nyo' ditulong diselamát. Ponyoe jum yeng dah ditulis ke' kam le' Paulus, menyadie diret kekaseh yeng seimán, cuco' ken kemampu yeng diunyo' Sen ke' iyo.
61003016	Iyo nan nulis potue jum di lem semuya' surate, des iyo nulis ke' hal tue. Mat do yeng ditulis di lem surat Paulus nyeh yeng maring diret ngajie, sampai do reng yeng nyunsang nyalei'e pun. Pie nyoe reng yeng mat noe tawue kaliam, yeng gei' malang kepecayoe. Ponyoe jum gewai sidoe ken pada' posan payit Allah yeng layin di lem Kitap Sen. Selopa'e sidoe mat punah ranaham.
61003017	Jedi, kaban kekaseh ku, ngaso diret dah tawu nyeh mangko diret mat ca' jego, gei' sempayo diret noe tepengaroh tam kesalah sidoe yeng jat nyeh; nang na' sampai diret yeng selomo dah togap kukoh pun pie pengabise diret nyelimpang jum deri jelan yeng mat nyeh.
61003018	Pie kebelike diret ca' serarat mansang gei' sempayo pengunyo' pengaseh deri Yesus Kristus Tuwowe ken Penulong diret nyeh mat nyato lem keidup diret. Diret mat ca' kin ari kin tekenal ken iyo. Kiroe iyo mat diagong tuam ken seora'-ora'eam. Amin.
62001001	Jedi mátam, semuya' segenoe. Pungka' pangkal pemadah kami ke' kam mat Posan Payit yeng idup. Deri asal muloe pun iyo nan do dah; dah nyoe mat didingo ken diperati le' kami, diteliti dijerumát ken mato kepalo diret kamiam, ken ditigue ken jeri diret kami jum.
62001002	Posan Payit yeng idup nyeh mat do ken Apa'e, pie dah nyoe iyo ngenyato direte ke' kami ditue. Nyoam yeng diperati kami. Kami pun besaksi madahe ke' kam ken iyo mat meyie idup yeng cum berudu mati.
62001003	Yeng kami padah ke' kam ya'am yeng kami dingo ken yeng kami perati. Tuju maksut kami gei' sempayo kam pun idup begelumo ken kami lem keidup beru tue, na' po kami pun idup begelumo ken Apa', ken Ana' Sen Yesus Kristus.
62001004	Mat ngatam keayah bikah kami mun kam segelumo ken kami; mangko kami pun nulis ke' kam ke' hal tue.
62001005	Jedi mátam. Tuam to' posan payit agah cerito yeng kami ningo deri iyo ken yeng kami padah ke' kam, ya'am Allah tei' mat tampa'. Sikit pun cum sagam di Sen.*
62001006	Mun jie diret diret idup begelumo ken Allah pie diret gei' bejelan di sagam si maksute diret memuloe. Diret noe nunoe pemadah Sen yeng mat.
62001007	Pie mun diret bejelan di tampa' na' po Sen pun do di tampa' nyeh mangko diret mat begelumo panci siko' ken betor. Ken derah Yesus Ana' Sen pun mat ngembereseh diret deri semuya' doso.
62001008	Mun jie diret cum doso diret si maksute diret memuloe diretam. Pemadah Sen yeng mat nyeh mat noe nyorap ke' lem ati diret.
62001009	-
62001010	Diret mat noe nyimpan posan payit Sen lem ati diret. Go jie Sen kin diret mat bedoso. Mangko mun jie diret diret noe bedoso si maksute diret ngangap Sen pememuloe. Pie Allah si mat mutu ken bujor benar. Mangko mun diret ngangkue doso diret, Sen pun ngampun ngelone, ken ngembereseh diret deri semuya' segelo kebeyat jat.
62002001	Pada' ana' kekaseh ku: tuju maksut ku nulis tue ke' kam si gei' sempayo kam mat noe bedoso kaliam. Ja'e mun do yeng bedoso si diret mat do penulong yeng manu ke' Allah nyo' diret, ya'am Yesus Kristus yeng bujor benar.
62002002	Iyoam yeng ngendamai diret ken Allah, go iyoam pesaling yeng betumpah derah nyo' ngapus doso diret. Ja'e noe iyo ngat nyo' doso diret peh, pie nyo' doso seruroh deniyo tue ge'em.
62002003	Mun diret tuno' taalo' ke' perentah Sen mangko diret mat tawu ken diret idup tekenal ken Sen.
62002004	Mun jie diret diret idup tekenal ken Sen pie diret noe tuno' taalo' ke' perentah Sen si maksute diret pememuloe. Pemadah Sen yeng mat noe disimpan di lem ati diret.
62002005	-
62002006	Pie sopai ja' yeng tuno' taalo' ke' posan payit Sen si kasehe ken Allah mat cum kekurang kemalange. A, ken sopai ja' yeng madah direte idup tekawum lem Sen mat ca' idup na' po keidup Yesus. Nyoam nyuroh diret tekenal ken diret mat idup tekawum lem Sen.
62002007	Pada' kaban kekaseh ku: yeng ku tulis ke' kam tue ke' hal kaseh nyeh noe iyo perentah bungas berue peh. Mat perentah yeng lamatam, yeng dipadah ke' kam deri asal muloe mie, ya'am posan payit Sen yeng dah didingo kam.
62002008	Numo' pun ponyoe pie perentah yeng ku tulis tue mat do keberue jum. Go padah ku beru tei' go berue tuam diret merati kenyatoe lem tingkah laku Kristus ge'em, ken di lem tingkah laku diret ge'em. Go dah tue si sagam nyeh kin losi-losiam, ken tampa' yeng mat nyeh dah manyah dah.
62002009	Sopai ja' yeng madah direte idup di tampa' pie iyo risie ken menyadie yeng seimán nyeh si iyo gei' idup di sagam po nyomiam.
62002010	Pie kebelike sopai ja' yeng ngaseh menyadie yeng seimán nyeh iyo mat renán regan di tampa'. Cumam iyo tesangkut tesongka', tam iyo mat bejelan di tampa'am.
62002011	Pie reng yeng risie ken menyadie yeng seimán nyeh iyo mat diyam di sagam, iyo mat bejelan besasap di sagam nyem. Iyo tarah ke' noe tawu kaliam kinai penujue. Iyo mat menjedi butoe tam nan diyam di sagam nyem.*
62002012	Pada' ana' kekaseh ku: nyuroh ku nulis potue noe go ku ngangap kam reng noe pecayo peh! Malah ken paie ku nulis potue ke' kam pun go doso kam dah dielon dah tam demo Yesus.
62002013	A, ku nulis potue ke' pada' kam yeng tuwo pun go kam dah tekenal ken iyo yeng nan do deri asal muloe pun. A, ku nulis ke' pada' kam biya' yeng gei' mudoe pun go kam dah ngalah Pengelakar yeng jat.
62002014	Pada' ana' kekaseh ku: ku dah nulis potue ke' kam go kam dah tekenal dah ken Apa'. Ku nulis potue ke' pada' kam yeng tuwo pun go kam dah tekenal ken iyo yeng nan do deri asal muloe pun. A, ken ku dah nulis potue ke' pada' kam biya' yeng gei' mudoe pun go kam mat togap kukoh. Posan payit Allah mat renán regan lem ati kam. Ken kam dah ngalah Pengelakar yeng jat. Jedi mátam.
62002015	Nang na' ati diret bepusat ke' deniyo tue ken pada' jolue. Go sopai ja' yeng atie bepusat ke' deniyo tue tentu noam iyo ngaseh Apa' diret.
62002016	Go pungka' pangkal keidup reng di deniyo tue mat tigo reno, ya'am keingín atie yeng jat; ramang di mato; ken kesomong kebongko' ati tam pekuleh kepanai direte. Sipat ati pemiker yeng tokoh nyoe kin bungkonge deri deniyo tuam, noe iyo deri Apa' diret peh.
62002017	Sedang deniyo tue ken pada' jolue yeng dikeingín le' mensiyo pun mat noe tan, mat cagar losi nayápam. Pie reng yeng nunoe kemawo' Allah si mat idup seora'-ora'eam.
62002018	Pada' ana' kekaseh ku: tue dah jemán pengudah dah. Kam pun dah dipadah dah ke' hal tue, go dah jemán pengudah nyeh langko' detang yeng didemo Munsoh Kristus. A, tue pun dah becocat doam pada' munsoh Kristus. Dinyoam diret tekenal ken tue mat jemán pengudah dah.
62002019	Kemuloe si sidoe mat begelumo ken diret, pie tue sidoe dah merayan direte dah. Ja'e yeng mat si go kemuloe pun sidoe mat noe segelumo ken diret peh. Kira' sidoe mat segelumo ken diret si sidoe tetap renán ken diret. Pie sidoe mat merayan direte, nyoam diret jelas ken sidoe mat noe segelumo ken diret.
62002020	Pie kam kebelike dah ditinting ditujun nyo' engku Allah le' Roh Sen yeng suci, ken semuya' kam pun mat tawu yeng mat.
62002021	Ku pun noe nulis ke' kam go kam noe tawu yeng mat peh; kam si dah tawu dah yeng mat. Kam pun dah tawu ken yeng noe mat nyeh mat cum kesamoe ken yeng mat.* Kam si mat layin nar deri sidoe yeng bemunsoh ken Kristus.
62002022	A, sopailah máte sidoe yeng gela' memuloe yeng ngajar yeng noe mat? Yeng gela' memuloe yeng nungkang yeng mat nyeh ya'am berang reng yeng nyangkal ken Yesus mat Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah. Reng yeng nyangkal nyoe kin mat munsoh Kristus. Maksute iyo bolei'e ken Ana' ge'em, bolei'e ken Apa' ge'em.
62002023	Go sopai pun yeng bolei'e ken Ana' si iyo mat cum ubonge ken Apa'. Pie sopai ja' yeng ngangkue Yesus mat Ana' Allah si iyo mat do ubonge ken Apa'e jum.
62002024	Jedi mátam te'. Yeng kam ningo deri asale mie mat ca' ditaroh di lem ati kam. Go mun tokoh nyoe si kam pun idup begelumo ken Ana' ken idup begelumo ken Apa' ge'em.
62002025	Nyoame' yeng dijenyi Sen ke' diret, ya'am idup yeng cum berudu mati.
62002026	Tue ku nulis ke' kam gei' kam jego, go mat do reng yeng na' nipu ngendeyo kam.
62002027	Pie kam si noe sa' diajar le' sidoe*. Go kam kin dah nerimoe Roh Sen yeng dijemín Sen ke' diret, yeng serarat nan ngendiyam diret. Roh Sénam yeng ngajar ngenjelas semuya' segeloe ke' diret. Pengajar Sen pun mat-mátam; noe Sen memuloe peh. Mangko diret pun ca' idup begelumo ken Sen, cuco' ken yeng diajar Sen ke' diret, gei' diret noe konoe tipu reng.
62002028	Pada' ana' kekaseh ku: diret mat ca' idup begelumo ken Kristus, gei' sempayo diret ayah bikah des ngadape gi, noam diret bebeli' unor tam rasoe, des iyo detang gi.
62002029	Diret kin tawu ken Allah mat bujor benar. Mangko diret tawu jum ken sopai ja' yeng ngelaku gewai yeng bujor benar nyeh mat ana' Sen.
62003001	Ugas bosaiam kaseh Apa' yeng belobeh-lobeh ken diret! Sampai diret didemo ana' Sen. Nyoe mátam, kamei, diret mat ana' Allaham. Reng di deniyo tue si mat noe tawue ken diret mat ana' Sen; patutam jum, go sidoe mat noe tekenale ken Sen.
62003002	Pada' kaban kekaseh ku: tue kin diret mat dah ana' Allah dah. Pai tel agei' dah nyoe gi, kepala'eam untong tuwah diret. Cume bolum dinyato koti kepepanyange keagong diret ana' Sen gi. Pie yeng diret jelas tawu si diret mat langko' menjedi na' po Kristus dah iyo detang gi, go diret langko' merati upoe yeng mat-mátam.
62003003	Sopai ja' yeng arap nantie nungu nyoe si iyo mat nyiyáng nyiseh keidup direte gei' suci bereseham, po Kristus pun suci bereseh.
62003004	Sopai ja' yeng bedoso si mat ngelangar ukum Allah, go jolu demo doso nyeh mat ngelangar ukum Sen.
62003005	Pie diret kin dah tawu ken Kristus detang ke' deniyo tue pun nyo' ngapus doso diret. Go iyo mat cum dosoe.
62003006	A, mun iyo mat cum dosoe kin menurute mat jelas jum ken sopai pun yeng idup begelumo ken iyo mat noe bedoso. Sopai ja' yeng bedoso si mat idup butoe, mat noe idup tekenal ken Allah.
62003007	Pada' ana' kekaseh ku: nang na' diret ditipu reng sampai diret idup bedoso nyem. Mun gewai diret bujor benar si maksute go diret idup bujor benaram samo po Kristus bujor benar.
62003008	Mun diret bedoso si diret mat idup segeyamo segelumo ken Pengelakaram,* go Pengelakar kin nan serarat bedoso nyem deri asale pun. Gopai ge' go Ana' Allah detang ke' deniyo tue pun, nyo' iyo munah ranah gewai Pengelakar.
62003009	Jedi sopai ja' yeng diado le' Allah, yeng idup segeyamo begelumo ken Sen si iyo mat noe bedoso, go iyo mat idup segeyamo segelumo ken Apa'e. Konai iyo na' bedoso mun bungkong idupe mat Allah?
62003010	-
62003011	A, agah panci yeng dipadah ke' diret deri asale mie pun diret mat ca' kaseh mengaseh ken betor. Mangko mat nyatoam bungkong gewai ulah tingkah laku diret, mat deri Allahei, deri Pengelakarei*. Go reng yeng noe kaseh ken menyadie yeng seimán, ken reng yeng gewaie noe bujor benar si, maksute iyo mat noe idup segeyamo segelumo ken Allah.*
62003012	Nang na' diret nunoe gewai Kain yeng di piya' Pengelakar* nyeh, yeng munoh adei'e. A, gopai engoe go iyo sampai munoh adei'e? Go gewai adei'e kin bujor benar, pie gewai iyo mat jat. Nyoam go iyo mat risie ken adei'e.
62003013	Reng jat kin nan risie ken reng bujor benar. Mangko, menyadie ku yeng seimán, nang na' diret kangáp mun deniyo tue risie ken diret!
62003014	Diret kin tawu ken diret dah ngaleh deri kemati ke' keidup. Nyuroh diret tawu pun go diret mat ngaseh menyadie yeng seimán. Reng yeng noe kaseh si mat idup po reng matiam.
62003015	Sopai ja' yeng risie ken menyadie yeng seimán nyeh mat reng pemunoh, sedang diret kin tawu, sipat reng yeng munoh mat idup po reng matiam, dah rangangam ken keidup yeng mat yeng cum berudu mati.
62003016	Nyuroh diret jelas ke' hal kaseh nyeh ya'am go Kristus nyerah keidup direte nyo' diret. Mangko diret pun sepatute ca' nyerah keidup diret nyo' betor.
62003017	Misale reng yeng do jolue, mun iyo merati menyadie yeng seimán yeng susah sontok pie cum itonge kaseh si maksute iyo mat noe kaseh ken Allah.
62003018	Pada' ana' kekaseh ku: nang na' diret ngat ngomóng nyem ke' hal kaseh, pie diret mat ca' ngaseh betor caro yeng mat, ya'am ken gewai ulah diret.
62003019	-
62003020	Mun diret kaseh mengaseh kin diret mat tawu ken diret idup nunoe pemadah Sen yeng mat. Mat tenáng amánam ati diret begelumo ken Sen. Dese si peraso ati diret namang, ngaji gola' diret na' diukum Sen, pie Allah mat lobeh tawu deri ati diret pun, go Sen mat tawu semuya' segeloe. Kaseh Sénam yeng ngalah peraso diret yeng namang.
62003021	Pada' kaban kekaseh ku: mun ati diret dah noam ngaji ca' diukum mangko diret pun mat noe namang manu ke' Sen.
62003022	Pai-pai pun yeng dipinta' diret ke' Sen mat dituntong Sen, go diret mat tuno' taalo' ke' perentah Sen, ken diret ngenggewai sipat jolu yeng nyenáng ati Sen.
62003023	Perentah Sen tei' ya'am diret ca' pecayo ken demo Ana' Sen Yesus Kristus, ken diret ca' kaseh mengaseh, na' po yeng dipadah le' Kristus ke' diret.
62003024	Sopai ja' yeng tuno' taalo' ke' perentah Sen si maksute iyo mat idup begelumo ken Sen, Sen pun begelumo ken iyo. A, Roh Sen yeng dah diunyo' Sen ke' diret pun mat ngeyakin diret ken Sen mat begelumo ken diret.
62004001	Pada' kaban kekaseh ku: nang na' semadi pecayo ken semuya' urang yeng bepadah ken pengajare deri Roh Allah. Mat ca' diuji dijerumát le' diret, bungkong pengajare mat Roh deri Allahei roh deri layinei. Go dah benya' dah guru pememuloe yeng nipu ngendeyo yeng ngajar dinai-nai pun di deniyo tue.
62004002	A, mun reng ngangkue madah ken Yesus yeng menjedi mensiyo mat Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah si mangko diret pun tawu, mat Roh Allah yeng ngajar ngelalu iyo.
62004003	Pie reng yeng ngei'e ngangkue Yesus si iyo mat noe deri Roh Allah. Iyo mat segeyamo segelumo ken Munsoh Kristus die. Kam kin dah dolu ningo mie ken Munsoh Kristus langko' detang. Tue pun dah do dah di deniyo tue.
62004004	Pie kam, ana' kekaseh ku, mat engku Allaham. Kam dah ngalah pada' guru pememuloe yeng madah yeng noe mat nyeh. Nyuroh diret monáng pun go Roh yeng ngendiyam diret mat lebeh bekuwaso deri roh yeng di deniyo tue.
62004005	Sidoe si mat deri deniyo tue, mangko bungkong pengajare pun kepanai deniyo tue nyem. Reng di deniyo tue pun na'e ningo pengajar sidoe.
62004006	Pie diret si mat engku Allah. Reng yeng tekenal ken Allah si na'e ningo pengajar diret. Pie yeng noe engku Allah si iyo mat ngei'e ningo diret. Dinyoe kin diret jelas tawu, sopai yeng nunoe Roh Allah yeng madah yeng mat ken sopai yeng nunoe roh yeng memuloe.
62004007	Pada' kaban kekaseh ku: diret mat ca' kaseh mengaseh, go bungkong kaseh mat Allaham. Sopai pun yeng ngaseh mat diado le' Allah ken tekenal ken Sen.
62004008	Yeng noe kaseh si mat noe idup tekenal ken Sen. Kira' iyo mat tekenal ken Sen si pasti idup kaseh, go Allah tei' ya'am kaseh.
62004009	Caro Allah nganyoe kaseh Sen ke' diret pun go Sen ngutus Ana' Sen yeng tungal ke' deniyo tue, gei' sempayo diret buleh idup ngelalu iyo.
62004010	Sen mat ngutus Ana' Sen nyo' ngendamai diret ken Sen, nyo' pesaling yeng betumpah derah nyo' ngelon ken ngapus doso diret. Dinyoam diret nomu kaseh yeng mat: noe iyo kaseh diret ken Sen peh, pie kaseh Sen ken diret.
62004011	Pada' kaban kekaseh ku: ngaji kaseh Sen yeng ngatam ken diret nyeh mat patutam diret pun ca' kaseh mengaseh.
62004012	Siko' pun cum mensiyo yeng koloe merati Allah, pie mun diret kaseh mengaseh si Allah mat begelumo ken diret. Ge'em kaseh diret ken Sen pun mat cum kekurang kemalange mun diret kaseh mengaseh ken betor.

62004021	Teruhale diret dah do dah perentah Sen ken sopai yeng kaseh ken Allah mat ca' kaseh ken menyadie yeng seimán.
62005001	Sopai ja' yeng pecayo ken Yesus mat Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi le' Allah si iyo mat diado le' Allah. Ken sopai ja' yeng ngaseh Apa' mat ngaseh pada' ana' Sen jum.

62005005	Mat ngat reng yeng pecayo ken Yesus mat Ana' Allah yeng mampu ngalah deniyo tue.
62005006	Mat Yesus Kristus yeng ngelaju tugase deri iyo disolam sampai ke' iyo mati betumpah derah pun. 66010003	Dah nyoe iyo mera' ontap keedah bungi singa yeng menderam. Tumas iyo mera' ontap tei' temosie disamut le' guntor yeng tujoh kali angute.

Jie suwaro deri serugo nyeh, "Nang na' kau nulis omóng yeng dipadah le' guntor yeng tujoh kali angute nyeh," jie. "Nyoe ca' kau pokap, kau poram lem ati kau nyem," jie.
66010005	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe melekat yeng ku perati tadie yeng kakie sepiya' betija' ke' lawut kakie sepiya' betija' ke' derat tei' ngenjola' jeri kanáne ke' langi' tano kebosai iyo besumpah.
66010006	Lalu iyo mat besumpah pakai demo Allah yeng idup seora'-ora'eam, yeng mulah langi' ken tanah ken lawut ken semuya' isei'e, madah ken jengkah Allah nuntong jenyi Sen mat cumam diunor Sen agei', jie.
66010007	Go dah jengkah melekat yeng ketujoh nyeh ngenciyup sangkakalae, jie, mangko Allah pun langko' ngelaju gewai Sen cuco' ken rencana Sen yeng nyomie gei' risi'-risi' Sen, na' po yeng dipadah Sen ke' pada' penijum yeng melayan Sen nyomie, jie melekat nyeh.
66010008	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe ku ningo suwaro deri serugo bepadah agei'am ke' aku. "Manuam ke' melekat yeng bediri kaki sepiya' betija' ke' lawut kaki sepiya' betija' ke' derat nyeh," jie. "Amiam buko' giling yeng dijentinge, yeng dah dikoba' nyeh," jie.
66010009	Lalu aku mat manuam ke' melekat nyeh minta' buko' giling yeng kocit. Jie melekat nyeh, "Amiam, segoam. Dah lem nyawo kau kaloe na' so maduam, pi porut kau kaloe saki'am," jie.
66010010	Lalu mátam. Dah diamie ku buko' giling nyeh, lalu mat ku sego. Di lem nyawo ku si manisam, pie dah ku tolan, porut ku mat saki'am.
66010011	Dah nyoe aku disuroh ca' betijum agei'am, bepadah ke' hal pada' suku benso ken pada' kawum kerabat ken pada' paner dongéng ken ke' hal pada' rajo.
66011001	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe ku diunyo' ken sekayo' buloh yeng koring keedah tungkat pengukor. Dah nyoe ku disuroh ngukor rumah kediyam Allah ken bedah pesalinge, ken disuroh jum milang pada' reng yeng semeyang dinyoe.
66011002	"Pie kolong luwar nyeh noe sa' diukoram," jie Sen, "go arong nyoe gei' diserah lo'e ke' pada' reng yeng noe pecayo ken Aku.* Sidoe langko' nija' ngiri' ngelegedah kolong nyoe ken semuya' kota suci* Ku, diperusa' diperenoh sidoe empat puloh duwo bulan pelamate.*
66011003	Pie Aku pun langko' ngutus duwo ko' saksi Ku nyo' manu kinun," jie Sen. "Sidoe langko' bepakai makai bonáng goni* ken betijum madah posan payit Aku melamat nyoe jum, ya'am 1260 ari,"* jie Sen.
66011004	Kenaken si do tijum yeng ditulis ke' hal sidoe duwo ko' nyeh. Kin jie penijum mie merempamo sidoe duwo ken kayo' kayu saitun, ken duwo tie pelito yeng diongkah di adap Allah Tuwowe deniyo. Jedi tijum nyoe mat ke' hal saksi yeng duwo ko' yeng diutus le' Allah.
66011005	Jedi mátam, dah sidoe duwo mat detang nyeh do gewaie yeng enah nar. Gola' reng na' ngaru sidoe duwo ko' nyeh si go sidoe do api yeng keluwar deri nyawoe nyo' mempungah munsohe; jedi sopai pun yeng ngarue lintus matiam, disego bis le' api.
66011006	Sidoe duwo ko' nyeh dikuwaso nyuroh ari noe ujan melamat jengkah sidoe betijum. Sidoe bekuwaso jum nyuroh pada' ayie menjedi derah, ken nyuroh deniyo tue dipenjerie ken bemacam bejenis behayo bencano bilo ja' sidoe ingín.
66011007	Jedi mátam. Dah santo' saksi duwo ko' nyeh madah posan payit Allah melamat nyoe tadie dah nyoe do binatang gerang die, ngencungol deri tengkelubang selamang nyeh tadie. Dah nyoe saksi yeng duwo ko' tadie diserang le' binatang gerang nyeh, dikalahe, lalu mat dibunohe.
66011008	Dah dibunohe tei' lalu bengkai sidoe duwo diadu reng temenggengang di tongah jelan di penenongah kota tekemuko, ya'am kota arong Tuwowe sidoe disalip reng jum nyomie.* Kota nyoe di gelar jum Sodom ken Mesir, entam gewai yeng ugasam kejate yeng tejedi dinyoe; pie noe iyo demoe yeng selie peh.
66011009	Jedi mátam. Dah saksi yeng duwo ko' mati nyeh bengkaie mat diadu reng nyem, kehe reng masare.* Tigo ari setengah pelamate bengkai sidoe diadu reng nyem, malah ken paie ditonton pada' reng deri tiyap kawum kerabat ken deri tiyap suku benso ken deri tiyap paner dongéng ken deri tiyap nenggeri nenggero pun.
66011010	Pada' mensiyo di deniyo tue mat ayah bikaham tam saksi yeng duwo ko' nyeh dah mati; sidoe beriyah berami betena' betari, betukar besamie pengunyo' siko' ken betore, keabis ayah tam saksi yeng duwo ko' dah mati nyeh. Go des sidoe duwo gei' betijum madah posan payit Allah nyeh mat ugas nyensare pada' mensiyo di deniyo tue.
66011011	Pie dah nyoe tei' dah tigo ari setengah tei' Allah ngenciyup roh diret Sénam ke' sidoe duwo ko' nyeh, nyurohe bengki' bediri idup agei'am. Pada' mensiyo yeng meratie pun mat tebelokam gupoham.
66011012	Dah nyoe sidoe duwo ko' nyeh ningo suwaro yeng bebungi ontap deri serugo. "Yo'am kitue," jie. Lalu sidoe mat dibeyie ke' serugo di lem románg; pada' munsohe pun mat merati sidoe dibeyie ke' serugo ponyoe.
66011013	Jedi pas sidoe dibeyie ke' serugo nyeh deniyo tue pun begontar paling kuwat (tam gempa bumi). Sepersepuloh deri kota nyoe teruma' rora', ken tujoh ribu ko' mensiyo yeng mati tam deniyo begontar nyeh. A, pada' mensiyo yeng gei' bodan nyeh tebelokam gupoham, lalu sidoe mat ngagong Allah di serugo ngangkue ken Sénam yeng rajo kuwaso.
66011014	Jedi mátam. Behayo yeng keduwo nyeh dah lalu dah lem sensonam ku. Yeng ketigo nyeh noe dam lamat langko' tejedi.
66011015	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe melekat yeng pengentujoh nyeh ngenciyup sangkakalae. Tumas diciyupe tei' do bungi pada' suwaro yeng ontap di serugo nun. "Tue," jie, "seruroh deniyo pun dah berajo ke' Allah Tuwowe diret ken ke' Kristus, penulong yeng dipileh Sen. Iyoam yeng bekuwaso merentah seora'-ora'eam," jie pada' suwaro yeng ontap nyeh.
66011016	Dah nyoe pada' ketuwo yeng duwo puloh empat ko' yeng dudo' di pada' belaie di adap Allah pun mat tepesungkur nyomah ke' Allah.
66011017	"Allah Tuwowe yeng Rajo Kuwaso, yeng nan serarat doam deri asal mulo nyomie pun," jie sidoe. "Kami besukor beterimoe kaseh ke' Den, go kuwaso Den yeng ugas bosaiam dah na' dipakai Den dah nyo' Den merentah semuya' segeloe.
66011018	Tue dah jengkahe dah nyo' Den ngakim pada' reng yeng dah mati mie. Pada' reng yeng noe pecayo nyeh mat godie ken Den, nan nungkang kemawo' Den, pie tue dah jengkahe dah nyo' Den melas godie ken sidoe. Tue mat dah jengkahe jum nyo' Den mempungah sopai-sopai pun yeng selomo gela' ngerusa' ngerenoh deniyo tue. Lalu tue dah jengkahe jum nyo' Den ngupah pada' pelayan Den, ken pada' penijum Den, ken pada' engku diret Den yeng layin bosai kocit tuwo biya' pun, demo ke' sopai-sopai pun yeng tuno' taalo' ke' Den. Den mat ngupah sidoe panciam," jie pada' ketuwo nyeh.
66011019	Jedi dah nyoe rumah kediyam Allah di serugo nyeh tekoba'. Dah tekoba' tei' mat awas maloam temenggengang peti suci, ya'am lamang jenyi semayo Sen ken mensiyo nyeh. Tumas maloe tekoba' tei' temosie lang ler! jie kengkitar; gar gur! jie gontu yeng paling ontap. Deniyo pun begontar kuwat, ken ari pun buwowe ken ujan es yeng paling ontap.
66012001	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe perati ku keenah keaneh yeng paling enah di langi' nun, ya'am siko' betinoe yeng digerebong mato ari. Iyo bediri di atas bulan. Kepaloe belabong ken duwo belas gie bintang.
66012002	Betinoe nyeh tei' nganong; perati ku iyo nguyáng ngayíng adoh anáng berodai tam dah na' berana'am.
66012003	Dah nyoe semorie maloam di langi' nun petanah petano yeng layin; nago die, yeng mirah, yeng rajo bosai. Iyo bekepalo tujoh; betano' sepuloh, ken tiyap gie kepaloe do labonge.
66012004	Iko'e tei' simah mengkipat ke' kiboe ke' kanán ngawus langi' nun, sampai sebegi deri semuya' bintang di langi' nun peterotah jetue teamur ke' derat; duwo begi gei' bodan. Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe nago tei' bediri di adap betinoe yeng na' berana' nyeh te', go kajie nun pas ana' biya' pansut nyeh na' ditolane.
66012005	Jedi dah nyoe betinoe nyeh tei' mat teberana'am. Ana'e lelaki, pie noe die disego le' nago nyeh te', tam copat dirampas dibeyie ke' Allah, ke' belai Sen yeng agong dinun. Go ana' biya' lelaki nyoe mat langko' tegas merentah nguwaso semuya' suku benso di deniyo, keedah penungu domo yeng ngalah munsohe ken tungkat bosie.
66012006	Jedi mátam. Dah berana' tei' lalu betinoe nyeh rari ke' padang puwang, arong yeng disiyap le' Allah nyo' iyo belinong. Dinyoe iyo mat ditoyu diperintu 1260 ari pelamate.
66012007	Jedi dah nyoe temosie do yeng beperang di serugo nun, ya'am melekat Mikael ken belo ana' buwahe, yeng betempor ngelawan nago nyeh tadie. Nago pun dibentue jum le' pada' melekat jat to' ngelawan Mikael sidoe.
