66012009	Pie kalah nago yeng bosai nyeh te', ya'am Ular Tuwo, yeng didemo jum Pelawan ken Pengelakar; go iyo nan ngelakar ngeliker nyuroh deniyo tue nyelimpang deri jelan yeng mat. Jedi nago nyeh mat kalaham; mat didah Sen dah le' Allah na' tomus ke' serugo nun. Mat dilojang Sen ke' deniyo, ken pada' melekate yeng jat pun.
66012010	Jedi dah nyoe ku ningo suwaro yeng bebungi ontap di serugo. Jie bungi suwaro tei', "Tuam to' jengkah Allah nulong nyelamát mensiyo! Tue Sen dah nganyoe kuwaso Sen! Sen dah disomah kei rajo! Kristus, penulong yeng dijenyi Sen pun mat bekuwasoam!" jie. "Go Pengelakar yeng nyomie nan nomah ngendudoh pada' menyadie diret yeng seimán di adap Allah siyang malam pun pie tue dah dilojang Sen dah deri serugo.
66012011	Iyo mat dikalah le' pada' menyadie diret yeng seimán, tam sidoe mat arap ken derah Ana' Domo; ge'em tam sidoe besaksi madah posan payit Sen. Ge'em ken sidoe mat ngei'e nyangkal kepecayoe, numo' pun sampai mati; sidoe noe mementing keidup direte peh. Mangko Pengelakar pun mat kalaham tam sidoe.
66012012	"Mangko semuya' segeno yeng diyam di serugo tue ca' beayah bikaham!" jie. "Pie semuya' segeno di deniyo nun beyi' di derat beyi' di lawut pun mat parah nar! Go Pengelakar dah dilojang ke' arong kam. Iyo pun manas beran go iyo mat tawu ken jengkah waktu nyo' iyo ngenggewai gewaie yeng jat nyeh tingal sikit dam," jie bungi suwaro yeng ontap nyeh.
66012013	Jedi mátam te'. Ngaso iyo dah dilojang ke' deniyo tei' lalu nago nyeh mat ngeragoe betinoe yeng berana' ke' ana' biya' lelaki nyeh tadie.
66012014	Pie betinoe nyeh diajen Sen le' Allah duwo tie sayap olang yeng bosaiam, nyo' iyo terobang ke' arong yeng dah disiyap nyo' iyo di padang puwang nun. Dinun iyo ditoyu diperintu tigo tawun setengah pelamate. Nago pun mat nolehe mempungahe dinyoe.
66012015	Pie dah nyoe nago nyeh nyomur ayie deri nyawoe, keedah ayie sungai yeng tengkujoh, gei' sempayo betinoe nyeh anyút dibeyie le' ayie.
66012016	Pie derat die yeng nulong betinoe; lalu derat nyeh ngoba' nyawoe ken nolan ayie yeng disomur le' nago tadie.
66012017	Ngaso tokoh nyoe tei' nago pun godie nar ken betinoe nyeh te'. Lalu iyo turun na' beperang ken pada' ana'e yeng layin die; ana'e yeng layin tei' maksute pada' reng yeng tuno' taalo' ke' posan payit Allah ken posan payit yeng dipadah le' Yesus.
66012018	Jedi mátam. Nago pun bediri di pinger lawut.
66013001	Dah nyoe perati ku tei' binatang layin ko'e die temeregam ngencungol deri lawut. Kepaloe tujoh, ken tano'e sepuloh. Tiyap tano'e bisei' labong, ken ketujoh konínge betulis ken demo yeng menghina ngeremeh Allah.
66013002	Perati ku binatang nyeh tei' upoe keedah macan tutol; kakie keedah kaki beruwang, ken nyawoe tei' keedah nyawo singa. Jedi binatang nyoe dikuwaso le' nago, disurohe merentah nguwaso seruroh deniyo.
66013003	Sigie kepaloe beronso, alap ca' dah mati dah tokohe, pie sungoh pun ponyoe tarah ke' idup. Semuya' segeno mensiyo pun paling eran merati iyo idup, lalu pada' mensiyo nyeh bejejiyoh nunoe nurut binatang nyeh.
66013004	Sidoe nyomah ke' nago, tam iyo yeng nguwaso binatang nyeh, ken nyomah ke' binatang nyeh ge'em. "Cum melebeh binatang tue," jie sidoe, ken "Cum yeng mampu ngalahe," jie.
66013005	Jedi mátam, binatang nyeh diijin nyo' nguwaso merentah deniyo tue empat puloh duwo bulan pelamate.* Iyo dipelebu Allah nyo' ngememuwa' ken menghina ngeremeh Allah.
66013006	Nan serarat jat nyem omónge yeng menghina ngeremeh Allah, beyi' demo Allah, beyi' kediyam Sen dinun, beyi' pada' reng yeng diyam di serugo pun; mat dihina le' iyo. Pie dipelebu le' Allah lo'e.
66013007	Iyo dikuwaso jum nyo' beperang ken ngalah pada' engku Allah ketiko nyoe. Ken iyo dikuwaso jum nyo' merentah kei rajo di seruroh deniyo, sampai tiyap kawum kerabat, tiyap suku benso, tiyap paner dongéng, ken tiyap nenggeri nenggero pun mat berajo ke' iyoam.
66013008	Semuya' segeno mensiyo yeng diyam di deniyo tue mat nyomah ke' binatang nyeh; pie maksute mensiyo yeng demoe noe ditulis di lem buko' yeng bisei' demo pada' reng yeng idup seora'-ora'eam. Buko' nyoe mat engku Ana' Domo yeng mati betumpah derah, cuco' ken kona' kemawo' Allah sebolum deniyo tue diado mie pun. Jedi pada' mensiyo yeng demoe noe ditulis di lem buko' nyoe si mat nyomah bisam ke' binatang nyeh.
66013009	Mangko semuya' segeno, kelinang mat ca' ningoam.
66013010	Pada' engku Allah mat ca' sabar ken ngetate nyem. Go sopai pun yeng disuroh Sen cagar ditangkap dipenjero nyeh mat langko' ditangkap dipenjeroam; ken sopai pun yeng disuroh Sen cagar dibunoh nyeh mat langko' dibunoham.* Mangko jie ku pada' engku Allah ca' sabar nyem, ngetate, ken mutu pecayo.
66013011	Dah nyoe ku merati binatang yeng layin iko'e die, ngencungol deri derat. Tano'e duwo, keedah tano' ana' domo, ken suwaroe tei' keedah suwaro nago.
66013012	Jedi binatang yeng ngencungol deri derat nyeh dikuwaso le' binatang yeng tadie, nyo' iyo melaju semuya' gewaie. Mangko iyo mat nyuroh seruroh deniyo ken semuya' segeno yeng diyam di deniyo tue ca' nyomah ke' binatang yeng pertamo nyeh tadie, yeng alap ca' dah mati tam beronso, pie tarah ke' idup.
66013013	Jedi binatang yeng keduwo nyeh mulah keenah keaneh yeng ugasam, sampai nyuroh api jetue deri serugo ke' deniyo di adap mato kepalo semuya' mensiyo pun.
66013014	Sampai pada' mensiyo di deniyo mat dikelakar dikeliker, tam pada' keenah keaneh yeng dipulahe, go iyo kin mat dikuwaso le' binatang yeng pertamo nyeh tadie nyo' iyo ngelaju gewaie. Mangko dah pada' mensiyo dikelakar dikelikere tei' dah nyoe mensiyo disurohe ca' mulah patong keramát gemar binatang yeng pertamo nyeh, yeng bokas beronso tam kelewang pie gei' idup.
66013015	Dah nyoe binatang yeng keduwo nyeh dikuwaso nyuroh patong keramát nyeh benapas, gei' iyo mampu bepaner. Maksute gei' patong keramáte nyuroh semuya' segeno mensiyo ca' nyomah ke' iyo. Sopai pun yeng bolei'e nyomah ke' iyo ca' dibunoh, jie.
66013016	Ken iyo memana' jum bosai kocit tuwo biya', reng miskin ken reng kayo rayo, reng ulun ken reng noe ulun pun ca' ditano. Tanoe tei' paji mileh, na' di goyam jeri kanánei na' di koníngei.
66013017	Tuju maksut reng ca' ditano tei' gei' sempayo reng noe tawu na' bejuwal beboli jolu pai pun, cuwali reng yeng ditano ken nomor demo binatang nyeh.
66013018	Jedi diret mat ca' minta' kepanai deri Allah mun na' tawu ken reti nomor tue. Go reng yeng belubang pemiker si mat mampu ngitonge sampai tawu ken reti nomor binatang tue, go mat nomor mensiyo. Nomore tei' 666.
66014001	Dah nyoe perati ku paling enah! Ana' Domo bediri di Buki' Sion, ken tukue pada' mensiyo yeng paling rami, 144,000 pemenya'e. Pada' koníng reng rami nyeh tei' ditano ken demo Ana' Domo ken demo Apa'e ge'em.
66014002	Dah nyoe ku ningo bungi deri serugo yeng keedah bungi ayie siling begugue riyam menseriyah, ken keedah bungi gontu yeng paling ontap. Mat panciam bungie, keedah bungi pada' demus yeng ditobah reng benya'.
66014003	Bungi nyoe tei' mat bungi reng yeng 144,000 ko' yeng nyanyi di serugo nun, di adap belai Allah yeng agong, ken di adap jolu empat ko' yeng idup, ken di adap pada' ketuwo ge'em. Sidoe benyanyi nyanyi yeng beru. Reng layin pun noe tawu nyanyi nyoe; mat noe tawu na' ditunoe le' sopai pun cuwali sidoe 144,000 ko' yeng ditobus deri kuwaso Pengelakar di deniyo tue mie.
66014004	Sidoe mat suci bereseham gewaie; mat mutu patoh ke' diret Allaham, cum sidoe nyomah ke' yeng layin, keedah reng lelaki yeng mutu bejodo, yeng noe koloe bekesalah ken betinoe. Sidoe nunoe nurut Ana' Domo kinai-nai iyo ngiringe pun. Sidoe ditobus deri antaro pada' mensiyo layin nyo' engku Allah ken Ana' Domo nyeh; keedah padi yeng kememerue digotam nyo' pesaling ke' Sen.
66014005	Cumam sidoe memuloe; mat cumam celo belengo sidoe. Nyoe ke' hal reng rami yeng ditano ken demo Ana' Domo ken demo Apa'e.
66014006	Dah nyoe perati ku melekat yeng layin agei' terobang di langi' nun. Iyo meyie agah panci yeng noe berubah seora'-ora'eam; mat dipadahe ke' semuya' segeno mensiyo di deniyo, demo ke' tiyap kawum kerabat, tiyap suku benso, tiyap paner dongéng ken tiyap nenggeri nenggero pun.
66014007	Jedi iyo mat ngomóng ken suwaro ontap, bepadah ke' semuya' segeno. Jie, "Semuya' segeno mat ca' tuno' taalo' ke' Allah; ca' ngagong diret Sénam, go tue dah jengkahe dah nyo' Sen mencaro mensiyo. Mangko semuya' segeno mensiyo ca' nyomah Sen yeng mulah langi' ken tanah ken lawut ken pada' caro' ayie ge'em," jie melekat nyeh.
66014008	Dah nyoe melekat yeng keduwo die ngenjurut melekat yeng pertamo nyeh tadie, lalu bepadah potue. "Kota Babel yeng bosai yeng tekemuko nyeh dah tumpar bis dah!" jie. "Dah punah ranaham! Go reng di Babel nyeh nan nari' nyuroh pada' suku benso nunoe keingín sidoe yeng nan royal ngeroyal nyem,* keedah reng yeng memana' nyunsong betore minúm sampai mabo'," jie melekat.
66014009	Jedi dah nyoe melekat yeng ketigo die ngenjurut melekat yeng keduwo tadie, lalu iyo bepadah ken suwaro ontapam. "Sopai ja' yeng nyomah ke' binatang ken patong keramáte, ken sopai ja' yeng ditano ken tano binatang beyi' di konínge beyi' di jerie pun," jie,
66014010	"pasti dikegodie Allah, diukum Sen rajo kejam. Kegodie Allah mat ngatam, paling biso, keedah ayie angur yeng gei' anínge. Jedi sopai ja' yeng nyomah ke' binatang nyeh ibarat ke' insup din langko' dipemana' nginsup ayie angur nyoe, yeng dah dipanting ke' lem cawane. Maksute sidoe langko' disensare ke' lem api yeng dibero' ke' merirang yeng ranyau. Ukum sidoe langko' diperati disaksi le' pada' melekat suci ken Ana' Domo pun.
66014011	Api yeng nyensare sidoe nan serarat benyalo nyem, ken asape ngamol bebem-buwo seora'-ora'eam. Jedi sidoe yeng nyomah ke' binatang ken patong keramáte, demo ke' sopai ja' yeng ditano ken demoe pun mat serarat nan disensare nyem lem api nyeh siyang malam noe berenti-renti," jie melekat nyeh.
66014012	Jedi ngaso tokoh nyoe mangko pada' engku Allah yeng tuno' taalo' ke' Sen ken yeng mutu patoh ke' Yesus nyeh mat ca' sabar ngetate nyem des ngerudu pai-pai pun; nang na' nyangkal kepecayoe.
66014013	Dah nyoe ku ningo suwaro yeng bebungi deri serugo. Jie, "Tue ne yeng ca' ditulis lem buko' kau, ya'am: Dah jemán yeng ugas sensare tue tarah ke' ayah bikaham reng yeng dibunoh tam iyo ngei'e nyangkal Tuwowe," jie. "Mang pun," jie Roh Allah nampong suwaro deri serugo nyeh. "Go sidoe mat dah berentiam bekoyo bekerejo belelah bejoreh, go sidoe mat diupah Sen tam gewai sidoe yeng panci nyeh," jie.
66014014	Dah nyoe perati ku jolu yeng paling enah! Do reng yeng keedah ana' mensiyo, yeng dudo' di románg puteh. Di kepaloe bisei' labong mas, ken di jerie iyo nyenting isau aret yeng tajam.
66014015	Dah nyoe do jum melekat yeng layin agei' yeng pamus deri rumah kediyam Allah. Lalu iyo nyapo ontap ke' reng yeng dudo' di románg nyeh te'. "Tobasam ken isau aret kau nyeh," jie. "Gotamam! Tue dah jengkahe dah. Go deniyo tue keedah umo yeng dah mansa' dah, sedang dah digotam," jie.
66014016	Mangko reng yeng dudo' di románg nyeh mat nobas seruroh deniyo ken arete; ibarat ke' padi din deniyo tue mat digotame nyo' diukum Sen.
66014017	Dah nyoe melekat yeng siko' die, pamus deri rumah kediyam Allah di serugo. Iyo pun nyenting isau aret yeng tajam jum.
66014018	Lalu do jum melekat yeng layin agei' yeng pamus deri soma' bedah pesaling. Tugas iyo nungu api di bedah pesaling. Jedi dah nyoe iyo nyapo ontap ke' melekat yeng siko' yeng nyenting isau aret yeng tajam tadie. "Beyiam," jie, "aret kau nyeh ke' deniyo nun," jie. "Pantusam pada' kupong tanan angur di kebun angur deniyo nun, go dah mansa' dah," jie.
66014019	Dah nyoe melekat yeng siko' nyeh mat makai isau arete di deniyo tue, mat dipantuse pada' kupong tanan angur tadie; dah dipantuse lalu dilojange ke' lem tengkelubang pemorahe. Nyoe mat gemar kegodie Allah tam pada' mensiyo yeng ngelawan Sen.
66014020	Ibarat ke' buwah angur din pada' mensiyo mat diporah lem tengkelubang di luwar kota Yerusalem. Derahe pun ngelayap deri tengkelubange, ngacap kota sampai nyoma' na' duwo meter pendelame*; peluwah iyo ngelayap nyeh do tigo ratus pal. Mat ponyoam des Allah ngukum pada' reng jat gi.
66015001	Dah nyoe perati ku di langi' nun keenah keaneh layin, yeng ugas enaham. Do tujoh ko' melekat yeng nyenting tujoh reno behayo bencano nyo' mempungah mensiyo di deniyo tue. Behayo bencano yeng tujoh reno tue mat behayo yeng pengudah; go mun dah dipelaju tei' maksute Allah dah nyukup nyanto' kegodie Sen (ken mensiyo di deniyo tue).
66015002	Dah nyoe perati ku jolu luwaham keedah lawut, pie koring na' po kaco, ken dibero' digewol ken api ge'em. A, di pinger jolu keedah lawut tei' perati ku do pada' reng yeng noe kalah tam binatang nyeh, go sidoe noe nyomah ke' patong keramát gemar binatang nyomie, ken noe ditano ken demoe. Sidoe nyenting demus yeng diunyo' le' Allah ke' sidoe.
66015003	Jedi dah nyoe sidoe nyanyi sebuwah nyanyi ke' hal gewai Allah ngelalu Musa pelayan Sen mie, ken ngelalu Ana' Domo ge'em. Jie nyanyi sidoe, "Allah Tuwowe yeng Rajo Kuwaso: mat ugas kuwaso ken enaham pada' gewai Den. Pada' gewai ulah tingkah laku Den mat-mátam, bujor benaram, Rajo semuya' segeno suku bensoei.
66015004	Patutam pada' mensiyo gola' ken Den, Tuwowei. Semuya' segeno mensiyo mat ngagong demo Den. Go ngat Dénam yeng suci bereseh. Semuya' suku benso langko' manu nyomah ke' Den, go pada' gewai Den yeng mat nyeh dah nyato dah," jie nyanyie.
66015005	Dah nyoe perati ku tekoba'am rumah kediyam Allah di serugo nun, sampai maloam aku merati arong kediyam Sen di petak paling suci.
66015006	Dah nyoe melekat yeng tujoh ko' tadie pamus deri rumah kediyam Allah. Sidoe nyenting behayo yeng tujoh reno nyeh tadie. Pekakas sidoe kayin lenán yeng noe betope' yeng bemalo puteh pepuwo. Dedoe tei' beselepang bonáng mas.
66015007	Jedi dah nyoe siko' deri jolu yeng idup yeng empat ko' nyeh ngunyo' tujoh buwah pingan mas ke' melekat yeng tujoh ko' tei'. Pada' pingan mas tei' bisei' kegodie Allah, yeng idup seora'-ora'eam.
66015008	Tumas pada' melekat nyeh diunyo' ken pingan tei' temosie rumah kediyam Allah tumpat keyayat ponoh bisei' asap tam keagong ken kuwaso Sen. Lalu siko' pun cum reng yeng mampu tamoe ke' rumah kediyam Sen mun bolum santo' behayo bencano yeng tujoh reno yeng langko' dipelaju le' pada' melekat nyeh.
66016001	Dah nyoe ku ningo suwaro ontap deri rumah kediyam Allah, yeng bepadah ke' melekat yeng tujoh ko' nyeh. "Turunam kam," jie, "belungangam kegodie Allah deri pingan mas kam ke' deniyo," jie.
66016002	Lalu mátam. Melekat yeng pertamo nyeh mat pamus, lalu ngembelungang isei' pingane ke' derat. Tumas dibelungange tei' timol pada' kepisoe berah yeng bewu roseh anyer yeng ngarat, mat numpat pada' tuboh mensiyo yeng ditano ken demo binatang yeng nyomah ke' patong keramáte tadie.
66016003	Dah nyoe melekat yeng keduwo nyeh ngembelungang isei' pingane ke' lawut die. Tumas dibelungange tei' temosie lawut nyeh kontan menjedi derah, keedah derah reng matiam. Lalu senika' jolu yeng idup di lem lawut nyeh bemati-matiam.
66016004	Dah nyoe melekat yeng ketigo die, ngembelungang isei' pingane ke' pada' ayie sungai ken caro' ayie, lalu pada' ayie nyoe pun menjedi derah bangam.
66016005	Dah nyoe ku ningo melekat yeng layin, yeng nguwaso pada' ayie, bebungi bepadah. Jedi jie melekat nyeh, "Allah yeng rajo suci, yeng nan serarat doam deri asal nyomie pun: ukum Den tue mat bujor benaram.
66016006	Go sidoe mat numpah derah pada' penijum Den ken pada' engku Den yeng layin. Mangko tue Den nyuroh sidoe ca' nginsup derah, setimpal ken gewai sidoe mie," jie.
66016007	Dah nyoe ku ningo suwaro deri bedah pesaling die yeng nyamut. "Mang pun," jie. "Ukum Den mat bujor benar, mat-mátam, Allah Tuwowe yeng Rajo Kuwasoei," jie.
66016008	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe melekat keempat die ngembelungang isei' pingane ke' mato ari. Tumas dibelungange tei' mato ari pun disuroh Sen bedecar panas terikam, keedah api benyalo, nyo' ngelotup pada' tuboh mensiyo.
66016009	Lalu pada' mensiyo mat lotupam tam panas mato ari yeng ugas angátam. Ngaso belelotup tei' pada' mensiyo menghina ngeremeh demo Allah, tam Sénam yeng nyuroh pada' behayo nyeh tejedi. Pie sidoe ngei'e bebeta' piker, ngei'e ngangkue keagong Allah.
66016010	Dah nyoe melekat yeng kelimo die ngembelungang isei' pingane ke' belai binatang yeng ngencungol deri lawut nyomie. Tumas dibelungange tei' senika' arong yeng berajo ke' binatang tei' temosie sagam gelemátam. Lalu mat tekerising tekerije' pada' mensiyo tam keabis kesaki'e.
66016011	Ngaso ponyoe tei' sidoe menghina ngeremeh demo Allah di serugo tam kepisoe berah ken tam tubohe yeng belotup-lotup yeng saki' nar, pie sidoe bolei'e bebeta' piker ke' hal gewaie.
66016012	Jedi dah nyoe melekat yeng kenám die ngembelungang isei' pingane ke' sungai yeng paling bosai yeng demoe Sungai Eprat. Tumas dibelungange tei' temosie kosat ayie sungai Eprat nyeh, gei' sempayo pada' rajo deri timor nyeh mampu bejelan niti alor sungai nyeh.
66016013	Dah nyoe perati ku do tigo ko' roh jat yeng upoe keedah konyau; yeng siko' tei' pamus deri nyawo nago; yeng siko' tei' pamus deri nyawo binatang, a, ken yeng siko' tei' pamus deri nyawo penijum tiru nyeh.
66016014	Sidoe tigo nyeh mat roh jat deri Pengelakar yeng dikuwasoe to' mulah keenah keaneh. Ken sidoe diutus nyo' ngumpol ngepal pada' serededu deri semuya' rajo di seruroh deniyo, nyo' beperang ngelawan Allah, des ari Allah yeng Rajo Kuwaso langko' ngukum semuya' mensiyo gi.
66016015	-
66016016	Jedi mátam, mat dikumpoleam le' roh jat yeng tigo ko' nyeh pada' rajo ken serededue, di arong yeng demoe Harmagedon lem paner Yunani. "Dingo beh kam," (jie Yesus Tuwowe). "Ca' siyapam, go aku langko' detang noe mererema', keedah perampok yeng detang des reng lengah ledor. Pie berang reng yeng tetap jego yeng dah nyaro' bejue si mat ayah bikaham, maksute kin iyo dah siyap dah, noam iyo telanyang, ken noam iyo rasoe di adap reng rami pun," jie.
66016017	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe melekat yeng ketujoh die, ngembelungang isei' pingane di awáng-awáng. Tumas dibelungange tei' temosie suwaro ontapam kedingo deri belai agong Allah di rumah kediyam Sen. "Dah santo' dah," jie.
66016018	Lalu temosie lang ler! jie kengkitar; gar gur! jie gontu. Seruroh deniyo pun begontar paling kuwat. Selomo noe koloe deniyo tue begontar menguwat nyoe semeja' mensiyo ngendiyam deniyo tue mie pun; mat ngatam penguwate.
66016019	Sampai kota Babel yeng tekemuko nyeh pun tebolah tigo, ken pada' kota di pada' nenggeri nenggero di seruroh deniyo pun mat tumparam. Go Allah kin nan ingát Sen ken doso pada' reng di kota Babel yeng tekemuko nyeh. Mangko sidoe ibarat ke' insup din disuroh Allah nginsup ayie angur deri cawan Sen; maksute sidoe mat ngaso ngetat kegodie Sen yeng ugas ngatam.
66016020	Senika' pulau ayie di seruroh deniyo ken pada' gunóng nyeh mat losi nayápam, mat tang ke' cumam kedemáte.
66016021	Ujan es yeng paling bosai jetue deri langi' ningang pada' mensiyo; do yeng sampai limo puloh kilo pemorate. Sampai pada' mensiyo nyeh menghina ngeremeh demo Allah tam behayo ujan es yeng ugas ngatam.
66017001	Jedi dah nyoe siko' deri melekat yeng tujoh ko' yeng nyenting pada' pingan mas tadie manu ngomóng ken aku. "Kitue ge'," jie. "Ku na' nganyoe madah ke' kau koti caro Allah ngukum betinoe royal yeng tekemuko, yeng diyam soma' pada' ayie.
66017002	Pada' rajo di seruroh deniyo tue gela' ngeroyal ken iyo, ken pada' mensiyo di deniyo pun mat tebeyie jum lem gewaie yeng jat nyeh. Ibarat ke' minúm din mat mabo'am tam nginsup ayie angure," jie melekat nyeh.
66017003	Dah nyoe aku dikuwaso le' Roh Allah sampai besensonam, lalu dibeyie le' melekat ke' padang nun. Dinyoe ku merati siko' betinoe yeng dudo' di binatang yeng jatam upoe. Binatang nyeh mirah, ken segonáp tubohe betulis ken pada' demo yeng menghina ngeremeh Allah. Kepaloe tujoh gie, ken tano'e sepuloh.
66017004	Pekakas betinoe nyeh panci mewaham, warnae ungu ken mirah keedah beju rajo. Mat ngeripasam pada' pekakase, pegemirapam pada' betu permato ken pada' mas ken pada' betu mutiara. Iyo nyenting cawan mas yeng bisei' pada' kebeyat kejeya'e yeng royal ngeroyal yeng ugas ngatam penjate.
66017005	Konínge betulis ken demo yeng ngenggemar gewaie. Jie tulise tei', "Babel yeng tekemuko, bungkong pada' reng yeng ngeroyal ken semuya' segelo gewai jat yeng ugas ngatam penjate di deniyo tue," jie.
66017006	Jedi perati ku betinoe nyeh tei' mabo' derah tam kebenya' pada' engku Allah yeng mutu pecayo ken Yesus yeng dibunohe. Mat tebelonga'am aku merati reng betinoe nyeh te'.
66017007	Pie jie melekat nyeh nyingka' aku, "Gopai go kau tebelonga'? Poe mat noe tawu kau risi'-risi' ke' hal betinoe nyoe ken binatang yeng dikediyame, yeng bekepalo tujoh ken betano' sepuloh nyeh," jie. "Jedi tue ku na' madahe ke' kau," jie.
66017008	"Ke' hal binatang yeng kau perati nyeh iyo mat idup nyomie di deniyo tue, pie tue dah cum dah. Pie dah nyoe gi iyo langko' ngencungol deri tengkelubang yeng selamang, dah nyoe iyo langko' dipunah ranaham. A, pada' mensiyo yeng diyam di deniyo mat langko' tebelonga'am merati binatang nyeh; pie maksute mensiyo yeng demoe noe ditulis di lem buko' yeng bisei' demo pada' reng yeng idup, yeng ditulis sebolum deniyo tue diado mie pun. Sidoe si mat langko' tebelonga'am merati binatang nyeh, go nyomie kin binatang nyeh mat idup di deniyo tue, pie tengkalo tue mat cum dah. Pie dah nyoe gi langko' temosie do agei'am.
66017009	"Jedi ke' hal tue," jie melekat, "reng ca' do kepanai yeng mat, mat ca' belubang pemiker mun na' tawu retie," jie. "Jedi ke' hal kepalo binatang yeng tujoh gie tei'," jie, "nyoe mat tujoh buwah buki', yeng to' kedudo' betinoe royal nyeh.
66017010	Nyoe mat gemar beyang tujoh ko' rajo. Limo ko' deri sidoe nyeh dah cum dah kuwasoe, cum dah sidoe merentah di deniyo tue. Yeng siko' nyeh si gei' merentah tengkalo tue. A, ken yeng siko' nyeh bolum iyo merentah kei rajo. Pie dah iyo merentah gi pun mat langko' merentah sebentaram.
66017011	Jedi dah rajo yeng tujoh ko' begiler merentah nyeh dah nyoe binatang yeng ngencungol deri tengkelubang die, yeng nyomie idup pie tue dah cum dah, iyo die yeng langko' merentah kei rajo yeng pengelapan nyeh. Iyoam penggenti sidoe tujoh ko' nyeh. Dah nyoe iyo pun langko' dipunah ranaham.
66017012	"Jedi ke' hal sepuloh tano' yeng kau perati nyeh," jie melekat, "nyoe sepuloh ko' rajo, yeng gei' bolum merentah. Dah nyoe gi si sidoe sepuloh langko' dikuwaso nyo' merentah beroto ken binatang nyeh, pie sidoe merentah sejurusam.
66017013	Sidoe sepuloh nyeh mat seati sepiker seiyo sekatoam ngaji binatang nyem, mangko hak sidoe ken kuwasoe diserahe ke' binatang nyeh.
66017014	Lalu rajo yeng sepuloh ko', beroto ken binatang nyeh, langko' beperang ngelawan Ana' Domo, pie sidoe dikalah le' Ana' Domo nyeh ken pada' reng yeng mutu nunoe iyo, yeng diunang diamie ken dipileh le' iyo. Mangko Ana' Domo ken reng yeng mutu nunoe iyo nyeh tei' mat monángam, go iyo mat Tuwowe di atas pada' tuwowe ken Rajo di atas pada' rajo," jie melekat.
66017015	Dah nyoe iyo manseh nyamong panere. "Jedi pada' ayie yeng diperati kau, yeng dikediyam betinoe yeng ngeroyal nyeh," jie, "nyoe mat keedah pada' kawum kerabat pada' suku benso pada' paner dongéng ken pada' nenggeri nenggero di seruroh deniyo tue.
66017016	Jedi binatang yeng jat ken tano'e yeng sepuloh nyeh (maksute sepuloh ko' rajo nyeh) mat langko' risie ken betinoe royal. Sidoe langko' munah ranahe sampai telanyang anyau-anyau, lalu dibunohe. Isei'e langko' disegoe, ken tulange dicucole.
66017017	Semuya' nyoe pun tam kona' kemawo' Allaham. Maksute Sénam yeng nyuroh ati rajo yeng sepuloh ko' nyeh tadie gei' na'e nyerah kuwasoe ke' binatang jat nyeh. Pie nyoe pun to' ngelaju kona' kemawo' Sénam; mangko binatang jat nyeh mat merentah sampai semuya' posan payit Allah mat dituntongam.
66017018	A, jedi ke' hal betinoe yeng kau perati tei', nyoe mat keedah kota yeng tekemuko yeng nguwaso merentah semuya' rajo di deniyo tue," jie melekat.
66018001	Jedi mátam. Dah nyoe perati ku melekat yeng layin die, turun deri serugo. Iyo mat ugas kuwaso ken gegah bereniam; cayoe nyacas sampai seruroh deniyo tampa' tam keagonge.
66018002	Jedi dah nyoe iyo bepadah ken suwaro ontap, "Kota Babel yeng tekemuko nyeh tumpar bis dah! Dah punah ranaham! Cum dah kedemáte; tingal kampong temewange dam, yeng bisei' pada' antu setan demo ke' pada' roh jat demo ke'...pada' burong yeng jat yeng dikecicek le' mensiyo," jie.
66018003	"Nyuroh pada' reng Babel dipunah ranah nyeh go sidoe meyie pada' suku benso to' ngeroyal ken sidoe. Ditari'e ngeroyal ken iyo keedah reng memana' betore minúm sampai mabo'. Pada' rajo di seruroh deniyo pun mat ngeroyal ken iyo. A, ge'em go sidoe dipunah ranah nyeh go pai ja' jolu yeng dikona' dikemawo' le' sidoe mat diamie dibolie nyem, sidoe mat noe tawu sabas, sampai pada' pedegang di seruroh deniyo pun menjedi kayo rayoam tam reng Babel nyeh," jie melekat.
66018004	Dah nyoe ku ningo suwaro yeng layin di serugo nun. Jie, "Pada' engku aku ca' pamus keluwaram deri kota nyoe," jie. "Ca' rariam deri nyoe, gei' sempayo kam noe tejorat tam doso sidoe, gei' kam noe konoe behayo beroto ken sidoe.
66018005	Go doso reng Babel nyeh mat dah betugoh-tugoh dah sampai ke' langi'. Allah nan ingát Sen nyem ken pada' gewai jat sidoe.
66018006	Mangko jie ku reng Babel nyeh ca' disensaream na' po iyo nyensare urang. Malah ken paie sidoe mat ca' dibelas duwo kali lipat. Ibarat ke' minúm din reng Babel nyeh ca' dipemana' nginsup deri cawan direte nyem; ca' dipemana' nginsup ayie angur yeng ugas piyetam deri pado yeng dipemana'e ke' betore layin nyomie pun.
66018007	Go ugas kememuwa'am pada' reng Babel nyeh, serarat nyabas keingíne to' pada' jolu; mangko sidoe mat ca' dibelas ken kesaki' kejoreh ken kesusah kesensare yeng ugas ngatam jum. Jie sidoe lem atie nun, Kami si ratu; kamiam yeng merentah betor. Kami si noe iyo reng belu peh. Noe ken kami cagar ngerudu kesusah kesensare; nan serarat nyamán senáng dedoh dempuam kami, jie.
66018008	Mangko tam atie yeng somong tokoh nyoe temosie noe mererema' sidoe dipenjeri ken pada' behayo yeng sekali rap. Sidoe buyun, ken semparan sempitan, ken berato berayi tam benya' pada' reng yeng mati nyeh. Ken sidoe langko' dicucol ken api, go Allah Tuwowe yeng ngukum sidoe mat rajo kuwasoam," jie suwaro di serugo nyeh.
66018009	Lalu mátam. Asap api yeng nyego kota nyoe langko' ketawu le' pada' rajo di deniyo yeng selomo nan ngeroyal ken reng dinyoe, yeng ngerubut ngemuwas semuya' keingíne ken sidoe. Dah merati asap api nyeh tei' pada' sidoe langko' nangis nentumau lolauam.
66018010	Sidoe langko' diyam ke' jewoh tam gupoham merati kota Babel nyeh dah diukum. Sidoe simah nangis ken bepangkas kayisam, "Adohai! Mawaham kota Babel! Kam nyomie tekemuko ken bekuwaso, pie sekali rap dah diukum dah," jie sidoe.
66018011	Pada' pedegang di deniyo pun langko' nentumau lolau susah sontokam jum, tam cum dah reng to' moli pada' berang rega'e,
66018012	demo ke' mas, demo ke' perak, demo ke' pada' betu permato ken betu mutiara, demo ke' bonáng yeng panci mewah alus lopue benso lenán ken sutera, ken bonáng warna ungu ken mirah; a, demo ke' pada' kayu kayan yeng arum benso geru, demo ke' bemacam bejenis jolu yeng dipulah deri bosi, temego, geding deri taring gejah, betu bebosai ken pada' kayu yeng mahal-mahal;
66018013	a, demo ke' kuli' kayu manis, demo ke' pada' rerempah, demo ke' menyán wangi, demo ke' binya' wangi, demo ke' binya' ancit, demo ke' ayie angur, demo ke' binya' saitun, demo ke' genum yeng gei' padi ken topong genum; a, demo ke' ingún pemurun, demo ke' pada' kuda, demo ke' pada' kereta, demo ke'...mensiyo pun, yeng dijuwal le' sidoe to' ulun reng. Mat ugas mewaham pada' berang rega' yeng selomo nan dijuwal reng di kota Babel, pie tue cum dah reng to' molie.
66018014	-
66018015	Mangko pada' pedegang yeng kayo rayo tam jolu yeng selomo nan dijuwale ke' reng di kota Babel nyeh mat diyam ke' jewoh, gupoham merati ukume. Mat nentumau lolauam tam Babel. "Pada' jolu yeng nan dikeayah kam dah cum dah," jie. "Kekayo kesugeh kam yeng berawa' berangáp nyeh tue dah losi nayápam; cum dah kam ngicape agei'," jie.
66018016	"Adohai! Mawaham kota Babel! Kam nyomie mat tekemuko! Pekakas kam mie panci mewaham deri bonáng lenán yeng ungu ken mirah. Ken pada' pekakas di tuboh kam mie pun ngeripas; pegemirapam pada' betu permato ken pada' mas ken pada' betu mutiara pun.
66018017	Pie sekali rap! punah ranaham semuya' segelo kekayo kesugeh kam; bis dah," jie pada' pedegang nyeh. A, ken pada' jeragan kapal lawut, ken pada' kuli kapal, ken pada' reng yeng numpang di kapal nyeh, ken sopai pun yeng pencarei'e di lawut nyeh mat langko' merati jum deri jewoh asap api yeng nyego kota Babel nyeh.
66018018	-
66018019	Dah sidoe merati asap api yeng nyegoe tei' sidoe langko' simah nangis nentumau lolau jum, ngamur ngawúp debu ke' kepaloe. "Mat cumam kota yeng menyamo kota tekemuko nyoe," jie. "Adohai! Mawaham kota yeng nyomie tekemuko," jie. "Pada' tuwowe kapal menjedi kayo rayo pun ketegal tam kekayo kesugeh deri kota nyoam, pie temosie sekali nyáp! losi nayápam. Mat punah ranaham," jie sidoe.
66018020	Dah nyoe do bungi suwaro nyingka' pada' engku Allah die. "Babel dah diukum dah," jie. Kam ca' beayah bikaham di serugo nun! Ayah bikaham, pada' pelantar posan ken penijum ken engku Allah yeng layin! Go Allah dah ngukum reng di kota nyoe, dah melas gewaie to' kam," jie.

Semuya' tona' ngat pelayan Sen nyem," jie melekat nyeh.
66022010	Dah nyoe, "Semuya' segelo yeng ditijum lem buko' tue," jie melekat, "mat ca' diagah dicerito; nang na' dipokap diporam, go jengkah semuya' tue langko' tejedi nyeh mat soma' dam.
66022011	Mun reng noe lokas dipadah, maksute dah telampoh dah. Mangko reng yeng bedoso langko' kejulong lem dosoe; a, reng yeng keragame jat nyeh langko' kejulong tam gewaie jat. Pie reng yeng gewaie panci, ken reng yeng suci bereseh nyeh ca' ngeresudu' ngenggewai yeng panci yeng suci bereseh nyeh," jie.
66022012	Jedi jie Yesus, "Dingo beh kam! Ku mat na' detang naram! Seroto ku detang ku langko' ngupah semuya' segeno setimpal ken gewaie.
66022013	Akuam yeng didemo Alpa ken Omega, Epun ken Ujong, Bungkong ken Pengudah semuya' segeloe.
66022014	"Ayah bikaham reng yeng suci bereseh; ibarat ke' beju din yeng nan ditopas bejue, go sidoam yeng behak tamoe ke' kota nyoe ngelalu pintu gerbang nyeh, ken behak jum nyego buwah yeng nyuroh reng idup serarateam.
66022015	Pie pada' reng yeng jat mat noe tamoe ke' kota nyoe, benso reng yeng keedah asue yeng cum ngaji Allah nyeh; a, ken pada' reng yeng bebeco bekengkato, demo ke' reng yeng ngeroyal, demo ke' pemunoh, demo ke' reng yeng nyomah ke' jolu yeng noe Allah, demo ke' reng yeng gela' memuloe si mat noe tamoe ke' kota nyoe; sidoe nan tetap di luwaram," jie.
66022016	"Mat aku Yesusam," jie, "yeng nyuroh melekat ku madah posan payit tue ke' pada' umát gereja. Aku mat buboh ampeh Rajo Daud. Akuam yeng didemo Bintang Timor yeng Pemencilang," jie Yesus. "Kam mat ca' ningo aku."
66022017	Jedi mátam. Roh Allah ken penganting Ana' Domo nyeh mat ngunang ngamie pada' mensiyo, "Yo' manu ke' Sen!"* jie. A, ken sopai pun yeng ningo posan payit tue ca' ngerubut jum ngunang ngamie pada' betore layin nyo' manu ke' Sen. Diret ca' ngunang sopai pun yeng awus ca' manuam, ca' nerimoam ayie yeng nyuroh reng idup, yeng diunyo' Sen modas- modasam.
66022018	Jedi tue peringát deri aku Yohanes ke' sopai pun yeng ningo tijum di lem buko' tue. Peringát ku tei' ya'am isei' buko' tue nang na' dikurang nang na' ditamah. Mun do reng yeng namah yeng dah ditulis lem buko' tue si Allah pun langko' namah ukume jum, dipenjerie ken pada' behayo yeng ditulis di lem buko' tue.
66022019	A, ken mun do reng yeng ngurang merayan separo yeng ditulis di lem buko' tue iyo mat didah le' Allah ngicap buwah yeng nyuroh mensiyo idup, ken didah Sen jum diyam di kota suci na' po yeng ditulis di lem buko' tue.
66022020	Yesusam yeng besaksi ken semuya' yeng ditulis ditue sengejo mat-mátam, lalu iyo mat bepadah ke' diret, "Aku mat na' detang naram, kamei," jie. Amin! Kiroe mat lokas detangam, Yesus Tuwowe.
66022021	Salam aku Yohanes berekat dolat deri Yesus Tuwowe ke' semuya' segeno kam. Amin.
